40001001	Chisɔsi bemba n ta bemba n fan nɛ. Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ, min bɛɛ bɔ‑a Ebeami 'a dambi ɔ.
40001002	Ebeami an‑na Aisaki suun, Aisaki an‑na Chekɔpi suun, mbɛ Chekɔpi‑a Chuda suun, ni a suun ma nyɔɛ kaima nu.
40001003	Chuda an‑na Pɛɛsi suun, an fea Sɛya a. An de tɔɛ an nii nɛ Tama. Pɛɛsi an‑na Ɛson suun, mbɛ Ɛson‑na Dami suun.
40001004	Dami an‑na Aminadabi suun, Aminadabi‑a Naason suun, mbɛ Naason‑na Samon suun.
40001005	Samon an‑na Bowasi suun, min de tɔ ni Daabi. Bowasi an‑na Wobɛdi suun, min de tɔ ni Dutu. Wobɛdi‑a Chɛsi suun.
40001006	Mbɛ Chɛsi‑a Mansa Defidi suun. Defidi an‑na Sɔɔmon suun, min de ni Wuyia 'a musu a.
40001007	Sɔɔmon an‑na Dɛoboami suun, Dɛoboami an‑na Abicha suun, mbɛ Abicha‑a Asa suun.
40001008	Asa an‑na Chɛosafati suun, Chɛosafati an‑na Choyan suun, mbɛ Choyan‑na Wusia suun.
40001009	Wusia an‑na Chotan suun, Chotan an‑na Aasi suun, mbɛ Aasi‑a Ɛsɛkia suun.
40001010	Ɛsɛkia an‑na Manasɛ suun, Manasɛ an‑na Amon suun, mbɛ Amon‑na Chosia suun.
40001011	Chosia an‑na Chɛkɔnia suun, ni a dɔ kaima nu. A na‑a an suun tima chɛ an na, tima min na an na‑a ta an na Babidon chɛnyɛ ɔ.
40001012	Mbɛ an 'na yɛenɛ gbakɔ, a ka Babidon, an‑na den chɛ n fan suun. Chɛkɔnia an‑na Sadatiyɛ suun, mbɛ Sadatiyɛ‑a Sɔɔbabɛɛ suun.
40001013	Sɔɔbabɛɛ an‑na Abiudi suun, Abiudi an‑na Ɛdiakin suun, mbɛ Ɛdiakin‑na Asɔ suun.
40001014	Asɔ an‑na Sadoki suun, Sadoki an‑na Akin suun, mbɛ Akin‑na Ɛdiudi suun.
40001015	Ɛdiudi an‑na Ɛdeasa suun, Ɛdeasa an‑na Matan suun, mbɛ Matan‑na Chekɔpi suun.
40001016	Chekɔpi an‑na Chosɛfi suun, min 'na musu ni Mɛi a, min na‑a Chisɔsi suun, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Chasi, kunka mansa.
40001017	A ka Ebeami ma a ta Mansa Defidi tena, bemba n ta bemba tan kun ma naanin fan suun‑da. A ka Defidi 'a tima ma, a che an ta‑a tima min na Babidon, bemba n ta bemba tan kun ma naanin fan suun‑da. A ka tima chɛ ma to, aan a sɔ Chasi suun tima ma, min ni kunka mansa a, bemba n ta bemba tan kun ma naanin fan suun‑da.
40001018	Chisɔsi Chasi suun‑da ka wan. Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Chosɛfi. A na‑a Chisɔsi de Mɛi too ɔ dia wan, a si koe a musu a. Chɛɛ yatina, an mbe e na to si‑a, Yataa Nyina‑a a ma wan Mɛi bu ma‑a.
40001019	Chosɛfi‑a bu koe chɛ ɔ sɔn kɛn, a na‑a a yii na chii wan, a ni a boo bɔ a ma koe ɔ yɛdɛn. Koe min na mu, mɔ tandenɛ ni a a, a nii ma to ni a ni baa bɔ Mɛi ma fanka ɔ.
40001020	Chɛɛ ɛ kɛn an yiinachii chɛ ɔ, a yen ko, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka na‑a a tena cho ɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Chosɛfi, Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ nyɔɛ, i ma sika Mɛi si koe a i 'a musu a. Koe min na mu, a‑a bu min ya ka, Yataa Nyina an‑na a be a ma.
40001021	Ɛ den kainɛ suun‑da wan. A sin, ni a‑a a suun, a tɔɛ si, i ɔ, Chisɔsi. Koe min na mu, ɛ a 'a mɔɛ n bɔ‑a wan an 'na ko yama n dɔ.”
40001022	Chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a gbɛ, min mbe a ma, Yataa na‑a min fɔ suun a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ye, a ni bɔ a a. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ,
40001023	“A yen ko, sunkun tɔngbɔɛ, min ma kai koe ɔ sɔn, ɛ na tena bu ma‑a, mbɛ a‑a den kainɛ suun. An mbe an den chɛ chee‑a wan, an dɔ, Imanuɛɛ,” min fasaien mu, Yataa ɛ mmɔ tɛ ɔ.
40001024	Mbɛ Chosɛfi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ kɛn chinɔɛ chɛ ɔ, a‑a Mɛi fuu wan, yɔ Mansa Yataa 'a maeka‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ a ye, a ni a ma.
40001025	Chɛɛ a nii ma a sɔn ni a 'a musu a, aan tima chɛ a, tima min na a‑a den kaien chɛ suun. Mbɛ Chosɛfi‑a a tɔɛ si, a ɔ, Chisɔsi.
40002001	Chisɔsi na‑a suun gbɛ Bɛtɛɛn duu ɔ wan, Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a tima kɔɔ ni. A tima chɛ a, a yen ko, yiimatɛ tɔɛ n na‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a ka tee bɔ, chɛnyɛ ɔ yansama ɔ.
40002002	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Den toa chɛ ɛ mende, min suunden mu ma koe a Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa wa a? Koe min na mu, nn‑na a tɔmbuaka yen fan pan tee bɔ, a sin, nn na‑a, nn ni tando be a ma.”
40002003	Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a chɛ a min kɛn, a ma‑a wan a ma faayɔn ba a, an bɛ Chuusaɛn mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.
40002004	Mbɛ a‑a Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n gbɛɛ, a‑a an na kan, a basan Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na. A‑a an dɔ tisa, an ni a ɔ yian a a, ni Chasi suun‑da kaina min, kunka mansa chɛ.
40002005	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Ɛ suun tena Bɛtɛɛn fan, Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A mu min na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ na‑a a nyɛn ka wan, a ɔ,
40002006	‘Yataa ɔ, Wo wan Bɛtɛɛn mɔɛ nu, Chuda tanda ɔ, duu pɛɛ ma wo 'a duu a, duu gbau gbau n tɛ ɔ Chuda. An dɔ mu, ya ɔ sɔɛ ɛ bɔ tena, min mbe n 'na Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n kun ma fɛn‑da.’ ”
40002007	Mbɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a sonda chɛ n chee, miin‑na tɔmbuaka sɔn ka. An dechee chɛ tɛ ɔ, a‑a a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ a ka an na, tɔmbuaka chɛ bɔ‑a tima min gbu a.
40002008	Mbɛ a‑a an na ta Bɛtɛɛn, a ɔ, “Wo ta, wo ni wo ya a kan den chɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ. Ni wo‑a a yen, wo na a ɔ yian n na, min mbe a ma, n bɛɛ n ni ta tando be a ma.”
40002009	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ an‑na chia bia, an ta‑a. An to‑a ta an na, mbɛ an‑na an tɔmbuaka yen to, an na‑a min yen pan tee bɔ. A ta‑a an ya ɔ aan, mbɛ a sɔ‑a chidi kaina chɛ kun ma, den toa chɛ ni kaina min.
40002010	An‑na tɔmbuaka chɛ yen kɛn, an‑na buɔdia min bɔ, a da a ni koo.
40002011	An don‑da kɛn chen chɛ a, mbɛ an‑na den chɛ tan, an fea a de Mɛi a. Mbɛ an‑na an kumbai gbangban, an‑na tando be a ma. An‑na samba n na bɔ, samba baa gbɛɛ ma nu, an na‑a miin na den toa chɛ ye. Sanu ni wan nɔ, ni fen kunyɛ a diama fea, an ni miin chee, an dɔ, fankinsɛnsi, ni dɔndɔɛ min tɔ ni maa.
40002012	Mbɛ Yataa‑a an na si wan cho ɔ, mbɛ an ma bɔ Mansa Ɛdɔdi waa chia a. An‑na chia dɔ mende ya wan, an yɛ‑a.
40002013	Yiimatɛ tɔɛ chɛ n taenɛ gbakɔ, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka na‑a Chosɛfi tena cho ɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Chosɛfi, i a sɔ, i ni den chɛ ya, an fea a de a, i ni i nun a ta Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Wo ma na, aan ni tima min na, n mbe a fɔ‑a i ye, na koe a. Koe min na mu, Mansa Ɛdɔdi ɛ na tena wan a ya a kan‑da den chɛ a, a ni a kasaa.”
40002014	Mbɛ a‑a a a sɔ, a‑a den chɛ ya, ni a de, an‑na an nun su ɔ, an‑na tachɛ bun a ma Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
40002015	A sin, an mbe to‑a nɔ wan aan Mansa Ɛdɔdi ni fa. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa da a kuiɛ ni bɔ a a, a na‑a min na ben suun a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a. Mbɛ ɛ na‑a wan a 'a denɛ chee‑a, a bɔ Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
40002016	Mbɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi faa gbandia‑a, a‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ yiimatɛ tɔɛ chɛ n‑na yaa an na tachɛ a a. Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n sɔ, Bɛtɛɛn duu ɔ, a basan a tanda chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ a, denɛ n fa koe a. Den kaima kan kɔ kan, a ka a den toaya ɔ, a ta san fea ɔ, an mbe a fa wan. A‑a a ma, yɔ yiimatɛ tɔɛ chɛ n na‑a tima min nyɔn sima yian a a.
40002017	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Chɛyimaya na‑a min fɔ, a ni bɔ a a.
40002018	A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Di chɛ kuiɛ a yen ko bɔ‑a Dama duu ɔ, di gbafi gbafi chɛ kuiɛ. Dechɛɛ an mbe ka di chɛ‑a a 'a denɛ n ko a, a a ee che maun‑da, pimbi ban‑da don‑da an tɛ.”
40002019	Mbɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi fa‑a. A faenɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Mansa Yataa 'a maeka na‑a Chosɛfi tena cho ɔ Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
40002020	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Chosɛfi, i a sɔ, i ni den chɛ ya, an fea a de a, i ni yɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na chɛnyɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, miin ni den chɛ fɛ a yama boo a, an fa‑a.”
40002021	Mbɛ a‑a a a sɔ, a‑a den chɛ ya, a basan a de a, an bun‑da yɛ‑a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na chɛnyɛ ɔ.
40002022	Chɛɛ a‑a a a min kɛn, mbɛ Akɛdaɔsi an yɛ‑a a fa Ɛdɔdi gbaa mansaya ɔ, Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a chian‑da ta koe a nɔ. A sin, a na‑a dasi ma sɔn fan cho ɔ, min‑na a ma, a ta‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
40002023	Mbɛ a ta‑a, a si‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Yataa na‑a min na ben a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n dɔ, a ni bɔ a a. A ɔ, “An mbe na‑a a chee‑a wan Nasaɛti mɔɛ a.”
40003001	Tima che‑a wan, mbɛ Chɔn, min mbe yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a na‑a fuinɛ ma, Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a bun‑da Yataa 'a bai sa‑a mɔɛ n tena.
40003002	A ɔ, “Wo wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na, wo ni wo ya a mun Yataa ma. A mu min na, Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yian tima, ɛ gbɛ mmɔ ma chenɛ da a wan.”
40003003	Chɔn chɛ ni, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a bai sa a si min ma. Aisaya na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ yen ko gbonka chɛ‑a fuinɛ ma, a ɔ, mɔɛ n ni tan Yataa tena. A ɔ, an ni an fandi n dɔ bɛn Mansa Yataa ya ɔ, yɔ an mbe chia ɔ bɛn buɛ min dɔ an 'na mansa n ya ɔ.”
40003004	Chɔn ma chiien ni koa min na, a nyanden ni soe ti an na. A bu tɛ chiien ni soe gboo an na, a 'a daun fenɛ sin ni kondonɛ an na, a basan kumin tuu a.
40003005	Mɔɛ n na‑a wan a tena, a ka Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, ni Chudia chɛnyɛ tɔɛ n dɔ, a basan Chɔdan yii 'a sanɛ a.
40003006	An dɔn‑da an 'na ko yama n ma, fanka ɔ den. Mbɛ Chɔn‑na yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Chɔdan yii ɔ.
40003007	Chɔn‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ Chu mɔ kuun chɛ nu, an ni miin chee Fayisii nu, a basan chɛ n na, miin ni Sadusii a, an na‑a a tena. An dɔ, a ni yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Chɛɛ a ɔ, “Wo yauaen ba chɛ nu, yɔ ka. Wo ee che wo nun‑da Yataa 'a mɔnɛ ma, min mbe wo ko a.
40003008	Wo chɛ chɛ wai n ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ wo‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na.
40003009	Wo ma wo yii na chii kafai be koe a, mbɛ Ebeami cheeya mu wo a. A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ɛ kun fan a ni sen chɛ n ya, a ni Ebeami cheeya n nyan an dɔ.
40003010	Ni kɔnɛ ma gbɔ chɛndɛ be ni, mɔɛ ɛ a tɛ wan a suu ma, mbɛ a‑a a minda. Wo gbɛɛ wo maen fan mu yɔ kɔnɛ nu. Yataa 'a yende a saen fan mu wo dɔ n tɛ koe a wo suu ma, wo wɛn mbe ee ko chɛndɛ ma‑a.
40003011	N fan, n mbe yii an chɛ wo kunɛ ɔ, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ wo‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na. Chɛɛ mɔ dɔndɔ ɛ na tena n gbaa, a benden mu n ma kaka. N gbu sin mbe ee che a 'a kɔɔwa wɛɛ bia koe a. A tana, ɛ Yataa Nyina a na‑a wan ma koe a wo fɛ, wo wɛn mbe wo kan kɔ sɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n na. Chɛɛ wo wɛn mbe ee wo kan kɔ sɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n na, ɛ wo a ta‑a wan ta ɔ.
40003012	Ɛ mɔ gbu gbɛɛ gbɛmbo‑a wan. Ɛ mɔ gbu chɛndɛ n bɔ‑a wan a yama n ya a, yɔ sɛnɛ sa mɔɛ ɛ fenɛ ɔ fɛ buɛ min dɔ, a pofe bɔ koe a a chɛndɛ ya a. Ɛ a pofe a dɛ‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a chɛndɛ si tena ɔ bɛn. Ɛ mɔ yama n tɔɔya‑a wan kuɔ fɔ ta ɔ, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ a fonɛ minda buɛ min dɔ ta a.”
40003013	A tima chɛ a, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a Chɔdan yii da a, min mbe a ma, Chɔn ni yii chɛ a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
40003014	Chɛɛ Chɔn toen ni kɛn a ni a ma, Chisɔsi yiima ni mun, a ɔ, “I ma chɛ ma n na. A ma bɛnden mu, i wan ni yii chɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. I wan mbe ee na to n tena, n ni yii chɛ i kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.”
40003015	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I ma n kɔɔsa bia. A ma yɔ n‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ i ye a ma koe a. Ni mɔ‑a a ma buɛ chɛ ɔ, mɔ ɛ ma‑a ka Yataa faa ma koe an ma‑a.” Mbɛ Chɔn dɔn‑da.
40003016	A‑a yii chɛ kɛn dechee Chisɔsi kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan yii ɔ. Mbɛ a yen ko, banda da a ka‑a a ya a a, mbɛ a‑a Yataa Nyina yen, ɛ yii‑a yɔ bugbɔɛ, mbɛ a si‑a a ma.
40003017	Mbɛ a yen ko, kuiɛ a min‑da a ka banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ an nɛ, a ko a di n ye kaka. N faa chimaen mu a ko a chɛndɛ chɛ.”
40004001	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a a ma, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a fuinɛ ma, min mbe a ma, Sitana ni a yiima yan, ni ɛ ko yama ma‑a wan.
40004002	A sin, Chisɔsi nii ma fen kɔ fen daun ni a tima chɛ a, tee bi naanin, ni pimbi bi naanin ko a. Mbɛ kɔnkɔɛ‑a a bia.
40004003	Mbɛ yiimayan chɛ na‑a a tena, a ɔ, “Ni Yataa 'a denɛ gbu mu i a, a ma wɛ senɛ chɛ n ni mun biidi a.”
40004004	Chɛɛ a ɔ, “Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, ‘Daun fenɛ dechee ma fenɛ a, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni ma fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ bai kan kɔ kan, Yataa‑a min fɔ, an mbe fɔɛ chɛndɛ be mɔɛ ma.’ ”
40004005	Mbɛ Sitana‑a a ya, mbɛ a ta‑a gbɛ a a Yataa 'a duu ɔ, Chuusaɛn. Mbɛ a sɛ‑a a a Yataa 'a kata kun tɛ, kaina a yansama wa.
40004006	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Ni Yataa 'a denɛ gbu mu i a, tin bɛ duu ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɛ a fɔ‑a wan a 'a maeka n ye, an ni i kun ma fɛn chɛndɛ chɛ. A ɔ, an mbe an boo si‑a wan i kɔɔ, min mbe a ma‑a, i chenɛ wɛɛ ee tu‑a senɛ a.’ ”
40004007	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te to, a ɔ, ‘I ma i 'a mansa Yataa ɔ siman.’ ”
40004008	Mbɛ Sitana‑a a ya to, mbɛ a sɛ‑a Chisɔsi a kɔnkɔ wa kun tɛ. Mbɛ a‑a chɛnyɛ n gbɛɛ yian a a dunya chɛ ɔ, a basan an dɔ nyanɛ n gbɛɛ a.
40004009	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Ni i‑a i kumbai gbangban n chen kɔɔ, i ni n fai, chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a i ta an na.”
40004010	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Ka n fɛ, Sitana, ta. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, ‘Mɔɛ e i 'a mansa Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an fai dechee, mbɛ i yɛ‑a, i‑a a ma wai chɛ.’ ”
40004011	Mbɛ Sitana gbu ka‑a Chisɔsi fɛ, a ta‑a. A yen ko, mbɛ maeka n na‑a, an‑na a deman.
40004012	A tima chɛ a, Chisɔsi‑a a a min, mbɛ an‑na Chɔn sa pimbi chenɛ a. Chisɔsi yɛ‑a wan Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
40004013	Chɛɛ a nii ma dɔn ni si koe a Nasaɛti duu ɔ. A na‑a ben fan, a ta Kapanaun. Kapanaun ni duu an na Kadidi yii daa baima, a sin, a ni Sɛbudɔn ni Nafadi tanda n tɛtɛ ma wan.
40004014	Chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a bai min fɔ suun, a ni bɔ a a. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ,
40004015	“Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, Sɛbudɔn tanda ɔ, Nafadi tanda ɔ, min mbe yii wa fɛ, Chɔdan yii a sanɛ, mɔɛ n baa, miin ma Chu mɔ a.
40004016	Mɔɛ nu nɔ, pimbi pimbi ɔ, an‑na Yataa 'a bauncha manɛ yen gbɛ. Chɛ nu, saya pimbi ɔ, an‑na manɛ yen.”
40004017	A ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ wan Yataa 'a bai sa‑a. A ɔ, “Wo wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na, wo ni wo ya a mun Yataa ma. A mu min na, Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yian tima, ɛ gbɛ mmɔ ma chenɛ da a wan.”
40004018	Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni tachɛ tena wan, Kadidi yii wa kaa a. A na‑a kamin fea n tan fan, dɔndɔɛ tɔ ni Saimɔn, min tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ni Pita, an fea a dɔɛ Anduu a. Nyɛ gbain mɔɛ ni an na, an sin ni nyɛ gbainɛ an na yaa a.
40004019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo nyɛ gbain chɛ boo ka, wo bea n fɛ. Ni wo bea‑a n fɛ, n mbe wo kan‑da wan, wo e mɔɛ n na sɔn buɛ min dɔ na koe a n tena, yɔ nyɛ gbain mɔɛ ɛ nyɛ n na sɔn buɛ min dɔ.”
40004020	A ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na an 'na yaa n boo ka, mbɛ an bea‑a a fɛ.
40004021	A ta‑a ɛnden fan na, mbɛ a‑a suun ma nyɔɛ kaima fea n yen, Chimisi an fea Chɔn na, kai Sɛbɛdi 'a denɛ nu. An bɛ an ni an fa Sɛbɛdi a dɛndɛ ɔ, an mbe an 'na yaa n dɔ bɛn‑da. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a suun ma nyɔn fea chɛ n chee.
40004022	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na an fa to dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ, an ta‑a.
40004023	Chisɔsi ben ben‑da wan Kadidi chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ ta‑a mɔɛ n kan‑da Chu mɔɛ n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na. A ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian fan to mɔɛ n na, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n baun an 'na gbandi kan kɔ kan dɔ, miin ni an ma.
40004024	A ma tɔɛ ta‑a wan Siyia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, min‑na a ma, mɔɛ na‑a a tena mɔɛ n na, gbandi sɛsɛ ni miin ma. An na‑a chɛ n na kɔsɔɛ ni miin gboo ɔ, gbɔgbɔi ni miin na be‑a, nyina yama ni miin fɛ, a basan namaa an na. Gbandi mɔ kan kɔ kan dechee, an na‑a wan an na a tena, a sin‑na an gbɛɛ a baun fan.
40004025	Fanka fanka bea‑a wan a fɛ, a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ka Duu Tan dɔ chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ka Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a basan Chudia chɛnyɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Mbɛ dɔ n ka‑a tanda chɛ ɔ, Chɔdan yii gbaa chia.
40005001	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ fanka fanka chɛ a sɔn‑da a ma, a sɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ a. A si‑a kɛn nɔ, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n gbɛn‑da a ma.
40005002	Mbɛ a‑a a kuu sɔ an kan‑da, a ɔ,
40005003	“Mɔɛ miin‑na a ɔ sɔn chia ee nɔ, mɔɔ ni Yataa basan‑da an ma, an duaen mu. Yataa an mbe ma‑a an 'na mansa a.
40005004	“Mɔɛ miin mbe di chɛ‑a, an duaen mu. Yataa ɛ di ka‑a wan an ya a.
40005005	“Mɔɛ miin dɔ ma fasi ni, an duaen mu. Yataa ɛ duu gboo chɛ gbɛɛ be‑a wan an ma, an ta a.
40005006	“Mɔɛ miin mbe an faa gbɛɛ chɛ‑a Yataa faa ma koe ma koe a, an duaen mu. Yataa ɛ faachima be‑a wan an ma.
40005007	“Mɔɛ miin mbe chinchin an bɔɛ n ma, an duaen mu. Yataa ɛ chinchin‑da wan an ma.
40005008	“Mɔɛ miin faa ɔ gbɛen mu, an duaen mu. An mbe Yataa yen‑da wan.
40005009	“Mɔɛ miin mbe mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ bɛn, an duaen mu. Yataa ɛ an ya‑a wan a 'a denɛ n na.
40005010	“Mɔɛ miin mbe ko yawaenɛ ɔ yen‑da, Yataa faa ma koe ma koe a, an duaen mu. Yataa an mbe ma‑a an 'na mansa a.
40005011	“Ni mɔɛ n‑na ko yawaenɛ sa wo ma, an ni wo main, an ni fania yama kan kɔ kan fɔ wo ma, n fan, n bakoe a, wo duaen mu.
40005012	Wo bu ɔ ni dia kaka, koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ chenama sa tena ɔ bɛn‑da wan wo ko a banda bu ɔ. Wo wo faa bia, a mu min na, an‑na ko yawaen dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an sa suun Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n ma, an‑na min sa ka wo wɛɛ ma.”
40005013	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo maen fan mu yɔ kuiɛ mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ ni kuiɛ ɔ sɛ‑a, mɔ ee che to i ni a ma a dia ni yɛ a ɔ. A ma nyin to fen kɔ fen ko a. A nyin dechee mɔ ni a a dɛ baa ma, mɔɛ n mbe tɛn tɛn a ɔ kaina.
40005014	“Wo maen fan mu yɔ sanku manɛ, mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a dunya chɛ ɔ. Duu wa min mbe sɔ ɔ kɔnkɔ a yansama kun tɛ, a ee che nun‑da.
40005015	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee dambo a man, mbɛ a‑a a don samba kɔɔ. Chɛɛ ɛ a si kaina wan, ɛ manɛ be kaina mɔ ɔ mɔ ma chenɛ bu ɔ.
40005016	A sin, mbɛ i wan, i wɛn maen mu yɔ sanku manɛ, i bɔɛ mɔ gbu n ko a, a ma i 'a manɛ ni man i bɔɛ mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni a ɔ yen, e wai chɛndɛ min chɛ tena. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, an ni tando be Fa Yataa ma, min mbe banda bu ɔ.”
40005017	Chisɔsi ɔ, “A ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ n na‑a a fɔ koe an na mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ an ma an too ma sɔ to sawa chɛ n ma, Yataa‑a miin be suun Mosisi ma, a basan bai chɛ na, min be‑a Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n ma. N ma na ni chɛ an na. Chɛɛ n na‑a, min mbe a ma, sawa chɛ nu, a basan gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n 'na bai n na, an ni bɔ a a.
40005018	Koe min na mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ tima min na dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ wɛ nɔ, sawa chɛ ɛnden bɛɛ ee ka a a, aan bai miin fɔ‑a a ɔ, an ni bɔ a a.
40005019	Mɔɛ min mbe sawa chɛ pɛɛ ɛnden bɛɛ yɔn‑da, ɛ ta‑a mɔɛ n kan‑da a yɔn koe ma, a ee nyan‑da a ko a. Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ma‑a wan mɔ pɛɛ ɛndenɛ a, mɔ gbu n tɛ, miin mbe na‑a don‑da a 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe bea‑a sawa chɛ fɛ, a ni mɔ dɔ mende n kan a a, ɛ nyan‑da wan a ko a. Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ma‑a mɔ chenama an na, mɔ gbu n tɛ, miin mbe na‑a don‑da a 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
40005020	N mbe a fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ wo ee don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, mɔɔ ni wo‑a wo sɔɛ don Yataa faa ma koe ma koe a, a ben Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, an bɛ Fayisii n na.”
40005021	Chisɔsi ɔ, “A ɔ yianden fan mu wo a, Yataa na‑a min fɔ suun mɔɛ n ye. A ɔ, ‘Wo ma mɔ fa, ni sawa ma min fɔ ni. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe mɔɛ fa‑a, ɛ gbɛmbo‑a wan.’
40005022	Chɛɛ n mbe sanche gbɛ a fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ faa tɛ‑a a ɔ benden ba a a, a suun ma nyɔɛ ma, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ gbɛmbo‑a wan. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe bai yama sa‑a a suun ma nyɔɛ ma, an mɔɛ chɛ ta gbɛmbo kɔ ɛ gbɛ‑a wan, Chu kuti wa ɔ. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a fɔ‑a a suun ma nyɔɛ ma, a ɔ, ‘Yataa sɔn bai mu a a,’ a mɔɛ chɛ nɛnɛ ɛ ta‑a ta an dɔ, ni a fa‑a.
40005023	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ni i ma‑a na‑a i 'a yasi a Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ a puin‑da i yii ma, mbɛ i na‑a ko yama ma wan i suun ma nyɔɛ a,
40005024	i 'a yasi chɛ to nɔ, yasi minda gbengbe chɛ ya kɔɔ. Mbɛ i ta‑a a ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ i‑a a ma wo tɛ bai sa‑a, wo fea i suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ a. E yɛ‑a wan gbɛ, i ni i 'a yasi chɛ bɔ Yataa tena.
40005025	“A ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, bai ni sa wo tɛ bui chɛ a, wo fea i koɔ nyɔɛ a, a e na to bɔ‑a sawa chen kɔɔ. Ni chɛ ma, i koɔ nyɔɛ ɛ i be‑a wan sawa kun ti ma, min mbe i a ben‑da sawa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n tena, mbɛ an‑na i sa pimbi chenɛ a.
40005026	N ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ e ee bɔ‑a pimbi chen chɛ a aan, kɔpɔɛ chɛ dankama gbɔdɛ, an mbe i a bɔnɔ‑a min na, i ni a be.”
40005027	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo‑a a a min fan, min na‑a fɔ suun, mbɛ mɔ ee waa ma basan mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na.
40005028	Chɛɛ n mbe sanche gbɛ a fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a musu ma fɛn aan, musu koe ni puin i yii ma musu chɛ ko a, mbɛ a mɔɛ chɛ‑a waa an ma basan ka musu a, a faa ɔ, a ee fuu ɔ min na.
40005029	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ni i boo nyima ɔ ya, an mbe i a dɛ tena ko yama ɔ, a bɔ, i ni a a dɛ. Ɛ nyan fan i ni fo i sɔna dɔndɔ a, a ni ben i ta koe ma i sɔna gbɛɛ a kandenɛ a ta ɔ.
40005030	Ni i boo nyima ɔ boo, an bɛɛ ɛ i a dɛ tena ko yama ɔ, a tɛ a a, i ni a a dɛ. Ɛ nyan fan i ni fo i sɔna dɔndɔ a, a ni ben i ta koe ma i sɔna gbɛɛ a kandenɛ a ta ɔ.”
40005031	Chisɔsi ɔ, “A fɔen fan mu to, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo ka a 'a musu a, a mɔɛ chɛ ni siiya gboo be an musu chɛ ma. An mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ a wan mɔ kaima chɛ wandi, an‑na a boo ka musu chɛ a.
40005032	Chɛɛ n mbe gbɛ sanche a fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo ka a 'a musu a, ko dɔ mende ko a, min ma waa ma basan koe a kai dɔ mende a, mbɛ an mɔɛ chɛ, a‑a musu chɛ ma waa ma basan mɔɛ a kai dɔ mende a, Yataa ya a. A sin, ni mɔ kaima dɔ mende‑a an musu bonda chɛ si musu a, mbɛ a wan mɔ kaima chɛ wɛɛ‑a waa an ma basan ka mɔ dɔ mende 'a musu a, Yataa ya a.”
40005033	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo na‑a a min fan, min fɔ‑a to suun mɔɛ n ye. Ni wo‑a wo gboo ko ɔ ko ma Mansa Yataa tena, wo ma wo da a kuiɛ yɔn, wo an koe chɛ ma.
40005034	Chɛɛ n mbe gbɛ sanche a fɔ tena wo ye, wo ma wo gboo ɛnden bɛɛ a. Wo ma wo gboo banda bu ɔ ɔ, a mu min na, Yataa 'a mansaya sea an nɛ.
40005035	A yɛ to, wo ma wo gboo dunya chɛ wɛɛ ɔ, a mu min na, Yataa chenɛ sɔ tena an nɛ. N mbe ee baa, wo ni wo gboo Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Yataa Mansa Wa an ta mu a a.
40005036	N mbe ee baa to, i gboo koe ma i wandi kunɛ ɔ, a mu min na, e ee che i kundi dɔndɔ wɛɛ fin‑da, chɛ ma, i ni a ma a ni gbɛ.
40005037	Wo e min ma, an mu yɔ chɛ, ni wo dɔn‑da gbɛ koe min ma, wo dɔn a ma wo faa gbɛɛ a. A sin, ni wo ma dɔn ni koe min ma a saa a, wo ma yɛ to, wo ni dɔn a ma a danka a. Bai dɔ mende kan kɔ kan, min mbe bɔ‑a wo da a a ben chɛ ma, Sitana an mbe a ma‑a wo ni a fɔ.”
40005038	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo‑a a a min fan, min na‑a fɔ suun, mbɛ ni mɔɛ‑a mɔ dɔ mende ya bɔ, an mbe a wɛɛ ta ya bɔ wan. Ni a‑a mɔ dɔ mende nyinɛ bɔ, an mbe a wɛɛ ta nyinɛ bɔ wan.
40005039	Chɛɛ n mbe gbɛ sanche a fɔ tena wo ye, wo ma wo ta ɔ nyɔn mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, min mbe ko yama ma‑a wo a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo boo nyima ɔ gbanɛ ɔ gbasi, wo wo man dɔ gbanɛ wɛɛ a mun, a ni a wɛɛ ɔ gbasi.
40005040	Ni mɔɛ‑a wo ma siibia wo 'a wanda fɛsi ko a, wo a be a ma, a basan wo 'a doma kai wɛɛ a.
40005041	A yɛ to, ni soya mɔɛ‑a a din wo ma ta koe a a 'a feanka a mai dɔndɔ ko a, wo ta a a mai fea.
40005042	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo ɔ tisa a deman koe a, wo a deman. Ni mɔɛ toen mu to wo ni kuiɛ be a ma fenɛ a, min mbe wo boo ɔ, wo a be a ma.”
40005043	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo‑a a a min fan, min na‑a fɔ suun, mbɛ wo ni to wo 'a mɔɛ n na, mbɛ wo too‑a wo ko don ma nyɔɛ n na.
40005044	Chɛɛ n mbe gbɛ sanche a fɔ tena wo ye, wo ko don ma nyɔɛ n ko a ni dia wo ye, a sin, wo ni samunɛ chɛ chɛ n ko a, miin mbe ko ma gbaaenɛ sa‑a wo ma.
40005045	Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo e ma‑a wan Fa Yataa, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a gbɔgbɔɔ denɛ n na. Koe min na mu, a wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe a ma, mɔ yama n mbe tee ma sɔn, an basan mɔ chɛndɛ n bɛɛ a. Ɛ a ma wan to, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ n‑na sona ma sɔn, an basan mɔ yama n bɛɛ a.
40005046	Chɛɛ ni wo to‑a dechee mɔɛ n na, miin toen mu wo a a, wo ee tɔnɔn ma sɔn chɛ ko a Yataa a. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ miin mbe pawa kain, an mbe a ma ka wan.
40005047	Ni wo e chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛ dechee wo suun ma nyɔɛ n fan na, tɛ bɔ ee wo ma, wo bɛ mɔ dɔ mende n na. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ miin bɛɛ ma Yataa sɔn, an mbe a ma ka wan.
40005048	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, koadia ma ban wo faa ɔ mɔ dɔ mende n ko a, yɔ koadia ee ban buɛ min dɔ Fa Yataa, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a faa ɔ.”
40006001	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni wo ma‑a a sɔ‑a wo 'a Yataa fai manda n fɛ, wo ma a ma fanka ɔ den. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, Fa Yataa, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a ee na‑a tɔnɔn kan kɔ kan be‑a wo ma.
40006002	“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ni wo ma‑a wai nyima chɛ‑a yɔn tɔɛ n na, wo ma a ma yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin‑na an fandi ya mɔ chɛndɛ a, min mu ka mɔ chɛndɛ ma an na. Ni an ma‑a wai nyima chɛ‑a yɔn tɔɛ n na, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na, an mbe a ma wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a ɔ yen, an mbe koe min chɛ tena. Ni an ma‑a wai nyima chɛ‑a an na dani n bɛɛ ma, an mbe a ma ka wan, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni an tando. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ an ban‑da an 'na tɔnɔnɛ gbɛɛ ma sɔn‑da.
40006003	Chɛɛ a sin, ni i ma‑a wai nyima chɛ‑a yɔn tɔɛ n na, a ɔ nun, i ma a ma mɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan ni a ɔ sɔn.
40006004	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, i 'a wai nyima ni ma nun dɔ koe a. A sin, Fa Yataa, min‑na nun dɔ koe kan kɔ kan dɔ sɔn, ɛ a tɔnɔnɛ be‑a wan i ma.”
40006005	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni wo toen mu wo ni samunɛ chɛ, wo ma a ma yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin‑na an fandi ya mɔ chɛndɛ a, min mu ka mɔ chɛndɛ ma an na. A mu min na, an toen mu sɔ koe a, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na, a basan dani tɔnfɛ n na. An mbe chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni an yen samun chɛ‑a. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ an ban‑da an 'na tɔnɔnɛ gbɛɛ ma sɔn‑da.
40006006	Chɛɛ a sin to, ni i ma‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a, don i 'a dumu ɔ, i ni a da a tɔn, mbɛ i‑a samunɛ chɛ Fa Yataa tena, e ee min yen. A sin, Fa Yataa, min‑na nun dɔ koe kan kɔ kan dɔ sɔn, ɛ a tɔnɔnɛ be‑a wan i ma.
40006007	“A sin, ni wo ma‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a, wo ma yɛ bai dɔndɔ gbe ɔ si tena sɛsɛ, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma Chu mɔ n na. Ɛ wan an yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ɛ an 'na samunɛ a min‑da wan, ni an‑na samun dɔ yansama chɛ.
40006008	Chɛɛ wo ma ma, yɔ an mbe buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, Fa Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, fenɛ miin sɔɛ ɛ wo a, pɛn wo e na to a ɔ tisa‑a.
40006009	Ni wo toen mu wo ni samunɛ chɛ, wo‑a a fɔ, wo ɔ, ‘Fa Yataa, i wɛn mbe banda bu ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni tando be i ma.
40006010	A ɔ ma yansan to, i ni ma mansa a dunya chɛ gbɛɛ kun ma. I faa ma koe, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a ma dunya chɛ ɔ, yɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ banda bu ɔ.
40006011	Nn kɔ nn daun fenɛ a tee chɛ a.
40006012	I boo bɔ nn 'na ko yama n dɔ, yɔ nn bɛɛ, nn mbe nn boo bɔ buɛ min dɔ ko yama n dɔ, an mbe miin ma nn na.
40006013	I ma dɔn ko ɔ ko ni a ma, nn ni ko yama ma. Chɛɛ i ni nn tanka Sitana ma, nyina yama.’ ”
40006014	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Samunɛ ɛ chɛ ka wan, koe min na mu, ni wo‑a wo boo bɔ mɔɛ n 'na ko yama an dɔ, an‑na miin ma wo a, Fa Yataa wɛɛ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan wo 'a ko yama n dɔ.
40006015	Chɛɛ ni wo ma wo boo bɔ ni mɔ dɔ mende n 'na ko yama ɔ, Fa Yataa wɛɛ, a ee a boo bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama ɔ, wo‑a miin ma.”
40006016	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni wo‑a sunɛ bia, wo ma wo ya kɔɔɛ ma digbi digbi, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ n mbe a ma buɛ min dɔ, miin‑na an fandi ya mɔ chɛndɛ a, min mu ka mɔ chɛndɛ ma an na. Ni an ma‑a sunɛ bia‑a, an mbe a ɔ yian fan an ya kɔɔɛ ma mɔɛ n na, mbɛ an mbe ka ko gbɛɛ ma wa an dɔ bia tena. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ an ban‑da an 'na tɔnɔnɛ gbɛɛ ma sɔn‑da.
40006017	Chɛɛ ni wo ma‑a sunɛ bia‑a tima ɔ tima, wo wo ya a ko, wo ni tu kunyɛ a diama sin wo kunɛ a, mbɛ wo‑a a ɔ bɔ fɛsi fɛsi.
40006018	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔ dɔ mende ee a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo e sunɛ ɔ wan. Chɛɛ Fa Yataa, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee min yen, ɛ a ɔ sɔn‑da wan. A sin, Fa Yataa, min‑na nun dɔ koe kan kɔ kan dɔ sɔn, ɛ a tɔnɔnɛ be‑a wan i ma.”
40006019	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma wo 'a nyanɛ a sɔn nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, chisi n mbe an yɔn kaina min, an mbe kasa‑a kaina. Wo ma a a sɔn kaina, kanka n mbe min te, mbɛ an‑na a kanka.
40006020	Chɛɛ i 'a nyanɛ a sɔn banda bu ɔ, i wandi ko a. Nɔ tana, chisi n mbe ee an yɔn, n mbe ee baa, kasa ni an bia. A sin, kanka n bɛɛ ee nɔ te, an ni an kanka.
40006021	Koe min na mu, i 'a nyanɛ ɛ ma‑a sa ɔ kaina, i faa ɛ ma‑a nɔ wan tima ɔ tima.”
40006022	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔ gbu ya ɛ wan yɔ dambo manɛ a gboo ko a. Ni mɔ ya a kaenɛ ma‑a gboden, a gboo gbɛɛ ɛ ma manɛ an dɔ.
40006023	Chɛɛ ni a ya a pimbienɛ ma‑a, a gboo gbɛɛ ɛ ma pimbi an dɔ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ni fenɛ min sin mu dambo a i gboo gbɛɛ ko a, ɛ pimbi ɔ, e pimbi min dɔ, a da a koo kaka.”
40006024	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che ma‑a wai chɛ mɔɛ a kun ti fea kɔɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, dɔndɔɛ ko a ee dia a ye a ni che dɔndɔɛ ɔ. Ɛ kooya be‑a wan dɔndɔɛ ma, a ni ben a bɔɛ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, e ee che wai chɛ‑a Yataa ye, mbɛ i‑a wai chɛ kɔpɔɛ wɛɛ ye dɔndɔ a.
40006025	“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n mbe a fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ wo ma wo gbɔsɔ wo da a daun fen ko a, a basan wo min yii a, ma koe a fɔɛ ɔ. N mbe ee baa, wo ni wo gbɔsɔ wo gboo ko a, wo e fen chii. Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu fɔɛ ma daun fenɛ dechee an na, a yɛ to, koa dechee an ma koe a mɔ gbu gboo ko a.
40006026	Wo konde n yen bɛ, an mbe ee chin fen chin, n mbe ee baa, an ni a a sɛ bea a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Fa Yataa, min mbe banda bu ɔ, ɛ an da kɔ wan. Wo nan gbu sin benden mu kaka konde n ma.
40006027	Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ, faa ni gbaa boo ɔ boo a 'a fɔɛ ko a, chɛ ee a ma tima kundu ɛnden bɛɛ ni sa a kun ma.
40006028	“N ma chia yen ni a ɔ, koe min mbe a ma, wo faa ɛ gbaa chii koa koe a. Wo fia ɔ kɔn chɛ n yen bɛ, miin mbe fu, an mbe koa buɛ min dɔ. An mbe ee wai chɛ, an sin mbe ee koa nyan an fandi ko a.
40006029	Chɛɛ n mbe a fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ mansa Sɔɔmon nyanden ni wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, koa nii a ma min ni nyin a ni che kɔn fu chɛ n dɔ.
40006030	Yataa an mbe kɔnɛ chɛ n ma chii, kɔnɛ min mu ɛ nɛ bi, mbɛ sinan a tɛ‑a, mbɛ wo‑a a minda. Ni ɛ ka wan, wo ma chii koe tana, a mu a ma gbɔsɔɛ an na. Wo 'a danaya ɔ dɔɔ gba.
40006031	“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo faa ma gbaa tima ɔ tima, wo ni bun a fɔ‑a, wo ɔ, wo e fen daun‑da, chɛ ma, wo e fen min‑da, chɛ ma, wo e fen chii‑a.
40006032	A mu min na, wo Fa Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo gbɔsɔen fan mu chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a. Mɔɛ miin ma Yataa sɔn, an fan faa ɛ gbaa tima ɔ tima fen chɛ n ko a.
40006033	Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo a ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a don koe a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, wo ni a faa ma koe ma. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ɛ to‑a wan nɔ, a ni fen chɛ n gbɛɛ be wo ma, miin ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ wo ma.
40006034	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo faa ma gbaa sinan ko a. A mu min na, sinan faagbaa bɛnden mu sinan fan ko a. Bi yakɔɔtawa, a‑a a bɔ bi tee chɛ ko a.”
40007001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma wo bɔɛ n ma bɔ a yama boo a, min mbe a ma, Yataa wɛɛ ee kaa a tɛ‑a wo wakoe ma.
40007002	Koe min na mu, wo e wo bɔɛ n ma bɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ, Yataa wɛɛ ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a ka wan wo wakoe ma. Wo e wo bɔɛ n bia‑a buɛ min dɔ, Yataa wɛɛ ɛ wo bia‑a ka wan.
40007003	Ni kɔn gbondo ma‑a wo ta ya a, wo ma wo faa gbaa bubuu ko a wo bɔ n ya a.
40007004	Wo ee kun wo ni a fɔ wo bɔɛ ye, wo ɔ, a ni ka wɛ, wo ni bubuu ɛnden chɛ bɔ a ya a, min mu ka, kɔn gbondo chɛ ɛ sa ɔ wo ta ya a.
40007005	Wo wan nɛnɛn fea ti chɛ nu, wo kɔn gbondo chɛ bɔ pɛn wo ta ya a, mbɛ wo kun‑da gbɛ kaina yen koe a gbadan, a bubuu chɛ bɔ koe a wo bɔɛ ya a.
40007006	“Wo ma fen chɛ n be wuu n ma, Yataa ta mu fenɛ miin na. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, an mbe an ya a yɛ‑a wan wo ma, mbɛ an‑na wo ma chin chin. A sin to, wo ma wo 'a fen baa gbandenɛ a bea kɔɛnya n ya ɔ. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, an mbe tɛn tɛn‑da wan an dɔ.”
40007007	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo a a tun Yataa ɔ tisa koe a fen kɔ fen ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan wo ma. Wo a a tun wo ya a kan koe a chɛndɛ chɛ, wo e min yan tena, wo e a yen‑da wan. Wo a a tun chenɛ da tu koe a, Yataa ɛ a da a ka‑a wan wo ye.
40007008	Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a a tun‑da Yataa ɔ tisa koe a fen kɔ fen ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a a tun‑da a ya a kan‑da fenɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ, ɛ a yen‑da wan. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a a tun‑da chenɛ da tu koe a, Yataa ɛ a da a ka‑a wan a ye.
40007009	Wo wɛn mu ka mɔ kaima n na, ni i 'a denɛ‑a i ɔ tisa biidi wakoe a, e ee senɛ be a ma.
40007010	A sin to, ni a‑a i ɔ tisa nyɛ ko a, e ee ka be a ma.
40007011	Ni wo wɛn sɔnɛ yau ka, ni wo kosan fan fen chɛndɛ n be‑a wo 'a denɛ n ma, Fa Yataa sin gbɛ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, ɛ fen chɛndɛ be‑a wan wo ma, wo wɛn mbe a ɔ tisa‑a a ko a.
40007012	“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo toen mu mɔɛ n ni koe min nyɔn sima a tachɛ wo tena, min na di wo ye, wo a nyɔn sima an na tachɛ an bɛɛ tena. Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma, a basan gboo chɛ n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n‑na miin nyɛn, an‑na a fɔ ka wan.”
40007013	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ben chen da a dɔɔyaen chɛ 'a chia a, don koe a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. A mu min na, chia min mbe ta tena ta ɔ, a a kaen waun. A ɔ ma gbɛ tachɛ chɛ koe a a a. Mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe ta an chia chɛ sin fan na.
40007014	Chɛɛ chia chɛ dɔɔ gba, chia min mbe ma‑a mɔ ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. An chia chɛ ɔ gbɛ tachɛ koe a. A sin, mɔ sɛsɛ n fan mbe ee ta‑a a a.”
40007015	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ, miin mbe fania fɔ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu an na. An mbe na‑a wan wo tena, an ma chimaenɛ a, yɔ sa. Chɛɛ min mu ka, tea tea ɔ, an yau yɔ yaa.
40007016	An mbe koe miin ma‑a, an mbe a ɔ yian‑da wo a, an mbe buɛ min dɔ. Mɔ ee che kɔn gbɔ chɛndɛ kai‑a kɔn yama ɔ.
40007017	Koe min na mu, kɔn chɛndɛ ɛ gbɔ chɛndɛ an be, mbɛ kɔn yama sin‑na gbɔ yama be.
40007018	Kɔn chɛndɛ ee gbɔ yama be, n mbe ee baa kɔn yama ni gbɔ chɛndɛ be.
40007019	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, an gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n mbe miin ma‑a, an fan mbe a ɔ yian‑da wo a, an mbe buɛ min dɔ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, kɔn kan kɔ kan, min ma gbɔ chɛndɛ be ni, a ɛ tɛ‑a wan, mbɛ a a dɛ‑a ta ɔ.”
40007021	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, miin mbe n chee‑a, ‘Mansa, Mansa,’ miin mbe don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Chɛɛ fɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ, min mbe a sɔɛ don‑da Fa Yataa, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a faa ma koe n ma koe a.
40007022	Ni tee chɛ che‑a, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ n gbɛmbo‑a tee min ma, mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan n ye, an dɔ, ‘Mansa, Mansa, nn ni Yataa bai ɔ yian i wan tɔɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, nn ni nyina yama n gbain i tɔɛ an dɔ, a basan kamaya koe chenama sɛsɛ a, nn ni an chɛ i tɔɛ ɔ wan.’
40007023	Chɛɛ n sin, n mbe a fɔ‑a wan an ye, n dɔ, ‘Wo ka n fɛ. N ma wo sɔn tee, wo wan ko yama ma mɔɛ chɛ nu.’ ”
40007024	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, min mbe n 'na bai chɛ n na min‑da, mbɛ a‑a an ma, yɔ n toen mu buɛ min dɔ an ma koe a, ɛ nyan‑da wan a ko a. Ɛ ma‑a ka wan, yɔ yiimatɛ kamin chɛ, min‑na a 'a chenɛ sɔ faa gbanɛ ma.
40007025	A ɔ ma yansan ni, mbɛ gbɔndɔ wa sona na‑a, mbɛ yii fa na‑a, fia wɛɛ ɛ ta‑a chenɛ gbu fɛ‑a. An ma chen chɛ ɔ maa ni a gba ɔ, a ma bea ni. Koe min na mu, a ni sɔ ɔ faa gbanɛ an ma.
40007026	“Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe n 'na bai chɛ n na min‑da, mbɛ a ma an ma ni, yɔ n toen mu buɛ min dɔ an ma koe a, a ma nyin a ko a. Ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ kamin chɛ, min yiima nii ma tɛ ni, min‑na chenɛ sɔ tɛɛ kuu munyɛ kun ma. A kuu nii ma si ni chɛndɛ.
40007027	A ɔ ma yansan ni, mbɛ gbɔndɔ wa sona na‑a, mbɛ yii fa na‑a, fia wɛɛ ɛ ta‑a chenɛ gbu fɛ‑a. Mbɛ chen chɛ bea‑a, a te‑a gbɔkɔɔ.”
40007028	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn bai chɛ fɔ‑a, mɔɛ miin ni ka nɔ, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, a 'a kan chɛ buɛ ma.
40007029	Koe min na mu, a nii ma an kan ni, yɔ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n ni an kan buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ a tana, a‑a an kan gbasaya wa an na.
40008001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi yii‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ a. A yii‑a kɛn, mbɛ mɔ fanka wa bea‑a a fɛ.
40008002	Mbɛ a yen ko, kamin dɔndɔ, gbandi yama bɔen ni min gboo gbɛɛ ma, a na‑a Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban a chen kɔɔ, a ɔ, “Fa, ni a a di i ye, e kun fan i ni n baun.”
40008003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a boo a ta, mbɛ a tu‑a kamin chɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, “I baun koe a di n ye. Baun gbɛ sanche.” Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, gbandi chɛ baun‑da kamin chɛ ma.
40008004	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “I ma koe chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a, chɛɛ ta dɔndɔ gbe mɔɛ chɛ tena, min mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a, a ni i ma fɛn. Mbɛ i‑a yasi chɛ bɔ nɔ Yataa tena, yɔ sawa, Yataa‑a min be Mosisi ma, a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian‑da mɔ ɔ mɔ a, mbɛ i baun‑da.”
40008005	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ. Soya gbakoo dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min ka‑a Domi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Soya chɛmɛ dɔndɔ an fan ni a kɔɔ. Chisɔsi ni kɛn don‑da nɔ, a na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, disa ɔ.
40008006	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Fa, n 'na bɔi denɛ yen ko sa ɔ chenɛ a, a namaaenɛ ɛ, ɛ tɔɔya‑a gbeden sofa a.”
40008007	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, “Mɔ ɛ ta‑a wan, n ni a a baun.”
40008008	Chɛɛ soya gbakoo chɛ ɔ, “Fa, i ma ta n baa. A mu min na, mɔ a tenden ma n na i don koe a n 'na chenɛ a. Chɛɛ i da a kuiɛ a ben dechee, n 'na bɔi denɛ ɛ baun‑da wan.
40008009	A mu min na, n fandi gbu wɛɛ, n mbe mɔɛ n fan 'na gbasaya kɔɔ, n bɛɛ soya n mbe wan n kɔɔ. N mbe a fɔ wan dɔndɔ ye, n dɔ, ‘Ta,’ mbɛ a ta‑a. N mbe a fɔ wan dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma, n dɔ, ‘Na,’ mbɛ a na‑a. Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ n 'na bɔi denɛ ma, n dɔ, ‘Chɛ ma,’ mbɛ a‑a a ma.”
40008010	Chisɔsi tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, bai chɛ a min koe a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ fanka wa chɛ ma, min ni a sɔ tena a fɛ, a ɔ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ kɛn gba, n ma mɔ bonda chɛ yen nin bɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, min danden mu ka n na.
40008011	Ka wɛ n mbe tea fɔ wo ye. Mɔ sɛsɛ dɔ mende nu, an mbe na‑a wan a ka dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. An mbe si‑a wan kaina dɔndɔɛ, an bɛ Ebeami a, a basan Aisaki an fea Chekɔpi a, an ni daunɛ chɛ Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
40008012	A tima chɛ a, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n sɛsɛ, kaina ɔ bɛnden ni miin ko a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, an na ɛ dɛ‑a wan baa ma, pimbi pimbi ɔ. An mbe ma‑a kaina di chɛ‑a, a basan an nyinɛ a daunɛ a tɔɔya a.”
40008013	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ soya gbakoo chɛ ye, a ɔ, “Yɛ i waa chenɛ a. Ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ i danden mu buɛ min dɔ a a.” Mbɛ a yɛ‑a. A sin, a 'a bɔi den chɛ baun‑da wan bai chɛ fɔ tima a.
40008014	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a Pita 'a chenɛ a. A don‑da kɛn chen chɛ a, a‑a Pita 'a musu de tan fan sa ɔ sofa ma, chima bɔndenɛ ɛ a ma.
40008015	Mbɛ Chisɔsi tu‑a a boo a, mbɛ chima gbandi chɛ bɔ‑a musu chɛ gboo ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a‑a daun fenɛ be Chisɔsi ma, a daun koe a.
40008016	A tee bea chɛ ma, an na‑a wan mɔ sɛsɛ a Chisɔsi tena, nyina yama ni miin fɛ. Chisɔsi da a bai‑a a ma wan, nyina yama chɛ n ka‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ. A yɛ to, a‑a mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n na baun fan, miin gbandienɛ ni.
40008017	A 'a mɔ baun buɛ chɛ, a na‑a a ma wan, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a min fɔ suun, a bɔ‑a a a. Aisaya na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “A‑a mmɔ bɔ wan mmɔ 'a gbandi n gbɛɛ ɔ.”
40008018	Tima dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi‑a fanka wa yen fan a 'a tindanɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, an ni yii wa chɛ tɛ tindi dɔndɔɛ ma.
40008019	Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔ dɔndɔ na‑a a tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Ticha, n ma bɛndenɛ mu bea koe a i fɛ kan kɔ kan, e ta‑a kaina min.”
40008020	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sonɛ n mbe fia ɔ, soe n boo ɔ, a sin konde n bɛɛ nyanɛ n mbe. Chɛɛ kaina kan kɔ kan mbe ee n boo ɔ, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe n gbɛnku kaina n ni n suin.”
40008021	Mbɛ kaminɛ dɔndɔɛ min ni a fɛ mɔɛ a, a‑a a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “Mansa, fa fa‑a. A ma n ni yɛ pɛn, n ni a tɔn.”
40008022	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan a wɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “Bea n fɛ. Mɔɛ miin mbe yɔ mɔ faenɛ nu, an to nɔ, an ni an 'na mɔ faenɛ n tɔn.”
40008023	A tima chɛ a, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na a sɔ a fɛ nɔ.
40008024	Mbɛ an bun‑da ta‑a. A yen ko, fia wa dɛgbɛ‑a a kuu sɔ bɔ‑a yii chɛ a, mbɛ an tima chɛ a, faagbaa ni wan dɛndɛ chɛ kun ma a to koe a yii ɔ. Chɛɛ fia chɛ ni kɛn bɔ tena, Chisɔsi ni sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ wan.
40008025	Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ n ta‑a a tena, mbɛ an‑na a a kunɛ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mansa, nn kun bɔ koe chɛ ɔ. Mmɔ yen ko to‑a yii ɔ.”
40008026	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fen chiandia e nɛ? Wo 'a danaya Yataa ko a, a dɔɔ.” Mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a‑a yii chɛ, an fea fia a, min bɛɛ ni bɔ tena, a‑a an na gban. Mbɛ fia ɔ maun‑da don, mbɛ yii wɛɛ si‑a chidi.
40008027	An fɛn gbɛɛ ni dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an da ɔ gbaa wan a si koe chɛ ma. Mbɛ an dɔ an nyɔn ma, “Fen kamin nyɔn sima mu chɛ a? Ɛ koe min fɔ fia wɛɛ yɛ, a basan yii a, an mbe ma.”
40008028	Mbɛ an‑na yii chɛ tɛ Kadaa tanda ɔ, yii wa chɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ ma. Mbɛ kamin fea n na‑a Chisɔsi tan, miin na‑a bɔ fanɛ a bɛnkuɛ ɔ. Nyina yama an ni an fɛ, min ma chianden ni. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ nii ben an tee na chia a.
40008029	Mbɛ a yen ko, an‑na yee tɛ, an dɔ, “Yataa 'a denɛ, i toen mu i ni fen ma nn na? I na‑a nn na tɔɔya koe an na, tee chɛ ya ɔ, Yataa ɛ dunya chɛ gbɛmbo‑a tee min ma?”
40008030	Kɔɛnya man sɛsɛ n ni wan nɔ, daun chɛ‑a, miin tena ɔ nii ma yansan.
40008031	Mbɛ nyina yama chɛ n‑na Chisɔsi disa, an dɔ, “E nn gbain tena wan kamin chɛ n fɛ. Ni i‑a nn gbain, a ma nn ni bea kɔɛnya man chɛ n fɛ.”
40008032	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo ta.” Mbɛ an ka‑a kamin chɛ n fɛ, mbɛ an ta‑a an bea‑a kɔɛnya chɛ n fɛ. A yen ko, kɔɛnya man chɛ n gbɛɛ ben‑da wan bui‑a, a ka kɔnkɔɛ chɛ kaa fɛ. An yii‑a wan an dɛ‑a yii ɔ, mbɛ an to‑a nɔ.
40008033	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni ka kɔɛnya chɛ n kun ma fɛn tena, an ben‑da bui‑a. An ta‑a duu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a gbɛɛ ɔ yian, min chɛ‑a a ɔ. A yɛ to, min ma‑a kamin fea chɛ n na, nyina yama ni miin fɛ.
40008034	Mbɛ a yen ko, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni an duu chɛ ɔ, an na‑a Chisɔsi tan‑da. Mbɛ an‑na a yen kɛn, an‑na a disa, an dɔ, a ni bɔ an 'na tanda ɔ.
40009001	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a yii wa chɛ tɛ, a yɛ‑a duu chɛ ɔ, a ni kaina si ɔ.
40009002	Mbɛ a yen ko, mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a a tena kamin dɔndɔ a, min ni namaa a, ɛ sa ɔ yaa ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen danaya min nyɔn sima ni an dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ namaa chɛ ma, a ɔ, “N 'na den, i faa ma yɔn. N mbe a fɔ tena i ye, mbɛ n‑na n boo bɔ i 'a ko yama ɔ.”
40009003	Mbɛ sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ n bun‑da a fɔ‑a an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Ɛ wan kamin chɛ yii ma, mbɛ Yataa mu a a. Ɛ ka baa an bɔ tena Yataa ma.”
40009004	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, an 'na yiinachii ni min na. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo 'a yiinachii yau kaka.
40009005	A ɔ ma gbɛ a fɔ koe a namaa chɛ ye, mbɛ n‑na n boo bɔ a 'a ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ a ɔ gbɛ wan a ma koe a, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ, a ni tachɛ chɛ.
40009006	N mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan gbɛ wo a, mbɛ gbasaya ɛ wan n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n boo ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, n boo bɔ koe a ko yama ɔ.” Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ namaa chɛ ma, a ɔ, “N mbe a fɔ tena gbɛ i ye, mbɛ i ni i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni i 'a yaa ya, i ni ta i waa a.”
40009007	Mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a a waa a.
40009008	Mɔ fanka chɛ, miin ni ka nɔ, an‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an chian‑da wan. Mbɛ an‑na Yataa tando, gbasaya sima chɛ be koe a mɔ gbu ma.
40009009	Chisɔsi ka‑a kɛn an kaina chɛ, a to‑a ta an na, mbɛ a‑a kamin dɔndɔ yen. A tɔ ni Matiu, ɛ si ɔ a 'a pawa kain chenɛ a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, “Bea n fɛ.” Mbɛ Matiu‑a a a sɔ, mbɛ a bea‑a a fɛ.
40009010	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ an ta‑a Matiu 'a chenɛ a. Chisɔsi ni kɛn daun chɛ‑a nɔ, mbɛ a yen ko, pawa kain mɔɛ dɔ mende n sɛsɛ na‑a wan, a basan mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin nii sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma. Mbɛ an bɛ bun‑da daunɛ chɛ‑a kaina dɔndɔɛ.
40009011	Mbɛ Fayisii n‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ an‑na a fɔ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n ye, an dɔ, “Wo kan mɔ yen ko, a ɛ daun chɛ‑a kaina dɔndɔɛ, an bɛ pawa kain mɔɛ n na, a basan mɔɛ n na, miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma.”
40009012	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ a ɔ, “Danda chɛ mɔ ma gbɔsɔ ee gboo ɔ bɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ dechee chɛ nu, miin gbandien mu.
40009013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ miin mu mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa tena, n ma na ni an fan ko a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, n na‑a an fan ko a. Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, wo e na to yasi bɔ‑a a tena, a ɔ, wo ni chinchimaya an yian dechee wo nyɔn na. Wo a ma, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ, bai chɛ ɛ fen fɔ tena.”
40009014	Mbɛ an tima chɛ a, Chɔn, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a fɛ denɛ n na‑a Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn mbe sunɛ bia tima ɔ tima, nn bɛ Fayisii mɔɛ n na, chɛɛ i fɛ denɛ n mbe ee a bia ɛnden bɛɛ a. Fen ko a an mbe chɛ ma?”
40009015	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔɛ‑a musu si bɛnɛ chee, mbɛ a bɔɛ n na kan‑da, daun chɛ koe a mu. An mbe ee to nɔ a chen kɔɔ an ni ma faayɔnɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ tima min na mɔɛ n mbe musu si kai chɛ ya‑a an tɛ, a tima a mu an mbe sunɛ bia‑a.
40009016	“A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔ ee che i ni koa nama tɛ a a, doma kɔma dombo koe a. Ni i‑a chɛ ma, doma kɔma chɛ, ɛ yɔn‑da wan a ben a saa ma. A mu min na, koa nama pisi chɛ ee bɛn‑da doma kɔma chɛ ya a.
40009017	A yɛ to, ni mɔ ma‑a gbɛ chɛ‑a gbɛ chɛ soe gboo ɔ, e a chɛ tena soe gboo nama an dɔ, ɛ to kaina aan a a ni kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔ ee gbɛ nama chɛ gbɛ chɛ soe gboo kɔma ɔ, a a kɔɔ koe a, ɛ a te wan, mbɛ i fo‑a gbɛ a, a basan soe gboo a. Mɔ ɛ min ma, e gbɛ nama chɛ soe gboo nama an dɔ. An fea gbɛɛ ee yɔn.”
40009018	Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ an na mɔɛ chɛ n tena, mbɛ a yen ko, ya ɔ sɔ dɔndɔ na‑a a tena. Mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban Chisɔsi chen na, a ɔ, “N 'na den musuma fa‑a ka sanche. Chɛɛ mɔ ta, i ni i boo bun a ma, min mbe a ma, a fɔɛ ni yɛ to a ma.”
40009019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ kamin chɛ fɛ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
40009020	A yen ko, musu dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ. An musu chɛ, musu n 'na kau ma gbandi an ni a ma, san tan kun ma fea ko a. Chisɔsi to‑a to ta an na, mbɛ a na‑a Chisɔsi gbaa chia a, mbɛ a tu‑a Chisɔsi 'a doma kai chɛ chen kana a.
40009021	Koe min na mu, a na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a yiinachii ɔ, a ɔ, ni a tu‑a dechee Chisɔsi 'a doma kai chɛ a, a ɔ, ɛ na‑a baun‑da wan.
40009022	A tu‑a kɛn Chisɔsi a, mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun, mbɛ a‑a musu chɛ yen. Mbɛ a ɔ, “N 'na den, i faa ma yɔn. I 'a danaya‑a i baun.” Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, musu chɛ baun‑da.
40009023	Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a gbɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ 'a chenɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a kuiɛ fen gbasi mɔɛ n yen fan nɔ, a basan mɔ fanka a, miin ni di wa chɛ‑a.
40009024	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo bɔ baa ma. Den musuen den chɛ ma fa ni, a ɛ sa ɔ chinɔɛ an dɔ dechee.” Mbɛ an gbɛɛ bun‑da tɛndɔya yɛnɛ chɛ‑a a a.
40009025	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ban‑da wan bɔ‑a chen chɛ a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi don‑da den chɛ su ni sa ɔ kaina min, a‑a a boo bia, a‑a a ya. Mbɛ den musuen chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ.
40009026	Mɔɛ n ta‑a wan an koe chɛ ɔ yian‑da an tanda chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ ben‑da.
40009027	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ben‑da nɔ ma, mbɛ a bun‑da ta‑a. Mbɛ fion tɔ fea nu, an‑na a sɔ a fɛ. An ni wan yee tɛ‑a gbankon, an dɔ, “I wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin nn ma.”
40009028	Chisɔsi‑a a fo, mbɛ a don‑da chenɛ a. Mbɛ fion tɔɛ fea chɛ n bɛɛ don‑da a tena. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Wo gbu, wo dan‑da a a, mbɛ n mbe che wan a ma‑a wo ni kaina yen?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mansa, nn danden mu a a ka wan.”
40009029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a boo a ta, mbɛ a tu‑a an ya a, a ɔ, “A ni ma ka, yɔ wo 'a danaya, a‑a min fɔ.”
40009030	A sin, an ya a ka‑a wan. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an na si gbau gbau, a ɔ, “Wo ma a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni chɛ ɔ sɔn.”
40009031	Chɛɛ an bɔ‑a kɛn nɔ, an ta‑a wan ben‑da Chisɔsi wakoe ɔ yian‑da an tanda chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
40009032	Kamin fea chɛ nu, miin ya a ka‑a ka, an mbe ta‑a, mbɛ a yen ko, mɔɛ n na‑a kamin dɔndɔ a. A nii koɔ, koe min na mu, nyina yama an ni a fɛ.
40009033	Chisɔsi‑a nyina yama chɛ gbain kɛn dechee kamin chɛ fɛ, mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a bun‑da koɔ‑a. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin ni nɔ, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kɛn gba, nn ma ko bonda chɛ sima ɔ yen nin bɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.”
40009034	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an dɔ, “Nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ, a 'a gbasaya ɔ mu, Chisɔsi ɛ nyina yama n gbain tena mɔɛ n fɛ.”
40009035	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi ben ben‑da wan konko n dɔ, a basan duu wa n na, an chɛnyɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. Ɛ ta‑a mɔɛ n kan‑da Chu mɔɛ n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na. A ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian fan to mɔɛ n na, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma. A yɛ to, a‑a mɔɛ n baun fan an 'na gbandi kan kɔ kan dɔ, miin ni an ma.
40009036	Mɔ fanka ni wan a fɛ. A‑a mɔ fanka chɛ ma fɛn, mbɛ an ma chinchinɛ‑a a bia. Koe min na mu, an 'na yakɔɔtawa da a koo, a yɛ to, an ma a ɔ sɔn an mbe ma ka ma. An mbe wan yɔ sa nu, miin kun ma fɛn mɔ ee.
40009037	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Chin fen chɛ a sɔndenɛ kaina dɔndɔɛ, a koo kaka. Chɛɛ a 'a sɔn mɔɛ n ma kɔkoo.
40009038	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo samunɛ chɛ chin fen ti tena, min mbe a ma, a ni wai chɛ mɔɛ n ma munda a na, chin fen chɛ a sɔn koe a.”
40010001	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n chee, an mɔ tan kun ma fea ni. A‑a an chee, a‑a gbasaya be wan an ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ. A yɛ to, a‑a gbasaya be wan an ma, mɔɛ n baun koe a an 'na gbandi n gbɛɛ ɔ.
40010002	A 'a sɔ mɔ tan kun ma fea chɛ n tɔɛ n fan nɛ. A saa tɔɛ an nɛ Saimɔn, a na‑a tɔ dɔ mende be min ma a ɔ, Pita, ni Saimɔn dɔɛ kaima Anduu. Chimisi ni a dɔɛ Chɔn, miin ni kai Sɛbɛdi 'a denɛ n na.
40010003	Fiipi ni Batɔɔmiu. Matiu, min ni pawa bia mɔɛ a, ni Tɔmɔsi. Chimisi, kai Afiɔsi 'a denɛ, ni Tadayɔsi.
40010004	Saimɔn min ni chɛnyɛ ma chɛɛ chɛ mɔɛ a, ni Chudasi Isikayɔti, min na‑a danka Chisɔsi ma tachɛ a.
40010005	A fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ nu, Chisɔsi‑a an sɔ wan ta koe a, a 'a wai chɛ koe a. A‑a an na si wan, a ɔ, “Wo ta Chu mɔɛ n tena, an fan maen mu yɔ sa nu, miin chen gba ɔ chɛenɛ ɛ an ti n ma, koe min na mu, an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a. Wo ma ta kaina, Chu mɔɛ n mbe ee kaina. A yɛ to, wo ma ta Samayia duu n dɔ.
40010007	Wo ta Chu mɔɛ n fan tena, mbɛ wo‑a a fɔ an ye, mbɛ Yataa‑a a kuu sɔ a 'a mansa wai chɛ‑a dunya ɔ.
40010008	Wo gbandi mɔɛ n baun, mbɛ wo‑a fɔɛ a yɛ chɛ n sun da a, miin faenɛ ɛ. Wo mɔɛ chɛ n baun, gboo ma gbandi yama ɛ miin ma, mbɛ wo‑a nyina yama n gbain mɔɛ n fɛ. N‑na gbasaya chɛ be wo ma gbama an na. N ma fen bia ni wo boo ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wɛɛ, wo ta, wo ni mɔɛ n deman. Wo ma an dɔ tisa fen kɔ fen ko a.
40010009	Ni wo sin ma‑a ta‑a, wo ma ta fen kɔ fen na wo boo ɔ. Wo ma ta kɔpɔ a,
40010010	wo ma basachi bia wo boo a, wo ma tu tungbɔɛ a, wo ma doma fea ya, wo ma kɔɔwa fea ya. A mu min na, wo e ma‑a wai chɛ‑a mɔɛ min ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ an mbe wo da kɔ‑a.
40010011	“Ni wo ta‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, wo ta wo ni wo ya a kan mɔɛ a, min mbe dɔn‑da a ni a boo si wo kɔɔ. Ni a‑a a boo si wo kɔɔ, wo ma a 'a sondaya a, aan wo ni bɔ an duu chɛ ɔ.
40010012	Ni wo don‑da chen chɛ a, wo nɔ mɔɛ n dua.
40010013	Ni an‑na wo bia chɛndɛ, an mbe dua‑a wan. Chɛɛ ni an ma wo bia ni chɛndɛ, an mbe fo‑a wan dua chɛ a.
40010014	Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a boo si ni wo kɔɔ an chen chɛ a, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a boo si ni wo kɔɔ an duu chɛ ɔ, ni an ma an too ma sɔ ni wo ma, wo bɔ nɔ. Ni wo ma‑a bɔ‑a, wo wo chenɛ a gbɔngbɔn fifii chɛ a, min mbe a ɔ yian an na, mbɛ an‑na koe min ma ka, a ma nyin.
40010015	N ni a ma din wo tena, mɔ yama chɛ nu suun Sɔdɔn duu ɔ, an fea Komoa a, an mbe ee tɔɔya‑a, Yataa ɛ dunya gbɛmbo‑a tee min na, yɔ chɛ nu an duu chɛ ɔ, an mbe tɔɔya‑a buɛ min dɔ.”
40010016	Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, “N yen ko wo a ta‑a, wo e ma‑a wan nɔ yɔ ni sa bɔ‑a kui n tɛ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo yiima a ni sɛn. A yɛ to, wo ni tea a tachɛ ko ɔ ko ɔ, wo e min ma‑a.
40010017	Wo wo kun ma fɛn, a mu min na, an mbe wo bia‑a wan, an ni ta wo a gbakoo n chen kɔɔ. An mbe yɛ‑a wan to, an ni wo gbasi an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na.
40010018	An mbe wo bia‑a wan, an ni ta wo a chɛnyɛ ti n tena, an mbe ta‑a wan wo a mansa wa n chen kɔɔ. An mbe chɛ n ma‑a wo a n bakoe an na. Chɛɛ wo e kun‑da wan Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a.
40010019	Ni an na‑a wo a, mansa n chen kɔɔ, wo ma wo faa gbaa wo fɔ bai ko a, ni a fɔ buɛ ko a. A mu min na, an tima chɛ a, wo e bai ma sɔn‑da wan, wo e min fɔ‑a.
40010020	Koe min na mu, wo e ma tena ka bai min fɔ‑a, a ee ma tena wo wandi an fɔ bai a. Chɛɛ a bai chɛ n mbe ka tena Yataa Nyina an tena. Fa Yataa ɛ a a na‑a wan, a ni bai chɛ n don wo da a, a fɔ koe a.
40010021	“Mɔɛ n mbe an suun ma nyɔɛ n be‑a wan, an fa koe a. Fa n mbe an 'na denɛ n be‑a wan, denɛ n bɛɛ ni yɛ, an ni an woo mɔɛ n be.
40010022	Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ mbe too‑a wan wo a, a mu min na, n fɛ mɔɛ mu wo a. Chɛɛ i wɛn mbe i faa bia‑a aan a danka a, Yataa ɛ i baun‑da wan.
40010023	Ni an‑na ko yawaenɛ sa wo ma duu min dɔ, wo ben bui a, a ta duu dɔ mende ɔ. Ka n ni chɛ ma din wo tena. Wo ee Chu duu chɛ n na bɛn‑da, mbɛ tima che‑a n na koe a. N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tima min na.
40010024	“Kan chɛ mɔɛ benden mu a 'a kan denɛ ma. Bɔi denɛ wɛɛ, an na ma kan ni, an fea a ti a.
40010025	An mbe kan chɛ mɔɛ bia buɛ min dɔ, an mbe a 'a kan denɛ wɛɛ bia ka wan. Bɔi denɛ wɛɛ, an mbe a ti bia buɛ min dɔ, an mbe a wɛɛ bia ka wan. An‑na suun ya ɔ sɔɛ chee ka buɛ min dɔ, an dɔ, Bɛɛsɛbu, an mbe sika a to nyɔn chee koe a tɔ dɔ mende a suun chɛ ɔ?
40010026	“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ma chian an mɔɛ chɛ n ma. Koe min na mu, boo kundu ee to doma kɔɔ, ɛ bɔ wan ya a ma tee dɔndɔ a.
40010027	N‑na bai min tɛnsɛ ka wo tena mmɔ dechee a, wo an dɔ yian baa kun tɛ. N‑na wo too wɛwɛɛ bai miin na ka, wo an fɔ dunya ye, wo kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a.
40010028	Wo ma chian mɔ gbu ma wo fa ko a. Ɛ wo fa‑a wan, chɛɛ a ee ko ɔ ko ma‑a wo nyina a, min mbe wo ɔ. Wo chian Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an ma. An mbe mɔ gbu fa, mbɛ a‑a a nyina wɛɛ, a‑a a a ta ta ɔ, ɛ minda kaina.
40010029	Baa ee soenɛ ma mɔ gbu ya a. Chɛɛ a dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee fa, mɔɔ ni Fa Yataa dɔn‑da a ma.
40010030	Wo sin benden mu kaka soenɛ n ma. Wo kundi nan fan bɛɛ wo kun ma, Fa Yataa‑a a danɛ sɔn fan. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ma chian mɔ gbu ma.”
40010032	Chisɔsi ɔ te to an nu ma, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe dɔn‑da fanka ɔ, mbɛ n fɛ mɔɛ mu a a, n bɛɛ n mbe dɔn‑da wan an mɔɛ chɛ wakoe ma Fa ya kɔɔ banda bu ɔ, gbɛmbo tee ma.
40010033	Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ fanka ɔ, mbɛ n fɛ mɔ ma a a, n bɛɛ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan Fa ye banda bu ɔ, gbɛmbo tee ma, mbɛ n bɛɛ n fɛ mɔ ma an mɔɛ chɛ a.”
40010034	Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to an ye, a ɔ, “A ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ n na‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, kuiɛ a kanɛ ni ma mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. N ma na ni an na, chɛɛ n na‑a dɔfasanɛ an na an tɛ ɔ.
40010035	N na‑a denɛ kaima n bɛ an fa n na, n ni an na chɛɛ. Denɛ musuma n bɛ an de n na, n ni an na chɛɛ. Den 'na musu n bɛ an de mɔɛ n na, n ni an bɛɛ a chɛɛ.
40010036	Wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ gbau gbau n mbe ma‑a wo 'a chen na mɔɛ n fan na.
40010037	“Mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, i wɛn toen mu i ni bea n fɛ, i yii ka i fa a, i ni i yii ka i de a, mbɛ i bea‑a n fɛ. A yɛ to, mɔɔ ni i‑a i yii ka i 'a den kaienɛ a, ni i 'a den musuenɛ, mbɛ i bea‑a n fɛ.
40010038	Ni mɔɛ min mbe ee a ma bɛn‑da mɔnɛ ɔ bia koe a n ko a, ni fa koe a, a e na to bea‑a n fɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ee che ma‑a n fɛ denɛ a.
40010039	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da bea koe a n fɛ, a wandi fɔɛ ma kanda koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe a yii bɔ‑a a fɔɛ ɔ n ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.”
40010040	Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ gbɛ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si wo kɔɔ, a ma a si ni wo dechee an kɔɔ, chɛɛ a‑a a si ka n fan kɔɔ. A sin to, mɔɛ min mbe a boo si‑a n kɔɔ, a ma a si ni ka n dechee an kɔɔ, chɛɛ a‑a a si ka Yataa an kɔɔ, min‑na n sɔ.
40010041	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a boo si‑a Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ kɔɔ, koe min na mu, a dan‑da a a, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu a a, Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ be‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ ma, yɔ ɛ min nyɔn sima be a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ nu ma. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si mɔɛ kɔɔ, min tanden mu Yataa tena, a mu koe min na, a tandenɛ ɛ Yataa a, Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ be‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ ma, yɔ ɛ min nyɔn sima be mɔɛ chɛ ma, min tanden mu a a.
40010042	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a yii chima kɔpu dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ be n fɛ denɛ den tachɛen bɛɛ ma, koe min na mu, ɛ n 'na fɛ dencha a, Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ be‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ ma.”
40011001	Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn a ɔ yian‑da a fɛ den tan kun ma fea n na, an mbe koe min ma, a ka‑a wan nɔ an kaina chɛ, mbɛ a ta‑a Kadidi duu n dɔ, mɔɛ n kan koe a, ni Yataa bai sa koe a mɔɛ n tena.
40011002	A tima chɛ a, Chɔn min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a ni wan pimbi chenɛ a. Chɛɛ a‑a Chisɔsi Chasi ma tɔɛ a min kɛn, a‑a a fɛ denɛ dɔ n na ta wan Chisɔsi tena, min mbe a ma, an ni a wakoe ɔ gbɛ.
40011003	Mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na Chisɔsi tan, an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Fa, kai Chɔn na‑a Chasi na koe fɔ wan, a toen mu a ni a ɔ sɔn ni i wan mu Chasi gbu a, nn kun ka mansa. Kɔ nn ni ta, nn ni a fɔ a ye, mbɛ nn ni chia a fɛn an mɔɛ chɛ ya ɔ?”
40011004	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo yɛ, wo ta yiima ɔ, wo ni a ɔ yian kai Chɔn na, wo‑a koe miin dɔ yen, a yɛ to, wo‑a miin na min.
40011005	Wo a fɔ a ye, wo ta yiima ɔ, mbɛ ya te tɔɛ nu, an‑na kaina ɔ yen, wo ɔ, namaa an sɔ‑a. Wo a fɔ to, wo ta yiima ɔ, wo ɔ, gbandi yama ni miin gboo ma, an baun‑da, wo ɔ, too gbee tɔɛ nu, an‑na koe a min, wo ɔ, miin faen ni, an‑na fɔɛ ma sɔn to, wo ɔ, yɔn tɔɛ n bɛɛ, an‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min.
40011006	Wo a fɔ, wo ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn gboo ɔ ma fa ni dan koe a n na, e dua ma sɔn‑da wan.”
40011007	An mbe an chenɛ bɔ‑a nɔ, Chisɔsi bun‑da koɔ‑a a si Chɔn ma mɔ fanka fanka chɛ tena, a ɔ, “Wo ta‑a kɛn Chɔn tena fuinɛ ma, wo yii na chiien ni mɔɛ minan nyɔn sima tan koe a? Wo nii ma ta ni maa yamba ma kaminɛ an yen koe a.
40011008	Wo na‑a ta nyɔn yen koe a? Wo nii ma ta ni mɔɛ an yen koe a, min ma chiien ni koa baa gbandenɛ ɔ. Tea ko a, mɔɛ miin mbe an ma chii ka, an mbe ma kata an fan dɔ.
40011009	Wo a fɔ wɛ gbu n ye, wo toen ni wo ni nyɔn yen, min ta‑a wo a? Wo toen ni wo ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an yen? Tea tea a, n ni a fɔ wo ye, wo ban‑da Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ yen‑da, min benden mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n ma.
40011010	A mu min na, Chɔn fan mu dɛya chɛ a, Yataa 'a gboo‑a bai sa a si min ma, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɔ te kunka mansa Chasi ma, a ɔ, ɛ a 'a dɛya sɔ tena wan a ya ɔ, min mbe dɔbɛnɛ chɛ‑a a ko a.’
40011011	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ Chɔn, min mbe yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee wɛ nɔ dunya ɔ, min benden mu a ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ den toa wɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a benden mu a wan Chɔn sin ma.
40011012	A ka tee chɛ ma, Chɔn‑na a kuu sɔ kɛn Yataa bai sa‑a aan a sɔ bi ma, Yataa 'a mansaya ɛ ta tena wan ya ɔ ma gbasaya a. Chɛɛ gbun tɔɛ n mbe Yataa 'a mansaya chɛ chɛɛ tena wan.
40011013	Chɔn mbe e na to na‑a suun, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a bai fɔ wan koe chɛ n ma, miin mbe ma tena ka bi tee chɛ a. Yataa‑a sawa min be Mosisi ma, a sawa gboo wɛɛ‑a bi tee chɛ a ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n fɔ wan.
40011014	Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ na‑a Idaicha na koe fɔ wan. Ni wo e dan‑da wan a a, n ni a fɔ wo ye, mbɛ a mu Chɔn fan na, a na‑a min na koe kɔɔ fɔ tee.
40011015	Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.
40011016	“Bi tee chɛ a mɔɛ nu, an maen fan mu yɔ den mɛsɛ nu tɔmbɔ chɛ baa ma. Chɛ n mbe denka ɔ, chɛ n mbe kandɔɛ. Miin mbe denka ɔ, an‑na yee tɛ wan kandɔ mɔɛ n tena, an dɔ,
40011017	‘Mmɔ si a bɔ, mmɔ ni mmɔ don.’ Chɛɛ kandɔ kaka ma dɔn ni. Mbɛ denka ɔ kaka‑a a fɔ to, an dɔ, ‘Mmɔ di chɛ wɛ.’ Chɛɛ an ma dɔn ni chɛ wɛɛ ma.
40011018	Chɛ tɛen mu min ma, Chɔn na‑a wan, a ni sunɛ bia wan, a sin nii gbɛ min. An dɔ te, ɛ dama. An dɔ, nyina yama an mbe a fɛ.
40011019	Chɛɛ n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n na‑a kɛn, n mbe daunɛ chɛ wan, a yɛ to, n mbe gbɛ min fan. An‑na a fɔ wan to, an dɔ, nun namaya tɔɛ mu n na, an dɔ, kɔn gbasi kai mu to n na. An dɔ te to, n fan mu pawa kain mɔɛ n dia nyɔɛ a, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ n na, miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ n mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ Yataa 'a yiimatɛ an mu tea tea yiimatɛ a. An mbe chɛ ɔ yen‑da koe n fan ma, mɔɛ chɛ n mbe miin ma‑a, mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa‑a a 'a yiimatɛ chɛ be miin ma.”
40011020	Chisɔsi na‑a kamaya koe n ma wan duu sawa n dɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu an duu chɛ n dɔ, an nii ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni an 'na ko yama n na. Chɛ‑a Chisɔsi faa yɔn fan, min‑na a ma, a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ,
40011021	“Wo wan, wo wɛn mbe ka Koyasin duu ɔ, ni wo wɛn mbe Besaida, koe miin mbe wo tan‑da, an mbe yaua‑a gba wo ko a. N‑na kamaya koe sɛsɛ n ma wan wo 'a duu n dɔ. Mɔɛ miin mbe ka Taya duu ɔ, a basan Sidon duu ɔ a, ni an na‑a ko bonda chɛ n dɔ yen fan, an nii ma‑a ka yɔ wo wan. An na‑a an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na suun gbɔɔ. An ni ma‑a gbɛ di chɛ an na an 'na ko yama n ko a.
40011022	Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ yama chɛ nu suun Taya duu ɔ, ni Sidon duu ɔ, an mbe ee tɔɔya‑a, Yataa ɛ dunya gbɛmbo‑a tee min na, yɔ wo e tɔɔya‑a buɛ min dɔ.
40011023	Wo wɛn sin mbe ka Kapanaun duu ɔ, wo‑a wo wandi a sɛ banda a, chɛɛ Yataa ɛ wo a yii‑a wan duu ma. N‑na kamaya koe miin ma ka wo 'a duu chɛ ɔ, ni Sɔdɔn mɔɛ n na‑a an dɔ yen fan, Sɔdɔn nii ma‑a duu tombo a bi tee chɛ a.
40011024	Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ yama chɛ nu suun Sɔdɔn duu ɔ, an mbe ee tɔɔya‑a, Yataa ɛ dunya gbɛmbo‑a tee min na, yɔ wo e tɔɔya‑a buɛ min dɔ.”
40011025	A tima chɛ a, Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Fa, n‑na i wai bɔ, i wɛn mu mansa a banda bu ɔ ni dunya ɔ. A mu min na, i‑a koe chɛ n dɔ nun fan chɛ nu ma, ɛ miin ta yiima ɔ, mbɛ an dɔ sɔen mu. Chɛɛ i‑a an dɔ yian fan chɛ n na, miin‑na an fandi a yii i tena.
40011026	Fa, n‑na i wai bɔ, koe min na mu, i toen ni a ni ma ka wan.”
40011027	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Fa‑a gbasaya gbɛɛ be n ma ko ɔ ko kun ma. Fa dɔndɔ gbe an‑na n sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ. N bɛɛ n dɔndɔ gbe an‑na Fa sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ. N‑na mɔɛ miin ya Fa sɔn koe a, an bɛɛ‑a a sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ.
40011028	“Wo wɛn kanɛ ɔ faenɛ ɛ wo 'a suun fanka ma kɔɔ, wo na n tan. Wo na, n mbe wo deman, wo ni wo suin.
40011029	Wo kooya be n ma. Wo ni n 'na kanɛ sɔn. N chinchinchaen mu, a yɛ to, n dɔ ma fasi ni. Ni wo puin‑da n chen gba ɔ, wo e suinɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
40011030	Koe min na mu, n mbe wo sɔ‑a chia chɛndɛ an ma, mbɛ a yɛ to, n mbe feanka min be‑a wo ma, a ee fanka‑a.”
40012001	Chu mɔɛ n 'na suin tee dɔndɔ ma, Chisɔsi ni sɛnɛ dɔndɔ ɔ tandin tena wan, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Kɔnkɔɛ na‑a a fɛ den chɛ n bia wan. Mbɛ an bun‑da sɛnɛ chɛ ɔ chin fenɛ tɛ‑a an boo a, an mbe ta‑a a yoyɛ‑a, an mbe a daun.
40012002	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni ka Fayisii n na, an 'na tindanɛ, an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, “Chisɔsi,” an dɔ, “a yen bɛ, i fɛ denɛ n mbe ka wai an chɛ‑a suin tee ma. An mbe ka koe min ma‑a, a ma nyin. Mmɔ 'a sawa ma a fɔ ni ka, mbɛ mɔɛ ɛ chɛ ma wan suin tee ma.”
40012003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, Mansa Defidi na‑a koe min ma. Kɔnkɔɛ na‑a a bia kɛn, an bɛ a fɛ mɔɛ n na,
40012004	a don‑da buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a chenɛ a. A sin, biidi min been ni Yataa ma, a bɔ‑a wan a a, mbɛ an‑na a daun. A na‑a mmɔ 'a sawa an yɔn ka e. A mu min na, mmɔ 'a sawa na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee an biidi chɛ daun, mɔɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ nu miin mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a.
40012005	A yɛ to, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an mbe wai chɛ wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ suin tee wɛɛ ma. Suin tee sawa yɔn ma ben ni to chɛ ma. Chɛɛ Mosisi 'a sawa gboo ma chɛ ya ni sawa yɔn na.
40012006	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ ɛ wan nɛ min benden mu Yataa 'a kata chɛ ma.
40012007	Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, wo e na to yasi bɔ‑a a tena, a ɔ, wo ni chinchimaya an yian dechee wo nyɔn na. Ni wo na‑a bai chɛ ɔ gbɛ wan tee, wo nii wo tɛɛ si‑a mɔɛ n ma miin ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni.
40012008	N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n fan mu mansa a suin tee ko a.”
40012009	Chisɔsi ka‑a nɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a bɛnɛ ɔ samun chɛ chenɛ a.
40012010	A‑a a a tinsɔn fan, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ nɔ, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min boo dɔndɔɛ gbaaen ni a ma. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na nɔ, an dɔ, “Nn ma a ɔ sɔn, ni mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu, mmɔ ni mɔɛ a baun suin tee ma.” An‑na chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, an toen ni an ni koɛ be a ma.
40012011	Chɛɛ a ɔ, “Wo wɛn mbe ka nɛ, ni sa dɔndɔɛ ma‑a wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ boo a, mbɛ a bea‑a sonɛ ɔ suin tee ma, wo ee a to nɔ, a ni fa. Wo‑a a bɔ wan nɔ.
40012012	Wo e chɛ ma wan suin tee ma sa ko a. Sa sin na ma kan ni mɔɛ a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a nyin fan mɔ ni ko chɛndɛ ma mɔ gbu a suin tee ma.”
40012013	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ kamin chɛ ma, a ɔ, “I boo ɔ tan.” Mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a a boo ɔ tan. Mbɛ a ma‑a yɔ a boo dɔndɔɛ, a baun‑da fion.
40012014	Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ nu, an bɔ‑a. Mbɛ an ta‑a an kun puin tena Chisɔsi ma, an mbe ma buɛ min dɔ an ni a fa.
40012015	Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ sɔn Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an ni an yii na chii tena, koe min ma koe a a. Mbɛ a ka‑a an kaina chɛ. A ni ta tena kɛn, fanka fanka bea‑a wan a fɛ. Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ gbandien ni fanka chɛ tɛ ɔ, a‑a an baun fan,
40012016	chɛɛ a‑a an na si wan, a ɔ, an ma a fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ye, mbɛ an‑na an baun.
40012017	A na‑a chɛ fɔ, min mbe a ma, Yataa na‑a bai min don a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya da ɔ a fɔ koe a, a ni bɔ a a.
40012018	Yataa 'a bai chɛ, Aisaya na‑a min na ben, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ yen ko, n‑na n boo sɔ min ma, n 'na wai chɛ koe a. A ko a di n ye, a sin a wakoe‑a n faa chima to. N mbe n Nyina bea‑a wan a fɛ. Ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a dunya ɔ, mbɛ n fan Yataa, mabɔ ee n 'na kaa tɛenɛ ma.
40012019	A faa chimaen mu yɔ tɔnɛnɛ, a sin mbe ee yonka tɛ.
40012020	A ee a faa a kɔɔ‑a chɛ n ma, miin gboo ɔ faen mu. Ɛ toa si‑a wan chɛ n kɔɔ, miin fanka an fandi ma. Ɛ a ma‑a wan aan tea ni ma tea,
40012021	mbɛ a sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ na‑a a kai fa‑a an na.”
40012022	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a wan kamin dɔndɔ a Chisɔsi tena, nyina yama ni min fɛ. Nyina yama chɛ, an‑na a ma wan kamin chɛ ya te‑a, a sin nii che koɔ‑a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a baun, a‑a a ma a koɔ‑a, mbɛ a ya wɛɛ a ka‑a, a‑a kaina yen.
40012023	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni ka nɔ sɔ ɔ, an tɛnɛ‑a wan koe chɛ a. Mbɛ an dɔ an nyɔn ma, an dɔ, “O, mɔɛ min bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, a wakoe fɔen fan mu. An mɔna chɛ an mbe na bɔ ka a 'a dambi ɔ?”
40012024	Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mu Fayisii a, an‑na koe chɛ a min fan. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ wan, an dɔ, “Nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ, min tɔ mu Bɛɛsɛbu, an mbe ka gbasaya chɛ be tena a ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.”
40012025	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ sɔn kɛn, koe min ni mɔɛ chɛ n yii ma, a‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Ni chɛɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n tɛ chɛnyɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ, an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɛ yɔn fan. A yɛ to, ni koɛ ma‑a duu min dɔ mɔɛ n tɛ, a duu chɛ ɛ te wan. Suunɛ wɛɛ ɛ ka wan, koɛ ɛ a yɔn fan.
40012026	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni Sitana ee kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ a bɔ n na, a 'a mansaya ee ta‑a ya ɔ ma. Ni a‑a a bɔ nyina yama n gbain mɔɛ n fɛ, a 'a mansaya ɛ bea‑a wan.
40012027	Mbɛ a sin, wo ta mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe nyina yama n gbain fan mɔɛ fɛ. Chɛɛ wo e a fɔ n fan ma, wo ɔ, n mbe a ma tena Bɛɛsɛbu 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Wo ta mɔɛ n gbu mbe koe miin ma tena, an fan mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ tea ee wo boo ɔ.
40012028	N mbe ee nyina yama n gbain tena mɔɛ n fɛ Bɛɛsɛbu 'a gbasaya ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe an gbain tena Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a mansaya ɛ gbɛ wo tɛ ɔ.”
40012029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Sitana ya yɔ kamin gbasayaen ba, a ɔ, “A yɛ to, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ toen mu a ni don kamin gbasayaen ba 'a chenɛ a punka koe a, mɔɔ ni a‑a a chii pɛn, a e na to a 'a chenɛ a punka‑a.”
40012030	Mbɛ a ɔ te to, “Mɔɛ min mbe ee n ko a, n chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ mu a a. Mɔɛ min mbe ee n deman‑da a a kan koe a kaina dɔndɔɛ, ɛ a a fasan‑da wan.
40012031	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ wan wo 'a ko yama kan kɔ kan dɔ, chɛɛ a ee a boo bɔ‑a a Nyina main koe ɔ.
40012032	N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a n main, Yataa ɛ kun fan a ni a boo bɔ a ɔ. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a Yataa Nyina main, a ee a boo bɔ‑a a mɔ sima chɛ 'a main chɛ ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ, a basan dunya nama a, min mbe na tena.
40012033	“Kɔnɛ mu a gbɔɛ an na. Kɔn chɛndɛ ɛ gbɔ chɛndɛ an be, mbɛ kɔn yama sin‑na gbɔ yama be.
40012034	Wo yauaen ba chɛ nu yɔ ka. Bai chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan mbe ee che bɔ‑a wo da ɔ. A mu min na, mɔ gbu ɛ bai min sa, ɛ ka a faa ɔ wan.
40012035	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔ chɛndɛ ɛ ko chɛndɛ an ma, a mu min na, a faa ɔ gbɛen fan mu. Chɛɛ mɔ yama sin mbe ko yama an ma, a mu min na, a faa ɔ finden fan mu.
40012036	“N sin, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni Yataa na‑a tima min na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ gbɛmbo koe a, a tima chɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ yian‑da wan, fen‑na a ma, a ni bai faun faunɛ n sa.
40012037	Wo da a bai n mbe wo yɛi‑a wan, wo da a bai n ni disa be wo ma.”
40012038	Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n dɔ nu, an bɛɛ Chu chɛ n na, miin ni Fayisii n na an tɛ ɔ, an‑na a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, an dɔ, “Ticha, nn toen mu i ni kamaya koe chenama wa dɔndɔ ma wɛ. Kamaya koe min mbe che a ɔ yian‑da nn na, mbɛ i 'a gbasaya kaen mu Yataa an tena.”
40012039	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo mɔ bonda chɛ nu, wo yau yama yama, wo sin mbe ee dan ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo e n dɔ tisa tena kamaya koe ma koe a. Chɛɛ wo ee tɔmɔsi dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma sɔn‑da, mɔɔ dechee Yataa‑a tɔmɔsi min na ben a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Chona a, a 'a mɔɛ n tena.
40012040	N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe tee sawa ni pimbi sawa ya‑a wan fii chima ɔ, yɔ Chona na‑a tee sawa ni pimbi sawa ya buɛ min dɔ nyɛ wa bu ɔ.
40012041	A sin tee min na Yataa ɛ ma‑a dunya gbɛmbo‑a, Ninifɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, an bɛ wo mɔ bonda chɛ sima n na. Mbɛ an‑na wo yɛi siiya bɔ Yataa tena. A mu min na, an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ wan an 'na ko yama n na, kɛn Chona‑a Yataa bai sa an tena. Mɔɛ yen ko wo tɛ gbɛ, min benden mu Chona ma, chɛɛ wo bandenɛ ɛ wo boo bɔ koe a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ.
40012042	A sin tee min na Yataa ɛ ma‑a dunya gbɛmbo‑a, musu min ni mansa a Seba chɛnyɛ ɔ, a wɛɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ a‑a wo yɛi siiya bɔ. A mu min na, a na‑a ka wan dunya danka a, na koe a, a too ma sɔ‑a Sɔɔmon 'na yiimatɛ bai n ma. Mɔɛ yen ko wo tɛ gbɛ, min benden mu Sɔɔmon ma, chɛɛ wo ee wo to sɔ tena a ma.”
40012043	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo e wan dechee yɔ nyina yama ɛ mɔɛ min fɛ. Ni nyina yama chɛ ka‑a a fɛ, nyina chɛ ɛ ta wan ben ben‑da kaina ɔ gbaa gbaaenɛ ɔ, ɛ a ya a kan‑da kaina ɔ chimaenɛ a, a suin koe a. Chɛɛ a ee kaina ma sɔn.
40012044	Ɛ si wan, a‑a a yii na chii, a ɔ, ‘N ka‑a kaina, ka wɛ, n mbe yɛ to nɔ.’ Ni a na‑a, mbɛ a‑a a ma gbaaenɛ tan, a sin mbe ee kun kɔɔ, a dɔndɔ gbe ee bea to a fɛ.
40012045	Chɛɛ ɛ a bɔ nyina yama wɔnfea chee wan, miin yau an ni ben a ma, mbɛ an gbɛɛ ma‑a kamin chɛ fɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan gbɛ, kamin chɛ ma buɛ ni yaua‑a kaka, a ni ben a kɔma ma. Ɛ ma‑a ka wan wo ko yama ma mɔɛ bonda chɛ sima n na, wo wɛn mbe ka ban‑da n dɔ.”
40012046	Chisɔsi ɛ koɔ tena chɛ wan mɔ fanka chɛ tena, mbɛ a de na‑a, a sɔ‑a baa ma, an bɛ a dɔ kaima n na. An toen ni an ni a yen.
40012047	Mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “I de n yen ko sɔ ɔ baa ma i ma kɔn‑da, an bɛ i dɔ kaima n na.”
40012048	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Wo ma n de sɔn, wo ma n dɔɛ n bɛɛ sɔn.”
40012049	Mbɛ a‑a a boo sɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, “N de n fan nɛ, a basan n dɔ kaima an na.
40012050	A mu min na, mɔɛ miin mbe kooya be‑a Fa Yataa ma, an fan mu n de a, an fan mu n dɔ kaima n na, an bɛ n dɔ musuma n na.”
40013001	A tee dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a a ni ka chenɛ min na, mbɛ a ta‑a Kadidi yii wa fɛ, a si‑a nɔ, mɔɛ n kan koe a.
40013002	Mbɛ mɔ fanka wa a kan‑da wan a 'a tindanɛ, min‑na a ma, a ta‑a, mbɛ a si‑a dɛndɛ dɔndɔ ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin to‑a sɔ ɔ tindi ma.
40013003	Mbɛ a bun‑da tai sɛsɛ tɛ‑a an tena. A ɔ, “Tee dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ ta‑a wan a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ chin fen fasi tena.
40013004	Ɛ a fasi chɛ an na, mbɛ dɔ bea‑a chia kuu a. Mbɛ dɔ n bɛɛ bea‑a faa gban duu gboo ma, dɔ n yɛ‑a an bea‑a wai duu gboo ma, mbɛ dɔ n sin bea‑a duu gboo chɛndɛ ma. Chin fen kuu miin bea‑a ka chia kuu a, konde n‑na an sogban sogban fan. Miin sin bea‑a ka faa gban duu gboo chɛ ma, an tana, an fɛn‑da wan bui chɛ wandi a, a mu min na, fii sima ni wan nɔ. Chɛɛ tee winɛ ma kun ni an dɔ, an gbaa‑a wan, koe min na mu, an suu nii ma yii ni chɛndɛ duu gboo ɔ. Miin sin bea‑a ka wai duu gboo chɛ ma, an bɛɛ fɛn‑da wan, a basan wai chɛ a dɔndɔ a, chɛɛ wai chɛ n koa‑a wan a ben chin fen chɛ n ma. Chɛ‑a chin fen fɛn chɛ n na kɔnya wan, mbɛ an gbaa‑a. Miin bea‑a ka duu gboo chɛndɛ chɛ ma, a danka a, an fii‑a wan wɔsɔkɔɔ. Dɔ n gbaa ni wan an kansanɛ ma chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, dɔ bi wɔdɔ, dɔ bi sawa.”
40013009	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.”
40013010	Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n‑na an ma na a baima, mbɛ an dɔ, “Fen mu i toen mu mɔɛ n kan koe a tai ɔ?”
40013011	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔɛ gbɛɛ nii ma min dɔ sɔn tee a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, a‑a an dɔ yian wo a. Chɛɛ a nunden fan mu mɔɛ tɔɛ n ma sanche wɛɛ.
40013012	A mu min na, mɔɛ min gbɔsɔen mu Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ gbɛ koe a, a 'a yiimatɛ ma ɛ munda‑a wan, a sin, ɛ a ma sɔn‑da wan a chenama ɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min gbɔsɔ ma Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ gbɛ koe a, ɛ fo‑a wan yiimatɛ ɛnden chɛ wɛɛ a, min mbe a ɔ.
40013013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe koɔ an tena tai an dɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma wan, an ya a kaenɛ ni ma an ni kaina fɛn, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ɔ yen‑da. An too ma sɔenɛ ɛ ma wan, an ni a a min, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ‑a.
40013014	Aisaya na‑a min fɔ suun an ko a, an mbe ka bɔ‑a bi. A na‑a Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ wan, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɔ te, a ɔ, wo e wo too ma sɔ‑a wan, wo ni koe a min, chɛɛ wo ee ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ‑a. A ɔ, wo ya a kaenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, wo ni kaina fɛn, chɛɛ wo ee ko ɔ ko ɔ yen‑da.
40013015	A ɔ, koe min na mu, mɔɛ mu wo a, wo ma ma bɛn ni ko ɔ ko ɔ yen koe a. A ɔ, wo ma ma bɛn ni a ɔ gbɛ koe wɛɛ a, a sin wo too ɔ gbɛ kaka. A ɔ, ni chɛ ma, wo ni koe n dɔ yen‑da wan, wo ni koe n dɔ gbɛ, wo sin too ɔ nii gbɛ‑a ka. A ɔ, chɛ ni a ma‑a wan, wo ni wo ya a mun a ma, mbɛ a sin, a ni wo baun‑da wan.’ ”
40013016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Chɛɛ wo tana wo duaen mu, a mu min na, wo e koe ɔ yen, mbɛ a yɛ to, wo e a a min.
40013017	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ sɛsɛ, a basan mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin tanden ni Yataa tena, an toen ni an ni koe chɛ n dɔ yen, wo‑a miin dɔ yen ka, chɛɛ an ma an dɔ yen ni. An toen ni to an ni an na min, wo‑a miin na min ka, chɛɛ an ma an na min ni.
40013018	“Wo wo too ma sɔ tai chɛ fasai ma, a si chin fen fasi mɔɛ chɛ ma.
40013019	Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe wan yɔ chia kuu a duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a min ma. Ni an‑na Yataa 'a sakana bai a min, a si a 'a mansaya ma, an mbe ee a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. Mbɛ an nyina yama chɛ, Sitana, a na‑a a ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a bai chɛ bɔ an yiima ɔ.
40013020	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan yɔ faa gban duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a min ma. Ni an‑na sakana bai chɛ a min, an mbe an boo si wan a kɔɔ, buɔdia wandi gbu a, a ya kɔɔɛ a.
40013021	Chɛɛ Yataa 'a bai chɛ ee si an yiima ɔ, tima ɔ yansama ko a. An mbe dan dechee a a tima kundu ɛnden fan ko a. Ni an‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa an ma dechee, sakana bai chɛ wako a, an mbe an boo bɔ wan a kɔɔ.
40013022	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan nɔ yɔ wai duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu chɛ n bea‑a ka min ma. An mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min fan, chɛɛ dunya chɛ ɔ faagbaa, a basan faagbaa a si an mbe ma buɛ min dɔ an ni nyan, ɛ a ma wan fanka ee ma to Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ a an tena.
40013023	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan yɔ duu gboo chɛndɛ chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a ka min ma. An gbɔ‑a wan wɔsɔkɔɔ. Dɔ n gbaa ni wan an kansanɛ ma chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, dɔ nu bi wɔdɔ, dɔ n sin ni bi sawa. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ɛ ka wan, miin mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min, mbɛ an‑na a sa an faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ an‑na a ma, yɔ sakana bai chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye, a ma koe a.”
40013024	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai dɔ mende tɛ to an tena, a ɔ, “Yataa 'a mansaya maen fan mu yɔ min ma‑a tai chɛ ɔ. Kamin dɔndɔ na‑a sɛnɛ sa wan, mbɛ a‑a chin fen suu chɛndɛ fɛn a ma.
40013025	Chɛɛ yɛɛ dɔndɔ ma, a ɛ kɛn sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ, an bɛ a 'a mɔɛ n na, a ko don ma nyɔɛ ta‑a wan sɛnɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a bin kuu fasi a ɔ, mbɛ a yɛ‑a yɛdɛn.
40013026	Chin fen chɛ koa‑a wan dɔndɔ a, an fea bin chɛ a. Mɔ ma che ni an tɛ bɔɛ sɔn‑da aan chin fen chɛ bu ma‑a.
40013027	Mbɛ kamin chɛ 'a sɛn dɔ kaminɛ n na‑a a tena, mbɛ an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, ‘Kai, binɛ‑a sɛnɛ gbu ya. Mɔ ma a ɔ sɔn bin bonda chɛ ka‑a kaina, mmɔ‑a chin fen suu chɛ ya bɔ wan kɛn chɛndɛ chɛ mmɔ e na a fɛn.’
40013028	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘N ko don ma nyɔɛ an‑na wai si ka.’ Mbɛ an dɔ, ‘Nn toen mu nn ni bin chɛ kuu bɔ chin fen chɛ ya a.’
40013029	Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘A an. Wo e ma‑a a bɔ‑a, ɛ basan‑da wan chin fen chɛ a, mbɛ chin fenɛ yayi‑a.
40013030	Wo a to nɔ, aan chin fenɛ tɛ tima ni che. An tima chɛ a, n mbe a fɔ‑a wan chin fen tɛ mɔɛ n ye, an mbe e na to chin fenɛ tɛ‑a, an ni binɛ pɛn kuu bɔ, mbɛ an‑na a a chii, an‑na a minda. Mbɛ a danka a, an‑na n 'na chin fenɛ sin na sɛ bea a.’ ”
40013031	Chisɔsi‑a tai dɔ mende tɛ wan to an tena, a ɔ, “Yataa 'a mansaya maen fan mu yɔ min ma‑a tai chɛ ɔ. Kamin dɔndɔ na‑a chin fen kuu dɔɔma ɛndenɛ ya wan, mbɛ a‑a a chin a 'a yadi ɔ.
40013032	Chin fen kuu nii nɔ, min ni dɔɔ a ni ben an chin fen kuu chɛ ma. Chɛɛ a fɛn‑da kɛn, a koa‑a wan, mbɛ a pimbi bun‑da chin fenɛ tɔɛ n kun ma yadi chɛ ɔ. Konde n na‑a wan, an‑na an nyanɛ n sa a bonɛ n dɔ.”
40013033	Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ wɛɛ tɛ wan to an tena, a ɔ, “Yataa 'a mansaya maen fan mu yɔ min ma‑a tai chɛ ɔ. Musu dɔndɔ‑a yisin denɛ ya wan, mbɛ a‑a a chɛ feawa funku wa ɔ, konko pani ɔ biidi nyan koe a. Yisin chɛ kun‑da wan feawa funku chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ feawa chɛ sɛ‑a.”
40013034	Chisɔsi na‑a bai chɛ n gbɛɛ fɔ mɔ fanka chɛ n tena tai n fan dɔ. A sin tima ɔ tima gbɛ, a nii koɔ an tena gbama a, mɔɔ ni a‑a tai tɛ.
40013035	Chɛ na‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa da a kuiɛ bɔ‑a a a. A 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ na‑a a da a kuiɛ min na ben suun, a ɔ, ɛ koɔ‑a an tena tai an dɔ. An ma koe min dɔ sɔn tee, a ka dunya a dan tima ma, ɛ an dɔ yian‑da wan an na.
40013036	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a mɔ fanka chɛ n to baa ma, a don‑da chenɛ a. A fɛ denɛ n don‑da a kun ma, an dɔ, “Tai chɛ fasai wɛ nn ye, i‑a min tɛ ka a si bin chɛ ma chin fen chɛ ya a.”
40013037	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Kamin chɛ min‑na chin fen suu chɛndɛ chɛ ya ka, mbɛ a‑a a fɛn a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, a mu n fan na, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ.
40013038	Sɛnɛ chɛ mu dunya chɛ an na. Chin fen suu chɛndɛ chɛ mu mɔɛ n fan na, miin mbe Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Bin chɛ n mu mɔɛ chɛ n fan na, miin mbe an nyina yama Sitana fɛ.
40013039	A sin fan mu n ko don ma nyɔɛ chɛ a, min‑na bin chɛ fasi chin fen chɛ ya a. Chin fen tɛ tima chɛ sin mu dunya danka an na, mbɛ a sin, chin fen tɛ mɔɛ chɛ n mu maeka n fan na.
40013040	Tima min na dunya ɛ ban‑da, ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ an‑na bin chɛ a sɔn sɔn buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ an‑na a minda.
40013041	N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe n 'na maeka n na na wan mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin mbe Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. An mbe mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a sɔn sɔn‑da wan, mɔɛ miin mbe ko yama ma‑a, ni miin bɛɛ an bɔɛ n na dɛ‑a ko yama ɔ.
40013042	Maeka chɛ n mbe an mɔɛ chɛ n na dɛ‑a wan ta wa chɛ ɔ, an mbe ma‑a kaina di chɛ‑a, a basan an nyinɛ a daunɛ a tɔɔya a.
40013043	Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin tanden mu Yataa tena, an mbe man‑da wan taun, yɔ tee manɛ an Fa Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.”
40013044	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a mansaya maen fan mu yɔ min ma‑a tai chɛ ɔ. Mɔ dɔndɔ‑a a kɔnkɔn fan nyanɛ a fii ɔ. Chɛɛ a ma a ya ni, a‑a a kun ma bun fan to chɛndɛ chɛ. Mbɛ a ta‑a, buɔdia wandi a, mbɛ a‑a a boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ma tachɛ kaina chɛ gbu san koe a, nyan chɛ ɛ ka nun dɔ min dɔ.
40013045	“Yataa 'a mansaya maen fan mu to yɔ min ma‑a tai chɛ ɔ. Kaminɛ ni wan, a ya a kan‑da sen dɔndɔ a, min baa a ni gbɛ yɔ dɛmunɛ.
40013046	A‑a a nyima nyima yen kɛn, min baa gbanden ba ni, a ta‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ma tachɛ kɔpɔɛ a, mbɛ a na‑a, a‑a a san.”
40013047	Chisɔsi ɔ te to, “Yataa 'a mansaya maen fan mu to yɔ min ma‑a tai chɛ ɔ. Nyɛ gbain yaa, ɛ nyɛ n kondo wan yii wa ɔ, mbɛ a na‑a an na tindi ma. Nyɛ kan kɔ kan mbe ma wan a ɔ.
40013048	Ni yaa chɛ sa‑a, mbɛ nyɛ n fa‑a a a, nyɛ gbain mɔɛ n mbe a sawan fan tindi ma. Mbɛ an si‑a, an bun‑da nyɛ chɛ n ya bɔ‑a. Nyɛ miin nyin ka a daun koe a, an mbe an chɛ wan samba ɔ. Chɛɛ nyɛ miin ma nyin ka a daun koe a, an mbe an nɛnɛ n na dɛ wan.
40013049	Ɛ ma‑a ka wan dunya danka wɛɛ a. Maeka n mbe na‑a wan dunya ɔ, mbɛ an‑na mɔ yama n ya bɔ mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa tena,
40013050	mbɛ an‑na mɔ yama chɛ n na dɛ ta wa ɔ, an mbe ma‑a kaina di chɛ‑a, a basan an nyinɛ a daunɛ a tɔɔya a.”
40013051	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n dɔ tisa, ni an‑na tai chɛ n dɔ gbɛ wan. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mm.”
40013052	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Chɛ ma yau. Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a Yataa 'a sawa sɔn, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a n 'na kanɛ sɔn, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, ɛ wan yɔ chen ti. Ni a boo fenɛ ma gbɔsɔɛ‑a a bia, ɛ a bɔ wan a ka a sa tena ɔ bɛn tena, a boo fenɛ kɔma basan a nama a.”
40013053	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn mɔɛ n kan‑da tai chɛ n na, a ka‑a wan an kaina chɛ.
40013054	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa duu ɔ. A yɛ‑a kɛn, a bun‑da mɔɛ n kan‑da an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. A 'a kan chɛ buɛ‑a mɔɛ n da a fa wan. Mbɛ an bun‑da a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ ɛ ka kamaya ko bonda miin ma‑a, a basan yiimatɛ bonda chɛ a ɔ, kɔndɔfii mu a a.
40013055	N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan a mu nyɔn na. Chen sɔ mɔɛ chɛ 'a denɛ an nɛ, a 'a musu Mɛi‑a min suun. Nyɔn ma a dɔɛ n sɔn? Chimisi ni ma, ni Chosɛfi, ni Saimɔn, a basan Chudasi a.
40013056	Mmɔ bɛ an mbe sɛ mmɔ ɛ yii mmɔ bɛ a tensa n na. Ɛ ma ka ma a ni ma ka?”
40013057	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a ben buɛ ni don fan an ma. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ n mbe basɔmaya be wan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ma kaina dɔ mende nu, chɛɛ basɔmaya ee a ma a ta suun duu ɔ, a suun chenɛ wandi gbu da a.”
40013058	A nii ma kamaya ko sɛsɛ ma ni nɔ an ko a, a mu min na, an nii ma dan ni a a.
40014001	A tima chɛ a, mbɛ Ɛdɔdi, min ni mansa a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ chɛndɛ a min kaka.
40014002	Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a Chisɔsi wakoe chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye a baima, a ɔ, “Chɔn, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, an‑na a kɔɔ sɔ ka to a ka saya ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, gbasaya chɛ sima ɛ a boo ɔ kamaya ko wa chɛ n ma koe a.”
40014003	Mansa Ɛdɔdi na‑a chɛ fɔ koe min na, a na‑a a kɔɔ kaima Fiipi 'a musu bɔ wan a boo ɔ, bɔɔɛ Ɛdɔdiyasi. Chɔn ni a fɔ wan a ye, mbɛ a‑a ko yama an ma ka. Ɛdɔdiyasi wakoe a, Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a mɔɛ n sɔ Chɔn bia koe a. An‑na a chii, mbɛ an‑na a a dɛ pimbi chenɛ a.
40014005	A toen ni a ni Chɔn fa, chɛɛ a chianden ni Chu mɔɛ n fan ma. Koe min na mu, Chu mɔɛ n danden fan ni Chɔn na, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu a a.
40014006	Chɛɛ Chɔn ni pimbi chen chɛ an na, mbɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a mɔɛ n chee bɛnɛ ɔ, buɔdia bɔ koe a, a si a suun tee ma. Ɛdɔdiyasi 'a den musuma na‑a tɔmbɔɛ don fan mɔɛ chɛ n ya kɔɔ, min na‑a Mansa Ɛdɔdi faa chima kaka,
40014007	mbɛ a‑a a kai a tena, a ɔ te, ni a‑a a ɔ tisa fen kɔ fen ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan a ma.
40014008	Mbɛ den chɛ de‑a a fɔ a ye, ɛ fenɛ min dɔ tisa. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ Mansa Ɛdɔdi ye, a ɔ, a ya kɔɔɛ a, a toen mu Chɔn kunɛ an na sa ɔ piiti ɔ, Chɔn min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
40014009	Bai chɛ‑a Mansa Ɛdɔdi faa yɔn fan a ɔ benden ba a. Chɛɛ a ban‑da gbɛ a kai‑a fanka ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n sɔ pimbi chenɛ a, na koe a Chɔn kunɛ a.
40014010	Mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na a kunɛ tɛ a a.
40014011	Mbɛ an na‑a a kunɛ a piiti ɔ, mbɛ a be‑a den chɛ ma. Den chɛ ta‑a a a, mbɛ a‑a a be a de ma.
40014012	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chɔn fɛ mɔɛ n na‑a, mbɛ an ta‑a pimbi chen chɛ a, an‑na a su ya, mbɛ an‑na a tɔn. Mbɛ an ta‑a Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian a a, koe min chɛ‑a a ɔ.
40014013	Chɔn fa koe chɛ‑a a fo kɛn Chisɔsi ma, mbɛ a sɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ. A ka‑a kaina chɛ a ni ka kaina, mbɛ a‑a chia bia a ta kaina ɔ maundenɛ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ n‑na chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ an bɛɛ‑a an na sɔ duu sɛsɛ ɔ, an‑na a sɔ a fɛ an chen ma chia a.
40014014	Chisɔsi puin‑da a bɔ dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a mɔ fanka wa chɛ yen, miin‑na a sɔ ka a fɛ. Mbɛ an ma chinchinɛ‑a a bia, a‑a an gbɛɛ baun miin gbandien ni ka.
40014015	Tee bea ma, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n gbɛn‑da a ma, mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “Ɛ nyan fan i ni mɔɛ chɛ n na ta konko chɛ n dɔ mmɔ 'a tindanɛ, an ni daun fenɛ yan. Koe min na mu, pimbi e na bun‑da, a sin mmɔ ee ka duu baima.”
40014016	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “An ma ta kan kɔ kan. Wo wandi gbu wo fen den be an ma, an ni a daun.”
40014017	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Fenɛ min mbe dechee nɛ nn boo ɔ, an mu biidi duu a, ni nyɛ fea.”
40014018	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo na an na nɛ.” Mbɛ an na‑a an na.
