40026034	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Pita, n ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee sayi chɛ ma, e kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a wan gba sawa, a si n sɔn koe ma i boo ɔ.”
40026035	Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “I fa tena, n fa tena. N mbe ee kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a i wakoe ma.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na a fɔ ka wan.
40026036	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a kaina dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni, Kɛsemani, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. An‑na a fo nɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo si nɛ, n mbe ta pan, n ni samunɛ chɛ.”
40026037	Mbɛ a‑a Pita ya, a basan kai Sɛbɛdi 'a den kaien fea an na, mbɛ an‑na an ma ta ɛnden na. Mbɛ mɔnɛ koa‑a a ma a ya a, a faa yɔn‑da kaka.
40026038	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Faayɔnɛ min mbe n ma, a da a koo. A toen mu, a ni ta n na faa. Wo ma chinɔ nɛ, mmɔ ma kɔnɛ chɛ, mmɔ bɛ.”
40026039	Mbɛ a ka‑a wan an baima ɛnden na, mbɛ a‑a a wandi ɔ fuin duu ma susu gbuu, a bun‑da samunɛ chɛ‑a. A ɔ, “Fa, ni ɛ bɛn fan, a ma ko yawaen chɛ ni ka n teen na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ta faa ma koe, an ma ma. Chɛɛ i ta faa ma koe, an ni ma.”
40026040	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a a fɛ den chɛ n tena. A‑a an tan sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ Pita ma, “Mmɔ bɛ ee che ma‑a mmɔ ya a, awa dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a?
40026041	Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ, wo ma chinɔ. Wo samunɛ ma ti bia, Sitana ma na a ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a. Wo toen mu wo ni Yataa faa ma koe n ma, chɛɛ a gbasaya ee wo boo ɔ an ma koe a.”
40026042	Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a to, a fean bɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ. A ɔ, “Fa, ni ko yawaen chɛ ee che ben‑da n ma, mɔɔ ni n‑na a ɔ bia, mbɛ i faa ma, an ni ma.”
40026043	Mbɛ a na‑a to, a‑a an tan sa ɔ to chinɔɛ ɔ. Chinɔɛ fankaen ba ni an ya a, an nii kun an ni an ya a ka.
40026044	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a gba sawan bɔɛ ɔ, samun chɛ tena. A‑a samunɛ chɛ da a kuiɛ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ.
40026045	A ban‑da kɛn samun‑da, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a a fɛ den chɛ n tan to. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo e ka sa ɔ chinɔɛ an dɔ tun? Wo e wo suin‑da? A yen ko, tima che‑a n ko a. N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n ma tachɛ koe a, ko yama ma mɔɛ n ma.
40026046	Wo wo a sɔ, mmɔ ni bun ta‑a. Wo wo ya a ta pan. Mɔɛ min mbe n ma tachɛ tena, a yen ko na‑a.”
40026047	Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ an na, mbɛ Chudasi, min ni a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ a, a na‑a, an bɛ mɔ fanka a. Kɔn kundu ma tɛenɛ, a basan chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, ɛ an boo ɔ. Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na, an fan na‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na na.
40026048	An mbe e na to na‑a, Chudasi na‑a a fɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, ɛ mɔɛ min kɔndɔn‑da, a ɔ, an nɛ. A ɔ, an ni dɛ a ma, an ni a bia.
40026049	Chɛ an‑na a ma, Chudasi‑a a fo kɛn, mbɛ a ta‑a Chisɔsi tan a ya kɔɔɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, en wua,” mbɛ a‑a a kɔndɔn.
40026050	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N dia nyɔɛ, i na‑a wai min chɛ koe a, a chɛ dechee.” Mbɛ an na‑a, an dɛ‑a Chisɔsi ma, an‑na a bia gban.
40026051	Chɛɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a 'a bɔi denɛ, a ni wan an mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ. An‑na Chisɔsi bia kɛn, mbɛ a yen ko, a fɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ, a‑a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ bɔ a a, mbɛ a‑a bɔi denɛ chɛ too tɛ a a gbeda.
40026052	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I 'a mɛ a yɛ a sa ɔ. Mɔɛ min mbe mɛ ya butuin chɛ koe a, an mbe a wɛɛ fa‑a mɛ an na.
40026053	A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ n mbe kun fan n ni Fa Yataa ɔ tisa, basan koe a n ma. A sin, a ɛ maeka wu sɛsɛ a na‑a wan, an ni butuinɛ chɛ n ko a.
40026054	Chɛɛ ni Yataa‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ a 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, mbɛ koe chɛ n mbe n tan‑da wan, a ee na‑a bɔ a a.”
40026055	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ mɔ fanka chɛ ma, miin na‑a ka a bia‑a, a ɔ, “Wo nii wo wandi tɔɔ na koe a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ n na wo boo ɔ, a basan kɔn ma tɛenɛ a, n bia koe a. Kanka ma chianden ma n na. Mmɔ‑a tee sɛsɛ wa chɛ gbɛɛ ban, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, n mbe kan chɛ‑a, wo ma n bia ni.
40026056	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma tena, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a miin nyɛn Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, an ni bɔ a a.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na a dɔndɔ gbe to, mbɛ an ben‑da bui‑a.
40026057	Mɔɛ miin na‑a Chisɔsi bia, an ta‑a wan a a Kayafasi 'a chenɛ a, min ni Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na tɛ mɔ wa a. A tima chɛ a, Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na kanden fan ni nɔ, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na.
40026058	Pita‑a a sɔ Chisɔsi fɛ, chɛɛ a ma dɔn ni a ni gbɛn an ma gbɛdɛn. An ta‑a wan aan, a che an kata chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an don‑da nɔ. Pita wɛɛ don‑da wan, mbɛ a si‑a, an bɛ kata chɛ kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n na. A toen ni a ni a ɔ sɔn ni an mbe fen ma‑a Chisɔsi a.
40026059	Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu kuti wa ɔ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bun‑da fania siiya yan‑da, a si Chisɔsi ma. An toen ni chia an na, a fa koe a.
40026060	Mɔ sɛsɛ n na‑a wan, an‑na fania fɔ Chisɔsi ma. Chɛɛ an‑na chɛ ma wɛɛ, fania nii nɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni a fa. Mbɛ a danka a, mɔ fea n‑na an kɔɔ sɔ, siiya ma munda bɔ koe a.
40026061	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ɛ kun fan a ni Yataa 'a chen chɛ te, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ tee sawa tɛ ɔ.”
40026062	Mbɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a sɔ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “A yen ko gbɛ siiya n‑na bai chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ, a si i ma. Bai ɔ bai ee i da a, e min fɔ, min mbe i kun bɔ koe chɛ ɔ?”
40026063	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma bai ɔ bai fɔ ni, a‑a a ma maun fan. Mbɛ tɛ mɔ wa chɛ ɔ, “Tea fɔ nn ye, Yataa ko a, ni i wan mu Chasi a, kunka mansa chɛ a, Yataa 'a denɛ chɛ.”
40026064	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a an fɔ ka. Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ a ka sanche ma aan a ta, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, wo e n yen‑da wan si ɔ kaina ma bɛndenɛ Yataa boo nyima ɔ, gbasaya ɔ. A sin, wo e n yen‑da wan na‑a, banda a dugbu ɔ.”
40026065	Tɛ mɔ wa chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn Chisɔsi da a, a‑a a ma doma a panda wan. A ɔ, “A‑a Yataa main. Mmɔ ɛ to‑a to siiya dɔ mende minan na? Mmɔ ban‑da a a min‑da a wandi da a, ɛ Yataa main‑da.
40026066	Fen bai ɛ wo da a, a fɔ koe a?” Mbɛ Chu kun ti chɛ n dɔ, “A nyin a ni fa. Koe min na mu, a yɛi mu.”
40026067	Mbɛ an‑na an da yii fu Chisɔsi ya a, dɔ n‑na a tu botani a, dɔ n sin‑na a gban fɛ gbasi.
40026068	An mbe ta‑a a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Kunka mansa, a ɔ yian bɛ nn na. Nyɔn mbe ka i gbasi‑a?”
40026069	Pita‑a a tun fan si koe a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ bɔi den musuma tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ, min ni tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a chenɛ a, a na‑a Pita tena. Mbɛ a ɔ, “I wɛɛ, i ni wan Chisɔsi fɛ, Kadidi mɔɛ chɛ.”
40026070	Chɛɛ Pita‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ya kɔɔɛ. A ɔ, “N ma a ɔ sɔn, e ka bai min sa tena.”
40026071	A ta‑a to kata chɛ da wɛɛ a, mbɛ bɔi den musuma dɔndɔ‑a a yen to nɔ sɔ ɔ. Mbɛ a wɛɛ ɔ, “Kamin chɛ wɛɛ ni wan Chisɔsi chɛ fɛ, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ.”
40026072	Pita‑a chɛ wɛɛ kɔɔsa bia wan, kai wandi ɔ. A ɔ, “N mbe a fɔ tena Yataa chen kɔɔ nɛ, mbɛ n ma kamin chɛ sɔn, min tɔ mu Chisɔsi.”
40026073	A ɔ ma yansan ni to, mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni ka nɔ sɔ ɔ, an bɛɛ gbɛn‑da a ma. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔ dɔndɔ mu i a, min ni Chisɔsi fɛ. Nn‑na chɛ ɔ sɔn i koɔ buɛ an ma.”
40026074	Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Yataa ni n tɔɔya, ni n mbe ka fania an fɔ tena. N ma kamin chɛ sɔn.” Ɛ bai chɛ fɔ‑a dechee, mbɛ tɛ kɔnɛ konchee‑a.
40026075	Mbɛ a puin‑da Pita yii ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Pita, tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee, e a fɔ‑a wan yɔ i ma n sɔn, gba sawa ko a.” Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Pita bɔ‑a baa ma, mbɛ a puyɛ‑a di a.
40027001	A banda ka sayi ma, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n bɛn‑da an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ kuiɛ bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ an mbe Chisɔsi fa wan.
40027002	Mbɛ an‑na a ma, mɔɛ n‑na Chisɔsi chii. Mbɛ an ta‑a a a, an‑na a ma konan Kɔfana Padeti ma, min ni kɔfana a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, Domi kun ti wa kɔɔ.
40027003	Mbɛ Chudasi, min‑na Chisɔsi ma tachɛ ka, a‑a a ɔ yen, an‑na kaa a tɛ buɛ min dɔ a fa koe ma. A faa yɔn‑da wan kaka, mbɛ a‑a a a tinsɔn, mbɛ a‑a koe min ma ka, a ma nyin. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a ta‑a kain gbɛnsɛn bi sawa chɛ a, an‑na Chisɔsi san a ma min na, mbɛ a‑a a a yɛ an ma.
40027004	Ɛ kɔpɔɛ chɛ a yɛ‑a kɛn an ma, a ɔ, “N‑na ko yama an ma ka. N‑na kamin chɛ min ma tachɛ ka, a ma ko yama kan kɔ kan man ni, ɛ ka na tena fa‑a fuu.” Chɛɛ an dɔ, “I ta ɔ wan nɛ chɛ nɛnɛ a. Nn ma to ni nn ni a ɔ sɔn ɛnden bɛɛ a.”
40027005	Mbɛ Chudasi‑a kɔpɔɛ gbu a dɛ nɔ Yataa 'a chen chɛ bu ɔ. Mbɛ a ta‑a, a‑a a wandi dɛn, a fa‑a nɔ.
40027006	Chɛɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa 'a, an 'na mansa chɛ n‑na kɔpɔɛ chɛ a sɔn sɔn fan. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mmɔ 'a sawa ma dɔn ni mmɔ ni kɔpɔ bonda chɛ sa tena ɔ bɛn, kɔpɔ sa tena ɔ bɛn tena, Yataa 'a chenɛ a. Wii kɔpɔɛ an nɛ.”
40027007	Mbɛ an‑na an kun puin, an kuiɛ bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, a si kɔpɔɛ chɛ ma. Mbɛ an‑na duu gboo san, min tɔ ni da nyan mɔɛ 'a duu gboo. An‑na nɔ ma bɛnkuɛ a, an ni mɔɛ n tɔn kaina, miin ni sonda n na.
40027008	Chɛ an fɛ mu, an‑na an duu gboo chɛ chee, an dɔ, wii duu gboo. Koe min na mu, a san‑da wii kɔpɔɛ an na.
40027009	Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Chɛyimaya na‑a bai miin fɔ, an ni bɔ a a. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “An kuiɛ ɛ bɛn‑da kain gbɛnsɛn bi sawa an ma, Chu mɔɛ dɔ n mbe na‑a a baa min tɛ‑a.
40027010	An mbe na‑a an kɔpɔ gbɛnsɛn bi sawa chɛ an be‑a da nyan duu gboo chɛ sɔnkɔɛ a, yɔ Mansa Yataa na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ n ye, an ni a ma.”
40027011	A tima chɛ a, an‑na a ma wan, Chisɔsi sɔ‑a Kɔfana Padeti chen kɔɔ. Mbɛ kɔfana chɛ‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “I wan mu Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa a?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a an fɔ ka.”
40027012	Chɛɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ gbakoo n na, an‑na kun sɛsɛ si a kun ma, chɛɛ a ma bai ɔ bai fɔ ni.
40027013	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Kɔfana Padeti ɔ a ma, “Kun sɛsɛ, an mbe ka an si tena i kun ma. I gbu ee a a min tena, an mbe min fɔ tena a si i ma?”
40027014	Chɛɛ chɛ wɛɛ ɔ to, Chisɔsi ma a tɛ ni a ma gbukuu wɛɛ. Chɛ‑a Kɔfana Padeti da a fa wan gban.
40027015	San kɔ san na, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ kun ma, manda ni nɔ dɔndɔ, Kɔfana Padeti ni min na tachɛ. An ni mɔ dɔndɔ boo ka wan, min mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a, mɔ dɔndɔ kan kɔ kan, mɔ fanka chɛ ɛ a ɔ tisa min boo ka koe a.
40027016	A san chɛ a, pimbi chen na sa mɔ dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Baabasi, a tɔɛ bɔen ni yama yama.
40027017	Fanka chɛ a kan‑da kɛn, mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Baabasi yen ko bia ɔ, an fea Chisɔsi a, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, kunka mansa. Wo toen mu n ni n boo ka mɔɛ minan na, mɔ fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ?”
40027018	Kɔfana Padeti‑a tisa chɛ chɛ, koe min na mu, a na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ toomaya an na‑a a ma, Chu n kun ti n na‑a Chisɔsi a a chen kɔɔ.
40027019	Kɔfana Padeti to‑a si ɔ tongbo kɔɔ wan bai chɛ kun ma, mbɛ a 'a musu‑a sakana a na a tena, a si Chisɔsi ma. Musu chɛ‑a a fɔ wan sakana chɛ ɔ, mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ma a boo kan kɔ kan chɛ Chisɔsi fa koe ɔ. A ɔ, Chisɔsi mu mɔ tanden ba an na, min ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni. A ɔ, a faa gbaaen ba mu, a si cho ma, a‑a min chɛ an su chɛ ɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma.
40027020	Chɛɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n yiima ni dama, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na. An don‑da wan fanka chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni Kɔfana Padeti ɔ tisa, a ni a boo ka Baabasi a, an ni Chisɔsi be a fa koe a.
40027021	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ tisa wan to, a ɔ, “Mɔ fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, wo toen mu n ni n boo ka nyɔn na wo ye?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Baabasi.”
40027022	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Wo toen mu gbɛ n ni fen ma Chisɔsi a, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Chasi, kunka mansa chɛ?” Mbɛ an gbɛɛ ɔ, “A ma an ni a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ.”
40027023	Chɛɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma? Kamin chɛ gbu, a‑a fen ko yama ma?” Mbɛ an gbu‑a yee ma munda tɛ, an dɔ, “A ma an ni kamin chɛ gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ.”
40027024	Kɔfana Padeti‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ a boo ee kun bai chɛ ma. A sin, ni a chii‑a a boo ka koe ma Chisɔsi a, mbɛ gbunɛ an mbe bɔ‑a a ɔ. A‑a chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ a‑a yii ya, mbɛ a‑a a boo a ko, an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, ɛ ta‑a a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “N boo ee kamin chɛ fa koe ɔ. Wo wan mbe a nɛnɛ ma yɛman‑da.”
40027025	Chɛɛ mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ, “Aa. A fa koe ni sɛ nn kun ma, nn bɛ nn 'na denɛ n na.”
40027026	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a boo ka Baabasi a an ye. Mbɛ a‑a a ma kɛn an‑na Chisɔsi boan pien, mbɛ a‑a a be, an ni a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ.
40027027	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ soya chɛ nu, miin ni Kɔfana Padeti kɔɔ, an don‑da Chisɔsi a kɔfana 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na an bɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a kan Chisɔsi 'a tindanɛ.
40027028	An na kan‑da kɛn a ma, an‑na a ta koa bɔ wan a ma, mbɛ an‑na an fandi ta doma kai yawaenɛ don a ma.
40027029	Mbɛ an yɛ‑a wan to, an‑na banfua nyan wai ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a si a kun na. An dɔ, a 'a mansa banfua an nɛ. An‑na kɔnɛ don fan a boo nyima ɔ boo a, an dɔ, a 'a tungbɔɛ an nɛ. Mbɛ an‑na an kumbai gbangban a chen kɔɔ, an mbe ta‑a a ma yɛn‑da, an dɔ, “Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa chɛ ni mɛ.”
40027030	Mbɛ an‑na an da yii chɛ a ma. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na tungbɔɛ chɛ bɔ a boo ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a gbasi a kun tɛ pɛɛ pɛɛ.
40027031	An ban‑da kɛn a ma yɛn‑da, an‑na doma kai chɛ bɔ a ma. Mbɛ an‑na a wandi ta doma don a ma gbɛ. Mbɛ an bɔ‑a a a, ta koe a a fa‑a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
40027032	An to‑a bɔ an na Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bɛn‑da kamin dɔndɔ a. Kamin chɛ tɔ ni Saimɔn. A sin, a ni ka tena Sayini duu ɔ wan, ɛ na‑a Chuusaɛn. An‑na a din fan a ma, a ni ta kɔn gbengbanden chɛ a Chisɔsi ko a.
40027033	A na‑a che wan kaina dɔndɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Kɔkɔta, min fasaien mu, kun konkon ma.
40027034	Nɔ ni, mbɛ an‑na gbɛ be a ma, min dɔ basandenɛ ni gboo ɔ dumɛ bui a. Chɛɛ a‑a a sima ma fɛn kɛn, a ma dɔn ni a min koe a.
40027035	Mbɛ an‑na a gbangban kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma nɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na chɛ fenɛ chɛ, a ma koa n ko a.
40027036	An na‑a a gbangban kɔn chɛ ma kaina dɔndɔ wan, an bɛ kanka fea chɛ n na. Dɔndɔɛ ni a boo nyima ɔ wan, dɔndɔɛ ɛ a manɛ ɔ. An‑na a nyɛn fan kɔn dɛnfɛ ma, an dɔ, Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa an nɛ, Chisɔsi. Mbɛ an‑na a gbangban a kun ma chia a, kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma. Yiima chɛ an na‑a a ma, an‑na Chisɔsi fa. Chɛ gbakɔ mbɛ an si‑a gbɛ, an bun‑da Chisɔsi a tɛ‑a.
40027039	Mbɛ chia a ben mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an‑na an kunɛ fichi fichi wan. Mbɛ an bun‑da a main‑da,
40027040	an dɔ, “Wua. O, i wɛn‑na a fɔ, i ɔ, e Yataa 'a chenɛ te wan, mbɛ i‑a a sɔ tee sawa tɛ. Ni Yataa 'a denɛ mu i a, puin bɛ kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, mbɛ i‑a i wandi kun bɔ saya yuu chɛ ɔ.”
40027041	Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n bɛɛ, an‑na a ma yɛn ka wan. Chu sawa kan mɔɛ n bɛɛ, a basan an 'na gbakoo n na, an‑na a ma yɛn fan.
40027042	An dɔ, “A‑a mɔ dɔ mende n baun, chɛɛ a ee che a ni a wandi baun. Kamin chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, an mu Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na mansa a. Ni a wan mu a a, a ni puin bɛ kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma sanche, min mbe a ma, nn ni dan a a.
40027043	A danden fan mu a a, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wan a fɛ tima ɔ tima ko a. Mbɛ Yataa ni a wan Chisɔsi baun bɛ sanche, sanche, ni a toen fan mu a a. Koe min na mu, a ɔ, Yataa 'a denɛ mu an na.”
40027044	An bɛ gbangban‑da ka kanka fea miin na dɔndɔ a, an bɛɛ, an‑na a main ka wan to.
40027045	Chɛ gbakɔ, tee che‑a kɛn kun tɛ, pimbi bun‑da wan chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, aan awa sawa ko a.
40027046	Mbɛ tee kɔ kai ma, Chisɔsi‑a yee tɛ wan gbankon, mbɛ a ɔ, “N 'na Yataa, n 'na Yataa, fen mu i ban‑da n dɔ?”
40027047	Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu nɔ sɔ ɔ, an‑na a a min kɛn a‑a min fɔ, mbɛ an dɔ, “Ɛ ka kai Idaicha an chee‑a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ suun.”
40027048	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an dɔndɔ‑a bui sa a a, mbɛ a ta‑a, a na‑a fen yɔfu yɔfu a. Mbɛ a‑a a chima gbɛ a, min baa nii ma gbɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a don kɔnɛ ma, a‑a a a sɛ, a ni a don Chisɔsi da a, a susu koe a.
40027049	Chɛɛ a bɔɛ tɔɛ n dɔ, “Mmɔ a ma kɔn bɛ, kɔkɔɛ Idaicha ɛ na‑a wan, a ni a kun bɔ saya yuu chɛ ɔ.”
40027050	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a yee tɛ wan to gbankon, mbɛ a fa‑a.
40027051	Tɛndi ni wan dɛn dɔ Yataa 'a chen chɛ bu ɔ. Mbɛ a yen ko, chɛ ma‑a kɛn, mbɛ tɛndi chɛ tɛka‑a fea a, a ka a kandɔɛ, aan a yii denka ɔ. Mbɛ duu gboo wɛɛ samba‑a, mbɛ faa gbanɛ n tɛka tɛka‑a.
40027052	A yɛ to, kamba n bɛɛ na ka‑a wan. Mbɛ mɔɛ n na sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin tanden ni Yataa tena an 'na fɔɛ ɔ.
40027053	Mbɛ an bɔ‑a an kamba n dɔ. A sin, Chisɔsi 'a sɔenɛ gbakɔ a ka saya ɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, an ta‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Mɔ sɛsɛ‑a an yen fan nɔ.
40027054	Domi soya gbakoo chɛ, min ni Chisɔsi a tɛ tena, a‑a a ɔ yen min ma‑a. A 'a soya n bɛɛ, an‑na a ɔ yen fan. An‑na a ɔ yen kɛn duu gboo samba‑a, a basan koe chɛ n gbɛɛ a miin ma‑a, chiandia‑a an gboo fa wan. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ ni Yataa 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ gbu an na.”
40027055	Musu sɛsɛ n bɛɛ ni wan nɔ, miin na‑a a sɔ Chisɔsi fɛ a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A sin, an fan ni a deman chia sɛsɛ a. An sɔ‑a wan pɔɔ, an mbe koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma mɛn‑da.
40027056	Musu chɛ n tɛ ɔ, bɔɔɛ Mɛi ni wan nɔ, min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ. Bɔɔɛ Mɛi dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, min 'na denɛ n ni Chimisi n fea Chosɛfi a, a ni wan nɔ, a basan kai Sɛbɛdi 'a musu a.
40027057	Tee bea ma, nyan tɔ dɔndɔ na‑a, a ka duu dɔndɔ ɔ min tɔ ni Ayimatia. A tɔ ni Chosɛfi. A sin, a wɛɛ ni Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔ an na.
40027058	A ta‑a wan Kɔfana Padeti tena, mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi su ɔ tisa a ma. Kɔfana Padeti‑a a fɔ wan soya n ye, a ɔ, an ni Chisɔsi su be Chosɛfi ma.
40027059	Mbɛ Chosɛfi‑a fen gbɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a a mendemende su chɛ a.
40027060	Mbɛ a ta‑a a a, mbɛ a‑a a tɔn a wan Chosɛfi gbu ta kamba ɔ, min sinden ni senɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a faa gban ba tundun kamba chɛ da a, mbɛ a ka‑a nɔ.
40027061	A tima chɛ a, Mɛi min ka‑a Makadaa, an fea Mɛi dɔndɔɛ a, an ni nɔ wan si ɔ, kamba chɛ ya teen ma.
40027062	Tee dɔndɔɛ ma, min ni suin tee a, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛn‑da wan Kɔfana Padeti tena. Chu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ni Fayisii n na, an ni wan an bɛn chɛ ɔ.
40027063	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mansa, tima min na da ɔ gbaa tɔɛ chɛ ni fɔɛ ɔ, nn yii to‑a wan a ɔ, a na‑a bai min fɔ. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, Yataa ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma.
40027064	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, soya n na ta a kamba chɛ ma, an ni a kun ma fɛn chɛndɛ chɛ, aan tee sawan bɔɛ ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a fɛ denɛ n mbe ee na‑a che‑a an ni a su kanka. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na fania fɔ mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ a wan Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Fania chɛ nɛnɛ, a dankama nɛn chɛ, ɛ na‑a ben‑da a saa gbɛɛ ma.”
40027065	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Wo soya n ya, an ni ta, an ni kamba chɛ kun ma fɛn chɛndɛ chɛ.”
40027066	Mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na an boo gba to kamba chɛ ma chɛndɛ chɛ. Mbɛ an‑na soya n to nɔ, a kun ma fɛn koe a.
40028001	Suin tee chɛ ben‑da kɛn, mbɛ Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ sayi ma che‑a. Mɛi min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ, a ta‑a wan kamba chɛ ma, an fea Mɛi dɔndɔɛ a.
40028002	A yen ko gbɛ, an tɛnɛ‑a a a, mbɛ duu gboo bun‑da samba‑a, mbɛ Mansa Yataa 'a maeka dɔndɔ wɛɛ yii‑a. Maeka chɛ‑a faa gban chɛ ka wan kamba chɛ da a, mbɛ a si‑a a kun ma.
40028003	Ɛ si ɔ kɛn nɔ, a ni man tena wan, yɔ banda manɛ, mbɛ a ma koa wɛɛ gbɛenɛ ɛ fo fo, yɔ fande funku.
40028004	Soya miin ni ka kamba chɛ kun ma fɛn‑da, an chian‑da wan a ma kaka. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ an bea‑a duu ma, an chima‑a yɔ su.
40028005	Chɛɛ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ wan musu chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Wo ma chian. A mu min na, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo e wo ya a kan tena Chisɔsi an na, an‑na min gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a tɔn‑da kaina.
40028006	A ee nɛ. Yataa‑a a ma, a‑a a a sɔ a ka saya ɔ, yɔ a wandi na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ ɛ ma‑a ka wan. Wo na nɛ. Wo ni nɔ yen, a ni sa ɔ kaina min.
40028007	Mbɛ n 'na sakana bai an nɛ wo tena gbɛ. Wo yɛ gbɛ bui‑a, wo ni a fɔ a fɛ mɔɛ n ye, wo ɔ, Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Wo ɔ, a sin, ɛ ta tena an ya ɔ Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an mbe a yen‑da kaina min pɛnɛnɛ.”
40028008	Mbɛ an yɛ‑a bui chɛ bui chɛ‑a. An ta‑a, chiandia ɛ an dɔ, chɛɛ an bu ɔ ni di kaka. Mbɛ an ta‑a koe chɛ ɔ yian koe a a fɛ denɛ n na.
40028009	An mbe ta‑a bui chɛ chɛ an na, mbɛ a yen ko, an‑na Chisɔsi yen sɔ ɔ an ya ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a an kɔndɔn, a ɔ, “Wo en chɛɛ n na.” A‑a an kɔndɔn kɛn, mbɛ an bea‑a a chen na, an‑na a chen kana bia, mbɛ an‑na a fai.
40028010	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo ma chian. Wo ta, wo ni a fɔ n suun ma nyɔɛ n ye, mbɛ an ni ta Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An mbe n yen‑da wan nɔ.”
40028011	Musu chɛ n mbe yɛ‑a, a yen ko, mbɛ soya chɛ dɔ n bɛɛ yɛ‑a duu ɔ. Mbɛ an si‑a ko ɔ ko ma, maeka chɛ‑a min ma kamba chɛ ma, an‑na a ɔ yian Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na.
40028012	An‑na bai chɛ a min, soya chɛ n‑na min dɔ yian. Mbɛ an‑na an kun puin fan kaina dɔndɔ, an bɛ Chu n 'na gbakoo n na. Mbɛ an‑na kɔpɔ sɛmbɛnden ya, mbɛ an‑na soya chɛ nu, miin ni kamba chɛ kun ma fɛn tena, an‑na an da a tɔn a a.
40028013	An dɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo ɔ tisa, a si Chisɔsi su tuin koe ma kamba chɛ ɔ, wo‑a a fɔ dechee, mbɛ wo to‑a sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ wan, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n na‑a su ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a su kanka.”
40028014	An yɛ‑a wan to, an‑na soya chɛ n too ɔ dia. An dɔ, an faa ma gbaa, ni kɔfana‑a a a min bɛɛ, mbɛ an chinɔ‑a wan. An dɔ, an mbe koɔ‑a wan a tena, min mbe a ma, ko ɔ ko ee bɔ‑a a ɔ.
40028015	Mbɛ an‑na kɔpɔɛ chɛ bia, an‑na a ma yɔ a fɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ an ye. A ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, a che gboo chɛ nyɛn tima ma, Chu mɔɛ n mbe bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ yian. Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n fan na‑a a su kanka, a bɔ kamba ɔ.
40028016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma dɔndɔɛ miin to‑a ka, an ta‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An ta‑a wan kɔnkɔɛ dɔndɔ ɔ, Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ an ye, an ni ta kaina.
40028017	Kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ɔ ni, mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi yen. A na‑a an tan kɛn, mbɛ an bea‑a a chen na, mbɛ an‑na a fai. Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, an nii ma dan ni a a chɛndɛ chɛ ni an nɛ.
40028018	Mbɛ Chisɔsi gbɛn‑da an ma, mbɛ a ɔ, “Fa min mbe banda bu ɔ, a‑a gbasaya gbɛɛ be n ma, fen fen kan kɔ kan kun ma, banda bu ɔ a basan dunya chɛ ma a.
40028019	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ta mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tena dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a an ma n fɛ denɛ n na. Wo ni yɛ, wo ni yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ Fa Yataa tɔɛ ɔ, n tɔɛ ɔ, a basan Yataa Nyina tɔɛ ɔ a.
40028020	A sin, wo ni mɔɛ n kan sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ bia koe a, n na‑a miin be wo ma. Wo sin ni dan to a a, mbɛ n mbe ma‑a wan wo fɛ tima ɔ tima, aan dunya chɛ ni ban bɛɛ.”
41001001	Sakana bai chɛndɛ kuu sɔɛ an nɛ, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma, Yataa 'a denɛ.
41001002	Ɛ wan yɔ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya‑a min fɔ. A na‑a a nyɛn fan suun a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, mbɛ Yataa ɔ te a 'a denɛ ma, a ɔ, a yen ko, ɛ a 'a dɛya sɔ tena wan a ya ɔ, min mbe dɔbɛnɛ chɛ‑a a ko a.
41001003	Aisaya‑a a nyɛn fan to, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ yen ko gbonka chɛ‑a fuinɛ ma, a ɔ, mɔɛ n ni tan Yataa tena. A ɔ, an ni an fandi n dɔ bɛn Mansa Yataa ya ɔ, yɔ an mbe chia ɔ bɛn buɛ min dɔ an 'na mansa n ya ɔ.”
41001004	Chɛ ko a, mɔɛ na‑a wan fuinɛ ma, min tɔ ni Chɔn. A bun‑da yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. A ni yɛ wan to, a ɛ Yataa bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na. A ɔ, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na, a ɔ, mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa ni a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ.
41001005	A sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni ka wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an mbe ka duu tɔɛ n dɔ, Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An ni na wan, mbɛ an‑na Chɔn tan. An ni dɔn fan ko yama n ma, an na‑a miin ma. Chɔn ni yii chɛ wan an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Chɔdan yii ɔ.
41001006	Chɔn ma chii ni koa min na, a nyanden ni soe ti an na. A bu tɛ chiienɛ ni soe gboo an na. A 'a daun fenɛ sin ni kondonɛ an na, a basan kumin tuu a.
41001007	Chɔn ni a fɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Kai min mbe na tena, n gbaa chia a, a 'a gbasaya benden mu n ta ma. A mɔ ma n na, n ni n ma bun, a 'a kɔɔwa yuu gbu wɛɛ fuin koe a.
41001008	N tana, n mbe yii an chɛ wo kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ min mbe na‑a, ɛ Yataa Nyina an na yii‑a, ma koe a wo fɛ.”
41001009	A tima chɛ a, a ɔ nii ma yansan ni, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a, a ka Nasaɛti duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A‑a Chɔn tan, mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ wan Chisɔsi kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Chɔdan yii ɔ.
41001010	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bun‑da bɔ‑a yii chɛ ɔ, a sɛ tindi ma. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a dechee, mbɛ a‑a banda yen, a da a ka‑a dɔndɔ a. Ɛ ta ta‑a Yataa Nyina yen‑da yii‑a a kun ma, yɔ bugbɔɛ, mbɛ a si‑a a kun ma.
41001011	Mbɛ kuiɛ a min‑da gbankon, a ka banda bu ɔ. A ɔ, “I mu n 'na denɛ an na, min ko a di n ye kaka. N faa chimaen mu i ko a.”
41001012	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a Chisɔsi ya, a ta‑a a a fuinɛ ma.
41001013	Chisɔsi ni nɔ wan, tee bi naanin ko a, Sitana ɛ a yiima yan‑da, ni ɛ ko yama ma‑a wan. Chisɔsi ni nɔ soe yama n fan tɛ, maeka n mbe basan‑da a ma.
41001014	Mbɛ an‑na Chɔn sa pimbi chenɛ a. Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi ta‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ sa koe a mɔɛ n tena.
41001015	A‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Tima gbu che‑a gbɛ. Ɛnden fan to‑a gbɛ, Yataa ni a 'a mansaya ɔ yian. Wo wo kan kɔ sɔ, wo 'a ko yama n na, wo ni dan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a.”
41001016	Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi to‑a tachɛ an na, Kadidi yii wa fɛ, mbɛ a‑a kamin fea n yen, nyɛ gbainɛ a. Saimɔn ni ma, an fea a dɔɛ Anduu a, an mbe an 'na yaa a dɛ‑a yii ɔ.
41001017	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo bea n fɛ. N ni wo kan, wo e kun buɛ min dɔ, wo ni na mɔɛ n na n tena, yɔ wo e nyɛ gbain buɛ min dɔ.”
41001018	A ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na an boo ka nyɛ gbain yaa chɛ n na, mbɛ an bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ.
41001019	A sɛ‑a ɛnden fan na, yii chɛ a sanɛ, mbɛ a‑a kai Sɛbɛdi 'a den kaima fea n tan. Chimisi ni ma, an fea a dɔɛ Chɔn na, an mbe dɛndɛ ɔ, an 'na nyɛ gbain yaa, an mbe an dɔ bɛn‑da.
41001020	Chisɔsi‑a an yen kɛn dechee, mbɛ a‑a an bɛɛ chee. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an fa Sɛbɛdi, a basan a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n na, a 'a den chɛ n‑na an to an dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ, an ta‑a.
41001021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. A sin, Chu n 'na suin tee che‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi ta‑a wan an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. Mbɛ a bun‑da mɔɛ n kan‑da nɔ, Yataa koe ma.
41001022	A‑a miin kan ka, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, a 'a kan chɛ buɛ a. A ta kanɛ, gbasaya wa, an ni a ɔ, a ben mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ni Chu n 'na sawa kan.
41001023	Yatina, kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, an 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, nyina yama ni min fɛ. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a yee tɛ,
41001024	a ɔ, “Chisɔsi, Nasaɛti mɔɛ, i ma nn tɔɔ. I na‑a nn kasaa koe an na? N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, i mu mɔɛ min na. I wan mu mɔɛ a tenchen, Yataa‑a min sɔ, a 'a wai chɛ koe a.”
41001025	Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, “I da a tɔn, i ni ka kamin chɛ fɛ!”
41001026	Nyina yama chɛ‑a kamin chɛ bondan fan gbasaya a, a‑a yee wa tɛ, mbɛ a ka‑a a fɛ.
41001027	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni nɔ, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan. An bun‑da a fɔ‑a, an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Fen koe e nɛ? Kan chɛ buɛ nama an nɛ. Ɛ a fɔ wan nyina yama n bɛɛ ye, an mbe koe min ma. An sin, a 'a gbasaya chɛ, an mbe a ya wan.”
41001028	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ ta‑a wan kan kɔ kan Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
41001029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, an bɛ Chimisi a, ni Chɔn, a basan a fɛ denɛ tɔɛ n na. Mbɛ an ta‑a dɔndɔ gbe, Saimɔn n 'na chenɛ a, an fea a dɔɛ Anduu a.
41001030	Mbɛ an‑na a tan, Saimɔn bian musu ɛ sa ɔ sofa a, chima bɔndenɛ ɛ a ma. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na a ɔ yian Chisɔsi a.
41001031	Mbɛ a ta‑a musu chɛ tena, a‑a a bia a boo ma, mbɛ a basan‑da a ma, a kɔɔ sɔ koe a. Mbɛ chima gbu bɔ‑a a ɔ, a bun‑da tawa chɛ‑a an ye.
41001032	A duina chɛ, tee beaenɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ n na‑a wan gbandi mɔɛ n na Chisɔsi tena. An na‑a wan chɛ n bɛɛ a, nyina yama ni miin fɛ.
41001033	Mbɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ Kapanaun duu chɛ ɔ, an na kan‑da wan a ma chen da a.
41001034	Chisɔsi‑a mɔɛ n baun fan gbandi sɛsɛ n dɔ. A‑a nyina yama n gbain fan, mɔ sɛsɛ n fɛ. A sin, a ee dɔn, nyina yama chɛ n ni koɔ, koe min na mu, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ min sima mu a a.
41001035	Sayi ma pimbi ɔ, Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a bɔ‑a chenɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a duu boo ka, a ta‑a, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kaina min, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ.
41001036	Chɛɛ Saimɔn bɛ a bɔɛ n na, an ta‑a wan ben‑da an ya a kan‑da Chisɔsi a.
41001037	An sin‑na a yen kɛn, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe ka i wan yan‑da.”
41001038	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Mmɔ ka nɛ, mmɔ ni ta duu tɔɛ n dɔ ben‑da, min mbe a ma, n ni Yataa 'a sakana bai sa an bɛɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, n na‑a wai chɛ an chɛ koe a.”
41001039	Mbɛ an ben ben‑da Kadidi chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ ta‑a Yataa 'a bai sa‑a Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na, a basan nyina yama n gbainɛ a, mɔɛ n fɛ.
41001040	Tima dɔndɔ a, mɔ kaima dɔndɔ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, gbandi yama bɔen ni min gboo gbɛɛ ma. Mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban, Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, disa ɔ, a ɔ, “Fa, ni a a di i ye, e kun fan i ni n baun.”
41001041	Chinchincha‑a Chisɔsi gboo fa wan gban. Mbɛ a‑a a boo a ta, mbɛ a tu‑a kamin chɛ a. A ɔ, “A a di n ye, i ni bauncha ma sɔn. Baun gbɛ gbandi chɛ ɔ.”
41001042	Mɔ kaima chɛ gboo gbongbon‑da wan, a baun‑da a ya kɔɔɛ a.
41001043	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a dasi gbau gbau be a ma, a ɔ, “I too ma sɔ. I ma koe chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a. Chɛɛ ta dɔndɔ gbe mɔɛ chɛ tena, min mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ, Yataa a, a ni i ma mɛn. Mbɛ min mbe a ma, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ i baun‑da, i ni yasi chɛ bɔ, min mbe sawa chɛ ɔ, min be‑a Mosisi ma.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ma, kamin chɛ ta‑a.
41001045	Chɛɛ a ta‑a kɛn dechee, a bun‑da koɔ‑a boo ka boo ka, a‑a a ɔ yian kan kɔ kan. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi nii che to bɔ‑a ya a ma, duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, fanka fanka ma chianɛ ko a. Chɛɛ a ni gbɛ ben‑da tanda n fan dɔ, mɔ ee kaina. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n ni bɔ wan kan kɔ kan, an mbe na a tan.
41002001	Tee kuunden gbakɔ, Chisɔsi yɛ‑a to Kapanaun duu ɔ. Mbɛ sakana kuiɛ a fasan‑da a ɔ gbɛɛ ɛ, mbɛ ɛ chenɛ a.
41002002	Mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ n na sɔn‑da wan a ma, kaina nii to chenɛ bu ɔ, a basan pɛsa wɛɛ a, mɔɛ n ko a. A sin, a ni wan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da an na.
41002003	Mbɛ mɔ kaima naaninɛ nu, an bɔ‑a a a, an mbe na‑a kaminɛ a Chisɔsi tena, a namaaenɛ ɛ.
41002004	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an nii che na‑a kamin chɛ a Chisɔsi tena. Koe min na mu, mɔ fanka da a ni koo. Mbɛ an sɛ‑a chenɛ gbu kun ma, mbɛ an‑na kaina ɛnden ma ka, Chisɔsi kun ma chia a. An ban‑da kɛn chen chɛ ma ka‑a, an kaina chɛ, mbɛ an‑na kamin chɛ a yii nɔ, sa ɔ yaa ɔ, an na‑a a a min dɔ.
41002005	Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, danaya wa min ni mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, a ko a, mbɛ a koɔ‑a namaa chɛ tena. A ɔ, “N 'na den, n‑na n boo bɔ i 'a ko yama n dɔ.”
41002006	Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, miin ni nɔ si ɔ, an bun‑da an yii na chii‑a, bai chɛ ma.
41002007	An dɔ, “Fen ko a mu, mɔ bonda chɛ ɛ bai chɛ sima fɔ‑a? Ɛ ka baa an bɔ tena Yataa ma. Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an mbe che a boo bɔ‑a mɔ gbu 'a ko yama n dɔ, chɛɛ mɔ gbu ma.”
41002008	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, a ya kɔɔɛ a, koe min ni tachɛ tena an yiima ɔ. Chɛ ko a, a ɔ an ma, “Wo sɛmbɛ wo yii na chii koe a ka.
41002009	A ɔ ma gbɛ a fɔ koe a namaa chɛ ye, mbɛ n‑na n boo bɔ a 'a ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ a ɔ gbɛ wan a ma koe a, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ, a ni a 'a yaa ya, a ni tachɛ chɛ.
41002010	N mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan wo a gbɛ sanche, mbɛ n fan, Mɔ gbu 'a Denɛ, gbasaya ɛ wan n boo ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ, n boo bɔ koe a mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n dɔ.” Mbɛ a koɔ‑a ka wan namaa chɛ tena,
41002011	A ɔ, “I wan, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye, mbɛ i ni i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni i 'a yaa ya, i ni ta i 'a chenɛ a.”
41002012	A ya kɔɔɛ a, an gbɛɛ ya to‑a ka wan kamin chɛ a, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a‑a a 'a yaa ya, mbɛ a ta‑a gbae. An gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan gbechee, mbɛ an‑na Yataa tando. An dɔ, “Nn ma koe ɔ yen nin bɛ, yɔ chɛ nyɔn sima.”
41002013	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a duu chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to Kadidi yii wa fɛ. Mɔ fanka na‑a wan a tena, mbɛ a‑a a kuu sɔ an kan‑da Yataa wakoe ma.
41002014	A to‑a tachɛ chɛ an na, mbɛ a‑a pawa bia mɔ dɔndɔ yen, an ni min chee Difai, Afiɔsi 'a denɛ. A ni si ɔ a 'a wai chɛ tena wan. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te a ma, “Bea n fɛ.” Mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a bea‑a a fɛ.
41002015	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi n ni wan si ɔ daun chɛ tena, Difai 'a chenɛ a. A tima chɛ a, pawa kain mɔ sɛsɛ nu, a basan mɔ dɔ mende n bɛɛ a, miin nii sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, an gbɛɛ ni wan Chisɔsi fɛ. An sin, a sɛsɛ na‑a wan, an bun‑da daunɛ chɛ‑a an bɛ Chisɔsi a, a basan a fɛ denɛ n na.
41002016	Mbɛ Fayisii mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, miin ni sawa kan min be‑a Mosisi ma, an ni wan nɔ. An na‑a Chisɔsi yen fan daunɛ chɛ‑a, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin nii sɔ ɔ Yataa chia ma, a basan pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ n na. Mbɛ an dɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, an dɔ, “Kai chɛ nii daunɛ chɛ ɛnden bɛɛ a, an bɛ mɔ bonda chɛ n na.”
41002017	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a min kɛn, an ni min fɔ tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Danda chɛ mɔ ma gbɔsɔ ee gboo ɔ bɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ dechee chɛ nu, miin gbandien mu. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ miin mu mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa tena, n ma na ni an fan ko a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, n na‑a an fan ko a.”
41002018	Tima dɔndɔ a, Chɔn, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a fɛ mɔɛ n ni wan sun bia a. Mbɛ Fayisii mɔɛ chɛ nu, an na‑a a tena, an dɔ, “Chɔn fɛ denɛ n mbe sunɛ bia wan tima ɔ tima, mbɛ an‑na samunɛ chɛ. Nn fan Fayisii n bɛɛ, nn fɛ denɛ n bɛɛ mbe a ma ka wan. Chɛɛ i ta fɛ denɛ n mbe daunɛ an chɛ tun, an mbe ee sun bia. Fen ko a mu, an mbe chɛ ma tena?”
41002019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔɛ‑a musu si bɛnɛ chee, mbɛ a bɔɛ n na kan‑da, daun chɛ koe a mu. An mbe ee to nɔ a chen kɔɔ, an ni kɔnkɔɛ a dɛ an fandi ma. Tima min na wɛ musu si kai chɛ ɛ nɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n mbe kun fan, an ni daunɛ chɛ, an mbe ee to nɔ, an ni sunɛ bia.
41002020	Chɛɛ tima ɛ che‑a wan, tima min na mɔɛ n mbe musu si kai chɛ ya‑a an tɛ, a tima a mu an mbe sunɛ bia‑a.”
41002021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai tɛ wan an tena, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che, i ni doma nama tɛ a a, doma kɔma dombo koe a. Ni mɔɛ‑a chɛ ma, a gba ma ee nyan‑da. Koe min na mu, woe an mbe to‑a doma nama chɛ ɔ, a koaen ba a.
41002022	A yɛ to, ni mɔ ma‑a gbɛ chɛ‑a gbɛ chɛ soe gboo ɔ, e a chɛ tena soe gboo nama an dɔ, ɛ to kaina aan a a ni kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔ ee gbɛ nama chɛ gbɛ chɛ soe gboo kɔma ɔ, a a kɔɔ koe a, ɛ a te wan, mbɛ i fo‑a gbɛ a, a basan soe gboo a. Mɔɛ ɛ min ma, e gbɛ nama chɛ soe gboo nama an dɔ.”
41002023	Chu mɔɛ n 'na suin tee dɔndɔ ma, Chisɔsi ni ben tena wan chia a sɛnɛ dɔndɔ tɛtɛ ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n bun‑da sɛnɛ chɛ ɔ, chin fenɛ tɛ‑a an boo a.
41002024	Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ nu, an dɔ, “A yen bɛ, i fɛ denɛ n mbe koe min ma tena, a ma nyin. Mmɔ 'a sawa ma dɔn ni chɛ ma, suin tee ma.”
41002025	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, Mansa Defidi na‑a koe ma wan tima dɔndɔ a. Kɔnkɔɛ na‑a a bia wan tima dɔndɔ a, an bɛ a fɛ mɔɛ n na.
41002026	Mbɛ a don‑da wan Yataa 'a chenɛ a, mbɛ biidi chɛ min been ni Yataa ma, a‑a a ya, mbɛ a‑a a daun. A yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a a tɔɛ be a fɛ mɔɛ n ma. A na‑a mmɔ 'a sawa an yɔn ka, a mu min na, mmɔ 'a sawa na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee an biidi chɛ daun, mɔɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a. Chɛɛ chɛ na‑a ma wan, tima min na Abiata ni Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa a, Yataa tena.”
41002027	Mbɛ Chisɔsi danka‑a gbɛ min fɔ‑a an ye, a ɔ, “Suin tee chɛ, a bɔ‑a mɔ gbu an ko a, chɛɛ mɔ gbu an ma bɔ ni suin tee ko a.
41002028	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a denɛ, n fan mu mansa a suin tee wɛɛ ko a.”
41003001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a to Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. A na‑a kaminɛ tan fan nɔ, min boo faenɛ ni a ma.
41003002	Mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan nɔ, miin toen ni an ni Chisɔsi bia a chen kɔ. An ni wan gbɛ a ma fɛn‑da, a ɔ yen koe a, ni ɛ kamin chɛ a baun‑da wan, suin tee wɛɛ ma.
41003003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ kamin chɛ ye, min boo chɛ faen ni ka a ma, a ɔ, “I a sɔ, i ni na sɔ mɔɛ gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ.” Mbɛ a na‑a, a sɔ‑a an ya kɔɔ.
41003004	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A nyin fan mmɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden mu fen ma suin tee ma. Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu mɔ ni mɔɛ baun, a ben a fa koe ma. Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu to mɔ ni ko chɛndɛ ma, a ben ko yama ma koe ma.” Chɛɛ an ma bai fɔ ni, a si chɛ ma.
41003005	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔɛ ma fɛn dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a a 'a tindanɛ. A faa tɛenɛ ɛ an ma, a yɛ to, ɛ faamɔnɛ ɔ, a si an 'na faa a kɔɔɛ ma. Mbɛ a ɔ kamin chɛ ma, “I boo ɔ tan.” Mbɛ a‑a a boo ɔ sawan, mbɛ a boo baun‑da, yɔ a dɔndɔɛ ni buɛ min dɔ.
41003006	Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ n bɔ‑a baa ma. Mbɛ an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ni Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a mɔɛ n na, an bun‑da an kun puin‑da kaina dɔndɔɛ, an mbe ma buɛ min dɔ, an ni Chisɔsi fa.
41003007	Chisɔsi ta‑a wan Kadidi yii wa fɛ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. A sin, mɔ fanka wa bea‑a wan to nɔ a fɛ. Mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, a basan Chudia a.
41003008	A yɛ to, an ka‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an ka‑a Idumia tanda ɔ, an ka‑a tee bɔ tena, Chɔdan yii tɔnfɛ dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ an ka‑a to Taya duu wa a a tindanɛ, a basan Sidon duu wa a. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena. Koe min na mu, an na‑a koe n na min fan, a ni miin ma tena.
41003009	Fanka wa min na‑a ka, a na‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi‑a a yii na chii a ma ta koe a, an ma na tindi tindi a ma. Mbɛ a ɔ, a fɛ denɛ n ni dɛndɛ ɔ bɛn, a ko a.
41003010	A mu min na, a na‑a mɔ sɛsɛ n baun fan an 'na gbandi n dɔ. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan gbɛ, gbandi mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an ni wan gbɛ an fandi fɔkɔ fɔkɔ‑a, fanka chɛ ɔ, tu koe a Chisɔsi a.
41003011	A sin, nyina yama ni ka miin gbɛɛ fɛ, ni an na‑a Chisɔsi yen dechee, an ni bea wan a chen kɔɔ, an mbe yee tɛ. An dɔ, “Yataa 'a denɛ mu i a!”
41003012	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a dasi gbau gbau be nyina yama chɛ n ma. A ɔ, an ma a fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ye, mɔɛ min sima mu a a.
41003013	Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ ɔ. A to‑a nɔ wan, a‑a mɔ kaima chɛ n chee, a toen ni miin na, bea koe a a fɛ. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ na‑a a tena.
41003014	Mbɛ a‑a an mɔ tan kun ma fea n ya, a‑a an chee a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ a ɔ, a‑a an ya, an bɛ ni ma. A ɔ, a sin mbe an sɔ‑a wan, a ɔ, an ni ta mɔɛ n kan, a si Yataa ma.
41003015	A sin to, a ɔ, ɛ gbasaya be‑a wan an ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.
41003016	Chisɔsi na‑a mɔ tan kun ma fea miin ya, ma koe a a fɛ, an fan nii nɛ. Saimɔn ni ma, Chimisi, ni a dɔɛ Chɔn. Anduu n fea Fiipi a, ni Batɔɔmiu. Matiu ni Tɔmɔsi. A yɛ to, Chimisi dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, ni Tadayɔsi. Saimɔn dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, ni Chudasi Isikayɔti. Saimɔn saa saa, a‑a min ya, a‑a tɔ dɔ gbɛɛ be wan a ma, a ɔ, Pita. Chimisi ni a dɔɛ Chɔn, an fa tɔ ni Sɛbɛdi. Chisɔsi‑a an bɛɛ tɔɛ si wan, a ɔ, banda mɛn kaminɛ nu. (Koe min na mu, an ni kosan koɔ‑a kaka). Chimisi dɔndɔɛ fa tɔ ni Afiɔsi. Saimɔn dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ ni mɔɛ an na, min ni a 'a chɛnyɛ ma chɛɛ chɛ tena. Chudasi Isikayɔti tana, an na‑a danka Chisɔsi ma tachɛ‑a.
41003020	Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a chenɛ a, a yiaenɛ ni kaina min. Nɔ wɛɛ to, fanka fanka wa koa‑a wan an ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, tima nii nɔ daun chɛ koe a.
41003021	Chisɔsi waa mɔɛ n‑na chɛ a min, mbɛ tima ee a boo ɔ, daun chɛ koe a. An ta‑a wan, a ka an baa a, a bia koe a, gbasaya a. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ dɔ n ni a fɔ tena wan, an dɔ, a woo‑a.
41003022	Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, an ni wan nɔ, a ka Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An ni wan a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ, min tɔ mu Bɛɛsɛbu, an mbe a fɛ. A sin to, an mbe ka gbasaya chɛ be tena a ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.”
41003023	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an chee, a koɔ‑a an tena, tai ɔ. A ɔ, “Sitana ee a wandi gbain, mɔɛ n fɛ.
41003024	Ni chɛɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n tɛ chɛnyɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ, an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɛ yɔn fan.
41003025	Suunɛ wɛɛ ɛ ka wan, koɛ ɛ a yɔn fan. A yɛ to, ni koɛ ma‑a suun chen kan kɔ kan da a, an suun chɛ ee che sɔ‑a.
41003026	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni Sitana fɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ n dɔ du‑a koɛ ɔ, mbɛ a bea‑a, a wandi gbu 'a mansaya danka che‑a.”
41003027	A ɔ, “Tea gbu sin ko a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee don ka dechee kamin gbasayaen ba a chenɛ a, i ni a 'a feanka n punka. Ni a chiienɛ an ma‑a, mbɛ a boo fenɛ n mbe che wan punka‑a, a 'a chenɛ a.”
41003028	A ɔ, “N ni chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ Yataa ɛ mɔɛ n to‑a wan nɔ, an 'na ko yama n ko a, a basan main chɛ n na, an mbe miin chɛ n na.
41003029	Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a Yataa Nyina main, Yataa ee a boo bɔ‑a a mɔ sima chɛ 'a main chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ a mɔɛ chɛ‑a ko yama ma, kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
41003030	Chisɔsi na‑a chɛ fɔ, a tɛ‑a bai chɛ an ma, mɔɛ dɔ n ni min fɔ tena. An dɔ, “Nyina yama, an mbe mɔna chɛ fɛ.”
41003031	Mbɛ Chisɔsi de na‑a a tena, an bɛ a dɔ kaima n na. An sɔ‑a baa ma, mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ a ta, a chee‑a.
41003032	Mɔ fanka ni wan si ɔ, Chisɔsi 'a tindanɛ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “A yen ko, i de ni ma, ni i dɔ kaima nu, an bɛ i dɔ musuma n na, an mbe baa ma sɔ ɔ, an toen mu an ni i yen.”
41003033	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo a fɔ n ye, n de mu mɔɛ min na. A yɛ to, ni n suun ma nyɔɛ mu miin na.”
41003034	Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n ma fɛn, miin ni ka si ɔ a 'a tindanɛ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo yen bɛ, n de yen ko nɛ, a basan n suun ma nyɔɛ n na.
41003035	Mɔ ɔ mɔ, min mbe Yataa faa chima koe ma‑a, n de an nɛ, n dɔ musuma an nɛ, n dɔ kaima an nɛ.”
41004001	Mbɛ tima dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ to mɔɛ n kan‑da, Kadidi yii wa fɛ. Mɔɛ miin na sɔn‑da a ma, an kɔ ni koo. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a sɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ a si‑a nɔ. Dɛndɛ chɛ ni si ɔ yii an na, mɔ fanka chɛ n gbɛɛ sin to‑a tindi ma.
41004002	A‑a an kan fan ko sɛsɛ ma, tai n dɔ. A‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ,
41004003	“Wo wo too ma sɔ! Tee dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ ta‑a wan a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ chin fen fasi tena.
41004004	Ɛ a fasi chɛ an na, mbɛ dɔ bea‑a chia kuu a. Mbɛ dɔ n bɛɛ bea‑a faa gban duu gboo ma, dɔ n yɛ‑a an bea‑a wai duu gboo ma, mbɛ dɔ n sin bea‑a duu gboo chɛndɛ ma. Chin fen kuu miin bea‑a ka chia kuu a, konde n‑na an sogban sogban fan. Miin sin bea‑a ka faa gban duu gboo chɛ ma, an tana, an fɛn‑da wan bui chɛ wandi a, a mu min na, fii sima ni wan nɔ. Chɛɛ tee winɛ ma kun ni an dɔ, an gbaa‑a wan, koe min na mu, an suu nii ma yii ni chɛndɛ duu gboo ɔ. Miin sin bea‑a ka wai duu gboo chɛ ma, an bɛɛ fɛn‑da wan, a basan wai chɛ a dɔndɔ a, chɛɛ wai chɛ n koa‑a wan a ben chin fen chɛ n ma. Chɛ‑a chin fen fɛn chɛ n na kɔnya wan, mbɛ an gbaa‑a. Miin bea‑a ka duu gboo chɛndɛ chɛ ma, a danka a, an gbɔ‑a wan wɔsɔkɔɔ. Dɔ n gbaa ni wan an kansanɛ ma bi sawa, bi wɔdɔ, ni chɛmɛ sɛsɛ.”
41004009	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.”
41004010	Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe to‑a kɛn, mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni ka a 'a tindanɛ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, an‑na a ɔ tisa. An dɔ, a ni a ɔ yian an na, tai chɛ n fasai buɛ.
41004011	Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Mɔɛ gbɛɛ nii ma min dɔ sɔn tee a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, a‑a an dɔ yian wo a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, mmɔ bɛ ma miin na, n mbe koɔ an tena tai an dɔ.
41004012	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ ‘an ya a kaenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, an ni kaina fɛn, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ɔ yen‑da. Mbɛ an mbe an too ma sɔ‑a wan, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ‑a. Ni chɛ ma, kɔkɔɛ an mbe na‑a an ya a mun‑da wan Yataa ma, mbɛ a‑a a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ.’ ”
41004013	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “A ni nyan fan gbu, wo ni tai chɛ ɔ gbɛ. Ni wo ma tai chɛ ɔ gbɛ ni, wo e ma ka ma gbɛ, wo ni tai dɔ mende ɔ gbɛ?
41004014	Chin fen fasi mɔɛ chɛ, a na‑a Yataa 'a sakana bai an fasi ka.
41004015	Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe wan yɔ chia kuu 'a duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a min ma. Ni an‑na Yataa 'a sakana bai a min, mbɛ Sitana ɛ na wan a ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ a‑a bai chɛ bɔ an yiima ɔ, a ta‑a a a.
41004016	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan yɔ faa gban duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a min ma. Ni an‑na sakana bai chɛ a min, an mbe an boo si wan a kɔɔ, buɔdia wandi gbu a, a ya kɔɔɛ a.
41004017	Chɛɛ Yataa 'a bai chɛ ee si an yiima ɔ, tima ɔ yansama ko a. An mbe dan dechee a a tima kundu ɛnden fan ko a. Ni an‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa an ma dechee, sakana bai chɛ wako a, an mbe an boo bɔ wan a kɔɔ.
41004018	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan nɔ yɔ wai duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu chɛ n bea‑a ka min ma. An mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min fan.
41004019	Chɛɛ dunya chɛ ɔ faagbaa, a basan faagbaa a si an mbe ma buɛ min dɔ an ni nyan, a basan faagbaa tɔɛ gbɛɛ a, an mbe sakana bai chɛ kɔ din fan, fanka ee ma to a a an tena.
41004020	Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan yɔ duu gboo chɛndɛ chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a ka min ma. An gbɔ‑a wan wɔsɔkɔɔ. Dɔ n gbaa ni wan an kansanɛ ma chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, dɔ nu bi wɔdɔ, dɔ n sin ni bi sawa. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ɛ ka wan, miin mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min, mbɛ an‑na a sa an faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ an‑na a ma, yɔ sakana bai chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye, a ma koe a.”
41004021	Chisɔsi‑a kan chɛ a tun, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a dambo a man, a ee samba bun a kun ma, chɛ ma, a ni a a don sofa kɔɔ. Chɛɛ ni mɔ‑a dambo a man, e a si kaina wan, min mbe a ma, ni mɔɛ n don‑da dechee i 'a chenɛ a, an mbe kun fan an ni kaina ɔ yen gbadan.
41004022	Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko min dɔ nunden mu, ɛ bɔ‑a wan ya a ma. Koe min bɛɛ ma bunden mu, a wɛɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan ya a ma tee dɔndɔ a.
41004023	Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.”
41004024	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a ɔ an ma, “Wo wo too ma sɔ bai chɛ n ma, wo e miin na min. Ni wo to‑a nɔ, wo ni wo too ma sɔ chɛndɛ chɛ Yataa 'a bai ma, wo e to‑a wan nɔ, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. A sin, Yataa wɛɛ ɛ a tɔnɔnɛ be‑a wan wo ma.
41004025	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe bai chɛ n dɔ gbɛ‑a chɛndɛ, a ta yiimatɛ kun ma ɛ sa wan. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ee bai chɛ n dɔ gbɛ‑a, min bɛɛ ɛ a yii ma, ɛ bɔ‑a wan a yii ma.”
41004026	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Tai chɛ, ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan Yataa 'a mansaya ɛ buɛ min dɔ. A maen fan mu, yɔ kaminɛ min na‑a chin fen kuu fasi a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ.
41004027	Ɛ chinɔ wan yɛɛ ma, mbɛ a kunɛ‑a sau ma, ɛ ben ben. A sin, ɛ ma chɛ ma‑a su ɔ tee a, chin fen chɛ sin mbe ta‑a fɛn‑da, ɛ ta‑a koa‑a. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ee a ma a ni a ɔ sɔn, a gbu ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ.
41004028	Duu gboo wandi, an mbe a ma, chin fenɛ ɛ nyan, a ni gbɔɛ be. Koe saa mu min na, chin fenɛ ɛ gbungbu pɛn, mbɛ a bɔ‑a duu kun ma, a pɔndɛn pɔndɛnɛ. A dankama a, mbɛ a gbɔɛ si‑a a a, a ma‑a wɔsɔkɔɔ.
41004029	Ni chin fen chɛ che‑a a ya tena, mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a a 'a chin fen tɛ mɛ ɔ bɛn, koe min na mu, chin fen ya tima che‑a.”
41004030	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe tai dɔ mende an tɛ tena to, n mbe kun n ni Yataa 'a mansaya siman min ma. Ka wɛ n mbe a bɔ nyɔɛ yian wo a.
41004031	Ɛ ka wan yɔ chin fen kuu dɔma ɛndenɛ, kamin dɔndɔ na‑a min ya, mbɛ a‑a a chin a 'a yadi ɔ. Chin fen kuu chɛ ni dɔɔ chin fen kuu gbɛɛ ma dunya ɔ.
41004032	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a fɛn‑da kɛn, a ma‑a wan chin fen chenama wa a, a ben chin fenɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma. A pimbi bun‑da wan chin fenɛ tɔɛ n kun ma yadi chɛ ɔ. Konde n na‑a wan, an‑na an nyanɛ n sa a bonɛ n dɔ.”
41004033	Chisɔsi ni ma Yataa 'a bai sa‑a an tena, a ni a sa tai sɛsɛ bonda chɛ n fan dɔ. An sin ni che buɛ min dɔ a ɔ gbɛ‑a, a ni a fɔ ka wan an ye.
41004034	A nii bai sa mɔɛ n tena, ni a ma tai tɛ ni. Chɛɛ ni an dechee na‑a to, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, a ni tai chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian fan an na.
41004035	Tee dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma, tee bea‑a kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Mmɔ yii wa chɛ tɛ tindi dɔndɔɛ ma.”
41004036	Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ chɛ n‑na mɔ fanka chɛ n to, mbɛ an sɛ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, ɛ ka si ɔ min dɔ. Mbɛ an bun‑da dɛndɛ gbu wii‑a, an mbe ta‑a Chisɔsi a. A sin, dɛndɛ dɔ mende n bea‑a wan Chisɔsi ta fɛ.
41004037	A yen ko, fia wa dɛgbɛ‑a a kuu sɔ bɔ‑a yii chɛ a, min‑na a kuu sɔ yii chɛ‑a dɛndɛ gbu ɔ. Ɛnden fan to‑a, yii ni a a fa.
41004038	Chisɔsi ni dɛndɛ gbaa wan pɔɔ, fenɛ ɛ sa ɔ a kunɛ kɔɔ, ɛ chinɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n ta‑a, an‑na a a kunɛ bui chɛ a, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, mmɔ ɛ ka fa an na, a gbɔsɔ ee i ma ɛnden bɛɛ a.”
41004039	Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a ɔ fia gbu ma, “Sɛmbɛ ka!” Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ yii wɛɛ ma, a ɔ, “A ɔ maun gbɛ!” Mbɛ fia sɛmbɛ‑a bɔ‑a, yii wɛɛ ɔ maun‑da.
41004040	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo nii chian. Tima an nɛ gbɛ, wo ni wo kai fa n na.”
41004041	Chɛɛ chiandia ni koo an dɔ. An bun‑da an nyɔn dɔ tisa‑a, an dɔ, “Fen kamin nyɔn sima mu chɛ a? Fia wɛɛ, a basan yii a, an mbe a kuiɛ a min fan!”
41005001	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi che‑a Kadidi yii wa tindi dɔndɔɛ ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Chɛnyɛ chɛ nɛnɛ, a tɔ ni Kɛyasa.
41005002	An che‑a kɛn nɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ. Ɛ bɔ‑a dechee a ɔ, mɔ kaima dɔndɔ na‑a a tan, min na‑a ka bɛnkuɛ ɔ. Nyina yama, an ni an kamin chɛ fɛ.
41005003	A sin, a ni chi bɛnkuɛ ɔ wan. Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kun, a ni a sa yɔɔɛ a.
41005004	Tima sɛsɛ ko a, an na‑a a sa wan yɔɔɛ a. Chɛɛ a ni yɔɔɛ chɛ ɔ tɛ wan, a chenɛ ma, a basan a boo a. A ɔ ni gbɛɛ gbeden, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kun a ma.
41005005	Su ɔ tee a, kamin chɛ ni ma wan sɔ ɔ, a chenɛ a, ben‑da bɛnkuɛ ɔ, a basan kɔnkɔɛ n dɔ a. Ɛ yee tɛ‑a, ɛ a wandi ma tɛ tɛ senɛ n na.
41005006	A ni pɔɔ, a‑a Chisɔsi yen, mbɛ a‑a bui sa a a. A na‑a, mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban, Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ.
41005007	Mbɛ a‑a yee wa tɛ, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi, Yataa Wa 'a denɛ! I toen mu i ni fen ma n na? I dimu, I ma n tɔɔya. A chɛ Yataa ko a.”
41005008	A‑a chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, Chisɔsi na‑a a kuu sɔ wan gbɛ a fɔ‑a nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, a ni ka mɔ kaima chɛ fɛ.
41005009	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I tɔɛ?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “N tɔ mu Fanka Wa. Koe min na mu, nn kɔkoo kaka.”
41005010	Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi disa pien, a ɔ, a ma nyina yama chɛ n gbain an tanda chɛ ɔ.
41005011	A tima chɛ a, kɔɛnya man sɛsɛ ni wan an baima, an mbe daun chɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ kaa fɛ.
41005012	Mbɛ nyina yama chɛ n‑na Chisɔsi disa, an dɔ, “Nn na ta kɔɛnya chɛ n tena, nn ni bea an fɛ.”
41005013	A dɔn‑da wan an ta koe ma. Mbɛ nyina yama chɛ n bɔ‑a kamin chɛ fɛ, an ta‑a, an bea‑a kɔɛnya chɛ n fɛ. Kɔɛnya chɛ n gbɛɛ, wu fea da faenɛ ɛ gban, an yii‑a bui chɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ kaa fɛ, an dɛ‑a yii wa chɛ ɔ, an to‑a a ɔ.
41005014	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni ka kɔɛnya chɛ n kun ma fɛn tena, an ben‑da bui‑a. An ta‑a duu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a gbɛɛ ɔ yian, min chɛ‑a a ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian ben‑da an tanda chɛ ɔ. Mɔ sɛsɛ n na‑a wan, min mbe a ma, an ni a ɔ yen min ma‑a.
41005015	A sin, an che‑a kɛn, nyina yama chɛ n ni ka kaminɛ min fɛ, an‑na a tan fan, ɛ si ɔ nɔ. A ma chiienɛ ɛ, a sin, a yiima tɛenɛ ɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an gbɛɛ chian‑da.
41005016	Mɔɛ miin ni ka nɔ ko ɔ ko ma‑a, an fan‑na a gbɛɛ ɔ yian gbɛ an bɔ n na. An‑na a ɔ yian, Chisɔsi na‑a nyina yama chɛ n gbain buɛ min dɔ kamin chɛ fɛ, a basan kɔɛnya chɛ n bakoe a.
41005017	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na Chisɔsi disa, an dɔ, a ni bɔ an 'na chɛnyɛ ɔ.
41005018	Chisɔsi ɛ kɛn dɛ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a na‑a nyina yama gbain ka kaminɛ min fɛ, a‑a disa chɛ wan, a ɔ, Chisɔsi ni a ma an bɛ ni ta.
41005019	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma dɔn ni. Chɛɛ a‑a min fɔ, a ɔ, “Ta i waa a. I ni a ɔ yian i 'a mɔɛ n na, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a koe min chɛ i ye, a chinchin‑da buɛ min dɔ i ma.”
41005020	Mbɛ kamin chɛ wɛɛ ta‑a wan, a ben‑da Duu Tan dɔ gbɛɛ, ɛ a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, Chisɔsi na‑a min chɛ a ye. A sin, an mɔɛ n gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, an koe chɛ a min koe a.
41005021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a yii wa chɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ, a ka‑a kaina, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mɔ fanka wa an na sɔn‑da nɔ a ma, yii chɛ da a.
41005022	Mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Chayɔsi. A ni mɔ chenama dɔndɔ an na, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. Mbɛ a na‑a Chisɔsi tan. A‑a Chisɔsi tan kɛn, mbɛ a bea‑a a chen na.
41005023	A‑a a disa, a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, a ɔ, “N 'na den musuenɛ e na fa‑a. I dimu, na i ni i boo bun a ma, a ni baun, a fɔɛ ni yɛ to a ma.”
41005024	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bea‑a Chayɔsi fɛ, an bun‑da ta‑a. Mɔ sɛsɛ ta‑a wan an na saan‑da, an findi findienɛ ɛ a ma, a ka kaka kan kɔ kan ma.
41005025	Musu dɔndɔ ni wan fanka chɛ tɛ ɔ, musu n 'na kau ma gbandi ni min ma, san tan kun ma fea ko a.
41005026	A na‑a tɔɔ wan bui ti sɛsɛ ye. A‑a a boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ma tachɛ wɛɛ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ma gboo ɔ bɔɛ ma sɔn ni, gbandi gbu ta‑a wan ya ɔ ma.
41005027	A na‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min fan, a kɔma a. Chɛ ko a, a na‑a wan a gbaa chia a, fanka chɛ ɔ. A ni wan a fɔ‑a, a yiima ɔ, a ɔ “Ni n tu‑a a ma doma a dechee, n mbe baun‑da wan gbandi chɛ ɔ.” Mbɛ a tu‑a Chisɔsi 'a doma a.
41005029	A ya kɔɔɛ a, a 'a kau ma gbandi chɛ sɛmbɛ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a gboo gbu a tinsɔn, mbɛ a baun‑da gbɛ.
41005030	A ya kɔɔɛ a, Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ gbasaya, min ni a ɔ mɔɛ n baun koe a, dɔ bɔ‑a a ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun, fanka chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Nyɔn tu‑a n ma doma a?”
41005031	A fɛ denɛ n dɔ, “I‑a a ɔ yen tena wan, mɔɛ n mbe i 'a tindanɛ, an mbe tindi‑a i ma. I ni tisa chɛ to, mɔɛ tu koe a i a?”
41005032	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma sɛmbɛ ni, a ya a ben ben koe a, a ɔ gbɛ koe a, ni mɔɛ min tu‑a a a.
41005033	Chɛɛ musu chɛ ban‑da a ɔ sɔn‑da, a gboo ɔ ɛ gbɛ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛ ko a, a bɔ‑a ya a ma, ɛ samba‑a chiandia a. Mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, mbɛ a‑a tea gbu gbɛɛ ɔ yian a a.
41005034	Chisɔsi ɔ te a ma, “N 'na den, ta i faa chimaenɛ a don. I 'a danaya‑a i baun. Baun i 'a gbandi chɛ ɔ.”
41005035	Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ tena wan musu chɛ tena, mbɛ sɔ mɔɛ na‑a, a ka Chayɔsi 'a chenɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, a 'a den musuenɛ gbu fa‑a, a ma na sɔ to ticha tɔɔya‑a ta koe a nɔ.
41005036	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma a too ma sɔ ni an bai chɛ ma. A‑a a fɔ wan Chayɔsi ye, a ɔ, “I ma chian, dan dechee n na.”
41005037	Chisɔsi ma dɔn ni mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n ni bea a fɛ. A‑a Pita an ya dechee, ni Chimisi, an fea a dɔɛ Chɔn na.
41005038	Mbɛ an che‑a Chayɔsi 'a chenɛ a. An che‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔɛ ni buɛ min dɔ nɔ, a basan di chɛ a, ni yee tɛ.
41005039	A don‑da chenɛ bu ɔ, mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “N ma a ɔ sɔn ni fen sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ e nɛ. Wo sɛmbɛ di chɛ‑a. Den chɛ ma fa ni, ɛ sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ wan dechee.”
41005040	An bun‑da a yɛn‑da a da a kuiɛ chɛ ma. Mbɛ a‑a an gbɛɛ a bɔ chen chɛ a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ den sawa chɛ nu, miin na‑a a fɛ, ni den chɛ fa an fea a de a, a‑a an ya. Mbɛ an don‑da chen chɛ dumu gbu ɔ, den su chɛ ni kaina min sa ɔ.
41005041	Chisɔsi‑a denɛ gbu ya ka wan a boo ma, mbɛ a ɔ, “Den den, n dɔ, i ni i a sɔ.”
41005042	Den chɛ ni yɛ‑a a ɔ, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan dɔndɔ gbe, mbɛ a bun‑da tachɛ‑a, nɔ a 'a tindanɛ. (Den chɛ sanɛ ni tan kun ma fea). Chɛ ma‑a kɛn, an gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan nɔ.
41005043	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a an na si wan gbau gbau, a ɔ, an ma a fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ye. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo daun fenɛ be a ma, a ni a daun.”
41006001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ka‑a an kaina chɛ. A yɛ‑a a waa a, Nasaɛti duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
41006002	Chu n 'na suin tee ma, Chisɔsi‑a mɔɛ n kan fan an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. Mɔɛ n ni kɔkoo wan nɔ, a ni kanɛ chɛ tena tima min na. An sin, kɛn an ban‑da a da a kuiɛ a min‑da, a 'a kan chɛ buɛ‑a an da a fa wan. An dɔ, “A e na ka mende kan chɛ buɛ bonda chɛ a? Yiimatɛ chɛ sima, min been mu ka a ma, kɔndɔfii mu. Mɔ ma a ɔ sɔn, ɛ kamaya ko wa chɛ n ma buɛ min dɔ.”
41006003	Mbɛ an dɔ, “N bɔ, ka wɛ, kapinda gbama an nɛ. Mɛi 'a denɛ an nɛ. Nyɔn ma a dɔɛ n sɔn? Chimisi ni ma, ni Chosɛfi, ni Saimɔn, a basan Chudasi a. Mmɔ bɛ an mbe sɛ, mmɔ ɛ yii, mmɔ bɛ a tensa n na.” Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an nii ma an boo si ni a kɔɔ.
41006004	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, mbɛ, “Mɔɛ n mbe basɔmaya be wan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ma kaina dɔ mende nu. Chɛɛ basɔmaya ee a ma, a ta suun duu ɔ, a ee ma a ma, a tuna tuna n tena, ni a suun chenɛ wandi gbu da a.”
41006005	A nii ma kun ni, kamaya ko kan kɔ kan ma koe a nɔ. A‑a min ma dechee, a na‑a a boo bun gbandi mɔɛ dɔ n fan ma, mbɛ an baun‑da.
41006006	A ɔ sɔn koe Chisɔsi boo ɔ, mbɛ a 'a mɔɛ n ma dan ni a a podon, tɛnɛ ko wa ni. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a duu n dɔ, nɔ a a tindanɛ. A ta‑a mɔɛ n kan koe a, a si Yataa ma.
41006007	Mbɛ a‑a a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n na kan, a‑a an sɔ, fea fea a. A‑a gbasaya be an ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.
41006008	A ɔ an ma, “Wo ma ta fen kɔ fen na wo boo ɔ ta chɛ ɔ, mɔɔ tachɛ chɛ tun gbɔɛ. Wo ma ta daun fen na, wo ma ta bɔɔɛ a, wo ma ta kɔpɔ wɛɛ a wo 'a pɔchiti n dɔ.
41006009	Wo kɔɔwa n fan don wo chenɛ n na, chɛɛ wo ma ta doma dɔ gbɛɛ a.”
41006010	A ɔ te to an ma, “Ni an‑na wo yia chen kan kɔ kan na, wo ma an chen chɛ an na aan, wo ni bɔ an duu chɛ ɔ.
41006011	Ni wo ta‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, min dɔ mɔɛ n ma an boo si ni wo kɔɔ, an gbu ma an too ma sɔ ni wo da a kuiɛ ma, wo bɔ nɔ. Ni wo ma‑a bɔ‑a, wo wo chenɛ a gbɔngbɔn fifii chɛ a, min mbe ma‑a dasi a an tena, mbɛ an mbe ka a ma an na Yataa faa ni tɛ an ma.”
41006012	Mbɛ an gbɛɛ ta‑a, an‑na Yataa bai sa, an dɔ, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na.
41006013	An‑na nyina yama sɛsɛ gbain fan mɔɛ n fɛ. A yɛ to, an‑na tu sin fan gbandi mɔɛ n ma, an‑na an baun gbandi n dɔ.
41006014	Chisɔsi ma tɔ chɛndɛ ta‑a wan kan kɔ kan. Mbɛ a che‑a Mansa Ɛdɔdi ma, a‑a a ma tɔɛ a min. Mɔɛ dɔ n ni a fɔ wan, an dɔ, “Chɔn min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, an yɛ‑a ka to fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, gbasaya chɛ sima ɛ a boo ɔ, kamaya ko chɛ n ma koe a.”
41006015	Dɔ n sin, an dɔ, “Idaicha an nɛ.” Dɔ n sin bɔ‑a nɔ, an dɔ, “Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an nɛ, yɔ gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ suun pɔɔ.”
41006016	Mansa Ɛdɔdi na‑a a ma tɔɛ a min kɛn, a ɔ, “Chɔn fan nɛ. N na‑a a ma wan, an‑na Chɔn kunɛ tɛ a a. Chɛɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ to, a ka saya ɔ.”
41006017	Mansa Ɛdɔdi wandi gbu, an na‑a mɔɛ n sɔ Chɔn bia‑a. A sin fan‑na a fɔ, an ni a sa yɔɔɛ a, pimbi chenɛ a. Mansa Ɛdɔdi na‑a chɛ ma Ɛdɔdiyasi an fɛ, a dɔɛ Fiipi 'a musu. A na‑a chɛ ɔ sɔn bɛɛ boo ɔ boo, a‑a a ma wan a 'a musu a.
41006018	Chɔn gboo ɔ nii ma fa ni, a fɔ koe a Mansa Ɛdɔdi ye pɛpɛ, mbɛ tea ko nii ma, a ni a dɔɛ a musu bɔ a boo ɔ.
41006019	Chɛ ko a, Chɔn ko don‑da wan Ɛdɔdiyasi ma kaka, a sin, a toen ni an ni Chɔn fa. Chɛɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi an na‑a a ma, a nii kun Chɔn fa koe a.
41006020	Mansa Ɛdɔdi chianden fan ni Chɔn bakoe ma. Koe min na mu, Chɔn ni mɔ tandenɛ an na, Yataa chen kɔɔ, min ni tenchen Yataa ko a. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a a konde gbain. A toen ni a too ma sɔ koe a, Chɔn ni ma koɔ‑a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a da a bai ni Mansa Ɛdɔdi kɔndɔ fii wan, tima ɔ tima ko a.
41006021	A danka a, Ɛdɔdiyasi‑a chia yen Chɔn ma. Mansa Ɛdɔdi suun tee che‑a, mbɛ a‑a daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ bɛn, a 'a mɔ chenama n ko a. A 'a chɛnyɛ mansa nu, soya n ya ɔ sɔɛ nu, a basan gbakoo n na, miin ni Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
41006022	Mbɛ Ɛdɔdiyasi 'a den musuenɛ ta‑a bɛn chɛ ɔ, a‑a a don nyima nyima. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Mansa Ɛdɔdi bu ɔ dia‑a, an bɛ a 'a sonda n na. Chɛ ko a, Mansa Ɛdɔdi ɔ a ma, “I toen mu, n ni fen ko chɛ i ye? Ko ɔ ko e n dɔ tisa‑a min chɛ koe a i ye, n mbe an chɛ‑a.”
41006023	Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a a kai wan, fanka chɛ ɔ den, gba sɛsɛ ko a. A ɔ, “A ni ma n ma gboo a, ni n ma fen kɔ fen be ni i ma, e n dɔ tisa‑a min ko a. A ni ma n 'na chɛnyɛ chɛ tɔnfɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a.”
41006024	Mbɛ den musuen chɛ bɔ‑a, a ta‑a a kun puin a de ma, a ɔ, “N de, n ni a ɔ tisa fen ko chɛ koe a n ye?” A de ɔ, “Chɔn, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a kunɛ.”
41006025	Den chɛ yɛ‑a bui‑a mansa tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Chɔn, min mbe yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a kunɛ. N toen mu an na, sanche wɛɛ i gba chɛ ɔ, an ni a be n ma piiti ɔ.”
41006026	Bai chɛ na‑a a ma wan, mansa faa yɔn‑da kaka. Chɛɛ a nii che to ban‑da, koe min na mu, a ban‑da gbɛ a kai‑a fanka ɔ, a‑a sonda n gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ.
41006027	Chɛ ko a, soya mɔɛ min ni a baima, a‑a a sɔ wan dɔndɔ gbe. A ɔ, an ni na Chɔn kunɛ a. Mbɛ soya mɔɛ chɛ ta‑a pimbi chen chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a Chɔn kunɛ tɛ a a.
41006028	Mbɛ a na‑a a kun chɛ a, ɛ sa ɔ piiti ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a be den musuen chɛ ma. Mbɛ a ta‑a, a‑a a be a de ma.
41006029	Chɔn fɛ denɛ n‑na a fa koe a min kɛn, an na‑a wan, an‑na a su ya, an ta‑a a a, mbɛ an‑na a tɔn.
41006030	Mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a, an‑na a tan. An‑na a ɔ yian fan a a, an na‑a koe min gbɛɛ ma, a yɛ to, an na‑a mɔɛ n kan buɛ min dɔ.
41006031	A tima chɛ a, mɔ sɛsɛ ni na wan, an mbe Chisɔsi tan, an mbe yɛ, an mbe na. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, tima wɛɛ gbu nii nɔ, daun chɛ koe wɛɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mmɔ ta kaina, mmɔ dechee, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ suin kaina, tima kunduen ko a.”
41006032	Mbɛ an dechee si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, an ta‑a pɔɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kaina min.
41006033	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a an ta koe kɔɔ sɔn fan, an sin na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ min nyɔn sima ni ka ta‑a. Chɛ ko a, mɔɛ n ka‑a wan duu n gbɛɛ ɔ, an ta‑a an chenɛ ma, an ya ɔ. A sin, an‑na a fo wan Chisɔsi ya ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
41006034	Chisɔsi bɔ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ kɛn, mbɛ a‑a mɔ fanka wa chɛ yen. Mbɛ chinchimaya koa‑a a faa ɔ, an ko a. Koe min na mu, a na‑a an yen fan, yɔ sa nu, miin kun ma fɛn mɔ ee. Mbɛ a bun‑da an kan‑da ko sɛsɛ a.
41006035	Tee bea ma, a fɛ denɛ n na‑a wan a tena, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, tima taen mu gbɛ. A sin, nɛ chɛ ee duu baima.
41006036	Ɛ nyan fan i ni mɔɛ chɛ n na ta konko chɛ n dɔ mmɔ 'a tindanɛ, an ni daun fenɛ san, a daun koe a.”
41006037	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wandi gbu, wo fen den be an ma, an ni a daun.” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Wuo! Nn mbe ee kun kau sɛi pawa ma sɔn‑da, nn ni biidi samba sɛsɛ san, an da kɔ koe a.”
41006038	Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Wo ta, wo ni a ɔ yen, ni biidi yuu ɛ wo boo ɔ.” An ta‑a kɛn, an‑na a ɔ gbɛ, an yɛ‑a wan, an dɔ, “Fenɛ min mbe dechee nɛ nn boo ɔ, an mu biidi duu a, ni nyɛ fea.”
41006039	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, an ni a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n ni si, an kuunɛ ma bin gbii ɔ.
41006040	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n si‑a an gbee ma ta‑a, mɔ chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, dɔndɔ, ni mɔ bi duu, duu.
41006041	Mbɛ a‑a biidi duu chɛ ya, a basan nyɛ fea chɛ a, a‑a a ya a si banda a, mbɛ a‑a tando be Yataa ma daun fen chɛ ko a. Mbɛ a‑a biidi chɛ ɔ kai kai, mbɛ a‑a a be a fɛ denɛ n ma, a du du koe a mɔɛ chɛ n ma. Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ n‑na a ɔ du du mɔɛ chɛ n ma. Nyɛ fea chɛ wɛɛ, a‑a a ɔ du du wan mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma.
41006042	Mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a daunɛ chɛ wan, a bu fa‑a gban.
41006043	Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na an da tɔɛ a sɔn. An da tɔɛ chɛ, biidi basan nyɛ a, a bɛn‑da wan samba fa tan kun ma fea.
41006044	Mɔ kaima miin ni an tɛ ɔ, miin‑na daun chɛ chɛ, an mɔ wu duu ni.
41006045	Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ nu, an ban‑da mɔɛ chɛ n da tɔɛ chɛ a sɔn‑da. A ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a an na ta a ya ɔ. An ta‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, yii kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, a don Besaida duu ɔ. A wandi sin to‑a a saa‑a mɔ fanka chɛ n na, an ta koe a an baa nu.
41006046	A‑a a saa kɛn mɔɛ chɛ n na, mbɛ a sɛ‑a kɔnkɔ dɔndɔ kun tɛ, a dɔndɔ gbe, samunɛ chɛ koe a.
41006047	Fitii che‑a ka wan, a dɔndɔ gbe ɛ nɔ tun tindi ma. Chɛɛ dɛndɛ chɛ sin, a ni gbɛ yii wa chɛ tɛ tɛ ma wan, a fɛ den chɛ n na.
41006048	Sayi ma pimbi ɔ, tɛ kɔn saa n konchee tima a, Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n ni tɔɔya tena wan an 'na dɛndɛ wii koe a. Koe min na mu, an ni ta tena fia ya teen ma wan. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi tachɛ‑a yii chɛ a tan den tan den, a ta a fɛ den chɛ n tena. Ɛnden fan na‑a to, a ni ben an ma.
41006049	Chɛɛ an‑na a yen kɛn na‑a yii chɛ a, an yiima a ma ko ni. An‑na yee tɛ wan, an dɔ, “Fuɛ yen ko na‑a e!”
41006050	Chiandia‑a an gbɛɛ gboo fa wan gban, an‑na a yen kɛn. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Chisɔsi koɔ‑a an tena, a ɔ, “Wo sɛmbɛ ka kaina chɛ an yee tɛ‑a. N fan mu, wo ma chian.”
41006051	Mbɛ a sɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ an baima, mbɛ fia wa chɛ ɔ tɛ‑a. An fɛ den chɛ n da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, koe chɛ n na.
41006052	Koe min na mu, an nii ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, biidi gbugbu duu da a koa‑a koe Chisɔsi boo ɔ, a sien mu koe min ma.
41006053	Mbɛ an‑na yii wa ɔ tandin, an che‑a tindi ma kaina dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Kɛnesayɛti. Mbɛ an‑na dɛndɛ yuu chii nɔ.
41006054	An to‑a bɔ tena wan dɛndɛ ɔ, a ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ nɔ mɔɛ nu, an‑na a ɔ sɔn mbɛ Chisɔsi ɛ wan an tɛ ɔ.
41006055	Mbɛ an ben‑da defe an tanda chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. A sin, ni an na‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min kan kɔ kan, an ni na wan, an mbe a tan gbandi mɔɛ n na, sa ɔ yaa ɔ.
41006056	A sin, Chisɔsi ni ta kaina miin gbɛɛ, a ni ma konko n na, a ni ma duu wa n na, chɛ ma, sɛnɛ n dɔ, mɔɛ n ni ta wan gbandi mɔɛ n na a tena. Machiti n bɛɛ ɔ, an ni a tan fan. An ni Chisɔsi disa wan, min mbe a ma, a ni a ma, gbandi mɔɛ chɛ n ni tu a 'a doma kai chen kana wɛɛ a. A sin, gbandi mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ tu‑a a a, an baun‑da wan.
41007001	Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ n na, an na‑a ka wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Mbɛ an na kan‑da Chisɔsi 'a tindanɛ.
41007002	An na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ an woo mɔɛ n‑na kanɛ min to an boo ɔ, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ dɔ n nii bea tena an kan chɛ fɛ. Koe min na mu, an fɛ den chɛ nu, an mbe ee an boo a ko a chia ma, yɔ kan chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mɔ e na daunɛ chɛ. (
41007003	Koe min na mu, Fayisii nu, ni Chu mɔɛ tɔɛ nu, an mbe bea sawa chɛ n fan fɛ, an woo mɔɛ n‑na miin to an boo ɔ. An mbe ee fen kɔ fen daun, ni an ma an boo a ko ni, a chia ma.
41007004	A sin, an gbu ee daun fen daun, ni an ka‑a machiti ɔ, mɔɔ ni an‑na an fandi ko pɛn. Sawa n ni kɔkoo, an na‑a miin ma sɔn, an sin ni bea wan an fɛ. Sawa nu, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ a boo a ko buɛ min dɔ, a chia ma. A yɛ to, kɔpu nu, da nu, pani kumusu nu, a basan sofa n bɛɛ ta sawa n na).
41007005	Mbɛ Fayisii n bɛ sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an‑na Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Mmɔ woo mɔɛ n‑na kanɛ min to mmɔ boo ɔ, a nyin fan mɔ ɔ mɔ ko a. Chɛɛ i fɛ denɛ n‑na an fandi bɔ kan chɛ kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, an mbe ee an boo a ko a chia ma, yɔ kan chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mɔɛ e na daunɛ chɛ. I‑a chɛ yen ka ma?”
41007006	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a min fɔ suun, a si wo ma, a teaen ni gba! Nɛnɛn fea ti mu wo a, yɔ a na‑a a nyɛn buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ, ‘Yataa ɔ te, a ɔ, wo e basɔmaya be dechee a ma wo da ɔ wan. A ɔ, chɛɛ a wakoe ee wo faa ɔ.
41007007	Wo e samun gbama an chɛ a tena, koe min na mu, wo e mɔɛ n kan gbɛ wo ta kanɛ an na, wo e ta‑a a ma‑a, yɔ a 'a sawa‑a a fɔ ka wan.’ ”
41007008	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ta sin, wo e Yataa 'a sawa to wan, mbɛ wo bea‑a wo ta kanɛ fɛ.”
41007009	A ɔ te to an ma, “Yiimatɛ chia ɛ wan wo boo ɔ, wo kunɛ bɔ koe a Yataa 'a sawa n kɔɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni bea wo ta sawa n fɛ.
41007010	Mosisi na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Wo ni kooya be wo fa ma, a basan wo de a.’ A yɛ to, a ɔ, ‘Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a bai yama sa a fa ma ni a de, wo ni an mɔɛ chɛ fa.’
41007011	Chɛɛ wo tana, wo e mɔɛ n kan fan, an ni chɛ fɔ an fa n ye, a basan an de n na. Mbɛ an toen ni, an ni fenɛ min be an ma, min ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ an ma, an ban‑da a be‑a Yataa ma.”
41007012	A ɔ, “Wo e kafai be wan mɔɛ chɛ ma, a ma na koe chɛ a fa ye, chɛ ma, a de ye.
41007013	Chia chɛ a mu, wo e kanɛ min chɛ mɔɛ n na, ɛ a ma mɔɛ n ni Yataa bai to, mbɛ an bea wo ta fɛ. Ko dɔ mende n sin mbe wan to nɔ, yɔ chɛ, wo e miin ma tena.”
41007014	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a mɔ fanka chɛ n chee to a tena. A ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo wo too ma sɔ, n da a bai ma, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ.
41007015	Mɔ gbu e min don i da a, an mbe ee a ma, i ma ni nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ, fɔ e min‑na bɔ i da ɔ.”
41007017	A‑a mɔ fanka chɛ n to kɛn, mbɛ a don‑da chenɛ a, a fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa wan, an dɔ, a ni a da a bai chɛ fasai an ye.
41007018	Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo e ka n fɛ wan, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo yiima ma tɛ ni, a ni ben mɔɛ tɔɛ n ma. Wo ma chɛ ɔ gbɛ ni? Mɔ gbu e min don i da a, an mbe ee a ma, i ma ni nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ, fɔ e min na bɔ i da ɔ.
41007019	Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu ɛ fenɛ min daun, a ee ta a faa ɔ wan. Chɛɛ ɛ yii mɔ bu ɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a kumbai a kanɛ ɔ.” (Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan ka, mbɛ daun fenɛ kan kɔ kan nyin fan, a daun koe a).
41007020	Mbɛ a ɔ te to, “Fenɛ min mbe bɔ mɔ gbu faa ɔ, an mbe a ma, a ma ni nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ.
41007021	Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu bu ɔ mu, a faa ɔ, ko yama n mbe bɔ. Yiinachii yama nu, miin mbe mɔɛ sɔ ko tɛ ma, kanka chɛ, ni mɔ fa koe.
41007022	A ni ma waa ma basan koe an na mɔɛ a, mɔ ee fuu ɔ min na, bɛncha mu, a basan ko yama tɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Mɔɛ bun koe, kan baiya, toomaya, tɔ ɔ tɛ yama chɛ, yonka, wooya.
41007023	Ko yama chɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe bɔ mɔ gbu faa an dɔ. An sin fan mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ma ni nyamui Yataa ya kɔɔ.”
41007024	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ka‑a nɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, mbɛ an ta‑a tanda ɔ, Taya duu wa a tindanɛ. A don‑da chenɛ a, a sin nii ma to ni, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ ɛ wan nɔ. Chɛɛ a nii ma che ni to‑a an nun chɛ ɔ.
41007025	Mbɛ musu dɔndɔ, nyina yama ni min 'na den musuenɛ fɛ, a‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a na‑a a tena, mbɛ a bea‑a a chen kɔɔ.
41007026	Chu mɔ nii ma an musu chɛ a. A sin, a suun‑da Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, Fonisia tanda ɔ. A‑a Chisɔsi disa wan, nyina yama chɛ gbain koe a 'a den chɛ fɛ.
41007027	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Den mɛsɛ n ni daunɛ chɛ pɛn. A ma nyin, mɔɛ ni den mɛsɛ n 'na daun fenɛ bɔ an da a, a ni a be wuu n ma.”
41007028	Chɛɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Kai, wuu gbu wɛɛ ɛ ma si ɔ den mɛsɛ n baima, ni an da a pɛɛ bea‑a duu ma, an mbe a daun fan.”
41007029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “I da a bai chɛ ko a, yɛ i waa chenɛ a. I‑a a tan‑da wan, nyina yama chɛ kaenɛ ɛ gbɛ i 'a denɛ fɛ.”
41007030	Musu chɛ yɛ‑a a waa a, mbɛ a‑a a 'a denɛ tan sa ɔ sofa ma, nyina yama gbu nii to a fɛ.
41007031	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Taya duu baima, mbɛ a ben‑da Sidon duu bu ɔ. Mbɛ a ta‑a chɛnyɛ dɔndɔ ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Duu Tan. A don‑da a ɔ, mbɛ a che‑a Kadidi yii wa ma.
41007032	Mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a kaminɛ a, Chisɔsi tena, min too nii koe a min, a sin, a koɔ koe wɛɛ ni gbɛɛ. An na‑a Chisɔsi ma nande wan, an dɔ, a ni a boo bun a ma, a baun koe a.
41007033	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a mɔ kaima chɛ ya, a ka‑a a fanka chɛ baima. Mbɛ a‑a a boo don kamin chɛ too fea ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a da yii a bɔ, mbɛ a tu‑a mumun chɛ nɛnɛnɛ a.
41007034	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a sɛ banda a. Mbɛ a kuun‑da dioo. Mbɛ a ɔ kamin chɛ ma, “A ɔ ni ka.”
41007035	A ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ che‑a koe a min‑da. A yɛ to, a koɔ koe min ni gbɛɛ ka, a bun‑da koɔ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ.
41007036	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ma a ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a. Chɛɛ a ni a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye, an ni ben ka wan a ɔ yian‑da mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n na.
41007037	A sin, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ na‑a a min, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan gbechee. An dɔ, “Gba! A kosan a 'a wai chɛ‑a. Ɛ a ma wan too gbee tɔɛ wɛɛ ni koe a min, mumunɛ ni koɔ.”
41008001	A tima chɛ a, mbɛ mɔ fanka dɔ gbɛɛ n na sɔn‑da Chisɔsi ma. Daun fen nii kɛn to nɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n mbe min daun, Chisɔsi na‑a a fɛ denɛ n chee wan, mbɛ a koɔ‑a an tena, a ɔ,
41008002	“Mɔɛ chɛ n ma chinchinden mu n ye. Tee sawa an nɛ ka gbɛ, an mbe nɛ mmɔ fɛ, daun fen mbe ee to nɔ.
41008003	Ni n‑na a ma sunɛ an ni ta an kɔnkɔ tɔɛ a, an mbe ka‑a wan an chenɛ kɔɔ chia a, an ni bɔn a ma. Koe min na mu, an dɔ nu, an ka‑a kaina min nu, an dɔ yansan.”
41008004	Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n dɔ, “Mɔ ee che daun fenɛ sɔn‑da nɛ kan kɔ kan, fuin bonda chɛ ma, mɔ ɛ mɔ fanka chɛ da kɔ min na, bufa ni chɛ.”
41008005	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Biidi yuu ɛ nɛ, wo boo ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Gbugbu wɔnfea.”
41008006	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tɛtɛ ye, a ɔ, an ni si duu ma, mbɛ an gbɛɛ si‑a. Mbɛ a‑a biidi wɔnfea chɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, daun fen chɛ ko a. A‑a a ɔ kai kai wan, mbɛ a‑a a be a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ du du koe a mɔɛ chɛ n ma. An sin‑na a ɔ du du wan an ma.
41008007	Nyɛ ɛndenɛ wɛɛ ni wan to nɔ an boo ɔ. Chisɔsi‑a tando be wan Yataa ma, a wɛɛ ko a, mbɛ a‑a a be a fɛ denɛ n ma, a du koe a to mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
41008008	Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a an bu fa daunɛ chɛ wan. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na mɔɛ chɛ n da tɔɛ a sɔn sɔn, a bɛn‑da wan samba sɛmbɛnden wɔnfea da a faenɛ ma gban.
41008009	Mɔɛ miin‑na an daun chɛ chɛ, an taen fan ni mɔ wu naaninɛ nyɔn sima ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a saa mɔɛ chɛ n na.
41008010	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a si‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ an‑na yii wa chɛ tɛ, a ta Damanuta kaka ma.
41008011	Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, Chu mɔɛ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, an bun‑da a kaa ɔ gbaa‑a. An toen ni, an ni a bia a chen kɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, a ni kamaya koe ma an ye, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ a 'a gbasaya kaen ni Yataa an tena.
41008012	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi kuun‑da a ɔ yansama a, mbɛ a ɔ, “Bi tee chɛ a mɔɛ nu, an toen mu kamaya koe n fan dɔ yen koe a, dan koe a mɔɛ a. N ni a ma din wo tena, chɛ ee ma tena. N mbe ee kamaya ko kan kɔ kan ma tena, an mɔ bonda chɛ n ye.”
41008013	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an to, mbɛ a yɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a kuu sɔ yii tɛ‑a, a yɛ a kaka dɔndɔɛ ma.
41008014	Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n na‑a nyina wan, ta koe a daun fenɛ a an boo ɔ. A sin biidi dɔndɔ gbe, an ni an boo ɔ, dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ.
41008015	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an na si, a ɔ, “Yisinɛ min mbe Chu mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ, miin mu ka Fayisii n na, ni Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a yisinɛ, wo wo kun ma fɛn a boo ɔ.”
41008016	Mbɛ an bun‑da a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “A‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, mmɔ nyina‑a mmɔ ma na ni biidi a mmɔ boo ɔ.”
41008017	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan an ni fen tɛnsɛ tena an nyɔn tɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Wo ee ma chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a sanche, a si biidi an ma, min mbe ee wo boo ɔ. Wo gbu ma n sɔn nin bɛ, wo ma n dɔ gbɛ ni. Wo yiima a ma sɛn ni, koe ɔ gbɛ koe a. A ee?
41008018	Wo wan, ya ɛ wo ma, chɛɛ wo ee kaina yen. Too ɛ wo kun fɛ, chɛɛ wo ee koe a min. A gbu sin to‑a wan wo yii ma, koe min na‑a ma.
41008019	N na‑a biidi gbugbu duu ɔ kai kai buɛ min dɔ, mɔ wu duu da kɔ koe a. An da tɔɛ min na‑a to, samba fa yuu na‑a to?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Samba tan kun ma fea.”
41008020	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N na‑a mɔ wu naanin chɛ n bɛɛ da kɔ tima min na biidi gbugbu wɔnfea a, samba fa yuu na‑a to, an da tɔɛ ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Samba wɔnfea.”
41008021	Mbɛ a ɔ te gbɛ, “Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ma a ɔ gbɛ nin bɛ. A e?”
41008022	Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a Besaida duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mɔɛ dɔ nu nɔ, an na‑a kaminɛ a, min fionden ni, Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ an‑na a disa, tu koe a an kamin chɛ a.
41008023	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a ya te tɔɛ chɛ bia a boo ma, mbɛ a bɔ‑a a a duu chɛ ɔ. Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn a da a yii chɛ‑a kamin chɛ ya a, mbɛ a‑a a boo bun a ma. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ɛ ka ma, e kaina yen tena wan?”
41008024	Mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a a kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ, a ɔ, “Mm. N mbe mɔɛ n yen tena wan. Chɛɛ an maen fan mu, yɔ kɔnɛ n fan mbe ka tachɛ tachɛ‑a ben‑da.”
41008025	Chisɔsi tu‑a ka wan to kamin chɛ ya a. Chɛ nɛnɛ ɔ gbɛ, kamin chɛ a kaina fɛn fan tidan, a ya ta yɛ‑a ɔ, mbɛ a‑a fen kɔ fen yen gbadan.
41008026	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kamin chɛ boo ka, ta koe a a waa a. Chɛɛ a ɔ a ma, “I ma yɛ to konko chɛ ɔ.”
41008027	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, konko dɔ n dɔ, miin ni nɔ Sisayea Fiipai duu baima. An mbe kɛn ta‑a, mbɛ a‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Wo a fɔ wɛ n ye, wo ta yiima ɔ, mɔɛ min nyɔn sima mu n na.”
41008028	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ i mu Chɔn fan na, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Dɔ n sin mbe a fɔ wan, mbɛ i mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ an na suun, min tɔ mu Idaicha. Dɔ n mbe ta‑a a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔ gbɛɛ mu i a.”
41008029	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu, wo ta yiima ɔ, n mu nyɔn na?” Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “I mu Chasi an na, nn kun ka mansa.”
41008030	Mbɛ a‑a an na si gbau gbau, mbɛ an ma chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a, mbɛ a wan mu Chasi a, mɔɛ n kun ka mansa.
41008031	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ a fɛ denɛ n kan‑da, a ɔ, “N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe tɔɔ‑a wan kaka. Mmɔ 'a chɛnyɛ gbakoo nu, an bɛ mɔɛ miin mbe Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an mbe an kan kɔ sɔ‑a wan n na. Mmɔ 'a sawa kan mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe toa si‑a wan an kɔɔ. N mbe fa‑a wan mɔ boo ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma.”
41008032	A sin na‑a chɛ fɔ wan, an ni a da a kuiɛ ɔ gbɛ gbadan. Mbɛ Pita‑a Chisɔsi pɛn, a ɔ, an ni sɔ an fea a. An sɔ‑a kɛn, mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, a ma bai kaina chɛ fɔ.
41008033	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a mun fan, a‑a a fɛ denɛ tɔɛ n ma fɛn, mbɛ a ɔ Pita ma, “Ka n fɛ, e ka Sitana 'a wai an chɛ tena. E ka mɔ gbu yiinachii an chɛ tena, Yataa ta yiinachii ma chɛ a.”
41008034	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a mɔ fanka fanka chɛ n chee a tena, ni a fɛ denɛ n bɛɛ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ toen mu a ni bea n fɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni nyina a faa ma koe n ma. Mbɛ a‑a a ma bɛn mɔnɛ ɔ bia koe a n ko a, a basan fa koe a.
41008035	Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da bea koe a n fɛ, a wandi fɔɛ ma kanda koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe a yii bɔ‑a a fɔɛ ɔ, n ko a, ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
41008036	Dunya chɛ ma nyanɛ gbɛɛ, min mbe a ma, mɔ ni a sɔn bɛɛ, mɔ ni fo kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a, tɔnɔn ma a a.
41008037	Fen kɔ fen mbe ee nɔ, mɔ gbu e che min be‑a, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ko a.
41008038	Sanche, mɔ yama yama bonda chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin mbe ee dan ko a, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da n dɔ, a basan n da a kuiɛ a, n bɛɛ, n mbe na‑a wan banda a ɔ. N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tima min na mansaya ɔ, n mbe ban‑da wan a ɔ. A tima chɛ a, n mbe ma‑a wan man‑da, Fa Yataa 'a manɛ a, nn bɛ maeka n na.”
41009001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te to an ma, “N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu nɛ sɔ ɔ sanche, an mbe ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ aan an ni chɛ ɔ yen. An mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ ni yian, gbasaya wandi a.”
41009002	Tee wɔdɔ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Pita ya, ni Chimisi an fea Chɔn na. Mbɛ a sɛ‑a an na kɔnkɔ a yansama dɔndɔ ɔ, an dechee. Chisɔsi kamaya‑a nɔ wan an boo ɔ.
41009003	Mbɛ a ma doma bun‑da man‑da, a gbɛenɛ ɛ fo fo. A gbɛen ni buɛ min dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii che a ma‑a koa ni gbɛ ka.
41009004	Mbɛ Mosisi an fea Idaicha a, an bɔ‑a fɛ den sawa chɛ n ya a, an mbe chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a, an bɛ Chisɔsi a.
41009005	Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, a nyan‑da wan mmɔ ɛ nɛ chɛ. Ka nn mbe ku sawa bun. Ku dɔndɔ i ko a, dɔndɔ kai Mosisi ko a, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ ma‑a kai Idaicha ko a.”
41009006	Pita na‑a chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, chiandia na‑a an gboo fa wan gban, a gbu nii ma a ɔ sɔn a ni fen fɔ.
41009007	Mbɛ dingbii yii‑a an kun na, mbɛ Yataa koɔ‑a an dingbii chɛ ɔ. A ɔ, “N 'na denɛ an nɛ, a ko a di n ye kaka. Wo a da a kuiɛ a min.”
41009008	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na an ya a ben ben. An mbe e na mɔɛ min yen gbɛ dechee, mɔɔ Chisɔsi.
41009009	Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ kɔnkɔɛ yii‑a. An mbe yii tena kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an na, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a dasi be an ma gbau gbau. A ɔ, an‑na koe min dɔ yen ka, a ɔ, an ma a ɔ yian mɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan na, a ɔ, aan a na tee ni che. A ɔ, tee chɛ, a wan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a tee min kɔɔ a ka saya ɔ.
41009010	An‑na a ma wan yɔ Chisɔsi‑a an na si buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ an‑na bai chɛ tɛnsɛ wan an dechee tɛ ɔ, a si Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ koe ma a ka saya ɔ. A mu min na, a na‑a an na fii wan.
41009011	Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Chɛɛ mmɔ 'a sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n mbe a fɔ wan, mbɛ Idaicha ɛ na‑a pɛn, kunka mansa e na na. Fen‑na a ma gbɛ Idaicha ma na nin bɛ?”
41009012	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tea gbu mu, Idaicha an mu ya ɔ sɔɛ a. An mbe ko ɔ ko sɔ‑a a chia ma. Chɛɛ a nyɛnden fan mu gbɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe mɔnɛ sɛsɛ ɔ bia‑a wan, mbɛ an ban‑da n dɔ. Fen ko a mu chɛ ɛ ma?
41009013	Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ Idaicha gbu ban‑da na‑a. A sin, an ban‑da koe gbɛɛ sɛ‑a a ma, an toen ni an ni miin sɛ a ma. An na‑a a ma a a, yɔ Yataa 'a gboo na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ.”
41009014	Chisɔsi n yɛ‑a kɛn, a fɛ denɛ tɔɛ chɛ n tena, an‑na fanka fanka tan fan an 'na tindanɛ. A tima chɛ a, an ni wan bai tɛnsɛ tena an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an bɛ Chu mɔɛ n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ n na.
41009015	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na Chisɔsi yen kɛn dechee na‑a, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan gbechee. Mbɛ an‑na bui sa a a a tena, an ta‑a a kɔndɔn.
41009016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ den chɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo e fen kɔɔsa bia ɔ, wo bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na?”
41009017	Mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ, fanka chɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Ticha, n na‑a ka n 'na den kainɛ an na i tena, nyina yama ɛ min fɛ. A‑a a ma wan, den chɛ ee che koɔ‑a.
41009018	Ni nyina yama chɛ na‑a a baima tima ɔ tima, ɛ a a bea wan, mbɛ a da a yii fɔnfɔnɛ bun‑da bɔ‑a. A sin to, ɛ a nyinɛ a daun daun fan, mbɛ a gbɛa‑a gbau. N‑na i fɛ denɛ n dɔ tisa wan, an ni nyina yama chɛ gbain a fɛ, chɛɛ an ma kun ni.”
41009019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A sin, wo e ka buɛ min dɔ, wo ee dan ko a. A ɔ yansan gbɛ mmɔ bɛ ɛ mmɔ nyɔn fɛ, fen mu wo ee dan n na? N ma a ɔ sɔn n mbe fen ma to wo ko a. Na i 'a denɛ a.”
41009020	Mbɛ an na‑a denɛ gbu a a tena. Nyina yama chɛ‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn dechee, a ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a denɛ gbu bondan duu ma, gbɔgbɔi chɛ‑a a ɔ. Mbɛ a bun‑da a ma chɛɛ chɛ‑a, a da a yii fɔnfɔnɛ ɛ ta‑a bɔ‑a.
41009021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ den chɛ fa ma, a ɔ, “Gbandi chɛ‑a den chɛ bia sɔyɔ?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “A den mɛsɛ tɔɛ a.
41009022	A sin, tima sɛsɛ ko a, nyina yama chɛ ɛ a a bea wan ta a. Dɔ n na, ɛ a a dɛ yii wɛɛ ɔ, a fa koe a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni e kun fan i ni nn deman, chinchin nn ma, i ni basan nn ma.”
41009023	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ta bai ma chɛ a, ni n mbe kun fan. Mɔ ɔ mɔ i wɛn mbe i kai fa‑a n na, Yataa ɛ ko ɔ ko chɛ wan i ye.”
41009024	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, den chɛ fa chɛ ɔ, “Danaya ɛ wan n dɔ, chɛɛ a ma gbɛ, n ni che n kai fa‑a i a, basan n ma!”
41009025	Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen kɛn mɔ fanka da ɛ koa‑a tun, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ wan nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, “I wan nyina chɛ, i wɛn mbe mɔɛ too gbee, e mɔɛ ma to mumunɛ a, ka den chɛ fɛ fion. A sin, i ma bea to a fɛ kuɔ fɔ.”
41009026	A ya kɔɔɛ a, nyina yama chɛ‑a yee tɛ gbankon, a‑a a ma, gbɔgbɔi‑a den chɛ bondan bin, mbɛ a ka‑a a fɛ. Kaienɛ gbu ma‑a yɔ su, min‑na a ma, mɔɛ sɛsɛ‑a a fɔ, an dɔ, a fa‑a.
41009027	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a bia wan a boo ma, mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a sɔ‑a sa.
41009028	Chisɔsi don‑da kɛn chenɛ a, an dechee, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa. An‑na a fɔ wan, an dɔ, “Nn toen fan ni nn ni nyina chɛ gbain kaien chɛ fɛ, chɛɛ nn ma kun ni. Fen mu chɛ ma‑a nn na?”
41009029	Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Samunɛ dechee, an mbe a ma, wo ni kun ko bonda chɛ ma‑a.”
41009030	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi n ka‑a an kaina chɛ, an ben‑da Kadidi chia a. Chisɔsi nii ma to ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, an mbe kaina min,
41009031	koe min na mu, a ni a fɛ denɛ n fan kan tena a tima chɛ a. A‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a, mɔɛ n ma. An mbe n fa‑a wan, chɛɛ tee fea ni a sawan bɔɛ gbakɔ, n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ.”
41009032	Chɛɛ an nii ma a gbu ɔ gbɛ ni, a ni bai min fɔ tena. Chɛɛ an chianden fan ni dechee a ɔ tisa koe a.
41009033	Mbɛ Chisɔsi n che‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ. An don‑da kɛn chenɛ a, a‑a a fɛ den chɛ n dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Wo ni wan chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a, mmɔ ɛ kɛn na‑a chia a. A sien ni fen ma?”
41009034	Chɛɛ an‑na a ɔ maun fan don. Koe min na mu, an na‑a chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ wan, mɔ chenama wa koe ma an tɛ ɔ.
41009035	Chisɔsi si‑a, mbɛ a‑a a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n chee. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min toen mu yaɔsɔya a, mɔɔ ni a sɔ‑a pɛn gbaa chia a, a ni ma bɔi denɛ a, a bɔɛ n ko a.”
41009036	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a den denɛ ya, a‑a a ma a sɔ‑a an ya kɔɔ. A‑a a si a nɔnkɔnɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a chɛ fɔ an ye, a ɔ,
41009037	“Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a boo si‑a den mɛsɛ bonda chɛ kɔɔ, a‑a a boo si ka n fan kɔɔ. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a boo si‑a n kɔɔ, a‑a a boo si ka Yataa an kɔɔ, min‑na n sɔ.”
41009038	Mbɛ Chɔn‑na a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn‑na kamin dɔndɔ yen fan, min mbe nyina yama n gbain tena mɔɛ n fɛ i 'a gbasaya ɔ. Nn‑na a a si wan nn dɔ a ni sɛmbɛ, koe min na mu, mmɔ bɛ ma a a.”
41009039	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma a a gban. Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ kamaya koe ma tena wan n tɔɛ ɔ, a ee kun a ni mun a ɔ wuuma a, a ni bai yama sa n ma.
41009040	Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ee mmɔ chɛɛ tena, mmɔ bɛ mu a a.
41009041	Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena. Mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a yii be wo ma, n tɔɛ ɔ, a ɔ koe min na mu, n fan kunka mansa, n fɛ mɔɛ mu wo a, a gbu an mbe a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn‑da.”
41009042	Chisɔsi ɔ, “A sin, den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, miin‑na an kai fa ka n na, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a ma, an ni ko yama ma. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a chɛ ma, ɛ nyan‑da wan an mɔɛ chɛ ko a, an ni sen fanka ma chii a kanɛ a, an ni a a dɛ yii wa ɔ.
41009043	A sin, ni i boo‑a i a dɛ ko yama ɔ, a tɛ a a, i ni a a dɛ. Koe min na mu, tamban tɔɛ wɛɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, ni a ma dɛ ni ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ ni i dɛ‑a ko yama ɔ, i boo fea a kandenɛ ni ma wɛɛ, e ta ta an dɔ, min mbe ee dufɛn kuɔ fɔ ko a.
41009045	A sin to, ni i chenɛ wɛɛ‑a i a dɛ ko yama ɔ, a wɛɛ tɛ a a. Koe min na mu, tamban tɔɛ wɛɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, ni a ma dɛ ni ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ ni i dɛ‑a ko yama ɔ, i chen fea a kandenɛ ni ma wɛɛ, e ta ta an dɔ, min mbe ee dufɛn kuɔ fɔ ko a.
41009047	Ni i ya nan fan bɛɛ‑a i a dɛ ko yama ɔ, a bɔ, i ni a a dɛ. A nyin i ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn, i ya dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a. Chɛɛ a yau, i ya a kandenɛ ni ma, mbɛ i ta‑a ta ɔ.
