41009048	Tɔnɛnɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe nɔ mɔɛ daun koe a, an mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a. Ta wɛɛ min mbe nɔ, a ɛ ka wan.
41009049	“A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ dɔsimanɛ ɔ bia‑a wan, min kɔ gbɛ yɔ ta.
41009050	Wo a ma kuiɛ ni ma wo wandi gbu ɔ, wo ni ma faachima ɔ wo nyɔn na. Kuiɛ nyin fan, ni a ɔ ma sɛ ni. Chɛɛ ni a ɔ sɛ‑a, mɔ ee che to, i ni a ma a dia ni yɛ a ɔ.”
41010001	Chisɔsi ka‑a kɛn Kapanaun duu ɔ, a ta‑a wan Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ta Chɔdan yii gbaa chia a. Mbɛ fanka a kan‑da to a ma. A sin, yɔ a ni a ma buɛ min dɔ, a na‑a an kan fan.
41010002	A sin, Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an na‑a wan a tena. An toen ni an ni a bia a chen kɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn toen mu nn ni a ɔ sɔn, ni mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu musu si kai ni a boo ka a 'a musu a.”
41010003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sawa minan mbe Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, Mosisi na‑a min fɔ wo ye, a ma koe a?”
41010004	Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, “Mosisi‑a sawa min sa, a dɔnden fan mu nn ni nn 'na musu n boo ka. Koe min na mu, sawa chɛ ɔ te, e i 'a musu boo ka wan, ni i‑a siiya gboo be a ma, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ i wan‑na i boo ka a a.”
41010005	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo 'a tooɔgbɛa, an‑na a ma, Mosisi‑a sawa chɛ n nyɛn wo ko a.
41010006	Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, mbɛ dunya a dan tima a, Yataa na‑a mɔ gbu fea an nyan, kai an fea musu a.
41010007	Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te to, a ɔ, ‘Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni mɔ kaima‑a musu fuu, ɛ a de to wan, a basan a fa a, mbɛ an chɛ‑a an nyɔn dɔ, an fea a 'a musu a.’
41010008	A ɔ, ‘A sin, an fea chɛ, an mbe ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.’ Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mɔ fea ma to an na, chɛɛ mɔ dɔndɔ gbe mu gbɛ an na.
41010009	Chɛ an fɛ mu, fuu ɔ, ni Yataa‑a mɔ fea an chɛ an nyɔn dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan ma an tɛ du.”
41010010	An yɛ‑a kɛn chenɛ a, a fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa wan to, a si musu ɔ ban koe dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma.
41010011	Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Mɔ kaima kan kɔ kan, min mbe ban‑da a 'a musu ɔ, a ni dɔ gbɛɛ si, a‑a waa an ma basan ka musu a, a ee fuu ɔ min na, Yataa ya a.
41010012	Musu wɛɛ, ni a ban‑da a chɛɛ ɔ, a ni kai dɔ gbɛɛ sɔn, a wɛɛ‑a waa an ma basan ka kai a, a ee fuu ɔ min na, Yataa ya a.”
41010013	Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a wan an 'na den mɛsɛ n na Chisɔsi tena. An toen ni a ni a boo bun an kun ma, a ni samunɛ chɛ an ko a. Chɛɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n na gban fan.
41010014	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi bu ɔ nii ma dia ni, chɛ ɔ yen koe a. Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Wo a ma den mɛsɛ n ni na n tena. Wo ma an ma bai. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ miin maen mu yɔ den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, Yataa an mbe ma‑a an 'na mansa a.
41010015	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma dɔn ni, a ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ yɔ den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, an mɔɛ chɛ ee che ma‑a Yataa ta a.”
41010016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a den mɛsɛ chɛ n ya dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Ɛ an si a kaa ma, ɛ a boo bun an ma, ɛ ta‑a an dua‑a.
41010017	Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ kɛn ta‑a, a bɔ an kaina chɛ, kamin dɔndɔ na‑a bui chɛ‑a, mbɛ a bea‑a a chen kɔɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ticha, i wɛn mu mɔ chɛndɛ a, n mbe fen ma, n ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn?”
41010018	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, “E ma ka ma i ni n chee mɔ chɛndɛ a? Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma mɔ chɛndɛ a, mɔɔ dechee Yataa dɔndɔ gbe.
41010019	I‑a sawa n sɔn fan, Yataa‑a miin be Mosisi ma. A ɔ, wo ma mɔ fa, ni sawa ma min fɔ ni. A ɔ, wo ma waa ma basan mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na, a ɔ, wo ma kanka chɛ, a ɔ, wo ma fania fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma. A yɛ to, a ɔ, wo ma mɔ kafa, a sin, wo ni kooya be wo fa ma, a basan wo de a.”
41010020	Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Ticha, n mbe wan sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ bia tena, aan a ka n den mɛsɛ tɔɛ ma a sɔ sanche ma.”
41010021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kamin chɛ ma fɛn, a wakoe a dia‑a a ye. Mbɛ a ɔ kamin chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Ko dɔndɔ an to‑a, e min ma gbɛ. Ta, i ni i boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ma tachɛ. Mbɛ i‑a an kɔpɔɛ chɛ ya, i‑a a be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. Chɛ‑a a ma‑a wan, i ni nyanɛ ma sɔn banda bu ɔ. Ni i‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ i na‑a, i ma‑a n fɛ denɛ a.”
41010022	Kamin chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, a ya kɔɔɛ ma‑a wan yama yama, mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa a, faayɔn ba ɔ. Koe min na mu, nyan tɔ wa ni a a.
41010023	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n gbɛɛ ma fɛn a 'a tindanɛ, mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “A ɔ gbɛ kaka nyan tɔɛ n ko a, an ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.”
41010024	Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, a si a da a bai chɛ ma. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “N 'na denɛ nu, don koe a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a ɔ gbɛ ka.
41010025	A ɔ gbɛ kaka nyan tɔɛ ko a, a ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a ni ben ninchi don koe ma miichi woe a.”
41010026	Mbɛ bai gbu, a‑a an da a fa gban. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mbɛ nyɔn mbe bauncha chɛ ma sɔn‑da gbɛ?”
41010027	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an gbɛɛ ma fɛn, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mɔ gbu ee che chɛ chɛ‑a, chɛɛ Yataa tana, ɛ an chɛ. Koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ che wan ko ɔ ko ma‑a.”
41010028	Mbɛ Pita bun‑da a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “A yen ko, nn‑na nn kan kɔ sɔ fen kɔ fen na, mbɛ nn bea‑a i fɛ.”
41010029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena. Chenɛ ni ma, ni suun ma nyɔɛ nu, de nu an bɛ fa n na, denɛ nu, a basan sɛnɛ n na, an nyin fan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ to‑a n ko a, a ni a to sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ko a,
41010030	Yataa ɛ a kɔ‑a wan. Fen chɛ n gbɛɛ sanche, chenɛ n ni ma, suun ma nyɔɛ nu, de nu an bɛ denɛ n na, a basan sɛnɛ n na, Yataa ɛ a kɔ‑a wan an na dunya chɛ ɔ, si tena chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ko a. Chɛɛ a tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, ko ma gbaaenɛ ɛ si‑a wan an na. A sin, Yataa ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be‑a wan an ma dunya nama ɔ, min mbe na tena.
41010031	Chɛɛ mɔɛ sɛsɛ nu, miin mbe sɔ ɔ ya ɔ sanche, Yataa ɛ an na yɛ‑a wan gbaa a. Mɔɛ miin sin mbe gbaa sanche, Yataa ɛ an sɔ‑a wan ya ɔ.”
41010032	Mbɛ an‑na chia bia, a sɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Chisɔsi an ni sɔ ɔ an ya ɔ. A sin, an da ɔ gbaaen fan ni. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ni a fɛ, chiandia ni wan an dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n ya, a ta‑a an na kaina, an dechee, mbɛ a bun‑da a ɔ yian‑da an na, a si koe n ma, miin ni na tena a tan‑da Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
41010033	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mmɔ yen ko ta‑a gbɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An mbe n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe n bia tena wan nɔ, mbɛ an‑na n ma tachɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n ma, a basan Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na. An mbe kaa a tɛ‑a wan n bakoe ma, n fa koe a, mbɛ an‑na n be mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma Chu mɔ n na.
41010034	A sin, an mbe n ma yɛn‑da wan, an ni an da yii chɛ n ma, an ni n bosa pien, mbɛ an‑na n fa. Chɛɛ ni an‑na chɛ ma, tee fea, a sawan bɔɛ ma, n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ.”
41010035	Mbɛ Chimisi n fea Chɔn na, kai Sɛbɛdi 'a denɛ nu, an na‑a Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn toen mu, nn ni i ɔ tisa, i ni koe an chɛ nn ye.”
41010036	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fen koe sima mu, wo toen mu n ni min chɛ wo ye?”
41010037	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Tima min na e si‑a i 'a mansa sea ɔ, i 'a mansa wai chɛ koe a, nn toen mu nn dɔndɔ ni si i boo nyima ɔ, mbɛ dɔndɔ si‑a i manɛ ɔ.”
41010038	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma a ɔ sɔn wo e fen dɔ tisa tena. Wo e kun fan wo ni ko yawaen chɛ ɔ bia, n mbe na tena min dɔ bia‑a?”
41010039	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mm, nn mbe kun fan.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Ko yawaen chɛ, min mbe na tena n tan‑da, ɛ wo wɛɛ tan‑da wan.
41010040	Chɛɛ n mbe ee che n faa ma ya‑a, si koe a n baima n 'na mansaya ɔ. Fa Yataa an‑na an si tena chɛ ɔ bɛn, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, a‑a a boo sɔ miin ma.”
41010041	A fɛ den tanɛ tɔɛ chɛ n‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, Chimisi an fea Chɔn‑na min fɔ, an faa tɛ‑a wan an ma.
41010042	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a an gbɛɛ chee kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo faa ma tɛ. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mansa nu, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma Chu mɔ n na, an mbe an 'na gbasaya yian fan an na. An 'na ya ɔ sɔɛ n bɛɛ, gbasaya ɛ ka wan an boo ɔ an kun ma.
41010043	Chɛɛ a ee ka wo tɛ ɔ. Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ toen mu, a ni ma mɔ chenama a wo tɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni a wandi ma bɔi denɛ a, wo gbɛɛ ko a.
41010044	Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ sin toen mu to, a ni ma ya ɔ sɔɛ a, a tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ ni ma an 'na yɔnɛ a.
41010045	Koe min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ wɛɛ, n ma na ni, mɔɛ n ni wai chɛ n ko a. Chɛɛ n na‑a, min mbe a ma, n ni mɔɛ n ma wai n chɛ. A yɛ to, n ni yɛ, n ni n fɔɛ be mɔ gbu n kun ka koe a.”
41010046	Mbɛ an che‑a Chɛiko duu ɔ. Chisɔsi n mbe kɛn bɔ‑a nɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, ni mɔ fanka miin ni an fɛ, an‑na kamin dɔndɔ tan fan si ɔ, chia kunɛ a. A tɔ ni Batimayɔsi, kai Timayɔsi 'a denɛ. Fion tɔɛ ni, a sin ni fenɛ an fuin.
41010047	A‑a a a min kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, an mbe ka ben tena, a‑a yee tɛ gbankon, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi, i wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin n ma!”
41010048	Mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ nu nɔ, an sɔnkɔ‑a wan a ma, an dɔ, a ni a da a tɔn. Chɛɛ a tima gbu a ni gbɛ, a‑a yee tɛ a ben a saa ma, a ɔ, “I wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin n ma!”
41010049	Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo a chee n ye.” Mbɛ an‑na ya te tɔɛ chɛ chee, an dɔ, “I faa ma yɔn, i kɔɔ sɔ, a yen ko i chee‑a.”
41010050	Mbɛ a‑a a 'a doma kun ma doma bɔ, a‑a a a dɛ. Mbɛ a tin‑da buɔdia a, a ta‑a Chisɔsi tena.
41010051	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I toen mu n ni fen ko chɛ i ye?” Mbɛ ya te tɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Kan mɔ, a ma n ya a ni ka.”
41010052	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ta, e ta tena kaina min, i 'a danaya‑a i baun.” A ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ‑a kaina yen gbadan, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ Chisɔsi fɛ, a 'a tachɛ chia ma.
41011001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi n‑na a fo Bɛfachi konko baima, a basan Bɛtani a. Konko chɛ n ni Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ ma wan, an sin dɔ nii ma yansan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ a. Nɔ ni, a‑a a fɛ den fea an sɔ.
41011002	A ɔ, “Wo ta konko chɛ ɔ wo ya teen ma. Ni wo che‑a nɔ dechee, wo e sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ tan‑da wan, a chiienɛ ɛ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma si nin bɛ min kɔ. Wo a fuin, wo ni na a a.
41011003	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo ɔ tisa, fen ko a mu wo e chɛ ma tena, wo a fɔ a ye, wo ɔ, mansa an mbe a ma gbɔsɔɛ bɔ tena a a. Wo ɔ, ni a ban‑da dechee, wo e yɛ‑a wan a a dɔndɔ gbe.”
41011004	Mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ tan baa ma, a chiienɛ ɛ chen dɔndɔ kankanɛ ma. An bun‑da kɛn a fuin‑da,
41011005	mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni nɔ sɔ ɔ, an‑na an dɔ tisa. An dɔ, “Wo e kɛn sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ fuin‑da, wo e fen ma tena a a?”
41011006	Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi da a bai ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na. Mbɛ an‑na a fɛ den chɛ n to nɔ, an ta‑a a a.
41011007	Mbɛ an na‑a sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ an‑na an 'na doma kai n bɔ wan, mbɛ an‑na an dɔ sa sa sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ kɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi si‑a a kɔ.
41011008	A sin to, mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a an 'na doma kai n dɔ fuin fan a ya ɔ chia a. Mbɛ dɔ n sin‑na yamba kuunɛ n tɛ ben‑da, an‑na an bɛɛ a bɔn a ya ɔ, basɔmaya ko a.
41011009	Mbɛ a ya ɔ mɔɛ nu, a basan a gbaa mɔɛ n na, an‑na yee wa tɛ, an dɔ, “Tando ni ma Yataa tɔɛ ma! Mansa Yataa ni mɔɛ chɛ dua, min na‑a a tɔɛ ɔ!
41011010	Yataa ni mansaya chɛ dua, min mbe na tena, min mbe ma‑a yɔ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba Defidi 'a mansaya ni buɛ min dɔ. Tando ni ma Yataa tɔɛ ma!”
41011011	Mbɛ Chisɔsi don‑da kɛn Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a ta‑a dɔndɔ gbe Yataa 'a kata ɔ. A‑a fen kɔ fen ma mɛn fan nɔ. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, tee ni bea koe an dɔ. Mbɛ an bɛ a fɛ den tan kun ma fea n na, an bɔ‑a, an ta‑a Bɛtani duu ɔ.
41011012	Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, an yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn, a ka Bɛtani. A yɛ tena chɛ, kɔnkɔɛ‑a Chisɔsi bia wan.
41011013	A‑a a ya a ta wan, mbɛ a‑a kɔnɛ yen pɔɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, fiki kɔnɛ, a pɔmbɔenɛ ɛ. Mbɛ a ta‑a, a ma fɛn koe a, ni a gbɔen fan ni. Chɛɛ a che‑a kɛn a ma, a nii ma a gbɔ kan kɔ kan tan ni a a, mɔɔ a yamba dechee. Koe min na mu, a gbɔ tima nii ma chɛ a.
41011014	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ kɔn chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Kuɔ fɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee i gbɔɛ daun‑da to.” Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na a da a kuiɛ chɛ a min.
41011015	Mbɛ an che‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Chisɔsi ta‑a wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da mɔɛ chɛ n gbain‑da miin ni nɔ, an mbe fee fenɛ n ma tachɛ‑a, a basan a san mɔɛ n na. A‑a kɔpɔ sinchi mɔɛ n 'na tebu n na bea bea wan. Bugbɔɛ ma tachɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ, a‑a an 'na si fenɛ n na dɛ dɛ wan.
41011016	A sin to, a nii dɔn mɔ ɔ mɔ ni don an kata chɛ ɔ, machiti a a boo ɔ.
41011017	Chɛ gbakɔ, a bun‑da an kan‑da, a ɔ, “A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, a 'a chenɛ ɛ dechee samun chɛ koe an na, dunya gbɛɛ ko a. Chɛɛ wo‑a an chen chɛ mun kanka n nun tena a.”
41011018	Mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an‑na a kuu sɔ wan chia yan‑da Chisɔsi fa koe a. An chiandenɛ ni a ma. Koe min na mu, a na‑a kanɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ, fanka wa chɛ gbɛɛ nɔ, a na‑a an da a fa wan.
41011019	Mbɛ fitii che‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
41011020	An mbe kɛn yɛ tena sau sau ma, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na fiki kɔn chɛ yen fan, a gbaaenɛ ɛ gbechee, a ka a yamba ma, aan a yii a suu ma.
41011021	Mbɛ Pita‑a a yii na chii, mbɛ a ɔ Chisɔsi ma, “Kan mɔ, a yen bɛ, i na‑a kɔnɛ min danka ka, a gbaa‑a pɔɛ.”
41011022	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo yii na tɛ dechee Yataa an ma.
41011023	N ni a ma din wo tena, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a fɔ‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ma, a ɔ, a ni kuɛn, a ni ta, a ni si yii wa ɔ, ni sika ee a ɔ Yataa a, ɛ ma wan. Ni a danden fan mu a a dechee a faa ɔ, mbɛ ɛ koe min dɔ tisa tena, ɛ kun fan a ni ma, Yataa ɛ a ma wan a ye.
41011024	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni wo‑a samunɛ chɛ fen fen ko a, wo kai faenɛ ɛ Yataa a, wo dan dechee a a, mbɛ wo‑a a ma sɔn fan.
41011025	A sin, tima ɔ tima ko a, ni wo‑a wo kɔɔ sɔ samun chɛ koe a, wo wo boo bɔ pɛn ko yama chɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a min ma wo a. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, wo fa wɛɛ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a ni a boo bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ, wo‑a miin ma.”
41011027	Mbɛ an che‑a to Chuusaɛn duu ɔ kɛn, Chisɔsi don‑da Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da ben ben‑da a bu ɔ. Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa dɔ nu, ni Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ nu, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na, an na‑a a tena.
41011028	Mbɛ an dɔ, “E koe miin ma ka, gbasaya minan mbe i boo ɔ, an ma koe a? An gbasaya chɛ sin, nyɔn‑na a be i ma?”
41011029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka wɛ, n mbe wo ɔ tisa, tisa dɔndɔ gbe a. Chɔn ni yii chɛ wan mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Yataa an fea mɔ gbu a, minan na‑a an gbasaya chɛ be a ma? Wo chɛ fɔ n ye. Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ wo ye, min‑na gbasaya chɛ be n ma, koe chɛ n ma koe a.”
41011031	Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ te, “Mmɔ ɛ fen fɔ kamin chɛ ye? Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ Chɔn 'na gbasaya ka‑a Yataa an tena, ɛ a fɔ‑a wan, mbɛ fen na‑a a ma, mmɔ nii ma dan ni Chɔn na?
41011032	Chɛɛ mmɔ sin mbe ee che a fɔ‑a to, mbɛ Chɔn 'na gbasaya ka‑a mɔ gbu an na.” (An na‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, an chianden fan ni fanka fanka chɛ n ma, miin ni nɔ. Koe min na mu, an gbɛɛ danden fan ni a a, mbɛ Chɔn ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an na).
41011033	Chɛ ko a, an‑na a fɔ wan Chisɔsi ye, an dɔ, “Nn ma a ɔ sɔn, ni Chɔn na‑a a 'a gbasaya chɛ sɔn kaina.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi wɛɛ ɔ, “N bɛɛ, n mbe ee a ɔ yian wo a, ni nyɔn 'na gbasaya ɔ mu, n mbe koe chɛ n ma tena.”
41012001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bun‑da koɔ‑a an tena tai ɔ, a ɔ, “Kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, min‑na yadi sa. Mbɛ a‑a yadi chɛ da a sansa gbɛɛ, mbɛ a‑a a a bɛn. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a bondonɛ nyan, ɛ a tɛn kaina, a ni a yii bɔ a ɔ. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a‑a gbasa sɔ, a 'a yadi chɛ kun ma fɛn koe a. A ban‑da kɛn chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a, mbɛ a‑a yadi chɛ kunɛ don mɔɛ n boo ɔ, a kun ma fɛn koe a, mbɛ a ta‑a chɛnyɛ dɔ mende ɔ.
41012002	Chin fen chɛ ya tima che‑a kɛn, yadi ti chɛ‑a a 'a bɔi denɛ dɔndɔ a ta wan yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n tena. A toen ni, an ni chin fen chɛ dɔ be a ma, mbɛ a na‑a a a ye.
41012003	Chɛɛ an chɛ‑a a ma, mbɛ an‑na a boan, an‑na a a yɛ, a boo a senɛ a.
41012004	Mbɛ yadi ti chɛ‑a a 'a bɔi denɛ dɔ mende a ta wan to, a fean bɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a nɛnɛ ma gba wan, a kunɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na mauma koe n sɛ a ma.
41012005	Mbɛ a‑a dɔ mende a ta to, a sawan bɔɛ gbɛ. An‑na a nɛnɛ fa wan. An‑na bɔi denɛ to gbaa nɛnɛ n bɛɛ bia ka wan, yɔ a saa chɛ nu. An‑na dɔ n boan fan, mbɛ an‑na dɔ n sin fa.
41012006	Chɛɛ dɔndɔ gbe ni wan a boo ɔ gbɛ, a a ta koe a an tena, a 'a denɛ, min ko a ni di a ye gbeden. Mbɛ a yiima ɔ, a ɔ, ‘An mbe basɔmaya be‑a wan n 'na denɛ wandi gbu ma.’
41012007	Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ wan an nyɔn ma, an dɔ, ‘Yadi ti chɛ 'a denɛ wandi gbu an nɛ. Wo na, mmɔ ni a fa, min mbe a ma, boo fenɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ni ma mmɔ ta a.’
41012008	Mbɛ an‑na a 'a den chɛ bia, an‑na a fa, mbɛ an‑na a su a dɛ yadi gbaa chia a.”
41012009	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ta yiima ɔ, ni yadi ti chɛ na‑a tima min na, ɛ fɛn ma‑a yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n na? Ɛ na‑a wan, a ni an yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n kasaa, mbɛ a‑a a don a kun ma fɛn mɔɛ dɔ mende n boo ɔ.
41012010	Ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a kaka min‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Chen sɔ mɔɛ n na‑a ban senɛ min dɔ, an dɔ, a ma nyin, an gbu ma‑a gbɛ senɛ kuu ba wandi a, chenɛ gbu ko a.
41012011	Yataa an‑na chɛ ma. A sin mu kamaya koe an na mmɔ ya a.’ ”
41012012	Chu n kun ti n toen ni, an ni Chisɔsi bia. Koe min na mu, a ni wan an yii ma, a 'a tai chɛ sien mu an fan ma. Chɛɛ an chian‑da wan mɔ fanka fanka chɛ ma, mbɛ an‑na a to nɔ, an ta‑a an ye.
41012013	Mbɛ an‑na Fayisii dɔ n sɔ, an bɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi fɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na, Chisɔsi tena. An toen ni, an ni a ɔ chɛ tisa chɛ a a, mbɛ an‑na a bia a chen kɔ, a da a bai ɔ.
41012014	An na‑a Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ an dɔ, “Ticha, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ danaya tɔɛ mu i a. I ma i gbɔsɔ ni mɔ gbu ɛ min fɔ, a si i ma, chɛɛ e tea an na tachɛ tun. A yɛ to, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ i ma i gbɔsɔ ni mɔ 'a sɔ tena ko a, chɛɛ e mɔɛ n kan Yataa bai miin gbɛɛ a, tea mu an na. A ɔ yian bɛ nn na, i ta yiima ɔ, i‑a pawa chɛ be koe yen ka ma Domi kun ti wa ma, a nyin fan?”
41012015	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a an 'na yiinachii yama chɛ kɔɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, “Fen mu wo toen mu wo ni n dɔ chɛ? Wo na n ye kain gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔ a, n mbe a ma fɛn.”
41012016	Mbɛ an na‑a a a, mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Nyɔn ya kɔɔɛ ɛ ka a ma, a basan a tɔɛ a?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Domi kun ti wa an nɛ.”
41012017	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mbɛ fen chɛ nu, miin mu Domi kun ti wa boo fenɛ a, wo an be a ma. Mbɛ wo yɛ‑a, fen chɛ nu, miin be Yataa ko a, wo‑a an be Yataa ma.” An tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, a‑a an yɛman buɛ min dɔ.
41012018	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Sadusii n na, miin nii ma dan ni mɔɛ kɔɔ sɔ koe a a ka saya ɔ, an bɛɛ na‑a Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ,
41012019	“Ticha, Mosisi‑a sawa chɛ an nyɛn mmɔ ko a, a ɔ, ‘Ni mɔɛ suun ma nyɔɛ kaima fa‑a,’ a ɔ, ‘mbɛ a‑a a 'a musu to, an fea ma den suun ni min na,’ a ɔ, ‘a dinden fan mu a ma,’ a ɔ, ‘a ni chenɛ da mun, an ni denɛ suun ta mɔɛ chɛ ko a.’
41012020	Tima dɔndɔ a, kaminɛ n ni wan nɔ, an kai wɔnfea an de‑a an fɛn suun. Mbɛ a wɛn ni chenan ka an gbɛɛ ma, a‑a musu si. Mbɛ a fa‑a, a ma den suun ni, musu chɛ ma.
41012021	Mbɛ denɛ kaima fean bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ‑a musu dɔndɔ gbe chɛ si to musu a. Mbɛ a wɛɛ fa‑a ka wan, a ma den suun ni, musu chɛ ma. A sawan bɔɛ wɛɛ ma‑a ka wan.
41012022	An wɔnfean bɔɛ gbɔdɛ, a na‑a musu chɛ si wan. Chɛɛ a wɛɛ nii ma den suun ni, musu chɛ ma, mbɛ a wɛɛ fa‑a. A danka a gbɛ, musu chɛ wɛɛ gbu fa‑a.
41012023	Ni tee che‑a, faa mɔɛ n ni an kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, musu chɛ ɛ ma nyɔn 'na musu a gbɛ? A yen ko, a ni wan an gbɛɛ boo ɔ, musu a.”
41012024	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo saman‑da kaka a fɔ koe a, mbɛ ni mɔɛ fa‑a, a ee a kɔɔ sɔ to a ka saya ɔ. Mbɛ fen‑na a ma wo saman‑da, a mu koe min na, wo ma Yataa 'a gboo ɔ gbɛ ni, mbɛ a yɛ to, wo ma ko ɔ ko sɔn a si Yataa 'a gbasaya ma.
41012025	Tima min na, mɔɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ, musu si basan kai sɔnɛ a, a ee ma‑a nɔ. Mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ maeka nu banda bu ɔ.
41012026	Min sin sien mu faa mɔɛ n kɔɔ sɔ koe ma, a ka saya ɔ, ɛ n yii ma, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan, Mosisi 'a gboo ɔ, a si kɔn den chɛ ma, min ni yɔ a ni minda tena wan. Yataa na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, Yataa mu a wan na Ebeami ko a, a basan Aisaki an fea Chekɔpi a. A ɔ, an mbe a wan fai.”
41012027	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ chɛndɛ ba n fan mbe Yataa fai. Mɔɛ min faen mu, a ee Yataa fai. Tea ee wo 'a yiinachii ɔ.”
41012028	Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ, min ni a too ma sɔ tena an 'na chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ ma. A‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Sadusii chɛ n 'na tisa yɛman fan chɛndɛ chɛ, a wɛɛ ɔ, “Mosisi na‑a sawa sɛsɛ be wan mmɔ ma. An tɛ ɔ, sawa minan mu a chenama a?”
41012029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sawa chenama gbu yen ko. ‘Wo a a min, wo wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu. Mansa Yataa, an mu mmɔ 'a Yataa a. A ɛ dɔndɔ gbe.
41012030	A sin, wo to Mansa Yataa a, wo faa gbɛɛ a, wo ni to a a, wo 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ni to a a, wo sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, wo ni to a a, wo yiima gbɛɛ a.’
41012031	Sawa fean bɔɛ chenama gbu an nɛ, ‘Wo to wo 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo wandi a.’ Sawa kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, min benden mu sawa fea chɛ n ma.”
41012032	Mbɛ sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Ticha, i‑a tea fɔ, mbɛ Mansa Yataa an mu Yataa dɔndɔ gbe a. Yataa dɔ mende kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, mɔɔ a wan.
41012033	Mbɛ mɔ gbu ni to Yataa a, a faa gbɛɛ a, ni a yiima gbɛɛ a, a basan a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. A ni yɛ to, a ni to a 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ a toen mu buɛ min dɔ a wandi a. A ma bɛnden mu sawa fea chɛ n sa tena ɔ bɛn koe a, a ni ben yasi kan kɔ kan ma.”
41012034	Mbɛ kɛn Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a yiimatɛ bai fɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ɛnden fan to‑a gbɛ, mbɛ i don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.” Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ chian‑da wan gbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ tisa koe a.
41012035	Chisɔsi to‑a kan chɛ an na Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ a‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a sawa kan mɔɛ nu, an mbe kun ka ma an ni a fɔ, an dɔ, mbɛ kunka mansa ɛ bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ? Fen mu chɛ ɛ ma?
41012036	Mansa Defidi wandi gbu wɛɛ, Yataa Nyina na‑a bai don kɛn a da ɔ, a na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ n 'na Mansa ye, a ɔ, “Si nɛ n boo nyima ɔ, aan n ni i chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n don i kɔɔ.” ’
41012037	Mansa Defidi wandi gbu yen ko gbɛ, a ɔ, kunka mansa chɛ benden mu a ma. Chɛɛ mɔ kun ma kundi ee koa, a ni ben i ma. A fɔen mu gbɛ, mbɛ kunka mansa chɛ ɛ bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ. Fen ko a, chɛ ɛ ma?” A tima chɛ a, mɔ fanka chɛ nu, an bu ɔ dia‑a wan, an too ma sɔ koe a Chisɔsi ma.
41012038	A sin ni kɛn an kan‑da, a ɔ, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ. An toen mu doma wa wa don koe a, an mbe ben ben. Ni an ta‑a machiti an dɔ, an toen mu mɔɛ n ni basɔmaya kɔndɔnɛ chɛ an na.
41012039	Ni an ta‑a mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n bɛɛ a, an toen mu si tena ma bɛnden ba an na. Daun chɛ bɛnɛ wɛɛ ɔ, an toen mu si koe a gbakoo n fan tɛ.
41012040	An mbe fuinya musu n boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ daun fan, kafaya ɔ. An gba yama chɛ ma nun koe a, an mbe samun dɔ yansama an chɛ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa wɛɛ ɛ an tɔɔya‑a wan, a ni ben mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma.”
41012041	Mbɛ Chisɔsi si‑a kɔpɔ sa kakaa chɛ ya teen ma, Yataa 'a kata ɔ, ɛ mɔ fanka n ma fɛn‑da, an mbe an boo fenɛ n na bea‑a a ɔ. A‑a nyan tɔ sɛsɛ yen fan, an mbe boo fen chenama n na bea‑a.
41012042	Mbɛ fuinya musu na‑a, yɔn tɔɛ, mbɛ a‑a kɔpɔ gbɛnsɛn den fea a bea. An kɔpɔ gbɛnsɛn fea chɛ, a a kanden ni pɛnɛ an na.
41012043	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n chee, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Tea a, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ fuinya musu yɔnden chɛ, a‑a kɔpɔɛ min na bea ka, a benden mu chɛ ma, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na miin na bea ka.
41012044	A mu min na, chɛ n‑na min be ka, an‑na a ya a chenama an kun ma, chɛɛ musu chɛ ta kɔpɔɛ gbɛɛ an nii nɛ a boo ɔ. Kɔpɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan mbe ee to a boo ɔ.”
41013001	Chisɔsi ni kɛn bɔ tena Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, a fɛ den dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, i ya a ta, i ni chen nyima wa chɛ n yen, an‑na miin sɔ sen nyima chɛ n na.”
41013002	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a chen nyima wa chɛ n yen, tima ɛ che‑a wan an gbɛɛ ni bea. A dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee to‑a sɔ ɔ, a gbɛɛ a ɛ kan‑da wan duu gboo a.”
41013003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ni kɛn si ɔ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ya teen ma, Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ kun ma, mbɛ Pita ni ma, Chimisi, Chɔn ni Anduu, an na‑a a tena. An dechee ni, mbɛ an dɔ,
41013004	“I‑a bai min fɔ ka, a ɔ yian nn na, ni sɔyɔ mu koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a. A tɔmɔsi ɛ ma‑a fen na, nn ni a ɔ sɔn mbɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe ka na tena ma‑a na?”
41013005	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bun‑da a fɔ‑a an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn, an ma na wo woo.
41013006	Mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe na‑a wan n tɔɛ ɔ, an mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, an fan mu Chasi a, kunka mansa. A sin, an mɔɛ chɛ n mbe mɔ sɛsɛ sɔ‑a wan chia yama ma.
41013007	Wo e chɛɛ ma tɔɛ a min‑da wan wo a tindanɛ, wo ni chɛɛ ma tɔɛ a min pɔɔ. Koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a wan, chɛɛ wo ma chian. Chɛ ni ma wɛɛ, a ee a ɔ yian, mbɛ tima che‑a dunya ban koe a.
41013008	A yɛ to, chɛnyɛ n mbe butuinɛ chɛ‑a wan an nyɔn na, mbɛ chɛnyɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ n‑na chɛɛ chɛ an bɛ chɛnyɛ mɔ dɔ mende n na. Kɔnkɔ ma chianden ba ɛ ma‑a wan chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ ɔ, a sin to, duu gboo wɛɛ ɛ samba‑a wan chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ ɔ, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Ko yawaenɛ saa n fan nɛ ka miin mbe ma‑a. Ko yawaenɛ chenama n mbe gbaa, miin mbe na tena ma‑a chɛ n gbakɔ.
41013009	“Chɛɛ wo wo wandi kun ma fɛn. An mbe wo bia‑a wan, an ni ta wo a, gbakoo n chen kɔɔ. An mbe yɛ‑a wan to, an ni wo gbasi an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na. An mbe wo bia‑a wan, an ni ta wo a, chɛnyɛ ti n tena, an mbe ta‑a wan wo a, mansa wa n chen kɔɔ. An mbe chɛ gbɛɛ si‑a wan wo a, a si n bakoe ma. Chɛɛ wo e kun‑da wan Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian‑da an na.
41013010	Chɛ n mbe e na to ma‑a, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ pɛn mbe fɔ‑a, mɔɛ n ye chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
41013011	Ni an na‑a wo a kun ti n tena, wo gbɛmbo koe a, an ni wo be gbae, wo faa ma gbaa, a si bai ma, wo e na tena min fɔ‑a. Chɛɛ bai ɔ bai, wo e min ma sɔn‑da a tima chɛ kɔɔ, wo e an fɔ. Koe min na mu, wo fɔ bai nu ma, wo e miin fɔ‑a, chɛɛ a bai chɛ n mbe ka tena Yataa Nyina an tena.
41013012	A sin, mɔɛ ɛ a suun ma nyɔɛ be‑a wan, an ni a fa. A yɛ to, mɔɛ fa ni a 'a denɛ be. Denɛ n bɛɛ gbu sin, an mbe sɔ‑a wan kan, an woo mɔɛ n na, an ni an fa.
41013013	Wo sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe too‑a wan wo a, a mu min na, n fɛ mɔɛ mu wo a. Chɛɛ i wɛn mbe i faa bia‑a aan a danka a, Yataa ɛ i baun‑da wan.”
41013014	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ wo e fen ma nyamuienɛ n yen‑da wan, miin mbe fenɛ n yɔn, an mbe sɔ ɔ kaina, an nii ma sɔ ɔ kaina min.” (Wo wɛn mbe gboo chɛ kan‑da, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, bai chɛ fasaien mu fen na). “Ni wo‑a chɛ yen ma‑a, wo wɛn mbe Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, wo bui sa a a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, wo fɔɛ ko a.
41013015	I wɛn mbe baa ma, i ma don to chenɛ a, i boo fen kan kɔ kan ya koe a.
41013016	I wɛn mbe i 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, i ma yɛ to duu ɔ, koa ya koe a.
41013017	A tima chɛ a, koe n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe bu ma musu n nan gbu tan‑da, a basan kuinsa n na.
41013018	Wo samunɛ chɛ Yataa tena, wo ma na bui chɛ chɛ sama ɔ.
41013019	Koe min na mu, an tima chɛ a, ko yawaenɛ miin mbe ma‑a, ɛ ben‑da wan a kɔma ma, miin ma‑a a ka dunya a dan tima ma, a sɔ sanche ma. A sin a nyɔn sima ee ma‑a to kuɔ fɔ.
41013020	Chɛɛ Mansa Yataa‑a tee chɛ n ma wua, ko yawaen bia tee chɛ nu. Ni a nii ma an ma wua ni, mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan kun nii bɔ‑a a ɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a tee chɛ n ma wua a 'a mɔɛ chɛ n fan ko a, a‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, an ma koe a a 'a mɔɛ n na.
41013021	“Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ i ye, a ɔ, i ya a na wɛ, i ni mmɔ kun ka mansa yen nɛ, i ma dan a a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, a yen ko pan, i ma dan a wɛɛ a.
41013022	A mu min na, fania kunka mansa an mbe na‑a wan, a basan fania fɔ mɔɛ n na, miin mbe an fandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na. An mbe kamaya koe n ma‑a wan, an ni koe tɔmɔsi n yian, mɔɛ n woo koe a. Ni an mbe kun fan, an mbe mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ woo‑a wan, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, ma koe a a 'a mɔɛ n na.
41013023	Chɛɛ wo wo kun ma fɛn! N ban‑da wo too kɔ‑a, an mbe e na to ma‑a.”
41013024	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ ni ko yawaen tee chɛ n ben‑da, tee ee na‑a man‑da, mbɛ kau wɛɛ pimbi‑a.
41013025	Tɔmbuaka n mbe bea‑a wan a ka banda a. Fen kɔ fen min mbe banda a, Yataa ɛ a ɔ samba‑a wan a ka a gba ɔ.
41013026	A sin, a tima chɛ a, an mbe n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe n yen‑da wan na‑a gbasaya wa ɔ dugbu ɔ, a yɛ to, n mbe ma‑a wan man‑da Yataa 'a manɛ a.
41013027	A sin, n mbe n 'na maeka n na ta‑a wan, an ni mɔɛ chɛ n na sɔn sɔn, n‑na n boo sɔ miin ma, ma koe a n ta mɔɛ n na. N mbe an na sɔn sɔn‑da wan, a ka dunya tɔnkɔnɛ naaninɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ka kan kɔ kan dunya gbɛɛ ɔ.”
41013028	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo yii na chii wɛ kɔnɛ ma. Ni wo‑a a yen pɔmbɔ‑a, a ni ma gbɛ wo yii ma, mbɛ sama ɔ ma yansan to.
41013029	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, ni wo‑a koe chɛ n yen ma‑a, a ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ tima ɔ ma yansan to, n na koe a.
41013030	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe ma‑a pɛn, wo nyɔn sima chɛ n mbe e na ban dunya ɔ.
41013031	Dunya gbɛɛ ɛ ban‑da wan, chɛɛ n da a bai ee ka‑a a gba ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
41013032	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a tee gbu sɔn, a basan a tima a, n na koe a. N fan, Yataa 'a denɛ wɛɛ, n ma a ɔ sɔn, ni n mbe na‑a tima min na. Maeka n bɛɛ, banda bu ɔ, an ma a sɔn. Fa Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an‑na a ɔ sɔn.
41013033	Wo wo kun ma fɛn, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma. Koe min na mu, wo ma tee sɔn, n na tima ɛ che‑a tee min ma.
41013034	A ɛ wan yɔ mɔɛ, ɛ ma ta‑a tachɛ ɔ. A ɛ ma a waa boo ka‑a, ɛ a 'a bɔi denɛ n to wan chenɛ kun ma fɛn koe a. A ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ta wai be wan a ma, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a 'a chen ma kɔn mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ni chenɛ kun ma fɛn.
41013035	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma tima ɔ tima ko a. Koe min na mu, wo ma a ɔ sɔn, chen ti chɛ ɛ na‑a tima min na, yɛɛ ma tee a mu, chɛ ma, su tɛ, chɛ ma, tɛ kɔnɛ konchee tima a sayi ma, chɛ ma, sau ma.
41013036	A ma na na, a ni i tɛnɛ, e sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ.
41013037	A sin, n mbe min fɔ wo ye, n mbe an fɔ mɔɛ gbɛɛ ye. Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma.”
41014001	A to‑a gbɛ tee fea, mbɛ Chu n 'na kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ bia tima che‑a, an 'na biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛn chɛ. A tima chɛ a, Chu n tɛ ɔ mɔɛ nu Yataa, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an toen ni an ni Chisɔsi bia nun dɔ, mbɛ an‑na a fa.
41014002	Chɛɛ an‑na a fɔ wan an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Mmɔ ma a ma bɛn chɛ kun ma, mɔɛ n ma na gbunɛ a bea.”
41014003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a Bɛtani duu ɔ. A ta‑a wan kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, min tɔ ni Saimɔn. Saimɔn chɛ ni mɔɛ an na, gbandi yama bɔen ni tee min gboo ma. An fea Chisɔsi a, an ni kɛn si ɔ daun chɛ a, musu dɔndɔ na‑a wan tu kunyɛ a diama wa a an chen chɛ a. Tu chɛ sin ni baa min dɔ, a nyanden ni senɛ ɔ wan. Mbɛ a‑a baa chɛ da tɛ, a‑a a chɛ Chisɔsi kunɛ ɔ.
41014004	Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan nɔ, miin faa tɛen ni, an bun‑da a fɔ‑a an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Musu chɛ‑a tu bonda chɛ gbɛɛ yayi fen ko a ka?
41014005	Koe min na mu, a ni a ma tachɛ wan bɛɛ kɔpɔɛ a, min ni ben san dɔndɔ pawa ma, mbɛ a‑a a be yɔn tɔɛ n ma.” Mbɛ an‑na musu chɛ ma nyin, a yama boo a.
41014006	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo a to nɔ dechee. Fen ko a, wo e a ma nyin tena? A‑a koe min ma ka n na, a ma kawaen mu.
41014007	Koe min na mu, yɔn tɔɛ n tana, wo bɛ an mbe ma‑a an na tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, ni wo toen mu, wo ni ko chɛndɛ ma an na tima ɔ tima, wo e a ma wan. Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe ee ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ tima ɔ tima ko a.
41014008	Musu chɛ‑a koe an ma ka, ɛ che min chɛ‑a, n ko a. A‑a tu min chɛ ka n kunɛ ɔ, a‑a n ma bɛn fan ka, n tɔn koe a, n fa tima ya ɔ.
41014009	A‑a min chɛ ka, n ni a ma din wo tena, a ee danka‑a nɛ. Chɛɛ kan kɔ kan dunya chɛ ɔ, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɛ fɔ‑a kaina, musu chɛ 'a ko chɛndɛ chɛ wɛɛ, ɛ fɔ‑a wan nɔ, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni a a min.”
41014010	Mbɛ Chudasi Isikayɔti, min ni Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ a, a ta‑a Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n tena, min mbe a ma, a ni Chisɔsi ma tachɛ an ma.
41014011	An sin‑na chɛ a min kɛn a da a, an bu ɔ dia‑a wan, mbɛ an dɔn‑da kɔpɔɛ gbu be koe a a ma. Mbɛ a ka gbɛ a tee chɛ ma, Chudasi ni wan gbɛ chia yan‑da, ɛ kun buɛ min dɔ, a ni Chisɔsi ma tachɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
41014012	Mbɛ tee saa saa che‑a bɛn chɛ ko a, biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛn chɛ. A tee chɛ a ni, an ni sa n fa tee min ma, daun fenɛ a, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “I toen mu nn ni ta mende, nn ni kaina ɔ bɛn, daun fen chɛ daun koe a, i boo ɔ?”
41014013	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n sɔ, an mɔ fea, ta koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A ɔ an ma, “Wo e ma‑a wo kunɛ a don‑da duu wa chɛ ɔ, wo e kaminɛ tan‑da wan, ɛ ta‑a yii a da ɔ. Wo bea a fɛ.
41014014	A sin, ni a don‑da chen kan kɔ kan na, wo a fɔ chen ti chɛ ye, wo ɔ, ‘Nn kan mɔ‑a nn sɔ, a ɔ, i ni dumu yian nn na. A ɔ, nn ni a ɔ bɛn daun chɛ koe a, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a. Dumu gbu ɛ wan nɔ?’
41014015	A sin, ɛ dumu ɔ bɛnden ba yian‑da wan wo a, banda a chenɛ banda a. Wo ko ɔ ko ɔ bɛn nɔ, mmɔ ko a.”
41014016	Mbɛ a fɛ den fea chɛ nu, an ta‑a duu wa chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a bai miin gbɛɛ fɔ an ye, a bɔ‑a wan a a. Mbɛ an‑na daun fen chɛ gbu ɔ bɛn, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a.
41014017	A sin, yɛɛ ma tee a che‑a kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a, an bɛ a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n na.
41014018	An sin ni kɛn si ɔ tebu ma, daun chɛ‑a, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe chɛ ma din‑da wan wo tena, mbɛ wo dɔndɔ, ɛ na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a. Wo dɔndɔ, mmɔ bɛ, mmɔ ɛ daun chɛ‑a min na.”
41014019	Mbɛ an faa bun‑da yɔn‑da, an bun‑da a fɔ‑a a ye, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, chɛ ɔ, “N gbee ma chɛ a, ae?”
41014020	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔ dɔndɔ mu, wo mɔ tan kun ma fea chɛ n tɛ. Nn fea gbu, nn mbe daunɛ chɛ tena min na, koen dɔndɔɛ ɔ.
41014021	Koe min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na tena wan fa‑a, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a si n ma. Chɛɛ ɛ yaua‑a gba mɔɛ chɛ ko a, min mbe n ma tachɛ‑a. Ni a nii ma suun ni, a ni nyan‑da wan a ko a.”
41014022	Mbɛ an ni kɛn daun chɛ chɛ‑a, Chisɔsi‑a biidi dɔndɔ ya. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa ɔ tisa, a ni biidi chɛ dua. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ kai kai, a‑a a du du an ma, ɛ ta‑a a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “N fandi gbu, n gboo an nɛ. Wo a bia, wo ni a daun.”
41014023	Mbɛ a‑a kɔpu wɛɛ ya, gbɛ ni min dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, a‑a a be an ma, mbɛ a ɔ, “N wii an nɛ, n mbe na tena min na bɔn‑da mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a. N wii chɛ, Yataa ɛ an ya tena, mbɛ a‑a dɔbɛn nama chɛ a 'a mɔɛ n na.” Mbɛ an gbɛɛ, an‑na a bia, an‑na a min.
41014025	A ɔ, “Ka wɛ, n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena. N mbe ee gbɛ chɛ min‑da to, mɔɔ dechee tima chɛ a, tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da. A tima an na mu, n mbe gbɛ nama min‑da, mmɔ bɛ.”
41014026	Mbɛ an‑na Yataa si sa kɛn, an ta‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ.
41014027	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo e na tena wan ka‑a n fɛ. Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ ni Yataa‑a sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ ya, sa n dɔ ɛ fasan fan.
41014028	Chɛɛ tima min na Yataa ɛ n kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ, n mbe ta‑a wan wo ya ɔ Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.”
41014029	Chɛɛ Pita‑a a fɔ wan Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “N bɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ni ka wɛɛ i fɛ, n tana, n mbe ee ka‑a i fɛ.”
41014030	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Pita, n ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee gba fea sayi chɛ ma, e kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a wan gba sawa, a si n sɔn koe ma i boo ɔ.”
41014031	Chɛɛ Pita chii‑a wan a ma Chisɔsi tena, a ɔ, “I fa tena, n fa tena. N mbe ee kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a i wakoe ma.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na a fɔ ka wan.
41014032	Mbɛ an ta‑a kaina chɛ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Kɛsemani. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Wo si nɛ, n mbe samunɛ chɛ.”
41014033	Mbɛ a‑a Pita ya, ni Chimisi an fea Chɔn na. Mbɛ mɔnɛ koa‑a a ma a ya a, mbɛ a faa yɔn‑da.
41014034	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Faayɔnɛ min mbe n ma, a da a koo. A toen mu, a ni ta n na faa. Wo ma chinɔ nɛ, wo n ma kɔn.”
41014035	Mbɛ a ka‑a wan an baima ɛnden na, mbɛ a‑a a wandi ɔ fuin duu ma, a bun‑da samunɛ chɛ‑a. A‑a Yataa ɔ tisa wan, ni ɛ bɛn fan, tima chɛ a, ko yawaen chɛ ni ka a kun ma.
41014036	A ɔ, “Fa, e kun fan ko ɔ ko ma. A ma ko yawaen chɛ ni ka n teen na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ta faa ma koe, an ma ma. Chɛɛ i ta faa ma koe, an ni ma.”
41014037	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a an tan sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ Pita ma, “Saimɔn, e ka chinɔɛ ɔ wan? E ee kun i ni ma i ya a, awa dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a?
41014038	Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ, wo ma chinɔ. Wo samunɛ ma ti bia, Sitana ma na a ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a. Wo toen mu wo ni Yataa faa ma koe n ma, chɛɛ a gbasaya ee wo boo ɔ an ma koe a.”
41014039	Mbɛ a ta‑a to, a‑a samunɛ chɛ, a‑a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an fɔ, a na‑a min fɔ a saa a.
41014040	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to a fɛ den chɛ n tena. A‑a an tan to chinɔɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, chinɔɛ ni fanka an ya a kaka. An gbu nii ma a ɔ sɔn, ni an mbe fen fɔ a ye.
41014041	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a gba sawan bɔɛ ɔ, a fɛ den chɛ n tena. A ɔ, “Wo e ka sa ɔ chinɔɛ an dɔ tun? Wo e wo suin‑da? A kun‑da gbɛ. Tima che‑a, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n ma tachɛ koe a, ko yama ma mɔɛ n ma.
41014042	Wo wo a sɔ, mmɔ ni bun ta‑a. Wo wo ya a ta pan. Mɔɛ min mbe n ma tachɛ tena, a yen ko na‑a.”
41014043	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ an na, mbɛ mɔ fanka na‑a a tan. Chudasi, a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ, an ni sɔ ɔ an ya ɔ. Mɔɛ miin mbe Chu n tɛ, an bɛ Yataa, an 'na mansa nu, ni Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ nu, an bɛ an 'na gbakoo n na, an fan na‑a an sɔ. Kɔn kundu ma tɛenɛ, a basan chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, ɛ an boo ɔ.
41014044	An mbe e na to na‑a, Chudasi na‑a a fɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, ɛ mɔɛ min kɔndɔn‑da, a ɔ, an nɛ. A ɔ, an ni dɛ a ma, an ni a bia gban, mbɛ an ta‑a a a.
41014045	Mbɛ an‑na a fo kɛn, Chudasi ta‑a Chisɔsi tan a ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ a ɔ, “Kan mɔ,” mbɛ a‑a a kɔndɔn.
41014046	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɛ‑a Chisɔsi ma, mbɛ an‑na a bia gban.
41014047	Chɛɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a 'a bɔi denɛ, a ni wan an mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ. An‑na Chisɔsi bia kɛn, mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ, min ni nɔ sɔ ɔ, a‑a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ bɔ a a, mbɛ a‑a bɔi denɛ chɛ too tɛ a a gbeda.
41014048	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo nii wo wandi tɔɔ na koe a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ n na wo boo ɔ, a basan kɔn ma tɛenɛ a, n bia koe. Kanka ma chianden ma n na.
41014049	Mmɔ‑a tee sɛsɛ wa chɛ gbɛɛ ban, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, n mbe kan chɛ chɛ‑a, wo ma n bia ni. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, a ni bɔ a a.”
41014050	Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na a dɔndɔ gbe to, mbɛ an ben‑da bui‑a.
41014051	Chɛɛ kamin tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ na‑a a sɔ wan Chisɔsi fɛ. Kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ, a nii ma a ma chii ni koa dɔ gbɛɛ ɔ, fɔ dechee fen gbɛ, a na‑a min wangban. An toen ni an ni a wɛɛ bia.
41014052	Chɛɛ a‑a a 'a koa chɛ to wan an boo ɔ, mbɛ a ben‑da bui‑a, a ma senɛ a.
41014053	Mbɛ an ta‑a Chisɔsi a tɛ mɔ wa chɛ chen kɔɔ, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an kun ti chɛ. A tima chɛ a, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ Yataa a, ni an 'na sawa kan mɔɛ nu, an bɛ gbakoo n na, an na kanden fan ni nɔ.
41014054	Pita na‑a a sɔ wan Chisɔsi fɛ. Chɛɛ a ma dɔn ni, a ni gbɛn an ma gbɛdɛn. An ta‑a wan, aan a che an 'na tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an don‑da nɔ. Pita wɛɛ don‑da wan, mbɛ a si‑a, an bɛ kata chɛ kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n na, ɛ a gbaa‑a ta fɛ.
41014055	Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu kuti wa ɔ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bun‑da siiya yan‑da, a si Chisɔsi ma. An toen ni, an ni chia yan, a fa koe ma. Chɛɛ an nii ma chia sɔn ni, a fa koe a.
41014056	Mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a wan, an‑na fania fɔ Chisɔsi ma. Chɛɛ an da a kuiɛ ma bɔ ni a nyɔn na.
41014057	An dɔ nu, an sɔ‑a wan, an‑na fania siiya chɛ, a si a wan Chisɔsi ma. An dɔ te,
41014058	“Nn‑na a a min fan, a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ɛ kun fan a ni Yataa 'a chen chɛ, mmɔ‑a min sɔ ka mmɔ boo a, a ni a te, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ tee sawa tɛ ɔ, mɔ gbu boo sin fan mbe ee a sɔ‑a.”
41014059	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an da a kuiɛ ma bɔ ni a nyɔn na fion.
41014060	Mbɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a sɔ‑a an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “A yen ko gbɛ, siiya n‑na bai chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ, a si i ma. Bai ɔ bai ee i da a, e min fɔ, min mbe i kun bɔ koe chɛ ɔ?”
41014061	Chɛɛ a na‑a a ma maun fan, a nii ma bai ɔ bai fɔ ni. Mbɛ tɛ mɔ wa chɛ‑a a ɔ tisa to, a ɔ, “I wan mu kunka mansa chɛ a, mɔɛ n mbe Yataa min tando, a 'a denɛ ɛ?”
41014062	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan nɛ. A sin, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, wo e n yen‑da wan, n mbe si ɔ kaina ma bɛndenɛ Yataa boo nyima ɔ, gbasaya ɔ. A sin to, wo e n yen‑da wan na‑a, banda a dugbu ɔ.”
41014063	Mbɛ tɛ mɔ wa chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn Chisɔsi da a, a‑a a ma doma a panda wan. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mmɔ ɛ to‑a to siiya dɔ mende minan na?
41014064	Wo ban‑da a a min‑da, a‑a Yataa main. Fen bai ɛ wo da a, a fɔ koe a?” Mbɛ kaa tɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a kaa a tɛ wan, mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi yɛi. An dɔ, a nyin a ni fa.
41014065	Mbɛ an dɔ n bun‑da an da yii chɛ‑a a ma, mbɛ an‑na a ya a chii, an dɔ n sin‑na a tu botani a. An dɔ a ma, “A ɔ yian bɛ, mɔɛ min mbe ka i gbasi tena.” Mbɛ kata kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n sin, an‑na a gbasi.
41014066	Pita na‑a a a tun fan, si koe a kata chɛ ɔ, denka ɔ chia a. Mbɛ bɔi den musuma tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ, min ni tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a chenɛ a, a na‑a.
41014067	A‑a Pita yen kɛn, ɛ a gbaa tena chɛ, a‑a a ma fɛn, mbɛ a ɔ, “I wɛɛ, i ni wan Chisɔsi fɛ, Nasaɛti mɔɛ chɛ.”
41014068	Chɛɛ Pita‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan a ma, a ɔ, “N ma a ɔ sɔn, a yɛ to, n ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, e ka bai min fɔ tena, ni a sien mu min ma.” Mbɛ Pita‑a a a sɔ, mbɛ a bɔ‑a, a sɔ‑a kata chɛ da a. Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, tɛ kɔnɛ konchee‑a.
41014069	Mbɛ bɔi den musuma chɛ‑a a yen to nɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to mɔɛ chɛ n ye sɔ ɔ, a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ, a mu Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔ an na.”
41014070	Chɛɛ Pita yɛ‑a wan to, a‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ chɛ wɛɛ ma. A ɔ ma yansan ni, mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni ka nɔ sɔ ɔ, an dɔ, “Mɔ dɔndɔ mu i a, min ni Chisɔsi fɛ. Koe min na mu, i wɛɛ ka‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ wan.”
41014071	Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Yataa ni n tɔɔya, ni n mbe ka fania an fɔ tena. N ma kamin chɛ sɔn, wo e ka min bakoe fɔ tena.”
41014072	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, tɛ kɔnɛ konchee‑a. A fean bɔɛ an nii nɛ gbɛ, tɛ chɛ‑a chɛ ma. Mbɛ a puin‑da Pita yii ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Pita, tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee, si tena fea, e a fɔ‑a wan yɔ i ma n sɔn, gba sawa ko a.” Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Pita puyɛ‑a di a.
41015001	A sau sau chɛ ma, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, ni Chu gbakoo nu, a basan Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an bɛ Chu kuti wa ɔ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bɛn‑da kun puinɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi chii fɔin, an ta‑a a a, mbɛ an‑na a konan Kɔfana Padeti ma.
41015002	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “I wan mu Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa a?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a an fɔ ka.”
41015003	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, Chu n tɛ Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ nu, an‑na kun sɛsɛ si wan Chisɔsi kun ma.
41015004	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a ɔ tisa to, a ɔ, “Bai ɔ bai ee i da a, e min fɔ? A ɔ yen bɛ, an mbe kun sɛsɛ wa min si tena i kun ma.”
41015005	Chɛɛ chɛ wɛɛ ɔ to, Chisɔsi ma a tɛ ni a ma gbukuu wɛɛ. Chɛ‑a Kɔfana Padeti da a fa wan gban.
41015006	San kɔ san na, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ kun ma, manda ni dɔndɔ, Kɔfana Padeti ni min na tachɛ. A ni mɔ dɔndɔ boo ka wan, min mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a, an ni a ɔ tisa min boo ka koe a.
41015007	A san chɛ a, kamin dɔndɔ min tɔ ni Baabasi, a ni wan pimbi chenɛ a, an bɛ a bɔɛ dɔ mende n na. An ni mɔɛ n fan na, an na‑a miin bia butuin chɛ koe a Domi mansa n na. Baabasi chɛ na‑a mɔɛ an fa, yɔ a bɔɛ chɛ dɔ n bɛɛ.
41015008	Kɔfana Padeti ni kɛn Chisɔsi gbɛmbo‑a, mɔ fanka wa a kan‑da a ma. An‑na a ɔ tisa wan, an dɔ, a ni manda chɛ a ben, min‑na ɛ ben tee.
41015009	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo toen mu, n ni n boo ka nyɔn na wo ye, Chu n 'na mansa chɛ?”
41015010	Kɔfana Padeti na‑a chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, a na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ toomaya gbama, an na‑a a ma, Chu tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na‑a Chisɔsi a a chen kɔɔ.
41015011	Chɛɛ a che‑a kɛn an kaina chɛ, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ n‑na a ma wan, an‑na fanka fanka chɛ a sɛ. An dɔ, an ni yee tɛ Baabasi an boo ka koe a.
41015012	Chɛɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a an dɔ tisa wan to, a ɔ, “Mbɛ wo toen mu gbɛ n ni fen ma kamin chɛ a, wo e min chee, wo ɔ, wo wan Chu n 'na mansa?”
41015013	Mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ to, an dɔ, “A ni gbangban kɔnɛ ma, a ni fa.”
41015014	Chɛɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma? Kamin chɛ gbu, a‑a fen ko yama ma?” Chɛɛ an‑na yee gbu ma munda wan gbɛ, an dɔ, “A ni gbangban kɔnɛ ma, a ni fa.”
41015015	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a boo ka wan Baabasi a, fanka fanka chɛ faa chima koe a. Mbɛ a‑a a ma, an‑na Chisɔsi gbasi bosa a pien, mbɛ a‑a a be, an ni a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ.
41015016	Chɛ gbakɔ, soya chɛ nu, miin ni Kɔfana Padeti kɔɔ, an ta‑a Chisɔsi a, mbɛ an don‑da a a Kɔfana Padeti 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na an bɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a kan.
41015017	Mbɛ an‑na a ma chii mansa doma a, min kɔ yawaen ni. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a wan to, an‑na banfua nyan wai ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a si a kun na. An dɔ, a 'a mansa banfua an nɛ.
41015018	Mbɛ an bun‑da mansa kɔndɔnɛ chɛ‑a a a, an dɔ, “Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa chɛ ni mɛ.”
41015019	Mbɛ an bun‑da Chisɔsi kun tɛ gbasi‑a kɔn kundu a. An mbe ta‑a an da yii wɛɛ fasi‑a a ma, mbɛ an mbe ta‑a to an kumbai gbangban‑da a chen kɔɔ.
41015020	Mbɛ an ban‑da kɛn a ma yɛn‑da, an‑na a ma bɔ wan gbae an ta mansa doma chɛ a, mbɛ an‑na a ta don a ma. Mbɛ an bɔ‑a a a, ta koe a fa a, kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
41015021	An to‑a ta an na Chisɔsi a, mbɛ an bɛn‑da kamin dɔndɔ a. A tɔ ni Saimɔn, a sin na‑a ka Sayini duu ɔ wan, ɛ na‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A 'a denɛ n fan nii nɛ Adɛsanda a, ni Dufɔsi. Soya chɛ n‑na a yen kɛn dechee, an‑na a din fan a ma, ta koe a kɔn gbengbanden chɛ a, Chisɔsi ko a.
41015022	Mbɛ an che‑a Chisɔsi a kaina dɔndɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Kɔkɔta, min fasaien mu, kun konkon ma.
41015023	Nɔ ni, mbɛ an‑na gbɛ be a ma, min dɔ basandenɛ ni gboo ɔ dumɛ bui a. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma dɔn ni a ni a min.
41015024	Mbɛ an‑na a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ chɛ ma nɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na chɛ fenɛ chɛ a ma koa n ko a, an ni a ɔ sɔn, ni mɔɛ ɛ min ma sɔn.
41015025	Tee kaina kɔɔɛ a ni, kɛn an‑na Chisɔsi gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
41015026	Mbɛ koe min gbu na‑a a ma, an‑na a gbangban kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, an‑na a nyɛn fan kɔn dɛnfɛ ma, an dɔ, Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa an nɛ.
41015027	An na‑a a gbangban kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma kaina dɔndɔɛ wan, an bɛ kanka fea an na. Dɔndɔɛ ɛ a boo nyima ɔ, dɔndɔɛ ɛ a manɛ ɔ.
41015029	Mbɛ chia a ben mɔɛ n‑na an kunɛ fichi fichi wan. Mbɛ an bun‑da a main‑da, an dɔ, “Wua! O, i wɛn‑na a fɔ, i ɔ, e Yataa 'a chenɛ te wan, mbɛ i‑a a sɔ tee sawa tɛ.
41015030	Mbɛ puin bɛ kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, i ni i wandi kun bɔ saya yuu chɛ ɔ.”
41015031	Mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ a, an‑na mayɛma koe n sɛ wan Chisɔsi ma. An mbe a fɔ an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “A‑a mɔ dɔ mende n baun, chɛɛ a ee che a ni a wandi baun.
41015032	Ni a wan mu kunka mansa chɛ a, Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa, a ni puin bɛ kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, nn ni a wakoe ɔ yen, mbɛ nn dan‑da a a.” An bɛ gbangban‑da ka mɔ fea miin na dɔndɔ a, an bɛɛ, an‑na a main ka wan.
41015033	Tee che‑a kɛn kun tɛ, an tee chɛ ma, pimbi bun‑da wan chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, aan awa sawa ko a.
41015034	Mbɛ tee kɔ kai ma, Chisɔsi‑a yee tɛ wan gbankon, a ɔ, “N 'na Yataa, n 'na Yataa, fen mu i ban‑da n dɔ?”
41015035	Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu nɔ sɔ ɔ, an‑na a a min kɛn a‑a min fɔ, an dɔ, “Wo a yen ko, ɛ ka kai Idaicha an chee‑a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ suun.”
41015036	Mbɛ an dɔndɔ‑a bui sa a a, mbɛ a ta‑a, a na‑a fen yɔfu yɔfu a. Mbɛ a‑a a chima gbɛ a, min baa nii ma gbɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a don kɔnɛ a, a don koe a Chisɔsi da a, a ni a susu, ɛ ta‑a a fɔ‑a a bɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Mmɔ a ma kɔn, kɔkɔɛ Idaicha ɛ na‑a wan, a ni a a yii kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma.”
41015037	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a yee tɛ to gbankon, mbɛ a fa‑a.
41015038	Mbɛ tɛndi, min ni dɛn dɔ Yataa 'a chen chɛ bu ɔ, a tɛka‑a fea a, a ka a kandɔɛ, aan a yii a denka ɔ.
41015039	Mbɛ Domi soya gbakoo chɛ, min ni sɔ ɔ nɔ Chisɔsi ya kɔɔɛ, a‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi fa‑a, a‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ ni Yataa 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ gbu an na.”
41015040	Musu n bɛɛ, an ni wan nɔ, an mbe sɔ ɔ pɔɔ, an ya bɛndenɛ ɛ a ma. Bɔɔɛ Mɛi min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ, a ni wan nɔ. Bɔɔɛ Mɛi dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ. A 'a denɛ ni Chimisi dɔɔma a, ni Chosesi. Bɔɔɛ Sadome wɛɛ ni wan nɔ.
41015041	Musu chɛ n fan na‑a a sɔ Chisɔsi fɛ, a ni Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ tima min na. A sin, an fan ni a deman chia sɛsɛ a. Musu sɛsɛ ni wan to nɔ, miin bea‑a a fɛ, a sɛ‑a tima min na Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
41015042	An tee chɛ bea ma, min ni tee a Chu n ni an ma bɛn an 'na suin tee chɛ ko a,
41015043	kamin dɔndɔ na‑a wan nɔ, a ka Ayimatia duu ɔ. A tɔ ni Chosɛfi, a sin baa ni wan a ma kaka, Chu gbakoo n tɛ, miin ni si Chu kuti wa ɔ. A yɛ to, a ya ni wan tima chɛ ya ɔ, tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da. A sin, a na‑a a faa sɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a Kɔfana Padeti tena, a‑a Chisɔsi su ɔ tisa a ma.
41015044	Chɛɛ yiinachii ni wan Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, ni Chisɔsi gbu faen fan ni gbɛ. Mbɛ a 'a soya gbakoo chɛ, a‑a a chee, a‑a a ɔ tisa ni Chisɔsi faen fan ni gbɛ.
41015045	Mbɛ soya gbakoo chɛ, a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, Chisɔsi fa‑a. Kɔfana Padeti‑a chɛ a ɔ gbɛ kɛn, mbɛ a dɔn‑da a su be koe a Chosɛfi chɛ ma.
41015046	Mbɛ Chosɛfi‑a fen gbɛ san. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi su a yii, a‑a a a mendemende fen gbɛ chɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a sa kamba ɔ, min nyandenɛ ni senɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a faa gban ba tundun kamba chɛ da a.
41015047	Mbɛ Mɛi, min ka‑a Makadaa, ni Mɛi dɔndɔɛ, min ni Chosesi de a, an ya ni wan kaina chɛ a, Chisɔsi na‑a tɔn ka kaina.
41016001	Mbɛ suin tee chɛ ben‑da kɛn, bɔɔɛ Mɛi, min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ, an fea Chimisi de Mɛi a, ni bɔɔɛ Sadome, an ta‑a, an‑na tu kunyɛ a diama san. Musu chɛ n toen ni, an ni tu kunyɛ a diama chɛ fasi fasi Chisɔsi su chɛ ma.
41016002	Mbɛ sayi ma, Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ ma, tee kainɛ a, an ta‑a wan Chisɔsi kamba ma.
41016003	An ni kɛn ta tena, an‑na an nyɔn dɔ tisa wan, an dɔ, “Sen ba dɛgbɛ chɛ, nyɔn mbe a ka‑a kamba chɛ da a, mmɔ ye?”
41016004	Chɛɛ an‑na an kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ kɛn, mbɛ an‑na a yen, mbɛ sen ba gbu chenchendenɛ ɛ, a ka kamba gbu da a.
41016005	Mbɛ an don‑da kɛn kamba gbu bu ɔ, an‑na kamin tɔngbɔɛ yen nɔ. Kamin chɛ ni si ɔ an boo nyima ɔ wan. A sin, doma kai min ni a ma, a gbɛen fan ni. Chɛ‑a an kɔndɔ fii wan.
41016006	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo kɔndɔ ma fii. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo e Chisɔsi an yan tena, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, an‑na min gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. A ee nɛ. Wo a yen, a ni sa ɔ kaina. Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ.
41016007	Chɛɛ wo ta gbɛ, wo ni a ɔ yian a fɛ denɛ n na. Wo a ɔ yian Pita wɛɛ a, wo ɔ, ɛ sɔ ɔ wo ya ɔ, a ta Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, wo ɔ, nɔ mu wo e a yen‑da, yɔ a na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ tee wo ye.”
41016008	Mbɛ an ben‑da bui‑a, a bɔ an kamba chɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, masamba basan kɔndɔfii a, a ni koo an dɔ. Chɛ sin‑na a ma wan, an ma che ni koɔ‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ tena, an chianden ba ɛ. [
41016009	Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a kɔɔ sɔ kɛn, Tɛnɛ kan kɔɔ dɔɛ ma, a‑a a wandi yian mɔɛ min pɛn na, an nɛ Mɛi a, min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ. A na‑a nyina yama wɔnfea chɛ n gbain an Mɛi chɛ an fɛ.
41016010	Mbɛ Mɛi ta‑a, a‑a a fɛ mɔɛ kɔma chɛ n tan, an mbe sanka di chɛ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian an na.
41016011	Chɛɛ an nii ma che ni dan‑da a a, an‑na a a min kɛn, mbɛ a wan Mɛi‑a a yen fan, a ɛ fɔɛ ɔ.
41016012	Chɛ gbakɔ, a fɛ den fea nu, an ni wan ta‑a konko dɔndɔ ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a wandi yian an na pɛnɛnɛ mɔ ya dɔ mende ɔ.
41016013	Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na a ɔ yian an bɔɛ tɔɛ n na, chɛɛ an bɛɛ ma dan ni an da a bai chɛ a.
41016014	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma dɔndɔɛ chɛ nu, an ni wan si ɔ tebu ma, daun chɛ tena. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a wandi yian an gbɛɛ a. A‑a an ma tɔɔ, a ɔ, an faa a kɔɔen mu, a sin, danaya ee an dɔ. A ɔ, koe min na mu, an ban‑da dan koe a mɔɛ saa an na, miin na‑a a wan Chisɔsi yen, a kɔɔ sɔenɛ gbakɔ saya ɔ.
41016015	Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Wo ta dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
41016016	Mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a n na, yii ni chɛ an kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, an mbe bauncha ma sɔn‑da wan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ee an kai fa‑a n na, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan an bakoe ma, an ni ma tɔɔya ɔ.
41016017	Mbɛ a sin, chɛ an mbe ma‑a tɔmɔsi a, tee ɔ tee a, chɛ n ko a miin kai faen mu n na. An mbe nyina yama n gbain‑da wan mɔɛ n fɛ, n tɔɛ ɔ, an ni koɔ chɛnyɛ koɛ n dɔ, miin mbe fɔ chɛnyɛ dɔ mende n dɔ.
41016018	Ni an‑na ka n bɛɛ bia, a ee ko ma‑a an na. Chɛ ma, an ni bɔɛɛ wɛɛ min, a ee ko ɔ ko ma‑a an na. An mbe an boo bun‑da wan gbandi mɔɛ n ma, mbɛ an baun‑da.”
41016019	Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a a fɛ den chɛ n tena, Yataa‑a a ya wan, a sɛ banda bu ɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi si‑a a boo nyima ɔ.
41016020	Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n ta‑a kan kɔ kan, an mbe ben‑da sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na. Mansa Chisɔsi sin basan‑da wan an ma, an 'na wai gbɛɛ ɔ. A sin, a‑a a ɔ yian tɔmɔsi n dɔ, miin ni yen an 'na sakana bai gbaa chia a, mbɛ an mbe tea chia an na.]
42001001	Koe miin ma‑a suun, mɔ sɛsɛ n ya‑a a ɔ yen fan, a ka a kuu sɔ tena. An mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ n sin, an‑na an koe n na ben fan nn tena. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a sakana a ben mɔɛ ni an na. Mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin‑na koe chɛ n na min, an si‑a wan, an‑na a nyɛn gboo ɔ.
42001003	N bɛɛ, n‑na an koe chɛ n ma mɛn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, a ka an kuu sɔ tena ma. Chɛ an‑na a ma, kai Tɛyɔfidɔsi, n sin mbe an bɔ tena a gbee ma gbɛ gbɛ, n ni a nyɛn i tena,
42001004	min mbe a ma, i wɛɛ ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. I ni a ɔ gbɛ, tea min mbe koe chɛ n gbaa, i kan‑da miin ma. N bɛɛ, n mbe ka gbɛ koe chɛ n fan nyɛn‑da i tena, n‑na koe miin kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn.
42001005	Tima min na Ɛdɔdi ni mansa a Chu chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ kun ma, mɔɛ ni wan nɔ, min ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, a tɔ ni Sakaaya. A 'a wai chɛ dɔbɛnɛ tɔ ni Abicha dɔbɛnɛ. A 'a musu tɔ ni Disabɛti. A wɛɛ na‑a bɔ mɔ kuun chɛ n fan tɛ ɔ, miin ni Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n na Yataa a.
42001006	Sakaaya tanden fan ni Yataa tena, an fea a 'a musu Disabɛti a. A sin an 'na fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an ni Mansa Yataa 'a sawa n gbɛɛ bia wan.
42001007	An fea gbɛɛ chenanchaen fan ni gbɛ, chɛɛ den nii an boo ɔ, koe min na mu, Disabɛti gbandayaen fan ni.
42001008	Tee dɔndɔ a, Sakaaya ni wan a 'a tɛ mɔ wai chɛ tena Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na, an fɛn ni Abicha wai chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ nɔ.
42001009	Mɔ dɔndɔ an ni don Mansa Yataa 'a chenɛ a, fen kunyɛ a diama minda koe a tee ɔ tee a. A tee chɛ ma, yɔ an 'na manda‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a bɔɛ n boo bɛn‑da an ma, don koe a a minda‑a.
42001010	Mɔ sɛsɛ ni wan baa ma samun chɛ‑a, kɛn Sakaaya ni fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ minda tena.
42001011	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka bɔ‑a wan a ya a, ɛ sɔ ɔ gbengbe boo nyima ɔ, Sakaaya ni fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ minda tena min ma.
42001012	Sakaaya‑a a yen kɛn, a kɔndɔ fii‑a wan kaka, mbɛ a chian‑da a ɔ benden ba a.
42001013	Chɛɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “Sakaaya, i ma chian, koe min na mu, Yataa‑a i 'a samunɛ a min. I 'a musu Disabɛti ɛ den kaienɛ suun‑da wan i ye. A tɔɛ ni ma Chɔn.
42001014	Wo bu ɔ dia‑a wan kaka, ni den chɛ suun‑da. Mɔ sɛsɛ n bɛɛ bu ɔ dia‑a wan.
42001015	Koe min na mu, ɛ ma‑a wan mɔ chenama a Mansa Yataa tena. A ma gbɛ kan kɔ kan min. A de e na to a suun‑da, Yataa Nyina ɛ ma‑a wan den chɛ fɛ gban.
42001016	Ɛ a ma‑a wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ sɛsɛ n ni yɛ an 'na Mansa Yataa chen kɔɔ.
42001017	Yataa Nyina ɛ gbasaya be‑a wan a ma, yɔ a‑a a be buɛ min dɔ Idaicha ma, min ni a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a suun. Ɛ na‑a wan Mansa Yataa ya ɔ, mɔ sɛsɛ n sɔ koe a chia ma. Ɛ a ma‑a wan, denɛ n ni na kuiɛ a kanɛ ɔ, an bɛ an fa n na. Ɛ a ma‑a wan to, tooɔgbɛa tɔɛ n bɛɛ ni bea tea fɛ, yɔ mɔ tandenɛ nu.”
42001018	Chɛɛ Sakaaya ɔ, “N mbe kun ka ma, n ni dan chɛ a? N chenancha buɛ chɛ, nn fea n 'na musu a.”
42001019	Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “N fan mu Chebɛɛ a. Yataa baima sɔ mɔɛ mu n fan na, a 'a wai chɛ koe a. A sin, a wan‑na n sɔ koɔ koe a i tena, a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a ben koe a.
42001020	Chɛ an fɛ mu, i ma danɛ min chɛ ni ka n na, a yen ko gbɛ, ɛ ma‑a ka wan. A ka gbɛ sanche ma, e ma‑a mumuncha an dɔ, a che a tee chɛ ma, n 'na sakana bai chɛ ɛ bɔ‑a a a tima min na. A sin ko ɔ ko ma‑a wan, yɔ ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ, a ma tima ma.”
42001021	A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ chɛ n ni wan Sakaaya ma kɔn tena baa ma. An ni wan an yiinachii a, fen mu ɛ mɛ tena ka Yataa 'a chen chɛ a.
42001022	A bɔ‑a kɛn, a ma che ni koɔ‑a an tena. A bun‑da koe siman‑da a boo a, chɛɛ a ma che ni bai dɔndɔ wɛɛ fɔ‑a. A tima a mu, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a‑a kamaya koe an dɔ yen Yataa 'a chen chɛ a.
42001023	A‑a a ta tima ban Yataa 'a tɛ mɔ wai chɛ chɛ‑a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa a.
42001024	Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, a 'a musu Disabɛti‑a bu ya wan. A ma bɔ ni chenɛ a aan kau duu, a ɔ,
42001025	“Mansa Yataa basan‑da gbɛ n ma, a danka a. A‑a fanka ɔ mau ka n ya a sanche, bu chɛ be koe a n ma.”
42001026	Disabɛti bu ma kau wɔdɔn bɔɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a maeka Chebɛɛ a na wan to Kadidi chɛnyɛ duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min tɔ ni Nasaɛti.
42001027	Sakana ni wan a boo ɔ, sunkun tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ko a, min tɔ ni Mɛi. Mɛi chɛ nii ma kai ko ɔ sɔn. Tooɔdia chɛen ni a a kamin dɔndɔ an ko a, min tɔ ni Chosɛfi, a ma koe a a 'a musu a. Chosɛfi chɛ na‑a bɔ Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ.
42001028	Maeka chɛ na‑a wan Mɛi tena, mbɛ a‑a a kɔndɔn, mbɛ a ɔ, “Mansa Yataa ɛ i fɛ gban, mbɛ a sin‑na i dua a ɔ bendenɛ a.”
42001029	Mɛi kɔndɔ fii‑a wan maeka chɛ 'a bai chɛ a, mbɛ a bun‑da a yii na chii‑a a ma.
42001030	Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “Mɛi, i ma chian, koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ i dua tena wan.
42001031	A yen ko, e na tena wan bu ya‑a, mbɛ i‑a den kaienɛ suun. A tɔɛ ni ma Chisɔsi.
42001032	Ɛ ma‑a wan mɔ chenama a, a sin, an mbe a chee‑a wan, an dɔ, Yataa Wa 'a Denɛ. Mansa Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan mansa a, yɔ a bemba n ta bemba Defidi ni buɛ min dɔ.
42001033	A sin, ɛ ma‑a wan mansa a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ko a kuɔ fɔ ko a, danka ee ma‑a a 'a mansaya ma.”
42001034	Mbɛ Mɛi ɔ, “Chɛɛ n ma kai ko ɔ sɔn kɛn bɛ, n mbe bu chɛ ya‑a ka ma gbɛ?”
42001035	Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “Yataa Nyina an mbe ma‑a i fɛ, mbɛ Yataa Wa 'a gbasaya, a‑a a ma, i‑a bu ya. Chɛ an fɛ mu, e denɛ min suun‑da, ɛ ma‑a tenchen Yataa 'a wai an na. A sin, an mbe a chee‑a wan, an dɔ, Yataa 'a denɛ.
42001036	I yii na chii wɛ i suun ma nyɔɛ Disabɛti ma. Mɔɛ n na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ gbanda musu mu a a, a ee denɛ suun‑da to kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛɛ a 'a chenan musuya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a bu ma ɛ ka gbɛ kau wɔdɔ an ko a.
42001037	Ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, Yataa ee che min ma‑a.”
42001038	Mbɛ Mɛi ɔ, “N mbe nɛ. N mu Mansa Yataa 'a yɔnɛ an na. Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ni ma n na, yɔ i‑a a fɔ ka buɛ min dɔ.” Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a to, mbɛ a ta‑a.
42001039	Tima kundu ɛnden gbakɔ, Mɛi‑a a ma bɛn fan, mbɛ a ta‑a dɔndɔ gbe duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min sɔen ni kɔnkɔ kɔnkɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
42001040	A don‑da wan Sakaaya 'a chenɛ a, mbɛ a‑a Disabɛti kɔndɔn.
42001041	Mɛi‑a Disabɛti kɔndɔn kɛn dechee, mbɛ denɛ min ni Disabɛti bu ɔ, a‑a a ma ma‑a wan gbasaya a. Mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a Disabɛti fɛ gban,
42001042	mbɛ a koɔ‑a a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a ɔ, “I duaen mu kaka, a ben nn fan musu n gbɛɛ ma, a sin, dua ɛ ma‑a wan den chɛ ma, e na tena min suun‑da.
42001043	N mbe ee che dan‑da a a, mbɛ n 'na mansa de ɛ na wan n kɔndɔn‑da.
42001044	A mu min na, n‑na i 'a kɔndɔn chɛ kuiɛ a min kɛn dechee, denɛ min mbe n bu ɔ, a‑a a ma ma‑a wan buɔdia a.
42001045	Mansa Yataa‑a i dua, a mu min na, i dan‑da a a, mbɛ ɛ chɛ ma‑a wan i ye, yɔ a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ a ma koe a i ye.”
42001046	Mbɛ Mɛi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N‑na Mansa Yataa tando n faa gbɛɛ a.
42001047	N bu ɔ di Yataa ko a. An mu n baun mɔɛ a.
42001048	Koe min na mu, a‑a a yii na chii n na, a 'a yɔnɛ min dɔ ma koo. A yen ko gbɛ, a ka sanche ma aan kuɔ fɔ ko a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ mbe n chee‑a wan, an dɔ, musu duaenɛ.
42001049	Koe min na mu, gbasaya gbɛɛ ɛ Yataa min boo ɔ, a basan‑da n ma a sɛmbɛnden na. A sin a kan nyɔ ee nɔ.
42001050	A 'a chinchimaya, ɛ ma‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, kuɔ fɔ ko a, mɔɛ miin chianden mu a ma.
42001051	Yataa‑a a ɔ yian, mbɛ a gbasayaen mu kaka. A‑a a ma wan dɔ koa tɔɛ n ben‑da bui‑a.
42001052	A‑a mansa chenama n bɔ an 'na mansaya n dɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ miin dɔ nii ma koo, a‑a an na sɛ.
42001053	A‑a kɔnkɔ tɔɛ n bu fa gban, chɛɛ a‑a nyan tɔɛ n na yɛ an boo a senɛ a.
42001054	A‑a mmɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n deman fan, a kɔɔ mɔɛ nu. A ma nyina ni, chinchin koe a an ma,
42001055	yɔ a na‑a mmɔ bemba n too ɔ dia buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ a ee nyina‑a Ebeami ma, a basan a cheeya n na, kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
42001056	Mɛi ni wan Disabɛti 'a sondaya a kau sawa ko a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa a.
42001057	Tima che‑a wan gbɛ Disabɛti suun koe a, mbɛ a‑a a suun den kaienɛ a.
42001058	A tanda ɔ si nyɔɛ nu, a basan a 'a mɔɛ n na, an‑na a a min Mansa Yataa chinchin‑da buɛ min dɔ a ma, mbɛ an gbɛɛ bu ɔ dia‑a a ko a.
42001059	Tee wɔnfean bɔɛ ma, den chɛ suundenɛ gbakɔ, an na kan‑da Sakaaya waa a. An na‑a, an ni bɛn den chɛ a kamincha tena ɔ. An toen ni an ni a fa tɔɛ Sakaaya an si a kun ma.
42001060	Chɛɛ a de‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan, a ɔ, “A an. A tɔ ni ma Chɔn.”
42001061	Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ wan a ye, an dɔ, “Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee wo sima n dɔ min tɔ mu ka.”
42001062	Mbɛ an‑na a siman denɛ fa tena an boo a, ni a 'a denɛ tɔɛ ɛ ma‑a ka ma.
42001063	Mbɛ Sakaaya‑a an dɔ tisa fenɛ ko a, ɛ fenɛ nyɛn min ma, mbɛ a‑a a nyɛn, a ɔ, “A tɔɛ an nɛ Chɔn.” An gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan.
42001064	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a bɔ‑a a 'a mumuncha chɛ ɔ, a bun‑da koɔ‑a, ɛ ta‑a Yataa tando‑a.
42001065	An tanda ɔ si nyɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, chiandia‑a an bia wan kaka. Koe chɛ fasan‑da wan an kɔnkɔ kɔnkɔ tanda chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
42001066	Mɔ ɔ mɔ miin‑na koe chɛ a min, a ma‑a wan an ma yiinachii a, mbɛ denɛ an nɛ, min 'na manɛ koo. Koe min na mu, a ɔ yenden fan ni gbɛ an boo ɔ, mbɛ Mansa Yataa ɛ wan den chɛ fɛ.
42001067	Mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a wan Chɔn fa Sakaaya fɛ gban, mbɛ a‑a a kuu sɔ Yataa 'a sakana bai n dɔ yian‑da,
42001068	a ɔ, “Mmɔ Mansa Yataa tando, mmɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na Yataa a. A na‑a basan koe a mmɔ ma, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ kun ka.
42001069	Gbasaya tɔ wa, Yataa‑a a a na, mmɔ baun koe a. Mɔɛ chɛ kaen mu, a 'a yɔnɛ Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ,
42001070	yɔ Yataa‑a a ma suun buɛ min dɔ, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a a gbonka.
42001071	An mɔɛ chɛ ɛ mmɔ bɔ‑a wan mmɔ chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ, a basan mmɔ ko don ma nyɔɛ n na.
42001072	Yataa‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a ni chinchin mmɔ ma, yɔ a na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ mmɔ bemba n ye. A sin ma nyina ni dɔbɛn chɛ ma, a‑a min chɛ an na.
42001073	A 'a kai chɛ, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba Ebeami tena,
42001074	mbɛ ɛ mmɔ bɔ‑a wan mmɔ chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n boo ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ma, mmɔ ni wai chɛ a ko a faachima ɔ.
42001075	Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan to, mmɔ ni mmɔ wandi gbɛɛ be a ma, mbɛ mmɔ tan‑da a tena mmɔ fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
42001076	“N 'na den, i sin, an mbe i chee‑a wan Yataa Wa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a. I wan mbe a ma‑a mɔɛ n ni an ma bɛn chɛndɛ chɛ, Mansa Yataa na tima ya ɔ,
42001077	I wan mbe a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, an mbe koe min ma, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ, mbɛ an‑na bauncha ma sɔn.
42001078	Chinchincha Yataa mu mmɔ 'a Yataa a. Ɛ mɔɛ a na‑a wan mmɔ baun koe a, yɔ ɛ tee kaienɛ a na buɛ min dɔ, manɛ be koe a mmɔ ma.
42001079	Mɔɛ miin mbe saya pimbi pimbi ɔ, ɛ an bɔ‑a wan a ɔ. Ɛ manɛ be‑a wan an ma, a ta faachima fɔɛ ɔ.”
42001080	Sakaaya 'a bai chɛ gbakɔ, an‑na den chɛ bɔ wan a ɔ gbɛ gbɛ, aan a koa‑a. Mbɛ Yataa wakoe a dia‑a a ye a ɔ benden ba a. A ni fuinɛ ma wan aan tima chɛ a, a bɔ‑a tima min na Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tena fanka ɔ.
42002001	A tima chɛ a, Domi kun ti wa ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Ɔkɔsɔsi. An ni mansa a Domi chɛnyɛ wa kun ma. A na‑a sawa a ben fan, mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ mbe a 'a gbasaya kɔɔ, an ni an tɔɛ n be an dan koe a.
42002002	Tima saa saa an nii nɛ mɔɛ n dan koe a, a sin Kuiniyɔsi an ni kɔfana a Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
42002003	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ta‑a wan a bemba n ta bemba n suun duu ɔ, a tɔɛ be koe a.
42002004	Kamin chɛ min tɔ ni Chosɛfi, a na‑a bɔ Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ wan. Chɛɛ a ni si ɔ Nasaɛti duu ɔ wan, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a wɛɛ sɛ‑a wan Bɛtɛɛn duu ɔ, Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a mu min na, Mansa Defidi suun‑da nɔ wan.
42002005	An fea na‑a ta wan Mɛi a, tooɔdia chɛen ni min ma koe a a 'a musu a, an dan koe a. A bu ma ni.
42002006	An to‑a Bɛtɛɛn fan, mbɛ Mɛi bu ɔ tɛ‑a.
42002007	Mbɛ a‑a a saa denɛ suun, den kainɛ. A‑a koa n mɔndɔ mɔndɔ a, mbɛ a‑a a sa fenɛ ɔ, an ni daun fenɛ be min dɔ sɔ fenɛ n ma. Chɛ ma‑a koe min na, sa tena kan kɔ kan nii nɔ sonda yia chenɛ a.
42002008	A su chɛ ɔ, sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan nɔ, an chɛnyɛ chɛ kaka dɔndɔ ma, an mbe an 'na sa n kun ma fɛn‑da, sa wɛɛ n dɔ.
42002009	Mbɛ Mansa Yataa 'a maeka bɔ‑a an ya a. A sin, manɛ‑a an na bɛn fan, Mansa Yataa 'a manɛ. Mbɛ an chian‑da kaka.
42002010	Chɛɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “Wo ma chian. N yen ko na‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ a wo ko a, min mbe na‑a buɔdia wa a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tena.
42002011	Den toa suun‑da Mansa Defidi 'a duu ɔ bi tee chɛ a. An den toa chɛ, an mbe wo baun‑da. An mu kunka mansa a, tea Mansa.
42002012	Wo e a ɔ sɔn‑da chɛ an ma. Ni wo ta‑a, wo e den toa tan‑da wan sa ɔ, koa mɔndɔ mɔndɔenɛ ɛ a a, ɛ sa ɔ fenɛ ɔ, an mbe daun fenɛ be min dɔ sɔ fenɛ n ma.”
42002013	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, maeka fanka fanka n bɔ‑a an ya a, a ka banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ an sɔ‑a maeka saa chɛ baima, an mbe ta‑a tando be‑a Yataa ma, an dɔ,
42002014	“Tando ni be Yataa ma, min mbe banda bu ɔ pɔɔ, a sin, faachima ni ma mɔ gbu n ma dunya ɔ, Yataa ɛ ko chɛndɛ ma‑a miin na.”
42002015	Mbɛ maeka chɛ n yɛ‑a banda bu ɔ. Chɛ gbakɔ, sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Mmɔ ta taiya a pan Bɛtɛɛn duu chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni koe chɛ ɔ yen, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka‑a min dɔ yian ka mmɔ a.”
42002016	An‑na a a gbandia, mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na an ya a kan. Mbɛ an‑na Mɛi yen, an fea den toa chɛ a, a basan Chosɛfi a. Den toa chɛ ni sa ɔ fen chɛ ɔ wan, an ni daun fenɛ be min dɔ sɔ fenɛ n ma.
42002017	An‑na den toa chɛ yen kɛn, an si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a nɔ, maeka chɛ na‑a koe min fɔ an ye a si den chɛ ma.
42002018	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, an‑na bai min nyɔn sima a min, sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n da a.
42002019	Chɛɛ Mɛi‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ sa wan a yii ma, ɛ ta‑a a tɛnsɛ‑a a yiima ɔ tima ɔ tima.
42002020	Mbɛ sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a. An mbe kɛn yɛ‑a, an bun‑da Yataa tando‑a, an mbe ta‑a si sa‑a a tena. An bu ɔ ni di wan koe chɛ n ko a, an‑na miin na min, a basan chɛ a, an‑na min dɔ yen. A gbɛɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye.
42002021	A suun tee wɔnfean bɔɛ ma, an‑na a a kamincha wan, mbɛ an‑na a tɔɛ wɛɛ si, an dɔ, Chisɔsi. Maeka chɛ na‑a tɔɛ chɛ an yian a ko a, pɛn a de ni a bu ya.
42002022	Tima na‑a che wan gbɛ Mɛi ma koe a sɛdɛ Yataa tena, Yataa 'a kata ɔ, yɔ Mansa Yataa 'a sawa, a‑a min be Mosisi ma, a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, musu suundenɛ gbakɔ. Chɛ an‑na a ma, Chosɛfi sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an fea Mɛi a. An ta‑a Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an ni an 'na yasi fenɛ be Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n ma Yataa a, a ni a bɔ Yataa tena Mɛi ko a. Ni yasi chɛ ma ma ni bugbɔ fea a, ɛ ma wan kangbo den fea a, yɔ sawa chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. An nii ma Chisɔsi to ni gbaa, koe min na mu, an ni a konan fan Mansa Yataa ma. An na‑a chɛ ma, a mu min na, Mansa Yataa 'a sawa ɔ, “Ni musu 'a denɛ saa bɛn‑da den kaienɛ ma, ɛ a be wan Mansa Yataa ma.”
42002025	A tima chɛ a, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, min tɔ ni Simiyɔn. Kamin chɛ tanden fan ni Yataa tena. A yɛ to, a Yataa koen ni kaka. A ni gbɛ tima an ma kɔn tena, tima min na, Yataa ɛ di ka‑a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ya a. Yataa Nyina ni wan a fɛ.
42002026	Yataa Nyina chɛ sin na‑a a yiima dia wan, mbɛ a ee fa‑a, ni a ma kunka mansa yen ni, Mansa Yataa ɛ min sɔ‑a.
42002027	Tee min ma an ni na Chisɔsi a Yataa 'a kata ɔ, Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a a ma wan Simiyɔn ta‑a nɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi woo mɔɛ nu, a ma koe a, yɔ Yataa 'a sawa‑a min fɔ, an don‑da a a Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ.
42002028	Simiyɔn‑na den toa chɛ ya wan, a‑a a sa a nɔnkɔnɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, a ɔ,
42002029	“Fa, i 'a yɔnɛ mu n na, n mbe ee ka gbɛ fa‑a faachima ɔ, koe min na mu, i ma i da a kuiɛ yɔn ni n tena.
42002030	N‑na i 'a mɔɛ yen gbɛ pɛnɛnɛ, min na‑a bauncha a.
42002031	Dunya gbɛɛ sin mbe a yen‑da wan.
42002032	Manɛ mu a a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tena, miin ma i sɔn tee, an ni i sɔn. Ɛ a ma‑a wan, basɔmaya wa ni ma i 'a mɔɛ n ma, nn fan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu.”
42002033	Den chɛ woo mɔɛ nu, an da a fa‑a wan bai chɛ n na, Simiyɔn‑na miin fɔ, a si an 'na den chɛ ma.
42002034	Mbɛ Simiyɔn‑na an dua, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ den chɛ de Mɛi ye, a ɔ, “Denɛ chɛ i boo ɔ, ɛ a ma‑a wan mmɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, Yataa ni mmɔ sɛsɛ kondon, mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a mmɔ sɛsɛ a sɛ. An mbe a ma‑a, mmɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ni tea a min. Chɛɛ mmɔ sɛsɛ ɛ ban‑da wan a ɔ.
42002035	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔ sɛsɛ n faa n dɔ koe n dɔ ni sɔn. I sin, Mɛi, ɛ ma‑a wan i ma faayɔn ba dɛgbɛ a, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a tima min na.”
42002036	A tima chɛ a, bɔɔɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, min ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a. A tɔ ni Ana, kai Fanuɛɛ 'a denɛ. Kai Fanuɛɛ chɛ na‑a bɔ Asaa 'a dambi ɔ wan. Bɔɔɛ Ana ni kai chia a san wɔnfea gbe, mbɛ a chɛɛ fa‑a, a chɛɛ min na‑a koa chii a a. A chenanchaen ba ni gbɛ.
42002037	A to‑a fuinyaya chɛ an dɔ gbɛ, aan a sanɛ che‑a san bi sɛi kun ma naaninɛ ɔ. A nii bɔ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Su ɔ ni tee a, ɛ Yataa fai wan nɔ, ɛ samunɛ chɛ, a basan sun bia a.
42002038	A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, a wɛɛ‑a Chisɔsi n tan fan, an bɛ a woo n na. Mbɛ a bun‑da Yataa wai bɔ‑a. A‑a bai sa wan, a si den chɛ ma, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tena, mɔɛ miin ni Chuusaɛn kun ka koe ma kɔn tena.
42002039	Chosɛfi n fea Mɛi a, an ban‑da manda chɛ n gbɛɛ a tachɛ‑a, yɔ Mansa Yataa 'a sawa‑a min fɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a an baa a, Nasaɛti duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
42002040	Den chɛ koa‑a wan, mbɛ a ɔ gbɛa‑a. A yiima tɛen ni kaka, a sin Yataa 'a dua ni wan a fɛ.
42002041	San kɔ san na, Chisɔsi woo mɔɛ n ni ta wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ bɛn ba chɛ ko a, min ni Chu n 'na kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ a.
42002042	Chisɔsi ni kɛn san tan kun ma fea, an bɛ sɛ‑a wan bɛn chɛ ɔ, yɔ a woo mɔɛ n ni a ma buɛ min dɔ tee.
42002043	Bɛn chɛ ka‑a kɛn a a, an‑na chia bia wan yɛ koe a an baa a. Chɛɛ yatina, Chisɔsi to‑a wan gbaa Chuusaɛn. A woo mɔɛ n nii ma chɛ ɔ sɔn.
42002044	A ni an yii ma, mbɛ ɛ fanka fanka chɛ ɔ, miin ni ka yɛ tena an baa nu. An‑na tachɛ chɛ tee dɔndɔ, mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ an ya a kan‑da a a, an baa mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, a basan an dia nyɔɛ n na.
42002045	Chɛɛ an ma a yen ni kɛn, an yɛ‑a to Chuusaɛn, an ya a kan‑da a a.
42002046	Tee sawan bɔɛ ma, an‑na a yen fan Yataa 'a kata ɔ. An bɛ an ni si ɔ, Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, a too ma sɔenɛ an ma, ɛ ta‑a an dɔ tisa‑a.
42002047	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni nɔ, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan yiimatɛ a, min ni a 'a tisa yɛman buɛ ɔ.
42002048	A de n fea a fa a, an‑na a yen kɛn, an tɛnɛ‑a wan a a. Mbɛ a de ɔ, “N 'na den, fen mu i‑a nn tɔɔya ka? Nn mbe faagbaa wa an dɔ i ko a, nn‑na nn ya a kan fan i a, kan kɔ kan ka gbɛ, nn fea i fa a.”
42002049	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fen ko a mu, wo ni n yan tena? Wo ni kun fan, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n mbe ma‑a wan nɛ Fa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Wo nii n yan.”
42002050	Chɛɛ a woo mɔɛ n nii ma a da a bai chɛ ɔ gbɛ ni, a‑a min fɔ ka an ye.
42002051	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi yii‑a wan Nasaɛti duu ɔ, an bɛ an na, a sin‑na kooya be wan an ma. A de‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ sa wan a yii ma, ɛ an tɛnsɛ a yiima ɔ.
42002052	Chisɔsi koa‑a, mbɛ a 'a yiimatɛ da a koa‑a. Mɔɛ n toen fan ni a a, a sin Yataa wɛɛ toen ni ka wan to a a.
42003001	Chɛ ɔ mɛen gbakɔ, Sakaaya 'a denɛ Chɔn ni gbɛ fuinɛ ma wan, mbɛ Yataa koɔ‑a a tena. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a tima min na, Tibɛyɔsi ni a sanɛ tan kun ma duun bɔɛ an dɔ, Domi kun ti wa ya a. Pɔnchɔsi Padeti an ni kɔfana a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Kadidi chɛnyɛ sin dɔ kun ti tɔ ni Ɛdɔdi. A kɔɔ Fiipi wɛɛ ni kun ti an na Ituyia chɛnyɛ kun ma, a basan Takonitisi a. Abidini chɛnyɛ kun ti ni Disanyasi an na. Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa nu Yataa tena, an ni Anasi n fea n na Kayafasi a.
42003003	Yataa koɔ‑a kɛn Chɔn tena, a ta‑a wan tanda n dɔ, Chɔdan yii a sanɛ gbɛɛ. Ɛ ta‑a Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, a ɔ, mɔɛ n ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama a. A ɔ, mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a ɔ, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama ɔ.
42003004	Chɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a a nyɛn suun buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ yen ko gbonka chɛ‑a fuinɛ ma, a ɔ, mɔɛ n ni tan Yataa tena. A ɔ, an ni an fandi n dɔ bɛn Mansa Yataa ya ɔ, yɔ an mbe chia ɔ bɛn buɛ min dɔ, an 'na mansa n ya ɔ. A ɔ, an mbe a tan fan, mbɛ an‑na kaina ɔ yiienɛ n gbɛɛ a fa fa. A ɔ, mbɛ an‑na kɔnkɔ kɔnkɔɛ n te, mbɛ an yɛ‑a an‑na kaina gbukusa gbukusaenɛ n gbɛɛ a kan kan, a ɔ bɛn koe a.
42003006	A ɔ, a sin, a tima chɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ yen‑da wan, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ n baun buɛ min dɔ.”
42003007	Chɔn ni kɛn Chɔdan yii da a, mɔ fanka fanka ni na wan a tena, yii chɛ koe a an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Mbɛ a ni a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Wo yauaen ba chɛ nu, yɔ ka. Wo ee che wo nun‑da Yataa 'a mɔnɛ ma, min mbe wo ko a.
42003008	Wo chɛ chɛ wai n ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ wo‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na. Wo ma bun kafai be‑a a fɔ koe a, mbɛ Ebeami cheeya mu wo a. A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ɛ kun fan a ni sen chɛ n ya, a ni Ebeami cheeya n nyan an dɔ.
42003009	Ni kɔnɛ ma gbɔ chɛndɛ be ni, mɔɛ ɛ a tɛ wan a suu ma, mbɛ a‑a a minda. Wo gbɛɛ wo maen fan mu yɔ kɔnɛ nu. Yataa 'a yende a saen fan mu wo dɔ n tɛ koe a wo suu ma, wo wɛn mbe ee ko chɛndɛ ma‑a.”
42003010	Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Nn mbe ma ka ma gbɛ?”
42003011	Mbɛ Chɔn dɔ an ma, “Doma fea ɛ mɔɛ min boo ɔ, a ni dɔndɔ be a bɔɛ ma, a ee min boo ɔ. Mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ daun fenɛ koo min boo ɔ, a ni a du an fea a bɔɛ a.”
42003012	Pawa bia mɔɛ dɔ n bɛɛ na‑a wan Chɔn tena, yii chɛ koe a an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Ticha, nn mbe ma ka ma?”
42003013	A ɔ, “Wo ma pawa bia mɔɛ n boo ɔ, sawa ma min fɔ ni.”
42003014	Soya dɔ n bɛɛ na‑a wan, an dɔ, “Nn bɛɛ sin? Nn mbe ma ka ma?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo ma kɔpɔɛ bia mɔ ɔ mɔ boo ɔ gbasaya a. A yɛ to, wo ma fania fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma. Wo faa ni chima wo 'a pawa a.”
42003015	A tima chɛ a, Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ya mɛen fan ni gbɛ an kun ka mansa ya ɔ, min na koe ni a ɔ. An bun‑da an yii na chii‑a Chɔn na, an dɔ, kɔkɔɛ kunka mansa chɛ gbu an nɛ.
42003016	Mbɛ Chɔn‑na a fɔ an gbɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “N fan, n mbe yii an chɛ wo kunɛ ɔ, chɛɛ mɔ dɔndɔ ɛ na tena n gbaa, a benden mu n ma kaka. N gbu sin mbe ee che a 'a kɔɔwa yuu wɛɛ fuin koe a. A tana, ɛ Yataa Nyina a na‑a wan ma koe a wo fɛ, wo wɛn mbe wo kan kɔ sɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n na. Chɛɛ wo wɛn mbe ee wo kan kɔ sɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n na, ɛ wo a ta‑a wan ta ɔ.
42003017	Ɛ mɔ gbu gbɛɛ gbɛmbo‑a wan. Ɛ mɔ gbu chɛndɛ n bɔ‑a wan a yama n ya a, yɔ sɛnɛ sa mɔɛ ɛ fenɛ ɔ fɛ buɛ min dɔ, a pofe bɔ koe a a chɛndɛ ya a. Ɛ a pofe a dɛ‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a chɛndɛ si tena ɔ bɛn. Ɛ mɔ yama n tɔɔya‑a wan kuɔ fɔ ta ɔ, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ a fonɛ minda buɛ min dɔ ta a.”
42003018	Chɔn‑na mɔɛ chɛ n kan fan chia sɛsɛ a, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, a basan an boo si koe a a kɔɔ.
42003019	Chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ, Chɔn‑na tea fɔ wan Mansa Ɛdɔdi ye. A ɔ, a ma tea ko ma ni, a kɔɔ kaima 'a musu Ɛdɔdiyasi bɔ koe a a boo ɔ, a ni a ma a 'a musu a. Mansa chɛ 'a ko yama ma gba dɔ mende nu, a‑a an bɛɛ fɔ wan a ye.
42003020	A ka Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a ko yama maenɛ saa chɛ n ma, a‑a a ma wan to, an‑na Chɔn bia, mbɛ an‑na a sa pimbi chenɛ a.
42003021	Chɔn ni tima min na yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a‑a a chɛ wan Chisɔsi wɛɛ kunɛ ɔ. Chisɔsi bun‑da samunɛ chɛ‑a, mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, banda da a ka‑a.
42003022	Mbɛ Yataa Nyina yii‑a, bugbɔya ɔ, mbɛ a si‑a a kun ma. Mbɛ kuiɛ ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ mu i a, i ko a di n ye kaka. N faa chimaen mu i ko a chɛndɛ chɛ.”
42003023	Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ tima min na a 'a wai chɛ‑a, a sanɛ ni wan san bi sawa nyɔn sima. A fa tɔ ni Chosɛfi, yɔ a ni buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ n yii ma. Chosɛfi fa tɔ ni Edi,
42003024	Edi fa tɔ ni Matati, Matati fa tɔ ni Difai, Difai fa tɔ ni Mɛki, Mɛki fa tɔ ni Chanai, Chanai fa tɔ ni Chosɛfi,
42003025	Chosɛfi fa tɔ ni Matatiyasi, Matatiyasi fa tɔ ni Emɔsi, Emɔsi fa tɔ ni Naun, Naun fa tɔ ni Ɛsi, Ɛsi fa tɔ ni Nakai,
42003026	Nakai fa tɔ ni Maati, Maati fa tɔ ni Matatiyasi, Matatiyasi fa tɔ ni Sɛmɛyin, Sɛmɛyin fa tɔ ni Chosɛki, Chosɛki fa tɔ ni Choda,
42003027	Choda fa tɔ ni Chowanan, Chowanan fa tɔ ni Desa, Desa fa tɔ ni Sɔɔbabɛɛ, Sɔɔbabɛɛ fa tɔ ni Sadatiyɛ, Sadatiyɛ fa tɔ ni Neyi,
42003028	Neyi fa tɔ ni Mɛki, Mɛki fa tɔ ni Adi, Adi fa tɔ ni Kosan, Kosan fa tɔ ni Ɛmadan, Ɛmadan fa tɔ ni Ea,
42003029	Ea fa tɔ ni Chɔsowa, Chɔsowa fa tɔ ni Ɛdiyɛsa, Ɛdiyɛsa fa tɔ ni Choyin, Choyin fa tɔ ni Matati, Matati fa tɔ ni Difai,
42003030	Difai fa tɔ ni Simiyɔn, Simiyɔn fa tɔ ni Chuda, Chuda fa tɔ ni Chosɛfi, Chosɛfi fa tɔ ni Chonan, Chonan fa tɔ ni Ɛdiakin,
42003031	Ɛdiakin fa tɔ ni Mɛdɛya, Mɛdɛya fa tɔ ni Mɛna, Mɛna fa tɔ ni Matata, Matata fa tɔ ni Natan, Natan fa tɔ ni Defidi,
42003032	Defidi fa tɔ ni Chɛsi, Chɛsi fa tɔ ni Wobɛdi, Wobɛdi fa tɔ ni Bowasi, Bowasi fa tɔ ni Samon, Samon fa to ni Naason,
42003033	Naason fa tɔ ni Aminadabi, Aminadabi fa tɔ ni Amin, Amin fa tɔ ni Ani, Ani fa tɔ ni Ɛson, Ɛson fa tɔ ni Pɛɛsi, Pɛɛsi fa tɔ ni Chuda,
42003034	Chuda fa tɔ ni Chekɔpi, Chekɔpi fa tɔ ni Aisaki, Aisaki fa tɔ ni Ebeami, Ebeami fa tɔ ni Tɛya, Tɛya fa tɔ ni Nawo,
42003035	Nawo fa tɔ ni Sɛyuku, Sɛyuku fa tɔ ni Du, Du fa tɔ ni Pɛdɛki, Pɛdɛki fa tɔ ni Ɛba, Ɛba fa tɔ ni Sɛda,
42003036	Sɛda fa tɔ ni Kainan, Kainan fa tɔ ni Afasadi, Afasadi fa tɔ ni Sɛn, Sɛn fa tɔ ni Nowa, Nowa fa tɔ ni Damɛki,
42003037	Damɛki fa tɔ ni Mɛtusɛda, Mɛtusɛda fa tɔ ni Ɛnoku, Ɛnoku fa tɔ ni Chayɛdi, Chayɛdi fa tɔ ni Maadadɛɛ, Maadadɛɛ fa tɔ ni Kainan,
42003038	Kainan fa tɔ ni Ɛnosi, Ɛnosi fa tɔ ni Sɛti, Sɛti fa tɔ ni Adami, min ni Yataa 'a denɛ a.
42004001	Chisɔsi ɛ gbɛ ka‑a Chɔdan yii da a, Yataa Nyina ni wan a fɛ gban. A sin, Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a a a ya wan, mbɛ a ben ben‑da a a fuinɛ ɔ,
42004002	tee bi naanin ni pimbi bi naanin ko a. A tima chɛ kɔɔ, Sitana ni wan sɔ ɔ a yiima yan‑da, ni ɛ ko yama ma‑a wan. Chisɔsi sin nii ma fen kɔ fen daun ni. Tee bi naanin ni pimbi bi naanin chɛ ban‑da kɛn, kɔnkɔɛ‑a a bia wan.
42004003	Mbɛ Sitana ɔ, “Ni Yataa 'a denɛ gbu mu i a, a ma wɛ senɛ chɛ ni mun biidi a.”
42004004	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, ‘Daun fenɛ dechee ma fenɛ a, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni ma fɔɛ ɔ.’ ”
42004005	Mbɛ Sitana sɛ‑a a a kɔnkɔ wa kun tɛ, mbɛ a‑a chɛnyɛ n gbɛɛ yian a a dunya chɛ ɔ, bui chɛ bui chɛ wandi a.
42004006	Mbɛ Sitana ɔ, “N mbe gbasaya be‑a wan i ma chɛnyɛ chɛ gbɛɛ kun ma, a sin, nyan chɛ gbɛɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, ɛ ma‑a i ta an na. N fan ta mu gbɛ an gbɛɛ a, n sin mbe kun fan, n ni a be mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, n toen mu mɔɛ min na.
42004007	Ni i‑a n fai dechee, chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a i ta an na.”
42004008	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, ‘Mɔ ɛ i 'a mansa Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an fai dechee, mbɛ i yɛ‑a, i‑a a ma wai chɛ.’ ”
42004009	Mbɛ Sitana‑a a ya to, mbɛ a ta‑a gbɛ a a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Mbɛ a sɛ‑a a a Yataa 'a kata kun tɛ, kaina a yansama wa. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Ni Yataa 'a denɛ gbu mu i a, tin bɛ duu ma a ka nɛ.
42004010	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɛ a fɔ‑a wan a 'a maeka n ye, an ni i kun ma fɛn chɛndɛ chɛ.
42004011	A ɔ, an mbe an boo si‑a wan i kɔɔ, min mbe a ma‑a, i chenɛ wɛɛ ee tu‑a senɛ a.’ ”
42004012	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘I ma i 'a mansa Yataa ɔ siman.’ ”
42004013	Sitana‑a a chɛ kɛn chia ɔ chia a, Chisɔsi yiima yan‑da, chɛɛ a ma kun ni, a‑a a to wan nɔ, aan tima dɔ gbɛɛ ko a.
42004014	Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ a fɛ, gbasaya be koe a a ma. Mɔɛ n‑na a ma tɔɛ a min fan Kadidi tanda gbɛɛ ɔ.
42004015	A ni ben fan kan chɛ‑a Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na, a sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni a tando wan.
42004016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, a bɔ‑a a ɔ kaina. Chu n 'na suin tee ma, a ta‑a wan an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a, yɔ a ni a ma tee buɛ min dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a sɔ‑a Yataa 'a gboo kan koe a mɔɛ chɛ n tena.
42004017	Mbɛ an‑na gboo be a ma a kan koe a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a min nyɛn. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a gboo chɛ da a ka a kaka dɔndɔ tena. Mbɛ a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a‑a a kan, a ɔ,
42004018	“Mansa Yataa Nyina ɛ n fɛ, koe min na mu, Mansa Yataa‑a a boo sɔ n ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian koe a yɔn tɔɛ n na. A‑a n sɔ a fɔ koe a mɔɛ n ye, miin mbe bia ɔ, mbɛ an mbe bɔ‑a wan a ɔ, mbɛ ya te tɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe kaina yen‑da wan to. A‑a n na na, chɛ n bɔ koe a mɔɛ chɛ n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ, miin mbe an yɔn bia chɛ tena.
42004019	A ɔ, mbɛ n ni a fɔ mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ye, mbɛ tima che‑a, tima min na mu, Mansa Yataa ɛ a 'a koadia ɔ yian‑da a 'a mɔɛ n na.”
42004020	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a gboo chɛ da a tɔn, mbɛ a‑a a a yɛ chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ ma. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a si‑a an kan koe a. Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni ka samun chɛ chen chɛ a, an‑na an ya bɛn a ma.
42004021	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo‑a min na min ka, n‑na a kan wo tena Yataa 'a gboo chɛ ɔ, wo e ka an dɔ yen‑da gbɛ bi chɛndɛ chɛ.”
42004022	An gbɛɛ bun‑da bai ma kawaenɛ n fɔ‑a, a si Chisɔsi ma. A sin, an tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, a koɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛɛ an yɛ‑a wan, an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ te, “N bɔ, ka wɛ, Chosɛfi 'a denɛ an nɛ.”
42004023	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N danden fan mu a a, mbɛ wo e tai chɛ tɛ‑a wan a si n ma, min‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Danda chɛ mɔɛ, i wandi baun.’ Wo e a fɔ‑a wan to n ye, wo ɔ, wo‑a a a min fan, n‑na min ma Kapanaun duu ɔ, wo ɔ, n ni a nyɔn sima ma wɛ nɛ wɛɛ, n ta suun duu gbu ɔ.
42004024	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ an mbe ee dan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ kan kɔ kan na, a wandi gbu ta suun duu ɔ.
42004025	“Wo wo too ma sɔ n ma. Tima na‑a che wan mmɔ 'a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Idaicha 'a tima a, sona nii ma na ni san sawa, ni kau wɔdɔ ko a. Kɔnkɔ wa na‑a wan a tima chɛ a chɛnyɛ chɛ gbu gbɛɛ ɔ. A sin to, fuinya musu n kɔ ni koo nɔ.
42004026	Chɛɛ Yataa nii ma Idaicha a ta ni fuinya musu chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ tena basan koe a an ma. A na‑a a a ta dechee fuinya musu dɔndɔ an tena, min nii ma Isɔɛɛ mɔ a. An fuinya musu chɛ ni duu min dɔ, a tɔ ni Sayɛfati, min ni Sidon tanda ɔ.
42004027	A yɛ to, tima min na to, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Ɛdisa ta tima wɛɛ a to mmɔ 'a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, gbandi yama yama ni wan mɔ sɛsɛ gboo ma nɛ. Chɛɛ a nii ma an dɔndɔ wɛɛ a baun ni, mɔɔ dechee Naaman min na‑a ka Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a‑a an baun.”
42004028	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ samun chɛ chen chɛ a, an‑na Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ n na min kɛn, an gbɛɛ faa bɔ‑a wan.
42004029	Mbɛ an‑na an kɔɔ sɔ wan a tima chɛ a, mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi konkon a bɔ an duu chɛ gbu ɔ. Mbɛ an ta‑a a a kɔnkɔ a yansama kun tɛ, an 'na duu chɛ gbu sɔen ni min ma. An toen ni, an ni a a nyɔndɔn, a bɔ kɔnkɔɛ chɛ gbu chechee tena.
42004030	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan an tɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a a ta chia a.
42004031	Mbɛ Chisɔsi yii‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a‑a mɔɛ n kan kaina Chu n 'na suin tee ma.
42004032	An gbɛɛ da a fa‑a wan, a na‑a Yataa bai sa buɛ min dɔ an tena. Koe min na mu, a da a kuiɛ ni gbasa.
42004033	Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ samun chɛ chen chɛ a, nyina yama ni min fɛ. Mbɛ a‑a yee tɛ gbankon, a ɔ,
42004034	“Ee, Chisɔsi, Nasaɛti mɔɛ, a nyin i ni nn to nɔ, yɔ i‑a nn yen buɛ min dɔ. I na‑a nn fa koe an na? N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan mɔɛ min nyɔn sima mu i a. Mɔɛ mu i a, min ka‑a Yataa tena, a 'a wai tenchenɛ chɛ koe a.”
42004035	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, a ni a da a tɔn, mbɛ a sin ni ka kamin chɛ fɛ. Nyina yama chɛ‑a kamin chɛ a bea duu ma an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, mbɛ a ka‑a a fɛ, a sin nii ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni a a.
