42004036	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ da a fa‑a wan a a, mbɛ an dɔ, “Kan chɛ buɛ nyɔn sima minan mbe nɛ? Ɛ gbasaya din fan nyina yama n bɛɛ ma, an ni ka mɔɛ fɛ. An sin mbe a da a kuiɛ a min fan, mbɛ an ka‑a an fɛ.”
42004037	Mbɛ mɔɛ n‑na a ma tɔɛ a min fan an tanda chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
42004038	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a samun chɛ chen chɛ a, a ta‑a Saimɔn 'na chenɛ a. A‑a a tan fan, chima yama bɔndenɛ ɛ Saimɔn 'na musu de ma. Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi ɔ tisa a danda koe a.
42004039	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a, a sɔ‑a a 'a sofa kaa a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, chima gbu ni bɔ musu gbu ɔ, mbɛ chima chɛ bɔ‑a a ɔ. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, musu chɛ‑a a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a‑a daun fenɛ be an ma a daun koe a.
42004040	Tee bea‑a kɛn, mɔɛ n na‑a wan mɔ sɛsɛ a Chisɔsi tena, gbandi yama sɛsɛ ni miin ma. Mbɛ a‑a a boo bun buɛ min dɔ an gbɛɛ ma dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an baun‑da ka wan ta‑a gbɛɛ.
42004041	A na‑a nyina yama n bɛɛ gbain fan to mɔ sɛsɛ fɛ. An sin ni kɛn ka tena mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ, an ni wan yee tɛ‑a, an dɔ, “Yataa 'a denɛ mu i a.” Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, an ni an da a tɔn. A sin nii ma dɔn ni an ni koɔ to, a mu min na, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ kunka mansa mu an na.
42004042	Banda ɔ ka da ma, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan duu ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a kaina dɔndɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kaina. Mbɛ mɔɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ a yan‑da. An‑na a yen kɛn, an nii ma to ni to, a ni bɔ an 'na duu ɔ.
42004043	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa‑a n na na, min mbe a ma, n ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian duu dɔ mende n bɛɛ ɔ, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a dinden fan mu n ma, n ni an wai chɛ chɛ.”
42004044	Chɛ ko a, a na‑a a a tun fan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yianɛ a, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ n gbɛɛ a, Chu chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
42005001	Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni wan sɔ ɔ yii wa dɔndɔ tindi ma, min tɔ ni Kɛnesayɛti. Mɔɛ n ni wan an nyɔn na nyɔndɔn‑da, min mbe a ma, an ni na, an ni an too ma sɔ Yataa 'a bai ma.
42005002	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen fan, mɔɛ n‑na dɛndɛ fea chii tindi ma. Chɛɛ nyɛ gbain mɔɛ chɛ n nii an dɔ, an ni an 'na yaa n na ko tena wan tindi ma.
42005003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɛ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ dɔndɔ ɔ, min ni Saimɔn 'na dɛndɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, a ni dɛndɛ gbu tundun yii ɔ ɛnden na. Chisɔsi si‑a dɛndɛ gbu ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da mɔɛ n kan‑da.
42005004	A ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a, a‑a a fɔ wan Saimɔn ye, a ɔ, “Dɛndɛ chɛ wii a ta yii chɛ ɔ yii tena, mbɛ wo‑a wo 'a yaa n na dɛ a ɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni nyɛ n bia.”
42005005	Chɛɛ Saimɔn dɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn chia nn ya a pii, nyɛ gbain chɛ an na, chɛɛ nn ma‑a nyɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ bia ni. Chɛɛ ni i‑a a fɔ, i ɔ, nn ni nn 'na yaa n na dɛ to yii ɔ, nn mbe a ma‑a wan.”
42005006	Mbɛ an‑na yaa chɛ n na dɛ yii ɔ, an‑na nyɛ n bia aan, ɛnden fan na‑a to yaa n gbu n na ni panda panda.
42005007	Mbɛ an‑na an boo kai an bɔɛ n ma dɛndɛ dɔndɔ ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni na, an ni basan an ma. Mbɛ an na‑a, an gbɛɛ‑a nyɛ n bɔ yaa chɛ n na aan, an‑na dɛndɛ fea n na fa‑a gban. Ɛnden fan na‑a to dɛndɛ n gbu ni tunɛ yii ɔ.
42005008	Saimɔn Pita‑a chɛ an dɔ yen, mbɛ a bea‑a Chisɔsi chen na, a ɔ, “Fa, n to, i ni ta. Ko yama ma mɔɛ mu n na.”
42005009	A‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na, an gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, a si nyɛ koaen bonda chɛ nyɔn sima ma, an‑na miin bia ka.
42005010	Chimisi wɛɛ tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, an fea Chɔn na, kai Sɛbɛdi 'a denɛ nu. An bɛ gbɛɛ ni an bɛ Saimɔn na wai chɛ a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ Saimɔn ye, a ɔ, “I ma chian, a mu min na, a ka gbɛ bi ma, aan a ta a nyɔn na, e ma‑a na‑a mɔɛ n fan na n tena, yɔ e nyɛ n bia buɛ min dɔ tee.”
42005011	Chɛ fɔenɛ gbakɔ Saimɔn ye, an‑na an 'na dɛndɛ n chii wan tindi ma, mbɛ an‑na fen kɔ fen to, mbɛ an bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ.
42005012	Tima dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni kɛn duu dɔndɔ ɔ, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, gbandi yama bɔen ni min gboo gbɛɛ ma. A‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn, a bea‑a wan a chen na, mbɛ a‑a a disa, a ɔ, “Fa, ni a a di i ye, e kun fan i ni n baun.”
42005013	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a boo a ta, mbɛ a tu‑a kamin chɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, “I baun koe a di n ye. Baun gbɛ sanche.” Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, gbandi chɛ baun‑da kamin chɛ ma.
42005014	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a dasi gbau gbau be a ma, a ɔ, “I ma koe chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a, chɛɛ ta dɔndɔ gbe mɔɛ chɛ tena, min mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a, a ni i ma fɛn. Mbɛ i‑a yasi chɛ bɔ nɔ Yataa tena, yɔ sawa, Yataa‑a min be Mosisi ma, a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian‑da mɔ ɔ mɔ a, mbɛ i baun‑da.”
42005015	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ ta‑a wan a tima gbu a kan kɔ kan. A sin, mɔ fanka fanka ni na wan Chisɔsi kuiɛ a min koe a, a basan an baun koe a an 'na gbandi n dɔ.
42005016	Chɛɛ a ni an to wan tima dɔ n na, mbɛ a ta‑a kaina nu, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii kaina miin, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ.
42005017	Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni kɛn kan chɛ tena, mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan nɔ si ɔ, miin ni Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, a basan Chu mɔɛ n na, miin ni Fayisii n na. An ka‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a basan Chudia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ a. An ka‑a wan duu kan kɔ kan dɔ Kadidi chɛnyɛ wɛɛ ɔ. A tee chɛ a, Chisɔsi ni wan mɔɛ n baun‑da an 'na gbandi n dɔ, Mansa Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ.
42005018	Yatina a tima chɛ a, kaminɛ n na‑a wan namaa tɔ dɔndɔ a, ɛ sa ɔ yaa ɔ. An toen ni an ni don kamin chɛ a chen chɛ a, Chisɔsi ni ka kaina, a sa koe a a chen kɔɔ.
42005019	Chɛɛ an ma an don chia sɔn ni, a mu min na, fanka da a ni koo kaka. Chɛ ko a, an‑na kaminɛ gbu ya wan, mbɛ an sɛ‑a a a chenɛ gbu kan ma. An‑na kaina ɛnden ma ka wan chen chɛ kun tɛ, mbɛ an‑na gbandi mɔɛ gbu a yii yaa ɔ chen chɛ tɛtɛ ma, Chisɔsi chen kɔɔɛ wandi gbu.
42005020	Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen kɛn danaya min nyɔn sima ni mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, a‑a a fɔ wan gbandi mɔɛ chɛ ye, a ɔ, “N bɔ, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye, mbɛ n‑na n boo bɔ i 'a ko yama ɔ.”
42005021	Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an bɛ Fayisii n na, an bun‑da a fɔ‑a an yiima ɔ, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ e na ma nyɔn na koɔ koe a ka buɛ chɛ ɔ. Ɛ ka Yataa an main‑da. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee nɔ min mbe kun, a ni a boo bɔ mɔ gbu 'a ko yama ɔ, mɔɔ Yataa dɔndɔ gbe.”
42005022	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a an yii ma koe n dɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Yiinachii chɛ ma ma wo ɔ, mbɛ n‑na bai min fɔ ka, a ma nyin a fɔ koe a.
42005023	A ɔ ma gbɛ a fɔ koe a namaa chɛ ye, mbɛ n‑na n boo bɔ a 'a ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ a ɔ gbɛ wan a ma koe a, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ, a ni tachɛ chɛ.
42005024	N mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan gbɛ wo a, mbɛ gbasaya ɛ wan n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ boo ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, n boo bɔ koe a ko yama ɔ.” Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ namaa chɛ ma, a ɔ, “N mbe a fɔ tena gbɛ i ye, mbɛ i ni i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni i 'a yaa ya, i ni ta i waa a.”
42005025	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a sɔ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a 'a yaa ya, a ni ka sa ɔ min dɔ, an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a a waa a, ɛ ta‑a Yataa tando‑a.
42005026	An gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan a ɔ benden ba a. Chiandia don‑da wan an gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bun‑da Yataa tando‑a, an dɔ, “Nn‑na kamaya koe n dɔ yen bi.”
42005027	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan baa ma. Mbɛ a‑a kamin dɔndɔ yen, min ni pawa kain mɔɛ a, a tɔ ni Difai. A ni si ɔ a 'a pawa kain chenɛ a wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Bea n fɛ.”
42005028	Mbɛ Difai‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a‑a a boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ to, mbɛ a bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ.
42005029	Mbɛ Difai‑a daun chɛ bɛn ba ɔ bɛn fan a 'a chenɛ a, Chisɔsi ko a. Pawa kain mɔ sɛsɛ ni wan nɔ, ni mɔ dɔ mende nu, an bɛn chɛ ɔ, an gbɛɛ mbe si ɔ daun chɛ a, an bɛ Chisɔsi n na.
42005030	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu miin ni Fayisii n na, an bɛ an 'na mɔɛ n na, miin ni Chu n 'na sawa kan, an bu ɔ nii ma dia ni. An gbonyɛ‑a wan Chisɔsi a, a fɛ denɛ n tena, an dɔ, “Wo kan mɔ ee ka ko chɛndɛ a. A ma nyin wo ni daunɛ chɛ kaina dɔndɔɛ, wo bɛ pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ n na, a basan mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n bɛɛ a, miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma.”
42005031	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Danda chɛ mɔ ma gbɔsɔ ee gboo ɔ bɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ dechee chɛ nu, miin gbandien mu.
42005032	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ miin mu mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa tena, n ma na ni an fan ko a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, n na‑a an fan ko a, min mbe a ma, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na.”
42005033	Mbɛ an dɔ Chisɔsi ma, “Chɔn fɛ denɛ n mbe sunɛ bia wan tima ɔ tima, mbɛ an‑na samunɛ chɛ. Nn fan Fayisii n bɛɛ, nn fɛ denɛ n bɛɛ mbe a ma ka wan. Chɛɛ i ta fɛ denɛ n mbe daunɛ an chɛ tun, an mbe ee sun bia. Fen ko a mu, an mbe chɛ ma tena?”
42005034	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔɛ‑a musu si bɛnɛ chee, mbɛ a bɔɛ n na kan‑da, daun chɛ koe a mu. An mbe ee to nɔ a chen kɔɔ an ni kɔnkɔɛ a dɛ an fandi ma.
42005035	Chɛɛ tima min na mɔɛ n mbe musu si kai chɛ ya‑a an tɛ, a tima a mu, an mbe sunɛ bia‑a.”
42005036	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai tɛ wan an tena, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che i ni doma nama tɛ a a, doma kɔma dombo koe a. Ni mɔɛ‑a chɛ ma, a gba ma ee nyan‑da. Koe min na mu, woe an mbe to‑a doma nama chɛ ɔ. A sin, doma nama pisi chɛ ee na‑a bɛn‑da doma kɔma chɛ ya a.
42005037	A yɛ to, ni mɔ ma‑a gbɛ chɛ‑a gbɛ chɛ soe gboo ɔ, e a chɛ tena soe gboo nama an dɔ, ɛ to kaina aan a a ni kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔ ee gbɛ nama chɛ gbɛ chɛ soe gboo kɔma ɔ, a a kɔɔ koe a, ɛ a te wan, mbɛ i fo‑a gbɛ a, a basan soe gboo a.
42005038	Mɔ ɛ min ma, e gbɛ nama chɛ soe gboo nama an dɔ.”
42005039	A ɔ te to, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee ka gbɛ kɔma min tena, mbɛ a bun‑da di chɛ‑a gbɛ nama wakoe a. Koe min na mu, ɛ a fɔ‑a wan, a ɔ, gbɛ kɔma nyin a ni ben gbɛ nama ma.”
42006001	Chu mɔɛ n 'na suin tee dɔndɔ ma, Chisɔsi ni ben tena wan chia a sɛnɛ dɔndɔ tɛtɛ ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n bun‑da sɛnɛ chɛ ɔ chin fenɛ tɛ‑a an boo a, an mbe a yoyɛ‑a, an mbe ta‑a a daun‑da.
42006002	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu nɔ, miin ni Fayisii n na, an dɔ, “Wo e ka ko bonda min ma tena suin tee ma, a ma nyin ɛnden bɛɛ a. Mmɔ 'a sawa ma dɔn ni, mɔ ni wai chɛ suin tee ma.”
42006003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mansa Defidi na‑a koe ma wan tima dɔndɔ a. Chɛɛ n ma dan ni a a, mbɛ wo‑a a kan fan bɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. Mbɛ kɔnkɔɛ na‑a a bia tima min na, an bɛ a fɛ mɔɛ n na,
42006004	a don‑da wan Yataa 'a chenɛ a, mbɛ biidi chɛ min been ni Yataa ma, a‑a a ya, mbɛ a‑a a daun. A yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a a tɔɛ be a fɛ mɔɛ n ma. A na‑a mmɔ 'a sawa an yɔn ka, a mu min na, mmɔ 'a sawa na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee an biidi chɛ daun, mɔɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a.”
42006005	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n fan mu mansa a suin tee ko a.”
42006006	Suin tee dɔ mende ma, Chisɔsi don‑da wan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen dɔndɔ a, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n kan nɔ. Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min boo nyima faen ni a ma.
42006007	Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ nu, a basan Chu mɔɛ dɔ n na, miin ni Fayisii n na, an toen ni an ni chia an yan koɛ be koe a Chisɔsi ma. An‑na a a tɛ wan chɛndɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, an ni a ɔ yen, ni ɛ mɔɛ chɛ baun‑da wan suin tee ma.
42006008	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a an yii ma koe sɔn fan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ kamin chɛ ye, min boo chɛ faen ni ka a ma, a ɔ, “I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni na nɛ ya ɔ.” Kamin chɛ na‑a wan, mbɛ a sɔ‑a an ya kɔɔ.
42006009	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A nyin fan, mmɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden mu fen ma suin tee ma. Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu mɔ ni mɔɛ baun, a ben a fa koe ma. Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu to mɔ ni ko chɛndɛ ma, a ben ko yama ma koe ma.”
42006010	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔɛ ma fɛn dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a a 'a tindanɛ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ kamin chɛ ye, a ɔ, “I boo ɔ sawan.” Mbɛ a‑a a boo ɔ sawan, mbɛ a boo baun‑da, yɔ a dɔndɔɛ ni buɛ min dɔ.
42006011	Mbɛ sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n faa tɛ‑a a ɔ benden ba a, an bɛ Fayisii chɛ n na. Mbɛ an bun‑da a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, ni an mbe fen ma Chisɔsi a.
42006012	Tima dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a wan kɔnkɔ dɔndɔ kun tɛ samun chɛ koe a. A chi‑a nɔ wan kudu ɛ samun chɛ‑a Yataa tena.
42006013	Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, a‑a a fɛ denɛ n gbɛɛ chee wan, mbɛ a‑a a boo sɔ mɔ tan kun ma fea n ma an tɛ. Mbɛ a‑a an ma a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na.
42006014	A na‑a a boo sɔ chɛ n fan ma: Saimɔn, ni a dɔɛ Anduu, Chimisi ni Chɔn, Fiipi, Batɔɔmiu, Matiu, Tɔmɔsi, Chimisi dɔndɔɛ, Saimɔn, Chudasi ni Chudasi Isikayɔti. Saimɔn saa saa, a‑a min ya, a‑a tɔ dɔ gbɛɛ be wan a ma a ɔ Pita. Chimisi fean bɔɛ fa tɔ ni Afiɔsi. Saimɔn dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ ni mɔɛ an na, min ni a 'a chɛnyɛ ma chɛɛ chɛ tena. Chudasi saa fa tɔ ni Chimisi. Chudasi Isikayɔti ni mɔɛ an na min danka‑a Chisɔsi ma tachɛ‑a.
42006017	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ yii, an bɛ a 'a sɔ mɔɛ tan kun ma fea chɛ n na. Mbɛ a sɔ‑a nɛngbunɛ ɔ. A fɛ denɛ sɛsɛ dɔ mende n ni wan nɔ, a basan mɔ fanka fanka a. Mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, dɔ n ka‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ ni Chudia chɛnyɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, dɔ n ka‑a wan Taya ni Sidon duu ɔ, miin ni kɔ yii a sanɛ.
42006018	An na‑a na, min mbe a ma, an ni Chisɔsi da a kuiɛ a min. An toen ni to, a ni an baun an 'na gbandi n dɔ. Nyina yama ni miin fɛ, an bɛɛ na‑a na wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an baun.
42006019	Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a butuin chɛ wan, min mbe a ma, an ni tu Chisɔsi a, koe min na mu, bauncha gbasaya ni wan ka tena a tena, ɛ ta‑a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ baun‑da.
42006020	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a mun a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo duaen mu, wo wɛn yɔnden mu. A mu min na, Yataa ma‑a wo 'a mansa a.
42006021	Wo duaen mu, kɔnkɔɛ ɛ wo wɛn na sanche. Yataa ɛ wo bu fa‑a wan. Wo duaen mu, wo wɛn mbe di chɛ‑a sanche. Wo e yɛn‑da wan.
42006022	“Ni mɔ gbu n too‑a wo a a si n ma, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, dua mu a a wo ma. Ni an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ wo a, mbɛ an‑na wo main, mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na bai yama sa wo ma.
42006023	Ni koe chɛ n si‑a wo a, wo bu ɔ ni dia. Wo buɔdia tɔmbɔɛ don, koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ chenama sa tena ɔ bɛn‑da wan wo ko a banda bu ɔ. Wo bu ɔ ni dia, a mu min na, an‑na ko ma gbaaen dɔndɔ gbe chɛ nyɔn sima sa wo ma, yɔ an bemba n ta bemba n‑na min sa suun Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n ma.
42006024	“Chɛɛ koe chɛ n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe wo tan‑da, wo wɛn nyanden mu sanche. A mu min na, wo ban‑da wo ta buɔdia bɔ‑a dunya chɛ ɔ.
42006025	Koe chɛ n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe wo tan‑da, wo wɛn bu faen mu gban sanche. Kɔnkɔɛ ɛ wo bia‑a wan. Koe chɛ n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe wo tan‑da, wo wɛn mbe yɛn tena sanche. Wo e chinchin di chɛ‑a wan.
42006026	“Ni mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a wo tɔ a diama fɔ, koe miin mbe wo tan‑da, ɛ yaua‑a gba. Koe min na mu, an bemba n ta bemba n‑na tɔ a dia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an chɛ suun chɛ n na, miin ni fania fɔ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu an na.”
42006027	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ n ni a fɔ wo ye, wo wɛn mbe n kuiɛ a min tena sanche. Wo ko don ma nyɔɛ mu miin na, wo to an na. Mɔɛ miin tooen mu wo a, wo ko chɛndɛ ma an na.
42006028	Mɔɛ miin mbe wo danka tena, wo an dua. Miin mbe ko yama ma tena wo a, mbɛ wo‑a samunɛ chɛ an ko a.
42006029	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo gban fɛ dɔndɔɛ gbasi, wo dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a mun, a ni a wɛɛ gbasi. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo 'a doma kun ma doma ya, wo a kɔɔ nɛnɛ wɛɛ be a ma.
42006030	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo ɔ tisa a deman koe a, wo a deman. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo boo fenɛ ya, wo ma a ɔ tisa to a a yɛ koe a wo ma.
42006031	Wo toen mu mɔɛ n ni koe min nyɔn sima a tachɛ wo tena, min na di wo ye, wo a nyɔn sima an na tachɛ an bɛɛ tena.
42006032	“Mɔɛ miin toen mu wo a, ni wo to‑a nɔ, wo ni to dechee an fan na, Yataa ee wo dua‑a. A mu min na, ko yama ma mɔɛ n bɛɛ toen fan mu mɔɛ n na, miin toen mu an na.
42006033	Mɔɛ miin mbe ko chɛndɛ ma wo a, ni wo e ko chɛndɛ ma dechee an fan na, Yataa ee wo dua‑a. Ko yama ma mɔɛ n bɛɛ mbe chɛ an ma.
42006034	Mɔɛ miin mbe che wo 'a kuiɛ n bɔ‑a, ni wo e kuiɛ be dechee an fan ma, Yataa ee wo dua‑a. Ko yama ma mɔɛ n bɛɛ mbe kuiɛ be wan an bɔɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ n ma, koe min na mu, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an mbe a ma sɔn‑da wan.
42006035	Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo to wo ko don ma nyɔɛ n na, mbɛ wo‑a ko chɛndɛ ma an na. Kuiɛ a dɛ, a sin wo ma wo yii na chii a a yɛ koe a wo ma. Ni wo‑a koe chɛ n ma, Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ chenama be‑a wan wo ma, mbɛ wo sɔnɛ bɔ‑a Yataa Wa sɔnɛ a. A mu min na, ɛ ko chɛndɛ ma wan wai nyima sɔn bai n na, a basan chɛ n na, miin yau kaka.
42006036	Chinchimaya ni ma wo ɔ, yɔ Fa Yataa wɛɛ chinchimayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.”
42006037	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma wo bɔɛ n ma bɔ. Ni wo ma chɛ ma ni, Yataa wɛɛ ee kaa a tɛ‑a wo wakoe ma. Wo ma kaa yama a tɛ. Ni wo ma chɛ ma ni, Yataa wɛɛ ee wo yɛi‑a. Wo wo boo bɔ wo bɔɛ n 'na ko yama maenɛ n dɔ wo a. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, Yataa wɛɛ‑a a boo bɔ‑a wan wo ta ko yama maenɛ n dɔ.
42006038	Wo wai nyima chɛ wo bɔɛ n na. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, Yataa wɛɛ ɛ wai nyima chɛ‑a wan wo a. Ɛ fenɛ miin be‑a wo ma, ɛ kɔkoa‑a wan aan, a sin mbe ma‑a wan, yɔ ni an‑na pani a fa gban, mbɛ an‑na a ma din, mbɛ an‑na a a fa to, ɛ bɔn fan a ma. Wo‑a a be‑a buɛ min dɔ wo bɔɛ n ma, Yataa wɛɛ‑a a be‑a ka wan wo wɛɛ ma.”
42006039	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ an tena, a ɔ, “Ya te tɔɛ ee che chia yian‑da a bɔɛ ya te tɔɛ a. Ni a‑a chɛ ma, an fea gbɛɛ ɛ bea‑a wan sonɛ ɔ.
42006040	A yɛ to, kan den kan kɔ kan ma ben ni a kan mɔɛ ma. Chɛɛ kan den kan kɔ kan, ni a‑a kanɛ a ban, ɛ ma wan yɔ a kan mɔɛ.
42006041	“Ni kɔn gbondo ma‑a wo ta ya a, wo ma wo faa gbaa bubuu ko a wo bɔ n ya a.
42006042	Wo ee kun wo ni a fɔ wo bɔɛ ye, wo ɔ, a ni ka wɛ, wo ni bubuu ɛnden chɛ bɔ a ya a, min mu ka, kɔn gbondo chɛ ɛ sa ɔ wo ta ya a. Wo wan nɛnɛn fea ti chɛ nu, wo kɔn gbondo chɛ bɔ pɛn wo ta ya a, mbɛ wo kun‑da gbɛ kaina yen koe a gbadan, a bubuu chɛ bɔ koe a wo bɔɛ ya a.”
42006043	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Kɔn chɛndɛ ee gbɔ yama be, n mbe ee baa kɔn yama ni gbɔ chɛndɛ be.
42006044	Kɔn kan kɔ kan mbe sɔn a gbɔɛ an ma, ɛ min be. Mɔ ee che kɔn gbɔ chɛndɛ kai‑a kɔn yama ɔ.
42006045	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔ chɛndɛ ɛ ko chɛndɛ an ma, a mu min na, a faa ɔ gbɛen fan mu. Mbɛ mɔ yama sin mbe ko yama an ma, a mu min na, a faa ɔ finden fan mu. Koe min mbe mɔ gbu faa ɔ, an mbe bɔ a da ɔ.”
42006046	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni wo ee na‑a n da a kuiɛ a min‑da, wo ma n chee, ‘Mansa, Mansa.’
42006047	Mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, min mbe na‑a n tena, a ni a too ma sɔ n 'na bai ma, mbɛ a‑a a ma, yɔ n toen mu buɛ min dɔ a ma koe a. N mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan wo a, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
42006048	Ɛ ka wan yɔ kamin chɛ min ni chen sɔɛ a. A‑a son dɔ yiienɛ sin pɛn, mbɛ a‑a a 'a chenɛ kuu si gban son chɛ ɔ. A ban‑da kɛn an chenɛ sɔ‑a, yii fa‑a wan, mbɛ a sɛ‑a a kuu ma. Chɛɛ a ma che ni a ni a a bɔn, koe min na mu, a sɔen fan ni chɛndɛ chɛ.
42006049	Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe n 'na bai a min‑da, mbɛ a ma a ma ni, yɔ n toen mu buɛ min dɔ a ma koe a, ɛ wan yɔ kaminɛ min‑na chenɛ sɔ, chɛɛ a ma a kuu si ni chɛndɛ. Yii fa chɛ sɛ‑a kɛn chen chɛ kuu ma, a bea‑a wan dɔndɔ gbe. A yɔn‑da wan a yama boo a.”
42007001	Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n tena, mbɛ a ta‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ.
42007002	Soya gbakoo dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min ka‑a Domi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Soya chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ni wan a kɔɔ. Bɔi denɛ ni wan a boo ɔ, min bakoe a ni di a ye gbeden. Bɔi den chɛ gbandi‑a wan, min‑na a ma, ɛnden fan na‑a to a ni fa.
42007003	A‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min kɛn, a‑a Chu gbakoo dɔ n sɔ wan a tena. A toen ni an ni a disa, min mbe a ma, a ni na, a ni a 'a bɔi denɛ baun.
42007004	An ta‑a, mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi tan, an dɔ, “Fa, i dimu, mmɔ ta, i ni kai chɛ 'a bɔi den chɛ baun, a mu min na, mɔ chɛndɛ wa mu a a.
42007005	A yɛ to, a toen mu mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na sai ma. A wandi gbu an‑na nn 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ sɔ nn ye.”
42007006	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a an bɛ an na. An che‑a kɛn chenɛ baima gbɛdɛn, mbɛ soya mɔɛ chɛ‑a a dia nyɔɛ n sɔ Chisɔsi ya ɔ. A ɔ, an ni a fɔ a ye ka, “Fa, i ma i wandi tɔɔya. A mu min na, mɔ a tenden ma n na i don koe a n 'na chenɛ a.
42007007	N ma buɛ chɛ gbu an fɛ ni, n‑na n yii na chii, mbɛ a gbu ma nyin, n fandi n ni ta i tan. Chɛɛ i da a kuiɛ a ben dechee, n 'na bɔi denɛ ɛ baun‑da wan.
42007008	A mu min na, n fandi gbu wɛɛ, n mbe mɔɛ n fan 'na gbasaya kɔɔ. N bɛɛ, soya n mbe wan n kɔɔ. N mbe a fɔ wan dɔndɔ ye, n dɔ, ‘Ta,’ mbɛ a ta‑a. N mbe a fɔ wan dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma, n dɔ ‘Na,’ mbɛ a na‑a. Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ n 'na bɔi denɛ ma, n dɔ, ‘Chɛ ma,’ mbɛ a‑a a ma.”
42007009	Chisɔsi tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, bai chɛ a min koe a. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun fanka wa chɛ ma, min ni a sɔ tena a fɛ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Kɛn gba, n ma mɔ bonda chɛ yen nin bɛ mmɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, min danden mu ka n na.”
42007010	Sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n yɛenɛ a chenɛ a, an‑na a tan gbɛ, bɔi den chɛ baundenɛ ɛ.
42007011	Chɛ gbakɔ, a ɔ ma yansan ni, mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a duu dɔndɔ ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Nain. An bɛ an na‑a ta a fɛ denɛ n na, a basan mɔ fanka dɔ mende n na.
42007012	A yen ko, an che‑a kɛn duu sundu kunɛ a, an‑na mɔ sɛsɛ tan fan, an mbe ta‑a kamin dɔndɔ tɔn‑da. An ni ta tena mɔɛ min tɔn‑da, a de ni fuinya musu an na, a sin a dɔndɔ gbe an ni a de boo ɔ den kaienɛ a. Mɔ sɛsɛ‑a a sɔ wan su chɛ fɛ a ka an duu chɛ ɔ.
42007013	Mansa Chisɔsi‑a sunkun chɛ yen kɛn, a ma chinchinɛ‑a a bia wan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Sɛmbɛ di‑a.”
42007014	Mbɛ a na‑a, a tu‑a su sa kɔn chɛ a, mbɛ miin ni ta tena su chɛ a, an sɔ‑a an gba ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Kamin tɔngbɔɛ, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye, i ni i kɔɔ sɔ.”
42007015	Mbɛ kamin chɛ min faenɛ ni ka, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a si‑a, a bun‑da koɔ‑a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a be a de ma.
42007016	Chiandia‑a an gbɛɛ bia wan, mbɛ an‑na Yataa tando, an dɔ, “Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ wa na‑a mmɔ tɛ ɔ. A sin Yataa na‑a a 'a mɔɛ n baun koe a.”
42007017	Chisɔsi na‑a koe min ma ka, a‑a a ma wan a ma tɔɛ ta‑a Chudia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan chɛnyɛ chɛ n na a a tindanɛ.
42007018	Mbɛ Chɔn fɛ denɛ n ta‑a pimbi chenɛ a, mbɛ an‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ yian a a. Mbɛ a‑a mɔ fea n chee an tɛ ɔ,
42007019	mbɛ a‑a an sɔ Mansa Chisɔsi tena, a ɔ tisa koe a, ni a wan mu mɔɛ chɛ a, a wan Chɔn ni gbonka chɛ tena min na koe a. A ɔ, kɔ an ni chia a fɛn mɔ dɔ mende ya ɔ.
42007020	Mbɛ an na‑a Chisɔsi tena, an dɔ, “Chɔn, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, an‑na nn sɔ i tena. A ɔ, nn ni i ɔ tisa, ni i wan mu mɔɛ chɛ a, a ni gbonka chɛ tena min na koe a. A ɔ, kɔ nn ni chia a fɛn mɔ dɔ mende ya ɔ?”
42007021	A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Chisɔsi ni wan mɔ sɛsɛ baun‑da an 'na gbandi n dɔ. A sin na‑a nyina yama n gbain fan mɔɛ dɔ n fɛ. A yɛ to, a‑a ya te tɔ sɛsɛ ya a ka wan.
42007022	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ Chɔn 'na sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Wo yɛ, wo ta yiima ɔ, wo ni a ɔ yian kai Chɔn na, wo‑a koe miin dɔ yen, ni wo‑a miin na min. Wo a fɔ a ye, wo ta yiima ɔ, mbɛ ya te tɔɛ nu, an‑na kaina ɔ yen, wo ɔ, namaa an sɔ‑a. Wo a fɔ a ye to, wo ta yiima ɔ, wo ɔ, gbandi yama ni miin gboo ma, an baun‑da, wo ɔ, too gbee tɔɛ nu, an‑na koe a min, wo ɔ, miin faen ni, an‑na fɔɛ ma sɔn to, wo ɔ, yɔn tɔɛ n bɛɛ, an‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min.
42007023	Wo a fɔ a ye, wo ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn gboo ɔ ma fa ni dan koe a n na, e dua ma sɔn‑da wan.”
42007024	Chɔn 'na sɔ mɔɛ n yɛ‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ wan bai sa‑a a si Chɔn ma fanka fanka chɛ tena, a ɔ, “Wo ta‑a kɛn Chɔn tena fuinɛ ma, wo yii na chiien ni mɔɛ minan nyɔn sima tan koe a? Wo nii ma ta ni maa yamba ma kaminɛ an yen koe a.
42007025	Wo na‑a ta nyɔn yen koe a? Wo nii ma ta ni mɔɛ an yen koe a, min ma chiien ni koa baa gbandenɛ ɔ. Tea ko a, mɔɛ miin mbe an ma chii ka, a sin, nyan fen kan kɔ kan mbe an boo ɔ, an mbe ma kata n fan dɔ.
42007026	Wo a fɔ wɛ gbu n ye, wo toen ni wo ni nyɔn yen, min ta‑a wo a? Wo toen ni wo ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an yen? Tea tea a, n ni a fɔ wo ye, wo ban‑da Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ yen‑da, min benden mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n ma.
42007027	A mu min na, Chɔn fan mu sɔ mɔɛ chɛ a, Yataa 'a gboo‑a bai sa a si min ma, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɔ te kunka mansa Chasi ma, a ɔ, a yen ko, ɛ a 'a dɛya sɔ tena wan a ya ɔ, min mbe dɔbɛnɛ chɛ‑a a ko a.’
42007028	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee wɛ nɔ dunya ɔ, min benden mu Chɔn ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ den toa wɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a benden mu a wan Chɔn sin ma.”
42007029	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, a basan pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ n na, an‑na a a min, Chisɔsi‑a bai min fɔ. A sin an gbɛɛ dɔn‑da wan a ma, mbɛ Yataa toen mu koe min na, a mu tea koe an na. A mu min na, Chɔn na‑a yii chɛ wan an kunɛ ɔ tee, Yataa chia a.
42007030	Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu miin ni Fayisii n na, an bɛ Chu n n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an ban‑da bɔ koe a chia chɛ a, Yataa toen ni an ni bɔ min na. Koe min na mu, an ban‑da Chɔn ye yii chɛ koe a an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
42007031	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te to, “N mbe mɔɛ chɛ n siman fen ma gbɛ? Mɔɛ minan sima n mbe nɛ?
42007032	An maen fan mu yɔ den mɛsɛ nu tɔmbɔ chɛ baa ma. Chɛ n mbe denka ɔ, chɛ n mbe kandɔɛ. Miin mbe denka ɔ, an‑na yee tɛ wan kandɔ mɔɛ n tena, an dɔ, ‘Mmɔ si a bɔ, mmɔ ni mmɔ don.’ Chɛɛ kandɔ kaka ma dɔn ni. Mbɛ denka ɔ kaka‑a a fɔ to, an dɔ, ‘Mmɔ di chɛ wɛ.’ Chɛɛ an ma dɔn ni chɛ wɛɛ ma.
42007033	Chɛ tɛen mu min ma, Chɔn min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a na‑a wan. A yɛ to, a ni sunɛ bia wan, a sin nii gbɛ min. Wo ɔ te, ɛ dama. Wo ɔ, nyina yama an mbe a fɛ.
42007034	Chɛɛ n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n na‑a, n mbe daunɛ chɛ, a yɛ to, n mbe gbɛ min fan. Wo‑a a fɔ wan to, wo ɔ, nun namaya tɔɛ mu n na, wo ɔ, kɔn gbasi kai mu to n na. Wo ɔ te to, n fan mu pawa kain mɔɛ n dia nyɔɛ a, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ n na, miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma.
42007035	Chɛɛ mɔɛ n mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ Yataa 'a yiimatɛ an mu tea tea yiimatɛ a. An mbe chɛ ɔ yen‑da koe n fan ma, mɔɛ chɛ n mbe miin ma‑a, mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa‑a a 'a yiimatɛ chɛ be miin ma.”
42007036	Mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min ni Fayisii a, a tɔ ni Saimɔn. A na‑a Chisɔsi chee wan, kɔ a ni ta an ni daunɛ chɛ. Chisɔsi dɔn‑da wan, mbɛ a ta‑a Saimɔn 'na chenɛ a. A che‑a kɛn, mbɛ a si‑a daun chɛ tena.
42007037	Yatina, a tima chɛ a, duu dia dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ an duu chɛ ɔ. A na‑a Chisɔsi ma tɔɛ a min fan, mbɛ ɛ daun chɛ‑a Fayisii chɛ 'a chenɛ a. A ta‑a wan tu kunyɛ a diama wa a an chen chɛ a. Tu chɛ ni baa an dɔ min nyanden ni senɛ ɔ. An sen baa chɛ baa ni gbɛ kaka.
42007038	Musu chɛ don‑da kɛn Fayisii chɛ 'a chenɛ a, a‑a a ma bun fan Chisɔsi gbaa chia a, a chenɛ ɔ fuinden ni kaina, mbɛ a bun‑da di chɛ‑a fiko fiko. A ya yii min ni ka bɔ tena, a‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ n ma chima wan. A‑a a kundi an ya, a‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ n ma fian a a. A yɛ‑a wan to, a‑a a da tu Chisɔsi chenɛ n na, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ basɔmaya ɛ wan a boo ɔ Chisɔsi ko a. A‑a tu kunyɛ a diama chɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ ma mun a gbɛɛ a.
42007039	Fayisii chɛ, min‑na Chisɔsi chee ka a 'a chenɛ a daun chɛ koe a, a‑a koe chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, a‑a a fɔ wan a yiima ɔ, a ɔ, “Ni kamin chɛ ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an na tea a, a ni a ɔ sɔn‑da wan musu min nyɔn sima ɛ ka tu tena a a. A ni a ɔ sɔn‑da wan, mbɛ mɔɛ an nɛ, min mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma.”
42007040	Mbɛ Chisɔsi koɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Saimɔn, bai an mbe n da a i ko a.” Mbɛ Saimɔn dɔ, “Ticha, fen bai mu?”
42007041	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min 'na kuiɛ ni kamin fea n ma. Kuiɛ ni wan kaminɛ dɔndɔɛ ma, min taen ni kain gbɛnsɛn chɛmɛ duu a, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ sin kain gbɛnsɛn bi duu.
42007042	An fea dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma kun ni an ni kamin chɛ 'a kuiɛ bɔ, min‑na a ma, a‑a a boo bɔ an fea gbɛɛ 'a kuiɛ chɛ ɔ. Mɔ fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, minan mbe to kuiɛ ti chɛ a, a ni ben a bɔɛ ma?”
42007043	Mbɛ Saimɔn dɔ, “N tana, n 'na yiinachii ɔ, kuiɛ chenama chɛ ni ka min ma.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a tea fɔ.”
42007044	A‑a a tindan musu chɛ tena, mbɛ a ɔ Saimɔn ma, “I‑a a ɔ yen fan, musu chɛ‑a koe min ma n tena, ae? N don‑da kɛn bi i 'a chen chɛ a, i ma yii be ni n ma, n chenɛ wɛɛ ma ko koe a. Chɛɛ musu chɛ to‑a wan di chɛ‑a aan, a ya yii‑a n chenɛ ma chima, a sin‑na a kundi an ya to, a‑a n chenɛ n ma fian a a.
42007045	N don‑da kɛn i 'a chen chɛ a, i ma n kɔndɔn ni koadia ɔ, chɛɛ aan n na‑a bi tima min na, musu chɛ ɛ tun a da tu tu‑a n chenɛ n fan na koadia ɔ.
42007046	I ma n kɔ ni tu ɔ, a sin koe a n kunɛ a, chɛɛ musu chɛ‑a tu kunyɛ a diama sin fan n chenɛ ma.
42007047	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ musu chɛ‑a koadia chenama min dɔ yian ka n na, a‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa‑a a boo bɔ a 'a ko yama chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ‑a mɔɛ min 'na ko yama sima sima ɔ dechee, a mɔɛ chɛ ee koadia chenama ɔ yian.”
42007048	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ musu chɛ ye, a ɔ, “N‑na n boo bɔ i 'a ko yama ɔ.”
42007049	Mbɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni ka si ɔ daun chɛ tena chɛ, an‑na a kuu sɔ a fɔ‑a an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ e na ma nyɔn na, a boo bɔ koe a mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n bɛɛ ɔ?”
42007050	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan musu chɛ ye, a ɔ, “Ta i faa chimaenɛ a don, i 'a danaya‑a i baun.”
42008001	Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, Chisɔsi ben ben‑da wan duu n dɔ, ɛ ta‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma. A fɛ den tan kun ma fea n bɛɛ ni wan a fɛ.
42008002	Musu dɔ n bɛɛ ni wan a fɛ. An ni musu n fan na, Chisɔsi na‑a miin baun an 'na gbandi ɔ. An dɔ n sin, a na‑a nyina yama n fan gbain an fɛ. Musu chɛ n gbu sin tɛ ɔ, musu dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Mɛi, min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ. Chisɔsi na‑a nyina yama wɔnfea gbain an fɛ.
42008003	Chowana wɛɛ ni to an musu chɛ n dɔndɔ an na, min chɛɛ ni wai chɛ tena Mansa Ɛdɔdi ko a. Susana wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, a basan musu sɛsɛ dɔ gbɛɛ n na. Musu chɛ n ni an fandi ta boo fenɛ n be wan Chisɔsi ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, an ta basamaya a.
42008004	Mɔɛ n ni wan tun na‑a Chisɔsi tena, a ka duu sɛsɛ n dɔ, mbɛ fanka wa a kan‑da kɛn, Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ an tɛ an tena.
42008005	A ɔ, “Tee dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ ta‑a wan a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, chin fen fasi tena. Ɛ a fasi chɛ an na, mbɛ dɔ bea‑a chia kuu a. Mbɛ dɔ n bɛɛ bea‑a faa gban duu gboo ma, dɔ n yɛ‑a an bea‑a wai duu gboo ma, mbɛ dɔ n sin bea‑a duu gboo chɛndɛ ma. Chin fen kuu miin bea‑a ka chia kuu a, mɔɛ n tɛn tɛn‑da wan a ɔ, mbɛ konde n bɛɛ‑a an sogban sogban fan. Miin sin bea‑a ka faa gban duu gboo chɛ ma, an fɛn‑da wan, chɛɛ an fa‑a wan. Koe min na mu, yii kan kɔ kan nii an duu gboo chɛ ɔ. Miin sin bea‑a ka wai duu gboo chɛ ma, an bɛɛ fɛn‑da wan, a basan wai chɛ a dɔndɔ a, chɛɛ wai chɛ n koa‑a wan a ben chin fen chɛ n ma. Chɛ‑a chin fen fɛn chɛ n na kɔnya wan, mbɛ an gbaa‑a. Miin bea‑a ka duu gboo chɛndɛ chɛ ma, an fɛn‑da wan, a danka a, an gbɔ‑a wan wɔsɔkɔɔ. An yii‑a wan gbaa chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ko a.” Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.”
42008009	Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa wan, ni a‑a tai min tɛ ka a fasaien mu fen na.
42008010	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mɔɛ gbɛɛ nii ma min dɔ sɔn tee, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, a‑a an dɔ yian wo a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, n mbe koɔ an tena tai an dɔ. Min mbe a ma, an ya a kaenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, an ni kaina fɛn, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ɔ yen‑da. Mbɛ an mbe an too ma sɔ‑a wan, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ‑a.”
42008011	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tai chɛ tɔmɔsi an nɛ. Chin fen kuu chɛ mu Yataa 'a bai an na.
42008012	Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe wan yɔ chia a duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a min ma. Ni an‑na Yataa 'a sakana bai a min, Sitana ɛ na wan a ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ a‑a bai chɛ bɔ an yiima ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ma na dan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, mbɛ an‑na bauncha ma sɔn.
42008013	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan yɔ faa gban duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a min ma. Ni an‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min, an mbe an boo si wan a kɔɔ, buɔdia wandi gbu a. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a bai chɛ ee sa an yiima ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, a ni tima ɔ yansama ya nɔ. An mbe dan dechee a a tima ɛnden fan ko a, chɛɛ ni koe ɔ gbɛa‑a an ma, mbɛ an‑na an boo bɔ a kɔɔ.
42008014	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan nɔ yɔ wai duu gboo chɛ, chin fen kuu chɛ n bea‑a ka min ma. An mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min fan, chɛɛ faagbaa ɛ wan an mɔɛ chɛ n ma, dunya chɛ ɔ nyanɛ ko a, a basan a ɔ buɔdia a. Ni chɛ ma‑a an yii ma, an mbe ee che an gbɔsɔ‑a Yataa 'a wai chɛ koe a.
42008015	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin mbe wan yɔ duu gboo chɛndɛ chɛ, chin fen kuu n bea‑a ka min ma. Ni an‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min, an mbe a sa wan an yii ma chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ an‑na a ma, yɔ sakana bai chɛ‑a min fɔ an ye a ma koe a. A sin to, yakɔɔtawa kan kɔ kan ni an tan bɛɛ, an mbe ee sɛmbɛ dan koe a Yataa a.”
42008016	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a dambo a man, a ee samba bun a kun ma, chɛ ma, a ni a a don sofa kɔɔ. Chɛɛ ni mɔ‑a dambo a man, e a si kaina wan, min mbe a ma, ni mɔɛ n don‑da dechee i 'a chenɛ a, an mbe kun fan an ni kaina ɔ yen gbadan.
42008017	“Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko min dɔ nunden mu, ɛ bɔ‑a wan ya a ma. Koe min bɛɛ ma bunden mu, a wɛɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan ya a ma tee dɔndɔ a.
42008018	“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn wo e wo too ma sɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ. A mu min na, miin mbe an too ma sɔ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa ɛ an 'na yiimatɛ ma munda‑a wan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ee dɔn‑da an too ma sɔ‑a, yiimatɛ ɛnden chɛ wɛɛ min mbe ma‑a an dɔ, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan an ni fo a.”
42008019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi de na‑a a tena, an bɛ a dɔ kaima n na. Chɛɛ an ma kun ni, an ni gbɛn a ma, a mu min na, fanka da a ni koo kaka a 'a tindanɛ.
42008020	Mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “I de yen ko sɔ ɔ baa ma, an bɛ i dɔ kaima n na. An toen mu an ni i yen.”
42008021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an gbɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ miin mbe Yataa 'a bai a min‑da, mbɛ an‑na an boo si a kɔɔ, n de mu an fan na. N dɔ kaima n bɛɛ mu an mɔ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n fan na.”
42008022	Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a dɛndɛ dɔndɔ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ a ɔ, an ni yii wa chɛ tɛ tindi dɔndɔɛ ma. Mbɛ an bun‑da ta‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ.
42008023	An to‑a ta an na yii chɛ a, mbɛ Chisɔsi chinɔ‑a a ye. Mbɛ fia wa‑a a kuu sɔ bɔ‑a, min‑na a ma, yii bun‑da chɛ‑a dɛndɛ gbu ɔ. A na‑a to ɛnden fan na, dɛndɛ gbu ni tunɛ an na yii ɔ.
42008024	Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n bun‑da a a kunɛ‑a. An dɔ, “Kan mɔ, kan mɔ, mmɔ yen ko to‑a yii ɔ.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a‑a yii chɛ, min kɔnkɔɛ ni sɔ ka dengben, a ɔ ɛ gbasi, a fea fia min bɛɛ ni bɔ tena, a‑a an na gban. Mbɛ fia ɔ maun‑da don, mbɛ yii wɛɛ si‑a chidi.
42008025	Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “Fen ko a mu, wo ma dan ni n na?” Chɛɛ an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, a sin, an chian‑da wan, mbɛ an dɔ an nyɔn ma, “Fen kamin nyɔn sima mu chɛ a? Ɛ koe min fɔ fia wɛɛ yɛ, a basan yii a, an mbe ma.”
42008026	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi n‑na a fo wan gbɛ yii wa chɛ tindi ma Kɛyasa chɛnyɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Kɛyasa chɛnyɛ chɛ ni Kadidi chɛnyɛ ya teen ma wan.
42008027	An che‑a kɛn nɔ, Chisɔsi ɛ bɔ‑a dechee dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ a sɛ tindi ma, kamin dɔndɔ min bɔ‑a Kɛyasa duu ɔ, a na‑a wan, a‑a Chisɔsi tan. Kamin chɛ nyina yama n fan ni a fɛ. A na‑a tima ɔ yansama ya wan a ma senɛ ɛ, a sin nii ta chenɛ a. A ni chi fanɛ a wan bɛnkuɛ ɔ.
42008028	Tima sɛsɛ ko a, nyina yama chɛ n ni a ma wan, kamin chɛ ni bui, a ni ta kaina mɔ ɔ mɔ ee kaina min. Mɔɛ n ni a chenɛ ɔ chii wɛɛ yɔɔɛ a, a basan a boo a, a ni yɔɔɛ chɛ ɔ tɛ tɛ wan, mbɛ nyina yama chɛ n‑na a ma, a ben‑da bui‑a. A‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn dechee, a‑a yee tɛ wan gbankon, mbɛ a bea‑a a chen na. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi, Yataa Wa 'a denɛ, i toen mu i ni fen ma n na? I dimu, i ma n mɔnɛ.” A‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan nyina yama chɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ni ka a fɛ.
42008030	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I tɔɛ?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “N tɔ mu Fanka Wa.” A‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, nyina yama sɛsɛ ni wan a fɛ.
42008031	Nyina yama chɛ n yɛ‑a wan, an‑na Chisɔsi disa, min mbe a ma, a ma na an na ta ta ɔ tɔɔya koe a.
42008032	A tima chɛ a, kɔɛnya man sɛsɛ ni wan daun chɛ‑a an baima kɔnkɔɛ kaa fɛ. Nyina yama chɛ n‑na Chisɔsi disa wan, min mbe a ma, a ni dɔn an ye an ni bea kɔɛnya chɛ n fɛ. A dɔn‑da wan an da a kuiɛ ma.
42008033	Nyina yama chɛ n ka‑a wan kamin chɛ fɛ, mbɛ an bea‑a kɔɛnya chɛ n fɛ. Kɔɛnya man chɛ n ben‑da wan bui‑a, a ka kɔnkɔɛ chɛ kaa fɛ. An yii‑a wan an dɛ‑a yii ɔ, mbɛ an to‑a an yii gbu ɔ.
42008034	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni ka kɔɛnya chɛ n kun ma fɛn tena, an‑na a ɔ yen kɛn koe min ma‑a, an ben‑da wan bui chɛ‑a. Mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na duu ɔ, a basan konko mɛsɛ chɛ n dɔ a.
42008035	Mɔ sɛsɛ n na‑a wan, min mbe a ma, an ni a ɔ yen min ma‑a. An che‑a kɛn, nyina yama chɛ n ni ka kaminɛ min fɛ, an‑na a tan fan, ɛ si ɔ Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ. A ma chiienɛ ɛ, a sin a yiima tɛenɛ ɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an gbɛɛ chian‑da.
42008036	Mɔɛ miin ni ka nɔ ko ɔ ko ma‑a, an fan‑na a ɔ yian gbɛ an bɔ n na, Chisɔsi‑a nyina yama chɛ n gbain buɛ min dɔ kamin chɛ fɛ.
42008037	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ miin ka‑a ka Kɛyasa chɛnyɛ ɔ, an‑na Chisɔsi disa, an dɔ, a ni bɔ an 'na tanda ɔ. Koe min na mu, an chian‑da wan kaka. Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ yɛ koe a.
42008038	A tima chɛ a, kamin chɛ, Chisɔsi na‑a nyina yama chɛ n gbain ka min fɛ, a‑a disa chɛ wan, a ɔ, Chisɔsi ni a ma an bɛ ni ta. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ,
42008039	“Ta i 'a mɔɛ n tena. I ni a ɔ yian an na, Yataa‑a koe min chɛ i ye.” Kamin chɛ wɛɛ ta‑a wan, mbɛ a ben ben‑da duu chɛ ɔ gbɛɛ, ɛ a ɔ yian‑da, Chisɔsi‑a koe min chɛ a ye.
42008040	Mbɛ Chisɔsi yɛ‑a yii wa chɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ, a ka‑a kaina, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. An‑na mɔ fanka tan a ma kɔn‑da, a sin mɔɛ chɛ n bu ɔ dia‑a wan an yen koe a.
42008041	Mɔ chenama dɔndɔ Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a, min tɔ ni Chayɔsi, a na‑a wan, mbɛ a bea‑a Chisɔsi chen na. Mbɛ a‑a a disa, a ɔ, an ni ta a 'a chenɛ a.
42008042	Koe min na mu, a 'a den musuen dɔndɔ gbe, min sanɛ ni gbɛ san tan kun ma fea, a ni gbɛ a ni ma tanka an na dechee. Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ kɛn ta‑a dechee, mɔɛ n findi findi‑a wan a ma, a ka kaka kan kɔ kan ma.
42008043	Musu dɔndɔ ni wan fanka chɛ tɛ ɔ, musu n 'na kau ma gbandi ni min ma, san tan kun ma fea ko a. A na‑a a boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ma tachɛ wan buii ti n ma, chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma kun ni, a ni a 'a gbandi chɛ danda a ma.
42008044	A na‑a na wan fanka fanka chɛ ɔ Chisɔsi gbaa chia a, mbɛ a tu‑a Chisɔsi 'a doma kai chɛ da a. Mbɛ a 'a wii chɛ ɔ tɛ‑a a ma a ya kɔɔɛ a.
42008045	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Nyɔn tu‑a n na?” Mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan tu koe a a a. Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Kan mɔ, mɔɛ n mbe i a tindanɛ, an mbe tindi tindi‑a i ma, mbɛ i ni tisa chɛ to mɔɛ tu koe a i a?”
42008046	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan tun, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ an tu‑a n na, a mu min na, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ gbasaya dɔ bɔ‑a n dɔ, danda chɛ koe a.”
42008047	Mbɛ musu chɛ‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a‑a min ma, a bɔ‑a ya a ma. Chɛ ko a, a na‑a wan, a ma samba sambaenɛ ɛ, mbɛ a bea‑a Chisɔsi chen na. A tima a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, a‑a a ɔ yian Chisɔsi a, fen na‑a a ma a tu‑a a a. A sin to, a baun‑da buɛ min dɔ a ya kɔɔɛ a.
42008048	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, ta i faa chimaenɛ a don. I 'a danaya‑a i baun. ”
42008049	Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ tena wan musu chɛ tena, mbɛ sɔ mɔɛ na‑a a ka Chayɔsi 'a chenɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, a 'a den musuenɛ gbu fa‑a, a ma na sɔ to ticha tɔɔya‑a ta koe a nɔ.
42008050	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a bai chɛ a min fan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ Chayɔsi ye, a ɔ, “I ma chian, dan dechee a a, mbɛ ɛ baun‑da wan.”
42008051	A che‑a kɛn Chayɔsi 'a chenɛ a, a nii ma dɔn ni, mɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan ni don a san‑da, mɔɔ dechee Pita, Chɔn, Chimisi, den chɛ fa, a basan den chɛ de a.
42008052	Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni wan yee tɛ‑a, an mbe ta‑a di chɛ‑a den chɛ kun ma. Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo sɛmbɛ di chɛ‑a, den chɛ ma fa ni, ɛ sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ wan dechee.”
42008053	A‑a bai chɛ fɔ kɛn, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a a yɛn fan, a mu min na, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ den chɛ faen fan ni tea tea a.
42008054	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a den chɛ ya wan a boo ma, mbɛ a‑a a chee banda a, a ɔ, “N 'na den, i kɔɔ sɔ.”
42008055	Mbɛ den chɛ ni yɛ‑a a ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ bui a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an sɔ, a ɔ, an ni daun fen den be a ma, a ni a daun.
42008056	A woo mɔɛ n da a fa‑a wan koe chɛ a. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a an na si wan gbau gbau, mbɛ an ma a ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a, min ma‑a ka.
42009001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a 'a sɔ mɔ tan kun ma fea n chee a tena. Mbɛ a‑a gbasaya be an ma nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ, a basan mɔɛ n baun koe a an 'na gbandi n dɔ.
42009002	Mbɛ a‑a an sɔ Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yian koe a kan kɔ kan mɔɛ n na, a basan gbandi mɔɛ n baun koe a.
42009003	A yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo ma‑a ta‑a, wo ma fen kɔ fen bia wo boo ɔ. Wo ma tungbɔɛ ya, wo ma basachi bia wo boo a, wo ma ta daun fenɛ a wo boo ɔ, wo ma ta kɔpɔ a, n mbe ee baa doma fea ya koe a.
42009004	Ni an‑na wo yia chen kan kɔ kan na, wo ma an chen chɛ an na aan, wo ni bɔ an duu chɛ ɔ.
42009005	Ni wo ta‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, min dɔ mɔɛ n ma an too n ma sɔ ni wo ma, wo bɔ nɔ. Ni wo ma‑a bɔ‑a, wo wo chenɛ a gbɔngbɔn fifii chɛ a, min mbe ma‑a dasi a an tena, mbɛ an mbe ka a ma an na, Yataa faa ni tɛ an ma.”
42009006	Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn bai chɛ n fɔ‑a an ye, mbɛ an ta‑a, an ben ben‑da konko n gbɛɛ ɔ. An‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian fan mɔɛ n na, an mbe ta‑a mɔɛ n baun‑da, ni an che‑a kan kɔ kan.
42009007	Mansa Ɛdɔdi, min ni Kadidi chɛnyɛ kun ma, a‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ a min, min ni ma tena gbɛ. A a fii‑a wan, koe min na mu, mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan a fɔ tena, mbɛ Chɔn, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, an yɛ‑a ka to fɔɛ ɔ.
42009008	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin dɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ an nɛ suun, min tɔ ni Idaicha, an bɔ‑a ka to. Mɔɛ dɔ n yɛ‑a, an dɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔ gbɛɛ suun, an yɛ‑a ka to fɔɛ ɔ.
42009009	Mbɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi ɔ, “N na‑a a ma wan, an‑na Chɔn kunɛ tɛ a a. Chɛɛ nyɔn mu to mɔɛ chɛ a, n mbe ka koe chɛ n na min tena, a si min ma?” Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a‑a butuinɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, a ni Chisɔsi wandi gbugbu yen.
42009010	Mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a a tena, an si‑a ko ɔ ko ma, an‑na min ma, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian a a. A‑a an ya wan, an dechee, mbɛ an ta‑a duu dɔndɔ baima, min tɔ ni Besaida.
42009011	Chɛɛ mɔɛ n‑na a ta koe kɔɔ sɔn, mbɛ mɔ fanka‑a a san, mbɛ an‑na an tan. Chisɔsi bu ɔ dia‑a wan an yen koe a. A koɔ‑a wan an tena a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbandien ni an tɛ ɔ, a‑a an baun.
42009012	Tee bea ma, Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n gbɛn‑da wan a ma, an dɔ, “I boo ka gbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, min mbe a ma, an ni ta duu chɛ n dɔ nɛ a tindanɛ, an ni daun fenɛ san, mbɛ an‑na sa tena yan. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ɛ ka nɛ fia tamba ma wan.”
42009013	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, “Wo wandi wo fen den be an ma, an ni a daun.” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Fenɛ min mbe dechee nɛ nn boo ɔ, an mu biidi duu a, ni nyɛ fea. Nn mbe ee che ta‑a, nn ni daun fenɛ san fanka fanka chɛ gbɛɛ ko a.”
42009014	Mɔ kaima miin ni nɔ, an taen fan ni wu duu nyɔn sima a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo a ma mɔɛ chɛ n ni si an kuunɛ ma, bi duu duu ma.”
42009015	Mbɛ an‑na a ma, yɔ a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ si‑a.
42009016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a biidi duu chɛ ya, a basan nyɛ fea chɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a si banda a, mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ daun fen chɛ ko a. Mbɛ a‑a an dɔ kai kai, mbɛ a‑a a be a fɛ denɛ n ma, a du du koe a mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
42009017	An gbɛɛ‑a an bu fa daun fenɛ daun fan. A sin, a fɛ denɛ n‑na an da tɔɛ min na sɔn, a bɛn‑da wan samba fa tan kun ma fea ma.
42009018	Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe ni kɛn samun chɛ‑a, a fɛ denɛ n na‑a wan a tena. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ɛ mɔɛ n yii ma, n mu nyɔn na?”
42009019	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ i mu Chɔn fan na, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Dɔ n sin mbe a fɔ wan, mbɛ i mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ an na suun, min tɔ ni Idaicha. Dɔ n sin bɛɛ ɔ te, mbɛ i mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔ mende an na, min fa‑a suun, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ.”
42009020	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu, wo ta yiima ɔ, n mu nyɔn na?” Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “I mu Chasi an na, nn kun ka mansa, Yataa‑a min sɔ.”
42009021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an na si gbau gbau, a ɔ, an ma chɛ ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
42009022	Chisɔsi yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe tɔɔ‑a wan kaka. Mmɔ 'a chɛnyɛ gbakoo nu, an bɛ mɔɛ miin mbe Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an mbe an kan kɔ sɔ‑a wan n na. Mmɔ 'a sawa kan mɔɛ n bɛɛ‑a toa si wan an kɔɔ. N mbe fa‑a wan mɔ boo ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma.”
42009023	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an gbɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ toen mu a ni bea n fɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni nyina a faa ma koe n ma. Mbɛ a‑a a ma bɛn tee ɔ tee a, mɔnɛ ɔ bia koe a n ko a, a basan fa koe a.
42009024	Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da bea koe a n fɛ, a wandi fɔɛ ma kanda koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe a yii bɔ‑a a fɔɛ ɔ n ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
42009025	Dunya chɛ ma nyanɛ gbɛɛ, min mbe a ma, mɔ ni fo kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a, tɔnɔn ma a a.
42009026	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da n dɔ, a basan n da a kuiɛ a, n bɛɛ, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tima min na mansaya ɔ, n mbe ban‑da wan a ɔ. A tima chɛ a, n mbe ma‑a wan man‑da Fa Yataa 'a manɛ a, nn bɛ maeka n na.
42009027	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu nɛ sɔ ɔ sanche, an mbe ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ aan an ni chɛ ɔ yen. An mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ ni yian.”
42009028	Chisɔsi bandenɛ a bai chɛ n fɔ‑a, tee sɛi gbakɔ, mbɛ a sɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ ɔ samun chɛ koe a. An bɛ an na‑a sɛ Pita a, Chɔn, ni Chimisi.
42009029	A to‑a samun chɛ chɛ an na, mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ kamaya‑a, a yɛ to, a 'a doma kai wɛɛ gbɛ‑a fo fo, a ben fen gbɛ ma, ɛ ta man‑da taun. Chisɔsi ma fan‑da ka wan.
42009030	Mbɛ a yen ko, mɔ fea n bɔ‑a a a. Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a, an bɛ Chisɔsi a. A mɔ fea chɛ n ni Mosisi an na, ni Idaicha.
42009031	An ni man tena Yataa 'a manɛ an na. An sin ni chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ tena, a si Chisɔsi ɛ fa‑a buɛ min dɔ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
42009032	Chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a, Pita ni chinɔɛ ɔ wan, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ an tima chɛ a gbɛ, an kunɛ‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na man ba dɛgbɛ chɛ yen fan Chisɔsi a tindanɛ, a basan mɔ fea chɛ n na, an bɛ ni sɔ ɔ miin na.
42009033	Mosisi an fea Idaicha a, an ni gbɛ Chisɔsi to an na, an mbe ta‑a. Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, a nyan‑da wan mmɔ ɛ nɛ chɛ. Ka nn mbe ku sawa bun. Ku dɔndɔ i ko a, dɔndɔ kai Mosisi ko a, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ ma‑a kai Idaicha ko a.” Chɛɛ Pita gbu nii ma a ɔ sɔn ni, a ni ka fen fɔ tena.
42009034	Pita to‑a chɛ an fɔ‑a, mbɛ dingbii yii‑a, mbɛ a‑a an na tunɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n chian‑da a ɔ benden ba a.
42009035	Mbɛ an‑na Yataa kuiɛ a min dingbii chɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ an nɛ, n‑na n boo sɔ min ma, wo wo too ma sɔ a ma.”
42009036	Yataa koɔen chɛ gbakɔ, an‑na Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe an yen gbɛ sɔ ɔ. A fɛ den chɛ n‑na koe chɛ n gbɛɛ sa wan an yii ma, an‑na miin gbɛɛ ɔ yen. An nii ma fua ni a ɔ yian‑da mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
42009037	A banda ka, Chisɔsi yiienɛ ma, a ka kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ den sawa chɛ n na, mɔ fanka wa‑a a tan fan.
42009038	Mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ yen ko an fanka chɛ ɔ, ɛ yee tɛ‑a, a ɔ, “Ticha, n 'na den kaima an nɛ, n 'na den dɔndɔ gbe. N mbe i disa tena, i ni n deman a a.
42009039	A yen ko, nyina yama an mbe a a bea tima ɔ tima. Ni nyina chɛ‑a a a bea dechee, ɛ a kuu sɔ wan yee tɛ‑a, mbɛ a da yii fɔnfɔnɛ bun‑da bɔ‑a. Ɛ a ma chɛɛ chɛ wan tima ɔ yansama ko a, a ee fua a boo ka‑a a a.
42009040	N‑na i fɛ denɛ n disa wan, an ni nyina yama chɛ gbain a fɛ, chɛɛ an ma kun ni.”
42009041	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo e ka buɛ min dɔ, wo too ɔ gbɛ kaka, a sin wo ee dan ko a. A ɔ yansan gbɛ mmɔ bɛ ɛ mmɔ nyɔn fɛ, fen mu wo ee dan n na? N ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe fen ma to wo ko a.” Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ kaminɛ gbu ye, a ɔ, “Na nɛ i 'a denɛ a.”
42009042	Den chɛ to‑a na an na, mbɛ nyina yama chɛ‑a a a bea duu ma, mbɛ a bun‑da a ma chɛɛ chɛ‑a. Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, a ni ka den chɛ fɛ. Nyina yama chɛ ka‑a wan a fɛ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a a yɛ a fa ma.
42009043	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni ka nɔ, an da a fa‑a wan, a si Yataa 'a gbasaya ko wa chɛ ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n to‑a da ɔ gbaa chɛ an dɔ, a si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, Chisɔsi ni miin ma tena, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ,
42009044	“N mbe na tena bai min fɔ‑a wo ye, n toen mu wo ni wo too ma sɔ a ma chɛndɛ chɛ. N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, an mbe na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a, mɔɛ n ma.”
42009045	Chɛɛ a fɛ den chɛ n nii ma bai chɛ ɔ gbɛ ni, a mu min na, a nunden fan ni an ma, a ɔ gbɛ koe a. An sin chian‑da wan a ɔ tisa koe a, bai chɛ fasai koe a an ye.
42009046	Mbɛ kɔɔsa don‑da Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n tɛ ɔ, a si mɔ chenama wa wakoe ma an tɛ.
42009047	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, an ni fen tɛnsɛ tena an nyɔn tɛ, min‑na a ma, a‑a den mɛsɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ a tɔnfɛ.
42009048	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si den den chɛ nyɔn sima kɔɔ n tɔɛ ɔ, a‑a a boo si ka n fan kɔɔ. A sin, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si n kɔɔ, a‑a a boo si ka Yataa an kɔɔ, min‑na n na na. A mu min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu mɔ dɔma a wo gbɛɛ wo tɛ ɔ, an mu mɔ chenama a.”
42009049	Mbɛ Chɔn dɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn‑na kamin dɔndɔ yen fan, ɛ ben‑da i tɔɛ ɔ, nyina yama n gbain‑da mɔɛ n fɛ. Mbɛ nn‑na a a si, nn dɔ, a ni sɛmbɛ, koe min na mu, mmɔ bɛ ma a a.”
42009050	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, ni a fɛ denɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, a ɔ, “Wo ma a a gban. Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ee i chɛɛ tena, wo fea mu a a.”
42009051	Tima chɛ ma ni kɛn gbɛ dɔɔya tena, Yataa na‑a tima min dɔ bɛn, Chisɔsi ya koe a a sɛ banda bu ɔ, Chisɔsi‑a a yiima ɔ bɛn fan sɛ koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
42009052	A‑a sɔ mɔɛ n na ta wan a ya ɔ. Sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ta‑a wan konko dɔndɔ ɔ Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni ko ɔ ko ɔ bɛn a ya ɔ.
42009053	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu an konko chɛ ɔ, an ma a yia tena be ni, a mu min na, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a ni ta tena Chuusaɛn fan.
42009054	A fɛ denɛ Chimisi n fea Chɔn na, an‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an dɔ, “Fa, i toen fan mu nn ni a ma, ta ni yii a ka banda bu ɔ, a ni mɔɛ chɛ n minda?”
42009055	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a yɛ wan, mbɛ a‑a an na gban, bai bonda chɛ fɔ koe a.
42009056	Mbɛ an ta‑a konko dɔ mende ɔ.
42009057	An mbe tachɛ chia chɛ an ma, mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “N ma bɛndenɛ mu bea koe a i fɛ kan kɔ kan, e ta‑a kaina min.”
42009058	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sonɛ n mbe fia ɔ soe n boo ɔ, a sin konde n bɛɛ nyanɛ n mbe. Chɛɛ kaina kan kɔ kan mbe ee n boo ɔ, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe n gbɛnku kaina, n ni n suin.”
42009059	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ kamin dɔndɔ wɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “Bea n fɛ.” Chɛɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Fa, a ma n ni yɛ pɛn, n ni fa tɔn.”
42009060	Mbɛ Chisɔsi wɛɛ ɔ, “Mɔɛ miin mbe yɔ mɔ faenɛ nu, an to nɔ, an ni an 'na mɔ faenɛ n tɔn. Chɛɛ i tana, a nyin i ni ta, i ni Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yian mɔɛ n na.”
42009061	Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Fa, n ma bɛnden mu n ni bea i fɛ, chɛɛ a ma n ni ta pɛn, n ni n saa n baa mɔɛ n na.”
42009062	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ, e bea‑a n fɛ, chɛɛ i yiima duenɛ ɛ fea a, e ee che a ma‑a mɔɛ a, Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.”
42010001	Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ maenɛ gbakɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a boo sɔ wan mɔ bi wɔnfea kun ma fea n ma. Mbɛ a‑a an du fea fea a, a‑a an na ta a ya ɔ duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, a basan kaina kan kɔ kan na, a wandi ni ta tena kaina min nu.
42010002	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Chin fen chɛ a sɔndenɛ kaina dɔndɔɛ, a koo kaka. Chɛɛ a 'a sɔn mɔɛ n ma kɔkoo. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo chin fen ti ɔ tisa, a ni wai chɛ mɔɛ n ma munda n na ta, chin fen chɛ a sɔn koe a.
42010003	A yen ko, n mbe wo sɔ tena yɔ sa denɛ nu kui n tɛ ɔ. Wo ta gbɛ.
42010004	Ni wo ma‑a ta‑a, wo ma ta kɔpɔ a wo boo ɔ, wo ma basachi bia wo boo ɔ, wo ma kɔɔwa fean bɔɛ ya, n mbe ee baa, wo ni sɔ chia a, kɔndɔn chɛ koe a.
42010005	Ni wo don‑da chen kan kɔ kan na, wo a fɔ an ye chen chɛ a, wo ɔ, Yataa ni an gbɛɛ dua, an fɛn mbe an 'na chen chɛ a.
42010006	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan nɔ an chen chɛ a, min mu faachima tɔɛ a, ɛ a boo si‑a wan wo 'a dua chɛ kɔɔ. Ni a mɔɛ chɛ nyɔn sima ee nɔ, an mbe fo‑a wan dua chɛ a.
42010007	Wo ma wo yia chenɛ saa saa an na aan, wo ni bɔ an duu chɛ ɔ. Wo ma wo yia chenɛ ma fea. An mbe fen kɔ fen min be‑a wo ma, a daun koe a, a basan a min koe a, wo a bia. A mu min na, a nyin wai chɛ mɔɛ ni a 'a pawa ma sɔn.
42010008	Ni wo ta‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, mbɛ an‑na an boo si wo kɔɔ, ni an‑na fen kɔ fen be wo ma, wo a daun.
42010009	Wo gbandi mɔɛ n baun an duu chɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo a fɔ an ye, wo ɔ, ɛnden fan to‑a gbɛ, wo ɔ, mɔɛ n ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
42010010	Chɛɛ ni wo ta‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, mbɛ an ma an boo si ni wo kɔɔ, wo ta chia kunɛ a, mbɛ wo‑a a fɔ an ye, wo ɔ,
42010011	fifii min bɛɛ to‑a wo chenɛ a, a ka an 'na duu ɔ, wo ɔ, wo‑a a a gbɔngbɔn, wo ɔ, min mbe ma‑a dasi a an tena, mbɛ an mbe ka a ma an na, wo ɔ, Yataa faa ni tɛ an ma. Wo ɔ, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ɔ, an ma nyina, mbɛ ɛnden fan to‑a gbɛ, wo ɔ, an ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
42010012	N ni a ma din wo tena, mɔ yama chɛ nu suun Sɔdɔn duu ɔ, an mbe ee tɔɔya‑a, Yataa ɛ dunya gbɛmbo‑a tee min na, yɔ chɛ nu an duu chɛ ɔ, an mbe tɔɔya‑a buɛ min dɔ.”
42010013	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wan, wo wɛn mbe ka Koyasin duu ɔ, ni wo wɛn mbe Besaida, koe miin mbe wo tan‑da, an mbe yaua‑a gba wo ko a. N‑na kamaya koe sɛsɛ n ma wan wo 'a duu n dɔ. Mɔɛ miin mbe ka Taya duu ɔ, a basan Sidon duu ɔ a, ni an na‑a ko bonda chɛ n dɔ yen fan, an nii ma‑a ka yɔ wo wan. An na‑a an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na suun gbɔɔ. An ni ma‑a gbɛ di chɛ an na an 'na ko yama n ko a.
42010014	Chɛɛ mɔ yama chɛ nu suun Taya duu ɔ, ni Sidon duu ɔ, an mbe ee tɔɔya‑a, yɔ wo e tɔɔya‑a buɛ min dɔ, Yataa ɛ dunya gbɛmbo‑a tee min na.
42010015	Wo wɛn sin mbe ka Kapanaun duu ɔ, wo‑a wo wandi a sɛ banda a, chɛɛ Yataa ɛ wo a yii‑a wan duu ma.”
42010016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a too ma sɔ wo ma, a‑a a too ma sɔ ka n fan ma. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da wo ɔ, a ban‑da ka n fan dɔ. Chɛɛ a sin mɔɛ min mbe ban‑da n dɔ, a ban‑da ka Yataa an dɔ, min‑na n na na.”
42010017	Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔ bi wɔnfea kun ma fea chɛ n yɛ‑a wan Chisɔsi tena buɔdia wa ɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mansa, nyina yama n bɛɛ, an‑na nn da a kuiɛ n na min fan i tɔɛ ɔ.”
42010018	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na Sitana yen fan bea‑a a ka banda bu ɔ, yɔ banda manɛ.
42010019	A yen ko, n‑na gbasaya be wo ma. Wo e tɛn‑da wan ka n ma, a basan chinchima n na, chɛɛ an mbe ee ko ɔ ko ma‑a wo a. N‑na gbasaya be wo ma, Sitana 'a gbasaya gbɛɛ kun ma, ko yama kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a wo a.
42010020	Chɛɛ wo bu ɔ ma dia, koe min na mu, nyina yama n mbe wo da a kuiɛ n na min. Chɛɛ wo bu ɔ ni dia, a mu min na, wo tɔɛ n nyɛn‑da banda bu ɔ.”
42010021	A tima chɛ a, Yataa Nyina‑a a ma Chisɔsi bu ɔ dia‑a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Fa, n‑na i wai bɔ, i wɛn mu mansa a banda bu ɔ ni dunya ɔ. A mu min na, i‑a koe chɛ n dɔ nun fan chɛ nu ma, ɛ miin ta yiima ɔ, mbɛ an dɔ sɔen mu. Chɛɛ i‑a an dɔ yian fan chɛ n na, miin‑na an fandi a yii i tena. Fa, n‑na i wai bɔ, koe min na mu, i toen ni a ni ma ka wan.”
42010022	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Fa‑a gbasaya gbɛɛ be n ma, ko ɔ ko kun ma. Fa dɔndɔ gbe an‑na a ɔ sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ, mɔɛ min mu n na. N bɛɛ n dɔndɔ gbe an‑na a ɔ sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ, mɔɛ min mu Fa a. N‑na mɔɛ miin ya Fa sɔn koe a, an bɛɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn‑da wan chɛndɛ chɛ, mɔɛ min mu Fa a.”
42010023	Mbɛ a ɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, an dechee a, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min‑na koe chɛ n dɔ yen, wo‑a miin dɔ yen ka, a duaen mu.
42010024	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ sɛsɛ, a basan mansa sɛsɛ a, an toen ni an ni koe chɛ n dɔ yen, wo‑a miin dɔ yen ka, chɛɛ an ma an dɔ yen ni. An toen ni to an ni an na min, wo‑a miin‑na min ka, chɛɛ an ma an na min ni.”
42010025	Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔ dɔndɔ yen ko, a toen ni a ni Chisɔsi ɔ siman. A‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a sɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Ticha, n mbe fen ma, min mbe a ma, n ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn?”
42010026	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a sawa‑a fen fɔ? E a fasai ka ma?”
42010027	Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Yataa ɔ te, mmɔ ni to mmɔ 'a mansa Yataa a, mmɔ faa gbɛɛ a, mmɔ ni to a a, mmɔ fɔɛ gbɛɛ a, mmɔ ni to a a, mmɔ sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, mmɔ ni to a a, mmɔ yiima gbɛɛ a. Mbɛ a yɛ to, Yataa ɔ te, mmɔ ni to mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ mmɔ toen mu buɛ min dɔ mmɔ wandi a.”
42010028	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “An nɛ, i ma a ma sa ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, e kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.”
42010029	Chɛɛ kamin chɛ nii ma to ni, a ni mau a bɔɛ n tena. Chɛ an fɛ ni, a‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Nyɔn n gbu mu n 'na mɔɛ n na?”
42010030	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tee dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ ni ka tena wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a yii Chɛiko duu ɔ. Kanka n chɛ‑a a ma, mbɛ an‑na a ma bɔ, an‑na a gbasi yama yama, mbɛ an‑na a to sa ɔ, ɛ a ni ma tanka‑a.
42010031	Mbɛ Yataa‑a a ma, mmɔ chɛnyɛ mɔ dɔndɔ, min ni mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a, a ni ben tena wan an chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a. Chɛɛ kɛn a‑a mmɔ chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ chɛ yen sa ɔ, a‑a a ma sangba wan chia kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, a ta‑a.
42010032	Mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ min bɛɛ ni mmɔ chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ a, a bɔ Difai dambi ɔ, a wɛɛ na‑a na wan, mbɛ a‑a kamin chɛ yen. Chɛɛ a wɛɛ‑a a ma sangba wan chia kaka dɔndɔɛ ma.
42010033	Chɛɛ sonda dɔndɔ, min ka‑a Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a wɛɛ ni wan ben tena an chia chɛ a. A na‑a wan, a‑a kamin chɛ tan sa ɔ. A‑a a yen kɛn, a ma chinchin‑da wan a ye.
42010034	Mbɛ a ta‑a a tena. A ma gba tena chɛ nu, a‑a an na ko fo, mbɛ a‑a buii sa an na, mbɛ a‑a an na chii. A yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a kamin chɛ a sɛ a wandi ta sofɛ kɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a a a sonda yia chenɛ a, a kun ma fɛn tena.
42010035	Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a, Samayia kaminɛ chɛ toen ni a ni ta. Mbɛ a‑a kɔpɔɛ ɛnden ya, mbɛ a‑a a be chen ti chɛ ma, a ɔ, ‘N dia nyɔɛ, i dimu, kamin chɛ danda n ye. Ni kɔpɔɛ chɛ ma a kun ni, n mbe ma‑a yɛ‑a to nɛ chia a, n mbe i ta a a yɛ‑a wan, e min sa‑a chɛ kun ma.’ ”
42010036	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ a ma, a ɔ, “I ta yiima ɔ, mɔ sawa chɛ n tɛ ɔ, nyɔn ni kamin chɛ 'a mɔɛ a, kanka ni ka min fa‑a?”
42010037	Sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Mɔɛ min chinchin‑da ka a ma.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I wɛɛ ta, i ni sɔ kamin chɛ chen gba ɔ.”
42010038	Chisɔsi n ben‑da, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na, an ta‑a, mbɛ an che‑a duu dɔndɔ ɔ. Musu dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Mata. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi 'a sondaya bɔɔɛ dɛn a 'a chenɛ a.
42010039	A dɔ musuma ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Mɛi. Mɛi na‑a si wan Mansa Chisɔsi baima gbɛdɛn, ɛ a a min‑da, Chisɔsi ni bai miin fɔ tena.
42010040	Chɛɛ chen dɔ bɛnɛ min ni Mata ma, a na‑a a dɔndɔ gbe ya kɔɔ tawa wan. Chɛ ko a, a ta‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi tan, a ɔ, “Fa, n dɔɛ chɛ yen ko, a‑a chen na wai gbɛɛ to n dɔndɔ gbe an kan na. Fen tea ɛ chɛ ɔ? A fɔ a ye, a ni na, a ni basan n ma.”
42010041	Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ee Mata, i 'a faagbaa sien mu ko sɛsɛ an fan ma,
42010042	chɛɛ ko dɔndɔ gbe an ma biaen mu a ma koe a. Mɛi ɛ ka sɔ chia gbu an ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a bɔ an chia chɛ ma.”
42011001	Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni wan samun chɛ‑a kaina dɔndɔ. A ban‑da kɛn, a fɛ denɛ dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Fa, nn kan samun chɛ koe a, yɔ kai Chɔn‑na a fɛ denɛ n kan buɛ min dɔ.”
42011002	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo toen mu wo ni samunɛ chɛ, wo a fɔ, wo ɔ, ‘Fa Yataa, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni tando be i ma. A ɔ ma yansan to, i ni ma mansa a dunya chɛ gbɛɛ kun ma.
42011003	Nn kɔ nn daun fenɛ a tee ɔ tee a.
42011004	I boo bɔ nn 'na ko yama n dɔ, a mu min na, miin mbe ko yama n ma nn na, nn bɛɛ nn mbe nn boo bɔ wan an 'na ko yama n dɔ. I ma dɔn ko ɔ ko ni a ma, nn ni ko yama ma.’ ”
42011005	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Ni wo dɔndɔ ta‑a wo dia nyɔɛ dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a su tɛtɛ ma, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘N bɔ, kuiɛ be n ma biidi sawa a.’
42011006	A ɔ, ‘N dia nyɔ dɔndɔ an na‑a ka n tena,’ a ɔ, ‘ɛ tachɛ chia an ma.’ A ɔ, ‘Chɛɛ daun fen kan kɔ kan mbe ee n boo ɔ, ɛ min daun.’
42011007	Chɛɛ ni i dia nyɔɛ chɛ to‑a a 'a chenɛ bu ɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘I ma n ya kɔɔ tawa,’ a ɔ, ‘n ban‑da gbɛ chenɛ da a tɔn‑da, a sin, n mbe gbɛ sa ɔ wan.’ A ɔ, ‘N 'na denɛ n gbɛɛ mbe gbɛ chinɔɛ ɔ wan.’ A ɔ, ‘N mbe ee che to sanche, n kɔɔ sɔ‑a fen kan kɔ kan be koe a i ma.’ ”
42011008	Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, ni kamin chɛ min mbe ka chinɔɛ ɔ, a ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni, a ni biidi chɛ be a bɔɛ chɛ ma, an 'na dia nyɔncha ko a, ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan, a ni a be a ma, koe min na mu, a chii‑a a ma a disa‑a.
42011009	“Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe a fɔ tena wo ye, wo a a tun Yataa ɔ tisa koe a fen kɔ fen ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan wo ma. Wo a a tun wo ya a kan koe a chɛndɛ chɛ, wo e min yan tena, wo e a yen‑da wan. Wo a a tun chenɛ da tu koe a, Yataa ɛ a da a ka‑a wan wo ye.
42011010	Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a a tun‑da Yataa ɔ tisa koe a fen kɔ fen ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a a tun‑da a ya a kan‑da fenɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ, ɛ a yen‑da wan. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a a tun‑da chenɛ da tu koe a, Yataa ɛ a da a ka‑a wan a ye.
42011011	Wo wɛn mu ka den suun kai n na, ni i 'a denɛ‑a i ɔ tisa nyɛ ko a, e ee ka be a ma.
42011012	Ni a‑a i ɔ tisa tɛ chii ko a, e ee chinchima be a ma.
42011013	Ni wo wɛn sɔnɛ yau ka, ni wo kosan fan fen chɛndɛ n be‑a wo 'a denɛ n ma, mmɔ Fa sin gbɛ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, ɛ fen chɛndɛ be‑a wan wo ma, min benden mu wo ta n ma. Ɛ Yataa Nyina be‑a wan chɛ n ma, miin mbe a ɔ tisa‑a a ko a.”
42011014	Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, nyina yama ni min fɛ. An nyina yama chɛ nii dɔn kamin chɛ ni koɔ. Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi na‑a an nyina yama chɛ gbain fan an kamin chɛ fɛ. A ka‑a kɛn a fɛ, kamin chɛ‑a a kuu sɔ wan gbɛ koɔ‑a. An mɔ fanka chɛ n tɛnɛ‑a wan koe chɛ a.
42011015	Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu fanka chɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ, min tɔ mu Bɛɛsɛbu, an mbe ka gbasaya chɛ be tena a ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.”
42011016	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin toen ni an ni Chisɔsi bia a chen kɔ, min‑na a ma, an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, a ni kamaya koe ma, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa an‑na gbasaya chɛ be a ma tea tea a.
42011017	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, an ni an yii na chii tena koe min na. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni chɛɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n tɛ chɛnyɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ, an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɛ yɔn fan. A yɛ to, koɛ ɛ suunɛ min bɛɛ ɔ, an suun chɛ ɛ yɔn fan.
42011018	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, ni Sitana 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n ma‑a butuinɛ chɛ‑a an nyɔn na, a 'a mansaya ee ta ya ɔ ma. N mbe chɛ fɔ tena, a mu min na, wo ɔ, mbɛ nyina yama n 'na mansa, min tɔ mu Bɛɛsɛbu, an mbe gbasaya be tena n ma, nyina yama n gbain koe a mɔɛ n fɛ.
42011019	Wo ta mɔɛ n bɛɛ mbe nyina yama n gbain fan mɔɛ n fɛ. Chɛɛ wo e a fɔ n fan ma, wo ɔ, n mbe a ma tena Bɛɛsɛbu 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Wo ta mɔɛ n gbu mbe koe miin ma tena, an fan mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ tea ee wo boo ɔ.
42011020	N mbe ee nyina yama n gbain tena mɔɛ n fɛ Bɛɛsɛbu 'a gbasaya ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe an gbain tena Yataa 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a mansaya ɛ gbɛ wo tɛ ɔ.”
42011021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Sitana ya yɔ kamin gbasayaen ba, a ɔ, “Ni kamin gbasayaen ba, chɛɛ chɛ fenɛ ɛ min boo ɔ, a ma‑a a wandi a chenɛ kun ma fɛn‑da, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a kanka‑a.
42011022	Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ min gbasayaen mu a ni ben a ma, a dɛ‑a a ma butuinɛ a, ɛ a boan fan. Ni a‑a a boan, ɛ a 'a chɛɛ chɛ feanka n gbɛɛ bɔ wan a boo ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a a a, a basan a boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ a, a ni miin ma butuin chɛ tena, mbɛ a‑a an du.
42011023	“Mɔɛ min mbe ee n ko a, n chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ mu a a. Mɔɛ min mbe ee n deman‑da a a kan koe a kaina dɔndɔɛ, ɛ a a fasan‑da wan.”
42011024	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni nyina yama ka‑a mɔɛ fɛ, nyina chɛ ɛ ta wan ben ben‑da kaina ɔ gbaa gbaaenɛ ɔ, ɛ a ya a kan‑da kaina ɔ chimaenɛ a, a suin koe a. Chɛɛ a ee kaina ma sɔn. Ɛ si wan, a‑a a yii na chii, a ɔ, ‘N ka‑a kaina, ka wɛ n mbe yɛ to nɔ.’
42011025	Ni a na‑a, mbɛ a ma Yataa Nyina tan ni mɔɛ chɛ fɛ, a sin mbe ee kun kɔɔ,
42011026	a dɔndɔ gbe ee bea to a fɛ. Chɛɛ ɛ a bɔ nyina yama wɔnfea chee wan, miin yau a ni ben a ma, mbɛ an gbɛɛ ma‑a kamin chɛ fɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan gbɛ, kamin chɛ ma buɛ ni yaua kaka, a ni ben a kɔma ma.”
42011027	Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ an na, mbɛ musu dɔndɔ fanka chɛ tɛ ɔ, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Musu min‑na i suun, mbɛ i‑a a susu min, a duaen ba mu.”
42011028	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a tea an fɔ ka, chɛɛ miin mbe Yataa 'a bai a min‑da, mbɛ an‑na a ma, yɔ bai chɛ‑a min fɔ an ye a ma koe a, dua chenama wa gbu ɛ ma‑a an fan ma.”
42011029	Mɔ sɛsɛ n na ni kan tena wan tun Chisɔsi ma. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Mɔɛ miin mbe n dɔ tisa‑a, n ni kamaya koe a dan, mɔ yauaen ba mu an mɔ bonda chɛ sima n na. Chɛɛ an mbe ee tɔmɔsi dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma sɔn‑da, mɔɔ dechee Yataa‑a tɔmɔsi min na ben a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Chona a.
42011030	N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe ma‑a wan tɔmɔsi a an mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, yɔ Chona ma‑a buɛ min dɔ suun tɔmɔsi a, Ninifɛ duu ɔ mɔɛ n tena.
42011031	A sin tee min ma Yataa ɛ ma‑a dunya gbɛmbo‑a, musu min ni mansa a Seba chɛnyɛ ɔ, a wɛɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ n yɛi siiya bɔ. A mu min na, a na‑a ka wan dunya danka a, na koe a, a too ma sɔ‑a Sɔɔmon 'na yiimatɛ bai n ma. Mɔɛ yen ko nɛ an tɛ gbɛ min benden mu Sɔɔmon ma, chɛɛ an mbe ee an too ma sɔ tena a ma.
42011032	A sin tima min na Yataa ɛ ma‑a dunya gbɛmbo‑a, Ninifɛ mɔɛ chɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n yɛi siiya bɔ. A mu min na, tima min na Chona na‑a Yataa bai sa Ninifɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tena, an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ wan an 'na ko yama n na. Mɔɛ yen ko nɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ n tɛ gbɛ min benden mu Chona ma, chɛɛ an mbe ee an too ma sɔ tena a ma.”
42011033	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a dambo a man, a ee a nun, chɛ ma, a ni samba bun a kun ma. Chɛɛ ni mɔ‑a dambo a man, e a si kaina wan, min mbe a ma, ni mɔɛ n don‑da dechee i 'a chenɛ a, an mbe kun fan an ni kaina ɔ yen gbadan.
42011034	Mɔ gbu ya ɛ wan yɔ dambo manɛ a gboo ko a. Ni mɔ ya a kaenɛ ma‑a gboden, a gboo gbɛɛ ɛ ma manɛ an dɔ. Chɛɛ ni a ya a pimbienɛ ma‑a, a gboo gbɛɛ ɛ ma pimbi an dɔ.
42011035	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, min mbe a ma, wo ya a ma na pimbi, mbɛ wo to‑a pimbi ɔ.
42011036	Ni wo ya a kaenɛ ma‑a gboden, a dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma te ni, wo e kaina kan kɔ kan dɔ yen fan, yɔ dambo ɛ man buɛ min dɔ taun wo ya ɔ yen koe a.”
42011037	Chisɔsi bandenɛ ma koɔ‑a, mɔ dɔndɔ min ni Fayisii a, a‑a a chee wan a 'a chenɛ a, ta koe a an ni daunɛ chɛ an fea a a. Mbɛ an ta‑a, an si‑a, mbɛ an bun‑da daunɛ chɛ‑a.
42011038	Chisɔsi nii ma a boo a ko ni a chia ma, yɔ Fayisii manda‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a e na to a kuu sɔ‑a daunɛ chɛ‑a. Chɛ na‑a ma wan tɛnɛmaya ko wa a Fayisii chɛ tena.
42011039	Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Wo wan Fayisii chɛ nu, tea mu a a, wo e wan yɔ kɔpu, min kɔɛ koenɛ ɛ, chɛɛ a bu ɔ nɔɔenɛ ɛ. Wo e nyima yɛnɛ an chɛ dechee mɔɛ n na, chɛɛ wo gbɔsɔen mu dechee wo wandi an ko a, a sin wo faa n dɔ finden mu kaka.
42011040	Wo kun dɔ ban tɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa min‑na gboo a dan, an‑na faa don bu ɔ, a sin an fea gbɛɛ wakoe ɛ wan sa ɔ a faa ma.
42011041	Chɛɛ wo wo boo fenɛ n be yɔn tɔɛ n ma, wo faa gbɛɛ a. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ko kan kɔ kan wo e min ma‑a, ɛ Yataa faa chima‑a wan.
42011042	“Wo wan Fayisii nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Ko chɛndɛ yen ko, wo e min ma. Boo fen kan kɔ kan, wo e min sɔn, wo e a du wan si tena tanɛ a, mbɛ wo‑a si tena dɔndɔ be Yataa ma. Boo fenɛ tatayaenɛ wɛɛ, wo e Yataa kɔ wan a ɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma wo gbɔsɔ ni tea koe ma koe a wo bɔɛ n na, a yɛ to, wo ma wo gbɔsɔ ni to koe a Yataa a. Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ, wo an ma. A sin to, wo a a tun wo boo fenɛ n be koe a Yataa ma.
42011043	“Wo wan Fayisii nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Ni wo ta‑a samun chɛ chenɛ a, wo toen mu si tena ma bɛnden ba an na. Ni wo ta‑a machiti wɛɛ ɔ, wo toen mu mɔɛ n ni basɔmaya kɔndɔnɛ chɛ wo a.
42011044	Koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. A mu min na, wo ma buɛ ee a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, mbɛ wo sɔnɛ n yau wan. An mbe ee a ɔ sɔn ni wo sɔnɛ n yau wan, chɛɛ ni an gbɛn‑da dechee wo ma, mbɛ wo‑a wo sɔn yama chɛ n chɛ an dɔ, mbɛ an ma‑a yɔ wo e buɛ min dɔ.”
42011045	Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔ dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ticha, i 'a bai chɛ n gbɛɛ tu‑a wan nn bɛɛ a, i‑a miin fɔ ka. Main bai n dechee n fan nɛ.”
42011046	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wan sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. Wo e suun feanka fanka ma si wan mɔɛ n kun ma ta koe a, chɛɛ wo wandi gbu ee deman an ma ɛnden bɛɛ a.
42011047	Koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. A mu min na, wo bemba n ta bemba n‑na Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ miin fa suun, wo sin mbe an kamba n ma bɛn nyima nyima.
42011048	Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ wo bɛ wo bemba n ta bemba chɛ n na, wo kuiɛ ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, an ban koe a an boo si koe a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n 'na sakana bai n kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, an na‑a an fa wan, mbɛ wo sin mbe an kamba n ma bɛn nyima nyima.
42011049	Chɛ an ko a ni, Yataa min yiima tɛen mu, a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘N mbe n 'na gbonka chɛ mɔɛ nu, a basan n 'na sɔ mɔɛ n na, n mbe an na ta‑a wan an tena. An mbe an dɔ n fa‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na ko yawaenɛ sa a tɔɛ n ma.’
42011050	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo nyɔn sima chɛ nu, Yataa ɛ wo wan tɔɔya‑a, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fa koe a, a ka suun dunya kuu sɔ tima ma.
42011051	Wo e tɔɔya‑a wan Ebɛɛ 'a saya ko a suun, aan a ta Sakaaya 'a saya ma. An na‑a Sakaaya chɛ fa Yataa 'a kata chɛ an dɔ, Yataa 'a chen chɛ n tɛ yasi minda gbengbe chɛ tena a. N mbe a ma din tena wo tena, tea ɔ, mbɛ wo nyɔn sima chɛ n fan mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n wii chɛ ko a.
42011052	“Wo wan sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, koe min mbe wo tan‑da, a yau gba wo ko a. A mu min na, mɔɛ ɛ bɔ chia min na, a ni Yataa sɔn, wo‑a a ma wo ta a. Wo ee dɔn, mɔɛ miin toen mu an ni Yataa sɔn, an ni an chia chɛ ma sɔn, wo wandi gbu sin ma Yataa sɔn.”
42011053	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Fayisii chɛ 'a chenɛ a. A bɔ‑a kɛn, Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, an bɛ Fayisii chɛ n na, an‑na a kuu sɔ wan a ma bɔ‑a a yama yama boo a. A ka a tima chɛ ma, an bun‑da a ɔ tisa‑a tisa n na a si ko sɛsɛ ma,
42011054	an mbe ta‑a butuinɛ chɛ‑a, min mbe a ma, an ni fɛɛ sa a ye, mbɛ an‑na a bia a chen kɔ, a da a bai ɔ.
42012001	A tima chɛ a, mɔ wu sɛsɛ a kan‑da wan Chisɔsi tena. Mɔɛ n da a ni koo, an ni ka wan tɛn tɛn‑da an nyɔn ma. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kuu sɔ a fɔ‑a a fɛ denɛ n pɛn ye, a ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mu Fayisii n na, yisinɛ ɛ wan an boo ɔ. Wo wo kun ma fɛn an yisinɛ chɛ boo ɔ. Yisin chɛ mu an 'na nɛnɛn feaya an na.
42012002	Koe min na mu, boo kundu ee to doma kɔɔ, ɛ bɔ wan ya a ma tee dɔndɔ a.
42012003	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo e bai kan kɔ kan min fɔ‑a wo dechee a, mɔɛ n mbe a a min‑da wan baa kun tɛ. A sin, wo dechee ɛ wɛwɛɛ min fɔ‑a, dunya ɛ a a min‑da wan chɛndɛ chɛ.
42012004	“N dia nyɔɛ nu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo ma chian mɔ gbu ma wo fa ko a. Ɛ wo fa‑a wan, chɛɛ a ee ko ɔ ko dɔ mende ma‑a chɛ gbakɔ.
42012005	Chɛɛ wo e chian min ma, n mbe a yian‑da wan wo a. Wo chian Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an ma. An mbe mɔ gbu fa, mbɛ a‑a a a ta ta ɔ, ɛ minda kaina. Wo dan chɛ a, mbɛ wo ni chian Yataa ma.
42012006	“Baa ee soenɛ ma mɔ gbu ya a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa ee nyina an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma.
42012007	Wo sin benden mu kaka soenɛ n ma. Wo kundi nan fan bɛɛ wo kun ma, Fa Yataa‑a a danɛ sɔn fan. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ma chian mɔ gbu ma.
42012008	“N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe dɔn‑da fanka ɔ, mbɛ n fɛ mɔɛ mu a a, n bɛɛ, n fan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe dɔn‑da wan an mɔɛ chɛ wakoe ma maeka n ya kɔɔ.
42012009	Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ fanka ɔ, mbɛ n fɛ mɔ ma a a, n bɛɛ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan maeka n ya kɔɔ, mbɛ n fɛ mɔ ma a a.
42012010	“A sin, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a n main, Yataa ɛ kun fan a ni a boo bɔ a ɔ. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a Yataa Nyina main, a ee a boo bɔ‑a a mɔ sima chɛ 'a main chɛ ɔ.
42012011	“Ni an na‑a wo a wo gbɛmbo koe a mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n na, ni an na‑a wo a ya ɔ sɔɛ n chen kɔɔ, ni an na‑a wo a kun ti n bɛɛ chen kɔɔ, wo ma wo faa gbaa wo fɔ bai ko a, ni a fɔ buɛ ko a.
42012012	A mu min na, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo kan‑da wan a tima chɛ a, wo e bai min fɔ‑a.”
42012013	Mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ fanka chɛ ɔ, a‑a a fɔ Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “Ticha, nn fa 'a fenɛ min to nn ko a, a fɔ n kɔɔ kaima ye, a ni a du nn ma.”
42012014	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma gbasaya be ni n ma, wo fa chɛ du koe a, wo tɛ wo fea i kɔɔɛ a.”
42012015	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn, fen koya yama min kɔ min boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu ni nyan boo ɔ boo, chɛ an mbe ee a ma i ni fɔɛ chɛndɛ ma sɔn.”
42012016	Mbɛ a‑a tai chɛ tɛ an tena, a ɔ, “Nyan tɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, sɛnɛ ni min boo ɔ. Chin fen sɛsɛ na‑a ma wan a a, an sɛnɛ chɛ ɔ.
42012017	Chɛ ko a, a‑a a yii na chii wan, a ɔ, ‘Kaina ɔ ma koo, n mbe n 'na chin fen chɛ n gbɛɛ a sɔn kaina. N mbe fen ma gbɛ sanche?’
42012018	Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘N yii puin‑da, n mbe bea kɔma chɛ n fasan‑da wan, mbɛ n‑na a chenama n sɔ. Ni n‑na chɛ ma, n mbe chin fen chɛ n gbɛɛ, ni fen dɔ mende nu, n ta mu miin na, n mbe an gbɛɛ chɛ‑a wan nɔ.
42012019	Mbɛ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan n fandi ye, n dɔ, “Nɛma tɔɛ, fen chɛndɛ gbɛɛ, n toen mu miin na fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an mbe wan n boo ɔ. An sin mbe san sɛsɛ ya‑a wan n na. N faa ma gbaa ni to fɔɛ chɛ ɔ fen kan kɔ kan ko a. Chɛɛ n mbe daunɛ chɛ‑a wan, n ni minɛ chɛ, mbɛ n yɛ‑a, n‑na buɔdia bɔ.” ’
42012020	Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, ‘I wooen mu. Yɛɛ chɛ ma, e fa tena wan. Ni i sin fa‑a, fen chɛ n gbɛɛ, i‑a miin na sɔn ka i wandi ko a, i wan ta ee ma‑a an na.’ ”
42012021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Chɛ n bɛɛ mbe ka wan, miin mbe nyanɛ a sɔn an fandi ko a, chɛɛ an ma nyan ni Yataa ta chia a.”
42012022	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo ma wo gbɔsɔ wo da daun fenɛ ko a, ma koe a fɔɛ ɔ. N mbe ee baa, wo ni wo gbɔsɔ wo gboo ko a, wo e fen chii.
42012023	Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu fɔɛ ma daun fenɛ dechee an na, a yɛ to, koa dechee an ma koe a mɔ gbu gboo ko a.
42012024	Wo ŋaŋaa n yen bɛ, an mbe ee chin fen chin, n mbe ee baa, an ni a a sɛ bea a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa ɛ an da kɔ wan. Wo nan gbu sin benden mu kaka ŋaŋaa n ma.
42012025	Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ, faa ni gbaa boo ɔ boo a 'a fɔɛ ko a, chɛ ee a ma tima kundu ɛnden bɛɛ ni sa a kun ma.
42012026	Koe ɛnden chɛ, wo ee che ka buɛ min dɔ a ma‑a, wo ma wo faa gbaa koe tɔɛ chɛ n ko a.
42012027	Wo fia ɔ kɔn chɛ n yen bɛ, miin mbe fu, an mbe koa buɛ min dɔ. An mbe ee wai chɛ, an sin mbe ee koa nyan an fandi ko a. Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mansa Sɔɔmon nyanden ni wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, koa nii a ma, min ni nyin a ni che kɔn fu chɛ n dɔ.
42012028	Yataa an mbe kɔnɛ chɛ n ma chii, kɔnɛ min mu ɛ nɛ bi, mbɛ sinan a tɛ‑a, mbɛ wo‑a a minda. Ni ɛ ka wan, wo ma chii koe a boo ɔ, a mu a ma gbɔsɔɛ an na. Wo 'a danaya ɔ dɔɔ gba.
42012029	“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo faa ma gbaa wo daun fen ko a, a basan wo min fen na.
42012030	A mu min na, wo Fa Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo gbɔsɔen fan mu chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a. Yataa sɔn bai n fan faa ɛ gbaa tima ɔ tima fen chɛ n ko a.
42012031	Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo a ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a don koe a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ɛ to‑a wan nɔ a ni fen chɛ n gbɛɛ be wo ma, miin ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ wo ma.”
42012032	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wɛn mbe n fɛ, wo ma kɔkoo, chɛɛ wo ma chian. A a di wan Fa Yataa ye, na koe a wo a, a 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
42012033	Wo wo boo fenɛ n ma tachɛ kɔpɔɛ a, mbɛ wo‑a a kɔpɔɛ chɛ n be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo e ma‑a ka nyanɛ an na sɔn‑da wo wandi ko a banda bu ɔ. Kɔpɔ sa basachi nu, miin mbe banda bu ɔ, an mbe ee taa, an sin mbe ee pumbɔ. Wo 'a nyan fen chɛ nu banda bu ɔ, an mbe ee ban kuɔ fɔ ko a. Kanka ee che an kanka‑a. Chisi sin mbe ee che an yɔn‑da.
42012034	A mu min na, wo 'a nyanɛ ɛ ma‑a sa ɔ kaina, wo faa ɛ ma‑a nɔ wan tima ɔ tima.”
42012035	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo ma bɛn, mbɛ wo‑a wo 'a dambo a man wai chɛ koe a.
42012036	Wo ma‑a yɔ bɔi denɛ nu, miin mbe an kun ti ma kɔn tena a na koe a chenɛ a, a ka musu si tɔmbɔɛ ɔ. Min mbe a ma, ni a na‑a, a ni chenɛ da tu, an mbe chenɛ da a ka‑a wan a ye bui chɛ a.
42012037	Ɛ ma‑a wan bɔi den chɛ n ma buɔdia a, miin mbe ee chinɔ‑a, aan an kun ti ni yɛ. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ kun ti chɛ ɛ a ma bɛn‑da wan, mbɛ a‑a a 'a bɔi den chɛ n chee, mbɛ a wandi gbu‑a daun fenɛ ya, a‑a a be an ma a daun koe a.
42012038	Ni a na‑a su tɛ wɛɛ, ni a na‑a sayi ma pimbi wɛɛ ɔ a, ɛ miin tan‑da an ya a, ɛ ma‑a an ma buɔdia wa an na.
42012039	Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni chen ti ɛ a ɔ sɔn fan tima min na kanka ɛ na‑a a kanka koe a, a ee dɔn kanka ni a 'a chenɛ te, a ni don nɔ.
42012040	A sin wo wɛɛ, wo wo ma bɛn, koe min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a wan tima ɔ tima, wo yii n mbe ee na‑a ma‑a min dɔ n na koe a.”
42012041	Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Fa, i‑a tai chɛ tɛ nn fan ko a, nn fɛn mu i fɛ denɛ n na, kɔ i‑a a tɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ an ko a?”
42012042	Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma yɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ, danaya ni min dɔ, a basan yiimatɛ a. Ni a kun ti ma‑a ta‑a tachɛ ɔ, ɛ a to wan a bɔɛ n kun ma, daun fenɛ be koe a an ma, tima ma.
42012043	Ni a kun ti yɛ‑a, a ni a tan, ɛ koe chɛ n ma‑a, yɔ a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ a ye, ɛ ma wan ko chɛndɛ a a ko a.
42012044	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ kun ti chɛ ɛ gbasaya be‑a wan a ma, ma koe a a 'a chenɛ gbɛɛ kun ma.
42012045	Chɛɛ ni wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, mbɛ kun ti chɛ ee fua tena yɛ‑a, mbɛ a bun‑da a bɔɛ n gbasi‑a, kai nu a basan musu n na. Ɛ ma‑a gbɛ daun chɛ an na, ni gbɛ min ba a, min mbe a bia‑a a ɔ bendenɛ a.
42012046	Chɛɛ a kun ti chɛ ɛ yɛ‑a wan tee dɔndɔ a, a yii n mbe ee ma‑a a yɛ koe ɔ tima min na. Kun ti chɛ ɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ a tɔɔya‑a wan a yama yama boo a, mbɛ a‑a a bia, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, a ee che a fa‑a miin na.
42012047	“Mbɛ ni wai chɛ mɔɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn, a kun ti toen mu a ni fen ma a ye, chɛɛ a ma a ma ni, yɔ a kun ti toen mu min ni ma, ɛ gbasi sɛmbɛndenɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
42012048	Chɛɛ ni wai chɛ mɔɛ ma a ɔ sɔn a kun ti toen mu fen na, mbɛ a‑a ko dɔ mende ma, ɛ gbasi ma sɔn min ko a, ɛ gbasi ɛndenɛ an ma sɔn‑da. Ni a chenama ma‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ boo ɔ, a ni a wai chenama chɛ. I boo ɛ che‑a buɛ min dɔ a ma sɔn koe a, i ni a chɛ ka a buɛ chɛ ɔ, a ma sɛenɛ a.”
42012049	Chisɔsi ɔ, “N na‑a ta an sɔ koe a dunya chɛ a. Ɛ ma‑a wan n ma buɔdia a, ni an ta chɛ ma‑a bia‑a gbɛ.
42012050	Chɛɛ chɛ e na to ma‑a, n mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a wan a ɔ benden ba a. N mbe ma‑a wan faayɔn ba ɔ aan an tɔɔya chɛ danka a ni si.
42012051	A ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ n na‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, kuiɛ a kanɛ ni ma mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. N ma na ni an na, chɛɛ n na‑a dɔfasanɛ an na an tɛ ɔ.
42012052	A ka gbɛ sanche ma, suun ma nyɔ duu n tɛ ɛ du‑a wan, mɔ sawa n mbe yɛ‑a wan kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, mbɛ mɔ fea n yɛ‑a kaka dɔndɔɛ ma.
42012053	Fa n bɛ an 'na denɛ kaima n na, an mbe sɔ‑a wan an nyɔn na kan. Den suun musu n bɛɛ mbe sɔ‑a ka wan an nyɔn na an bɛ an 'na denɛ musuma n na. Mbɛ de mɔɛ n bɛ an 'na den 'na musu n na, an bɛɛ sɔ‑a an nyɔn na kan.”
42012054	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to mɔ fanka fanka chɛ ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a dingbii yen ka‑a tee bea tena, wo e a fɔ wan dɔndɔ gbe, mbɛ sona ɛ na tena wan, a sin ɛ na wan.
42012055	Mbɛ ni wo‑a fia a tinsɔn ɛ bɔ‑a a ka dunya denkɔɛ, wo e a fɔ wan to, mbɛ kaina ɛ na tena wan win‑da, a sin mbe ma wan.
42012056	Wo wan nɛnɛn fea ti nu, wo e banda ma fɛn fan, an fea duu gboo a, mbɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn ni banda ɛ na tena wan nyan‑da. Wo e a ɔ sɔn fan to ni a ee nyan tena. Chɛɛ wo ee che koe chɛ n sin fasai‑a, miin mbe ma tena sanche.
42012057	“A nyin fan wo wandi ni a ɔ sɔn, koe min nyin a ma koe a wo boo ɔ.
42012058	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a i ma siibia, a ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a bai chɛ ni sa wo tɛ ɔ. I ma dɔn wo ni ta kuti ɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni sɔ chiti tɛ mɔɛ n chen kɔɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, chiti tɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ mbe i be‑a wan sawa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n ma, mbɛ sawa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n bɛɛ‑a i sa pimbi chenɛ a.
42012059	N ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ e ee bɔ‑a pimbi chen chɛ a aan, kɔpɔɛ chɛ dankama gbɔdɛ, an mbe i a bɔnɔ‑a min na, i ni a be.”
42013001	A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a ni, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin bɛ ni Chisɔsi a, an‑na ko yama wa ɔ yian a a. Ko yama wa chɛ na‑a ma mɔɛ dɔ n fan na, miin na‑a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An na‑a na Yataa 'a kata ɔ wan, min mbe a ma, an ni soe n minda, a be koe a Yataa ma an 'na yasi a. An to‑a yasi chɛ n fan bɔ‑a Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a ma, an‑na an fa. An faen chɛ a, an wii ɔ basan‑da wan soe chɛ n wii a, an na‑a miin bɔ ka yasi a.
42013002	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ɛ wo ta yiima ɔ, mbɛ an‑na Kadidi mɔɛ chɛ miin fa ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔ wa ni an na. A ma ma ka wo yii ma, mbɛ an benden ni Kadidi mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma ko yama ma ɔ.
42013003	N ni a ma din wo tena, a ee ka wan ɛnden bɛɛ a. A sin, ni wo ma wo kan kɔ sɔ ni wo 'a ko yama n na, wo wɛɛ, wo gbɛɛ ɛ kasaa‑a wan.
42013004	A ka to chɛ ma, tima min na banda a chen chɛ na‑a bea Sidowan fɔnɛ ɔ, mɔ tan kun ma sɛi an fa‑a. Chɛɛ a ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ a mɔɛ chɛ n ni yau a ben mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
42013005	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ a ee ka ɛnden bɛɛ a. Ni wo sin ma wo kan kɔ sɔ ni wo 'a ko yama n na, wo wɛɛ gbɛɛ ɛ kasaa‑a wan.”
42013006	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ an tena, a ɔ, “Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, yadi ni min boo ɔ. Gbɔ kɔnɛ ni wan nɔ an yadi chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ tee dɔndɔ a, yadi ti chɛ ta‑a wan kɔn chɛ gbɔɛ kai koe a. Chɛɛ a ma a gbɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ tan ni a a.
42013007	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a 'a yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘A yen ko san sawa ko a ka gbɛ, n mbe na yadi chɛ ɔ, gbɔ kɔn chɛ gbɔɛ kai koe a, chɛɛ tima ɔ tima n ni n na‑a, n mbe ee a gbɔ kan kɔ kan tan a a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a tɛ, i ni a a bea. A ma nyin a ni duu gboo ma bia gbama a.’
42013008	Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘Fa, a to nɔ san dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ko a. N mbe sonɛ sin‑da wan a 'a tindanɛ, mbɛ n‑na sundu tui chɛ a kuu ma.
42013009	Ni a gbɔ‑a yɛi, ɛ nyan‑da wan, chɛɛ ni a ma gbɔ ni, mbɛ a tima chɛ a, a tɛ‑a.’ ”
42013010	Chu n 'na suin tee dɔndɔ ma, Chisɔsi ni wan kan chɛ tena an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a.
42013011	Musu dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, nyina yama ni min fɛ, min‑na a ma, a gbandienɛ ni san tan kun ma sɛi ko a. A ma bundenɛ ni, mbɛ a sin, a nii che a ɔ tan‑da ɛnden bɛɛ a.
42013012	Chisɔsi‑a a yen kɛn, a‑a a chee, mbɛ a ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, i baun‑da gbɛ i 'a gbandi chɛ ɔ sanche.”
42013013	Mbɛ a‑a a boo bun musu chɛ ma. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, musu chɛ sɔ‑a den, mbɛ a‑a tando be Yataa ma.
42013014	Chɛɛ kun ti chɛ samun chɛ chen chɛ a, a faa tɛ‑a wan kaka, koe min na mu, Chisɔsi‑a mɔɛ baun suin tee ma. Chɛ ko a, a ɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ma, “Tee wɔdɔ an mbe mɔ gbu ko a wai chɛ koe a wichi kan kɔ kan dɔ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo na a tee wɔdɔɛ chɛ tɛ ɔ, an ni wo baun wo 'a gbandi n dɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma na suin tee ma.”
42013015	Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wan nɛnɛn fea ti nu, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɛ, min 'na ninchi kanɛ a ɛ gbaa, a 'a sofɛ kanɛ a ni gbaa, suin tee wɛɛ ma a, ni a ee a fuin‑da, a ni ta a a yii da a, a ni a min. Ni wo e chɛ ma wan, mbɛ wo‑a wai an chɛ ka suin tee ma.
42013016	Mbɛ sanche gbɛ wo a yen ko, mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ dɔndɔ an nɛ musu chɛ a, mmɔ gbɛɛ bɔ‑a Ebeami 'a dambi dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ. Sitana‑a a chii wan, ɛ tɔɔya ɔ san tan kun ma sɛi ko a. Chia ɔ chia a, fɔ ni a fuin‑da wan, a ni ma suin tee wɛɛ ma a.”
42013017	A 'a bai chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ mau‑a an fandi ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a buɔdia bɔ wan, a si kamaya koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, Chisɔsi‑a miin ma.
42013018	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka wɛ n mbe a ɔ yian wo a, Yataa 'a mansaya ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Ka wɛ n mbe a bɔ nyɔɛ yian wo a.
42013019	Ɛ ka wan yɔ kamin dɔndɔ min‑na chin fen kuu dɔma ɛndenɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a a chin a 'a yadi ɔ. A fɛn‑da, mbɛ a ma‑a kɔn chenama wa a. Mbɛ konde n‑na an nyanɛ sa a bonɛ n dɔ.”
42013020	Mbɛ a ɔ te to, “Ka wɛ n mbe a ɔ yian to wo a, Yataa 'a mansaya bɔen mu to fenɛ min na.
42013021	Ɛ ka wan to yɔ yisin denɛ, musu dɔndɔ‑a min ya, mbɛ a‑a a chɛ feawa funku wa ɔ, konko pani ɔ biidi nyan koe a. Yisin chɛ kun‑da wan feawa funku chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ feawa chɛ sɛ‑a.”
42013022	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bun‑da to a 'a tachɛ ma, a ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A ta‑a wan mɔɛ n kan‑da duu chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, a‑a miin dɔ tandin.
42013023	A tima chɛ a, mɔ dɔndɔ ɔ, “Fa, Yataa ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be‑a dechee mɔ kuundenɛ n fan ma?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ,
