42013024	“Wo butuinɛ chɛ, wo ni ben an chen da a dɔɔyaen chɛ a, don koe a Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe butuinɛ chɛ‑a wan tee dɔndɔɛ kɔɔ don koe a nɔ, chɛɛ an mbe ee na‑a kun‑da.
42013025	Tima ɛ che‑a wan, tima min na chen chɛ kun ti ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a chen chɛ da a tɔn. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, ni wo e sɔ ɔ baa ma wan, wo e chen chɛ da tu‑a wan, wo ɔ, kun ti chɛ ni a ma wo ni don. Chɛɛ ɛ a fɔ‑a wan wo ye, a ɔ, a ma wo sɔn ɛnden bɛɛ a.
42013026	Wo wɛɛ, wo‑a a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, wo bɛ na‑a daunɛ chɛ wan kaina dɔndɔ tee. A yɛ to, wo ɔ, a na‑a kanɛ chɛ wan wo 'a duu n dɔ.
42013027	Chɛɛ ɛ a fɔ‑a wan to, a ɔ, a ma wo sɔn ɛnden bɛɛ a. A ɔ, ko yama ma mɔɛ mu wo a, a ɔ, wo ni ka a fɛ.
42013028	A tima chɛ a, wo e Ebeami yen‑da wan, wo ni Aisaki yen, mbɛ wo‑a Chekɔpi yen. Wo e Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ yen‑da wan. An gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a wan Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, wo sin mbe sɔ ɔ baa ma, wo ee che don‑da. Wo e ma‑a wan di chɛ‑a fiko fiko faayɔn ba ɔ, wo e ta‑a wo nyinɛ a daun‑da.
42013029	A sin, mɔɛ n mbe na‑a wan a ka dunya tɔnkɔnɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ an si‑a daun chɛ tena, tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da.
42013030	A yen ko gbɛ, mɔɛ dɔ nu miin mbe gbaa, an mbe ma‑a wan ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, mbɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ dɔ n sin ma‑a gbaa mɔɛ n na.”
42013031	A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ an dɔ, “Bɔ nɛ, i ni ta kaina dɔ mende, koe min na mu, Mansa Ɛdɔdi toen mu a ni i fa.”
42013032	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ta, wo ni a fɔ an kamin yaaen chɛ ye, wo ɔ, n yen ko n mbe nyina yama n gbain‑da mɔɛ n fɛ, a yɛ to, n mbe gbandi mɔɛ n baun‑da tima kundu ɛnden ko a sanche wɛ. Ni a tima chɛ ban‑da, n mbe na‑a ban‑da wan gbɛ n 'na wai chɛ‑a.
42013033	Chɛ ni ma wɛɛ, n mbe ma‑a wan n ta chia ma tima ɛnden tɛ ɔ. A mu min na, Chuusaɛn an mu dechee duu a, a nyin an ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ni a fii kaina.”
42013034	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Wo wan Chuusaɛn mɔɛ nu, wo toen mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fa koe a. A yɛ to, wo toen mu Yataa 'a sɔ mɔɛ n bon koe a, ɛ miin na na wo tena. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, n toen ni, n ni wo a sɔn sɔn kaina dɔndɔɛ, yɔ tɛ kuinsa ɛ a 'a denɛ n don buɛ min dɔ a kambanɛ kɔɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma dɔn ni n ye.
42013035	A yen ko gbɛ, Yataa 'a chen chɛ a senɛ to‑a, a sin pombonɛ mu gbɛ. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ a ka sanche ma, wo ee n yen‑da to, aan a ta tima chɛ ma, wo e a fɔ‑a tima min na, wo ɔ, Mansa Yataa ni mɔɛ chɛ dua, min mbe na‑a a tɔɛ ɔ.”
42014001	Chu n 'na suin tee dɔndɔ ma, Chisɔsi ta‑a wan daun chɛ tena mɔ dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, min ni Fayisii n kun ti a. A tima chɛ a, an ni wan Chisɔsi a tɛ tena chɛndɛ chɛ.
42014002	Mbɛ a yen ko, kamin dɔndɔ min chenɛ n fa faen ni, a basan a boo gbɛɛ a, a ni wan nɔ Chisɔsi ya kɔɔ.
42014003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a basan Fayisii chɛ n na, a ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu mmɔ ni mɔɛ a baun suin tee ma, kɔ a ma a fɔ ni ka?”
42014004	Chɛɛ an‑na a ɔ maun fan don. An ma bai ɔ bai fɔ ni. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kamin chɛ bia, mbɛ a‑a a baun. Mbɛ a‑a a boo ka, a ta‑a a waa a.
42014005	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo dɔndɔ 'a denɛ bea‑a yii sonɛ ɔ suin tee ma, ni wo 'a ninchi wɛɛ mu, wo e a bɔ wan nɔ bui chɛ a, ae?”
42014006	Chɛɛ bai ɔ bai ma che ni bɔ‑a an da a, a fɔ koe a a ye.
42014007	Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ mɔɛ miin chee‑a ka daun chɛ bɛn chɛ ɔ, an ni wan si tena chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n ya‑a an fandi ko a. Mbɛ a‑a tai chɛ tɛ an gbɛɛ tena, a ɔ,
42014008	“Ni mɔɛ min mbe ma‑a musu si‑a, a‑a i chee an musu si daun chɛ bɛn chɛ ɔ, i ma ta i ni si tena chɛndɛ ya i wandi ko a. Koe min na mu, kɔkɔɛ mɔ chenama dɔ mende cheeen fan mu, min benden mu i ma.
42014009	Mbɛ mɔɛ min sin‑na wo fea gbɛɛ chee ka, ɛ na‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ i ye, a ɔ, i ni i kafai, a ɔ, kaina chɛ ɛ kai chɛ an ko a. Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, e mau‑a wan ta koe a si‑a kaina, baa ɛnden bɛɛ ee min ma.
42014010	Chɛɛ ni an‑na i chee tima ɔ tima bɛnɛ ɔ, ta, mbɛ i si‑a kaina, baa ɛnden bɛɛ ee min ma. Ni i yaa yii na‑a, a ni i tan nɔ si ɔ, ɛ a fɔ‑a wan i ma, a ɔ, i ni ta, a ɔ, i ni si gbakoo kaina. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan basɔmaya a i tena, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, an‑na miin chee ka.
42014011	Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi a sɛ, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ a yii‑a wan. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi a yii, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ a sɛ‑a wan.”
42014012	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a yaa yii chɛ wɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “Ni i‑a daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ bɛn, i ma to nɔ i ni i dia nyɔɛ n fan chee dechee. I ma i suun ma nyɔɛ n dechee chee, a basan nyan tɔɛ n na. A mu koe min na, an bɛɛ i chee‑a wan to tima dɔ mende a an ta daun chɛ bɛnɛ n dɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, mbɛ i ban‑da i 'a pawa ma sɔn‑da koe chɛ ko a, i na‑a min chɛ an ye.
42014013	Chɛɛ ni i‑a daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ bɛn, chɛ n chee miin yɔnden mu. Namaa n chee, i ni tamban tɔɛ n chee, a basan ya te tɔɛ n na.
42014014	Mɔɛ n fan nɛ, miin mbe ee che i ta wai nyima a yɛ‑a. Chɛɛ ni i‑a chɛ ma, e dua ma sɔn‑da wan. Tima min na, mɔɛ miin tanden ni Yataa tena, an mbe ma‑a an kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ, Yataa ɛ a tɔnɔnɛ be‑a wan i ma.”
42014015	Kamin dɔndɔ min ni nɔ si ɔ daun chɛ tena chɛ, an bɛ Chisɔsi a, a‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, a‑a a fɔ wan Chisɔsi ye, a ɔ, “Dua ɛ ma‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, Yataa ɛ miin chee‑a a 'a daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ, tima min na mu, ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da.”
42014016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tima dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ na‑a daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ bɛn fan, mbɛ a‑a mɔ sɛsɛ chee an daun chɛ bɛn chɛ ɔ.
42014017	Tima che‑a kɛn an bɛn chɛ ko a, a‑a bɔi den dɔndɔ a ta wan mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a‑a miin chee, a ɔ, an ni na, a ɔ, a ban‑da ko ɔ ko ɔ bɛn‑da.
42014018	Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, an gbɛɛ‑a a kuu sɔ wan kafai be‑a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Mɔɛ saa saa‑a a fɔ wan bɔi den chɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘N 'na denɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ n 'na sɛnɛ wai a, chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n toen mu n ni ta, n ni a fo nɔ. A fɔ a ye, i ɔ, a ni n kafai.’
42014019	Mbɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘N‑na ninchi tan fan san ka sanche. N toen mu n ni ta an na wɛɛ ɔ. A fɔ a ye, a ni n kafai.’
42014020	Mbɛ a sawan bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘N‑na musu si ka sanche, chɛ ko a, n mbe ee che‑a ta‑a.’
42014021	“Mbɛ bɔi den chɛ yɛ‑a, mbɛ a‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian a kun ti chɛ a. Kun ti chɛ faa tɛ‑a wan gbeden, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ bɔi den chɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘A a gbandia, i ni ta chia kuu chɛ n na, a basan duu tɔnkɔnɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, i ni na yɔn tɔɛ n na, ya te tɔɛ nu, a basan namaa n na.’
42014022	Mɔɛ chɛ n cheeenɛ gbakɔ, a na‑a wan to, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian a kun ti chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a sɔ wai min na, a‑a a chɛ, chɛɛ kaina a ma fa nin bɛ.
42014023	Mbɛ kun ti chɛ‑a a fɔ to a 'a bɔi den chɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘Ta duu sundu kunɛ n na, a basan fia ɔ chia chɛ n na, mbɛ i‑a a din an ma fɔsɛɛ a, min mbe a ma, an ni na, mbɛ n 'na chenɛ a fa‑a.
42014024	N ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ miin chee ka a saa a, mbɛ an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee n 'na daun fen chɛ sima wɛɛ puin an da ɔ.’ ”
42014025	A tima chɛ a, mɔ sɛsɛ bea‑a wan Chisɔsi fɛ, an bɛ ni ta tena miin na. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun an ma, a ɔ,
42014026	“Mɔ kan kɔ kan min mbe na‑a n tena, a ee che ma‑a n fɛ denɛ a, mɔɔ ni n bakoe a dia‑a a ye, a ni ben a fa ma, a ni ben a de ma, a ni ben a 'a denɛ ma, a ni ben a suun ma nyɔɛ ma, a ben a 'a musu wɛɛ ma, a basan an mɔɛ chɛ wandi gbu wɛɛ a.
42014027	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma nyina ni a faa ma koe ma, a ni a ma bɛn mɔnɛ ɔ bia koe a, a basan fa koe a n ko a, a ee che bea‑a n fɛ.
42014028	“Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ toen mu a ni banda a chenɛ sɔ, a ee a kuu sɔ ka dechee. Ɛ si pɛn, a ni a ɔ yen, ni fen nyɔn mbe a boo ɔ. Ɛ a ɔ yen pɛn, ni an kɔpɔɛ chɛ ɛ chen chɛ a ban fan.
42014029	Ni a ma chɛ ma ni, ni a‑a chenɛ gbu kuu si, a ee na‑a kun‑da a ni wai chɛ a ban. Mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ yen‑da fen ma‑a, an mbe a ma yɛn‑da wan.
42014030	An mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, ‘Kamin chɛ‑a a kuu sɔ chen chɛ sɔ‑a, chɛɛ a ma kun ni a ni a a ban.’
42014031	“Mansa dɔndɔ yen ko, soya wu tanɛ ɛ a boo ɔ. A bɔ mansa dɔ mende, soya wu bi fea ɛ min boo ɔ, a toen ni a ni chɛɛ bun a ma. Mansa chɛ, soya wu tanɛ ɛ ka min boo ɔ, a ee ta ka dechee chɛɛ chɛ tena. Ɛ si pɛn, a ni a yii na chii, ni ɛ che wan chɛɛ chɛ chɛ‑a, a e na to ta‑a.
42014032	Ni a ee kun, ɛ to pɔɔ wan, mbɛ a‑a sakana a ta a bɔɛ mansa chɛ tena, min mbe a ma, an ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ.
42014033	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee che ma‑a n fɛ denɛ a, mɔɔ ni a mɔɛ chɛ‑a a kan kɔ sɔ fen kɔ fen na, min mbe a boo ɔ.
42014034	“Kuiɛ nyin fan, chɛɛ ni a ɔ sɛ‑a, mɔ ee che to i ni a ma a dia ni yɛ a ɔ.
42014035	A ma nyin to fen kɔ fen ko a, n mbe ee baa a ma koe a duu gboo wɛɛ ni nyan. A nyin dechee mɔ ni a a dɛ fia ɔ. Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.”
42015001	Tima dɔndɔ a, pawa kain mɔɛ nu, ni mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin nii sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, an gbɛɛ na‑a wan, an too ma sɔ koe a Chisɔsi ma.
42015002	Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an bun‑da gbonyɛ‑a Chisɔsi a, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ ɛ a boo si wan mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ kɔɔ, miin mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, mbɛ an‑na daunɛ chɛ kaina dɔndɔ.”
42015003	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ an tena, a ɔ,
42015004	“Mmɔ a ya, mbɛ sa chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ɛ wo dɔndɔ boo ɔ. Ɛ fen ma, ni dɔndɔ to‑a a ɔ? Ɛ sa bi kɔnɔntɔ kun ma kɔnɔntɔɛ chɛ n to wan daun chɛ a. Ɛ ta wan a ya a kan‑da sa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, min to‑a a ɔ ka. Ɛ a ya a kan fan, aan a ni a yen.
42015005	Ni a‑a a yen, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a sa a kan ma,
42015006	mbɛ a yɛ‑a a a a waa a. Mbɛ ɛ a dia nyɔɛ n chee wan kaina dɔndɔ, a basan a baachenɛ n na, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘N‑na n 'na sa yen. Mmɔ buɔdia bɔ.’
42015007	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ dɔndɔ gbe, min mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, ni a‑a a kan kɔ sɔ a 'a ko yama an na, buɔdia chenama ɛ ma‑a wan banda bu ɔ. An buɔdia chɛ sin gbu benden mu buɔdia chɛ ma, min sien mu mɔ bi kɔnɔntɔ kun ma kɔnɔntɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin‑na an yii na chii an fandi a, mbɛ mɔ tandenɛ mu an na. Mbɛ an sin kan kɔ sɔ ee to an ma.”
42015008	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai dɔ mende tɛ an ye, a ɔ, “Kain gbɛnsɛn tanɛ ɛ musu boo ɔ, kain ba nu. Ni dɔndɔ gbe to‑a a ɔ, ɛ fen ma? Mɔ a yen, mbɛ ɛ dambo a man fan, mbɛ a‑a chenɛ chɛ doee gbɛɛ ɔ fian fo, ɛ a ya a kan‑da a 'a kain chɛ a kɔdɛɛ, aan a ni to a ɔ, a ni a yen.
42015009	Ni a‑a a yen, ɛ a dia nyɔɛ n chee‑a wan, a basan a baachenɛ n na, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘N‑na n 'na kainɛ yen. Mmɔ buɔdia bɔ.’
42015010	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ dɔndɔ gbe, min mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, ni a‑a a kan kɔ sɔ a 'a ko yama an na, maeka n bɛɛ bu ɔ dia‑a ka wan.”
42015011	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to an ye, a ɔ, “Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, den kaien fea ni min boo ɔ.
42015012	Tima dɔndɔ che‑a wan, mbɛ denɛ dɔma‑a a fa ɔ tisa, a ɔ, a fa ni a boo fenɛ du, a ni a ta be a ma. Mbɛ a fa wɛɛ‑a a boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ du, mbɛ a‑a a 'a denɛ dɔma chɛ ta be a ma.
42015013	Tee kuun den ben‑da kɛn, denɛ dɔma chɛ‑a a ta boo fen chɛ n gbɛɛ ma tachɛ, mbɛ a bɔ‑a a waa duu chɛ ɔ, kɔpɔɛ chɛ ɛ a boo ɔ. A ta‑a chɛnyɛ min dɔ, a ɔ ni yansan kaka. A ni kɛn nɔ an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, a‑a kɔpɔɛ chɛ gbɛɛ yɔn baa baa chia an fan na.
42015014	Kɔpɔɛ gbɛɛ min ni a boo ɔ, a ban‑da wan fion. Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, kɔnkɔ wa dɛgbɛ na‑a an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ koe ɔ bun‑da gbɛa‑a a ma.
42015015	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ a ta‑a wai chɛ koe a chɛnyɛ den dɔndɔ tena. Kamin chɛ wɛɛ‑a a a ta wan a 'a kɔɛnya kuii ɔ a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, a ni a 'a kɔɛnya n da kɔ.
42015016	A ni wan a yii ma, a ni kɔɛnya chɛ n da tɔɛ daun, chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma fen kɔ fen be ni a ma.
42015017	“Chɛɛ ko bonda chɛ si‑a kɛn a a, a danka a, a‑a yiimatɛ ma sɔn fan gbɛ, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Daun fenɛ ɛ wan fa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ boo ɔ, an mbe min daun a tɔɛ ɛ to. Chɛɛ n sin yen ko gbɛ nɛ, n mbe fa‑a kɔnkɔɛ a.
42015018	N mbe ee chɛ ɔ si chɛ tena. N mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan, n ni ta, n ni fa tan. Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ a ye, n dɔ, “Fa, n‑na ko yama ma i a, wo fea Yataa a.
42015019	A ma nyin to i ni n ya i 'a denɛ a. N ya yɔ i 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ.” ’
42015020	Mbɛ a‑a a a sɔ wan, mbɛ a‑a chia bia ta koe a a fa tan‑da. “Chɛɛ a to‑a pɔɔ wan, mbɛ a fa‑a a yen, mbɛ a ma chinchinɛ‑a a fa bia. Mbɛ a fa‑a bui sa a a, mbɛ a‑a a 'a denɛ tan. Mbɛ a bea‑a a kaa ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a kɔndɔn buɔdia wandi ɔ.
42015021	Mbɛ den chɛ ɔ, ‘Fa, n‑na ko yama ma i a, wo fea Yataa a. A ma nyin to i ni n ya i 'a denɛ a.’
42015022	Chɛɛ a fa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, ‘Wo a a gbandia. Wo ta na doma kai nyima nyima a, wo ni a don a ma. Wo chia don a boo ma, mbɛ wo‑a kɔɔwa don a chen na.
42015023	Mbɛ wo ta‑a, wo‑a ninchi busi ya, min maen mu buchɛ buchɛ. Mbɛ wo‑a a fa, mbɛ mmɔ‑a daun chɛ buɔdia bɔ.
42015024	Koe min na mu, n 'na den chɛ faen fan ni, chɛɛ a yɛ‑a gbɛ fɔɛ ɔ. A toen fan ni a ɔ, chɛɛ a yen‑da gbɛ.’ Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ daunɛ chɛ‑a an mbe ta‑a tɔmbɔɛ don‑da a boo ɔ.
42015025	“Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe ma tena tima min na, denɛ kaima chenama ni sɛnɛ ɔ wan wai chɛ‑a. Mbɛ a na‑a duu ɔ. A foenɛ a an 'na chenɛ baima, mbɛ a‑a kuiɛ fenɛ kuiɛ a min, a basan mɔɛ n tɔmbɔ don kuiɛ a.
42015026	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ a‑a a fa 'a wai chɛ den dɔndɔ chee, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa ni fen mbe ma tena chenɛ a.
42015027	Mbɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘I dɔɛ an na‑a ka bi. Chɛ ko a, i fa‑a a ma wan, nn‑na ninchi busi chɛ fa, a mu min na, i dɔɛ yɛ‑a a fɔɛ a a sun da a.’
42015028	“Chɛɛ denɛ chenama chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, a faa tɛ‑a wan gbeden, mbɛ a ban‑da don koe a chenɛ a. Mbɛ a fa bɔ‑a, a‑a a tan. Mbɛ a‑a a ma nande, a ɔ, a ni don chenɛ a.
42015029	Chɛɛ den chɛ‑a a fɔ wan a fa ye, a ɔ, ‘A yen bɛ, san sɛsɛ wa chɛ gbɛɛ ko a, n wai‑a wan i ye yɔ yɔnɛ. A sin, n ma i da a kuiɛ yɔn ni tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, i ma fen kɔ fen be ni n ma. I ma ba den bɛɛ be ni n ma, min mbe a ma, nn bɛɛ n dia nyɔɛ n na, nn ni tee dɔndɔ 'a buɔdia wɛɛ bɔ.
42015030	Chɛɛ i 'a den chɛ‑a i boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ɔ yufuyufu dani ma gbankanda an ma. A yɛ‑a kɛn gbɛ sanche, i‑a ninchi busi chɛ an fa a ye.’
42015031	Mbɛ a fa ɔ, ‘N 'na den, mɔ fea an mbe tima ɔ tima ko a, a sin, fen kɔ fen min mbe n boo ɔ, i wan ta mu a a.
42015032	Chɛɛ mɔɔ ni mmɔ‑a buɔdia bonda chɛ bɔ, a mu min na, i dɔɛ chɛ faen fan ni, chɛɛ a yɛ‑a gbɛ fɔɛ ɔ. A toen fan ni a ɔ, chɛɛ a yen‑da gbɛ sanche.’ ”
42016001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Nyan tɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, wai chɛ mɔɛ ni min boo ɔ. Wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ, an ni nyan tɔɛ chɛ boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ kun ma. Mɔɛ n na‑a a ɔ yian fan nyan tɔɛ chɛ a, mbɛ an wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ, ɛ a boo fenɛ ɔ yayi tena wan.
42016002	Chɛ fɛ, a‑a mɔɛ a ta wan wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ chee‑a. A na‑a kɛn, nyan tɔɛ chɛ‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, ‘N‑na koe miin na min, a si i ma, an na ma di n ye.’ A ɔ, ‘Na,’ a ɔ, ‘i ni i konan a si i 'a wai gbɛɛ ma, e min chɛ tee.’ A ɔ, ‘A mu min na,’ a ɔ, ‘e ee che to ma‑a n boo fen kan kɔ kan kun ma.’
42016003	Mbɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ‑a a fɔ a yiima ɔ, a ɔ, ‘N ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe fen ma‑a gbɛ sanche.’ A ɔ, ‘N kun ti ɛ na tena wan gbɛ n bɔ‑a wai chɛ ɔ.’ A ɔ, ‘N dɔ ma gbɛ sɛnɛ sa koe a,’ a ɔ, ‘a yɛ to,’ a ɔ, ‘n mbe mau‑a wan n ni ben ben fen fuinɛ a.’
42016004	A ɔ, ‘N yii puin‑da, n mbe koe min ma tena,’ a ɔ, ‘min mbe a ma,’ a ɔ, ‘ni an‑na n bɔ wai chɛ ɔ,’ a ɔ, ‘n dia nyɔɛ n ni ma.’ A ɔ, ‘N dia nyɔɛ n mbe ma‑a wan,’ a ɔ, ‘miin mbe an boo si‑a n kɔɔ an 'na chenɛ n na.’
42016005	“Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, a kun ti chɛ 'a kuiɛ ni ka miin ma, a‑a an chee dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a kuiɛ bia mɔɛ saa chɛ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, ‘N kun ti chɛ,’ a ɔ, ‘a 'a kuiɛ minan nyɔn sima ɛ i ma?’
42016006	Mbɛ mɔɛ saa ɔ, ‘Tu kadɔn chɛmɛ sɛi an mbe n ma.’ Mbɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘I 'a kuiɛ gboo yen ko,’ a ɔ, ‘si, i ni a nyɛn yɔ tu kadɔn chɛmɛ naanin an mbe i ma.’
42016007	Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ fean bɔɛ chɛ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, ‘Kuiɛ minan nyɔn sima ɛ i ma?’ Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Chin fen kuu busɛ wu dɔndɔ an mbe n ma kuiɛ a.’ Mbɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘I 'a kuiɛ gboo yen ko,’ a ɔ, ‘si, i ni a nyɛn yɔ busɛ chɛmɛ sɛi an mbe i ma.’
42016008	“Chɛ gbakɔ, kun ti chɛ‑a wai chɛ mɔ kafaen chɛ tando wan. A nii ma a tando ni a 'a kafaya chɛ an ko a. A na‑a a tando yiinadia chɛ an ko a, a‑a min bɔ. Dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n yii na di kaka tachɛ koe a an nyɔn na, a ni ben Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma.
42016009	“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo ni wo dia nyɔɛ n yan wo 'a nyan chɛ n dɔ, wo e miin chɛ‑a nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo dia nyɔɛ n mbe ma‑a wan banda bu ɔ, miin mbe an boo a si‑a wo kɔɔ.
42016010	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a danaya yian koe ɛndenɛ ɔ, ɛ danaya yian fan ko chenama wɛɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma danaya yian ni koe ɛndenɛ ɔ, a ee che danaya a ko chenama wɛɛ ɔ.
42016011	Ni wo ma danaya bɔ ni dunya chɛ ɔ nyanɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee to‑a nɔ, a ni nyanɛ chɛndɛ konan wo ma.
42016012	Mbɛ a sin, ni wo ma danaya bɔ ni mɔ dɔ mende ta boo fenɛ kun ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee to‑a nɔ a ni dan wo a, a ni fenɛ be wo ma wo wandi ta a a.
42016013	“Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che ma‑a wai chɛ mɔɛ a kun ti fea kɔɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, dɔndɔɛ ko a ee dia a ye a ni che dɔndɔɛ ɔ. Ɛ kooya be‑a wan dɔndɔɛ ma, a ni ben a bɔɛ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, e ee che wai chɛ‑a Yataa ye, mbɛ i‑a wai chɛ kɔpɔɛ wɛɛ ye dɔndɔ a.”
42016014	Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an‑na Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ n na min kɛn, an‑na an pɔsɛ a di wan a ma, a mu min na, an kɔpɔ koen ni kaka.
42016015	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔɛ n mu wo a, miin mbe an fandi n ma mɔ chɛndɛ n na an bɔɛ n ya kɔɔ, chɛɛ Yataa‑a wo faa n dɔ sɔn fan. Mɔ gbu n mbe fenɛ min ya fen ma kawaenɛ a, an mu fen ma nyamuienɛ a Yataa tena.
42016016	“Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma, a basan da a bai chɛ n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na miin nyɛn, an ni wan nɔ gbau gbau a. Mɔɛ n ni wan an kɔɔ aan Chɔn na‑a tima min na, min ni yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. A ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, an mbe gbɛ fɔ tena mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ a sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ gbɛ butuinɛ an chɛ tena don koe a an mansaya chɛ kɔɔ.
42016017	A ɔ gbɛ dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ni ban. Sawa chɛ ɛnden bɛɛ nan gbu sin, a ka koe a a gba ɔ, a ɔ gbɛ kaka, a ni ben dunya ban koe ma.
42016018	“A yɛ to, ni mɔ kaima kan kɔ kan ban‑da a 'a musu ɔ, mbɛ a‑a musu dɔ gbɛɛ si, mɔɛ chɛ‑a waa an ma basan ka musu a, a ee fuu ɔ min na, Yataa ya a. Mɔ kaima min sin mbe musu si‑a min chɛɛ ban‑da a ɔ, a mɔ kaima chɛ wɛɛ‑a waa an ma basan ka musu a, a ee fuu ɔ min na, Yataa ya a.”
42016019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tima dɔndɔ a, nyan tɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min toen ni a ma chii koe a koa baa gbanden ba n dɔ, mbɛ a sin tee ɔ tee a, a ni buɔdia wa an dɔ.
42016020	Yɔn tɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Dasayɔsi. A gboo gbɛɛ ma banden fan ni tɛɛ mɛsɛ a. An ni na wan a a, nyan tɔɛ chɛ 'a chenɛ da a.
42016021	An ni chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, yɔn tɔɛ chɛ ɛ kun fan a ni daun fen pɛɛ mɛsɛ chɛ n sɔn sɔn a daun koe a a boo ɔ. A tima chɛ n na, wuu n bɛɛ ni na wan, an mbe a 'a tɛɛ chɛ n na fian fian.
42016022	“Tima che‑a wan, mbɛ yɔn tɔɛ chɛ fa‑a, mbɛ maeka n ta‑a a a, an‑na a si kai Ebeami baima, banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ chɛ gbakɔ, nyan tɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ fa‑a, mbɛ an‑na a tɔn,
42016023	chɛɛ a ta‑a ta ɔ wan, a ni kaina tɔɔya wa ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a sɛ, mbɛ a‑a Ebeami yen pɔɔ, Dasayɔsi ɛ si ɔ a baima.
42016024	Mbɛ a‑a chee chɛ, a ɔ, ‘Fa Ebeami, n mbe nɛ tɔɔya wa an dɔ ta chɛ ɔ. Chinchin n ma, i ni Dasayɔsi sɔ n tena. A ni a boo ɛndenɛ don yii ɔ, a ni na, mbɛ a‑a a puin n da ɔ, min mbe a ma, n nɛnɛnɛ ma ni chima.’
42016025	“Chɛɛ Ebeami ɔ, ‘N 'na den, i yii na chii, mbɛ tima min na i ni fɔɛ ɔ, Yataa na‑a fen chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan be wan i ma, i toen ni min na. Chɛɛ Dasayɔsi tana, a na‑a ko yawaenɛ dechee an dɔ yen. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, ɛ gbɛ buɔdia wa an dɔ nɛ, i sin mbe tɔɔya ɔ.
42016026	A ka chɛ gbɛɛ ma, son ba an sinden mu mmɔ tɛ mmɔ bɛ. Mɔ ee che ka‑a nɛ a ta wo tena, n mbe ee baa, mɔɛ ka koe ma wo tena, a ben koe a nɛ nn tena.’
42016027	Mbɛ nyan tɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘Fa Ebeami, ni koe n mbe ka wan, n mbe i disa tena, i ni Dasayɔsi a ta fa 'a chenɛ a,
42016028	a mu min na, n dɔ kaima duu n mbe nɔ. A ni ta, a ni an na si, min mbe a ma, an bɛɛ ma na na nɛ tɔɔya chɛ ɔ, n mbe ka min dɔ.’
42016029	“Mbɛ Ebeami ɔ, ‘Mosisi‑a gboo min nyɛn, ɛ wan i dɔɛ n boo ɔ, a basan gboo chɛ n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n‑na miin nyɛn. I dɔɛ n ni an kan. Ni an‑na an kan, an ni an too ma sɔ bai chɛ n ma, miin mbe an dɔ.’
42016030	Mbɛ nyan tɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ‘Fa Ebeami, chɛ ee kun a ni a ma, an ni an too ma sɔ. Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ ɛ kun fan a ni a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, a ni ta an tena, a tima a mu, an mbe an kan kɔ sɔ‑a an 'na ko yama n na.’
42016031	Chɛɛ Ebeami ɔ, ‘Ni an mbe ee che an too ma sɔ‑a bai chɛ n ma gboo chɛ n dɔ, an mbe ee na‑a che‑a an ni dan a a, ni mɔɛ wɛɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.’ ”
42017001	Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Koe n mbe ma‑a wan, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu n ni dɛ ko yama ma ɔ. Chɛɛ a yau gba mɔɛ chɛ ko a, min mbe a bɔ mɔ gbu a dɛ‑a ko yama ma ɔ.
42017002	Ɛ nyan fan a mɔ bonda chɛ ko a, sen kanɛ ni chii a kan na, mbɛ an ni a a dɛ yii wa ɔ. A mɔɛ chɛ e na to a ma‑a, mɔɛ miin dan‑da ka n na sanche, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni dɛ ko yama ma ɔ.
42017003	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, ni wo ma‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a. “Ni wo bɔɛ‑a ko yama ma wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ a, wo a fɔ a ye, mbɛ a‑a ko yama an ma ka. Ni a dɔn‑da a ma, mbɛ a‑a ko yama an ma ka, wo wo boo bɔ a 'a ko yama maen chɛ ɔ wo a.
42017004	Ni a sin‑na ko yama ma wo a, si tena wɔnfea wɛɛ tee ma, mbɛ ɛ wo disa tima ɔ tima a 'a ko yama chɛ ko a, wo wo boo bɔ a 'a ko yama maen chɛ n dɔ wo a.”
42017005	Mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ Mansa Chisɔsi ye, an dɔ, “Basan nn ma, nn 'na danaya Yataa a, a ma ni munda.”
42017006	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni danaya ɛnden bɛɛ yɔ chin fen kuu dɔma ɛndenɛ, a ni wan wo ɔ Yataa ko a, wo ni kun fan wo ni a fɔ kɔn ba chɛ ye, wo ɔ, a kuu ni bɔ, a ni ta, a ni sɔ yii ɔ. Mbɛ a ma‑a, yɔ wo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ.
42017007	“Mmɔ a ya, mbɛ bɔi denɛ ɛ wo dɔndɔ boo ɔ. Ni a na‑a a ka i 'a fen fɛn tena, chɛ ma, ni a na‑a a ka i 'a sa kun ma fɛn tena, e ee a fɔ a ye, i ɔ, a pɛn ni daunɛ chɛ.
42017008	Chɛɛ e a fɔ‑a wan, i ɔ, a ni daun fenɛ ɔ bɛn i ye. Mbɛ a na‑a fen kɔ fen na, e min daun. Ni i ban‑da daunɛ chɛ‑a, a tima an na mu, ɛ a ta daunɛ chɛ.
42017009	Wai bɔ ee bɔi den chɛ ma, koe min na mu, ɛ nɔ wai chɛ an chɛ koe a, i toen mu a ni min chɛ.
42017010	Wo wɛɛ, wo e ka wan. Ni wo ban‑da koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma‑a, n mbe wo sɔ‑a min chɛ koe a, wo e a fɔ‑a wan, wo ɔ, bɔi den gbama mu wo a. Wo ɔ, wai bɔ ee wo ko a.”
42017011	Mbɛ Chisɔsi bun‑da to a 'a tachɛ ma, a ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A ben‑da wan Samayia chɛnyɛ a sanɛ, a basan Kadidi chɛnyɛ a.
42017012	A ni don tena gbɛ konko dɔndɔ an dɔ, mbɛ kamin tanɛ n‑na a tan, gbandi yama yama bɔen ni miin gboo gbɛɛ ma. An sɔ‑a wan pɔɔ,
42017013	mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ, an dɔ, “Chisɔsi, kan mɔ, i dimu, chinchin nn ma.”
42017014	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an yen, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo ta, mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin mbe mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, an ni wo ma fɛn, ni wo baunden fan mu.” An to‑a ta an na mɔɛ chɛ n gbu tena, mbɛ an baun‑da chia a.
42017015	An dɔndɔ‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ a baun‑da, a yɛ‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, ɛ ta‑a Yataa tando‑a, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a.
42017016	Mbɛ a‑a a wandi ɔ fuin fan duu ma fugbu Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, mbɛ a‑a a wai bɔ ka. Samayia mɔɛ ni an kamin chɛ a.
42017017	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na an mɔ tanɛ n gbɛɛ baun fan. Mɔ kɔnɔntɔɛ chɛ nɛnɛ nu, an ma an ya wɛɛ a yɛ ni to.
42017018	Chɛɛ sonda chɛ dɔndɔ gbe an yɛ‑a, Yataa wai bɔ koe a.”
42017019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni ta, i 'a danaya‑a i baun.”
42017020	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu miin ni Fayisii n na, an‑na Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, an dɔ, tima minan na mu, Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da, koe n fan mbe ee ma‑a, miin mbe a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ tima gbu an che‑a ka Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yian koe a.
42017021	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, ‘I ya a na nɛ, a yen ko nɛ.’ Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, ‘A yen ko pan.’ A mu min na, Yataa 'a mansaya ɔ yianden fan mu gbɛ wo nan tɛ.”
42017022	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Tima ɛ che‑a wan, tima min na mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe ee na‑a ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ. A tima chɛ a, wo e na‑a to‑a wan n ni ma wo tɛ ɔ tee dɔndɔ gbe wɛɛ ko a.
42017023	Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan wo ye, an dɔ, ‘Wo wo ya a ta pan, wo ni Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ yen.’ Dɔ n sin dɔ, ‘A yen ko nɛ.’ Chɛɛ wo ma bea an mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ ta koe a an kaina chɛ nu.
42017024	A mu min na, ni banda bea‑a kan kɔ kan, mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ yen fan, ni fen ko ma‑a ka. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tima min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ a ɔ yen‑da wan.
42017025	Chɛɛ chɛ e na to ma‑a, n mbe tɔɔ‑a wan kaka, mbɛ mɔ bonda chɛ siman‑na an kan kɔ sɔ n na.
42017026	Tima min na, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe yɛ‑a dunya chɛ ɔ to, koe n mbe ma‑a ka wan, yɔ an ni buɛ min dɔ Nowa 'a tima a.
42017027	Mɔɛ n ni wan ko ɔ ko ma‑a Nowa 'a tima a, mɔ gbu ɛ ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan min ma. Mɔɛ n ni daun fenɛ n daun fan, a yɛ to, an mbe an min. Mɔɛ n ni musu fuu wan, musu n sin ni be wan kai ma. Chɛ an ni a a, yii nii ma dunya ya ni tima min na, mbɛ Nowa sɛ‑a dɛndɛ wa dɛgbɛ ɔ. Mbɛ yii‑a an 'na dunya gbu gbɛɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a an gbɛɛ ban.
42017028	Koe n mbe ma‑a ka wan, yɔ an ni buɛ min dɔ Dɔti ta tima wɛɛ a. Mɔɛ n ni daun fenɛ n daun fan, a yɛ to, an mbe an min. An ni fee fenɛ n san fan, an mbe ta‑a an ma tachɛ‑a. An ni chin fenɛ n chin fan, mbɛ an‑na chenɛ n sɔ.
42017029	Chɛɛ tee min ma Dɔti bɔ‑a Sɔdɔn duu ɔ, Yataa‑a a ma wan ta yii‑a a ka banda a, a basan senɛ n na, miin ni gbandi yɔ ta. An yii‑a wan a ka banda a, yɔ sona ɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ fa nɔ an duu chɛ ɔ.
42017030	Ɛ ma‑a ka wan to an tee chɛ ma, tee min ma, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe n 'na gbasaya ɔ yian‑da.
42017031	“A tee chɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe ma‑a a 'a chenɛ baa ma, a ma na to a don koe a chenɛ a, a boo fenɛ n ya koe a. A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a to, mɔɛ min mbe ma‑a a 'a sɛnɛ ɔ, a wɛɛ ma yɛ to duu ɔ ta koe a a 'a chenɛ a.
42017032	Wo wo yii na chii, koe min si‑a Dɔti 'a musu a.
42017033	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi fɔɛ ma sansa, an mɔɛ chɛ ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe a yii bɔ‑a a fɔɛ ɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
42017034	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ a tima chɛ a, mɔ fea n mbe ma‑a wan sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ sofa dɔndɔɛ ma yɛɛ ma, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ ya‑a, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ sin to‑a nɔ.
42017035	Musu fea n mbe ma‑a wan tu chɛ‑a mun dɔndɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ ya‑a, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ to‑a nɔ.”
42017037	Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n dɔ, “Fa, koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a mende?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni wo ee doa n yen fen su a tindanɛ, mbɛ wo ee an kaina chɛ sɔn‑da.”
42018001	Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi‑a tai tɛ wan a fɛ denɛ n tena. Tai chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan an na, mbɛ a nyin fan an ni samunɛ ma ti bia tima ɔ tima ko a. A yɛ to, an gboo ɔ ma fa samun chɛ a.
42018002	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Chiti tɛ mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min nii ma chian ni Yataa ma ɛnden bɛɛ a. A yɛ to, a nii ma baa sɔn a fian mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan ma.
42018003	An duu dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ɔ, fuinya musu dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ. A na‑a mɔɛ ma siibia wan an chiti tɛ mɔɛ chɛ a. Chɛ ko a, a ni na wan chiti tɛ mɔɛ chɛ tena tima ɔ tima a, a ɔ, a ni kaa a tɛ an tɛ an fea a koɔ nyɔɛ a.
42018004	Tima ɔ yansama ko a, chiti tɛ mɔɛ chɛ ma dɔn ni, a ni bai chɛ sa. Chɛɛ a danka a, a‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘N mbe ee chian Yataa ma, n sin ma baa be ni n fian mɔ gbu wɛɛ ma.
42018005	Chɛɛ fɔ ni n‑na fuinya musu chɛ 'a tea be a ma. A‑a n na mankan gbɛ kaka. Ni n ma kaa a tɛ ni a 'a bai chɛ ma, n mbe ee na‑a fɔɛ‑a a boo ɔ.’ ”
42018006	Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “Wo‑a a a min, chiti yama 'a tɛ mɔɛ chɛ‑a bai min fɔ.
42018007	Ni ɛ chɛ ma wan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ tea be‑a wan a 'a mɔɛ n ma, miin mbe di chɛ‑a a tena su ɔ tee a. A ee wo sa‑a tima ma, tee ɔ tee a.
42018008	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ɛ a a gbandia‑a wan, a ni tea be an ma. N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe yɛ‑a wan to dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, n mbe na‑a mɔɛ n tan‑da wan to, miin kai faenɛ ɛ ma‑a n na?”
42018009	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ chɛ n tena, miin yii na tɛen ni an 'na ko chɛndɛ ma an na, min‑na a ma, an‑na an yii na chii, mbɛ an fisa mɔ ɔ mɔ ma Yataa tena.
42018010	A ɔ, “Tima dɔndɔ a, kamin fea n ta‑a wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ samun chɛ tena. Dɔndɔɛ ni Fayisii an na, mbɛ dɔndɔɛ sin ni pawa kain mɔɛ an na.
42018011	“Fayisii chɛ ka‑a wan mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n baima, mbɛ a ta‑a a sɔ‑a a dɔndɔ gbe a, mbɛ a‑a a kuu sɔ samunɛ chɛ‑a. A ɔ, ‘Yataa, en wai, n ta n mbe ee ka yɔ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ nu. N ta, n ma bɛnchɛ, n sin ma kafa tɔ a. A yɛ to, n mbe ee waa ma basan musu a, n ma miin fuu ni. Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe ka wan, chɛɛ n ta, n mbe ee ka. En wai, a mu min na, n mbe ee ka yɔ pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ pande sɔ ɔ.
42018012	Wichi kan kɔ kan dɔ, n mbe sunɛ bia tee fea, i fai koe a. N mbe n boo fenɛ n du wan si tena tanɛ a, mbɛ n‑na a si tena dɔndɔɛ be i ma.’
42018013	“Chɛɛ pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ sɔ‑a wan pɔɔ, a 'a ko yama maenɛ koa‑a a ma, a‑a a kunɛ a bun gbudu. Mbɛ a‑a a boo bun a kaa ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Yataa, chinchin n ma. Ko yama ma mɔɛ mu n na.’ ”
42018014	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te gbɛ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ pawa kain mɔɛ chɛ e na to yɛ‑a a 'a chenɛ a, Yataa na‑a a ya wan mɔɛ a, min tanden ni a tena. Chɛɛ Yataa ma Fayisii chɛ ya ni mɔɛ a, min tanden ni a tena. Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi a sɛ, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ a yii‑a wan. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi a yii, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ a sɛ‑a wan.”
42018015	Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a wan an 'na den toa n bɛɛ a, an dɔ, Chisɔsi ni a boo bun an ma, mbɛ a‑a an dua. A fɛ den chɛ n‑na chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n na gban fan.
42018016	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ma wan, an na‑a den chɛ n na a tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo a ma den mɛsɛ n ni na n tena. Wo ma an ma bai. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ miin maen mu yɔ den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, Yataa an mbe ma‑a an 'na mansa a.
42018017	N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma dɔn ni, a ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ yɔ den mɛsɛ chɛ nu, an mɔɛ chɛ ee ma‑a Yataa ta mɔɛ a.”
42018018	Chu kun ti dɔndɔ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Ticha, i wɛn mu mɔ chɛndɛ a, n mbe fen ma, n ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn?”
42018019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “E ma ka ma, i ni n chee mɔ chɛndɛ a? Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma mɔ chɛndɛ a, mɔɔ dechee Yataa dɔndɔ gbe.
42018020	I‑a sawa n sɔn fan, Yataa‑a miin be Mosisi ma. A ɔ, wo ma waa ma basan mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na, a ɔ, wo ma mɔ fa, ni sawa ma min fɔ ni, a ɔ, wo ma kanka chɛ, a ɔ, wo ma fania fɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, a ɔ, wo ni kooya be wo fa ma, a basan wo de a.”
42018021	Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “N mbe wan sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ bia tena, aan a ka n den mɛsɛ tɔɛ ma a sɔ sanche ma.”
42018022	Chisɔsi‑a chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ a ɔ, “Ko dɔndɔ gbe an to‑a, e min ma gbɛ. I boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ ma tachɛ. Mbɛ i‑a a kɔpɔɛ chɛ ya, i‑a a be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, i ni nyanɛ ma sɔn banda bu ɔ. Ni i‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ i na‑a i ma‑a n fɛ denɛ a.”
42018023	Chɛɛ kɛn kamin chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min, a faa yɔn‑da wan a ɔ benden ba a. Koe min na mu, nyan tɔ wa ni a a.
42018024	Chisɔsi‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ bai chɛ‑a kamin chɛ faa yɔn kaka, mbɛ a ɔ, “A ɔ gbɛ nyan tɔɛ ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
42018025	A ɔ gbɛ kaka nyan tɔɛ ko a, a ni don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a ni ben ninchi don koe ma miichi woe a.”
42018026	Mɔɛ miin‑na bai chɛ a min, an dɔ, “Mbɛ nyɔn mbe bauncha chɛ ma sɔn‑da gbɛ?”
42018027	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔ gbu ee che koe min ma‑a, Yataa ɛ an ma.”
42018028	Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “A yen ko, nn‑na nn kan kɔ sɔ fen kɔ fen na, mbɛ nn bea‑a i fɛ.”
42018029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chenɛ, musu, suun ma nyɔɛ nu, mɔ woo mɔɛ nu, a basan denɛ n na, an nyin fan. Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe an dɔndɔ wɛɛ to‑a, Yataa 'a mansaya a ta koe a ya ɔ ma,
42018030	Yataa ɛ a kɔ‑a wan dunya chɛ ɔ gba sɛsɛ ko a, an fen chɛ a, min ni a boo ɔ a kɔ ma a. A yɛ to, Yataa ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be‑a wan a ma dunya nama ɔ, min mbe na tena.”
42018031	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n bɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin na‑a bea ka a fɛ. Mbɛ an dechee ma tɛenɛ to‑a, mbɛ a ɔ, “Mmɔ yen ko ta‑a gbɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Nɔ mu ko ɔ ko ɛ na tena bɔ‑a a a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a min nyɛn suun, a si n ma, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ.
42018032	An mbe n be‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, Chu mɔ ma miin na. An mɔɛ chɛ n mbe na‑a n ma yɛn‑da wan, an ni n main, mbɛ an‑na an da yii chɛ n ma.
42018033	An mbe n gbasi‑a wan faa a, mbɛ an‑na n fa. Chɛɛ tee fea, a sawan bɔɛ, n mbe n kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ.”
42018034	Chɛɛ a fɛ den chɛ n nii ma ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ ni, a si a 'a bai chɛ ma, koe min na mu, a fasai buɛ ɔ nunden fan ni an ma.
42018035	Mbɛ Chisɔsi gbɛn‑da Chɛiko duu baima. A tima chɛ a ni, a‑a ya te tɔ dɔndɔ tan si ɔ chia tɔnfɛ, ɛ fen fuinɛ a.
42018036	Ya te tɔɛ chɛ, a‑a fanka fanka chɛ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ a min, mbɛ a‑a tisa chɛ, ni fen mbe ka ma‑a.
42018037	Mbɛ mɔɛ n‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “Chisɔsi, an mbe ka ben tena, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ.”
42018038	Mbɛ a‑a yee tɛ gbankon, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi, i wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin n ma.”
42018039	Mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni ka sɔ ɔ ya ɔ, an sɔnkɔ‑a a ma, an dɔ, a ni a da a tɔn. Chɛɛ a tima gbu a ni gbɛ, a‑a yee tɛ a ben a kɔma ma, a ɔ, “I wɛn bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, chinchin n ma.”
42018040	Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a a ma, an na‑a ya te tɔɛ chɛ a a tena. A che‑a kɛn a baima, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ,
42018041	“I toen mu n ni fen ko chɛ i ye?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “Fa, a ma n ya a ni ka.”
42018042	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I 'a danaya‑a i baun. Kaina yen gbadan.”
42018043	A ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ ya a ka‑a, mbɛ a‑a kaina yen gbadan. Mbɛ a‑a a sɔ Chisɔsi fɛ, ɛ ta‑a Yataa tando‑a. Mɔ fanka fanka chɛ‑a koe chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, an gbɛɛ‑a tando be wan Yataa ma.
42019001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi don‑da Chɛiko duu ɔ, ɛ ben‑da, ɛ ta‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
42019002	Yatina, pawa kain mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ ni wan nɔ Chɛiko, min tɔ ni Sakayɔsi. Nyan tɔ wa ni a a.
42019003	A toen ni a ni mɔɛ chɛ gbu yen, an ni min chee Chisɔsi. Chɛɛ a ni wuu, a nii che Chisɔsi yen‑da, koe min na mu, fanka da a ni koo.
42019004	Chɛ fɛ, a ta‑a wan bui a fanka chɛ ya ɔ, mbɛ a sɛ‑a kɔnɛ ɔ, ɛ to kaina a ni Chisɔsi yen ben‑da. An ni kɔn chɛ chee, an dɔ, sikamɔ kɔnɛ.
42019005	Chisɔsi che‑a kɛn an kaina chɛ, a‑a a ya a sɛ wan kɔn chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a Sakayɔsi yen. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Sakayɔsi, a a gbandia, i ni puin, a mu min na, n mbe bi i wan 'na sondaya a.”
42019006	Sakayɔsi‑a a a gbandia wan, mbɛ a puin‑da kɔn chɛ ɔ. A ta‑a wan Chisɔsi a a 'a chenɛ a, a bu ɔ diaen ba ɛ.
42019007	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ‑a koe chɛ ɔ yen ka, an bun‑da gbonyɛ‑a, an dɔ, “A yen bɛ, ɛ ta‑a kamin chɛ 'a sondaya a, min mbe ee sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma.”
42019008	Chɛɛ Sakayɔsi sɔ‑a wan Mansa Chisɔsi ya kɔɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Fa, n yen ko, n boo fenɛ gbɛɛ, n mbe a du‑a wan si tena fea a, mbɛ n‑na a kaka dɔndɔɛ be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. A sin, ni n‑na mɔ ɔ mɔ kafa fen kɔ fen na, n mbe a a yɛ‑a wan a ma, si tena naanin dɔ.”
42019009	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “A ka bi ma, i 'a chenɛ‑a bauncha ma sɔn. A mu min na, i dan‑da gbɛ Yataa a, yɔ Ebeami danden ni a a buɛ min dɔ.
42019010	N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n naen mu dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n fan yan koe a, miin toen mu a ɔ Yataa ma, n ni an kun ka.”
42019011	Mɔɛ n‑na an too ma sɔ wan Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ n ma. A to‑a wan koɔ‑a an tena, mbɛ a‑a tai tɛ an ye. Koe min na mu, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ nii ma yansan to. A sin, a ni wan mɔɛ chɛ n yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ni ka gbɛ na‑a na a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da.
42019012	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Mansa den dɔndɔ bɔ‑a wan a 'a chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a gboo mansa chɛnyɛ dɔ mende ɔ pɔɔ. A toen ni kun ti wa min ni nɔ, a ni a si mansa a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa a.
42019013	A e na to ta‑a, a‑a a 'a bɔi den tanɛ n chee wan, mbɛ a‑a sanu gbɛnsɛn tanɛ du an ma dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, a ɔ, ‘Wo a ɔ yen, wo e fen nyɔn na sɛ‑a kɔpɔɛ chɛ kun ma, n‑na miin be ka wo ma, n mbe na ka tachɛ chɛ ɔ.’
42019014	Chɛɛ a 'a chɛnyɛ ɔ mɔɛ n nii ma to ni a a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, kɛn a‑a chia bia ta koe a, an‑na mɔɛ n sɔ wan a san‑da chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ. An dɔ, an ni a fɔ kun ti wa chɛ ye, mbɛ an ma to ni mansa den chɛ a, a ni ma an 'na mansa a.
42019015	“Chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a wɛɛ, an‑na kamin chɛ ma wan mansa a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a a waa a. A ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a a ma wan, an‑na a 'a bɔi den tanɛ chɛ n chee a chen kɔɔ. A toen ni a ni a ɔ sɔn, ni bɔi den chɛ n‑na fen nyɔn ma sɔn dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
42019016	Bɔi denɛ saa na‑a wan, mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Fa, i 'a sanu gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔɛ chɛ, i‑a min be n ma, n‑na sanu gbɛnsɛn tan fan na sɛ a kun ma.’
42019017	Mbɛ mansa chɛ ɔ, ‘En wai, en wai, wai chɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu i a. I‑a danaya min bɔ ka fen denɛ kun ma, n mbe i ma‑a wan ya ɔ sɔɛ a, duu tan kun ma.’
42019018	Mbɛ bɔi denɛ fean bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ na‑a, a ɔ, ‘Fa, i 'a sanu gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔɛ chɛ, i‑a min be n ma, n‑na sanu gbɛnsɛn duu an na sɛ a kun ma.’
42019019	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ chɛ wɛɛ ye, a ɔ, ‘N mbe i ma‑a wan ya ɔ sɔɛ a, duu kun duu kun ma.’
42019020	“Mbɛ bɔi denɛ dɔ mende na‑a, a ɔ, ‘Fa, i 'a sanu gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔɛ chɛ yen ko, i na‑a min be n ma. N‑na a a chii wan pɔchitanɛ ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a sa tena ɔ bɛn.
42019021	N chian‑da wan i ma, a mu min na, i faa a kɔɔen ba mu. E mɔɛ n kuu kɔ gba an ma i ta a, a yɛ to, i ta ma chin fenɛ min na, e an ya.’
42019022	Mansa chɛ ɔ, ‘I wan, wai chɛ mɔ yama mu i a. I wandi gbu da a kuiɛ chɛ, n mbe an ya‑a, mbɛ n‑na chiti tɛ i wakoe ma. I‑a a fɔ, i ɔ, i na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n faa a kɔɔen ba mu, mbɛ n mbe mɔɛ n kuu kɔ gba an ma n ta a, mbɛ n mbe ee chin fenɛ min chin, n mbe an ya.
42019023	Ni i na‑a chɛ ɔ sɔn fan a si n ma, fen‑na a ma, i ma n 'na kɔpɔɛ sa ni banchi ma? N ni n na‑a yɛ tima min na, n ni chini sima tan‑da wan a kun ma.’
42019024	“Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin ni ka a 'a tindanɛ, a ɔ, ‘Wo sanu gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ bia a boo ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a a be bɔi den chɛ ma, sanu gbɛnsɛn tan chɛ ɛ ka min boo ɔ.’
42019025	Chɛɛ an dɔ, ‘Fa, sanu gbɛnsɛn tanɛ ɛ gbɛ a boo ɔ.’
42019026	Mbɛ mansa chɛ ɔ, ‘N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe a 'a wai ma ti bia chɛndɛ chɛ, ɛ wai ma munda sɔn fan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee a 'a wai ɛnden chɛ ma ti bia, ɛ fo‑a wan an wai ɛnden chɛ wɛɛ a.
42019027	Mbɛ a si n chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ n sin ma, miin nii ma to ni, n ni ma an 'na mansa a, wo na an na nɛ, mbɛ wo‑a an fa n ya kɔɔɛ ma.’ ”
42019028	Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn tai chɛ tɛ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a sɔ‑a wan a fɛ den chɛ n ya ɔ, a sɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
42019029	Mbɛ an che‑a Bɛfachi konko baima, a basan Bɛtani a. Konko chɛ n ni kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an kaa a, min tɔ ni Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ. Nɔ ni, mbɛ a‑a a fɛ den fea n na ta a ya ɔ.
42019030	A ɔ, “Wo ta konko chɛ ɔ wo ya ɔ. Ni wo che‑a nɔ, wo e sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ tan‑da wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma si nin bɛ min kɔ, a chiienɛ ɛ. Wo a fuin, mbɛ wo na‑a a a nɛ n tena.
42019031	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a wo ɔ tisa, fen mu wo e a fuin‑da, wo a fɔ a mɔɛ chɛ ye, wo ɔ, mansa an mbe a ma gbɔsɔɛ bɔ tena a a.”
42019032	Mbɛ an‑na chia bia, mbɛ an ta‑a, an‑na a tan, yɔ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye.
42019033	An to‑a sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ fuin tena wan, mbɛ a ti n‑na an dɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Fen mu, wo e sofɛ chɛ fuin tena?”
42019034	An bɛɛ, an dɔ, “Mmɔ 'a mansa an mbe a ma gbɔsɔɛ bɔ tena a a.”
42019035	Mbɛ an na‑a sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a a tena. Mbɛ an‑na an 'na doma kai n bɔ wan, mbɛ an‑na an dɔ sa sa sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ chɛ kun ma, Chisɔsi si koe a a ma. Chɛ maenɛ gbakɔ, an basan‑da wan a ma a sɛ koe a sofɛ chɛ gbu kɔ.
42019036	A ni kɛn sofɛ chɛ kɔ ɛ ta‑a, mɔɛ n‑na an 'na doma kai n dɔ fuin fan chia a.
42019037	Ɛ gbɛ gbɛn‑da Chuusaɛn baima, chia kunɛ a yiienɛ ni kaina min ɛnden na, Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ kaa a, a fɛ den fanka fanka chɛ nu, an‑na a kuu sɔ wan Yataa tando‑a, an kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a. An bu ɔ ni di kaka kamaya koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a, an‑na miin dɔ yen.
42019038	An dɔ, “Mansa Yataa ni mansa chɛ dua, min na‑a a tɔɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ n ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ Yataa a, a sin tando ni ma Yataa ma.”
42019039	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu fanka chɛ ɔ, miin ni Fayisii n na, an dɔ, “Ticha, a fɔ i fɛ denɛ n ye, an ni sɛmbɛ bai bonda chɛ sima fɔ‑a.”
42019040	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni an‑na an ma maun bɛɛ, sen chɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe a kuu sɔ‑a wan yee tɛ‑a.”
42019041	Chisɔsi gbɛn‑da kɛn gbɛ gbɛdɛn Chuusaɛn duu baima, mbɛ a‑a nɔ yen, mbɛ a puyɛ‑a di a a ko a.
42019042	Mbɛ a ɔ, “A ni nyan‑da wan wo ko a, ni wo wan Chuusaɛn mɔɛ nu, wo na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan bi, wo e min ma, wo ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ Yataa a. Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, a ɔ nunden fan mu wo ma.
42019043	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, tima ɛ che‑a wan, wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ni wo a tindan. An mbe gbuu tɛ‑a wan wo ma, mbɛ an‑na wo a bɛn piɔ. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ kun mbe ee che‑a bɔ‑a a ɔ.
42019044	An mbe wo 'a duu chɛ te‑a wan gbɔkɔɔ, mbɛ an‑na wo wandi sa a kun ma. Wo 'a chen kan kɔ kan mbe ee to‑a sɔ ɔ. Wo 'a chenɛ n sɔ sen kan kɔ kan mbe ee to‑a sa ɔ a nyɔn kundu a. Chɛ n mbe ma‑a koe min na, wo nii ma a ɔ sɔn ni, mbɛ tima an nii nɛ, tima min na Yataa na‑a na wo baun koe a.”
42019045	Mbɛ Chisɔsi don‑da Yataa 'a kata ɔ, nɔ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n tan nɔ fee fen ma tachɛ‑a, mbɛ a bun‑da an gbain‑da.
42019046	A ɔ, “A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, a 'a chenɛ ɛ samun chɛ koe an na. Chɛɛ wo‑a a 'a chen chɛ mun gbɛ kanka n nun tena an na.”
42019047	Tee ɔ tee a gbɛ, Chisɔsi ni kanɛ chɛ wan Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an toen ni an ni Chisɔsi fa. An bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, a basan ya ɔ sɔɛ gbakoo n na, an yiima ni dɔndɔ.
42019048	Chɛɛ an nii ma chia kan kɔ kan sɔn ni a ma koe a, a mu min na, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ na‑a an too be wan Chisɔsi ma a tima chɛ a. An nii ma to ni a da a bai dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni fo an too a.
42020001	Tee dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni wan mɔɛ n kan‑da Yataa 'a kata ɔ, ɛ ta‑a Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian‑da an na. Mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an na‑a a tena, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, a basan Chu gbakoo n na.
42020002	Mbɛ an dɔ, “E koe miin ma ka, gbasaya minan mbe i boo ɔ, an ma koe a? An gbasaya chɛ sin, nyɔn‑na a be i ma?”
42020003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka wɛ, n mbe wo ɔ tisa, tisa dɔndɔ gbe a. Wo chɛ fɔ n ye.
42020004	Chɔn ni yii chɛ wan mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Yataa an fea mɔ gbu a, minan na‑a an gbasaya chɛ be a ma?”
42020005	Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ te, “Mmɔ ɛ fen fɔ kamin chɛ ye? Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ Chɔn 'na gbasaya ka‑a Yataa an tena, ɛ a fɔ‑a wan, mbɛ fen na‑a a ma, mmɔ nii ma dan ni Chɔn na.
42020006	Chɛɛ ni mmɔ sin‑na a fɔ to, mbɛ Chɔn 'na gbasaya ka‑a mɔ gbu an na, mɔ fanka fanka min mbe ka nɛ, an mbe mmɔ bon‑da wan. A mu min na, an gbɛɛ danden fan mu a a, mbɛ Chɔn ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an na.”
42020007	Chɛ ko a, an‑na a fɔ wan Chisɔsi ye, an dɔ, “Nn ma a ɔ sɔn, ni Chɔn na‑a a 'a gbasaya chɛ ma sɔn kaina.”
42020008	Mbɛ a wɛɛ ɔ, “N bɛɛ n mbe ee a ɔ yian wo a, ni nyɔn 'na gbasaya ɔ mu, n mbe koe chɛ n ma tena.”
42020009	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ gbɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tena, a ɔ, “Kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, min‑na yadi sa, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n ya a kun ma fɛn koe a. Mbɛ a bɔ‑a wan a waa a, mbɛ a ta‑a tachɛ ɔ tima ɔ yansama ko a.
42020010	Chin fen chɛ kai tima che‑a kɛn, yadi ti chɛ‑a a 'a bɔi denɛ dɔndɔ a ta wan yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n tena. A toen ni an ni a ta chin fenɛ be a ma, mbɛ a na‑a a a a ye. Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na bɔi denɛ chɛ a boan fan, mbɛ an‑na a a yɛ a boo a senɛ a.
42020011	Mbɛ yadi ti chɛ‑a a 'a bɔi denɛ dɔ mende a ta wan to a fean bɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a wɛɛ a boan fan to, mbɛ an‑na mauma koe n gbɛɛ sɛ a ma, mbɛ an‑na a wɛɛ a yɛ a boo a senɛ a.
42020012	Mbɛ a to‑a wan to nɔ, mbɛ a‑a a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ dɔ mende a ta to, a si tena sawan bɔɛ ɔ. Yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a wɛɛ ma gba gba wan, mbɛ an‑na a a nyɔndɔn a bɔ yadi gbu ɔ.
42020013	An‑na chɛ gbɛɛ ma kɛn, yadi ti chɛ‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘N mbe fen ma gbɛ? Ka wɛ, n mbe n faa ma denɛ gbu a ta mɔɛ chɛ n tena. N danden mu a a, an mbe baa be‑a wan a nan ma.’
42020014	Chɛɛ yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a 'a den chɛ yen kɛn na‑a, an dɔ, ‘Yadi ti chɛ 'a denɛ wandi gbu an nɛ. Mmɔ a fa, min mbe a ma, boo fen chɛ gbɛɛ ni ma mmɔ ta a.’
42020015	Mbɛ an bɔ‑a a a yadi gbu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a fa.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ta yiima ɔ, yadi ti chɛ ɛ fen ma‑a yadi kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n na?
42020016	Ɛ na‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fa, mbɛ a‑a yadi chɛ be a kun ma fɛn mɔ dɔ mende n ma.” Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an dɔ, “Gbuama sɛkɔ.”
42020017	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ma fɛn fan, mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a a fɔ, wo ɔ, gbuama bai an nɛ, mbɛ fen mu a nyɛndenɛ ɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ ‘Chen sɔ mɔɛ n na‑a ban senɛ min dɔ, an dɔ, a ma nyin, an gbu ma‑a gbɛ senɛ kuu ba wandi a, chenɛ gbu ko a.’
42020018	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan bea‑a an sen chɛ ma, ɛ a ma kai‑a wan. A sin to, ni sen chɛ sin bea‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ɔ funku funku‑a wan.”
42020019	A tima chɛ a, Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ nu, an bɛ Chu n tɛ ɔ mɔɛ n na Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi ni tai chɛ tɛ tena a si an fan ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an toen ni, an ni a bia nɔ a gba chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ an chian‑da wan mɔɛ n ma.
42020020	An nii ma chinɔ ni a a tɛ koe a, a basan chia yanɛ a, min mbe a ma, an ni a bia. Chɛ ko a, an‑na mɔɛ n na dɛ wan a ma, a ɔ tisa koe a yiima yiima tisa n na. An toen ni, a da a bai ni a wandi ma tachɛ an ma. Mbɛ an‑na a be chɛnyɛ kun ma kɔfana ma, chɛnyɛ sawa a tachɛ koe a.
42020021	Mbɛ sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a, an dɔ, “Ticha, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ e bai miin gbɛɛ fɔ, tea mu. Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ee i boo don mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ, chɛɛ e mɔɛ n kan Yataa 'a bai miin gbɛɛ a, tea mu a a.
42020022	Chɛ an fɛ mu, a yen ko, mmɔ ɛ pawa chɛ tima ɔ tima Domi kun ti wa tena. I‑a pawa chɛ be koe yen ka ma, a nyin fan?”
42020023	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a an 'na yaa kɔɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a wɛɛ‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ,
42020024	“Wo kain gbɛnsɛn dɔndɔ yian bɛ n na. Nyɔn ya kɔɔɛ ɛ ka a ma, a basan a tɔɛ a?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Domi kun ti wa an nɛ.”
42020025	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mbɛ fen chɛ nu, miin mu Domi kun ti wa boo fenɛ a, wo an be a ma. Mbɛ wo yɛ‑a, fen chɛ nu, miin mbe Yataa ko a, wo‑a an be Yataa ma.”
42020026	An tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, a‑a tisa n yɛman buɛ min dɔ. An ma chia kan kɔ kan sɔn ni, an mbe bɔ min na, an ni a bia. Mbɛ an‑na an ma maun.
42020027	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Sadusii n na, an bɛɛ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena. Sadusii n nii ma dan ni a a, mbɛ mɔ gbu ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ wan a ka saya ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye,
42020028	an dɔ, “Ticha, Mosisi‑a sawa chɛ an nyɛn mmɔ ko a, a ɔ te, ni mɔɛ suun ma nyɔɛ kaima fa‑a, a ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a 'a musu to, an fea ma den suun ni min na, a ɔ, a dinden fan mu a ma, a ɔ, a ni chenɛ da mun, a ni denɛ n suun a ma. A sin an mbe an den chɛ n ya wan, a suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ 'a denɛ n na.
42020029	Tima dɔndɔ a, kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, an kai wɔnfea an de‑a an fɛn suun. Mbɛ a wɛn ni chenan ka an gbɛɛ ma, a‑a musu si. Chɛɛ a ma den suun ni musu chɛ ma, mbɛ a fa‑a.
42020030	Mbɛ denɛ kaima fean bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ‑a musu dɔndɔ gbe chɛ si to musu a. Mbɛ a wɛɛ fa‑a ka wan.
42020031	A sawan bɔɛ wɛɛ‑a a si ka wan to musu a. Mbɛ a wɛɛ fa‑a. Ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma‑a to suun ma nyɔ wɔnfea chɛ n gbɛɛ a. An gbɛɛ fa‑a ka wan an ma den kan kɔ kan suun ni musu chɛ ma.
42020032	A danka a, mbɛ musu chɛ wɛɛ gbu fa‑a.
42020033	A yen ko gbɛ, a ma‑a suun ma nyɔɛ wɔnfea chɛ n gbɛɛ 'a musu a, a e na to fa‑a. Ni tee che‑a, faa mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni an kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, ɛ ma‑a nyɔn 'na musu a gbɛ?”
42020034	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Musu si basan kai sɔnɛ a, ɛ nɛ wan dunya chɛ ɔ,
42020035	chɛɛ a ee an dunya nama chɛ ɔ, min mbe na tena. Yataa ɛ mɔɛ miin ya‑a mɔ chɛndɛ n na, an kɔɔ sɔ koe a a ka saya ɔ, an mbe ee musu si‑a, n mbe ee baa an ni kai sɔn.
42020036	An mbe ee fa‑a to, koe min na mu, an mbe ma‑a wan yɔ maeka nu. An mbe ma‑a wan Yataa 'a denɛ n na, koe min na mu, Yataa‑a an kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.
42020037	Min sin sien mu mɔɛ n kɔɔ sɔ koe ma, a ka saya ɔ, Mosisi wandi‑a a ɔ yian fan gboo chɛ ɔ, a‑a min nyɛn, mbɛ ɛ ma‑a wan tea gbu a. A mu min na, a‑a a ɔ yian fan an gboo chɛ ɔ, Yataa bɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ a ya a kɔn den chɛ ɔ, ta ni min dɔ, chɛɛ a nii a minda. A‑a bai sa nɔ wan a si Mansa Yataa ma, a ɔ, Yataa mu a wan na Ebeami ko a, a basan Aisaki an fea Chekɔpi a. A ɔ, an mbe a wan fai.
42020038	Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ chɛndɛ ba n fan mbe Yataa fai. Mɔɛ min faen mu, a ee Yataa fai. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ tima ɔ tima Yataa tena.”
42020039	Mbɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ n‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, “Ticha, i‑a an 'na tisa yɛman fan chɛndɛ chɛ.”
42020040	Chɛ gbakɔ, kai nii ma to mɔ ɔ mɔ a, Chisɔsi ɔ tisa koe a tisa dɔ mende a.
42020041	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ n dɔ, kunka mansa ɛ bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ. Fen mu chɛ ɛ ma?
42020042	A mu min na, Mansa Defidi wandi‑a a fɔ wan Yataa tando si gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ wan n 'na Mansa ye, a ɔ, “Si nɛ n boo nyima ɔ,
42020043	aan n ni i chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n don i kɔɔ, n ni an popoya i ya kɔɔ.” ’
42020044	Defidi wandi gbu yen ko gbɛ, a ɔ, kunka mansa chɛ benden mu a ma. Chɛɛ mɔ kun ma kundi ee koa, a ni ben i ma. A fɔen mu gbɛ, mbɛ kunka mansa chɛ, a bɔ‑a Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ. Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma?”
42020045	Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ too ma sɔenɛ ni Chisɔsi ma, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ,
42020046	“Wo wo kun ma fɛn Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ. An toen mu doma wa wa n don koe a, an mbe ben ben. Ni an ta‑a machiti an dɔ, an toen mu mɔɛ n ni basɔmaya kɔndɔnɛ chɛ an na. Ni an ta‑a mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n bɛɛ a, an toen mu si tena ma bɛnden ba an na. Daun chɛ bɛnɛ wɛɛ ɔ, an toen mu si koe a gbakoo n fan tɛ.
42020047	An mbe fuinya musu n boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ daun fan, kafaya ɔ. An gba yama chɛ ma nun koe a, an mbe samun dɔ yansama an chɛ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa ɛ an tɔɔya‑a wan, a ni ben mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma.”
42021001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ, a‑a nyan tɔɛ chɛ n yen Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, an mbe an boo fenɛ n na bea‑a kɔpɔ sa kakaa chɛ ɔ.
42021002	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a wan to, a‑a fuinya musu yɔnden dɔndɔ yen, ɛ kɔpɔ gbɛnsɛn den fea a bea‑a.
42021003	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Tea a, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ fuinya musu yɔnden chɛ, a‑a kɔpɔɛ min na bea ka, a benden mu mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a kɔpɔɛ miin na bea ka.
42021004	A mu min na, chɛ n‑na min be ka, an‑na a ya a chenama an kun ma, chɛɛ musu chɛ ta kɔpɔɛ gbɛɛ an nɛ a boo ɔ. Kɔpɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan mbe ee to a boo ɔ.”
42021005	Mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan Yataa 'a kata ma dia‑a tena. An dɔ, a ni nyin kaka, a nyanden mu sen nyima nyima n fan dɔ. A sin, mɔɛ n‑na an boo fenɛ siama be wan kata chɛ gbu a bonchen koe a. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ,
42021006	“Wo e ka kawa‑a sanche fenɛ miin gbɛɛ ma, tima ɛ che‑a wan, an gbɛɛ ni yɔn. Ɛ te‑a wan, a sen kan kɔ kan mbe ee to‑a sa ɔ a nyɔn kundu a.”
42021007	Mɔɛ dɔ n‑na a ɔ tisa wan, an dɔ, “Ticha, koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a sɔyɔ? Ni tima sin ma‑a che‑a, koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a tima min na, fen mbe ma‑a an tɔmɔsi a?”
42021008	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo kun ma fɛn, an ma na wo woo. Koe min na mu, mɔ sɛsɛ mbe na‑a wan n tɔɛ ɔ, an mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, an fan mu Chasi a, kunka mansa. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ to, an dɔ, tima gbu, an che‑a ka. Chɛɛ wo ma bea an fɛ.
42021009	Ni wo sin‑na chɛɛ n ma tɔɛ a min, a basan butuinɛ n bɛɛ a, wo ma chian. Koe min na mu, koe chɛ n pɛn pɛn fan mbe ma‑a. Chɛɛ chɛ an mbe ee a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ tima gbu che‑a.”
42021010	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to an ye, a ɔ, “Chɛnyɛ n mbe butuinɛ chɛ‑a wan an nyɔn na, mbɛ chɛnyɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ n‑na chɛɛ chɛ an bɛ chɛnyɛ mɔ dɔ mende n na.
42021011	Duu gboo ɛ samba‑a wan a ma chianden ba a, dunya gbɛɛ ɔ dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Kɔnkɔ ma chianden ba ɛ ma‑a wan kaina sɛsɛ, a basan gbandi n na. Banda wɛɛ a, ko ma chiandenɛ n mbe ma‑a wan, a basan koe tɔmɔsi chenama dɔ mende n na.
42021012	Chɛɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe e na to ma‑a, an mbe wo bia‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa wo ma. An mbe ta‑a wan wo a, wo gbɛmbo koe a, mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n na, mbɛ an‑na wo sa pimbi chenɛ a. An mbe na‑a wan wo a, mansa n chen kɔɔ, an bɛ kun ti n na. An mbe chɛ gbɛɛ si‑a wan wo a, a si n bakoe ma.
42021013	Chɛɛ chɛ an mbe ma‑a tima a wo ko a, wo ni Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na.
42021014	Wo wo yiima ɔ bɛn tima ya ɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ma na wo faa gbaa wo wandi ma fɔ koe a.
42021015	Koe min na mu, n mbe bai n don‑da wan wo da a, mbɛ n‑na yiimatɛ be wo ma. Ni wo‑a bai kan kɔ kan fɔ, wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n mbe ee che‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a a ma.
42021016	Wo woo mɔɛ n fandi gbu, ni wo suun ma nyɔɛ nu, a basan wo baachenɛ n fandi gbu a, an fan bɛɛ gbu n mbe wo be‑a kun ti n ma. An mbe wo dɔ n sin fa‑a wan.
42021017	Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ mbe too‑a wan wo a, a si n ma.
42021018	Chɛɛ wo kundi dɔndɔ wɛɛ wo kun ma, a ee to‑a a ɔ.
42021019	Ni wo sɔ‑a gban, wo e kun‑da wan wo ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn wo wandi ko a.”
42021020	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni wo‑a Chuusaɛn duu yen, soya n‑na a a tindan, a tima a mu wo e a ɔ sɔn‑da, mbɛ a ɔ ma yansan to a te koe a.
42021021	A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ miin mbe ma‑a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ni bui sa a a kɔnkɔɛ n dɔ. Miin mbe ma‑a nɛ Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ, an ni bɔ nɛ. Mɔɛ miin mbe tanda n bɛɛ ɔ, an ma yɛ to nɛ.
42021022	A mu min na, a tee chɛ n ma, Yataa ɛ duu chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n tɔɔ‑a wan. A tima an na mu, koe miin gbɛɛ nyɛndenɛ ɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ a si an ma, an mbe bɔ‑a a a.
42021023	A tima chɛ a, koe n mbe yaua‑a gba, miin mbe bu ma musu n nan gbu tan‑da, a basan kuinsa n na. Faayɔn ba ɛ na‑a wan chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, a sin, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ chɛ n mɔnɛ‑a wan.
42021024	An chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n mbe an dɔ n fa‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na an dɔ n ma yɔnɛ n na, chɛnyɛ dɔ mende tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ. A sin, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, an mbe gbasaya din‑da wan Chuusaɛn mɔɛ n ma, aan an ta tima ni ban.”
42021025	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Da fii koe n mbe bun‑da wan ma‑a kau a, ni tee, a basan tɔmbuaka n na. Faayɔn ba basan kɔndɔfii wa a, an mbe ma‑a wan chɛnyɛ n dɔ, dunya ma. Chianɛ ɛ ma‑a wan mɔɛ n dɔ, a si yii wa n tu kuiɛ ma, a basan an fonfo yii kuiɛ a.
42021026	Mɔɛ n mbe bɔn‑da wan a ma chiandia a, ni an‑na an yii na chii koe chɛ n ma, miin mbe na tena ma‑a dunya ɔ. Koe min na mu, gbasaya fenɛ miin gbɛɛ ɛ banda a, an dɔ ɛ ma‑a wan a ka an gba n dɔ.
42021027	Mbɛ an mbe n yen‑da wan, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe ma‑a na‑a gbasaya wa ɔ dugbu ɔ. A yɛ to, n mbe ma‑a wan man‑da Yataa 'a manɛ a.
42021028	Ni koe chɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ ma‑a, wo wo faa bia, wo yiima diaenɛ ni ma. Koe min na mu, a ɔ ee yansan‑da to, mbɛ Yataa‑a wo kun ka.”
42021029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tai chɛ tɛ an tena, a ɔ, “Wo wo yii na chii wɛ foa kɔnɛ ma, a basan kɔnɛ tɔɛ n na.
42021030	Ni wo‑a an yamba n yen, an mbe pɔmbɔ‑a, a ni ma gbɛ wo yii ma, mbɛ sama ɔ ma yansan to.
42021031	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, ni wo‑a koe chɛ n yen ma‑a, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ tima ɔ ma yansan to, Yataa ni a 'a mansaya ɔ yian.
42021032	“N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe ma‑a pɛn, wo nyɔn sima chɛ n mbe e na ban dunya ɔ.
42021033	Dunya gbɛɛ ɛ ban‑da wan, chɛɛ n da a bai ee ka‑a a gba ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
42021034	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wo wandi kun ma fɛn. Wo ma daun chɛ ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a, a basan gbɛ a kɔɔen minɛ a. A yɛ to, wo ma dunya chɛ ɔ faagbaa n sa wo kun ma. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ni n 'na tima che‑a, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe a ma wan, n ni wo tɛnɛ.
42021035	A mu min na, a tee chɛ, ɛ ma‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ma dunya ɔ tɛnɛ ma koe an na.
42021036	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, a yɛ to, wo samunɛ chɛ tee ɔ tee a. Wo samunɛ chɛ, wo ni gbasaya ma sɔn koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ bia koe a, miin mbe na tena wo tan‑da, mbɛ wo‑a an dɔ tandin. A yɛ to, wo samunɛ chɛ, wo ni che sɔ‑a n chen kɔɔ, wo kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ a, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na‑a tima min na.”
42021037	Chisɔsi ni kanɛ chɛ wan tee ɔ tee a Yataa 'a kata ɔ. Ni tee na‑a bea, a ni ta wan mbɛ a chi‑a duu dɔndɔ ɔ, Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ ɔ.
42021038	Ni banda ɔ ka‑a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni na wan a tena Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, sau ɔ sau ma an too ma sɔ koe a a ma.
42022001	Mbɛ tima ni gbɛ che an na bɛn chɛ ko a, min tɔ ni biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛnɛ. An ni an bɛn chɛ chee wan to, an dɔ kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ.
42022002	A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an toen ni an ni Chisɔsi fa nun dɔ. Koe min na mu, an chianden fan ni mɔɛ n ma na gbunɛ a bea.
42022003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Chudasi. A tɔɛ ma sien fan ni to, an dɔ, Isikayɔti. Sitana bea‑a wan an Chudasi chɛ fɛ.
42022004	Mbɛ a ta‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin mbe Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ nu, a basan poesi n ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, Yataa 'a kata kun ma. Mbɛ a‑a a kun puin an na, a si Chisɔsi ma tachɛ koe ma.
42022005	An bu ɔ dia‑a wan kaka, mbɛ an dɔn‑da an ni kɔpɔɛ ɛnden be a ma.
42022006	Mbɛ a dɔn‑da dɔbɛn chɛ ma. Mbɛ a bun‑da a ya a kan‑da, ɛ chia chɛndɛ chɛndɛ ma sɔn buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi ma tachɛ koe a, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n mbe ee kun, an ni min dɔ sɔn.
42022007	Mbɛ biidi dɛnfɛ daun tee chɛ che‑a. A tee chɛ a ni, an ni sa tɔngbɔɛ n fa, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a.
42022008	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Pita sɔ, an fea Chɔn na, a ɔ, “Wo ta, wo ni daun fenɛ ɔ bɛn, mmɔ ɛ min daun‑da, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a.”
42022009	Mbɛ an dɔ, “I toen mu nn ni kaina minan dɔ bɛn daun fen chɛ daun koe a?”
42022010	Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, “A yen ko, ni wo ma‑a wo kunɛ a don‑da duu ɔ, kaminɛ ɛ wo tan‑da wan, ɛ ta‑a yii a da ɔ. Wo bea a fɛ, wo ni don chen chɛ a, ɛ don‑da min na.
42022011	Mbɛ wo‑a a fɔ chen ti chɛ ye, wo ɔ, n toen mu n ni a ɔ sɔn, ni dumu gbu ɛ mende, n mbe kun bɔ a ɔ daun fen chɛ daun kaina, mmɔ bɛ wo gbɛɛ a.
42022012	Ɛ dumu ɔ bɛnden ba yian‑da wan wo a, banda chenɛ banda a. Wo ko ɔ ko ɔ bɛn nɔ.”
42022013	Mbɛ an ta‑a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a bai miin gbɛɛ fɔ an ye, a bɔ‑a wan a a. Mbɛ an‑na daun fen chɛ gbu ɔ bɛn, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a.
42022014	Mbɛ kun bɔ a ɔ daun chɛ tima chɛ che‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi si‑a wan daun chɛ tena, an bɛ a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na.
42022015	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Kun bɔ a ɔ daun fen chɛ daun koe a di wan n ye kaka mmɔ bɛ, n mbe na to mɔnɛ ɔ bia‑a.
42022016	Koe min na mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ n mbe ee daun fen chɛ sima daun‑da to. Ni n‑na a daun to, fɔ dechee tima min na Yataa‑a a 'a mansaya ɔ yian, mbɛ a‑a a 'a mɔɛ n kun ka fion.”
42022017	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a kɔpu ya, gbɛ ni min dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo kɔpu chɛ bia, mbɛ wo‑a chɛ sima kai kai a a wo nyɔn ma.
42022018	Koe min na mu, n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ n mbe ee gbɛ chɛ min‑da to, aan Yataa ni a 'a mansaya ɔ yian.”
42022019	Mbɛ a‑a biidi chɛ dɔndɔ ya. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ kai kai, mbɛ a‑a a du du an ma, a ɔ, “N gboo an nɛ, n mbe min be tena wo ko a. Wo chɛ ma tima ɔ tima, wo yii na chii koe a n na.”
42022020	An ban‑da kɛn kun bɔ a ɔ daunɛ chɛ‑a, a‑a an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma kɔpu wɛɛ a. A‑a a ya wan, mbɛ a ɔ, “N wii an nɛ, n mbe min na bɔn tena wo ko a. Yataa ɛ an ya tena, mbɛ a‑a dɔbɛn nama chɛ a 'a mɔɛ n na.
42022021	“Chɛɛ wo a yen bɛ, mɔɛ min mbe na tena n ma tachɛ‑a, ɛ nɛ si ɔ daun chɛ‑a mmɔ bɛ an na.
42022022	N fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe na tena wan fa‑a, yɔ Yataa‑a a ɔ bɛn buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ koe chɛ miin mbe mɔɛ chɛ tan‑da, a yau gba a ko a, mɔɛ min mbe n ma tachɛ‑a.”
42022023	Mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n bun‑da an nyɔn dɔ tisa‑a, ni nyɔn mbe na tena ko bonda chɛ sima ma‑a an tɛ ɔ.
42022024	Mbɛ an bun‑da an nyɔn kɔɔsa bia‑a, a si mɔɛ ma, min mu mɔ chenama a an tɛ ɔ.
42022025	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mansa nu, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma Chu mɔ n na, an mbe an 'na gbasaya yian fan an na. Chɛɛ an mansa chɛ dɔ n sin mbe an fandi chee wan mɔɛ n dia nyɔɛ n na.
42022026	Chɛɛ wo tana, wo ma ma ka yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu. Mɔɛ min toen mu a ni ma mɔ chenama a wo tɛ ɔ, a ni ma yɔ den mɛsɛ, mbɛ wo ya ɔ sɔɛ wɛɛ ni ma yɔ bɔi denɛ.
42022027	Koe min na mu, mɔ fea n yen ko. Dɔndɔɛ ɛ si ɔ, dɔndɔɛ sin mbe na‑a daun fenɛ a a tena, ɛ a be a ma. Nyɔn mu mɔ chenama a an fea chɛ tɛ ɔ? Mɔɛ min mbe ka si ɔ, a bɔɛ ɛ daun fenɛ be‑a a ma, an mu mɔ chenama a. Chɛɛ n mbe wo tɛ sanche wo ma wai n fan chɛ koe a.
42022028	“Wo to‑a wan n fɛ tima ɔ yansama ko a, n 'na ko yawaenɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ.
42022029	A sin, Fa‑a gbasaya be buɛ min dɔ n ma ma koe a mansa a, n bɛɛ n mbe an gbasaya chɛ be‑a wo wɛɛ ma.
42022030	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, tima min na Yataa ɛ n 'na mansaya ɔ yian‑da, mmɔ bɛ ɛ daunɛ chɛ‑a wan to, mmɔ ni mmɔ min, daun chɛ bɛn ba chɛ ɔ. A tima chɛ a, wo wɛɛ wo e ma‑a wan mansa n na, mmɔ 'a Isɔɛɛ dambi tan kun ma fea chɛ n kun ma.”
42022031	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ Pita ye, a ɔ, “Saimɔn, a yen ko, Yataa dɔn‑da Sitana ye, a ni wo gbɛɛ ɔ siman, yɔ sɛnɛ sa mɔɛ ɛ chin fenɛ ɔ fɛ buɛ min dɔ.
42022032	Saimɔn, chɛɛ n‑na samunɛ chɛ i ko a, i chenɛ ni sɔ gban i 'a danaya ɔ n na. A sin, ni i‑a i ya a yɛ to n ma, a ma i bɔɛ n bɛɛ, an chenɛ ni sɔ gban an 'na danaya ɔ n na.”
42022033	Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Fa, chɛɛ n ma bɛnden fan mu, an ni mɔ fea sa pimbi chenɛ a dɔndɔ a, mbɛ an‑na mɔ fea fa kaina dɔndɔɛ.”
42022034	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Pita, n ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee sayi chɛ ma, e kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a wan gba sawa, a si n sɔn koe ma i boo ɔ.”
42022035	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo yii na chii tima chɛ a, tima min na n na‑a wo sɔ Yataa 'a bai ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. Wo nii ma ta ni kɔpɔ a wo boo ɔ, wo ma ta ni bɔɔ a, a basan kɔɔwa fean bɔɛ wɛɛ a. Fen kɔ fen ma gbɔsɔɛ‑a wo bia wan a tima chɛ a?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Fen kɔ fen ma gbɔsɔɛ ma nn bia ni.”
42022036	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, ni kɔpɔɛ ɛ mɔɛ min boo ɔ, a ni a ya, a basan a 'a chia a tachɛ bɔɔɛ a. A sin, ni chɛɛ chɛ mɛ ee mɔɛ min boo ɔ, a ni a 'a doma kai ma tachɛ, a ni dɔndɔ san.
42022037	Wo e chɛ ma‑a koe n na, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, mɔɛ n mbe n bia‑a wan, yɔ an mbe sawa yɔn mɔ wa chɛ n bia buɛ min dɔ. N ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ chɛ sin fan mbe ma‑a. Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko min nyɛnden mu, a si n ma, ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a.”
42022038	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Fa, i ya a na, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ fea n yen ko nɛ.” Mbɛ a ɔ, “A kun‑da gbɛ.”
42022039	Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, yɔ a ni a ma buɛ min dɔ tee, mbɛ a ta‑a Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
42022040	An che‑a kɛn nɔ, a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo samunɛ ma ti bia, Sitana ma na a ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a.”
42022041	Mbɛ a ka‑a wan an baima ɛnden na, mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban, mbɛ a bun‑da samunɛ chɛ‑a.
42022042	A ɔ, “Fa, ni i 'a dɔbɛnɛ mu, a ma ko yawaen chɛ ni ka n teen na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ta faa ma koe, an ma ma. Chɛɛ i ta faa ma koe, an ni ma.”
42022043	Mbɛ maeka ka‑a banda bu ɔ, mbɛ a bɔ‑a a ya a, mbɛ a‑a faa be a ma.
42022044	A faa yɔn‑da wan a ɔ benden ba a, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Taa min ni bɔ tena a ma, a maen fan ni yɔ wii, ɛ bɔn‑da kaka duu ma.
42022045	A ban‑da kɛn samun‑da, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a a fɛ den chɛ n tena. A‑a an tan fan sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, an bɛɛ faa n yɔnden ba ni, min‑na a ma, an gboo ɔ fa‑a.
42022046	Mbɛ a‑a an na kunɛ, a ɔ, “Wo e ka sa ɔ chinɔɛ an dɔ? Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ, wo ni samunɛ ma ti bia, ko ɔ ko ma na wo yiima ɔ chɛ chɛ a si Yataa ma.”
42022047	A yen ko, Chisɔsi to‑a koɔ an na, mbɛ mɔ fanka an na‑a, mbɛ an‑na a tan. A fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Chudasi, an ni sɔ ɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ya ɔ. Mbɛ a wan Chudasi chɛ na‑a wan Chisɔsi baima gbɛdɛn, min mbe a ma, a ni Chisɔsi kɔndɔn.
42022048	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Oo, Chudasi, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, e n fan ma tachɛ‑a kɔndɔnɛ ɔ?”
42022049	Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n‑na a ɔ yen kɛn, koe min ni na tena ma‑a, an dɔ, “Fa, nn ni nn 'na chɛɛ chɛ mɛ n ya, nn ni butuinɛ chɛ an na?”
42022050	Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a 'a bɔi denɛ, a ni wan an mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ dɔndɔɛ, a‑a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ ya, a‑a an bɔi den chɛ boo nyima ɔ too tɛ a a gbeda.
42022051	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sɛmbɛ, ɛn to ka.” Mbɛ a tu‑a kamin chɛ too a, mbɛ a too chɛ yɛ‑a to a gba ɔ.
42022052	Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an na‑a na wan Chisɔsi bia koe a. An bɛ an na‑a na poesi n ya ɔ sɔɛ n na Yataa 'a kata ɔ, a basan Chu gbakoo n na. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo nii wo wandi tɔɔ na koe a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ n na wo boo ɔ, a basan kɔn ma tɛenɛ n na, n bia koe a. Kanka ma chianden ma n na.
42022053	Mmɔ‑a tee sɛsɛ wa chɛ gbɛɛ ban Yataa 'a kata ɔ, wo ma n bia ni. Chɛɛ wo ta tima an che‑a ka wo faa ma koe ma koe a, tima min na Sitana 'a gbasaya ɛ wɛ dunya chɛ kun ma.”
42022054	Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi bia, mbɛ an ta‑a a a, Chu n tɛ mɔ wa Yataa a, a 'a chenɛ a. Pita‑a a sɔ wan an fɛ, chɛɛ a ma dɔn ni a ni gbɛn an ma gbɛdɛn.
42022055	A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ n‑na ta sa wan tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a chen chɛ kata tɛtɛ ma, mbɛ an si‑a a fɛ. Pita wɛɛ don‑da wan kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a si‑a an baima ta chɛ fɛ.
42022056	Mbɛ bɔi den musuma tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ‑a a yen si ɔ ta chɛ fɛ. A‑a a ma fɛn tiin, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ ni wan Chisɔsi fɛ.”
42022057	Chɛɛ Pita‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan bai chɛ ma, a ɔ, “N bian musu, n ma kamin chɛ sɔn.”
42022058	Tima ɛnden ben‑da, mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ wɛɛ‑a Pita yen. Mbɛ a ɔ, “I wan, a fɛ denɛ dɔndɔ gbu mu i a.” Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Mɔna, n fan ma.”
42022059	Awa dɔndɔ bendenɛ gbakɔ, kamin dɔ mende wɛɛ chii‑a wan bai chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ ni wan gbu Chisɔsi fɛ, a mu min na, Kadidi mɔɛ mu a wɛɛ a.”
42022060	Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Mɔna, tea kan kɔ kan mbe ee bai chɛ ɔ, e ka min fɔ‑a. N ma a sɔn.” A to‑a bai chɛ an fɔ‑a, mbɛ tɛ kɔnɛ konchee‑a.
42022061	Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a ya a yɛ, mbɛ a‑a Pita ma fɛn. Mbɛ a puin‑da Pita yii ma, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Pita, tɛ kɔnɛ e na to konchee‑a sayi chɛ ma, e kɔɔsa bia chɛ‑a wan gba sawa, mbɛ i ma n sɔn.”
42022062	Mbɛ Pita bɔ‑a baa ma, mbɛ a puyɛ‑a di a.
42022063	Mɔɛ miin ni ka Chisɔsi kun ma fɛn tena, an bun‑da a ma yɛn‑da, an mbe ta‑a a gbasi‑a.
42022064	Mbɛ an yɛ‑a wan to, an‑na a ya a chii koa a, an mbe ta‑a a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Nyɔn mbe ka i gbasi‑a? A ɔ yian bɛ nn na.”
42022065	Mbɛ an yɛ‑a wan to, an‑na a main chia sɛsɛ a.
42022066	Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, mbɛ Chu gbakoo n bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ. Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n bɛɛ ni wan an bɛn chɛ ɔ, a basan Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ‑a a ma, an na‑a Chisɔsi a an chen kɔɔ.
42022067	Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “A ɔ yian bɛ nn na, ni i wan mu kunka mansa chɛ a.” Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni a bɔ‑a n fan da a, wo ee dan‑da a a.
42022068	A sin, ni n‑na wo ɔ tisa, wo ee na‑a n yɛman‑da.
42022069	Chɛɛ a ka gbɛ sanche ma, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe ma‑a wan si ɔ Yataa boo nyima ɔ, gbasaya gbɛɛ ɛ min boo ɔ.”
42022070	Mbɛ an gbɛɛ‑a a fɔ, an dɔ, “Mbɛ i wan mu Yataa 'a denɛ a?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo‑a an fɔ ka.”
42022071	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Siiya ee to chɛ ma. Mmɔ ban‑da bai a min‑da a wandi gbu da a.”
42023001	A tima chɛ a ni gbɛ, mbɛ chiti tɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a an kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ an ta‑a Chisɔsi a kɔfana chen kɔɔ, min tɔ ni Padeti.
42023002	Nɔ ni, an‑na a kuu sɔ kunɛ si‑a a kun ma, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ an mbe ben‑da nn 'na mɔɛ n sɔ‑a chia yama n ma, ɛ ta‑a a fɔ‑a an ye, a ɔ, an ma chɛnyɛ pawa chɛ Domi kun ti wa tena. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a a wandi chee Chasi a, min mu mansa a.”
42023003	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “I wan mu Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa a?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a an fɔ ka.”
42023004	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a fɔ wan Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n ye, a basan mɔ fanka chɛ a, a ɔ, “N ma ko yama kan kɔ kan yen ni, kamin chɛ‑a min ma.”
42023005	Chɛɛ tima chɛ gbu a ni, an‑na a kɔ din gbasaya wandi gbu a, an dɔ, “Ɛ kanɛ min chɛ tena, ɛ a ma tena wan gbun ba ni gbasi Chudia chɛnyɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. A‑a a kuu sɔ Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, mbɛ sanche gbɛ a che‑a nɛ a 'a kan chɛ‑a.”
42023006	Kɔfana Padeti‑a bai chɛ an na min, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “O, kamin chɛ mu Kadidi mɔɛ an na?”
42023007	Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ gbɛ kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi ka‑a Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, a sin, a wan Mansa Ɛdɔdi ni wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ a tima chɛ a, a‑a Chisɔsi a ta wan a tena.
42023008	Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan kaka. Koe min na mu, tima ɔ yansama ko a, a yen sɔɛ ni wan a a. A na‑a a ma tɔɛ a min fan, a sin ni gbɛ a 'a yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ a ni Chisɔsi yen kamaya koe n ma‑a.
42023009	Chɛ an‑na a ma, Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a Chisɔsi ɔ tisa tisa sɛsɛ a, chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma bai dɔndɔ wɛɛ fɔ ni a ye.
42023010	Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ chɛ n na, an bun‑da kun sɛsɛ si‑a to Chisɔsi kun ma.
42023011	Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, Mansa Ɛdɔdi an bɛ a 'a soya n na, an‑na Chisɔsi ma yɛn fan, mbɛ an‑na mauma mauma koe sɛsɛ sɛ a ma. An‑na doma kai nyima nyima don fan a ma, mbɛ a‑a a a yɛ Kɔfana Padeti tena.
42023012	A ka a tee chɛ ma, Mansa Ɛdɔdi n dia‑a wan, an fea Kɔfana Padeti a. Chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ ni an na a kɔma a.
42023013	An yɛ‑a kɛn to Chisɔsi a, Kɔfana Padeti chen kɔɔ, mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a Chu n tɛ mɔɛ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, a‑a an chee kaina dɔndɔɛ, an bɛ kun ti n na, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.
42023014	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo na‑a kamin chɛ a n chen kɔɔ, wo ɔ, ɛ mɔɛ n sɔ‑a chia yama ma. A yen ko gbɛ, n‑na a wakoe kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn wo gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, chɛɛ n ma ko ɔ ko yen ni, a‑a min ma, min mu ko yama a, yɔ wo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ.
42023015	Mansa Ɛdɔdi wɛɛ‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ kamin chɛ ma ko ɔ ko ma ni, min mu ko yama a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a‑a a a yɛ mmɔ chen kɔɔ. Wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ kamin chɛ ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, min mbe a ma, a ni saya ma sɔn.
42023016	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n mbe a ma‑a wan an ni a pɛndɛn pien, mbɛ n‑na a boo ka, a ni ta.”
42023018	Chɛɛ an gbɛɛ‑a a fɔ wan dɔndɔ a, an kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ fa, mbɛ i‑a i boo ka Baabasi a nn ye.”
42023019	Baabasi chɛ ni mɔɛ an na, an na‑a min sa pimbi chenɛ a, butuin chɛ koe a Domi mansa n na Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A yɛ to, a na‑a mɔɛ fa wan.
42023020	Kɔfana Padeti toen ni a ni a boo ka Chisɔsi an na. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a‑a mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ tisa to, min mbe a ma, a ni a boo ka Chisɔsi a.
42023021	Chɛɛ an‑na yee tɛ wan to, an dɔ, “A ni gbangban kɔnɛ ma, a ni fa. A ni gbangban kɔnɛ ma, a ni fa.”
42023022	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a fɔ to an ye a si tena sawan bɔɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma? Kamin chɛ gbu, a‑a fen ko yama ma? N ma ko ɔ ko yen ni, a‑a min ma, ɛ saya ma sɔn min ko a. N mbe a ma‑a wan, an ni a pɛndɛn pien, mbɛ n‑na a boo ka, a ni ta.”
42023023	Chɛɛ a tima gbu a ni, an‑na yee tɛ a sɛmbɛndenɛ a, mbɛ a ni a ma, an ni Chisɔsi gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. Mbɛ a danka a, an kun‑da Kɔfana Padeti yiima mun koe ma. Mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ koe min ko a, an to‑a a ma.
42023024	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti dɔn‑da an ni Chisɔsi gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ, yɔ an‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ.
42023025	Mbɛ a‑a a boo ka kamin chɛ a, an toen ni min na, kaminɛ min ni pimbi chenɛ a butuin chɛ koe a Domi mansa n na, a basan mɔ fa koe a. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi be a fa mɔɛ n ma, min ni an faa ma koe a.
42023026	Mbɛ soya n‑na Chisɔsi bia, mbɛ an ta‑a a a. An to‑a ta tena wan a a, mbɛ an bɛn‑da kamin dɔndɔ a, min tɔ ni Saimɔn. A ni ka tena Sayini duu ɔ wan, ɛ na‑a Chuusaɛn. Soya chɛ n‑na a din fan kamin chɛ ma, a ni ta kɔn gbengbanden chɛ a Chisɔsi gbaa chia a.
42023027	Mɔ fanka wa‑a a sɔ wan Chisɔsi fɛ. An tɛ ɔ, musu dɔ n ni wan nɔ, miin ni di chɛ‑a a ko a.
42023028	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a yɛ wan an ma, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ musu nu, wo ma di chɛ n fan ko a, chɛɛ wo di chɛ wo wandi ko a, a basan wo 'a denɛ n na.
42023029	Koe min na mu, a yen ko, tima ɛ che‑a wan, mɔɛ n ni a fɔ, an dɔ, musu miin gbandayaen mu, an dɔ, miin ma susu be ni den ma, an duaen mu.
42023030	A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan kɔnkɔɛ n ye, an dɔ, an ni bɔn an ma, an dɔ, an ni an na tunɛ.
42023031	A mu min na, ni an mbe kun fan an ni n tɔɔya buɛ chɛ ɔ, n fɛn ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, wo sin gbɛ, wo wɛn yau ka, an mbe ma‑a ka ma wo a?”
42023032	A tima chɛ a, soya chɛ n ni wan to ta tena kamin fea dɔ mende a, miin ni mɔ yama n na. An sɔen ni, an ni an bɛɛ fa, an bɛ Chisɔsi a.
42023033	An che‑a kɛn kaina chɛ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Kun Konkon Ma, an‑na Chisɔsi gbangban fan nɔ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. An na‑a mɔ yama fea chɛ n bɛɛ gbangban fan to nɔ kɔn gbengbanden fea n ma. An na‑a mɔ yama dɔndɔɛ gbangban fan Chisɔsi boo nyima ɔ, mbɛ an‑na dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ gbangban a man dɔɛ.
42023034	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fa Yataa, i boo bɔ mɔɛ chɛ n 'na ko yama n dɔ. A mu min na, an ma a ɔ sɔn, an mbe ka koe min nyɔn sima ma tena.” Chisɔsi gbangbandenɛ gbakɔ, soya chɛ n‑na chɛ fenɛ chɛ wan a 'a koa n ko a, min mbe a ma, an ni a ɔ sɔn, ni mɔ dɔndɔɛ ɛ min ma sɔn.
42023035	Mɔɛ n ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ, an mbe koe n dɔ gbɛ‑a miin ni ma tena. Chɛɛ Chu n kun ti n‑na ma yɛn ma koe n sɛ wan Chisɔsi ma. Mbɛ an dɔ, “A‑a mɔ dɔ mende n baun, a ni a wandi baun gbɛ, ni an mu kunka mansa a, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ min ma.”
42023036	Soya chɛ n bɛɛ‑a a ma yɛn fan. An na‑a wan a tena, mbɛ an‑na gbɛ be a ma,
42023037	mbɛ an dɔ, “I wandi baun bɛ, ni i wan mu Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa a.”
42023038	Kɔn dɛnfɛ ni wan bun dɔ a 'a kɔn gbengbanden chɛ kun ma. A nyɛnden fan ni an kɔn chɛ ma, an dɔ, Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa an nɛ.
42023039	Ko yama ma mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ, min ni ka nɔ dɛn dɔ, an bɛ Chisɔsi n na, a kai‑a wan Chisɔsi a manyinɛ a, a ɔ, “Kunka mansa chɛ mu i wan na, ae? Ni a mu i wan na, mbɛ i wandi baun bɛ, a basan nn bɛɛ a.”
42023040	Chɛɛ a bɔɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ sin‑na a a gban fan, mbɛ a ɔ, “An‑na ko yawaen dɔndɔ gbe an sa ka mmɔ ma mmɔ bɛ. E ee chian Yataa ma chɛ gbu dechee wɛɛ ko a?
42023041	A sin, an teayaen fan mu, an ni ko yawaenɛ sa mɔ ma, koe min na mu, mɔ tana, mɔ ɛ ka nɛ mɔ sɔn yama an ko a. Chɛɛ a tana, a ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni.”
42023042	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Kai Chisɔsi, i yii na chii n na, ni i na‑a tima min na gbasaya ɔ, i 'a mansa wai chɛ koe a.”
42023043	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din i tena, mbɛ bi tee chɛ a, mɔ fea ɛ ma‑a wan banda bu ɔ.”
42023044	Tee kun tɛ a tee chɛ ma, pimbi bun‑da wan chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ awa sawa ko a.
42023045	Koe min na mu, tee sɛmbɛ‑a wan man koe a. Mbɛ tɛndi min bɛɛ ni ka dɛn dɔ Yataa 'a chenɛ bu ɔ, a tɛ ka‑a fea a.
42023046	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a yee tɛ gbankon, a ɔ, “Fa, n‑na n nyina be i ma.” A‑a chɛ fɔ kɛn dechee, mbɛ a fa‑a.
42023047	Domi soya gbakoo chɛ, min ni ka Chisɔsi ma fɛn‑da, a‑a a ɔ yen min ma‑a. Mbɛ a‑a tando be Yataa ma, a ɔ, “Tea gbu ko a, mɔ tandenɛ ni kamin chɛ a.”
42023048	Mɔ sɛsɛ wa chɛ nu, miin na‑a a ɔ yen koe a, an mbe Chisɔsi fa tena buɛ min dɔ, an na‑a ɔ yen fan, koe min ben‑da. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ yɛ‑a wan an baa nu, faayɔn ba ɔ.
42023049	Chɛɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ni ben tena tima min na, Chisɔsi dia nyɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ pɔɔ, an mbe an dɔ yen‑da. Musu miin bɛɛ na‑a a ma sɔ ka, a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ni wan an tɛ ɔ.
42023050	Yatina, a tima chɛ a, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ min tɔ ni Chosɛfi. A na‑a ka Ayimatia duu ɔ wan, min ni Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A sɔnɛ ni nyin, a yɛ to, mɔ tandenɛ ni a a. A sin, a ya ni tima chɛ an ya ɔ, tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a mansaya ɔ yian‑da dunya chɛ ɔ. Chu gbakoo dɔndɔ ni a a, miin ni chiti tɛ koe n ma. Chɛɛ a nii ma toa si ni a bɔɛ chɛ n 'na yiinachii kɔɔ, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma koe a Chisɔsi a.
42023052	A ta‑a wan Kɔfana Padeti tena, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, a ni Chisɔsi su be a ma a tɔn koe a.
42023053	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti dɔn‑da a ye. Mbɛ Chosɛfi‑a a ma, an‑na Chisɔsi su a yii kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a a ma bɛn fen gbɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a tɔn kamba ɔ, min sinden ni senɛ ɔ, an nii ma mɔ ɔ mɔ tɔn nin bɛ min dɔ.
42023054	An tee chɛ ma ni, Chu n ni an ma bɛn an 'na suin tee chɛ ko a. A sin dɔ nii ma yansan to, a ni a kuu sɔ.
42023055	Musu miin na‑a a sɔ ka Chisɔsi fɛ a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ta‑a wan an bɛ Chosɛfi n na. Mbɛ an‑na kamba chɛ yen, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ sɔn Chisɔsi tɔndenɛ ni buɛ min dɔ.
42023056	Mbɛ an yɛ‑a duu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na tu kunyɛ a diama ɔ bɛn, a fasi fasi koe a Chisɔsi su ma. Chɛɛ suin tee‑a a kuu sɔ, mbɛ an‑na an suin, yɔ an 'na sawa‑a min fɔ.
42024001	Suin tee chɛ ben‑da, mbɛ Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ sau sau ma, musu chɛ n ta‑a wan kamba ma. An ta‑a tu kunyɛ a diama chɛ a an boo ɔ, an na‑a min dɔ bɛn ka.
42024002	Chɛɛ an‑na a tan fan, senɛ chɛ, an na‑a kamba gbu da a tɔn ka min na, a chenchendenɛ ɛ, a ka a da a.
42024003	Mbɛ an don‑da a bu ɔ. Chɛɛ an nii ma Mansa Chisɔsi su tan ni to nɔ.
42024004	Mbɛ an na fii‑a, a si koe chɛ ma. An to‑a chɛ an dɔ, mbɛ a yen ko, mɔ kaima fea bɔ‑a an ya a, an mbe sɔ ɔ an baima, an ma chiienɛ ɛ koa manden ba ɔ.
42024005	Musu chɛ n chian‑da wan kaka, mbɛ an‑na an kunɛ a bun duu ma. Mbɛ kamin chɛ n dɔ, “Wo ma na wo ya a kan‑da kamba ɔ chɛndɛ ba a.
42024006	A ee nɛ. Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Wo wo yii na chii bai chɛ a, a‑a min fɔ wo ye, a ni tima min na Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
42024007	A ɔ, mbɛ an mbe a wan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ bia‑a wan, a ɔ, an ni a be ko yama ma mɔɛ n ma. A ɔ, an mbe yɛ‑a wan to, a ɔ, an ni a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. A ɔ, chɛɛ tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma, a ɔ, ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, a ni yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ.”
42024008	Mbɛ a 'a bai chɛ puin‑da musu chɛ n yii ma.
42024009	Mbɛ an ka‑a kamba chɛ ma, an yɛ‑a duu ɔ. An si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma min ma‑a, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma dɔndɔɛ chɛ n na miin to‑a, a basan a fɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.
42024010	Musu chɛ n fan nii nɛ, miin‑na bai chɛ ɔ yian Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na. Mɛi min na‑a ka Makadaa, ni Chowana, ni Mɛi dɔndɔɛ Chimisi de, a basan musu dɔ gbɛɛ n na.
42024011	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an nii ma dan ni a a, musu chɛ n‑na min dɔ yian an na. A ni an yii ma, mbɛ musu chɛ n na‑a wooya bai an dɔ yian ka an na.
42024012	Chɛɛ Pita‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ a ta‑a bui a kamba chɛ ma. A che‑a kɛn, a‑a a ma bun fan kamba chɛ da a, chɛɛ a‑a kasanche chɛ an yen dechee, a ma fen dɔ mende kan kɔ kan yen ni to. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a duu ɔ, a kɔndɔ fiienɛ a, a si koe chɛ ma min ma‑a ka.
42024013	Yatina, a tee dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Chisɔsi fɛ mɔ fea n ni wan ta tena konko dɔndɔ ɔ, min tɔ ni Emayɔsi. Emayɔsi chɛ an tɛ ɛ Chuusaɛn na, ɛ ma wan yɔ mai wɔnfea.
42024014	An ni wan ta tena chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ‑a, a si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, miin ma‑a ka.
42024015	An to‑a chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ an na dɔndɔ a, mbɛ Chisɔsi wandi gbu gbɛn‑da an baima gbɛdɛn, mbɛ an bɛ bun‑da ta‑a an na.
42024016	An gbu na‑a a yen fan, chɛɛ an nii ma a ɔ sɔn ni, mbɛ an nɛ.
42024017	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N bɔ nu, wo e ka ta tena fen chia ɔ bɔɛ ɔ?” Mbɛ an sɔ‑a gbɛ, an ya kɔɔɛ maenɛ digbi digbi.
42024018	An dɔndɔ min tɔ ni Kiyopasi, a ɔ, “Mɔna, i dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, sonda mu i wan na dechee Chuusaɛn, min ma a ɔ sɔn koe miin ben‑da nɔ tee fea chɛ ɔ.”
42024019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wuo, fen ko chɛ‑a a ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “An‑na koe miin sɛ Chisɔsi ma, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ. Kamin chɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ni a a. A na‑a kamaya ko wa miin ma, a basan bai n na, a ni miin fɔ, an na‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa ni wan a kɔ. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ danden fan ni a a, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya ni wan a ɔ.
42024020	Mmɔ 'a mansa chɛ nu, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ni mmɔ tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an bɛ mmɔ kun ti n na, an ta‑a wan a a, Kɔfana Padeti chen kɔɔ. An toen ni a ni kaa a tɛ a faa koe ma. Mbɛ an‑na a gbangban fan kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, mbɛ a fa‑a.
42024021	Chɛɛ a ni wan nn 'na yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ an ni na tena mmɔ 'a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ kun ka koe a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, tee sawan bɔɛ an nɛ bi, kɛn an‑na a fa.
42024022	A sin to, nn bɛ ni musu miin dɔ n na, an‑na nn kɔndɔ fii wan. An ta‑a wan Chisɔsi kamba ma sayi chɛ ma,
42024023	chɛɛ an ma a su yen ni kamba gbu ɔ. An sin yɛ‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian to nn na, mbɛ an‑na maeka dɔ n yen fan nɔ. An dɔ, maeka chɛ n dɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a yɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ.
42024024	Nn bɔɛ dɔ n bɛɛ, an ta‑a wan kamba gbu ma to, mbɛ an bɛɛ‑a a ɔ yen, yɔ musu chɛ n na‑a a ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ nn na. Chɛɛ an bɛɛ ma a wandi gbu yen ni nɔ.”
42024025	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo wooen ba mu. Fen mu, wo ee fua dan‑da koe chɛ n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na miin fɔ wo ye?
42024026	A ma biaen fan ni kunka mansa ko a, a ni mɔnɛ ɔ bia. Chɛ an ni ma, Yataa e na to a kɔɔ sɔ‑a saya ɔ, a ni a sɛmbɛn banda bu ɔ.”
42024027	Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian an na, koe miin nyɛnden ni a si a ma Yataa 'a gboo gbɛɛ ɔ. A‑a a kuu sɔ chɛ an ma, Mosisi‑a miin nyɛn, a ta Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a miin nyɛn.
42024028	Mbɛ an gbɛn‑da konko chɛ baima, an ni ta tena ka min dɔ. Chisɔsi‑a a ma wan, yɔ a toen ni a ni ben an konko chɛ ma.
42024029	Chɛɛ an‑na a ɔ bia wan, an dɔ, “Mmɔ chi nɛ. Tee bea‑a gbɛ, a sin pimbi ɛ gbɛ bun koe an dɔ.” Mbɛ an bɛ ta‑a an na chenɛ a chi koe a.
42024030	Mbɛ an bɛ si‑a an na daun chɛ tena, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a biidi ya, a‑a Yataa wai bɔ a ko a, mbɛ a‑a a tɛ kai, mbɛ a‑a a du an ma.
42024031	A ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ gbɛ gbadan mbɛ Chisɔsi an nɛ. Chɛɛ a tuin‑da wan an tɛ ɔ.
42024032	Mbɛ an bun‑da a fɔ‑a an nyɔn ye, an dɔ, “Chɛ an‑na a ma, mɔ bu ɔ ni di ka, mmɔ bɛ ni na tena tima min na chia ɔ bɔ chɛ‑a chia a, a yɛ to, tima min na a ni Yataa 'a gboo chɛ fasai tena mɔ tena.”
42024033	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na an kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ an yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An na‑a Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma dɔndɔɛ chɛ n tan fan, an na sɔndenɛ ɛ kaina dɔndɔ, an bɛ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na,
42024034	an mbe a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, tea tea a. A bɔ‑a wan Saimɔn ya a.”
42024035	Mbɛ kamin fea chɛ nu, miin ka‑a ka Emayɔsi, an‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ yian, min chɛ‑a a ɔ an tɛ an bɛ Chisɔsi a, Emayɔsi chia ma. Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian fan to, an fandi gbu na‑a Chisɔsi ma gbɛ buɛ min dɔ, a‑a biidi du kɛn an ma, tima min na an ni daun chɛ tena.
42024036	An to‑a bai chɛ an dɔ yian‑da, mbɛ Chisɔsi wandi gbu bɔ‑a an ya a, ɛ sɔ ɔ an tɛtɛ ma. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Yataa ni faachima be wo ma.”
42024037	Chɛɛ an ma samba‑a wan, mbɛ an chian‑da a ɔ benden ba a, a mu min na, a ni wan an yii ma, mbɛ fuɛ an bɔ‑a ka an ya a.
42024038	Chɛɛ a ɔ, “Wo ma chian n ma. A yɛ to, wo yiima ma tankan tankan a si n ma.
42024039	Wo n boo n ma fɛn bɛ, wo ni n chenɛ n ma fɛn. Wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ n fandi gbu an nɛ. Wo tu n na, wo ni a ɔ yen, mbɛ n gboo ɛ wan, a basan n kuu n na. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian‑da wo a, mbɛ n fan gbu an nɛ, fuɛ ma chɛ a. A mu min na, fuɛ gboo ee, n mbe ee baa a kuu n ni ma.”
42024040	A ban‑da kɛn chɛ fɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a a boo n yian an na, a basan a chenɛ n na.
42024041	An nii ma dan nin bɛ a a, ni Chisɔsi an ni ka koɔ tena an tena. A mu min na, buɔdia ni koo wɛ an dɔ, an sin da ɔ gbaaen fa ni to. Chɛ an fɛ ni, a‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Fen kɔ fen mbe wan nɛ wo boo ɔ, a daun koe a?”
42024042	Mbɛ an‑na nyɛ mindaenɛ tɛn dɔndɔ be a ma,
42024043	mbɛ a‑a a bia, a‑a a daun an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ.
42024044	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Tima min na mmɔ bɛ ni, n na‑a a fɔ wan wo ye, mbɛ koe miin gbɛɛ nyɛndenɛ ɛ a si n ma, mbɛ an gbɛɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a. Mbɛ ko ɔ ko sawa chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a min be Mosisi ma, an bɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n na, a basan Yataa tando si gboo a, an gbɛɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a.”
42024045	A‑a a ma wan, an‑na Yataa 'a gboo ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ.
