42024046	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Chɛ an nyɛnden mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. Mbɛ n fan, kunka mansa, mbɛ n mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a pɛn, mbɛ n‑na n kɔɔ sɔ gbɛ a ka saya ɔ, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma.
42024047	Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan to, mbɛ a 'a sakana bai chɛ ɛ che‑a wan mɔɛ n ma dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ n tɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ mɔɛ n ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ. A ɔ, an ni sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian Chuusaɛn duu pɛn dɔ.
42024048	Wo wandi gbu‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yen. Wo an dɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
42024049	Mbɛ a yen ko, n mbe a a yii‑a wan wo tena, Fa Yataa na‑a wo too ɔ dia‑a min na. Chɛɛ wo ma ka nɛ Chuusaɛn aan wo ni gbasaya ma sɔn, min mbe ka‑a banda bu ɔ.”
42024050	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ denɛ n ya wan, mbɛ a bɔ‑a an na Chuusaɛn duu bu ɔ, a ta‑a an na Bɛtani tanda ɔ. A‑a a boo dɛn an kun ma, mbɛ a‑a an dua.
42024051	A to‑a an dua an na, mbɛ a bɔ‑a an tɛ ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a a ya a sɛ‑a a a banda bu ɔ.
42024052	Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n‑na an kumbai gbangban fan, mbɛ an‑na a fai, mbɛ an yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn buɔdia wa ɔ.
42024053	An ni wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an mbe tando be‑a Yataa ma tima ɔ tima ko a.
43001001	Dunya e na to a kuu sɔ‑a, an mbe mɔɛ min chee, an dɔ, Bai, a ni wan gbɛ nɔ. An fea ni Yataa a, a wɛɛ ni Yataa an na.
43001002	Bai chɛ ni wan gbɛ nɔ, an fea Yataa a, a ka a tima chɛ ma.
43001003	Bai chɛ an‑na fen kɔ fen na dan. Yataa ma a ma ni, fen kɔ fen min na dan‑da, a a ni dan a gbaa.
43001004	A wan mbe fɔɛ chɛndɛ be. An fɔɛ chɛ, an mu manɛ a mɔ gbu ko a.
43001005	Man chɛ ɛ manɛ be tena wan tun pimbi pimbi ɔ. A sin, pimbi ee che kuɔ fɔ a ma‑a, a ni sɛmbɛ man koe a.
43001006	Kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Chɔn. Yataa wandi, an na‑a a sɔ.
43001007	An Chɔn chɛ na‑a, a ni man chɛ wakoe ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni an sakana bai chɛ a min, an sin ni dan a a.
43001008	A wandi gbu, an nii ma man chɛ a. A na‑a dechee, a ni a wakoe fɔ mɔɛ n ye.
43001009	Mɔɛ min mu tea manɛ a, min mbe manɛ be mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, a ni na tena wan dunya ɔ.
43001010	Bai chɛ ni wan dunya ɔ, a‑a dunya min na dan ka. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n nii ma a sɔn ni a buɛ chɛ ɔ.
43001011	A ta‑a wan a waa a, chɛɛ a ta mɔɛ chɛ nu, an ma an boo a si ni a kɔɔ.
43001012	Chɛɛ mɔɛ n‑na an boo si wan a kɔɔ, miin‑na an kai fa a a. Chɛ ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ nu, a‑a gbasaya be wan an ma, ma koe a Yataa 'a denɛ n na.
43001013	An ma ma ni Yataa 'a denɛ n na mɔgbuya ta chia an na. Yataa wandi an‑na a ma, an ma‑a a 'a denɛ n na.
43001014	An ni a wɛn chee, an dɔ, Bai, a na‑a ma wan mɔ gbu a, koadia chinchimaya faenɛ ɛ a faa a, a basan danaya a Yataa tena. A ni wan nn tɛ ɔ. Nn na‑a a ɔ yen fan, a kamayaen ni buɛ min dɔ, kamaya min ni a ɔ, a wan Fa Yataa 'a Den dɔndɔ gbe.
43001015	Chɔn na‑a bai sa wan gbankon, a si a ma, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ chɛ mu, n‑na min na koe fɔ wo ye, n dɔ, ‘Mɔɛ min mbe na tena, n gbaa chia a, a gbasayaen mu a ni ben n ma.’ N dɔ, ‘Koe min na mu, a ni wan fɔɛ ɔ, n nii ma suun nin bɛ tima min na.’ ”
43001016	Koadia chinchimaya min faen mu a faa ɔ, an mbe a ma tena, ɛ mmɔ gbɛɛ dua tena tima sɛsɛ a.
43001017	Yataa na‑a a 'a sawa n na ben Mosisi an na, chɛɛ koadia chinchimaya tana, a basan danaya a, mmɔ‑a an ma sɔn Chisɔsi Chasi an na.
43001018	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma Yataa yen nin bɛ. Chɛɛ a 'a Den dɔndɔ gbe, min fandi mu Yataa a, an fea an mbe min na tima ɔ tima, a‑a a ma, mɔɛ n‑na a Fa sɔn.
43001019	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ nu Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an ya ɔ sɔɛ nu, an‑na mɔɛ dɔ n sɔ wan Chɔn tena. An tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, a basan mɔɛ n na, miin bɛɛ bɔ‑a Difai 'a dambi ɔ, an‑na an sɔ wan. An dɔ, an ni Chɔn dɔ tisa, ni mɔɛ minan sima mu a a. Chɔn na‑a chɛ an fɔ an ye.
43001020	A ma ban ni koɔ koe a an tena, chɛɛ a‑a a fɔ wan an ye den, a boo kaenɛ a ma, a ɔ, “N fan ma a a, kunka mansa chɛ.”
43001021	Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ tisa to, an dɔ, “Nyɔn sin mu gbɛ i a?” An dɔ, “Idaicha an bɔ‑a ka to?” A ɔ, “N fan ma, Idaicha ma n na.” Mbɛ an dɔ te to, “Mosisi na‑a Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔ na koe fɔ wan. A mu i wan na?” A ɔ, “N fan ma.”
43001022	Mbɛ an dɔ te gbɛ, an dɔ, “Mbɛ a fɔ gbɛ nn ye, mɔɛ min mu i a.” An dɔ, “Ni nn yɛ‑a, mɔɛ miin‑na nn sɔ, an mbe to‑a wan i wakoe ɔ sɔn koe a.” An dɔ, “Fen mbe i da a, a si i wandi ma?”
43001023	Mbɛ Chɔn dɔ, “Mɔɛ min ni gbonka chɛ tena, fuinɛ ma, n fan mu an mɔɛ chɛ a. N dɔ, wo chia ɔ bɛn chɛndɛ, Yataa Mansa tachɛ koe a, a ni na.” Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ suun, min tɔ ni Aisaya, a da a kuiɛ an nii nɛ, Chɔn yɛ‑a a ɔ.
43001024	Chu mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, an na‑a miin sɔ, Fayisii n ni an na.
43001025	Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ tisa to, an dɔ, “Ni kunka mansa chɛ ma i a, Idaicha ma i a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ a ma i a, tisa chɛ yen ko. Fen ko a mu, e yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a?”
43001026	A ɔ, “N mbe yii an chɛ dechee mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ ɛ sɔ ɔ wo tɛ ɔ, wo ma min sɔn, a sɔn buɛ a.
43001027	An mbe na tena sɔ‑a n chen gba ɔ. Chɛɛ a tɔɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan gbeden, a sin gbu, n mbe ee che a 'a kɔɔwa yuu wɛɛ fuin koe a.”
43001028	Chɛ gbɛɛ na‑a chɛ‑a a ɔ Bɛtani duu ɔ wan, Chɔdan yii kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, tee bɔ chia a. Chɔn ni nɔ wan, ɛ yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
43001029	Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, tee dɔndɔɛ ma, Chɔn‑na Chisɔsi yen na‑a a tena. Mbɛ a wan Chɔn dɔ, “Yataa 'a sa tɔngbɔɛ yen ko a na‑a, mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n gbɛɛ dunya ma, an mbe si ɔ min kun ma.
43001030	Mɔɛ chɛ mu, n‑na min na koe fɔ wo ye, n dɔ, ‘Mɔɛ min mbe na tena, n gbaa chia a, a gbasayaen mu a ni ben n ma.’ N dɔ, ‘Koe min na mu, a ni wan fɔɛ ɔ, n nii ma suun nin bɛ tima min na.’
43001031	N fandi gbu wɛɛ, n nii ma an mɔɛ chɛ sɔn, a sɔn buɛ a. Chɛɛ n na‑a, n mbe yii chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a ma koe a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, an ni a sɔn, a sɔn buɛ a.”
43001032	Chɔn na‑a a ɔ yian ka wan, koe min na‑a ma. A ɔ, “N nii ma a sɔn, a sɔn buɛ a. Chɛɛ Yataa min‑na n sɔ, yii chɛ koe a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, a na‑a a fɔ wan n ye, a ɔ, n mbe a Nyina yen‑da wan, a ni yii, a ka banda bu ɔ, mbɛ a bea‑a mɔɛ fɛ gban. A ɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ, an mbe a ma‑a, Yataa Nyina chɛ, ɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n fɛ.” Chɔn dɔ, “A sin,” a ɔ, “n‑na Yataa Nyina chɛ yen fan, a yii‑a fɛɛ yɔ bugbɔɛ, mbɛ a bea‑a mɔɛ fɛ.”
43001034	A ɔ, “N‑na chɛ ɔ yen fan, a ma‑a,” a ɔ, “n sin mbe a fɔ tena gbɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na.”
43001035	Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a to, tee dɔndɔɛ ma, Chɔn sɔ‑a to nɔ, an bɛ a fɛ den fea an na.
43001036	A‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn ben‑da an baima, a ɔ, “Yataa 'a sa tɔngbɔɛ yen ko ben‑da.”
43001037	A fɛ den fea chɛ nu, an‑na a da a bai chɛ a min fan, mbɛ an bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ.
43001038	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ya a mun, a‑a an yen, an beaenɛ ɛ a fɛ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo wan, wo e fen yan tena?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, i yia tena ɛ mende?”
43001039	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo na, wo ni nɔ yen.” A tima chɛ a, awa naanin bɔɛ ni gbɛ che an na, tee yiienɛ ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an ta‑a kɛn an‑na a waa yen, an bɛ an na tee bea gbɛ nɔ.
43001040	Mɔ fea chɛ dɔndɔ ni Anduu an na, Saimɔn Pita dɔ kaima.
43001041	Anduu‑a koe min pɛn pɛn ma, a‑a a kɔɔɛ Saimɔn yan fan. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Nn‑na mɔɛ chɛ yen, min mu kunka mansa a.” (Kiisi mɔɛ n dɔ, Chasi).
43001042	Mbɛ a ta‑a Saimɔn na Chisɔsi tena. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Saimɔn ma fɛn kɔdɛɛ, mbɛ a ɔ, “I tɔ mu Saimɔn, i fa sin tɔ mu Chɔn. Chɛɛ i tɔɛ ɛ ma tena Kefasi an na gbɛ.” (Tɔɛ chɛ, ni a a mun‑da, a mu Pita an na).
43001043	A banda ka dɔndɔɛ ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a yii na chii, mbɛ a‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ chia bia. Mbɛ a‑a Fiipi yan, mbɛ a ɔ te a ma, a ɔ, “Na, i ni ma n fɛ denɛ a.”
43001044	Fiipi chɛ, a na‑a ka Besaida wan, duu chɛ, Anduu an fea Pita a, an baa a.
43001045	Mbɛ Fiipi‑a a ya a kan Natanɛɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min, Mosisi na‑a a wakoe nyɛn, sawa gboo chɛ ɔ, nn‑na a yen. A yɛ to, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an na‑a fenɛ nyɛn to, a si an ma. A tɔ mu Chisɔsi, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, kai chɛ, Chosɛfi, a 'a denɛ.”
43001046	Mbɛ Natanɛɛ ɔ, “Nasaɛti chɛ, fen kɔ fen mbe che wan bɔ‑a nɔ, min mbe ma tɔnɔnɛ a mɔ gbu tena?” Mbɛ Fiipi ɔ, “Na, i ni a yen.”
43001047	Chisɔsi‑a Natanɛɛ yen kɛn na‑a a tena, a‑a chɛ an fɔ, a si a ma. A ɔ, “Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a yen ko na‑a, tɔɛ chɛ bɛnden mu min kun ma. Mɔɛ mu a a, a ee mɔ ɔ mɔ bun.”
43001048	Natanɛɛ‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “I ma‑a ka ma, i‑a n sɔn?” Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fiki kɔn chɛ kɔɔ, n‑na i yen nɔ wan, Fiipi e na to i chee‑a.”
43001049	Natanɛɛ ɔ, “Kan mɔ,” a ɔ, “Yataa 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ mu i a,” a ɔ, “Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na mansa mu i a.”
43001050	Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na a fɔ wan i ye, mbɛ n‑na i yen fan, i ni tima min na fiki kɔn chɛ kɔɔ. Chɛ an gbu‑a a ma ka, i dan‑da ka n na? E na tena wan koe sɛsɛ ɔ yen‑da ma‑a, miin benden mu chɛ ma kaka.”
43001051	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ka wɛ n ni chɛ ma din wo tena. Wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, banda bu ɔ da a ni ka, mbɛ Yataa 'a maeka n yii‑a. An mbe sɛ‑a wan, an mbe yii, n na tindanɛ, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ.”
43002001	Tee dɔndɔ bendenɛ gbakɔ, a fean bɔɛ ma, Chisɔsi de ni wan daun chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ, Kana duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An bɛn chɛ kunɛ ni musu si koe an na.
43002002	Mbɛ Chisɔsi wɛɛ, an ni a chee sonda an na, an bɛn chɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
43002003	Gbɛ min ni bɛn chɛ ko a, sonda chɛ n ban‑da kɛn a min‑da, mbɛ Chisɔsi de koɔ‑a a tena, a ɔ, “Gbɛ gbɛɛ tɛtɛ ban‑da.”
43002004	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, a to n 'na boo ma dechee. Tima ma che nin bɛ n ko a.”
43002005	Mbɛ Chisɔsi de‑a a fɔ bɔi den chɛ n ye, miin ni gbɛ kun ma, min ban‑da ka, a ɔ, “Bai ɔ bai, ɛ min fɔ‑a wo ye, wo a ma.”
43002006	Chu mɔɛ nu, an 'na Yataa fai ɔ, an 'na sawa n kɔkoo, a si an ko buɛ ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, yii si fenɛ n ni wan nɔ si ɔ, an ni wɔdɔ, an sin gbɛɛ ni koo wan. An nyanden ni senɛ ɔ wan, a sin, a dɔndɔɛ, a ni yii ya wan, min mbe kadɔn bi fea tɛ bi sawa a.
43002007	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Yii si fen chɛ nu, wo an na fa yii a.” Mbɛ an‑na an gbɛɛ a fa gban.
43002008	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye to, a ɔ, “Wo a sima bɔ yii si fen chɛ n dɔ, wo ni ta a a kai wandi tena, min mbe wo ya ɔ.” Mbɛ an‑na a ma ka.
43002009	Yii chɛ, min fandenɛ ni gbɛ ka gbɛ a, a‑a a ma fɛn. A nii ma a ɔ sɔn, gbɛ chɛ ka‑a kaina min. Chɛɛ bɔi den chɛ n tana, miin na‑a yii chɛ bɔ, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan. Mbɛ an ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ‑a kamin chɛ chee, min‑na musu si bɛnɛ ni a ɔ, mbɛ an sɔ‑a ka wan.
43002010	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Ni i bɔ n‑na mɔɛ n chee bɛn bonda chɛ ɔ, an mbe gbɛ chɛndɛ pɛn be mɔɛ n ma. Ni an‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ gbɛ kun‑da an gboo ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ gbɛ tafu tafu be‑a. Chɛɛ i tana, i‑a gbɛ chɛndɛ si tena ɔ bɛn fan aan, mbɛ i danka‑a a a bɔ‑a sanche.”
43002011	Kamaya koe wa saa an nii nɛ, Chisɔsi na‑a min ma. A na‑a a ma Kana duu ɔ wan, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A na‑a a ɔ yian nɔ wan, a kamayaen ni buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ n‑na an kai fa a a.
43002012	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi yii‑a Kapanaun duu ɔ. An fea ni a de a, a basan a suun ma nyɔɛ kaima n na, ni a fɛ denɛ nu. An‑na tee kuunden ben fan nɔ.
43002013	Tima ni gbɛ che koe an na, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ ko a. Chɛ ko a, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
43002014	A‑a a fo kɛn nɔ, a‑a mɔɛ n tan fan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an mbe sɔ fenɛ n ma tachɛ‑a. Ninchi nu, an bɛ sa n na, a basan bugbɔɛ n bɛɛ a. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ni kɔpɔɛ sinchi, an ni wan nɔ si ɔ.
43002015	Mbɛ a‑a bosa nyan fan yuu ɔ, mbɛ a‑a sɔ fen chɛ n gbɛɛ gbain fan kata chɛ ɔ, sa chɛ nu, a basan ninchi chɛ n na. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin ni kɔpɔɛ sinchi ka, a‑a an 'na tebu n na bɔn fan, mbɛ a‑a an 'na kɔpɔɛ a fasan fasan.
43002016	Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin ni ka bugbɔɛ ma tachɛ‑a, a ɔ an ma, “Wo bɔ nɛ wo 'a bugbɔɛ chɛ n na. Wo sɛmbɛ Fa 'a chenɛ ma koe a fee fen ma tachɛ chenɛ a.”
43002017	Mbɛ a puin‑da a fɛ denɛ n yii ma, mbɛ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Fa Yataa, i 'a chen chɛ 'a koadia koo n faa ɔ, n mbe fa tena wan a ko a.”
43002018	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ nu, an ya ɔ sɔɛ nu, an sɔ‑a a kanɛ ɔ. An dɔ, “I‑a koe min ma ka, nn ma a ɔ sɔn ni a gbasaya chɛ ɛ wan i boo ɔ, a ma koe a. E kamaya koe minan ma‑a, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ a gbasaya chɛ ɛ wan i boo ɔ?”
43002019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa 'a chen chɛ, wo a te wɛ. Tee sawa tɛ, n mbe a sɔ‑a wan to.”
43002020	Mbɛ an dɔ, “I ta yiima ɔ, i‑a a sɔ‑a ka ma tee sawa kɔɔ? San bi naanin, kun ma wɔdɔɛ da faenɛ ɛ gban, an‑na an ya wɛ, a sɔ koe a.”
43002021	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi yii nii Yataa 'a chenɛ an ma, a yii ni a wandi gboo an ma.
43002022	Chɛ an na‑a a ma, a na‑a a kɔɔ sɔ kɛn, a ka saya ɔ, a puin‑da a fɛ den chɛ n yii ma, a ni min fɔ tee. Mbɛ chɛ ko a, an dan‑da Yataa 'a gboo a, a basan bai chɛ n na, Chisɔsi ni miin fɔ.
43002023	Chisɔsi ni tima min na Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ tima a, mɔɛ sɛsɛ na‑a an kai fa wan a a. Koe min na mu, an na‑a a ɔ yen fan, a na‑a kamaya koe miin ma.
43002024	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma nyina ni a wandi ma an boo ɔ, koe min na mu, a na‑a mɔgbuya sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ.
43002025	Chisɔsi ya nii mɔ ɔ mɔ a, a ɔ yian koe a, mɔgbuya ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, a wandi gbu na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, koe min gbɛɛ ni an faa ɔ.
43003001	Mbɛ kaminɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Nikɔdemɔsi. Ya ɔ sɔɛ dɔndɔ ni a a, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, a sin, Fayisii dɔndɔ ni to a a.
43003002	Yɛɛ dɔndɔ ma, kamin chɛ na‑a wan Chisɔsi tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Kan mɔ, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ i ta tichaya, Yataa an‑na i a na. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che kamaya koe chɛ n ma‑a, e miin ma ka, mɔɔ ni Yataa ma‑a an mɔɛ chɛ kɔ.”
43003003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din i tena, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, mɔɔ ni a mɔɛ chɛ suun‑da to a nama a.
43003004	Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Musu si kai, ɛ kun ka ma to a ni suun, a gba fean bɔɛ ko a? A de ee che kɛn to, a ni a bu ya a nama a, mbɛ a‑a a suun, gba fean bɔɛ ko a.”
43003005	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ni a ma din to i tena, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, mɔɔ ni a suun‑da to yii a, an fea Yataa Nyina a.
43003006	Mɔ gbu woo mɔɛ nu, an fan mbe a suun dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina, an mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni ma Yataa 'a denɛ a.
43003007	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a ee che ma‑a i ma kɔndɔ fii‑a, ni n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, mɔɔ ni wo suun‑da to a nama a.
43003008	Fia toen mu a ni bɔ kaina min, ɛ bɔ nɔ wan. Mɔ ɛ a bɔ kuiɛ a min fan, chɛɛ mɔ ee che a ɔ sɔn‑da, ɛ ka tena kaka min ma. Chɛ an mbe ma mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan bɛɛ a, Yataa Nyina an mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni suun to a nama a.”
43003009	Chɛɛ Nikɔdemɔsi ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ che ka ma a ma‑a, mɔ gbu ni suun to a nama a?”
43003010	Mbɛ Chisɔsi wɛɛ ɔ, “I sin, i ticha wa chɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, fen mu ee chɛ n dɔ gbɛ?
43003011	N ni chɛ ma din i tena, mbɛ nn‑na koe miin dɔ sɔn, nn mbe koɔ a si an fan ma. A yɛ to, nn‑na koe miin dɔ yen, nn mbe siiya bɔ a si an fan ma. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma ma bɛn ni dan koe a nn 'na siiya a.
43003012	Ni n‑na dunya ma koe n dɔ yian wo a, wo ma dan ni n na, wo ee che‑a wo ni dan n na, ni n‑na banda bu ɔ koe n dɔ yian wo a. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan?
43003013	A sin ko, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma sɛ nin bɛ banda bu ɔ, mɔɔ dechee n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ. N fan ka‑a nɔ, n yii‑a nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ.
43003014	Mosisi ni tima min na suun fuinɛ ma, ka chɛ, min nyandenɛ ni kundu ɔ, a na‑a a dɛn fan kɔnɛ a. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ wɛɛ, an mbe n dɛn‑da ka wan.
43003015	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ min kai faen mu n na, an ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”
43003016	Yataa na‑a a 'a Den dɔndɔ gbe be wan, a ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na dunya ɔ, koadia min nyɔn sima ɛ a faa ɔ, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a kai fa a 'a Den chɛ a, a ee fa‑a, a ni to saya ɔ, chɛɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
43003017	Koe min na mu to, Yataa ma a 'a Den chɛ a na ni dunya ɔ, kaa an na tɛ koe a mɔɛ n ma, a ni an tɔɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a a a na, a ni ma an kun ka mɔɛ a.
43003018	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a kai fa‑a a 'a Den chɛ a, Yataa ee kaa a tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, a ni tɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma a kai fa ni a a, kaa a bandenɛ mu tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, a tɔɔ koe a, a mu min na, a ma a kai fa ni Yataa 'a Den dɔndɔ gbe a.
43003019	Yataa ɛ a 'a kaa a tɛ ka wan mɔɛ n ma. Manɛ na‑a wan dunya chɛ ɔ, min mu tea a si Yataa ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ n toen mu ma koe a an 'na ko yama n pimbi ɔ, an mbe e na ma man chɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, an chɛ chɛ wai nu, an ma nyin.
43003020	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ko yama n ma, a ma to ni man chɛ a, a sin, a e na man chɛ ɛ ma kaina min. Koe min na mu, a ma to ni, man chɛ ni a 'a ko yama n na bɔ ya a ma.
43003021	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ko chɛndɛ ma, an mbe na man chɛ tena. A ɛ chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, man chɛ ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ ɛ kooya be wan Yataa ma, a chɛ chɛ wai n dɔ.
43003022	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi ben‑da nɔ ma, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ an ta‑a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An‑na tima kundu ɛnden ya wan nɔ, Chisɔsi ɛ ta‑a yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
43003023	A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, Chɔn bɛɛ, a ni Ainon duu ɔ wan. Ainon chɛ, yii ni nɔ kaka, chɛ an fɛ ni, Chɔn na‑a nɔ, ɛ yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, miin ni na an mbe a tan. A sin, Ainon chɛ tɛ ɔ nii ma yansan Sadin duu ɔ a.
43003024	Chɛ n ma‑a pɛn, an mbe e na to Chɔn sa‑a pimbi chenɛ a.
43003025	A tima chɛ a, Chɔn fɛ denɛ dɔ nu, kɔɔsa don‑da wan an tɛ, an bɛ Chu mɔ dɔndɔ a. An kɔɔsa chɛ kunɛ ni mɔɛ ɛ a wandi ma ko buɛ min dɔ Yataa ko a.
43003026	Mbɛ an na‑a Chɔn tena, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, kaminɛ wɛɛ yen ko pan yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Mɔɛ n mbe nyɔndɔn tena wan gbɛ a tena. A to‑a wan i yii ma, wo fea ni kaminɛ min na Chɔdan yii kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, e min chee ka kunka mansa a, an kamin chɛ mu.”
43003027	Chɔn dɔ, “Ni koe ma‑a ka, Yataa an dɔn‑da a ma.
43003028	Wo wandi gbu, n 'na siiya n mu wo a, mbɛ n ni a fɔ wan, n dɔ, n fan ma kunka mansa a. Chɛɛ n dɔ, n 'na naen mu dechee a ya ɔ wan, chia ɔ bɛn koe a.
43003029	Sɛnama tana, musu fuu kai an ta mu a a. Chɛɛ an kai chɛ bɔɛ tana, min mbe ta a ya ɔ, dɔbɛn chɛ koe a, a too an ma sɔenɛ ɛ ma dechee. A bu ɔ dia‑a wan, ni a‑a musu fuu kai gbu kuiɛ a min. N ta buɔdia da faen mu ka wan gbɛ.
43003030	A nyin a wan ni ma mɔ chenama wa a, n sin tana n ni ma mɔ dɔɔma a.”
43003031	Mɔɛ chɛ, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a benden mu mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, tea ko a. Mɔɛ chɛ sin tana min mbe dunya chɛ ɔ, ɛ bai sa a si dunya ma koe n fan ma dechee.
43003032	Mɔɛ min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a tana, a‑a miin dɔ yen nɔ, a‑a miin na min, ɛ an fan dɔ yian. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n mbe ee an boo si a 'a sakana bai kɔɔ.
43003033	Chɛɛ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe an boo si‑a a 'a sakana chɛ kɔɔ, an mbe ma‑a ka a ɔ yian fan na, mbɛ Yataa 'a bai mu tea an na.
43003034	Mɔɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a min na na, an mbe a 'a bai sa. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a Nyina min na yii, a ni ma a fɛ, a da faen gban.
43003035	Mmɔ Fa Yataa toen mu a 'a Denɛ a, an‑na a ma, a‑a gbasaya be a ma fen kɔ fen kun ma.
43003036	Mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a Yataa 'a denɛ a, ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee a kai fa‑a a 'a Denɛ a, a ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. Koe min na mu, Yataa faa tɛenɛ an mbe ma‑a a ma.
43004001	Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, min fɔen ni Chu mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin ni Fayisii n na. A fɔen fan ni an ye, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe bea tena a wan Chisɔsi fɛ, ɛ yii chɛ tena miin kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, an da a koo, an ni ben Chɔn ta n ma.
43004002	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi wandi gbu sin fan nii yii chɛ‑a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a fɛ denɛ n fan ni a ma tena.
43004003	Chisɔsi‑a a a min kɛn bai min ni sa tena, a si a ma, a bɔ‑a wan Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a yɛ‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
43004004	A ni kɛn ta‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ben‑da Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ chia an na.
43004005	Samayia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, a‑a duu dɔndɔ tan fan, min tɔ ni Sika. Nɔ tena ɔ nii ma yansan duu gboo chɛ a, kai Chekɔpi na‑a min be a 'a denɛ Chosɛfi ma.
43004006	Yii sonɛ wɛɛ, a wan kai Chekɔpi ta ni min na suun, a ni wan bɛ nɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi si‑a an yii son chɛ baima, koe min na mu, tachɛ ɔ yansama chɛ na‑a a gboo ɔ fa wan. A tima chɛ a, tee cheenɛ ni gbɛ mɔ kun tɛ.
43004007	A ɔ ma yansan ni, mbɛ Samayia musu dɔndɔ na‑a yii bɔ tena son chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, “N kɔ yii ɔ, n mbe n min.”
43004008	A tima chɛ a, a fɛ denɛ n taenɛ ni duu ɔ, daun fen san tena.
43004009	Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ mu i a, n sin mu Samayia mɔɛ a. Mmɔ ma to ni mmɔ nyɔn na ɛnden bɛɛ a. E kun kan ma i ni yii fuin n ma?”
43004010	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni i na‑a Yataa 'a wai nyima sɔn fan mɔɛ n tena, a sin, i na‑a n sɔn fan, n fɛn mbe ka koɔ‑a i tena, i ni tisa dɔ mende an chɛ‑a n na. A sin, n ni yii be‑a wan i ma, min mbe fɔɛ be mɔ gbu ma.”
43004011	Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Kai, yii bɔ chiti ee kɛn i boo ɔ, yii son chɛ sin dɔ yansan. E ka‑a gbɛ mende yii chɛ a, min mbe fɔɛ be mɔ gbu ma?
43004012	Nn bemba n ta bemba kai Chekɔpi, an‑na yii son chɛ to nn boo ɔ. An bɛ a 'a denɛ n na, an ni yii son chɛ an min. A 'a sɔ fenɛ n bɛɛ, yii son dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ɔ yii, an ni an min. I toen mu i ni a fɔ n ye, mbɛ i benden mu nn bemba Chekɔpi ma, ae?”
43004013	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ, an mbe yii son chɛ min, an kanɛ a ɛ gbaa‑a wan to.
43004014	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe yii chɛ min, n mbe min be‑a a ma, a kanɛ a ee gbaa‑a to kuɔ fɔ. N mbe yii chɛ min be‑a a ma, ɛ ma‑a wan a faa ɔ. A sin, an yii chɛ ɔ ee tɛ‑a, ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”
43004015	Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Kai, an yii chɛ be n ma, n mbe a min, min mbe a ma‑a, n kanɛ a ee gbaa‑a to kuɔ fɔ ko a. N mbe ee ma‑a to yii chɛ ɔ chia ma, yii bɔɛ a tee ɔ tee a.”
43004016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ni a fɔ gbɛ a ye, a ɔ, “Ta wɛ, i ni i chɛɛ chee, mbɛ wo fea na‑a a a.”
43004017	Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “Chɛɛ kai ee kɛn n boo ɔ.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ, i ɔ, kai ee i boo ɔ, tea mu a a.”
43004018	A ɔ, “Kai duu an fan‑na i si ka gbɛ musu a, a sin, wo fea ɛ ka min bɛɛ a sanche, an ma i fuu ni. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, i‑a bai min fɔ ka n ye sanche, tea mu.”
43004019	Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ gbɛ, “Kai, n‑na a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu i a.
43004020	Nn bemba n ta bemba nu, Samayia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, an ni Yataa fai kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an dɔ nɛ. Chɛɛ wo wan Chu mɔɛ nu, wo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, mɔ ɛ a fai dechee Chuusaɛn duu ɔ wan.”
43004021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, dan n da a kuiɛ a. Tima ɛ na tena wan che‑a, tima min na, mɔɛ n mbe ee Fa Yataa fai‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ ma, an mbe ee a fai‑a Chuusaɛn duu wɛɛ ɔ.
43004022	Wo wan Samayia mɔɛ nu, wo ma a ɔ sɔn, wo e min gbu fai tena. Chɛɛ nn fan Chu mɔɛ nu, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, nn mbe min fai. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a nn too ɔ dia wan, a ma koe a, mɔɛ n ni a 'a bauncha ma sɔn.
43004023	Chɛɛ tima ɛ che‑a wan, a sin gbu che‑a gbɛ, tima min na, mɔɛ miin mbe Fa Yataa fai, a Nyina ni gbasaya be an ma a fai koe a. A Nyina chɛ, ɛ tea ɔ yian‑da wan to an na a si a wan Fa Yataa wandi ma. An mɔɛ chɛ n fan mbe Yataa fai tea chia a, a sin mbe an fan yan tena a fai koe a.
43004024	Yataa ma mɔ gbu a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ miin mbe a fai, a nyin Yataa Nyina wandi ni gbasaya be an ma, a fai koe a. A yɛ to, mbɛ a‑a tea ɔ yian an na, a si a wandi ma.”
43004025	Mbɛ musu chɛ ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chasi, kunka mansa ɛ na tena wan. A sin mbe na‑a kɛn, ɛ ko ɔ ko ɔ yian‑da wan mmɔ a.”
43004026	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan gbu mu an mɔɛ chɛ a, n fɛn mbe ka koɔ tena i tena.”
43004027	Ɛ bai chɛ fɔ‑a dechee, mbɛ a fɛ denɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a, a ka duu ɔ. A sin, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, an‑na a tan kɛn chia ɔ bɔɛ ɔ, an fea musu chɛ a. Chɛɛ an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma musu chɛ ɔ tisa ni, a ni a fɔ, a ɔ, “I toen mu fen na?” Dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma Chisɔsi ɔ tisa ni, a ni a fɔ, a ɔ, “Fen mu e koɔ‑a musu chɛ tena?”
43004028	Mbɛ musu chɛ‑a a 'a yii chiti to, mbɛ a yɛ‑a duu ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a koe chɛ ɔ yian nɔ mɔɛ n na.
43004029	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo na, wo ni kaminɛ yen, min‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ yian n na, n‑na miin gbɛɛ ma wɛ. A e na ma kunka mansa chɛ an na?”
43004030	Mbɛ mɔɛ n na‑a Chisɔsi tena, a ka an duu chɛ ɔ.
43004031	Chɛ ɛ ma‑a tima min na, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n ni a ma nande tena wan, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, daun fenɛ sima daun gbɛ.”
43004032	Chɛɛ a ɔ, “Daun fenɛ ɛ n boo ɔ, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma min bakoe ɔ sɔn.”
43004033	Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ nu, an bun‑da an nyɔn dɔ tisa‑a, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ an mbe na na daun fenɛ a kai chɛ ye?”
43004034	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Min 'na dɛya mu n na, ni n‑na a faa ma koe ma, n ni a 'a wai a ban, a‑a n sɔ min na, an mu n 'na daun fenɛ a.
43004035	Wo e a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, a ka a fɛn tima ma, wo ɔ, kau naanin fan mbe ben, wo ɔ, a tɛ koe a. Chɛɛ n ni a ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo ni an sɛnɛ gbu ma mɛn, wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ fen chɛ n gbu, miin fɛndenɛ ɛ ka, an tɛ tima gbu che‑a.
43004036	A tɛ mɔɛ nu, an mbe wan gbɛ wai‑a, an sin mbe wan gbɛ an 'na tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn‑da. An sin mbe an fɛn fen chɛ min na sɔn sɔn‑da, an nɛ mɔɛ n na, miin‑na kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. A fɛn mɔɛ nu, an bɛ a tɛ mɔɛ n na, an 'na buɔdia koo.
43004037	Chɛ fɛ mu, tea mu tai chɛ a, an mbe min tɛ, an dɔ, ‘A fɛn mɔɛ ɛ gba, a tɛ mɔɛ wɛɛ ɛ gba.’
43004038	N yen ko, n‑na wo sɔ wo bɔɛ n ta tɔɔ gba tɛ‑a, wo‑a tɔnɔnɛ sɔn an 'na taa sende ɔ.”
43004039	Samayia mɔɛ chɛ n sɛsɛ nu, an duu chɛ ɔ, an na‑a an kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. Chɛ na‑a ka musu chɛ da a bai an ma, a na‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ, a ɔ, a‑a ko ɔ ko ɔ yian a a, a ɔ, a wan musu chɛ, a ɔ, a na‑a min ma fɔɛ ɔ.
43004040	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, an na‑a kɛn Chisɔsi tena, an‑na a ɔ bia wan disa a, ma koe a nɔ an tena. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a tee fea ben nɔ an tena.
43004041	A ka chɛ ma, mɔɛ n sɛsɛ, a‑a sakana bai min sa, an‑na a ma, an‑na an kai fa a a.
43004042	Mbɛ an dɔ musu chɛ ma, an dɔ, “I da a bai dechee an mbe ee a ma tena to, nn mbe nn kai fa tena a a. Chɛɛ koe min na mu, nn fandi gbu, nn‑na a da a bai a min. A sin, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn gbɛ, mbɛ a wan gbu mu dunya chɛ baun mɔɛ a.”
43004043	Chisɔsi‑a tee fea chɛ ben kɛn nɔ, mbɛ a ben‑da Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
43004044	A wandi gbu na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Baa ee Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ma, a wandi gbu waa a.”
43004045	A che‑a kɛn Kadidi, nɔ mɔɛ nu, an‑na an boo si wan a kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, an bɛɛ na‑a ta wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ kun ma. A tima chɛ a, an na‑a ko ɔ ko yen fan, Chisɔsi na‑a miin ma, an bɛn chɛ ɔ.
43004046	Mbɛ Chisɔsi che‑a Kana duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, a na‑a yii ma fan kaina min gbɛ a. Duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min tɔ ni Kapanaun, kɔmende mɔ dɔndɔ 'a den kaienɛ gbandienɛ ni wan nɔ.
43004047	Mbɛ kamin chɛ, a‑a Chisɔsi na koe a min Kadidi, a ka Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A‑a chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ a na‑a a tan. Kamin chɛ‑a Chisɔsi ɔ tisa wan, disa ɔ, a ɔ, an ni yii Kapanaun, a ni a 'a denɛ a baun, min ni gbɛ sa ɔ dechee saya ma kɔnɛ a.
43004048	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Wo wan, ni wo ma kamaya koe n dɔ yen ni ma‑a, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee wo kai fa n na.”
43004049	Mbɛ kɔmende mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Kai, na, mɔ ni ta, n 'na denɛ ma na fa.”
43004050	Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Ta dechee, i 'a denɛ ɛ baun tena wan.” Kamin chɛ dan‑da wan Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a.
43004051	A to‑a yɛ an na a waa a, mbɛ an bɛn‑da a 'a bɔi denɛ n na. An dɔ, “I 'a denɛ ee fa tena.”
43004052	Mbɛ a‑a an dɔ tisa, ni tima min na ni a 'a denɛ‑a a kuu sɔ fisa‑a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Chima chɛ bɔ‑a a ɔ kunun fan, tee ben‑da kɛn ɛnden na kun tɛ ma.”
43004053	Mbɛ a puin‑da den chɛ fa yii ma, mbɛ a tima chɛ a ni kunun, Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, a 'a denɛ ɛ baun‑da wan. Mbɛ a wandi ni ma, a basan a 'a chenɛ a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a.
43004054	A gba fean bɔɛ an nɛ, Chisɔsi ka‑a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a yɛ‑a Kadidi, mbɛ a‑a kamaya koe ma.
43005001	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi sɛ‑a wan to Chuusaɛn, Chu n 'na bɛnɛ dɔndɔ ko a to.
43005002	Nɔ Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ, ben chia ni wan nɔ sa n na, yii pai ɛ a baima. Ku ni bun dɔ duu an pai chɛ a tindanɛ ben‑da. Chu mɔɛ n ni an kaina chɛ chee, an dɔ, Betɛsɛda.
43005003	Gbandi mɔɛ n sɛsɛ ni wan nɔ, an fanka wa, an mbe sa ɔ kuu chɛ n kɔɔ. Fion tɔɛ n ni wan nɔ, namaa n mbe nɔ, a basan chɛ n na, miin chenɛ faen ni an ma.
43005005	Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, a tima chɛ a, min gbandienɛ ni san bi sawa kun ma sɛi ko a.
43005006	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a yen nɔ sa ɔ. A sin‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ an kamin chɛ, ɛ ka gbɛ an gbandi chɛ ɔ, tima ɔ yansama an ko a. Chɛ ko a, mbɛ a ɔ, “I toen mu i ni baun gbandi chɛ ɔ?”
43005007	Mbɛ gbandi mɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Kai, mɔ ee n boo ɔ nɛ, min mbe dɛ n na yii chɛ ɔ, tima ɔ tima dechee ni a ɔ ma‑a. N mbe ma n gbɔ‑a, n ni dɛ a ɔ, mɔ dɔ mende ɛ dɛ wan a ɔ n ya ɔ.”
43005008	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni i 'a waa ya, mbɛ i ta‑a.”
43005009	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ gbu baun‑da a 'a gbandi chɛ ɔ, a‑a a 'a waa ya, mbɛ a bun‑da ben ben‑da. Koe chɛ na‑a chɛ a ɔ Chu n 'na suin tee ma wan.
43005010	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ nu, an‑na a fɔ kamin chɛ ye, an dɔ, “Suin tee mu bi a, a sin, mmɔ 'a sawa ma dɔn ni a ma, i ni ma ka ben ben‑da i 'a waa a.”
43005011	Chɛɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Chɛɛ mɔɛ min‑na a ma n baun‑da, a na‑a a fɔ ka wan n ye, a ɔ, n ni n 'na waa ya, a ɔ, n ni ben ben.”
43005012	Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ minan mu, min‑na chɛ fɔ i ye?”
43005013	Chɛɛ kaminɛ chɛ min na‑a baun ka, a nii ma a ɔ sɔn, mɔɛ min na‑a a ma a baun‑da. Koe min na mu, fanka min ni nɔ a da a ni koo. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan Chisɔsi chen gba ɔ chɛ‑a an mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ.
43005014	Chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi‑a kamin chɛ yen fan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, “A yen ko, i baun‑da gbɛ sanche. Chɛ an fɛ mu, i ma ko yama ma to. Ni chɛ ma, tɔɔya min mbe i tan‑da gbɛ, ɛ yaua‑a a saa ma.”
43005015	Mbɛ kamin chɛ ka‑a nɔ, a ta‑a, mbɛ a‑a Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n tan. A‑a a ɔ yian an na, mbɛ Chisɔsi an na‑a a baun gbandi chɛ ɔ.
43005016	Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, an ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n‑na chɛɛ ma nyɔncha bun fan Chisɔsi ma, kamin chɛ 'a baun koe a, an 'na suin tee chɛ ma.
43005017	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fa Yataa ɛ basan fan mɔɛ n ma, tima ɔ tima ko a. N bɛɛ, a nyin n ni a ma ka.”
43005018	A 'a bai chɛ, a gbu‑a a ma gbɛ, Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n‑na an faa a kɔɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, a fa koe a. An ma yiinachii chɛ chɛ ni, an 'na sawa chɛ dechee an yɔn koe ko a. Chɛɛ a‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ ka, mbɛ a fa an nɛ Yataa a. Mbɛ a chia chɛ a, a‑a a wandi ya wan ka, mbɛ an fea Yataa a, an na kanden fan mu.
43005019	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “N ni chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ n fan, n fɛn mu ka Yataa 'a denɛ a, n mbe ee che ko ɔ ko ma‑a, n kun ma gbasaya a. N mbe koe chɛ n fan ma dechee, n mbe Fa yen miin ma‑a. N Fa, ɛ koe miin ma, n bɛɛ, n fɛn mu a 'a denɛ a, n mbe an fan ma.
43005020	Chɛ ɛ ma wan, koe min na mu, n ko a di Fa ye. A sin, ɛ koe miin gbɛɛ ma, ɛ an dɔ yian fan n na. A sin mbe kamaya koe n dɔ yian‑da wan n na, miin benden mu chɛ ma kaka, miin mbe wo gbɛɛ da n dɔ gbaa a.
43005021	N Fa, ɛ mɔɛ n kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ, ɛ fɔɛ be an ma. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, n bɛɛ, n mbe fɔɛ be‑a chɛ n ma, n toen mu n ni a be miin ma.
43005022	A yɛ to, Fa wandi sin, a ee kaa a tɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ wakoe ma. Chɛɛ a‑a a nɛnɛ gbasaya gbɛɛ be n fan ma.
43005023	A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni basɔmaya be n ma, yɔ an mbe a be buɛ min dɔ Fa ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma basɔmaya be ni n ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ma a be ni ka Fa an ma, min‑na n sɔ.
43005024	“N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe n da a bai a min‑da, a ni a kai fa Fa Yataa a, min‑na n sɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan. A mɔɛ chɛ, kaa a ee tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, a ni tɔɔ. A ban‑da saya ɔ tandin‑da, a ta kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ɔ.
43005025	Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ tima ɛ che tena wan, a gbu sin che‑a, tima min na, mɔ faenɛ n mbe n kuiɛ a min‑da, n fan, Yataa 'a denɛ. An fɛn sin mbe an too ma sɔ‑a a ma, an mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
43005026	N Fa ɛ a ma wan, mɔɛ n mbe fɔɛ ma sɔn. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, n bɛɛ, a 'a denɛ, a‑a a ma, n mbe fɔɛ be.
43005027	A sin‑na n si ka wan to a gbasaya chɛ ɔ, kaa a tɛ koe a. Koe min na mu a‑a chɛ ma, n fan mu Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ a.
43005028	Bai chɛ ma wo da ɔ gbaa, n mbe na tena min fɔ‑a. Tima ɛ che‑a wan, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ faen mu, an ni n kuiɛ a min.
43005029	Mbɛ an bɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ. Chɛ nu, miin na‑a ko chɛndɛ ma, an mbe ma‑a wan to fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛ n sin, miin na‑a ko yama ma, an mbe yɛ‑a wan to fɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ kaa a tɛ‑a an bakoe ma, tɔɔya sa‑a an ma.”
43005030	Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe ee ko ɔ ko ma n ta gbasaya ɔ. Fa Yataa ɛ a fɔ buɛ min dɔ n ye, n mbe kaa a tɛ ka wan. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n sin mbe tea kaa an na tɛ. Tea mu chɛ a, koe min na mu, n mbe koe miin ma, n fandi faa ma koe n ma. Chɛɛ n mbe koe miin ma dechee, an fan nɛ chɛ n na, min‑na n sɔ, a toen mu miin na.
43005031	“Ni n ma‑a siiya a, n fandi ko a, mbɛ n mbe min fɔ‑a, fanka ee ma a.
43005032	Chɛɛ siiya ɛ bai sa tena wan, a si n bakoe ma. N sin‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a 'a siiya a si n ma, tea mu a a.
43005033	Wo na‑a mɔɛ n sɔ wan, an ta‑a Chɔn tena. A wɛɛ sin‑na tea fɔ wan, a si n ma.
43005034	N mbe ee chɛ ma tena, min mbe a ma, n ni mɔ gbu 'a siiya ma sɔn. N mbe Chɔn 'na siiya wakoe fɔ tena dechee, min mbe a ma, wo ni Yataa 'a bauncha ma sɔn.
43005035	Chɔn na‑a bai min sa, min ni yɔ manɛ wo tena, a na‑a a ma wan, wo bu ɔ dia‑a. Tima dɔ ko a, wo ma bɛnden fan ni a 'a bai a min koe a, min ni yɔ manɛ, a sin na‑a wo bu ɔ dia wan.
43005036	Chɛɛ siiya ɛ wan nɔ n ko a, n faen mu min na, a ben Chɔn ta siiya ma. N mbe koe miin ma, chɛ chɛ wai chɛ nu, Fa Yataa‑a n sɔ miin chɛ koe a, an fan mbe koɔ n ko a. N mbe an chɛ buɛ min dɔ, an fan mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ Fa an‑na n sɔ.
43005037	A yɛ to, Fa min‑na n sɔ, a wɛɛ‑a tea ɔ yian fan mɔɛ n na, a si n ma. Chɛɛ wo ma a kuiɛ a min nin bɛ, tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a, wo ma a yen nin bɛ wo ya a.
43005038	A sin, a 'a sakana bai ma si tena sɔn ni wo faa n dɔ. Koe min na mu, wo ma dan ni n na, a‑a n fɛn sɔ.
43005039	Wo e Yataa 'a gboo kan fan chɛndɛ chɛ, koe min na mu, ɛ wo yii ma, an mbe a ma‑a, wo ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Bai miin gbu sin nyɛnden mu gboo chɛ ɔ, an sien mu n fan ma.
43005040	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ma to ni wo ni na n tena, min mbe a ma, wo gbu ni an fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn.
43005041	“Mɔ gbu 'a tando n ko a, n ma a yen ni fen kɔ fen na.
43005042	Chɛɛ a ka chɛ ma, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ min nyɔn sima mu wo a. A sin gbu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ koadia kan kɔ kan, a ee wo faa n dɔ Yataa ko a.
43005043	N fan mu mɔɛ a, Fa‑a min na na, ma koe a a ya a wo tɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ wo ma wo boo si ni n kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe na dechee an fandi kun ye, wo e wo boo si an fan kɔɔ.
43005044	Wo bu ɔ dia‑a wan, wo e ma wo nyɔn bai‑a. Chɛɛ wo ee koe n ma, an ma buɛ n na, min mbe a ma, a wɛn mu dechee Yataa a, a ni wo bai. Mbɛ wo e che ka ma, wo ni dan n na?
43005045	Chɛ wɛɛ ni ma, a ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ n fan mbe kun yama si‑a wo kun ma Fa tena. Chɛɛ Mosisi wandi gbu, wo yii sɔen mu min ma, sɔ koe a wo kɔ, an mbe an kun chɛ si‑a wo kun ma.
43005046	Ni wo na‑a dan fan gbu Mosisi a tea tea gbu a, wo ni dan‑da wan n na, a mu min na, a‑a gboo nyɛn a si n fan ma.
43005047	Chɛɛ ni wo ma dan ni bai chɛ a, a‑a min nyɛn, wo ee kun wo ni dan n da a bai a.”
43006001	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Kadidi yii wa chɛ tɛ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mɔɛ dɔ n ni an yii chɛ chee, an dɔ, Tibɛyasi.
43006002	Mbɛ mɔ fanka wa n bea‑a a fɛ, koe min na mu, an na‑a a ɔ yen fan, a na‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ gbandi mɔɛ n baun‑da.
43006003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi sɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ a, mbɛ a si‑a nɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
43006004	A tima chɛ a, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ chɛ, a bia tima ma naen fan ni gbɛ.
43006005	Chisɔsi‑a a ya a ta, mbɛ a‑a mɔ fanka wa chɛ yen, an mbe na‑a a tena. Chɛ ko a, mbɛ a ɔ Fiipi ma, a ɔ, “Mmɔ ɛ daun fenɛ san mende, min mbe kun mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a?”
43006006	A na‑a chɛ fɔ, min mbe a ma dechee, a ni Fiipi yiima sɔn. Tea ni min na, a wan Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, ɛ koe min ma tena, a e na to tisa chɛ chɛ‑a.
43006007	Mbɛ Fiipi ɔ, “Min mbe a ma mɔ ɔ mɔ ni daun fenɛ sima daun, a kɔpɔɛ chɛ, ɛ ta wan kau sɛi pawa ɔ, daun fen chɛ san koe a.”
43006008	A fɛ den chɛ n dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Anduu, Saimɔn Pita dɔɛ, a koɔ‑a wan,
43006009	a ɔ, “Kaienɛ yen ko nɛ, biidi gbugbu duu, ɛ min boo ɔ, a basan nyɛ gbaa fea a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbu, ɛ fen bɔ mɔ bonda chɛ n ko a?”
43006010	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ den chɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ni si.” An kaina chɛ gbɛɛ yaen fan ni bin gbii a. Chɛ ko a, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ si‑a wan ta‑a. Mɔ kaima miin gbɛɛ ni nɔ, an taen fan ni mɔ wu duu ɔ.
43006011	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a biidi chɛ ya, a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ma, a du‑a mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, miin ni ka nɔ si ɔ. A‑a ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma nyɛ chɛ wɛɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a ma, a wɛɛ du‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ma. A sin, an gbɛɛ, an‑na an bu fa daunɛ chɛ wan, yɔ an toen ni min na.
43006012	An gbɛɛ bu fa‑a kɛn, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo an da tɔɛ chɛ n na sɔn sɔn, mmɔ ma a pɛɛ ɛndenɛ wɛɛ yayi.”
43006013	Mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n da tɔɛ chɛ gbɛɛ a sɔn sɔn. A bɛn‑da samba fa tan kun ma fea an ma, biidi gbugbu duu chɛ.
43006014	Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na kamaya koe chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, Chisɔsi‑a min ma, mbɛ an dɔ, “Tea ko a, kamin chɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ an nɛ. Mosisi na‑a chɛ an na koe kɔɔ fɔ dunya ɔ.”
43006015	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn kɛn, mbɛ an toen ni, an ni a bia gbasaya a, an ni a din a ma, ma koe a mansa a, a bɔ‑a wan an tɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a dɔndɔ gbe, a‑a a ma sɛ to kɔnkɔɛ ɔ.
43006016	Yɛɛ ma tee che‑a kɛn, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n yii‑a wan yii wa da a.
43006017	Fitii che‑a ka wan aan, Chisɔsi nii ma na nin bɛ an tena. Mbɛ an sɛ‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, an bun‑da yii chɛ tɛ‑a, an mbe yɛ‑a Kapanaun teen na.
43006018	A tima chɛ a, fia‑a a kuu sɔ wan bɔ‑a gbasaya a, mbɛ yii wa chɛ yaua‑a, a tɛ koe a.
43006019	Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ nu, an na‑a dɛndɛ chɛ wii wan gbɛ mai sawa nyɔn ko a, chɛ ma, mai naanin, an mbe e na to a yen‑da, ɛ na‑a tachɛ chɛ‑a yii wa chɛ a, dɛndɛ chɛ baima. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ, chiandia‑a an gboo fa gban.
43006020	Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo ma chian, n fan mu.”
43006021	Mbɛ an‑na an boo si Chisɔsi kɔɔ dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, buɔdia a. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a ka, an 'na dɛndɛ chɛ gbu, a che‑a an na tindi ma, an ni ta tena kaina min.
43006022	Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, mɔ fanka chɛ nu, miin na‑a to nɔ yii chɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ chɛ ma, an na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ dɛndɛ dɔndɔɛ an ni nɔ. An na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan to, mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n ni ta tena tima min na, an bɛ an nii ma ta ni a a. Chɛɛ an na‑a a to an gbaa wan.
43006023	Chɛɛ dɛndɛ dɔ gbɛɛ nu, an na‑a wan, a ka Tibɛyasi duu ɔ. An na‑a an kaina chɛ baima, Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a Yataa wai bɔ kaina min, mbɛ mɔ fanka wa chɛ‑a biidi chɛ daun.
43006024	Mɔ fanka wa chɛ‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi nii nɔ, n mbe ee baa a fɛ denɛ n ma. Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n sɛ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ n dɔ, nɔ tindi chɛ ma, mbɛ an ta‑a Kapanaun, an mbe an ya a kan‑da Chisɔsi a.
43006025	An‑na a yen kɛn, yii chɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, i‑a a fo nɛ tima minan na?”
43006026	Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, koe min na mu, wo e n yan tena. Wo‑a biidi miin daun, wo bu fa‑a gban, an fɛ mu. Chɛɛ an ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ wo‑a kamaya koe chɛ n dɔ gbɛ wan, n‑na miin ma.
43006027	Chɛɛ wo ma butuinɛ chɛ daun fenɛ ko a, min mbe yɔn. Wo e min ma, wo butuinɛ chɛ daun fenɛ ko a, min mbe mɛ, min mu kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a. Daun fen chɛ mu, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe a be‑a wo ma. Koe min na mu, Fa Yataa‑a a ɔ yian, mbɛ a boo ɛ wan n kɔɔ.”
43006028	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn mbe fen gbu n ma gbɛ, Yataa toen mu nn ni koe miin ma?”
43006029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Yataa toen mu wo ni koe min ma, an nɛ wo dan koe a n na, a‑a n fɛn sɔ.”
43006030	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔɔ ni i‑a kamaya koe ma, nn ni a ɔ yen, a ma koe a, nn ni dan i da a bai a. E fen ma‑a?
43006031	Koe tɔmɔsi chɛ yen bɛ, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba nu, an‑na daun fenɛ daun fan suun fuinɛ ma, an ni min chee, an dɔ, mana. A na‑a ma wan dechee, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ a‑a daun fenɛ be wan an ma, a ka banda bu ɔ, a daun koe a.”
43006032	Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, mbɛ Mosisi an nii ma daun fen chɛ be ni wo ma, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ. Chɛɛ Fa Yataa, an mbe daun fenɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ be wo ma, a ka banda bu ɔ.
43006033	A mu min na, daun fen chɛ, Yataa‑a min be, a mu chɛ an na, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a yii‑a, a‑a fɔɛ be dunya ma.”
43006034	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kai, an daun fen chɛ be nn ma, tima ɔ tima ko a.”
43006035	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan mu daun fen chɛ a, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be koe a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a n tena, mbɛ a‑a a kai fa n na, kɔnkɔ ee a mɔɛ chɛ bia‑a to kuɔ fɔ, a sin, a kanɛ wɛɛ a ee gbaa‑a to.
43006036	Chɛɛ n‑na a fɔ wan wo ye, mbɛ wo e n yen tena wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, wo ee wo kai fa‑a n na.
43006037	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Fa Yataa‑a miin be n ma, an mbe na‑a wan n tena. N sin, n mbe ee mɔ ɔ mɔ a yɛ‑a, min mbe na‑a n tena.
43006038	A mu min na, n yii‑a dunya ɔ, Fa Yataa faa ma koe an chɛ koe a, a wan‑na n sɔ. Chɛɛ n ma na ni n fandi ta faa ma koe an fan chɛ koe a.
43006039	A sin, a wɛn‑na n sɔ, a faa ma koe n fan nɛ. Mbɛ n ma fo a 'a mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ a, mɔɛ chɛ nu, a‑a miin be n ma. Chɛɛ tee dankama ma, n ni a ma, an gbɛɛ kɔɔ ni sɔ, a yɛ fɔɛ ɔ.
43006040	A mu min na, Fa Yataa toen mu min na, an nɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe dɔn‑da a ma, mbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ mu n na, mbɛ a‑a a kai fa n na, n ni a ma, a ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. A sin, n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan, a ka saya ɔ tee dankama ma.”
43006041	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bun‑da gbonyɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, a si a ma. An dɔ, fen mu ɛ a fɔ, a ɔ, a wan mu daun fenɛ chɛ a, Yataa na‑a min na yii a ka banda bu ɔ.
43006042	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an dɔ, “Mɔna chɛ an nɛ, Chisɔsi, Chosɛfi 'a den chɛ. An ma chɛ a? Mmɔ‑a a fa sɔn fan, an fea a de a. Ɛ ma ka ma gbɛ, a ni a fɔ to mmɔ ye, mbɛ a ka‑a banda bu ɔ wan, a yii‑a nɛ?”
43006043	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo sɛmbɛ wo kunɛ ma tɔɔ koe a.
43006044	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che na‑a n tena, mɔɔ ni Fa‑a a ma, a na‑a n tena. A sin, n mbe a ma‑a wan, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ saya ɔ tee dankama ma.
43006045	Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ‑a a nyɛn fan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ kan‑da wan.’ A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a too ma sɔ‑a Fa kuiɛ ma, a ni a 'a kanɛ sɔn, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ na wan n tena.
43006046	Chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan nɔ, min‑na Fa Yataa yen bɛ, mɔɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ, min ka‑a a tena, a dechee, an‑na a yen bɛ.
43006047	N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a n na, an mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da.
43006048	N fan mu daun fen chɛ a, fɔɛ be koe a.
43006049	Wo bemba n ta bemba nu, an‑na daun fen chɛ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, mana, an‑na a daun bɛɛ boo ɔ boo fuinɛ ma, an fa‑a wan chɛ gbakɔ.
43006050	Chɛɛ daun fen chɛ yen ko, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a ee ka, ni mɔ‑a a daun. A tana, ɛ a ma wan, mɔɛ ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.
43006051	N fan mu fɔɛ be daun fen chɛ a, min yii‑a a ka banda bu ɔ. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a daun fen chɛ daun, ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan. N mbe daun fen chɛ min sin be‑a a ma, a mu n gboo an na. N mbe a be‑a wan, fɔɛ ko a dunya ɔ.”
43006052	Chɛ ko a, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bun‑da kɔɔsa bia wa chɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Mɔna chɛ ɛ kun ka ma, a ni a gboo be koe fɔ mmɔ ma, a daun koe a?”
43006053	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka n mbe a ma din to wo tena, mbɛ mɔɔ ni wo‑a n gboo daun, n fan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, wo ni n wii min, wo e na to ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ.
43006054	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe n gboo daun‑da, mbɛ a‑a n wii min, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an mbe a ko a. A sin, n mbe a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan saya ɔ, a yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ, tee dankama ma.
43006055	Koe min na mu, n gboo an mu daun fenɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a, n wii wɛɛ mu min fenɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a.
43006056	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe n gboo daun‑da, a ni n wii min, nn fea a mɔɛ chɛ a, nn mbe ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
43006057	Fa min mbe fɔɛ be, an‑na n sɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, a sin fan‑na a ma to, n mbe fɔɛ ɔ. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe n gboo daun‑da, n bɛɛ, n mbe a ma‑a ka wan, an ni ma fɔɛ ɔ.
43006058	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, daun fen chɛ an yii‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ. Wo bemba n ta bemba n‑na daun fen chɛ daun fan, an ni min chee, an dɔ, mana, chɛɛ an fa‑a wan a gbakɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ tana, a ee ka. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe daun fen chɛ daun‑da, ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”
43006059	Chisɔsi na‑a chɛ fɔ tima min na, a ni kan chɛ tena Kapanaun duu ɔ wan, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a.
43006060	Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n sɛsɛ, an fandi gbu na‑a a fɔ wan, an dɔ, “Kan chɛ nɛnɛ kɔ gbɛ. Nyɔn mbe che a too ma sɔ‑a chɛ ma?”
43006061	Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma a fɔ ni a ye, chɛɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an ni gbonyɛ tena a 'a kan chɛ an na. Chɛ ko a, a‑a a fɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Chɛ‑a a kun gbɛ, wo yiima mun koe a, ae?”
43006062	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Chɛ ɛ wo faa mun‑da wan gbɛ yama yama. Ni wo‑a a ya gbɛ, mbɛ wo‑a n yen, n fan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n mbe sɛ‑a to kaina chɛ, n ka‑a kaina min.
43006063	Yataa Nyina, an mbe fɔɛ be, chɛɛ mɔ gbu ta gbasaya ma fen kɔ fen na ɛnden bɛɛ a. N‑na bai miin fɔ ka wo ye, an fan mbe na Yataa Nyina a, min mbe fɔɛ be.
43006064	Chɛɛ wo dɔ n ban‑da wo kai fa koe a n na.” Chisɔsi na‑a chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, a na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, a ka a fɛ denɛ n chee tima ma, an fɛn mbe ee na‑a an kai fa‑a a a. A yɛ to, an tɛ ɔ, min bɛɛ ɛ na‑a a ma tachɛ‑a, a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ma.
43006065	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a ɔ, “Kun chɛ gbu ko a mu, n‑na a fɔ wo ye, n dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che na‑a n tena, mɔɔ ni Fa Yataa‑a gbasaya be a ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ma koe a n fɛ denɛ a.”
43006066	A ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n sɛsɛ yiima mun‑da, an ka‑a a fɛ.
43006067	Chɛ ko a, Chisɔsi‑a a fɛ den tan kun ma fea n dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Wo wɛɛ to, wo e to‑a wan, wo ni ka n fɛ?”
43006068	Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita ɔ, “Mansa, nn mbe ta‑a gbɛ nyɔn tena? A yen ko, i da a bai, an mbe a ma kɛn, mɔ gbu ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.
43006069	A sin yen ko gbɛ, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn, a sin, nn dan‑da a a, mbɛ i wan mu mɔɛ a tenchen Yataa 'a wai chɛ koe a, a‑a min sɔ.”
43006070	Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan‑na n boo sɔ wo mɔ tan kun ma fea n chɛ n ma, ma koe a n fɛ, a ee ka wan? Chɛɛ Sitana faa an mbe wo dɔndɔ bu ɔ.”
43006071	A da a bai chɛ sien ni ka Chudasi an ma, kai Saimɔn Isikayɔti 'a denɛ. Koe min na mu, Chudasi ni wɛɛ boo ɔ boo Chisɔsi fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ a, chɛɛ a wan ni danka tena Chisɔsi ma tachɛ‑a, chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ma.
43007001	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi ben ben‑da Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A nii ma to ni, a ni gbɛn Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ ma ɛnden bɛɛ a. A mu min na, Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ nu nɔ, an ma bɛnden fan ni a fa koe a.
43007002	Chɛɛ tima gbɛnden fan ni gbɛ, bɛn chɛ ko a, Chu mɔɛ n ni kuu n sɔ tima min na.
43007003	Chɛ ko a, mbɛ Chisɔsi suun ma nyɔɛ kaima nu, an dɔ a ma, an dɔ, “Bɔ nɛ chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, i ni ta Chudia, min mbe a ma, i fɛ mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen, e kamaya koe miin ma tena.
43007004	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a chɛ chɛ wai nun‑da mɔɛ n ma, ni a toen mu dunya ni a wakoe ɔ sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ. Ni e kamaya ko bonda chɛ n ma wan sanche, a ma to dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ni i wakoe ɔ sɔn.”
43007005	A suun ma nyɔɛ kaima n gbu wɛɛ, an na‑a chɛ fɔ, a mu min na, an nii ma dan ni a a.
43007006	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo tana tima ee wo ko a, tima min kɔ min nyin fan, wo ta koe a. Chɛɛ n tana, tima gbu ma che nin bɛ n ko a, n ta ta koe a.
43007007	Dunya chɛ ee che chia sɔn‑da too koe a wo nan na, chɛɛ n tana, a tooen fan mu n na. Koe min na mu, n ma n da a tɔn ni, a fɔ koe a mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ an chɛ chɛ wai n yau Yataa ya a.
43007008	Wo e ka wɛ ta‑a Chuusaɛn bɛn chɛ ɔ. N mbe ee ta tena wɛ, koe min na mu, n ta tima gbu ma che nin bɛ, ta koe a.”
43007009	A na‑a chɛ fɔ kɛn, mbɛ a to‑a wɛ gbaa Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
43007010	A suun ma nyɔɛ kaima n taenɛ gbakɔ an bɛnɛ chɛ ɔ, Chisɔsi wɛɛ na‑a ta wan. Chɛɛ chɛ wɛɛ ma‑a, a nii ma a ya kɔɔɛ a bɔ ni ya a ma, chɛɛ a na‑a a ya kɔɔɛ nun fan.
43007011	Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ nu, an ni wan ben‑da an ya a kan‑da a a, bɛn chɛ ɔ. An dɔ, “An mɔna chɛ ɛ mende?”
43007012	Mɔ fanka chɛ ni wan bai sɛsɛ sa‑a an da kɔɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma. An dɔ n dɔ, “Mɔ chɛndɛ an nɛ mɔna chɛ a.” Dɔ n sin dɔ, “A ee ka. Mɔ bun mɔɛ gbama an nɛ.”
43007013	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ nii a kuiɛ ma sɛ, an ni ma bai sa‑a a si Chisɔsi ma. Koe min na mu, an chianden fan ni ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n ma.
43007014	An ni gbɛ bɛnɛ chɛ tɛtɛ ma wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi sɛ‑a Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, a bun‑da an kan‑da.
43007015	Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ nu, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan kaka. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mɔna chɛ ɛ ma ka ma, a ni koe sɔn buɛ chɛ ɔ, a nii kɛn mɔ kɔɔ kandencha a?”
43007016	Chɛ ko a, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe kanɛ miin chɛ, an mbe ee bɔ n ta yiimatɛ an dɔ. Chɛɛ Fa Yataa, min‑na n sɔ, an mbe an be n ma.
43007017	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma bɛnden mu, Yataa faa ma koe ma koe a, an mbe a ɔ sɔn, n mbe kanɛ min chɛ tena. A mɔɛ chɛ, an mbe a ɔ sɔn, ni n mbe Yataa da a bai an na ben tena. Chɛ ma, an mbe a ɔ sɔn, ni n mbe a chɛ tena n fandi kun ma an na.
43007018	Mɔɛ min mbe kanɛ chɛ, a wandi kun ma a a, a toen mu a ni a wandi an na buu fɛ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min toen mu, mɔɛ min‑na a sɔ, a ni tando ma sɔn, a mɔɛ chɛ tea mɔɛ mu. A ee fania kan kɔ kan fɔ.
43007019	Wo gbɛɛ dɔnden fan mu a ma, mbɛ Mosisi an‑na sawa chɛ n be wo ma. Chɛɛ wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee tachɛ tena sawa chɛ n na chɛndɛ. Fen ko a mu, wo toen mu wo ni n fa?”
43007020	Mbɛ mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ, “Nyina yama an mbe i fɛ. Mɔɛ minan mu, min mbe i fɛ i fa koe a?”
43007021	Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na tee dɔndɔ 'a kamaya koe an ma wɛ ka, a sin‑na wo gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa wan.
43007022	Wo e wo 'a denɛ n na kamincha wan, tima ɔ tima, a ni ma suin tee wɛɛ ma a. Mosisi na‑a a fɔ ka wan wo ye, a ma koe a. Chɛɛ Mosisi gbu, an nii ma mɔɛ saa saa a, min na‑a chɛ kuu sɔ. Wo bemba n ta bemba nu, an fan gbu na‑a a kuu sɔ.
43007023	Wo ee che tandin‑da suin tee wɛɛ ɔ, wo 'a denɛ n 'na kamincha koe a, wo ma na sawa chɛ yɔn, min be‑a Mosisi ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo faa ee che tɛ‑a n ma, koe min na mu, n‑na a ma, gbandi bɔ‑a mɔna chɛ gboo gbɛɛ ɔ, suin tee ma. Fen ko a wo faa ɛ tɛ?
43007024	Wo sɛmbɛ koe n yen koe a dechee, mbɛ wo‑a kaa a tɛ an ma. Chɛɛ wo koe n dɔ gbɛ pɛn, mbɛ tea nu mu, mbɛ wo‑a tea kaa n na tɛ an ma.”
43007025	Mbɛ an mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an bun‑da wan a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Mɔna chɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an nɛ, mmɔ ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n mbe min yan tena, a fa koe a.
43007026	A yen ko, ɛ koɔ‑a fanka ɔ den, a sin, an mbe ee che gbukuu wɛɛ tɛ‑a a ma, a si a ma. A e na ma wan gbɛ, mbɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n yiima bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ an mu kunka mansa a?
43007027	Chɛɛ nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, kamin chɛ ka‑a duu min dɔ. Chɛɛ kunka mansa chɛ, ɛ na‑a tima min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a ka tena sɔn‑da.”
43007028	Chisɔsi to‑a kan chɛ an na, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a koɔ‑a gbankon, a ɔ, “Wo‑a n sɔn fan tea gbu ko a? Wo‑a n ka tena sɔn fan? N mbe ee nɛ n fandi an ko a. Chɛɛ a nyin wo ni dan a a, min‑na n sɔ. Wo ma a sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ.
43007029	Chɛɛ n tana, n‑na a sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. Koe min na mu, a wan‑na n sɔ, a sin, n ka‑a a tena wan.”
43007030	Chisɔsi kuiɛ chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ chɛ dɔ n toen ni an ni a bia fɔin. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a boo tu ni a a. Koe min na mu chɛ ma‑a, tima nii ma chɛ a, tima min yianden ni a 'a fɔɛ ɔ, a bia koe a.
43007031	Chɛɛ mɔ fanka chɛ nu, an sɛsɛ na‑a an kai fa wan a a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kunka mansa chɛ gbu, a ɛ na‑a tima min na, kamaya koe ee to nɔ, a ɛ min ma‑a, a ni ben kamin chɛ ma.”
43007032	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii n na, an‑na fanka chɛ wɛwɛɛ kuiɛ a min bai chɛ n na, a si Chisɔsi ma. Chɛ ko a, an fan, an bɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n na Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an‑na kata chɛ ɔ poesi n sɔ, a bia koe a.
43007033	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe ma tena wɛ wo tɛ ɔ, tima ɛnden fan ko a dechee. Mbɛ a gbakɔ, n mbe yɛ‑a wan a tena, a wɛn‑na n sɔ.
43007034	N yen sɔɛ ɛ ma‑a wan wo a, wo ni n yan, chɛɛ wo ee n yen‑da. Koe min na mu, n mbe ma‑a kaina min, wo ee che‑a ta‑a nɔ.”
43007035	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni Chisɔsi chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n na, an bun‑da a da a bai chɛ tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “A e na ma ta‑a mende, mmɔ ee a yen kaina min? Kɔkɔɛ a ɛ ta tena duu dɔ mende n fan dɔ, mmɔ 'a mɔɛ dɔ n mbe kaina min, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n kan, miin ma mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na.
43007036	A ɔ te to, mbɛ a yen sɔɛ ɛ mmɔ bia wan, mmɔ ni a yan, chɛɛ a ɔ, mmɔ ee na‑a a yen‑da. A sin, a ɛ ta‑a kaina min, mmɔ ee che‑a ta‑a nɔ. Fen bai nu mu chɛ n na?”
43007037	An bɛnɛ chɛ tee dankama ma, mɔɛ n 'na buɔdia bɔɛ, a kun tɛ tee ni an na. Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a koɔ‑a gbankon, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min kanɛ a gbaaen mu, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ na n fan tena, a ni a min.
43007038	A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min kai faen mu n na, yii min mbe fɔɛ be, a ɔ ee tɛ‑a bɔ koe a, a ka an mɔɛ chɛ faa ɔ. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ ka wan.”
43007039	Chisɔsi na‑a chɛ fɔ, a yii ni Yataa Nyina chɛ an ma, min mbe ma‑a mɔɛ n fɛ, miin kai faenɛ ɛ ma‑a a a. Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, Yataa Nyina chɛ nii ma yii nin bɛ, a ni ma an mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ. Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi kɔɔ ni ma sɔ nin bɛ, a ka saya ɔ, a ni sɛ manɛ ɔ.
43007040	Mɔɛ dɔ nu, an mɔ fanka chɛ n tɛ ɔ, an‑na a da a bai chɛ n na min kɛn, mbɛ an dɔ, “Tea ko a, kamin chɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ an nɛ, min na koe fɔen mu.”
43007041	Mbɛ an dɔ n sin, an dɔ, “Kunka mansa gbu an nɛ.” Chɛɛ dɔ n bɛɛ to, an dɔ, “Kunka mansa ee che bɔ‑a Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
43007042	Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, mbɛ kunka mansa ɛ na‑a bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ wan. A sin mbe suun‑da Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ wan, Bɛtɛɛn duu ɔ, a wan Mansa Defidi waa a.”
43007043	Chɛ ko a, kuiɛ a kanɛ sima wɛɛ nii mɔ fanka chɛ n tɛ ɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma.
43007044	An dɔ nu, an toen fan ni, an ni a bia fɔin, chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a boo tu ni a a.
43007045	Yataa 'a kata ɔ poesi chɛ n yɛ‑a kɛn, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ n tena, an bɛ Fayisii chɛ n na, an‑na tisa chɛ, an dɔ, “Fen mu wo ma na ni an mɔna a?”
43007046	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ, a da a kuiɛ, a kaen fan mu mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan ta ma.”
43007047	Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ n dɔ, “Wo ma a ma nn ni dan a a, mbɛ a‑a wo wɛɛ kunɛ ɔ fii fii.
43007048	Nn mbe ee dan‑da a a, mbɛ mmɔ 'a gbakoo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɛ wan nɔ, chɛ ma, ni Fayisii mɔ kan kɔ kan mbe wan nɔ, min kai faen mu a a.
43007049	A sin, mɔɛ chɛ n ma sawa chɛ n sɔn, Yataa na‑a miin be Mosisi ma. Chɛ ko a, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni tɔɔya ɔ yen.”
43007050	Chɛɛ kamin chɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ mu Nikɔdemɔsi. Fayisii chɛ nu, an ya ɔ sɔɛ dɔndɔ ni a a. A sin fan na‑a ta tima dɔndɔ a, a‑a Chisɔsi tan. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a bɔɛ chɛ n ma, a ɔ,
43007051	“Mmɔ 'a sawa n‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ mmɔ ee kaa a tɛ, a si mɔɛ ma, ni mmɔ ma a kan dɔ kuiɛ a min ni, mmɔ ni a ɔ gbɛ, a‑a koe min gbu ma. A ee ka wan?”
43007052	Mbɛ a bɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “Aa, i wɛɛ ka‑a Kadidi wan? Yataa 'a gboo ɔ fɛn bɛ kan kɔ kan, e ee yiima chɛ yen‑da a ɔ. Yiima chɛ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɛ ka‑a wan Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ.” [
43007053	Mbɛ an gbɛɛ yɛ‑a an 'na chenɛ n na.
43008001	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi tana, bɛn chɛ fasandenɛ gbakɔ, a sɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an dɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ.
43008002	Banda ka dɔndɔɛ ma, sayi ma, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ na‑a a 'a tindanɛ. A sin, a si‑a wan, mbɛ a bun‑da an kan‑da.
43008003	Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ nu, an bɛ Fayisii mɔɛ dɔ n na, an don‑da wan musu dɔndɔ a. An na‑a a bia, an dɔ, a‑a waa ma basan mɔ kaima a, min ma a fuu kai a. Mbɛ an‑na a ma, a sɔ‑a den, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ.
43008004	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Ticha, musu chɛ, nn‑na a bia tɔgbaa, ɛ waa ma basan‑da, an fea kai a, min ma a fuu kai a.
43008005	Mmɔ 'a sawa n dɔ, Mosisi na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ musu bonda chɛ, mmɔ ɛ a bon fan senɛ a, a ni fa. Mmɔ ɛ fen ma gbɛ a a, sanche?”
43008006	An‑na chɛ fɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni Chisɔsi bia a chen kɔ, a da a bai ɔ, mbɛ an‑na kun yama si a kun ma. Chɛɛ a‑a a kunɛ a bun fan, a bun‑da nyɛnɛ sa‑a gbangbanɛ ɔ, a boo denɛ a.
43008007	An to‑a a ɔ tisa chɛ an na tun tun, mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ. A‑a a tɛ ɔ sawan, mbɛ a ɔ, “A ma yau. Chɛɛ wo gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma nin bɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ, an ni senɛ saa saa bondan musu chɛ a fasa.”
43008008	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a ma bun to, mbɛ a bun‑da to nyɛnɛ sa‑a gbangbanɛ chɛ ɔ.
43008009	A tima chɛ a gbɛ, mɔɛ chɛ miin gbɛɛ na‑a a da a bai chɛ a min, an bun‑da an fandi kanka‑a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Chenanɛ n pɛn tuin‑da, mbɛ a tɔɛ n‑na a sɔ an fɛ. Chisɔsi ma gbaaenɛ to‑a nɔ, an fea an musu chɛ a sɔ ɔ tun.
43008010	Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ to, a‑a a tɛ ɔ sawan, mbɛ a ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, i 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ta‑a mende? An dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma bɔ ni nɔ, a ni kaa a tɛ i wakoe ma?”
43008011	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Kai, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma a ma ni e.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N bɛɛ, n fan mbe ee kaa a tɛ‑a, a si i ma. E ka gbɛ ta‑a. Chɛɛ a ka bi ma, i boo bɔ ko yama ma ɔ.”]
43008012	Chisɔsi koɔ‑a wan to mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a ɔ, “N fan mu manɛ a dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ko a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe bea‑a n fɛ, ɛ manɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ ni ma fɔɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, a mɔɛ chɛ ee tachɛ‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a pimbi pimbi ɔ.”
43008013	Mbɛ Fayisii mɔɛ n dɔ, “Sanche gbɛ, e ka i wandi an na siiya bɔ‑a. E bai miin gbɛɛ fɔ tena, an ma nn kun bia ni.”
43008014	Chisɔsi ɔ, “A ee ka. Mmɔ a ya, mbɛ n mbe siiya an bɔ tena n fandi ko a. Chɛɛ n mbe bai miin fɔ tena, tea mu. Koe min na mu, n ka‑a kaina min, n‑na nɔ sɔn fan. A sin to, n‑na n ta tena sɔn fan. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo ma an kaina chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ sɔn.
43008015	Wo tana, wo e kaa a tɛ mɔɛ n bakoe ma mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia an na. Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe ee kaa a tɛ tena mɔ ɔ mɔ wako ma.
43008016	Chɛɛ ni n‑na a ma wɛɛ ka, n mbe kaa min na tɛ‑a, ɛ ma‑a tea nɛnɛ an na. Koe min na mu, n dɔndɔ gbe an mbe ee na‑a a ma‑a n kun ma gbasaya a. Fa min‑na n sɔ, nn fea an mbe nn kun puin‑da kaina dɔndɔɛ.
43008017	A nyɛnden fan mu wo 'a sawa gboo ɔ, mbɛ sii fea nu, ni an kuiɛ bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ an 'na siiya bɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ an da a kuiɛ mu tea an na.
43008018	N mu siiya, n fandi ko a. Fa wɛɛ, min‑na n sɔ, a wɛɛ ɛ siiya bɔ tena wan, a si n ma.”
43008019	Mbɛ an dɔ, “I fa chɛ gbu ɛ mende?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo ma n sɔn buɛ min dɔ, wo ma Fa wɛɛ sɔn ka wan. Ni wo na‑a n sɔn fan, wo ni Fa wɛɛ sɔn‑da wan.”
43008020	Chisɔsi na‑a chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ tima min na, a ni Yataa 'a kata ɔ wan, ɛ mɔɛ n kan‑da. A ni kaina chɛ baima wan, kakaa chɛ n ni ka si ɔ kaina min, an ni boo fenɛ n be ka Yataa ma, kakaa miin dɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma a bia ni nɔ, a mu min na, a bia tima min yianden ni, a nii ma che nin bɛ.
43008021	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ to an ye, a ɔ, “N mbe na tena wan ta‑a, a sin, n yen sɔɛ ɛ wo bia‑a wan, wo ni wo ya a kan n na. Chɛɛ wo e fa‑a ka wan aan, Yataa ee a boo bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ. Wo ee kun‑da wo ni ta kaina chɛ, n mbe ma‑a kaina min.”
43008022	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “Mɔna chɛ yii e na ma ta‑a a wandi fa koe an dɔ? A yen ko, a ɛ a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, a ɛ ta‑a kaina min, mmɔ ee kun‑da mmɔ ni ta nɔ.”
43008023	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Wo tana, dunya chɛ nɛ, a ɔ mɔɛ n mu wo a. Chɛɛ n tana, n ka‑a pande wan, banda bu ɔ. Dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ mu wo a, chɛɛ a ɔ mɔɛ ma n nan sin na.
43008024	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na a fɔ wo ye, n dɔ, wo e fa‑a ka wan, Yataa ee a boo bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ. Ni wo ma dan ni a a, mbɛ n fan mu mɔɛ chɛ a, n‑na a fɔ, n mu mɔɛ min na. Ni wo ma dan ni chɛ a, wo e fa‑a ka wan, Yataa ee a boo bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ.”
43008025	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nyɔn gbu sin mu i a?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N‑na a fɔ wan wo ye a saa saa, n mu mɔɛ min na. N mu mɔɛ chɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an na, n‑na a fɔ wo ye sɛsɛ, n mu mɔɛ min na.
43008026	Bai kɔkoo n yii ma, a si wo ma, a kɔkoo kaa a tɛ koe a wo wakoe ma. Chɛɛ an sin gbu, n fan yiima ko ma an na. Min‑na n sɔ, a wan yii ma koe nu mu, a sin mbe tea an fɔ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ɛ min fɔ n ye dechee, n mbe an na ben mɔ ɔ mɔ tena dunya chɛ ɔ.”
43008027	Chɛɛ an dɔndɔ wɛɛ nii ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, mbɛ Chisɔsi ni koɔ tena a si a Fa Yataa an ma.
43008028	Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Tima min na mu, wo e n na sɛ‑a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, n fan Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, wo e n sɔn‑da a tima an na. Mbɛ n fan mu mɔɛ chɛ a, n fɛn mbe ka koɔ tena wo tena. Mbɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn to, mbɛ n mbe ee ko ɔ ko chɛ n kun ma a a. Chɛɛ Fa ɛ min fɔ n ye, a fɔ koe a, n mbe an fɔ dechee.
43008029	A sin, a wɛn‑na n sɔ, nn fea an mbe nn kun puin kaina dɔndɔɛ, a ee n dɔndɔ gbe boo ka tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ. Koe min na mu, a faa chima koe nu, n mbe an fan ma tima ɔ tima.”
43008030	Mɔ sɛsɛ nu, miin‑na Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ n na min, an‑na an kai fa wan a a.
43008031	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin dan‑da ka Chisɔsi a, a koɔ‑a an tena, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a wo too ma sɔ n da a kuiɛ ma, wo e ma‑a n fɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n fan na.
43008032	Wo e tea ɔ gbɛ‑a wan, a si Yataa ma, a sin fan mbe a ma‑a, wo kunɛ ni bɔ yɔncha ɔ.”
43008033	Chɛɛ an dɔ, “Nn tana, Ebeami dambi ɔ mɔɛ mu nn na. A sin, kɛn gba, nn ma don nin bɛ mɔ 'a yɔncha kɔɔ. E a fɔ‑a sanche, i ɔ, nn mbe bɔ‑a wan yɔncha ɔ. Fen mbe i yii ma?”
43008034	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ko yama ma, yɔnɛ mu a mɔɛ chɛ a, a 'a ko yama n boo ɔ.
43008035	Yɔnɛ ee to a yɔn fa 'a suunɛ ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛɛ an suun chɛ ɔ denɛ tana, ɛ to wan a ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.
43008036	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni Yataa 'a denɛ‑a i kun bɔ yɔncha ɔ, mbɛ i kun bɔ‑a a ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ.
43008037	N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Ebeami cheeya mu wo a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo toen mu wo ni n fa. Koe min na mu, n mbe wo kan tena bai miin na, wo ma to ni, wo ni wo boo si an kɔɔ.
43008038	Fa na‑a koe miin yian n na, n mbe koɔ tena a si an fan ma. Wo sin, wo fa na‑a koe miin fɔ wo ye, wo e an fan ma ka.”
43008039	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn bemba n ta bemba, a mu Ebeami an na.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni Ebeami cheeya chɛndɛ chɛndɛ gbu ni wo a, wo chɛ chɛ wai n ni ma‑a ka wan dechee, yɔ a ta ni buɛ min dɔ.
43008040	Chɛɛ wo tana, wo ma bɛndenɛ min chɛen mu ka, n fa koe a, Ebeami nii ma a ma ni ka. N sɔnɛ gbɛɛ wɛ wo tena, an nɛ tea bai chɛ n na, miin kaen mu Yataa tena, n mbe miin fɔ.
43008041	Chɛɛ wo sɔnɛ n mbe wan dechee, yɔ wo fa ta ni buɛ min dɔ.” Mbɛ an dɔ, “I ma chɛ fɔ nn ye. Nn tana, nn fa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, a sin fan nɛ Yataa a. A 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ mu nn na.”
43008042	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni Yataa an ni wo fa a, wo nii too‑a n na. Koe min na mu, n ka‑a Yataa an tena, n na‑a nɛ chɛ. N fandi an ma si ni ka dechee, n ni na n kun ye, n kun ma gbasaya ɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa an‑na n sɔ.
43008043	N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, koe min‑na a ma, wo ee n da a bai n dɔ gbɛ. Ko dɔ gbɛɛ ma, wo ma to ni, wo ni wo too ma sɔ n da a bai n ma.
43008044	Sitana wandi gbu, an mu wo fa a. A sin, wo e bea tena koe chɛ n fan fɛ, wo fa toen mu miin na. Suun gba wɛ, mɔ fa mɔɛ mu a a, a sin tima ee a boo ɔ tea ko a. Koe min na mu, tea ma bɔ nin bɛ a da ɔ tee dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ. Ni a ma‑a fania fɔ‑a tima ɔ tima, ɛ ma ka dɔn‑da a tɔɛ gbu an ma. Koe min na mu, fania fɔ mɔ dechee ma a a, chɛɛ fania fa mu a a.
43008045	Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe tea gbu an fɔ, a sin fan fɛ mu, wo ma dan ni n da a bai a.
43008046	Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɛ, min mbe kun a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ mu n na. N mbe tea an fɔ, a sin nyin fan wo ni dan n da a kuiɛ a.
43008047	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu Yataa 'a denɛ a, a bu ɔ di wan tima ɔ tima, a too ma sɔ koe a Yataa bai ma. Chɛɛ wo tana, a 'a denɛ ma wo a, an fɛ mu, wo e ban wo too ma sɔ koe a, a da a bai n ma.”
43008048	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ Chisɔsi ma, an dɔ, “I‑a a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ nn‑na min fɔ, nn teaen fan mu. Nn‑na a fɔ wan, mbɛ Samayia mɔɛ mu i a, a sin, nyina yama an mbe i fɛ.”
43008049	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Nyina yama ee n fɛ. N mbe basɔmaya an be Fa ma, chɛɛ wo tana, wo e baa an bɔ n ma.
43008050	N mbe ee chia an yan tena, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni baa be n ma. Min mbe chia chɛ yan tena, n ko a, ɛ nɔ. A sin, a wan mbe tea kaa a tɛ.
43008051	N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ma‑a a da a kuiɛ ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ee fa‑a.”
43008052	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn gbɛ tea a, mbɛ nyina yama an mbe i fɛ. Ebeami wɛɛ gbu fa‑a wan, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ fa‑a. Chɛɛ i tana, i ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si kan chɛ kɔɔ, e min chɛ tena, a ee fa‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a.
43008053	Nn bɔ kɔnkɔɛ, Ebeami, a fa‑a wɛɛ, chɛɛ i ma i wandi ya, mbɛ i benden fan mu a ma, ɛnden bɛɛ a. A yɛ to, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ fa‑a wan. I‑a i wandi ya fen mɔ a?”
43008054	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni n gbu, n‑na basɔmaya be n fandi ma, an basɔmaya chɛ nɛnɛ, fen kɔ fen mbe ee a ɔ. Fa dechee, an mbe a ma tena, n mbe basɔmaya ma sɔn tena. Fa min ka, wo e a fɔ tena, wo ɔ, an mu wo 'a Yataa a.
43008055	Wo ma a sɔn bɛɛ boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ n tana, n‑na a sɔn fan. Ni n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, n ma a sɔn, n mbe ma‑a ka fania an fɔ‑a, yɔ wo e fania fɔ tena buɛ min dɔ, a sɔn koe a. Chɛɛ n gbu sin‑na a sɔn fan, a sin, n mbe wan a da a kuiɛ ma.
43008056	Wo bɔ kɔnkɔɛ, Ebeami, a bu ɔ ni di wan, a ni tima min na tee chɛ ma kɔn‑da, n na koe a. A na‑a n yen fan, a sin, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan.”
43008057	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Chɛɛ i gbu suun sanɛ ni san bi duu bɔ pɛn, e na to Ebeami yen koe fɔ‑a.”
43008058	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena sanche, mbɛ Ebeami e na to ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ, n ni wan gbɛ fɔɛ ɔ.”
43008059	Chɛ ko a, mbɛ an‑na senɛ n ya, a bondan koe a Chisɔsi a, an ni a fa. Chɛɛ a bɔ‑a wan an tɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, kai wɛɛ, a a ma tɛ ni a ma.
43009001	Chisɔsi to‑a ta an na, mbɛ a‑a kaminɛ yen, min suun‑da a fiondenɛ ɛ.
43009002	Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, mɔ ma a ɔ sɔn, mɔɛ min 'na ko yama maenɛ‑a kamin chɛ fion buɛ chɛ ɔ. A e na ma a wandi ta an na ba, kɔ a woo mɔɛ nu?”
43009003	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A 'a fioncha chɛ ma bɔ ni ko fea chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɔ, a wandi‑a ko yama maenɛ ma, a woo mɔɛ n ta ma. Chɛɛ a suun‑da ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen a ta chɛ kun ma, kamaya koe miin mbe ma, Yataa dɔndɔ gbe gbaa chia a.
43009004	Tee ɛ wɛ nɔ tima min na, fɔ ni mmɔ‑a a tun wai chɛ n chɛ koe a, n sɔen mu miin chɛ koe a. Pimbi ɛ bun‑da tima min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a.
43009005	N mbe tima min na dunya chɛ ɔ, n fan mu manɛ a dunya ko a.”
43009006	Chisɔsi‑a bai chɛ fɔ kɛn dechee, mbɛ a‑a a da yii fu gbangbanɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ ma ma, mbɛ a‑a boobo chɛ sin kamin chɛ ya gbingbii kɔɔ.
43009007	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ kamin chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Ta yii pai chɛ da a, an mbe min chee Sidowan, i ni i ya a ko” (Sidowan chɛ, a fasai an nɛ, an‑na min sɔ). Mbɛ kamin chɛ ta‑a, a‑a a ya chɛ a ko nɔ. Mbɛ a‑a kaina yen kɛn, a yɛ‑a a waa a.
43009008	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an bɛ ɛ miin na fɔn dɔndɔɛ ɔ, an basan mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ni a yen tee si ɔ fen fuinɛ a, a fiondenɛ ɛ, an na fii‑a. An dɔ, “Kou, kamin chɛ an mbe ma nɛ si ɔ fen fuinɛ a, an ya a ka‑a ka. An ma chɛ a?”
43009009	An dɔ nu, an dɔ, “An nɛ ka.” Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, an dɔ, “An ma chɛ a o, a bɔen fan mu dechee a a.” Chɛɛ kamin chɛ wandi koɔ‑a, a ɔ, “N fan gbu e nɛ.”
43009010	Chɛ ko a, an dɔ kamin chɛ ma, an dɔ, “I ma‑a ka ma gbɛ, i‑a kaina yen?”
43009011	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ min tɔ mu ka Chisɔsi, an‑na a ma ka n baun‑da. A‑a boobo an dɔ fa, mbɛ a‑a a sin n ya gbingbii kɔɔ. A‑a a fɔ n ye, a ɔ, n ni ta n ya a ko yii pai chɛ ɔ, min tɔ mu ka Sidowan. Mbɛ n ta‑a, a sin, n‑na a ma kɛn dechee, n‑na kaina yen.”
43009012	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “A gbu ɛ mende?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “N bɛɛ n ma a ɔ sɔn.”
43009013	Mbɛ kamin chɛ, min ya a ka‑a ka, mɔɛ chɛ n bɛ ta‑a an na Fayisii n chen kɔɔ.
43009014	Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi na‑a boobo chɛ sin ka a ya a tee min ma, mbɛ a ya a ka‑a, Chu mɔɛ n 'na suin tee ni.
43009015	Mbɛ an Fayisii chɛ n bɛɛ, an bun‑da kamin chɛ ɔ tisa‑a to, an dɔ, a ni a ɔ yian an bɛɛ a, a ya a ka‑a buɛ min dɔ. Mbɛ a ɔ, “A‑a boobo an sin n ya gbingbii kɔɔ, mbɛ n‑na n ya a ko yii ɔ. Chɛ an‑na a ma, n mbe kaina yen tena ka gbɛ.”
43009016	Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ dɔ nu, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ min‑na chɛ ma, suin tee sawa yɔn koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ, Yataa an ma a sɔ ni a ma.” Chɛɛ an dɔ n sin, an dɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu ko yama ma mɔɛ a, a ee kamaya ko bonda chɛ sima ma.” Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ an kuiɛ a nii ma kan ni, a si Chisɔsi ma.
43009017	Mbɛ a danka a, Fayisii chɛ n yɛ‑a to kamin chɛ tena, min ya a ka‑a ka. An dɔ, “A‑a i wan ya a ka. E che fen fɔ‑a, a si a ma?” Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “N ta yiima ɔ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu a a.”
43009018	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ nu, an nii ma to ni, an ni dan a a, mbɛ kamin chɛ fionden fan ni tee, chɛɛ a ya a ka‑a gbɛ sanche. Mbɛ an‑na an da a kuiɛ a ben, min mbe a ma, a woo mɔɛ n ni bɔ ya a ma.
43009019	Mbɛ an‑na a woo mɔɛ n dɔ tisa, an dɔ, “Wo 'a denɛ an nɛ mɔna chɛ a? Wo‑a a fɔ kɛn, mbɛ wo‑a a fiondenɛ an suun, chɛɛ ɛ kaina yen gbɛ sanche. Chɛ ma‑a ka ma a ma‑a?”
43009020	Mbɛ a woo mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “Nn 'na denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an nɛ. A sin gbu, nn‑na a suun, a fiondenɛ ni.
43009021	Chɛɛ nn ma a ɔ sɔn, a ma‑a buɛ min dɔ sanche ɛ kaina yen. Nn sin ma a gbu ɔ sɔn to, mɔɛ min‑na a ma, a ya a ka‑a. Musu si kai mu gbɛ a a, wo a ɔ tisa, ɛ che wan a ɔ yian‑da a wandi ko a.”
43009022	A woo mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a chɛ fɔ, ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n ma chianɛ an dɔ. Koe min na mu, a ɔ bɛnden fan ni, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a fɔ‑a den, mbɛ Chisɔsi an mu kunka mansa a, a ma nyin a ko a. A mɔɛ chɛ ka‑a mɔɛ tɔɛ n ma fɛsɛ fɛsɛ, na koe a an fan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a.
43009023	Chɛ an‑na a ma, a woo mɔɛ chɛ nu, an dɔ, “Musu si kai mu gbɛ a a, wo a wandi ɔ tisa.”
43009024	Mbɛ an kamin chɛ, min fionden ni ka a kɔma a, an‑na a chee to, a gba fean bɔɛ ko a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Yataa ɛ i yen tena wan i sɔ gba chɛ ɔ, tea fɔ wɛɛ nn ye, a tɔɛ ko a. Nn danden fan mu a a, mbɛ kamin chɛ, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ mu a a.”
43009025	Mbɛ a ɔ, “A ni ma ko yama ma mɔ a, a ma ma a a, n mbe ee kun n ni a ɔ sɔn. N‑na koe min dɔ sɔn dechee, an nɛ chɛ a. N fionden fan ni tee, chɛɛ n mbe kaina yen fan gbɛ.”
43009026	Mbɛ an yɛ‑a to, an dɔ, “A na‑a fen ma i a, i baun koe a fioncha chɛ ɔ?”
43009027	Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “N ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da wo a, chɛɛ wo ma to ni, wo ni wo too ma sɔ a ma. Wo e n sɔ‑a to yɛ‑a n da a kuiɛ ɔ. Fen mu? N mbe ee che dan‑da a a, mbɛ wo wɛɛ, wo toen mu wo ni ma a fɛ mɔɛ n na.”
43009028	Mbɛ an‑na a main, an yɛ‑a to, an dɔ, “I wan mu mɔna chɛ fɛ mɔɛ a, chɛɛ nn tana, Mosisi fɛ mɔɛ mu nn na.
43009029	Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa wandi gbu, an na‑a koɔ Mosisi tena. Chɛɛ mɔna chɛ tana, Chisɔsi chɛ, nn gbu ma a ka tena wɛɛ gbu an sɔn.”
43009030	Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “N ma kamaya koe chɛ sima ɔ yen nin bɛ. Wo ma kamin chɛ ka tena sɔn, chɛɛ a yen ko, a‑a a ma, n‑na kaina yen.
43009031	Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa ee mɔɛ n 'na samunɛ a min, miin mbe ko yama ma. Chɛɛ ɛ mɔɛ chɛ n 'na samunɛ a min fan, miin mbe a tɔɛ fai, an mbe a faa ma koe n ma.
43009032	A ka dunya a dan tima ma, aan sanche, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a a min nin bɛ, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ‑a kaina yen, min suun‑da a fiondenɛ ɛ.
43009033	Ni kamin chɛ nii ma ka ni Yataa tena wan, a nii kun‑da a ni n ya chɛ a ka.”
43009034	Chɛɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “I wan, i suun‑da ko yama an dɔ. E ee kun i ni nn kan fen kɔ fen na.” Mbɛ an‑na a gbain nɔ fɛsɛ fɛsɛ, an 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a.
43009035	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a a min kɛn, koe min ma‑a, a‑a a ya a kan kamin chɛ a, an‑na min gbain ka. A‑a a yen kɛn, a ɔ, “I danden fan mu Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ a?”
43009036	Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ, “Kai, a wakoe ɔ yian bɛ n na, min mbe a ma, n ni n kai fa a a.”
43009037	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Chɛɛ i ban‑da gbɛ a yen‑da. A sin, n fan gbu mu a a, n fɛn mbe ka koɔ‑a i tena.”
43009038	Mbɛ kamin chɛ ɔ gbɛ, a ɔ, “Mansa, n‑na n kai fa i a.” Mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, a‑a a fai.
43009039	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N na‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, n ni mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n na bɔ ya a ma. Min mbe a ma, mɔɛ miin fiondenɛ ɛ, an ya ni kaina yen. Miin sin, an ya ɛ kaina yen, an ni ma fion tɔɛ n na.”
43009040	A ni chɛ fɔ tena tima min na, Fayisii chɛ n dɔ n ni wan nɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “I ɔ fen? Nn ma dan ni a a, mbɛ i toen mu i ni a fɔ, mbɛ nn bɛɛ, nn fionden fan mu.”
43009041	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni fion tɔɛ ni wo a, Yataa ni a ya ka‑a wan wo 'a ko yama n na. Chɛɛ wo e a fɔɛ min chɛ, wo ɔ, fion tɔ ma wo a, an fɛ mu, a ee a ya ka‑a wo 'a ko yama n na.”
43010001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena. Mɔɛ min mbe ee don‑da sa kuii ɔ, a da 'a chia a, chɛɛ ɛ sɛ‑a chia dɔ mende a, a mɔɛ chɛ mu kanka kona wa an na.
43010002	Mɔɛ min mbe don a da 'a chia a, an mu sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ gbu a.
43010003	Ni a na‑a sa kuii chɛ da a, mɔɛ min mbe ma nɔ, a kun ma fɛnɛ a, ɛ a da a ka wan a ye. Ni a sin don‑da, a ni bun a 'a sa n chee‑a an tɔɛ ma, an mbe a kuiɛ a min fan. Mbɛ a bɔ‑a an na kuii gbu ɔ.
43010004	Ni a ban‑da bɔ‑a a ta sa chɛ n gbɛɛ a, ɛ sɔ wan an ya ɔ, mbɛ sa chɛ n‑na a sɔ a fɛ, a mu min na, an‑na a kuiɛ sɔn fan.
43010005	Sa chɛ n mbe ee bea mɔ dɔ mende fɛ. Chɛɛ an mbe min ma, an mbe ben fan bui a, a ka mɔ dɔ mende baima. Koe min na mu, a mɔɛ chɛ kuiɛ ma bɔ ni an ti kuiɛ a.”
43010006	Chisɔsi na‑a tai chɛ an tɛ, chɛɛ an nii ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, a ni min fɔ tena an ye.
43010007	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena. N mbe wan dechee yɔ sa kuii chɛ da, sa chɛ n mbe don min na, an mbe bɔ.
43010008	Chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, miin sɔ‑a n ya ɔ, miin na‑a a ma, yɔ an ni sa chɛ n kun ma fɛn tena wan, kanka kona wa mu an na. Chɛɛ sa chɛ n gbu ma an too wɛɛ ma sɔ ni an ma.
43010009	N fan mu sa kuii chɛ da a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ben‑da n tena chia a, a ni don, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ kun ka ma sɔn‑da wan. Ɛ don‑da wan, a ni bɔ, a faa ma a. A sin mbe a daun fenɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
43010010	Kanka tana, ɛ na dechee kanka chɛ koe an na, fen fa koe a, a basan kasaa chɛ koe a. Chɛɛ n fan, n na‑a, min mbe a ma, n 'na sa n ni fɔɛ ma sɔn, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ. An sin, an fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an mbe n 'na dua gbɛɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
43010011	“N mbe wan yɔ sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛndɛ, min ma bɛnden mu a fɔɛ be koe a, a 'a sa n ko a.
43010012	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ tana, an mbe min pawa sa chɛ n kun ma fɛn koe a, a ee chɛ ma. Ni a‑a kui yen na‑a, ɛ sa chɛ n to wan, mbɛ a ben‑da bui‑a, a mu min na, a wan ta ma an na. Chɛ ɛ a ma wan, kui chɛ ni chɛ dɔndɔ ma, mbɛ a tɔɛ n fasan‑da a ɔ.
43010013	Mɔɛ min yaen mu ka, sa chɛ n kun ma fɛn koe a, ɛ ben fan bui‑a, koe min na mu, bɔi den gbama mu a a. A sin, a ma a gbɔsɔɛ ni sa chɛ n ko a.
43010014	N fan mu sa kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛndɛ a. N‑na n ta sa n sɔn fan, a sin, n 'na sa n bɛɛ, an‑na n sɔn fan.
43010015	Ɛ ka wan dechee, yɔ Fa‑a n sɔn buɛ min dɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, n bɛɛ, n‑na a sɔn ka wan. A sin, n ma bɛnden fan mu, n fandi be koe a, n 'na sa n na tɔnɔnɛ ko a.
43010016	N 'na sa dɔ n mbe wan nɔ, miin mbe ee sa kuii chɛ ɔ. N mbe na tena wan an bɛɛ a. An bɛɛ, an mbe an too ma sɔ‑a wan n da a kuiɛ ma, a sin, an gbɛɛ, an mbe ma‑a wan sa dɔndɔɛ a, an kun ma fɛn mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ko a.
43010017	“Fa Yataa toen fan mu n na, koe min na mu, n ma bɛnden fan mu, n ni n fɔɛ be, min mbe a ma, n ni danka to ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ.
43010018	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee kun a ni n fɔɛ ya n sun da a. Chɛɛ n fandi gbu, n fan mbe n fɔɛ be‑a. Gbasaya been mu n fandi an ma, n fandi fɔɛ be koe a, an ni n fa. A gbasaya chɛ ɛ to n fandi an boo ɔ, a ma koe a to, n ni yɛ fɔɛ ɔ. Fa na‑a a fɔ ka wan n ye, a ma koe a.”
43010019	Chisɔsi 'a bai chɛ n‑na a ma wan to, kuiɛ a fasanɛ don‑da to Chu mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ.
43010020	An sɛsɛ nu, an ni wan a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Nyina yama min mbe a fɛ, an‑na a woo ka. Wo e wo too ma sɔ a ma fen ko a?”
43010021	Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, an ni wan a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Nyina yama ɛ ma mɔɛ min fɛ, a ee koɔ ka. Nyina yama ee che a ma‑a fion tɔɛ ya a ni ka.”
43010022	Chima tima dɔndɔ a, Chisɔsi ni wan Chuusaɛn. A sin, a tima chɛ a, Chu n 'na bɛn dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Yataa 'a kata da a ka. An ni buɔdia wa an bɔ a tima chɛ a.
43010023	A tee chɛ ma, Chisɔsi ni wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, ɛ sɛ ɛ yii an kaina chɛ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Mansa Sɔɔmon 'na Pɛsa.
43010024	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ n na sɔn sɔn‑da a 'a tindanɛ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “I ma a ma nn ni ma kɔndɔfii ɔ tima ɔ tima ko a, a si i wakoe ma. A ma gbu nn ni a ɔ sɔn, tea chɛndɛ chɛndɛ ko a, ni i wan mu kunka mansa chɛ a.”
43010025	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N banden fan mu gbɛ a fɔ‑a wo ye, chɛɛ wo ma to ni wo ni dan n na. Fa 'a gbasaya ɔ, n mbe kamaya koe miin ma, an fan mbe siiya bɔ n ko a.
43010026	Chɛɛ wo ma dan ni n na, koe min na mu, wo ma ma ni yɔ n 'na sa nu.
43010027	N 'na sa n mbe an too ma sɔ wan n da a bai ma, n mbe min fɔ. N‑na an sɔn, a sin, an mbe bea wan n fɛ.
43010028	N fɛ mɔɛ nu, n mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an be‑a an ma, min mbe a ma, an mbe ee fa‑a, an ni to saya ɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che an bɔ‑a n boo ɔ.
43010029	Fa min‑na an be n ma, a 'a gbasaya benden mu fen kɔ fen ma. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che an bia‑a gbasaya a, an ni bɔ Fa boo ɔ.
43010030	Nn fea Fa a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na.”
43010031	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, an‑na senɛ ya to, a bon koe a fasa.
43010032	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo‑a wai chɛndɛ sɛsɛ yen fan, n‑na miin chɛ. Fa 'a gbasaya ɔ mu, n mbe kun tena wai chɛ n chɛ koe a. N ma a ɔ sɔn, an wai chɛndɛ chɛ nu, ni a minan ko a mu, wo toen mu wo ni n bon, n ni fa.”
43010033	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, “I 'a wai chɛndɛ chɛ nu, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a ma, nn toen mu nn ni i bon, i ni fa. Chɛɛ e baa bɔ tena buɛ min dɔ Yataa ma, an donden mu nn ma. I mɔ gbu gbama gbama, e i wandi ya‑a Yataa a.”
43010034	Chisɔsi ɔ, “A nyɛnden fan mu, wo wandi gbu 'a sawa gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Wo mu Yataa dɔma n fan na.’
43010035	Wo 'a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a gboo, ɛ bai miin fɔ, tea bai nu mu kuɔ fɔ ko a. A sin, Yataa wandi gbu, an na‑a mɔɛ chɛ n chee yataa dɔma n na. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, a wandi gbu, a ni a 'a sakana bai n na ben mɔɛ miin dɔ.
43010036	N tana, Fa an‑na n ya, a‑a n sɔ dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ee kun, wo ni kunɛ si n kun ma, baa bɔ koe a a ma. Koe min na mu, n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, a 'a denɛ mu n na.
43010037	Ni Fa‑a n sɔ wai miin chɛ koe a, n mbe ee an fan chɛ tena, wo ma dan n na.
43010038	Chɛɛ ni n mbe Fa 'a wai an chɛ tena, wo ma dan nin bɛɛ n na boo ɔ boo, a nyin wo ni dan n chɛ chɛ wai n nan gbu n na. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ fɛsɛ fɛsɛ, mbɛ nn fea Fa a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na.”
43010039	A tima chɛ a to, Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, an toen ni to, an ni Chisɔsi bia fɔin. Chɛɛ a bɔ‑a wan an boo ɔ yɛdɛn.
43010040	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a a gbaa chia a, a‑a Chɔdan yii chɛ tɛ to. A yɛ‑a kaina chɛ, Chɔn na‑a a kuu sɔ ka yii chɛ‑a kaina min mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
43010041	Mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a wan, an‑na Chisɔsi tan. Mbɛ an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Chɔn nii ma kamaya ko kan kɔ kan ma ni. Chɛɛ bai n gbɛɛ, a‑a miin fɔ, a si kamin chɛ ma, an ma‑a tea a.”
43010042	Mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ, miin ni nɔ, an‑na an kai fa a a.
43011001	Mbɛ kaminɛ yen ko, min tɔ ni Dasayɔsi, a bea‑a gbandi a. A waa tɔ ni Bɛtani. An duu chɛ ɔ, a tensa musu fea nu, an ni wan nɔ, Mɛi an fea Mata a.
43011002	Mɛi chɛ, an mbe na tena na‑a tu kunyɛ a diama fasi fasi‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ n ma, mbɛ a‑a an ma fian chɛndɛ chɛ, a kundi a. A tensa kai an nii nɛ Dasayɔsi chɛ a, min ni ka sa ɔ gbandi ɔ.
43011003	Mbɛ tensa musu fea chɛ nu, an‑na sakana a ta Mansa Chisɔsi tena, an dɔ, an ni a fɔ a ye, mbɛ a dia nyɔɛ Dasayɔsi gbandi‑a.
43011004	Chisɔsi‑a sakana chɛ a min kɛn, a ɔ, “Dasayɔsi 'a gbandi chɛ, a ee che‑a a ma‑a a ni fa kudai. Chɛ ɛ ma tena, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ yen. A sin, ɛ ma tena to chia an na, n fan, Yataa 'a denɛ, mɔɛ n mbe n 'na kamaya ɔ yen‑da chia min na.”
43011005	Chisɔsi toen ni suun ma nyɔ n sawa chɛ n na, Mɛi, Mata, a basan an tensa Dasayɔsi a.
43011006	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a‑a Dasayɔsi gbandi koe chɛ a min kɛn, a nii ma a chen ma bɔ ni nɔ, aan tee fea benden gbakɔ.
43011007	Mbɛ chɛ gbakɔ, a‑a a fɔ gbɛ a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Mmɔ ɛ yɛ tena gbɛ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ wan.”
43011008	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kan mɔ, mmɔ ka kundu chɛ ɔ nɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n toen ni an ni i ma bon bon senɛ a, i ni fa. I toen mu to, mmɔ ni yɛ nɔ wan ka to?”
43011009	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Awa tan kun ma fea an mbe tee ɔ, ae? Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe tachɛ chɛ‑a tee a den, a ee a chenɛ a tu, a ni bea. Koe min na mu, ɛ manɛ yen tena wan.
43011010	Chɛɛ ni a ma‑a tachɛ chɛ‑a pimbi pimbi ɔ, ɛ a chenɛ a tu wan, mbɛ a bea‑a. Koe min na mu, manɛ ee nɔ, kaina yen koe a.”
43011011	Chisɔsi‑a chɛ fɔ kɛn, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a ɔ, “Mmɔ dia nyɔɛ Dasayɔsi, chinɔɛ ben‑da a a. Chɛɛ n mbe ta tena wan, a sin, n mbe a a kunɛ‑a wan.”
43011012	Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ n dɔ, “Mansa, ni gbandi mɔɛ chɛ chinɔ‑a, mbɛ ɛ baun tena wan.”
43011013	Chisɔsi ni ka a fɔ an na an ye, mbɛ Dasayɔsi fa‑a. Chɛɛ an tana, an‑na a ya, mbɛ ɛ chinɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an dɔ.
43011014	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a bai gbu bu ka an ye, a ɔ, “Dasayɔsi fa‑a.
43011015	Chɛɛ wo ko a, n bu ɔ di, n nii nɔ a fa tima a, min mbe a ma, wo ni wo kai fa n na. Wo na, mmɔ ni ta a su tan.”
43011016	Mbɛ Tɔmɔsi, an ni min tɔɛ ma si, an dɔ, Fɛn Kai, a koɔ‑a a bɔɛ chɛ n tena, a ɔ, “Mmɔ gbɛɛ mmɔ bɛ mmɔ kan mɔ a, mmɔ ta, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni fa dɔndɔ a.”
43011017	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a fo Bɛtani duu ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ den chɛ n na. A‑a a fo kɛn, a fɔ‑a a ye, mbɛ tee sawa ben‑da gbɛ, kɛn an‑na Dasayɔsi sa a kamba ɔ.
43011018	Bɛtani chɛ, an tɛ ɔ nii ma yansan Chuusaɛn na, a nii ma mai fea bɔ ni.
43011019	Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ ka‑a Chudia, an na‑a Mata sɛbɔ‑a, an fea Mɛi a, a si an tensa kai a saya ma.
43011020	Mata‑a a a min kɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɛ chia a, ɛ na tena, mbɛ a ta‑a a ya ɔ. Chɛɛ Mɛi tana, a to‑a wan chenɛ a.
43011021	Mata‑a Chisɔsi tan kɛn, a ɔ, “Mansa, ni i ni nɛ wan, n tensa chɛ nii fa‑a.
43011022	Chɛɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ sanche chɛ wɛɛ ɔ, ni i‑a Yataa ɔ tisa fen kɔ fen ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan i ma.”
43011023	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te a ma, a ɔ, “I tensa ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ tena wan to, a ni yɛ fɔɛ ɔ.”
43011024	Mbɛ a ɔ, “N‑na chɛ ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan to saya ɔ, a ni yɛ fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, tee dankama nɛnɛ ma, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a a kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ.”
43011025	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te to a ma, “N fan mbe a ma, mɔɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a ma to, an‑na fɔɛ ma sɔn. An ni a fɔ mɔɛ ni fa wɛɛ, ɛ a tun fan ma koe a fɔɛ ɔ, ni a kai faen fan ni n na.
43011026	A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ miin mbe fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, an sin kai faen mu n na, an mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan n na. I danden fan mu chɛ a?”
43011027	Mbɛ a ɔ, “A ɛ ka wan, mansa. N danden fan mu a a, mbɛ i wan mu kunka mansa a, Yataa 'a denɛ. Yataa na‑a i wan na koe fɔ dunya chɛ ɔ.”
43011028	Bai chɛ n fɔenɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ Mata yɛ‑a, a‑a a dɔ Mɛi chee. Mbɛ an fea gbe tɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a ticha na‑a, a sin, a toen mu a ni i yen.”
43011029	Mɛi‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn dechee, a ma a ɔ si chɛ ni, a ta‑a a tan dɔndɔ gbe.
43011030	Chisɔsi nii ma don nin bɛ konko chɛ gbu ɔ, chɛɛ a ni kaina chɛ wan tun, Mata na‑a a tan kaina min.
43011031	Mɔɛ miin na‑a na ka sɛbɔ chɛ tena, an na‑a Mɛi yen fan ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a bui a. Mbɛ an‑na a yen kɛn ta‑a, an bea‑a wan a fɛ. A ni an yii ma, mbɛ a ni ta tena kamba ma wan, di chɛ koe a.
43011032	Mbɛ Mɛi‑a a fo Chisɔsi ni kaina. A sin‑na a yen kɛn dechee, a bea‑a dɔndɔ gbe a chenɛ a. A ɔ, “Mansa, ni i ni nɛ wan, n tensa chɛ nii fa‑a.”
43011033	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a yen Mɛi puyɛ‑a di a. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin na‑a ka a san‑da, an bun‑da di chɛ‑a. Chɛ‑a Chisɔsi faa mɔnɛ wan, a ma a to ni ɛnden bɛɛ a.
43011034	Mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo‑a a sa mende kamba ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mansa, na, i ni nɔ yen.”
43011035	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ya yii yii‑a wuu.
43011036	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ an nyɔn ma, an dɔ, “Wo a ɔ yen gbɛ, a toen ni buɛ min dɔ Dasayɔsi a.”
43011037	Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, an dɔ to, “A wan na‑a a ma fion tɔɛ chɛ‑a kaina yen. A ni a ma wan to Dasayɔsi nii fa.”
43011038	A fean bɔɛ ɔ to, koe chɛ nii ma Chisɔsi to ni. Mbɛ an‑na a fo kamba chɛ tena. Kamba ni a a, fanɛ ni, sen dɛnfɛ bunden ni min da a.
43011039	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo sen chɛ ka a da a.” Chɛɛ Dasayɔsi tensa musu Mata, a ɔ, “Mansa, a tui kunyɛ yama an mbe bɔ‑a.” A ɔ, “Tee naaninɛ an nɛ ka gbɛ, kɛn a sa‑a a kamba chɛ ɔ.”
