43011040	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi wɛɛ ɔ, “N na‑a a fɔ wan i ye, mbɛ ni i‑a i kai fa n na, e a ɔ yen‑da wan, Yataa ɛ kamaya koe miin ma.”
43011041	Mbɛ an‑na senɛ chɛ bɔ kamba chɛ da a. Chisɔsi‑a a ya a si banda a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Fa, n ni i wai bɔ, a mu min na, i‑a n 'na samunɛ a min fan.
43011042	N gbu n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ e a a min fan tima ɔ tima. Chɛɛ n‑na chɛ fɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ n fan ko a nɛ, min mbe a ma, an ni dan a a, mbɛ i wan gbu‑a n sɔ nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ.”
43011043	Samunɛ chɛ chɛenɛ gbakɔ Chisɔsi boo ɔ, mbɛ a‑a chee chɛ gbankon, a ɔ, “Dasayɔsi, bɔ nɛ.”
43011044	Mbɛ Dasayɔsi bɔ‑a kamba chɛ gbu ɔ. A bɔ‑a kamba chɛ ɔ, fen gbɛ mendemendeenɛ ɛ a a. A chenɛ n ni ma e, a boo nu, ni a kunɛ gbɛɛ dondenɛ ni fen gbɛ chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo kasanche chɛ gbɛɛ bɔ a ma, a ni ben ben.”
43011045	Mɔɛ chɛ n sɛsɛ, miin na‑a na ka Mɛi sɛbɔ‑a, an na‑a a ɔ yen fan Chisɔsi na‑a koe min ma ka, mbɛ an‑na an kai fa a a.
43011046	Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, an yɛ‑a wan Fayisii dɔ n tena, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yian an na, Chisɔsi‑a koe min ma.
43011047	Chɛ ko a, Fayisii chɛ nu, an bɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n na Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an‑na Chu kuti wa si kaina dɔndɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Mmɔ ɛ fen ma tena gbɛ? Mmɔ a ɔ yen gbɛ sanche, kamin chɛ ɛ kamaya koe min gbɛɛ a tachɛ tena.
43011048	Ni mmɔ‑a a to nɔ, a ni ma kamaya koe chɛ n ma‑a tun tun, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ na‑a wan an kai fa a a. A sin, kun ti nu Domi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an mbe ee na‑a mmɔ to‑a nɔ. An mbe na‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na Yataa 'a kata chɛ yɔn nɛ, a basan mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n bɛɛ a.”
43011049	Chɛɛ an dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Kayafasi. An ni tɛ mɔ wa a, Chu n tɛ Yataa a, an san chɛ a. Mbɛ a koɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo ma ko ɔ gbɛ nin bɛ.
43011050	A nyin, wo gbu ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a fisa mɔ dɔndɔ ni fa, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a. Chɛ ma che ni mɔɛ gbɛɛ faenɛ ɔ, chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ.”
43011051	Tea gbu a, Kayafasi nii ma bai chɛ fɔ ni, a wandi kun ma gbasaya an na. A ni ka a kɔɔ fɔ an na an ye, Yataa ni na tena koe min ma‑a. A ni ka a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ Chisɔsi ni na tena wan fa‑a Chu mɔɛ n ko a. Chɛ ma‑a koe min na mu, a san chɛ a, a wan ni Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena.
43011052	A sin, Chisɔsi nii fa tena an dechee ko a, chɛɛ a ma koe ni to, a ni na Yataa 'a denɛ n na kaina dɔndɔɛ. Yataa 'a denɛ nu, miin gbɛɛ a fasandenɛ ni ben‑da, an ni ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
43011053	A ka a tee chɛ ma, aan a ta gbɛ, Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu, an ni wan gbɛ dɔbɛnɛ ɔ, Chisɔsi fa koe a.
43011054	Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi nii ben ben to fanka ya kɔɔ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a min ma, a ka‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a kaina dɔndɔ, min ni fuinɛ baima. Mbɛ a si‑a nɔ duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min tɔ ni Ɛfan, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na.
43011055	A tima chɛ a, tee kuunden fan na‑a to, Chu n 'na kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ ko a. A sin, mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a sɛ wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a ka duu tɔɛ chɛ n dɔ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An na‑a na, min mbe a ma, an ni an ko an 'na manda ɔ, bɛnɛ chɛ e na to che‑a.
43011056	An ni wan an ya a kan‑da Chisɔsi a. A sin, an na ni kɛn sɔn‑da Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bun‑da an nyɔn dɔ tisa‑a, an dɔ, “Wo gbu danden fan mu a a, tea ko a, mbɛ ɛ na‑a wan bɛnɛ chɛ ɔ?”
43011057	Mɔɛ miin ni Chu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Fayisii n na, an na‑a sawa a ben fan. An na‑a a fɔ wan, an dɔ, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a a ɔ sɔn, Chisɔsi ni kaina min, an dɔ, an ni a fɔ an ye, an dɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni a bia.
43012001	Tee wɔdɔ an na‑a to, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a, mbɛ Chisɔsi ta‑a Bɛtani duu ɔ, Dasayɔsi waa a. Dasayɔsi chɛ ni, Chisɔsi na‑a a ma, a kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ.
43012002	An na‑a yɛɛ ma daun fenɛ ɔ bɛn fan Chisɔsi ko a, Mata ni min dɔ du tena. Dasayɔsi ni mɔɛ dɔndɔ an na, miin bɛ ni daunɛ chɛ tena tebu ma Chisɔsi a.
43012003	Chisɔsi to‑a daun chɛ chɛ an na, an bɛ gbɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, mbɛ Mɛi‑a tu kunyɛ a diama ya, sani dɔndɔ faa gban. Tu chɛ baa ni gbɛ sai ma, mbɛ a bun‑da a fasi fasi‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ n ma. Mbɛ tu chɛ kunyɛ, a‑a chenɛ gbu gbɛɛ ya. Mɛi yɛ‑a wan, a‑a Chisɔsi chenɛ n ma fian fian a kundi a.
43012004	Chisɔsi fɛ den dɔndɔ min tɔ ni Chudasi Isikayɔti, a ni wan nɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ. A wan ni na tena Chisɔsi ma tachɛ‑a, chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ nu ma. Mbɛ a ɔ,
43012005	“A ni nyan‑da wan, sunkun chɛ ni ma‑a tu bonda chɛ ma tachɛ‑a, tee chɛmɛ sawa debea pawa a, mbɛ a‑a a 'a kɔpɔɛ chɛ be yɔn tɔɛ n ma.”
43012006	A nii ma chɛ fɔ ni, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ yɔn tɔɛ n bakoe ɛ wan a faa ɔ. Chɛɛ a na‑a a fɔ, koe min na mu, kanka ni a a. A wan ni an 'na kɔpɔɛ kun ma, a bɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a. A sin, tima sɛsɛ ko a, a ni kɔpɔɛ chɛ dɔ ya wan, ɛ a don a ta faa ma koe ɔ.
43012007	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A to nɔ dechee. A‑a min ma ka, a‑a n ma bɛn fan ka n tɔn koe a, n fa tima ya ɔ.
43012008	Yɔn tɔɛ n tana, wo bɛ an mbe ma tena an na tima ɔ tima. Chɛɛ n tana, mmɔ bɛ ee ma tena tima ɔ tima.”
43012009	Chɛ ɛ ma‑a tima min na, mɔ fanka wa n‑na Chisɔsi wakoe a min Bɛtani duu ɔ, mbɛ an na‑a wan nɔ. An nii ma na ni, an ni Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe an yen. Chɛɛ an na‑a, min mbe a ma, an ni Dasayɔsi wɛɛ yen, Chisɔsi na‑a min kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.
43012010	Mbɛ a tima chɛ a gbɛ, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an‑na dɔbɛnɛ chɛ Dasayɔsi wɛɛ fa koe a.
43012011	A mu min na, an bakoe a ni to, an bɔ Chu mɔɛ n sɛsɛ, an ni ka tena an fɛ, an mbe an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a.
43012012	Banda ɔ ka dɔndɔɛ ma, fanka wa chɛ, miin na‑a na ka kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ɔ, an‑na a a min, mbɛ Chisɔsi ɛ na tena Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
43012013	Chɛ ko a, mbɛ an‑na gbɛ nyanda an bia an boo ɔ, an mbe ta‑a buɔdia yee tɛ‑a, a ya ɔ chia a. An dɔ, “Mmɔ Yataa tando. Mansa Yataa ni mɔɛ chɛ dua, min na‑a a tɔɛ ɔ. Mansa Yataa ni mansa wa chɛ dua, min mbe na tena ma‑a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ kun ma.”
43012014	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a sofɛ tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ma sɔn, a sɛ‑a min kun ma, a bun‑da na‑a Chuusaɛn. Yataa 'a gboo na‑a a fɔ ka wan dechee, a ɔ,
43012015	“Chuusaɛn mɔɛ nu, wo ma chian ko ɔ ko ma. Wo 'a mansa yen ko na‑a, ɛ si ɔ sofɛ tɔngbɔɛ kun ma.”
43012016	A tima chɛ a, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n nii ma koe chɛ n dɔ gbɛ ni. Chɛɛ kɛn Yataa na‑a Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ, a sɛ‑a banda bu ɔ manɛ ɔ, mbɛ a puin‑da an yii ma, Yataa 'a gboo na‑a chɛ fɔ wan, a si a ma. A sin, an‑na an chɛ ka a ko a.
43012017	Tima min na Chisɔsi na‑a Dasayɔsi chee, mbɛ a bɔ‑a kamba chɛ ɔ, a kɔɔ sɔ‑a saya ɔ, mɔ fanka miin ni nɔ, an na‑a an koe chɛ ɔ yian fan, min na‑a ma ka.
43012018	Chɛ an na‑a a ma, mɔ fanka chɛ wɛɛ na‑a a ya ɔ, koe min na mu, an na‑a a a min fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi an‑na kamaya koe wa chɛ ma.
43012019	Mbɛ Fayisii chɛ nu, an bun‑da a fɔ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Wo‑a a yen, ko ɔ ko ee bɔ tena ɔ mmɔ boo ɔ. Wo ko bonda chɛ yen bɛ, dunya gbɛɛ ɛ a sɔ tena gbɛ a wan fɛ.”
43012020	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin na‑a sɛ ka Chuusaɛn bɛn chɛ ɔ, Yataa fai koe a, mɔɛ n ni wan an tɛ ɔ, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a.
43012021	Mbɛ an mɔɛ chɛ nu, mbɛ an ta‑a Fiipi tena, min na‑a ka Besaida duu ɔ, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “Kai, nn toen mu nn ni Chisɔsi an yen ka.”
43012022	Mbɛ Fiipi ta‑a a ɔ yian Anduu a, mbɛ an fea chɛ ta‑a a ɔ yian Chisɔsi a, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na min fɔ.
43012023	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tima che‑a gbɛ sanche, Yataa ni a ɔ yian, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, n kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.
43012024	Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ chin fen kuu, a mu chin fen kuu dɔndɔɛ an na, aan a ni chin, mbɛ a tui‑a. Ni a tui‑a wan, min mbe bɔ gbɛ, mbɛ a‑a gbɔɛ be kaka.
43012025	Mɔɛ miin gbɔsɔen mu an fandi ko a dechee, an mbe fo‑a wan an fɔɛ a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe an fɔɛ be‑a Yataa ma dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
43012026	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu, a ni ma n kɔɔ, mɔɔ ni a bea‑a n fɛ. Koe min na mu, n 'na bɔi denɛ ɛ ma kaina chɛ wan, n mbe ma‑a kaina min. A sin, Fa Yataa ɛ baa be‑a wan mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, min mbe ma‑a n kɔɔ.
43012027	“Sanche chɛ ɔ, n faa ɛ mɔnɛ tena. A sin, n ma a ɔ sɔn ni n mbe fen fɔ. N mbe che wan a fɔ‑a, n dɔ, ‘Fa, n kunɛ bɔ koe chɛ ɔ, n ya ɔ.’ Chɛɛ n na‑a chɛ gbu an ko a dunya chɛ ɔ, tima chɛ a.
43012028	Fa, i 'a kamaya ɔ yian dunya chɛ ɔ.” Mbɛ kuiɛ a min‑da, a ka banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “N ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, n kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ, a sin, n mbe na‑a wan to a ɔ yian‑da an na.”
43012029	Mɔ fanka chɛ miin ni ka nɔ sɔ ɔ, an‑na kuiɛ chɛ a min fan. A sin, an dɔ nu, an dɔ, “Banda an na‑a koɔ ka.” Mbɛ an dɔ n sin, an dɔ, “Maeka an koɔ‑a a tena.”
43012030	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Bai chɛ miin na min‑da ka, a ka banda bu ɔ, basan koe ma n ma, chɛɛ basan koe mu wo ma.
43012031	Tima an che‑a ka gbɛ sanche, Yataa ni kaa a tɛ dunya chɛ wakoe ma. Sanche chɛ ɔ, nyina yama min 'na mansaya ɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, a a bea tima an nɛ.
43012032	Chɛɛ n fan, tima min na an mbe n na sɛ‑a kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, n mbe a ma‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni na n tena.”
43012033	A na‑a chɛ fɔ tima min na, a ni ka a fɔ an na, a ni na tena fa‑a buɛ min dɔ.
43012034	Mbɛ fanka chɛ koɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Mmɔ 'a sawa‑a a fɔ wan mmɔ ye, mbɛ kunka mansa ɛ ma‑a wan nn tɛ ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛɛ e gbɛ a fɔ‑a nn ye, mbɛ an mbe Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ a sɛ‑a wan kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa. Nyɔn mu an Mɔ Gbu 'a Den chɛ a?”
43012035	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Manɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan bɛ wo tɛ ɔ tima ɛnden ko a. Wo a a tun tachɛ chɛ koe a, manɛ ɛ wɛ nɔ tima min na, min mbe a ma, pimbi ee bun‑da wo ma. Ni mɔɛ a ma‑a tachɛ chɛ‑a pimbi pimbi ɔ, a ee a chen kɔɔ yen, a ta chia sɔn koe a.
43012036	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo kai fa man chɛ a, tima min na mu wɛ ɛ wo tɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni ma mɔɛ n na, miin mbe manɛ ɔ tima ɔ tima ko a.” Bai chɛ fɔenɛ gbakɔ Chisɔsi boo ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a, a‑a a wandi ya kɔɔɛ nun an mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
43012037	Chisɔsi na‑a kamaya koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma boo ɔ boo an ya kɔɔ, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an nii ma an kai fa ni a a.
43012038	Chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a bai min fɔ, a ni bɔ a a. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Mansa, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma dan ni nn 'na sakana bai a, nn‑na min fɔ. I sin‑na a ɔ yian fan, i gbasayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.”
43012039	An nii ma dan ni sakana bai chɛ a, koe min na mu, Aisaya na‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ,
43012040	“N‑na an ya n na pimbi, an ma na kaina yen. N‑na an yiima n bɛɛ a fa fa‑a, an ma na koe n dɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. N‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, an ma na an ya a mun n ma, an ni bauncha ma sɔn.”
43012041	Aisaya na‑a chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, a na‑a a yen fan, Chisɔsi ni na tena ma‑a kamaya tɔɛ min na. A sin, chɛ an na‑a a ma, a na‑a a kɔɔ fɔ mɔɛ n ye.
43012042	Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ n sɛsɛ nu, a tima chɛ a, an bɛɛ kai faen fan ni Chisɔsi a. Chɛɛ Fayisii n bakoe na‑a a ma wan, an nii an 'na danaya chɛ a bɔ ya a ma. Koe min na mu, an nii ma to ni an ni an gbain kuɔ fɔ an 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a.
43012043	An na‑a chɛ ma, koe min na mu, an toen ni mɔ gbu n ta tando an na, a ni ben Yataa ta ma.
43012044	Mbɛ Chisɔsi koɔ‑a gbankon, a ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a kai fa‑a n na, a ma a kai fa ni n dɔndɔ gbe a, chɛɛ a‑a a kai fa Fa Yataa wɛɛ an na, min‑na n sɔ.
43012045	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min‑na n yen, a‑a Fa an yen ka, min‑na n sɔ.
43012046	N na‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, a ma koe a, mɔɛ n ni manɛ ma sɔn. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a kai fa‑a n na, a ee ma‑a kaina ɔ pimbienɛ ɔ.
43012047	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a a min, n‑na bai miin fɔ, a sin, a ma a boo si ni an kɔɔ, n fan mbe ee na‑a kaa a tɛ‑a a mɔɛ chɛ ma, a ni tɔɔya. N na‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n baun koe an na, chɛɛ an 'na tɔɔya koe ma.
43012048	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ban‑da n dɔ, a ni a boo bɔ n 'na sakana bai kɔɔ, min mbe kaa a tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, ɛ nɔ. N‑na bai miin fɔ, an fan mbe kaa a tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, a ni tɔɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan tee dankama ma, mɔɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a saya ɔ tee min ma.
43012049	N mbe ee koɔ n fandi 'a gbasaya an kɔɔ. Chɛɛ Fa min‑na n sɔ, ɛ min fɔ n ye a fɔ koe a, n mbe an fɔ.
43012050	A sin, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ɛ min sin fɔ n ye, an mbe a ma mɔɛ n ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe min fɔ, an nɛ dechee Fa‑a min fɔ n ye, a fɔ koe a.”
43013001	Tima ni gbɛ che koe an na, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ kuu sɔ koe a. Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tima an ni ka gbɛ che‑a, a ni dunya chɛ to, a ni yɛ a fa tena. Mɔɛ miin ni a fɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, a na‑a to wan an na tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, mmɔ ɛ na tena a ɔ yen‑da, a to‑a buɛ min dɔ an na, a da faenɛ ɔ gban.
43013002	Chisɔsi ni gbɛ yɛɛ ma daun fenɛ an ma kɔn tena, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. A tima chɛ a, Sitana chɛen fan ni gbɛ Chudasi faa ɔ, Chisɔsi ma tachɛ koe a, chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ n ma. Chudasi chɛ ni kai Saimɔn Isikayɔti 'a denɛ an na.
43013003	Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a fa ban‑da gbasaya gbɛɛ be‑a a ma, ko ɔ ko ma koe a. A na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan to, mbɛ a ka‑a Yataa tena wan, a sin mbe yɛ tena to nɔ wan.
43013004	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, doma kai min ni ka a ma, a‑a a bɔ, mbɛ a‑a tawa chii a bu tɛ.
43013005	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ feanka ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da a fɛ den chɛ n chenɛ n ma ko‑a, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. A sin, ɛ ta‑a an chen chɛ n ma fian‑da a 'a tawa chɛ a a bu tɛ, aan an ma ɛ ta‑a gbaa gbechee.
43013006	Mbɛ a che‑a Saimɔn Pita ma, min‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, “Mansa, i wan mbe na tena n chenɛ ma ko‑a. I wan to?”
43013007	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe ka koe min ma tena, e ee che a ɔ gbɛ‑a sanche chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ e a ɔ gbɛ‑a wan ya ɔ ma.”
43013008	Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “N mbe ee dɔn a ma, tima kan kɔ kan ko a, i ni n chenɛ ma ko.” Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni i sin ma dɔn ni, n ni i chen chɛ ma ko, mbɛ i ta ka‑a n bakoe ma.”
43013009	Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita ɔ te gbɛ, a ɔ, “Mansa, mbɛ i ma n chen dechee ma ko, chɛɛ n boo n bɛɛ ma ko, mbɛ i‑a n kunɛ wɛɛ ɔ ko.”
43013010	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Ni mɔɛ‑a a ko fion, ɛ a chenɛ an ma ko gbɛ dechee, a mu min na, nɔɛ ee to a gboo tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma. A sin, wo koen fan mu gbɛ, chɛɛ wo dɔndɔ ma ko ni fion.”
43013011	Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan gbɛ, mɔɛ min ni na tena a ma tachɛ‑a, chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ n ma. Chɛ an‑na a ma, a na‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an gbɛɛ koen fan mu gbɛ, chɛɛ an dɔndɔ ma ko ni fion.
43013012	Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn an chenɛ n ma ko‑a, mbɛ a 'a doma kai chɛ, a na‑a min bɔ ka, a‑a a don, mbɛ a si‑a to daun chɛ tena. Mbɛ a ɔ a fɛ den chɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo‑a koe chɛ ɔ gbɛ wan, n‑na min ma ka sanche wo tena?”
43013013	A ɔ, “Wo e ma koɔ‑a n tena, tima dɔ n na, wo e n chee, wo ɔ, kan mɔ, dɔ n na, wo ɔ, mansa. A sin, wo e ma ka tea an fɔ‑a, koe min na mu, n fan nɛ.
43013014	N fan, n fɛn mu wo 'a mansa a, ni wo kan mɔ, n‑na wo chenɛ n ma ko ka sanche. Chɛ ni a ma, wo wɛɛ, wo ni wo nyɔn chenɛ n ma ko.
43013015	N‑na tɔmɔsi an yian ka wo a, min mbe a ma, wo ni a ma, yɔ n‑na a ma dechee buɛ min dɔ wo ko a.
43013016	Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo gbɛɛ tena, yɔnɛ ma ben ni a ti ma, a sin, sɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan ma ben ni mɔɛ ma, min‑na a sɔ.
43013017	Wo‑a koe chɛ n dɔ sɔn ka buɛ min dɔ gbɛ, dua ɛ ma‑a wan wo ma kaka, ni wo‑a an koe chɛ n ma.
43013018	“N mbe ee bai chɛ fɔ tena wo gbɛɛ an ko a. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, n‑na n boo sɔ mɔɛ miin sima ma, ma koe a n fɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a. A‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Nn fea mɔɛ min na, nn mbe n 'na daun fenɛ ɔ du, a bun‑da n chɛɛ‑a.’
43013019	Koe min mbe na tena ma‑a, n mbe an dɔ yian tena wo a sanche, a e na to ma‑a. Min mbe a ma, ɛ ma‑a tima min na, wo ni dan a a, mbɛ n fan, kunka mansa mu n fan na.
43013020	N mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a boo si‑a mɔɛ kɔɔ, n‑na miin sɔ, a‑a a boo si ka n fandi wɛɛ an kɔɔ. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a boo a si‑a n kɔɔ, ɛ ma‑a ka a boo a si‑a Yataa an kɔɔ, min‑na n sɔ.”
43013021	Bai chɛ fɔenɛ gbakɔ Chisɔsi boo ɔ, a faa ni mɔnɛ tena wan kaka. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ den a fɛ denɛ n ye, a ɔ, “N mbe chɛ ma din‑da wan wo tena, mbɛ wo dɔndɔ, ɛ na tena wan n ma tachɛ‑a, chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ n ma.”
43013022	Bai chɛ‑a Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n gbɛɛ da a fa wan gban. Mbɛ an bun‑da an nyɔn ma fɛn‑da, an ma a ɔ sɔn ni a yii ni min ma an tɛ ɔ.
43013023	Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n dɔndɔ, min ko a ni di a ye kaka, a ni wan Chisɔsi tɔnfɛ daun chɛ‑a.
43013024	Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita‑a a ya kai an fɛ den chɛ ma, a ɔ, a ni tisa chɛ ni Chisɔsi ɛ bai sa tena, a si nyɔn ma an tɛ ɔ.
43013025	Mbɛ an fɛ den chɛ, a‑a a da ma ta Chisɔsi too tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Mansa, i yii mbe nyɔn na?”
43013026	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe biidi sima tɛ‑a wan a a, mbɛ n‑na a don supu ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a be a mɔɛ chɛ ma.” A sin, a‑a biidi chɛ don kɛn supu chɛ ɔ, a‑a a be wan Chudasi ma, kai Saimɔn Isikayɔti 'a denɛ chɛ.
43013027	Chudasi ɛ biidi chɛ bia‑a dechee, mbɛ Sitana bea‑a a fɛ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “I 'a wai i boo ɔ, a chɛ, a a gbandia.”
43013028	An fɛn gbɛɛ ni daun chɛ‑a, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ nii ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, koe min na‑a a ma, Chisɔsi‑a bai chɛ fɔ Chudasi ye.
43013029	A ni fɛ den chɛ n dɔ n yii ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a a sɔ wan ka, a ni ta daun fenɛ san, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ ko a. Ni chɛ ma, a ni fen den be yɔn tɔɛ n ma. A yen ko, a wan Chudasi, an ni an 'na kɔpɔ sa tena ɔ bɛn mɔɛ a.
43013030	Chudasi‑a biidi kundu chɛ bia kɛn dechee, mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a bɔ‑a baa ma. A tima chɛ a, pimbi bundenɛ ni gbɛ.
43013031	Chudasi bɔ‑a kɛn, a ta‑a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A ɔ ma yansan to, mbɛ mɔɛ n‑na a ɔ yen, kamaya mɔɛ min mu n na, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ. A ɔ ma yansan to, mbɛ n‑na a ma, Fa Yataa 'a kamaya ɔ ni yen chɛndɛ chɛ.
43013032	A sin, ni n‑na a ma, mɔɛ n ni Fa Yataa 'a kamaya ɔ yen, mbɛ a wɛɛ, ɛ a ma‑a wan, n fan, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ wandi, mɔɛ n ni n 'na kamaya ɔ yen. A sin, ɛ na tena wan chɛ ma‑a, a ya kɔɔɛ a.
43013033	N 'na denɛ nu, n mbe ma tena gbɛ wo tɛ ɔ tima kunduenɛ an ko a. Wo e wo ya a kan‑da wan n na. Chɛɛ ka n mbe chɛ fɔ wo ye, n na‑a min fɔ Chu ya ɔ sɔɛ n ye, mbɛ n mbe ma‑a kaina min, an mbe ee na‑a che‑a nɔ. A ɛ ma‑a ka wan wo wɛɛ a.
43013034	A sin sanche, n yen ko sawa nama be‑a wo ma, n ma min be nin bɛ a kɔma a, mbɛ wo ni to wo nyɔn na. N to‑a buɛ min dɔ wo a, wo wɛɛ, wo to wo nyɔn na ka.
43013035	Ni wo toenɛ ma‑a wo nyɔn na, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ n fɛ denɛ n mu wo a.”
43013036	Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita ɔ, “Mansa, e na tena ta‑a mende?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “E ee che‑a a sɔ‑a n fɛ dɔndɔ a, n mbe ta tena kaina min, chɛɛ ni a ɔ mɛ‑a, e a sɔ‑a wan n fɛ.”
43013037	Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Mansa, n mbe ee a sɔ i fɛ sanche, fen mu? I fa tena, n fa tena.”
43013038	Chisɔsi ɔ, “Tea ko a, i ma bɛndenɛ mu, i ni fa n ko a, ae? Ka n mbe chɛ ma din i tena, e na tena min ma‑a. Tɛ kɔnɛ e na konchee banda ɔ ka da ma, e a fɔ‑a wan, gba sawa ko a, mbɛ i ma n sɔn ɛnden bɛɛ a.”
43014001	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Chɛ ma wo faa mɔnɛ. Wo a a tun wo kai fa koe a Yataa a, wo ni a a tun wo kai fa koe a n bɛɛ a.
43014002	Fa Yataa waa banda bu ɔ, sa tena kɔkoo nɔ kaka. N mbe chɛ fɔ tena wo ye, koe min na mu tea mu. A sin, n mbe ta tena wan kaina ɔ bɛn‑da wo ko a.
43014003	A sin, ni n ta‑a, mbɛ n‑na kaina chɛ ɔ bɛn wo ko a, n mbe yɛ‑a wan to nɛ wo ya ɔ. Mbɛ n‑na a ma, mmɔ ta‑a, min mbe a ma‑a, n mbe ma‑a kaina min, wo wɛɛ, wo ni ma nɔ.
43014004	A sin, wo‑a an chia chɛ sɔn fan, a ta an kaina chɛ, n mbe ta tena kaina min.”
43014005	Mbɛ Tɔmɔsi ɔ, “Mansa, e ta tena kaina min, a yiima kan kɔ kan mbe ee nn ma. Nn mbe ee kun, nn ni chia sɔn ta koe a nɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma wan?”
43014006	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan mu dechee chia a, tea ɔ sɔn koe a mɔɛ n boo ɔ, a si Fa Yataa ma, mbɛ an‑na fɔɛ ma sɔn, Fa ɛ min be. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che ta‑a Fa tena, mɔɔ ni a ben‑da n tena chia a.
43014007	Ni wo na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, n mu mɔɛ min sima a, mbɛ wo ni Fa wɛɛ sɔn‑da wan. Chɛɛ a ka gbɛ sanche ma, aan a ta, wo‑a a sɔn gbɛ, a sin, wo ban‑da a yen‑da.”
43014008	Mbɛ Fiipi ɔ, “Mansa, a ma nn ni i fa chɛ yen, mbɛ nn faa chima‑a.”
43014009	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fiipi, mmɔ mɛ buɛ chɛ mmɔ bɛ, a ni nyan fan wo gbɛɛ ni n sɔn gbɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min‑na n yen, a‑a Fa an yen ka. E ee kun to, i ni n dɔ tisa, n ni Fa yian wo a. Chɛ ɛ ma wan?
43014010	A nyin i ni dan a a, mbɛ nn fea Fa a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na. Bai chɛ nu, n‑na miin fɔ ka wo ye, an ma ka ni ka dechee n kun ma yiinachii an dɔ. Fa, nn fea mu min na mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, tima ɔ tima ko a, an mbe ma ka wai chɛ‑a.
43014011	N‑na a fɔɛ min chɛ, n dɔ, nn fea Fa a, n dɔ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na, dan chɛ a. Ni chɛ ma, Fa ɛ a ma, n mbe wai miin bɛɛ chɛ, an mbe che wan a ma‑a, wo ni dan n na.
43014012	N ni chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a n na, an mɔɛ chɛ nu, an mbe wai bonda chɛ n chɛ‑a wan, n mbe miin chɛ. A sin gbu, an mɔɛ chɛ nu, an chɛ chɛ wai n mbe koa‑a wan. Koe min na mu, n mbe yɛ tena Fa tena, nn ni ma kaina dɔndɔɛ ɛ.
43014013	A sin, n mbe ko ɔ ko chɛ‑a wan wo ye, wo e n dɔ tisa‑a min chɛ koe a, n tɔɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, n ni a ma, mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen, Fa kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.
43014014	Ni wo‑a tisa chɛ ko ɔ ko ko a, n tɔɛ ɔ, n mbe a chɛ wan wo ye.”
43014015	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a fɛ denɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Wo e koe chɛ n ma‑a wan, n‑na miin fɔ wo ye an ma koe a, ni wo toen fan mu n na.
43014016	N mbe fa ɔ tisa‑a wan, a ni a ma, wo ni demanɛ dɔ mende ma sɔn. A sin, ɛ a Nyina a na‑a wan, a ni ma wo fɛ tima ɔ tima ko a.
43014017	An Nyina chɛ, an mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni tea ɔ sɔn a si Yataa ma. Chɛɛ Yataa wakoe ee mɔɛ miin faa ɔ, an mbe ee che an boo si‑a a kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, an mbe ee che a yen‑da, an sin ma a sɔn. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo‑a a sɔn fan, koe min na mu, wo bɛ mu sanche chɛ ɔ, a sin mbe ma‑a wan wo fɛ ya ɔ ma.
43014018	“Ni n ta‑a, n mbe ee wo boo ka‑a. N mbe yɛ‑a wan wo tena.
43014019	A ɔ ma yansan to, mbɛ Yataa wakoe ee mɔɛ miin faa ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe ee n yen‑da to. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo e n yen‑da wan, koe min na mu, ni n yɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ, wo wɛɛ, wo e ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ.
43014020	Ni a tima chɛ che‑a, wo e a ɔ gbɛ‑a wan, mbɛ nn fea Fa a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na. A sin, wo wɛɛ, wo e ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ n na, yɔ n bɛɛ, n mbe ma‑a buɛ min dɔ dechee mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ wo a.
43014021	“Mɔɛ min mbe koe n ma‑a, n mbe miin fɔ an ma koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ an toen mu n na. A sin, an mɔɛ chɛ, a toen min chɛ‑a ka n na, Fa wɛɛ, a ɛ to‑a wan a a. N bɛɛ, n mbe to‑a wan a mɔɛ chɛ a, mbɛ n‑na a ma, a‑a n sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ.”
43014022	Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni to Chudasi, Chudasi Isikayɔti nii ma o. Mbɛ an fɛ den chɛ ɔ, “Mansa, e a ma‑a nn fan ni i yen dechee, chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa wakoe ee miin faa ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe ee i yen‑da. Fen mu chɛ ɛ ma‑a?”
43014023	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Mɔɛ min toen mu n na, ɛ koe chɛ n ma wan, n‑na miin fɔ a ye, an ma koe a. Fa ɛ to‑a wan a mɔɛ chɛ a. A sin, Fa ni ma, ni n fan, nn mbe na‑a wan a tena, mbɛ nn bɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a kaina dɔndɔ.
43014024	Mɔɛ min ma to ni n na, a ee che koe chɛ n ma‑a, n‑na miin fɔ a ye. A sin, n mbe bai chɛ miin gbɛɛ fɔ, n mbe ee an tɛ n fandi gboo an ma, chɛɛ Fa min‑na n sɔ, a 'a sakana bai nu mu, n mbe an na ben.
43014025	“N mbe bai chɛ n gbɛɛ fɔ tena wo ye, tima min na mu wɛ mmɔ bɛ ɛ.
43014026	Min mbe wo deman‑da, Yataa Nyina, Fa ɛ na‑a min na na‑a n gba ɔ, an mbe wo kan‑da ko ɔ ko ma, a si n 'na bai n ma. A sin mbe a ma‑a wan, n 'na bai chɛ n ni puin wo yii ma, n ni bai miin fɔ, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na.
43014027	“N mbe wo to tena faachima an dɔ. Faachima min nyɔn sima ɛ n dɔ, n mbe an be tena wo ma. N ta faachima, n mbe min be, a ee ka yɔ dunya chɛ ɔ nɛnɛ. Wo ma ma faamɔnɛ ɔ, a sin to, wo ma chian, a si koe chɛ n ma, miin mbe ma‑a.
43014028	Wo‑a a a min fan, n‑na min fɔ wo ye, mbɛ n mbe na tena wan ta‑a, chɛɛ n mbe yɛ‑a wan to wo ya ɔ. Ni n ko a di wan wo ye, wo bu ɔ dia‑a wan, a si n yɛ koe ma Fa tena. Koe min na mu, a benden mu n ma.
43014029	N mbe chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ tena wan wo ye sanche, an mbe e na to ma‑a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an mbe ma‑a tima min na, wo e dan‑da wan n da a bai n na.
43014030	Mmɔ ee che to chia ɔ bɔ yansama chɛ‑a mmɔ bɛ, a mu min na, nyina yama min 'na gbasaya ɛ dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n kun ma, ɛ chia a. Chɛɛ gbasaya ee a boo ɔ n kun ma.
43014031	Chɛɛ a nyin dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ nu, an ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n toen mu Fa a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ko ɔ ko ɛ min fɔ, n mbe an ma a buɛ an dɔ. “Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ, mmɔ ni bɔ nɛ.”
43015001	Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fan mu kɔnɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a, min mbe gbɔ chɛndɛ be. A sin, Fa an mu yadi ti a.
43015002	N bonɛ kan kɔ kan, min mbe ee gbɔ chɛndɛ be, ɛ a ka wan a ma. N bonɛ min sin mbe ee gbɔ a tenden be, ɛ a tɛ‑a wan a a, min mbe a ma, a ni nyan chɛndɛ, mbɛ a gbɔ‑a wɔsɔkɔɔ.
43015003	Bai chɛ nu, n‑na miin fɔ wo ye, an‑na a ma, wo bon chɛ n tɛ‑a wo ma, wo ni gbɔɛ be chɛndɛ chɛ.
43015004	Mmɔ ma mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ, wo ma n boo ka, n bɛɛ, n mbe ee wo boo ka‑a. Kɔnɛ bonɛ ee kun a ni gbɔ be, ni a kaenɛ ma‑a kɔnɛ kuu ba ma. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, wo wɛɛ, wo ee kun wo ni ko ɔ ko ma, mɔɔ ni mmɔ bɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ.
43015005	“N fan mu kɔnɛ a, wo sin, n bonɛ n mu wo a. Nn mbe ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ, mɔɛ min na, a ma n boo ka ni, n bɛɛ, n ma a boo ka ni, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ gbɔ sɛsɛ be‑a wan. Koe min na mu, wo ee che ko ɔ ko ma‑a, wo kun ma a a, ni n mbe ee wo kɔ.
43015006	Nn fea mɔɛ min na, nn mbe ee mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ kɔnɛ bonɛ, ɛ tɛ‑a wan a a, mbɛ a gbaa‑a. Kɔn bonɛ gbaaenɛ bonda chɛ nu, mɔɛ n mbe an na sɔn‑da wan, an ni sa ta a, minda koe a sɔɛ a.
43015007	Ni mmɔ bɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a n 'na bai n sa wo yii ma gban, ɛ nyan‑da wan. Fen kɔ fen, wo toen mu min na, mbɛ wo‑a Fa Yataa ɔ tisa a ko a, ɛ a be‑a wan wo ma.
43015008	Wo e ko chɛndɛ min ma‑a, ni an da a koa‑a, wo e ma‑a ka a ɔ yian fan na, mbɛ n fɛ denɛ mu wo a. An ko chɛndɛ chɛ n sin mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan to mɔɛ n na, Fa kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.
43015009	N toen fan mu wo a, yɔ Fa wɛɛ toen mu buɛ min dɔ n na. Wo ma wo kan kɔ sɔ n 'na koadia a.
43015010	Ni wo e koe chɛ n ma‑a, n mbe miin fɔ wo ye an ma koe a, wo ee na‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ‑a n 'na koadia a. N bɛɛ, n‑na koe chɛ n ma wan, Fa ɛ miin fɔ n ye, mbɛ n ma n kan kɔ sɔ ni a 'a koadia a.
43015011	“N mbe koe chɛ n fɔ tena wo ye, min mbe a ma, buɔdia min mbe n dɔ, a ni ma wo wɛɛ ɔ. An mbe a ma‑a wo 'a buɔdia da ni fa gban.
43015012	N mbe chɛ an fɔ tena wo ye a ma koe a, mbɛ wo ni to wo nyɔn na, yɔ n toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo a.
43015013	Ni mɔɛ fa‑a mɔɛ n ko a, a toen mu miin na, chia dɔ mende ee to nɔ, koadia ɔ yian koe a, a ni ben chɛ ma.
43015014	A sin, wo e ma‑a wan mɔɛ n na, n toenɛ ɛ ma‑a miin na tima ɔ tima, ni wo‑a koe chɛ n ma, n mbe miin fɔ‑a wo ye.
43015015	N mbe ee wo ya to n 'na bɔi den na, koe min na mu, bɔi den ma a kan mɔ yiima sɔn. N mbe min ma tena, n mbe wo ya tena gbɛ n bɔɛ n fan na. Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko, Fa‑a min fɔ n ye, n‑na a gbɛɛ ɔ yian wo a.
43015016	Wo wan ma n ya ni, ma koe a wo kan mɔ a, chɛɛ n fan‑na wo ya, ma koe a n fɛ mɔɛ n na. N fan‑na wo ya, mbɛ n‑na wai be wo ma, wo ni ta, wo chɛ chɛ wai ni koa. Wo chɛ chɛ wai chɛ n sin, an ni ma kuɔ fɔ wai n na. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, Fa ɛ fen kɔ fen be‑a wan wo ma, wo e a ɔ tisa‑a min ko a, n tɔɛ ɔ.
43015017	N mbe chɛ an fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ wo ni to wo nyɔn na.
43015018	“Mɔɛ miin ma to ni Yataa a dunya chɛ ɔ, ni an too‑a wo a, a ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ an too‑a n pɛn na.
43015019	Ni wo ni wan an 'na kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, an ni wo ya wan an sima a, mbɛ wo ko a dia‑a an ye. Chɛɛ n‑na wo bɔ wan an 'na dunya ɔ, a sin‑na a ma, wo bɛ ma to an na. Chɛ an fɛ mu, an tooenɛ ɛ wo a.
43015020	N da a bai chɛ ni to wo yii ma, n na‑a min fɔ wo ye, mbɛ bɔi den mbe ee nɔ, min benden mu a kan mɔ ma. Ni an‑na a ma wan n tɔɔ‑a, wo wɛɛ, an mbe a ma‑a ka wan wo ni tɔɔ. Chɛɛ ni an dɔ nu, an na‑a an too ma sɔ wan n da a kuiɛ ma, mbɛ an mbe an too ma sɔ‑a wan wo ta wɛɛ ma.
43015021	Chɛɛ an mbe a ma‑a wan wo ni tɔɔ, n bakoe fɛ. An mbe chɛ ma‑a wan, koe min na mu, an ma Fa Yataa sɔn, min‑na n sɔ.
43015022	Ni n nii ma na ni, n ni koɔ an tena, a si Yataa wakoe ma, Yataa nii a tɛɛ si‑a an ma, ko yama ma koe a. Chɛɛ ɛ ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ sanche, an mbe ee che to a fɔ‑a an nii ma an 'na ko yama n sɔn.
43015023	Mɔɛ min mbe too‑a n na, ɛ too‑a ka Fa an na.
43015024	Yataa nii a tɛɛ si‑a an ma, ko yama ma koe a, ni n nii ma koe n ma ni an tɛ ɔ. Kamaya koe chɛ nu, n‑na miin ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma miin ma nin bɛ an ya kɔɔɛ. Chɛɛ an ban‑da gbɛ kamaya koe chɛ n gbɛɛ yen‑da, n‑na miin ma. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an too‑a wan n na, a basan Fa wɛɛ a.
43015025	Chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, min nyɛnden ni an 'na sawa n dɔ, a ni bɔ a a. A nyɛnden ni ka wan, ‘An too‑a wan n na dechee, n nii ma ko ɔ ko yɔn ni an ma.’
43015026	“Chɛɛ min mbe wo deman‑da, n mbe a sɔ‑a wan, a ka Fa tena. Fa Yataa Nyina chɛ, an mbe tea ɔ yian‑da wo a, a si a wandi ma. N mbe a ma‑a wan a ni ka Fa tena, a ni na wo tena. A sin, ɛ n bakoe ɔ yian‑da wan wo a.
43015027	A sin gbu, wo wɛɛ, wo e n bakoe ɔ yian‑da wan mɔɛ n na. Koe min na mu, kɛn n‑na a kuu sɔ kanɛ chɛ‑a, mmɔ bɛ an mbe ben ben tena.
43016001	“N mbe chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ yian tena wo a, min mbe a ma, wo ma na sɛmbɛ wo kai fa koe a n na.
43016002	An mbe wo gbain‑da wan fɛsɛ fɛsɛ, a bɔ an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. A sin gbu, tima ɛ che‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ fa‑a, ɛ ma‑a wan a yii ma, mbɛ a‑a Yataa faa ma koe an ma ka.
43016003	Mɔɛ n mbe koe chɛ n ma‑a wan wo a, koe min na mu, an ma Fa Yataa sɔn tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ, chɛ ma, n fandi gbu wɛɛ.
43016004	Chɛɛ n mbe koe chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ yian tena wo a, a tima an ko a. Min mbe a ma, ni a che‑a, an ni koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma wo a, n na‑a min gbɛɛ ɔ yian wo a, ɛ ma‑a wan wo yii ma. N nii ma koe chɛ n dɔ yian ni wo a, a ka wo bea tima chɛ gbɛɛ ma n fɛ. N‑na chɛ ma koe min na, mmɔ bɛ an ni chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ ben ben‑da.
43016005	“Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, n mbe ta tena gbɛ Fa tena wan, min‑na n sɔ. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee n dɔ tisa tena, ni n mbe ta tena mende.
43016006	A sin, n‑na a ɔ yian ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ wo a sanche, faamɔnɛ koa‑a wo ma.
43016007	Chɛɛ n mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena, mbɛ a nyin fan wo ko a, n ni ta. Koe min na mu, ni n ma yɛ ni, Yataa Nyina min mbe wo deman‑da, a ee na‑a wo tena. Chɛɛ ni n yɛ‑a, n mbe a ma‑a wan, a ni na wo tena.
43016008	Ni n sin‑na a ma a na‑a, ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔɛ dɔ nu dunya chɛ ɔ, an ni a ɔ sɔn fen mu ko yama a. A yɛ to, an ni a ɔ sɔn, an mbe ma buɛ min dɔ an ni tan Yataa tena. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a‑a a ɔ yian an na, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ.
43016009	Yiima min mbe an dɔ, a si ko yama ma, tea yiinachii ma, koe min na mu, an ma an kai fa ni n na.
43016010	An sin ma a ɔ sɔn to, koe min nyin a ma koe a, koe min na mu, n mbe yɛ tena Fa Yataa tena wan. A sin, wo ee a a tun‑da to n yen koe a.
43016011	An sin ma a ɔ sɔn, kaa chɛ a tɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa ban‑da kaa a tɛ‑a Sitana wakoe ma, min mbe dunya chɛ kun ma.
43016012	“Bai sɛsɛ ɛ wan n da a, a fɔ koe a wo ye, chɛɛ wo ee na‑a kun‑da, wo ni an gbɛɛ sa wo yii ma.
43016013	Chɛɛ ni Yataa Nyina chɛ na‑a, min mbe tea ɔ yian a si Yataa ma, ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni tea gbɛɛ ɔ sɔn. A ee koɔ‑a wo tena a kun ma gbasaya n dɔ, chɛɛ ɛ min na min‑da Yataa a, ɛ an fɔ‑a wo ye. A sin, koe miin mbe na tena ma‑a, ɛ an fan dɔ yian‑da wo a.
43016014	Ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan wo a, n kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, n da a bai nu, ɛ an fan na ben‑da wo tena.
43016015	Fen kɔ fen Fa ta mu min na, n fan ta mu a a. An fɛ mu, n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, Yataa Nyina chɛ ɛ a too ma sɔ‑a wan n da a bai ma, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian wo a.”
43016016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A to‑a gbɛ fen den, mbɛ wo ee na‑a n yen‑da to, chɛɛ tima kundu ɛnden tɛ ɔ, wo e n yen‑da wan to.”
43016017	Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ dɔ nu, an bun‑da a tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “A yen ko, a ɔ, mmɔ ee na tena to a yen‑da, a ɔ, a ɔ ee mɛ tena to. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a ɔ, mmɔ ɛ a yen‑da wan, a ɔ, a ɔ ee mɛ tena to. A ɔ te to, mbɛ mmɔ ee na‑a a yen‑da, a ɔ, koe min na mu, a ɔ, ɛ ta tena a fa tena wan. A e na ma ka fen fɔ‑a mmɔ ye?
43016018	Mmɔ gbu an mbe ee che a ɔ gbɛ‑a, ɛ bai miin fɔ tena. Chɛ yen bɛ, ‘a ɔ ee mɛ tena to,’ mmɔ ɛ fen dɔ gbɛ chɛ ma?”
43016019	Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an toen fan ni ka, an ni a ɔ tisa. Mbɛ a ɔ, “N dɔ, wo ee na tena to n yen‑da, n dɔ, a ɔ ee mɛ tena to. Mbɛ n dɔ te to, wo e n yen‑da wan, n dɔ, a ɔ ee mɛ tena to. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ chɛ gbu an‑na wo kɔndɔ fii ka.
43016020	Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ wo e di chɛ‑a wan gbafi gbafi, wo ya yii ni bɔn, a si koe chɛ n ma, miin mbe na tena n tan‑da. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tana dunya ɔ, Yataa wakoe ee miin faa ɔ, an mbe ma‑a buɔdia an dɔ. Wo e ma‑a wan faamɔnɛ ɔ, chɛɛ wo 'a faamɔnɛ chɛ ɛ mun‑da buɔdia an na wo ma.
43016021	Ɛ ma‑a wan dechee, yɔ ni musu bu ɔ tɛ‑a, faamɔnɛ min mbe ma a ma, koe min na mu, tɔɔya ɔ bia tima che‑a a boo ɔ. Chɛɛ ni a‑a den chɛ suun gbɛ dechee, kun na dia ɔ, mbɛ a nyina‑a a 'a tɔɔya ma. Ɛ ma gbɛ buɔdia an dɔ, koe min na mu, a‑a mɔ gbu ma sɔn dunya chɛ ɔ.
43016022	Wo wɛɛ, an mbe ka ma‑a wo a sanche chɛ ɔ. Wo e faayɔnɛ an dɔ, chɛɛ a ee mɛ‑a, n mbe wo yen‑da wan to. A sin, wo bu ɔ dia‑a wan kaka. An buɔdia chɛ nɛnɛ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che‑a a ma‑a to, wo ni fo a a.
43016023	“Ni an tee chɛ che‑a, wo ee n dɔ tisa‑a to a si ko ɔ ko ma. Ka n mbe chɛ ma din wo tena, mbɛ ni wo‑a Fa ɔ tisa fen kɔ fen ko a, n tɔɛ ɔ, ɛ a be‑a wan wo ma.
43016024	Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ aan sanche, wo ma tisa chɛ nin bɛ fen kɔ fen ko a, n tɔɛ ɔ. Wo tisa chɛ, mbɛ wo‑a fen chɛ ma sɔn, wo e min bakoe ɔ tisa‑a. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, wo 'a buɔdia da ni fa gban.
43016025	“N mbe ka sanche koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian‑da wo a, tai n fan dɔ. Chɛɛ tima ɛ che‑a wan, mbɛ n‑na n boo bɔ tai a bɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ n koɔ‑a wo tena a si Fa ma, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ gbadan.
43016026	Ni a tee chɛ che‑a, wo e fa ɔ tisa‑a wan, n tɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe ee a fɔ tena, mbɛ fɔ ni, n bɛɛ, n‑na a disa wo ko a.
43016027	Koe min na mu, Fa wandi gbu, a toen fan mu wo a. Wo toenɛ min chɛ‑a n na, a wɛɛ, an‑na a to wo a. A sin, wo‑a wo kai fa to n na, mbɛ wo dan‑da a a, mbɛ n ka‑a Fa Yataa tena wan.
43016028	N sin gbu ka‑a Fa tena wan, mbɛ n na‑a nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ. A sin, sanche chɛ ɔ, n mbe bɔ tena wan dunya chɛ ɔ, mbɛ n yɛ‑a Fa tena.”
43016029	Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ n dɔ, “Chɛ an nyin, i‑a tai tɛ boo ka gbɛ. I bun‑da a ma‑a gbɛ, nn mbe i da a kuiɛ ɔ gbɛ‑a gbadan.
43016030	Sanche mu gbɛ a boo‑a nn ma chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ nn yii ma koe gbɛɛ ɛ i boo faa a wan. I gbu an mbe ee mɔ ɔ mɔ ɔ tisa, ni fen mbe a yii ma, koe min na mu, i‑a mɔ gbu yii ma koe sɔn fan. Chɛ ko a, nn dan‑da gbɛ a a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ i ka‑a Yataa tena wan.”
43016031	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “An nɛ, wo dan‑da gbɛ n na fo.
43016032	Chɛɛ tima ɛ che tena, a sin, an tima gbu che‑a, wo gbɛɛ, wo e na tena fasan‑da n ma tima min na. Dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo e na tena ta‑a wo ta chia an na, mbɛ wo‑a n dɔndɔ gbe ma gbaaenɛ to. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n dɔndɔ gbe ee ma tena, koe min na mu, Fa ɛ n kɔ gban.
43016033	N mbe chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ tena wo ye, min mbe a ma, wo ni faachima sɔn. Koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ gbɛɛ. Ko yawaenɛ n mbe wo tan‑da wan dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ wo wo faa sɔ, n kun‑da gbasaya ti ma dunya chɛ ɔ.”
43017001	Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn bai chɛ n fɔ‑a a fɛ denɛ n ye, mbɛ a‑a a ya a si banda a, a‑a samunɛ chɛ, a ɔ, “Fa, tima gbu che‑a. A ma mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen, n kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ n bɛɛ, n‑na a ma, mɔɛ n‑na i ta kamaya wɛɛ ɔ yen.
43017002	Koe min na mu, i‑a gbasaya be n ma, mɔ gbu n gbɛɛ kun ma dunya ɔ. Gbasaya min mbe a ma, n ni a ma, chɛ n gbɛɛ ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn, i‑a miin be n ma, ma koe a n fɛ.
43017003	Mɔɛ n sin mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn ka wan. An mbe i wan sɔn, tea Yataa dɔndɔɛ a, mbɛ an‑na n bɛɛ sɔn, i 'a denɛ Chisɔsi Chasi, i‑a n fɛn sɔ dunya chɛ ɔ.
43017004	N ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da dunya ɔ, i kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ. A yen ko, n‑na i 'a wai a ban, i‑a min be n ma a chɛ koe a.
43017005	Fa Yataa, sanche gbɛ, a ma n ni ma basɔmaya chɛ ɔ, i waa a, yɔ n ni min nyɔn sima ɔ, dunya chɛ a e na to dan‑da.
43017006	“I‑a mɔɛ dɔ n bɔ wan an bɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, mbɛ i‑a an be n ma, ma koe a n fɛ denɛ n na. A gbu sin, i wan ta ni an na, a sin to, i wan‑na an be n ma. N‑na i wakoe ɔ yian fan an na, an‑na i sɔn. An sin‑na an too ma sɔ wan i da a kuiɛ ma, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
43017007	Sanche chɛ sin dɔ gbɛ, an‑na a ɔ sɔn gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ i na‑a fenɛ miin gbɛɛ be n ma, an ka‑a i wandi gbu an tena.
43017008	I 'a sakana chɛ, i‑a min be n ma an ko a, n‑na a a ben fan an tena. A sin, an‑na an too ma sɔ wan a ma. Mbɛ an‑na an boo a chii a ma, mbɛ tea mu, mbɛ n ka‑a i tena wan. A sin, an danden fan mu to a a, mbɛ i wan‑na n sɔ.
43017009	“I 'a mɔɛ n fan nɛ, i wan‑na an be n ma, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena an ko a. N mbe ee samunɛ chɛ tena chɛ n fan ko a, i wakoe ee miin faa ɔ.
43017010	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ n ko a, i wɛɛ, i 'a mɔɛ nu mu. Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ, an mbe i ko a, n bɛɛ, n 'na mɔɛ nu mu. A sin, an mbe a ɔ yian tena wan, n kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ.
43017011	Sanche chɛ ɔ gbɛ, n mbe chia an na, na koe a i tena. N tana, ɛ gbɛ buɛ min dɔ, n mbe ee ma tena to dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ an tana, an mbe wɛ nɛ chɛ a ɔ. Fa, i wɛn kan nyɔ ee, an kun ma fɛn, min mbe a ma, an ni ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a an nyɔn tena, yɔ mɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛ ma i 'a gbasaya ɔ, i na‑a gbasaya min sima be n ma.
43017012	Tima min na nn bɛ ni an na, n na‑a an kun ma fɛn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. N na‑a chɛ ma i 'a gbasaya ɔ wan, i na‑a gbasaya min be n ma. A sin, n ma fo nin bɛ an dɔndɔ wɛɛ a. Chɛɛ an dɔndɔ mu dechee, i na‑a min bakoe fɔ, mbɛ a tana ɛ na‑a wan a wandi nimisa‑a. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, min mbe a ma, min nyɛnden mu i 'a gboo ɔ, a ni bɔ a a.
43017013	A sin, sanche chɛ ɔ, n mbe gbɛ chia an na, na‑a i tena. Chɛɛ n mbe wɛ nɛ tima min na dunya chɛ ɔ, n mbe koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian tena wan n fɛ den chɛ n na. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, buɔdia min nyɔn sima ɛ n dɔ, an ni a buɔdia da faenɛ ma sɔn.
43017014	I‑a sakana min be n ma an ko a, n‑na a ben fan an tena. An sin, an bɛ ee mɔɛ chɛ n na ko dɔndɔ ɔ, i wakoe ee miin faa ɔ. Chɛ ko a, an fɛn mbe i faa ma koe ma ka, an ko a ma di chɛ n ye, miin mbe ee i faa ma koe ma ka.
43017015	N mbe ee samunɛ chɛ tena gbɛ, min mbe a ma, i ni an bɔ dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe a chɛ tena, i ni an kun ma fɛn Sitana boo ɔ, nyina yama chɛ.
43017016	N mbe buɛ min dɔ dechee, nn bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, i wakoe ee miin faa ɔ, nn mbe ee ko dɔndɔ ɔ. N fɛ den chɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe dechee ka wan yɔ n fan, an bɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n na, an mbe ee ko dɔndɔ ɔ.
43017017	I 'a bai an mu tea a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a ma i 'a bai chɛ ni an ma, an ni ma i ko a tenchen.
43017018	I na‑a n sɔ buɛ min dɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, n bɛɛ, n mbe ka wan an sɔ‑a gbɛɛ ben‑da a ɔ.
43017019	A sin, an fan ko a mu, n mbe n fandi be tena, ma koe a tenchen i ko a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an bɛɛ, an ni ma tenchen i ko a.
43017020	“N mbe samunɛ min chɛ tena, n fɛ den chɛ n dechee an ko a ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ko a, miin mbe an kai fa‑a n na, a mu min na, n fɛ den chɛ n koɔ‑a an tena a si n ma.
43017021	N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, an gbɛɛ ni ma mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ. Fa, a ma an ni ma mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ mɔ a, yɔ mɔ fea chɛ mɔɛ ɛ buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ.
43017022	N‑na a ma an bɛɛ‑a basɔmaya ma sɔn, i na‑a basɔmaya min be n ma. N‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, an ni ma mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ an nyɔn na, yɔ mɔ fea ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
43017023	Nn bɛ an na, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu nn na, yɔ mɔ fea wɛɛ, mɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, an mbe mɔ dɔndɔya min dɔ an nyɔn na, a da ni fa gban. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, i wakoe ee mɔɛ miin faa ɔ, an ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ i wan‑na n sɔ. A yɛ to, an mɔɛ chɛ n ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ i toen fan mu n fɛ den chɛ n na, yɔ i toen mu n na buɛ min dɔ.
43017024	“Fa, i ban‑da gbɛ an be‑a n ma. N toen mu, n mbe ma‑a kaina min, nn bɛ ni ma nɔ n fɛ den chɛ n na. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni a ɔ yen n kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ. A sin, i wan‑na an kamaya chɛ be n ma. I na‑a a be n ma, koe min na mu, i to‑a wan n na pɛn dunya chɛ a ni to dan‑da.
43017025	Fa, i wɛn tanden mu, i wakoe ee mɔɛ miin faa ɔ, kɛn gba an ma i sɔn. Chɛɛ n tana, n‑na i sɔn fan tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, n fɛ den chɛ n bɛɛ gbu, an‑na a ɔ sɔn gbɛ, mbɛ i wan‑na n sɔ.
43017026	N‑na i wakoe ɔ yian fan an na, an‑na i sɔn. A sin, n gboo ɔ ee fa‑a a ɔ yian koe a an na. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, n ko a di ka buɛ min dɔ i ye, a nyɔn sima koadia ni ma an faa ɔ. Mbɛ a sin fan mbe a ma‑a, nn bɛ an na, nn ni ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.”
43018001	Chisɔsi ban‑da kɛn samunɛ chɛ chɛ‑a, mbɛ a bɔ‑a nɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ n na. Mbɛ an‑na foo ɔ tandin, min tɔ ni Kidon foo. Foo chɛ kaka chɛ ma, kɔn nangbanɛ ni wan nɔ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi don‑da an nangbanɛ chɛ ɔ, an bɛ a fɛ denɛ chɛ n na.
43018002	Chɛɛ a fɛ denɛ Chudasi, min ni na tena ka a ma tachɛ‑a a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ nu ma, a na‑a an kaina chɛ sɔn fan. Koe min na mu, tima sɛsɛ ko a, Chisɔsi na‑a bɛn fan nɔ, an bɛ an na.
43018003	Mbɛ Chudasi na‑a an kaina chɛ, ɛ na‑a an bɛ Domi chɛnyɛ ɔ soya kuunɛ n na. An bɛ ni poesi n na na‑a, miin ni Yataa 'a kata kun ma fɛn. Fayisii mɔɛ dɔ nu, an bɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an fan na‑a an sɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ feanka n ni wan an boo ɔ, ni sanku manɛ, a basan dambo n na.
43018004	Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, an ni na tena koe miin gbɛɛ a ben‑da a a. Chɛ ko a, a wɛɛ ta‑a wan an ya ɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Wo e wo ya a kan tena nyɔn na?”
43018005	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn mbe nn ya a kan tena Chisɔsi an na, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ.” Mbɛ a ɔ, “N yen ko.” A tima chɛ a, Chudasi, min ni ka a ma tachɛ‑a, chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ n ma, ɛ nɔ sɔ ɔ, an bɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n na.
43018006	Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ kɛn, a ɔ, “N yen ko,” mbɛ an gbɛɛ yɛ‑a an kuu kɔ, an bea‑a duu ma.
43018007	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a an dɔ tisa to, a ɔ, “Nyɔn gbu mu, wo e wo ya a kan tena min na?” Mbɛ an dɔ te to, “Chisɔsi, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ.”
43018008	Chɛ nɛnɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “N ban‑da a fɔ‑a wo ye, mbɛ Chisɔsi mu n fan na. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni wo e wo ya a kan tena n fan na, mbɛ wo a ma, n fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ni ta.”
43018009	A‑a chɛ fɔ, min mbe a ma, a na‑a min fɔ, a ni bɔ a a. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Fa, n ma fo ni mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ a, i na‑a mɔɛ miin be n ma, an kun ma fɛn koe a.”
43018010	Mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ n dɔndɔ, Saimɔn Pita, a‑a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ bɔ a sa ɔ. Mbɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a 'a yɔnɛ, a‑a a too tɛ a a fau, a boo nyima ɔ. An yɔnɛ chɛ, a tɔ ni Makɔsi.
43018011	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ Pita gbu ma, a ɔ, “I 'a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a yɛ a sa ɔ. N mbe mɔnɛ chɛ bia wan, Fa‑a a fɔ, n ni min dɔ bia. Ɛ i yii ma, n mbe ee a ɔ bia‑a?”
43018012	Mbɛ Domi soya mɔɛ nu, an bɛ an 'na mɔ chenama an na, a basan Yataa 'a kata kun ma fɛn poesi chɛ n na, an gbɛɛ‑a Chisɔsi bia. Mbɛ an‑na a chii.
43018013	An ta‑a mɔɛ min pɛn tena, an nɛ kai Anasi a. Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, an san chɛ a, a ni Kayafasi an na. Anasi chɛ, a 'a denɛ musuma, an ni a boo ɔ.
43018014	Kayafasi chɛ ni, min na‑a Chu mɔɛ n ya ɔ sɔɛ n na si, mbɛ a fisa mɔ dɔndɔɛ ni fa mɔ gbu tɔɛ n ko a.
43018015	Saimɔn Pita chɛ, an fea a bɔɛ fɛ den dɔ mende a, an ta‑a wan Chisɔsi san‑da. A wan Pita bɔɛ chɛ, Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa chɛ Yataa tena, a na‑a a sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛ ko a, a tana, a don‑da wan an tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a kata ɔ.
43018016	Chɛɛ Pita tana, a to‑a kata chɛ kɔ wan, a da tɔnfɛ. Mbɛ a bɔɛ chɛ bɔ‑a baa ma, mbɛ a koɔ‑a sunkun tɔngbɔɛ tena kata chɛ da a, mbɛ Pita don‑da an fea a bɔɛ chɛ a.
43018017	Sunkun tɔngbɔɛ chɛ, min ni ka kata chɛ da a, a koɔ‑a Pita tena. A ɔ, “I wɛɛ, a ma ma, mbɛ i mu kamin chɛ fɛ denɛ dɔndɔ an na.” Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “A an, a fɛ den ma n na.”
43018018	Chima an ni na tena a tima chɛ a, min‑na a ma, tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a bɔi denɛ chɛ n dɔ nu, an bɛ Yataa 'a kata kun ma fɛn poesi chɛ n na, an‑na ta chɛ chɛmbu ɔ. A sin, an tindanden fan ni a a, an mbe an gbaa‑a. Mbɛ Pita wɛɛ na‑a an tena, a sɔ‑a, a bun‑da a gbaa‑a.
43018019	Mbɛ tɛ mɔ wa chɛ‑a Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, a fɛ denɛ n bakoe a, a yɛ to, a si kanɛ ma, ɛ min chɛ.
43018020	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N ma bai ɔ bai sa nin bɛ doee ɔ. Tima ɔ tima ko a, mɔɛ miin ni an too ma sɔ n ma, n ni koɔ wan an tena fanka ɔ den. Kanɛ gbɛɛ n ni min chɛ, n ni a chɛ wo 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n na wan, a basan Yataa 'a kata ɔ a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ bɛn tena nu.
43018021	Fen ko a gbɛ, e n dɔ tisa tena? Mɔɛ miin ni an too ma sɔ n ma, e an fan dɔ tisa. An dɔ tisa, an ni a ɔ yian i a, n ni min fɔ an ye, an‑na a gbɛɛ ɔ sɔn fan.”
43018022	Chisɔsi‑a chɛ fɔ kɛn dechee, poesi chɛ n dɔndɔ nɔ, a‑a a too ɔ gbasi. A ɔ, a wan Chisɔsi ee kun, a ɔ, a ni koɔ ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, an 'na tɛ mɔ wa tena.
43018023	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Fen mu e n gbasi tena? A ɔ yian bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na nɛ, n‑na bai yama min fɔ. Chɛɛ ni n ma bai yama fɔ ni, i nii a ma ka.”
43018024	Chisɔsi boo ɔ chiienɛ chɛ to‑a ka wan, mbɛ Anasi‑a a ma, an ben‑da a a Kayafasi tena, Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa chɛ Yataa tena.
43018025	Saimɔn Pita ni wan sɔ ɔ tun mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, ɛ a gbaa chɛ‑a. Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ tisa, an dɔ, “I wɛɛ, a ma ma, mbɛ i mu kamin chɛ fɛ denɛ dɔndɔ an na.” Chɛɛ Pita‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan to, a ɔ, “A an, a fɛ den ma n na.”
43018026	Mbɛ tɛ mɔ wa chɛ 'a bɔi dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ. A suun ma nyɔɛ ni mɔna chɛ a, Pita na‑a min too tɛ ka a a. Mbɛ bɔi chɛ koɔ‑a, a ɔ, “N na‑a i yen fan kɔn nangbanɛ chɛ ɔ, wo fea ɛ Chisɔsi a, ae?”
43018027	Mbɛ a gba sawan bɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ ɔ, Pita ɔ, “A an.” A sin, a ya kɔɔɛ a, tɛ kɔnɛ konchee‑a wan.
43018028	Sau sau ma ni, mbɛ an bɔ‑a Chisɔsi a Kayafasi chen kɔɔ, an ta‑a a a. Mbɛ an na‑a Domi kun ti chen kɔɔ, min ni kɔfana a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mɔ fanka min na‑a ka Chisɔsi a, an nii ma don ni kata chɛ ɔ, an to‑a a baa ma wan. Chu sawa ta fɛ chia a, an toen ni an ni an fandi bia chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛ an mbe a ma, an ni daunɛ chɛ, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ chɛ kun ma, aan an ni ban.
43018029	Chɛ ko a, Kɔfana Padeti bɔ‑a a 'a kata ɔ, a na‑a a tan. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ‑a fen ko yɔn wo ma?”
43018030	Mbɛ an‑na a yɛman ka wan, an dɔ, “Ni mɔna chɛ ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, nn mbe ee kun nn ni na a a i chen kɔɔ.”
43018031	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Mbɛ wo wandi, wo ta a a, wo ni wo 'a sawa a tachɛ a a.” Chɛɛ an dɔ, “Wo wan Domi mɔɛ n ma a gbasaya chɛ be nin bɛ kɛn nn ma, kaa a tɛ koe a mɔɛ fa koe ma.”
43018032	An‑na bai min fɔ ka, a‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a min fɔ, a ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a. Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ yian fan, an ni na tena a fa‑a buɛ min dɔ.
43018033	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti yɛ‑a a 'a kata bu ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ma, an na‑a Chisɔsi a a tena. Mbɛ a ɔ, “I wan mu Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa a?”
43018034	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I wandi gbu ta tisa an nɛ, kɔ mɔɛ n fan‑na n ma don i tena?”
43018035	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti wɛɛ ɔ, “Chɛɛ a ma ma i yii ma, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ mu n na, i ɔ tisa koe a n kun ma a a. I wandi 'a mɔɛ n gbu, a basan Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n na, an fan na‑a i a n chen kɔɔ. I‑a fen gbu ma?”
43018036	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Dunya chɛ ɔ mansa ma n na. Ni a ni n na, mbɛ n fɛ mɔɛ n ni butuinɛ chɛ‑a wan n ko a, mɔɛ n nii n be‑a ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n ma. A an, n 'na mansaya gbasaya ma bɔ ni dunya chɛ an dɔ.”
43018037	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “E ka a fɔ an na gbɛ n ye, mbɛ mansa mu i a?” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “I wan‑na a fɔ, i ɔ, mansa mu n na. N na‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, mbɛ n suun‑da mɔgbuya ɔ. Chɛ ma‑a, ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ko a, tea ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu an tea chɛ a, ɛ a too ma sɔ wan n da a kuiɛ ma.”
43018038	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Tea e na ma fen na?” Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti bɔ‑a to mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a 'a kata baa ma. Mbɛ a ɔ, “N ma chia kan kɔ kan yen ni, kaa a tɛ koe a, mɔna chɛ fa koe ma.
43018039	Chɛɛ san kɔ san na, manda mu a a, mbɛ kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ kan kɔ kan kun ma, n mbe n boo ka wan mɔɛ dɔndɔ a wo ye, min mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ gbɛ sanche, wo toen mu n ni n boo ka wo 'a mansa an na, ae?”
43018040	Chɛɛ chɛ ko a, an‑na yee tɛ wan, an dɔ, “A an, an ma. N toen mu i ni i boo ka Baabasi an na.” Baabasi chɛ ni mɔ yama wa an na.
43019001	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a ma, an‑na Chisɔsi boan chɛndɛ chɛ.
43019002	Mbɛ soya chɛ nu, an‑na mansa banfua nyan wai a sen sendenɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a si Chisɔsi kunɛ a. Mbɛ doma kai kɔ yawaenɛ, an‑na a don a ma mansa doma a.
43019003	Mbɛ an‑na an yuu sɔ na koe a a tena, an mbe ta‑a ma yɛn ma bun‑da a ma, an dɔ, “Chu mɔɛ n 'na mansa chɛ ni mɛ.” Mbɛ dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an‑na a gbasi.
43019004	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti bɔ‑a to baa ma, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔ fanka chɛ ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo too ma sɔ, n mbe a ma‑a wan, an ni bɔ a a nɛ wo wandi tena. An mbe a ma‑a, wo ni a ɔ yen, mbɛ n ma chia kan kɔ kan yen ni, kaa a tɛ koe a a fa koe ma.”
43019005	Mbɛ an bɔ‑a Chisɔsi a, wai mansa banfua chɛ, a sienɛ ɛ a kun na, doma kai kɔ yawaen chɛ wɛɛ dondenɛ ɛ a ma. Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Wo 'a mɔna gbu yen ko.”
43019006	Mɔɛ miin mbe Chu n tɛ Yataa a, an 'na mansa chɛ nu, an bɛ Yataa 'a kata kun ma fɛn poesi chɛ n na, an gbɛɛ‑a Chisɔsi yen kɛn sɔ ɔ an ya kɔɔ, an‑na yee tɛ wan gba fea, an dɔ, “A ni gbangban kɔnɛ ma, a ni fa. A ni gbangban kɔnɛ ma, a ni fa.” Chɛɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Wo wandi wo a bia, mbɛ wo‑a a fa a buɛ ɔ. N tana, n ma chia kan kɔ kan yen ni, kaa a tɛ koe a a fa koe ma.”
43019007	Chɛɛ mɔ fanka chɛ ɔ, “Nn 'na sawa ɛ wan nɔ, min‑na a fɔ, mbɛ mɔna chɛ ɛ fa wan. Koe min na mu, a ɔ, Yataa 'a denɛ mu a a.”
43019008	Kɔfana Padeti‑a chɛ a min kɛn, a 'a chiandia gbu kun ma chɛ‑a kaa a tɛ koe a Chisɔsi fa koe ma.
43019009	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to Chisɔsi a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “I ta bɔ tena gbu mu mende a?” Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ma a tɛ ni a ma gbukuu wɛɛ.
43019010	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “E yen ko ban‑da koɔ koe a n tena. A ni ma i yii ma, mbɛ gbasaya ɛ wan n boo ɔ, i kun bɔ koe a saya chɛ ɔ. Gbasaya ɛ wan to n boo ɔ, a ma koe a, an ni i fa kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.”
43019011	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Gbasaya ee che ma‑a i boo ɔ n kun ma, ni Yataa an ma a be ni i ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min‑na a ma, an na‑a nɛ chɛ n na i chen kɔɔ, a ta ko yama benden mu i ta ma.”
43019012	Kɔfana Padeti‑a chɛ a min kɛn, a‑a chia yan fan Chisɔsi boo ka koe a, a bɔ koe chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ fanka chɛ‑a yee tɛ to, an dɔ, “Ni i‑a mɔna chɛ boo ka, mbɛ i ma to ni Domi kun ti wa a. Mɔɛ min mbe a wandi ya mansa a, ɛ ma‑a ka a kaa sa‑a Domi kun ti wa chɛ an na.”
43019013	Kɔfana Padeti‑a an da a bai chɛ n na min kɛn, mbɛ a‑a a ma an bɔ‑a Chisɔsi a. Mbɛ a si‑a a 'a kaa tɛ sea a. Sea chɛ ni kaina min, a tɔ ni kaina min nyanden mu senɛ a. Chu mɔɛ n ni nɔ chee, an dɔ, Kabata.
43019014	Tee min ma, Chu n ni an ma bɛn suin tee ko a, tee che‑a a kun tɛ. An wichi chɛ ni kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ an ko a. Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo 'a mansa gbu yen ko.”
43019015	Mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ to, an dɔ, “A ni ka ka, a ni ka ka. A ma a ni fa kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.” Chɛɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “Wo 'a mansa, wo toen mu n ni a ma, an ni a fa kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, ae?” Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n dɔ, “Nn 'na mansa mu Domi kun ti wa an na dechee.”
43019016	Mbɛ a danka a, Kɔfana Padeti‑a Chisɔsi be soya chɛ n ma nɔ, an ni a fa kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ni gbɛ an fan ko a, an ta‑a a a.
43019017	Chisɔsi wandi an to‑a a 'a kɔn gbengbandenɛ chɛ suun‑da aan an bɔ‑a an duu chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a fo kaina, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Kun Konkonɛ Ma. Chu mɔɛ n ni nɔ chee, an dɔ, Kɔkɔta.
43019018	An kaina chɛ ni, an‑na Chisɔsi gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a basan kamin fea dɔ mende n bɛɛ a. Chisɔsi an ni dɛn dɔ an kamin fea chɛ n tɛtɛ ma.
43019019	Mbɛ Kɔfana Padeti‑a a ma, bai kundu nyɛn‑da gbembe kundu ma, min gbangban‑da kɔn gbengbandenɛ chɛ ma. An bai kundu chɛ ɔ, “Chisɔsi an nɛ, min ka‑a Nasaɛti, Chu n 'na mansa.”
43019020	Chu mɔ sɛsɛ na‑a a kan fan, koe min na mu, Chisɔsi gbangban‑da ka kaina min, a ɔ nii ma yansan duu a. An bai kundu chɛ nyɛn‑da gba sawa. A nyɛn‑da Chu mɔɛ n da a kuiɛ pɛn dɔ, mbɛ a a mun‑da Domi mɔɛ n ta ɔ, a danka a, a nyɛn‑da Kiisi mɔɛ n ta ɔ.
43019021	Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n dɔ Kɔfana Padeti ma, an dɔ, “I nii a fɔ, i ɔ, Chu n 'na mansa, chɛɛ i ni a fɔ wan, i ɔ, mɔna chɛ, an‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, Chu n 'na mansa mu a a.”
43019022	Chɛɛ Kɔfana Padeti ɔ, “N‑na a ma ka, an‑na min nyɛn, an mbe to tena nɔ.”
43019023	Soya chɛ n‑na Chisɔsi gbangban kɛn kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, mbɛ an‑na a ma koa n ya, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ du si tena naanin. A si tena dɔndɔ, soya mɔ dɔndɔ. A 'a gbansan doma an na‑a to gbɛ, mbɛ an‑na a wɛɛ ya.
43019024	A nɛnɛ wakoe, an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, an dɔ, “Mmɔ ma a a panda. Mmɔ chɛ fenɛ chɛ a ko a, mmɔ ni a ɔ yen mɔɛ min mbe a ma sɔn‑da.” An sin na‑a a ma ka wan. Chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gboo na‑a bai min fɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma, a ni bɔ a a. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “An‑na n 'na koa n du wan an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na chɛ fenɛ chɛ n 'na gbansanɛ sin ko a.”
43019025	Chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ chɛ a ɔ tima min kɔɔ, Chisɔsi de ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ a 'a kɔn gbengbandenɛ chɛ baima. A de dɔ musuma wɛɛ ni wan nɔ. Kai Kopasi 'a musu Mɛi wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, a basan Mɛi dɔndɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ a, min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ.
43019026	Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ, min ko a ni di a ye gbeden, a wɛɛ ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ Chisɔsi de baima. Chisɔsi‑a an fea chɛ yen kɛn sɔ ɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “N de, i 'a denɛ an nɛ gbɛ.”
43019027	Mbɛ a ɔ an fɛ den chɛ wɛɛ ma, a ɔ, “N bɔ, i de an nɛ gbɛ.” A sin, a ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, aan a ta, an fɛ den chɛ ta‑a bɔɔɛ chɛ a a waa a, a‑a a bia yɔ a de.
43019028	Chisɔsi na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tima chɛ a gbɛ, a ban‑da a 'a wai gbɛɛ chɛ‑a, a ni min chɛ. A sin, min mbe a ma Yataa 'a gboo‑a bai min fɔ, a ni bɔ a a, mbɛ a ɔ, “N kanɛ a gbaa‑a.”
43019029	A tima chɛ a, gbɛ konama wa ni wan nɔ si ɔ da ɔ. Mbɛ soya chɛ n‑na fen yɔfu yɔfu don a ɔ, a chima‑a dɔgbɔ. Mbɛ an‑na fen chɛ bɔ gbɛ chɛ ɔ kɔnɛ bonɛ a, mbɛ an‑na a a sɛ Chisɔsi da tena.
43019030	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a gbɛ chɛ susu fen yɔfu yɔfu chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “N ban‑da n 'na wai chɛ‑a.” Mbɛ a‑a a kunɛ a bun, a fa‑a.
43019031	Tee chɛ ni Anyima tee an na. Chu n ni an ma bɛn tee chɛ an ma suin tee ko a. Chɛ ko a, an nii ma to ni, su chɛ n ni ma dɛn dɔ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma an tee chɛ ma. A bɛbɛɛ suin tee min nɛnɛ ni na tena ka, min ni tee wa a. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ n‑na Kɔfana Padeti ɔ tisa, a ni a ma, an ni mɔɛ chɛ n chenɛ n dɔ kai kai, an ni fua fa‑a, mbɛ an‑na an su bɔ dɛn dɔ kɔn gbengbandenɛ chɛ n ma.
43019032	Mbɛ soya chɛ n ta‑a, mbɛ an‑na kaminɛ saa chenɛ n dɔ kai. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na kaminɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ chenɛ n dɔ kai kai, an na‑a miin gbangban ka kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, an bɛ Chisɔsi a.
43019033	Chɛɛ an che‑a kɛn Chisɔsi ma, an nii ma a chenɛ n dɔ kai ni. Koe min na mu, an na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a faenɛ ni gbɛ.
43019034	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, soya chɛ n dɔndɔ, a‑a tamba a sendenɛ ya wan, a‑a Chisɔsi kaa fɛ sɔɔ a a. A sin, a ya kɔɔɛ a, wii bɔ‑a wan nɔ, a basan yii a.
43019035	N fɛn na‑a koe chɛ ɔ yen ma‑a, n fan mbe ka a ɔ yian‑da. N‑na min dɔ yian, tea mu a a, a sin, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n mbe tea an fɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma wan, wo ni a a tun wo kai fa koe a Chisɔsi a.
43019036	Chɛ na‑a ma, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, a ni bɔ a a. A‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “An mbe ee a kuu dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɔ kai‑a.”
43019037	Yataa da a bai dɔndɔ to a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ n mbe mɔɛ chɛ ma fɛn‑da wan, an‑na min sɔɔ tamba a.”
43019038	Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ maenɛ gbakɔ, Chosɛfi, min ka‑a Ayimatia duu ɔ, a‑a Kɔfana Padeti ɔ tisa wan Chisɔsi su ko a. Chosɛfi chɛ ni Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ an na, chɛɛ nun dɔ ni. A nii ma bɔ ni ya a ma, a mu min na, a chianden ni Chu gbakoo n fan ma. Kɔfana Padeti dɔn‑da kɛn su chɛ be koe a, a ni tɔn, mbɛ Chosɛfi‑a su chɛ a yii, a ta‑a a a.
43019039	Nikɔdemɔsi wɛɛ na‑a a sɔ wan Chosɛfi fɛ. Nikɔdemɔsi chɛ, an na‑a ta a saa a Chisɔsi tena su ɔ. A ta‑a wan buii a a boo ɔ, min kunyɛ a ni di kaka, su chɛ ko a. An buii chɛ nyandenɛ ni fen fea an na, an ni fenɛ miin chee, an dɔ, maa, ni adosi. Ni mɔ na‑a an buii chɛ sa sechee a, a dɛnɛ ni paun bi wɔnfea kun ma duu ya wan.
43019040	Mbɛ mɔ kaima fea chɛ n‑na Chisɔsi su ya. Mbɛ an‑na fen gbɛ mendemende su chɛ a, an mbe ta‑a buii kunyɛ a diama chɛ yuyu‑a pien a ma. Chu mɔɛ n ni su ma bɛn ka wan, an mbe e na to a sa‑a kamba ɔ.
43019041	An na‑a Chisɔsi gbangban ka kaina min kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a fa‑a, yadi ni wan nɔ baima. An yadi chɛ ɔ, fanɛ nama ni wan nɔ, an nii ma mɔ su sa nin bɛ min dɔ a kɔma a.
43019042	Mɔ fea chɛ n na‑a Chisɔsi su sa an dɔ, a tɔn kamba a, a mu min na, an ni an baima. A sin to, an tee chɛ bea ma, a ni Chu n 'na suin tee kuu sɔɛ an na.
43020001	Sau sau ma, Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ ma, kaina a findenɛ ni wɛ tima min na, Mɛi min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ, a ta‑a Chisɔsi kamba chɛ tena. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ senɛ min bundenɛ ni an fan chɛ da a, a su chɛ sa‑a ka kaina, mbɛ an senɛ chɛ ee to nɔ bun dɔ.
43020002	Mbɛ a‑a bui sa a a Saimɔn Pita tena, an fea a bɔɛ fɛ denɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ a, min ko a ni di ka gbeden Chisɔsi ye. Mbɛ an Mɛi chɛ‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ n‑na mmɔ 'a mansa su bɔ kamba ɔ, a sin, nn ma a ɔ sɔn an taen mu a a kaina min.”
43020003	Mbɛ Pita an fea a bɔɛ chɛ a, an ta‑a a kamba chɛ tena.
43020004	An fea chɛ ni ta tena bui chɛ an na. Chɛɛ Pita bɔɛ chɛ na‑a a bui wan a kɔ gbɛaen ba a, min‑na a ma, a pɛn‑na a fo nɔ.
43020005	Mbɛ a‑a a ma bun, a‑a a ya ma sa fan chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a fen gbɛ chɛ yen nɔ sa ɔ. Chɛɛ a nii ma don ni nɔ su sa fan chɛ a.
43020006	Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita wɛɛ na‑a gbɛ a gbaa chia a. Chɛɛ a tana, a don‑da wan dɔndɔ gbe an fanɛ gbu a. Mbɛ a wɛɛ‑a fen gbɛ chɛ yen nɔ sa ɔ.
43020007	A sin‑na koa chɛ wɛɛ yen fan to, min na‑a mɔndɔ mɔndɔ Chisɔsi kunɛ a. A nɛnɛ sin, a ɔ nii ma basan ni fen gbɛ tɔɛ chɛ a, chɛɛ a ni sa ɔ dɔi a ta kun ma a a.
43020008	Mbɛ fɛ denɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ, min pɛn na‑a che ka kamba chɛ ma, a wɛɛ don‑da nɔ. A don‑da kɛn nɔ, a‑a koa chɛ n yen nɔ sa ɔ, mbɛ a dan‑da a a, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.
43020009	Chɛɛ a tima chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a gboo na‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ, mbɛ ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ, an nii ma a ɔ gbɛ nin bɛ.
43020010	Mbɛ a fɛ den fea chɛ n yɛ‑a an baa chenɛ a.
43020011	Chɛɛ Mɛi tana, a sɔ‑a wan nɔ kamba chɛ baima, ɛ di chɛ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a ma bun, a‑a a ya ma sa kamba chɛ a.
43020012	Mbɛ a‑a maeka fea an yen nɔ, an ma bɛndenɛ ɛ koa gbɛ ɔ, an mbe si ɔ kaina chɛ, Chisɔsi su chɛ ni sa ɔ kaina min. Dɔndɔɛ ni si ɔ a sa tena chɛ kun kandɔɛ wan, dɔndɔɛ sin ni a chen den kɔɔɛ tena wan.
43020013	Mbɛ an‑na tisa chɛ, an dɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, fen mu e di chɛ‑a?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “An‑na n 'na mansa su ya, an ta‑a a a. A sin, n ma a ɔ sɔn, an‑na a sa kaina min.”
43020014	Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun, mbɛ a‑a kaminɛ yen sɔ ɔ nɔ. Chisɔsi an nii nɛ, chɛɛ Mɛi nii ma a ɔ sɔn ni, mbɛ an nɛ.
43020015	Mbɛ Chisɔsi gbu ɔ, “Bɔɔɛ, fen mu e di chɛ‑a? A yɛ to, e i ya a kan tena nyɔn na?” A ni Mɛi yii ma, mbɛ yadi gbu kun ma fɛn mɔɛ an nɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a ɔ, “Kai, ni i wan ta‑a a su a, a ɔ yian n na, i‑a a sa kaina min. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, n ni ta a bi, mbɛ n yɛ‑a a a nɛ.”
43020016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a chee a tɔɛ ma, a ɔ, “Mɛi.” Mbɛ Mɛi‑a a kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ a tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Ticha.”
43020017	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Sɛmbɛ n bia koe a, a mu min na, n ma sɛ nin bɛ banda bu ɔ Fa tena. Chɛɛ ta n fɛ denɛ n tena, mbɛ i‑a a ɔ yian an na, mbɛ n mbe yɛ tena Fa tena, min mu wo wɛɛ fa a. A yɛ to, n 'na Yataa mu a a, wo wɛɛ 'a Yataa mu a a.”
43020018	Mbɛ Mɛi, min ka‑a Makadaa duu ɔ, a yɛ‑a Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n tena. A‑a a ɔ yian an na, mbɛ a‑a Mansa Chisɔsi yen. A yɛ‑a to, Chisɔsi na‑a min gbɛɛ fɔ a ye, a‑a a ɔ yian an na gbae.
43020019	A Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ chɛ ma, tee bea ma ni gbɛ nyɔ dɛɛ. A sin, Chisɔsi fɛ den chɛ n na‑a an nyɔn na kan fan chenɛ a, mbɛ an‑na a da a tɔn, an chiandenɛ ɛ Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma. Mbɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a a a, a sɔ‑a an tɛtɛ ma. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Yataa ni faachima be wo ma.”
43020020	Chɛ fɔenɛ gbakɔ a boo ɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a boo n yian an na, a basan a kaa a fɛ chɛ a. An na‑a an 'na mansa yenɛ min chɛ ka, a na‑a a fɛ den chɛ n bu ɔ dia‑a wan gbeden.
43020021	Mbɛ a ɔ to an ma, a ɔ, “Yataa ni faachima be wo ma. Fa‑a n na na buɛ min dɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, n bɛɛ, a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, n mbe wo a ta tena a ɔ.”
43020022	Mbɛ a‑a a fia fu an ma fuu, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ni ma wo fɛ.
43020023	Ni wo‑a wo boo bɔ mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n dɔ, an bɔ‑a an dɔ. Chɛɛ ni wo ma wo boo bɔ ni an dɔ, an mbe ee bɔ‑a an ko yama chɛ n dɔ.”
43020024	Tɔmɔsi, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Fɛn Kai, fɛ den tan kun ma fea chɛ n dɔndɔ ni a a. Chɛɛ a nii a bɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, Chisɔsi na‑a a wandi yian ka tima min na.
43020025	Chɛ ko a, Tɔmɔsi bɔɛ chɛ n‑na a ɔ yian fan a a, an dɔ, “Nn‑na mmɔ 'a mansa yen.” Chɛɛ a ɔ te an ma, a ɔ, “N mbe ee dan chɛ a. Mɔɔ ni n‑na a yen, n ni dɔntima paa chɛ n yen a boo kana n ma, n boo denɛ gbu ni tu an na, mbɛ n tu‑a a kaa a fɛ a.”
43020026	Wichi dɔndɔ bendenɛ gbakɔ, an na sɔn‑da wan to kaina dɔndɔ chenɛ a, mbɛ an‑na a da a tɔn. Tɔmɔsi chɛ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ an tɛ ɔ a tima chɛ nɛnɛ kɔɔ. Chen chɛ a tɔndenɛ ni wɛɛ ka, chɛɛ Chisɔsi bɔ‑a wan to, a sɔ‑a an tɛtɛ ma. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a ɔ, “Yataa ni faachima be wo ma.”
43020027	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ Tɔmɔsi gbu ma, a ɔ, “N boo kana n ma fɛn, i ni i boo din nɛ paa chɛ n dɔ. A yɛ to, i boo a na, i ni a din nɛ n kaa fɛ chɛ. Kɔɔsa bia chɛ gbɛɛ ni ban gbɛ i boo ɔ, i kai fa gbɛ n na.”
43020028	Mbɛ a wan Tɔmɔsi ɔ gbɛ, a ɔ, “I wan mu n 'na mansa a, i wan mu n 'na Yataa a.”
43020029	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “I‑a n yenɛ min chɛ, an‑na a ma dechee, i‑a i kai fa n na. Dua ni ma mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma n yen ni, chɛɛ an‑na an kai fa‑a n na.”
43020030	Chisɔsi na‑a kamaya koe dɔ mende ma wan sɛsɛ, a fɛ den chɛ n ya kɔɔɛ ma. Chɛɛ an koe chɛ nɛnɛ nu, an ma nyɛn ni gboo chɛ ɔ.
43020031	Chɛɛ miin nyɛndenɛ ɛ ka gboo chɛ ɔ, an nyɛn‑da, min mbe a ma, wo ni wo kai fa Chisɔsi a, mbɛ a wan mu kunka mansa a. A yɛ to, mbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ mu a a, a sin, ni wo‑a wo kai fa a a, wo e kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
43021001	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chisɔsi‑a a wandi yian fan to a fɛ denɛ n na, Tibɛyasi yii wa fɛ. A sin na‑a chɛ ka wan a ɔ.
43021002	A fɛ den chɛ n fan ni nɔ. Saimɔn Pita, ni Tɔmɔsi, an ni min chee, Fɛn Kai, ni Natanɛɛ, min na‑a ka Kana, Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a basan kai Sɛbɛdi 'a denɛ kaima n na. Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ fea dɔ mende n ni wan to nɔ.
43021003	Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita koɔ‑a a bɔɛ n tena, a ɔ, “N mbe ta‑a nyɛ gbain tena.” Mbɛ a bɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ɔ, “Mmɔ bɛ an mbe ta tena, nyɛ gbain tena chɛ.” Mbɛ an gbɛɛ chɛ‑a dɛndɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, an ta‑a. Chɛɛ a su chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an ma nyɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ bia ni.
43021004	Banda ɔ ka‑a chinɛn, mbɛ Chisɔsi sɔ‑a an yii chɛ tindi ma. Chɛɛ a fɛ den chɛ n nii ma a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a wan mu.
43021005	Mbɛ a‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “N bɔ nu, wo ma fen kɔ fen bia nin bɛ?” Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn ma nyɛ dɔndɔ gbe bia nin bɛ.”
43021006	Mbɛ a ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo wo 'a nyɛ gbain yaa a dɛ wo boo nyima ɔ, dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, wo e nyɛ dɔ bia‑a wan.” Mbɛ an‑na an 'na yaa a dɛ nɔ, a sin, nyɛ n chɛ‑a wan a ɔ. An nii ma che ni a sawan‑da, a sɛ dɛndɛ gbu ɔ, koe min na mu, nyɛ n faen fan ni a a gban.
43021007	Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ, min ko a ni di ka a ye gbeden, a‑a a fɔ Pita ye, a ɔ, “Mansa Chisɔsi an mbe ka sɔ ɔ tindi ma.” Pita‑a chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ an 'na mansa an nɛ, mbɛ a na‑a a 'a doma min bɔ ka, ɛ nyɛ gbain chɛ‑a, mbɛ a‑a a chii fɔin a bu tɛ, mbɛ a dɛ‑a yii chɛ ɔ.
43021008	A bɔɛ fɛ denɛ tɔɛ chɛ n to‑a wan dɛndɛ gbu ɔ, aan an na‑a tindi ma, an mbe yaa chɛ sawan‑da, min na faenɛ ni ka nyɛ n na. Tindi chɛ ma ɔ nii ma yansan an na. An tɛɛ ni ma wan yadi chɛmɛ dɔndɔ nyɔn na.
43021009	An che‑a kɛn tindi ma, an bɔ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na ta a dɛndenɛ tan nɔ, nyɛ kua ɛ gbaa sa ɔ ta chɛ a. An na‑a biidi wɛɛ yen fan nɔ si ɔ.
43021010	Mbɛ Chisɔsi a ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo na nyɛ dɔ a, wo‑a miin bia ka sanche.”
43021011	Mbɛ Saimɔn Pita sɛ‑a, mbɛ an‑na yaa gbu sawan, an na‑a a a tindi ma, nyɛ gboso gboso n faenɛ a. An taen fan ni nyɛ chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, nyɛ bi duu n kun ma sawa. Nyɛ chɛ n kɔ ni koo wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ yaa chɛ a nii ma panda ni ɛnden bɛɛ a.
43021012	Mbɛ Chisɔsi a ɔ an ma, a ɔ, “Wo na, wo ni daunɛ chɛ.” A fɛ den chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma a faa sɔ ni tisa chɛ koe a, a ni a fɔ Chisɔsi ma, a ɔ, “Nyɔn mu i a?” An na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi an nii nɛ.
43021013	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a a boo a ta, a‑a biidi chɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a a be an ma. A‑a chɛ an ma nyɛ chɛ wɛɛ a, min ni ta chɛ a.
43021014	Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔenɛ gbakɔ a ka saya ɔ, a gba sawan bɔɛ an nii nɛ, ɛ a wandi yian‑da a fɛ denɛ n na.
43021015	An ban‑da kɛn daunɛ chɛ‑a, mbɛ Chisɔsi koɔ‑a Saimɔn Pita tena, a ɔ, “Kai Chɔn 'na denɛ Saimɔn, n ko a di wan i ye, i ni ben i bɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma?” Mbɛ Saimɔn dɔ, “Aa mansa, i‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, i ko a di buɛ min dɔ n ye.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “Mbɛ n fɛ mɔɛ n kun ma fɛn, yɔ an mbe sa denɛ n kun ma fɛn buɛ min dɔ.”
43021016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi‑a Saimɔn Pita ɔ tisa to, a gba fean bɔɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Kai Chɔn 'na denɛ Saimɔn, n ko a di wan i ye?” Mbɛ Saimɔn dɔ te to, a ɔ, “Aa mansa, i‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, i ko a di buɛ min dɔ n ye.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ a ma, a ɔ, “N fɛ mɔɛ n kun ma fɛn, yɔ an mbe sa n kun ma fɛn buɛ min dɔ.”
43021017	A gba sawan bɔɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Kai Chɔn 'na denɛ Saimɔn, n ko a di wan i ye?” Chɛ nɛnɛ ɔ, Pita faa yɔn‑da wan, Chisɔsi ni sɔ ɔ tisa min chɛ‑a a a, ni a ko a di wan a ye. Chɛ ko a, mbɛ a ɔ, “Mansa, i‑a ko ɔ ko ɔ sɔn fan. I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, i ko a di buɛ min dɔ n ye.” Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “N fɛ mɔɛ n kun ma fɛn, yɔ an mbe sa n kun ma fɛn buɛ min dɔ.”
43021018	A ɔ te to, “Ka n mbe chɛ ma din i tena, mbɛ i ni tima min na i tɔngbɔ tɔɛ a, i ni i ma bɛn fan, mbɛ i ta‑a i faa ma kaina nu, mbɛ i‑a i faa ma koe n ma. Chɛɛ tima min na e chenancha‑a, e i boo ɔ sawan‑da wan, mbɛ an‑na i chii fɔin. Mbɛ an ta‑a i a kaina, i ma to ni i ni ta kaina min.”
43021019	Chisɔsi da a bai chɛ, a ni ka a ɔ yian fan na, mbɛ Pita ni na tena fa‑a ka wan. A sin, a 'a saya chɛ ɛ na‑a wan a ma‑a mɔɛ n ni Yataa 'a kamaya ɔ yen. Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ gbɛ a ma, a ɔ, “A a tun ma koe n fɛ denɛ a.”
43021020	Mbɛ Pita‑a a ya a mun, mbɛ a‑a a bɔɛ chɛ yen na‑a gbaa a, a bɔɛ min ko a di ka an 'na mansa ye gbeden. A bɔɛ chɛ, an ni min dɔ daun chɛ tena yɛɛ ma tee a, an na‑a a da a ta Chisɔsi too baima, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Mansa, nyɔn gbu sin mbe na tena i ma tachɛ‑a, i chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ n ma?”
43021021	Mbɛ Pita‑a a yen kɛn, mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Mansa, an mbe n bɔɛ chɛ nan sin bia ka ma?”
43021022	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “Pita, i ta kuu? A ya mbɛ n gbu n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, a fɔɛ ni to a sun da a, aan n ni yɛ to dunya chɛ ɔ. A a tun dechee ma koe a n fɛ denɛ a.”
43021023	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, bai fasan‑da a ɔ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, mbɛ a fɛ den chɛ nɛnɛ ee fa‑a to. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi nii ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ a gbu ee fa‑a. A na‑a a fɔ wan dechee, a ɔ, “Pita, i ta kuu? A ya mbɛ n gbu n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, a fɔɛ ɛ to‑a wan a sun da a, aan n ni yɛ to dunya chɛ ɔ.”
43021024	N fan mu an fɛ den chɛ a, n fan‑na koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yen, mbɛ n‑na an nyɛn nɛ n 'na gboo chɛ ɔ. A sin, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n‑na miin gbɛɛ fɔ, mbɛ tea bai nu mu an na.
43021025	Chisɔsi na‑a ko sɛsɛ dɔ mende n ma wan. Chɛɛ an koe chɛ n gbɛɛ nii ma nyɛn ni dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Ni an na‑a an gbɛɛ nyɛn, n mbe a ya tena, mbɛ dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ kaina nii a kun‑da an gboo chɛ n gbɛɛ sa tena ko a.
44001001	Kai Tɛyɔfidɔsi, N‑na a nyɛn fan n 'na gboo saa saa ɔ, Chisɔsi‑a miin gbɛɛ ma, ni a na‑a kanɛ min gbɛɛ chɛ. A ka a 'a wai kuu sɔɛ tee saa ma,
44001002	aan a sɔ tee chɛ a, Yataa‑a a wan Chisɔsi ya min ma, a sɛ banda bu ɔ. A e na to ya‑a, a sɛ banda bu ɔ, a 'a sɔ mɔɛ nu, a na‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, a koɔ‑a pɛn an tena, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ.
44001003	A ka Chisɔsi fa tee ma, aan tee bi naanin tɛ, chia sɛsɛ a, a‑a a wandi yian fan a 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na, tima sɛsɛ ko a. Chɛ ni a ma, an ni dan a a, mbɛ a ɛ wan to fɔɛ ɔ. A‑a a ma wan, mbɛ an‑na a ma gbɛ gbadan, a sin to, an‑na chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ wan, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma.
44001004	An bɛ ni wan tima dɔndɔ a daun chɛ tena, mbɛ a‑a dasi be an ma, a ɔ, “Wo ma bɔ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, chɛɛ wo fen chɛ ma kɔn, Fa Yataa‑a wo too ɔ dia min be koe a wo ma. N na‑a a wakoe ɔ yian fan wo a,
44001005	mbɛ Chɔn ni yii an chɛ wo kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Chɛɛ tee kuunden tɛ ɔ, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, a Nyina ni bea wo fɛ.”
44001006	Mbɛ an na kan‑da kɛn kaina dɔndɔɛ, an‑na Chisɔsi ɔ tisa, an dɔ te, “Mansa, tima gbu an che‑a ka gbɛ i boo ɔ, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na mansaya a yɛ koe a to an ma?”
44001007	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ te, “Fa Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an mbe kun a ni a ɔ bɛn, ni an koe chɛ n mbe ma tima miin na. A sin, wo ta ɔ ma chɛ a, a ɔ sɔn koe a, ni an mbe ma tena tima miin na.
44001008	Chɛɛ wo e gbasaya ma sɔn‑da wan, ni Yataa Nyina chɛ bea‑a wo fɛ. A tima chɛ a, wo e a ɔ yian‑da wan mɔɛ n na, wo‑a min dɔ sɔn, a si n ma. Wo e a ɔ yian‑da wan mɔɛ n na Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, wo ni a ɔ yian Chudia chɛnyɛ tɔɛ gbu gbɛɛ ɔ, ni Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a che kan kɔ kan dunya gbɛɛ ɔ.”
44001009	Chɛ fɔenɛ gbakɔ, a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n ya to‑a wan a a, aan a ya‑a a sɛ banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ a don‑da dingbii ɔ, a tuin‑da an ya a.
44001010	An ya a sien fan ni tun banda chɛ a, a taen chɛ gbakɔ. Mbɛ a yen ko, mɔ kaima fea n mbe sɔ ɔ an baima, an ma chiienɛ ɛ doma gbɛ wa ɔ.
44001011	Mbɛ mɔ fea chɛ n dɔ, “Kadidi mɔɛ nu, fen mu wo e sɔ ɔ banda a fɛn‑da tidan? Chisɔsi chɛ, Yataa sɛ‑a ka min na banda bu ɔ, ɛ na‑a wan to mɔya chɛ ɔ, yɔ wo‑a a yen ka buɛ min dɔ sɛ‑a banda bu ɔ.”
44001012	Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ni Wodifi kɔnkɔɛ ɔ wan, min nii ma che ni mai dɔndɔ tachɛ ɔ a ta Chuusaɛn duu wa chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn gbu.
44001013	Mbɛ an don‑da kɛn duu gbu bu ɔ, an na sɔn‑da wan banda a chen dɔndɔ dumu ɔ, an yia ni min na nɔ banda a. Pita ni wan nɔ, an fea Chɔn na, ni Chimisi an fea Anduu a. Fiipi wɛɛ, an fea Tɔmɔsi a, ni Batɔɔmiu an fea Matiu a. A yɛ to, Chimisi dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, kai Afiɔsi 'a denɛ ni wan nɔ, ni Saimɔn min ni a 'a chɛnyɛ ma chɛɛ chɛ tena, ni Chudasi dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, kai Chimisi 'a denɛ.
44001014	An gbɛɛ ni wan kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, samunɛ chɛ koe a tima ɔ tima ko a. An bɛ an ni ma musu chɛ n na, miin na‑a ta Chisɔsi san‑da. Chisɔsi de Mɛi wɛɛ, a ni ma wan nɔ, ni Chisɔsi suun ma nyɔɛ kaima nu.
44001015	Tee kuunden gbakɔ, mɔɛ miin‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an bɛn‑da wan kaina dɔndɔ. An danɛ taen fan ni mɔ chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, ni mɔ bi fea ɔ. Mbɛ Pita‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, koɔ koe a an tena.
44001016	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, a ni che wan a ni bɔ a a. Suun, Yataa Nyina‑a a ma wan, Mansa Defidi‑a koe chɛ kɔɔ fɔ, a si Chudasi ma, min ni na tena ma‑a. Chudasi chɛ ni mmɔ bɔɛ an na. Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi na‑a a boo sɔ wan a ma, wai chɛ chɛ koe a, mmɔ ɛ ka min na. A wan sɔ‑a mɔɛ n ya ɔ, miin ta‑a Chisɔsi bia.
44001018	“Chudasi‑a Chisɔsi ma tachɛ kɛn dechee, a‑a an kɔpɔɛ an ya, a 'a ko yama ma kɔpɔɛ chɛ, mbɛ a‑a nangbanɛ san a a. Chɛɛ a bea‑a wan duu ma an nangban chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a bu te‑a pu, a nunɛ gbɛɛ bɔ‑a ya a ma.
44001019	Mmɔ wɛn gbɛɛ sin ni nɛ Chuusaɛn, mmɔ‑a an koe chɛ a min fan. Chɛ an‑na a ma, an‑na an nangban chɛ chee, an dɔ, wii bɔn‑da nangbanɛ min dɔ.”
44001020	Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu gboo chɛ ɔ, Yataa tando si gboo chɛ, mbɛ, ‘A 'a chenɛ n ni te, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma ma nɔ.’ A sin to, a ɔ, ‘A ni min chɛ tee, mɔ dɔ mende ni a chɛ.’
44001021	“Chɛ an fɛ mu, ɛ nyan fan mmɔ ni mɔ dɔndɔ sa mmɔ kaa a, min mbe ma sii a, mbɛ tea mu Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ koe a, a ka saya ɔ. A mɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma mɔɛ an na, mmɔ bɛ ni tee min na tima gbɛɛ a, mmɔ bɛ ben ben‑da min kɔɔ Mansa Chisɔsi a. A ka tima chɛ ma, Chɔn na‑a yii chɛ tima min na Chisɔsi kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. Aan a che tee chɛ ma, Chisɔsi ya‑a tee min na mmɔ tɛ ɔ, a sɛ banda bu ɔ.”
44001023	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na mɔ fea yian, an tɛ ɔ. An‑na Chosɛfi yian, an ni min chee, an dɔ Basabasi, (a tɔ ni to Chɔsitɔsi), ni mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ, Matiyasi.
44001024	Mbɛ an‑na samunɛ chɛ, an dɔ te, “Mansa Yataa, i wan‑na mɔ gbu gbɛɛ yii ma koe ɔ sɔn. Chɛ ko a, Fa, mɔ fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, a ɔ yian nn na, ni i‑a i boo sɔ min ma,
44001025	i 'a sɔ mɔya wai chɛ chɛ koe a. Chudasi‑a a to gbɛ, ta koe a pan, a bɛnden mu kaina.”
44001026	Mbɛ an‑na chɛ fenɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, an ni a ɔ sɔn, ni an mbe nyɔn ya an mɔ fea chɛ tɛ ɔ. Matiyasi tɔɛ an bɛn‑da chɛ fenɛ ma, a sin sa‑a wan Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔ tan kun ma dɔndɔɛ chɛ n kaa a.
44002001	Tee chɛ che‑a kɛn, an ni min chee an dɔ Pɛndekɔsi, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, an na kanden fan ni Chuusaɛn kaina dɔndɔɛ.
44002002	A ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ a min fan banda a, yɔ fia ɛ ma bɔ‑a. An sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ kuiɛ chɛ, a‑a chenɛ gbu gbɛɛ ya wan, an ni ka kaina.
44002003	Mbɛ an‑na fenɛ n yen yɔ ta man mɛsɛ nu, an fasandenɛ ɛ a ɔ. Mbɛ an fɛn gbɛɛ ni ka nɔ, an fen chɛ n tu‑a wan an na dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
44002004	Yataa Nyina ni wan gbɛ an gbɛɛ fɛ gban, mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ koɔ‑a chɛnyɛ koɛ dɔ mende n dɔ. Yataa Nyina chɛ an ni gbasaya chɛ be an ma, an bai chɛ n sa koe a.
44002005	A tima chɛ a, Chu mɔɛ n sɛsɛ, a ka chɛnyɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ dunya ɔ, an ni wan Chuusaɛn. An ni mɔɛ n fan na, miin ni kooya be Yataa ma.
44002006	An‑na sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ a min kɛn, mɔ fanka wa chɛ a kan‑da wan. An sin, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan gbechee. Koe min na mu, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mɔɛ miin kai faen ni ka Chisɔsi a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a a min fan, an mbe an nyɔn ta chɛnyɛ koɛ fɔ‑a.
44002007	Chɛ ma‑a wan kamaya koe a mɔɛ chɛ n tena, mbɛ an kɔndɔ fii‑a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Fen ko e nɛ? Mmɔ ɛ ka mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ koɔ kuiɛ a min tena, Kadidi mɔɛ n fan nɛ.
44002008	Chɛɛ fen ko a mu gbɛ, mmɔ gbɛɛ ɛ an da a kuiɛ ɔ gbɛ‑a, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a mmɔ ta chɛnyɛ koɛ n dɔ?
44002009	Mmɔ ka‑a chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ n fan dɔ. Dɔ n ka‑a Patia, dɔ nu Media, dɔ n sin Ɛdan. Dɔ n ka‑a to Mɛsɔpotemia, dɔ nu Chudia, mbɛ dɔ n ka‑a Kapadosia. Dɔ n bɛɛ ka‑a Pɔndɔsi, an fea Esia a.
44002010	Dɔ n ka‑a wan Fichiya, ni Panfidia. An ka‑a Ichipi, a basan Dibia tanda ɔ a, min mbe Sayini duu kɔ. Mmɔ dɔ n sin ka‑a Domi duu ɔ wan,
44002011	Chu mɔɛ tiki tiki nu, ni chɛ nu miin dɔn‑da bea koe a, Chu n 'na Yataa fai chia fɛ. Mbɛ mmɔ dɔ n sin ka‑a Keti wan, ni Adebia chɛnyɛ n dɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ a a min tena wan an mbe koɔ‑a mmɔ ta chɛnyɛ koɛ n dɔ, a si Yataa 'a wai wa n ma.”
44002012	An gbɛɛ kɔndɔ fiienɛ ni, a ɔ benden ba a. An‑na an nyɔn dɔ tisa wan tɔfɛ tɔfɛ, an dɔ te, “Chɛ e na ma ka gbɛ fen na?”
44002013	Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n‑na an ma yɛn fan, an dɔ, “N bɔ ka n ye, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ gbɛ tɔɛ mu.”
44002014	Mbɛ Pita sɔ‑a wan, an bɛ a bɔ tan kun ma dɔndɔɛ chɛ n na. Mbɛ a koɔ‑a mɔ fanka wa chɛ tena, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ ɛ, a ɔ, “N bɔ Chu mɔɛ nu, ni wo gbɛɛ, wo wɛn mbe nɛ Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ, wo wo too ma sɔ n ma. A sin, n mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan wo a, koe min ma‑a ka.
44002015	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛ tɔ ma, yɔ wo‑a wo yii na chii buɛ min dɔ an na. Koe min na mu, banda ɔ ka tima ɔ ma yansan bɛ.
44002016	Chɛɛ koe min ma‑a ka, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Chowɛ‑a bai sa wan tee, a si an ma, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ,
44002017	‘Yataa ɔ te, “N mbe koe chɛ an ma‑a, tee dankama chɛ n kɔɔ, dunya e na to ban‑da.” A ɔ, “N mbe a ma‑a wan n Nyina ni bea mɔ ɔ mɔ fɛ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan wo 'a denɛ kaima nu, an bɛ a musuma n na, an ni n 'na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na. Wo 'a kamin tɔngbɔɛ n mbe kamaya koe n dɔ yen‑da wan, wo 'a chenan kai n bɛɛ, an mbe cho‑a wan cho n na.
44002018	Tea gbu a, ni dunya ma‑a ban‑da tima min na, n mbe a ma‑a wan, n Nyina ni bea n 'na yɔnɛ n bɛɛ fɛ, a kaima n bɛ a musuma n na, an sin mbe n 'na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da wan mɔɛ n na.
44002019	N mbe kamaya koe n ma‑a wan banda a, mbɛ n‑na tɔmɔsi n yian dunya ma. Wo e wii yen‑da wan, ni ta, a basan sisi sɛmbɛndenɛ a.
44002020	Tee ɛ mun‑da wan pimbi a, mbɛ kau wɛɛ yawa‑a, yɔ wii, tee chɛ e na che, Mansa Yataa na tee. Tee wa chɛ, ko chenama n dɔ yen tee chɛ.
44002021	A sin tima chɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn mbe Mansa Yataa chee‑a, basan koe a i ma, e bauncha ma sɔn‑da wan.” ’ ”
44002022	Mbɛ Pita ɔ te to, “N bɔɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, wo wo too ma sɔ bai chɛ n ma, n mbe na tena miin fɔ‑a wo ye. Chisɔsi chɛ, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, a mu Yataa wandi 'a sɔ mɔɛ an na. Kamaya koe nu, a ni miin ma, a ni tɔmɔsi miin yian, kɔndɔ fii koe nu, an fan ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya an mbe a ɔ. Wo wandi gbu, wo e siiya bɔ wan an koe chɛ n ma. Koe min na mu, an gbɛɛ ma‑a nɛ wan wo ya kɔɔɛ ma.
44002023	Chɛ e na to ma‑a, Yataa wandi gbu na‑a a ɔ bɛn fan gbae a faa gbɛɛ a, mbɛ tima ɛ che‑a wan Chisɔsi ni be wo ma. A sin, wo e a ma‑a wan, mɔɛ miin mbe ee don Yataa 'a sawa kɔɔ, an ni a gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a ni fa nɔ.
44002024	Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a bɔ wan saya 'a mɔnɛ boo ɔ, a‑a a ma, Chisɔsi chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Koe min na mu, saya nii che gbasaya din‑da a ma ɛnden bɛɛ a.
44002025	Koe min na mu, Mansa Defidi wandi gbu na‑a chɛ an fɔ, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma, a ɔ, ‘N mbe Mansa Yataa yen fan sɔ ɔ n ya kɔɔ, tima ɔ tima ko a. Ɛ n baima, chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n ma n gbɔsɔ ni.
44002026	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, n bu ɔ dia‑a, a sin, n mbe a tando wan buɔdia ɔ. Mbɛ n fan, n mu wɛɛ mɔ gbu a, min danka mu saya a, n yii na tɛen fan mu Yataa ma.
44002027	Koe min na mu, i wan Yataa ee n to‑a saya a boo ma. E ee dɔn‑da i 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn‑na n fandi be i ma, n su ni tui kamba ɔ.
44002028	I‑a chia sa n ye, n mbe a sɔ min fɛ, n ni fɔɛ ma sɔn, I sin, e n fɛ, n bu ɔ dia‑a a ɔ benden ba a.’ ”
44002029	Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “N 'na mɔɛ nu, n mbe na tena ka tea bai an fɔ‑a wo ye, a si mmɔ bemba n ta bemba ma, Mansa Defidi. A fa‑a wan, mbɛ a tɔn‑da. A sin, a kamba ɛ wɛ nɛ sanche sa ɔ mmɔ tɛ ɔ.
44002030	Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ ni a a, a sin na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, Yataa na‑a tooɔdia min chɛ a a. Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia wan gbau gbau, mbɛ a wan Defidi gbu cheeya dɔndɔ, ɛ a ma‑a wan mansa chenama a, yɔ Defidi wandi gbu ni buɛ min dɔ.
44002031	Mansa Defidi na‑a a ɔ yen fan, Yataa ni na tena koe min ma‑a ya ɔ ma. Chɛ sin ko a, a wan Defidi‑a bai sa wan, a si kunka mansa chɛ kɔɔ sɔ koe ma saya ɔ. Mansa Defidi‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ Yataa nii ma Chasi to ni saya a boo ma, a sin ma a ma ni Chasi su ni tui kamba ɔ.
44002032	Chisɔsi wandi gbu ni, Yataa‑a min na sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Nn gbɛɛ sin mu wan sii n na chɛ ko a.
44002033	Yataa‑a Chisɔsi a sɔ, a sɛ banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ Yataa‑a a ma, Chisɔsi ɛ si ɔ kaina ma bɛndenɛ, Yataa boo nyima ɔ. A fa Yataa‑a a Nyina be wan Chisɔsi ma, a na‑a a too ɔ dia tee min be koe a. A sin, Chisɔsi wandi‑a a ma wan, Yataa Nyina bea‑a nn fɛ. Wo e ka gbɛ an dɔ yen tena, wo e a a min tena.
44002034	Koe min na mu, Mansa Defidi wandi gbu nii ma sɛ ni banda bu ɔ, chɛɛ a na‑a a fɔ wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Mansa‑a a fɔ wan n 'na Mansa ye, a ɔ, “Si nɛ n boo nyima ɔ,
44002035	aan n ni i chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n don i kɔɔ, n ni an popoya i ya kɔɔ.” ’ ”
44002036	Mbɛ Pita a ɔ te gbɛ, “Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo gbɛɛ, wo wɛn mbe ka Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, wo ni chɛ ɔ sɔn. Mbɛ tea gbu ko a, Chisɔsi chɛ, wo‑a min gbangban ka kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, Yataa wandi‑a an ma ka kunka mansa a, wo baun mɔɛ.”
44002037	Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an faa mɔnɛ‑a wan. An sin‑na a fɔ wan Pita ye, an bɛ a bɔɛ sɔ mɔɛ n na, an dɔ, “Nn 'na mɔɛ nu, nn mbe fen ma gbɛ?”
44002038	Mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ wo wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na, mbɛ nn‑na yii chɛ wo kunɛ ɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, a Nyina ni bea wo fɛ.
44002039	Koe min na mu, Yataa na‑a wo too ɔ dia koe chɛ n fan na, wo bɛ wo 'a denɛ n na, a basan chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin baa ɔ yansan nɛ a. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, mmɔ 'a mansa Yataa‑a miin chee, na koe a a tena.”
44002040	Pita koɔ‑a wan an tena tima ɔ yansama ko a, mbɛ a‑a an na si, a ɔ, “Yataa ɛ na tena wan mɔ bonda chɛ sima n na mɔnɛ‑a, miin yau ka yama yama. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ni wo tanka an mɔnɛ chɛ ma.”
44002041	Mɔ sɛsɛ dan‑da wan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, a na‑a min sa ka. An sin‑na yii chɛ wan an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. A tee chɛ a, mɔ wu sawa an sa‑a chɛ n ma, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a.
44002042	Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an too ma sɔ wan kanɛ ma, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ni min chɛ, a si Yataa wakoe ma. Kuiɛ a kanɛ ni wan to an gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, a sin, an ni daunɛ chɛ wan kaina dɔndɔɛ tima ɔ tima ko a. An ni bɛn fan to tima ɔ tima ko a, samun chɛ koe a. An‑na an 'na tima gbɛɛ be wan, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma koe a.
44002043	Yataa ni wan a ma‑a, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n mbe kamaya koe sɛsɛ ma, a yɛ to, an ni tɔmɔsi sɛsɛ yian fan. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ da a fa‑a gban, an bakoe a.
44002044	Mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, an ni wan kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ. An boo fenɛ gbɛɛ ni boo fen dɔndɔɛ an na.
44002045	An ni an boo fenɛ n ma tachɛ wan, mbɛ an‑na an kɔpɔɛ chɛ du an nyɔn ma, yɔ an ma gbɔsɔɛ ni buɛ min dɔ.
44002046	Tee ɔ tee a, an ni bɛn fan kaina dɔndɔ Yataa 'a kata ɔ. An sin ni daunɛ chɛ wan an nyɔn tɛ ɔ an 'na chenɛ n na. An ni daun chɛ n chɛ faaɔgbɛ an dɔ, ni buɔdia ɔ,
44002047	an mbe ta‑a Yataa tando‑a. A sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a an yii na chii wan an na, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu an na. Tee ɔ tee sin na, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a an ma munda mɔɛ n na, miin ni gbɛ bauncha chia ma.
44003001	Tee dɔndɔ a, Pita, an fea Chɔn na, an ta‑a wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ tee kɔ kai dɔndɔ ma, min ni Chu n 'na samun chɛ tima a.
44003002	An che‑a kɛn nɔ kata chɛ ɔ, an ta‑a wan don koe a a da dɔndɔɛ a, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Kata Da Nyima. An kata chɛ da a, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ si ɔ. A namaaenɛ ni, a ka a suun tima ma. An ni ta wan an kamin chɛ a tee ɔ tee a kata chɛ da a, fenɛ fuin koe a mɔɛ n ma, miin ni na Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, samun chɛ koe a.
44003003	A‑a Pita yen kɛn don‑da, an fea Chɔn na, a‑a an disa wan, a ɔ, an ni fen den be a ma.
44003004	Mbɛ an‑na an ya sɔ kamin chɛ a paden, mbɛ Pita ɔ, “Nn ma fɛn.”
44003005	Mbɛ a‑a an ma fɛn. A ni wan a yii ma, mbɛ an mbe fen den be tena wan a ma.
44003006	Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Kɔpɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee n boo ɔ, a be koe i ma. Chɛɛ fenɛ min nɛnɛ ɛ n boo ɔ, n mbe a be‑a wan i ma. Chisɔsi Chasi min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, a 'a gbasaya ɔ mu, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye, mbɛ i ni i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni tachɛ chɛ.”
44003007	Mbɛ Pita‑a namaa tɔɛ chɛ ya, a boo nyima ma, mbɛ a basan‑da a ma, a sɔ koe a. A ya kɔɔɛ a, kamin chɛ samaa, an fea a chen kana n na, an dɔ gbɛa gbɛa‑a.
44003008	Mbɛ a tin tin‑da, a sɔ‑a a wandi kun ma a a, mbɛ a bun‑da tachɛ chɛ‑a ben‑da. Mbɛ an bɛ don‑da Pita a, an fea Chɔn n na, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, ɛ ta ta‑a tin tin‑da, ɛ tachɛ‑a, ɛ ta‑a Yataa tando‑a.
44003009	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni ka nɔ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, an‑na kamin chɛ yen fan tachɛ chɛ‑a, ɛ ta ta‑a Yataa tando‑a.
44003010	Mbɛ an‑na a ma gbɛ, mbɛ kamin chɛ an nii nɛ, min ni si ka fen fuin tena Yataa 'a kata chɛ da a, an ni min chee ka, an dɔ, Kata Da Nyima. An gbɛɛ tɛnɛ‑a wan a a, mbɛ an da ɔ gbaa‑a, a si ko bonda chɛ ma, min ma‑a ka kamin chɛ a.
44003011	Kamin chɛ min baun‑da ka, a boo ni wan tun Pita a, an fea Chɔn n na. Mbɛ an che‑a kaina chɛ Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Mansa Sɔɔmon 'na Pɛsa. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a bui sa wan a a an tena, an na fiienɛ ɛ.
44003012	Pita‑a mɔɛ chɛ n yen kɛn an na tindanɛ, a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N bɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, kamin chɛ baun koe ma wo kɔndɔ fii. Wo ma nn ma fɛn ya dɔ mende a. A ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ nn 'na gbasaya ɔ mu, nn‑na chɛ ma. An ma a fɔ ni, nn mbe a ma wan, Yataa faa ni chima kaka, min‑na a ma, nn‑na a ma kamin chɛ‑a tachɛ chɛ.
