44003013	Ebeami ni Yataa min fai, Aisaki ni min fai, Chekɔpi wɛɛ ni min fai, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n bɛɛ n‑na Yataa min fai, an‑na basɔmaya wa chɛ be a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ Chisɔsi ma. Chɛɛ wo to‑a wan nɔ, wo‑a a bia, mbɛ wo‑a a be ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma. Mbɛ wo yɛ‑a, Kɔfana Padeti chen kɔɔ, a ni a yii na chii tena kɛn Chisɔsi chɛ boo ka koe a, wo‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan a wakoe ma.
44003014	A ni tenchen Yataa 'a wai an ko a, a sin, a tanden fan ni Yataa tena. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ban‑da wan a ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a Kɔfana Padeti disa, wo ɔ, a ni a boo ka mɔ fa mɔɛ a wo ye.
44003015	A sin, wo‑a Chisɔsi fa wan, gbasaya ɛ min boo ɔ, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be koe a. Chɛɛ Yataa‑a Chisɔsi gbu kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. Nn sin mbe siiya bɔ tena wan chɛ ma.
44003016	Kaifa chɛ sin Chisɔsi a, an‑na a ma, namaa chɛ baun‑da ka. Wo kamin chɛ ma fɛn, wo gbɛɛ‑a a sɔn fan. Kaifa Chisɔsi a, an‑na a ma ka, kamin chɛ baun‑da fɛsɛ fɛsɛ, yɔ wo gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ yen buɛ min dɔ.
44003017	“N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan gbɛ, mbɛ ko ɔ gbɛ waiya an‑na a ma, wo‑a chɛ ma Chisɔsi a. An‑na a ma, wo 'a ya ɔ sɔɛ n bɛɛ‑a a ma.
44003018	Chɛɛ Yataa wandi na‑a min fɔ suun, an bɔ‑a ka a a. A na‑a a don fan a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ da ɔ, mbɛ a 'a kunka mansa ɛ mɔnɛ ɔ bia‑a wan.
44003019	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na, mbɛ wo‑a wo ya a mun Yataa ma, min mbe a ma, a ni a boo bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ.
44003020	Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, Mansa Yataa ɛ wo faa ma nande‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi a na to wo tena, a na‑a a boo sɔ kunka mansa min ma, na koe a, a ni wo baun.
44003021	Chisɔsi chɛ ɛ to‑a banda bu ɔ wan, aan tima ni che, tima min na Yataa ɛ fen kɔ fen nyan‑da to a nama a. Ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni tenchen a ko a, an‑na a gbonka buɛ min dɔ suun.
44003022	Mosisi wɛɛ na‑a a fɔ wan suun, a ɔ, ‘Wo 'a mansa Yataa, ɛ a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a na‑a wan wo tena, yɔ a‑a n na na buɛ min dɔ, wo tɛ ɔ. A sin mbe ma‑a wo chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ an na. Wo wo too ma sɔ koe gbɛɛ ma, ɛ miin fɔ‑a wo ye.
44003023	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ sin ma an gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ da a kuiɛ a min ni, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ bɔ‑a wan a 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a mɔɛ chɛ kasaa.’ ”
44003024	Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, “A ka Samɛɛ ma, aan a ta, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ na‑a bai sa wan, a si koe chɛ n ma, miin mbe ka bi ma tena sanche.
44003025	Yataa‑a wo too ɔ dia koe miin na, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n da ɔ, an gbɛɛ n mbe wo wan ko a. Yataa‑a dɔbɛnɛ min bɛɛ chɛ, wo bemba n ta bemba n na, a wɛɛ ɛ wo wan ko a. A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ a na‑a a fɔ wan Ebeami ye, a ɔ, ‘I cheeya ɔ mu, n mbe mɔɛ n gbɛɛ dua‑a dunya chɛ ɔ.’
44003026	Yataa‑a a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ Chisɔsi a na kɛn, a‑a a sɔ wo pɛn pɛn tena, wo wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu. Yataa‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a ni wo dua, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a faamagbaa koe n na.”
44004001	Pita ni tun koɔ tena wan, an fea Chɔn na, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a, an‑na an tan. An mɔɛ chɛ n ni Chu n tɛ mɔɛ n fan na Yataa a, ni mɔɛ min ni ka Yataa 'a kata kun ma fɛn poesi n ya ɔ, a basan mɔɛ n na, an ni miin chee, an dɔ Sadusii mɔɛ nu.
44004002	An faa tɛ‑a wan Pita ma, an fea Chɔn na. Koe min na mu, an dɔ, an mbe mɔɛ n kan‑da, a si Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ koe ma, a ka saya ɔ. An dɔ, kan chɛ, ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ tea mu a a, mbɛ Yataa ɛ a ma wan mɔɛ ni a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ.
44004003	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an‑na an bia, mbɛ an‑na an sa pimbi chenɛ a, aan banda ɔ ka‑a. Koe min na mu, an na‑a an bia tee bea ma wan.
44004004	Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin sɛsɛ na‑a Pita 'a sakana bai chɛ a min, a si Chisɔsi ma, an dan‑da wan a a. A sin, mɔ kaima miin gbɛɛ‑a an kai fa gbɛ Chisɔsi a, an danɛ ta‑a wan gbɛ wu duu ɔ.
44004005	Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, Chu n kun ti nu, ni Chu n 'na gbakoo nu, an bɛ Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ n na, an gbɛɛ bɛn‑da Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ.
44004006	An gbɛɛ bɛn‑da wan, an bɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔɛ wa a, Yataa tena. An tɛ mɔ wa chɛ tɔ ni Anasi. Kayafasi wɛɛ, Chɔn, ni Adɛsanda, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n na, miin bɛɛ na‑a bɔ an tɛ mɔ wa dambi chɛ ɔ, an bɛɛ ni wan nɔ, an bɛn dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ɔ.
44004007	An‑na a ma wan Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n sɔ‑a an chen kɔɔ. Mbɛ an‑na an dɔ tisa, an dɔ te, “Wo ma‑a ka ma namaa chɛ‑a tachɛ chɛ? Gbasaya minan dɔ mu, wo‑a ko bonda chɛ ma? Nyɔn 'na gbasaya ɔ mu, wo‑a koe chɛ ma?”
44004008	Yataa Nyina ni wan gbɛ Pita fɛ gban, min‑na a ma, a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Chɛnyɛ gbakoo n bɛ mansa n na, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n kun ma,
44004009	wo e ka nn gbɛmbo tena wan bi, a si ko chɛndɛ ma, min ma‑a namaa chɛ a. Wo e nn dɔ tisa‑a, ni a baun‑da buɛ min dɔ.
44004010	Nn mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan gbɛ wo a, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ ɔ, kamin chɛ ɛ sɔ ɔ nɛ, mɔɛ min 'na gbasaya ɔ. Nasaɛti duu ɔ mɔɛ chɛ mu, Chisɔsi Chasi, wo‑a min gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, mbɛ a fa‑a. Chɛɛ Yataa‑a Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. An Chisɔsi Chasi chɛ 'a gbasaya ɔ mu kamin chɛ, wo e ka min yen tena, a‑a bauncha ma sɔn.
44004011	Chisɔsi chɛ mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a bai sa a si min ma, a ɔ, ‘Wo wan chen sɔ mɔɛ n na‑a ban senɛ min dɔ, wo ɔ, a ma nyin, an gbu ma‑a gbɛ senɛ kuu ba wandi a, chenɛ gbu ko a.’
44004012	Yataa‑a gbasaya be Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe an ma, a ma koe a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ni bauncha ma sɔn. Yataa ma tɔ dɔ mende a bɔ ni to dunya chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ min chee bauncha ma sɔn koe a, a fɔ dechee Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe.”
44004013	Chu kuti wa chɛ a fii‑a wan, a ɔ yen koe a Pita an fea Chɔn na, an ni bai sa tena buɛ min dɔ yaagbɛa a. Kun ti chɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mɔ gbama gbama ni Pita n na, miin gbu nii ma gboo sɔn ba chɛ. A yɛ to, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan to a tima chɛ a, mbɛ an ni wan tee Chisɔsi fɛ.
44004014	Chɛɛ an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, min‑na a ma, bai ɔ bai ma bɔ ni an da a a fɔ koe a, min ni mabɔ bai a. Koe min na mu, an‑na kamin chɛ yen fan, min na‑a baun, ɛ sɔ ɔ Pita tɔnfɛ, an fea Chɔn n na.
44004015	Mbɛ Chu kuti wa chɛ, an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, Pita ni an kafai, an fea Chɔn na. Mbɛ an‑na an nyɔn dɔ tisa, an dɔ te,
44004016	“Mmɔ ɛ fen ma‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na? Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na kamaya ko wa min ma ka. Mmɔ ee che a fɔ‑a, mbɛ an fan ma a ma ni.
44004017	Chɛɛ min mbe a ma, an ma na a ma mɔ dɔ mende n ni a ɔ sɔn, mmɔ an na si gbau gbau. Mbɛ an ma bai kan kɔ kan sa to mɔɛ n tena, a si Chisɔsi chɛ ma.”
44004018	Mbɛ an‑na Pita chee, an fea Chɔn na. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ an ye, an dɔ, an ma bai ɔ bai sa to mɔ ɔ mɔ tena, a si Chisɔsi wakoe ma. A yɛ to, an dɔ, an ma mɔ ɔ mɔ kan to, a si Chisɔsi 'a wai n ma.
44004019	Chɛɛ Pita an fea Chɔn na, an dɔ, “Wo wandi gbu, wo a fɔ wɛ, ni a ma bɛnden fan mu Yataa chen kɔɔ, nn ni nn too ma sɔ a ma, chɛ ma, ni nn mbe a ma sɔ wo wan ma.
44004020	Koe min na mu, nn mbe ee che nn da a tɔn‑da koe n ma, nn fandi‑a koe miin dɔ yen, a yɛ to, nn too‑a miin na min.”
44004021	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chu kuti wa chɛ, an‑na Pita n na si wan to gbau gbau, mbɛ an‑na an boo ka. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni wan Yataa tando‑a, koe chɛ ko a, min ma‑a ka. An fandi gbu kuti ɔ, an kuiɛ nii ma bɛn ni kaina dɔndɔɛ, a si ni an mbe an tɔɔ buɛ min dɔ.
44004022	Kamin chɛ min baun‑da ka kamaya chia chɛ a, a suun sanɛ benden fan ni gbɛ san bi naanin ma.
44004023	An‑na an boo ka kɛn dechee Pita a, an fea Chɔn na, an yɛ‑a wan an bɔɛ n tena. An‑na a ɔ yian fan an bɔɛ chɛ n na, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na, an na‑a bai min fɔ an fan Pita n ye.
44004024	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, an‑na bai chɛ n na min kɛn, mbɛ an gbɛɛ bun‑da samun‑da Yataa tena, kuiɛ a kanɛ ɔ. An dɔ, “Mansa Yataa, i wan‑na banda a dan, an fea duu gboo a, kɔ yii wɛɛ, a basan fen kɔ fen na, miin mbe an dɔ.
44004025	I wan‑na a ma, nn bemba n ta bemba Defidi koɔ‑a. I 'a bɔi denɛ ni a a. Mbɛ a sin, Yataa Nyina na‑a bai don fan a da a, a fɔ koe a. A na‑a a fɔ wan i 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an faa ɛ tɛ‑a, an mbe dɔbɛn yama chɛ‑a, a si Mansa Wa ma, ko ee bɔ‑a min dɔ. Fen mu an mbe chɛ ma tena?
44004026	Mbɛ dunya ɔ mansa n‑na an fandi ma bɛn, mbɛ kun ti n na kan‑da kaina dɔndɔ, butuin chɛ koe a Mansa Yataa a, an fea kunka mansa a, a‑a a boo sɔ min ma.’
44004027	Tea gbu sin ko a, nɛ ni Chuusaɛn duu chɛ ɔ, an‑na an kun puin kaina, i 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ Chisɔsi Chasi ma, min mbe tenchen i ko a. I‑a i boo sɔ an ma kunka mansa a. Mansa Ɛdɔdi, ni Kɔfana Pɔnchɔsi Padeti, an bɛ an na‑a an kun puin chɛ chɛ, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na miin ma Chu mɔ n na, a basan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, ko yama ma koe a kunka mansa chɛ a.
44004028	An na kan‑da wan kaina dɔndɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni koe chɛ n dɔ bɛn, miin dɔ bɛnden ni gbɛ i boo ɔ, yɔ i toen ni a a buɛ min dɔ.
44004029	Sanche gbɛ Mansa Yataa, an 'na da chianɛ n ma fɛn, mbɛ i‑a gbasaya be nn ma. Nn fɛn mu i 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n na, i ni a ma, nn ni faagbɛa ma sɔn. I 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi ma, nn ni kun a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na.
44004030	A ma mɔɛ n ni i 'a gbasaya ɔ yen, i 'a baun chɛ ɔ. Gbasaya be nn ma, nn ni kun a ma‑a, kamaya ko wa n ni ma, i 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ, min mbe tenchen i ko a.”
44004031	An ban‑da kɛn samunɛ chɛ‑a, an na sɔnden ni ka kaina, Yataa‑a a ma wan, nɔ ɔ samba‑a gbigbi. A sin, Yataa Nyina ni wan gbɛ an gbɛɛ fɛ gban. Mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ Yataa 'a sakana bai sa‑a, faagbɛa a.
44004032	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, an 'na yiinachii ni dɔndɔ gbe, an faa ma koe ni dɔndɔ gbe. Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma kankan ni a ta boo fenɛ kun ma, chɛɛ an boo fenɛ n ni boo fen dɔndɔɛ n fan na. An ni an boo fenɛ n be wan an nyɔn ma, yɔ an nyɔn ma gbɔsɔɛ ni ma buɛ min dɔ.
44004033	Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n da a kuiɛ ni gbasa kaka, an ni koɔ wan mɔɛ n tena, a si Yataa‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. A sin, Yataa‑a mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ dua wan, a sɛmbɛnden na, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a.
44004034	Fen kɔ fen ma gbɔsɔ ma mɔ ɔ mɔ bia ni an tɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, duu gboo ni an fɛn gbɛɛ boo ɔ, a basan chenɛ n na, an ni an ma tachɛ wan, mbɛ an na‑a a kɔpɔɛ chɛ a,
44004035	mbɛ an‑na a be Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ma. An ni an kɔpɔɛ chɛ du wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, yɔ mɔɛ ma gbɔsɔɛ ni ma buɛ min dɔ.
44004036	A tɔmɔsi ni kamin dɔndɔ an na, min tɔ ni Chosɛfi. Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n ni an kamin chɛ chee, an dɔ, Banabasi, min fasaien ni, mɔɛ min mbe a bɔɛ n faa ma nande. A na‑a bɔ Difai dambi an dɔ. A sin na‑a suun Saipɔsi wan, yii tinɛ ɔ.
44004037	A wɛɛ, a‑a a 'a duu gboo ma tachɛ wan. Mbɛ a na‑a an kɔpɔɛ chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a konan Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
44005001	Chɛɛ kamin dɔndɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Ananiyasi. A 'a musu tɔ ni Safiya. A tima chɛ a, an bɛɛ‑a an 'na duu gboo ma tachɛ wan.
44005002	Chɛɛ kamin chɛ n fea a 'a musu a, an‑na a ɔ bɛn fan kɔpɔɛ chɛ ɛnden ka koe a a ma, an fandi ko a. A ta‑a wan a tɔɛ chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a konan Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
44005003	Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ananiyasi, fen‑na a ma i dɔn‑da Sitana kun‑da i yii ma, fania fɔ koe a Yataa Nyina ye? I 'a duu gboo sɔnkɔɛ gbɛɛ ma chɛ a, i‑a dɔ nun.
44005004	I nii ma duu gboo chɛ ma tachɛ nin bɛ tima min na, i wan ta ni a a. I‑a a ma tachɛ kɛn, a kɔpɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ ni i ta an na, a sin, i ni kun fan i ni ko ɔ ko ma a a to, i faa ma a. Fen ko a mu, i‑a ko bonda chɛ ɔ bɛn i yii ma, a ma koe a? I ma fania chɛ fɔ ni, mɔ gbu n fan ye, chɛɛ i‑a a fɔ ka Yataa an ye.”
44005005	Ananiyasi‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, a ya kɔɔɛ a, a bea‑a, mbɛ a fa‑a. Mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ‑a koe chɛ a min, an chian‑da wan a ɔ benden ba a.
44005006	Mbɛ kamin tɔngbɔɛ dɔ nu, an na‑a, an‑na Ananiyasi su ma bɛn, mbɛ an ta‑a a a, an‑na a tɔn.
44005007	Awa sawa benden gbakɔ, mbɛ Ananiyasi 'a musu Safiya don‑da an chen dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, a chɛɛ fa‑a ka kaina. A nii ma a misi misi wɛɛ ɔ sɔn, koe min na‑a ma a chɛɛ a.
44005008	Mbɛ Pita‑a a wɛɛ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “A fɔ n ye tea a, ni kɔpɔɛ chɛ gbɛɛ an nii nɛ, wo‑a min ma sɔn, wo fea i chɛɛ a, kɛn wo 'a duu gboo chɛ ma tachɛ.” Mbɛ a ɔ, “Tea gbu a, a kɔpɔɛ gbɛɛ gbu an nɛ.”
44005009	Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ a wɛɛ ye, a ɔ, “Fen ko a mu wo fea i chɛɛ a, wo‑a wo yiima ɔ bɛn, Mansa Yataa Nyina ɔ siman koe a? Mɔɛ miin ta‑a i chɛɛ tɔn‑da, an yen ko sɔ ɔ chenɛ da a. An fan mbe ta‑a i wɛɛ tɔn‑da.”
44005010	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, musu chɛ wɛɛ bea‑a duu ma Pita chen kɔɔ, mbɛ a fa‑a. Mbɛ kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ n don‑da, mbɛ an‑na a wɛɛ faenɛ tan. Mbɛ an ta‑a a a, an‑na a tɔn a chɛɛ kaa a.
44005011	Mbɛ chɛ ma‑a kɛn, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, ni mɔ dɔ mende nu, miin‑na koe chɛ a min, an gbɛɛ chian‑da wan a ɔ benden ba a.
44005012	Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ni kamaya ko sɛsɛ ma wan mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, min ni an da a fa gban. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin‑na an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, an ni bɛn fan suun ma nyɔncha ɔ kaina dɔndɔ Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Mansa Sɔɔmon 'na Pɛsa.
44005013	Miin nii ma an kai fa ni ka Chisɔsi a, an faa nii gbɛa sa koe a an kaa a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, basɔmaya ni koo an boo ɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a.
44005014	Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔ kaima sɛsɛ, an bɛ musu sɛsɛ n na, an‑na an kai fa wan Mansa Chisɔsi a, mbɛ an sa‑a mɔɛ kɔma n kaa a.
44005015	Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ni kamaya koe sɛsɛ ma tena wan an tɛ ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ n‑na an suun ma nyɔɛ n ya, miin gbandien ni, an na‑a an tena. An‑na gbandi mɔɛ chɛ dɔ n sa sofa ma wan, an‑na dɔ n sa waa ma chia tɔnfɛ. An‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, ni Pita ma‑a ben‑da, a nininɛ wɛɛ ni che gbandi mɔɛ chɛ dɔ n ma.
44005016	Mbɛ mɔ fanka fanka n na‑a wan, a ka duu chɛ n dɔ Chuusaɛn a tindanɛ. An ni kɛn na tena, an na‑a wan mɔɛ n na an boo a, miin gbandien ni, a yɛ to, ni nyina yama n ni miin fɛ. Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a ma wan, an gbɛɛ baun‑da.
44005017	Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔ wa Yataa a, ni miin gbɛɛ ni a fɛ, miin ni Sadusii mɔɛ n na, an gbɛɛ too‑a wan yama yama Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na. An gbɛɛ faa bɔ‑a wan.
44005018	Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n bia, mbɛ an‑na an sa pimbi chenɛ a.
44005019	Chɛɛ a yɛɛ chɛ ma, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka na‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a pimbi chen chɛ da gbɛɛ a ka gbasi. Mbɛ a‑a a ma, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n bɔ‑a pimbi chen chɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ,
44005020	“Wo ta Yataa 'a kata ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a bai sa mɔɛ n tena, a si fɔɛ nama chɛ ma.”
44005021	Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ma maeka chɛ da a kuiɛ yɔn ni. Mbɛ sau sau ma, an don‑da wan Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ mɔɛ n kan‑da. Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔ wa Yataa a, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na, an‑na Chu kuti wa si kaina dɔndɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni bɛn ba bia. Mbɛ an bɛn‑da kɛn, an‑na mɔɛ a ta wan pimbi chen chɛ a, min mbe a ma, an ni na Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na an chen kɔɔ.
44005022	Chɛɛ poesi chɛ n che‑a kɛn pimbi chen chɛ a, an nii ma Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tan ni nɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na a ɔ yian kun ti chɛ n na, an dɔ te,
44005023	“Nn che‑a kɛn pimbi chen chɛ a, nn‑na a tan a da gbɛɛ a tɔndenɛ ɛ gban. Pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ni wan nɔ, an mbe an 'na wai chɛ‑a chen chɛ n da a. Chɛɛ nn‑na chen chɛ da chɛ n na ka kɛn, nn ma mɔ ɔ mɔ tan ni nɔ.”
44005024	Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, ni ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ min ni Yataa 'a kata kun ma fɛn poesi chɛ n ya ɔ, bai chɛ‑a an na fii wan. An nii ma a ɔ sɔn, fen ma‑a Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na.
44005025	An to‑a chɛ an dɔ, mbɛ kamin dɔndɔ don‑da, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo too ma sɔ. Wo‑a mɔɛ miin sa pimbi chenɛ a, an yen ko sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an mbe mɔɛ n kan‑da.”
44005026	Mbɛ a tima chɛ a gbɛ, ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ, ni poesi miin ni a kɔɔ, an ta‑a Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ, mbɛ an na‑a Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na. An nii ma gbasaya kan kɔ kan din ni an ma, na koe an na. Koe min na mu, an chianden fan ni, mbɛ ni an‑na gbasaya din an ma, mɔɛ n mbe an ma bon bon‑da wan.
44005027	An na‑a wan Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na. An na‑a kɛn an na, an ta‑a wan an na, Chu kuti wa chɛ bɛnden ni ka chenɛ min na. An toen ni, Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa Yataa tena, a ni an dɔ tisa.
44005028	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Nn‑na a ma din fan wo tena, mbɛ wo ma mɔɛ n kan to, a si Chisɔsi chɛ wakoe ma. Chɛɛ wo a ɔ yen, wo‑a koe min ma. Wo‑a a ma mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe Chuusaɛn, an‑na a a min, wo‑a bai miin sa a si a ma. A sin, wo toen mu wo ni a fa koe dɛn nn fan na.”
44005029	Chɛɛ Pita n bɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n na, an‑na a fɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, an dɔ te, “A ma bɛnden mu nn ni Yataa faa ma koe an ma. Chɛɛ a ma din ni nn ma, nn ni mɔ gbu n fan faa ma koe n ma.
44005030	Wo‑a a ma wan, Chisɔsi‑a mauma saya chɛ, kɛn wo‑a a gbangban kɔnɛ ma. Chɛɛ Yataa chɛ, nn bemba n ta bemba n ni min fai, an‑na a ma, a wan Chisɔsi chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.
44005031	Yataa‑a a a sɛ wan basɔmaya kaina chenama wa, a wan Yataa boo nyima ɔ. A‑a a ma wan to mansa a, ni mɔ gbu n baun mɔɛ a. Chɛ ni a ma, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ni kun, an ya a mun koe ma Yataa ma, mbɛ Yataa‑a a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ.
44005032	Nn fan mu koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma sii a. A yɛ to, Yataa Nyina wɛɛ, min mbe bea mɔɛ fɛ, miin mbe kooya be Yataa ma, sii mu to a wɛɛ a.”
44005033	Chɛɛ Chu kuti wa chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na min fɔ, an faa tɛ‑a wan aan. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an‑na a ɔ bɛn an fa koe a.
44005034	Chɛɛ kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Kamadiɛɛ. Fayisii mɔɛ ni, a sin, Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ ni to a a. A sin to, mɔɛ n ni baa be wan a ma. An kamin chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, a sɔ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a ma, an bɔ‑a Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na baa ma, tima ɛnden ko a.
44005035	Mbɛ a bɔɛ nu kuti wa chɛ ɔ, a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N bɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, wo wo kun ma fɛn koe chɛ n na, wo toen mu ka, wo ni min ma mɔɛ chɛ n na.
44005036	Tima dɔndɔ a, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Tudasi. A na‑a na wan, mbɛ a‑a a wandi yian, mbɛ mɔ chenama mu a a. Mɔ chɛmɛ naanin nyɔn sima bea‑a wan a fɛ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ n‑na a fa wan, mbɛ a fɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ na fasan‑da a ɔ gbusɛ, mbɛ ko ɔ ko nii ma bɔ ni to chɛ gbakɔ.
44005037	Chɛ gbakɔ, Chudasi, min ni Kadidi mɔɛ a, a wɛɛ na‑a wan mɔ dan tima a. A wɛɛ‑a a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ bea‑a a fɛ. Chɛɛ an‑na a wɛɛ fa wan, mbɛ a wɛɛ fɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ fasan‑da a ɔ gbusɛ.
44005038	Mɔɛ chɛ n sin bakoe sanche, n mbe a fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ wo ma ko ma gbaaen kan kɔ kan sa an ma. Wo an to nɔ yɛdɛn. Ni an 'na dɔbɛn chɛ mu mɔ gbu n 'na dɔbɛnɛ an na, ɛ bea‑a wan.
44005039	Chɛɛ ni Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ an nɛ, mbɛ wo ee kun‑da wo ni a a bea. Wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ wo e ka butuinɛ chɛ‑a Yataa an na.” Mbɛ Chu kuti wa chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n‑na an too ma sɔ Kamadiɛɛ 'a dasi chɛ ma.
44005040	Mbɛ an‑na Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n chee, mbɛ an‑na a ma, an‑na an boan pien. Mbɛ an‑na an na si gbau gbau, an dɔ, an ma bai ɔ bai sa to mɔɛ n tena, a si Chisɔsi ma. An‑na an na si kɛn, mbɛ an‑na an boo ka.
44005041	Chɛɛ an bu ɔ ni di wan, an mbe kɛn ka‑a Chu kuti wa chɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa‑a an ya mɔ chɛndɛ n na, mauma koe ɔ bia koe a Chisɔsi ko a.
44005042	A sin, tee ɔ tee a, an nii ma sɛmbɛ ni bai sa koe a, a si Chisɔsi ma. An ni a sa wan Yataa 'a kata ɔ, a yɛ to, chenɛ n bɛɛ a, an ni kanɛ chɛ wan, an mbe ta‑a a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, mbɛ Chisɔsi an mu kunka mansa a.
44006001	Tima ɛnden benden gbakɔ, Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ wan kɔkoa‑a. Mbɛ koɛ bun‑da a kuu sɔ‑a an tɛ ɔ. Chu mɔɛ miin ka‑a Kiisi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ni wan gbonyɛ‑a, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ miin suun‑da Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an dɔ, an mbe ma fenɛ ɔ du‑a tee ɔ tee a, an mbe ee fen chɛ n be fuinya musu chɛ n ma, miin ka‑a ka Kiisi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44006002	Chɛ ko a, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔ tan kun ma fea chɛ n‑na mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a kan kaina dɔndɔ, miin na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, mbɛ an‑na a fɔ an ye, an dɔ te, “A ma ee bia‑a nn ni nn boo ka Yataa 'a bai sa a, min mbe a ma dechee, nn ni fen chɛ n du mɔɛ n ma.
44006003	Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo mɔ wɔnfea ya wo tɛ, basɔmaya ɛ wo boo ɔ miin ko a. Yataa Nyina ɛ miin fɛ, a yɛ to, miin yiima tɛen mu, min mbe a ma, nn ni wai chɛ nɛnɛ be an ma.
44006004	Mbɛ nn tana sin, nn ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ ma‑a dechee samun chɛ an na, ni Yataa 'a bai sa koe a.”
44006005	Bai chɛ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ faa chima wan. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an‑na an boo sɔ mɔ kuun chɛ n ma, an tɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ saa ni Sitibin fan na, danaya tɔɛ ni min na, a sin Yataa Nyina ni wan a fɛ. A tɔɛ n fan nii nɛ Fiipi a, Pɔkɔyɔsi, Nikanɔ, Timɔn, Pamɛnasi, ni Nikodasi. Nikodasi chɛ Chu mɔ nii ma a a, a sin na‑a ka Andiɔki duu ɔ wan. Chɛɛ a na‑a yɛ wan gbɛ Chu n 'na Yataa fai gbee ma.
44006006	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an na‑a mɔ wɔnfea chɛ n na Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tena. Sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an boo bun fan an mɔ wɔnfea chɛ n ma, mbɛ an‑na samunɛ chɛ an ko a.
44006007	Mbɛ a ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, Yataa 'a bai a fasan‑da wan a ɔ gbɛɛ ɛ. Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n da a koa‑a wan gbeden Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an sɛsɛ‑a an boo si sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ kɔɔ.
44006008	Sitibin ni mɔɛ an na, Yataa na‑a min dua a sɛmbɛnden na. A sin, Yataa Nyina ni wan a fɛ, min‑na a ma, a ni kun kamaya ko sɛsɛ ma koe a, miin ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ sakana bai chɛ ka‑a Yataa tena wan.
44006009	Chɛɛ tee dɔndɔ a, mɔɛ dɔ n ka‑a wan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Chu miin bɔ‑a yɔncha ɔ, an 'na samun chɛ chenɛ. Mbɛ an bun‑da bai tɛnsɛ‑a an nyɔn tɛ, an bɛ Sitibin na. Chu mɔɛ n ni an mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ka‑a Sayini duu ɔ, a basan Adɛsandia duu ɔ a. A yɛ to, Chu mɔ dɔ mende nu, miin ka‑a Sidisia, an fea Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ a, an ni wan nɔ.
44006010	Chɛɛ an nii kun an ni sɔ Sitibin 'na yiimatɛ a, koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina ni bai n don fan a da a, a fɔ koe a.
44006011	Mbɛ an don‑da mɔɛ n too ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni a fɔ, mbɛ an‑na a a min fan Sitibin mbe bai yama sa‑a, a si Mosisi n fea ma Yataa a.
44006012	Bai chɛ‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a kan‑da, an bɛ basan Chu gbakoo n na, ni Chu n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ nu. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ faa tɛ‑a Sitibin ma, min‑na a ma, an‑na a bia, mbɛ an na‑a a a Chu kuti wa ɔ.
44006013	Mbɛ an na‑a mɔɛ n na, fania siiya chɛ koe a, a si Sitibin ma. Mbɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ, an dɔ te, “Tima ɔ tima kamin chɛ ɛ bai yama n fan fɔ, a si Yataa 'a kata chɛ ma, min mbe tenchen a ko a. Ɛ a fɔ to, a si sawa chɛ n ma, Yataa‑a miin be Mosisi ma.
44006014	Nn‑na a a min fan to, a‑a a fɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi chɛ, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, ɛ Yataa 'a kata chɛ te‑a wan. A yɛ to, a ɔ, ɛ mmɔ 'a manda n gbɛɛ, Mosisi‑a miin be mmɔ ma, ɛ an ka‑a wan chia ma.”
44006015	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni ka si ɔ an Chu kuti wa ɔ, an ya to‑a ka wan Sitibin na, mbɛ an‑na a ya kɔɔɛ yen, yɔ maeka ta ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
44007001	Mbɛ Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa chɛ Yataa tena, a‑a Sitibin dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “An‑na kunɛ miin gbɛɛ si ka i kun ma, tea mu an na?”
44007002	Mbɛ Sitibin dɔ, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, fa nu, wo wo too ma sɔ n ma. Mmɔ bemba Ebeami na‑a ka wan Mɛsɔpotemia, a ta‑a Ayan duu ɔ. Chɛɛ a e na to ta‑a, Yataa min benden mu fen kɔ fen ma, a bɔ‑a wan a ya a,
44007003	mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, ‘Ka i 'a mɔɛ n kun ma, bɔ i 'a chɛnyɛ ɔ, i ni ta chɛnyɛ dɔ mende ɔ, n mbe min yian‑da i a.’
44007004	A sin bɔ‑a wan a waa a, Kadia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a si Ayan. Mbɛ Ebeami fa fa‑a kɛn, Yataa‑a a ma wan Ebeami bɔ‑a Ayan. Mbɛ a na‑a a a chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, wo e ka gbɛ kaina, min mu Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ chɛ a.
44007005	Chɛɛ Yataa nii ma an duu gboo chɛ kan kɔ kan be ni a ma, ma koe a a ta a a, duu gboo chen ya dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ nii ma be ni a ma. Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a too ɔ dia wan, chɛnyɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ma koe a a ta a, an bɛ a cheeya n na. Tooɔdia chɛ ni chɛ tena ka tima min na, den nii wɛ Ebeami boo ɔ.
44007006	Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, ‘I cheeya n mbe ma‑a wan sonda n na, chɛnyɛ dɔ mende ɔ. An sin mbe ma‑a wan nɔ yɔnɛ n na, an mbe an na mɔnɛ‑a, san chɛmɛ naanin ko a.’
44007007	Mbɛ Yataa‑a a fɔ to, a ɔ, ‘Chɛɛ an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ mɔɛ nu, an mbe ma‑a miin kɔɔ yɔncha ɔ, n mbe kaa a tɛ‑a wan an bakoe ma, n ni an tɔɔ. Mbɛ chɛ gbakɔ, n‑na a ma, i cheeya n ni bɔ an chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ. An sin mbe na‑a wan nɛ, mbɛ an‑na n fai.’
44007008	Yataa‑a ko dɔndɔ fɔ gbɛ Ebeami ye, a ma koe a, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ an dɔn‑da an dɔbɛn chɛ ma. Yataa ɔ, Ebeami ni a wandi a kamincha, a ni yɛ, a cheeya kan kɔ kan na ni kamincha. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a 'a denɛ Aisaki suun‑da tee sɛi gbe, Ebeami‑a a a kamincha. Mbɛ Chekɔpi wɛɛ suun tee che‑a kɛn tee sɛi ɔ, Aisaki wɛɛ‑a a a kamincha wan. Chekɔpi wɛɛ, a 'a den kaien tan kun ma fea chɛ n bɛɛ, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba nu, a‑a an na kamincha wan. An fan‑na dambi tan kun ma fea chɛ kuu sɔ, Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44007009	“Chekɔpi 'a den chɛ nu, an too‑a wan an dɔɛ Chosɛfi a, mbɛ an‑na a ma tachɛ mɔɛ n ma, miin ta‑a a a Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, an‑na Chosɛfi ma tachɛ wan yɔncha ɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa nii ma ka ni a fɛ,
44007010	a sin ni basan fan a ma tima ɔ tima, ni ko yawaenɛ‑a a tan. An ta‑a wan Chosɛfi a mansa chen kɔɔ, Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa na‑a sɔn chɛndɛ be wan a ma, a basan yiimatɛ a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Chosɛfi wakoe a dia‑a Ichipi mansa chɛ ye. A sin, a‑a Chosɛfi ma wan kɔfana a Ichipi chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ kun ma. A yɛ to, Chosɛfi an ni to ya ɔ sɔɛ a, mansa chɛ 'a chenɛ n gbɛɛ kun ma.
44007011	Mbɛ mansa chɛ‑a chɛ ma kɛn, tima che‑a wan gbɛ, mbɛ kɔnkɔ wa na‑a Ichipi chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan Kenaan na. Kɔnkɔɛ chɛ‑a mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n tɔɔ wan, an nii kun daun fenɛ ma kan kɔ kan, a daun koe a.
44007012	Mbɛ Chekɔpi‑a a a min, mbɛ daun fenɛ ma ɛ sɔn fan Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A‑a chɛ a min kɛn, a 'a denɛ kaima nu, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n nu, a‑a an na ta wan tima saa saa ko a Ichipi.
44007013	Chekɔpi‑a an na ta kɛn to, a fean bɔɛ ɔ, Chosɛfi‑a a wandi wakoe ɔ yian fan a suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n na. An tima chɛ a ni, mansa chɛ wɛɛ‑a Chosɛfi a mɔɛ n bakoe ɔ sɔn.
44007014	Mbɛ chɛ ma‑a kɛn, Chosɛfi‑a sakana a ta wan a fa tena, a ɔ, a ni na a tan. A ɔ, an bɛ a wan Chekɔpi 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin danɛ taen ni mɔ bi wɔnfea, kun ma duu ɔ.
44007015	Mbɛ Chekɔpi n yii‑a Ichipi, a to‑a kaina, an bɛ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n na, aan an gbɛɛ fa‑a a nyɔn na.
44007016	An ta‑a wan an su n na Sɛkɛn duu ɔ. An‑na an tɔn fan kamba chɛ ɔ, Ebeami na‑a min san Amɔ 'a denɛ n ma, kɔpɔ ɛnden na.
44007017	“Tima ni gbɛ kɛn gbɛn tena a ma, tooɔdia chɛ bɔ koe ma a a, Yataa na‑a min chɛ Ebeami a. A tima chɛ a, mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n da a ni koo wan gbɛ gbeden, Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44007018	Mbɛ a tima chɛ a gbɛ, mansa dɔ mende si‑a wan Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An mansa chɛ nii ma ko ɔ ko ɔ sɔn, a si Chosɛfi ma.
44007019	A‑a yaa a ben fan mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a‑a ko ma gbaaenɛ n sa an ma. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a wan to, a‑a a din an ma, kɔ an ni an 'na denɛ n na dɛ fia ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni fa.
44007020	A tima chɛ a ni Mosisi suun‑da. Den ma kawaen ba ni a a. A de‑a a bɔ wan a ɔ, kau sawa ko a, a 'a chenɛ a.
44007021	Chɛ gbakɔ, a de‑a a a dɛ wan. Mbɛ mansa chɛ 'a den musuma, a‑a Mosisi gbu ya, mbɛ a‑a a bɔ a ɔ, a ta denɛ a.
44007022	Mansa 'a den musuma chɛ‑a a ma wan, an‑na Mosisi kan yiimatɛ wa chɛ gbɛɛ a, Ichipi mɔɛ n dɔ. A sin, a kosan‑da wan koɔ‑a kaka, a yɛ to, a chɛ chɛ wai ni nyin.
44007023	“Mosisi suun sanɛ che‑a kɛn san bi naaninɛ ɔ, a‑a a yii na chii wan, ta koe a a bɔɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n bakoe ɔ gbɛ a.
44007024	A‑a a ɔ yen fan, Ichipi mɔ dɔndɔ ɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔ dɔndɔ bia‑a yama. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Mosisi‑a a yii na chii Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ ta a yɛ koe a. A‑a Ichipi mɔɛ chɛ fa wan.
44007025	A ni wan Mosisi yii ma, mbɛ a 'a mɔɛ n ni ko dɔndɔ ɔ gbɛ‑a wan. Mbɛ Yataa ni na tena wan a ma‑a, a wan Mosisi ni an kun bɔ an 'na yɔncha chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ an nii ma chɛ a ɔ gbɛ ni.
44007026	Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a tee dɔndɔɛ ma, a‑a a tan fan, a 'a mɔɛ n mbe butuin chɛ‑a, an mɔ fea. Mbɛ a‑a a yii na chii bai sa koe a an tɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, ‘Wo wo too ma sɔ, wo mu suun ma nyɔn dɔndɔɛ n fan na. Wo ma wo nyɔn bia yama yama.’
44007027	Chɛɛ kaminɛ dɔndɔɛ min ni ka a bɔɛ chɛ gbasi tena, a‑a Mosisi a nyɔndɔn fan, a bɔ an tɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ Mosisi ye, a ɔ, ‘Nyɔn‑na i ma mansa a, kaa a tɛ koe a nn tɛ ɔ?
44007028	I toen mu i ni n bɛɛ fa, yɔ i‑a Ichipi mɔɛ chɛ fa buɛ min dɔ kunun, ae?’
44007029	Mosisi‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, a‑a a nun fan, a bɔ Ichipi chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a ta‑a, ma koe a Midia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A to‑a nɔ wan, aan a‑a den kaien fea suun.
44007030	“San bi naaninɛ bendenɛ gbakɔ, maeka bɔ‑a wan Mosisi ya a. Maeka chɛ ni wan, yɔ ta manɛ ɛ ma kɔn denɛ ɔ fuinɛ ma. Chɛ ma‑a Saina kɔnkɔɛ baima wan.
44007031	A‑a an koe chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, Mosisi a fii‑a wan. Mbɛ a‑a a ma ta an kɔn den chɛ baima, min mbe a ma, a ni koe chɛ ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛɛ a‑a Mansa Yataa kuiɛ a min fan, a ɔ,
44007032	‘N fan mu Yataa a, wo bemba n ta bemba n‑na min fai. Ebeami na‑a n fai wan, Aisaki‑a n fai, Chekɔpi wɛɛ‑a n fai.’ Mbɛ Mosisi‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, chiandia dɛ‑a wan a ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da samba‑a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a nii che to an kaina gbu ma fɛn‑da.
44007033	Mbɛ Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, ‘I 'a kɔɔwa bɔ i chenɛ a. Koe min na mu, e ka sɔ ɔ kaina min, ɛ tenchen n fan ko a.
44007034	N‑na a ɔ yen, Ichipi mɔɛ nu, an mbe n 'na mɔɛ n tɔɔya tena buɛ min dɔ, a yama yama boo a. N‑na an di chɛ kuiɛ a min. An fɛ mu, n fandi gbu, n yii‑a a ka banda bu ɔ, n ni an baun. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n mbe i a yɛ tena gbɛ Ichipi chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ.’
44007035	“Mosisi chɛ ni, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ban‑da min dɔ. An‑na a ɔ tisa wan, an dɔ te, ‘Nyɔn‑na i ma mansa a, kaa a tɛ koe a nn tɛ ɔ?’ A sin fan mu mɔɛ a, Yataa‑a min na na, ma koe a ya ɔ sɔɛ a, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n kun ka koe a. Yataa‑a chɛ sin ma maeka chɛ an 'na gbasaya ɔ, min na‑a bɔ a ya a yɔ ta manɛ, kɔn den chɛ ɔ.
44007036	Kamaya ko wa sɛsɛ, miin ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa ni wan an kɔ, Mosisi‑a an ma wan. A‑a an ma wan Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ, ni kɔ yii wa chɛ ɔ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Yii Yawa. A‑a a a tun fan an kamaya koe chɛ n ma‑a, san bi naanin chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an ni min dɔ fuinɛ chɛ ma.
44007037	Mosisi an‑na a fɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɛ a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a na‑a wan wo tena, yɔ a‑a n na na buɛ min dɔ wo tena. A sin mbe ma‑a wo 'a mɔɛ gbu an na.’
44007038	Mosisi chɛ sin ni wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, an na sɔndenɛ ni tima min na fuinɛ ma. An bɛ ni nɔ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n na, ni maeka chɛ wɛɛ, min koɔ‑a a tena Saina kɔnkɔɛ ɔ. A sin‑na Yataa 'a sakana bai ma sɔn fan, min mbe fɔɛ be, a a ben koe a mmɔ tena.
44007039	“Chɛɛ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n ma dɔn ni, an ni an too ma sɔ Mosisi chɛ ma. An na‑a a a yɛ wan an boo kɔ, mbɛ an‑na an yii na chii yɛ koe a Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44007040	Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ Eyɔn ye, an dɔ te, ‘Yataa dɔ mende n nyan nn ye, miin mbe kun sɔ‑a nn ya ɔ. Koe min na mu, nn ma a ɔ sɔn fen ma‑a Mosisi chɛ a, min bɔ‑a nn na, a ka Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ.’
44007041	A tima a ni gbɛ, mbɛ an‑na fenɛ nyan yɔ ninchi, a fai koe a, mbɛ an‑na yasi fenɛ bɔ a ma. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na daun fen daun buɔdia bɔ, an fen chɛ ko a, an fandi‑a min nyan ka an boo a.
44007042	Mbɛ Yataa wɛɛ‑a a kan kɔ sɔ an na, a‑a a boo ka an na, an ni bun tee fai‑a, ni kau basan tɔmbuaka n na banda a. Chɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ, gboo chɛ ɔ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n‑na min nyɛn. Yataa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Wo wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, san bi naanin chɛ gbɛɛ ko a, wo ni tima min na fuin chɛ ma, wo ni soe miin gbɛɛ fa ka, a basan yasi gbɛɛ a, wo ni miin bɔ ka, n fan ko a nii ma.
44007043	Wo na‑a ku chɛ ya wan wo kun ma, fania yataa chɛ, an ni min chee ka Mɔdɔki, a ni min kɔɔ, ni tɔmbuaka chɛ, min bɔen ni ka wo 'a fen chɛ a, Defan, wo e min fai ka. An gbɛɛ ni fenɛ n fan na, wo‑a miin nyan wo wandi, an fai koe a. A sin fan fɛ mu, n mbe a ma‑a, an ni bɔ wo a wo ta chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ an ta‑a wo a Babidon duu gbaa chia a.’
44007044	“Mmɔ bemba n ta bemba nu, tima min na an ni fuinɛ ma, tɛndi an ni an boo ɔ, min ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa ɛ an tɛ. Yataa‑a tɛndi chɛ nyan buɛ ɔ yian fan Mosisi a. An sin gbu‑a a nyan fan, yɔ Yataa wandi gbu‑a a nyan buɛ ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ.
44007045	Chɛ gbakɔ, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba nu, an ta‑a wan Yataa 'a tɛndi chɛ a, an ta fa nu, an na‑a min be ka an ma. An ta‑a wan an tɛndi chɛ a, tima min na an ni ta tena, an bɛ Chɔsowa n na. Mbɛ an‑na chɛnyɛ chɛ bia wan a tima chɛ a, Yataa‑a mɔ dɔ mende n gbain kaina an ya ɔ. An tɛndi chɛ sin to‑a nɔ wan an boo ɔ, aan Defidi ma‑a mansa a.
44007046	Yataa faa chimaen fan ni Mansa Defidi a. Mbɛ a wan Defidi‑a Yataa ɔ tisa, a ɛ koe min ma. A ɔ, Yataa ni a ma, a wan Defidi ni chenɛ sɔ a wan Yataa chɛ ye, Chekɔpi ni min fai.
44007047	Chɛɛ Sɔɔmon fan‑na chenɛ sɔ Yataa ye.
44007048	“Chɛɛ Yataa Wa ee ma chen na, mɔ gbu n mbe min sɔ. Ɛ wan yɔ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n 'na gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ,
44007049	‘Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “N tena, banda bu ɔ mu n 'na mansa sea an na. Dunya gbɛɛ sin mu fen denɛ an na, n mbe n chenɛ sɔ min ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, chenɛ minan nyɔn sima mu, wo toen mu wo ni min sɔ n ye? Kaina gbu ɛ mende, n mbe kun n suin‑da kaina min?
44007050	N fan‑na fen chɛ n gbɛɛ gbu nyan.” ’ ”
44007051	Mbɛ Sitibin n dɔ te gbɛ, a ɔ, “Wo too ɔ gbɛ kaka. Wo faa n dɔ ɛ wan dechee yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ban‑da Yataa ɔ. Wo too gbee‑a, Yataa bai a min koe a. Wo e wan dechee yɔ wo bemba n ta bemba nu. Wo ee dɔn tima ɔ tima ko a, wo too ma sɔ koe a Yataa Nyina ma.
44007052	Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ kan kɔ kan nii nɔ, ni wo bemba n ta bemba n ma ko ma gbaaenɛ sa ni min ma. An‑na Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fa wan, miin na‑a a gbonka suun, a si Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ ma. Mbɛ an wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ, min tanden mu a chen kɔɔ, ɛ na‑a wan. Chɛɛ wo gbu‑a a ma tachɛ gbɛ, mbɛ wo‑a a fa.
44007053	Wo wan mu mɔɛ n na, Yataa na‑a a 'a sawa be miin ma. Maeka n fan na‑a na sawa chɛ a wo tena. Chɛɛ wo ma dɔn ni, wo ni don sawa chɛ kɔɔ.”
44007054	An‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an faa tɛ‑a wan gbeden Sitibin da a bai chɛ ma. Mbɛ an bun‑da an nyinɛ a daun‑da mɔnɛ ɔ, a si a ma.
44007055	Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina ni wan Sitibin fɛ gban. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a sɛ banda a, a‑a Yataa 'a manɛ yen ɛ man‑da. A yɛ to, a‑a Chisɔsi wɛɛ yen, ɛ sɔ ɔ Yataa boo nyima ɔ.
44007056	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “A yen ko, n‑na banda bu ɔ yen, a da a kaenɛ ɛ. A sin, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ, ɛ sɔ ɔ Yataa boo nyima ɔ.”
44007057	Chɛɛ an‑na yee tɛ wan, mbɛ an‑na an boo don an too ɔ, an ma na a da a kuiɛ chɛ a min to. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, an sawan‑da Sitibin ma,
44007058	mbɛ an‑na a konkon a bɔ an duu chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an bun‑da a ma bon bon‑da, a fa koe a. Miin ni ka sii n na, an 'na doma kun ma doma nu, an‑na an bɔ wan, mbɛ an‑na an to kamin tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ boo ɔ, min tɔ ni Sɔɔ.
44007059	An sin ni kɛn a ma bon bon tena, Sitibin‑na samunɛ chɛ wan, a ɔ, “Mansa Chisɔsi, n‑na n fɔɛ be i ma. A sa tena ɔ bɛn n ye.”
44007060	Mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban duu ma, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a. A ɔ, “Mansa, i boo bɔ mɔɛ chɛ n 'na ko yama chɛ n dɔ, an mbe ka min ma‑a n na.” A ban‑da kɛn samun chɛ chɛ‑a, mbɛ a fa‑a.
44008001	Sɔɔ‑a toa si, Sitibin fa koe kɔɔ Sitibin fa‑a kɛn, mɔɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ wan ko ma gbaaenɛ sa‑a chɛ n ma Chuusaɛn, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a. A ka Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ma, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an dɔ fasan‑da wan a ɔ ben‑da gbɛɛ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a basan Samayia a.
44008002	Mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin fɔɛ been ni ka Yataa fai koe a, an‑na Sitibin tɔn fan. An sin‑na chinchima di chɛ wan to, a si Sitibin fa koe ma.
44008003	Chɛɛ Sɔɔ bun‑da wan ta si‑a chɔchi mɔɛ n gbu kɔɔ. A ni don fan chen kan kɔ kan na, a ɛ ta‑a mɔɛ chɛ n bia‑a, miin‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a. A‑a musu n konkon fan, an bɛ mɔ kaima n na, a‑a an da a tɔn pimbi chenɛ a.
44008004	Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ miin na fasan‑da ka a ɔ, an ben ben‑da wan, an‑na Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na.
44008005	Fiipi ni mɔ dɔndɔ an na mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin na fasan‑da a ɔ. A yii‑a wan duu dɔndɔ ɔ, Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a bai sa a si kunka mansa ma.
44008006	Fanka fanka wa chɛ‑a an too ma sɔ wan chɛndɛ chɛ, a da a bai ma. Koe min na mu, a‑a kamaya ko wa miin ma ka, an ni a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ a 'a sakana bai chɛ ka‑a Yataa tena wan.
44008007	Koe min na mu, Fiipi‑a a ma wan, mbɛ nyina yama n ka‑a mɔ sɛsɛ fɛ, an ni miin fɛ. A sin, an nyina yama chɛ n ni yee tɛ wan gbankon, an mbe e na to ka‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ. A‑a namaa n sɛsɛ baun fan, an bɛ tamban tɔɛ n na.
44008008	Chɛ ko a, buɔdia wa dɛgbɛ ni wan an duu chɛ ɔ.
44008009	Chɛɛ kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Saimɔn. Tima ɔ yansama ko a, kamin chɛ na‑a Samayia mɔɛ n na fii wan a 'a nkofo koe n na, a ni miin ma. A na‑a a fɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ye, a ɔ, mɔ chenama mu a a.
44008010	Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan duu chɛ ɔ, an‑na an too ma sɔ a da a bai chɛ ma. A ka mɔ chenama n ma, a ta mɔɛ tɔɛ n tena, an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ te, “Mɔna chɛ, Yataa 'a gbasaya an mbe a ɔ, an mbe min chee Gbasaya Wa.”
44008011	An sin na‑a an too ma sɔ wan a ma. Koe min na mu, tima ɔ yansama ko a, an da ɔ gbaaen fan ni a wan Saimɔn 'na nkofoya a.
44008012	Chɛɛ Fiipi‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian kɛn an na, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, a basan Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ a, mɔ sɛsɛ dan‑da wan a a. Mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, musu nu, an bɛ kai n na.
44008013	Saimɔn wandi gbu wɛɛ, a tima chɛ a, a‑a a kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. Yii chɛ‑a wan a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a sin, a nii ma ka ni to Fiipi fɛ. A da ɔ na‑a gbaa wan, a na‑a kamaya ko wa sɛsɛ chɛ n dɔ yen kɛn, Fiipi ni miin ma tena. An koe chɛ n sin ni a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ a 'a sakana bai chɛ ka‑a Yataa an tena.
44008014	Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ miin ni gbɛ Chuusaɛn, an‑na a a min fan, mbɛ Samayia mɔɛ n‑na an boo si Yataa bai kɔɔ. An‑na chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ an‑na Pita sɔ, an fea Chɔn n na, ta koe a an tena.
44008015	An sin yii‑a wan nɔ an tena, mbɛ an‑na samunɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ miin‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a, Yataa Nyina ni bea an fɛ.
44008016	Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina nii ma bea nin bɛ an dɔndɔ wɛɛ fɛ. An na‑a yii an chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ.
44008017	Mbɛ Pita an fea Chɔn na, an‑na an boo bun mɔɛ chɛ n ma, an‑na samunɛ chɛ, mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ.
44008018	Saimɔn‑na a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ, kɛn Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an boo bun an ma. Chɛ ma‑a kɛn, a toen ni a ni kɔpɔɛ be Pita ma, an fea Chɔn na, an gbasaya chɛ ko a.
44008019	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo gbasaya chɛ be n ma, min mbe a ma, n bɛɛ, ni n‑na n boo bun mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, Yataa Nyina ni bea a mɔɛ chɛ fɛ.”
44008020	Chɛɛ Pita ɔ, “Yataa ni i a ta ta ɔ, i 'a kɔpɔɛ chɛ a i boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, ɛ wan i yii ma, mbɛ e kun fan i ni kɔpɔɛ be, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni gbasaya chɛ be i ma.
44008021	E ee kun mmɔ bɛ ni wai chɛ chɛ, koe min na mu, i faa ɔ ma gbɛ ni Yataa chen kɔɔ.
44008022	Chɛ an fɛ mu, i kan kɔ sɔ i 'a yiinachii yama chɛ a, mbɛ i‑a samunɛ chɛ Mansa Chisɔsi tena. Kɔkɔɛ ɛ chinchin‑da wan i ma, yiinachii yama chɛ ko a.
44008023	Koe min na mu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ faa yama an mbe i ɔ, a yɛ to, i ma‑a yɔnɛ a, ko yama boo a.”
44008024	Mbɛ Saimɔn dɔ, “Wo dimu, wo Mansa Yataa fai n ko a, min mbe a ma, wo‑a koe miin gbɛɛ fɔ ka, an ma na ma n na.”
44008025	Pita an fea Chɔn na, an ban‑da wan koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, an‑na min dɔ sɔn a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn, an mbe ta‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, duu sɛsɛ n dɔ Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44008026	Mbɛ Mansa Yataa‑a maeka sɔ Fiipi tena. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ Fiipi ye, a ɔ, “I ma bɛn, i ni yii denka ɔ, chia chɛ a, min kaen mu Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Ta, aan a che Kasa fuinɛ ma. Chia chɛ mu fuinɛ ma chia an na.”
44008027	Mbɛ Fiipi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a chia chɛ a. Mbɛ a yen ko, a tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, kai dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min na‑a ka Itiopia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A ni ben tena wan a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, a yɛ a waa a. Mɔ chenama ni a a Itiopia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mansa de chɛ 'a kɔpɔɛ kun ma. A na‑a ka samun chɛ tena wan Chuusaɛn, a ɛ yɛ‑a Itiopia. A ni si ɔ mɔto gbingbi an dɔ, soo n mbe min sawan. A ni kɛn si ɔ mɔto gbingbi chɛ ɔ, a ni wan gboo kan‑da, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a min nyɛn.
44008029	Mbɛ Yataa Nyina‑a a fɔ Fiipi ye, a ɔ, “I ma tundu gbɛdɛn mɔto gbingbi chɛ baima.”
44008030	Fiipi wɛɛ‑a bui sa wan a a mɔto chɛ tena, mbɛ a‑a a a min, mɔɛ ɛ Aisaya 'a gboo chɛ kan‑da. Mbɛ Fiipi‑a kamin chɛ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “E gboo chɛ ɔ gbɛ tena wan chɛndɛ chɛ, e ka min kan‑da?”
44008031	Mbɛ a ɔ, “N mbe ee che a ɔ gbɛ‑a, mɔɔ ni mɔɛ‑a n sɔ chia ma.” Mbɛ a gbu‑a a fɔ Fiipi ye, a ɔ, a ni sɛ mɔto gbingbi chɛ ɔ, a ni si a baima.
44008032	A ni ka kaina min kan‑da Yataa 'a gboo chɛ ɔ, an nii nɛ: “An ta‑a wan a a, a fa koe a yɔ sa, A yɛ to, bai ɔ bai ma bɔ ni a da a. yɔ sa tɔngbɔɛ ma maun buɛ, ni an ma‑a a ti tɛ‑a a a.
44008033	An‑na baa bɔ wan a ma. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma dɔn ni, a 'a tea fɔ koe a. Mɔ ee che bai fɔ‑a, a si a 'a den ma, a mu min na, an‑na a wandi gbu ta fɔɛ ya wan banda kun ma.”
44008034	Mbɛ mɔ chenama chɛ‑a a fɔ Fiipi ye, a ɔ, “A fɔ wɛ n ye, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ ɛ bai chɛ sa tena ka a si mɔɛ min ma. Ɛ a sa tena, a si a wandi an ma, chɛ ma, a sien mu mɔ dɔ mende an ma?”
44008035	Mbɛ Fiipi‑a an kaina chɛ fasai kamin chɛ ye, a ni ka kaina min kan tena. Mbɛ a‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian kamin chɛ a, a si Chisɔsi ma.
44008036	Mbɛ an mbe kɛn ta‑a chia chɛ a, an che‑a wan kaina, yii ni kaina min. Mbɛ Itiopia mɔ chenama chɛ‑a a fɔ Fiipi ye, a ɔ, “Yii yen ko nɛ. Ko ɔ ko ɛ wan nɔ, min mbe i ka‑a to yii chɛ‑a n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a?”
44008038	Mbɛ kamin chɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, soo chɛ ni sɔ, mbɛ a sɔ‑a. Mbɛ an fea Fiipi a, an puin‑da, an yii‑a yii chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ Fiipi‑a yii chɛ mɔ chenama chɛ kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
44008039	An fea chɛ gbɛɛ bɔ‑a kɛn yii chɛ ɔ, mbɛ Yataa Nyina‑a Fiipi a tuin. Kai chɛ ma a yen ni to, mbɛ a wɛɛ‑a a 'a tachɛ a tun a ma. A bu ɔ diama wa ni gbɛ, ɛ ta‑a.
44008040	Chɛɛ Fiipi‑a a wandi yen fan gbɛ duu dɔndɔ ɔ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Asotɔsi. A sin ben‑da wan nɔ ma, a ɛ ta‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ sa‑a duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, aan a che Sisayea duu ɔ.
44009001	Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, Sɔɔ ni wan tun ko ma gbaaenɛ sa‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin na‑a an kai fa Mansa Chisɔsi a. A sin, a toen fan ni to, a ni an fa. Mbɛ a ta‑a Chu n 'na tɛ mɔ wa chɛ tena,
44009002	mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa, gboo be koe a a ma. Gboo nyɛndenɛ chɛ, ɛ kun fan a ni a wakoe ɔ yian, ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n na, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na, Damasikɔsi duu ɔ. A na‑a chɛ ma koe min na, a toen ni, ni a‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ tan, min‑na a sɔ chia chɛ fɛ, Chisɔsi‑a min yian ka a sɔ koe a a fɛ, a ni a bia. A ni ma mɔ kaima a, chɛ ma, musu wɛɛ, a ni na a a Chuusaɛn duu bu ɔ.
44009003	A ni kɛn gbɛ ta‑a, mbɛ a gbɛn‑da Damasikɔsi duu ɔ ma. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, man ba‑a a a bɛn, a ka banda a.
44009004	A bea‑a wan duu ma, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a ɔ, “Sɔɔ, Sɔɔ, fen mu e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka n ma?”
44009005	Mbɛ Sɔɔ ɔ, “Nyɔn mu chɛ a?” Mbɛ a ɔ, “N fan mu, n fan Chisɔsi, e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka min ma.
44009006	Chɛɛ i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni ta Damasikɔsi duu wa chɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan i a nɔ, e koe min ma.”
44009007	Sɔɔ ni ka ta tena, an bɛ mɔɛ miin na, an bɛɛ na‑a sɔ wan, chɛɛ an ma bai tɛ ni a ma gbukuu wɛɛ. An bɛɛ na‑a mɔɛ chɛ kuiɛ a min fan, chɛɛ an nii ma an mɔɛ chɛ gbu yen ni an ya a.
44009008	Mbɛ Sɔɔ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ duu ma, a‑a a ya a ka paden, chɛɛ a nii ma kaina kan kɔ kan yen ni to. Mbɛ an‑na a bia a boo ma, an ta‑a a a Damasikɔsi duu ɔ.
44009009	A sin ni wan tee sawa ko a, a ee kaina yen. A tima chɛ sin gbɛɛ ɔ, a nii daun chɛ, n mbe ee baa, yii min ko ma.
44009010	Mbɛ a yen ko gbɛ, Chisɔsi fɛ den dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ Damasikɔsi, min tɔ ni Ananiyasi. A na‑a ma wan yɔ a ni cho ɔ wan, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a chee, a ɔ, “Ananiyasi!” Mbɛ a dɔn‑da, a ɔ, “Mansa, n yen ko nɛ.”
44009011	Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ, “I ma bɛn, mbɛ i ta‑a dani chɛ a, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Dani Tandenɛ. An dani chɛ a, chenɛ ɛ wan nɔ, min mu Chudasi ta a a. Tisa chɛ nɔ kamin dɔndɔ ko a, min tɔ mu Sɔɔ. A ka‑a Tasɔsi duu ɔ wan. A yen ko samunɛ chɛ‑a, sanche wɛɛ.
44009012	A sin na‑a koe ɔ yen fan, yɔ a ni cho ɔ wan. A na‑a mɔ dɔndɔ yen fan, min tɔ mu Ananiyasi. Ananiyasi chɛ na‑a wan, mbɛ a don‑da chen chɛ a, ɛ ka kaina min. Mbɛ a‑a a boo bun a ma, min mbe a ma, a ni kaina yen to.”
44009013	Chɛɛ Ananiyasi ɔ, “Mansa, mɔ sɛsɛ n‑na kamin chɛ wakoe ɔ yian fan n na. A‑a ko ma gbaaenɛ miin sa i 'a mɔɛ n ma Chuusaɛn, a koo.
44009014	Mbɛ a sin gbu na‑a ka wan gbɛ Damasikɔsi, gboo nyɛndenɛ a a boo ɔ. Gboo chɛ sin, a‑a gbasaya be wan a ma, a ka Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n tena, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ bia koe a, miin mbe i fai tena.”
44009015	Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Ta, mɔna chɛ mu, n‑na n boo sɔ min ma, wai chɛ koe a n ko a. A ni n bakoe ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, a basan mansa n na, an bɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na.
44009016	A sin, n mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan a a gbɛ, a wɛɛ, ɛ mɔnɛ min nyɔn sima ɔ bia‑a n ko a.”
44009017	Mbɛ Ananiyasi ta‑a, a don‑da chen chɛ a, Sɔɔ ni min na. Mbɛ a‑a a boo bun a ma, a‑a samunɛ chɛ. A ɔ, “Sɔɔ, n suun ma nyɔɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ, a wandi gbu, an‑na n sɔ ka i tena. An na‑a bɔ ka i ya a, chia chɛ a, kɛn i ni na tena nɛ duu chɛ ɔ. A‑a n sɔ, min mbe a ma, i ni kaina yen to. A yɛ to, Yataa Nyina ni bea i fɛ gban.”
44009018	Mbɛ Ananiyasi‑a bai chɛ fɔ kɛn, a ya kɔɔɛ a, fenɛ bea‑a, a bɔ Sɔɔ ya a yɔ nyɛ wɔnbɔɛ, mbɛ a‑a kaina yen to. Mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a sɔ‑a, mbɛ Ananiyasi‑a yii chɛ a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
44009019	Mbɛ a‑a daunɛ chɛ kɛn, a fanka yɛ‑a wan to a ɔ. Sɔɔ ya chɛ a ka‑a kɛn, a ni wan Damasikɔsi, an bɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n na, tee kuunden ko a.
44009020	A nii ma tima yayi ni, chɛɛ a ta‑a wan dɔndɔ gbe Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na. Mbɛ a bun‑da bai sa‑a, a si Chisɔsi ma, a ɔ, Yataa 'a denɛ an nɛ.
44009021	Mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ‑a a da a kuiɛ chɛ a min ka, an na fii‑a wan. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Wuo, kamin chɛ an ni mɔɛ n fa pan Chuusaɛn, miin ni kamin chɛ fai, min mu Chisɔsi a. An ma chɛ a? A gbu sin, a na‑a nɛ ka mɔɛ chɛ n fan gbu bia koe a, ta koe a an na Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n tena. Ae?”
44009022	Yataa‑a gbasaya be wan Sɔɔ ma, a 'a Yataa bai sa ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, ni a‑a a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, mbɛ Chisɔsi an mu kunka mansa a, dɔ tisa nii ma nɔ. A da a bai kɔ ni gbɛɛ buɛ min dɔ, Chu mɔɛ miin ni Damasikɔsi, an nii che bai ɔ bai sa‑a.
44009023	Tee sɛsɛ bendenɛ gbakɔ, Chu mɔɛ n bɛn‑da wan kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ bɛn Sɔɔ fa koe a,
44009024	chɛɛ mɔɛ n‑na an 'na dɔbɛn chɛ kɔɔ yian fan Sɔɔ a. Su ɔ tee a, mɔɛ n ni wan Sɔɔ ma kɔn tena, a fa koe a. Kanda wa chɛ min tindandenɛ ni duu wa chɛ a, an ni wan sɔ ɔ a da gbɛɛ ma kɔn‑da.
44009025	Chɛɛ su dɔndɔ ɔ, Sɔɔ fɛ mɔɛ n‑na a si wan tɛngbɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a a ben sonɛ a, min ni kanda wa chɛ ma. An‑na a a yii wan, a che duu ma.
44009026	Sɔɔ ta‑a wan Chuusaɛn, mbɛ a ta‑a Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ n tena. A toen ni an ni sa an kaa a. Chɛɛ an nii ma dan ni a a, mbɛ a wan Sɔɔ wɛɛ mu gbɛ an dɔndɔ an na. A sin, an gbɛɛ chiandenɛ ni a wan Sɔɔ gbu ma.
44009027	Chɛɛ Banabasi basan‑da wan Sɔɔ ma, a yian koe a Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n na. A‑a a ɔ yian fan an na, Mansa Chisɔsi bɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ Sɔɔ ya a, kɛn a ni ta tena Damasikɔsi. A yɛ to, Mansa Chisɔsi koɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ a tena. Banabasi yɛ‑a wan to, a‑a a ɔ yian, Sɔɔ na‑a Yataa bai sa buɛ min dɔ faagbɛa a, mɔɛ n tena Damasikɔsi, a si Chisɔsi ma.
44009028	Chɛ ko a, an dɔn‑da wan, an bɛ ni ma Sɔɔ a. A ka gbɛ a tee chɛ gbu sin ma, a ben ben‑da Chuusaɛn gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ ta‑a bai sa‑a, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma, faagbɛa wandi a.
44009029	A‑a bai sa wan Chu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ tena, miin ni Kiisi koɛ fɔ ka. An ni ma bai ɔ, a ni sɔ wan an kanɛ ɔ kaka. Chɛ an fɛ ni, an toen ni, an ni a fa.
44009030	Sɔɔ suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na koe chɛ kɔɔ sɔn kɛn, an yii‑a wan Sɔɔ a Sisayea duu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a a ta Tasɔsi duu ɔ.
44009031	Mbɛ a ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, faachima yɛ‑a wan to mɔɛ chɛ n ma, chɔchi n gbɛɛ ɔ. A ka Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ta Kadidi, ni Samayia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Yataa Nyina basan‑da wan an ma, an dɔ gbɛa koe a. A sin, an ma munda‑a wan kaka, a mu min na, an gbɛɛ ni basɔmaya wa be wan Mansa Chisɔsi ma.
44009032	Tima che‑a wan, Pita ni ben ben Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma. Tima dɔndɔ a, a ta‑a wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n kɔndɔn‑da, miin ni si ɔ Dida duu ɔ.
44009033	An duu chɛ ɔ, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Ainɛasi. A namaaenɛ ni. A sin, san sɛin ko a, a nii ma che ni puin‑da a sa sofa gbu a.
44009034	Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ainɛasi, Chisɔsi Chasi‑a i baun. I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni i 'a sofa ɔ bɛn.” A ya kɔɔɛ a, Ainɛasi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ.
44009035	Mɔɛ gbɛɛ, miin ni ka Dida duu chɛ ɔ, an fea Saon na, an‑na kamin chɛ yen fan tachɛ a. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ‑a an ya a mun, Mansa Chisɔsi ma, a tima chɛ a gbɛ.
44009036	Chɔpa duu wɛɛ ɔ, musu dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Tabita. A na‑a a kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. Kiisi mɔɛ n ni a chee, an dɔ, Dɔkasi, min fasaien ni dɔmba. A 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ni wai nyima wa an chɛ, a ɛ basan yɔn tɔɛ n bɛɛ ma.
44009037	Tima che‑a wan gbɛ, a gbandi‑a, mbɛ a fa‑a. An‑na a su koe chɛ wan, an‑na a ma bɛn, mbɛ an‑na a sa dumu dɔndɔ ɔ, a 'a banda a chenɛ a.
44009038	Chɔpa ɔ nii ma yansan Dida a. Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ nu Chɔpa, an‑na a a min kɛn, mbɛ Pita ɛ Dida, an‑na mɔ fea n sɔ wan a tena. An dɔ, a dimu, a ni na bui chɛ a nɔ an tena, Chɔpa.
44009039	Mbɛ Pita‑a a ma bɛn, an bɛ ta‑a mɔ fea chɛ n na. An‑na a fo kɛn, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na Pita ya wan, mbɛ an sɛ‑a a a banda chenɛ chɛ dumu chɛ ɔ. Fuinya musu n gbɛɛ, an tindan‑da wan Pita a, an mbe di chɛ‑a fiko fiko. An mbe ta‑a to koa n yian‑da Pita a, Dɔkasi na‑a miin nyan, a ni kɛn fɔɛ ɔ.
44009040	Mbɛ Pita‑a an gbɛɛ a bɔ dumu gbu ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a kumbai gbangban, a‑a samunɛ chɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun su chɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Tabita, i kɔɔ sɔ.” Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, Tabita‑a a ya a ka. A sin‑na Pita yen kɛn, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ a si‑a.
44009041	Mbɛ Pita‑a a bia a boo ma, mbɛ a basan‑da a ma, a kɔɔ sɔ koe a, a ni sɔ. Mbɛ Pita‑a mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ chee, miin na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, a basan fuinya musu chɛ n na, mbɛ a‑a musu chɛ a yɛ an ma, a fɔɛ ɛ a sun da a.
44009042	Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ Chɔpa duu ɔ, an‑na koe chɛ a min fan, a si musu chɛ ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan to, mɔ sɛsɛ n‑na an kai fa Mansa Chisɔsi a.
44009043	Pita ni wan Chɔpa tee sɛsɛ ko a, kamin dɔndɔ a sondaya a, min tɔ ni Saimɔn. Saimɔn chɛ ni kanche an na.
44010001	Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ Sisayea duu ɔ, min tɔ ni Kɔniyɔsi. A ni soya gbakoo dɔndɔ an na, Domi soya chɛmɛ dɔndɔ kun ma. Chɛ ni kaka dɔndɔ an na, soya chɛ n tɛ ɔ, an ni miin chee, an dɔ, Itadi mɔɛ n 'na soya nu.
44010002	An kamin chɛ ni mɔɛ an na, min ni kooya be Yataa ma. A ni Yataa fai wan tima ɔ tima ko a, an bɛ a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. A boo fenɛ nii ma dɔɔ, a ni min be, basan koe a yɔn tɔɛ n ma. A gboo ɔ nii fa, samunɛ chɛ koe a.
44010003	Tee kɔ kai ma ni, tee dɔndɔ a, mbɛ Kɔniyɔsi‑a koe ɔ yen, yɔ a ni cho ɔ wan. A‑a maeka yen fan pɛnɛnɛ a wandi ya a, a na‑a a tena, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Kɔniyɔsi!”
44010004	A‑a maeka chɛ ma fɛn fan tidan, a chianden ba ɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Mansa, fen mu?” Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, “Yataa‑a i 'a samunɛ n na min. A‑a a ɔ yen, e boo fenɛ miin be tena yɔn tɔɛ n ma. A sin, a ma bɛnden mu, a ni i 'a samunɛ a bia.
44010005	A sin, sanche gbɛ, mɔɛ n na ta Chɔpa duu ɔ, kamin dɔndɔ chee koe a, min tɔ mu Saimɔn. A tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ an nɛ, Pita.
44010006	Ɛ kamin dɔndɔ an 'na sondaya a, min tɔ mu Saimɔn. Kanche mu an kamin chɛ a, a sin, a 'a chenɛ ɛ kɔ yii kaa a wan.”
44010007	Mbɛ maeka chɛ ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a Kɔniyɔsi tena, a ta‑a gbae. Mbɛ Kɔniyɔsi‑a bɔi den fea n ya, miin ni wai chɛ tena a kɔɔ a 'a chenɛ a, ni soya mɔ dɔndɔ. An soya mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, a Yataa koen ni kaka, a sin fan ni Kɔniyɔsi fɛ basan koe a a ma.
44010008	A‑a a ɔ yian fan an na, maeka chɛ na‑a bai min fɔ a ye, mbɛ a‑a an na ta Chɔpa duu ɔ.
44010009	Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, Kɔniyɔsi‑a mɔɛ miin sɔ ka, an che‑a wan Chɔpa baima, tee kun tɛ. Pita wɛɛ sɛ‑a wan chen chɛ kun tɛ, a tima chɛ a, min mbe a ma, a ni samunɛ chɛ.
44010010	Kɔnkɔɛ‑a Pita bia wan, daun fen daun sɔɛ ɛ a a. An ni daun fen nyan tena wan a ye, mbɛ a‑a koe ɔ yen, yɔ a ni cho ɔ wan.
44010011	A‑a banda bu ɔ yen fan a a ka‑a, mbɛ a‑a fenɛ yen yii‑a dunya ɔ, yɔ koa wa, a biaenɛ ɛ a tɔnkɔn naaninɛ ma.
44010012	An koa chɛ ɔ, soe kan kɔ kan ni wan a ɔ, ni ka kan kɔ kan, a basan konde kan kɔ kan na.
44010013	Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Pita, i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni min kɔ min fa, i ni a daun.”
44010014	Chɛɛ Pita‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Mansa, a ma ma ka. N ma fen kɔ fen daun nin bɛ, nn 'na Chu sawa ɛ min ma bɔ, mbɛ a ma nyamuien fan mu Yataa tena nn ko a, nn ni a daun.”
44010015	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ kuiɛ chɛ‑a a fɔ to a ye, a ɔ, “Yataa ɛ a fɔ fenɛ min ma, a nyin, i ma a fɔ, mbɛ a ma nyamuienɛ mu.”
44010016	Kuiɛ chɛ‑a bai chɛ fɔ si tena sawa, mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, koa chɛ tuin‑da, a yɛ banda bu ɔ.
44010017	Pita ni tun a yii na chii tena koe chɛ an ma, a‑a min dɔ yen ka, yɔ a ni cho ɔ wan. A toen ni a ni a ɔ sɔn, ni a sien mu fen ma. Mbɛ Kɔniyɔsi na‑a mɔɛ miin sɔ ka, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, a wan Saimɔn 'na chenɛ ni kaina min. An gbu sin ni gbɛ sɔ ɔ wan baa ma, an chen chɛ kata chɛ da a.
44010018	Mbɛ an‑na chee chɛ, an dɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan nɛ sondaya a, min tɔ mu Saimɔn Pita?”
44010019	Pita ni tun yiinachii an dɔ, a tima chɛ a, an koe chɛ ɔ gbɛ koe a, min mbe ka yɔ cho. Yataa Nyina‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “A yen ko, mɔ kaima sawa n na‑a, an mbe an ya a kan‑da i a.
44010020	I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni yii, i ni an tan, mbɛ wo bɛ ta‑a an na. I ma sika, koe min na mu, n fan‑na an sɔ i tena.”
44010021	Mbɛ Pita‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a yii‑a an tena, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ mɔ sawa chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Wo e ka wo ya a kan tena n fan na. Fen mu wo na‑a?”
44010022	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kaminɛ min mbe soya chɛmɛ dɔndɔɛ chɛ n ya ɔ, an‑na nn sɔ. A tɔ mu Kɔniyɔsi. A ɛ kooya be wan Yataa ma, a sin tanden mu. A sin to, Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a basɔmaya be wan a ma. Maeka an bɔ‑a Kɔniyɔsi chɛ ya a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, a ni i chee a 'a chenɛ a. A ɔ, a ni i da a bai a min, e min fɔ‑a.”
44010023	Mbɛ Pita‑a kamin chɛ n chee a 'a chenɛ a, an yɛɛ chɛ ma, an ma‑a sonda n na a tena. A banda ɔ ka ma, an ta‑a wan, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na. A sin, suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ dɔ nu Chasi ɔ, a ka Chɔpa duu ɔ, an bɛɛ‑a a sɔ wan an fɛ.
44010024	An che‑a wan Sisayea duu ɔ, tee dɔndɔɛ ma. Kɔniyɔsi ni wan a ma kɔn tena kaina. A sin na‑a a suun ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ a sɔn sɔn fan, an bɛ a dia nyɔɛ n na.
44010025	Pita‑a a kunɛ a don kɛn chen chɛ a, Kɔniyɔsi bea‑a wan a chen kɔɔ, a bun‑da a fai‑a.
44010026	Chɛɛ Pita‑a a ma wan, Kɔniyɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ɔ, “I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni sɔ. N bɛɛ mu dechee mɔ gbu an na.”
44010027	Pita to‑a wan koɔ‑a Kɔniyɔsi tena, aan an don‑da chen chɛ a, a‑a mɔ sɛsɛ n na sɔndenɛ tan kaina.
44010028	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wandi gbu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ nn 'na Chu sawa‑a min fɔ. Mbɛ nn fan Chu mɔ kan kɔ kan, nn mbe ee ta mɔ ɔ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ 'a chen na. Chɛ ma, nn ni gbɛn an ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛɛ Yataa ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da n na, mbɛ n ma tɛ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan dɔ, n gbu ma mɔ ma nyamui koe fɔ.
44010029	Chɛ an fɛ mu, i‑a mɔɛ n na ta kɛn n chee‑a, n ma n kun dɔ nyan ni, na koe a. A ɔ yian gbɛ n na, i‑a n chee fen ko a?”
44010030	Mbɛ Kɔniyɔsi ɔ, “Bi an‑na a ma gbɛ tee naanin, koe chɛ ma‑a. N ni wan samun chɛ‑a, tee kɔ kai ma, nɛ n 'na chenɛ a. Mbɛ a yen ko, n‑na mɔ kaima yen sɔ ɔ, a ma koa ɛ man‑da taun.
44010031	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Kɔniyɔsi, Yataa‑a i 'a samunɛ a min. A sin, a‑a a ɔ yen, e boo fenɛ miin be yɔn tɔɛ n ma.
44010032	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ a ta Chɔpa, kamin dɔndɔ chee koe a, min tɔ mu Saimɔn. A tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ an nɛ Pita. Ɛ kamin dɔndɔ an 'na sondaya a, min tɔ mu to Saimɔn. Saimɔn chɛ mu kanche an na, a sin, a 'a chenɛ ɛ kɔ yii kaa a wan.’
44010033	Mbɛ an‑na a ma, n‑na mɔɛ n sɔ i chee‑a bui chɛ a. I wɛɛ, i‑a ko chɛndɛ ma wan, i na koe a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, sanche gbɛ, mmɔ gbɛɛ a sɔn sɔn‑da nɛ Yataa chen kɔɔ. Nn gbɛɛ sin too ma sɔen mu ka gbɛ i wan ma, Mansa Yataa‑a bai min don i da a, nn ko a, nn ni an bai a min.”
44010034	Mbɛ Pita bun‑da koɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Sanche mu ka gbɛ, n‑na a ɔ sɔn, tea ko a, mbɛ Yataa ee mɔ gbu gbɛɛ tɛ bɔ.
44010035	Chɛɛ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan dunya chɛ ɔ, i wɛn mbe chian Yataa ma, mbɛ i‑a a faa ma koe ma, ɛ a boo si‑a wan i mɔɛ chɛ kɔɔ.
44010036	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, Yataa‑a bai min na ta Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tena. A ni wan sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ faachima ɛ sɔn fan Yataa a, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, min mu mɔ gbu gbɛɛ 'a mansa a.
44010037	Wo‑a a sɔn fan, min ma‑a Chu chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. A kuu sɔ‑a Kadidi wan, Chɔn ban‑da kɛn a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, a si yii chɛ koe ma an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
44010038	A yɛ to, wo‑a Chisɔsi wakoe ɔ sɔn fan, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ. Yataa na‑a a Nyina be buɛ min dɔ a ma, a basan gbasaya a. Chisɔsi ben ben‑da wan a ɔ gbɛɛ, ɛ ta‑a ko chɛndɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n na, mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ baun, miin ni Sitana 'a gbasaya kɔɔ. Koe min ni a ma, a ni chɛ ma, Yataa ni wan a fɛ.
44010039	Siiya mu nn fan na, a si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, a‑a miin ma Chu mɔɛ n 'na chɛnyɛ ɔ, ni Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An na‑a a gbangban fan kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a fa‑a nɔ.
44010040	Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ, tee sawan bɔɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a a ma, a bɔ‑a mɔɛ n ya a.
44010041	Chisɔsi nii ma bɔ ni mɔɛ gbɛɛ an ya a, chɛɛ a bɔ‑a dechee nn fan ya a. Yataa na‑a a boo sɔ nn fɛn ma, ma koe a sii n na. Nn fan‑na daun dɔndɔɛ chɛ, nn‑na nn min kaina dɔndɔɛ, Chisɔsi a sɔenɛ gbakɔ saya ɔ.
44010042	A sin‑na a fɔ wan nn ye, a ɔ, nn ni Yataa bai sa mɔɛ n tena. Mbɛ nn‑na siiya bɔ, a si a wakoe ma. A ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ Yataa‑a a wan Chisɔsi an yian, kaa a tɛ koe a, chɛndɛ ba n ko a, an bɛ fuɛ n na.
44010043	Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ na‑a bai sa wan, a si Chisɔsi chɛ ma. An dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi chɛ a, Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ a ko yama n dɔ, Chisɔsi ko a.”
44010044	Pita to‑a koɔ tena wan, mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ fɛ, miin ni an too ma sɔ tena a 'a sakana bai chɛ ma.
44010045	Pita n bɛ na‑a wan Chɔpa duu ɔ, an bɛ Chu mɔɛ n na, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a. An da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, koe chɛ ɔ yen koe a. Mbɛ Yataa ɛ kun fan, a ni a ma, a Nyina ni ma mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ fɛ, miin ma Chu mɔ a.
44010046	Koe min na mu, an‑na a a min fan, mɔɛ chɛ n mbe kamaya bai n fɔ‑a, mɔɛ n mbe ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, an mbe ta‑a Yataa tando‑a. Mbɛ Pita‑a a fɔ, a ɔ,
44010047	“Yataa Nyina bea‑a ka wan mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ, yɔ a bea‑a buɛ min dɔ nn bɛɛ fɛ. Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee to nɔ, min mbe an ka‑a yii chɛ koe a an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.”
44010048	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, an ni ma nɔ an tɛ ɔ, tee kuunden ko a.
44011001	Bai ben‑da wan gbɛ a ɔ, Chudia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. A che‑a Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ suun ma nyɔɛ tɔɛ n na Chasi ɔ, a si mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma ka Chu mɔ a. Mbɛ an bɛɛ, an‑na an boo si Yataa 'a bai kɔɔ.
44011002	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Pita yɛ‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn, Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an bu ɔ nii ma di a wakoe a. An danden ni ka a a, mbɛ ni mɔɛ a ma kamincha ni, a ee che a kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a. Mbɛ an‑na Pita ma nyin fan,
44011003	an dɔ, “I ta‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n 'na chenɛ a, mɔɛ miin na ma kamincha ni ka, mbɛ wo gbu sin yɛ‑a to, wo bɛ an na, wo‑a daunɛ chɛ kaina dɔndɔ. Fen ko a mu, i‑a chɛ ma?”
44011004	Mbɛ Pita wɛɛ si‑a ko ɔ ko ma, a‑a a gbɛɛ ɔ yian an na dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
44011005	A ɔ, “N ni tee dɔndɔ a samun chɛ‑a Chɔpa duu chɛ ɔ, n‑na koe ɔ yen fan, yɔ n ni cho ɔ wan. N‑na fenɛ yen fan yii‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ, yɔ koa wa, a biaenɛ ɛ a tɔnkɔn naaninɛ ma. Mbɛ a che‑a kɛn n baima, a sɛmbɛ‑a yii koe a.
44011006	N‑na koa chɛ bu ɔ fɛn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, a sin, n‑na soe sɛsɛ yen fan a ɔ, ka sɛsɛ nu, an bɛ konde sɛsɛ n na.
44011007	Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a ɔ, ‘Pita, i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni min kɔ min fa, i ni a daun.’
44011008	Chɛɛ n‑na a fɔ wan, n dɔ, ‘Mansa, a ma ma ka. N ma fen kɔ fen daun nin bɛ, mabɔɛ ɛ min ma, nn 'na Chu sawa ta fɛ chia a, fenɛ min ma nyamuien mu Yataa tena.’
44011009	Mbɛ kuiɛ chɛ ɔ te to, a ɔ, ‘Yataa ɛ a fɔ fenɛ min ma, a nyin, i ma a fɔ, mbɛ a ma nyamuienɛ mu.’
44011010	Chɛ ma‑a si tena sawa, mbɛ koa chɛ basan fen chɛ n na, miin ni a ɔ, a tuin‑da, a yɛ banda bu ɔ.
44011011	A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, nn ni ka chenɛ min na, mɔ kaima sawa n na‑a wan nɔ. An na‑a an sɔ wan, a ka Sisayea duu ɔ, an na‑a n tena.
44011012	A sin, Yataa Nyina‑a a fɔ wan n ye, mbɛ n ma sika, chɛɛ nn bɛ ni ta an na. Suun ma nyɔn wɔdɔɛ chɛ nu, Chasi ɔ, an bɛɛ‑a n ma sɔ wan. Nn ka‑a wan Chɔpa, nn ta‑a Sisayea duu ɔ, mbɛ nn don‑da kamin chɛ 'a chenɛ a.
44011013	Nn don‑da kɛn, a‑a a ɔ yian fan nn na, a na‑a Yataa 'a maeka yen buɛ min dɔ sɔ ɔ a 'a chenɛ a. Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ, ‘Mɔɛ a ta Chɔpa duu ɔ, kamin dɔndɔ tena min tɔ mu Saimɔn. A tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ an nɛ, Pita.
44011014	Ɛ sakana bai fɔ‑a wan i ye, min mbe na‑a bauncha a i tena, wo bɛ i 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.’
44011015	Mbɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ kɛn koɔ‑a an tena, Yataa Nyina bea‑a wan an fɛ, yɔ a na‑a bea buɛ min dɔ nn bɛɛ fɛ, a saa a.
44011016	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, n yii puin‑da Mansa Chisɔsi 'a bai chɛ ma. A na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Chɔn ni yii an chɛ wo kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, chɛɛ Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, a Nyina ni bea wo fɛ.’
44011017	Yataa wandi‑a a Nyina dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an be an ma, a na‑a min be mmɔ wɛɛ ma, mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa kɛn Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a. Ni a‑a chɛ ma, n mbe ee che n kun si‑a Yataa a. Nyɔn mu n na, chɛ ma koe a?”
44011018	An‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an sɛmbɛ‑a wan a ma nyin koe a. Mbɛ an‑na Yataa tando, an dɔ te, “Mbɛ Yataa deman‑da mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a. A‑a chia sa wan an bɛɛ ye, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama a, mbɛ an‑na kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”
44011019	An na‑a Sitibin fa tima min na, mɔɛ n‑na a a kuu sɔ wan ko ma gbaaenɛ sa‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ miin na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, an gbɛɛ fasan‑da a ɔ gbuu. An ta‑a wan aan a che Fonisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Dɔ n sin ta‑a wan Saipɔsi yii tinɛ ɔ, ni Andiɔki duu wa chɛ ɔ. An nii bai ɔ yian mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n na, a si Chisɔsi wakoe ma, mɔɔ dechee Chu mɔɛ nu.
44011020	Chɛɛ an dɔ nu, miin na‑a an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, a ka Saipɔsi ni Sayini duu wa ɔ, an ta‑a wan Andiɔki. Mbɛ sakana bai chɛ, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma, an‑na a ɔ yian fan an bɛɛ a, miin nii ma ka Chu mɔ n na.
44011021	A sin, Mansa Yataa 'a gbasaya ni wan an kun ma. Mɔ sɛsɛ sin‑na an kai fa wan Mansa Chisɔsi a, mbɛ an‑na an ya a mun a ma.
44011022	Mbɛ an koe chɛ che‑a chɔchi mɔɛ n ma, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na Banabasi a ta wan Andiɔki.
44011023	A che‑a kɛn nɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yen, Yataa‑a koadia demanɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ n na, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan kaka. A‑a an disa wan, min mbe a ma, an ni a tun an kai fa koe a Mansa Chisɔsi a, an faa gbɛɛ a.
44011024	Banabasi chɛ ni mɔ chɛndɛ an na, min danayaen ni, a sin Yataa Nyina ni wan a fɛ gban. Mbɛ a‑a a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ sa‑a chɛ n kun ma, miin faa mun‑da Mansa Chisɔsi tena.
44011025	Mbɛ Banabasi ta‑a Tasɔsi duu wa ɔ, ɛ a ya a kan‑da Sɔɔ a.
44011026	A‑a a yen kɛn, a‑a a ma wan, mbɛ an fea yɛ‑a a a Andiɔki duu ɔ. An ni bɛn fan, an bɛ chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n na, an mbe ta‑a an sɛsɛ kan‑da. An ni wan nɔ san dɔndɔ ko a. Andiɔki ni, tɔɛ chɛ si‑a an kun ma, an dɔ, Chisianɛ nu, an fɛn kai faen ni Chisɔsi a.
44011027	A tima chɛ a ni gbɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ dɔ n yii‑a, a ka Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, mbɛ an na‑a Andiɔki.
44011028	An tɛ ɔ, mɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Akabɔsi. Yataa Nyina‑a a ma wan, Akabɔsi chɛ sin, a‑a kɔnkɔ wa na koe kɔɔ fɔ wan dunya ɔ. An kɔnkɔɛ chɛ sin na‑a Mansa Kaudiyɔsi 'a tima an na, Domi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44011029	Chisian chɛ n‑na a ɔ bɛn fan, an sɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an ni an boo fenɛ n na ta, basan koe a an suun ma nyɔɛ n ma Chasi ɔ, miin ni Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An dɔ, an ni chɛ ma yɔ an 'na gbasaya ɛ kun min nyɔn sima ma.
44011030	An sin‑na an boo fenɛ n na sɔn sɔn fan, mbɛ an‑na an be Banabasi ma, an fea Sɔɔ a. An bɛɛ‑a boo fen chɛ n na ta wan, chɔchi gbakoo n tena Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
44012001	Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ni kɛn chɛ tena a ɔ, a tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a ni, Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a a kuu sɔ ko ma gbaaenɛ sa‑a chɔchi mɔɛ dɔ n ma.
44012002	A‑a a ma wan, an‑na Chimisi fa chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, Chɔn kɔɔ kaima.
44012003	A sin, a‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ a‑a Chu n faa ma koe an ma ka, a ma yɛ ni to kuu kɔ, a‑a Pita wɛɛ bia wan. Chɛ ma‑a tima chɛ an na, Chu mɔɛ n 'na biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛn chɛ kun ma.
44012004	A sin‑na a ma kɛn, Pita bia‑a, a‑a a sa wan pimbi chenɛ a. Pita be‑a pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ kun naanin fan ma, a kun ma fɛn koe a. An ni naanin naaninɛ an ma. Mansa Ɛdɔdi toen ni, a ni Pita 'a bai sa fanka ɔ wan, ni an kun bɔ‑a ɔ bɛn chɛ ka‑a a a.
44012005	Mbɛ an‑na Pita ma gban pimbi chenɛ a. Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n ni wan Yataa fai‑a a ko a, an faa gbɛɛ a.
44012006	Mbɛ Mansa Ɛdɔdi yiima ɔ, banda dɔndɔ ɔ ni ka wan, a ni Pita a bɔ pimbi chenɛ a, a 'a bai sa koe a fanka ɔ. An pimbi chɛ ɔ, Pita ni wan sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ, soya mɔ fea n tɛ. A chiien ni yɔɔ fea an na. A sin, pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n ni wan nɔ, pimbi chenɛ gbu da a, an mbe a kun ma fɛn‑da.
44012007	Mbɛ a yen ko, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka bɔ‑a a pimbi chen chɛ a. Pimbi chenɛ gbu, a dumu bu ɔ, Pita ni kaina, maeka chɛ 'a manɛ‑a a ɔ ka wan. Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a Pita tɔnfɛ ma gbasi, a‑a Pita a kunɛ, a ɔ, “I a sɔ bui chɛ a.” Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, yɔɔɛ min ni ka Pita boo ma, a fuin‑da, mbɛ a bea‑a.
44012008	Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “I ma bɛn, i ni i 'a kɔɔwa don i chenɛ a.” Mbɛ Pita wɛɛ‑a a ma ka. Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ to a ye, a ɔ, “I 'a doma don, i ni a sɔ n fɛ, mɔ ni ta.”
44012009	Pita‑a a sɔ wan maeka chɛ fɛ, a bɔ pimbi chenɛ chɛ a. A gbu nii ma a ɔ gbɛ ni pɛnɛnɛ, maeka chɛ ni koe min ma tena. A ni wan a yii ma, mbɛ a ni ka cho an dɔ.
44012010	Pita an fea maeka chɛ a, an ben‑da wan soya mɔɛ saa saa ma, a basan a fean bɔɛ a. Mbɛ a danka a, an che‑a pimbi chenɛ da chɛ ma, min nyandenɛ ni kundu a, duu wa chɛ teen na. Pimbi chenɛ chɛ da a ka‑a wan, a wandi kun ma a a, mbɛ an bɔ‑a. An ta‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na dani dɔndɔ ɔ tandin. Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, maeka chɛ‑a Pita to, a ta‑a.
44012011	Mbɛ a tima gbu a ni gbɛ, Pita‑a a wandi a tinsɔn. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Sanche mu gbɛ, n‑na a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ n nii ka cho ɔ. Mansa Yataa an‑na a 'a maeka a na ka, n bɔ koe a Mansa Ɛdɔdi boo ɔ. A ni n bɔ koe gbɛɛ ɔ, miin ni Chu mɔɛ n 'na yiinachii ɔ, n ko a.”
44012012	Pita ban‑da chɛ ɔ sɔn‑da kɛn, a ta‑a wan Mɛi 'a chenɛ a, min 'na denɛ tɔ ni Chɔn. A tɔ ni to Maki. Mɔ sɛsɛ a kanden fan ni an chen chɛ a, an mbe samun chɛ‑a.
44012013	Mbɛ Pita‑a chenɛ kata da tu. A‑a a tu kɛn, yɔn musu dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Doda, a dɔn‑da wan a bu ɔ.
44012014	A‑a Pita kuiɛ ɔ gbɛ kɛn, a bu ɔ dia‑a wan, a ɔ benden ba a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a ma chenɛ da gbu a ka ni. Chɛɛ a yɛ‑a wan bui a, a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, mbɛ Pita ɛ sɔ ɔ chenɛ da a.
44012015	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “I wooen fan mu.” Chɛɛ yɔn musu chɛ chii‑a wan a ma, mbɛ tea mu. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, mbɛ Pita 'a maeka an nɛ.
44012016	Chɛɛ Pita ma sɛmbɛ ni, chen chɛ da tu koe a. An sin‑na chen chɛ da a ka kɛn, an‑na Pita yen fan, mbɛ an gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a gbechee.
44012017	Chɛɛ Pita ni wan a boo kai‑a an ma, an ma na sɔnkɔɛ chɛ. Mbɛ a si‑a a gbɛɛ ma, a‑a a ɔ yian, Mansa Yataa‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ, a bɔ‑a pimbi chen chɛ a. Pita‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, an ni a ɔ yian Chimisi a, a basan an suun ma nyɔɛ n na Chasi ɔ. Mbɛ a ka‑a nɔ, a ta‑a kaina dɔ mende.
44012018	A banda ɔ ka ma, sau ma che‑a kɛn gbɛ, pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n 'na ma samba nii ma dɔɔ. An gbu nii ma a ɔ sɔn, koe min ma‑a Pita a.
44012019	Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a a ma kɛn, an‑na an ya a kan Pita a, chɛɛ an ma a yen ni, a faa tɛ‑a wan gbeden. Mbɛ a‑a pimbi chenɛ chɛ kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ tisa gbɛɛ ɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni an fa. Chɛ gbakɔ, Mansa Ɛdɔdi yii‑a wan, a ka Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a Sisayea duu ɔ tima ɛnden ko a.
44012020	Mansa Ɛdɔdi faa tɛen fan ni gbɛ Taya duu ɔ mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ Sidon mɔɛ n na. A sin, an duu fea chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n na‑a wan kaina dɔndɔɛ. An‑na kai Basɔsi pɛn tan, min ni Mansa Ɛdɔdi 'a kata kun ma, ni a boo fenɛ gbɛɛ. An‑na a ɔ tisa wan, an dɔ, a ni an deman, an ni koɔ Mansa Ɛdɔdi tena. An toen ni, Mansa Ɛdɔdi faa ni chima an boo ɔ, koe min na mu, an 'na daun fenɛ ni ka nɔ, a 'a chɛnyɛ chɛ an dɔ.
44012021	Tee chɛ ma, Mansa Ɛdɔdi‑a min yian ka an tɛ ɔ bai sa koe a, an bɛ an na, a‑a a ma chii wan a 'a mansa ma chii a. Mbɛ a si‑a, a 'a mansa sea a, koɔ koe a an tena, a ma kawaen ba ɔ.
44012022	A ni kɛn koɔ tena, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a yee tɛ wan, an dɔ te, “Mɔ gbu ee koɔ ka. Yataa an mbe ka koɔ tena.”
44012023	A ya kɔɔɛ a, Mansa Yataa 'a maeka‑a a boo yii wan Mansa Ɛdɔdi a. Koe min na mu, a nii ma basɔmaya be ni Yataa ma. A sin, tɔnɛnɛ n fan‑na a daun, mbɛ a fa‑a.
44012024	Chɛɛ Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ tana, a fasan‑da wan a ɔ gbɛɛ ben‑da, mbɛ mɔ nama sɛsɛ‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a.
44012025	Mbɛ Banabasi n fea Sɔɔ a, an ban‑da kɛn an 'na wai ma, an ta‑a min chɛ koe a Chuusaɛn, an yɛ‑a wan Andiɔki. An na‑a Chɔn dɔndɔ an na an boo a, min tɔ ni to Maki.
44013001	Mɔɛ n ni wan nɔ Andiɔki duu ɔ, miin ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, a basan a 'a kan chɛ mɔɛ n na. Banabasi ni an mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ an na, ni Simiyɔn bɛɛ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Simiyɔn finɛ. A yɛ to, Sɔɔ wɛɛ, ni Dusiɔsi, min ka‑a Sayini duu ɔ, an fea Manaɛn na, min bɔ‑a a ɔ chen dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Mansa Ɛdɔdi Andipasi a.
44013002	Tee dɔndɔ a, an ni kɛn sun bia a, an mbe ta‑a Mansa Yataa fai‑a, Yataa Nyina‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Wo a ma n ye, Banabasi, an fea Sɔɔ a, an ni ma tenchen wai chɛ ko a, n‑na an chee min chɛ koe a.”
44013003	Mbɛ an ban‑da sun bia‑a, a basan samun chɛ a, an‑na an boo bun fan an ma, an‑na an dua, mbɛ an‑na an na ta.
44013004	Mbɛ Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a Banabasi sɔ kɛn, an fea Sɔɔ a, ta koe a baa kɔ, an yii‑a wan Sɛdusia duu ɔ. An bɛ an ta‑a Chɔn Maki a, basan koe a an ma an 'na wai chɛ koe a. An ka‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ an‑na yii tɛ dɛndɛ ɔ Saipɔsi yii tinɛ ɔ. An che‑a wan Sadamisi duu ɔ, an don‑da Chu n na samun chɛ chenɛ a, mbɛ an‑na Yataa bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na.
44013006	An‑na an tinɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ ban kɛn, benbenɛ a, aan a che Pafɔsi duu ɔ, an‑na nkofo kamin dɔndɔ tan fan. A tɔ ni Baa Chisɔsi. A ni Chu mɔɛ an na, min ni fania fɔɛ a, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu a a.
44013007	An nkofo chɛ, a dia nyɔɛ an nii nɛ kɔfana a nɔ, an yii tin chɛ ɔ. An kɔfana chɛ tɔ ni Sachɔsi Pɔdɔsi, min yiima tɛen ni kaka. A‑a Banabasi chee wan, an fea Sɔɔ a, Yataa bai a min koe a an na.
44013008	Chɛɛ nkofo chɛ, min tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ni Ɛdimasi (a tɔɛ chɛ fɔɛ an nii nɛ, nkofo tɔɛ), a‑a Banabasi n kɔɔsa bia wan kaka. A nii ma to ni, kɔfana chɛ ni dan bai chɛ n na, an ni min fɔ tena a si Chisɔsi ma.
44013009	Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a wan Sɔɔ fɛ gban, min tɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ni Pɔɔ. A‑a a ya gbangban fan nkofo chɛ a,
44013010	mbɛ a ɔ, “I wan, Sitana 'a denɛ. Ko chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ mu i a. Chɛwɛɛ yama yama gbɛɛ ɛ i ɔ, mɔɛ n bun koe a. A sin, e butuin chɛ tena wan tima ɔ tima, i ni Mansa Yataa 'a tea mun fania a.
44013011	Mbɛ a yen ko gbɛ sanche, Mansa Yataa‑a a boo bun i ma. I ya a ɛ pimbi‑a wan tee kuunden ko a.” A ya kɔɔɛ a, mbɛ dingbii bun‑da Ɛdimasi ya a, a don‑da pimbi ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da a boo mɛmɛ‑a. A toen ni, mɔɛ ni a bia a boo ma, a ni ta a a.
44013012	Kɔfana chɛ‑a a ɔ yen kɛn koe min ma‑a, a‑a a kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. Koe min na mu, a da ɔ gbaa‑a wan kan chɛ a, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma.
44013013	Mbɛ Pɔɔ n bɛ a bɔɛ n na, an si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ an bɔ‑a Pafɔsi duu ɔ, an ta‑a Paaka duu ɔ, min ni Panfidia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An che‑a kɛn nɔ, Chɔn Maki‑a an to wan, mbɛ a yɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
44013014	Chɛɛ an‑na an 'na tachɛ a tun fan a ma, a ka Paaka, a ta Andiɔki duu dɔ mende ɔ, min ni Pisidia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A sin, Chu n 'na suin tee ma, an don‑da wan Chu n 'na samun chenɛ a, mbɛ an si‑a.
44013015	Mbɛ mɔɛ ban‑da sawa gboo chɛ kan‑da, Mosisi na‑a min nyɛn, a basan bai n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ na‑a min nyɛn. Mbɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ nu, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, an‑na sakana a ta Pɔɔ n tena, an dɔ te, “Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu, ni bai ɔ bai ɛ wan wo da a, a fɔ koe, min mbe mɔɛ n faa ma nande, wo e ka a fɔ‑a.”
44013016	Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a‑a a boo a sɛ an too ma sɔ koe a, mbɛ a bun‑da koɔ‑a. A ɔ, “N bɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, wo wo too ma sɔ, wo wɛn bɛɛ ma Chu mɔ a, wo wo too ma sɔ n ma.
44013017	Mmɔ wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n mbe Yataa min fai, an‑na a boo sɔ nn bemba n ta bemba n ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ a‑a a ma, an da a koa‑a, tima min na, an ni sondaya a Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Yataa 'a gbasaya, an‑na a ma to, an bɔ‑a Ichipi chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ.
44013018	Mbɛ a sin, san bi naanin chɛ gbɛɛ ko a, an ni tima min na fuinɛ ma, an 'na ko yama gbɛɛ bɛn‑da wan a ma.
44013019	Yataa‑a chɛnyɛ mɔ kun wɔnfea n kasaa wan, Kenaan chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a ma, a 'a mɔɛ nu, Kenaan chɛnyɛ chɛ ma‑a an ta a.
44013020	Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma‑a san chɛmɛ naanin, ni san bi duu an tɛ ɔ. “Chɛ gbakɔ, a‑a a ma wan, an‑na ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma sɔn, miin ni an kun ma fɛn, aan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Samɛɛ ta tima che‑a.
44013021	Mbɛ an‑na Yataa ɔ tisa, min mbe a ma, a ni mansa be an ma. Yataa‑a Sɔɔ be wan an ma, min ni kai Kisi 'a denɛ a. A bɔ‑a Bɛnchamin 'na dambi an dɔ. A ni wan mansaya chɛ ɔ, san bi naanin ko a.
44013022	Yataa‑a Sɔɔ bɔ kɛn mansaya chɛ ma, a‑a a boo sɔ wan Defidi ma, ma koe a mansa a, Sɔɔ gba ɔ. Yataa‑a bai chɛ an fɔ a si Defidi ma, a ɔ, ‘Defidi wakoe‑a n ya fa, Chɛsi 'a den chɛ. Koe min na mu, n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ ɛ kun fan n faa ma koe ma‑a, yɔ n toen mu a a buɛ min dɔ.’
44013023	Defidi chɛ, a 'a dambi ɔ mu, Yataa‑a a ma, mmɔ‑a baun mɔɛ ma sɔn, min mu Chisɔsi a. A‑a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n too ɔ dia an na.
44013024	Chisɔsi e na to a 'a wai kuu sɔ‑a dunya chɛ ɔ, Chɔn‑na Yataa bai sa wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tena, an kan kɔ sɔ koe a, an 'na ko yama n na, a ni yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
44013025	A sin, Chɔn ni kɛn gbɛ a 'a wai a ban tena dunya chɛ ɔ, a‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, ‘Ɛ wo yii ma, mbɛ nyɔn mu n na? N fan ma mɔɛ chɛ a, wo yii na chiien mu min na. Chɛɛ wo wo too ma sɔ, a ɛ na tena n gbaa chia a. Kɔɔwa gbu wɛɛ a chenɛ a, n mbe ee che a yuu wɛɛ fuin koe a.’
44013026	“N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, wo wɛn mu Ebeami cheeya n na, ni wo wɛɛ, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, chɛɛ wo wɛn mbe kooya be Yataa ma, wo chɛ a min. Sakana bai chɛ, min mbe na bauncha a, a naen mu mmɔ gbɛɛ an ko a.
44013027	Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an bɛ an ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, an nii ma a wakoe ɔ gbɛ ni. An nii ma Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n 'na bai n nan fan bɛɛ ɔ gbɛ ni, an ni min kan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a, suin tee kan kɔ kan ma. Chɛɛ an‑na kaa a tɛ wan, a wakoe ma, a ni fa, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n da a kuiɛ bɔ koe a a.
44013028	An nii ma chia ɔ chia sɔn ni kaa a tɛ koe a, a fa koe ma. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an‑na Kɔfana Padeti ɔ tisa wan, a ni a ma, an ni a fa.
44013029	An sin ban‑da wan koe chɛ n gbɛɛ a tachɛ‑a Chisɔsi a, yɔ a na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a si a ma Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a a yii kɔn chɛ ma, an‑na a tɔn.
44013030	Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ,
44013031	a sin, tee sɛsɛ ko a, a ni bɔ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ya a, an bɛ ni ta miin na chia a a ka Kadidi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a sɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An fan mu sanche sii n na, a wan Chisɔsi ko a, mɔɛ n tena.
44013032	A sin, nn mbe ka nɛ, min mbe a ma, nn ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian wo a. Mbɛ Yataa na‑a tooɔdia min chɛ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n na,
44013033	a‑a an chɛ ka mmɔ ye, mmɔ wɛn mu an cheeya n na. Koe min na mu, a‑a Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. A‑a chɛ ma wan, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ si fean bɔɛ chɛ ɔ, Yataa tando si gboo ɔ. A‑a a fɔ wan a ɔ, a ɔ, ‘N 'na denɛ mu i a. N ma‑a i fa a bi.’
44013034	Yataa sin‑na Chisɔsi a sɔɛ min chɛ ka, a ka saya ɔ, a ee a ma‑a a gboo ni tui kuɔ fɔ ko a. Yataa na‑a a fɔ ka wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Dua min mbe ee bea duu ma, n mbe a chɛ‑a wan wo a, n na‑a Mansa Defidi too ɔ dia min na.’
44013035	Chɛ an fɛ mu, a‑a a fɔ wan to si dɔ mende ɔ, Yataa tando si gboo chɛ ɔ, a ɔ, ‘E ee dɔn‑da i 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn‑na n fandi be i ma, n su ni tui kamba ɔ.’
44013036	Defidi tana, a ta tima a, a na‑a ban fan wai chɛ‑a Yataa ye, a chia ma yɔ a ɔ na‑a bɛn buɛ min dɔ. Mbɛ saya‑a a boo kana bia, a sin sa‑a a bemba n kaa a, mbɛ a gboo tui‑a kamba ɔ.
44013037	Chɛɛ chɛ nii ma ma ni mɔɛ chɛ a, Yataa‑a min na sɔ, a ka saya ɔ.
44013038	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu, a nyin wo ni chɛ ɔ gbɛ. Mbɛ Chisɔsi chɛ an ko a mu, Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ.
44013039	A sin, a wan ko a mu to, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a kai fa‑a a a, Yataa ɛ a ya‑a wan mɔ tandenɛ a a tena. Ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ a ko yama gbɛɛ ɔ. Ko yama chɛ nu, an mɔɛ chɛ kun mbe ee che bɔ‑a miin dɔ, Mosisi 'a sawa kɔɔ.
44013040	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo kun ma fɛn, min mbe a ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a bai min fɔ, a ma na wo tan. An na‑a a fɔ wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, an dɔ te,
44013041	‘Wo a yen, bai yama sa mɔɛ nu, a si Yataa da a bai n ma. N mbe na tena wan koe ma‑a bi tee chɛ kɔɔ, wo ee dan‑da min na kuɔ fɔ, mɔɛ ni a ɔ yian bɛɛ wo a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo da a ɔ gbaa‑a wan, mbɛ wo fa‑a.’ ”
44013042	Pɔɔ n ni kɛn bɔ‑a Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an disa wan. An dɔ, suin tee min ni na tena, an ni koe chɛ n dɔ yian to an na.
44013043	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an ban‑da bɔ‑a Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a. Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ nu, ni an sɛsɛ miin boo fea sien ni Chu n 'na Yataa fai chia kɔɔ, an sɛsɛ‑a a sɔ wan Pɔɔ fɛ, an fea Banabasi a. An koɔ‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n tena, an‑na a ma din an tena, mbɛ an ma an kan kɔ sɔ to Yataa 'a koadia deman chɛ a.
44013044	Suin tee dɔndɔɛ chɛ che‑a kɛn, ɛnden fan to‑a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ an duu chɛ ɔ, an ni kuɛn, na koe a, an too ma sɔ‑a Mansa Yataa 'a bai ma.
44013045	Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu, an‑na fanka wa chɛ yen kɛn, toomaya‑a an faa fa wan gban. Mbɛ an‑na Pɔɔ da a bai gbɛɛ kɔɔsa bia, an yɛ‑a to, an‑na a main.
44013046	Chɛɛ a tima gbu a ni gbɛ, Pɔɔ, an fea Banabasi a, an‑na bai sa faagbɛa a. An dɔ, “A ni nyin, nn ni Yataa da a bai chɛ ɔ yian wo pɛn na. Chɛɛ wo‑a wo boo sɔ wan a ya ɔ, wo‑a a ɔ yian wo sɔnɛ ɔ, mbɛ a ma nyin, wo ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn. A yen ko gbɛ, nn bɛɛ, nn‑na nn ya a yɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a.
44013047	Koe min na mu, Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ ka wan nn ye, a ma koe a. A‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘N‑na wo ma manɛ a, chɛ n ko a, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛ ni a ma, wo ni na bauncha a dunya tɔnkɔnɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.’ ”
44013048	A sin, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a, an‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, an bu ɔ dia‑a wan, an bun‑da Yataa tando‑a, a 'a bai ko a. Mɔ sɛsɛ sin, Yataa na‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn koe a, an‑na an kai fa wan Chisɔsi a.
44013049	Mbɛ bai chɛ, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma, a fasan‑da wan a ɔ gbɛɛ an tanda chɛ ɔ ben‑da.
44013050	Chɛɛ musu gbakoo nu an duu chɛ ɔ, miin ni kooya be Yataa ma, an bɛ nɔ mɔ kaima gbakoo n gbɛɛ a, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an gbɛɛ a sɛ wan Pɔɔ n ma. An‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa wan Pɔɔ ma, an fea Banabasi a, mbɛ an gbu‑a an gbain an tanda gbu ɔ.
44013051	Chɛ ma‑a kɛn, Pɔɔ n‑na an chen 'na fifii a gbɔngbɔn fan an chenɛ a, ma koe a dasi a, an duu chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n ko a. Mbɛ an bɔ‑a nɔ, an ta‑a Ikoniɔn duu ɔ.
44013052	A sin, Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ nɔ, buɔdia koa‑a wan an dɔ, Yataa Nyina wɛɛ sin ni wan an fɛ gban.
44014001	Koe min si‑a Pɔɔ a, an fea Banabasi a, Andiɔki duu chɛ ɔ, an si‑a to an na Ikoniɔn duu wɛɛ ɔ. Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an don‑da Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. An sin koɔ buɛ ma kawa‑a wan aan, min‑na a ma, mɔ sɛsɛ n‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a. Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a, an gbɛɛ‑a an kai fa a a.
44014002	Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, miin nii ma dɔn ni an kai fa koe a Chisɔsi a, an don‑da mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. A sin, an‑na an na sɛ wan Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ma.
44014003	Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an ni wan nɔ an duu chɛ ɔ, tima ɔ yansama ko a. An ni bai sa wan faagbɛa a, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma. Mansa Chisɔsi sin gbu‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ sakana bai chɛ, an mbe min sa, a si a 'a koadia demanɛ ma, tea bai nu mu. Chisɔsi ni a ma wan, sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ni kamaya ko wa sɛsɛ n ma, an kun ma a a.
44014004	Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni an duu chɛ ɔ, an duen fan ni fea a. Dɔ n sɔ‑a wan Chu mɔɛ chɛ n kɔ, mbɛ dɔ n sin sɔ‑a Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n kɔ.
44014005	Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin nii ma ka Chu mɔ a, an bɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ n na, an‑na a siman fan, maumaya koe sɛ koe a an ma, an ni an ma bon bon senɛ a, aan an ni fa.
44014006	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔ fea chɛ nu, an‑na an 'na yiinachii chɛ kɔɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an bui‑a, an ta‑a Dikawonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An ta‑a wan nɔ duu fea ɔ, Diisa an fea Dabi a, a basan nɔ tanda n na,
44014007	mbɛ an‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian nɔ gbɛɛ.
44014008	Kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ si ɔ, Diisa duu chɛ ɔ, min nii che sɔ‑a a chen fea gbɛɛ a. A namaaenɛ ni, a ka a suun tima ma. Tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ, a nii ma tachɛ chɛ ni.
44014009	An kamin chɛ too ma sɔen fan ni, Pɔɔ ni kɛn koɔ‑a. A sin, Pɔɔ‑a a ya sɔ wan a a. Mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ an kamin chɛ, danaya ɛ wan a ɔ, min mbe che a ma‑a, a ni baun,
44014010	mbɛ Pɔɔ kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni sɔ den i chenɛ a.” Mbɛ kamin chɛ tin‑da kosa, a bun‑da tachɛ chɛ‑a.
44014011	Mbɛ fanka fanka chɛ‑a a ɔ yen kɛn, Pɔɔ na‑a koe min ma, an bun‑da koɔ‑a an 'na Dikawonia chɛnyɛ koɛ chɛ ɔ. An dɔ te, “Mmɔ ɛ yataa miin fai ka, an fan mun‑da mɔ gbu n na, mbɛ an yii‑a mmɔ tɛ ɔ.”
44014012	Mbɛ an‑na Banabasi chee, an dɔ, yataa min tɔ ni Suusi, mbɛ an‑na Pɔɔ sin chee, an dɔ, yataa min tɔ ni Amesi, koe min na mu, an ni koɔ pɛpɛ.
44014013	Chen dɔndɔ ni wan sɔ ɔ an duu sundu kunɛ a, yataa Suusi chɛ fai koe a. Mɔɛ min ni mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ yataa Suusi a, a na‑a ninchi kai n na, a basan kɔn fu chii a, yataa Suusi 'a chenɛ kata da a. Koe min na mu, a wan an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, an toen ni an ni yasi bɔ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tena.
44014014	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, Banabasi an fea Pɔɔ a, an nii ma to ni, an ni chɛ a min. An‑na a ma, an‑na an ma koa a panda wan, mbɛ an‑na bui don a ɔ mɔ fanka chɛ n tɛ ɔ. Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an ni wan yee te‑a, an dɔ,
44014015	“N bɔ nu, wo toen mu wo ni ko bonda chɛ ma, fen ko a? Nn bɛɛ, mɔ gbu mu nn na, yɔ wo e ka buɛ min dɔ. Nn mbe nɛ, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian koe a wo a, wo ni wo boo bɔ tataya ko bonda chɛ n dɔ. Wo ni wo ya a mun Yataa ma, min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a. A wan‑na banda a dan, an fea duu gboo a, kɔ yii wɛɛ, a basan fen kɔ fen na, miin be an dɔ.
44014016	Suun tima a, a nii mɔ ɔ mɔ a gban, ta koe a a ta chia a.
