44014017	Chɛɛ tima ɔ tima ko a, ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan gbɛ wo a, mbɛ ɛ wan wo tɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, ɛ wan wai chɛndɛ chɛ‑a wo tɛ ɔ, tee ɔ tee a. Ɛ a ma tena wan, sona ɛ chɛ a ka banda a, mbɛ wo 'a chin fenɛ n nyan‑da a tima ma. Ɛ daun fenɛ be wan wo ma, mbɛ a‑a wo faa bu ɔ dia, a ɔ bendenɛ a.”
44014018	An koɔ‑a wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, an tena, an kun‑da wan kayiin, a ma koe a, mɔɛ chɛ n ni sɛmbɛ yasi chɛ bɔ koe a.
44014019	Chɛɛ Chu dɔ n ka‑a wan Andiɔki duu ɔ, Pisidia chɛnyɛ ɔ, dɔ n bɛɛ ka‑a Ikoniɔn duu ɔ. An‑na a ma wan, mɔ fanka chɛ n yiima mun‑da, an‑na Pɔɔ ma bon bon fan, mbɛ an‑na a konkon, a bɔ duu ɔ. A ni an yii ma, mbɛ a fa‑a.
44014020	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na kan‑da kɛn a a tindanɛ, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ a yɛ‑a duu chɛ gbu ɔ to. Tee dɔndɔɛ ma, an fea Banabasi a, an ta‑a wan Dabi duu ɔ.
44014021	Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi ma, an‑na a sa wan an duu wa chɛ ɔ. An sin‑na a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ bea‑a Chisɔsi fɛ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a Diisa duu ɔ, an ta‑a Ikoniɔn, aan a che Andiɔki, Pisidia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44014022	Mbɛ an‑na a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n 'na danaya ɔ gbɛa‑a, miin ni ka Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ n na. An mbe ta‑a an faa n ma nande‑a, an ni to tun an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a. Mbɛ an‑na an kan, an dɔ te, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ mɔnɛ sɛsɛ ɔ bia pɛn, a e na to don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya chɛ kɔɔ.”
44014023	Mbɛ an‑na gbakoo n yian, an 'na chɔchi n gbɛɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an 'na sunɛ bia, an mbe ta‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a, mbɛ an‑na an konan Mansa Chisɔsi ma, an kai faen ni min na.
44014024	Mbɛ an ben‑da Pisidia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ta‑a Panfidia chɛnyɛ ɔ chia a.
44014025	An ban‑da kɛn sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na Paaka duu ɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma, mbɛ an yii‑a Atadia duu ɔ.
44014026	An ka‑a Atadia chɛ wan, mbɛ an si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, a yɛ to Andiɔki duu ɔ. An duu chɛ ɔ ni, Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ na‑a an konan Yataa ma, koadia demanɛ ɔ, an 'na wai ko a, an‑na min na ban ka gbɛ.
44014027	An sin, an che‑a kɛn Andiɔki duu ɔ, an‑na chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a kan fan kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ an si‑a ko ɔ ko ma, an‑na a ɔ yian, Yataa‑a miin chɛ an ye. A yɛ to, Yataa‑a chia sa buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an kai fa koe a Chisɔsi a.
44014028	Mbɛ an sin‑na tima ɔ yansama ya wan nɔ, an duu chɛ ɔ, an bɛ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ n na.
44015001	Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n ka‑a wan Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an na‑a Andiɔki duu chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ an kan‑da nɔ, an dɔ, “Yataa ee che wo baun‑da, mɔɔ ni an‑na wo a kamincha, yɔ Mosisi‑a mmɔ kan buɛ min dɔ.”
44015002	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, koɛ basan kɔɔsa yama yama a, a don‑da mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, an bɛ Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a. Mbɛ Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an bɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na, an‑na an yian fan, sɛ koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An dɔ, an ni Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n yen, an bɛ chɔchi gbakoo n na, a si an bai chɛ ma.
44015003	Mbɛ chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n‑na an ma saa kɛn, an ben‑da wan Fonisia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an fea Samayia chɛnyɛ a. An ni a ɔ yian fan mɔɛ n na, mbɛ mɔɛ miin ma ka Chu mɔ a, an‑na an kai fa buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi a. An sin ma‑a wan buɔdia wa a, suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tena, Chasi ɔ.
44015004	An che‑a kɛn gbɛ Chuusaɛn, chɔchi mɔɛ n‑na an boo si wan an kɔɔ, an bɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na nɔ, ni gbakoo n gbɛɛ. A sin, Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma, Yataa‑a min chɛ an ye, an‑na a ɔ yian.
44015005	Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin kai faen ni ka Chisɔsi a, Chu mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan an tɛ ɔ, miin ni dɔbɛn chɛ ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Fayisii dɔbɛnɛ. An‑na an kɔɔ sɔ wan, mbɛ an dɔ, “A nyin fan mmɔ ni an na kamincha. A sin to, mmɔ ni a din an ma, an ni a sɔ sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ fɛ, Yataa‑a miin be Mosisi ma.”
44015006	Mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an bɛ gbakoo n na, an bɛnden fan ni kaina dɔndɔɛ, an yii na chii koe a, bai chɛ ma.
44015007	An‑na a tɛnsɛ kɛn pien, an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, mbɛ Pita‑a a kɔɔ sɔ. A ɔ, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, Yataa‑a koe min ma. Mbɛ tima ɛnden ko a gbɛ, Yataa na‑a a boo sɔ wan n ma wo tɛ ɔ, n ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi ma, a ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. An ni an bai chɛ a min, mbɛ an‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a.
44015008	A sin, Yataa min‑na mɔ ɔ mɔ faa ɔ koe sɔn, a dɔn‑da wan an ma koe a ka. A‑a a ma wan, Yataa Nyina bea‑a an bɛɛ fɛ, yɔ a‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ mmɔ ko a.
44015009	A sin ma tɛ bɔ kan kɔ kan yian ni mmɔ tɛ, mmɔ bɛ an na. Chɛɛ a‑a a ma wan, an faa ɔ gbɛ‑a, koe min na mu, an‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a.
44015010	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, wo ma suun feanka si mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma, feanka min mu mmɔ bɛ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n na, mmɔ ee che min kɔɔ. Wo e ma‑a ka Yataa an dɔ siman‑da, ni wo‑a chɛ ma.
44015011	Chɛɛ mmɔ danden fan mu a a, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ bauncha ma sɔn‑da wan, koadia demanɛ 'a gbasaya ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ min chɛ, yɔ an bɛɛ an mbe a ma sɔn‑da buɛ min dɔ.”
44015012	Pita ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ a kanden ni ka, an‑na a ɔ maun fan don. Mbɛ an‑na an too ma sɔ Banabasi ma, an fea Pɔɔ a. An‑na a ɔ yian fan gbɛɛ, Yataa na‑a a ma, an‑na kamaya ko wa miin ma, mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a.
44015013	An ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a, Chimisi wɛɛ koɔ‑a wan, a ɔ te, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo too ma sɔ n ma.
44015014	Saimɔn Pita ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da mmɔ a, Yataa na‑a a 'a koadia ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ, tima saa saa ko a, mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. A na‑a a boo sɔ wan an dɔ n ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.
44015015	An koe chɛ sin, an fea bai chɛ a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a min fɔ, bai dɔndɔɛ mu an na. Ɛ ka wan dechee yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ,
44015016	‘Mansa Yataa ɔ te, a ɔ, “Chɛ gbakɔ, n mbe yɛ‑a wan to, mbɛ n‑na chen chɛ sɔ to, Mansa Defidi 'a chen chɛ min bea‑a tee. N mbe chen gbaa chɛ a yɛ‑a wan to mbɛ n‑na a sɔ to.
44015017	A tima chɛ a mu, mɔɛ tɔɛ nu, an mbe an ya a mun‑da n ma, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin ma Chu mɔ a, n‑na n boo sɔ miin ma, ma koe a n ta mɔɛ n na. N fan, Mansa Yataa, n fan‑na chɛ fɔ.
44015018	N sin‑na koe chɛ n kɔɔ fɔ wan, kɛn suun tima a.” ’
44015019	“Chɛ an fɛ mu, n ta yiima ɔ, n ma to ni mmɔ ni mɔɛ chɛ n tɔɔ, miin ma Chu mɔ a, miin mbe an ya a mun tena Yataa tena.
44015020	Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ min ma, mmɔ gboo nyɛn an tena. Mmɔ ni a fɔ an ye, mbɛ an ma daun fɛnɛ daun, mɔɛ n‑na min bɔ yasi a, fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a. A yɛ to, an ma koe tɛ, an sin ma soe kan kɔ kan daun, min kanɛ a ma tɛ ni, an gbu ma wii daun.
44015021	Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma, a kanden fan mu gbɛ san chɛmɛ sɛsɛ ko a, Chu 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a, suin tee kan kɔ kan ma. A sin, Mosisi da a bai chɛ nu, an dɔ yianden fan mu gbɛ duu wa kan kɔ kan dɔ.”
44015022	Mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, ni gbakoo nu, an bɛ chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, an‑na dɔbɛnɛ chɛ. An boo sɔ koe ma mɔɛ dɔ n ma an tɛ ɔ, an bɛ ni ta Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, Andiɔki duu ɔ. An‑na an boo sɔ wan mɔ fea n ma, basɔmaya ni miin ma mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ, miin‑na an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a. An mɔ fea chɛ n ni Chudasi an na, min tɔ ni to Basabasi, an fea Sidasi a.
44015023	An‑na gboo nyɛnden chɛ an be an ma. An‑na a nyɛn fan a ɔ, an dɔ te: Nn fan, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, nn bɛ gbakoo n na, nn fɛn mu wo suun ma nyɔɛ n na Chasi ɔ, nn fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn tena. Nn mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan tena. Wo wan, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, wo wɛn‑na wo kai fa Chisɔsi a. A yɛ to, wo wɛn mbe sanche Andiɔki duu ɔ, ni wo wɛn mbe Siyia chɛnyɛ tɔɛ ɔ, wo bɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Nn‑na wo kɔndɔn.
44015024	Nn‑na a a min, mbɛ mɔɛ n dɔ n bɔ‑a wan nn tɛ ɔ, an ta‑a wo tena, an‑na wo kɔndɔ fii an 'na kanɛ a, an mbe min chɛ tena. An gbu sin mbe ka min ma‑a, nn fan ma an sɔ ni.
44015025	Nn gbɛɛ nn‑na chɛ an dɔ yen, nn dɔn‑da, mbɛ a nyin fan, nn boo sɔ koe a mɔɛ dɔ n ma, nn ni an sɔ wo tena. An bɛ an mbe na tena nn dia nyɔɛ Banabasi an fea Pɔɔ a.
44015026	Mɔ fea an fan nɛ, miin‑na an fɔɛ be, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai ko a.
44015027	Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn‑na Chudasi wɛɛ sɔ wan, an fea Sidasi a, wo tena. An ni bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ bɔ an da a, an ni a ɔ yian wo a, yɔ nn‑na a nyɛn buɛ min dɔ gboo chɛ ɔ.
44015028	Koe min na mu, nn‑na a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a nyin fan nn tena, ni Yataa Nyina gbu wɛɛ tena, mbɛ yakɔɔtawa dɔ mende kan kɔ kan ma si to wo kun ma. Chɛɛ wo ni bea dechee sawa chɛ n fan fɛ, miin nyin wo ko a, yɔ chɛ nu.
44015029	Wo ma daun fenɛ daun, mɔɛ n‑na min bɔ yasi a, fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a. Wo ma soe kan kɔ kan daun, min kanɛ a ma tɛ ni, wo gbu sin ma wii daun. A yɛ to, wo ma koe tɛ. Ni wo ma wo boo chɛ ni to chɛ n dɔ, a nyin fan wo ko a. Wo mmɔ a gbɛ.
44015030	Mbɛ an‑na an boo ka kɛn ta koe a, an ta‑a wan Andiɔki duu ɔ. An sin‑na chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a kan kɛn kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ an‑na gboo chɛ be an ma.
44015031	A sin, an‑na a kan kɛn, faamanande bai miin ni ka ɔ, a ma‑a wan an ma buɔdia wa a.
44015032	Chudasi, an fea Sidasi a, miin bɛɛ ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, an bɛɛ‑a faamanande bai sɛsɛ sa wan an tena. Chɛ‑a an dɔ gbɛa wan, an kai fa koe a Chisɔsi a.
44015033	Suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na tima ɛnden ya wan nɔ, mbɛ an‑na an du faachima ɔ, an bɛ an suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n na Chasi ɔ, Andiɔki duu ɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin na‑a an sɔ.
44015035	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ an fea Banabasi a, an to‑a wan Andiɔki, mɔɛ n kan koe a, a basan bai ɔ yianɛ a, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma. An bɛ ni wai chɛ ma, an bɛ mɔ sɛsɛ n fan na.
44015036	Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ Banabasi ye, a ɔ, “Na, mɔ ni ta ben ben mɔɛ n kun ma, duu chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔ na‑a sakana bai chɛ sa miin tena, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma. Mɔ ni a ɔ yen, ni an mbe buɛ min dɔ.”
44015037	Banabasi toen ni, an ni ta Chɔn na an fɛ, min tɔ ni to Maki,
44015038	chɛɛ Pɔɔ ta yiima ɔ, a nii ma nyin, ta koe a Maki chɛ a. Koe min na mu, a na‑a ka wan an fɛ Panfidia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ a yɛ‑a. A nii ma to ni an fɛ, an ni an 'na wai a ban.
44015039	Chɛ na‑a koɛ a an tɛ ɔ, min‑na a ma, an tɛ du‑a. Banabasi‑a Maki ya wan, an si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ an ta‑a Saipɔsi, yii tinɛ ɔ.
44015040	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ‑a Sidasi an ya, mbɛ an suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na an konan Mansa Yataa ma. An dɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi 'a koadia demanɛ ni an kun ma fɛn.
44015041	A sin ben‑da wan Siyia, an fea Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ a, ɛ ta‑a a ma‑a mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ ɛ gbɛa‑a chɔchi n dɔ, an 'na kaifaya ɔ.
44016001	Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an ta‑a pɛn Dabi duu ɔ, mbɛ an ben‑da Diisa duu ɔ chia a. An‑na Chisɔsi fɛ mɔ dɔndɔ tan fan nɔ, min tɔ ni Timoti. A de ni Chu mɔɛ an na, min na‑a a kai fa Chisɔsi a. Chɛɛ a fa ni Kiisi mɔɛ an na.
44016002	Suun ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ Chasi ɔ, miin ni Diisa duu ɔ, an fea Ikoniɔn na, an‑na bai chɛndɛ sa wan, a si Timoti ma.
44016003	Pɔɔ toen ni Timoti ni bea a fɛ, min‑na a ma, a‑a a a kamincha. A‑a chɛ ma koe min na, Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ an tanda chɛ n dɔ, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Timoti fa ni Kiisi mɔɛ an na.
44016004	An ni ben ben tena kɛn duu wa chɛ n dɔ, an ni koe chɛ n dɔ yian fan mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an ni an ma mɛn. Koe chɛ nu, an fan, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ nu, an bɛ gbakoo n na, an kuiɛ na‑a bɛn miin ma Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
44016005	Mbɛ chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ gbɛa‑a gbau, an 'na kaifaya ɔ Chisɔsi a, a sin, an ma ni mun‑da wan tee ɔ tee a.
44016006	An ta‑a wan aan Fichiya chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan Kadesia chɛnyɛ ɔ a. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina nii ma dɔn ni, an ni Yataa bai sa Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44016007	An che‑a kɛn Misia chɛnyɛ bandoe ma, an‑na butuin chɛ wan, ta koe a Bitinia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi Nyina nii ma dɔn ni, an ni ta nɔ.
44016008	Mbɛ an bɛɛ‑a Misia chɛnyɛ ɔ tandin fan, an yii‑a Towasi duu ɔ.
44016009	A yɛɛ chɛ ma, Yataa‑a koe ɔ yian fan Pɔɔ a, yɔ a ni cho an dɔ. A‑a mɔ kaima yen fan, min ka‑a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ɛ sɔ ɔ a disa‑a, a ɔ, “Na nɛ nn tena Masidonia, i ni nn deman.”
44016010	Pɔɔ ban‑da kɛn dechee an koe chɛ ɔ yen‑da, a ya kɔɔɛ a, a wan Pɔɔ ni ma, ni nn fan, nn bun‑da nn ma bɛn‑da, ta koe a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, nn‑na nn yii na chii wan, mbɛ Yataa an‑na nn chee ka, ta koe a nɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, nn ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian nɔ mɔɛ n na, a si Chisɔsi ma.
44016011	Nn si‑a wan dɛndɛ wa dɛgbɛ ɔ, a ka Towasi duu ɔ, mbɛ nn‑na kɔ yii tɛ, a ta Samɔtesi yii tinɛ ɔ. Nn nii ma te ni a ma, nn ta tena. Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, nn‑na kɔ yii tɛ wan to dɛndɛ ɔ, a ta Niapɔdisi duu ɔ.
44016012	Nn ka‑a nɔ wan, mbɛ nn ta‑a Fiipai duu ɔ. An ni duu chenama wa a, a tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A ni to duu an na, Domi mɔɛ n na‑a min na tɛ. Nn‑na tee sɛsɛ ya wan nɔ.
44016013	Suin tee che‑a kɛn, nn bɔ‑a wan an duu wa dɛgbɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ nn ta‑a yii a sanɛ. A ni wan nn yii ma, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n na sɔndenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ, samun chɛ koe a. Nn‑na musu chɛ n tan fan nɔ, an na sɔndenɛ ɛ kaina dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ nn koɔ‑a an tena.
44016014	Musu dɔndɔ an tɛ ɔ, min‑na a too ma sɔ nn ma, a tɔ ni Didia. A ka‑a Tiyatiya duu ɔ wan. A ni koa baa gbanden ba an ma tachɛ. Musu ni a a, min ni Yataa fai kaka. A ni kɛn a too ma sɔ tena nn ma, Mansa Yataa‑a a ma wan, a‑a a faa be bai chɛ ko a, Pɔɔ ni ka min fɔ‑a.
44016015	Chɛ gbakɔ, Pɔɔ‑a yii chɛ wan a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a basan a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ Didia‑a a fɔ nn ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a a fɔ, mbɛ n‑na n kai fa Mansa Chisɔsi a tea tea gbu a, mbɛ wo na, wo ni ma n 'na chenɛ a.” A sin‑na nn ma nande wan kaka, min‑na a ma, nn ta‑a a waa a.
44016016	Tee dɔndɔ a, nn ni ta tena kɛn kaina chɛ, mɔɛ n ni ta samun chɛ koe a Yataa tena kaina, yɔnɛ den musuma dɔndɔ‑a nn tan fan. Nyina yama an ni a fɛ, min ni a ma, a ɛ mɔɛ n ma koe kɔɔ fɔ an ye, min mbe na tena an tan‑da. An yɔnɛ chɛ, a ni kɔpɔ sɛsɛ nyan fan a ti n ye, a 'a yawa gbasi chɛ ɔ.
44016017	A bea‑a wan nn fɛ, nn bɛ Pɔɔ a, ɛ ta‑a yee tɛ‑a, a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ nu, Mansa Yataa Wa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n fan nɛ. An fan mbe a ɔ yian tena wo a, Yataa ɛ wo baun buɛ min dɔ.”
44016018	A sin‑na chɛ ma wan tee sɛsɛ ko a, min‑na a ma, Pɔɔ faa tɛ‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a ya a mun an yɔnɛ chɛ ma, a‑a a fɔ nyina yama chɛ ma, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye, mbɛ i ni ka den musuen chɛ fɛ.” A ya kɔɔɛ a, nyina yama chɛ ka‑a wan den den chɛ fɛ.
44016019	Chɛɛ yɔnɛ chɛ ti n‑na a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ an 'na kɔpɔ sɔn chia den den chɛ a, a ban‑da, an dɛ‑a wan Pɔɔ ma, an fea Sidasi a. Mbɛ an‑na an konkon, a ta mansa n tena, kuti tongbo kɔɔ.
44016020	An na‑a an na, mansa chɛ n chen kɔɔ, an‑na a fɔ an ye, an dɔ, “Kamin fea chɛ nu, Chu mɔɛ n fan nɛ. An toen mu, an ni na gbunɛ a, duu wa chɛ ɔ.
44016021	An mbe mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n kan tena manda n fan na, mmɔ ta sawa n ma min fɔ ni. Domi mɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ ee mmɔ boo si an kɔɔ, mmɔ sin mbe ee an na tachɛ.”
44016022	Mbɛ fanka fanka chɛ n bɛɛ‑a an kaa sa Pɔɔ ma koe a, an fea Sidasi a. Mbɛ mansa chɛ n‑na Pɔɔ n 'na doma a panda panda, an fea Sidasi a. Mbɛ an‑na a ma, an‑na an gbasi kɔnɛ a.
44016023	An‑na an faa ma gbasi chɛ kɛn an na, an‑na a ma wan an na dɛ‑a pimbi chenɛ a. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ, pimbi chenɛ kun ma fɛn mɔɛ ye, an dɔ, a ni a da a tɔn gban.
44016024	Da a kuiɛ chɛ saen chɛ a an kun ma, pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ, a‑a an na dɛ wan pimbi chenɛ tɛ tɛ ma dumu ɔ, mbɛ a‑a an chenɛ n don kɔnɛ a.
44016025	Chɛɛ su tɛ tɛ ma an to‑a, Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an ni wan samun chɛ‑a, an mbe ta‑a si sa‑a Yataa tena. Pimbi chen na sa mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, an too ma sɔenɛ ɛ an ma.
44016026	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, duu gboo samba‑a wan, a chenama wa a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, pimbi chenɛ gbu gbɛɛ ɔ ma‑a ma‑a. Mbɛ pimbi chenɛ gbu da nu, an sa‑a a teen na gbasi. Mbɛ yɔɔɛ wɛɛ, miin chɛen ni pimbi chen na sa mɔɛ chɛ n boo ma, ni an chenɛ n bɛɛ ma, an gbɛɛ fuin‑da an ma.
44016027	Mbɛ pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ kunɛ‑a, mbɛ a‑a pimbi chenɛ gbu da n na kaenɛ n yen. A‑a chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, a ni wan a yii ma gbɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ pimbi chen chɛ a, an ben‑da bui‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a 'a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ bɔ a sa a, a toen ni, a ni a wandi fa.
44016028	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ‑a yee tɛ wan a ma gbankon, a ɔ, “I ma i wandi fa gbama a, nn gbɛɛ yen ko nɛ.”
44016029	Mbɛ a‑a dambo ma chee, a don‑da nɔ. A sin, a ma samba sambaenɛ ɛ, a bea‑a wan Pɔɔ chen na, an fea Sidasi a.
44016030	Mbɛ a sɔ‑a an ya ɔ, a bɔ pimbi chen chɛ a. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Fa nu, n mbe fen ma gbɛ, bauncha ma sɔn koe a?”
44016031	Mbɛ Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an dɔ te, “I kai fa Mansa Chisɔsi a, mbɛ i‑a bauncha ma sɔn, a basan i 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.”
44016032	Mbɛ sakana bai chɛ, a si mansa Chisɔsi ma, an‑na a sa a tena, a basan a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.
44016033	A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ yɛɛ chɛ ma, pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ‑a an ya wan, mbɛ a‑a an ma gba tena n na ko fo. A sin, a ya kɔɔɛ a, Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an‑na yii chɛ wan a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a basan a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.
44016034	Mbɛ a sɛ‑a Pɔɔ, an fea Sidasi a, a waa chenɛ a, a‑a an da kɔ. Buɔdia wa ni wan a ɔ, a basan a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, an‑na an kai fa gbɛ Yataa a.
44016035	Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, Domi mansa chɛ n‑na poesi n na ta wan. An dɔ te, “Mɔɛ chɛ n boo ka, an ni ta.”
44016036	Mbɛ pimbi chen kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ, a‑a bai chɛ ɔ yian Pɔɔ a, a ɔ, “Mansa n‑na sakana a na, mbɛ wo ni ta, wo fea Sidasi a. Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, wo bɔ gbɛ, wo ni ta wo faa chimaenɛ a.”
44016037	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Nn ma ko kan kɔ kan yɔn ni, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an‑na nn gbasi fanka ɔ den. Min gbu sin mu ka Domi mɔɛ tiki tiki mu nn na. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a to, an‑na nn na dɛ pimbi chenɛ a. Mbɛ sanche gbɛ an toen mu, an ni nn na bɔ pimbi chenɛ a, nun dɔ. Chɛ ee ma. Ɛ nyan fan, Domi mansa chɛ n fandi gbu, an ni na nn na bɔ.”
44016038	Mbɛ poesi mɔɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a wan, an‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ yian, Domi mansa chɛ n na. Mbɛ Domi mansa chɛ n chian‑da, an‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, mbɛ Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, Domi mɔɛ nu mu.
44016039	Chɛ ko a, an ta‑a wan, mbɛ an koɔ‑a Pɔɔ n tena disa ɔ, an fea Sidasi a. Mbɛ an‑na a ma, an bɔ‑a pimbi chen chɛ a, an‑na an ma nande bɔ koe a, an duu chɛ ɔ.
44016040	Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an bɔ‑a wan pimbi chen chɛ a, mbɛ an ta‑a wan Didia 'a chenɛ a. A sin, an suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na an tan fan nɔ. An‑na an yen kɛn, an‑na an faa ma nande wan, mbɛ an bɔ‑a an duu chɛ ɔ, an ta‑a.
44017001	Mbɛ Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an ben‑da Anfipɔdisi duu ɔ chia a, an fea Apodonia duu a. Mbɛ an na‑a Tɛsadonika duu ɔ, Chu mɔɛ n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ ni kaina min.
44017002	Mbɛ Pɔɔ don‑da nɔ, yɔ a ta manda ni buɛ min dɔ. A sin wichi sawa ko a, an bɛ an na, an ni koe n tɛnsɛ wan, an nyɔn tɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ.
44017003	A ni a ɔ yian fan chɛndɛ chɛ, an ni a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ ɛ nyan‑da wan chɛ ni ma. Mbɛ kunka mansa chɛ ɛ tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a wan, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Pɔɔ ni a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Chisɔsi chɛ, n mbe min bakoe ɔ yian tena wo a, an mu kunka mansa a.”
44017004	A sin, an dɔ n dan‑da wan a a, min‑na a ma, an bea‑a Pɔɔ fɛ, an fea Sidasi a. Kiisi mɔɛ n sɛsɛ wɛɛ, miin ni kooya be Yataa ma, an bɛɛ‑a a ma ka wan, an bɛ musu gbakoo sɛsɛ a.
44017005	Chɛɛ toomaya faa chɛ‑a wan Chu mɔɛ n dɔ, min‑na a ma, an‑na tataya tɔɛ n na sɔn sɔn dani ma ben‑da, gbunɛ a bea koe a. An ben‑da wan duu ɔ yee tɛ‑a, mbɛ an‑na butuinɛ a bea kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a. Kamin chɛ tɔ ni Chason. A ni wan an yii ma, mbɛ Pɔɔ an fea Sidasi a, an ni an bɔ nɔ, mbɛ an ta‑a an 'na mɔɛ n tena baa ma.
44017006	Chɛɛ an ma an yen ni kɛn, an bea‑a gbɛ Chason fan ma, mbɛ an‑na a konkon, a basan Chisianɛ dɔ n na. Mbɛ an na‑a an na duu ɔ gbakoo n tena, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ chɛ n fan‑na dunya gbɛɛ a mun mun ben‑da. Sanche gbɛ, an na‑a nɛ mmɔ 'a duu wɛɛ ɔ,
44017007	Chason chɛ sin fan‑na a boo si an kɔɔ. An gbɛɛ sin, an mbe Domi kun ti wa 'a sawa n fan yɔn tena. An mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ mansa dɔ mende ɛ wan nɔ, min benden mu a ma. An dɔ, a tɔ mu Chisɔsi.”
44017008	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an bɛ an 'na duu ɔ gbakoo chɛ n na, an faa bɔ‑a wan, bai chɛ a min koe a.
44017009	Duu ɔ gbakoo chɛ n‑na Chason na bɔnɔ wan, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na, yɔ an 'na sawa‑a min fɔ, mbɛ an‑na an boo ka, an ta koe a.
44017010	Pimbi ɛ bun‑da dechee, mbɛ mɔɛ miin‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an‑na Pɔɔ a ta wan Bɛyia duu ɔ, an fea Sidasi a. An che‑a kɛn nɔ, an ta‑a wan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a.
44017011	Mɔɛ miin ni Bɛyia, an ta mɔya kɔ ni gbɛ, a ben chɛ n ma, miin ni Tɛsadonika. Koe min na mu, a ma bɛndenɛ ni, an too ma sɔ koe a Yataa 'a bai ma. Pɔɔ ni ma koɔ‑a tee ɔ tee a, an ni Yataa 'a gboo ma mɛn fan, a ɔ sɔn koe a, ni tea mu.
44017012	Chɛ ko a, Chu mɔɛ n sɛsɛ‑a an kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. A yɛ to, duu ɔ gbakoo n sɛsɛ, musu an bɛ kai n na, miin ni Kiisi mɔɛ n na, an bɛɛ‑a an kai fa wan a a.
44017013	Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu Tɛsadonika, an‑na a a min kɛn, mbɛ Pɔɔ ɛ Yataa bai sa‑a Bɛyia wɛɛ, an na‑a wan nɔ. Mbɛ an bun‑da mɔ fanka chɛ a sɛ‑a Pɔɔ ma, gbunɛ a bea koe a.
44017014	A ya kɔɔɛ a, mɔɛ chɛ nu nɔ, miin‑na an kai fa ka Chisɔsi a, an‑na Pɔɔ a ta kɔ yii da a. Chɛɛ Sidasi an fea Timoti a, an to‑a wan Bɛyia.
44017015	Mɔɛ miin ta‑a Pɔɔ ma sɔ‑a, an ta‑a wan a a, aan a che Atɛnsi duu ɔ. Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na yɛ Bɛyia, sakana chɛ a, an boo ɔ. A ɔ, an ni a fɔ, Timoti an fea Sidasi a, an ni na a san‑da, bui chɛ bui chɛ a.
44017016	Tima min na Pɔɔ n ni an ma kɔn tena, na koe a, a faa yɔn‑da wan yama yama. Koe min na mu, a‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ Atɛnsi duu a faen fan ni fania yataa n na.
44017017	Chɛ ko a, a ni ma wan Chu n 'na samun chen chɛ a. An bɛ an na, an ni koe n tɛnsɛ wan, an nyɔn tɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ni kooya be Yataa ma, an ni ma wan nɔ. A yɛ to, Pɔɔ ni ta wan machiti ɔ tee ɔ tee a, mbɛ a‑a koe n tɛnsɛ chɛ n tena, miin ni che ma‑a nɔ.
44017018	Kan chɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu to, miin ni kanɛ chɛ a si Ɛpikuyian koe ma, ni dɔ nu, miin ni kanɛ chɛ a si Sitoiki koe ma, an bɛɛ‑a Pɔɔ kɔɔsa bia wan. An dɔ, “Gboo kaa ma chɛ ɛ ka fen fɔ tena?” Mbɛ dɔ n sin‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ ɛ a yen, yɔ ɛ ka bai sa tena, a si sonda yataa n fan ma.” An‑na chɛ fɔ koe min na, Pɔɔ ni Yataa bai sa tena, a si Chisɔsi an ma, ni a kɔɔ sɔ koe a, a ka saya ɔ.
44017019	Mbɛ an‑na Pɔɔ ɔ tisa, an dɔ, a ni na duu gbakoo chɛ n tena, miin ni bɛn kɔnkɔɛ chɛ bu kɔɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Ayiopakɔsi kɔnkɔɛ. Mbɛ an dɔ te, “Nn toen mu nn ni a ɔ sɔn, ni i 'a kan nama chɛ sien mu fenɛ min ma.
44017020	Koe min na mu, nn sɛsɛ ma bai chɛ n na min nin bɛ, e ka miin fɔ tena. Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn toen mu, i ni an fasai nn ye.”
44017021	Koe min na mu, Atɛnsi mɔɛ nu, ni sonda n bɛɛ miin ni nɔ, an gbɛɛ nii an 'na tima yɔn koe dɔ mende kan kɔ kan ma. An ni ma dechee bai n fan dɔ yian‑da, an mbe ta‑a an too ma sɔ‑a ko nama ma, tima ɔ tima ko a.
44017022	Mbɛ Pɔɔ sɔ‑a duu ɔ gbakoo chɛ n ya kɔɔ, mbɛ a ɔ, “Atɛnsi mɔɛ nu, n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ chia ɔ chia a, wo toen mu kaka yataa sɛsɛ fai koe a.
44017023	Koe min na mu, n mbe ma ben ben‑da wo 'a duu chɛ ɔ, n mbe fenɛ n yen fan, wo e miin fai. A yɛ to, n‑na gbengbe yen fan, yasi bɔ koe a, a nyɛndenɛ ɛ min ma, a ɔ, ‘Yataa tena, nn ma min sɔn.’ An Yataa chɛ, wo e min fai ka, chɛɛ wo sin ma a sɔn, n mbe ka gbɛ an bakoe ɔ yian tena wo a.
44017024	Yataa, min‑na dunya a dan, a basan fen kɔ fen na, miin mbe a ɔ, an mu Mansa Yataa a dunya chɛ ɔ ni banda a. A sin mbe ee ma chenɛ a, mɔ gbu ɛ min sɔ a boo a.
44017025	A sin, mɔ gbu boo ee ko chɛ a ko a, ni a toen mu ko kan kɔ kan na. A wan Yataa, an mbe fɔɛ be mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, an mbe fia chɛ mɔɛ ɔ, a wan mbe fen kɔ fen be mɔɛ ma.
44017026	A‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ nyan dunya chɛ ɔ, a bɔ mɔ kaima dɔndɔ gbe an dɔ. Mbɛ a‑a an na fasan dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ ben‑da. A wandi gbu sin fan‑na a ɔ bɛn, mbɛ mɔ gbu n ni ma dunya gbɛɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ n sin mbe kaina min chee an 'na chɛnyɛ n na, a wan‑na a ɔ bɛn to an ma koe a nɔ, an tima chɛ kɔɔ.
44017027	A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, an ni an ya a kan a a. Kɔkɔɛ an mbe a yen‑da wan, ni an‑na an boo mɛmɛ mɛmɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa gbu tena ɔ ma yansan, mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ a.
44017028	A ɛ wan dechee, yɔ mɔ dɔndɔ na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, ‘A 'a gbasaya ɔ mu mmɔ ɛ ben ben, a yɛ to, mmɔ ɛ ma fɔɛ chɛ ɔ.’ A ɛ wan, yɔ wo 'a gboo nyɛn mɔ wa dɔ n‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, an dɔ te, ‘Mbɛ tea gbu ko a, a 'a denɛ n mu mmɔ gbɛɛ a.’
44017029	Mmɔ mu gbɛ buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a denɛ n na, mmɔ ma mmɔ yii na chii a bɔ nyɔɛ dɔ mende wa koe a. Mbɛ a bɔen mu fenɛ an na, min nyanden mu sanu ɔ, chɛ ma, kain gbɛ ɔ, chɛ ma, senɛ ɔ. Mɔ gbu wandi 'a yiinachii, a‑a miin nyan.
44017030	Tima min na ni wo nii ma a ɔ sɔn, wo ni koe miin ma tena, Yataa‑a a ya ka a nɛnɛ a. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, ɛ a fɔ tena mɔ ɔ mɔ ye, dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na.
44017031	Koe min na mu, a‑a tee yian, ɛ tea gbɛmbo chɛ‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ a, dunya ɔ tee min ma. Ɛ a ma‑a wan, a na‑a a boo sɔ mɔɛ min ma, a ni mɔɛ n gbɛmbo. A sin‑na yiinatɛ be wan mmɔ ma, a‑a a ma kɛn, kamin chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ.”
44017032	An‑na a a min kɛn gbɛ, Pɔɔ‑a bai sa, a si mɔ gbu kɔɔ sɔ koe ma, a ka saya ɔ, dɔ n‑na a ma yɛn fan. Chɛɛ dɔ n sin, an dɔ, “Nn mbe to‑a wan to, nn ni bai a min, a si koe chɛ ma.”
44017033	Mbɛ Pɔɔ bɔ‑a an bɛn chɛ ɔ.
44017034	Mɔɛ dɔ n sa‑a wan a kaa a, mbɛ an‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a. An mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, mɔɛ ni wan nɔ min tɔ ni Diɔnisiɔsi, a sin ni gbakoo dɔndɔ an na bɛn chɛ ɔ. Musu dɔndɔ wɛɛ‑a a kai fa wan Chisɔsi a, min tɔ ni Damayisi, ni mɔ dɔ mende nu.
44018001	Chɛ gbakɔ, Pɔɔ bɔ‑a wan Atɛnsi duu ɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a Kɔyindi duu ɔ.
44018002	Kɔyindi ni, a‑a Chu mɔ dɔndɔ tan, min tɔ ni Akuida, a sin suun‑da Pɔndɔsi chɛnyɛ ɔ wan. A na nama ni ka, a ka Itadi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an fea a 'a musu Pisida a. Koe min na mu, Domi kun ti wa chɛ, min tɔ ni Kaudiyɔsi, a na‑a sawa a ben fan, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni bɔ Domi duu ɔ. Pɔɔ ta‑a wan an yen koe a,
44018003	mbɛ an bɛ ni wan an na. Koe min na mu, an bɛ ni wai dɔndɔ gbe an chɛ. Pɔɔ ni a 'a daun fenɛ ma sɔn tɛndi nyan wai an dɔ, yɔ Akuida wɛɛ, an fea a 'a musu a.
44018004	Suin tee kan kɔ kan ma, a ni koe tɛnsɛ wan mɔɛ chɛ n tena, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a. A sin, a ni butuin chɛ tena wan, Chu mɔɛ nu, an bɛ Kiisi mɔɛ n na, an yiima ni mun Chisɔsi tena.
44018005	Sidasi an fea Timoti a, an na‑a kɛn a ka Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, Pɔɔ‑a a 'a tima gbɛɛ be Yataa bai sa koe an na. A ni wan a fɔ tena Chu mɔɛ n ye, Chisɔsi an mu kunka mansa a.
44018006	An‑na a kɔɔsa bia wan, mbɛ an‑na bai yama gbɛɛ sa a ma. An‑na chɛ ma kɛn, Pɔɔ‑a a 'a doma ɔ gbɔngbɔn fan, ma koe a dasi a an tena. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni wo ma bauncha ma sɔn ni, wo ee wo tɛɛ si‑a to n ma. Wo e wo tɛɛ si‑a gbɛ wo wandi an ma. A ka gbɛ sanche ma, n mbe Yataa bai sa‑a gbɛ chɛ n fan tena, miin ma Chu mɔ a.”
44018007	Mbɛ a bɔ‑a an tɛ ɔ, a ta‑a kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, min nii ma Chu mɔ a. A tɔ ni Titiyɔsi Chɔsitɔsi, min ni Yataa fai mɔɛ a. A 'a chenɛ ni Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ baima wan.
44018008	Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Kisipɔsi, ni a 'a chen 'na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an‑na an kai fa wan gbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a. Kisipɔsi chɛ ni ya ɔ sɔɛ an na, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ a. Mɔ sɛsɛ nu Kɔyindi duu ɔ, an‑na sakana bai chɛ a min kɛn Pɔɔ a, an dan‑da wan a a, mbɛ yii chɛ‑a an kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.
44018009	Yɛɛ dɔndɔ ma, Mansa Yataa‑a koe ɔ yian fan Pɔɔ a, yɔ a ni cho an dɔ. Yataa‑a a fɔ wan Pɔɔ ye, a ɔ, “Pɔɔ, i ma chian, koe min na mu, n mbe i fɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che ko yama ma‑a i a. E Yataa bai sa min na, a a tun, i ma sɛmbɛ. Koe min na mu, mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe wan nɛ duu chɛ ɔ, miin mu n 'na mɔɛ n na.”
44018011	Chɛ ko a, Pɔɔ ni wan Kɔyindi duu ɔ, san dɔndɔ ni a tɔ, ɛ nɔ mɔɛ n kan‑da Yataa 'a bai n na.
44018012	Chɛɛ an‑na Kadio ma tima min na kɔfana a, Akaya chɛnyɛ kun ma, Chu n‑na kuiɛ a kanɛ chɛ Pɔɔ ma, mbɛ an‑na a bia, an na‑a a a kɔfana chɛ 'a kuti ɔ.
44018013	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kamin chɛ toen mu, a ni a ma mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n yiima ni mun, Yataa fai gbee dɔ mende ma, mmɔ 'a sawa ma dɔn ni min ma.”
44018014	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ toen ni kɛn a ni koɔ, Kadio‑a a fɔ wan Chu chɛ n ye, a ɔ, “Wo wan Chu nu, a ni nyan‑da wan, n ni n too ma sɔ wo ma. Ni kamin chɛ na‑a sawa an yɔn, chɛ ma, a ni ko yama wa ma.
44018015	Chɛɛ a sien mu ka buɛ min dɔ kɔɔsa bia ma, bai n dɔ, a basan tɔɛ n na, ni wo ta Chu sawa nu, wo wandi an mbe bai chɛ nɛnɛ sa tena. N fan mbe ee kaa a tɛ tena, a si ko bonda chɛ n ma.”
44018016	Mbɛ a‑a an gbain, an kuti gbu ɔ.
44018017	Mbɛ an gbɛɛ bea‑a Sositɛnesi ma gbasi a, min ni ya ɔ sɔɛ a, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ kun ma. An‑na a gbasi wan, kuti chenɛ gbu ya kɔɔ. Chɛɛ Kadio‑a a ka wan a too kɔ.
44018018	Koe chɛ maenɛ gbakɔ, Pɔɔ ni wan Kɔyindi tee kuun ko a. Mbɛ a‑a a saa suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n na nɔ Chasi ɔ, a si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, an bɛ Pisida an fea a chɛɛ Akuida a, ta koe a Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ. An mbe e na to si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, a ka Sɛnkea duu ɔ, an‑na a kunɛ gbanan fan. Koe min na mu, a na‑a a kai wan tee a kɔma a, Yataa tena.
44018019	An che‑a kɛn Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ, Pɔɔ n tɛ du‑a wan Pisida, an fea a chɛɛ Akuida a. A ta‑a wan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, koe n tɛnsɛ koe a, an bɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n na nɔ Ɛfisɔsi.
44018020	An‑na a ɔ tisa kɛn, a ma koe a nɔ tima ɔ yansama ko a, a nii ma dɔn ni.
44018021	Chɛɛ a ni kɛn a saa an na, a‑a bai chɛ an fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Ni Yataa dɔn‑da, n mbe yɛ‑a wan to wo tena.” Mbɛ a si‑a dɛndɛ ɔ, a ka Ɛfisɔsi, mbɛ a ta‑a.
44018022	A che‑a kɛn Sisayea duu ɔ, a bɔ‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ a sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn. A che‑a kɛn nɔ, a‑a chɔchi mɔɛ n kɔndɔn fan, mbɛ a ben‑da, a ta Andiɔki duu ɔ.
44018023	A‑a tima ɛnden ya kɛn nɔ wɛɛ, a bɔ‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ a ta‑a Kadesia an fea Fichiya chɛnyɛ ɔ a. A ta‑a wan duu sɛsɛ ɔ, an chɛnyɛ chɛ n dɔ. A ni wan a ma tena, Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an dɔ ɛ gbɛa‑a.
44018024	A tima chɛ a, Chu mɔ dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Apɔdɔsi, min suun‑da Adɛsandia duu ɔ, a na‑a wan Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ. A ni kosan kaka bai sa a, a sin to, a‑a Yataa 'a gboo ɔ gbɛ wan chɛndɛ chɛ.
44018025	A kanden fan ni gbɛ, chia chɛ ma, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min yian. A sin ni bai sa wan a si Chisɔsi ma, a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, paa ee a ma. A‑a chɛ ma wɛɛ, chɛɛ a‑a koe chɛ an dɔ gbɛ dechee, min sien ni yii chɛ ma mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, Chɔn na‑a min fɔ.
44018026	A‑a a kuu sɔ wan koɔ‑a, faagbɛa a, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a. Chɛɛ Pisida an fea a chɛɛ Akuida a, an‑na a da a bai chɛ a min kɛn, an‑na a ya wan, an ta‑a a a an 'na chenɛ a. Mbɛ an‑na chia chɛ wakoe ɔ yian a a chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a min yian.
44018027	Chɛ gbakɔ, a toen ni kɛn a ni ben Akaya chɛnyɛ ɔ, suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na a faa ma nande wan. Mbɛ an‑na gboo nyɛn an suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n tena Akaya, an dɔ, an ni an boo si a kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ. A che‑a kɛn Akaya, a basan‑da wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma kaka, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, koadia demanɛ 'a gbasaya ɔ, Yataa ɛ min chɛ.
44018028	Koe min na mu, a ni ma koe n tɛnsɛ‑a, Chu mɔɛ n nii sɔ a a ɛnden bɛɛ a. A‑a a ɔ yian fan an na, a ka Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ kunka mansa mu Chisɔsi an na.
44019001	Apɔdɔsi ni kɛn Kɔyindi duu ɔ, Pɔɔ bɔ‑a wan chɛnyɛ kun ma chia a, mbɛ a che‑a Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ, a‑a Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ dɔ n tan kaina min.
44019002	Mbɛ a‑a an dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina na‑a bea wan wo fɛ, wo na‑a wo kai fa kɛn Chisɔsi a?” Mbɛ an dɔ te, “A an. Nn gbu ma chɛ a min nin bɛ, mbɛ nyina ɛ wan nɔ, min tɔɛ ɛ ka.”
44019003	Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “Mbɛ yii minan sima chɛ‑a gbɛ wo kunɛ ɔ?” Mbɛ an dɔ te, “Chɔn‑na yii chɛ buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a.”
44019004	Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ, “Chɔn ni yii min chɛ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a sien ni mɔɛ n kan kɔ sɔɛ koe an na, an 'na ko yama n na. A ni a fɔ wan to mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ an ni an kai fa mɔɛ chɛ a, min mbe na tena a gbaa chia a. A wan Chɔn chɛ sin, a ni ka bai sa‑a a si Chisɔsi an ma.”
44019005	Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na Pɔɔ da a bai chɛ a min kɛn, an‑na a ma wan, Pɔɔ‑a yii chɛ an kunɛ ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ.
44019006	A sin, Pɔɔ‑a a boo bun an ma, mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a an fɛ. An‑na kamaya bai n fɔ wan, mɔɛ n mbe ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na Yataa bai ɔ yian.
44019007	An gbɛɛ, an taen fan ni mɔ kaima tan kun ma fea nyɔn sima ɔ.
44019008	Kau sawa ko a, Pɔɔ ni ta wan Chu n 'na samun chɛ chen chɛ a, a sin ni koɔ wan nɔ faagbɛa a. A ni koe n tɛnsɛ wan, an bɛ an na, a sin ni an disa wan, a si Yataa 'a mansaya wakoe ma.
44019009	Chɛɛ dɔ n too ɔ ni gbɛ wan, min‑na a ma, an nii ma dɔn ni dan koe a Pɔɔ a. A sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ ni, an ni bai yama n sa, a si chia ma, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min yian mɔ gbu a, a sɔ koe a a fɛ. Mbɛ Pɔɔ sɛmbɛ‑a koɔ koe a an tena, a ka‑a an fɛ. Mbɛ a‑a Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɔ an ya a, an ta‑a a a. A sin ni koe n tɛnsɛ wan, tee ɔ tee a, an bɛ an na, chen ba dɔ mende a, min ni Tayanɔsi ta a, kanɛ ni chɛ kaina min.
44019010	Chɛ a tun‑da wan a ma san fea ko a, min‑na a ma, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ ni Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, an‑na sakana bai a min fan, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma. Chu mɔɛ n‑na a a min fan, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a.
44019011	Yataa‑a gbasaya be wan Pɔɔ ma, kamaya ko wa n ma koe a.
44019012	Ni a 'a yenkisa wɛɛ, chɛ ma, a kana doma gbu wɛɛ, ni an ta‑a a a, tu koe a gbandi mɔ kan kɔ kan na, a ni chɛndɛya ma sɔn fan. Gbandi ni bɔ wan an mɔɛ chɛ gboo ɔ, chɛ ma, nyina yama wɛɛ ni ka wan a fɛ.
44019013	Chu mɔɛ n ni wan nɔ, miin ni ben ben, nyina yama gbain‑da mɔɛ n fɛ. An bɛɛ ni tima ya wan, wai chɛ koe a Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ. An ni a fɔ wan, an dɔ te, “N mbe a fɔ tena i ye, mbɛ i ni ka a fɛ, Chisɔsi tɔɛ an dɔ, Pɔɔ ɛ bai sa ka a si min ma.”
44019014	Den kaien wɔnfea nu, miin fa ni Sifa a, an fan ni chɛ ma. Sifa chɛ ni Chu mɔɛ n 'na tɛ mɔ wa an na, Yataa tena.
44019015	Chɛɛ tee dɔndɔ a, an ni wan nyina yama chɛ gbain‑da kamin dɔndɔ fɛ. Nyina yama chɛ ni a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “N‑na Chisɔsi sɔn fan, n‑na Pɔɔ wɛɛ sɔn. Chɛɛ wo tana, nyɔn mu wo a?”
44019016	Mbɛ kamin chɛ, nyina yama chɛ ɛ ka min fɛ, a chɛ‑a an ma gbasi a. A kun‑da wan an ma, mbɛ a‑a an gbɛɛ pɛndɛn chɛndɛ chɛ. Mbɛ an bɔ‑a bui a an chenɛ chɛ a, an ma senɛ ɛ, a yɛ to, wii ɛ bɔ‑a an ma.
44019017	Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ nu, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a, an‑na koe chɛ a min fan Ɛfisɔsi. Chiandia dɛ‑a wan an gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na basɔmaya wa be wan gbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ma.
44019018	Mɔ sɛsɛ nu, miin bɛɛ na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an na‑a wan fanka ɔ, mbɛ an dɔn‑da an chɛ chɛ wai yama n ma, an sin‑na an dɔ yian fan.
44019019	An sɛsɛ nu, miin boo ni nkofo koe n dɔ, an na‑a wan an 'na nkofo gboo n na kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ an‑na an minda fanka ɔ. A tima chɛ a, an gboo chɛ n gbɛɛ sɔnkɔɛ, a ni wai chɛ mɔ chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, mɔ bi wɔdɔ pawa wan, san dɔndɔ ko a.
44019020	Chia chɛ a ni, sakana bai chɛ, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma, a fasan‑da a ɔ gbɛɛ. A sin, an sakana chɛ ni koe miin ma mɔɛ n 'na fɔɛ ɔ, a nii ma dɔɔ.
44019021	Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ gbakɔ, Pɔɔ‑a a yiima ɔ bɛn fan, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, ben koe a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a basan Akaya a, ta koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Ni n ta‑a Chuusaɛn, n mbe che‑a wan Domi bɛɛ.”
44019022	Mbɛ a‑a Timoti a ta Masidonia, an fea Ɛyasitɔsi a, mɔ fea miin ni basan a ma. Mbɛ a sin to‑a tima ɛnden ko a, Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ.
44019023	A tima chɛ a, gbunɛ min‑na a kuu sɔ Ɛfisɔsi, a nii ma dɔ, a si mɔɛ n ma, Chisɔsi fɛ chia a.
44019024	A kuu sɔ‑a kamin dɔndɔ an ma, min tɔ ni Demetiɔsi. Demetiɔsi chɛ ni tonkan ti an na, min na‑a mɔ sɛsɛ ya, wai chɛ koe a a kɔɔ. Ɛfisɔsi duu chɛ ɔ, chen chenama sɔen fan ni nɔ, Kiisi mɔɛ n 'na musu yataa chɛ, min tɔ ni Atɛmisi, a fai koe a. Demetiɔsi, an bɛ a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, an ni chen mɛsɛ mɛsɛ n nyan fan, kain gbɛ ɔ, miin ni yɔ chen chenama chɛ. An ni kɔpɔ sɛmbɛndenɛ sɔn fan, an wai chɛ ɔ.
44019025	Mbɛ tee dɔndɔ a, a‑a a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n chee kaina dɔndɔ, an bɛ mɔ dɔ mende n na, miin bɛɛ ni an wai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N bɔ nu, wo gbɛɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mmɔ 'a nyanɛ gbɛɛ, ɛ bɔ wai chɛ an dɔ, mmɔ ɛ ka min na.
44019026	Sanche gbɛ, wo wandi, wo e a ɔ yen tena wan, koe min mbe chɛ tena a ɔ. A yɛ to, wo e a a min tena wan. Ɛfisɔsi dechee ma, chɛɛ a maen fan mu gbɛ yɔ Esia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Pɔɔ chɛ ɛ mɔɛ n yiima mun tena buɛ min dɔ, a si mmɔ 'a wai ma. A ɛ a fɔ tena wan mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ yataa miin nyan ka mmɔ boo a, yataa kan kɔ kan ma an na.
44019027	N mbe ee bai sa tena dechee a si mmɔ 'a kɔpɔ sɔn koe an ma, ni mmɔ ɛ fo‑a buɛ min dɔ kɔpɔɛ a. Chɛɛ tima ɛ che‑a wan, mɔɛ n mbe ee na‑a baa be‑a chen chɛ ma to, mmɔ 'a musu yataa wa chɛ, a 'a chen chɛ. An gbu sin mbe na‑a wan a bɔ‑a a 'a basɔmaya chɛ ɔ, min mbe a boo ɔ. A wɛn mu ka, mɔɛ gbɛɛ Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan dunya chɛ gbɛɛ a, an mbe a fai.”
44019028	Fanka chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, an faa tɛ‑a wan gbeden. Mbɛ an bun‑da yee te‑a, an dɔ te, “Atɛmisi min mbe Ɛfisɔsi, yataa an nɛ, min gbasayaen mu.”
44019029	Mbɛ mɔɛ n sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ‑a duu wa gbu ɔ bɔ, a si an koe chɛ ma. Mbɛ an gbɛɛ‑a bui sa a a, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ bɛn tena chɛ duu chɛ ɔ. An‑na Kayɔsi bia wan, an ta‑a a a an boo ɔ, an fea Ayisitakɔsi a. Kayɔsi chɛ, an fea Ayisitakɔsi a, Masidonia chɛnyɛ mɔɛ n ni an na, miin bɛ na‑a na Pɔɔ a.
44019030	Pɔɔ wandi gbu toen fan ni don koe a, an kaina chɛ, fanka chɛ ni ka kaina min. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an nii ma dɔn ni, a ni don nɔ.
44019031	Mɔɛ dɔ n bɛɛ gbu, miin ni mɔ chenama n na nɔ, an Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an‑na sakana a ta wan disa ɔ, Pɔɔ ma na don nɔ. A dia nyɔɛ ni an mɔɛ chɛ n na.
44019032	Mɔɛ chɛ nu an bɛn chɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ too nii a bɔɛ da a kuiɛ ma. Mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan bai fɔ‑a ka, dɔ n sin mbe ta‑a bai dɔ gbɛɛ fɔ‑a. An gbu nii ma a ɔ sɔn, fen na‑a a ma, an mbe an bɛn chɛ ɔ.
44019033	Chu mɔɛ n‑na Adɛsanda yian fan, koɔ koe a mɔɛ n tena. A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ dɔ n ni wan bai don‑da a da a, a fɔ koe a. Mbɛ Adɛsanda‑a a boo kai mɔɛ chɛ n ma, min mbe a ma, a ni koɔ an tena, Chu mɔɛ n ko a.
44019034	Chɛɛ an‑na a ɔ sɔn kɛn, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ ni a a, an‑na yee tɛ wan to dɔndɔ a, an dɔ te, “Atɛmisi min mbe Ɛfisɔsi, yataa an nɛ, min gbasayaen mu.” An‑na chɛ ma wan, awa fea ko a.
44019035	Mbɛ a danka a, gboo nyɛn mɔɛ min ni an duu chɛ ɔ, a kun‑da wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, an ma maun koe a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N bɔ Ɛfisɔsi mɔɛ nu, mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mmɔ 'a duu wa chɛ, an mbe chenɛ kun ma fɛn Atɛmisi ye, mmɔ 'a yataa tɔ bɔen ba chɛ. A yɛ to, an mbe sen chɛ wɛɛ kun ma fɛn, sen ma chianden ba chɛ, min bea‑a a ka banda bu ɔ.
44019036	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che mmɔ kɔɔsa bia‑a, a si ko bonda chɛ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, a nyin wo ni wo faa chima, wo ma na ko kan kɔ kan ma, yiimatɛ ee min dɔ.
44019037	Wo na‑a ka nɛ mɔɛ miin na, an ma fen kanka ni mmɔ 'a yataa chɛ 'a chenɛ chɛ a nɛ, n mbe ee baa, an ni bai yama kan kɔ kan sa, a si mmɔ 'a musu yataa chɛ ma.
44019038	Ni mɔɛ an‑na ko yama ma Demetiɔsi a, an bɛ a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n na, mmɔ 'a gbakoo n mbe wan nɔ, miin mbe kuti si. An ni ta a mɔɛ chɛ n na nɔ, an ni an ma sii bia.
44019039	Chɛɛ ni ko dɔ mende kan kɔ kan mbe wan nɔ, wo toen mu min ma koe a, a bai chɛ ɛ sa bɛn chɛ an dɔ, chɛnyɛ ti n mbe min chee.
44019040	Ni mmɔ ma mmɔ kun ma fɛn ni koe chɛ a, min ma‑a ka bi, Domi gbakoo n mbe kunɛ si‑a wan mmɔ kun ma, gbunɛ a bea koe a. Mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee che‑a a fɔ‑a, mbɛ tea ɛ wan mmɔ 'a faatɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ bi.”
44019041	A ban‑da kɛn bai chɛ fɔ‑a, mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na ta an baa nu.
44020001	An gbun chɛ ɔ chima‑a kɛn, mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n chee kaina dɔndɔ. A ban‑da kɛn an faa chima bai fɔ‑a an ye, a‑a a saa wan an na. Mbɛ a‑a an to, a ta‑a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44020002	A ben ben‑da wan Masidonia chɛnyɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ ta‑a nɔ mɔɛ chɛ n faa ma nande‑a bai sɛsɛ a. Mbɛ a ka‑a nɔ, a ta‑a Kiisi chɛnyɛ ɔ,
44020003	a ni kaina kau sawa ko a. A ɛ gbɛ a ma bɛn tena wan, ta koe a Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ n ni dɔbɛnɛ an dɔ, a fa koe a. A wɛɛ‑a a yiima mun fan, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to Masidonia.
44020004	Kai Piyɔsi 'a den kaienɛ Sopata, min ka‑a Bɛyia duu ɔ, a bea‑a wan Pɔɔ fɛ, mbɛ an fea ta‑a a a. Mɔ dɔ mende nu, miin bɛɛ bea‑a a fɛ, an fan nii nɛ, Ayisitakɔsi a, an fea Sɛkundɔsi a, miin ka‑a Tɛsadonika duu ɔ. A yɛ to, ni Kayɔsi, min ka‑a Dabi duu ɔ, an fea Tikikɔsi a, ni Tɔfimɔsi miin ka‑a Esia chɛnyɛ n dɔ. Mɔɛ dankama ni Timoti an na.
44020005	An fan ta‑a nn ya ɔ, mbɛ an‑na nn ma kɔn Towasi duu ɔ.
44020006	Chɛɛ biidi dɛnfɛ daun bɛn ba chɛ ben‑da kɛn, nn si‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, a ka Fiipai duu ɔ. Tee duu gbakɔ, nn‑na an tan fan Towasi, nn ni kaina tɛn sɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ko a.
44020007	Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ ma, nn bɛn‑da wan kaina dɔndɔɛ, daun chɛ koe a. Pɔɔ‑a Yataa bai sa wan mɔɛ chɛ n tena. A toen ni ben koe an na, a banda ka. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a koɔ‑a wan an tena, aan su ta‑a a tɛ ma.
44020008	Dambo sɛsɛ a manden fan ni, banda a chen chɛ a, nn ni ka kaina bɛnɛ chɛ ɔ.
44020009	A tima chɛ a, kamin tɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Yutikɔsi. Pɔɔ ni koɛ chɛ gbɛɛ chɛ tena tima min na, a ni si ɔ wunda a wan, a gbu chinɔenɛ ɛ. Mbɛ Pɔɔ che‑a kaina wan, Yutikɔsi boo tɛ‑a wunda chɛ a, mbɛ a bea‑a duu ma, a bɔ chenɛ chɛ si tena sawa chɛ ɔ. An mbe gbɛ a ya‑a, a faenɛ ni don.
44020010	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ yii‑a wan nɔ duu ma, mbɛ a‑a a ma bun su chɛ kun ma. Mbɛ a‑a su chɛ bia a boo fea a, a ɔ, “Wo ma wo faa gbaa, a ɛ fɔɛ ɔ.”
44020011	Mbɛ a sɛ‑a to banda a chen chɛ a, a‑a biidi tɛ kai, mbɛ an bɛ gbɛɛ‑a a daun kaina dɔndɔ. A to‑a wan koɔ‑a an tena, aan banda ɔ ka‑a, mbɛ a ta‑a.
44020012	Pɔɔ ta‑a kɛn, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ya wan, a chɛndɛ chen, an ta‑a a ma sɔ‑a a waa a. Chɛ‑a an bu ɔ dia wan, a ɔ benden ba a.
44020013	Pɔɔ na‑a dɔbɛnɛ chɛ wan nn na, mbɛ a ɛ ta‑a nn ya ɔ, a chenɛ ma, Asɔsi duu ɔ. A ɔ, nn sin tana, nn ni si dɛndɛ ɔ, a ta Asɔsi, a ya ɔ. A ɔ, a ɛ nn tan‑da nɔ wan, mbɛ nn ta‑a a ya ɔ.
44020014	A‑a nn tan kɛn Asɔsi duu ɔ, a sɛ‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ nn kun ma, mbɛ nn bɛ ta‑a Mitidene duu ɔ.
44020015	Nn ka‑a wan nɔ dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ nn ta‑a Kiɔsi ya teen ma, tee dɔndɔɛ ma. Tee dɔndɔ gbakɔ to, nn che‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ Samɔsi yii tinɛ ɔ. Nn chi‑a nɔ wan. Mbɛ banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, nn che‑a wan gbɛ Midetɔsi duu ɔ.
44020016	Pɔɔ yiima ɔ bɛnden fan ni, a ni Ɛfisɔsi ma sangba. Koe min na mu, a nii ma to ni tima kan kɔ kan yayi koe a Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A toen ni tachɛ a gbandi ma an chɛ koe a. Ni a ni bɛn fan, a ni che Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, tee chɛ ma, an ni min chee Pɛndekɔsi.
44020017	Pɔɔ to‑a Midetɔsi wan, mbɛ a‑a sakana a ta Ɛfisɔsi chɔchi gbakoo n tena, an na koe a, a tan‑da.
44020018	An che‑a kɛn Pɔɔ ma, a‑a a fɔ wan an ye, a ɔ, “Wo‑a a ɔ yen fan, n ni buɛ min dɔ wo tɛ ɔ, tima ɔ tima ko a. A ka n 'na tee saa saa ma Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, aan a sɔ n ka tee ma nɔ.
44020019	Chu mɔɛ n‑na kun puinɛ chɛ wan, a yama boo a, a si n ma. Chɛɛ n‑na n fandi ma yii wan, n‑na wai chɛ wan Mansa Chisɔsi ko a, di ni wɛɛ n ya a, n faa wɛɛ yɔndenɛ ɛ, a si ko ma gbaaen chɛ n ma, Chu mɔɛ n‑na min sa n ma.
44020020	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan to, mbɛ n ma ko ɔ ko ɔ nun ni wo ma, n ni ma Yataa bai sa‑a wo tena. Chɛɛ fanka ɔ den, a basan wo 'a chenɛ n bɛɛ a, n‑na wo kan fan koe n na, miin mu demanɛ a wo tena.
44020021	N‑na dasi gbau gbau be wan Chu mɔɛ n ma, ni miin bɛɛ ma Chu mɔ a, a si an kan kɔ sɔ koe a, an 'na ko yama n na, an ni an ya a mun Yataa ma. A yɛ to, a si an kai fa koe ma mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi a.
44020022	Sanche gbɛ sin, n yen ko, n mbe ee che Yataa Nyina da a kuiɛ bɔ a ɔ, n mbe ka ta‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ wan. N gbu ma a ɔ sɔn, koe min mbe n tan‑da nɔ.
44020023	Mɔɔ dechee Yataa Nyina ɛ min fɔ tena n ye, duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, n mbe ta min dɔ. Mbɛ tɔɔya sɛsɛ, a basan pimbi chenɛ a sa a, ɛ wan n ya ɔ.
44020024	Chɛɛ ni n 'na wai chɛ koe mu, n ma n ta fɔɛ chɛ ya ni fen kɔ fen na. Wai chɛ, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min be n ma, n ni a a ban koe mu. N ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, a si Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ma.
44020025	“A sin, a yen ko gbɛ, n‑na chɛ ɔ sɔn. Mbɛ n ben ben‑da wo wɛn gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, n mbe ta‑a koɔ‑a wo tena, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee na‑a n yen‑da to.
44020026	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, n mbe chɛ ma din tena wo tena bi. Mbɛ ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ nɛ, wo ma bauncha ma sɔn ni, wo ee na‑a wo tɛɛ si‑a n ma.
44020027	Koe min na mu, n ma ko kan kɔ kan dɔ nun ni wo ma, a si koe n gbɛɛ ma, miin mbe Yataa yii ma, an ma koe a.
44020028	Wo wo wandi kun ma fɛn, ni mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, Yataa Nyina‑a miin kai fa wo a. Wo Yataa 'a chɔchi mɔɛ n kun ma fɛn. Yataa gbɔgbɔɔ denɛ, Chisɔsi, a ta wii min bɔn‑da, a fa tima a, an‑na a ma, chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n ma‑a a wan Yataa ta mɔɛ n na.
44020029	N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni n ta‑a, fania kan chɛ mɔɛ n mbe na‑a wan n gbaa. An mbe ma‑a wan, yɔ nya fenɛ nu wo tɛ ɔ, a sin, an mbe ee sai bɔ‑a, wo 'a mɔɛ n na.
44020030	A sin, tima ɛ che‑a wan, mɔɛ dɔ n ni bɔ wo wandi gbu tɛ ɔ, miin mbe bai n fɔ‑a, miin mbe ee a chia ma. An mbe chɛ ma‑a wan, mɔɛ dɔ n ka koe a Chisɔsi 'a chia ma, an ni bea an fɛ.
44020031	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo wandi kun ma fɛn, mɔ bonda chɛ n boo ɔ. Wo wo yii na chii, mbɛ su ɔ tee a, n ni wo a si wan. N‑na chɛ ma wan san sawa ko a, di a n ya a.
44020032	“Sanche gbɛ, n mbe wo kai fa tena Yataa an na. Wo a a tun dan koe a sakana bai chɛ a, a si Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ chɛ ma wo tena. Ɛ kun fan, a ni a ma, wo 'a danaya n dɔ ni gbɛa. A yɛ to, ɛ kun fan, a ni dua chɛ be wo ma, min mbe Yataa boo ɔ, a 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a.
44020033	N nii ma to ni, mɔ ɔ mɔ ta boo fen kan kɔ kan na.
44020034	Wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n fandi gbu 'a taa sende, n mbe an daun, nn bɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe n fɛ.
44020035	N‑na a ɔ yian fan wo a, chia ɔ chia a, mɔɛ ɛ wai chɛ buɛ min dɔ a boo a, basan koe a mɔɛ n ma, boo ee miin ma, an ma koe chɛ koe a. Mmɔ yii ɛ ma‑a wan bai chɛ kɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a min fɔ, a ɔ, ‘Dua ɛ fenɛ be mɔɛ ma kaka, a ni ben a bia mɔɛ ma.’ ”
44020036	Pɔɔ ban‑da kɛn koɔ‑a ka mɔɛ chɛ n tena, a‑a a kumbai gbangban fan, an bɛ gbɛɛ an na, mbɛ an‑na samunɛ chɛ Yataa tena.
44020037	A sin, an ni kɛn an saa a a, an gbɛɛ gbaun‑da wan di a, an bea‑a a kaa ɔ, koadia wa ɔ.
44020038	Pɔɔ‑a bai min fɔ an ye, an gbu‑a an faa mɔnɛ kaka. A‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ, a ɔ, an mbe ee na‑a an nyɔn yen‑da to. Mbɛ an ta‑a a ma sɔ‑a, dɛndɛ tena, an kɔ yii da a.
44021001	Mbɛ nn tɛ du‑a kɛn, nn bɛ Ɛfisɔsi mɔɛ chɛ n na, nn si‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ. Mbɛ nn ta‑a dɔndɔ gbe Kɔsi yii tin chɛ ɔ. Tee fean bɔɛ ma, nn bɔ‑a Kɔsi, mbɛ nn ta‑a Dɔdɛsi yii tinɛ ɔ, nn ka‑a kaina min, nn ta‑a Pataa duu wɛɛ ɔ.
44021002	A sin, nn‑na dɛndɛ dɔ gbɛɛ tan fan Pataa, min ni ta tena Fonisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Nn sɛ‑a wan a ɔ, mbɛ nn ta‑a Fonisia.
44021003	Nn che‑a kɛn kaina, nn ni Saipɔsi yii tinɛ yen kaina min, nn‑na a ma sangba wan. Mbɛ nn‑na boo nyima ɔ chia bia wan, nn‑na nn kun sɔ Saipɔsi a, mbɛ nn che‑a tindi ma Taya duu ɔ. Koe min na mu, nɔ ni feanka a ni yii, a bɔ dɛndɛ wa chɛ ɔ.
44021004	Nn‑na nn ya a kan fan Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na nɔ, nn sin bɛ ni wan an na tɛn sɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ko a. Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, fɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ wan Pɔɔ ye, a ma tachɛ a tun, a ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
44021005	Chɛɛ nn 'na tima ban‑da kɛn nɔ duu chɛ ɔ, nn‑na nn saa wan an na, ta koe a. An gbɛɛ, musu nu, kai nu, an bɛ an 'na denɛ n na, an‑na nn ma sɔ wan. Nn che‑a kɛn yii da a, nn gbɛɛ, nn‑na nn kumbai gbangban fan, nn‑na samunɛ chɛ Yataa tena.
44021006	Nn ban‑da kɛn nn saa nn nyɔn na, mbɛ nn sɛ‑a dɛndɛ gbu ɔ, an sin yɛ‑a an baa a.
44021007	Nn ban‑da kɛn nn 'na tachɛ ma Taya duu ɔ, mbɛ nn‑na a fo Tɔdɛmaisi duu ɔ. A sin, suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu nɔ Chasi ɔ, nn‑na an kɔndɔn fan tee dɔndɔ ko a.
44021008	Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, nn bɔ‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ nn na‑a Sisayea duu ɔ. Nn ta‑a wan kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, sondaya a. A tɔ ni Fiipi, min ni ben ben sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da, a si Chisɔsi ma. A ni mɔ dɔndɔ an na to, mɔ wɔnfea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, Chuusaɛn mɔɛ n na‑a an boo sɔ miin ma.
44021009	Den musuma naanin fan ni a boo ɔ, miin nii wɛ kai boo ɔ. An ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fan na.
44021010	Nn ni ka nɔ tee kuunɛ min ko a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔ dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Akabɔsi, a yii‑a wan, a ka Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44021011	Akabɔsi chɛ na‑a wan nn tena, mbɛ a‑a Pɔɔ 'a bu tɛ chii yuu ya, a‑a a wandi chenɛ ɔ chii, a basan a boo a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɔ te, a ɔ, mɔɛ min ta mu bu tɛ chii yuu chɛ a, Chu mɔɛ n mbe a chii‑a ka wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. A ɔ, an sin mbe a be‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a.”
44021012	Nn‑na bai chɛ a min kɛn, nn fan, nn bɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n na nɔ, nn‑na Pɔɔ disa wan, a ma na ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
44021013	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “Wo e di chɛ tena ka, n faa yɔn koe an na. Fen mu wo e chɛ ma tena? N ma ma bɛn ni, n sa koe dechee an ko a pimbi chenɛ a, chɛɛ n fa koe wɛɛ gbu a, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi ko a.”
44021014	Nn sin‑na a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ nn nii che a yiima mun‑da, nn bɛɛ sɛmbɛ‑a. Nn dɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi faa ma koe ni ma.
44021015	Nn‑na tima ɛnden ya kɛn nɔ, nn‑na nn 'na feanka n dɔ bɛn fan, mbɛ nn ta‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
44021016	Mbɛ Chisɔsi fɛ denɛ dɔ nu, a ka Sisayea, an bea‑a wan nn fɛ. An sin‑na nn ya wan, nn ta‑a kamin dɔndɔ 'a chenɛ a, nn ni ma tena min 'na sondaya a. A tɔ ni Nason. A ka‑a Saipɔsi yii tinɛ ɔ wan, a sin‑na a kai fa Chisɔsi a tima min na, a ɔ ni yansan.
44021017	Nn na‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, nn suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an‑na an boo si wan nn kɔɔ, buɔdia wa a.
44021018	Banda ɔ ka dɔndɔɛ ma, nn bɛ ta‑a wan Pɔɔ a, Chimisi yen koe a. Nn che‑a kɛn Chimisi tena, chɔchi gbakoo n gbɛɛ a sɔnden fan ni nɔ.
44021019	Pɔɔ‑a an gbɛɛ kɔndɔn fan. Mbɛ a si‑a ko ɔ ko ma, a‑a a ɔ yian an na, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. A‑a a ɔ yian fan, Yataa na‑a koe miin chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin nii ma ka Chu mɔ a. Chɛ sin bɔ‑a a wan Pɔɔ 'a wai an dɔ.
44021020	An sin‑na Pɔɔ 'a bai chɛ n na min kɛn, an‑na tando be wan Yataa ma. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ Pɔɔ ye, an dɔ, “Nn suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ, i wandi‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ Chu mɔ wu sɛsɛ nu, an‑na an kai fa buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi a. A yɛ to, an‑na a ma wan, an ma gbɔsɔɛ a, mmɔ 'a Chu sawa n bia koe a.
44021021	A sin, a fɔen fan mu an ye, mbɛ e ben tena Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe mɔɛ n 'na chɛnyɛ ɔ, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an kan‑da koe miin na. Mbɛ an ni an kan kɔ sɔ mmɔ 'a sawa chɛ n na, Yataa na‑a miin be Mosisi ma. An dɔ te to, i ɔ, an ma an 'na denɛ n na kamincha to, n mbe ee baa, Chu n 'na manda n na tachɛ koe a.
44021022	Mmɔ ɛ fen ma‑a gbɛ sanche? Koe min na mu, an mbe na‑a wan kɛn a a min‑da, mbɛ e nɛ duu chɛ ɔ.
44021023	Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn toen mu i ni koe chɛ an ma. Chu mɔ kaima naanin mbe wan nɛ, miin‑na an kai Yataa tena.
44021024	Wo bɛ ni ta an na, mbɛ wo bɛ‑a manda chɛ a tachɛ, min mbe a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ wo ma ko‑a fion Yataa tena. Bɔnɔɛ gbɛɛ, an ko a, a chɛ, an ma ko koe chɛ a Yataa tena. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni kun an kunɛ n sin koe ma. Ni i‑a chɛ ma, mɔɛ n mbe ee na‑a dan‑da bai chɛ n na to, an‑na miin gbɛɛ fɔ an ye, a si i ma. Chɛɛ an mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ i wɛɛ‑a koe chɛ n ma wan, miin mbe sawa chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma.
44021025	Chɛɛ chɛ n tana, miin ma Chu mɔ a, chɛɛ an‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a, nn‑na gboo nyɛndenɛ a ta wan an tena. Nn‑na a fɔ wan an ye, mbɛ nn ta yiima ɔ, an ma daun fen kan kɔ kan daun, mɔɛ n‑na min bɔ yasi a, fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a. A yɛ to, an ma wii daun, an gbu ma soe kan kɔ kan daun, min kanɛ a ma tɛ ni. A sin to, an ni an boo bɔ ko tɛ ɔ.”
44021026	Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ya, tee dɔndɔɛ ma, mbɛ an bɛ gbɛɛ an na, an‑na manda chɛ a tachɛ, an ma ko koe a Yataa tena. Mbɛ a don‑da Yataa 'a kata ɔ, a fɔ koe a, ni ɛ tima yuu ya‑a, aan an ma ko tima chɛ ni ban. A tima chɛ a mu, yasi ɛ bɔ‑a an gbɛɛ ko a, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
44021027	Chɛɛ tee wɔnfea chɛ, a ni gbɛ ban koe an na, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, a ka Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an‑na Pɔɔ yen fan Yataa 'a kata ɔ. An‑na fanka a sɛ wan Pɔɔ ma, mbɛ an‑na a bia fɔin.
44021028	An‑na yee tɛ wan, an dɔ te, “Nn bɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, wo na, wo ni basan nn ma. Kamin chɛ, an mbe ben tena bai yama sa‑a, a si mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n ma. An mbe a fɔ tena to mɔ ɔ mɔ ye, mbɛ an ma ma sawa chɛ n kɔɔ, Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma. Ɛ bai yama n dechee an sa, a si mmɔ 'a Yataa 'a kata chɛ wɛɛ ma. A yɛ to, a‑a Yataa 'a kata chɛ tana yɔn, don koe a nɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ n na.”
44021029	Koe min‑na a ma, an‑na chɛ fɔ, an na‑a a yen fan an duu chɛ ɔ, an fea Tɔfimɔsi a, min ka‑a Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ. A ni wan an yii ma, mbɛ Pɔɔ na‑a don fan Tɔfimɔsi chɛ a, Yataa 'a kata ɔ.
44021030	Mbɛ gbunɛ bea‑a an duu wa chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ ben‑da, mɔɛ n mbe ta‑a ben‑da bui chɛ‑a dɔndɔ a. Mbɛ an‑na Pɔɔ bia fɔin, an‑na a konkon, a bɔ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. A sin, a ya kɔɔɛ a, an‑na Yataa 'a kata chɛ da n na tɔn tɔn fan.
44021031	An toen ni kɛn an ni Pɔɔ fa, sakana na‑a wan kun ti chɛ tena, Domi mɔɛ n 'na soya n ko a. Mbɛ gbunɛ bea‑a Chuusaɛn duu wa chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
44021032	A ya kɔɔɛ a, a‑a soya gbakoo dɔ n ya, an bɛ soya n na, mbɛ an yii‑a butuin chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a yen kɛn na‑a, an bɛ soya chɛ n na, an sɛmbɛ‑a wan Pɔɔ gbasi koe a.
44021033	Mbɛ soya chɛ n kun ti chɛ, a ta‑a, mbɛ a‑a Pɔɔ bia. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni yɔɔɛ fea chɛ a ma. Mbɛ a‑a dɔ tisa chɛ gbɛ, a ɔ, “Nyɔn mu kamin chɛ a, a yɛ to, a gbu sin‑na fen ma?”
44021034	Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu fanka chɛ ɔ, an ni bai dɔndɔɛ fɔ wan, dɔ n sin mbe ta‑a bai dɔ mende fɔ‑a. Sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔɛ da a ni koo aan, soya chɛ n kun ti, a nii ma che ni, a ni a ɔ sɔn, ni fen ko gbu na‑a ma. Mbɛ a wɛɛ‑a a fɔ soya chɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ni ta Pɔɔ a an tena, baachi chɛ ɔ.
44021035	An sin che‑a kɛn sitɛpi ma, soya chɛ nu, an fan‑na Pɔɔ ya gba, an‑na a si an kanɛ ma. Koe min na mu, an nii ma to ni, fanka fanka chɛ ni koe ma a a.
44021036	An gbɛɛ‑a a sɔ wan an fɛ, yee tɛ‑a, an dɔ te, “Mmɔ a fa.”
44021037	Soya chɛ n toen ni kɛn an ni don Pɔɔ a baachi chɛ ɔ, a koɔ‑a wan soya chɛ n kun ti tena. Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “E dɔn fan, n ni koɔ i tena?” Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a ɔ, “Mbɛ e Kiisi koɛ fɔ wan ka?
44021038	Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian, mbɛ Ichipi mɔɛ chɛ mu i wan na, min‑na butuinɛ si nɛ tee kɔmende a. A sin to, i wan na‑a a ma mɔ wu naaninɛ nu, miin wokoya‑a Domi kɔmende a, an bea‑a i fɛ, a ta fuinɛ ɔ. A e ka wan?”
44021039	Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “Chu mɔɛ mu n na. N suun‑da Tasɔsi duu ɔ wan, Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. N suun‑da duu min dɔ, duu nɔmɛ nɔmɛ ma a a, Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. I dimu, a ma n ni koɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tena.”
44021040	Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ dɔn‑da a ye, a ni koɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tena. A dɔn‑da kɛn, mbɛ Pɔɔ sɔ‑a sitɛpi chɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a boo a ben ben mɔɛ chɛ n tena, an too ma sɔ koe a. An‑na a ɔ maun kɛn, Pɔɔ‑a bai chɛ an sa an tena, Ibu koɛ ɔ.
44022001	A ɔ, “Fa nu, n suun ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ, wo wɛn na sɔndenɛ ɛ nɛ bi, wo wo too ma sɔ n ma, n mbe koɔ n fandi ko a.”
44022002	An‑na a min kɛn, ɛ koɔ‑a an fandi ta chɛnyɛ koɛ ɔ, an‑na a ɔ maun fan gbɛ don. Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a 'a bai sa a tun an tena, a ɔ,
44022003	“Chu mɔɛ mu n na. N suun‑da Tasɔsi wan, Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ n bɔ‑a a ɔ nɛ wan, Chuusaɛn chɛ. Kamadiɛɛ 'a kan denɛ ni n na. A‑a n kan fan chɛndɛ chɛ, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n ta sawa bia koe a gbau gbau gbu a. A sin, n‑na n fandi be wan, Yataa 'a wai chɛ koe a, n faa gbɛɛ a, n sɔɛ a. N bankan‑da wan, Yataa 'a wai chɛ koe a, yɔ wo wɛɛ, wo wɛn mbe ka bi nɛ.
44022004	N‑na mɔnɛ sɛsɛ sa wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin na‑a a sɔ chia chɛ fɛ, Chisɔsi‑a chia min yian, a sɔ koe a a fɛ. N‑na a ma wan, an‑na saya ma sɔn. N‑na an bia wan, kai nu, an bɛ musu n na, n‑na an sa pimbi chenɛ a.
44022005	Chu n tɛ mɔ wa Yataa a, ni Chu kuti wa ɔ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe kun fan an ni siiya bɔ chɛ ma. N‑na gboo nyɛndenɛ ma sɔn, a ka an fan na, ta koe a mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n tena, Damasikɔsi duu ɔ. A sin, n ni ta tena nɔ, chɛ n bɛɛ bia koe an na, n ni na an na, an chiienɛ ɛ, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an tɔɔya koe a.
44022006	“N to‑a ben ben‑da an tachɛ ɔ, mbɛ n che‑a Damasikɔsi baima. Tee cheenɛ ni a kun tɛ, a sin, man ba sɔ‑a wan, a‑a n na bɛn a ka banda a.
44022007	A sin, n bea‑a wan duu ma, mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, ɛ a fɔ‑a n ye, a ɔ, ‘Sɔɔ, Sɔɔ, fen mu e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka n ma?’
44022008	“Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ te, ‘Nyɔn mu chɛ a?’ “Mbɛ a ɔ te n ma, ‘N fan mu, n fan Chisɔsi, min ka‑a Nasaɛti duu ɔ, e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka min ma.’
44022009	Nn bɛ ni mɔɛ miin na, an‑na man chɛ yen fan gbɛ, chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ min ni koɔ tena n tena, an nii ma a kuiɛ chɛ ɔ gbɛ ni ɛnden bɛɛ a.
44022010	“Mbɛ n‑na dɔ tisa chɛ wan, n dɔ te, ‘Mansa, n mbe fen ma gbɛ?’ “Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ te n ma, ‘I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni don Damasikɔsi duu ɔ. E ma‑a nɔ wan, mbɛ ko ɔ ko ɔ yian‑da i a, Yataa‑a koe min dɔ bɛn i ko a, a ma koe a.’
44022011	Man ba chɛ‑a a ma wan, n nii che to kaina yen‑da. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, nn bɛ ni ka mɔɛ miin na, an‑na n boo bia wan, an don‑da n na Damasikɔsi duu ɔ.
44022012	“Damasikɔsi duu chɛ ɔ, kamin dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Ananiyasi. A ni mɔɛ an na, min ni Yataa fai a faa gbɛɛ a, a sin ni koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma wan, Chu n 'na sawa‑a miin fɔ. Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ Damasikɔsi, an mbe basɔmaya be wan a ma, a sɛmbɛnden na.
44022013	Mbɛ an Ananiyasi chɛ, a na‑a wan n tena, mbɛ a sɔ‑a n baima. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ n ye, a ɔ, ‘N suun ma nyɔɛ Sɔɔ, i ya a ni ka.’ Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, bai chɛ fɔ tima kɔɔ, n ya a ka‑a, mbɛ n‑na a yen.
44022014	Mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Yataa, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n ni min fai, an‑na a boo sɔ bi i ma, i ni a faa ma koe ɔ sɔn. Chɛ ni a ma, i ni mɔɛ chɛ yen, min tanden mu Yataa tena gbeden, a yɛ to, i ni bai a min, min mbe bɔ‑a a da ɔ.
44022015	Koe min na mu, a toen mu i ni ma siiya a a ko a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ tena dunya ɔ, a si koe chɛ ma, i‑a min dɔ yen, a basan chɛ a, i‑a min na min.
44022016	A sin, e gbɛ fen ma kɔnun tena? I kɔɔ sɔ, i ni Mansa Chisɔsi chee basan koe a i ma, mbɛ yii chɛ‑a i kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, i ni ko fion, a bɔ i 'a ko yama n dɔ.’
44022017	“N yɛ‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, mbɛ n bun‑da samunɛ chɛ‑a, Yataa 'a kata ɔ. Mbɛ a ma‑a, yɔ n ni cho ɔ wan,
44022018	mbɛ n‑na Mansa Chisɔsi yen. A ni wan a fɔ tena n ye, a ɔ, ‘A a gbandia, i ni bɔ dɔndɔ gbe nɛ chɛ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Koe min na mu, an mbe ee an boo si‑a bai chɛ kɔɔ, e miin fɔ‑a, a si n ma.’
44022019	“Mbɛ n dɔ te, ‘Mansa, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan tea gbu a, n ni koe miin si i 'a mɔɛ n na. Nn 'na samun chɛ chenɛ kan kɔ kan na, n ni ta kaina, n ni an gbasi wan, n mbe yɛ, n mbe an sa pimbi chenɛ a, a si kaifa ma, an mbe min chɛ i a.
44022020	A sin, an ni kɛn Sitibin wii a bɔn‑da, min ni koɔ ka mɔɛ n tena a si i ma, n fandi gbu ni nɔ wan sɔ ɔ. N ni wan n kunɛ ɔ dondon‑da, a fa koe ma. A sin mɔɛ miin ni ka a fa tena, n ni wan an 'na doma n kun ma fɛn‑da.’
44022021	“Mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a fɔ n ye, a ɔ, ‘Ta, koe min na mu, n mbe i sɔ tena kaina ɔ yansama wan, pande, mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin ma Chu mɔ a.’ ”
44022022	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, an‑na an too ma sɔ wan Pɔɔ ma, aan a che‑a bai chɛ kaina chɛ ma. Mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ, an dɔ, “Wo mɔ bonda chɛ ka dunya ɔ ka! Koe min na mu, a ma nyin, a ni ma fɔɛ chɛ ɔ!”
44022023	An‑na yee tɛ buɛ min dɔ, an ni an 'na doma n na meche meche ka wan banda a, mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na gbangbanɛ a sɛ banda a, faatɛ ɔ Pɔɔ ma.
44022024	Mbɛ Domi mɔɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a‑a a fɔ a 'a mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ni ta Pɔɔ a baachi ɔ. A‑a a fɔ wan to an ye, a ɔ, an ni a gbasi pien bosa a, mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na a ɔ tisa, ni fen‑na a ma, mɔɛ n mbe yee bonda chɛ tɛ tena ka a ma.
44022025	Chɛɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ kɛn a chii‑a yuu a, a gbasi koe a, mbɛ soya gbakoo chɛ, min ni ka nɔ sɔ ɔ, Pɔɔ‑a a ɔ tisa. A ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a sawa dɔnden fan mu a ma, Domi mɔɛ gbasi koe a bosa a pien, kaa a ma tɛ nin bɛ min ma, ko yama ma koe a?”
44022026	Soya gbakoo chɛ‑a bai chɛ a min kɛn, a ta‑a wan an kun ti tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “E fen ma‑a gbɛ? A yen ko, kamin chɛ mu Domi mɔɛ an na.”
44022027	Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a ta‑a Pɔɔ tena, mbɛ a ɔ, “Domi mɔɛ mu i a? A fɔ wɛ n ye, tea gbu a?” Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Tea a, Domi mɔɛ mu n na.”
44022028	Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a‑a a fɔ Pɔɔ ye, a ɔ, “N tana, n‑na kɔpɔ chenama wa an be, ma koe a Domi mɔɛ a.” Pɔɔ sin dɔ te, “Chɛɛ n tana, Domi mɔɛ tiki tiki mu n na.”
44022029	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, mɔɛ miin ma bɛndenɛ ni ka Pɔɔ ɔ tisa koe a, an gbɛɛ‑a an ma yɛ kuu kɔ, an ka‑a a baima. A sin, soya n kun ti chɛ wɛɛ, a chian‑da wan. Koe min na mu, a‑a a ɔ sɔn fan gbɛ, mbɛ a‑a yɔɔɛ chɛ Pɔɔ min ma, mbɛ Domi mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ mu.
44022030	Chɛɛ an ban‑da ɔ ka dɔndɔɛ ma, soya n kun ti chɛ, a toen ni kɛn a ni a ɔ sɔn, koe min gbu na‑a a ma, Chu mɔɛ n‑na kunɛ si Pɔɔ kun ma, a‑a a fuin. Mbɛ Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, a‑a a fɔ an ye, an bɛ Chu kuti wa ɔ mɔɛ n na, a ɔ, an ni na, an ni bɛn. An bɛn‑da kɛn, a yii‑a wan Pɔɔ a, a‑a a sɔ an chen kɔɔ.
44023001	Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a kuti wa chɛ ma fɛn, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, a ka n suun tima ma, aan a sɔ tee chɛ ma, n ma sika ni n fandi ɔ. A sin, n mbe tachɛ tena tea chia an na, Yataa chen kɔɔ.”
44023002	Mbɛ Ananiyasi, min ni Chu mɔɛ n 'na tɛ mɔ wa a Yataa tena, a‑a a fɔ mɔɛ n ye, miin ni sɔ ɔ Pɔɔ baima, a ɔ, an ni a da ɔ gbasi.
44023003	Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Yataa wɛɛ, ɛ i da ɔ gbasi‑a wan, i nɛnɛn fea ti chɛ. E si ɔ pan, kaa a tɛ koe an na, yɔ mmɔ 'a sawa, a‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, sawa chɛ ma min fɔ ni, e ka an ma‑a, a fɔ koe a, i ɔ, an ni n gbasi.”
44023004	Mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni ka sɔ ɔ Pɔɔ baima, an‑na a fɔ a ye, an dɔ, “E ka koɔ‑a mɔɛ min tena, an mu Chu n tɛ mɔ wa a Yataa tena. E chɛ main fan?”
44023005	Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, n nii ma a ɔ sɔn ka, mbɛ an mu mmɔ 'a tɛ mɔ wa a Yataa tena. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, a ɔ, ‘Mɔ ee bai yama sa, a si i 'a mɔɛ n 'na mansa ma.’ ”
44023006	Pɔɔ‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ fanka chɛ tɛ ɔ, mɔɛ dɔ n ni Sadusii mɔɛ n fan na, mɔɛ dɔ n sin ni Fayisii n fan na. A‑a chɛ ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ a koɔ‑a, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, Chu kuti wa chɛ tena, a ɔ te, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, n mbe dɔbɛn chɛ an dɔ, an mbe min chee Fayisii dɔbɛnɛ. N‑na n woo mɔɛ n tan an dɔ, n mbe e na to suun‑da. A sin, n mbe nɛ kuti chɛ ɔ, koe min na mu, n yii na tɛen fan mu, mbɛ ni mɔ gbu fa‑a, ɛ a kɔɔ sɔ wan to a ka saya ɔ.”
44023007	A‑a chɛ fɔ kɛn dechee, mbɛ Fayisii mɔɛ chɛ nu, nɔ kuti wa chɛ ɔ, koɛ bea‑a an tɛ ɔ, an bɛ Sadusii mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ an kuti wa chɛ, a gbu du‑a kaina fea a.
44023008	Koe min na mu, Sadusii mɔɛ n mbe a fɔ wan, mbɛ ni mɔ gbu fa‑a, a ee che to a kɔɔ sɔ‑a kamba ɔ. A yɛ to, an dɔ, maeka n mbe ee nɔ, nyina dɔ mende wɛɛ ee nɔ. Chɛɛ Fayisii n tana, an danden fan ni ko sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ a.
44023009	Mbɛ an gbɛɛ bun‑da sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ wa chɛ‑a. Mbɛ Chu mɔɛ n 'na sawa kan mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ni Fayisii gbee a, an sɔ‑a. Mbɛ an dɔ, “Nn ma bai yama kan kɔ kan yen ni, Pɔɔ‑a min fɔ. Mmɔ ma a ɔ sɔn, kɔkɔɛ maeka mu, min koɔ‑a a tena, chɛ ma, kɔkɔɛ nyina dɔ mende nu mu.”
44023010	An to‑a kɔɔsa chɛ an dɔ, mbɛ a ma‑a sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ wa a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, soya chɛ n kun ti chɛ chian‑da, mbɛ a‑a a yii na chii Pɔɔ bɔ koe a an tɛ ɔ, an ma na a a panda panda an boo a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a 'a soya mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, an ni ta, an ni Pɔɔ bɔ an tɛ ɔ gbasaya a, an ni na a a baachi ɔ.
44023011	Mbɛ a yɛɛ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma, Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a, a sɔ‑a Pɔɔ baima. Mbɛ Chisɔsi gbu ɔ, “I ma chian. I‑a a ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ, mɔɛ n na Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, i‑a koe min dɔ sɔn, a si n ma, e an ma tena to pan bɛɛ Domi duu ɔ.”
44023012	Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, an bɛn‑da, an‑na dɔbɛnɛ chɛ, a si Pɔɔ ma. Mbɛ an‑na an gboo, an dɔ, an mbe ee fen kɔ fen daun, an sin mbe ee yii wɛɛ min, aan an ni Pɔɔ fa.
44023013	Mɔɛ miin‑na koe chɛ ɔ bɛn, an benden ni mɔ bi naaninɛ ma.
44023014	Mbɛ an‑na an kɔɔ sɔ, an ta‑a Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa n tena, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na. Mbɛ an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ te, “Nn‑na nn gboo kaina dɔndɔ, mbɛ nn ma fen kɔ fen daun, aan nn ni Pɔɔ fa.
44023015	Nn toen mu min na sanche gbɛ, a ma wɛ, wo bɛ mmɔ 'a kuti wa chɛ a, wo ni sakana a ta Domi soya n kun ti chɛ tena, na koe a an Pɔɔ a, wo tena. Wo a ma, yɔ wo toen mu, wo ni a ɔ tisa wan chɛndɛ chɛ, a 'a bai ɔ gbɛ koe a. Chɛɛ a e na to a fo‑a wo tena, nn mbe ma‑a wan gbɛ a ma kɔn‑da, a fa koe a.”
44023016	Chɛɛ boo kɔɔ mɔnɛ chɛ, a puin‑da wan Pɔɔ bain denɛ too ɔ. Mbɛ a don‑da baachi chɛ ɔ, a‑a an yii ma koe ɔ yian Pɔɔ a.
44023017	Mbɛ soya gbakoo dɔndɔ, Pɔɔ‑a a chee. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “Ta n ye kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a, wo kun ti chɛ tena. Bai chenama an mbe a da a, a ɔ yian koe a a a.”
44023018	Mbɛ soya gbakoo chɛ‑a kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ya, a ta‑a a a, an kun ti chɛ tena. Mbɛ a ɔ, “Kamin chɛ mmɔ boo ɔ bia ɔ, min tɔ mu ka Pɔɔ, an‑na n chee, mbɛ a‑a n dɔ tisa, a ɔ, n ni na kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a i tena. Koe min na mu, a ɔ, bai chenama an mbe a da a, a ɔ yian koe a i a.”
44023019	Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a‑a kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ bia a boo ma. Mbɛ an fea ta‑a, mɔ dɔ mende nii kaina min, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Fen mbe i da a, a fɔ koe a n ye?”
44023020	Mbɛ kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ɔ, “Chu gbakoo chɛ nu, an gbɛɛ‑a an kun puin kaina dɔndɔ, i ɔ tisa koe a, i ni Pɔɔ a ta Chu kuti wa chɛ ɔ. An mbe a ma tena wan, yɔ an toen mu, an ni a wakoe an kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn chɛndɛ chɛ.
44023021	Chɛɛ i ma i too ma sɔ an ma. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ n mbe wan nun dɔ, Pɔɔ ma kɔn tena. An mɔɛ nu, an benden mu mɔ bi naanin bɛɛ ma. An‑na an gboo wan, mbɛ an mbe ee daun chɛ, an sin mbe ee yii wɛɛ min, aan an ni Pɔɔ fa. An gbu sin ma bɛndenɛ mu gbɛ sanche, a ma koe a. An mbe gbɛ dechee i wan ma kɔn tena, an ni a a min, ni e bai min fɔ‑a.”
44023022	Mbɛ kun ti chɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “I ma a ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a, mbɛ i‑a koe chɛ kɔɔ fɔ wan n ye.” Mbɛ a‑a a ma, kamin tɔngbɔɛ ɛnden chɛ, a ta‑a a waa a.
44023023	Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a‑a soya gbakoo fea chee, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “Wo wo ma bɛn soya mɔ chɛmɛ fea a, an ta koe a Sisayea duu ɔ, ni awa sawan bɔɛ ben‑da pimbi bundenɛ a. An bɛ ni ta soya mɔ bi wɔnfea a, miin mbe soo n kɔ, a basan an mɔ chɛmɛ fea a, miin mbe tamba a dɛ.
44023024	A yɛ to, wo soo ɔ bɛn Pɔɔ ko a, a ni si a kɔ, mbɛ wo‑a a kun ma fɛn, aan a ni che Kɔfana Fedisi tena.”
44023025	Mbɛ soya n kun ti chɛ, a‑a gboo sin nyɛn fan kɔfana chɛ tena, a si Pɔɔ ma.
44023026	N fan, Kaudiyɔsi Disiyasi, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena kai wa chɛ tena, Kɔfana Fedisi. Fa, n ni i kɔndɔn.
44023027	Chu mɔɛ chɛ n‑na kamin chɛ an bia. An toen ni, an ni a fa. N‑na a a min fan, mbɛ Domi mɔɛ an nɛ a a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, nn bɛ ta‑a n 'na soya mɔɛ n na, mbɛ nn‑na a bɔ an boo ɔ.
44023028	N toen fan ni, n ni a ɔ sɔn, ni an‑na a bia koe min ko a. Mbɛ n ta‑a an Pɔɔ a, an 'na kuti wa chɛ ɔ.
44023029	N‑na a kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn fan, n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ a ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, ɛ saya ma sɔn min ko a. Chɛ ma, an ni a sa pimbi chenɛ a. An‑na a bia dechee, an ta sawa n fan ko a, an dɔ, a‑a an yɔn.
44023030	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ‑a a fɔ kɛn n ye, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ n mbe dɔbɛnɛ chɛ tena, a fa koe a, n ma tima yayi ni. N‑na a ma wan, an na‑a i tena. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin‑na a bia, n‑na a fɔ wan an bɛɛ ye, mbɛ an ni ta an 'na bai a i tena.
44023031	Mbɛ soya chɛ n‑na a ma ka wan, yɔ an kun ti chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye, a ma koe a. An ta‑a wan Pɔɔ a pimbi ɔ, Andipatisi duu ɔ.
44023032	Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, soya mɔɛ chɛ dɔ n yɛ‑a wan baachi ɔ, chɛɛ an‑na an bɔɛ dɔ n to wan nɔ, miin ni soo a bui, ta koe a Pɔɔ a.
44023033	An che‑a kɛn Sisayea duu ɔ, an ta‑a wan Pɔɔ a kɔfana chɛ tena, mbɛ an‑na gboo nyɛndenɛ chɛ wɛɛ be a ma.
44023034	Mbɛ kɔfana chɛ‑a gboo chɛ kan. Mbɛ a‑a Pɔɔ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “I ka‑a kaka minan ma?” A‑a a ɔ sɔn kɛn, mbɛ Pɔɔ ka‑a Sidisia chɛnyɛ ɔ wan,
44023035	mbɛ a‑a a fɔ a ye, a ɔ, “N mbe n too ma sɔ‑a wan i 'a bai chɛ ma, ni mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a, koɛ ɛ wo tɛ miin na.” A ɔ, an ni Pɔɔ a don kata chɛ ɔ, Mansa Ɛdɔdi Wa na‑a min sɔ.
44024001	Tee duu gbakɔ, an na‑a kɛn Pɔɔ a Sisayea duu ɔ, mbɛ Ananiyasi, min ni tɛ mɔ wa a, Chu n tɛ Yataa a, a yii‑a wan nɔ an duu chɛ ɔ, an bɛ Chu gbakoo dɔ n na. Dɔya dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni wan an tɛ ɔ, min tɔ ni Tatudɔsi. An ta‑a wan Kɔfana Fedisi 'a kuti ɔ, mbɛ an‑na koe gbɛɛ ɔ yian, Pɔɔ‑a miin ma.
44024002	A sin, an na‑a kɛn Pɔɔ a, kuti chɛ ɔ, Tatudɔsi chɛ bun‑da bai ɔ yian‑da, a si Pɔɔ ma. Tatudɔsi chɛ ɔ, “Kɔfana Fedisi, i mu ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ chenama a, sawa n na teen koe a, a sin, i yiima tɛen mu, an‑na a ma ka faachima ɛ chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, aan a sɔ bi nyɔn tima ma. I‑a ko sɛsɛ sɔ wan a chia ma chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, nn ni ko chɛndɛ ma sɔn nɛ.
44024003	Chɛ sin ko a, nn bu ɔ di chia ɔ chia a, a yɛ to, nn mbe i wai bɔ tena kaka, a si i 'a wai chɛndɛ chɛ n ma.
44024004	N ma to ni, n ni ta to pɔɔ, i 'a tima yɔn koe a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe i disa tena, i ni i too ma sɔ bai kundu ɛndenɛ chɛ ma, n mbe na tena min dɔ yian tena i a, nn gbɛɛ ko a.
44024005	Koe min na mu, nn‑na a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ kamin chɛ mu mɔ gbu yama yama an na. A wan mbe gbunɛ a bea kan kɔ kan, Chu mɔɛ n mbe kaina min kan kɔ kan dunya ma. A yɛ to, a wan mu ya ɔ sɔɛ a dɔbɛn chɛ ko a, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Nasaɛti mɔɛ n 'na dɔbɛnɛ.
44024006	A sin gbu, a toen ni a ni baa bɔ Yataa 'a kata chɛ ma, min‑na a ma, nn‑na a bia. Ni i‑a a ɔ tisa, i‑a a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ nn‑na bai miin gbɛɛ ɔ yian, a si a ma, mbɛ nn ma saman ni kan kɔ kan.”
44024009	Chu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ‑a toa si wan a da a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, an dɔ, a gbɛɛ ɛ ka wan.
44024010	Mbɛ kɔfana chɛ, a‑a a boo kai Pɔɔ ma, koɔ koe a. Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ i mɛen mu mɔɛ n 'na bai sa‑a chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, nɛ i 'a kuti chɛ ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n bu ɔ diaen mu, koɔ koe a n fandi ko a, i chen kɔɔ.
44024011	Ni i‑a mɔɛ n dɔ tisa, e a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ n sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ wan, Yataa 'a kata ɔ, a fai koe a. A sin, a ka a tee chɛ ma, a sɔ bi ma, a‑a tee tan kun ma fea ya gbɛ.
44024012	An sin nii ma n tan ni gbunɛ a bea‑a, a yɛ to, an ma n tan ni a fɔ‑a mɔɛ n ye, an ni koɛ a bea. An ma n tan ni chɛ ma‑a Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an ma n tan ni a ma‑a mmɔ 'a samun chɛ chenɛ n na, n mbe ee baa, a ma koe ma kan kɔ kan an duu gbu ɔ.
44024013	An gbu ee che koe ɔ yian‑da, min mbe toa si, an 'na bai chɛ n kɔɔ, a si n ma.
44024014	Chɛɛ n mbe dɔn tena chɛ an ma, i chen kɔɔ. Mbɛ nn bemba n ta bemba n 'na Yataa chɛ, n mbe an fai, a sɔ koe a chia chɛ fɛ, Chisɔsi‑a min yian, a sɔ koe a a fɛ. An‑na a fɔ an ma, mbɛ tea chia ma chɛ a. Chɛɛ n danden fan mu ko ɔ ko a, min mbe sawa chɛ ɔ, Yataa na‑a min be Mosisi ma, a basan koe chɛ n na, miin mbe Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n 'na gboo n dɔ.
44024015	Yiinatɛ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe n dɔ, nn bɛ an na, a si Yataa ɛ min ma‑a. Mbɛ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan, min tanden mu, ni min ma tan ni, ni a fa‑a, Yataa ɛ an mɔɛ chɛ kɔɔ sɔ wan to, a ka saya ɔ.
44024016	Chɛ an fɛ mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, n mbe ko sɛsɛ ɔ bia wan, n yiima a koenɛ ni ma Yataa tena, a basan n bɔ mɔ gbu n bɛɛ a.
44024017	“N‑na san sɛsɛ ya wan, n ka‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ, n ta‑a wan nɔ, fen den be koe a yɔn tɔɛ n ma, a yɛ to, yasi bɔ koe a Yataa tena.
44024018	N to‑a chɛ an ma‑a, mbɛ an‑na n tan nɔ, Yataa 'a kata chɛ ɔ. An‑na a ɔ yen fan gbɛ, mbɛ n koenɛ ni fion. A tima chɛ a, mɔ fanka fanka nii nɔ, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ nii nɔ.
44024019	Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin ka‑a Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ni wan nɔ a tima chɛ a, a sin mbe nyan fan an bɛɛ ni ma nɛ, i chen kɔɔ. An bɛɛ ni an ta koe ɔ yian, ni bai ɔ bai ɛ wan an da a, a si n ma.
44024020	Ni chɛ ma, an fandi gbu, an fɛn na‑a ka n na, an ni a ɔ yian, ni n‑na koe min ma, min ma nyin. Tima min na n ni sɔ ɔ, an 'na kuti wa chɛ chen kɔɔ, n‑na ko yama min ma,
44024021	min kaen mu ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma. Koe chɛ, n‑na yee tɛ min na, n ni sɔ ɔ an tɛ tima min na. N dɔ, ‘Wo e n dɔ tisa dechee, a si mɔɛ kɔɔ sɔ koe chɛ an ma, a ka saya ɔ. N danden mu an na, wo sin na‑a nɛ n na, kuti chɛ ɔ an ko a.’ ”
44024022	Mbɛ Kɔfana Fedisi, min‑na ko ɔ ko ɔ sɔn, a si Chisɔsi 'a chia chɛ ma, a‑a kuti da a tɔn fan a tee chɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N mbe wo 'a bai sa‑a wan, ni soya n kun ti Disiyasi na‑a tima min na.”
44024023	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ soya gbakoo chɛ ye, min ni pimbi chenɛ kun ma, a ɔ, an ma Pɔɔ a bɔ pimbi chen chɛ a. Chɛɛ a ɔ, an ni a ma, Pɔɔ ni bun fia sima bia‑a. A sin, a ɔ, an ma Pɔɔ dia nyɔɛ kan kɔ kan bai basan koe a a ma.
44024024	Tee kuunden gbakɔ, Kɔfana Fedisi na‑a wan, an fea a 'a musu Dusida a, min ni Chu mɔɛ a. Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ n sɔ, an ni ta Pɔɔ bi. Mbɛ an‑na an too ma sɔ wan Pɔɔ ma, a ɛ bai ɔ yian‑da, a si kaifa ma Chisɔsi Chasi a.
44024025	Pɔɔ‑a koe n tɛnsɛ wan, a si koe n ma Yataa chen kɔɔ, tea ɛ koe miin dɔ. A yɛ to, ni mɔɛ e kun buɛ min dɔ, i ni tachɛ i wandi a chɛndɛ chɛ. A‑a koe n tɛnsɛ wan to, a si gbɛmbo tee ma, min mbe na tena. Kɔfana Fedisi chian‑da wan, mbɛ a ɔ, “E ka‑a gbɛ ta‑a. N mbe i chee‑a wan to, ni n‑na tima ma sɔn, tima min na.”
44024026	A tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, a ni wan a yii ma, mbɛ Pɔɔ ɛ don too ɔ woo be‑a wan a ma. Chɛ an fɛ ni, a ni Pɔɔ chee wan pɛɛpɛɛ, chia ɔ bɔɛ chɛ koe a.
44024027	Chɛɛ san fea ben‑da kɛn, Kɔfana Fedisi bɔ‑a wan kɔfanaya ma. Mbɛ Pɔsiyɔsi Fesɔsi yɛ‑a a gba ɔ. Kɔfana Fedisi toen fan ni, a ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ a ni deman tena wan Chu mɔɛ n ma, min‑na a ma, a‑a Pɔɔ da a tɔndenɛ to pimbi chenɛ a.
44025001	Tee sawa gbakɔ kɛn Kɔfana Fesɔsi na‑a Sisayea duu ɔ, a 'a kɔfana wai kuu sɔ koe a, a sɛ‑a wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
44025002	A che‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, ni Chu n ya ɔ sɔɛ nu, an‑na a ɔ yian Kɔfana Fesɔsi a, mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a sawa sɛsɛ yɔn fan. An‑na Kɔfana Fesɔsi disa wan,
44025003	a ni basan an ma, a ma koe a, an ni na Pɔɔ a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. An‑na chɛ fɔ, koe min na mu, an na‑a a ɔ bɛn fan, a fa koe a chia tɛ.
44025004	Mbɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi ɔ, “Pɔɔ ɛ ma gbanɛ ɔ Sisayea. N fandi gbu wɛɛ, n mbe yɛ tena wan nɔ sanche.
44025005	Wo a ma, nn bɛ ni ta wo 'a ya ɔ sɔɛ dɔ n na, an ni a ɔ yian nɔ, ni kamin chɛ‑a ko yama min nyɔn sima ma.”
44025006	Kɔfana Fesɔsi‑a tee sɛin ya wan Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, chɛ ma, tee tan nyɔn sima, a e na to yii‑a Sisayea duu ɔ. A che‑a tee min na, a banda ɔ ka da ma, a si‑a wan kuti ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni na Pɔɔ a, a chen kɔɔ.
44025007	An na‑a kɛn Pɔɔ a, Chu mɔɛ miin ka‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, an sɔ‑a wan gbɛɛ Pɔɔ 'a tindanɛ. Mbɛ an Chu mɔɛ n bun‑da kun sɛsɛ si‑a Pɔɔ kun ma, an nii che toa si‑a miin kɔɔ.
44025008	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ koɔ‑a wan a wandi ko a, a ɔ, “N ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, a si Chu sawa ma, n ma a ma ni, a si Yataa 'a kata ma, n mbe ee baa, a ma koe a, a si Domi kun ti wa ma.”
44025009	Chɛɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi toen ni, a wakoe a ni dia Chu mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ a‑a Pɔɔ ɔ tisa, a ɔ, “E dɔn‑da wan, n ni i a ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, i 'a bai chɛ sa koe a nɔ?”
44025010	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “N mbe ka sɔ ɔ, Domi kun ti wa ta kuti tongbo gbu an kɔɔ ka, n 'na bai chɛ ɛ sa kaina. I wandi gbu ban‑da a ɔ yen‑da, mbɛ n ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, Chu mɔɛ n na.
44025011	Ni n na‑a sawa an yɔn, n ni ko yama ma, an mbe che n fa‑a min ko a, n mbe ee che an disa‑a n bɔ koe ma a ɔ. Chɛɛ ni tea ee koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, an‑na miin si ka n kun ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che n be‑a an ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n 'na bai ni ta Domi kun ti wa tena.”
44025012	Mbɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi‑a a kun puin kɛn a 'a gbakoo n ma, mbɛ a ɔ, “I‑a a fɔ wan, i ɔ, i 'a bai a ni ta Domi kun ti wa tena, a sin, e ta tena gbɛ nɔ wan.”
44025013	Tima ɛnden gbakɔ, Mansa Akipa an fea a tensa musu Banisi a, an na‑a wan Sisayea duu ɔ, Kɔfana Fesɔsi kɔndɔn koe a.
44025014	An‑na tee kuunden ya kɛn nɔ, Kɔfana Fesɔsi‑a Pɔɔ wakoe ɔ yian fan mansa chɛ a. A ɔ te, “Kaminɛ ɛ wan nɛ, Kɔfana Fedisi‑a min to pimbi chenɛ a.
44025015	A sin, n ta‑a kɛn Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an bɛ Chu gbakoo n na, an‑na kun sɛsɛ si wan Pɔɔ chɛ kun ma. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na n dɔ tisa, an dɔ, n ni kaa a tɛ, a fa koe ma.
44025016	Chɛɛ n‑na a fɔ wan an ye, mbɛ Domi mɔɛ n mbe ee koe ma ka. An mbe ee kaa a tɛ ka dechee mɔɛ a bai ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe a ma siibia, fɔ ni an‑na a ɔ yian, an mɔɛ chɛ‑a koe min ma. A sin, an mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, a ɛ koɔ wan, a si an siibia ma. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ tea ɛ wan siibia chɛ mɔɛ n boo ɔ, chɛ ma, ni tea ee an boo ɔ.
44025017	An na‑a kɛn nɛ, n nii ma tima kan kɔ kan yayi ni. Chɛɛ tee dɔndɔɛ ma, n‑na kuti si wan, n dɔ, an ni na Pɔɔ a, n chen kɔɔ, an bai chɛ sa koe a.
44025018	A koɔ nyɔɛ n bɔ‑a wan ya a ma, an sɔ‑a. Chɛɛ an nii ma che ni bai ɔ bai sa‑a, a si Pɔɔ ma, min mu bai yama a, yɔ n yii ni buɛ min dɔ a ɔ.
44025019	Koe miin don‑da an tɛ ɔ dechee, an mu kɔɔsa an na, a si an 'na Yataa fai buɛ ma. A yɛ to, a si kamin dɔndɔ wakoe ma, min tɔ mu Chisɔsi. Kamin chɛ fa‑a wan, chɛɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, a ɛ fɔɛ ɔ.
44025020	N kɔndɔ fii‑a wan, a si n mbe kun buɛ min dɔ, yiima sɛsɛ ma sɔn‑da, a si bai bonda chɛ ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, n‑na Pɔɔ ɔ tisa, n dɔ, ni ɛ dɔn fan, n ni a 'a bai a ta Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a sa koe a nɔ.
44025021	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, an ni a to pimbi chenɛ a, aan a 'a bai ni ta Domi duu wa ɔ. N bɛɛ, n‑na a ma gban fan bia ɔ, aan a ta tima a, Domi kun ti wa wandi tena, a 'a bai chɛ sa koe a.”
44025022	Mbɛ Mansa Akipa ɔ Kɔfana Fesɔsi ma, a ɔ, “Ɛ nyan‑da wan, n fandi gbu, n ni kamin chɛ kan dɔ kuiɛ a min.” Mbɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi ɔ, “E a a min‑da wan sinan.”
44025023	Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, mbɛ Mansa Akipa na‑a, an fea Banisi a, basɔmaya wa ɔ, mɔɛ ni min be tena an ma. Mbɛ an don‑da tongbo wa chɛ kɔɔ, an bɛ soya n ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n na, a basan duu ɔ gbakoo n na. Mbɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, an ni na Pɔɔ a, kuti chen kɔɔ.
44025024	Mbɛ Kɔfana Fesɔsi ɔ, “Mansa Akipa, a basan wo gbɛɛ a, wo wɛn mbe nɛ sanche. Wo‑a kamin chɛ yen nɛ sɔ ɔ, kuti chen kɔɔ. Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, sanche nɛ chɛ, ni miin mbe Chuusaɛn, an fan‑na a ma siibia n tena. An ni wan yee tɛ tena, mbɛ n ni a ma, an ni a fa.
44025025	Chɛɛ n ma che ni, ko yama kan kɔ kan dɔ yen‑da, kamin chɛ‑a min ma, n mbe kaa a tɛ min ma, a ni fa. A sin, a wandi ban‑da ka buɛ min dɔ a fɔ‑a, mbɛ a 'a bai ni ta Domi kun ti wa tena, n dɔn‑da a ta koe ma nɔ.
44025026	Chɛɛ ko gbu ee nɔ, n mbe min nyɛn, a si a ma, kun ti wa chɛ tena. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n na‑a Pɔɔ chɛ a, wo gbɛɛ chen kɔɔ, a bɛɛ bɛɛ i wan Mansa Akipa, wo wandi ni a a bai kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn. Koe ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ, n mbe min nyɛn.
44025027	Koe min na mu, n ma yiimatɛ yen ni a ɔ, n ni pimbi chen na sa mɔɛ a ta, kun ti chɛ tena, ni n ma a ɔ yian ni, a‑a ko yama min ma.”
44026001	Mbɛ Mansa Akipa‑a a fɔ Pɔɔ ye, a ɔ, “Pɔɔ, n too ɛ wan gbɛ i ma, koɔ koe a i wandi ko a.” Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a boo ɔ fuin, a bun‑da koɔ‑a a wandi ko a.
44026002	A ɔ, “Mansa Akipa, n‑na a ya wan, mbɛ n duaen mu bi, koɔ koe a n fandi ko a, i chen kɔɔ. N ni n fandi kun bɔ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n‑na miin si n kun ma.
44026003	Tea gbu bɛɛ bɛɛ mu, mbɛ i‑a Chu manda n sɔn fan, a basan kɔɔsa chɛ n na, an mbe miin bia. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe i disa tena, i ni i too be n ma chɛndɛ chɛ.
44026004	“Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, n ni fɔɛ min nyɔn sima ɔ, n kamin tɔngbɔ tɔɛ a. An‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, a ka a tima chɛ ma, n tachɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ, n 'na fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ta chɛnyɛ ɔ, a basan Chuusaɛn duu wɛɛ ɔ a.
44026005	Tima ɔ tima ko a, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a saa gbu a, n ni dɔbɛn chɛ an dɔ, min nii sai bɔ. An dɔbɛn chɛ, Yataa fai koe a, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Fayisii dɔbɛnɛ. Ni an mbe dɔn‑da wan, an mbe che wan siiya bɔ‑a chɛ ma.
44026006	Mbɛ sanche gbɛ, n mbe ka sɔ ɔ nɛ, n gbɛmbo koe a an ko a. Tooɔdia chɛ an ko a mu, n yii na tɛen mu min ma, Yataa na‑a min chɛ mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n na.
44026007	An tooɔdia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, mmɔ 'a dambi tan kun ma fea chɛ n gbɛɛ, an yii na tɛen mu an ma sɔn koe a. A sin fan mbe a ma tena, an mbe Yataa fai tena, su ɔ tee a, an faa gbɛɛ a. Mansa Akipa, yiinatɛ chɛ an ko a mu ka, n mbe nɛ sɔ ɔ kuti chen kɔɔ.
44026008	Wo wan, wo e a ya tena wan, mbɛ a ee che ma‑a, wo ni dan chɛ a, mbɛ Yataa ɛ mɔɛ kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. Fen mu, wo e wo yii na chii tena ka?
44026009	“N fandi gbu wɛɛ, n ni n yii na chii wan, ko kan kɔ kan ma koe a, min ni a ma, Chisɔsi tɔɛ ni fa, Nasaɛti mɔɛ chɛ.
44026010	N‑na chɛ an ma Chuusaɛn duu ɔ. N‑na a ma wan, Chu mɔɛ n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa, a‑a gbasaya be n ma, n‑na Yataa 'a mɔɛ n sa pimbi chenɛ a. Chɛ dechee nii ma, chɛɛ an ni kɛn kaa a tɛ‑a, an fa koe ma, n‑na toa si wan a kɔɔ.
44026011	Tima sɛsɛ ko a, n‑na an na mɔnɛ wan, Chu n 'na samun chɛ chenɛ n na. A sin to, n‑na butuin chɛ wan, a ma koe a, an ni Yataa main. Mbɛ n yɛ‑a, faatɛ wa ɔ, n‑na ko yawaenɛ sa an ma. N ni ta wan duu wa dɔ mende n bɛɛ ɔ, chɛnyɛ dɔ mende n dɔ.
44026012	“Chɛ ko a, n‑na chia bia wan, n bun‑da ta‑a Damasikɔsi duu ɔ. Chu n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na mansa nu, an fan‑na gbasaya be n ma, ta koe a nɔ, an da a kuiɛ kɔɔ.
44026013	Mansa Akipa, n ni Damasikɔsi chia chɛ ma wan, tee dɔndɔ a, mbɛ tee che‑a kɛn kun tɛ, n‑na man ba yen, a‑a n na tindan, nn bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, nn ni ta tena tachɛ chɛ ɔ miin na. Man chɛ ka‑a banda a wan, min ni man tena taun, a ben tee ma.
44026014	Nn gbɛɛ bea‑a kɛn duu ma, mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, ɛ a fɔ‑a n ye, Ibu koɛ ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Sɔɔ, Sɔɔ, fen mu e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka n ma? E ka i wandi an tɔɔ tena fuu.’
44026015	“Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ te, ‘Nyɔn mu chɛ a?’ “Mbɛ mansa chɛ ɔ, ‘N fan mu, n fan Chisɔsi, e ko ma gbaaenɛ sa tena ka min ma.
44026016	Chɛɛ i kɔɔ sɔ, i ni sɔ. Koe min na mu, n‑na n fandi yian i a, n boo sɔ koe mu i ma, wai chɛ koe a n ye. I ni siiya bɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ n tena, a si koe chɛ n ma, i‑a miin dɔ yen bi, a yɛ to, n mbe a ma‑a, e min dɔ yen‑da ya ɔ ma.
44026017	N mbe ma‑a i kun bɔ‑a Chu mɔɛ n boo ɔ, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. N mbe na tena i sɔ‑a miin tena,
44026018	i ni an ya a ka, i ni an bɔ pimbi ɔ, a na manɛ ɔ, i ni an bɔ Sitana boo ɔ, an ni ma Yataa 'a gbasaya kɔɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ, mbɛ an‑na an si tena ma sɔn, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa ɛ a ma, miin mbe ma tenchen a ko a, koe min na mu, an‑na an kai fa n na.’
44026019	“Chɛ an fɛ mu, Mansa Akipa, n nii ma koe chɛ kɔɔsa bia ni, n‑na min dɔ yen, a ka banda bu ɔ, yɔ n ni cho ɔ wan.
44026020	N‑na a ɔ yian Damasikɔsi pɛn, mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yian Chuusaɛn duu ɔ wɛɛ. A yɛ to, n‑na a ɔ yian Chudia chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ni mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin nii ma Chu mɔɛ n na. N‑na a ɔ yian fan an gbɛɛ a, mbɛ an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na, an ni an ya a mun Yataa ma. A sin, an ni koe n ma, yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin‑na an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama n na.
44026021	Wai chɛ an ko a mu, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n chɛ‑a n ma, n ni tima min na Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an sin toen ni, an ni n fa.
44026022	Chɛɛ a ka a tee chɛ ma, a sɔ bi ma, Yataa basan‑da wan n ma. A sin, n mbe bi nɛ sɔ ɔ, bai ɔ yian koe a wo gbɛɛ a, a ni ma mɔ chenama n na, chɛ ma, an ni ma chɛ n bɛɛ a, baa ee miin ma. N mbe ka min fɔ tena wo ye, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an‑na an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an fɔ wo ye. Mosisi wɛɛ, a‑a an fɔ,
44026023	mbɛ mmɔ kun ka mansa ɛ mɔnɛ ɔ bia wan. A yɛ to, a wan mbe ma‑a mɔɛ saa saa a, min mbe a kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ. A sin, a wan mbe manɛ yian‑da Chu mɔɛ n na, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a.”
44026024	A sin koɔ‑a kɛn ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, a wandi kun bɔ koe a mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ, Kɔfana Fesɔsi dee‑a wan, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a ɔ, “Pɔɔ, i wooen fan mu. Gboo kan ba chɛ, an mbe i yii bɔ tena i ɔ.”
