44026025	Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te, “Kɔfana Fesɔsi, n ma woo ni. N mbe ka tea ma gbaaenɛ an fɔ tena.
44026026	Koe min na mu, Mansa Akipa‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ sɔn fan. A sin fan tena mu, n mbe koɔ tena ka, ko ɔ ko boo ee n na. Koe min na mu, n yiima a koen fan mu, mbɛ a chen kɔɔ mu, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma‑a. Koe min na mu, an nii ma chɛ ni a ɔ nun dɔ.
44026027	Mansa Akipa, i danden fan mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, ae? N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ i danden fan mu an na.”
44026028	Mbɛ Mansa Akipa‑a a fɔ Pɔɔ ye, a ɔ, “I toen mu gbɛ, i ni n ma Chisianɛ a, a ɔ wuuma wuuma chɛ a. Ae?”
44026029	Mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ, “A ɔ ni yansan fan, a ɔ ni wua wan, n ma to ni i dɔndɔ gbe a, chɛɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ, miin mbe n kuiɛ a min tena ka bi, an ni ma Yataa tena, yɔ n mbe buɛ min dɔ. Yɔɔɛ chɛ dechee, n boo ma, an ma ma an ta ma.”
44026030	Mbɛ mansa chɛ‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, an fea kɔfana a, ni Banisi, an bɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bɛ ni si ɔ miin na,
44026031	mbɛ an ta‑a pɔɔ, an sɔ‑a. An sɔ‑a kɛn, mbɛ an dɔ an nyɔn ma, an dɔ te, “Kamin chɛ ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, a ɛ saya ma sɔn min ko a, chɛ ma, ni a ee sa pimbi chenɛ a.”
44026032	Mbɛ Mansa Akipa‑a a fɔ Kɔfana Fesɔsi ye, a ɔ, “I ni i boo ka‑a wan kamin chɛ a, ni a nii ma a 'a bai a ta koe fɔ ni Domi kun ti wa tena.”
44027001	A tima che‑a, dɔbɛnɛ chɛ‑a wan nn si koe a dɛndɛ ɔ, a ta Itadi chɛnyɛ ɔ. An‑na Pɔɔ be wan, a basan pimbi chenɛ a sa mɔɛ dɔ mende n na, Chudiɔsi dɔndɔ ma. Chudiɔsi chɛ, a ni soya gbakoo an na, soya chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ko a, an ni miin chee, an dɔ, Domi Kun Ti Wa Soya nu.
44027002	Nn sɛ‑a wan dɛndɛ ɔ, min ka‑a Adamitiɔn duu ɔ, min ni gbɛ ta koe a duu chɛ n dɔ, yii a sanɛ Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ nn ta‑a, nn bɛ Ayisitakɔsi a, min ni Tɛsadonika duu ɔ mɔɛ a, a ka Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44027003	Tee dɔndɔɛ ma, mbɛ nn che‑a Sidon duu ɔ. Chudiɔsi‑a Pɔɔ bia wan chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ a‑a a boo ka a ma. A ɔ, Pɔɔ ni ta, a ni a dia nyɔɛ n yen, basan koe a a ma, mbɛ a yɛ‑a.
44027004	Mbɛ nn ka‑a nɔ, nn bun‑da ta‑a. Chɛɛ nn‑na chia dɔ gbɛɛ bia wan, Saipɔsi yii tinɛ ɔ baima, fia nii nn ya kɔɔ tawa kaina min, koe min na mu, fia wa an ni bɔ tena.
44027005	Nn‑na kɔ yii gbu tɛ kɛn, nn ben‑da Sidisia a san‑da, an fea Panfidia chɛnyɛ a. Mbɛ nn ta‑a Miya duu ɔ, min ni Disia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
44027006	Nɔ ni soya gbakoo chɛ‑a dɛndɛ tan, a ka Adɛsandia duu ɔ, min ni ta tena Itadi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a nn na sɛ an dɛndɛ gbu ɔ.
44027007	Nn ni dɛndɛ min dɔ, a ni ta tena wan yɛdɛn yɛdɛn, tee sɛsɛ ko a. Nn ya kɔɔ tawa‑a wan, nn mbe e na to che‑a Nidɔsi duu ɔ. Fia nii ma tima be ni nn ma, min‑na a ma, nn‑na dɛndɛ mun Keti yii tinɛ kaka dɔndɔɛ ma, fia nii nn ya kɔɔ tawa kaina. Mbɛ nn ben‑da Samone chia a, min ni yii chɛ sunɛ a den.
44027008	Nn tɔɔ‑a wan, ben koe a kɔ yii tindi a sanɛ. Mbɛ n che‑a kaina, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Yii Tɛnda Nyima. A tena ɔ nii ma yansan, an fea Dasiya duu a.
44027009	Nn na‑a tima ɔ yansama ya wan, nn 'na tachɛ chɛ ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a nii ma nyin to ta koe a yii a, koe min na mu, sanɛ ma taen fan ni gbɛ. Chɛ ko a, Pɔɔ‑a dasi be wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin ni dɛndɛ chɛ kun ma, a ɔ,
44027010	“N bɔ nu, n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ mmɔ 'a tachɛ a ka nɛ, a ee ma‑a tachɛ chɛndɛ a. Gbunɛ ɛ mmɔ tan‑da wan yii chɛ a. Fenɛ miin gbɛɛ n mbe dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an mbe to‑a wan a ɔ, mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ fɔɛ ɛ to‑a wan a ɔ.”
44027011	Chɛɛ soya gbakoo chɛ, a ma a too ma sɔ ni Pɔɔ ma, mɔɔ dɛndɛ wii mɔɛ chɛ, ni dɛndɛ ti n‑na min fɔ, a‑a a too ma sɔ an fan ma.
44027012	An ni kaina, a nii ma nyin ma koe a nɔ, chima tima a. Chɛ ko a, mɔɛ miin sɛsɛ ni dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an toen ni an ni an tundun yii ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni che Finisi duu ɔ, ni an mbe kun fan. Finisi ni duu an na, Keti yii tinɛ ɔ. Yii Tɛnda Nyima wɛɛ ni an yii tinɛ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ. Chɛɛ tɛnda ni wan nɔ Finisi, min ya a munden ni tee bea boo nyima ɔ, ni a man dɔɛ. An toen ni an ni ma nɔ wan, aan tima chɛ ni ban, tima min na fia wa dɛgbɛ chɛ ɛ bɔ sanɛ ma.
44027013	Mbɛ a ɔ ma yansan ni, mbɛ fia‑a a kuu sɔ bɔ‑a tɛfɛɛ, tee bɔ boo nyima ɔ, mbɛ an‑na an yii na chii, mbɛ tee chɛndɛ an nii nɛ, an 'na tachɛ kuu sɔ koe a. Mbɛ an‑na yɔɔɛ chɛ fuin, min chiien ni dɛndɛ gbu ma, mbɛ an bun‑da ta‑a Keti yii tindi a sanɛ.
44027014	Chɛɛ a ɔ ma yansan ni to, mbɛ fia wa dɛgbɛ bɔ‑a, a ka yii tin chɛ ɔ. An ni fia wa chɛ sima chee, an dɔ, fia min ka‑a man dɔ chia a, tee bɔ.
44027015	A‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ ma ma‑a wan a yama boo a, nn nii ma che ni min dɔ bia‑a, ta koe ya ɔ chia a. Nn bɛɛ, nn‑na nn boo ka dɛndɛ gbu a, an fia boo ɔ.
44027016	Fia chɛ sin‑na nn 'na dɛndɛ chɛ tundun fan, aan nn‑na kaina dɔndɔ a ben, yii tinɛ dɔɔma ɔ. An yii tinɛ chɛ tɔ ni Kauda, fia nii ma nn ya kɔɔ tawa ni kaina min. Nɔ ni, nn‑na nn ma chɛɛ chɛ, ya kɔɔ sisi a, dɛndɛ dɔɔma chɛ, nn ni min sawan nn gbaa, a ɔ bɛn koe a.
44027017	Nn‑na a bɔ wan yii ɔ, mbɛ nn‑na a a sɛ dɛndɛ wa chɛ bu ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na yuu chii gban dɛndɛ wa chɛ 'a tindanɛ, a ɔ gbɛa koe a. An chianden fan ni, min mbe a ma, dɛndɛ chɛ ma na si tɛɛ kuu ma yii kɔɔ, Dibia chɛnyɛ baima. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an‑na koa chɛ a mɔndɔ mɔndɔ, min ni fia ya ka dɛndɛ chɛ a bui koe a, min mbe a ma, fia wandi ni ta dɛndɛ gbu a.
44027018	A sin, fia to‑a wan nn fichi fichi‑a aan, mbɛ tee dɔndɔɛ ma, an bun‑da feanka n na dɛ‑a yii ɔ, miin ni ka dɛndɛ wa chɛ gbu ɔ.
44027019	Mbɛ tee sawan bɔɛ ma, an‑na dɛndɛ gbu ma feanka n bɛɛ a dɛ wan yii ɔ, an fandi gbu boo a.
44027020	Tee sɛsɛ ko a, nn nii tee yen, nn nii tɔmbuaka n bɛɛ yen. Fia fichi fichi chɛ ni bɔ tena wan tun gbasaya a. A danka a, nn‑na nn yii bɔ nn fɔɛ kɔ, a nii to nn yii ma, mbɛ nn kunɛ n mbe bɔ‑a wan a ɔ.
44027021	Tee sɛsɛ ben‑da ka buɛ min dɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n nii ma daun fen daun ni, Pɔɔ bɔ‑a wan gbɛ, a sɔ‑a an tɛ, mbɛ a ɔ, “N bɔ nu, a ni nyan‑da wan, ni wo na‑a wo too ma sɔ n ma, a saa a. Mmɔ nii bɔ‑a Keti, mmɔ ni fo feanka bonda chɛ n gbɛɛ a, a yɛ to, mmɔ nii kasaa bonda chɛ ɔ yen‑da.
44027022	Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, n mbe wo disa tena, mbɛ wo ni wo faa bia. Koe min na mu, mmɔ wɛn gbɛɛ ɛ ka nɛ, mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ kun mbe ee to tena koe chɛ ɔ, mmɔ 'a dɛndɛ an kun mbe to‑a a ɔ dechee.
44027023	Koe min na mu, kunun yɛɛ ma, Yataa min ta mu n na, a yɛ to, n mbe min fai, a 'a maeka ni wan sɔ ɔ n baima,
44027024	mbɛ a ɔ, ‘Pɔɔ, i ma chian. E sɔ‑a wan Domi kun ti wa chɛ chen kɔɔ. A sin yen ko, Yataa chinchin‑da i ma, a basan mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, wo bɛ ɛ ka miin na dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ.’
44027025	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n bɔ nu, wo wo faa bia. Koe min na mu, n kai faen fan mu Yataa a, mbɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, yɔ a 'a maeka chɛ‑a a ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ n na.
44027026	Chɛɛ dɛndɛ chɛ ɛ a fo tena wan mmɔ a, yii tinɛ dɔndɔ ɔ.”
44027027	Tee tan kun ma naanin bɔɛ che‑a kɛn, yɛɛ ma, fia wa ni wan tun nn tundun‑da Mɛditeyenia kɔ yii chɛ a ta‑a faa. Su tɛ nyɔn sima a ɔ ni, mbɛ mɔɛ miin ni wai chɛ dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an yiima‑a an kɔ, mbɛ nn ni gbɛ gbaa gbaa baima wan.
44027028	Mbɛ an‑na yuu a yii yii chɛ ɔ, fen fankama chiien ni min na. Mbɛ an‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a ka yii chɛ kun ma, a yii a kɔɔ, a ɔ yiien fan ni fiti chɛmɛ dɔndɔ ni fiti bi fea. An ta‑a to ɛnden na, mbɛ an‑na yuu chɛ a yii to, mbɛ an‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ a ɔ yiien ni gbɛ fiti bi kɔnɔntɔ.
44027029	An chianden fan ni, nn 'na dɛndɛ ma na bɛn senɛ n ma, min‑na a ma, mbɛ an‑na kundu wa naanin na yii yii ɔ, min chiien ni dɛndɛ chɛ ma, a gbaa chia a. Chɛ n fan mbe a ma, dɛndɛ ee bui, ni a sɔ‑a. Mbɛ an bun‑da Yataa fai‑a, banda ɔ ka koe a.
44027030	Wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an toen ni an ni bɔ dɛndɛ gbu ɔ, an ni an nun. An‑na dɛndɛ ɛnden chɛ, dɛndɛ wa chɛ bu ɔ, an‑na a fuin fan, mbɛ an‑na a a yii yii ɔ. An‑na a ma, yɔ an mbe ka ta tena kundu wa dɔ mende n fan na yii‑a, dɛndɛ wa chɛ ya ɔ.
44027031	Chɛɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ wan soya gbakoo chɛ ye, an bɛ soya tɔɛ chɛ n na, a ɔ, “Ni wai chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, an ma to ni dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, wo kun mbe ee bɔ‑a a ɔ.”
44027032	Chɛ ko a, soya chɛ n‑na dɛndɛ ɛnden chɛ yuu tɛ, dɛndɛ gbu ta koe a, a wandi ko a.
44027033	Banda ɔ ni gbɛ ka tena wan, mbɛ Pɔɔ‑a a fɔ an gbɛɛ ye, a ɔ, an ni fen den daun. A ɔ te an ma, “Tee tan kun ma naanin ka gbɛ, wo e faagbaa ɔ tun, wo gbu sin ma daun fen kan kɔ kan daun ni ɛnden bɛɛ a.
44027034	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo disa tena, wo ni daun fen den daun. An mbe a ma‑a fanka ni yɛ wo ɔ. Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko ee ma‑a wo kundi dɔndɔ gbe wɛɛ a, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ kun ma.”
44027035	A sin, Pɔɔ ban‑da kɛn chɛ fɔ‑a an ye, mbɛ a‑a biidi ya, a‑a tando be Yataa ma an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ, a‑a a ɔ kai kai, mbɛ a bun‑da a daun‑da.
44027036	Mbɛ chɛ‑a an gbɛɛ faa chima wan, mbɛ an gbɛɛ‑a daunɛ chɛ, a tima chɛ a.
44027037	Nn fɛn gbɛɛ ni dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, nn danɛ taen fan ni mɔ chɛmɛ fea, mɔ bi wɔnfea kun ma wɔdɔɛ ɔ.
44027038	An gbɛɛ‑a an bu fa daunɛ chɛ kɛn, an‑na daun fen chɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ a dɛ wan yii ɔ, dɛndɛ chɛ fanka bɔ koe a ɔ.
44027039	Banda ɔ ka‑a kɛn, wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an‑na yii tinɛ yen fan, chɛɛ an nii ma ko ɔ ko ɔ sɔn, a si an kaina chɛ ma. Chɛɛ an‑na kaina yen fan an yii tin chɛ ɔ, min ni yii a, a doee taenɛ ɛ gbaa gbaa ɔ, tɛɛ kuu munyɛ nyima ni min ma. Mbɛ an‑na an yiima ɔ bɛn, ni an mbe kun fan, an ni ta dɛndɛ chɛ a nɔ tindi ma.
44027040	Mbɛ an‑na yuu chɛ n tɛ kundu wa chɛ n ma, mbɛ an to‑a gbaa yii chɛ kɔɔ. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a to, an‑na yuu chɛ n fuin kɔn chɛ n ma, miin ni dɛndɛ chɛ mun a ta tena. Mbɛ an‑na koa chɛ a sɛ, kɔnɛ ma dɛndɛ chɛ ya ɔ, fia si koe a ɔ, dɛndɛ chɛ a ta koe ma ya ɔ. Mbɛ dɛndɛ gbu, a‑a a kuu sɔ ta‑a tindi ma.
44027041	Chɛɛ dɛndɛ chɛ ya ɔ chia gban‑da wan kaina chɛ, tɛɛ kuu‑a kɔnkɔɛ nyan kaina yii kɔɔ. A nii che ka‑a a gba ɔ. Mbɛ fia wa dɛgbɛ chɛ, a‑a a ma, yii gbugbu chɛ‑a dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, a gbaa chia ɔ tɛka tɛka‑a gbɛɛ.
44027042	Mbɛ soya chɛ n‑na a ɔ bɛn, an ni mɔɛ n gbɛɛ fa, miin ni an boo ɔ bia ɔ. Koe min na mu, an nii ma to ni, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni nɔɔɛ chɛ, a ni yii tɛ, mbɛ a‑a a nun, an boo ɔ.
44027043	Chɛɛ soya gbakoo chɛ, a nii ma to ni Pɔɔ ni fa. Mbɛ a‑a an na gban, an 'na dɔbɛn chɛ, a ta koe a ya ɔ ma. A‑a min ma dechee, a‑a a fɔ wan an gbɛɛ ye dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, a ɔ, mɔɛ miin kosan nɔɔɛ chɛ‑a, an pɛn ni tin yii chɛ ɔ, an ni nɔɔɛ chɛ, a ta tindi ma.
44027044	Mbɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n sin, miin mbe ee nɔɔɛ chɛ, an‑na a sɔ an fɛ. Chɛɛ an tana, an mbe ma bun dɔ gbembe tɛnɛ n fan kɔ, chɛ ma, dɛndɛ gbu pɛnchɛnɛ n kɔ. Mbɛ a sin ma‑a ka wan, nn gbɛɛ‑a yii tɛ tindi ma, nn chɛndɛ a.
44028001	Nn kun bɔ‑a kɛn a ɔ, mbɛ nn‑na a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ an yii tinɛ chɛ, an ni a chee, an dɔ, Mata.
44028002	Mɔɛ miin sin ni nɔ an kaina chɛ, an‑na ko chɛndɛ min ma nn na, a ɔ gbɛ, an nyɔn sima a ɔ yen koe a. Koe min na mu, an‑na ta a dɛn fan, mbɛ an‑na an boo si nn gbɛɛ kɔɔ, buɔdia ɔ. Sona an ni na tena, a sin, kaina chimaen fan ni kaka.
44028003	Pɔɔ‑a sɔ chii kai wan, a bun‑da a chɛ‑a ta chɛ a. Pɔɔ ni kɛn sɔɛ chɛ chɛ‑a ta chɛ a, mbɛ win chɛ‑a a ma, ka yama bɔ‑a, mbɛ a dɛn‑da a boo a.
44028004	Duenɛ chɛ nu, an‑na ka chɛ yen kɛn, dɛn dɔ Pɔɔ boo a, an dɔ an nyɔn ma, an dɔ, “Mɔ fa mɔɛ an nɛ kamin chɛ a. Kɔɔsa bia ee chɛ ma. A bɔ‑a wɛɛ boo ɔ boo yii chɛ ɔ, a fɔɛ ɛ a sun da a, chɛɛ mmɔ 'a musu yataa, min mbe tea kaa a tɛ, a‑a a pawa. A kun mbe ee bɔ tena chɛ nɛnɛ ɔ.”
44028005	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Pɔɔ‑a ka chɛ a fasi wan ta a. Ka chɛ kona ma ko ɔ ko ma ni a a.
44028006	Mbɛ an bun‑da a ma kɔn‑da. A ni an yii ma, mbɛ a gboo ɛ fa fa‑a wan, chɛ ma, a ni bea duu ma, mbɛ a fa‑a. Chɛɛ an‑na a ma kɔn fan, tima ɔ yansama ko a, an nii ma a yen ni, ko yama kan kɔ kan ni Pɔɔ tan. Mbɛ an dɔ, yataa dɔndɔ mu a a.
44028007	Mɔɛ min ni nɔ mansa a, an yii tin chɛ ɔ, a tɔ ni Pubiɔsi. Sɛnɛ wa ni wan a boo ɔ nɔ, nn baima tanda chɛ ɔ. A bu ɔ dia‑a kaka, a‑a nn yen kɛn. Nn ni wan a 'a sondaya a, tee sawa ko a, a sin‑na nn bia wan chɛndɛ chɛ.
44028008	A tima chɛ a, nn‑na a wan Pubiɔsi fa tan fan sa ɔ gbandi ɔ. Chima an na‑a bɔn a ma, a basan wii chɛ a. A sin, Pɔɔ ta‑a wan a kɔndɔn‑da, mbɛ a‑a samunɛ chɛ a ma. A sin‑na a boo bun kɛn dechee Pubiɔsi fa gbandien chɛ ma, a gbu baun‑da.
44028009	Chɛ sin ma‑a kɛn dechee, gbandi mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an yii tin chɛ ɔ, an na‑a wan Pɔɔ tena, an sin baun‑da wan.
44028010	An‑na boo fenɛ sɛsɛ be wan nn ma. A sin, nn 'na dɛndɛ ni ka tena nɔ tima min na, an‑na fen kɔ fen chɛ wan nn 'na dɛndɛ ɔ, nn toen ni miin na.
44028011	Kau sawa gbakɔ, nn bɔ‑a wan Mata, dɛndɛ ɔ, mbɛ nn ta‑a. An dɛndɛ chɛ, a na‑a ka Adɛsandia wan. An dɛndɛ chɛ sin, a tɔ ni Banda Bu Ɔ Fɛnɛ Nu. Dɛndɛ chɛ‑a chima tima gbɛɛ ya Mata wan, yii tinɛ chɛ ɔ.
44028012	Nn che‑a wan duu dɔndɔ ɔ, min tɔ ni Siyakusi, mbɛ nn si‑a nɔ tee sawa ko a.
44028013	Nn ka‑a Siyakusi kɛn, mbɛ nn che‑a Dekiɔn duu ɔ. Nn‑na tee dɔndɔɛ ben kɛn nɔ, fia bun‑da bɔ‑a, a ka tee bɔ boo nyima ɔ. Mbɛ tee fean bɔɛ ma, nn na‑a Putiɔdi duu ɔ.
44028014	Suun ma nyɔɛ dɔ nu Chasi ɔ, nn‑na an tan fan nɔ, a sin, an‑na nn dɔ bia wan, ma koe a an 'na sondaya a, tɛn sɔngbɔ dɔndɔ ko a. Mbɛ nn danka‑a gbɛ na‑a Domi duu ɔ.
44028015	A sin, suun ma nyɔɛ nu nɔ, Chasi ɔ, an‑na nn ma tɔɛ a min kɛn, an‑na nn tan. An na‑a wan nn ya ɔ, aan a che machiti chɛ ɔ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Apiyɔsi Machiti. An dɔ n sin, an na‑a wan, aan a che kaina chɛ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Sonda Yia Chen Sawa. Pɔɔ‑a an yen kɛn, a ma‑a wan a ma faachima a, mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ.
44028016	A sin, nn che‑a kɛn Domi duu ɔ, an‑na a ma wan, Pɔɔ ma‑a a kun ma chenɛ a. Chɛɛ soya mɔɛ ya gba ni wan a fɛ.
44028017	Tee sawa gbakɔ, Pɔɔ‑a Chu mɔɛ n kun ti n chee wan, miin ni Domi bɛnɛ ɔ. An bɛn‑da kɛn, mbɛ a‑a a fɔ an ye, a ɔ, “N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, n ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na, n ma mmɔ fa n 'na manda yɔn ni. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an‑na n ma wan pimbi chenɛ a sa mɔɛ a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, mbɛ an‑na n be Domi mɔɛ n ma.
44028018	An ban‑da kɛn n bakoe kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn‑da, an toen ni, an ni n boo ka. Koe min na mu, an nii ma chia kan kɔ kan yen ni, kaa a tɛ koe a, n ni saya ma sɔn.
44028019	Chɛɛ Chu n‑na kɔɔsa bia chɛ kɛn chɛ ma, chɛ an‑na a ma, n bɛɛ, chia dɔ gbɛɛ nii n ye, fɔ n 'na bai a ta koe Domi kun ti wa tena. Chɛ ma‑a wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ koe an ni n yii ma, n 'na mɔɛ n ko a.
44028020	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, n‑na wo chee, wo yen koe a, n ni koɔ wo tena. Koe min na mu, n boo ɔ chiien mu ka yɔɔɛ a, a si an koe chɛ an ma, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n yii na tɛen mu min ma.”
44028021	Mbɛ an dɔ a ma, an dɔ, “Nn ma‑a gboo nyɛnden kan kɔ kan ma sɔn ni, a ka Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a si i ma. A yɛ to, mmɔ suun ma nyɔ kan kɔ kan, a ma ka ni nɔ, a ni na i 'a siibia a, chɛ ma, a ni bai yama ɔ yian, a si i ma.
44028022	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn toen mu, nn ni i wandi kanɛ ɔ kuiɛ a min, nn ni i ta yiima sɔn. Koe min na mu, koe min sien mu Chisian dɔbɛn chɛ ma, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ kan kɔ kan, mɔɛ n mbe a ma nyin fan.”
44028023	Mbɛ an‑na tee yian Pɔɔ a, an mbe bɛn tee min ma, a yia chenɛ a. An tee chɛ che‑a kɛn, an na‑a wan a tena, an da a koaen ba. Mbɛ a ka sau ma ma, aan yɛɛ ma tee a, Pɔɔ si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma, a‑a a ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na. Pɔɔ‑a bai ɔ yian fan, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma, an yiima mun koe a Chisɔsi tena. A‑a bai chɛ bɔ sawa chɛ an dɔ, Yataa‑a miin be Mosisi ma, a basan gboo chɛ ɔ a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n 'na gboo chɛ.
44028024	A sin, a 'a bai chɛ‑a a ma wan, an dɔ n yiima mun‑da Chisɔsi ma, chɛɛ dɔ n sin, an nii ma dan ni a da a kuiɛ chɛ a.
44028025	An mbe e na to bɔ‑a an bɛn chɛ ɔ, Pɔɔ danka‑a bai chɛ an ma an tena, a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina‑a tea an fɔ. A‑a chɛ fɔ wo bemba n ta bemba n fan ye, a‑a bai don kɛn Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya da ɔ. Aisaya‑a a fɔ wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, ‘Ta Chu mɔɛ chɛ n tena, i ni a fɔ, i ɔ te, “Wo too gbu, ɛ koe a min‑da wan, chɛɛ wo ee ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ a, a sin, wo ya gbu, ɛ kaina yen‑da wan, chɛɛ wo ee ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ a. Koe min na mu, wo yiima a faen mu, wo too n sin sɔsɔenɛ mu, koe a min koe a, wo ya sin, wo‑a an na chii. Ni chɛ ma, wo ya n ni kaina ɔ yen‑da wan, wo too n ni koe a min, wo yiima ni koe ɔ gbɛ, a sin, wo e wo ya a mun‑da wan n ma, n sin, n fan Yataa, n mbe wo baun‑da wan.” ’ ” Mbɛ Pɔɔ ɔ te gbɛ, a ɔ, “A nyin wo ni a ɔ sɔn gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa 'a bauncha chɛ, a‑a a a che gbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a. An sin mbe an too ma sɔ‑a wan.” Mbɛ an bɔ‑a kɛn an bɛn chɛ ɔ, an gbɛɛ ni wan an nyɔn kɔɔsa bia‑a, mbɛ an ta‑a an baa nu.
44028030	San fea ko a, Pɔɔ ni wan nɔ Domi duu ɔ, an chen chɛ a, a wandi kun ma a a. A sin, a ni a boo si wan mɔɛ gbɛɛ kɔɔ, miin ni na a tena.
44028031	A ni bai sa wan an tena, a si Yataa 'a mansaya ma. A yɛ to, a ni mɔɛ n kan fan, a si Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ma. A nii chɛ ma nun dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ sin nii a a gban.
45001001	N fan Pɔɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da. Yataa an‑na n chee ma koe a a 'a sɔ mɔɛ a, mbɛ a‑a a ma, n ma‑a tenchen mɔɛ a, min mbe a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na.
45001002	A 'a sakana bai chɛ, a na‑a a ma wan suun tima a gbɔɔ, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n‑na tooɔdia chɛ a a. A sin nyɛnden fan mu a 'a gboo ɔ.
45001003	An sakana bai chɛ sien mu a 'a denɛ an ma. A 'a den chɛ a 'a mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia sin, min sien mu a ma, a bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ wan.
45001004	Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina‑a a ɔ yian fan gbasaya wandi ɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi mu to Yataa 'a denɛ an na. A‑a a ma wan, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.
45001005	Yataa‑a a ma wan, Chasi 'a duaya ɔ, nn ma‑a a 'a sɔ mɔɛ a. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, nn ni a ma mɔɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, danaya ni ma an dɔ Yataa ko a, mbɛ an‑na kooya be Chisɔsi ma.
45001006	Wo wɛɛ, wo wan Domi mɔɛ chɛ nu, an mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ mu wo a. Wo cheeenɛ mu gbɛ Yataa boo ɔ, ma koe a Chisɔsi Chasi 'a mɔɛ n na.
45001007	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, wo gbɛɛ Domi duu ɔ. Wo ko a di Yataa ye, a sin‑na wo ya ma koe a a 'a mɔɛ n na. Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
45001008	Koe saa mu min na, n mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena wo gbɛɛ ko a, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ. N mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena, koe min na mu, dunya gbɛɛ, an mbe a fɔ tena wan danaya min mbe wo ɔ Chisɔsi Chasi ko a.
45001009	Yataa an mu n 'na sii a, mbɛ n mbe bai min fɔ tena, tea bai mu. A sin, n mbe wai chɛ tena an ko a n faa gbɛɛ a. Sakana bai chɛ, a si a 'a denɛ ma, n mbe a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na. Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo e wan n 'na yiinachii ɔ tima ɔ tima ko a.
45001010	N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena wo ko a tima ɔ tima. A sin, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena sanche, Yataa ni a ma, n ni kun na‑a wo kɔndɔn‑da nɔ.
45001011	Wo yen sɔɛ ɛ n na kaka, min mbe a ma, Yataa Nyina ɛ dua min chɛ tena n na, a ni a chɛ wo wɛɛ ko a, wo ni sɔ gban.
45001012	N ta yiima ɔ, n toen mu mmɔ ni basan mmɔ nyɔn ma mmɔ 'a danaya ɔ. Wo 'a danaya ɛ kun‑da wan a ni basan n ma, mbɛ n ta danaya wɛɛ ɛ basan‑da wo ma.
45001013	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n toen mu wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ tima sɛsɛ ko a, mbɛ ɛ ma wan n yii ma tima ɔ tima, n ni na wo kɔndɔn. Chɛɛ koe an‑na a ma, n ma che nin bɛ na‑a wo tena. N toen mu n ni na, min mbe a ma, n ni mɔɛ n ma sɔn wo tɛ ɔ, Domi duu ɔ, miin mbe an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a. N‑na a ma ka wan kaina sɛsɛ nu mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na.
45001014	Koe min na mu, n gbɔsɔen fan mu mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a. N gbɔsɔen fan mu chɛ n ko a, miin bonchenden mu, a basan chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin ma bonchen ni. A yɛ to, chɛ n ko a, miin‑na koe sɔn, a basan chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin ma ko sɔn.
45001015	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n ma bɛnden mu tima ɔ tima ko a, Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ yian koe a wo wɛɛ a Domi duu ɔ.
45001016	N 'na danaya Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, a da faenɛ mu gban. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gbasaya ɛ wan sakana bai chɛ ɔ. Chia mu an na, Yataa ɛ a 'a mɔɛ n baun min na, a 'a mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi a. A saa mu Chu mɔɛ n fan na, mbɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an na‑a an gbaa chia a.
45001017	Koe min na mu, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, Yataa ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ, mmɔ ni tan a tena. Chɛ ee bɔ ko dɔ mende kan kɔ kan dɔ, mɔɔ dechee danaya dɔndɔ gbe Yataa a. Ɛ wan dechee, yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a Yataa a, ɛ an ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a sin fan mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”
45001018	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe ko yama n ma, an fan mbe a ma, mɔɛ n mbe ee tea ɔ sɔn a si Yataa ma. A ka banda bu ɔ, ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan a faa tɛen mu buɛ min dɔ.
45001019	Yataa ɛ an tɔɔ‑a wan, a mu min na, an‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, koe min nyin a ma koe a, a si a ma. Yataa wandi gbu an‑na koe chɛ n yian an na den.
45001020	A ka dunya a dan tima ma, mmɔ ee Yataa yen tena, chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ a 'a gbasaya a tinsɔn tena wan. A 'a gbasaya chɛ kuɔ fɔ ko a, a basan a 'a gbasaya a, fenɛ n gbɛɛ a dan koe a dunya ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, bai ee ma‑a an da a, koe min‑na a ma, an ma Yataa sɔn ni.
45001021	An‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wan nɔ, chɛɛ an mbe ee a tando a chia ma, an sin mbe ee a wai bɔ. An mbe yiinachii miin chɛ, ko ɔ ko ee bɔ an dɔ. Fen kɔ fen mbe ee an 'na yiinachii n dɔ, a mu min na, yiinachii yama n fan mbe an dɔ.
45001022	A ni an yii ma, mbɛ an yiima tɛen mu kaka, chɛɛ wooya tɔ wa mu an na.
45001023	An mbe e na Yataa fai, kuɔ fɔ mansa, an mbe fenɛ n fan fai, an mbe miin nyan. Fenɛ miin bɔen mu mɔ gbu a, mɔ gbu min mbe fa. Chɛ ma, fenɛ miin bɔen mu konde n na, an bɔenɛ ɛ soe n na, an bɔenɛ ɛ sawan fenɛ n bɛɛ a.
45001024	Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa‑a an to an fandi boo ɔ, ko yama chɛ nu, miin na di an ye, an ni an ma. An sin, an mbe maumaya koe tɛ wan an nyɔn na.
45001025	An mbe ee dɔn, an ni dan tea koe n na, a si Yataa ma. An mbe dɔn dechee fania fania bai chɛ n fan ma. An mbe fen chɛ n fan fai, Yataa wandi‑a miin nyan. Chɛɛ an mbe ee dɔn, an ni Yataa wandi gbu sin fai, min‑na an fen chɛ n sin nyan. A wan gbu mu, a ma biaen mu, tando ni be min ma, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
45001026	Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa‑a an to nɔ, an ni maumaya koe tɛ. Musu n bɛɛ an tɛ ɔ, an mbe waa ma basan fan an nyɔn na. Yataa ma chɛ a bɔ ni dunya chɛ ɔ.
45001027	Mɔ kaima n bɛɛ, an mbe ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma wan, Yataa ma min na bɔ ni. An mbe musu n to wan, mbɛ an faa bɔ‑a waa ma basan koe a an bɔ kai n na. Mɔ kaima chɛ n mbe maumaya koe n sɛ wan an nyɔn ma. An sin, chɛ‑a a ma wan, Yataa‑a tɔɔya si an na, min na kanden mu an 'na ko yama a.
45001028	An gbu sin nii ma to ni, tea yiinachii chɛ koe a, a si Yataa ma. Chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a an to wan nɔ, an ni ma an kun ye, an 'na yiinachii yama chɛ a. Chɛ ɛ a ma wan, an ni koe n ma, miin ma nyin an ma koe a.
45001029	Ko yama nu, an fan faenɛ an faa an na gban. An toen mu an bɔ n boo fenɛ n fan na, an toen mu to fen fen ni ma an dɔndɔ gbe ta a, an ma to ni an nyɔn na, an sin mbe an nyɔn fa wan. A yɛ to, an mbe butuinɛ chɛ, an mbe an nyɔn bun, an mbe ta‑a yiinachii yama chɛ‑a an nyɔn na. A sin to, an mbe an nyɔn tɔɛ ɔ tɛ ka wan.
45001030	An mbe bai yama sa a si an nyɔn ma, an ma to ni Yataa nan fan na. An mbe an nyɔn main fan, mbɛ an‑na dɔpandaya bɔ, an mbe ta‑a yonka tɛ‑a. Tima ɔ tima ko a, an mbe yiinachii an na, ko yama ma munda ma koe a. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, an mbe ee baa be an woo mɔɛ n bɛɛ ma.
45001031	Ko yama ma koo an dɔ, an mbe ee an da a kuiɛ to a ma. An sin, an mbe ee an bɔ n bia chɛndɛ chɛ, an mbe ee chinchin an bɔ n ma.
45001032	An‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa ɔ te, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe koe ma‑a ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, ɛ fa‑a wan. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an mbe a a tun tena an koe chɛ n ma koe a. A yɛ to, an sin mbe ta‑a to mɔ dɔ mende n pɛmbɛ‑a, miin mbe an ko yama dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n ma tena.
45002001	Wo wan, wo wɛn mbe kaa a tɛ, a si wo bɔɛ n ma, wo ni ma mɔ kan kɔ kan na, wo ee che wo ka‑a ko yama ma koe a. Koe min na mu, bai ee ma‑a wo da a, min mbe wo kun bɔ‑a a ɔ. Ni wo‑a kaa a tɛ, a si mɔ dɔ mende n ma koe ko a, chɛɛ wo wɛɛ, wo e an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma, wo e ma‑a ka kaa a tɛ‑a, a si wo wandi an ma.
45002002	Mmɔ gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tea ɛ Yataa an boo ɔ, ni a‑a kaa a tɛ, a si mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mbe ko bonda chɛ n ma.
45002003	Chɛɛ wo tana, wo e kaa tɛ mɔɛ n bakoe ma, a si koe miin ma koe ma, wo wɛɛ wo e an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n fan ma. A ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ee kaa a tɛ‑a, a si wo wakoe ma.
45002004	Wo e Yataa wakoe bia tena baa baa an na, koe min na mu, a chinchinden mu wo ma. A faa ma gbandi wo tɔɔya koe a a ya kɔɔɛ a, a sin mbe a faa bia wan wo a tima sɛsɛ ko a. A nyin wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ Yataa ɛ chinchin tena wan wo ma. Koe min na mu, ɛ chia yian tena wan wo a faachima ɔ, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na.
45002005	Chɛɛ wo faa a kɔɔen mu, wo too wɛɛ ɔ gbɛ. Chɛ ko a, wo 'a tɔɔya ma ɛ munda‑a wan, tee chɛ ma, tee min ma mɔɛ n mbe Yataa 'a faatɛ ɔ yen‑da. A sin, an mbe a ɔ gbɛ‑a wan, mbɛ ɛ tea kaa an na tɛ.
45002006	Koe min na mu, an tee chɛ ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a wai chɛ buɛ min dɔ, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn a buɛ ɔ.
45002007	Mɔɛ dɔ nu, an mbe ko chɛndɛ an ma tima ɔ tima, an mbe Yataa 'a dua yanɛ a, a 'a tando, a basan kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a, ɛ min be. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa ɛ an kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be‑a wan an ma.
45002008	Chɛɛ mɔɛ nu, miin toen mu dechee an fandi a, an sin ma to ni tea a, an mbe bea ko yama n fan fɛ. An mɔɛ chɛ n tana, Yataa faa ɛ tɛ‑a wan an ma yama yama, a ni an tɔɔ.
45002009	Ko ma gbaaenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ, a basan tɔɔya a, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a, miin mbe ko yama chɛ n ma. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan Chu mɔɛ n na, a ni ma mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na.
45002010	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe ko chɛndɛ ma, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni a 'a dua ma sɔn, a 'a tando, a basan a 'a faachima a. Chɛ ɛ chɛ‑a wan Chu mɔɛ n ye, a ni chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ye, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na.
45002011	Koe min na mu, Yataa ee a 'a mɔɛ n tɛ bɔ, ɛ ma a 'a kaa a tɛ‑a.
45002012	Mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, sawa chɛ ee an boo ɔ, min na‑a be Mosisi ma. Chɛɛ ni an mɔɛ chɛ n‑na ko yama ma, Yataa ɛ an tɔɔya‑a wan, a ee ma‑a wɛɛ sawa chɛ ta fɛ chia a. Chu mɔɛ n sin, Mosisi na‑a sawa chɛ a ben miin tena, ni an‑na ko yama ma, Yataa ɛ sawa chɛ an ya‑a, mbɛ a‑a kaa a tɛ an bakoe ma, an ni tɔɔya.
45002013	An ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ sawa chɛ, a a min koe dechee an mbe a ma, mɔɛ ni ma mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe a a min‑da, mbɛ a tachɛ‑a a a chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa ɛ an ya‑a mɔ tandenɛ a.
45002014	Mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, sawa chɛ nii an boo ɔ. Chɛɛ tima ɔ tima ko a, ni an‑na koe chɛ n ma an kun ma a a, miin nyin an ma koe a sawa chɛ ta fɛ chia a, a nyin an ko a. An‑na a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ Mosisi nii ma sawa chɛ a ben nin bɛɛ an tena, chɛɛ an‑na ko chɛndɛ tɛ bɔɛ sɔn fan ko yama a.
45002015	An sɔnɛ n fan mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ sawa‑a miin fɔ, a nyɛndenɛ mu an faa an dɔ. An 'na yiinachii wɛɛ ɔ, chɛ ɔ yianden fan mu, mbɛ tea mu. Tima dɔ a, an 'na yiinachii, an mbe a fɔ an ye, mbɛ an‑na koe min ma, a ma nyin a ma koe a. Tima dɔ a, an yiima ɛ a fɔ wan an ye, mbɛ an‑na ko chɛndɛ an ma.
45002016	Chɛ an fɛ mu, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a wan tee chɛ ma, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a tee min na Chisɔsi Chasi ni kaa tɛ koe ma, miin mbe nun dɔ mɔɛ n yiima ɔ. N mbe bai chɛ an fɔ tena mɔɛ n ye, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, n mbe min dɔ yian ka.
45002017	Chɛɛ wo tana, wo wɛn yii na koen mu, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ mu wo a, wo yii faen mu Yataa 'a sawa chɛ an ma, Mosisi na‑a min na ben wo tena. A sin, wo e yonka tɛ tena wan, mbɛ Yataa faa ma mɔɛ n mu wo a.
45002018	Wo e a fɔ wan to, mbɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, Yataa toen mu koe miin na, a ma koe a. A sin, wo ɔ, sawa ban‑da wo kan‑da ko chɛndɛ n ma, wo e miin ma.
45002019	Wo danden fan mu a a, mbɛ wo wan mbe chia yian ya te tɔɛ n na. A yɛ to, mbɛ wo wan mu manɛ a chɛ n ko a, miin mbe pimbi pimbi ɔ.
45002020	A sin to, wo wan mbe chɛ n sɔ chia ma, miin kunɛ ɔ banden mu, wo e mɔɛ n kan to miin yiima ma kɔɔ ni. Wo danden fan mu a a, mbɛ wo‑a ko ɔ ko sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. A yɛ to, wo da a kuiɛ ma bɔ chia ee, koe min na mu, sawa chɛ ɛ wo boo ɔ, Mosisi na‑a min na ben wo tena.
45002021	Wo sin, a yen ko, wo e mɔ dɔ mende n kan, a gbu nyin wo ni wo wandi kan. Wo e a fɔ wan mɔɛ n ye, mbɛ an ma kanka chɛ, chɛɛ wo wandi sin mbe a chɛ wan.
45002022	Wo e a fɔ wan mɔɛ n ye, wo ɔ, an ma waa ma basan mɔɛ a, an mbe ee fuu ɔ min na, chɛɛ wo wandi sin mbe a ma wan. Wo ma to ni mɔɛ n ni fenɛ n fai, miin ma Yataa a, chɛɛ wo e fenɛ n ya wan kaina chɛ nu, an mbe fen chɛ n fai kaina min.
45002023	Wo e yonka tɛ, mbɛ Yataa 'a sawa ɛ wo boo ɔ, chɛɛ wo e Yataa a mau tena wan, wo e ma ka an sawa yɔnɛ min chɛ‑a.
45002024	Ɛ wan dechee yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Wo wan Chu mɔɛ chɛ n fan mbe a ma tena, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, an mbe baa bɔ Yataa ma.”
45002025	Mɔɛ a kamincha chɛ, Yataa boo ɛ wan a kɔɔ, ni a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ tachɛ tena wan Yataa 'a sawa chɛ n na. Chɛɛ ni a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ sawa chɛ yɔn tena wan, mbɛ a ni fisa wɛɛ ni a a nii ma kamincha nin bɛɛ.
45002026	Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ min ma Chu mɔ a, a sin na ma kamincha ni, a tachɛ‑a sawa chɛ gbee a, Yataa ɛ a boo a si wan a kɔɔ, yɔ mɔɛ min na kaminchaen mu.
45002027	A gbu sin, mɔɛ chɛ n yen bɛ, an na ma kamincha nin bɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ an mbe tachɛ wan sawa chɛ n na chɛndɛ. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan, mbɛ wo wan Chu nu, wo wɛn na kaminchaen mu bɛɛ, Yataa 'a sawa ɛ wo boo ɔ, mbɛ wo e sawa chɛ yɔn tena wan. Yataa sin mbe kaa a tɛ‑a wan wo wakoe ma.
45002028	Ni an‑na mɔɛ a kamincha, chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ a ma‑a Chu mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a. Mbɛ a a kamincha chɛ sin, a ma dechee gboo ma nɛn chɛ an na, dunya ta manda chɛ.
45002029	A ee ka, Chu mɔɛ mu a faa an na, min mbe a bu ɔ. Yataa Nyina an mbe a ma, mɔɛ ni a faa gbɛɛ be Yataa ma, chɛɛ sawa nyɛnden fan mbe ee a ma chɛ ni ma. An mɔɛ chɛ, ɛ a 'a tando sɔn‑da wan Yataa a, ni mɔ gbu ma a tando nin bɛɛ.
45003001	Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe tisa chɛ wan, ni ma koe a Chu mɔɛ a, ni tɔnɔnɛ ɛ wan a ɔ, a ben ma koe a mɔɛ a, min ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛ ma, ni tɔnɔn kan kɔ kan mbe wan a ɔ, mɔ gbu a kamincha koe a.
45003002	Ma koe a Chu mɔɛ a, tɔnɔnɛ gbu an kɔkoo a ɔ chia sɛsɛ a. A saa mu min na, an nɛ, Yataa na‑a a 'a sakana bai gbɛɛ fɔ an fan ye.
45003003	Tea mu a a, mbɛ Chu mɔɛ dɔ n nii ma dan ni sakana bai chɛ a. Chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ Yataa ɛ a da a kuiɛ ka‑a wan a gba ɔ, koe min na mu, an dɔ n‑na chɛ ma.
45003004	A an, chɛ ma ma wo 'a yiinachii ɔ. Mɔ gbu da a kuiɛ ma funka nin bɛɛ boo ɔ boo tima ɔ tima ko a, chɛɛ Yataa tana, ɛ a da a kuiɛ to wan a ma. A sin, a 'a gboo‑a a fɔ ka wan, a si Yataa wandi ma, a ɔ, “Ni a koɔ‑a tima ɔ tima, mɔɛ gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a teaen fan mu. A sin to, mɔɛ min mbe kunɛ si‑a a kun ma, ni a koɔ‑a dechee, fanka ee ma‑a to a mɔɛ chɛ da a kuiɛ a, a mu min na, Yataa gbu ma ko yama ma ni.”
45003005	Chɛɛ a yen ko, ni mɔɛ n‑na ko yama ma, a tima a mu mɔ dɔ mende n mbe a yen gbadan, Yataa ɛ ko chɛndɛ min ma. Chɛɛ chɛ tɛ bɔ buɛ ɛ wan nɔ. Mɔɛ dɔ nu, an mbe a fɔ wan gbu, mbɛ Yataa ee tea ko ma, ɛ ma ka mmɔ tɔɔya min chɛ‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. (Chɛɛ n mbe ka koɔ tena dechee, yɔ mɔgbuya ɛ a tasi buɛ min dɔ tima dɔsa a).
45003006	Chɛɛ a gbu ee ka chia kan kɔ kan na. Ni Yataa ee tea ko ma, a ee che‑a kaa a tɛ‑a mɔɛ gbɛɛ a ko yama ma dunya chɛ ɔ.
45003007	Chɛɛ a yen ko, mbɛ nn 'na fania fɔɛ, ɛ a ma‑a mɔɛ n ni Yataa 'a tea fɔɛ ɔ yen. Nn ma chia yen ni to, min mbe a ma, Yataa ɛ a ma nn mbe tɔɔya, ko yama ma koe a.
45003008	Ni tea mu chɛ a, mbɛ mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan gbɛ, an dɔ, “Mmɔ ko yama ma, min mbe a ma, ko chɛndɛ ni bɔ a ɔ.” Mɔɛ dɔ n‑na kun chɛ an si n kun ma, mbɛ n fan, n‑na chɛ an fɔ chinɛn, mbɛ an‑na n main a ko a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe chɛ fɔ tena, an fandi an mbe tɔɔya ɔ fai tena Yataa ma.
45003009	Chɛ ee a ɔ yian tena gbɛ, mbɛ nn fan Chu mɔɛ n tana, nn fisa wan Yataa chen kɔɔ, a ben mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ chɛ n ma. A ee ka ɛnden bɛɛ a. A mu min na, nn ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ mu ko yama ma mɔɛ an na. Chu mɔ ta ma ka ni chɛ ma, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, an ta ma ka ni chɛ ma.
45003010	Ɛ wan yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɔ, min tanden mu Yataa chen kɔɔ.
45003011	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee nɔ, min‑na a ɔ gbɛ fen mu tea koe a, mɔ ɔ mɔ sin mbe ee nɔ, min mbe chia yan tena, ma koe a an fea Yataa a.
45003012	Mɔ gbu n gbɛɛ, an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a, an gbɛɛ sɔ‑a chia yama ma, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɔ, min mbe koe ma tena, min nyin.
45003013	An da a bai n mbe mɔɛ n kasaa wan. An 'na kana nɛnɛn chɛ n na, tea ee bɔ an da an dɔ. An da a bai n mu ka kona an na, miin mbe mɔɛ n fa.
45003014	Tima ɔ tima ko a, an mbe an bɔ n danka wan, faamɔnɛ ɔ.
45003015	A ɔ wuu an boo ɔ, mɔɛ tɔɔya koe a, mbɛ an‑na a fa.
45003016	Ni an ta‑a kan kɔ kan, tɔɔya basan kasaa a, an fan mbe ma nɔ.
45003017	An tana, an ma chia sɔn, a ma koe a an ni ma faachima ɔ mɔ dɔ mende n na,
45003018	n mbe ee baa a chianɛ sima wɛɛ ni ma an dɔ Yataa ko a.”
45003019	Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn gbɛ sanche, mbɛ sawa chɛ‑a min gbɛɛ fɔ, a sien mu chɛ n fan ma, miin mbe sawa gbu kɔɔ. An mbe a ma, an mbe ee kafai kan kɔ kan be ko yama ma koe a. A sin to, ɛ a ma‑a wan Yataa ni kaa a tɛ, a si mmɔ gbɛɛ a ko yama ma.
45003020	Koe min na mu, ni mɔɛ toen mu Yataa ni a ya mɔ tandenɛ a, sawa a tachɛ koe a gbee a, an mbe ee a ma chɛ ni ma. Chɛɛ sawa chɛ ɛ koe min ma, ɛ a ma wan mɔɛ n ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ mu mmɔ a.
45003021	Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, Yataa ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da mmɔ a, a ta chia mu min na, mmɔ ma koe a mɔ tandenɛ n na, a chen kɔɔ. A sin, a ta chia chɛ ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ mɔɛ ɛ koe chɛ an ma dechee, sawa‑a min fɔ a ma koe a. Yataa‑a sawa min na ben Mosisi a, a basan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, an‑na siiya bɔ wan chɛ ma.
45003022	Yataa ɛ mmɔ ya wan mɔ tandenɛ n na a chen kɔɔ, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a. Yataa ɛ chɛ ma wan mɔ ɔ mɔ ko a, min kai faen mu Chisɔsi a. Koe min na mu, a ni ma Chu mɔ a, a ma ma Chu mɔ a, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ bia dɔndɔ gbe.
45003023	A mu min na, mɔ gbu gbɛɛ‑a ko yama ma, a sin, mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ma bɔ ni Yataa faa ma chia a, an sɔnɛ n bɛɛ ka‑a Yataa ta fɛ.
45003024	Chɛɛ Yataa 'a chinchimaya an‑na a ma, a‑a mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ n na a chen kɔɔ. Ko kan kɔ kan dɔ gbɛɛ an ma a ma ni, a ni chɛ ma. A‑a chɛ ma koe min na, Chisɔsi Chasi‑a mmɔ kun ka wan mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ.
45003025	Yataa na‑a an be fa koe a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A 'a saya chɛ ni a ma, mɔ gbu ni kunka ma sɔn ko yama ɔ. A wii min sin bɔn‑da ka mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a, mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a a a, Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan an 'na ko yama n dɔ. Yataa‑a chɛ ma, a ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ a wan mbe mɔ gbu ya mɔ tandenɛ a. A kɔma a, Yataa na‑a a faa bia wan, mbɛ a‑a a ya ka mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n na.
45003026	Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ gbɛ, a ee a ya ka tena to mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n na. Chɛɛ ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ a wan mbe mɔ gbu ya dechee mɔ tandenɛ a. Ɛ ka a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ a wandi gbu tanden fan mu. A sin, ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe i kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a.
45003027	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ 'a yonkatɛ gbu kun mbe ee to. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ɛ bea min chɛ sawa chɛ fɛ, an mbe ee a ma, mmɔ ni ya mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa chen kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ mmɔ kai min fa ka dechee Chisɔsi a, an mbe a ma, mmɔ ɛ ya mɔ tandenɛ a.
45003028	Mbɛ mmɔ‑a a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa ɛ mmɔ ya dechee mɔ tandenɛ n na, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi a. Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ bea min chɛ ka sawa chɛ fɛ, an mbe ee a ma, mmɔ ni ya mɔ tandenɛ n na.
45003029	Yataa ee dechee Chu mɔɛ n fan ko a, ɛ wan mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ko a, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na. Ɛ ka wan tea gbu a.
45003030	Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, a sin, Chu mɔɛ nu, ni miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, ɛ an ma‑a wan mmɔ tandenɛ n na a chen kɔɔ. Chɛ ɛ bɔ‑a an 'na kaifa an dɔ Chisɔsi a.
45003031	Chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni chia kan kɔ kan na, mbɛ ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi a, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ boo bɔ wan gbɛ sawa chɛ kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mmɔ‑a min ma, mmɔ‑a sawa gbu an kɔ gbɛa ka gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ.
45004001	A nyin gbɛ mmɔ ni bai sa, a si nn fan Chu n bɔ kɔnkɔɛ ma, nn bemba Ebeami, a na‑a miin dɔ yen.
45004002	Ni Ebeami chɛ chɛ wai n fan na‑a a ma, mbɛ Yataa‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a, chɛ ni ma‑a yonkatɛ chia an na a boo ɔ mɔɛ n tena. Chɛɛ chia ee nɔ, ɛ yonka tɛ min na Yataa chen kɔɔ.
45004003	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Ebeami‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. A sin, Yataa wɛɛ‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.”
45004004	Mɔɛ min mbe wai chɛ pawa ko a, ɛ pawa an ma sɔn. Mɔɛ 'a pawa ma ma ni, yɔ wai nyima, chɛɛ fenɛ mu a a, mɔɛ chɛ ɛ wai chɛ min ko a.
45004005	Chɛɛ mmɔ mɔɛ yen bɛ, a e na a chɛ chɛ wai n ya, mbɛ an fan mbe a ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a ni a kai fa Yataa a. Mbɛ Yataa ɛ a yii na chii wan, an mɔɛ chɛ‑a a kai fa min chɛ a a. Ni an mɔɛ na‑a ko yama ma boo ɔ boo, Yataa ɛ a fɔ wan, a ɔ, a ma ko yama ma ni. Yataa ɛ an mɔɛ chɛ ya ka wan mɔ tandenɛ a.
45004006	Mansa Defidi wɛɛ na‑a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an fɔ tima dɔndɔ a. A na‑a bai sa tima min na, a si mɔɛ ma, Yataa‑a min ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a ɔ, mɔ duaen ba mu, a mu min na, Yataa ma a yii na chii ni a chɛ chɛ wai an ma. Mansa Defidi ɔ,
45004007	“Dua ɛ chɛ n ma, Yataa‑a a boo bɔ miin na ko yama maenɛ n dɔ, a‑a a ya ka miin na ko yama n na.
45004008	Dua min mbe chɛ n ma, a koo, Mansa Yataa ee miin na ko yama n sa tena ɔ bɛn‑da.”
45004009	Mansa Defidi na‑a bai sa ka a si dua min ma, a ee mɔɛ chɛ n dechee ko a, miin na kaminchaen mu. Chɛɛ ɛ wan chɛ n bɛɛ ko a, miin na ma kamincha ni. Mmɔ ban‑da a fɔ‑a, mbɛ Ebeami‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, a sin, Yataa‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.
45004010	Mmɔ ma a ya, mbɛ Yataa na‑a chɛ ma tima min na, mbɛ kai Ebeami a kaminchaen fan ni. A na‑a a ma pɛn, Ebeami a e na to kamincha‑a.
45004011	A gbakɔ ni gbɛ, Ebeami a kamincha‑a. A sin, a a kamincha koe chɛ, a ni tɔmɔsi an na, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ Yataa na‑a a ya pɛn mɔ tandenɛ a, a a e na to kamincha‑a. Chɛ sin na‑a ma, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ an kai fa‑a Yataa a, mbɛ a‑a an ya mɔ tandenɛ n na a chen kɔɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ n mbe ma‑a dechee yɔ Ebeami 'a denɛ nu Yataa ta fɛ chia a. An mbe ma‑a wan ka Ebeami tena, an ni a fɔ an na ma kamincha nin bɛɛ.
45004012	Ebeami sin fan mu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ gbu fa a, mɔɛ miin na kaminchaen mu ka. Chɛ ma si ni an na kamincha koe chɛ an ma, chɛɛ a sien mu an tachɛ buɛ dɔndɔɛ an ma, an kai fa koe Yataa a. Mmɔ fa Ebeami a e na to kamincha‑a, a tachɛ buɛ ni ka wan gbɛ Yataa a.
45004013	Yataa na‑a Ebeami too ɔ dia wan, an bɛ a cheeya n na, mbɛ ɛ dunya chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a an ta a. Yataa na‑a tooɔdia chɛ chɛ Ebeami a, koe min na mu, a na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. Chɛɛ Ebeami na‑a bea min chɛ sawa chɛ fɛ, an ko a nii ma. Chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a a ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.
45004014	Mmɔ a ya wɛ, mbɛ Yataa na‑a tooɔdia min chɛ, a ni be dechee chɛ n fan ma, miin mbe a sɔ sawa chɛ fɛ. Ni chɛ na‑a ma, mbɛ tɔnɔn mbe ee a ɔ mɔɛ kai fa koe a Yataa a. A sin, a fɔ koe a to, mbɛ Yataa‑a tooɔdia chɛ wan, bai ma fanka ɛ min na.
45004015	Yataa faa ɛ tɛ wan, ni mɔɛ‑a a 'a sawa yɔn, a na‑a min be Mosisi ma. Chɛɛ ni sawa kan kɔ kan mbe ee kaina min, sawa yɔn mbe ee ma nɔ.
45004016	Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa 'a tooɔdia chɛ, a kuu si‑a danaya an ma, Ebeami na‑a min chɛ a a. Yataa 'a tooɔdia chɛ ma fen dɔ mende a, chɛɛ a mu wai nyima chɛ an na, a na‑a min chɛ Ebeami cheeya n na. Cheeya chɛ nu, an ma dechee chɛ n fan na, miin boo a sien mu Mosisi 'a sawa n kɔɔ. Chɛɛ an mu wan chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin danden mu Yataa a, yɔ Ebeami na‑a dan buɛ min dɔ a a. Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ bemba n ta bemba mu Ebeami an na, danaya ko a Yataa a.
45004017	Chɛ fɔen fan mu Yataa 'a gboo wɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ a wan Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, mɔ sɛsɛ dunya ɔ, Ebeami an mu an bemba n ta bemba a. A sin, a wan Yataa Mansa ko a, a 'a tooɔdia chɛ baa ɛ wan a ma. Ebeami sin na‑a dan Yataa an na. Yataa an mbe a ma mɔɛ min fa‑a, a ni yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ. A da a kuiɛ to, an mbe a ma, fenɛ miin nii dunya chɛ ɔ tee, a ni bɔ a ɔ.
45004018	Ebeami na‑a dan fan Yataa a tima chɛ a, tima min na, a yii nii sɔ ɔ fen kɔ fen ma. Chɛ ko a, a ma‑a wan fa a mɔ sɛsɛ ko a dunya ɔ. A sin nyɛnden mu ka wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ a cheeya n mbe kɔkoa‑a wan dunya ɔ.
45004019	A tima chɛ a, Ebeami suun sanɛ ni gbɛ san chɛmɛ dɔndɔɛ an gbain tena. A gboo ɔ ni gbɛ buɛ min dɔ, a ni gbɛ faa chia ma wan. A 'a musu Seda wɛɛ, gbandayaen fan ni. Chɛ gbɛɛ ni wan Ebeami yii ma. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a 'a danaya Yataa a, a kɔ ni gbɛ wan tun.
45004020	A yiima nii fea, a si tooɔdia chɛ ma, Yataa na‑a min chɛ a a. Chɛɛ a sɔ‑a wan gban a 'a danaya ɔ Yataa ko a. A 'a danaya chɛ sin‑na gbasaya fa wan a gboo a, Yataa tando koe a.
45004021	A dandenɛ ni a a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ Yataa‑a tooɔdia min chɛ a a, mbɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan.
45004022	Chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a a ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.
45004023	Bai chɛ sin, min nyɛnden mu, mbɛ Yataa‑a Ebeami ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a, a ee a wan Ebeami dɔndɔ gbe an ko a.
45004024	Chɛɛ a nyɛnden fan mu mmɔ wɛɛ ko a, mmɔ wɛn kai faen mu Yataa a, min‑na mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ saya ɔ. Ɛ mmɔ wɛɛ ya a wan mɔ tandenɛ n na.
45004025	Chisɔsi be‑a wan, fa koe a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A sin, a kɔɔ sɔ‑a wan, a ka saya ɔ, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ n na.
45005001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ya‑a mɔ tandenɛ n na, mmɔ 'a danaya ko a Yataa a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ gbɛ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a ma, mmɔ ɛ faachima ɔ Yataa a.
45005002	Mmɔ 'a danaya chɛ ko a Yataa a, Chasi‑a a ma, mmɔ boo kun‑da Yataa 'a koadia deman chɛ ma, min mbe ka mmɔ ko a sanche. Mmɔ ɛ buɔdia bɔ wan gbɛ sanche, koe min na mu, mmɔ yii na tɛen fan mu gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa sɔnɛ dɔ ɛ ma‑a wan mmɔ ɔ ya ɔ ma.
45005003	Chɛ dechee ma, chɛɛ mmɔ buɔdia bɔ mmɔ 'a tɔɔya n dɔ. Koe min na mu, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tɔɔya an mbe na faabia a mmɔ tena.
45005004	Mmɔ sin mbe mmɔ faa bia min chɛ, ɛ a ma wan, mmɔ yiima ni kɔɔ mmɔ 'a koe a dan buɛ ɔ. Chɛ sin mbe a ma wan mmɔ yii na tɛenɛ ni ma Yataa ma.
45005005	Yiinatɛ chɛ mmɔ ɔ, a ee ma fania a, koe min na mu, Yataa 'a koadia koo mmɔ faa an dɔ. Yataa Nyina, min mbe mmɔ fɛ, Yataa wandi‑a min be mmɔ ma, an‑na koadia chɛ chɛ mmɔ ɔ.
45005006	Tima min na mmɔ nii che basan‑da mmɔ wandi ma, Chasi fa‑a wan mmɔ ko a, mmɔ ko yama ma mɔɛ chɛ nu. Yataa na‑a tima min yian, a fa‑a a tima chɛ an na.
45005007	A ɔ gbɛ ka, mɔɛ ni dɔn fa koe a mɔɛ ko a, min tanden mu sawa bia ɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n mbe kun fan an fɔɛ be‑a mɔɛ ko a, min mu mɔ chɛndɛ wa a fɔɛ ɔ.
45005008	Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a ɔ yian fan mmɔ a, mbɛ a toen mu mmɔ a kaka. Koe min na mu, mmɔ to‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n fan dɔ, mbɛ Chasi fa‑a mmɔ ko a.
45005009	A wii min sin bɔn‑da, an‑na mmɔ ya sanche gbɛ mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa chen kɔɔ. Ni Chasi ɛ kun fan a ni chɛ ma mmɔ ko a, mmɔ ni dan a a, mbɛ ɛ mmɔ kun bɔ‑a wan Yataa 'a faatɛ ɔ.
45005010	Mmɔ ni Yataa chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n fan na, chɛɛ a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi 'a saya‑a a ma, a‑a mmɔ ma gbɛ a dia nyɔɛ n na. Mmɔ ma‑a ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ sanche Yataa dia nyɔɛ n na, bauncha ɛ gbɛ mmɔ wan ko a, koe min na mu, Chasi ɛ fɔɛ ɔ.
45005011	Chɛɛ chɛ dechee ma, a mu min na, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi an‑na a ma, mmɔ bu ɔ dia‑a Yataa ko a. An‑na a ma gbɛ sanche, Yataa ma‑a mmɔ dia nyɔɛ a.
45005012	Mɔ dɔndɔ gbe an‑na a ma, ko yama don‑da dunya chɛ ɔ. A 'a ko yama maen chɛ sin na‑a saya an na a boo ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, saya fasan‑da dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, a mu min na, mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ma‑a ko yama ma mɔɛ a.
45005013	Yataa e na to sawa chɛ be‑a Mosisi ma tima min na, mɔɛ n ni wan gbɛ ko yama ma‑a dunya ɔ. Chɛɛ ni sawa ee kaina min, Yataa ee mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a ko yama sa tena ɔ bɛn.
45005014	Chɛɛ a ka Adami ta tima ma, a ta Mosisi ta ma, saya 'a gbasaya ɛ wan mɔɛ gbɛɛ kun ma dunya ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ kun ma, miin gbu nii ma ko yama chɛ ma ni, Yataa da a kuiɛ yɔn koe a, yɔ Adami na‑a min ma. Chia dɔ n na, Adami chɛ bɔen fan ni mɔɛ chɛ a, mɔɛ n ya ni min ya ɔ na koe a dunya ɔ.
45005015	Chɛɛ mɔ fea chɛ n ni dama. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ, a ee ka yɔ Adami 'a ko yama maenɛ. Tea gbu mu a a, mbɛ mɔ sɛsɛ faen mu mɔ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ 'a ko yama maenɛ ko a. Chɛɛ Yataa ɛ a 'a koadia demanɛ chɛ chia min na a koo kaka. A sin chia chɛ a mu, a 'a ko chɛndɛ chɛen mu mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a, gbama gbama a. Chɛ maen mu mɔ dɔndɔ gbe a ko chɛndɛ ma an dɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi.
45005016	Yataa ɛ ko chɛndɛ min ma, an fea Adami 'a ko yama a, tɛ bɔɛ ɛ wan an ma. Adami na‑a ko yama ma kɛn, Yataa na‑a kaa a tɛ wan a ma, mbɛ ko yama mu. Chɛɛ mɔ sɛsɛ‑a ko yama ma kɛn sɛsɛ, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ, a‑a an ya mɔ tandenɛ n na.
45005017	Tea gbu mu a a, mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ gbe 'a ko yama maenɛ, an‑na a ma, saya 'a gbasaya kun‑da dunya ma, mɔ dɔndɔ gbe wakoe. Chɛɛ chɛ ma che ni koe chɛ ɔ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, Chisɔsi Chasi, a‑a min ma. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, Yataa ɛ a 'a koadia demanɛ yian miin na, a ɔ benden ba a, mbɛ a‑a an ya mɔ tandenɛ n na. An mbe gbasaya sɔn‑da wan fɔɛ ɔ Chisɔsi a, a si kun koe a ko yama ma an fea saya a.
45005018	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ 'a ko yama‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ma ko yama ma mɔɛ n na. Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ, a 'a tea wai Yataa tena, a‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ kun ka, mbɛ a‑a fɔɛ be an ma.
45005019	Adami dɔndɔ gbe na‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ bɔ wan a ɔ, min na‑a a ma, mɔ sɛsɛ ma‑a ko yama ma mɔɛ n na. A ma‑a ka wan to, Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe dechee, an‑na Yataa da a kuiɛ a min, min‑na a ma, Yataa ɛ a a tun‑da wan mɔ sɛsɛ ya koe a mɔ tandenɛ n na.
45005020	Yataa na‑a sawa a, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni ko yama kun ma sa. Chɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na ko yama kun ma ɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ wɛɛ, a ma ɛ munda ka wan.
45005021	N da a bai kunɛ a bia koe a, ko yama‑a gbasaya ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ saya ɔ, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ a ta gbasaya wɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ ya‑a ka wan mɔ tandenɛ n na a chen kɔɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mmɔ‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a min be.
45006001	Mmɔ ɛ fen fɔ‑a gbɛ? Mmɔ ee kun to a fɔ‑a, mbɛ mmɔ ni a a tun ko yama ma koe a, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a 'a ko chɛndɛ ma munda mmɔ tena.
45006002	Tea ko a, chɛ ee ma. Ni ko yama ma koe mu to, mbɛ mmɔ faenɛ mu gbɛ. Mmɔ ee kun to ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ ta‑a ko yama ma‑a tun tun.
45006003	Koe min na mu, a nyin wo ni chɛ ɔ sɔn tea ko a. Mbɛ yii chɛ‑a wan mmɔ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, mmɔ ma koe a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a. Yii chɛ sin chɛ‑a kɛn mmɔ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, a ma‑a wan yɔ mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a saya ma‑a mmɔ 'a saya a.
45006004	Yii chɛ min chɛ‑a ka mmɔ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, a‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ mmɔ bɛ fa‑a, a yɛ to, mmɔ bɛ tɔn‑da Chisɔsi a. Chɛ an mbe a ma, yɔ Yataa 'a kamaya gbasaya na‑a Chasi kɔɔ sɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ka saya ɔ, mmɔ wɛɛ ni ma fɔɛ nama ɔ, a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a.
45006005	Chasi fa min chɛ‑a, mmɔ wɛɛ, a ma‑a wan mmɔ 'a saya a, kɛn yii chɛ‑a mmɔ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a. Chasi a sɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ a ka saya ɔ, a chia dɔndɔ gbe a mu, Yataa ɛ mmɔ wɛɛ kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ.
45006006	Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi ni gbangban tena tima min na kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, mmɔ sɔn kɔma n bɛɛ gbangban‑da wan a ma. Chɛ ma‑a min mbe a ma, Yataa ni mmɔ sɔn kɔma n bɔ mmɔ faa n dɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mmɔ ee ma‑a to yɔnɛ n na mmɔ 'a ko yama n boo ɔ.
45006007	A mu min na, ni mɔ gbu fa‑a, a kun ka‑a, ko yama 'a gbasaya ee to a kun ma.
45006008	Ni a na‑a ma wan, yɔ a ma‑a buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ mmɔ bɛ an na‑a fa dɔndɔ a Chasi a, mmɔ ɛ dan fan a a, mmɔ bɛ ɛ ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ.
45006009	Koe min na mu, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chasi a sɔ‑a wan a ka saya ɔ. A sin, gbasaya ee to saya boo ɔ a kun ma, fa koe a to.
45006010	A na‑a saya min chɛ ka, mmɔ 'a ko yama ko a, ko yama 'a gbasaya ee to a kun ma kuɔ fɔ ko a. Ɛ ka gbɛ fɔɛ min dɔ, fɔɛ mu Yataa ko a.
45006011	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, wo wɛɛ ni wo wandi ya gbɛ mɔ faenɛ n na, ko yama 'a gbasaya ee to wo kun ma. Chɛɛ wo e gbɛ fɔɛ min dɔ, wo e Yataa an ko a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu gbɛ wo a Chisɔsi Chasi a.
45006012	Wo ma dɔn to, ko yama ni gbasaya sɔn wo kun ma wo 'a mɔgbuya ɔ, min mbe danka dunya ma. Mɔgbuya chɛ ɔ, wo ma bea wo faa ma koe yama n fɛ.
45006013	Wo sin gbu ma wo wandi be chia ɔ chia a ko yama ma, wo ma wo boo chɛ ko yama n dɔ. Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo wo wandi be Yataa ma. Wo a ma yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin‑na fɔɛ ma sɔn, a ka saya ɔ. Wo wo wandi gbɛɛ be a ma, a ma koe a wo ni tea koe n ma.
45006014	Wo ma dɔn to ko yama ni gbasaya sɔn wo kun ma. Wo ee sawa chɛ an kɔɔ, chɛɛ wo e Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ an kɔɔ.
45006015	Mmɔ ɛ fen ma gbɛ? Sawa an mbe ee wai tena to mmɔ a, chɛɛ Yataa 'a ko chɛndɛ an mbe gbɛ wai tena mmɔ a. Mmɔ ee che to a a tun‑da ko yama ma koe a.
45006016	Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ wandi gbɛɛ be fen kɔ fen ma, mmɔ ma‑a a fen chɛ 'a yɔnɛ a. Ni mmɔ ma‑a ko yama 'a yɔnɛ a, a gbaa chia a mu saya an na. Chɛɛ ni mmɔ‑a kooya be Yataa ma, ɛ mmɔ ya‑a wan mɔ tandenɛ n na.
45006017	Wo ni tee yɔnɛ n fan na, wo 'a ko yama n boo ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe Yataa wai bɔ wan gbɛ wo ko a. Koe min na mu, wo‑a kooya be wo faa gbɛɛ a, wo‑a a be tea chɛ a min koe a, min mbe kan chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a wo don kanɛ min kɔɔ.
45006018	Wo na‑a kunka ma sɔn fan, a bɔ ko yama 'a yɔncha ɔ. Mbɛ wo don‑da Yataa ta yɔncha ɔ, min mu tea ko ma a.
45006019	N mbe koɔ tena ka, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, koe min na mu, mɔgbuya gboo ɔ faen fan mu koe ɔ gbɛ koe a. Wo na‑a wo wandi be wan gbae a saa a, ma koe a yɔnɛ a ko tɛ boo ɔ, a basan ko yama sɛsɛ n na. Wo yii ma koe yama n fan ni a ma wo ni ka. Sanche chɛ ɔ, wo wo wandi be gbae, ma koe a yɔnɛ a, tea koe ma koe a, wo ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a.
45006020	Wo ni tima min na yɔnɛ n na wo 'a ko yama n kɔɔ, a nii ma din ni wo ma Yataa faa ma koe n ma koe a.
45006021	Wo na‑a tɔnɔnɛ minan sɔn a ɔ? Tea ko a, wo nii ma tɔnɔn kan kɔ kan sɔn ni an koe chɛ n dɔ. An koe n mu ka sanche maumaya koe n na wo tena. Saya an bɔ‑a a koe n dɔ.
45006022	Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, wo kun bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ, wo ma‑a gbɛ Yataa 'a yɔnɛ n na. Wo 'a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ gbɛ, wo e gbɛ tenchen Yataa an ko a. Chɛ sin tɔnɔnɛ mu kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an na wo ko a.
45006023	Ko yama tana, saya an mu a tɔnɔnɛ a, a wandi ɛ na min na. Chɛɛ Yataa ɛ min be mmɔ ma gbama gbama a, an nɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a. Chɛ ɛ ma wan, koe min na mu, mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, mmɔ 'a mansa.
45007001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, tea ko a, wo e a ɔ gbɛ‑a wan, n mbe na tena min fɔ‑a. Koe min na mu, sawa chɛ tana, wo gbɛɛ‑a a sɔn fan. Tima min na wɛ mɔ gbu ɛ fɔɛ ɔ, ɛ tun sawa chɛ an kɔɔ.
45007002	A tɔmɔsi yen ko, min mu fuu musu a. Musu si sawa, ɛ an kɔɔ a chɛɛ tena, an mbe wɛ tima min na fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ ni a chɛɛ fa‑a, mbɛ sawa chɛ‑a a boo ka musu chɛ ma fion a wandi ko a.
45007003	Chɛ an fɛ mu, a chɛɛ ɛ wɛ fɔɛ ɔ tima min na, a ee kai dɔ gbɛɛ sɔn. Ni a‑a chɛ ma, mɔɛ n mbe a chee ko tɛ musu an na. Chɛɛ sawa‑a min fɔ, ni a chɛɛ fa‑a, a ee to musu si sawa chɛ kɔɔ. Ni an musu chɛ‑a kai dɔ gbɛɛ sɔn, mɔɛ n mbe ee a chee ko tɛ musu a.
45007004	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wɛɛ ɛ ka wan. Sawa ta fɛ chia a, a maen fan mu dechee yɔ wo wɛɛ na‑a fa wan. Chasi‑a saya min chɛ, a‑a a ma yɔ wo wɛɛ fa‑a sawa tena. A sin sanche gbɛ, wo e Chasi an ko a, min kɔɔ sɔ‑a saya ɔ. Chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni gbɔɛ be Yataa ko a.
45007005	Tima min na mmɔ ni mmɔ kun ye, sawa chɛ na‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n na kunɛ wan mmɔ ɔ, mmɔ gboo bankandenɛ ni miin ma koe a. A sin, mmɔ faa ma koe yama chɛ n fan‑na a ma, mbɛ saya‑a mmɔ boo kana bia.
45007006	A ni ma boo ɔ boo gbɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, mmɔ kunɛ bɔen fan mu gbɛ sawa chɛ boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, mmɔ fa‑a sawa ta fɛ chia a, min na‑a mmɔ bia pimbi chenɛ a. Mmɔ ee ma‑a to Yataa ko a, chia chɛ n na, sawa nyɛnden chɛ‑a min fɔ. Chɛɛ kuɔ fɔ ko a gbɛ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a gbɛ chia nama an na, chia chɛ, Yataa Nyina‑a mmɔ sɔ min ma.
45007007	Mmɔ ɛ che gbɛ fen ko fɔ‑a? Mmɔ ee che a fɔ‑a, mbɛ sawa mu ko yama an na. A ee ka sima wɛ. Sawa chɛ an‑na a ma, n‑na a ɔ sɔn, ko yama mu fenɛ min na. Sawa na‑a a fɔɛ min chɛ, a ɔ, mɔ ee to i bɔɛ ta boo fenɛ a yama yama, an na‑a a ma, n‑na chɛ ɔ gbɛ.
45007008	Ko yama‑a a chenɛ sɔ sawa an na, mbɛ a kun‑da a ma koe a mɔɛ n boo fenɛ wakoe a dia‑a n ye kaka. Sawa ee kaina min, ko yama ee nɔ.
45007009	N fandi gbu wɛɛ, n ni wan fɔɛ ɔ tima min na, n nii ma sawa chɛ wakoe ɔ sɔn, a ɔ yian koe a n na, koe min ma nyin a ma koe a. Chɛɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn kɛn, koe miin ma nyin an ma koe a, sawa chɛ ɔ, ko yama koa‑a n dɔ.
45007010	A sin, yɔ a fɔen mu buɛ min dɔ, a ma‑a wan yɔ n fa‑a. Sawa chɛ sin, min be‑a Mosisi ma, fɔɛ be koe a, a ma n kun bɔ ni saya boo ɔ.
45007011	Sawa chɛ, ko yama‑a a chen sɔ an na, n bun koe a. Ko yama‑a sawa chɛ an ya, n fa koe a.
45007012	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, Yataa wandi an ta mu sawa a. Sawa chɛ sin, Yataa an‑na a be. A sin, sawa chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan mɔ gbu ɛ koe miin ma, miin mu tea a. A yɛ to, ni koe miin nyin mɔ gbu ko a.
45007013	Chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ fen chɛndɛ‑a a ma n fa‑a. Chɛ ma ma ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. Ko yama‑a a chen fan sɔ dechee ko chɛndɛ a, mbɛ a na‑a saya a n kun ma. Ko yama‑a chɛ ma, a ni kun a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, ɛ buɛ min dɔ a sɔnɛ gbu ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan ka mmɔ a, mbɛ ko yama gbu ma chian‑da gbɛ a yama buɛ ɔ.
45007014	Mmɔ gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ sawa sien mu Yataa an ma. Chɛɛ n tana, mɔ gbu gbama gbama mu n na, min mbe fa. N ma‑a gbɛ yɔ ko yama 'a yɔnɛ, n kooenɛ ɛ a ye.
45007015	N mbe ee a ɔ gbɛ, n mbe koe miin ma. Chɛ ɛ ma koe min na, n toen mu koe miin na, n mbe ee an fan ma. Chɛɛ n mbe min ma, n ma to ni koe miin na, n mbe an fan ma.
45007016	Ni n‑na ko yama n ma, n ma to ni miin ma koe a, chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ n dɔn‑da a ma, mbɛ sawa chɛ nyin fan.
45007017	Chɛ ɛ a yian fan, mbɛ n mbe ee n fandi boo ɔ, koe chɛ n ma koe a. Chɛɛ ko yama min mbe n faa ɔ, an mbe a ma tena n mbe an ma.
45007018	N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mɔgbuya chɛ ɔ min ma nyin, ko chɛndɛ ma koe gbasaya, a ee n faa ɔ. Koe min na mu, n toen mu bɛɛ boo ɔ boo n ni ko chɛndɛ ma, chɛɛ n mbe ee che a ma‑a.
45007019	N mbe ee ko chɛndɛ ma, n toen mu n ni min ma. Chɛɛ min mbe ma, n mbe ko yama an ma, n ma to ni n ni min ma.
45007020	Ni n‑na koe ma, n ma to ni n ni min ma, ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ n fandi an mbe ee a ma tena. Chɛɛ min mbe ma tena, ko yama min mbe n faa ɔ, an mbe a ma tena.
45007021	Mbɛ chɛ‑a a ɔ yian gbɛ n na, mbɛ ɛ ma tena ka wan n ta fɔɛ ɔ. N toen mu bɛɛ n ni ko chɛndɛ ma, koe min ma nyin a ma koe a, n mbe an ya a ma koe a.
45007022	N faa gbɛɛ ɔ, n bu ɔ di wan Yataa 'a sawa ko a.
45007023	Chɛɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn gbɛ n faa ɔ, mbɛ n mbe bea tena sawa dɔ gbɛɛ an fɛ. An sawa chɛ, ɛ butuinɛ chɛ tena wan sawa chɛ a, n toen mu min na n yiima ɔ. A‑a n ma yɔnɛ a, sawa chɛ boo ɔ, min mbe n yiima ɔ.
45007024	N faa yɔnden mu a ɔ benden ba a. N toen mu mɔɛ a, min mbe che n bɔ‑a ko yama ma fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma tena n mbe fa‑a.
45007025	Yataa ɛn wai! A‑a a ma, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a n kun bɔ a ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n ma buɛ ɛ gbɛ ka wan. N mbe bea tena wan Yataa 'a sawa n fɛ n yiima gbɛɛ a. Chɛɛ yɔnɛ mu n na, ko yama 'a gbasaya kɔɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin.
45008001	Chɛ an fɛ mu sanche chɛ ɔ, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, Yataa ee kaa a tɛ‑a a wakoe ma, a ni tɔɔ.
45008002	A mu min na, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, mmɔ kunɛ bɔ‑a ko yama 'a gbasaya ɔ, min mbe na saya a. Yataa Nyina min mbe fɔɛ chɛndɛ be, an‑na a ma chɛ ma‑a.
45008003	Mmɔ ɛ koe miin ma, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin, an na‑a a ma wan, sawa chɛ ma kun ni mmɔ kun ka‑a. Chɛɛ Yataa na‑a dɔbɛn dɔ gbɛɛ chɛ wan, mmɔ kun ka koe a. A na‑a a 'a denɛ a na wan dunya chɛ ɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ. A na‑a a 'a den chɛ ma wan yasi a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A na‑a chɛ ma, kaa an na tɛ koe a, a si mmɔ 'a ko yama n ma.
45008004	Yataa na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, sawa na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ mmɔ tan koe a a tena, mmɔ ɛ a ma‑a wan ka chɛndɛ chɛ. Mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ wɛn mbe tachɛ Yataa Nyina gbee a, mmɔ ɛ a ma‑a ka wan. Chɛɛ mmɔ ee na‑a tachɛ‑a gbee a, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin.
45008005	Mɔɛ chɛ min mbe fɔɛ ɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin, ɛ koe n fan ma dechee, miin na di a ye. A yiima gbɛɛ ɛ ma gbasaya an kɔɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu fɔɛ ɔ, miin mbe koe ma, min na di Yataa Nyina ye, an yiima gbɛɛ ɛ ma Nyina chɛ 'a gbasaya an kɔɔ.
45008006	Mɔɛ yii ma ma koe a, gbasaya kɔɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin, ɛ na saya an na. Chɛɛ mɔɛ yii ma ma koe a Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya kɔɔ, ɛ na kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an na, a basan faachima a.
45008007	A sin fan fɛ mu, mɔɛ min yiima ɛ gbasaya kɔɔ mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin, Yataa chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ mu a a. Koe min na mu, a mɔɛ chɛ ma kun ni ma koe a Yataa 'a sawa kɔɔ. A gbu sin, a ee che ma‑a a kɔɔ.
45008008	Mɔɛ miin mbe koe n ma gbasaya kɔɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin, an mbe ee che Yataa faa ma koe n ma‑a.
45008009	Ni Yataa Nyina gbu ɛ wan wo fɛ, wo ee koe n ma mɔgbuya ɔ, miin ma nyin. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ koe miin fɔ wo ye, an ma koe a, wo e an fan ma. Chasi Nyina ee mɔɛ min fɛ, a mɔɛ chɛ ee Chasi an ko a.
45008010	Chɛɛ ni Chasi ma‑a wo wɛn fɛ, ɛ a ma wan, wo ni ma fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan wo a, wo gboo ɛ fa‑a wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, wo 'a ko yama boo ɔ. Chasi sin mbe chɛ ma‑a wan wo ko a, koe min na mu, wo ya‑a mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena.
45008011	Yataa Nyina, min‑na a ma, Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, ɛ wan wo fɛ. A Nyina chɛ sin, min‑na chɛ ma ka, ɛ fɔɛ be‑a wan wo ma, wo wɛn mbe fa ka. Ɛ chɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ a na‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ dechee Chasi a.
45008012	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, Yataa Nyina ɛ min fɔ mmɔ ye a ma koe a, mmɔ a ma. Mmɔ ma koe chɛ n ma, mmɔ 'a mɔgbuya ɔ min ma nyin.
45008013	Koe min na mu, ni wo ma‑a an gbasaya chɛ kɔɔ, wo e na‑a wan fa‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛɛ ni Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a a ma, wo sɛmbɛ‑a fion an ko yama n na, wo e kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
45008014	Yataa Nyina ɛ chia yian mɔɛ miin na, an fan mu Yataa 'a denɛ n na.
45008015	A mu min na, Yataa‑a a Nyina min be wo ma, ma koe a wo fɛ, a ee wo ma yɔnɛ n na, a ni a ma chiandia ni ma wo ɔ. Chɛɛ min mbe ma, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo ma Yataa 'a denɛ n fan na. A sin Yataa Nyina chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni Yataa chee, wo ɔ, wo fa.
45008016	Yataa Nyina chɛ, an sa‑a mmɔ ta nyina n kaa a, a fɔ koe a, mbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ n mu mmɔ a.
45008017	Mmɔ mu ka buɛ min dɔ a 'a denɛ n na, a‑a dua miin sa tena ɔ bɛn a 'a mɔɛ n ko a, mmɔ wan ta ɛ ma an na. A na‑a min sa tena ɔ bɛn Chasi wɛɛ ko a, ɛ ma‑a wan to mmɔ ta a. Mmɔ na‑a Chasi 'a tɔɔya ɔ bia wan, mmɔ ɛ a 'a basɔmaya wɛɛ dɔ sɔn‑da wan ya ɔ ma.
45008018	Sanche, mmɔ ɛ mɔnɛ ɔ bia tena. Chɛɛ n danden mu a a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ ka mɔnɛ min dɔ bia tena sanche, a a ma kan ni basɔmaya chɛ a, Yataa ɛ min be‑a mmɔ ma ya ɔ ma.
45008019	Yataa‑a fenɛ miin gbɛɛ a dan, an gbɛɛ ɛ wan gbɛ makɔnɛ chɛ‑a nyaka, nyaka, tima chɛ ko a, tima min na Yataa ɛ a 'a denɛ n yian‑da.
45008020	A mu min na, Yataa‑a fenɛ miin gbɛɛ nyan, a‑a an baa yɔn ka wan. Yataa 'a fen nyanden chɛ nu, an fandi nii ma to ni an baa ni yɔn, chɛɛ Yataa toen ni a ma koe a ka wan. Chɛɛ a na‑a chɛ wɛɛ ma, koe ni wan nɔ a yii na tɛen ni min ma.
45008021	A wan Yataa na‑a a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ tee dɔndɔ ɛ che‑a wan, a‑a fenɛ miin nyan ka, a ni an kun ka, an ma na tui to. A sin, an tee chɛ ma, Yataa 'a den chɛ n mbe ma‑a wan buɔdia ɔ, kamaya kun ka chɛ boo ɔ.
45008022	A mu min na, mmɔ gbɛɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a ka suun ma, aan sanche chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a fenɛ miin gbɛɛ nyan, an mbe kuun tena wan pinia an dɔ. An mbe wan dechee yɔ musu bu ɔ tɛ buɛ min dɔ, a e na to a suun‑da.
45008023	Chɛɛ chɛ ee ma fen chɛ n dechee a, Yataa‑a miin nyan. Mmɔ wɛɛ, Yataa Nyina pɛn be‑a mmɔ ma. Chɛ sin ma‑a wɛɛ ka mmɔ ye, mmɔ ɛ kuun tena wan tun mmɔ faa ɔ. Mmɔ ɛ wan chɛ a, mmɔ ɛ ta‑a Yataa ma kɔn‑da, a ni mmɔ ma fion a 'a denɛ n na, gboo nama ɔ ya ɔ ma.
45008024	Koe min na mu, a ka mmɔ 'a bauncha ma sɔn tima ma, yiinatɛ chɛ an mbe mmɔ ɔ. Chɛɛ mmɔ yii na tɛen mu fenɛ min ma, ni mmɔ‑a a yen gbɛ, mbɛ mmɔ yii ee che to ma‑a a kɔ. Koe min na mu, mɔ yii ee che ma‑a fenɛ kɔ, mmɔ ban‑da min yen‑da.
45008025	Chɛɛ ni mmɔ yii ma‑a fenɛ kɔ, mmɔ ma min yen nin bɛ, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ faa bia wan a ma kɔnɛ a.
45008026	Yataa Nyina wɛɛ, ɛ na ka wan, a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ deman, mmɔ ɔ gbɛa koe a danaya ɔ Yataa a. Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbu ma a ɔ sɔn, mmɔ ɛ samunɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ. Yataa Nyina wandi an mbe samunɛ chɛ mmɔ ko a. Ɛ samunɛ chɛ chɛ mmɔ ko a kuunɛ an dɔ, mmɔ ee kun min dɔ yian‑da.
45008027	Yataa sin gbu, a‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, koe miin mbe mmɔ faa n dɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ɛ a Nyina chɛ yii ma sɔn fan. A mu min na, Yataa Nyina chɛ ɛ a disa tena wan mmɔ ko a, a 'a mɔɛ nu. A Nyina chɛ sin mbe samunɛ chɛ tena koe chɛ an ko a, Yataa toen mu min na an ko a.
45008028	Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan dɔ, mɔɛ miin toen mu Yataa a, a wɛɛ, ɛ wai chɛndɛ n fan chɛ an ko a. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, an fan cheeen mu, a 'a dɔbɛnɛ ta fɛ chia a.
45008029	An mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa na‑a an sɔn pɛn chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ a‑a a boo sɔ an ma. An mbe ma‑a wan gbɛ yɔ a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi. A 'a den chɛ ɛ ma‑a gbɛ denɛ saa an na, den sɛsɛ wa chɛ n ya ɔ.
45008030	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ ka miin ma, a‑a an chee. A sin‑na miin chee ka, a‑a an ya mɔ tandenɛ n na a wandi tena. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin ɛ miin ya mɔ tandenɛ n na, ɛ a ma‑a wan an ni a 'a basɔmaya dɔ ma sɔn.
45008031	A si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, mmɔ‑a miin dɔ sɔn ka, mmɔ ɛ kun chɛ an fɔ‑a, mbɛ ni Yataa ɛ mmɔ ko a, mmɔ chɛɛ ma nyɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee kun mmɔ ma.
45008032	Yataa ma a boo a ben ni a wandi gbu 'a denɛ wɛɛ kɔ, a kunɛ bɔ koe a tɔɔya ɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a Chisɔsi be wan yasi a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a. Ni ɛ chɛ ma wan mmɔ ko a, ɛ kun fan a ni fen kɔ fen be mmɔ ma gbama gbama a, a faa gbɛɛ a.
45008033	Mɔ ee nɔ min mbe kunɛ si chɛ n kun ma, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ ka a 'a mɔɛ miin ma. Yataa wandi ban‑da a fɔ‑a, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu an na.
45008034	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee nɔ min mbe kaa a tɛ, a si an mɔɛ chɛ n tɔɔya koe ma. Chisɔsi Chasi an fa‑a mmɔ ko a, chɛ ma, an kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ. A sin, ɛ si ɔ kaina ma bɛndenɛ Yataa boo nyima ɔ. Ɛ wan tun koɔ‑a Yataa tena mmɔ ko a.
45008035	Ko ɔ ko ee nɔ, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ko sɔɔ ni bɔ Chasi ɔ. Ko yawaenɛ ee kun chɛ ma‑a, yakɔɔtawa ee a ma, mɔɛ n mbe ko ma gbaaenɛ min sa mmɔ ma, a nan fan mbe ee a ma. A yɛ to, kɔnkɔ ee a ma, mmɔ yɔn koe ee a ma, ko yama ma chiandenɛ ee a ma, saya wɛɛ ee kun a ma‑a, mmɔ ko sɔɔ ni bɔ Chisɔsi ɔ.
45008036	Yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “I wan Yataa ko a, nn mbe wan saya ma chianɛ kɔɔ tee ɔ tee a, nn mbe wan gbɛ dechee yɔ sa miin mbe sɔ ɔ yuu a, fa koe a.”
45008037	Chɛɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ni mmɔ tan bɛɛ, a wɛn toen mu mmɔ a, an mbe mmɔ kunɛ bɔ‑a an dɔ fion.
45008038	N danden fan mu a a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ ko ɔ ko ee che a ma‑a, mmɔ sɔɔ ni bɔ Chasi ɔ. Mmɔ ni fa wan, mmɔ ni ma fɔɛ ɔ wan, mmɔ ko a di wan a ye. Maeka n ni ma, ni nyina yama nu, a basan gbasaya gbɛɛ n na, an mbe ee che mmɔ ko sɔɔ bɔ‑a a ɔ. A sin to, koe min gbɛɛ ɛ ma tena sanche chɛ ɔ, a basan koe n na, miin mbe na tena ma‑a ya ɔ ma, an bɛɛ ee che chɛ ma‑a.
45008039	Fen mbe ee nɔ banda wɛɛ a pechenden, fen mbe ee nɔ yii wa kɔɔ wɛɛ pɔɔ, min mbe mmɔ ko sɔɔ bɔ Chasi ɔ. Fen kɔ fen mbe ee nɔ, Yataa‑a min gbɛɛ nyan, min mbe kun‑da chɛ ma koe a kuɔ fɔ. Yataa 'a koadia chɛ, mmɔ‑a min ma sɔn mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, fen kɔ fen mbe ee a yɔn.
45009001	N mbe ka tea bai an fɔ tena. N mbe ee fania fɔ tena, a mu min na, Chasi an ta mu n na. N 'na yiinachii gbu wɛɛ, an fea Yataa Nyina a, ɛ min 'na gbasaya kɔɔ, an dɔnden fan mu n 'na tea chɛ ma.
45009002	N 'na chinchincha koo, mɔnɛ wɛɛ ee ban n faa ɔ.
45009003	Chɛ ɛ ma tena n na, n suun ma nyɔɛ n fan ko a, Chu mɔɛ nu, n chɛnyɛ mɔɛ nu. Ni chɛ ɛ ma wan demanɛ a an tena, ɛ ma wan n 'na yiinachii ɔ, n fandi gbu, Yataa ni n danka, mbɛ nn fea tɛ du‑a Chasi a, an ko a.
45009004	An mu Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n fan na, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, a ɔ, a ta mɔɛ mu an na. A na‑a an ma wan a 'a denɛ n na, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ yian an na, a kamayaen mu buɛ min dɔ. A na‑a a 'a dɔbɛnɛ n chɛ wan an na, mbɛ a‑a a 'a sawa wɛɛ be Mosisi ma an ko a. Yataa na‑a a ɔ yian fan to an na, an mbe a fai buɛ min dɔ teaya ɔ. Yataa na‑a tooɔdia sɛsɛ chɛ wan an na.
45009005	An bɔ kɔnkɔɛ nu, baa ni wan an ma kaka Yataa tena. A sin, Chasi 'a mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a, a wɛɛ danka‑a bɔ‑a an 'na dambi dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni tando be a ma kuɔ fɔ ko a. An mu Yataa a fen kɔ fen ko a dunya chɛ ɔ. A ni ma ka.
45009006	Chɛ ma a yian ni gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa na‑a an too ɔ dia koe miin chɛ koe a an ye, a ma an chɛ ni. Koe min na mu, a ma ma ni, mbɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ mu mɔɛ n fan na, miin‑na Yataa sɔn. An dɔ n ma a sɔn.
45009007	A ka chɛ gbu ma, a ma ma ni to, mbɛ Ebeami cheeya n gbɛɛ, an mu Yataa 'a denɛ n chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an fan na. Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan Ebeami ye, a ɔ, “I 'a denɛ Aisaki cheeya nu dechee, an fan mbe ya‑a i cheeya chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n na.”
45009008	Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ denɛ miin suun‑da mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a, an fan ma Yataa 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n na. Chɛɛ mɔɔ dechee cheeya chɛ nu, Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia denɛ miin na, an fan yaen mu Yataa 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n na.
45009009	Yataa ni an tooɔdia chɛ chɛ tena tima min na, a na‑a bai chɛ n fan fɔ, a ɔ, “Tima chɛ kɔɔ, min dɔ bɛnden mu, n mbe yɛ‑a wan nɛ, a sin Seda ɛ den kaienɛ suun‑da wan.”
45009010	A sin nii ma danka ni chɛ ma. Debɛka 'a fɛn kaima fea nu, an fa ni Aisaki an na, mmɔ bɔ kɔnkɔɛ.
45009011	Chɛɛ an fɛn chɛ nu, an nii na to suun‑da, an dɔndɔ e na to koe ma‑a min nyin, chɛ ma, min ma nyin, Yataa na‑a koɔ wan Debɛka tena. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ koe ma, a ta chia an na.
45009012	Yataa ee koe ma mmɔ sɔn chɛndɛ ko a, a ee a ma mmɔ sɔn yama ko a. A na‑a a fɔ wan Debɛka ye to, mbɛ a 'a den kaienɛ chenama, a ɔ, an mbe ma‑a a dɔ kaima kɔɔ.
45009013	Chɛ ɛ wan dechee yɔ Yataa na‑a min fɔ a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, a‑a a boo sɔ Chekɔpi ma, a ɔ, mbɛ a ban‑da Isɔ sin dɔ.
45009014	Mmɔ ɛ fen fɔ‑a gbɛ? Mmɔ ee kun to a fɔ‑a, mbɛ Yataa ma tea ni.
45009015	Koe min na mu, a na‑a a fɔ wan Mosisi ye, a ɔ, ɛ koadia yian‑da dechee mɔɛ chɛ an na, a toen mu a ni a yian min na. Mbɛ a‑a chinchincha yian mɔɛ chɛ a, a toen mu a yian koe min na.
45009016	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, a gbɛɛ mu dechee Yataa 'a chinchimaya an na. Chɛɛ mmɔ 'a faagbaa ee Yataa 'a chinchincha be mmɔ ma, mmɔ chɛ koe wɛɛ ee a be mmɔ ma.
45009017	Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa na‑a Fɛdo ma Ichipi mansa a koe n fan ko a. A na‑a a ma mansa a, a ɔ yian koe an na, a wan Yataa gbasayaen mu buɛ min dɔ. A yɛ to, min mbe a ma, dunya gbɛɛ ni a wan Yataa 'a gbasaya chɛ ɔ yen.
45009018	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa ɛ chinchin fan mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, a toen mu a ni chinchin min ma. A sin to, ni a toen mu a ni a ma mɔ ɔ mɔ too ɔ ni gbɛa, ɛ a ma wan.
45009019	Chɛ ko a, wo dɔndɔ ɛ a fɔ‑a wan, a ɔ, mbɛ ni Yataa ɛ a ma ka wan, mbɛ a wan Yataa ee kun to, a ni a tɛ si mɔ ɔ mɔ ma. A ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a kunɛ bɔ‑a koe chɛ kɔɔ, a wan Yataa toen mu min ni ma.
45009020	Chɛɛ n dia nyɔɛ nu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma wo a, Yataa ɔ tisa koe a. Koe min na mu, fenɛ min nyan‑da, a ee a fɔ a nyan mɔɛ ma, a ɔ, “Fen mu i‑a n nyan buɛ chɛ ɔ?”
45009021	Boo da nyan mɔɛ dɔndɔ yen ko, a ɛ dia a wandi an ye, ɛ a 'a boo a wai buɛ min dɔ. A ɛ da fea nyan fan boo dɔndɔɛ ɔ. A sin, a da dɔndɔɛ ɛ ma wan wai chɛ koe a tee ɔ tee ko a. Mbɛ dɔndɔɛ ma‑a nɔ tenchen, bɛn chenama ko a.
45009022	Yataa‑a koe min ma, a wɛɛ ɛ ka wan. A toen ni a ni a ɔ yian, a faa ɛ tɛ buɛ min dɔ. A yɛ to, an ni a ɔ sɔn, a gbasayaen mu buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a na‑a a faa bia wan mɔɛ chɛ n na, a ni na tena miin tɔɔya‑a, miin ma bɛndenɛ ni gbɛ kasaa koe a.
45009023	Mbɛ a sin to, a toen ni a ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ a 'a basɔmaya danka ee. Yataa na‑a mɔɛ miin ya a 'a chinchimaya sɔn koe a, a na‑a a yian fan an na.
45009024	Koe min na mu, a na‑a mɔɛ miin chee, an mu mmɔ wan na. A nii ma mmɔ wan Chu mɔɛ n dechee an chee ni, chɛɛ mmɔ dɔ n bɛɛ, mmɔ wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, a na‑a mmɔ wɛɛ chee wan.
45009025	A mu min na, kai Wosea 'a gboo ɔ, Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ ɛ mɔɛ n chee‑a wan a 'a mɔɛ n na, mɔɛ miin nii ma tee a 'a mɔɛ n na. A ɔ, a nii ma to ni miin na tee, ɛ an chee wan a 'a mɔɛ n na, a toen mu miin na.
45009026	A ɔ, a sin, an kaina chɛ gbu, Yataa na‑a a fɔ kaina an ye, mbɛ a 'a mɔ ma an na, a ɔ, a wan Yataa ɛ a fɔ‑a to an kaina dɔndɔ gbe chɛ wan an ye, a ɔ, a wan Yataa min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, a ɔ, a 'a denɛ mu an na.
45009027	A sin to, kai Aisaya na‑a bai chɛ an fɔ a si Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ma, a ɔ, mbɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n kɔ ni koa wɛɛ, yɔ tɛ kuu mɛsɛ mɛsɛ yii da a, a ɔ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an mɔ kuundenɛ dechee, a ɔ, an fan mbe bauncha ma sɔn‑da.
45009028	A ɔ, ya ma kai fisɔɛ ɔ mu, Mansa Yataa ɛ na‑a kaa a tɛ‑a mɔɛ gbɛɛ wakoe ma dunya ɔ.
45009029	Ɛ wan dechee yɔ Aisaya na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ suun, mbɛ ni Yataa Mansa Wa nii ma an bɔ kɔnkɔɛ dɔn to ni suun, an ni ma‑a wan yɔ duu wa chɛ nu, Sɔdɔn an fea Komoa a, an dɔ mɔɛ nu.
45009030	Nn mbe bai chɛ an fɔ tena, a si mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin nii ma Chu mɔ n na. An nii butuin chɛ tena, an ni ma mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa tena. Chɛɛ an‑na an kai fa wan Yataa a. Chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a a ma wan an tan‑da a tena.
45009031	Chɛɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tana, Yataa na‑a a boo sɔ ka miin ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na, an nii ma ma ni mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa tena. Chɛ ma‑a wɛɛ, an ni bea tena sawa n fan fɛ, tan koe a Yataa tena.
45009032	Fen na‑a a ma, an nii ma tan ni Yataa tena? Koe min na mu, an yii faen ni an chɛ chɛ wai n fan ma, an yii na nii ma tɛ ni an kai fa buɛ ma Yataa a. An na‑a nama wan sen chɛ ma, sen chɛ min mbe a ma ka, mɔɛ n mbe bea.
45009033	Yataa 'a gboo na‑a bai sa a si an sen chɛ an ma, a ɔ, “A yen ko, n 'na senɛ si Sayɔn duu ɔ, mɔɛ n mbe an chenɛ n na tu‑a min na, an sen chɛ, mɔɛ n mbe nama‑a min ma, mbɛ an bea‑a. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn mbe i kai fa‑a a a, i mɔɛ chɛ ee che‑a mau‑a.”
45010001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n faa ma koe chenama wa an nɛ, n 'na Chu mɔɛ n koa. N mbe Yataa fai tena chɛndɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, an ni a 'a bauncha ma sɔn.
45010002	N danden fan mu a a, mbɛ an‑na an fandi be wan Yataa ma. Chɛɛ an fandi be chɛ, a ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ an‑na Yataa wakoe ɔ gbɛ wan chɛndɛ chɛ.
45010003	Chɛɛ an ma a ɔ gbɛ ni, Yataa ɛ a ya buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ ni tan a tena. An‑na min ma, an bea‑a wan an ta sawa n fɛ, a si an mbe ma buɛ min dɔ an ni tan Yataa tena. An ma bea ni chia fɛ, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ ya buɛ min dɔ mɔ tandenɛ a a tena.
45010004	Chasi‑a a ma wan, sawa chɛ, a 'a gbasaya ee to mɔ gbu kun ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ma wan mɔ tandenɛ a a tena, i wɛn mbe i kai fa‑a a a.
45010005	Mosisi na‑a chɛ an nyɛn Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a si mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, min toen mu don koe a sawa chɛ kɔɔ, a ni tan Yataa tena. A ɔ, mɔɛ miin mbe sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ bɔ‑a a gbee a chɛndɛ chɛ, a ɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ n fan mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da.
45010006	Yataa 'a gboo‑a chɛ an fɔ, a si mmɔ 'a kaifa ma Yataa a, ɛ mmɔ ma buɛ min dɔ mɔ tandenɛ n na a tena. Gboo chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ma a fɔ, mbɛ mɔ ee nɔ sɛ koe a banda bu ɔ, Chasi yii koe a dunya ɔ.
45010007	A ɔ, chɛ ma, mmɔ ni a fɔ, mbɛ mɔ ee nɔ ta koe a faa a sɛ koe a Chasi a dunya ɔ.
45010008	Yataa 'a gboo chɛ‑a a fɔ ka wan, a si a 'a sakana bai ma. A ɔ, Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ ɛ mmɔ boo ɔ wan, ɛ mmɔ da ɔ, a sin mbe mmɔ faa ɔ. Sakana bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ tun, nn mbe ka an dɔ yian tena, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a Chasi a, an fan mbe bauncha ma sɔn.
45010009	E bauncha ma sɔn‑da wan, ni i‑a da a bai chɛ fɔ den faaɔgbɛya ɔ, mbɛ Chisɔsi Chasi an mu i 'a mansa a. A sin i danden mu a a i yiima ɔ, mbɛ Yataa na‑a Chisɔsi chɛ kɔɔ sɔ wan a ka saya ɔ.
45010010	Koe min na mu, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi a, an mbe mmɔ ma mɔ tandenɛ n na a tena. Mmɔ 'a danaya chɛ sin, ni mmɔ‑a a ɔ yian den, an mbe na bauncha a mmɔ ko a.
45010011	Ɛ wan dechee yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa a a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee che‑a mau‑a.
45010012	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan chɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, tɛ bɔ ee Chu mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ mɔɛ n na miin nii ma Chu mɔɛ n na. Mansa Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an mbe mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a, a sin‑na mɔ ɔ mɔ dua wan chɛndɛ chɛ, mɔɛ min mbe a tɔɛ chee demanɛ ko a.
45010013	Ɛ ma wan yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn mbe Mansa Yataa chee‑a, basan koe a i ma, e bauncha ma sɔn‑da wan.
45010014	Chɛɛ mɔɛ n mbe ee kun, an ni a tɔɛ chee bauncha ko a, ni an ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a. Chɛɛ ni an ma Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ a min ni, an mbe ee che an kai fa chɛ chɛ a. An sin mbe ee kun, an ni sakana bai chɛ a min, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a fɔ ni an ye.
45010015	A sin to, sakana bai chɛ ɔ ee che yian‑da mɔɛ n na, ni Yataa ma mɔɛ n na fasan ni dunya ɔ, a ɔ yian koe a. A ni ma yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, mbɛ a ma kawaen mu kaka, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n mbe chia a, miin mbe na tena sakana bai chɛndɛ a.
45010016	Chɛɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, miin‑na an boo si sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ kɔɔ. Kai Aisaya wandi gbu na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Mansa Yataa, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma dan ni nn 'na sakana bai a, nn‑na min fɔ.”
45010017	Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan gbɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ n mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ min na min tena ka, an mbe a ma tena an mbe an kai fa tena Chisɔsi Chasi a. A sin to, mɔɛ n mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tena wan, mɔɛ n mbe min fɔ tena an ye a si Chisɔsi ma.
45010018	Chɛɛ chɛ ɛ ma wan tea a gbau gbau, mbɛ an na‑a sakana bai chɛ a min fan. Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a nyɛnden fan mu, mbɛ a wan Yataa 'a fenɛ miin gbɛɛ a dan, an‑na sakana bai chɛ fɔ wan. A yɛ to, an da a kuiɛ na‑a a fo wan dunya danka a.
45010019	A yɛ to, n mbe chɛ an fɔ tena, mbɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na‑a sakana bai chɛ gbu ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. Mosisi wandi gbu, a ni koɔ tena tima min na Yataa ko a, a pɛn na‑a chɛ fɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a, Yataa ɛ an na sɛ‑a wan, Chu mɔɛ n faa ni yɔn. Mbɛ an Chu mɔɛ n yɛ‑a, an faa bɔ‑a an mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin kunɛ ɔ bandenɛ ɛ.
45010020	Kai Aisaya nan gbu, a na‑a Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ wan faagbɛa wandi gbu a. A ɔ, Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, mɔɛ miin nii an ya a kan tena Yataa a, a ɔ, an fan‑na a yen. A ɔ, a wan Yataa sin na‑a a wandi yian fan chɛ n na, miin nii a wakoe ɔ tisa tena.
45010021	Chɛɛ min sien ni Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ma, Aisaya na‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ an sɔen fan mu Yataa a kan, a ɔ, an mbe ee kooya be tena Yataa ma. A ɔ, chɛɛ Yataa na‑a butuin chɛ wan a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, a ɔ, min mbe a ma, an ni ma faachima ɔ.
45011001	Chɛɛ n mbe chɛ an fɔ tena gbɛ. Yataa nii ma Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na yɛ ni a boo kɔ. A nii ma chɛ ma ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. N fandi gbu wɛɛ, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ mu n na. Ebeami an mu n bemba a. N bɔ‑a Bɛnchamin 'na dambi an dɔ.
45011002	Yataa ma ban ni a 'a mɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, a na‑a a boo sɔ ka miin ma kɛn suun, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na. Kai Idaicha na‑a gbonyɛ wan Yataa tena a si an ma. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ an disa chɛ tena chɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ.
45011003	A ɔ, “Mansa Yataa, an‑na kaina chɛ gbɛɛ yɔn, nn mbe i fai kaina min nu, an‑na i 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fa. N dɔndɔ gbe min bɛɛ toen mu an tɛ, an toen mu an ni n bɛɛ fa.”
45011004	Yataa na‑a a da a bai yɛman fan, a ɔ, mbɛ a dɔndɔ gbe ma dechee, a ɔ, a‑a mɔ wu wɔnfea n dɔ bɛn, a wandi ko a. A ɔ, an mu, an nii ma dɔn ni an ni fen chɛ fai, min nii ma Yataa a, fen chɛ min tɔ ni Bee.
45011005	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ɛ ka wan sanche wɛɛ. Chu mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma, miin‑na an kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a. An kuunden mbe wan nɔ, miin kun bɔ‑a a ɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a koadia demanɛ chɛ wan an na, mbɛ a‑a a boo sɔ an ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.
45011006	Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ an‑na a ma, a‑a a boo sɔ an ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na. A ee mɔ ya i chɛ chɛ wai an ko a. A mu min na, ni Yataa ni mɔ ya a ta mɔɛ a, mɔ chɛ chɛ wai an ko a, mbɛ mɔ ɛ a yen, a ee mɔɛ chɛ ya tena koadia demanɛ ta fɛ chia an na.
45011007	Fen mu to? Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma fen chɛ yen ni, an ni min yan tena, mɔɔ dechee mɔ kuunden chɛ nu, Yataa na‑a miin ya a ta mɔɛ n na, an fan na‑a a yen. Yataa na‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n‑na an boo don an too n dɔ, kɛn a ni an chee tena tima min na.
45011008	Ɛ ka wan dechee yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Yataa‑a an ma wan tindo. Aan a sɔ bi nyɔn tima ma, an ya ee che koe ɔ yen‑da, an ni a ɔ gbɛ ni fen mbe ma tena.”
45011009	Mansa Defidi na‑a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an fɔ suun, a ɔ, “Yataa ni gbai a sɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n ma,” a ɔ, “an ni chɛɛ a a, daun fen chɛ a, min mbe dia an da a.” A ɔ, “Yataa ni an na bea, a ni an tɔɔ.”
45011010	A ɔ, “Yataa ni a ma an ni fion, an ma kaina yen.” A ɔ, “Tima ɔ tima ko a, an kɔɛ bɔenɛ ni ma, an 'na tɔɔya kɔɔ.”
45011011	N mbe chɛ an fɔ tena gbɛ. Chu mɔɛ n na‑a nama wan, chɛɛ an nii ma bea chɛ ni, an mbe ee che an kɔɔ sɔ‑a min dɔ. Chɛ nii ma ma ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. An na‑a ko yama miin ma, an na‑a a ma mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na, an‑na bauncha ma sɔn. Chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni an na sɛ, Chu mɔɛ chɛ n faa ni yɔn.
45011012	Chu mɔɛ n na‑a ko yama min ma, an na‑a a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na bauncha wa ma sɔn, mɔɛ miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛɛ ni Chu mɔɛ n bɛɛ‑a bauncha chɛ ma sɔn gbɛ, ɛ ma‑a gbɛ ko ma kawaen ba an na, a ka Yataa tena.
45011013	N mbe chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ tena wo wan ko a, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a. N mu ka buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ a, wo ko a, n bu ɔ diama mu tima ɔ tima ko a, n 'na wai chɛ koe a. N ni chɛ ma din ka wo tena. Ka wɛ n mbe koɔ gbɛ wo tena, wo wan mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔɛ n na. Tima min na wɛ n mbe Chisɔsi 'a sɔ dencha ɔ wo ko a, n bu ɔ diama mu, wai chɛ ɔ.
45011014	Kɔkɔɛ chɛ ɛ che‑a wan a ma‑a, n ta mɔɛ nu, miin mu Chu n na, n ni a ma toomaya ni chɛ an faa ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an dɔ n ni bauncha ma sɔn.
45011015	Koe min na mu, Yataa na‑a ban an dɔ tima min na, mɔɛ tɔɛ nu dunya ɔ, an na‑a ma wan a dia nyɔɛ n na. Chɛ ma‑a wɛɛ, Yataa ɛ a boo a si‑a to kɛn an kɔɔ, ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ ni mɔɛ fa‑a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ.
45011016	Ni chin fenɛ gbɔɛ saa a be‑a Yataa ma, mbɛ a tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a Yataa ta a. A sin to, ni kɔnɛ suu be‑a Yataa ma, an kɔnɛ gbu bonɛ n gbɛɛ ma‑a Yataa ta a.
45011017	A maen fan mu ka gbɛ yɔ an kɔn chɛ bonɛ dɔ n ka‑a a ma, mbɛ fia kɔnɛ dɔ gbɛɛ bonɛ ya a, mbɛ a chii‑a kɔnɛ bonɛ chɛ gba ɔ. Fia kɔn chɛ ɛ ka gbɛ kana‑a kɔn chɛ a tifa an dɔ. Wo wan mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, wo e ka wan. Wo e ka gbɛ kana‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na tifa an dɔ Yataa tena, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mu Chu mɔɛ n na.
45011018	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma yonka tɛ an na. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, chɛ ni ma wo 'a yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ wo wan mbe ee a be tena an ma, chɛɛ an fan mbe an fandi kɔ tena, ni wo wɛɛ.
45011019	Chɛɛ wo dɔ nu, wo e a fɔ‑a wan, wo ɔ, tea mu a a. Wo ɔ, mbɛ an ka‑a kɔnɛ kuu ba ma, min mbe a ma, wo ni chii an gba n dɔ.
45011020	Tea gbu mu chɛ a. Chɛɛ an ma danɛ min chɛ ni Yataa a, an‑na a ma, an wagban‑da a ma. Wo tana sin, wo chii‑a gban a ma, koe min na mu, wo danda a a. Chɛɛ wo ma dɔpandaya bɔ, a si chɛ ma. Wo e min ma, chianɛ ni ma wo ɔ Yataa ko a.
45011021	Ni Yataa ma kaa ni Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ka‑a a ma, miin mbe yɔ kɔnɛ bonɛ wandi gbu, a ee che‑a a to‑a a ɔ wo wɛɛ ye. Chɛ ee che ma‑a.
45011022	Chɛ ɛ kun fan a ni a ɔ yian wo a, Yataa sɔnɛ nyin buɛ min dɔ, a yɛ to, a faa a kɔɔen mu buɛ min dɔ. A ee chinchin‑da chɛ n ma, miin‑na an kan kɔ sɔ a a, chɛɛ ɛ chinchin‑da wan wo ma, wo wɛn mbe a a tun‑da wo kai fa koe a a a, a wɛn sɔnɛ nyin. Chɛɛ ni wo ma wo kai fa ni a a, Yataa ɛ wo wɛɛ bonɛ n ka‑a ka wan a ma.
45011023	A sin ni an bun‑da an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi a, an mbe chii‑a wan to kɔnɛ kuu ba ma. Yataa ɛ kun fan a ni chɛ ma an ko a.
45011024	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wan, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔɛ n na, wo e ka wan yɔ wodifi min mbe nyan a wandi ko a. Wo ka‑a wan a ma, mbɛ wo chii‑a kɔn dɔ gbɛɛ ma min chin‑da. Koe ma chɛ a, min mbe ma tee. Chu mɔɛ n sin tana, an mbe wan yɔ wodifi kɔn chɛ, min chin‑da ka. Ni an kɔn chɛ bonɛ ka‑a a ma, a ɔ ee gbɛa Yataa boo ɔ, an kɔn bon chɛ‑a yɛ koe a, a gba ɔ.
45011025	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, tea ɛ wan nɔ, min dɔ nunden mu wo ma tee. N toen mu, n ni an tea chɛ an dɔ yian wo a. Ni wo sin‑na a ɔ gbɛ, wo ee a a tun‑da dɔpanda bɔ koe a. An tea gbu yen ko gbɛ. Chu mɔɛ n sɛsɛ na‑a tooɔgbɛa bɔ wan, dan koe a Yataa a. An sin mbe to‑a an tooɔgbɛa chɛ an dɔ aan, mbɛ wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, wo‑a wo kai fa Yataa a. Wo gbɛɛ, Yataa na‑a a boo sɔ ka wo ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.
45011026	Yataa sin mbe Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ baun‑da ka wan. Ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ a wan Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min mbe mɔ gbɛɛ kun ka‑a, ɛ bɔ‑a Sayɔn duu ɔ wan.” A ɔ, “Ɛ a ma‑a wan, Chekɔpi cheeya nu, ko yama ma ni bɔ an faa ɔ.”
45011027	Mbɛ Yataa ɔ te to a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Chɛ sin fan mbe ma‑a n 'na dɔbɛnɛ ɔ, an bɛ an na, tima min na n mbe n boo bɔ‑a an 'na ko yama n dɔ.”
45011028	Chu mɔɛ n ban‑da wan Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ, min‑na an ma Yataa chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n na. Chɛ ma min chɛ‑a, wo‑a a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn fan. Chɛɛ chia dɔndɔɛ a, Yataa‑a a yian fan, mbɛ a toen mu Chu mɔɛ n na. Koe min na mu, a na‑a an bemba n ta bemba n too ɔ dia wan chɛndɛ chɛ.
45011029	Koe min na mu, ni Yataa ban‑da a boo sɔ‑a mɔɛ miin ma, a ban‑da a sɔ‑a an ma. Ni a‑a mɔɛ miin dua, a ban‑da an dua‑a. A ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn.
45011030	Wo nan sin, wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, wo na‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ yɔn fan tee. Chɛɛ Chu mɔɛ n‑na Yataa da a kuiɛ min yɔn, an mbe a ma tena ka gbɛ, a wan Yataa ɛ chinchin‑da wo ma.
45011031	An ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an maen mu ka wo ta wɛ ɔ. Wo na‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ bɔ wan a ɔ, chɛɛ a chinchin‑da wan wo ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chu mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe a da a kuiɛ yɔn tena, min‑na a ma, a chinchin‑da an bɛɛ ma.
45011032	Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a ɔ gbɛ wan, mbɛ mɔ gbu gbɛɛ‑a a da a kuiɛ bɔ a ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, Yataa‑a a ma, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe pimbi chenɛ a. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a ni chinchincha yian mɔ gbu gbɛɛ a.
45011033	O Yataa wa. A 'a yiimatɛ koo. A 'a ko sɔnɛ wɛɛ koo ka wan to. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a yii ma koe ɔ yian‑da. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a chɛ chɛ wai ɔ gbɛ.
45011034	A sin gbu, Yataa 'a gboo gbu‑a a fɔ ka wan mbɛ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma Mansa Yataa yiima sɔn, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che Yataa a si‑a.
45011035	Mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a wai nyima ee a ma, mɔ ee nɔ, ɛ min ta wai nyima a yɛ.”
45011036	A yen ko o, Yataa an‑na fen kɔ fen na dan. Fen kɔ fen, min mbe dunya chɛ ɔ, Yataa an mbe a ma an mbe nɔ. Fen kɔ fen dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe nɔ, Yataa tando koe an na. Dua ni ma a tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
45012001	N bɔ Chisianɛ nu, Yataa 'a chinchincha koo mmɔ tena. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo disa tena, min mbe a ma, wo ni wo wandi be a 'a wai ko a. Wo ni ma tenchen an ko a. Wo wo fɔɛ gbɛɛ be a ma, wo ni ma yasi a a ko a, min mbe na faachima a a tena. Chia chɛndɛ gbu sin mu chɛ an na, Yataa fai koe a.
45012002	Wo ma a a tun koe n ma koe a, dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n mbe miin ma. Chɛɛ wo faa an dɔ, Yataa ni wo mun, mbɛ a‑a yiima nama chɛndɛ chɛndɛ be wo ma. A tima chɛ a mu, wo e kun‑da wo ni a ɔ sɔn, Yataa toen mu koe miin na. Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, koe miin nyin Yataa tena, a yɛ to, mabɔ ee miin ma, an sin mbe a faa chima wan.
45012003	N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, Yataa‑a min chɛ n ye, koe min na mu a chinchin‑da wan n ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe chɛ fɔ tena wo gbɛɛ ye, mbɛ wo ma wo wandi a sɛ, a ni ben wo e buɛ min dɔ.
