Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo tea yiinachii chɛ, a si wo wandi ma. A sin, wo yiinachii chɛ, Yataa‑a min chɛ wo ye, a mu min na, wo‑a wo kai fa a a.
45012004	Chɛ ɛ wan yɔ mɔ gbu gboo, mmɔ sɔna n da a koo a ma. Mmɔ sɔna chɛ n sin gbɛɛ mbe wai chɛ dama dama.
45012005	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mmɔ kɔkoo wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo Chisiancha chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ a mmɔ bɛ Chasi a. A yɛ to, mmɔ‑a tun tunden fan mu, mmɔ nyɔn na.
45012006	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa‑a koadia demanɛ chɛ mmɔ a. A‑a mmɔ gbɛɛ kɔ wan mmɔ ta chia n na. Mmɔ wɛn, Yataa‑a mmɔ kɔ a 'a bai sa koe a mɔɛ n tena, mmɔ a sa danaya ɔ min nyɔn sima ɛ mmɔ ɔ.
45012007	Ni Yataa‑a yiimatɛ chɛ mmɔ ɔ, basan koe an na mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n ma, mmɔ basan an ma chɛndɛ chɛ. Ni an kan koe mu, mmɔ an kan chɛndɛ chɛ.
45012008	Ni an faa ma nande koe mu chɛndɛ chɛ, mmɔ a ma ka. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n deman‑da, a ni an deman a faa gbɛɛ a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma‑a gbasaya ɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ni wai chɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. A sin, ko chɛndɛ ma faa ɛ mɔɛ min dɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ma a ya kɔɔɛ sisi, ni a ma‑a an ko chɛndɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n na.
45012009	Ni i bɔɛ ko a dia‑a i ye, a ko a ni dia i ye i faa gbɛɛ a. Wo ma to ko yama a, chɛɛ wo ko chɛndɛ ma an bia wo boo fea a.
45012010	Wo to wo nyɔn na chɛndɛ chɛ wo faa gbɛɛ a, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ to buɛ min dɔ a suun ma nyɔɛ n na. A sin, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma basɔmaya be koe a wo nyɔn ma, tima ɔ tima ko a.
45012011	Wo ma ma gboo ɔ fa tɔɛ n na, wo wai chɛ wo sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Wo wo wandi be Mansa Yataa ma, wo ni a 'a wai chɛ wo faa gbɛɛ a.
45012012	Wo ma buɔdia ɔ, tima ɔ tima ko a. Koe min na mu, wo yii na tɛ tena ɛ wan. Ni yakɔɔtawa‑a wo tan, wo wo faa bia. A sin, wo samunɛ chɛ tima ɔ tima ko a.
45012013	Ni Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma‑a yakɔɔtawa ɔ, an kɔ i boo fenɛ dɔ ɔ. Ni ben sonda na‑a i waa tima ɔ tima ko a, i boo si a kɔɔ i 'a chenɛ a.
45012014	Ni mɔɛ n‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa wo ma, wo Yataa ɔ tisa, a ni an dua. Wo a ma ka wan gbu. Wo a ɔ tisa, a ni an dua, chɛɛ wo ma a ɔ tisa, a ni an danka.
45012015	Mɔɛ miin mbe buɔdia ɔ, wo bɛ ni an buɔdia bɔ an na. Mbɛ miin mbe chinchin di chɛ‑a, wo‑a an kan dɔ bia.
45012016	Wo wo boo a si wo nyɔn kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ. Wo ma ma dɔpanda tɔɛ n na. Baa ee ka mɔɛ miin ma, wo an ma wo dia nyɔɛ n na. Wo ma wo ta mansaencha a sɛ kaka.
45012017	Ni mɔɛ n‑na ko yama ma wo a, wo ma wo ta a yɛ ko yama a. Chɛɛ wo butuin chɛ, wo ni koe n ma, miin ma ɛ kawa mɔ ɔ mɔ ya a.
45012018	Wo ta nan gbu, wo butuin chɛ chia ɔ chia a, wo ni ma faachima ɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
45012019	N dia nyɔɛ nu, ni mɔɛ n‑na ko yama ma wo a, wo ma wo ta a yɛ an ma. Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo an to nɔ, Yataa wandi ni kaa a tɛ. Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu a 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ a wan Yataa ɛ ta ɔ nyɔnɛ chɛ‑a wan, ko yama chɛ n ko a, an‑na miin ma.
45012020	Chɛ an fɛ mu, yɔ Yataa 'a gboo chɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, wo e a ma ka wan. A ɔ, “Ni kɔnkɔɛ ma‑a wo ko don ma nyɔɛ n na, wo daun fenɛ be an ma. Ni an kanɛ n na gbaaenɛ ma‑a, wo min yii be an ma. Koe min na mu, wo e ma‑a chɛ ma‑a, wo e ma‑a ka an mɔɛ chɛ n na mau‑a wan kaka.”
45012021	Ko yama ni ma i a boo ɔ boo, chɛ ma a ma, i wɛɛ ni ko yama ma. Chɛɛ ko chɛndɛ an ma, i chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n bɛɛ a.
45013001	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ni kooya be mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mu ka ya ɔ sɔɛ n na. Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee gbasaya ma sɔn, ni Yataa ma dɔn ni a ye. A sin, mɔɛ miin mbe gbasaya ɔ ka, Yataa an‑na a be an ma.
45013002	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ban‑da kooya be koe a ya ɔ sɔɛ ma, a mɔɛ chɛ‑a Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ an kɔɔsa bia ka. Mɔɛ min sin mbe chɛ ma‑a, ɛ na‑a gbɛmbo an na a wandi kun ma.
45013003	Koe min na mu, ko chɛndɛ ma mɔ ee chian ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma. Chɛɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ n fan mbe chian ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma. Ni i ma to ni chianɛ ni ma i ɔ ya ɔ sɔɛ n ko a, mbɛ ko chɛndɛ ma. Chɛ an mbe a ma an ni i tando.
45013004	Koe min na mu, ya ɔ sɔɛ mu Yataa 'a yɔnɛ an na, min mbe wai chɛ koe a i ko a, i ni baka. Chɛɛ ni i‑a ko yama ma, chian ya ɔ sɔɛ ma. Koe min na mu, gbasaya ɛ wan a boo ɔ i tɔɔya koe a. Yataa 'a yɔnɛ mu ya ɔ sɔɛ kan kɔ kan na, an fan mbe a 'a kaa a tɛ, an ni ko yama ma mɔɛ n tɔɔ.
45013005	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ya ɔ sɔɛ n da a kuiɛ a min. Wo tɔɔya koe dechee ma a ma, wo ni an da a kuiɛ a min. Chɛɛ wo yiima wandi gbu ni a fɔ wo ye, mbɛ a nyin fan wo ni a ma ka.
45013006	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, wo wo 'a pawa n bɛɛ chɛ. Koe min na mu, a nyin kɔmende wai chɛ mɔɛ n ni an 'na pawa ma sɔn. Chɛ an mbe a ma, an gboo ɔ ee fa‑a wai chɛ chɛ koe a, Yataa‑a an sɔ min chɛ a.
45013007	Ni mɔɛ n ta ma‑a wo ma, wo a be an ma. Ni chɛnyɛ pawa kan kɔ kan mbe wan nɔ, wo ma min chɛ nin bɛ, wo a chɛ. A sin to, ya ɔ sɔɛ n gbɛɛ, wo basɔmaya be an ma, a basan kooya a.
45013008	Mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a kuiɛ ma to wo ma kuɔ fɔ. Kuiɛ min mbe ma dechee wo ma, an nɛ koadia a. Koadia ni ma wo faa n dɔ, wo nyɔn ko a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe to‑a a fian mɔ gbu a, a mɔɛ chɛ don‑da ka sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ fan kɔɔ, Yataa 'a sawa chɛ nu.
45013009	Yataa‑a sawa miin be Mosisi ma, an dɔ, wo ma waa ma basan mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na. A yɛ to, wo ma mɔ fa, ni sawa ma min fɔ ni. A sin, wo ma kanka chɛ, wo sin ma kawa mɔ dɔ mende n boo fenɛ n ma, an ma koe a wo ta n na. Sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ, an basan dɔ mende n na, an kuiɛ bɛnden mu sawa kun dɔndɔɛ chɛ an ma, mbɛ wo ni to wo 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo wandi n na.
45013010	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu a fian mɔ gbu n na, a ee ko yama ma an na. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ to koe mmɔ nyɔn na, an mu sawa gbu gbɛɛ kun tɛ a.
45013011	N‑na koe miin fɔ ka wo ye, an ma koe a, wo an ma. Koe min na mu, wo‑a tima sɔn fan sanche, mmɔ ɛ tima min kɔɔ. Tima an nɛ gbɛ, wo ni kunɛ chinɔɛ ɔ, wo e min dɔ. Koe min na mu, tima min na mmɔ ɛ bauncha ma sɔn‑da, an tima chɛ ɔ ma yansan to mmɔ a. A gbɛnden mu gbɛ, a ni ben tima saa ma, tima min na mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi a.
45013012	Banda ɔ ka tena wan gbɛ, a ɔ ma yansan to tee bɔ‑a. A nyin fan mmɔ ni sɛmbɛ koe chɛ n ma koe a, pimbi ɔ ko yama chɛ nu. Mbɛ mmɔ‑a butuin chɛ feanka chɛ n ya, mmɔ ɛ butuinɛ chɛ‑a miin na tee a den.
45013013	Mmɔ a kuu sɔ tachɛ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ mmɔ wandi a, fɔɛ ɔ. Wo a ma yɔ mɔɛ nu miin mbe koe n na tachɛ tena chɛndɛ tee a. A yɛ to, wo ma wo boo chɛ gbɛ min kɔmpini ɔ, a basan ko tɛ gbɛɛ a. A sin, wo ma butuin chɛ, wo sin ma too wo nyɔn na.
45013014	Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo to mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi kɔ, a ni butuinɛ chɛ wo ko a. Wo sɛmbɛ wo yiima a ta koe a wo faa ma koe yama chɛ n tena, bea koe a an fɛ.
45014001	Wo wo boo a si wo bɔɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, wo tɛ ɔ, miin 'na Chisian danaya ɔ ma gbɛ. Chɛɛ wo ma wo da a kuiɛ ɔ fan an na, a si koe n ma, miin nyin an ma koe a an boo ɔ, a basan miin ma nyin an ma koe a.
45014002	Mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin 'na Chisian danaya ɔ gbɛ, an daun fen tɛ bɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee. Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin 'na Chisian danaya ɔ ma gbɛ, an mbe chin fenɛ dechee an daun.
45014003	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin daun fen tɛ bɔɛ ee, an ma an kunɛ dɛn chɛ n kun ma, miin mbe an daun fenɛ tɛ bɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ to, miin mbe an daun fenɛ tɛ bɔ, an ma kaa a tɛ, an ni a fɔ, mbɛ miin mbe ee an daun fen tɛ bɔ, an mbe ko yama an ma ka. Koe min na mu, Yataa ma a boo bɔ ni an mɔɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, miin daun fen tɛ bɔ ee ka.
45014004	Yataa 'a yɔnɛ n fan nɛ, i wan ta ma an na. Gbasaya kan kɔ kan mbe ee i boo ɔ, kaa a tɛ koe a mɔ dɔ mende a yɔnɛ sɔnɛ ma. Gbasaya ɛ an yɔnɛ chɛ kun ti an boo ɔ, kaa a tɛ koe a a sɔn chɛndɛ ma, a basan a yama a. A sin, an yɔnɛ chɛ chenɛ ɛ sɔ‑a wan gban, koe min na mu, Mansa Yataa an mbe a ma‑a a ni sɔ.
45014005	A yɛ to, ɛ ma wan mɔɛ dɔ n yii ma, mbɛ tee ɛ wan nɔ, min benden mu tee tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma Yataa tena. Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n ta yiima ɔ, tee gbɛɛ a kanden fan mu, dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma ben ni a nyɔn ma. Mɔɛ si tena fea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni yiinachii chɛ a wandi ko a.
45014006	An mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe a ma tena, mbɛ tee ɛ wan nɔ, min mu tee wa a, an mɔɛ chɛ n mbe chɛ ma tena Mansa Yataa 'a basɔmaya an ko a. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin daun fen tɛ bɔ ee, an bɛɛ an mbe ma ka chɛ ma‑a Mansa Yataa 'a basɔmaya an ko a. Koe min na mu, daun fenɛ kan kɔ kan, an ni ma a daun‑da, an mbe Yataa wai bɔ pɛn, a be koe a an ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe an daun fenɛ tɛ bɔ, an bɛɛ ɛ ma ka basɔmaya be‑a Mansa Yataa an ma. Koe min na mu, an mbe ma ban‑da daun fen kan kɔ kan dɔ, an mbe Yataa wai bɔ wan, a ma koe a an ni ban a ɔ.
45014007	Mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma ma ben‑da, mmɔ kun ye. A yɛ to, fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma fa mmɔ kun ye.
45014008	Ni mmɔ ma‑a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni ma ɔ Mansa Yataa ko a. Ni mmɔ fa‑a wɛɛ tima min na, mmɔ ni fa Mansa Yataa 'a gbee a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mmɔ fɔɛ chɛ ni ma mmɔ ɔ, chɛ ma, mmɔ ni fa wan, Mansa Yataa an ta mu mmɔ a.
45014009	Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi Chasi fa‑a wan, mbɛ a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. Chɛ na‑a ma, min mbe a ma, a ni ma mansa a mmɔ gbɛɛ ko a, mmɔ wan chɛndɛ ba nu, mmɔ bɛ fuɛ n na.
45014010	Wo dɔ nu, wo ma kaa a tɛ, wo bɔ Chisianɛ n ma, ko yama ma koe a. A sin to, wo dɔ n bɛɛ, wo ma wo kunɛ dɛn wo bɔ Chisianɛ n kun ma. Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ sɔ‑a wan Yataa chen kɔɔ tee dankama tee ma, a ni kaa a tɛ mmɔ wakoe ma.
45014011	Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Mansa Yataa ɔ te, ɛ ka buɛ min dɔ fɔɛ a fɛ‑a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ kumbai gbangban‑da wan a chen kɔɔ. A sin, mɔɛ gbɛɛ, an mbe a fɔ‑a wan, mbɛ a wan mu Yataa a.
45014012	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ, dɔndɔ, dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan Yataa a, mmɔ ɛ wai min chɛ‑a dunya chɛ ɔ.
45014013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ sɛmbɛ kaa a tɛ koe a, mmɔ bɔ Chisianɛ n bakoe ma, ko yama ma koe ko a. Chɛɛ wo e chɛ an ma. Wo ma koe ma, min mbe a ma, wo bɔɛ n ni ka Yataa 'a chia ma.
45014014	N fan, nn fea Mansa Chisɔsi a, nn ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na a sɔn fan, tea tea ko a, mbɛ daun fen kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, mmɔ ɛ min daun, min ma nyamuien mu Yataa tena. Chɛɛ ni mɔ gbu dan‑da a a, mbɛ fenɛ ma nyin a daun koe a, an fen chɛ, mbɛ a ma nyamui‑a Yataa tena, a daun koe a an mɔɛ chɛ boo ɔ.
45014015	Ni e daun fenɛ min daun, a ee na buɔdia a i bɔɛ Chisianɛ n tena, mbɛ koadia an mbe ee ka i faa ɔ an ko a. Koe min na mu, a ma nyin e daun fenɛ min daun, a ni mɔɛ n kasaa, Chasi fa‑a mɔɛ miin ko a.
45014016	Fenɛ min nyin i ta yiima ɔ, i ma a ma, mɔ dɔ mende n ni a yen fen yama a.
45014017	Koe min na mu, mmɔ ɛ fenɛ miin daun, mmɔ ɛ miin min, an fan mbe ee Yataa ma mmɔ 'a mansa a. Chɛɛ a kuu si mu tan koe an na a tena, ni faachima, a basan buɔdia chɛ a, Yataa Nyina ɛ min be mmɔ ma.
45014018	A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe wai chɛ a buɛ chɛ ɔ ka Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, ɛ ma‑a Yataa faa ma koe an na, mɔɛ n bɛɛ bu ɔ dia‑a wan a mɔɛ chɛ ko a.
45014019	Chɛ an fɛ mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, mmɔ butuin chɛ an koe chɛ n fan ma koe a. Koe chɛ nu, miin mbe na faachima a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, an sin mbe a ma to, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ nyɔn dɔ gbɛa, mmɔ 'a danaya ɔ Yataa a.
45014020	Daun fenɛ gbɛɛ, Yataa‑a min na bɔ, a nyin fan mɔ gbu ni an daun. Chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ mɔ gbu ɛ daun fenɛ gbɛɛ an daun. Ni mɔɛ‑a a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a daun fenɛ ma nyin mɔ dɔ mende ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ ma an daun fen chɛ nɛnɛ daun, a ma na an mɔɛ chɛ ka Yataa 'a chia ma. A ma nyin ɛnden bɛɛ a, mmɔ daun fenɛ ni a ma Yataa boo gba ma ni yɔn.
45014021	A nyin wo ni dasi chɛ n na min, ni an fan mbe a ma, wo ee mɔ dɔ mende n ka‑a Yataa 'a chia ma. Wo ma soe daun, a sin wo ma gbɛ min. A yɛ to, wo ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma, min mbe a ma, wo bɔ Chisianɛ n bɛɛ ni ka Yataa 'a chia ma.
45014022	Ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan, wo danden mu min na, a si koe chɛ n ma, a ni ma dechee wo tɛ ɔ, wo bɛ Yataa an na. A sin, mɔɛ min yii a koen mu, a si a chɛ chɛ wai ma, a duaenɛ an mbe ma.
45014023	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ sin, sika ɛ min dɔ, a daun fenɛ wakoe a, danaya ee a mɔɛ chɛ ɔ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan a mɔɛ chɛ wakoe ma, a ni tɔɔ. Koe min na mu, ko ɔ ko mɔ ɛ min ma, danaya ee min dɔ, ko yama ma mu a a.
45015001	Mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ wɛn 'na danaya Yataa a, a ɔ gbɛ gbechen, mmɔ faa ma gbaa dechee mmɔ wandi an deman koe a. Chɛɛ mmɔ mɔɛ chɛ n deman, miin 'na Chisian danaya ɔ ma gbɛ.
45015002	A nyin mmɔ ni chɛ an ma. Koe min na di an ye, min mu an faa ma koe a, mmɔ an koe chɛ an chɛ mmɔ bɔ Chisianɛ n ye. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, an 'na fiienɛ ee ma‑a.
45015003	Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi wandi gbu wɛɛ, a nii a wandi faa ma koe n fan ma. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ, a si a ma, a ɔ, “Main chɛ, mɔɛ n‑na min chɛ Yataa a, an‑na a chɛ ka n fan na.”
45015004	Koe min na mu, bai miin gbɛɛ mbe Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, an nyɛnden mu mmɔ wan ko a, mmɔ kan koe a. Koe min na mu, gboo chɛ ɛ mmɔ faa ma nande wan, mbɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ faa bia gban Yataa 'a wai ɔ, yiinatɛ ni ma mmɔ ɔ.
45015005	Yataa an mbe mmɔ faa ma nande, a sin fan mbe a ma to mmɔ ɛ mmɔ faa bia. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa ni a ma wo ni sɔ Chasi chen gba ɔ, faachima ni ma wo ɔ wo nyɔn ko a.
45015006	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo yiima ni ma kaina dɔndɔɛ, wo kuiɛ ni ma dɔndɔ, wo ni tando be Yataa ma. A wan mu mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa.
45015007	Wo wo boo si wo nyɔn kɔɔ, yɔ Chasi‑a a boo si buɛ min dɔ wo kɔɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a mɔɛ n ni tando be Yataa ma.
45015008	A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a na dunya chɛ ɔ, ma koe an na yɔnɛ a Chu mɔɛ n ko a. A na‑a chɛ ma, koe an dɔ yian koe an na, mbɛ Yataa tanden mu. An ni a ɔ yen, Yataa na‑a tooɔdia min chɛ an bemba n ta bemba n na, a ni bɔ a a.
45015009	A ni a ma to, mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an ni Yataa tando a 'a chinchimaya ko a. A nyɛnden mu ka wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ, “Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe tando be‑a i tɔɛ ma, mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin ma Chu mɔ a, n mbe i tɔɛ sa‑a wan si a.”
45015010	Gboo chɛ na‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “Chu mɔ ma wo wɛn na, wo buɔdia bɔ. Wo a bɔ, wo bɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, Chu mɔɛ chɛ nu.”
45015011	A ɔ te to, “Wo wɛn ma Chu mɔ a, wo tando be Mansa Yataa ma. Mɔɛ gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, wo a tando.”
45015012	Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ Aisaya na‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, mɔ dɔndɔ ɛ bɔ‑a wan kai Chɛsi 'a dambi ɔ. A ɔ, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ma‑a wan, a ɔ, a ni ma mansa a, a ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma ka Chu mɔ a. A ɔ, an sin mbe an yii na tɛ‑a wan a ma gbae.
45015013	Yataa, min‑na yiinatɛ chɛ be, a ni buɔdia be wo ma. Yataa, a ni faachima be wo ma. A ni koe chɛ n ma wo ye, koe min na mu, wo kai faen mu an na. Yiinatɛ chɛ ma ni mun‑da wo ɔ kaka, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ.
45015014	N bɔ Chisianɛ nu, n fandi gbu wɛɛ danden fan mu a a, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ wa mu wo wɛɛ gbu a. Wo‑a wo boo nyima tɛ bɔɛ sɔn fan wo manɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e dasi be buɛ min dɔ wo nyɔn ma.
45015015	Chɛɛ gboo chɛ ɔ, n ma ko ɔ ko ɔ nun ni wo ma, a si koe dɔ n ma, wo na‑a miin na min tee. Yataa 'a dua an na‑a a ma, n‑na n faa gbɛa bai chɛ n fɔ koe a.
45015016	A‑a a boo sɔ wan n ma, ma koe a Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ a, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, miin ma ka Chu mɔ a. N mbe wai chɛ wan an ye, yɔ Yataa 'a tɛ mɔɛ. N mbe Yataa 'a sakana bai sa wan an tena. Chɛ ɛ ma, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo si an kɔɔ, yɔ yasi miin mbe tenchen a ko a. An ni ma yasi chɛ a, Yataa Nyina wandi gbu‑a min be tenchen a ma.
45015017	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n mbe Chisɔsi Chasi a sɛ, chia ɔ chia a, min sien mu Yataa ma.
45015018	N mbe ee chian ɛnden bɛɛ a, bai sa koe a, a si Chasi chɛ chɛ wai n fan ma dechee. Chisɔsi‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ miin ma ka Chu mɔ a, n‑na a ma an na kooya be Yataa ma. Chɛ bɔ‑a n da a bai n fan dɔ, a basan n chɛ chɛ wai n na.
45015019	A yɛ to, a bɔ‑a to koe n tɔmɔsi gbau gbau n dɔ, a basan kamaya koe wa n na, n‑na miin ma. A sin, Yataa Nyina‑a gbasaya be n ma koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma koe a. A sin chia chɛ a mu, Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a si Chasi ma, n‑na a sa wan kan kɔ kan, a ka Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, a ta Idiikɔn chɛnyɛ ɔ.
45015020	Tima ɔ tima ko a, n toen mu ko dɔndɔ gbe an ma koe a. An koe chɛ mu Chisɔsi 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ sa koe an na, kaina kan kɔ kan mɔɛ n tena miin nii ma a min ni tee. Koe min na mu, n ma to ni, mɔ dɔ mende 'a wai min kuu sɔ, n ni an na ban.
45015021	Yataa 'a gboo wɛɛ‑a a fɔ wan, a si Chisɔsi ma, a ɔ, “A nii ma a fɔ ni miin ye wɛ, an mbe a yen‑da wan. Chɛ n bɛɛ, miin nii ma a wakoe a min ni, an mbe a wakoe ɔ gbɛ‑a wan.”
45015022	Wai chɛ n koo n boo ɔ, a chɛ koe a. An mbe a ma tena, tima sɛsɛ ko a, ni n toen mu n ni che wo ma, n mbe ee kun.
45015023	Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, wai min ni n boo ɔ a chɛ koe a nɛ ta‑a, n ban‑da a chɛ‑a gbae. A sin‑na san sɛsɛ ya, kɛn wo yen sɔɛ‑a n bia.
45015024	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n toen mu n ni na gbɛ, n ni wo yen. N mbe ma‑a ta‑a Sipen chɛnyɛ ɔ, n mbe ben‑da wan wo tena chia a, n ni wo yen. Ni n‑na tima ɛnden ya wo tena, buɔdia ɔ, mbɛ wo basan‑da n ma ben koe a Sipen chɛnyɛ ɔ.
45015025	N ni chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ wɛɛ, chɛɛ n mbe gbɛ sanche chia a ta koe a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ wan. N mbe ta tena nɔ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n 'na wai an dɔ.
45015026	Koe min na mu, chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ nu Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an bɛ Akaya chɛnyɛ ɔ nɛnɛ n bɛɛ a, an‑na an boo fenɛ a bɔ faaɔgbɛ ɔ. An toen mu an ni chɛ n deman, miin yakɔɔtawaen mu Yataa 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
45015027	An fandi gbu an si‑a, an‑na an yii na chii chɛ ma koe a. Chɛɛ tea gbu ko a, a gbu dinden fan mu an ma a ma koe a ka. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a dua min chɛ Chu mɔɛ n na, an na‑a a du wan, an‑na mɔɛ chɛ n kɔ miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni Yataa‑a boo fenɛ be an bɛɛ ma, an mbe Chu mɔɛ n bɛɛ kɔ wan.
45015028	N‑na an kɔpɔɛ chɛ ma kain fan, n sin mbe ka an be‑a an ma. Ni n ban‑da a be‑a an ma gbae, n mbe na‑a wan. N mbe bɔ‑a wo tena chia wan, mbɛ n ta‑a Sipen.
45015029	N mbe na‑a wan, mbɛ n‑na a ma, wo‑a dua da faenɛ ma sɔn gban. Dua chɛ, Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ min be.
45015030	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi an ta mu mmɔ a. A sin, Yataa Nyina‑a koadia chɛ mmɔ ɔ mmɔ nyɔn ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo disa tena, mmɔ ni chɛɛ chɛ chɛ. Wo Yataa fai n ko a.
45015031	Wo samunɛ chɛ n ko a, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ miin ma dan ni ka Chisɔsi Chasi a Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ma na ko yama ma n na. A yɛ to, Yataa 'a mɔɛ miin mbe Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, n mbe demanɛ min chɛ‑a an na, an bu ɔ ni dia a ko a.
45015032	Chɛ ni a ma, Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, n ni na‑a wo tena, n bu ɔ diaenɛ ni ma. Ni n sin‑na wo tan, n mbe ma‑a wan faachima ɔ.
45015033	Yataa min mbe faachima be mmɔ ma, a boo ni ma wo kɔɔ. A ni ma ka.
45016001	N toen mu n ni a ɔ yian wo a, mbɛ mmɔ tensa musu min tɔ mu Fɔibe, min bɛɛ kai faen mu Chisɔsi Chasi a, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ wa mu a a. Ɛ demanɛ chɛ chɔchi chɛ an dɔ pan Sɛnkea duu ɔ.
45016002	Wo wo boo si a kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, yɔ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n mbe an nyɔn bia buɛ min dɔ. A sin, ni a toen mu basɔmaya kan kɔ kan na, wo a chɛ a a. Koe min na mu, a‑a ko chɛndɛ ma wan mɔ sɛsɛ a, a basan n bɛɛ a.
45016003	N bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu Chisɔsi ye, Pisida an fea Akuida a, n mbe an kɔndɔn tena kaka.
45016004	An ma chian ni an fɔɛ ko a, n bakoe a. An 'na wai bɔɛ ɛ wan n da a tima ɔ tima ko a. N dechee an mbe ee an wai bɔ tena, chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ miin ma ka Chu mɔ a, an 'na chɔchi n gbɛɛ.
45016005	N mbe chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ kɔndɔn tena, miin mbe bɛn n bɔɛ chɛ n na chenɛ a. N mbe n dia nyɔɛ Ɛpainɛtɔsi kɔndɔn tena. An mu mɔɛ saa saa a Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, min‑na a kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a.
45016006	N mbe Mɛi wɛɛ kɔndɔn tena, min bɛɛ‑a wai chɛ wo ko a a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a.
45016007	Andɔnikɔsi an fea Chunia, n mbe an bɛɛ kɔndɔn tena. N bɔ Chu mɔɛ n fan nɛ, nn bɛ ni miin na pimbi chenɛ a. Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ nu, an‑na an sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. An sin pɛn pɛn na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, n ya ɔ.
45016008	N mbe Ampiatɔsi wɛɛ kɔndɔn tena. N dia nyɔ chɛndɛ an nɛ, koe min na mu, a kai faen mu Mansa Chisɔsi a.
45016009	N mbe Wubanɔsi wɛɛ kɔndɔn tena. A wɛɛ mu mmɔ bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔ an na Chisɔsi Chasi ye. N mbe n dia nyɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛ wɛɛ kɔndɔn tena, min mu Sitakisi a.
45016010	N mbe Apɛdesi wɛɛ kɔndɔn tena. A‑a a ɔ yian fan a sɔnɛ ɔ, mbɛ ɛ Chisɔsi an ko a gbu. N mbe mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ kɔndɔn tena, miin mbe Ayisɔbudɔsi 'a chenɛ a.
45016011	N bɔ Chu mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, Ɛdɔdiɔn, n mbe a kɔndɔn tena. Chisian chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe Nasisɔsi 'a chenɛ a, n mbe an kɔndɔn tena.
45016012	N mbe Tifaina ni Tifosa n kɔndɔn tena. An mbe wai chɛ tena an sɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi an ye. N ni n dia nyɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ kɔndɔn min mu Pasisi a. A wɛɛ‑a wai chɛ wan a sɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi ye.
45016013	N mbe Dufɔsi wɛɛ kɔndɔn‑da. Mansa Chisɔsi fɛ mɔɛ gbau gbau wa mu a a. A de wɛɛ, ɛ n bia wan tima ɔ tima yɔ a 'a denɛ. N mbe a kɔndɔn tena.
45016014	N mbe mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ kɔndɔn tena. An fan nɛ, Asinkitɔsi, Fɛkon, Amesi, Patɔbasi ni Amasi, an bɛ Chisianɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bɛ ɛ miin na.
45016015	N mbe Fidɔɔkɔsi kɔndɔn tena, an fea Chudia a. N ni Neyɛɔsi kɔndɔn, an fea a tensa musu a. Mbɛ n‑na Wɔdimpasi kɔndɔn, a basan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, an bɛ ɛ miin na.
45016016	Ni wo bɛn‑da, mbɛ wo‑a wo nyɔn kɔndɔn koadia faa a. Chisian chɛ n gbɛɛ chɔchi tɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, an mbe wo gbɛɛ kɔndɔn tena ka.
45016017	N bɔ Chisianɛ nu, n mbe wo disa tena wo ni wo kun ma fɛn mɔɛ chɛ n boo ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe mɔɛ n dɔ fasan, an mbe sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔɛ a bea an tɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an bɔɛ n ka tea chia ma. A yɛ to, wo kan‑da ko chɛndɛ miin ma, an mɔɛ chɛ n mbe wo kan ko dɔ gbɛɛ n na, miin mbe ee a chia ma. Wo ma gbɛn an mɔ bonda chɛ n ma.
45016018	A mu min na, an mɔɛ chɛ nu miin mbe ko bonda chɛ n ma, an mbe ee ma ka mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi 'a wai an chɛ‑a. An gbɔsɔen mu dechee an faa ma koe n fan ko a. An da ɔ di, an sin mbe mɔɛ n yii a faa faa wan bai sɛsɛ a, mɔɛ miin woo koe ma gbɛ, mbɛ an‑na an bun.
45016019	Mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a min fan, wo kooen mu buɛ min dɔ Mansa Chisɔsi tena. Chɛ gbu sin‑na a ma, n bu ɔ dia‑a wo ko a kaka. N toen mu, fen kɔ fen min nyin, wo 'a yiimatɛ ni koa an ma koe a. Chɛɛ ko ɔ ko min yau, a yiima gbu ma ma wo ɔ a ma koe a.
45016020	A sin dɔ ee yansan tena to, Yataa min mbe faachima be mmɔ ma, mbɛ a kun‑da Sitana ma wo ko a. Mansa Chisɔsi ni wo dua.
45016021	Timoti, nn fea ɛ wai chɛ min na, a‑a wo kɔndɔn ka. N bɔɛ Chu mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, Dusiɔsi, ni Chason, ni Sosipata, an‑na wo kɔndɔn ka.
45016022	N fan, Tatiɔsi, n fɛn‑na Pɔɔ da a bai chɛ n nyɛn gboo chɛ ɔ, n bɛɛ n mbe wo kɔndɔn tena kaka, Chisian chia a.
45016023	N mbe mɔɛ min bɛɛ 'a sondaya a, chɔchi ɛ si to nɛ an 'na chenɛ a, kai Kayɔsi, ɛ wo kɔndɔn tena ka. Ɛyasitɔsi wɛɛ, min mbe kɔpɔɛ sa tena ɔ bɛn duu chɛ ko a, an fea mmɔ bɔɛ Chisianɛ Kuatɔsi a, an mbe wo kɔndɔn tena ka.
45016025	Mmɔ tando be Yataa ma. A wan mbe kun a ma‑a mmɔ gboo ɔ ee fa‑a, dan koe a a a. N mbe chɛ an fɔ wo ye, n mbe ma sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da wo a, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma. A sin fɔen mu ka wan ko ɔ nunden chɛ wɛɛ ɔ, min na bɔ‑a ya a ma. An tea ɔ nunden chɛ, Yataa nii ma a ma ni mɔ gbu ni fua min dɔ sɔn‑da san sɛsɛ sɛsɛ ko a suun.
45016026	Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na fenɛ miin nyɛn Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a‑a a ma wan mɔ sɛsɛ n‑na tea ko ɔ nunden chɛ ɔ sɔn. A sin, mɔɛ gbɛɛ dunya ma, an‑na an ko ɔ nunden chɛ ɔ sɔn gbɛ. Yataa Mansa, min mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be, an‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni an kai fa a a, mbɛ an‑na kooya be a ma.
45016027	Mmɔ Yataa tando kuɔ fɔ ko a. An mu dechee yiimatɛ koaenɛ dɛgbɛ ɛ min dɔ, a ni ben fen kɔ fen ma. Dua ni ma a tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ ko a, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ. A ni ma ka.
46001001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, nn fea Sositɛnesi a, mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ. Yataa wandi gbu, an dɔn‑da, a boo sɔ koe a n ma, n ni ma Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ a.
46001002	Nn mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, wo wan tena, wo wɛn mbe Yataa 'a chɔchi ɔ, Kɔyindi duu ɔ. Yataa na‑a wo wɛn chee, wo ni ma tenchen a ko a. Yataa‑a wo ma a ta mɔɛ n na, koe min na mu, a‑a wo ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a. A‑a a ma ka wan mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ chee tena, mmɔ 'a mansa, ni an 'na mansa, an baun koe a.
46001003	Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
46001004	N mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena wan wo ko a, tima ɔ tima. A sien mu koadia deman chɛ an ma, a‑a min chɛ wo a, wo wɛn mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a.
46001005	Wo ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ a a, a‑a wo kɔ wan chia a, a chenama ɔ. A‑a wo kɔ wan chia a, bai gbɛɛ ɔ, wo e min sa. A yɛ to, yiimatɛ kan kɔ kan ko a.
46001006	Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ nn‑na bai min fɔ wo ye, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma, mbɛ wo boo a sien mu a kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ.
46001007	Chɛ ko a, Yataa Nyina ɛ dua kan kɔ kan min mbe, koe n ma koe a, wo‑a an ma sɔn, wo e ta‑a mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi yɛ tima ma kɔn‑da.
46001008	Ɛ wo 'a danaya n dɔ gbɛa‑a wan, aan a sɔ tee danka chɛ ma. Ɛ a ma‑a wan, mabɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a wo ma, an tee wa chɛ ma, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ na‑a to tima min na.
46001009	Yataa ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn. A wan‑na wo chee, ma koe a dia nyɔncha wa chɛ ɔ, wo bɛ a 'a denɛ a, Chisɔsi Chasi, mmɔ 'a mansa.
46001010	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n mbe wo disa tena, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ, kuiɛ dɔndɔya ni ma wo tɛ. Wo sɛmbɛ wo nyɔn kɔɔsa bia koe a. Wo dɔn wo nyɔn ye, wo yiima ni ma dɔndɔ gbe, a ɔ ma du du.
46001011	Koe min na mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n‑na a a min, mbɛ bɛn mbe ee wo tɛ, an fɛ mu n mbe koɔ tena ka wo tena. Mɔɛ dɔ nu Kowɛ 'a chenɛ a, an ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da n na.
46001012	N mbe min fɔ tena wo ye, an nɛ. Mbɛ wo gbɛɛ, wo da a kuiɛ ee kaina dɔndɔ. Wo dɔ n mbe a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, “Pɔɔ fɛ mɔɛ mu n na.” Mbɛ wo dɔ n‑na a fɔ, wo ɔ, “N mbe Apɔdɔsi an fɛ,” dɔ n dɔ, “Pita,” dɔ n sin dɔ, “Chasi fɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ mu n na.”
46001013	Chasi chɛ dɔndɔ gbe, a ɔ ee che du‑a kaina sɛsɛ. N fan Pɔɔ ma a a, an na‑a min gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, wo ko a. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɔ, yii na‑a chɛ min kunɛ ɔ, Pɔɔ tɔɛ ɔ.
46001014	Yataa ɛn wai, n ma yii chɛ ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a. N‑na a chɛ dechee Kisipɔsi an kunɛ ɔ, an fea Kayɔsi a.
46001015	Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma na a fɔ, mbɛ yii chɛ‑a wo kunɛ ɔ, n tɔɛ an dɔ, wo ni bea n fɛ.
46001016	(A puin‑da gbɛ n yii ma, mbɛ n na‑a yii chɛ wan Sitɛfanasi kunɛ ɔ, a basan a 'a chen na mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ a ma to ni n yii ma, n ni yii chɛ mɔ dɔ mende kan kɔ kan kunɛ ɔ to).
46001017	Koe min na mu, Chasi ma n sɔ ni, yii an chɛ koe a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ. A‑a n sɔ, n ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na. N sin mbe ee a ɔ yian tena, mɔ gbu 'a yiimatɛ an na, daɔdiaya a. Ni n‑na chɛ ma, ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ Chasi‑a saya min chɛ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, gbasaya ban‑da a ɔ.
46001018	A mu min na, sakana bai chɛ a si Chisɔsi Chasi fa koe ma kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, a mu wooya bai an na mɔɛ dɔ n tena. Chɛ nu, miin mbe ee na‑a bauncha ma sɔn‑da. Chɛɛ mmɔ wɛn mbe bauncha chia ma, bai chɛ mu Yataa 'a gbasaya an na.
46001019	A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa ɔ te, ɛ yiimatɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu, an 'na yiimatɛ ɔ yɔn‑da wan. A sin, an 'na ko sɔnɛ gbɛɛ, a ee a ya a fen kɔ fen na.
46001020	Yataa‑a a ɔ yian, mbɛ dunya chɛ ɔ yiimatɛ, tɔnɔn mbe ee a ɔ. Mɔɛ yiima ni tɛ wɛɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, chɛ ee che a ma‑a Yataa sɔn mɔɛ a. A ni Chu n 'na sawa sɔn boo ɔ boo, chɛ wɛɛ ee a ma Yataa sɔn mɔɛ a. A ni ma wɛɛ mɔɛ a, min kosan koɔ‑a, chɛ nan fan gbu wɛɛ ee a ma, a ni ma Yataa sɔn mɔɛ a.
46001021	Yataa yiima tɛen ba mu, an‑na a ma, a‑a a ma mɔɛ n 'na yiimatɛ ee che a ma‑a, an ni a ɔ gbɛ a gbu ɛ ka ma. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ chɛ n ni bauncha ma sɔn. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an kai fa‑a a a, ni an‑na wooya sakana bai chɛ a min, nn mbe min dɔ yian.
46001022	Chu mɔɛ n tana, an toen mu kamaya koe n fan dɔ yen koe a, dan koe a a a. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an mbe dan fan a a, ni an ta yiimatɛ‑a a fɔ an ye, mbɛ tea mu.
46001023	Chɛɛ nn‑na a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mɔɛ n na‑a kunka mansa fa wan, kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. Chu mɔɛ n tana, an mbe chɛ ya mainɛ an na. Chɛ n sin, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an mbe a ya dechee wooya bai an na.
46001024	Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chasi chɛ, an mu Yataa 'a gbasaya a, an mu a 'a yiimatɛ a. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa‑a miin chee bauncha ma sɔn koe a. An ni ma Chu mɔ a, an ma ma Chu mɔ a, an‑na chɛ ɔ sɔn fan.
46001025	Yataa 'a dɔbɛn chɛ, min yaen mu ka wooya a, yiimatɛ koo a ɔ, a ben mɔ gbu 'a yiimatɛ a sɛnden kan kɔ kan ma. Yataa 'a gboo ɔ fa nan fan gbu wɛɛ, a benden mu mɔ gbu 'a gbasaya ma.
46001026	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, a ni ma wo yii ma, dunya ta yiinachii ɔ, wo sɛsɛ an nii ma yiimatɛ tɔɛ a, Yataa na‑a wo chee tima min na. Wo sɛsɛ, an nii ma wo ya ni gbasaya tɔ a, an ma wo ya ni nyan tɔ a.
46001027	Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a a wii wan a ma, fenɛ n ya koe a fen chɛndɛ a, miin ma dunya ya a fen fen na. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, dunya ɔ yiimatɛ tɔɛ n ni mau. Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, gbasaya nii miin ye dunya ɔ, a‑a an ma mɔɛ a, gbasaya tɔɛ n na mau koe a.
46001028	Mɔɛ n gbɔsɔ ma fenɛ miin ko a, an ma miin ya ni fen fen na, Yataa‑a an fen chɛ n fan ya. A‑a an ya, a ma koe a, fenɛ miin yaen ni tɔnɔnɛ a dunya ɔ, a ni ma fen fufafuu n na.
46001029	Chɛ ni a ma, mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan mbe ee yonka tɛ Yataa chen kɔɔ.
46001030	A wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, a wan‑na a ma, wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a. Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, yiimatɛ ɛ mmɔ ɔ, Chasi mu. Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mmɔ tanden mu, a wan mu. A‑a mmɔ kun bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, mmɔ ma‑a Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na.
46001031	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ min toen mu a ni yonka tɛ, a ni a tɛ koe a ma dechee, Mansa Yataa‑a min chɛ a ko a.
46002001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n na‑a na wan wo tena. Chɛɛ n nii ma na ni daɔdia an na, Yataa na‑a koe min nun tee, a ɔ yian koe a wo a. N sin nii ma a ya ni, mbɛ n yiima tɛen ni.
46002002	Koe min na mu, tima min na n ni wo tɛ ɔ, ko dɔ gbɛɛ kan kɔ kan nii n yii ma wo kan koe a. Min ni dechee n yiima ɔ, an nɛ min sien mu Chisɔsi Chasi ma, a‑a saya min chɛ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
46002003	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mmɔ bɛ ni kɛn, n gboo ɔ nii ma gbɛa nin bɛ. A yɛ to, chianɛ ni wan n dɔ, a basan ma samba a.
46002004	A sin, n da a bai nu, daɔdia nii ma, yiimatɛ ɔ yian koe a. Chɛɛ n ni sakana bai miin dɔ yian, an ni a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa Nyina an ni n fɛ, an wai chɛ n chɛ‑a.
46002005	Chɛ ni a ma, wo ma wo kai fa mɔ gbu 'a yiimatɛ a. Chɛɛ wo ni wo kai fa Yataa 'a gbasaya an na.
46002006	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn mbe sakana bai min sa ka, yiimatɛ ɛ wan a ɔ, chɛ n tena, miin kai faen mu Chasi a chɛndɛ chɛ. Mɔɛ miin mbe dunya chɛ ɔ, an 'na yiimatɛ ma. Gbasaya ɛ miin boo ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, an ta ɔ ma, an 'na gbasaya min mbe ka gbɛ che‑a a danka a.
46002007	Nn mbe bai sa wo tena, a si yiimatɛ an ma, Yataa‑a miin nun tee. A e na to dunya a dan‑da, a‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ an yiimatɛ chɛ, an mbe na‑a basɔmaya a mmɔ tena.
46002008	Yiimatɛ an nɛ, min nii an mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, gbasaya ɛ miin boo ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, a ni ma‑a an dɔ, an nii Mansa Chisɔsi fa‑a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a wɛn mbe si ɔ a 'a gbasaya ɔ.
46002009	Chɛɛ min maen mu, ɛ ka wan dechee yɔ min nyɛnden mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. A ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma koe chɛ n dɔ yen nin bɛ, a ya a, a ɔ, a ma an na min ni, a too a, a ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ sin ma an dɔ gbɛ ni, a yiima ɔ. A ɔ, koe chɛ nu, Yataa‑a min sa tena ɔ bɛn mɔɛ n ko a, a ɔ, miin toen mu a a.
46002010	Chɛɛ Yataa‑a koe chɛ n dɔ yian mmɔ a, a Nyina 'a gbasaya an dɔ, a‑a min na na mmɔ tena. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina chɛ ɛ ko ɔ ko kɔɔ gbɛngbɛn fan, a ni ma Yataa yii ma koe wɛɛ a.
46002011	Mɔ gbu yii ma koe chɛndɛ wɛɛ gbu, mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ee a sɔn, fɔ a wandi dɔndɔ gbe dechee. Yataa Nyina wɛɛ ɛ ka wan, a dɔndɔ gbe an mbe ko ɔ ko ɔ sɔn, a si Yataa ma.
46002012	An Nyina chɛ mu, mmɔ‑a min ma sɔn, a ka Yataa tena. Chɛɛ mmɔ ma chɛ an ma sɔn ni, min mbe dunya chɛ ɔ. Mmɔ ni kun gbɛ, mmɔ ni a ɔ gbɛ, Yataa‑a koe min chɛ mmɔ ye.
46002013	An fɛ mu, nn mbe bai chɛ n fan fɔ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ye. N sin mbe ee a fɔ an ye, daɔdia bai n fan dɔ, yɔ mɔɛ n mbe an yii na chii miin na, mɔɛ n kan koe a. Chɛɛ nn mbe min ma, nn mbe bai n fan sa, Yataa Nyina ɛ min don nn da ɔ, an sa koe a. Nn mbe Yataa Nyina ta bai ɔ yian, a wandi ta bai an na, ɛ min fɔ nn ye.
46002014	Chɛɛ mɔɛ nu, Yataa Nyina ee miin fɛ, an mbe ee dɔn, an ni an boo si fen chɛ n kɔɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ miin be. Koe min na mu, an mbe an ya wooya fenɛ n fan na. An mbe ee che an dɔ gbɛ‑a. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina dechee, an mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni koe n dɔ gbɛ miin ka‑a Yataa tena.
46002015	Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ mɔɛ min fɛ, ɛ kun fan a ni ko ɔ ko ɔ gbɛ, a si ko ɔ ko ma. Chɛɛ a sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee kun a ni a wandi gbu wakoe ɔ gbɛ.
46002016	Tea an nɛ, koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee Yataa Mansa yii ma koe ɔ sɔn, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a sɔ chia ma. Chɛ wɛɛ ni ma, mmɔ wɛn, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɛ mmɔ ɔ, Chasi 'a yiinachii ɛ wan mmɔ ɔ.
46003001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chisɔsi ɔ, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na, n fandi gbu nii ma koɔ ni wo tena, yɔ Yataa Nyina ɛ mɔɛ miin fɛ. Chɛɛ n na‑a wo ya wan yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe bea an ta faa ma koe n fɛ. Wo e wan dechee yɔ den toa nu, miin mbe ka dechee a kuu sɔ‑a an kai fa koe a Chisɔsi Chasi a.
46003002	N ni ma wo kan‑da, n ni wo da kɔ tee susu yii an na, n nii daun fen dɔ gbɛama be wo ma. Koe min na mu, wo ma nii ma bɛn nin bɛ daun fen dɔ gbɛama ko a. Tea gbu ko a, wo gbu sin ma ma bɛn nin bɛ a ko a sanche wɛɛ.
46003003	Koe min na mu, wo mu tun mɔɛ n fan na, miin faa ma koe n benden mu an ma. Toomaya ɛ wo tɛ ɔ, a basan koɛ a. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ wo e koe ma tena wan yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe ee Yataa chia ma.
46003004	Koe min na mu, wo dɔ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ wo e n fan Pɔɔ an ko a. Mbɛ dɔ n sin dɔ, an mbe Apɔdɔsi an ko a. Ni wo ma‑a chɛ ma‑a, wo e ma‑a ka koe ma‑a na yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe ee Yataa chia ma.
46003005	Chɛɛ n fan Pɔɔ, n ma mɔ a, Apɔdɔsi wɛɛ ma mɔ ɔ mɔ a. Min sin sien mu nn ma, Yataa 'a yɔnɛ gbama mu nn na, miin‑na a ma, wo dan‑da Chisɔsi Chasi a. Mansa Yataa‑a nn sɔ wai chɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ, nn‑na a chɛ ka wan.
46003006	N fan‑na wai chɛ kuu sɔ, mbɛ Apɔdɔsi‑a toa si a kɔɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa wandi gbu an‑na a ma, a ta‑a ya ɔ ma.
46003007	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min mbe chin fenɛ chin‑da, a ma wai chɛ ni, an fea mɔɛ chɛ a, min bɛɛ ɛ yii chɛ‑a a ma. Chɛɛ Yataa, min mbe a ma chin fen chɛ, ɛ koa, a ta wai an koo.
46003008	Mɔɛ min mbe chin fenɛ chin, an fea mɔɛ chɛ a, min mbe yii chɛ a ma, an mbe wai dɔndɔɛ an chɛ. Yataa ɛ an fea gbɛɛ pawa‑a wan, yɔ an‑na wai chɛ buɛ min dɔ.
46003009	Koe min na mu, nn mbe wai chɛ tena Yataa an ko a. Wo sin, wo e wan yɔ wo e a 'a yadi ɔ wan. A yɛ to, wo e wan bɛɛ yɔ a 'a chen sɔenɛ.
46003010	N 'na wai maen fan ni, yɔ chen sɔ mɔ wa. N fan‑na chenɛ chɛ kuu si. Yataa an‑na mɔnɛ chɛ be n ma. Mbɛ mɔ dɔ mende sin mbe ta‑a chen chɛ sɔɛ a ya ɔ ma. An fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni tima ya, chen chɛ sɔ buɛ a.
46003011	Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee an chen chɛ kuu sɔ, ni a ma a kuu si ni Chisɔsi Chasi a.
46003012	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a fen sɛsɛ ya wan, chen chɛ sɔ koe a. Mɔɛ n‑na sanu ya wan, an‑na kain gbɛ ya, a basan sen baa gbɛama a. Mɔɛ dɔ n‑na kɔnɛ ya wan, an‑na nyanda ya, a basan nungbu a.
46003013	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ta wai chɛ buɛ, ɛ bɔ‑a wan ya a ma, kaa a tɛ tee chɛ ma. A sin, ta an mbe a ɔ yian‑da, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan‑na a ta wai min chɛ.
46003014	Ni a‑a chenɛ min sɔ, ni a sɔ‑a chidi, ɛ a 'a pawa ma sɔn‑da wan.
46003015	Chɛɛ ni a minda‑a, ɛ fo‑a wan fen kɔ fen na. A wandi kunɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan a ɔ, yɔ mɔɛ min ma chɛ chɛ‑a ta manɛ boo ɔ.
46003016	Wo gbu sin‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo gbɛɛ mu Yataa 'a chenɛ an na. A sin, Yataa Nyina ɛ wan wo tɛ ɔ.
46003017	Chɛ ko a, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe na‑a kasaa a Yataa 'a chenɛ a, Yataa wɛɛ, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ kasaa‑a wan. A mu min na, Yataa 'a chenɛ ɛ tenchen a wandi an ko a. Wo sin fan mu an chen chɛ a.
46003018	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a wandi woo. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma a wandi ya yiimatɛ tɔ wa a, dunya chɛ ta chia a. Wo wo wandi woo mɔ a bɔɛ chɛ pɛn, min mbe a ma, wo ni ma yiimatɛ tɔ wa an na, Yataa ta chia a.
46003019	Koe min na mu, dunya chɛ ɔ yiimatɛ, a mu wooya koe an na Yataa tena. A 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Yataa ɛ yiimatɛ tɔ wa an bia, an 'na yaa wa an fan dɔ.”
46003020	Yataa 'a gboo chɛ‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “Mansa Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ koe miin mbe yiimatɛ tɔɛ n yii ma dunya chɛ ɔ, wooya koe nu mu.”
46003021	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma yonka tɛ, a si ma koe ma mɔ dɔ mende fɛ mɔɛ a. Yataa ban‑da fen fen ma‑a wo ta a.
46003022	Pɔɔ ni ma, Apɔdɔsi, ni Pita, an mbe wo wan ko a. Dunya chɛ wɛɛ, fɔɛ chɛ, saya, fenɛ miin mbe sanche, ni miin mbe kɔkɔɛ ya ɔ ma, an gbɛɛ, an mbe wo wan ko a.
46003023	Wo sin mbe Chisɔsi Chasi an ko a, a wɛɛ sin mbe Yataa ko a.
46004001	Chɛ ko a, wo nn ya, mbɛ bɔi denɛ mu nn na, Chasi ko a. Nn‑na ko sɛsɛ ɔ sɔn fan, a si Yataa ma, mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ma min dɔ sɔn. Nn sin fan yaen mu, a ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na.
46004002	A yɛ to, bɔi den kan kɔ kan gbu sin, a dinden fan mu a ma, wai chɛ koe a danaya ɔ.
46004003	Ni n fan ko a mu, n ma n gbɔsɔ ni, ni wo wan‑na n gbɛmbo, chɛ ma, ni mansa nu mu kuti ɔ. N mbe ee kun n ni kaa a tɛ n fandi wakoe ma.
46004004	N yiima a koenɛ mu fion. Chɛ ma a yian ni, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔ ma n na. Mansa Chisɔsi dɔndɔ gbe an mbe kaa a tɛ, a si n ma.
46004005	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma a a gbandia, kaa a tɛ koe a mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, tima ya ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi e na to na‑a. A wan mbe koe n na bɔ‑a ya a ma, miin mbe nun dɔ, ni koe nu miin mbe mmɔ faa ɔ. A sin, tando min nyin, Yataa ɛ a be‑a wan mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, a be koe nyin mɔɛ miin ma.
46004006	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n‑na nn fandi ya tɔmɔsi a, nn fea Apɔdɔsi a, wo 'a tɔnɔnɛ an ko a. Chɛ ni a ma, Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, wo ma na tandin a ɔ. Wo ma na yonka tɛ, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ wakoe ma, mbɛ wo tɛ‑a dɔndɔɛ sin dɔ.
46004007	Wo ta mɔgbuya, a a ma sɛ ni, a ni ben mɔ ɔ mɔ ta ma ɛnden bɛɛ a. Fen kɔ fen min mbe wo boo ɔ, Yataa an‑na a be wo ma. Ni wo‑a an ma sɔn Yataa an na, tea kan kɔ kan mbe ee wo boo ɔ, yonka tɛ koe a, yɔ wo ma an ma sɔn ni an na gbama a.
46004008	Wo tana, ɛ wo yii ma, Chisian fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo ban‑da gbɛ wo faa ma fenɛ n gbɛɛ ma sɔn‑da. Mbɛ wo ban‑da gbɛ nyan‑da, Yataa chia a. A yɛ to, mbɛ wo ban‑da ma‑a mansa wa n na, nn tana, nn to‑a. Yataa ni a ma, wo ni ma mansa wa n na, min mbe a ma, mmɔ gbɛɛ ni ma an mansaya chɛ ɔ dɔndɔ a.
46004009	Chɛɛ n ta yiinachii ɔ, mansa ma nn na. Nn fan, Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, nn maen fan mu yɔ mɔɛ nu, Yataa‑a miin ma yii, ma yii dankama a. Nn mbe wan yɔ mɔɛ nu, ya ɔ sɔɛ n mbe ta miin na, an mbe an fa mɔɛ gbɛɛ ya kɔɔ. Ɛ ka wan, koe min na mu, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ya an mbe nn na. Mɔ gbu n bɛ maeka n na, an ya an mbe nn na, kɔ an ni a ɔ yen, koe min mbe ma‑a nn na.
46004010	Nn tana, mɔɛ n mbe nn ya woo mɔɛ n fan na, wai chɛ koe a Chasi ko a. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo e wo wandi ya yiimatɛ tɔ wa n fan na, koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu wo a, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. Mɔɛ n mbe nn ya, mbɛ gbasaya ee nn boo ɔ, wo sin tana, wo‑a wo wandi ya, mbɛ ɛ wan wo boo ɔ. Wo e baa be wan wo wandi ma, chɛɛ nn tana, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee baa be nn ma.
46004011	A sɔ sanche ma, nn mbe ee daun chɛ tima dɔ a, nn sin kanɛ a ɛ gbaa wan. Nn ma chiienɛ ɛ koa taa an na, nn mbe ee si kaina dɔndɔ, nn sin mbe gbasi ɔ yen ka wan.
46004012	Nn mbe wai chɛ wan, nn sɔɛ a, nn boo n na, nn da a daun fenɛ ma sɔn koe a. Ni an‑na nn main, nn mbe dua wan an ko a. Ni an‑na ko yawaenɛ sa nn ma, nn mbe nn faa bia wan.
46004013	Ni an‑na nn ma yaua, nn mbe bai chɛndɛ an sa, a si an ma. Sanche wɛɛ, an mbe nn bia yɔ bubuu, an‑na nn ya mɔ gbu tɔɛ a banɛ n na, dunya chɛ ɔ.
46004014	N ma gboo chɛ nyɛn ni wo tena, wo a mau koe an na. Chɛɛ n‑na a nyɛn wo tena, n ni wo sɔ chia ma, yɔ n faa ma denɛ nu.
46004015	Wo kan mɔɛ n ni ma wu sɛsɛ wɛɛ, ni wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi a, wo fa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. Koe min‑na a ma, n ma‑a wo fa a, an nɛ sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, a si Chisɔsi ma, n na‑a min na wo tena.
46004016	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo dimu, wo sɔ n chen gba ɔ, wo ni tachɛ Yataa a, yɔ n mbe a ma tena buɛ min dɔ.
46004017	Chɛ gbu an fɛ mu, n mbe Timoti sɔ tena wo tena. Mɔɛ mu a a, mɔɛ ɛ che i yii sɔ‑a min ma gbau gbau, wai chɛ koe a Chisɔsi Chasi ko a. N 'na denɛ mu gbɛ a a, n toen mu min na kaka. Ɛ a ma‑a wan wo ee nyina‑a koe n ma, n mbe bea tena miin fɛ, n 'na fɔɛ ɔ, Chisɔsi 'a sɔmɔya ɔ. N ni mɔɛ n kan ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n fan na, chɔchi kan kɔ kan dɔ, n ni ta miin dɔ.
46004018	Ɛ wo dɔ n yii ma, mbɛ n mbe ee na tena to wo tena. A sin, chɛ bun‑da a ma‑a, wo bun‑da dɔpanda bɔ‑a.
46004019	Chɛɛ ni Mansa Yataa dɔn‑da, n mbe na tena wo tena sanche. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, n mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan, dɔpanda tɔɛ chɛ n mbe che koe min ma‑a, a fɔ koe ma dechee.
46004020	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a mansaya wakoe, a ee dechee mɔ da an dɔ, chɛɛ a gbasaya gbu ɛ ma wan nɔ.
46004021	Ni n na‑a tima min na, wo wandi an mbe wo faa ma ya a gbɛ. Ni n mbe sɔnkɔ wan wo ma, n ni wo a tɔɔya. Chɛ ma, ni n mbe koadia an dɔ yian wo a, mbɛ n‑na wo bia chɛndɛ chɛ.
46005001	A che‑a n ma, mbɛ mɔ dɔndɔ wo tɛ ɔ nɔ, Kɔyindi chɔchi ɔ, ɛ ko yama ma tena, an fea musu a. Mɔɛ miin ma Yataa sɔn, an mbe ee ko yama miin nyɔn sima n ma, wo bɔɛ chɛ ɛ an fan ma tena. An‑na a gbu fɔ n ye, mbɛ ɛ waa ma basan tena wan, a de tinanɛ a.
46005002	Koe an nɛ, wo e di chɛ min na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo e dɔpanda an bɔ tena. Chɛɛ wo ni an mɔ bonda chɛ gbain fan, min‑na ko bonda chɛ ma, a ni bɔ wo tɛ ɔ chɔchi ɔ.
46005003	N tana, n mbe ee wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo wo tɛ ɔ, n fandi gbugbu gbu a, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n faa ɛ wan wo tena. N gbu sin ban‑da kaa a tɛ‑a, a si a ma.
46005004	Ni wo bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ, n mbe ma‑a wan wo tɛ ɔ, n faa ɔ. A sin, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ, ɛ ma‑a wan mmɔ tɛ ɔ.
46005005	Wo an mɔ bonda ya, wo ni a be Sitana ma, a ni tɔɔya. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mbɛ a wandi‑a bauncha ma sɔn, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi ɛ na‑a to tima min na.
46005006	Wo e yonka min tɛ ka, a si wo 'a chɔchi ma, a yau gba wo ko a. An mbe a fɔɛ min chɛ, an dɔ, yisin denɛ chɛenɛ feawa funku ɔ, an dɔ, an mbe a ma, feawa funku gbu ɛ sɛ wa chɛ, wo‑a a tɛnsɛ buɛ sɔn fan.
46005007	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo mɔ yama chɛ bɔ wo tɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni to Yataa gbee ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni ma yɔ feawa funku nama, yisinɛ ee min dɔ. Tea gbu sin ko a, n‑na wo sɔn ka wan. Koe min na mu, Chasi wandi gbu fa‑a wan mmɔ ko a. A sin mbe wan yɔ sa chɛ, Chu mɔɛ n mbe min bɔ yasi a, kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ kun ma.
46005008	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ tachɛ Yataa faa ma a, yɔ Chu mɔɛ n ni kun bɔ a ɔ bɛn chɛ bia buɛ min dɔ, a chia ma. Mmɔ ma mmɔ 'a bɛn chɛ bia faa yama a, mmɔ ma a bia, mmɔ ɛ tun mmɔ 'a ko yama kɔma n dɔ. Chɛɛ mmɔ Yataa 'a sawa bia mmɔ boo fea a, mmɔ ni sɔn yama boo ka. Mmɔ ni Chu mɔɛ n ya tɔmɔsi a, miin ni biidi dɛnfɛenɛ daun, yisin nii min dɔ, bɛn chɛ tima kɔɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ mmɔ tandenɛ ni ma Yataa chen kɔɔ.
46005009	N na‑a gboo nyɛn wo tena, tima dɔndɔɛ min na, n‑na wo a si wan, mbɛ wo ma gbɛn mɔɛ ma, min‑na waa ma basan buɛ yau.
46005010	N mbe ee chɛ fɔ tena mɔɛ n fan ko a, dunya chɛ ɔ, miin mbe waa yama ma basan. A yɛ to, an kanka, an fen ko yaen mu kaka, an mbe fenɛ n bɛɛ fai, miin ma Yataa a. Ni wo‑a a fɔ, wo ɔ, wo ee gbɛn an ma a sima wɛɛ, mbɛ fɔ ni wo ta ka‑a dunya chɛ wakoe ma gbae.
46005011	N ni min fɔ tena gboo chɛ ɔ, an nɛ, mbɛ wo ma gbɛn mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin‑na an fandi chee Chisianɛ n na, chɛɛ an mbe ko tɛ an nyaa ma. Ni chɛ ma, an fen ko yaen mu kaka, an mbe fenɛ n fai miin ma Yataa a, an mbe an bɔɛ n tɔ yama ɔ tɛ, an mbe gbɛ wa min, chɛ ma, an mbe kanka chɛ. Wo gbu ma si wɛɛ, wo ni daunɛ chɛ mɔɛ bonda chɛ a, min boo ɛ chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɔ.
46005012	Yataa an 'na wai mu, kaa a tɛ koe a mɔɛ chɛ n bakoe ma, miin mbe ee chɔchi ɔ. N 'na wai ma chɛ a, kaa a tɛ koe a, a si an ma. Chɛɛ wo 'a wai an nɛ, wo ni kaa a tɛ, a si wo bɔɛ n ma, miin mbe chɔchi ɔ. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ ka wan, mbɛ wo ni mɔ yama gbain, a ni bɔ wo tɛ ɔ.
46006001	Ka n mbe chɛ wɛɛ fɔ wo ye. Tea ee ma‑a wo boo ɔ, ta koe a wo bɔɛ chɔchi mɔɛ a, kuti ɔ, ni koɛ ma‑a wo tɛ. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo e ma‑a ka ta‑a a mɔɛ chɛ a Yataa sɔn bai n fan chen kɔɔ. Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo a sa chɔchi ɔ mɔɛ dɔ n chen kɔɔ, an ni a sa Yataa chia a.
46006002	Wo gbu ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe chɔchi ɔ, an fan mbe na‑a kaa a tɛ‑a, a si mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma dunya ɔ. Ni wo sin fan mbe na tena chɛ ma‑a, wo ee che wo ni tɛ wo wandi ɔ sanche, kaa a tɛ koe a tataya bai n ma.
46006003	Wo gbu sin ni a ɔ sɔn to, mbɛ mmɔ wan mbe na tena kaa a tɛ‑a, maeka n bɛɛ wakoe ma. Chɛ gbu ko a, wo e che wan, wo ni tataya bai n sa wo nyɔn tɛ, nɛ dunya ma.
46006004	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni bai bonda chɛ n ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ, wo ma ta a a mɔɛ tena, min mbe ee chɔchi ɔ, baa ni ma a ma boo ɔ boo. Chɛɛ wo ta a chɔchi ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ tena, baa sima wɛɛ ee min ma, a ni a sa.
46006005	Bai chɛ ma mauen mu, wo ko a. Mɔ dɔndɔ gbe gbu wɛɛ, ɛ wan nɔ wo tɛ ɔ, min yiima tɛen mu, bai sa koe a, wo dechee tɛ ɔ chɔchi ɔ.
46006006	Chɛɛ wo suun ma nyɔn dechee dechee nu Chasi ɔ, wo wan mbe ta wo nyɔn na, kuti ɔ. Wo e ta mɔɛ chɛ n chen kɔɔ, miin ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a, wo 'a bai sa koe a.
46006007	Siibia bonda chɛ chɛ koe wo boo ɔ gbu, a ɔ yiandenɛ an nɛ, mbɛ wo bea‑a fo. A fisa wɛɛ, wo ni an baamaya an dɔ bia. A fisa wɛɛ to, wo bɔɛ n ni wo boo fenɛ n ma kafaya.
46006008	Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo wandi gbu an mbe wo nyɔn kafa, wo e baa wo nyɔn ma. Wo suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo e chɛ n ma an nan fan bɛɛ a.
46006009	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan pɛnɛnɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n mbe ee don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, mɔɛ miin mbe ko yama ma. Wo ma wo wandi woo. An mɔɛ chɛ n fan nɛ, miin mbe waa yama ma basanɛ a, ni miin mbe fɛnɛ n fai miin ma Yataa a. Chɛ ma, miin mbe waa ma basan an bɔ kai n na, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe waa ma basan an bɔɛ n ta si nyɔɛ n na.
46006010	N mbe ee a fɔ, chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe kanka chɛ, ni miin fen ko yaen mu kaka. A yɛ to, gbɛ min mɔ wa an bɛɛ, ni miin mbe tɔ ɔ tɛ yama chɛ, an bɛ kafa tɔɛ n na. An dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
46006011	Wo dɔ n ni ka wan tee. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, wo ko‑a fo, wo 'a ko yama n boo ɔ. Wo ma‑a tenchen Yataa ko a. Yataa‑a wo ya mɔ tandenɛ n na, a chen kɔɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, an fea Yataa Nyina a.
46006012	Wo dɔ n mbe a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, “Kɔn mbe ee sa ɔ n ya ɔ, ko ɔ ko ma koe a.” Chɛɛ wo koe gbɛɛ ma, min nyin a ma koe a wo boo ɔ. Wo ɔ te to, wo ɔ, “Kɔn mbe ee sa ɔ n ya ɔ, ko ɔ ko ma koe a.” Chɛɛ n mbe ee dɔn‑da, n ni ma yɔnɛ a koe n boo ɔ, n mbe miin ma.
46006013	Wo dɔ n sin mbe a fɔ, wo ɔ, “Daun fenɛ ɛ bu an ko a,” wo ɔ, “bu wɛɛ ɛ daun fenɛ ko a.” A gbu sin mbe ka wan. Chɛɛ tee dɔndɔ a, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an fea gbɛɛ ee ma‑a to nɔ. Wo gboo ee nɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni koe tɛ. Chɛɛ wo tachɛ koe mu Chisɔsi ko a, mbɛ wo gboo kɔ koe sin, a ma‑a Mansa Chisɔsi wɛɛ ma.
46006014	Yataa‑a Mansa Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. A sin mbe a ma‑a ka wan, mmɔ wɛɛ ni mmɔ kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, a 'a gbasaya dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ɔ.
46006015	Wo gbu ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo gboo mu Chasi wandi sɔna n fan na. Mɔɛ sin mbe ee a gboo ya, min mu Chasi ta a, a ni a a tun ko tɛ mɔɛ ta a. Chɛ ee ma ɛnden bɛɛ a.
46006016	Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe a gboo be‑a ko tɛ musu ma, mbɛ an fea ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. A nyɛnden mu den Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ an fea ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
46006017	Chɛɛ mɔɛ min ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi a, a Nyina an mbe ma an mɔɛ chɛ fɛ.
46006018	Wo wo boo bɔ waa ma basan ko yama kan kɔ kan dɔ. Koe min na mu, ko yama kan kɔ kan, mmɔ ɛ min ma, a ee mmɔ gboo tɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe koe tɛ, a‑a ko yama si a wandi gboo a.
46006019	Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo gboo mu Yataa Nyina 'a chenɛ n fan na, miin mbe tenchen a ko a. Yataa an‑na an Nyina chɛ be wo ma, an ni ma wo fɛ. Wo ee wo wandi an ko a, chɛɛ wo e Yataa an ko a.
46006020	Yataa‑a wo sɔnkɔɛ bɔ wan. Chɛ ko a, wo wo gboo bia chia an na, min mbe na tando a a tena.
46007001	N mbe na tena gbɛ n da tu‑a koe chɛ n na, wo‑a miin nyɛn wo 'a gboo ɔ. N dɔnden fan mu a ma, mbɛ a nyin ni mɔ ma tu ni musu a.
46007002	Chɛɛ mɔ sɛsɛ ɛ waa ma basan ko yama ma wan. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a nyin kai kan kɔ kan ni a ta musu ma sɔn, musu kan kɔ kan bɛɛ.
46007003	Mɔ kaima min sin mbe musu fuu‑a, a ni ko ɔ ko chɛ musu si kai, ɛ min chɛ a 'a musu ye. Fuu musu wɛɛ ni ko ɔ ko chɛ, kai sɔn musu ɛ min chɛ, a chɛɛ ye. Mɔɛ ɛ i bɔɛ faa ma koe an ma.
46007004	Gbasaya kan kɔ kan mbe ee musu boo ɔ, a gboo kun ma. Gbasaya chɛ ɛ a chɛɛ an boo ɔ. Mɔ kaima wɛɛ ɛ ka wan. Gbasaya ɛ a 'a musu an boo ɔ, a gboo kun ma.
46007005	Wo ma ban waa ma basan koe a, wo nyɔn na. Fɔ ni a ma‑a wo 'a dɔbɛnɛ an na, a ma koe a ka, tima kundu ɛnden ko a. Chɛ ni a ma, wo ni tima ya samun chɛ koe a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ wɛɛ, wo yɛ to wo gba ɔ, fuu ta chia a. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo e na‑a bɔ‑a wan Sitana 'a dɔsimanɛ boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, wo ee na‑a kun‑da wo ni wo wandi kun ma fɛn.
46007006	N mbe chɛ fɔ tena wo ye, gbasaya an kɔɔ ma. Chɛɛ a ɔ yian koe mu wo a, wo e min ma.
46007007	A ni ma‑a wan buɔdia a, ni wo ni wan yɔ n mbe buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ kɔ wan, a ta chia a. Ɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ kɔ chia chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a dɔndɔɛ kɔ chia dɔ mende a.
46007008	N mbe dasi chɛ an be tena gbɛ fuinya n ma. A nyin an ni ma an 'na dɔndɔ gbeya chɛ ɔ, yɔ n fan.
46007009	Chɛɛ ni wo ee che wo wandi bia‑a a chia a a, mbɛ wo dɛ fuu ɔ. Koe min na mu, a nyin mɔ ni ma fuu ɔ, a ben dunya ma koe ben koe ma mɔɛ ɔ.
46007010	Wo wɛn mbe fuu ɔ, sawa chɛ an mbe n boo ɔ wo ko a. Musu ma a chɛɛ boo ka. N fan ma sawa chɛ sa ni, chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi mu.
46007011	Chɛɛ ni musu‑a a chɛɛ boo ka, a ma kai dɔ gbɛɛ sɔn to. Ni chɛ ma, a ni yɛ a chɛɛ tena, an 'na bai ni ban. Mɔ kaima nan fan bɛɛ ma a 'a musu boo ka.
46007012	Ka n mbe chɛ fɔ gbɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n sin ye. (N fandi an mbe chɛ fɔ tena, Mansa Chisɔsi an ma a don ni n da ɔ.) Mbɛ mɔ kaima min mu Chisianɛ a, ni a 'a musu sin ma Chisian na, kai chɛ ma a boo ka chɛ ko a. Ni an musu chɛ dɔnden fan mu, an ni ma tun an si chɛ ɔ.
46007013	Ni musu wɛɛ mu Chisianɛ a, a chɛɛ sin ma a, a wɛɛ ma a boo ka chɛ ko a. Ni a chɛɛ chɛ dɔnden fan mu tun, an ni ma an si chɛ ɔ.
46007014	Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min ma Chisianɛ a, ni a‑a musu fuu min mu Chisianɛ a, an fea chɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Mɔ kaima chɛ, min ma ka Chisianɛ a, Yataa ɛ a ya wan yɔ a ta. Musu wɛɛ ɛ ka wan, ni a ma Chisianɛ a, chɛɛ a fuu kai mu Chisianɛ a, an bɛɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Musu chɛ, Chisianɛ ma ka min na, Yataa ɛ a ya wan yɔ a ta. Ni chɛ ma, an 'na denɛ n mbe ma‑a wan, yɔ denɛ nu, miin ma Yataa sɔn. Chɛɛ Yataa ban‑da ka buɛ min dɔ an fa ya‑a, ni an de, mbɛ a wan ta mu an na, a ban‑da an 'na denɛ n bɛɛ ya‑a, mbɛ a wan ta mu an bɛɛ a.
46007015	Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ n ma‑a fuu ɔ, min ma ka Chisianɛ a, a toen mu an ni du, yuu tɛen fan mu an ma, du koe a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ni ɛ bɛn fan, an ni to an fuu chɛ ɔ. Yataa toen mu, mmɔ ni ma faachima an dɔ, mɔ dɔ mende n na.
46007016	Wo wɛn mu fuu musu n na, n ni a fɔ wo ye, mbɛ kɔkɔɛ wo chɛɛ n mbe an kai fa‑a wan Chisɔsi Chasi a, a si wo wakoe ma. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, kɔkɔɛ wo wan Chisian kai n bɛɛ, wo e ma‑a ka wan demanɛ a wo 'a musu n tena, miin ma Chisianɛ n na.
46007017	Sawa mu chɛ an na, n mbe wo kan tena min na chɔchi n gbɛɛ ɔ. Mansa Chisɔsi‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ ma koe fɔ buɛ min dɔ fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni ma ka a ɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a fɔɛ ni ma, yɔ a ni buɛ min dɔ, Yataa‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ chee tima min na, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.
46007018	Ni mɔɛ min na kaminchaenɛ ɛ, Chu mɔɛ n 'na sawa chia a, mbɛ a dɔn‑da Yataa 'a chee ma, a ma a fɔ, mbɛ ɛ kamincha paa chɛ ka wan a gboo ma. Ni mɔɛ min na ma kamincha ni, a dɔn‑da Yataa 'a chee ma, a ma a fɔ, mbɛ a ɛ kamincha wan to.
46007019	Mɔɛ a ni kamincha wan, a a ma kamincha ni fan, ko ɔ ko ma chɛ a. Koe mu min na dechee, an nɛ, Yataa 'a sawa bia koe a chɛndɛ chɛ.
46007020	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ni to ka, yɔ a ni buɛ min dɔ, a e na to dɔn‑da Yataa 'a chee ma, ma koe a a ko a.
46007021	Tima min na Yataa‑a i chee, ni i ni yɔnɛ an na, chɛ ma i faa gbaa. Chɛɛ ni i‑a chia ma sɔn, bɔ koe a an yɔncha ɔ, an chia chɛ bia i boo fea a.
46007022	Koe min na mu, Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ yɔnɛ min chee, a ma‑a mɔ kun kaenɛ a. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe ee yɔncha ɔ, ni Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a chee, a mɔɛ chɛ ma‑a a 'a yɔnɛ a.
46007023	Yataa‑a wo sɔnkɔɛ an bɔ. Wo ma Yataa to, wo ni don mɔɛ n kɔɔ.
46007024	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni to ka, yɔ a ni buɛ min dɔ Yataa ya kɔɔ, a e na to dɔn‑da Yataa 'a chee ma, ma koe a a ko a.
46007025	Ka n mbe koɔ gbɛ, a si den tɔngbɔɛ n ma, miin ma si nin bɛ fuu ɔ, wo‑a gboo nyɛn a si miin ma. Mansa Chisɔsi an ma chɛ don ni n da ɔ, n mbe ka min fɔ‑a. Chɛɛ bai min mbe n da a, n mbe ka an fɔ‑a. N mbe koɔ tena wan, yɔ mɔɛ, wo e kun wo ni dan min na. Koe min na mu, Yataa chinchinden fan mu n ma.
46007026	N ta yiima ɔ, ni n‑na a ma fɛn faayɔnɛ min mbe sanche, a nyin mɔ ɔ mɔ ni to ka, yɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
46007027	Ni musu ɛ wan i boo ɔ, i ma a boo ka. Ni musu sin mbe ee i boo ɔ, mbɛ i ma i ya a kan musu a.
46007028	Chɛɛ ni i gbu sin‑na musu si, i ma ko yama ma ni. A sin to, ni sɛnama‑a kai sɔn, a wɛɛ ma ko yama ma ni. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe fuu ɔ, an 'na kun dumɛ koo. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n bu ɔ ɛ dia‑a wan, ni wo ma dɛ ni an tee ɔ tee a kun dumɛ ɔ.
46007029	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, min mbe n yii ma, tima min yianden mu, a ɔ wua‑a gbɛ. A ka gbɛ sanche ma, aan a ta, musu si kai n ni ma, yɔ mɔɛ nu, musu ee miin boo ɔ.
46007030	Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe di chɛ‑a, an ni a ma yɔ an faa ma yɔn ni. Miin mbe yɛn chɛ‑a, an ni a ma yɔ an bu ɔ ma di. Miin‑na fee fenɛ n san, an ni a ma yɔ an‑na fenɛ miin san ka, mbɛ an fan ta ma an na.
46007031	Mɔɛ miin mbe wai chɛ tena, dunya ma fenɛ n na, an ma an faa gbɛɛ chɛ an fen chɛ n bakoe ɔ. Koe min na mu, dunya chɛ ɛ ka buɛ min dɔ, a ee to tena a gba ɔ.
46007032	N ma to ni, faagbaa kan kɔ kan ni ma wo ma. Chisianɛ n tɛ ɔ, mɔ kaima miin ma musu si nin bɛ, an gbɔsɔen mu Mansa Chisɔsi 'a wai an na. Koe min na mu, an toen mu an ni koe n ma, miin mbe Mansa Chisɔsi faa chima.
46007033	Chɛɛ musu si kai tana, a faa gbaaen mu dunya chɛ ma koe an na. Ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ, a ni a 'a musu faa chima.
46007034	A sin to, a faa ma ko ee dɔndɔ. Musu wɛɛ, a ni ma sunkun tɔngbɔ a, a ni ma sɛnama a, ni a ee kai boo ɔ, a gbɔsɔen mu Mansa Chisɔsi 'a wai an ko a. A toen mu, a ni Mansa Chisɔsi faa chima koe ma, a chɛ chɛ wai gbɛɛ ɔ, ni a 'a yiinachii gbɛɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ fuu musu tana, a faa gbaaen mu dunya chɛ ɔ koe an na, ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ, a ni a chɛɛ faa chima.
46007035	N mbe chɛ fɔ tena, wo deman koe mu. Chɛɛ n mbe ee wo a gban tena wan. Chɛɛ n toen mu min na, an nɛ, koe ma koe a, min nyin, a sin tea ɛ a ɔ, a ma koe a. A yɛ to, min mbe a ma, wo ni wo wandi be Mansa Chisɔsi ma gbae, wai chɛ koe a a ko a, wo faa gbɛɛ a.
46007036	Chɛ an mbe n da a chɛ n ko a, miin‑na woo sa musu n ko a. Chɛɛ ni mɔ kaima yiima‑a a fɔ a ye, mbɛ a ee tachɛ chɛ tena musu chɛ a a chia ma, ni a to‑a musu a kaka, a fuu koe chɛ‑a a faa ɔ, a ni a fuu, a faa ni chima. Ko yama kan kɔ kan ma chɛ a.
46007037	Chɛɛ ni mɔ kaima‑a a yiima ɔ bɛn, mbɛ a ee fuu chɛ tena, mɔ ɔ mɔ sin ma a din ni a ma, a nyin fan. Ni ɛ kun fan tachɛ koe a a wandi a chɛndɛ, a 'a woo chɛ saenɛ ni ma tun musu chɛ ko a.
46007038	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min mbe musu fuu, a‑a ko chɛndɛ ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min gbu sin ma musu fuu ni, a nan gbu ta ko chɛndɛ koo.
46007039	Fuu musu ɛ a chɛɛ an ko a, kai ɛ wɛ tima min kɔɔ fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ ni a chɛɛ fa‑a, yuu tɛ‑a a ma, kai dɔ gbɛɛ sɔn koe a, Mansa Chisɔsi ta chia a.
46007040	Chɛɛ n ta yiinachii ɔ, musu chɛ 'a buɔdia ma ɛ munda‑a wan, ni a ma si ni kai ko a. N sin danden fan mu a a, mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ wan n bɛɛ fɛ, n sɔ koe a chia ma.
46008001	Ka n mbe koɔ gbɛ, a si daun fenɛ n ma, mɔɛ ɛ miin bɔ yasi n na, fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a. Wo‑a gboo nyɛn fan, a si a ma. Mmɔ gbɛɛ, yiimatɛ ɛ wan mmɔ ɔ, yɔ wo e a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ an yiimatɛ chɛ sima, ɛ mmɔ kunɛ koa dɔpanda an na. Chɛɛ koadia tana, ɛ chen sɔ wan mmɔ kɔɔ.
46008002	Ni a ma‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ a‑a koe sɔn fan, a ni ma a yii ma, mbɛ a ma ko sɔn, yɔ a gbu ɛ min sɔn.
46008003	Chɛɛ ni Yataa ko a dia‑a mɔɛ ye, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ sɔn fan.
46008004	Chɛ sin fan mbe n da a gbɛ, a si an daun fenɛ daun koe ma, mɔɛ n mbe min bɔ yasi a, fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a. Mmɔ gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an fen chɛ n mbe ee fɔɛ ɔ. Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Mansa Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe.
46008005	Tea gbu mu a a, mbɛ mɔɛ n mbe bai sa wan, a si fenɛ n ma banda bu ɔ, ni dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe miin chee Yataa a. An fen chɛ n kɔkoo wan, an sin mbe miin bɛɛ chee, an dɔ, mansa, an bɛɛ kɔkoo.
46008006	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe mmɔ ko a. An mu mmɔ Fa a, min‑na fen kɔ fen na dan dunya ɔ. An 'na fɔɛ ɛ mmɔ sun da a. Mmɔ 'a Mansa wɛɛ, ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, min mu Chisɔsi Chasi a. Yataa 'a gbasaya ben‑da an dɔ, fen fen na dan koe a dunya chɛ ɔ. A sin fan‑na a ma, mmɔ ɛ fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ ka min na fɛ‑a.
46008007	Chɛɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ an ma tea chɛ ɔ sɔn. Mɔɛ dɔ n dii‑a gbɛ bea koe a an 'na fania yataa chɛ n fɛ kaka. Bi tee chɛ wɛɛ a, mɔɛ dɔ n mbe daun fenɛ n daun fan, miin been mu an fania yataa chɛ n ma. An sin mbe ma a daun‑da, an gbu dandenɛ an mbe ma an na tun, mbɛ an daun fen chɛ n mbe an 'na yataa chɛ n fan ko a. An 'na Chisian danaya ɔ ma gbɛ wɛ kaka. An mbe ma an fen chɛ n daun‑da, ɛ ma wan an yii ma, mbɛ an mbe ee ka tea ko ma‑a, mbɛ an ma‑a ko yama ma mɔɛ n na.
46008008	Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ daun fenɛ min daun, an mbe ee na mmɔ a Yataa baima. Mmɔ ni daunɛ chɛ, tɔnɔn kan kɔ kan mbe ee a ɔ, mmɔ ma a chɛ, mmɔ ee fo fen kɔ fen na.
46008009	Chɛɛ wo tima an ya dechee, wo e koe n ma buɛ min dɔ. Min mbe a ma, gbasaya min been mu ka wo ma daun chɛ koe a, a ma na a ma miin 'na danaya ɔ ma gbɛ, an ni ko yama ma.
46008010	Mmɔ a ya, mbɛ mɔɛ min 'na danaya ɔ ma gbɛ, a‑a wo yen daun chɛ‑a. Wo wan, an dɔ, yiimatɛ ɛ wo wɛn dɔ, wo e daun chɛ‑a an 'na fania Yataa chɛ n fai tena. Wo ni dan gbɛ a a, mbɛ chɛ ɛ ma wan a ma buɔdia a daun fen bonda chɛ daun koe a tima ɔ tima.
46008011	Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ wo 'a yiimatɛ chɛ, an‑na a ma ka, wo suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ Chasi ɔ, min 'na danaya ɔ ma gbɛ ka, a kasaa‑a. Wo suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ, Chasi fa‑a ka min ko a.
46008012	An chia chɛ sin na, wo e ma‑a ka ko yama an ma‑a wo bɔɛ Chisianɛ n na, wo e paa to‑a an yii ma, miin 'na danaya ɔ ma gbɛ. Wo sin mbe ka ko yama ma‑a Chasi an na.
46008013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni n daun fenɛ an mbe a ma, n suun ma nyɔɛ ɛ ko yama ma, mbɛ n mbe ee soe daun‑da to. Min mbe a ma, n ma na n suun ma nyɔɛ a dɛ ko yama ɔ.
46009001	Ko ɔ ko boo ee n na, ae? Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na, ae? N‑na a yen fan n ya a pɛnɛnɛ, mmɔ 'a mansa chɛ. A sin, wo ma min chɛ a Chisianɛ n na, a bɔ‑a wai chɛ an dɔ, n‑na min chɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ko a.
46009002	Ni mɔ dɔ mende nu, an ma n ya nin bɛɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ a, wo nɛnɛ tana, wo ee ka ɛnden bɛɛ a. Wo wan mu tɔmɔsi gbau gbau a, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na.
46009003	N mbe chɛ an fɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin mbe n ma nyin.
46009004	Nn bɛɛ, tea ɛ wan nn boo ɔ, nn ya sɔ koe a wo ya ɔ, daun fɛnɛ wakoe a, ae?
46009005	Tea ɛ wan to nn boo ɔ, nn mbe ma n 'na wai chɛ a, ben ben koe a, nn bɛ nn 'na musu n na, Chisianɛ nu. Ni musu ɛ wan nn boo ɔ, nn mbe chɛ ma wan, ae? Tea ɛ wan nn boo ɔ nn ni chɛ ma, yɔ Mansa Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ nu, ni a suun ma nyɔɛ nu, a che kai Pita wɛɛ ma, an gbɛɛ‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ.
46009006	Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ nu, an mbe ee wai chɛ an da a daun fen ko a. Nn fea Banabasi a, nn fan mbe wai chɛ gbɛ dechee nn da a daun fenɛ ma sɔn koe a. Fen ko a chɛ ɛ ma?
46009007	Soya mɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, min mbe a wandi pawa. Chin fen chin mɔ kan kɔ kan bɛɛ ee nɔ, min mbe a 'a chin fenɛ ya, chɛɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee tu a da a. Ninchi kun ma fɛn mɔ nan fan mbe ee nɔ, min mbe a fɔ, mbɛ a 'a ninchi nɔnɔnɛ ee che a da ma.
46009008	N mbe ee chɛ fɔ tena dechee mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia an na. Sawa chɛ wɛɛ, min be‑a Mosisi ma, a‑a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an fɔ.
46009009	Koe min na mu, an sawa chɛ, a ɔ te, mbɛ mɔ ma ninchi da a chii, a ɔ, ni a ma‑a fenɛ tɛn‑da. A sin ma ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ni bai sa tena a si ninchi dechee an ma, an sawa chɛ ɔ.
46009010	Yataa‑a bai chɛ n gbɛɛ fɔ, mmɔ wan ko a. Mɔɛ miin mbe wai chɛ tena Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, an ni pawa ma sɔn mɔɛ n na, an mbe wai chɛ tena miin ko a. Ɛ wan dechee yɔ chin fen wai chɛ mɔɛ nu, miin mbe chin fenɛ tɛn, an yii na tɛenɛ ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ an ta ma sɔn koe ma.
46009011	Nn‑na koe n sa wan wo faa ɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ miin be. Chɛ ko a, kafa ma, ni nn‑na wo ɔ tisa dunya chɛ ɔ tɔnɔnɛ ko a.
46009012	Ni wo e wo boo fenɛ n be wan mɔ dɔ mende n ma, miin mbe Yataa 'a bai sa wo tena, tea ɛ wan a ɔ wo gbu ni wo boo fenɛ chenama be nn fan ma. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn ma bea nin bɛ tea chɛ fɛ. Nn mbe e na kɔnɛ sɔ sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ya ɔ, nn mbe nn faa bia wan ko ɔ ko a.
46009013	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ miin mbe Yataa 'a kata ɔ, an mbe an daun fenɛ ma sɔn buɛ min dɔ. An mbe a ma sɔn wai chɛ an dɔ, an mbe min chɛ nɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, Chu mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a, miin mbe yasi minda sen gbengbe ma nɔ, an mbe kana an yasi n fan dɔ.
46009014	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a chɛ an fɔ, a si a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n ma. Mbɛ an bɛɛ, mɔɛ miin mbe an sakana bai chɛ a min, an ni an ma koe chɛ.
46009015	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ma bea nin bɛ tea chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ fɛ. N sin mbe ee gboo chɛ nyɛn tena an tea chɛ konde gbain koe an na. Koe min na mu, n mbe ee chia be tena mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, n da tɔn koe a tea yonka chɛ tɛ koe a. A fisa wɛɛ n ni fa.
46009016	N mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ min dɔ yian tena mɔɛ n na, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma, an mbe ee che a ma‑a n ni yonka tɛ. A dinden fan mu n ma, a ma koe a ka. A sin, a ma ɛ chian‑da gba n ko a, ni n ma sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian ni mɔɛ n na.
46009017	N mbe ka wai min chɛ‑a, ni n fandi kun ma a ni, n ni pawa ɔ tisa‑a wan. Chɛɛ a ee ka wan. N mbe wai chɛ chɛ tena, koe min na mu, Yataa wandi an‑na n sɔ a chɛ koe a.
46009018	N 'na pawa sin gbu ɛ ma chɛ an na. Mbɛ n ni ma‑a sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian‑da, n ma tisa chɛ pawa ko a. N mbe ee bea tena n 'na tea fɛ, n ni che a ɔ nyɔɔ.
46009019	Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a yɔn ma n na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n‑na n fandi ma yɔnɛ a mɔ ɔ mɔ ko a. Chɛ ni a ma, n ni na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, n mbe che na‑a miin na Chisɔsi Chasi tena.
46009020	Ni n ma‑a wai chɛ‑a Chu mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, n mbe mun fan Chu mɔɛ a, an ma sawan koe a Chasi tena. A sin, n mbe ee wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo an sawa chɛ kɔɔ, Yataa‑a min mbe Mosisi ma, n 'na fɔɛ ɛ wan yɔ miin mbe a kɔɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ n mun koe a, Chasi 'a mɔɛ n na.
46009021	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, ni n ma‑a wai chɛ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin mbe ee an sawa chɛ kɔɔ, n mbe bɛn fan an bɛɛ tɛ ɔ. Chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ sawa chɛ ee nan gbu ko a. N sin gbu, n mbe wan Chasi 'a sawa kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛɛ n mbe chɛ ma, an ma sawan koe an na Chasi tena.
46009022	Ni n ma‑a wai chɛ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin 'na danaya ɔ ma gbɛ, Chisɔsi a, n bɛɛ, n mbe a ma wan yɔ n ta wɛɛ ɔ ma gbɛ. N mbe chɛ ma, n ni an ma sawan Chasi tena. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian, mbɛ n mbe mun fan mɔ kan kɔ kan na, mɔɛ kan kɔ kan tena. N mbe chɛ ma, an dɔ n baun koe an na, chia ɔ chia a.
46009023	N mbe chɛ gbɛɛ ma, min mbe a ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ni fasan a ɔ kan kɔ kan. A ni a ma, mmɔ ni dua chɛ ma sɔn, bai chɛ ɛ na min na.
46009024	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan gbu, mbɛ bui chɛ tɔmbɔɛ ɔ, bui chɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ an mbe ee a to a ɔ an nyɔn ko a. Chɛɛ dɔndɔ gbe, an mbe boo ɔ gbasi woo ma sɔn, sɔ koe a a bɔɛ n ya ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo bui chɛ chɛ, wo ni boo ɔ gbasi woo chɛ ma sɔn.
46009025	A sin, bui chɛ mɔɛ kan kɔ kan, ɛ tachɛ wan a wandi a chɛndɛ chɛ koe gbɛɛ ɔ. An mbe chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, an ni mansa banfua ma sɔn, min gbu ee mɛ. Chɛɛ mmɔ tana, mmɔ ɛ bui chɛ tena boo ɔ gbasi woo an ko a, min mbe ma‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a.
46009026	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n tana, n mbe ee bui chɛ n kun fan ye. N mbe ee botani a dɛ, fia gbama ɔ.
46009027	Chɛɛ n mbe n fandi gboo ma wan tindin, mbɛ n‑na n tachɛ buɛ ma mɛn. N mbe chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, Yataa ma na n na yɛ a boo kɔ, ni n ban‑da mɔɛ n chee‑a bui chɛ koe a.
46010001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo yii na chii, koe miin ma‑a suun mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n na. Yataa‑a an bɔ kɛn Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a‑a banda gbii a tachɛ wan an kun ma, an kun ma fɛn koe a. A sin, an‑na kɔ yii wa chɛ tɛ wan. Yataa‑a a du wan fea a, mbɛ an ben‑da.
46010002	An to‑a banda gbii chɛ an kɔɔ, kɔ yii chɛ ɔ, mbɛ yii chɛ‑a an gbɛɛ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, an ma koe mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Mosisi a.
46010003	An sin gbɛɛ‑a kamaya daun fen dɔndɔ gbe chɛ daun fan.
46010004	Mbɛ an gbɛɛ yɛ‑a, an‑na kamaya yii dɔndɔ gbe chɛ min. Koe min na mu, kamaya senɛ min ni an fɛ an tachɛ chɛ ɔ, an yii chɛ bɔ‑a an dɔ, an na‑a min min ka. An sen chɛ sin ni Chasi an na.
46010005	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa faa nii ma chima ni an sɛsɛ a. Chɛ sin‑na a ma wan, a‑a an sɛsɛ kasaa an fuinɛ ma.
46010006	Koe chɛ n ma‑a, ma koe a dasi an na mmɔ tena. An ni a ma, mmɔ ma mmɔ faa chɛ koe n ma koe ɔ, miin yau, yɔ an na‑a miin ma.
46010007	Ni chɛ ma, mmɔ ni fenɛ n fai, miin ma Yataa a, yɔ an dɔ n ni a ma buɛ min dɔ. A sin nyɛnden mu ka wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. A ɔ, an‑na buɔdia bɔ wan, a ɔ, daun ba chɛ a, a ɔ, a basan gbɛ minɛ a. A ɔ, an‑na tɔmbɔɛ don fan, a ɔ, an mbe ta‑a fɔɛ yama 'a tachɛ a.
46010008	Mmɔ ma mmɔ boo chɛ waa ma basan yama ɔ, yɔ an dɔ n ni a ma buɛ min dɔ. An‑na a ma, an mɔ wu bi fea kun ma sawa an fa‑a tee dɔndɔɛ a.
46010009	Mmɔ ma Chasi yiima yan, a ɔ yen koe a, ni ko yama yuu mu mmɔ ɛ miin ma, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ tɔɔya. An dɔ n‑na a yiima yan ka wan, mbɛ ka n‑na an chin, an fa‑a.
46010010	Wo sin gbu ma gbonyɛ wɛɛ chɛ. An dɔ n‑na a ma ka wan to, mbɛ kasaa chɛ maeka na‑a, a‑a an kasaa.
46010011	Koe chɛ gbɛɛ miin ma‑a ka, an‑na a ɔ yian fan, koe min mbe ma mɔɛ a, ni i wɛɛ i‑a ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na miin ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mɔɛ n‑na a nyɛn Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, ma koe a dasi a mmɔ ko a. A mu min na, mmɔ ɛ ka tee min kɔɔ, a ɔ ma yansan to mbɛ dunya ban‑da.
46010012	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni ɛ wan mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ ɛ wan sɔ ɔ gban Yataa ko a, a mɔɛ chɛ ni a kun ma fɛn, min mbe a ma, a wɛɛ ma na bea.
46010013	Dɔsiman kan kɔ kan mbe ee wo tan, min sima ma mɔ gbu tan nin bɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn, a sin mbe ee dɔn dɔsimanɛ ni na mɔ gbu tena, i 'a danaya ɔ ma gbɛ min dɔ bia koe a. Ni dɔsimanɛ na‑a i tena tima min na, a tima dɔndɔ gbe chɛ kɔɔ, ɛ chia yian‑da wan e kun buɛ min dɔ, i ni bɔ a ɔ. Ɛ i ɔ gbɛa‑a wan a ɔ bia koe a.
46010014	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n dia nyɔɛ nu, wo ma wo boo chɛ fenɛ n fai koe ɔ, miin ma Yataa a.
46010015	Yiimatɛ tɔɛ mu wo a, chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe koɔ tena wo tena. Wo ni bai chɛ tɛnsɛ wo yii ma, n mbe ka min fɔ‑a wo ye.
46010016	Ni mmɔ ma‑a Mansa Chisɔsi 'a tebu chɛ ma, a yɛ to, ni mmɔ ma‑a gbɛ min‑da kɔpu chɛ ɔ, mmɔ‑a Yataa fai min dua koe a, mmɔ ɛ ma ka Chasi wii an ma sɔn‑da kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ. A sin to, ni mmɔ‑a biidi ɔ kai, mmɔ ni a daun, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a ka Chasi gboo an ma sɔn‑da kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ.
46010017	Mmɔ da a koo, chɛɛ mɔ dɔndɔ gbe mu mmɔ a, a mu min na, mmɔ ɛ biidi gbugbu dɔndɔ gbe an daun.
46010018	A sin, wo Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ma fɛn, ni an mbe koe miin ma. Ni an‑na soe chɛ n daun, an mbe min bɔ ka yasi n na Yataa tena, an mbe ma ka a ɔ yian fan na, mbɛ an bɛ mu Yataa 'a kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ.
46010019	N mbe ee ka a fɔ an na, mbɛ yasi min mbe bɔ fen chɛ n tena, miin ma Yataa a, mbɛ yasi mu, tɔnɔnɛ ee min dɔ. Chɛ ma, mbɛ an fen chɛ n gbu, mbɛ baa kan kɔ kan mbe wan an ma.
46010020	Chɛɛ n mbe min fɔ tena, mbɛ an mbe yasi miin bɔ tena, an mbe an bɔ tena nyina yama n fan ma, an mbe ee an bɔ tena Yataa an tena. A ee dia n ye, n ni wo yen kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, wo bɛ nyina yama n na.
46010021	E ee che ma‑a nɔ, e a min Mansa Chisɔsi 'a kɔpu ɔ, mbɛ e a min nyina yama n ta wɛɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, e ee ma nɔ, e si daun chɛ tena Mansa Chisɔsi 'a tebu ma, mbɛ e si daun chɛ tena nyina yama n bɛɛ a tebu ma.
46010022	Ni i‑a chɛ ma, e a ma tena koe min na, i toen mu Mansa Chisɔsi faa ni yɔn a si i ma. Tea gbu sin ko a, i ɔ ma gbɛ a ni ben Mansa Chisɔsi ma.
46010023	Wo dɔ n mbe a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, “Kɔn mbe ee sa ɔ n ya ɔ, ko ɔ ko ma koe a.” Chɛɛ koe gbɛɛ ma, min nyin a ma koe a wo boo ɔ. Wo ɔ te to, wo ɔ, “Kɔn mbe ee sa ɔ n ya ɔ, ko ɔ ko ma koe a.” Tea gbu mu, chɛɛ mɔ gbu ɛ koe miin gbɛɛ ma, an gbɛɛ an mbe ee che ma‑a basamaya a Chisianɛ n tena.
46010024	Wo ma ma nɔ koe n fan ko a dechee, miin ko a di wo ye. Chɛɛ wo ma nɔ koe n ko a, miin ko a di mɔ dɔ mende n ye.
46010025	Koe yen ko, wo e min ma. Wo e kun fan wo ni fen kan kɔ kan daun, an mbe miin ma tachɛ machiti ɔ. Yiinachii kan kɔ kan mbe ee che ma‑a wo ɔ, an daun fen chɛ daun koe a.
46010026	Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ “Dunya chɛ, ni fen kɔ fen min mbe a ɔ, Mansa Yataa an ta mu an gbɛɛ a.”
46010027	Ni mɔɛ min ma Chisianɛ a, a‑a wo chee daun fenɛ ma, mbɛ wo ta‑a nɔ, wo fen kɔ fen daun, ɛ min be‑a wo ma a daun koe a. Wo ma tisa kan kɔ kan chɛ, a si an daun fen chɛ ma, wo ma a ma, mbɛ yiinachii an mbe wo ɔ.
46010028	(Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ‑a a fɔ wo ye, a ɔ, an daun fen chɛ bɔen mu yasi an na, fenɛ n tena, an mbe miin fai, wo ma an daun fen chɛ daun. Wo ee a daun tena koe min na, an mɔɛ chɛ an ko a mu, ni wo 'a yiinachii gbu ko a.
46010029	N mbe ee a fɔ tena, mbɛ wo ta yiinachii ɔ mu o. Chɛɛ an mɔɛ chɛ ta yiinachii ɔ mu). Koe min na mu, mɔ dɔ mende 'a tataya koe, an mbe ee n ka‑a n faa ma koe ma‑a.
46010030	Ni n‑na Yataa wai bɔ pɛn, mbɛ n‑na daun fen chɛ daun, mɔ ee n ma nyin chɛ ko a. Mɔ ee n ma nyin, koe min na mu, n‑na Yataa wai bɔ.
46010031	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ni ma ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan ma‑a, basɔmaya ni ma i boo ɔ Yataa ko a. A ni ma daun chɛ ko a, a ni ma fen min koe wɛɛ a.
46010032	Wo ma mɔ ɔ mɔ sɔ chia yama ma, wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ. Wo ma Chu mɔ sɔ a ma, ni chɛ n bɛɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a. Wo gbu ma chɔchi ɔ mɔɛ n sɔ chia yama ma.
46010033	Wo koe n ma dechee, yɔ n mbe a ma buɛ min dɔ. N mbe butuinɛ chɛ wan mɔ ɔ mɔ faa chima koe a, n tachɛ buɛ gbɛɛ ɔ. N mbe ee n yii na chii, n fandi a tɔnɔnɛ an ko a. Chɛɛ tɔnɔnɛ chɛ mu, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a, an ni bauncha ma sɔn.
46011001	Chasi na‑a min ma, n mbe bea tena an fan fɛ. Wo wɛɛ, n mbe min ma tena, wo bea an fan fɛ.
46011002	N mbe wo wai bɔ tena, koe min na mu, wo e wo yii na chii tena n na tima ɔ tima ko a. Wo sin mbe bea tena wan kan chɛ fɛ, n‑na min chɛ wo a.
46011003	Chɛɛ n toen mu wo ni a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ musu kan kɔ kan kun ti mu a chɛɛ an na. Mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan sin dunya ɔ, a kun ti mu Chasi an na. Chasi sin kun ti mu Yataa an na.
46011004	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ kaima kan kɔ kan, min mbe ma samunɛ chɛ‑a, chɛ ma, ɛ ma Yataa bai ɔ yian‑da fanka ɔ, banfua ee ma a kunɛ a. Min mbe banfua si‑a a kunɛ a, a‑a baa bɔ a kun ti ma, min mu Chasi a.
46011005	Musu kan kɔ kan sin, min be ma samunɛ chɛ‑a, chɛ ma, ɛ ma Yataa bai ɔ yian‑da fanka ɔ, a kunɛ a chiienɛ ni ma. Min mbe ee a kunɛ a chii‑a, a‑a baa bɔ a kun ti ma, min mu a chɛɛ a. Ɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ an na, an fea musu a, min kunɛ gbanan‑da, a a mau koe a.
46011006	Ni musu min mbe ee na‑a to‑a a kunɛ a chii koe a, ɛ nyan fan a gbu ni a kunɛ ma tɛ wɛɛ. A sin, musu kun gbananɛ ma mauen mu ka buɛ min dɔ, a ma tɛenɛ wɛɛ ɛ yau, mbɛ a ni a kunɛ a chii.
46011007	Mɔ kaima tana, banfua si ko ee a ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa bɔ nyɔɛ mu a a, a sin, a nyin a ni basɔmaya be Yataa ma. Chɛɛ musu tana, a nyin a ni basɔmaya be a chɛɛ an ma.
46011008	Koe min na mu, Yataa ma mɔ kaima a dan ni musu an dɔ. Chɛɛ a‑a musu a dan, a bɔ mɔ kaima an dɔ.
46011009	Mɔ kaima gbu sin, Yataa nii ma a nyan ni musu an ko a. Chɛɛ a na‑a a yii na chii wan, mbɛ a‑a musu a dan, mɔ kaima ko a.
46011010	Chɛ an fɛ mu, kun na chii ɛ musu ko a, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ ɛ gbasaya an kɔɔ, ni maeka n bɛɛ gbu ko a to.
46011011	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ni ma wɛɛ, mmɔ mu buɛ min dɔ ka mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi a, ɛ ka wan. Mɔ kaima, a ee ma dechee a wandi ko a, musu wɛɛ, a ee ma dechee a wandi ko a.
46011012	Chɛɛ a gbu ma‑a boo ɔ boo, mbɛ musu saa bɔ‑a mɔ kaima an dɔ, a ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, mɔ kaima gbɛɛ ɛ bɔ tena musu an dɔ. Yataa sin fan mbe fen kɔ fen na dan tena.
46011013	Wo wandi gbu, wo e kun fan gbɛ wo yiima a tachɛ‑a chɛ ma. Mbɛ tea ee a ɔ, musu ni Yataa fai fanka ɔ, a kunɛ a chii wai a.
46011014	Mauma ko wa mu, mɔ kaima kundi yansanden ba ni ma. Yataa‑a mɔ gbu a dan buɛ min dɔ, a dechee gbu, a‑a mmɔ kan fan chɛ a.
46011015	A sin, mmɔ gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ kundi bɔndenɛ mɔɛ kan kɔ, a mu basɔmaya an na musu ko a. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a be a ma, ma koe a gbasa an na.
46011016	Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ toen mu, a ni chɛ ma nyin, bai chɛ an mbe n da a dechee a ko a. Mbɛ manda dɔ mende ee nn boo ɔ, a ee Chisian chɔchi tɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ boo ɔ, a ka chɛ ma.
46011017	N mbe ka gbɛ na‑a bai miin fɔ‑a wo ye, n mbe ee wo bai tena wan. Koe min na mu, wo e bɛnɛ min chɛ, Yataa fai koe a, wo deman ko ma, wo tɔɔ koe mu.
46011018	Koe saa saa mu min na, mɔɛ n‑na a ɔ yian fan n na, koe min mbe ma, ni wo bɛn‑da chɔchi si tena. Wo kuiɛ a ee kan ɛnden bɛɛ a. N sin danden fan mu chɛ a ɛnden na.
46011019	Tɛnɛ ko ma chɛ a n tena. A gbu nyin fan, wo ni ma sɔ ɔ wo nyɔn kanɛ ɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, tea ɛ miin boo ɔ, an ma ni gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ.
46011020	Ni wo bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, daun chɛ koe a, wo ee ma ka Mansa Chisɔsi 'a daun chɛ bɛnɛ an dɔ.
46011021	Koe min na mu, wo e ma daunɛ chɛ‑a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a chɛ a nyɔn ko a. A sin, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ kɔnkɔ tɔɛ ɛ ma, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ sin gbɛ tɔɛ ɛ.
46011022	Gba! Chenɛ n mbe wan wo boo ɔ, wo e daunɛ chɛ kaina min, wo e fenɛ n min nɔ. Chɛ ma, wo ma wo yii dɛn Yataa 'a chɔchi kun ma. Wo ma mɔɛ chɛ n na mau, fen mbe ee miin boo ɔ. N ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe fen fɔ wo ye, a si chɛ ma. Wo toen mu, n ni wo tando wan. Chɛɛ n mbe ee che wo tando‑a chɛ ko a, ɛnden bɛɛ a.
46011023	Koe min na mu, n bɛɛ n‑na min na ben wo tena, n‑na a ma sɔn Mansa Chisɔsi an na. An na‑a a ma tachɛ ka yɛɛ min ma, a‑a biidi gbugbu ya wan.
46011024	Mbɛ a‑a Yataa wai bɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ɔ kai kai. Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N gboo an nɛ, min mbe wo ko a. Wo chɛ ma tima ɔ tima ko a, wo yii na chii koe a n na.”
46011025	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a to, an ban‑da kɛn kun bɔ a ɔ daunɛ chɛ‑a, a‑a an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma kɔpu wɛɛ a. A‑a a ya wan, mbɛ a ɔ, “N wii an nɛ. Yataa ɛ an ya tena, mbɛ a‑a dɔbɛn nama chɛ a 'a mɔɛ n na. Tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ni ma chɛ min‑da, wo yii na chii koe a n na.”
46011026	Koe min na mu, wo e biidi chɛ daunɛ min chɛ‑a tima sɛsɛ ko a, wo ni gbɛ chɛ wɛɛ min kɔpu ɔ, wo e ma‑a Mansa Chisɔsi 'a saya an dɔ yian‑da den, aan a ni na to.
46011027	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, ni i ma‑a Mansa Chisɔsi 'a biidi chɛ daun‑da, i ma baa bɔ a ma. A 'a gbɛ chɛ wɛɛ min koe ɛ ka wan. Ni i‑a chɛ ma, mbɛ i‑a ko yama an ma ka, Chisɔsi gboo a, i‑a a ma a wii a.
46011028	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a wandi faa ma mɛn pɛn, a e na to biidi chɛ daun‑da, a basan gbɛ chɛ min koe a.
46011029	Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a daun‑da, a ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi gboo an nɛ. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma‑a gbɛ chɛ wɛɛ min‑da, a ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a wii wɛɛ an nɛ. Chɛɛ ni a ma koe chɛ n ma ni a chia ma, ni a gbu ma a ɔ sɔn an sien mu fen ma, Yataa ɛ kaa tɛ‑a wan a ma, a ni a tɔɔ.
46011030	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo sɛsɛ, wo gboo fanka wo ma, gboo ɔ bɔ wɛɛ ee wo ma. A sin, dɔ n gbu fa‑a.
46011031	Chɛɛ ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ wandi ma mɛn pɛn, Yataa ee na‑a kaa a tɛ‑a mmɔ wakoe ma.
46011032	Chɛɛ Mansa Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan mmɔ ma gbɛ, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ koo. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, tee dankama tee kɔɔ, ɛ ma‑a kaa a tɛ‑a dunya chɛ ma mɔɛ n ma, a ee na‑a mmɔ wɛɛ sa‑a an kun ma, a ni mmɔ a tɔɔya.
46011033	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ni wo bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔɛ daun chɛ chɛ tena, wo wo nyɔn ma kɔn.
46011034	Ni kɔnkɔɛ ma‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ a, a ni daunɛ chɛ pɛn a waa chenɛ a. Wo ni chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, ni wo bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔɛ, wo ee na‑a koe ma‑a, Yataa ni kaa a tɛ wo wakoe ma. Min sien mu koe tɔɛ n ma, n mbe chia n yian‑da wan wo a, ni n na‑a tima min na.
46012001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n mbe koɔ tena gbɛ wo tena, a si dua chɛ n fan ma, Yataa Nyina ɛ miin be. Wo na‑a gboo nyɛn, a si an ma. N toen mu wo ni tea ɔ sɔn, a si an ma.
46012002	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tima min na wo nii ma Yataa sɔn, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan wo ni min ma. An‑na wo ka wan a ma, chia sɛsɛ a, wo e ben fenɛ n fai‑a, miin mbe ee koɔ.
46012003	Sanche gbɛ, n toen mu wo ni chɛ an dɔ sɔn. Mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ min fɛ, a ee Chisɔsi main. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a bɔ a da ɔ, a ni Chisɔsi chee mansa a, ni Yataa Nyina ma a sɔ ni chia ma.
46012004	Dua tana, a ma bɔ ni a nyɔn na. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina tana sin, min mbe dua be, ɛ dɔndɔ gbe.
46012005	Chia wɛɛ kɔkoo, mɔɛ ɛ bɔ min na Yataa koe ɔ. Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, mmɔ ɛ min ko a.
46012006	A sin to, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ che wai chɛ‑a a ko a chia miin na, an kɔkoo wan. Chɛɛ a wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe mɔ ɔ mɔ ta chia be a ma, wai chɛ koe a a ko a.
46012007	Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ wan mmɔ tɛ ɔ. Yataa ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ dua wan, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wai chɛ koe a mɔɛ tɔɛ n ni ta ya ɔ ma.
46012008	Mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ɛ nɔ, Yataa Nyina‑a sakana bai min don a da a, a fɔ koe a mɔɛ n ye, yiimatɛ wa an be a ɔ. Mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ sin, Nyina dɔndɔ chɛ‑a a ma wan, yiimatɛ bai wa, ɛ ma a da a bai ɔ.
46012009	Nyina chɛ an mbe a ma to, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, ɛ a kai fa Chisɔsi a gban. Mbɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, a‑a gbasaya be a ma, mɔɛ n baun koe a gbandi n dɔ.
46012010	A Nyina dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe gbasaya be mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ma, kamaya koe n ma koe a. Mbɛ a‑a a be to dɔndɔɛ sin ma, Yataa bai sa koe a. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, gbasaya min mbe a ma, mɔɛ ni nyina n tɛ bɔɛ sɔn, a‑a a be dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ ma. Kamaya bai n fɔ koe wɛɛ to, miin dɔ ee gbɛ ka dechee, ɛ a be wan mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ma. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, an kamaya bai chɛ n fasai koe, a‑a a gbasaya sin be mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ nan ma.
46012011	Yataa Nyina dɔndɔ gbe, an mbe a ma koe chɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe che ma‑a, a ta faa ma a a. Mɔ gbu gbɛɛ, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ ɛ dua chɛ ma sɔn an na.
46012012	Mɔ gbu gboo ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, chɛɛ a sɔna n kɔkoo. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, gboo dɔndɔ gbe chɛ mu tun, sɔna sɛsɛ n mbe wɛɛ a ma. Chisɔsi Chasi wɛɛ ɛ ka wan.
46012013	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mmɔ wan mɔ gbu gbɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ ka wan. Mmɔ ni ma Chu mɔ a, chɛ ma, mɔɛ nu miin ma Chu mɔ a, mmɔ ni ma yɔn fan na, mmɔ ma ma yɔn na. Yii min chɛ‑a mmɔ kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a Nyina‑a mmɔ ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, gboo dɔndɔɛ sɛ‑a mmɔ ma. A sin, Yataa‑a an Nyina dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a na, ma koe a mmɔ fɛ.
46012014	Mmɔ ɛ a fɔ min chɛ ka, mmɔ gboo, mmɔ sɔna dɔndɔ gbe ma.
46012015	Mmɔ a ya gbɛ, mbɛ mmɔ chenɛ gbu ni a fɔ, a ɔ, boo ma a a, a ɔ, chɛ ko a, a ɔ, mmɔ sɔna ma a a. Chɛ ee che a ma‑a, a ta ni ka mmɔ gboo wakoe ma.
46012016	Mmɔ a ya to, mbɛ mɔ gbu too wɛɛ ni a fɔ, a ɔ, a tana, a ɔ, ya ma a a. A ɔ, chɛ ko a, a ɔ, a ta ee gboo koe ma. Chɛ ee che a ma‑a, a ta ni ka mmɔ gboo wakoe ma.
46012017	Ni mɔ gbu gboo gbɛɛ ni dechee ya kuu an na, ko a minɛ nii ma‑a a ɔ. A yɛ to, ni mɔ gbu gboo ni dechee mmɔ too an na, fen kunyɛ a minɛ nii ma‑a a ɔ.
46012018	Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, koe n mbe ka buɛ min dɔ, mmɔ sɔna n gbɛɛ, mmɔ gboo ma, Yataa‑a an dɔ bɛn bɛn fan, a ta faa ma a a.
46012019	Mɔ gbu gboo nii ma‑a nɔ, ni sɔna dɔndɔ gbe ni.
46012020	Tea gbu mu min na, mɔ gbu sɔna n kɔkoo wan, chɛɛ a gbɛɛ mu mɔ gboo dɔndɔɛ a.
46012021	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, ya ee che a fɔ‑a boo ye, a ɔ, a ma gbɔsɔ ee a ma. A yɛ to, n mbe ee a fɔ, kunɛ wɛɛ ni a fɔ chenɛ ma, a ɔ, a ma gbɔsɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee a ma.
46012022	A ka chɛ gbu ma, mmɔ sɔna n gbu wɛɛ, miin dɔ ma gbɛ, mmɔ ee che an to‑a gbaa ko ɔ ko ɔ.
46012023	A sin, mmɔ sɔna chɛ nu, ɛ ma mmɔ yiima baa ee miin ma, kaka, mmɔ ɛ an fan gbu bia chɛndɛ chɛ. Mmɔ sɔna chɛ n sin, miin ma ma kawa ni mmɔ ye, mmɔ ɛ tima ya an fan na.
46012024	Mmɔ ee an tima chɛ ya, mmɔ sɔna chɛ n na, miin ma kawaen mu kaka. Mmɔ gboo chɛ, Yataa wandi gbu wɛɛ, a‑a a ɔ bɛn, a buɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, mɔ ni baa chenama be i gboo kaka n ma, baa bɛnden mu a ni be miin ma.
46012025	Chɛ ni a ma, koɛ ma ma mmɔ sɔna n tɛ, mmɔ gboo ma. Chɛɛ mmɔ sɔna n gbɛɛ, an gbɔsɔenɛ ni ma an nyɔn ko a kuiɛ a kanɛ ɔ.
46012026	Ni mɔ gbu sɔna dɔndɔ wɛɛ tɔɔya‑a, a ni ma a tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a tɔɔya a. Ni an sɔna dɔndɔ a basɔmaya ma sɔn, a tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ni buɔdia bɔ a a.
46012027	Sanche chɛ ɔ, wo gbɛɛ, wo mu Chasi gboo dɔndɔɛ chɛ an na. A sin, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo mu a sɔna n fan na.
46012028	Yataa‑a sɔ tena koe ɔ bɛn fan, Chisianɛ n tɛ chɔchi ɔ. A saa ma‑a min na, a‑a a boo sɔ wan Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n ma. A fean bɔɛ mu, a wan Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fan na. A sawan bɔɛ mu, mɔɛ n kan mɔɛ n fan na. Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ miin mbe kamaya koe n ma, ni chɛ nu gbasaya be‑a miin ma, mɔɛ n danda koe a, deman koe a an ma, an sɔ koe wɛɛ a chia chɛndɛ ma, a basan kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, miin dɔ ee gbɛ ka dechee.
46012029	Mɔɛ gbɛɛ, an ma Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na, an ma Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, an ma mɔɛ n kan mɔɛ n na. A sin, an gbɛɛ an mbe ee kamaya koe n ma.
46012030	Yataa Nyina ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ an dua ni, mɔɛ n baun koe a gbandi n dɔ. A ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ dua ni, kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, miin dɔ ee gbɛ ka dechee. A yɛ to, a ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ dua ni, an kamaya bai chɛ n na ben koe a.
46012031	Chɛɛ wo butuin chɛ, wo faa gbɛɛ a, Yataa Nyina ɛ dua miin chɛ, a kuu ba n fan ko a ni dia wo ye. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, min benden mu chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, an nɛ yɔ n mbe ka na‑a chia min yian‑da wo a.
46013001	Chɛnyɛ koɛ sɛsɛ wa chɛ nu, mɔ gbu n mbe miin fɔ, maeka n bɛɛ an mbe miin fɔ, n ni an gbɛɛ fɔ wɛɛ, koadia ni ma n faa ɔ. Chɛɛ ni koadia ee n faa ɔ, n bɔ mɔ gbu ko a, n da a bai chɛ n mbe wan dechee yɔ tainɛ sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ kuiɛ, chɛ ma, pani tata n mbe ma bɛn bɛn‑da an nyɔn na.
46013002	Chɛ n bɛɛ, n mbe na tena ka miin ma dan‑da, an ni ma wɛɛ n boo ɔ, koadia ni ma n faa ɔ. Gbasaya ni ma n boo ɔ, Yataa da a kuiɛ ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. A ni ma n boo ɔ, koe gbɛɛ mɔ gbu ee kun min dɔ gbɛ koe a, n ni an dɔ gbɛ. A ni ma to n boo ɔ, n ni n kai fa Chisɔsi a gbeden, min mbe che a ma‑a, n ni a fɔ kɔnkɔɛ ma, n dɔ, a ni ka a gba ɔ, mbɛ a kuɛn‑da. Chɛ n gbɛɛ ni ma wɛɛ n boo ɔ, ni koadia ee n faa ɔ, mɔ ma n na.
46013003	N gbu ni n boo fenɛ gbɛɛ be wɛɛ mɔɛ n ma, n ni n fandi gbu be, an ni n minda, koadia ni ma n faa ɔ. Chɛɛ ni a ee a ɔ, n mbe ee ko chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan ma sɔn chɛ gbakɔ.
46013004	Faabia, an mbe koadia ɔ, a basan chinchimaya a. Toomaya ee koadia ɔ, yonkatɛ ee a ɔ, dɔpandaya wɛɛ ee a ɔ.
46013005	Kanbaiya ee koadia a ɔ, faagbandia ee a ɔ, mɔ sin mbe ee i gbɔsɔ dechee i ta ma koe n fan na, a ni ben i bɔɛ ta ma. Koadia ɔ, kakaa ee nɔ, kodomaya sa koe a ɔ.
46013006	Koadia ɔ, mɔ bu ɔ ee dia ko yama ma koe a, mɔ bu ɔ ni dia tea koe an ma koe a.
46013007	Koadia ɔ, mɔ sɔɛ ee bɔ, i bɔɛ ko a. A sin, danaya, yiinatɛ, ni faabia, mɔ gboo ɔ ee fa an na.
