46013008	Kuɔ fɔ koe mu koadia a. Sakana bai n mbe wan nɔ a ka Yataa tena, mɔɛ n mbe miin ma sɔn. Chɛɛ an mbe ma tima kundu an ko a. Dua sɛsɛ ɛ wan nɔ, kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, miin dɔ ee gbɛ dechee. Chɛɛ dua chɛ ɛ ban fan. Yiimatɛ ɛ wan nɔ. Chɛɛ a nan fan bɛɛ danka ɛ.
46013009	Koe min na mu, mmɔ 'a ko sɔnɛ, a a ma ban ni. Yataa da a bai chɛ wɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ min dɔ yian mɔɛ n na, a a ma ban ni.
46013010	Chɛɛ ni koe min na banden mu, ni a che‑a a ma, koe min na ma ban ni, ɛ tuin‑da wan.
46013011	N ni denmɛsɛya ɔ tima min na, n 'na bai sa buɛ, n 'na ko a tisɔn buɛ, a basan n yii si buɛ a koe n ma, an ni wan yɔ den mɛsɛ. Chɛɛ n ma‑a kɛn kai da faenɛ a, n‑na n boo bɔ n 'na den mɛsɛ sɔnɛ n dɔ.
46013012	Sanche gbɛ, mmɔ ɛ koe ɔ yen mia mia, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ ma mɛmɛ ɔ fɛn‑da. Chɛɛ tima ɛ che‑a wan, mmɔ ɛ a yen‑da tima min na gboden, mmɔ ya fea sɔenɛ a nyɔn na. N ma ko a tenden sɔn bɛ, chɛɛ a da ɛ na‑a wan fa a. A da ɛ fa‑a wan, yɔ n bakoe ɔ sɔn koe da faen mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa boo ɔ.
46013013	Chɛ ni ma wɛɛ ma‑a, ko sawa an fan mbe nɔ, miin mbe ma‑a nɔ tun. An mu kai fa an na Chisɔsi a, yiinatɛ a ma, ni a ko a dia koe a mmɔ ye. Ko sawa chɛ n tɛ, a kuu ba mu koadia an na.
46014001	Koadia ni ma wo faa ma koe a, a ben fen fen ma. Chɛɛ wo to chia sɛsɛ chɛ n bɛɛ a, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo dua‑a miin na. A bɛbɛɛ dua chɛ, min mu Yataa da a bai ɔ yian koe a.
46014002	Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min mbe kamaya bai n fɔ, mɔɛ n mbe ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, a ee koɔ ka mɔ gbu n fan tena. Chɛɛ ɛ ma ka koɔ‑a Yataa an tena. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina ɛ ma wan a fɛ, ɛ ma kamaya bai miin fɔ‑a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee an dɔ gbɛ.
46014003	Chia dɔndɔɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe Yataa da a bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, an deman koe mu. Mbɛ a‑a an faa ma nande, an bu ɔ ni dia.
46014004	Mɔɛ min mbe kamaya bai n fɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, ɛ a wandi an deman dechee. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe Yataa da a bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, ɛ basan ka mɔɛ gbɛɛ an ma, miin mbe chɔchi ɔ.
46014005	N toen fan mu, wo gbɛɛ ni kamaya bai sɛsɛ fɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee. Chɛɛ min benden mu chɛ ma, n toen mu, wo ni Yataa da a bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na. Mɔɛ min mbe chɛ ma, a benden mu mɔɛ chɛ ma, min mbe kamaya bai sɛsɛ fɔ. Koe min na mu, ni mɔɛ ma a da a bai ɔ yian ni, mɔɛ n mbe ee demanɛ sɔn chɔchi ɔ.
46014006	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ni n na‑a wo tena, n mbe kamaya bai sɛsɛ fɔ‑a, wo ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, wo ee a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn. Wo ee a sima wɛɛ ma sɔn, mɔɔ ni n‑na a tɛnsɛ wo tena, Yataa ɛ min fɔ tena. Chɛ ma, yiima miin mbe a ɔ, chɛ ma, sakana min nyɔn sima mu a a, chɛ ma, kanɛ minan sima mu.
46014007	A ni ma kuiɛ fenɛ n bɛɛ a, miin mbe ee fɔɛ, yɔ koee, chɛ ma, koninka, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a kuiɛ sɔn, ɛ ma koɔ‑a. Mɔ ee a sɔn, mɔɔ ni a kuiɛ ma‑a bɔ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ.
46014008	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min mbe potani fɛ, ni a ma a fɛ ni chɛndɛ chɛ, soya n mbe ee an ma bɛn chɛɛ chɛ koe a.
46014009	Ɛ ka wan dechee wo wɛɛ ko a. Ni wo ma koɔ ni gbadan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a ɔ gbɛ‑a, wo e ma‑a bai min fɔ‑a. Koe min na mu, wo e ma‑a wo da a kuiɛ sa‑a fia an na.
46014010	Chɛnyɛ koɛ sɛsɛ ɛ wan dunya ɔ, chɛɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɔ, mɔ ee min dɔ gbɛ.
46014011	Chɛɛ ni n ma chɛnyɛ koɛ sɔn, mɔɛ min mbe a fɔ tena n ye, sonda mu a a n tena. N bɛɛ, n mu sonda an na a wɛɛ tena.
46014012	Wo wɛɛ, wo ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ka buɛ min dɔ Yataa Nyina 'a dua ma sɔn koe, wo chɛ ma. Wo e min ma, koe gbɛɛ ya ɔ, dua miin mbe na demanɛ a, chɔchi ɔ, wo ni wai chɛ an pɛn na.
46014013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min mbe kamaya bai n fɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, a ni samunɛ chɛ, gbasaya ni ma nɔ a a ben koe a.
46014014	Ni n‑na samunɛ chɛ kamaya bai bonda chɛ n dɔ, n mbe a chɛ Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Chɛɛ n ta yiima, an mbe ee a ma tena, n mbe a ma.
46014015	Ni ɛ ka wan, n mbe fen ma gbɛ? N mbe samunɛ chɛ‑a wan Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a chɛ to n yiima wɛɛ ɔ. N mbe tando si be‑a wan Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a be n yiima wɛɛ ɔ to.
46014016	Ni wo‑a Yataa fai kamaya bai n dɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, wo e a ma tena Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Ni mɔ gbama ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo ban‑da Yataa wai bɔ‑a an samunɛ chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ ee che a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “A ni ma ka.” Koe min na mu, chia kan kɔ kan mbe ee a boo ɔ, a ɔ gbɛ koe a, samun chɛ sien mu koe min ma.
46014017	Samunɛ chɛ, i‑a min chɛ ka, a ni nyan bɛɛ boo ɔ boo, a ee che ma‑a demanɛ a mɔɛ dɔ mende tena.
46014018	Yataa ni wai. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee nɔ, min mbe kamaya bai n fɔ, a ni che n dɔ.
46014019	Chɛɛ n ni chɔchi ɔ, n mbe ee bai wuu tanɛ sa, kamaya bai n dɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee. A fisa, n ni bai duu gbe sa, chɛnyɛ koɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n mbe min dɔ gbɛ. Chɛ an mbe a ma, n ni an kan.
46014020	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo boo bɔ den mɛsɛ n 'na yiinachii ɔ. Wo wo yii na chii, yɔ gbakoo nu. Chɛɛ ni ko yama ma ɔ mu, wo ma den toa n na.
46014021	A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ, Mansa Yataa ɔ, mbɛ ɛ koɔ‑a wan a 'a mɔɛ n tena, a ɔ, mɔɛ n dɔ, miin mbe koɔ chɛnyɛ koɛ dɔ mende n dɔ. A ɔ, sonda nu, a ɔ, ɛ koɔ‑a an fan dɔ, a ɔ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a ɔ, a 'a mɔɛ n mbe ee an too ma sɔ‑a a ma.
46014022	Chɛ an fɛ mu, dua chɛ, min mu kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, a mu tɔmɔsi an na. A sin, ɛ mɔɛ n fan ko a, miin ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a. A ee mɔɛ chɛ n fan ko a, miin kai faen mu Yataa a. Dua chɛ wɛɛ, min mu bai ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na den, a si Yataa ma, a nɛnɛ ɛ mɔɛ n fan ko a, miin kai faen mu Chisɔsi a. A ee chɛ n ko a, miin ma an kai fa ni a a.
46014023	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ a ya wɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ chɔchi ɔ, an bun‑da kamaya bai n fɔ‑a, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee. Mbɛ ko sɔn bai nu, chɛ ma, mɔɛ nu, miin ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a, mbɛ an don‑da an chɔchi chɛ ɔ. An mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, koɔ chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n wooenɛ mu.
46014024	Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a Yataa bai sa an na, mɔɛ n tena, mbɛ ko sɔn bai don‑da, a yiima ɛ mun‑da wan. Chɛ ma, mɔɛ wɛɛ, min ma a kai fa ni Chisɔsi a, a wɛɛ ta ɛ mun‑da wan. An mbe min na min‑da, ɛ a ma‑a wan, an 'na ko yama ma ni boo an ma. An mbe min gbɛɛ a min‑da, an mbe kaa a tɛ‑a, a si an tachɛ buɛ ma.
46014025	An‑na koe miin ma nun dɔ, miin mbe sa ɔ an yii ma, an mbe bɔ‑a wan ya a ma. An sin, an mbe an kumbai gbangban‑da wan, mbɛ an‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, tea mu, an dɔ, Yataa ɛ wan nɔ an tɛ ɔ.
46014026	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n mbe chɛ an fɔ tena. Ni wo bɛn‑da samun chɛ tena, mɔ dɔndɔ ni ma si sa kun ma, dɔndɔɛ ɛ kan chɛ kun ma. Dɔndɔɛ nan sin, a ni ma nɔ koe ɔ yian koe a, min dɔ nunden mu Yataa boo ɔ. Dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ, a ni ma sakana bai fɔ‑a kamaya bai n dɔ, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee. A yɛ to, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ni ma nɔ, a gbɛɛ ɔ yian koe a, sakana chɛ sien mu koe min ma. Ko ɔ ko min mbe chɛ‑a a ɔ, an ni ma tɔnɔnɛ an na chɔchi tena.
46014027	Ni mɔɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan wo tɛ ɔ, kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, a ni ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, chɛ ma, mɔ fea a, chɛ ma, a ni danka mɔ sawa ma. An sin mbe ma koɔ‑a, an ma koɔ dɔndɔ a, an ni koɔ dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ an na. A sin, mɔɛ ni ma nɔ, an da a kuiɛ a ben koe a.
46014028	Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ee nɔ, min mbe an da a kuiɛ a ben, an ni a ɔ maun don chɔchi ɔ. Ni an ma‑a kamaya bai chɛ n fɔ‑a, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee, an ni koɔ an da kɔɔ wan, Yataa tena.
46014029	Mɔ fea, chɛ ma, mɔ sawa, an fan mbe Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ yian. Mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n sin, an mbe ma nɔ a tɛnsɛ koe an na, an ni tachɛ chɛndɛ.
46014030	Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ dɔ mende to‑a nɔ, chɔchi chɛ ɔ, mbɛ a bun‑da sakana ma sɔn‑da, a ka Yataa tena, mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ min ni koɔ tena, a ni a bia a ma.
46014031	Wo gbɛɛ, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo e kun fan Yataa bai ɔ yian koe ma. Wo ni a ɔ yian, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ni a ɔ gbɛ, an bu ɔ ni dia.
46014032	Dua, Yataa bai ɔ yian koe a, a ɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fan boo ɔ.
46014033	Koe min na mu, Yataa ee koe ɔ basan basan, ɛ na kuiɛ dɔndɔya an na mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. A sin mbe ka wan chɔchi n gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ,
46014034	mbɛ musu n koɔ koe chɔchi ɔ, ko ma kawaen ma, an ni an ma maun don bɛnɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ yɔ Chu mɔɛ n 'na sawa‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, an ni ma kooya gbee an na.
46014035	Ni ko ɔ ko ɛ wan nɔ, an toen mu an ni min dɔ gbɛ, an ni an chɛɛ n dɔ tisa chenɛ a. Koe min na mu, a ma mauen mu, musu ni koɔ bɛnɛ ɔ, chɔchi ɔ.
46014036	Gba! Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma, a ma ka ni wo wan tena. A sin, a ma na ni wo dechee an ko a.
46014037	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a, chɛ ma, a ni a wandi ya, mbɛ dua ɛ wan a boo ɔ, Yataa Nyina‑a a min be. An mɔɛ chɛ ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n mbe ka min gbɛɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi 'a sawa an nɛ.
46014038	Chɛɛ ni a ma chɛ ya ni sɔɛ ma koe a, a wɛɛ ee a ya‑a sɔɛ ma ya mɔɛ a.
46014039	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo faa chɛ Yataa bai ɔ yian koe a, mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ wo ma mɔɛ n na gban, kamaya bai n fɔ koe a, mɔ ee miin dɔ gbɛ ka dechee
46014040	Chɛɛ ko ɔ ko, min mbe chɛ‑a a ɔ, a ni ma chɛndɛ chɛ, a chia ma.
46015001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ka n mbe chɛ puin gbɛ wo yii ma, a si sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ma, n ni min fɔ wo ye. Wo na‑a min na min, a sin, wo 'a kaifa gbu Chisɔsi a, a kuu sien mu an ma gbau gbau.
46015002	An mu sakana bai chɛndɛ a, min mbe che wo baun‑da, ni wo‑a a a tun wo boo si koe a a kɔɔ. Ni wo ma chɛ an ma ni, wo kai faen fan mu fuu Chisɔsi Chasi a.
46015003	A nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, n‑na a a ben ka wan wo tena. Chɛ an mu koe chenama saa saa a, a ɔ gbɛ koe a. Mbɛ Chasi fa‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n fan ko a.
46015004	Mbɛ an‑na a tɔn kɛn, tee fea a sawan bɔɛ ma, Yataa‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. A ma‑a wan ka, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ to Yataa 'a gboo ɔ.
46015005	A sin gbu, a‑a a wandi yian Pita pɛn na, mbɛ an sɔ mɔɛ tan kun ma fea chɛ nu, a‑a a wandi yian to an gbɛɛ a.
46015006	Mbɛ a‑a a ma wan to, a fɛ mɔɛ nu, miin benden ni mɔ chɛmɛ duu ma, a‑a a wandi yian an na, dɔndɔ a. An fɛ den chɛ n dɔ nu, a faen bɛɛ mu gbɛ, chɛɛ an sɛsɛ, an mbe wan bɛ tun ka fɔɛ ɔ sanche.
46015007	Chɛ gbakɔ to, a‑a a wandi yian fan Chimisi a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a a wandi yian a 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.
46015008	A danka‑a gbɔdɛ, a‑a a wandi yian n bɛɛ a. N fan maen mu wɛɛ, yɔ mɔɛ min suun‑da kɔndɔfii ɔ.
46015009	Koe min na mu, Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an benden mu n ma. N gbu sin, mɔ a tenden ma n na, a chee koe a a 'a sɔ mɔɛ a. Koe min na mu, n‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ sa wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma, chɔchi ɔ.
46015010	Chɛɛ Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ, n ma‑a mɔɛ a, n mu mɔɛ min na. A 'a koadia demanɛ chɛ sin, a‑a min be n ma, chia yen‑da wan a ma. Chia dɔ mende sin gbu a, n‑na wai chɛ wan, a ben Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ kan kɔ kan ma. A maen mu wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, mbɛ n fandi an ma a ma ni, n ni koe chɛ n ma. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ an na wai chɛ n na.
46015011	Chɛ ko a gbɛ, a ni ma n na, a ni ma a 'a sɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ n na, nn gbɛɛ nn mbe na tena Yataa 'a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an na. Wo sin bɛɛ, wo danden mu an na.
46015012	Mmɔ 'a sakana bai sanche chɛ ɔ, an nɛ, mbɛ Chasi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. Chɛ ko a, wo dɔ nu, wo ee che to a fɔ‑a, mbɛ kɔɔ sɔ ee nɔ, a ka saya ɔ.
46015013	Ni tea mu an na, mbɛ Chasi wɛɛ, a nii ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni, a ka saya ɔ.
46015014	A sin, ni Chasi chɛ nii ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni, a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ fufafuu mu, Yataa 'a bai ɔ yian koe a. Mbɛ wo kai fa koe wɛɛ Chisɔsi a, fufafuu mu.
46015015	A ka chɛ gbu ma, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a ka fania an fɔ‑a, a si koe ma, Yataa‑a min ma. Koe min na mu, mmɔ wan mbe a fɔ, mbɛ a‑a Chasi kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. Chɛɛ ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ kɔɔ sɔ ee nɔ, a ka saya ɔ, chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ Chasi nii ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni, a ka saya ɔ.
46015016	Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ee a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ Chasi nii ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni.
46015017	Chasi chɛ sin, ni a nii ma a kɔɔ sɔ ni, a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ wo kai faen mu a a fuu. A sin, wo e wan tun wo 'a ko yama boo ɔ.
46015018	A gbu ɛ ma‑a wan to, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin na‑a an kai fa Chasi a, mbɛ an fa‑a, an to‑a saya ɔ.
46015019	Yiinatɛ chɛ, min mbe mmɔ ɔ Chasi ko a, ni a sien mu dunya chɛ ɔ fɔɛ chɛ an ma dechee, ko ee to a gbaa chia a, mbɛ mmɔ ma chinchin‑da. Mmɔ ma chinchin‑da, a ben mɔɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma dunya ɔ.
46015020	Chɛɛ tea gbu ko a, Chasi na‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan, a ka saya ɔ. A ma‑a mɔɛ saa a, a kɔɔ sɔ koe a, chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin na‑a an kai fa a wan Chasi a, mbɛ an fa‑a. Chɛ ni a ma, mmɔ ni dan a a, mbɛ mmɔ wɛɛ ɛ na‑a wan mmɔ kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ.
46015021	Koe min na mu, mɔ kaima dɔndɔ na‑a buɛ min dɔ saya a, dunya ɔ, mɔ kaima dɔ mende na‑a ka wan to kɔɔ sɔɛ a, a ka saya ɔ.
46015022	Adami‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ saya‑a mmɔ gbɛɛ fa, Chasi wɛɛ, ɛ a ma‑a ka wan, mmɔ gbɛɛ ni yɛ fɔɛ ɔ, mmɔ bɛ mu ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a a a.
46015023	Chɛɛ ni a tima che‑a, chɛ ɛ ma‑a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ an na. Chasi pɛn mbe a kɔɔ sɔ‑a. Mbɛ ɛ yɛ‑a to tima min na dunya chɛ ɔ, ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ta mɔɛ n bɛɛ ni an kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ.
46015024	Chɛ gbakɔ, tima ɛ che‑a wan, dunya ban koe a. A tima chɛ a, Chasi ɛ kun‑da wan nyina n gbɛɛ ma, miin mbe sɔ tena nu. Ɛ kun‑da wan ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma, ni fen kɔ fen miin gbasa dunya chɛ ɔ. Ɛ a ma‑a wan fen kɔ fen ni yɛ, mmɔ Fa Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
46015025	Koe min na mu, ɛ ma‑a wan mansaya ɔ, aan Yataa ni kun chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a an si Chasi chen kɔɔ.
46015026	Chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ dankama, Yataa ɛ kun‑da min ma, an nɛ saya a.
46015027	Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, a‑a a ma wan fen fen si‑a Chasi chen kɔɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ ni a fɔ‑a, fen fen, mbɛ a wan Yataa wandi wɛɛ si‑a wan Chasi chen kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, a wan‑na a ma, fen fen si‑a Chasi chen kɔɔ.
46015028	Yataa ban‑da wan a ma‑a, mbɛ fenɛ n gbɛɛ don‑da Chasi 'a mansaya kɔɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a kɛn, mbɛ a tima chɛ a gbɛ, Chasi wandi gbu, a wan denɛ, ɛ don‑da wan gbɛ a Fa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. A Fa Yataa, min‑na a ma, fenɛ n gbɛɛ si‑a Chasi chen kɔɔ. A sin, a wan Yataa 'a mansaya ɛ ma‑a wan fenɛ n gbɛɛ kun ma chɛndɛ chɛ.
46015029	Mbɛ mmɔ mmɔ yii na chii gbɛ bai chɛ ma. Mbɛ yii, ɛ chɛ wan mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, miin mbe fɔɛ ɔ, mɔɛ chɛ n ko a miin faen mu. N ma a ɔ sɔn, ni an yii na tɛen mu fenɛ min ma, ko bonda chɛ ɛ min chɛ an ye. Mmɔ a ya, yɔ mbɛ tea gbu mu, a si bai chɛ ma mɔɛ dɔ n mbe min fɔ tena. Mbɛ mɔ ee i kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, ni i fa a. Ni chɛ mu tea an na, mbɛ yiimatɛ ee a ɔ, yii chɛ koe a mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, mɔɛ n ko a miin faen mu.
46015030	Nn ta nan gbu, ni kɔɔ sɔ ee nɔ, a ka saya ɔ, mbɛ nn mbe ka nn fɔɛ ma tachɛ‑a gbama gbama an ko a.
46015031	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, tee ɔ tee a, n kaa ɔ kaen fan mu saya ko a. N mbe yonka tɛ wan wo wakoe ma, a si fɔɛ chɛ ma, mmɔ ɛ min dɔ. Mmɔ ɛ wan kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, mmɔ bɛ mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a. An fɛ mu, n mbe chɛ fɔ tena den.
46015032	N‑na butuinɛ chɛ wan, Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ, nn fea nyima soe a. N nii ma chɛ ma ni dechee, mɔgbuya ɔ koe an ko a. Chɛɛ tɔnɔnɛ kan kɔ kan mbe ee bɔ‑a chɛ ɔ, ni faa mɔɛ ee a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. Mbɛ ɛ ma‑a wan dechee, yɔ an mbe a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, an dɔ, “Mmɔ ni daunɛ chɛ, mbɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ min,” an dɔ, “koe min na mu, saya ɛ na tena wan sinan bɛɛ.”
46015033	Wo ma a ma mɔɛ n ni wo woo. An mbe a fɔ wan to, an dɔ, “Mmɔ dia nyɔɛ yama nu, an mbe a ma wan, mmɔ wɛɛ sɔnɛ ni yaua.”
46015034	Wo yiima chɛndɛ ni ma gbɛ wo baima, wo ni sɛmbɛ ko yama ma koe a kuɔ fɔ. N mbe chɛ fɔ tena den, mbɛ wo dɔ nu, wo ma ko ɔ ko sɔn, a si Yataa ma. Chɛ ni a ma wo ni mau.
46015035	Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ɛ to‑a wan, a ni a ɔ sɔn, ni mɔɛ miin faen mu, an mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a ka ma, a ka saya ɔ. Ɛ to‑a wan to a ɔ sɔn koe a, ni an‑na an kɔɔ sɔ, an mbe na‑a to dunya chɛ ɔ gboo min nyɔn sima ɔ.
46015036	Woo mɔ tisa an nɛ, e ka min chɛ‑a. Ni i‑a chin fenɛ chin duu gboo ɔ, ɛ tui pɛn, mbɛ a fɛn‑da gbɛ.
46015037	E chin fenɛ min fasi tena, chin fen kuu gbama mu. E ee chin fen fɛnɛ wandi gbu an chin tena, min mbe danka koa‑a.
46015038	Chɛɛ Yataa wandi, an mbe gboo nama be‑a chin fen kuu chɛ ma, a toen mu min be koe a a ma. Gboo min ma bɛnden mu chin fen kuu kan kɔ kan ko a, ɛ an be‑a a ma.
46015039	A sin, fɔɛ fenɛ n gbɛɛ, an soe ee dɔndɔ. Mɔ gbu n ta soe, ɛ dama. Soe n ta ɛ dama, konde n bɛɛ ta ɛ dama, nyɛ n ta ɛ dama.
46015040	A sin to, fenɛ nu, miin mbe banda a, an ta ma buɛ ɛ wan nɔ. Fen chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe yii kɔɔ, an ta gboo n mbe wan nɔ. Fenɛ miin mbe banda a, an nyan buɛ ɛ dama. Fen chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe duu gboo ma, an nyan buɛ, a wɛɛ ɛ dama.
46015041	Tee ta nyan buɛ ɛ dama, kau ta ɛ dama, tɔmbuaka n bɛɛ ta nyanɛ ɛ dama. Tɔmbuaka n dechee nan fan gbu wɛɛ, an 'na nyanɛ n ma bɔ ni an nyɔn na.
46015042	Mɔɛ miin bɛɛ fa‑a ka, an kɔɔ sɔ koe chɛ wɛɛ, a ka saya ɔ, ɛ ma‑a ka wan. Ni mɔɛ su tɔn‑da, ɛ tui wan. Chɛɛ ni Yataa‑a a ma, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, an gboo chɛ tana, a ee tui to kuɔ fɔ ko a.
46015043	Mɔ su ɛ ma tɔn‑da, baa ee ma to a ma. Chɛɛ a kɔɔ sɔ buɛ nan tana, a ka saya ɔ, baa ɛ ma wan a ma. Mɔɛ ɛ ma tɔn‑da, a su chɛ, gbasaya ee ma a boo ɔ. Chɛɛ a kɔɔ ɛ ma sɔ‑a, ɛ ma gbasaya an dɔ.
46015044	Mɔ gbu gboo min mbe tɔn, dunya ma gboo gbama mu. Chɛɛ a kɔɔ ɛ ma sɔ‑a, an gboo chɛ nɛnɛ tana, Yataa Nyina an mbe a be a ma. Mmɔ gbu sin‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ dunya ma gboo ɛ wan nɔ. Chɛ ko a mu, gboo wɛɛ ɛ wan nɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ min be.
46015045	A gbu sin, a nyɛnden mu ka wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ mɔ kaima saa saa, min tɔ ni Adami, Yataa‑a fɔɛ be wan a ma. Mbɛ Adami dankama sin, a mu Yataa Nyina an na, min mbe fɔɛ be.
46015046	Chɛɛ mmɔ 'a dunya ma gboo pɛn mbe sɔ ya ɔ, mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ gboo min be, a na‑a a gbaa chia a.
46015047	Mɔ kaima saa saa chɛ, a bɔ‑a duu gboo an dɔ, a nyan‑da fifii ɔ. Mɔ kaima fean bɔɛ chɛ sin, a ka‑a banda bu ɔ wan.
46015048	A ni ka buɛ min dɔ fifii ɔ mɔɛ a, mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin bɔ‑a fifii ɔ, an mbe ka wan. A sin to, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ chɛ a, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe gbɛ banda bu ɔ ko a, an mbe ka wan.
46015049	Sanche, mmɔ bɔen mu ka buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ chɛ a, min bɔ‑a fifii ɔ, mmɔ ɛ na‑a bɔ‑a ka wan to mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ a, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ.
46015050	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n toen mu wo ni chɛ ɔ sɔn. Mbɛ mɔ gbu e ma i gboo ɔ, wii ɛ i ɔ, e ee don Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ. N mbe baa a, fenɛ min mbe fa, a ni che ma‑a fenɛ a, min mbe ee fa.
46015051	Wo wo too ma sɔ koe chɛ ma, tea chɛ, min dɔ nunden ni tee. Mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ee na‑a fa a. Chɛɛ mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ma ɛ fan‑da wan.
46015052	A tima chɛ a, ɛ na‑a ka wan, a ya kɔɔɛ a. Ɛ ma‑a bui chɛ an na, yɔ mɔɛ e i ya ma kai buɛ min dɔ kabu kabu. Koe min na mu, ni buu chɛ kuiɛ bɔ‑a, buu dankama nɛnɛ chɛ, faa mɔɛ n kɔɔ ɛ sɔ‑a wan, a ka saya ɔ. A sin, an mbe ee na‑a fa a to kuɔ fɔ ko a. A sin to, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ma ɛ fan‑da wan.
46015053	Koe min na mu, mmɔ gboo chɛ, min mbe tui ka, ɛ fan‑da wan gboo a, min mbe ee fa a to, a ni tui.
46015054	Ni fenɛ min mbe fa, ɛ tui, a ma‑a gbɛ fenɛ a, min mbe ee fa, a ee tui, mbɛ bai chɛ ɛ bɔ‑a wan a a, min nyɛnden mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Kunɛ chɛ‑a saya ma, buɔdia kun tɛ‑a gbɛ.”
46015055	Yataa ' a gboo‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “Saya gbu, buɔdia ee to a boo ɔ. A yɛ to, saya 'a gbasaya ban‑da, kasaa chɛ koe a.”
46015056	Ko yama, mmɔ ɛ miin ma, an fan mbe gbasaya be saya ma, mmɔ kasaa koe a. Sawa sin, min be‑a Mosisi ma, an mbe gbasaya be ko yama ma.
46015057	Chɛɛ Yataa ni wai. A‑a buɔdia be mmɔ ma. Mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, Yataa‑a a ma mmɔ kun‑da saya ma.
46015058	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n faa ma suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo sɔ gban wo 'a danaya ɔ. Wo ma ka wo gba ɔ, wo ma Mansa Chisɔsi 'a wai a tima ɔ tima ko a. Koe min na mu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, wai ɔ wai, wo e min chɛ‑a Mansa chɛ ko a, a ee ma wai gbama a.
46016001	N mbe chɛ an fɔ tena gbɛ wo ye, a si kɔpɔ kain koe chɛ ma, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n deman koe a, wo‑a gboo nyɛn a si min ma. Chɔchi chɛ nu pan Kadesia chɛnyɛ ɔ, n‑na an sɔ buɛ min dɔ chia ma, wo wɛɛ, wo a ma ka.
46016002	Tɛnɛ kan kɔɔ dɔɛ kan kɔ kan ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni kɔpɔɛ ɛnden dɔ bɛn, a ni a sa tena ɔ bɛn. Mɔɛ ɛ kɔpɔɛ ma sɔn buɛ min dɔ, ɛ a boo ma sɛ ka wan, mbɛ a‑a a sa tena ɔ bɛn. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, n mbe a fo‑a nɔ tima min na, kɔpɔ ma kain mbe ee ma‑a to nɔ.
46016003	N sin mbe a fo‑a kɛn, n mbe gboo be‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, wo‑a miin yian ma koe a wo 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na. N mbe wo boo fenɛ be‑a wan an ma, an ni ta a a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
46016004	Ni a sin mbe nyan fan, n fandi gbu, n bɛɛ n ni ta, nn bɛ an na, nn mbe ta‑a wan.
46016005	N mbe na‑a wan wo kɔndɔn‑da, ni n‑na Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ tandin, koe min na mu, n toen mu, n ni ben nɔ chia an na.
46016006	N mbe na‑a tima ɛnden ya‑a wan wo tena. Chɛ ma, kɔkɔɛ mmɔ bɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, aan chima tima chɛ ni ban. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, wo e kun fan wo ni basan n ma, n 'na tachɛ ɔ, n ta koe a kaina dɔ mende, a ni ma kan kɔ kan na.
46016007	N ma to ni, n ni na sanche, wo kɔndɔn‑da, min mbe ma dechee tima ɔ wuuma ko a. Ni Mansa Yataa dɔn‑da, n toen mu, n ni tima ɔ yansama ya wan nɔ, mmɔ bɛ ɛ.
46016008	N mbe to‑a nɛ wan Ɛfisɔsi, aan tima min na, Pɛndekɔsi tee chɛ ni che.
46016009	Tima an nɛ n ko a nɛ, Chisian wai kɔkoo tima min na. Wai n fan nɛ, miin nyin an chɛ koe a, n chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n kɔkoo wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo.
46016010	Ni Timoti che‑a wo ma, wo a ma wo ni a ɔ yian a a, mbɛ a che‑a ka a waa wan. Koe min na mu, ɛ ka Mansa Chisɔsi 'a wai an na, yɔ n mbe a a buɛ min dɔ.
46016011	Chɛ ko a, wo ma dɔn mɔ ɔ mɔ wo tɛ ɔ, a ni baa bɔ a ma. Chɛɛ wo ni basan a ma, a ni a 'a tachɛ a tun a ma, faachima ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni yɛ to nɛ, n tena. Koe min na mu, n mbe ma tena wan, a ya ɔ fɛn‑da nɛ, an bɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n na Chasi ɔ.
46016012	Wo 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, a si mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ ma Chasi ɔ, min mu Apɔdɔsi a, ka n mbe koɔ gbɛ a si a ma. N mbe a ma nande n faa gbɛɛ ɔ, a ta koe a wo kɔndɔn‑da, an bɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ dɔ n na Chasi ɔ. A bu ɔ nii ma di ɛnden bɛɛ a, na koe a nɔ sanche. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ni a‑a tima ma sɔn, ɛ na‑a wan nɔ.
46016013	Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma, tima ɔ tima. Wo sɔ gban, wo 'a danaya ɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi a, wo sin ma chian. Wo ɔ ni gbɛa gbau.
46016014	Wo e koe min gbɛɛ ma, wo a ma koadia faa a.
46016015	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, sanche chɛ ɔ, wo‑a a koe ɔ sɔn fan, a si Sitɛfanasi ma, ni a 'a chen na mɔɛ nu. An fan pɛn‑na an kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, Akaya chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ. A sin, an‑na an fandi be, wai chɛ koe a, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ko a. N mbe chɛ ma din wo tena,
46016016	wo ni don ya ɔ sɔɛ sima chɛ n kɔɔ. Wo gbu ni don mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan kɔɔ, miin mbe wai chɛ chɛ tena.
46016017	N bu ɔ di kaka, Sitɛfanasi na koe a, an fea Fɔtunatɔsi a, ni Akaikɔsi. Wo ee nɛ chɛ, an fan yɛ‑a ka wo gba ɔ.
46016018	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, n faa chima‑a, yɔ wo ta wɛɛ ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ. A nyin wo ni baa be mɔ bonda chɛ n ma chɛndɛ chɛ.
46016019	Chɔchi mɔɛ miin mbe Esia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, an ni wo kɔndɔn. Akuida wɛɛ, an fea a 'a musu Pisida a, an‑na wo kɔndɔn. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe bɛn an 'na chenɛ a, an bɛɛ‑a wo kɔndɔn, buɔdia kɔndɔnɛ a.
46016020	Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ Chasi ɔ, an mbe wo kɔndɔn tena. Wo wɛɛ, ni wo bɛn‑da, mbɛ wo‑a wo nyɔn kɔndɔn koadia faa a.
46016021	N fandi gbu, n fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da, n ni wo kɔndɔn.
46016022	Mɔ ɔ mɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi ko a ee dia min ye, danka ni ma a fɛ. Mansa Chisɔsi, na wɛ nn ye.
46016023	Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo dua.
46016024	Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, n 'na koadia ni ma wo gbɛɛ fɛ.
47001001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, nn fea mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ a Chasi ɔ, min mu Timoti a. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na. Yataa wandi an dɔn‑da, n ma koe a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ a. N mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wɛn mbe Yataa 'a chɔchi ɔ, Kɔyindi duu ɔ, wo bɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe nɔ Akaya chɛnyɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
47001002	Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
47001003	Tando ni be Yataa ma. A wan mu mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa. Chinchincha Fa mu a wan Yataa an na. A sin fan mbe mmɔ nande chia kan kɔ kan na.
47001004	Ko gbɛama gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ nn nande wan. Ɛ chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, nn bɛɛ ni che mɔ dɔ mende nande‑a, miin mbe ko gbɛama dɔ mende n dɔ. Yataa ɛ nn nande buɛ min dɔ, nn bɛɛ ni mɔ dɔ mende bɛɛ nande a buɛ ɔ.
47001005	Ko gbɛama miin dɔ ɛ bia, Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, a koo kaka. Ɛ ka wan to, yɔ nn mbe nande min ma sɔn, Chisɔsi Chasi a, a wɛɛ koo kaka.
47001006	Ni nn‑na ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia tima ɔ tima, wo nande koe mu, wo ni bauncha ma sɔn. Ni nn‑na nande ma sɔn, mbɛ wo wɛɛ‑a a ma sɔn. Mbɛ wo‑a fanka ma sɔn, wo faa bia koe a, wo ni ko yawaen chɛ n dɔ bia, nn bɛɛ‑a miin dɔ bia.
47001007	Nn faa ma gbaa ni ɛnden bɛɛ a, a si wo ma. Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ nn‑na ko yawaenɛ min dɔ bia, wo wɛɛ‑a an dɔ bia. Chɛɛ nn‑na a ɔ sɔn ka wan to, mbɛ nn‑na nande min bɛɛ ma sɔn, wo wɛɛ‑a a ma sɔn fan.
47001008	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn ma to ni wo ni ma ka, ni nn ma‑a chɛ ɔ yian ni wo a. Ko gbɛama chɛ, nn‑na min dɔ bia Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ, nn ni a ɔ yian wo a. Suunɛ min na‑a si nn kun ma, a ni koo, a ni fanka ka wan to. A na‑a a ma wan, nn yii nii to ma koe a fɔɛ ɔ.
47001009	A ni wan gbɛ nn yii ma, mbɛ saya ni gbɛ nn ma chen da a wan. Chɛɛ chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, nn ni sɛmbɛ dan koe a nn fandi 'a gbasaya a. Nn ni nn yii sɔ Yataa ma, a dechee, a wɛn mbe a ma, faa mɔɛ n mbe an kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ.
47001010	A na‑a nn kun bɔ wan saya ma chianden ba ɔ. A sin mbe na‑a nn kun bɔ‑a ka wan to a ɔ. Nn sin yii na tɛen fan mu a ma, mbɛ a gboo ɔ ee fa‑a nn kun bɔ koe a a ɔ.
47001011	Wo basan nn ma, samunɛ chɛ koe a nn ko a. Ni mɔ sɛsɛ n ma‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a nn ko a, Yataa ɛ an 'na samunɛ n na min‑da wan, mbɛ a‑a nn dua. Ni chɛ ma‑a, mɔ sɛsɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe Yataa wai bɔ‑a wan nn ko a.
47001012	Nn mbe yonka tɛ ko dɔndɔ gbe an na, nn gbu sin yii na koen mu an na dechee. An nɛ, mbɛ nn mbe fɔɛ min dɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, a bɛbɛɛ nn tachɛ buɛ wo tena, mbɛ Yataa fɔɛ mu, tea ɛ min dɔ. Nn mbe chɛ ma tena Yataa 'a duaya an dɔ, mɔgbuya ta yiimatɛ ɔ ma.
47001013	Nn mbe gboo min nyɛn wo tena dechee, an nɛ gboo a, wo e che min kan‑da, wo e min dɔ gbɛ. Chɛɛ wo‑a nn dɔ gbɛ ka buɛ min dɔ chia dɔ a, ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo e nn dɔ gbɛ‑a wan chia gbɛɛ a. Chɛ ni a ma, tee chɛ ma, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi na tee, wo ni yonka tɛ nn ma, yɔ nn bɛɛ a tɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ wo ma.
47001015	N danden fan mu chɛ a. An fɛ mu, n toen ni, n ni na wo kɔndɔn. N ni na, min mbe a ma, wo ni dua ma sɔn gba fea ko a.
47001016	N toen ni n ni che wo ma, ni n ma‑a ta‑a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, ni n ma‑a yɛ‑a a ka nɔ. N ni chɛ ma‑a, min mbe a ma, wo ni n deman, n 'na ta chɛ ɔ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
47001017	N ni yiinachii chɛ chɛ tena tima min na, n ma a ɔ sɔn ni yiima fea an ni n dɔ. N ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe ma yiinachii chɛ chɛ‑a, ni n mbe a chɛ mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia an na. Ni n ma bɛndenɛ an mbe ma, dɔn koe a, ni ban koe ma, fɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ.
47001018	Yataa ee a da a kuiɛ ka a gba ɔ tima dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n bɛɛ n mbe ee che wo too ɔ dia‑a bi koe a, mbɛ sinan n‑na n yiima mun, n dɔ n mbe ee a ma to.
47001019	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a denɛ Chisɔsi Chasi, a ee ka. Sidasi ni ma, Timoti, ni n fan, nn na‑a a wakoe ɔ yian fan wo a. A wan Chisɔsi ee dɔn koe ma, mbɛ a ban‑da to a ma. Chɛɛ a ta nan gbu, tima ɔ tima ko a, a dɔndenɛ an mbe ma a ma.
47001020	Koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ tooɔdia min gbɛɛ chɛ, Chisɔsi an mbe a gbɛɛ a tachɛ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ɛ a fɔ, mmɔ ɔ, “A ni ma ka,” Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ, basɔmaya be koe a Yataa ma.
47001021	Chɛɛ Yataa wandi an‑na nn ma chɛndɛ chɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi a, a basan wo wɛɛ a. Yataa wandi an‑na a boo sɔ nn ma, wai chɛ koe a a ko a.
47001022	A sin fan‑na a boo gba to nn ma, a ɔ yian koe a, mbɛ nn mbe a wan ko a. A Nyina wɛɛ, a‑a a be wan nn ma to ma koe a nn fɛ. A ni a ma, nn ni dan a a, koe miin gbɛɛ a a boo ɔ nn ko a.
47001023	Chɛɛ Yataa an mu n 'na sii a, a si bai chɛ ma, n mbe ka min fɔ‑a wo ye. Mbɛ n toen ni, n ni wo to wan nɔ, an na‑a a ma n ma yɛ ni nɔ wo tena Kɔyindi duu ɔ.
47001024	Nn mbe ee a din tena wo ma fɔsɛɛ a, wo e dan koe min na. Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi a gban. Nn mbe a ma tena, tee ɔ tee a, mmɔ bɛ ɛ wai chɛ tena, wo 'a buɔdia ko a.
47002001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na n yii na chii, mbɛ n ma na to wo tena, n ni wo faa yɔn.
47002002	Koe min na mu, ni n‑na wo faa yɔn, mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ee ma‑a to nɔ n bu ɔ dia koe a. Chɛ ee ma‑a, fɔ wo wan dechee, n‑na wo wɛn faa yɔn, wo wan mbe n bu ɔ dia.
47002003	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na gboo saa chɛ nyɛn wo tena, n na‑a min nyɛn ka. N nii ma to ni, n ni na nɔ, mbɛ n‑na faayɔnɛ ma sɔn wo a, wo wɛn mbe a ma, n bu ɔ ni dia. Koe min na mu, n danden fan mu a a, mbɛ ni n bu ɔ dia‑a, mbɛ wo gbɛɛ bu ɔ dia‑a.
47002004	N‑na gboo saa chɛ nyɛn wo tena tima min na, n faa yɔnden ni kaka, n bu ɔ nii ma di ɛnden bɛɛ a, di an ni n ya a. N 'na yiinachii nii ma, n ni wo faa yɔn. Chɛɛ n toen ni wo ni a ɔ sɔn, wo 'a koadia da a koo buɛ min dɔ n faa ɔ.
47002005	N fan tena ma, chɛɛ mɔɛ ɛ nɔ wo tɛ ɔ, min naen mu faayɔnɛ a wo gbɛɛ tena. N ni a fɔ wo ye, tea ɔ, mbɛ a naen mu faayɔnɛ a wo tena, chia dɔndɔ an na. Chɛɛ n ma to ni, n ni an koe chɛ ma chian, a ben a gbu ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
47002006	Wo sɛsɛ, wo e tɔɔya min chɛ‑a a mɔɛ chɛ a, a‑a a kun a ko a.
47002007	Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ nyan fan gbɛ wo ni a to nɔ, mbɛ wo‑a a nande. Ni chɛ ma, faayɔnɛ ɛ koa‑a wan a ma.
47002008	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo disa tena, wo ni a ɔ yian to a a, mbɛ wo toen fan mu a a chɛndɛ chɛ.
47002009	N na‑a gboo chɛ nyɛn wo tena chɛ an na, n ni wo yiima yan. N ni a ɔ gbɛ, ni n 'na dasi nu, wo ma bɛnden fan mu tima ɔ tima ko a a ya koe a.
47002010	Mɔ ɔ mɔ, wo e min to‑a nɔ, a 'a ko yama ko a, n bɛɛ n mbe a to‑a wan nɔ. N‑na ko ɔ ko min to nɔ, ni tataya koe gbu ma wɛɛ, n mbe a ma‑a wan wo ko a, Chasi chen kɔɔ.
47002011	Chɛ ni a ma, Sitana ma na mmɔ bɔ yaa a. Koe min na mu, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan a yiima ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
47002012	N che‑a wan Towasi duu ɔ, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian koe a nɔ, a si Chasi ma. N che‑a kɛn, n‑na a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a chia sa wan nɔ, a 'a wai chɛ koe a.
47002013	Chɛɛ n faa nii ma chima ni, koe min na mu, n nii ma Taitɔsi tan ni nɔ, n suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, n‑na n saa nɔ mɔɛ n na, mbɛ n ta‑a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
47002014	Chɛɛ n mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena. Nn ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, Chisɔsi Chasi a. An mbe a ma tena tima ɔ tima ko a, nn mbe kun Sitana ma. A sin, Yataa ɛ a ma wan, nn mbe sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian kan kɔ kan, a si Chasi ma, yɔ fen kunyɛ a diama ɛ ta buɛ min dɔ.
47002015	A mu min na, nn mbe wan yɔ fen kunyɛ a diama, Chasi‑a min be Yataa ma. Fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ, min mbe che chɛ n ma, miin mbe gbɛ bauncha ma sɔn‑da, ni chɛ nu, miin mbe kasaa tena, an 'na ko yama n boo ɔ.
47002016	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe kasaa tena, an mu fen kunyɛ yama an na, min mbe na saya a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tana, miin mbe bauncha ma sɔn tena, kunyɛ a diama mu, min mbe fɔɛ be. Mɔ bonda chɛ sima ee to nɔ gbɛ, min mbe kun ko bonda chɛ sima ma koe ma, a ta gbasaya a.
47002017	Koe min na mu, nn mbe ee ka yɔ mɔ sɛsɛ dɔ nu, miin mbe Yataa 'a bai ya, fen sɔn koe a a ɔ dechee. Chɛɛ Yataa an‑na nn sɔ. An fɛ mu, nn fan wai chɛ mɔɛ nu Chasi ye, nn mbe a 'a sakana bai ɔ yian tea chia a, a chen kɔɔ.
47003001	Nn‑na gboo min nyɛn ka, a ee a ɔ yian tena, mbɛ nn bun‑da ka yonka an tɛ‑a, a si nn fandi ma. Nn mbe ee ka yɔ mɔɛ dɔ nu. Nn ma to ni mɔ ni nn pɛmbɛ gboo chɛ nyɛn koe a wo tena. Nn ma to ni wo wɛɛ, wo ni a nyɛn, a si nn bakoe ma.
47003002	Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu wɛɛ, wo wan mu nn 'na gboo a, min mbe nn pɛmbɛ. Gboo chɛ sin nyɛnden mu nn faa n fan dɔ, mɔɛ gbɛɛ‑a a kan kaina min, an ni a ɔ gbɛ.
47003003	Wo gbu sin mbe a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ nn‑na wai min chɛ, a gbɔɛ mu wo wan na. Mbɛ gboo mu wo a, min ka‑a Chisɔsi Chasi tena. Wo ta gbooya sin dɔ, wo ma nyɛn ni pɛnɛ inki an na. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina, min mbe fɔɛ be, an‑na wo nyɛn. A yɛ to, wo ma nyɛn ni sen sɛndenɛ an ma, chɛɛ a‑a wo nyɛn mɔɛ n faa ɔ wan.
47003004	Nn mbe chɛ fɔ tena, koe min na mu, danaya koo nn dɔ Yataa ko a, Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ.
47003005	Nn fandi gbu, an ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ nn mbe kun fan nn ni wai chɛ chɛ nn ta gbasaya a. Nn 'na gbasaya, ɛ ka Yataa an tena.
47003006	An‑na a ma nn ma‑a wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ n na, Yataa 'a dɔbɛn nama chɛ ko a. Dɔbɛn nama chɛ sin, sawa ma min nyɛnden mu, chɛɛ Yataa Nyina mu. Sawa min nyɛnden mu, ɛ na saya an na, chɛɛ Yataa Nyina ta na, ɛ na fɔɛ an na.
47003007	Sawa kɔma n nyɛndenɛ ni senɛ an ma. A sin, a ni be tena tima min na Mosisi ma, Yataa 'a manɛ na‑a yen fan. Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nii ma che ni Mosisi ma fɛn‑da kaka, koe min na mu, a manɛ kɔ ni gbɛɛ. Chɛɛ a ya kɔɔɛ chɛ gbu nii ma man ni tima ɔ yansama ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, sawa chɛ min mbe na ka saya a, ni a manɛ ma‑a ka, chɛ ɛ koe an dɔ yian tena.
47003008	Mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ wai min chɛ, a manɛ ɛ koa‑a wan, a ni ben sawa ta ma. Tea mu chɛ a.
47003009	Koe min na mu, sawa chɛ, min mbe a ma kaa ɛ tɛ mmɔ ma, mmɔ ni tɔɔ, ɛ na wan manɛ a. Ni chɛ ɛ ma wan, mbɛ Yataa Nyina ta manɛ tana, ɛ koa‑a wan kaka. Koe min na mu, a wan mbe mɔɛ n ya mɔ tandenɛ n na Yataa chen kɔɔ.
47003010	Mmɔ a fɔ gbɛ tea ko a, mbɛ manɛ min mbe sanche, a koo a ɔ benden ba a. Chɛ ko a, manɛ chɛ min ni nɔ a kɔma a, a ma to ko a.
47003011	Koe min na mu, koe min mbe tuin gbae, ɛ ma wan manɛ a, mbɛ koe min nan gbu sin mbe ma nɔ kuɔ fɔ, a ta manɛ ɛ koa‑a wan kaka.
47003012	Chɛ an fɛ mu, yiinatɛ chɛ sima ɛ ka buɛ min dɔ nn dɔ, chian mbe ee nn dɔ.
47003013	Nn mbe ee ka yɔ Mosisi, min na‑a koa bun a ya a. A na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ma na a ya kɔɔɛ yen, ɛ man‑da, mbɛ an man chɛ tuin‑da.
47003014	An gbu sin, tea ko a, an na‑a fo wan ko ɔ gbɛ yiimatɛ a. Koe min na mu, bi tee chɛ wɛɛ a, Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ kɔma chɛ, an mbe ma a kan‑da, a maenɛ mu yɔ an yiima ɛ koa an kɔɔ. Koa chɛ sin, min mbe mɔɛ yii kun ma, ɛ bɔ nɔ dechee tima min na, an nɛ tima chɛ a, mɔɛ ɛ ma tima min na mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi a.
47003015	Bi tee chɛ wɛɛ a, tima ɔ tima ni an ma‑a sawa chɛ n kan‑da, miin na‑a be Mosisi ma, an yiima ɛ tun koa chɛ an kɔɔ.
47003016	Chɛɛ koa chɛ, ɛ ka wan mɔɛ ya a, tima ɔ tima dechee, ni mɔɛ a a ya a mun Mansa Chisɔsi ma.
47003017	Mansa chɛ mu gbɛ Yataa Nyina an na. A sin, Yataa Nyina chɛ ɛ ma kaina min, yɔncha ee ma nɔ.
47003018	Mmɔ gbɛɛ sin, koa kan kɔ kan mbe ee to bun dɔ mmɔ ya a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ɛ Mansa 'a manɛ an na ta, yɔ mɛmɛ. Yataa Nyina sin, min mu Mansa chɛ a, ɛ a ma tena wan, mmɔ ma‑a tee ɔ tee a Yataa bɔ nyɔɛ a, manɛ ɔ.
47004001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn faa ee yɔn wai chɛ chɛ koe a. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a chinchincha ɔ mu, a‑a wai chɛ be nn ma a chɛ koe a.
47004002	Chɛɛ nn‑na nn yii na chii, nn ma nn boo chɛ ni mauma koe kan kɔ kan dɔ, a ni ma nun dɔ wɛɛ a. Nn sin mbe ee koe n ma, miin mbe mɔɛ n bun. Nn gbu sin mbe ee Yataa 'a bai ma sa chia ɔ chia a. Chɛɛ nn mbe fɔɛ min dɔ, Yataa chen kɔɔ, basɔmaya da faenɛ kɔɔ mu. A sin, chɛ ɛ na tena wan pɛmbɛ a nn ko a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ tena, yiinachii chɛndɛ ɔ.
47004003	A sin, nn mbe chɛ ma tena wɛɛ, mɔɛ dɔ n mbe ee che Yataa bai chɛ ɔ gbɛ‑a, nn mbe min dɔ yian tena. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe ee a ɔ gbɛ, an mu chɛ n fan na, miin mbe kasaa tena.
47004004	An mbe ee che dan‑da Yataa bai chɛ a. Koe min na mu, an yiima ɛ tun pimbi an dɔ, Sitana boo ɔ, min 'na gbasaya ɛ dunya chɛ kun ma. A wan mbe a ma tena, an mbe ee man chɛ yen, ɛ ma man‑da an ma. Manɛ chɛ, min mbe ka sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma. A wan Chasi chɛ, an mu Yataa bɔ nyɔɛ a.
47004005	Nn mbe sakana bai min dɔ yian, a ma si ni nn fandi an ma. Chɛɛ a gbu an nɛ, mbɛ Chisɔsi Chasi an mu mansa a. Nn tana sin gbɛ, nn mu wo 'a yɔnɛ n fan na, Chisɔsi ko a.
47004006	A sin, Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Manɛ ni be, a bɔ pimbi ɔ.” A wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe a ma a 'a manɛ ɛ ma mmɔ faa n dɔ. A ni man, a ni a ma, mmɔ ni yiimatɛ sɔn, a si Yataa 'a manɛ ma. Man chɛ, min mbe yen tena man‑da, a ka Chisɔsi Chasi ya kɔɔ.
47004007	Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina 'a tɔnɔnɛ ma kawaenɛ ɛ ka mmɔ wɛn boo ɔ, mmɔ ɛ wan yɔ boo da. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ gbasaya ɛ Yataa an boo ɔ, mmɔ wan ma.
47004008	Tima sɛsɛ ko a, ko gbɛama ɛ nn tan fan, chɛɛ a ee nn nimisa‑a. Tima dɔsa an na, nn kɔndɔ fiien ba an mbe ma, chɛɛ nn yii fa tena ɛ wan.
47004009	An mbe ko ma gbaaenɛ n sa wan nn ma, chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ wan nn kɔɔ. A sin, dumɛ ɛ si wɛɛ nn na tima dɔ n na, chɛɛ a ee ma kasaa a nn ma.
47004010	Tima ɔ tima ko a, Chisɔsi na‑a saya min chɛ, ɛ wan ben tena nn fɛ nn gboo ɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, ɛ fɔɛ nama min dɔ, a ni yen nn dɔ.
47004011	Nn 'na fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, saya ɛ wan tun ben‑da nn na san‑da, Chisɔsi wakoe a. Chɛ ni a ma, a ni fɔɛ min nyɔn sima ɔ, a ni yen nn gboo chɛ ɔ.
47004012	Chɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ saya ɛ wan tun ben‑da nn na san‑da. Chɛɛ wo tana, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an mbe wo ko a.
47004013	Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, “N‑na n kai fa Yataa a, an fɛ mu, n mbe bai chɛ sa.” A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, nn bɛɛ, nn na‑a bai sa wan, koe min na mu, nn bɛɛ kai faen mu Yataa an na.
47004014	Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa an‑na a ma, Mansa Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ. Ɛ a ma‑a wan nn bɛɛ kɔɔ ni sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, nn ni bɔ Chisɔsi gba ɔ. A sin mbe ta‑a wan nn na, a basan wo wɛɛ a, mmɔ ni ma a chen kɔɔ.
47004015	Koe min na mu, wo ko a mu, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ n mbe ma tena. A sin, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ɛ che tena buɛ min dɔ mɔ sɛsɛ ma, an bɛɛ, an mbe Yataa wai bɔ ka wan, min mu basɔmaya a a tena.
47004016	Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn faa ee yɔn. Nn gboo chɛ, mɔgbuya ɔ, ɛ na tena wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo tui‑a, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina min mbe nn fɛ, a ɔ gbɛama mu tee ɔ tee a.
47004017	Nn mbe ko gbɛama miin dɔ bia tena ka sanche, ɛndenɛ mu, a sin, an dɔ ee mɛ tena. Chɛ an mbe na‑a kuɔ fɔ tɔnɔnɛ wa an na, min benden mu kaka ko gbɛama chɛ n ma.
47004018	Koe min na mu, nn yiima ee koe chɛ n fan ma, mɔ gbu ɛ miin yen a ya a. Chɛɛ ɛ fen chɛ n fan ma, mɔ gbu ee min yen a ya a. Mɔ gbu ɛ fenɛ min yen ka a ya a, ɛ ma dechee tima kundu an ko a. Chɛɛ mɔ gbu ee fenɛ min yen a ya a, ɛ ma wan kuɔ fɔ ko a.
47005001	Koe min na mu, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni mmɔ ɛ ka nɛ tɛndi gbama min kɔɔ, min mu mmɔ gboo chɛ a nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, ni a kasaa‑a, Yataa ɛ chenɛ be‑a wan mmɔ ma. A wandi gbu an‑na chen chɛ a dan, mmɔ ma koe a nɔ. An chen chɛ sin, banda bu ɔ, a ee te kuɔ fɔ ko a.
47005002	Mmɔ ɛ wan gbɛ nɛ dunya ma, mmɔ ɛ kuun tena wan. Buɔdia min mbe mmɔ ɔ, a koo kaka an gboo nama chɛ ko a. Mmɔ toen mu gbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ ma, mmɔ 'a gboo nama chɛ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a ni sɛ gbɛ mmɔ ma.
47005003	Gboo nama chɛ sɛenɛ ɛ ma‑a mmɔ ma, mmɔ ma senɛ ee ma‑a to.
47005004	Tima min na wɛ mmɔ ɛ dunya ma gboo chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ kuun tena wan, tɔɔya ɔ. An ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ mmɔ toen mu mmɔ ma senɛ ni ma. Chɛɛ mmɔ toen mu, banda bu ɔ gboo chɛ, a ni sɛ mmɔ ma. Chɛ ni a ma, mmɔ 'a dunya ma gboo chɛ, a ni mun kuɔ fɔ nɛnɛ a.
47005005	Yataa wandi gbu, an‑na a ma, mmɔ ma bɛndenɛ mu koe chɛ a. A sin to, a wan‑na a Nyina be mmɔ ma, a ɔ yian koe a mmɔ a, mbɛ ɛ fen chɛ n gbɛɛ be‑a wan mmɔ ma, miin mbe sa ɔ a boo ɔ mmɔ ko a.
47005006	Chɛ an fɛ mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, faachima koo mmɔ ɔ. Mmɔ gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni mmɔ ɛ wɛ tun dunya ma gboo chɛ an dɔ, mbɛ mmɔ ee ma‑a Mansa Chisɔsi waa a.
47005007	Mmɔ ɛ tachɛ buɛ min dɔ fɔɛ ɔ, ɛ bɔ mmɔ kai fa buɛ an dɔ Chisɔsi Chasi a, a ee bɔ koe n fan dɔ, mmɔ ɛ miin dɔ yen.
47005008	Chɛ ko a, faachima koo mmɔ ɔ. A sin, mmɔ ɛ to‑a wan mmɔ ni bɔ dunya ma gboo chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ min dɔ, mbɛ mmɔ ma‑a, mmɔ bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a.
47005009	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni ma nɛ wan, mmɔ ni ma pan fan, mmɔ toen mu, mmɔ ni a faa chima koe n ma. An mu mmɔ faa ma koe chenama a, a ben ko ɔ ko ma.
47005010	Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ sɔ‑a wan Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ tee dankama tee ma, a ni kaa a tɛ mmɔ wakoe ma. Ɛ mmɔ gbɛmbo‑a wan dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ sin mbe koe miin ma‑a, dunya ma gboo chɛ ɔ, an koe n ni nyan, an ni yaua wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ an pawa ma sɔn‑da.
47005011	Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, Mansa Yataa ma chianɛ mu koe min na. Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn mbe butuin chɛ mɔ dɔ mende yiima mun koe a chɛndɛ, a si a ma. Yataa‑a nn sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ. A sin, n yii na tɛen fan mu, wo ta yiinachii gbu wɛɛ ɔ, wo‑a n sɔn fan.
47005012	Wo ma a yen, mbɛ nn mbe nn fandi pɛmbɛ tena wan to wo tena. Chɛɛ nn mbe ka min ma‑a, nn mbe dɔ yian chɛndɛ an chɛ tena wo a, min mbe a ma, wo ni yonka tɛ nn ma. Chɛ ni a ma, wo ni che mɔɛ dɔ n da a kuiɛ yɛman‑da. Mɔɛ dɔ nu, miin mbe yonka tɛ mɔɛ ma buɛ ma a gboo ma, an mbe ee na a tɛ a sɔnɛ ma.
47005013	Koe min na mu, ni nn wooen bɛɛ mu, mbɛ Yataa an ko a mu. Chɛ ma, ni nn yiima tɛen fan mu, mbɛ wo sin fan ko a mu.
47005014	Chisɔsi Chasi 'a koadia, an mbe tachɛ tena mmɔ a. Mmɔ ban‑da ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ a ɔ sɔn‑da, mbɛ a dɔndɔ gbe an fa‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ko a. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ fa‑a wan, a 'a saya chɛ ɔ.
47005015	A sin gbu, a na‑a fa mɔɛ gbɛɛ an ko a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ gbɛɛ, miin mbe fɔɛ ɔ, an mbe ee to a ɔ an fandi an ko a. Chɛɛ an mbe gbɛ fɔɛ ɔ, Chasi an ko a. A wan fa‑a, mbɛ a kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a ka saya ɔ, an ko a.
47005016	Chɛ an fɛ mu, a ka gbɛ sanche ma, mmɔ ee mɔ ɔ mɔ ya to mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a. Mmɔ na‑a Chasi wɛɛ ya boo ɔ boo mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a, tima dɔndɔ a, mmɔ ee an yiinachii chɛ chɛ tena to a a.
47005017	Chɛ ko a, ni mɔ ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a mmɔ bɛ Chasi a, mmɔ ma‑a mɔ nama a. Mmɔ ka‑a mmɔ tachɛ buɛ kɔma kun ma, mmɔ dɛ‑a a nama ɔ.
47005018	Yataa an‑na koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, mmɔ ko a. A wan‑na a ma, Chasi‑a a ma, mmɔ ma‑a Yataa dia nyɔɛ a, mmɔ bɔ‑a chɛɛ ma nyɔncha ɔ. A sin fan‑na nn sɔ, mɔ dɔ mende n ma sawan koe a Yataa tena, dia nyɔncha ɔ.
47005019	Nn 'na sakana yen ko. Mbɛ Yataa‑a a ma wan, Chasi‑a a ma, mɔɛ gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, an ni ma a wan Yataa dia nyɔɛ a. Yataa nii ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ 'a ko yama n sa tena ɔ bɛn ni. A sin, a‑a an sakana bai chɛ be wan nn ma. Sakana bai chɛ, min mbe a ɔ yian, mmɔ gbɛɛ ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ a dia nyɔɛ a.
47005020	Chɛ ko a, nn yen ko gbɛ nɛ, nn mu Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ a. Nn mbe a ɔ yian‑da, a maenɛ mu yɔ Yataa wandi an mbe koɔ tena nn dɔ. Nn mbe wo disa tena, yɔ Chasi wandi an mbe koɔ tena, Yataa ni a ma wo ni mun chɛɛ ma nyɔncha ɔ, wo ni ma a dia nyɔɛ n na.
47005021	Mmɔ ko a ni, Yataa‑a ko yama gbɛɛ si Chasi kun ma. Chɛɛ Chasi chɛ nii ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni. Yataa‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni ma mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ma‑a mmɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a.
47006001	Nn bɛ an mbe wai chɛ tena dɔndɔ a, nn bɛ Yataa wandi a. Chɛ ko a gbɛ, nn mbe wo disa tena, wo wɛn‑na Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ma sɔn, wo ni a bia wo boo fea a.
47006002	A mu min na, Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Tima min na n ni basan wo ma, n‑na n ya a mun fan wo ma. Mbɛ n‑na wo deman bauncha sɔn tee ma.” A yen ko, tima che‑a, Yataa basan koe a wo ma. Bi tee chɛ, a mu tee an na, bauncha ma sɔn koe a.
47006003	Nn ma to ni, nn ni kɔnɛ sɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ ya ɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee wai chɛ ma bɔ‑a, nn mbe min chɛ ka.
47006004	Chɛɛ nn mbe min ma, nn 'na wai chɛ buɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn mbe nn tachɛ buɛ ma mɛn fan, yɔ Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ nu. A chia chɛ a, nn mbe nn faa bia wan ko gbɛama n dɔ, yakɔɔtawa n dɔ, a basan ko yawaenɛ n dɔ a.
47006005	A yɛ to, an‑na nn gbasi wan, an‑na nn sa pimbi chenɛ a, an‑na koɛ bun nn ma. A ma‑a wan nn‑na wai chɛ, a ɔ benden ba gbu a. A sin to, chinɔ nii nɔ, daun fen bɛɛ nii nɔ.
47006006	Nn‑na a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ nn mbe wai chɛ tena Yataa an ko a. Nn sɔnɛ a koen fan mu Yataa tena, a 'a yiimatɛ ɛ wan nn dɔ, nn mbe nn faa bia wan. A sin to, nn mbe ko chɛndɛ ma wan mɔɛ n na. Yataa Nyina ɛ wai chɛ tena wan nn dɔ, koadia wɛɛ ɛ nn faa ɔ.
47006007	Sakana bai chɛ wɛɛ, nn mbe min sa, Yataa 'a gbasaya an mbe a ɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ fenɛ miin mbe nn boo nyima a, an mbe to nn manɛ a, an mu nn tan buɛ an na, nn tandenɛ min chɛen mu Yataa tena.
47006008	Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe basɔmaya be wan nn ma, dɔ n sin mbe baa bɔ nn ma. Dɔ n mbe nn tɔɛ a dia, dɔ n sin mbe a yɔn. Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe nn ya fania fɔ mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn mbe tea an fɔ.
47006009	Mɔɛ dɔ n sin dɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma nn sɔn. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n‑na nn sɔn fan. Saya ɛ ben‑da nn san‑da, chɛɛ yɔ wo‑a a ɔ yen buɛ min dɔ, nn mbe wɛ tun fɔɛ ɔ. An mbe nn tɔɔya tena wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ nn ma fa ni.
47006010	Faayɔnɛ ɛ nn tan tena wɛɛ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn mbe buɔdia bɔ wan tee ɔ tee a. Nn maen mu bɛɛ yɔn tɔɛ n na, chɛɛ nn mbe mɔ sɛsɛ n ma tena wan nyan tɔɛ n na. Nn maen mu mɔɛ n fan na, fen kɔ fen mbe ee miin boo ɔ. Chɛɛ fen kɔ fen gbu, ɛ nn fan boo ɔ.
47006011	Nn dia nyɔɛ nu Kɔyindi, nn‑na ko ɔ ko yian wo a, nn‑na nn faa gbɛɛ be.
47006012	Wo 'a koadia nn tena, a danka ee. Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu, wo wan mbe ban tena koadia yian koe a nn na.
47006013	Chɛ ko a, n mbe koɔ tena gbɛ wo tena yɔ n 'na denɛ nu. Wo a ma, nn ko a ni dia ka wo wɛɛ ye. Wo wo faa n bu ka nn ye.
47006014	Wo wo boo bɔ ma koe a kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, wo bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi Chasi a. Tea an fea ko yama a, an mbe ee bɛn. Manɛ ɛ ma kaina min, pimbi ee che ma‑a nɔ.
47006015	Chasi n fea Sitana a, an mbe ee che bɛn‑da. Mɔɛ wɛɛ, min‑na a kai fa Chasi a, an mbe ee che ma‑a ko dɔndɔɛ ɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ a, min ma a kai fa ni a a.
47006016	Yataa 'a chenɛ nu, an bɛ fen chɛ n na, an‑na miin ya Yataa a, ko dɔndɔ ee che ma‑a an tɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, mmɔ mu chenɛ an na, Yataa ko a, min mbe ma‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a. Yataa wandi gbu sin‑na a fɔ ka wan, a ɔ, “N mbe ma‑a wan an tɛ ɔ, n mbe ben ben an tɛ ɔ. N sin mbe ma‑a wan an 'na Yataa a, an bɛɛ, an mbe ma‑a wan n 'na mɔɛ n na.”
47006017	Chɛ an fɛ mu, Mansa Yataa‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo bɔ mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, wo wo wandi ka an kaa a. Wo sin ma wo boo chɛ ko kan kɔ kan dɔ, min ma nyamuien mu n tena. N sin, n mbe n boo si‑a wan wo kɔɔ.”
47006018	Yataa Mansa Wa‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “N mbe ma‑a wan wo fa a, mbɛ wo wɛɛ ma‑a n 'na denɛ kaima n na, a basan n 'na denɛ musuma an na.”
47007001	N dia nyɔɛ nu, tooɔdia chɛ n fan mbe mmɔ ko a. Chɛ ko a, mmɔ mmɔ boo a ko, a bɔ ko yama gbɛɛ ɔ. Fen kɔ fen, miin mbe a ma, mmɔ ma ɛ nyamui Yataa tena, mmɔ 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni mmɔ boo a ko an ma. Mmɔ gbu sin, mmɔ 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a, a ma chianɛ ni ma mmɔ ɔ.
47007002	Kaina ni ma wo faa ɔ, nn ko a. Koe min na mu, nn ma baa ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, nn ma mɔ ɔ mɔ sɔ ni chia yama ma, nn ma mɔ ɔ mɔ kafa ni.
47007003	N ma bai chɛ fɔ ni, n tɛɛ si koe an na wo ma. Koe min na mu, yɔ n na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ tee, wo ko a di nn ye kaka. Mmɔ bɛ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a wan tima ɔ tima ko a. Mmɔ tɛ ee ka‑a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, saya wɛɛ ee mmɔ tɛ ka‑a.
47007004	N yii faen mu wo ma kaka. N mbe yonka min tɛ wo ma, a da a koo. Ko gbɛama chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, nn mbe miin dɔ bia tena, buɔdia koo n dɔ, a gbu danka ee.
47007005	Koe min na mu, nn cheenɛ gbakɔ wɛɛ Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, nn nii ma nn suin ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. Gbun koe dechee an ni a ɔ ben‑da, kan kɔ kan nn 'na tindanɛ. Mɔɛ n mbe koɔ‑a, an bɛ an bɔɛ n na, min gbu‑a a ma nn chian‑da.
47007006	Chɛɛ Yataa, min mbe faayɔn tɔɛ n faa ma nande, a‑a a ma wan nn faa chima‑a, kɛn Taitɔsi na‑a nn tena.
47007007	A na koe dechee nii ma, min na‑a a ma, nn bu ɔ dia‑a. Chɛɛ a na‑a konanɛ min bɛɛ chɛ, a si bia ma, wo‑a min chɛ a a. A‑a a ɔ yian fan to nn na, wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo ni n yen. A sin to, a ɔ, mbɛ wo faa yɔnden mu. A yɛ to, mbɛ wo ma bɛnden mu sɔ koe a n ko a. Chɛ gbu an ko a mu gbɛ, n 'na buɔdia gbu ma munda‑a.
47007008	Koe min na mu, n‑na gboo min nyɛn wo tena, ni a na‑a wɛɛ faayɔnɛ a wo ma, n ma n gbɔsɔ ni chɛ a. Chɛɛ n gbu sin, kɛn n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ an gboo chɛ‑a wo faa yɔn fan, a ma‑a wan n ma faagbaa a, tima ɛnden ko a.
47007009	Koe n sin mbe ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ sanche, n bu ɔ di. A ɔ ma di faayɔn chɛ an ko a, n‑na gboo a min be wo ma. Chɛɛ a ɔ di koe min na, faayɔn chɛ‑a a ma, wo ka‑a wo sɔn yama n kun ma. Wo 'a faayɔn chɛ, Yataa‑a an ma ka ko chɛndɛ a. Chɛ ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ nn ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni wo a.
47007010	Koe min na mu, faayɔnɛ min mu Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ a, ɛ a ma wan mmɔ ni mmɔ kan kɔ sɔ ko yama ma a, a ni na bauncha a. A sin, n ni ma‑a a ɔ sɔn‑da ee a ɔ. Chɛɛ faayɔnɛ min mbe bɔ mɔgbuya ta chia a, ɛ na kuɔ fɔ saya an na.
47007011	Wo wandi gbu, wo a ɔ yen bɛ, wo 'a faayɔnɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a min dɔ bɛn wo ko a, a ma‑a koe min na wo tena. Wo ma‑a gbɛ tea mɔ wa an na, wo ma bɛndenɛ ɛ a ɔ yen koe a, mbɛ wo ma ko yama ma ni. Wo faa tɛ‑a wan, wo chian‑da, yiinachii ko a wo ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a wo wandi be, wo ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ n tɔɔya koe a. Wo gbu, wo‑a a ɔ yian, mbɛ mabɔ ee wo ma, chia ɔ chia a, an koe gbu gbɛɛ ɔ.
47007012	A sin gbu, n‑na gboo chɛ nyɛn bɛɛ wo tena, n ya nii ko yama ma mɔɛ an na, chɛ ma, ko yama ma‑a mɔɛ min na. Chɛɛ n‑na a nyɛn, n ni a ɔ yian wo a gbadan, Yataa chen kɔɔ, wo e buɛ min dɔ nn ko a tea tea ɔ.
47007013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo‑a nn faa ma nande. A sin, a ka nn ta ma, Taitɔsi wɛɛ‑a a ma wan, nn bu ɔ dia‑a kaka, a si a ta buɔdia ma, wo tɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, a‑a a ɔ yian fan nn na, wo gbɛɛ‑a a deman buɛ min dɔ, a bu ɔ ni dia.
47007014	N gbu na‑a wo ma yonka tɛ wan a tena, wo sin ma n na mau ni. Tima ɔ tima ko a, nn‑na bai miin gbɛɛ fɔ wo ye, tea nu mu. A sin, a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, nn‑na yonka min tɛ Taitɔsi tena, a si wo ma, a wɛɛ ma‑a tea a.
47007015	A sin, chɛ ko a, wo 'a koadia ma ɛ munda tena wan a faa ɔ, ɛ ma a yii na chii‑a wo a. A si wo gbɛɛ ma bɛnden ni buɛ min dɔ, bea koe a dasi chɛ n fɛ, a ni miin be wo ma. A yɛ to, wo gbɛɛ, wo‑a wo boo si buɛ min dɔ a kɔɔ ma samba ɔ, chianɛ ɛ wo ɔ.
47007016	N mbe buɔdia bɔ wan, koe min na mu, n danden mu wo a chɛndɛ chɛ.
47008001	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn toen mu wo ni koe ɔ sɔn, a si Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ma. Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, ɛ koe miin ma tena chɔchi n dɔ Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
47008002	An‑na ko gbɛama sɛsɛ ɔ bia wan, an sin ni wan to yɔnɛ wɛɛ ɔ, min ni koo. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, buɔdia min ni an dɔ, a ni koo kaka an ma. Mɔ ni chɛ gbu sin yen fan an boo fen ba n dɔ, an ni miin be an faa gbɛɛ a.
47008003	N mbe che wan a fɔ‑a wo ye, tea ɔ, mbɛ an‑na an boo fenɛ be wan, an 'na gbasaya ni kun min ma. An gbu sin, an‑na a be wan, a ni ben an 'na gbasaya ni kun min ma. An‑na chɛ ma, an fandi gbu kun ma an na.
47008004	An ni ma chɛ ma‑a, an mbe disa chɛndɛ gbu chɛ‑a nn na. An dɔ deman ba mu, nn mbe min chɛ tena an na, a ma koe a, an ni kun basan‑da Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
47008005	A sin, an‑na koe chɛ wan, nn yii nii min dɔ. An‑na koe saa min ma, an‑na an fandi be wan Mansa Chisɔsi ma. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a gbɛ, Yataa wandi dɔndenɛ ma, an‑na an fandi be nn bɛɛ ma.
47008006	Chɛ ko a, nn bɛɛ, nn‑na a din fan Taitɔsi ma, min‑na wai chɛ kuu sɔ, a ni a a tun. A ni basan wo ma, wo ni wai chɛ nɛnɛ a ban, min mu koadia wai a.
47008007	Wo nyanden mu gbɛ kaka, fenɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, miin mbe wo boo ɔ. Wo nyanden mu wo 'a kaifa ɔ, Chisɔsi a, wo nyandenɛ ɛ bai n dɔ, wo e miin sa. A yɛ to, yiimatɛ wɛɛ ɔ, teaya gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan koadia a, min mbe wo ɔ, n ko a. Chɛ ko a, wo e ka koadia wai min chɛ‑a, nn toen mu, wo nyandenɛ ni ma ko chɛndɛ ma wɛɛ ɔ.
47008008	N mbe ee ka sawa an sa tena, wo ko a. Chɛɛ ni n‑na a ɔ yian, mɔɛ n ma bɛnden ni buɛ min dɔ, deman chɛ koe a, n mbe ma‑a ka a ɔ gbɛ an na, wo 'a koadia nyin buɛ min dɔ.
47008009	Koe min na mu, wo‑a koadia deman chɛ ɔ sɔn fan, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a min chɛ. Mbɛ a nyanden ni wɛɛ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo ko a, a‑a a wandi ma yɔn tɔɛ a. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a 'a yɔncha chɛ ɔ, wo wɛɛ ni ma nyan tɔɛ n na.
47008010	A sin, n mbe dasi chɛ an be tena. A nyin fan gbɛ, wo‑a wai min kuu sɔ banun, wo ni a a ban. Wo wan nii ma dechee mɔɛ saa n na, a kuu sɔ koe a, chɛɛ wo wan ni mɔɛ saa a, a ma faa ni wo wɛn dɔ.
47008011	Wo a a gbandia, mbɛ wo‑a a a ban. Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni buɛ min dɔ, a kuu sɔ koe a, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma ka, a a ban koe a. Wo sin, wo a chɛ wo boo fenɛ ɔ, min mbe wo boo ɔ.
47008012	Koe min na mu, ni wo ma bɛnden mu fen be koe a, Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e che min be‑a. A sin, ni wo‑a a be, ɛ a ya wan. A ee a fɔ, ɛ boo fenɛ ya wan, min mbe ee mɔɛ boo ɔ.
47008013	N mbe ee butuin chɛ tena, min mbe a ma, n ni feanka ka wo bɔ n kun ma, mbɛ n‑na a si wo sin kun ma. Chɛɛ wo gbɛɛ, wo a kanden fan mu n boo ɔ.
47008014	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni boo fenɛ koa‑a wo boo ɔ, a nyin wo ni chɛ n kɔ, a ee miin boo ɔ. An mbe ma demanɛ a an ko a. Chɛ an mbe a ma, an bɛɛ, ni a ma‑a an boo ɔ kaka tima min na, a ee wo sin boo ɔ, an bɛɛ, an mbe wo deman‑da wan. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, wo ni wai chɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ.
47008015	A ni ma yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min‑na daun fen sɛmbɛndenɛ a sɔn, a tɔɛ ma to ni a boo ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ sin, min bɛɛ‑a ɛndenɛ a sɔn dechee, min to‑a a boo ɔ, a‑a a bɔ wan a ko a.”
47008016	Nn mbe Yataa wai bɔ wan, a ma koe a, wo wakoe chɛ‑a Taitɔsi faa ɔ, basan koe a wo ma, yɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ n bɛɛ faa ɔ.
47008017	Koe min na mu, nn‑na a disa min chɛ, basan koe a wo ma, a nii ma a boo si ni a dechee an kɔɔ. Chɛɛ a wandi gbu, a ni wan a faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, a na koe a wo tena.
47008018	Nn mbe Taitɔsi a na tena wo tena, an fea mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ dɔndɔ a, Chasi ɔ. An suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ sin, mɔɛ n mbe a bai tena kaka chɔchi n gbɛɛ ɔ, a si Yataa 'a bai ma, ɛ min sa ben‑da gbɛɛ.
47008019	Chɛ an dechee ko a ma. Chɛɛ a gbu, chɔchi n gbɛɛ‑a an boo sɔ an ma, an‑na a yian, an 'na kɔpɔɛ ni ma a boo ɔ, a ni bea nn fɛ nn 'na tachɛ ɔ. Ni nn ma‑a wai chɛ chɛ‑a, nn bɛ ni ma. Nn gbɛɛ, nn ni wai chɛ, baa be koe a Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ma. A yɛ to, min mbe a ma, nn ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ nn toen mu, nn ni basan mɔ dɔ mende n ma.
47008020	Nn mbe nn fandi kun ma fɛn tena wan, mɔɛ n boo ɔ. An ma na gbonyɛ nn na, a si nn tachɛ buɛ ma, boo fen chɛ a, min mbe nn boo ɔ an ko a gbama gbama a.
47008021	Nn 'na yiinachii mu chɛ an na. Mbɛ nn ni koe ma, tea ɛ min dɔ, Mansa Yataa chen kɔɔ, ni mɔ gbu n bɛɛ ya a.
47008022	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ suun ma nyɔ dɔ mende, Chasi ɔ, nn mbe a bea tena an fɛ, na koe a wo tena. An suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ, a wakoe ɔ gbɛen mu nn boo ɔ, a sin, a ɔ yendenɛ mu, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu a a, chia sɛsɛ a. A 'a mɔ chɛndɛya gbu, a kun ma chɛ‑a gbɛ, a ben a kɔma ma. Koe min na mu, a yii na tɛen mu wo ma, a sin, ɛ a faa ɔ basan koe a wo ma.
47008023	Taitɔsi nan tana, nn bɔɛ mu a a, nn fea, nn mbe wai chɛ tena min na, basan koe a wo ma. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n tana sin Chasi ɔ, chɔchi n 'na sɔ mɔɛ mu an na. An sin mbe na basɔmaya an na Chisɔsi Chasi tena.
47008024	Nn‑na yonka tɛ wan, a si wo ma, mɔna chɛ n tena. Chɛ ko a, wo a ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na, a basan chɔchi n gbɛɛ a, mbɛ nn‑na tea yonka an tɛ, a si koadia ma wo faa ɔ.
47009001	Tima yayi mu gbɛ sanche, n ni bun to gboo nyɛn‑da, a si wo boo fenɛ n ma, miin mbe be mmɔ bɔ Chisian chɛ n ma Chuusaɛn duu ɔ.
47009002	N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo ma bɛndenɛ mu, basan koe a an ma. N gbu sin, n mbe yonka tɛ wan, a si wo ma mmɔ bɔɛ Chisian chɛ n tena Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. N mbe a fɔ wan an ye, mbɛ an bɔɛ Chisianɛ nu, miin mbe Akaya chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ma bɛndenɛ mu, kɛn banun, demanɛ chɛ koe a. Faa min mbe wo ɔ demanɛ chɛ koe a, a‑a a ma wan, an sɛsɛ faa bɔ‑a gbɛ.
47009003	Chɛɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu, Chasi ɔ, n yen ko gbɛ an na na‑a sanche wo tena, nn 'na yonka ɔ siman koe a. A ɔ ni sɔn, mbɛ nn mbe yonka min tɛ, a si wo ma, mbɛ fania ma. Chɛ ni a ma, wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma, yɔ n‑na wo ma bɛn koe fɔ buɛ min dɔ.
47009004	Koe min na mu, ni Masidonia mɔɛ n bea‑a nn fɛ, na koe a, an ni a ɔ yen, mbɛ wo ma wo ma bɛn ni, mau wa mu nn ko a. Wo ta nan tana, n yii na tɛen mu ka buɛ min dɔ wo ma, n mbe ee a fɔ, wo ta mau ɛ ma‑a buɛ min dɔ.
47009005	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na n yii na chii, mbɛ a nyin fan, n ni mmɔ bɔɛ Chisian chɛ n disa, an ni na n ya ɔ wo tena. Mbɛ wo na‑a wo boo fenɛ miin be koe fɔ, wo sin‑na a sa tena ɔ bɛn, a be koe a, wo ni a be. An ni a sa tena ɔ bɛn, n ya ɔ. Chɛ sin mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan, mbɛ wo ta faa ɔ mu, wo‑a a be, chɛɛ mɔ an ma a din ni wo ma.
47009006	Koe gbu mu chɛ an na, a nyin wo ni min sa wo yii ma. Mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe chin fen pɛɛ chin, ɛ chin fen pɛɛ an ma sɔn. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe chin fen chenama chin, ɛ chin fen sɛmbɛndenɛ an ma sɔn.
47009007	Mɔ ɔ mɔ yiima, ɛ min fɔ a ye, a be koe a, a ni an be. A ma a gbɔɔ a be‑a, a sin ma din a ma a be koe a. Koe min na mu, Yataa toen mu mɔɛ a, min mbe ma fenɛ be‑a, a bu ɔ diama ɛ.
47009008	A sin, Yataa kundenɛ mu, a ni mɔɛ kɔ boo fen chɛndɛ a, a ɔ benden ba a. Chɛ ni a ma, a mɔɛ chɛ toen mu fenɛ min na tima ɔ tima ko a, a ni ma a boo ɔ. A sin gbu, fenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan a boo ɔ, ko kan kɔ kan ma koe a, min nyin a ma koe a.
47009009	Ɛ wan dechee yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ, a ɔ, “A mɔɛ chɛ ni wai nyima chɛ wan kaka, yɔn tɔɛ n na. A 'a ko chɛndɛ sin, a ni min ma, a danka ee ma‑a.”
47009010	Yataa sin fan mbe chin fen kuu be chin fen chin mɔɛ ma, ɛ daun fenɛ be mɔ gbu ma, a daun koe a. Chin fen kuu gbɛɛ, i toen mu min na, ɛ a be‑a wan i ma. Ɛ i boo fenɛ ma munda‑a wan, min mbe a ma, e fenɛ min be yakɔɔtawa tɔɛ n ma, a ni koa.
47009011	Ɛ a ma‑a wan i nyanden ba ni ma, ko chɛndɛ ma koe a, tima ɔ tima ko a. Chɛ ɛ a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ ni Yataa wai bɔ, i boo fenɛ chɛ n ko a, an mbe miin ma sɔn, a ka nn na.
47009012	Koe min na mu, wo e wai min chɛ tena ka, a ee Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma gbɔsɔɛ an bɔ tena dechee. Chɛɛ ɛ a ma tena wan, mɔ sɛsɛ n ni Yataa wai bɔ.
47009013	A sin, wo e wai min chɛ tena ka, ɛ koe min dɔ yian tena, ɛ a ma tena wan, mɔ sɛsɛ ni basɔmaya be Yataa ma. Koe min na mu, wo‑a wo boo si wan sakana bai chɛ kɔɔ, wo e min dɔ yian, a si Chisɔsi ma. A yɛ to, wo 'a wai nyima wɛɛ ko a, wo e min chɛ an na, a basan mɔ dɔ mende n bɛɛ a.
47009014	Chɛ sin ko a, an toen mu wo a kaka, an mbe samunɛ chɛ tena wo ko a. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ koo, min been mu wo ma.
47009015	Yataa ɛn wai, a 'a wai nyima ko a, a‑a min chɛ mmɔ a. An wai nyima chɛ sɔnkɔ ee.
47010001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka wo disa tena. N fɛn mu ka, an dɔ, n ma chimaen mu, n mbe ma wo baima, n sin mbe wo bia wan chinchincha a. An dɔ, chɛɛ ni n ka‑a wo baima, n mbe wo bia wan faaakɔɔɛ a. N mbe wo disa tena, machimaya ɔ, a basan chinchincha a, Chasi ni min yian.
47010002	N mbe wo disa tena, wo ma a ma, n ni n faa a kɔɔ wo ma, ni n che‑a nɔ wo tena tima min na. Koe min na mu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n mbe che wan n faa sɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ n ma. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe a fɔ, mbɛ nn mbe koe n ma dunya chɛ ɔ yiinachii an na.
47010003	Koe min na mu, nn mbe wɛɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, chɛɛ nn mbe ee butuin chɛ tena a ɔ yiinachii an na.
47010004	Nn mbe chɛɛ chɛ tena feanka miin na, dunya chɛ ta ma. Chɛɛ nn mbe Yataa 'a gbasaya an ya tena, nn ni kaina n yɔn, Sitana kai fa tena nu.
47010005	Kɔɔsa bia gbɛɛ, nn mbe a yɔn fan. Nn ni yɛ, dɔpandaya min mbe mɔɛ n dɔ, min mbe an ka‑a tena Yataa sɔn‑da, nn ni a yɔn. Yiima kan kɔ kan ni ma nn boo ɔ bia ɔ, don koe a Chasi kɔɔ.
47010006	A sin, ni wo ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da gbae, mbɛ wo e Chisɔsi an ko a, nn ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ tɔɔ koe a, min mbe koe ma‑a, min mbe a ɔ yian ɛnden bɛɛ a, mbɛ a ee an ko a.
47010007	Wo ya ɛ dechee fen chɛ n fan na, miin mbe wo ya kɔɔ. Ni mɔɛ ɛ wan nɔ wo tɛ ɔ, min danden mu a a, ɛ Chasi an ko a, chɛ wɛɛ ni ma a yii ma. Mbɛ Chasi ɛ buɛ min dɔ a mɔɛ chɛ ko a, nn bɛɛ, ɛ ka wan nn ko a.
47010008	Koe min na mu, n mbe ee mau, ni n‑na yonka tɛ wɛɛ kaka, a si gbasaya ma, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min be nn ma, wo kun ma. An gbasaya chɛ, ɛ wo ɔ gbɛa koe an na, wo a bea koe ma bun.
47010009	N ma to ni wo ni a yen, mbɛ n mbe wo a chian tena wan, n 'na gboo nyɛndenɛ n na.
47010010	Mɔɛ n mbe a fɔ wan, an dɔ, “Pɔɔ ɛ bai miin nyɛn a 'a gboo n dɔ, an kɔɔ fanka wan, dimaya wɛɛ an dɔ. Chɛɛ,” an dɔ, “ni a ma‑a mmɔ tɛ ɔ, a ma chimaen mu, baa wɛɛ ee a da a kuiɛ ma.”
47010011	An mɔ bonda chɛ nu, miin mbe bai chɛ fɔ tena ka, an ni chɛ ɔ gbɛ. Mbɛ ni nn ma‑a wo tɛ ɔ, nn mbe bai min fɔ, an fea bai a, nn mbe min nyɛn wo tena gboo ɔ, bai dɔndɔ gbe nu mu, tɛ bɔ ee an ma.
47010012	Nn mbe ee nn fandi siman tena mɔɛ n ma, chɛ ma, nn ni nn fandi a kan an na. Mɔɛ nu, miin mbe an fandi bai. A yɛ to, an mbe an yii na chii, mbɛ an fisa a ben an bɔɛ n ma. Chɛɛ an mbe ma ka an fandi simanɛ min chɛ‑a an fandi ma, an mbe an fandi a kan an fandi a, yiimatɛ ee a ɔ.
47010013	Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, nn tana, nn mbe ee yonka tɛ, nn ni a ɔ ben. Nn mbe yonka tɛ dechee, a si wai chɛ an ma, Yataa‑a min be nn ma a chɛ koe a. An wai chɛ sin, a dɔndɔ mu wai chɛ an na, nn mbe min chɛ tena ka wo tɛ ɔ.
47010014	Koe min na mu, wo e ka nn 'na wai chɛ tena tinɛ ɔ wan, nn mbe ee nn doo bun tena wo kun ma, che koe a wo ma wai chɛ a. Nn na‑a wan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a wo tena, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma.
47010015	Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn mbe ee yonka tɛ, mɔ dɔ mende n‑na wai chɛ gba ma, min mbe ee tinɛ chɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a min yian nn na. Chɛɛ nn yii na tɛen mu, mbɛ wo 'a danaya ma ɛ munda‑a buɛ min dɔ, nn bɛɛ, nn mbe wai chenama chɛ‑a ka wan wo tɛ ɔ. A sin, tima ɔ tima ko a, nn mbe ma‑a a tinɛ chɛ an dɔ, Yataa‑a min yian nn na.
47010016	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, nn ni kun sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, chɛnyɛ dɔ mende n dɔ, miin dɔ yansan wo a. Chɛ ee ma‑a yonka tɛ‑a, a si mɔ dɔ mende n ta wai ma, tanda dɔ mende ɔ.
47010017	Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ min toen mu a ni yonka tɛ, a ni a tɛ koe a ma dechee, Mansa Yataa‑a min chɛ a ko a.”
47010018	Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min mbe a wandi tando, ko gbama mu. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ, Mansa Chisɔsi wandi ɛ min bai, an mu tea tando a.
47011001	Ɛ n bu ɔ dia‑a wan, ni wo‑a wo faa bia n na, n ni wooya bai ɛnden sa. Wo dimu.
47011002	N faa gbaaen mu kaka wo ko a, yɔ Yataa faa gbaaen mu buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, wo e wan yɔ sɛnama, min ma kai koe ɔ sɔn. N‑na wo yan mɔ dɔndɔ gbe an ko a, min mu Chasi a.
47011003	Chɛɛ n chianden mu ko dɔndɔ an ko a. Mbɛ ka chɛ na‑a Ifi bun buɛ min dɔ, yaa a, wo wɛɛ, wo yiima ɔ ma na chɛ. Wo ee na‑a ma‑a teaya ɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi a, wo ni ma a ko a chɛndɛ chɛ.
47011004	Koe min na mu, wo e wo boo a si wan mɔɛ kɔɔ, buɔdia ɔ, min mbe na wo tena, ɛ bai ɔ yian, a si Chisɔsi dɔ mende ma. Chisɔsi chɛ ma, nn‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian, a si min ma. Mbɛ wo‑a wo boo si nyina dɔ mende kɔɔ, min ma Yataa Nyina a. Wo‑a wo boo si to sakana bai dɔ mende kɔɔ, min kaen mu chɛ ma, wo na‑a wo boo si tee min kɔɔ. Wo‑a wo wandi be a ma, ko ɔ wuu ma a.
47011005	Chɛɛ n ta yiinachii ɔ, n ma dan ni a a, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n benden fan mu n ma ɛnden bɛɛ a, wo e mɔɛ miin ya ka Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔ wa an na.
47011006	An ni a fɔ wɛɛ n ma kosan koɔ‑a, chɛɛ yiimatɛ nan tana, a been fan mu n ma. Chia ɔ chia a, nn‑na chɛ ɔ yian fan wo a, ko ɔ ko ɔ.
47011007	N ma ko yama an ma ni ka, n fandi ma yii koe a, min mbe a ma, n ni wo a sɛ. N‑na Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian fan wo a, n ma wo ɔ tisa ni fen kɔ fen be koe a.
47011008	Chɔchi mɔɛ dɔ mende nu, an‑na an boo fenɛ n be wan, basan koe a n ma, n ni wai chɛ wo tɛ ɔ.
47011009	Mmɔ bɛ sin ni tima min na, n sin toen ni demanɛ a, n nii ma n 'na yakɔɔtawa si ni mɔ ɔ mɔ kun ma. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, miin na‑a ka Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an fan‑na fen kɔ fen be n ma, min ma gbɔsɔɛ ni n ma. N ni buɛ min dɔ, a kɔma a, n mbe ma‑a ka wan, ya ɔ ma wɛɛ. N mbe ee n 'na yakɔɔtawa sa‑a wo kun ma, chia ɔ chia a.
47011010	Chasi 'a tea, ɛ ka buɛ min dɔ n dɔ, n mbe ka yonka min tɛ‑a, a ɔ ee maun‑da Akaya chɛnyɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
47011011	N mbe chɛ fɔ tena, wo wakoe an ma don ni n ma, n toen fan mu wo a. Yataa‑a chɛ ɔ sɔn fan.
47011012	N sin mbe ka koe min na, n mbe an na tun‑da, a ma koe a. N mbe chɛ ma‑a wan, mɔɛ chɛ n kɔɔ bɔ koe a. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an fandi ya Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na, an ma chia sɔn, yonka tɛ‑a. An mbe ta‑a a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, nn bɛ an na, nn mbe wai dɔndɔɛ an na.
47011013	An mɔɛ chɛ nu, fania mɔɛ nu mu, an fandi ya koe a sɔ mɔɛ n na. Wai chɛ mɔɛ n fan nɛ, miin mbe mɔɛ n bun, an mbe ben an fandi ya‑a mɔɛ n na, miin mu Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na.
47011014	Chɛɛ tɛnɛ ko ma chɛ nɛnɛ a. Sitana wandi gbu wɛɛ, ɛ kun fan, a ni a wandi ma yɔ maeka, min mbe man taun Yataa 'a manɛ a.
47011015	Chɛ an fɛ mu, kɔndɔfii ko ma, ni Sitana 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n bɛɛ, an‑na an fandi mun tea wai chɛ mɔɛ n na. A dankama a, an mbe pawa min sɔn‑da, a ɛ kan‑da an wai chɛ buɛ an na.
47011016	Ka n mbe a fɔ to. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ, wo ma n ya woo mɔɛ a. Chɛɛ ni wo‑a n ya wɛɛ ka, wo wo boo a si n kɔɔ n 'na wooya ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, n bɛɛ, n ni yonka tɛ ɛnden na.
47011017	N gbu sin, mbe ka miin fɔ‑a gbɛ, bai ma a, Mansa Chisɔsi toen mu min na. Chɛɛ n mbe a fɔ tena wan, yonka chɛ a, yɔ woo mɔɛ ɛ koɔ buɛ min dɔ.
47011018	Mɔɛ sɛsɛ nu, an mbe yonka tɛ kɛn dunya ma mɔɛ n ta chia an fan na, n bɛɛ, n mbe yonka tɛ‑a wan.
47011019	Wo e wo faa bia wan woo mɔɛ n na, buɔdia a, a yen ko wo wandi gbu yiima tɛen ba mu.
47011020	Wo gbu sin mbe wo faa bia wan, mɔɛ ni wo yɔn bia wɛɛ chɛ. Chɛ ma, mɔɛ ni wo boo fenɛ daun, chɛ ma, a ni wo chii, chɛ ma, a ni a yombo sɔ a ma, chɛ ma, a ni wo ya a gbasi.
47011021	A ma ɛ che wan mau‑a n ye, n ni dɔn a ma, mbɛ nn dɔ nii ma gbɛ, koe chɛ n ma koe a. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ faa na‑a gbɛa, tima kan kɔ kan ko a, yonka tɛ koe a, a si ko kan kɔ kan ma, n bɛɛ, n faa ɛ gbɛa wan n ni yonka tɛ an koe chɛ ma. N mbe ka koɔ an na, yɔ woo mɔɛ.
47011022	Ni Ibu mɔɛ mu an na, n bɛɛ, Ibu mɔɛ mu ka wan n na. Ni Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ mu an na, n bɛɛ, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ mu ka wan n na. Ni Ebeami cheeya mu an na, n bɛɛ, a cheeya mu ka wan n na.
47011023	Ni wai chɛ mɔɛ mu an na, Chasi ko a, n mbe wɛɛ ka koɔ‑a yɔ woo mɔɛ, chɛɛ an wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ gbu mu n na, a ben an ma. N‑na wai chɛ, a ben an ma, n ta‑a pimbi chenɛ a, a ben an ma. N‑na gbasi min sin dɔ yen, dan mbe ee a ma. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, n ni ma wan saya baima, a ben an ma.
47011024	N‑na gbasi ma sɔn fan, si tena duu, Chu mɔɛ n boo ɔ. An ni n bosa wan, gba bi sawa, kun ma kɔnɔntɔ ko a.
47011025	Si tena sawa gbɛ, Domi mɔɛ n ni n gbasi kɔnɛ an na. Mɔɛ n‑na n ma bon bon gba dɔndɔ, senɛ a, n fa koe a. Gba sawa gbɛ, dɛndɛ wɛɛ ɛ gban‑da n na, yii a. A sin, n ni wan yii a su ɔ tee a, tima dɔndɔ ko a.
47011026	N 'na tachɛ sɛsɛ n dɔ, n ni wan chianɛ kɔɔ, yii fa boo ɔ, a basan kanka n na. N ni wan chianɛ kɔɔ, n bɔ Chu mɔɛ n boo ɔ, ni mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ boo ɔ, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Ko ma chiandenɛ n ma‑a wan duu wa n dɔ, an ma‑a fuinɛ ma, an ma‑a kɔ yii a. N suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n gbu wɛɛ Chasi ɔ, a wakoe ni sa ɔ dechee miin ya kɔɔɛ, chɛɛ a ee an faa ɔ, n chiandenɛ ni wan an ma.
47011027	N‑na wai chɛ wan n sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, n ni chi wan n ya a. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, kɔnkɔɛ‑a n bia wan, n kanɛ a gbaa‑a, a sin n nii daun fen ma sɔn. Tima sɛsɛ ko a, chima ni n bia wan, koa a tenden bɛɛ nii n ma.
47011028	A sin, a ka ko dɔ gbɛɛ chɛ n ma, n faa gbaaen fan ni tima ɔ tima ko a, chɔchi n gbɛɛ ko a.
47011029	Ni mɔɛ ɛ nɔ min gboo ɔ faenɛ ɛ, n bɛɛ, n gboo ɔ fa wan a mɔɛ chɛ ko a. Ni mɔɛ‑a a ma, a bɔɛ ni ko yama ma, n faa ɛ gbandia wan yɔ ta.
47011030	Ni n mbe kun fan n ni yonka tɛ, n mbe yonka tɛ‑a, a si koe chɛ n fan ma, miin mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ gbasaya ee n boo ɔ.
47011031	Tando ni be Yataa ma kuɔ fɔ ko a. A wan mu Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa. A‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n mbe ka tea an fɔ tena.
47011032	N ni kɛn Damasikɔsi, duu mansa min ni nɔ Mansa Ayetasi kɔɔ, a‑a mɔɛ n sɔ wan chia kunɛ gbɛɛ a, duu wa chɛ a tindanɛ. A ɔ, an ni n bia.
47011033	Chɛɛ n si‑a wan tɛngbɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na n na yii duu ma, kanda wa chɛ gbaa, a bɔ woe a, kanda wa chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ n bɔ‑a a boo ɔ.
47012001	N mbe yonka a tun‑da wan a ma. Fen kɔ fen mbe ee wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo yonka ɔ. Chɛɛ n mbe a a tun‑da wan gbɛ koɔ koe a, a si koe n ma, miin dɔ nunden ni, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a miin dɔ yian n na.
47012002	N‑na kamin dɔndɔ sɔn fan, min ni Chisianɛ a. Yataa‑a an kamin chɛ ya wan, mbɛ a sɛ‑a a a pɔɔ banda bu ɔ. San tan kun ma naanin fan ben‑da gbɛ, kɛn koe chɛ chɛ‑a a ɔ. Chɛɛ n ma a ɔ sɔn, ni a gbugbu an ya a, a sɛ‑a, chɛ ma, ni a ma‑a cho ɔ wan. Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an‑na a ɔ sɔn.
47012003	A sin, n gbu ni a fɔ to, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ kamin chɛ ya‑a wan, a sɛ‑a banda bu ɔ. N ma a ɔ sɔn, ni a gbugbu an ya a, a sɛ‑a, chɛ ma, ni a ma‑a cho ɔ wan. Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an‑na a ɔ sɔn. A sin, a‑a koe n na min fan, miin dɔ ee che yian‑da. Koe nu, mɔ gbu ee che a da tu‑a miin na.
47012005	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe yonka tɛ‑a wan, a si kamin chɛ ma. Chɛɛ n mbe ee yonka tɛ, a si n fandi ma. N mbe yonka tɛ dechee, a si fen chɛ n fan ma, miin mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ gbasaya ee n boo ɔ.
47012006	Ni n toen mu wɛɛ, n ni yonka tɛ, n mbe ee che ma‑a woo mɔɛ a. Koe min na mu, n mbe ma‑a ka tea an fɔ‑a. Chɛɛ n mbe ee yonka tɛ. Koe min na mu, n ma to ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ni n ya mɔ chenama a, a ben koe n ma, an mbe n yen miin ma‑a, a ni ben to koe n ma, an mbe miin na min n da a.
47012007	A sin to, Yataa nii ma to ni n kunɛ ni koa, yonka a, a si ko ɔ nunden chɛ n ma, miin dɔ yian‑da n na. Yataa‑a mɔnɛ ma koe si wan n na. An koe chɛ ma‑a wan Sitana 'a bosa a, n gbasi koe a, n kunɛ ma na koa n na.
47012008	N‑na Mansa Chisɔsi fai wan, gba sawa ko a, an koe chɛ ma, n dɔ, a ni n boo ka.
47012009	Chɛɛ a‑a a fɔ wan n ye, a ɔ, “N 'na koadia demanɛ, a‑a a kun i ko a. Koe min na mu, tima min na ee kun ko ma, n 'na gbasaya danka ee a tima chɛ a.” Chɛ an fɛ mu, n bu ɔ di yonka tɛ koe a kaka, a si gbasaya ma min mbe ee n boo ɔ, min mbe a ma, Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ni ma n kun ma.
47012010	Gbasaya ee ka buɛ min dɔ n boo ɔ, chɛ‑a n faa chima, Chasi ko a. N faa chimaen mu, mainɛ ɔ bia koe a, yakɔɔtawa bia koe a, ko ma gbaaenɛ ɔ bia koe a, a basan ko gbɛama n na. Koe min na mu, gbasaya ee n boo ɔ tima min na, a tima chɛ a mu, n dɔ gbɛ.
47012011	N mbe ka wooya koe n fan ma tena, chɛɛ wo wan‑na a din n ma, a ma koe a. Koe min na mu, a ni nyan fan, wo ni n pɛmbɛ. Ni mɔ a tenden bɛɛ gbu ma n na, chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo e miin chee ka Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ wa n na, an ma ben ni n ma chia ɔ chia a.
47012012	Yataa‑a a ma wan, n‑na kamaya ko wa sɛsɛ ma, a ɔ yian koe a wo a, mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na. N na‑a an ma wan, faabia wa ɔ.
47012013	N nii ma wo bia boo yama chɛ ni, ko kan kɔ kan dɔ, n ni wo ka chɔchi tɔɛ chɛ n ma. Fɔ dechee, n nii n 'na suun feanka sa wo kun ma. Ni chɛ mu ko yama an na, mbɛ wo dimu.
47012014	Sanche gbɛ, gba sawan bɔɛ an nɛ ka, n ma bɛndenɛ ɛ, na koe a wo kɔndɔn‑da. A sin, n mbe ee wo ɔ tisa fen kɔ fen ko a. Koe min na mu, n ma to ni wo boo fenɛ an na, n toen mu wo wandi gbu an na. A ni ma boo ɔ boo gbɛ, denɛ n fan mbe ee an woo mɔɛ n da kɔ. Chɛɛ an woo mɔɛ n fan mbe an da kɔ.
47012015	Ɛ ma wan buɔdia n ma, n ni n boo fenɛ gbɛɛ be, a basan n fandi gbu wɛɛ a, basan koe a wo ma. N mbe chɛ ma‑a wan, n 'na koadia kun ma ɛ sa‑a wan wo ko a, n ta ma ni dɔɔya wɛɛ wo faa ɔ.
47012016	Chɛɛ wo dɔ nu, wo dɔnden fan mu a ma, mbɛ n ma n 'na suun feanka si ni wo kun ma. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, ɛ wo 'a yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ yaa tɔɛ mu n na, a sin n na‑a wo boo bia wan yii kɔɔ.
47012017	Chɛɛ a ma to ni n yii ma, n ni ben mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ ɔ, n na‑a miin sɔ wo tena, n ni wo kafa. Ae?
47012018	N na‑a Taitɔsi disa wan na koe a wo tena. Mbɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ, n‑na a sɔ, an fea a a. Taitɔsi nii ma wo kafa ni, ae? Nn fea Taitɔsi a, nn yiima ni dɔndɔ gbe, a basan nn 'na ko ma buɛ wɛɛ a.
47012019	A ma ma wo yiima chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ nn mbe nn fandi an ma fɔ tena wo tena. Nn mbe ma ka Yataa chen kɔɔ wan, nn mbe ma bai sa‑a, Chasi faa ma a. A sin, nn dia nyɔɛ nu, nn na‑a a gbɛɛ ma, basan koe mu wo ma.
47012020	N faa gbaaenɛ mu, kɔkɔɛ ni n che‑a wo tena, n mbe ee na‑a wo tan‑da, yɔ n toen mu n ni wo tan buɛ min dɔ. A sin to, kɔkɔɛ wo wɛɛ, wo ee na‑a to‑a n ma buɛ a, wo ta faa ma ɔ. N chiandenɛ mu, n ma na koɛ tan wo tɛ ɔ, a basan toomaya a. A yɛ to, faagbandia basan wo ta diana koe n dechee a, main chɛ basan ko ɔ fɔɛ a, dɔpanda basan ko a fasanɛ a.
47012021	N faa gbaaenɛ mu, mbɛ ni n yɛ‑a to nɔ wo tena, n 'na Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni n ma yii, wo ya kɔɔ. A sin, n mbe na‑a di chɛ‑a wan, a si mɔɛ chɛ n sɛsɛ wakoe ma, miin na‑a ko yama ma, an sin ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni ko yama ma a. An 'na ko tɛ chɛ, min danka ee ka.
47013001	Chɛ an mbe ma‑a gba sawan bɔɛ a, n mbe na‑a wo kɔndɔn‑da. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Ni an‑na kunɛ si mɔ ɔ mɔ kun ma, siiya fea, sawa an mbe bɔ a ma, an mbe e na to kaa a tɛ‑a, a si an bai chɛ ma.”
47013002	N‑na wo a si wan, n 'na gba fean bɔɛ ɔ, wo kɔndɔn‑da. N‑na wo a si wan, wo wɛn na‑a ko yama ma, a kɔma a, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. Chɛɛ n mbe a fɔ‑a wan to sanche, mbɛ n mbe ee ka buɛ min dɔ wo tɛ ɔ, mbɛ n mbe na‑a to tima min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ kun mbe ee bɔ‑a tɔɔya ɔ.
47013003	Wo toen mu, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n mbe koɔ tena, Chasi 'a gbasaya an dɔ. Wo sin mbe a ɔ sɔn‑da wan. Ni a ma‑a tachɛ‑a wo a, a ee ma gboo ɔ fa ɔ. Chɛɛ ɛ min ma, ɛ a 'a gbasaya ɔ yian fan wo tɛ ɔ.
47013004	Koe min na mu, tima min na an ni Chasi gbangban tena kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a fa koe a, a nii ma gbasaya yian ni. Chɛɛ ɛ tun fɔɛ ɔ, Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, gbasaya ee nn bɛɛ boo ɔ, nn mu ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ n na Chasi a. Chɛɛ wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, nn mbe fɔɛ ɔ, nn bɛ Chasi a, wai chɛ koe a wo ko a.
47013005	Wo wo wandi ma mɛn, wo ni a ɔ yen, ni wo boo a chiien fan mu, wo kai fa koe a Chasi a. Wo ni a ya, mbɛ wo ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. Fɔ dechee, ni chia ɔ chia ee wo ye, wo wandi ma mɛn koe chɛ a.
47013006	N ko a, ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ wo e a ɔ gbɛ‑a wan, mbɛ nn ban‑da nn fandi ma mɛn‑da, ko ee nn ma.
47013007	Chɛɛ nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, wo ma na ko yama kan kɔ kan ma. Nn mbe ee a ɔ yian tena wan ka, mɔɛ n na, mbɛ nn‑na wai chɛndɛ an chɛ wo tɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ nn toen mu, wo ni koe n ma, miin nyin, a ma koe a. A ni ma wɛɛ, mbɛ nn‑na wai min chɛ, ko ma bɔ ni a ɔ.
47013008	Koe min na mu, nn mbe ee ko ɔ ko ma, miin mbe ee tea gbee a. Chɛɛ ɛ ma tea gbee an na, a si Chisɔsi ma.
47013009	Koe min na mu, n bu ɔ diama an mbe ma, tima ɔ tima ko a, gbasaya ee wɛɛ nn boo ɔ, chɛɛ wo sin dɔ gbɛama ɛ. Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ min ko a, an nɛ, mbɛ mabɔ ma na ma wo ma.
47013010	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, wo tena, n mbe ee tima min na wo baima. N mbe chɛ ma tena, min mbe a ma, ni n‑na a fo wo ma tima min na, n mbe ee na‑a wo bia‑a faaakɔɔɛ a. N mbe ma‑a gbasaya chɛ a tachɛ‑a, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min be n ma, wo ɔ gbɛa koe mu, wo yɔn koe ma.
47013011	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, an nɛ, wo buɔdia bɔ. Wo butuin chɛ, wo ni wo tachɛ buɛ n dɔ bɛn. Wo wo too ma sɔ n 'na dasi n ma. Wo ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, wo ni ma faachima ɔ. A sin, Yataa min mbe faachima be, koadia ɛ to a faa ɔ, ɛ ma‑a wan wo kɔ.
47013012	Ni wo bɛn‑da, mbɛ wo‑a wo nyɔn kɔndɔn koadia faa a. Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ nɛ, an‑na wo kɔndɔn.
47013013	Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a dua ni ma wo ma. Yataa 'a koadia ni tachɛ wo a. A sin, wo ni ma yiima dɔndɔɛ ɔ Yataa Nyina a.
48001001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, nn bɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ n na Chasi ɔ, miin mbe nɛ. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na. Mɔ gbu an ma a ma ni, chɛ ni ma. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi Chasi wandi, an‑na a ma, an fea mmɔ Fa Yataa a, min‑na Chasi chɛ kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ. N mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wɛn mbe chɔchi n dɔ, Kadesia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
48001003	Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
48001004	Mansa Chisɔsi chɛ, an na‑a a wandi be a fa koe a, mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A na‑a chɛ ma, mɔ kun ka koe an na, mmɔ 'a ko yama n boo ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ. Mmɔ Fa Yataa sin faa ma koe, Chasi na‑a an ma ka.
48001005	Tando ni ma a tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ, ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
48001006	Da ɔ gbaa koe mu n tena, mbɛ wo‑a wo ya a mun sakana bai dɔ mende ma. A ɔ wuuma a, wo bun‑da ka‑a Yataa fɛ, min‑na wo chee, Chasi 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ.
48001007	N mbe ee a gbu fɔ tena, mbɛ sakana bai chɛndɛ dɔ mende an mbe to nɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n fan mbe nɔ, miin mbe wo tɔɔ tena. An toen mu, an ni sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi ma, a ka a chia ma.
48001008	Chɛɛ an ni a fɔ wɛɛ, nn fan, nn ni sakana bai dɔ mende sa, a si Chisɔsi ma, Yataa ni nn danka kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛ ma, maeka gbu wɛɛ, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, ni a wɛɛ‑a chɛ ma, danka ni ma a ma kuɔ fɔ ko a.
48001009	Nn‑na min fɔ wo ye tee, n mbe ka to an fɔ tena wo ye. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ dɔ mende sa wo tena, a ka chɛ ma wo na‑a wo boo si ka min kɔɔ, Yataa ni a mɔɛ chɛ danka kuɔ fɔ ko a.
48001010	Ni n ma‑a chɛ fɔ‑a, n mbe ee ka a ma‑a na tea tea ɔ, mɔ gbu n ni to n na. Chɛɛ n mbe a ma tena wan ka, Yataa faa ni chima n na. Ni n toen ni tun mɔ gbu n faa ma koe an na, n nii che ma‑a tima chɛ a, Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ a.
48001011	Chɛɛ n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n toen mu, wo ni ko dɔndɔ an dɔ sɔn. Mbɛ n mbe sakana bai chɛndɛ min sa ka, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma, mɔ gbu n fan ma a kuu sɔ ni a fɔ‑a.
48001012	Koe min na mu, mɔ gbu an ma a be ni n ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ wɛɛ ma n kan ni a ma. Chɛɛ koe ɔ nunden chɛ, Chisɔsi Chasi wandi gbu, an‑na a ɔ yian n na.
48001013	Chɛɛ wo gbu, wo na‑a a a min fan, n ni Chu n 'na sawa n bia buɛ min dɔ gbau gbau, a si Yataa fai koe ma. N‑na ko yawaenɛ sa wan mɔɛ n ma, a yama boo a, chɔchi ɔ. N gbu toen ni, n ni an kasaa wan.
48001014	A gbu sin, Chu mɔɛ n 'na sawa chɛ ɔ, n tɔɛ na‑a bɔ wan, a ben n ya teen ma an sɛsɛ ma, n 'na mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. N bemba n ta bemba n 'na manda chɛ ko a, mɔ nii sai bɔ n na ɛnden bɛɛ a.
48001015	Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a boo sɔ wan n ma, n suun‑da tima min na. A‑a n chee wan, a 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ. A bu ɔ dia‑a wan,
48001016	a 'a denɛ yian koe a n na. A na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, n ni a wakoe ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. A‑a a yian kɛn, n nii ma n kun puin ni mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan ma.
48001017	N mbe ee n sɛ koe fɔ, Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, chɛ n tan koe a, miin ni Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na, n ya ɔ. Chɛɛ n ta‑a a ya kɔɔɛ a, Adebia chɛnyɛ ɔ, a sin, n yɛ‑a wan to Damasikɔsi duu ɔ.
48001018	Mbɛ san sawa gbakɔ, n sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, Pita kɔndɔn tena. A sin, nn fea ni wan nɔ, aan tee tan kun ma duu ko a.
48001019	Chɛɛ n nii ma Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ yen ni, mɔɔ dechee Chimisi, Mansa Chisɔsi suun ma nyɔɛ.
48001020	N mbe ka min nyɛn tena, wo tena, tea mu. N mbe ka a fɔ‑a Yataa chen kɔɔ wan.
48001021	Chɛ gbakɔ, n ta‑a wan Siyia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an fea Sidisia a.
48001022	Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, mɔɛ miin mbe chɔchi n dɔ Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, miin kai faen ni Chasi a, an nii n yen, an ni n sɔn.
48001023	An na‑a chɛ an na min dechee, mɔɛ n mbe a fɔ, an dɔ, “Kaminɛ min ni ko yawaenɛ sa mmɔ ma, a yɛ‑a mmɔ kaa a. An mbe gbɛ mɔɛ n kan‑da a si ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma, a toen ni min kasaa koe a.”
48001024	A sin, n bakoe na‑a a ma wan, an‑na Yataa tando.
48002001	San tan kun ma naanin gbakɔ, mbɛ n sɛ‑a to Chuusaɛn duu ɔ, nn fea Banabasi a. Nn ta‑a wan Taitɔsi a, nn boo ɔ.
48002002	Chisɔsi na‑a koe min dɔ yian n na, an na‑a a ma, n sɛ‑a Chuusaɛn. A sin, n‑na a sa wan an kɔɔ, chɛɛ nn dechee ni bɛnɛ ɔ, nn bɛ an 'na gbakoo n na. N‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian an na, n na‑a min dɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. N‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, n‑na wai min chɛ, a ma na to n ma gbama gbama a.
48002003	Chɛɛ Taitɔsi nan fan bɛɛ gbu, nn fea ni wɛɛ, a sin Kiisi mɔɛ mu a a, a nii ma din ni a ma, a a ni kamincha.
48002004	Chɛɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ dɔ nu Chasi ɔ, a wakoe ɛ sa ɔ dechee miin ya kɔɔɛ, chɛɛ a ee an faa ɔ, an toen ni chɛ an na. A sin, an na‑a wan nn tɛ ɔ yɛdɛn, min mbe a ma, an ni nn na tɛ. An ni a ɔ gbɛ, Chisɔsi‑a mmɔ bɔ buɛ min dɔ sawa chɛ boo ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a ma to, mmɔ yɛ‑a an yɔncha ɔ.
48002005	Chɛɛ tima kundu ɛndenɛ wɛɛ ko a, nn ma dɔn ni an ye. Chɛ ni a ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a si Chisɔsi ma, tea min mbe a gbaa, a ma na ka a chia ma wo ko a.
48002006	A sin, mɔɛ chɛ nu, baa ni miin ma (Yataa ee mɔ gbu tɛ bɔ, chɛ ko a mu, n ma n gbɔsɔ ni an ni buɛ min dɔ), an nɛnɛ nu, an nii ma fen fen na. Ka n ni chɛ fɔ to, mɔɛ miin mu, baa ni an ma, an nii ma fen kɔ fen sa ni n 'na sakana bai kun ma.
48002007	Chɛɛ an na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ Yataa ban‑da gbɛ n ya a, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian koe mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. A maen fan mu dechee, yɔ Yataa na‑a Pita ya buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin mu Chu mɔɛ a.
48002008	Koe min na mu, Yataa min na‑a a ma, Pita ta‑a wai chɛ koe a mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin mu Chu mɔɛ n na, an Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an‑na n bɛɛ sɔ, mɔɛ n tena, miin ma Chu mɔ a.
48002009	Chimisi, Pita, ni Chɔn, mɔɛ n na‑a an ya, mɔ gbau gbau wa n fan na. An‑na a ɔ yen kɛn, mbɛ Yataa wandi an na‑a wai chɛ be n ma, koadia demanɛ ɔ, an‑na an boo si wan nn kɔɔ, nn fea Banabasi a. An dɔn‑da wan nn ta koe ma mɔɛ n tena, miin ma Chu mɔ a, mbɛ an sin ta‑a Chu mɔɛ n tena.
48002010	An dechee mu, miin‑na nn dɔ tisa, yɔn tɔɛ n deman koe a tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, koe chɛndɛ chɛndɛ gbu an nii nɛ, n ma bɛnden ni min ma koe a.
48002011	Chɛɛ Pita na‑a kɛn Andiɔki duu ɔ, n‑na a ma nyin fan, a wandi ya kɔɔɛ ma, koe min na mu, a na‑a ma bɔ koe an ma.
48002012	A na‑a a fo kɛn nɔ a saa saa a, an bɛ an ni daunɛ chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ n na‑a kɛn, a ka Chimisi tena, a wan Pita sɛmbɛ‑a wan daun chɛ koe a, an bɛ an mɔɛ n na, a ka‑a an kaa a. Koe min na mu, a chianden ni mɔɛ chɛ n fan ma, miin ni a fɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ ee ma Chasi fɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ a, ni a a ma kamincha ni yɔ Chu mɔɛ nu.
48002013	Pita dɔndɔ gbe nii ma, chɛɛ Chisianɛ tɔɛ n bɛɛ, miin mu Chu mɔɛ a, an na‑a a ma ka wan. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Banabasi wɛɛ, a bea‑a an fɛ, bɔ koe mɔɛ chɛ n kaa a, miin ma Chu mɔ a.
48002014	Chɛɛ n na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ an nii ma tan ni, min sien mu tea ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ n‑na a fɔ Pita ye, an gbɛɛ ya kɔɔɛ ma, n dɔ, “I wan Pita, i wɛn mu Chu mɔɛ a, chɛɛ e koe ma‑a yɔ mɔɛ min ma Chu mɔ a. Fen ko a, e a din‑da mɔɛ n ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an ni koe ma yɔ Chu mɔɛ nu?”
48002015	Mmɔ wandi gbu, mmɔ wɛn mu ka Chu mɔɛ n na, mmɔ ma mɔɛ chɛ n na, mɔɛ min nii sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a chia ma, mɔɛ miin ma ka Chu mɔ a.
48002016	Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ wɛn mu Chu mɔɛ n na, mmɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mɔɛ ɛ wai min chɛ, an mbe ee a ma, Yataa ni a ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a tena. Chɛɛ chɛ ɛ bɔ kai fa an dɔ, mɔɛ ɛ min chɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. Chɛ ko a, mmɔ wɛɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ n na, a tena, mmɔ 'a kaifa chɛ ko a. A ee bɔ wai an dɔ, sawa ɛ a ma, mɔɛ ɛ min chɛ. Koe min na mu, ni wai ta fɛ chia a mu, sawa ɛ a ma mɔɛ ɛ min chɛ, Yataa ee mɔ ɔ mɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a tena.
