48002017	Ɛ wan Chu mɔɛ dɔ n yii ma, mbɛ mmɔ ee sɔ ɔ Yataa chia ma. Koe min na mu, mmɔ kai faen mu Chasi an na, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ n na. Ni mmɔ‑a chɛ ma, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a ka a ɔ yian fan na, mbɛ Chasi wandi an mbe a boo si ko yama ma kɔɔ. A sin, a ee ka buɛ chɛ ɔ.
48002018	Chɛɛ n ni yɛ wan to, n ni n kunɛ don Chu sawa kɔɔ, n kunɛ na‑a bɔ min kɔɔ, mbɛ n‑na a yian, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ mu n na.
48002019	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a sawa ko a ni dechee, Chasi fa‑a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, n fa‑a wan, sawa chɛ ta fɛ chia a, min mbe a ma, n ni ma Yataa ta fɔɛ ɔ. An ban‑da gbɛ n fa‑a, kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, nn fea Chasi a.
48002020	N fandi gbu wɛɛ, n faenɛ mu gbɛ, chɛɛ Chasi ɛ sɔ ɔ n kɔ. Chɛ ko a, n mbe buɛ min dɔ fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, n kai faen mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na. A wan to‑a n na, mbɛ a‑a a fɔɛ be n ko a.
48002021	N mbe ee dɔn, n ni Mansa Chisɔsi 'a koadia demanɛ kɔɔsa bia. Koe min na mu, ni Yataa 'a sawa nu, an fan mbe mɔɛ ma mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena, mbɛ Chasi fa‑a wan fuu.
48003001	Wo wan Kadesia mɔɛ nu, wo wooen mu. N ma a ɔ sɔn mɔɛ min nya‑a wo a. Wo wandi gbu, wo too n‑na a a min fan, mɔɛ n‑na Chisɔsi Chasi gbangban buɛ min dɔ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a fa‑a nɔ.
48003002	N mbe chɛ an fɔ tena dechee wo ye. Wo bea koe a sawa chɛ fɛ, an mbe ee a ma, Yataa Nyina ni bea wo fɛ. Chɛɛ wo dan sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, ni wo‑a a min, an mbe a ma, ɛ bea wo fɛ.
48003003	Wo wooen ba mu. Wo wɛn‑na a kuu sɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo fɛ, wo wan mbe ka gbɛ danka‑a tachɛ‑a mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a.
48003004	Wo tɔɔen mu kaka, ma koe a Chasi ko a. N ma dan ni gbu a a, mbɛ wo‑a koe miin gbɛɛ ɔ bia, mɔnɛ fuu mu.
48003005	Yataa‑a a Nyina bea wan wo fɛ, a‑a kamaya koe n ma wo tɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ an‑na a ma, Yataa na‑a chɛ ma. Wo na‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min fan, a si Chisɔsi ma, a yɛ to, wo‑a wo kai fa wan Chisɔsi a. A nii ma chɛ ma ni, a mu min na, wo bea‑a sawa fɛ.
48003006	Wo wo yii na chii wɛ, koe min ma‑a Ebeami a. Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Ebeami‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. A sin, Yataa wɛɛ‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.”
48003007	Chɛ ni a ɔ yian wo a, mbɛ mɔɛ miin kai faen mu Yataa a, an fan mu Ebeami cheeya chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n na.
48003008	A sin, Yataa 'a gboo‑a chɛ kɔɔ fɔ wan. Mbɛ Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an ni an kaifa a a, mbɛ a‑a an ya mɔ tandenɛ n na, a chen kɔɔ. Chɛ an‑na a ma, a fua‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da Ebeami a. A‑a a fɔ wan a ye, a ɔ, “Dunya ɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe dua sɔn‑da, ɛ ka‑a i wan na.”
48003009	Chɛ ko a, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, an duaenɛ mu, an bɛ Ebeami a, min kai faen ni Yataa a.
48003010	Mɔɛ gbɛɛ, miin too ma sɔen mu Mosisi 'a sawa ma, an tan koe a Yataa chen kɔɔ, an mbe Yataa 'a danka an kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, a ɔ, “Yataa ɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ danka‑a wan, min mbe ee don‑da koe chɛ n gbɛɛ kɔɔ, miin mbe a 'a sawa gboo ɔ, a ni an gbɛɛ ma.”
48003011	Mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ɔ yen fan gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa ee mɔ ɔ mɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a 'a sawa wakoe a. Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, “Mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a Yataa a, ɛ an ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a sin fan mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.”
48003012	Chɛɛ bea koe sawa chɛ fɛ, ko dɔndɔ ma, an fea mɔɛ kai fa koe ma Yataa a. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, “Mɔɛ miin mbe sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ bɔ‑a a gbee a chɛndɛ chɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ n fan mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da.”
48003013	Chasi‑a mmɔ kun ka wan, a bɔ sawa chɛ 'a danka kɔɔ. Mmɔ wakoe an na‑a a ma, a‑a danka chɛ ɔ bia, a ka koe a mmɔ kun ma. Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ, min mbe fa‑a dɛn dɔ kɔnɛ ma, Yataa ni a danka.”
48003014	Chɛ ni a ma, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, Yataa 'a dua min mbe Ebeami ma, a ni ma mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛ an mbe a ma, mmɔ ni kun Yataa Nyina ma sɔn‑da, mmɔ too ɔ dia‑a min ma sɔn koe a, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a.
48003015	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ka n mbe tɔmɔsi yian, mɔgbuya ɔ. Mɔ fea nu, ni an‑na dɔbɛnɛ chɛ, mbɛ an kuiɛ bɛn‑da a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a ka a gba ɔ, chɛ ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a kun ma sa. Ni mɔɛ gbɛɛ ban‑da dɔn‑da a ma, ɛ to ka wan.
48003016	Yataa‑a tooɔdia sɛsɛ chɛ wan Ebeami a, ni a cheeya. Yataa 'a gboo ma a fɔ ni, “cheeya nu,” min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ an kɔ koo wan. Chɛɛ a yii ni dɔndɔɛ an na, a ɔ, “mbɛ ni i cheeya,” min mu Chasi a.
48003017	N toen mu n ni min fɔ, an nɛ. Mbɛ Yataa‑a sawa be wan Mosisi ma. A ban‑da kɛn dɔbɛnɛ chɛ‑a Ebeami a, san chɛmɛ naanin, san bi sawa gbakɔ, mbɛ a‑a sawa chɛ be Mosisi ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, an sawa chɛ ee che dɔbɛn chɛ yɔn‑da, Yataa ban‑da min chɛ‑a. Chɛ ee che ma‑a, min mbe a ma, Yataa‑a tooɔdia min chɛ Ebeami a, a ni ma fuu gbama a.
48003018	Koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ koe min chɛ mɔ gbu ye, ni sawa an mbe a chɛ, mbɛ fanka ee to tooɔdia chɛ a, Yataa‑a min chɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa gbu, a‑a tooɔdia min chɛ Ebeami a, an na‑a a ma, a‑a koadia demanɛ chɛ a a.
48003019	Chɛɛ sawa chɛ nii ma sa ni gbama a. Ko yama ma, an fɛ mu, Yataa‑a sawa chɛ sa dɔbɛn chɛ kaa a. Koe ni ma ka, aan Ebeami cheeya chɛ ni na, tooɔdia chɛ chɛ‑a min na. A sin, Yataa‑a sawa chɛ a ben maeka n fan dɔ, a be koe a Mosisi ma, min ni mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ an bɛ Yataa a.
48003020	Tɛ mɔɛ tana, a 'a wai mu kaka fea gbɛɛ faa chima koe an na. Chɛɛ Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an‑na tooɔdia chɛ Ebeami a.
48003021	Chɛɛ chɛ ma a ɔ yian ni, mbɛ sawa chɛ ma to ni ko ɔ ko a, a si Yataa 'a tooɔdia ma. Koe min na mu, ni sawa been fan mu, min mbe fɔɛ be, mbɛ sawa an mbe a ma, Yataa ni mɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ a.
48003022	Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, dunya gbɛɛ, ɛ ko yama 'a gbasaya an kɔɔ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa na‑a tooɔdia min chɛ, ɛ a be‑a chɛ n fan ma, miin mbe an kai fa‑a Chisɔsi Chasi a.
48003023	Mmɔ e na to mmɔ kai fa‑a Chisɔsi Chasi a, mmɔ ni sawa an kɔɔ. Sawa chɛ‑a mmɔ bia wan, yɔ pimbi chenɛ a sa mɔɛ nu, aan tima chɛ, mmɔ kai fa koe Chisɔsi a, a ɔ yian‑da mmɔ a tima min na.
48003024	Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa‑a sawa an sa mmɔ kun ma, aan Chasi na tima a. A sin na‑a, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni mmɔ kai fa a a, mbɛ Yataa‑a mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ a.
48003025	Mmɔ sin‑na mmɔ kai fa ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ Chasi a, mmɔ ee to an sawa kɔɔ, mmɔ kun ma fɛn koe a.
48003026	Koe min na mu, ni wo‑a wo kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, wo gbɛɛ mu Yataa 'a denɛ n fan na, wo gbɛɛ mu gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ an na, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a.
48003027	Koe min na mu, yii chɛ‑a wo gbɛɛ kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a, wo ma koe mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a. A sin, wo‑a Chasi sɔnɛ ya gbɛ.
48003028	Wo gbɛɛ, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a, wo ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Tɛ bɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee to Chu mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na. Tɛ bɔ ee chɛ n ma miin mu yɔnɛ n na, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe an fandi ko a. Tɛ bɔ ee mɔ kaima an ma, an bɛ musu n na. Mɔ tɛ bɔ ee to nɔ.
48003029	A sin, ni wo e gbɛ Chasi an ko a, mbɛ wo mu gbɛ Ebeami cheeya n fan na. Wo wan yɛ‑a a gbaa a, tooɔdia chɛ ko a.
48004001	Chɛɛ ka n mbe tɔmɔsi chɛ be, wo ni n da a kuiɛ ɔ gbɛ. Ni den mɛsɛ ma‑a wɛ tima min na denmɛsɛya ɔ, ɛ wan yɔ yɔnɛ. Boo fenɛ min mbe a fa boo ɔ, a mu wɛɛ a ta a, chɛɛ gbasaya ee wɛ a boo ɔ, an boo fen chɛ n kun ma.
48004002	Ɛ ma gbakoo n fan na gbasaya kɔɔ, miin mbe a sɔ chia ma aan tima ni che, a fa na‑a tima min yian.
48004003	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mmɔ wɛɛ, mmɔ ni wan denmɛsɛya ɔ. A sin, yɔnɛ ni mmɔ a, nyina yama n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ dunya chɛ ɔ.
48004004	Chɛɛ tima che‑a kɛn chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a a wandi gbu ta denɛ a na wan dunya ɔ. Musu an‑na a bu ya, mbɛ a‑a a suun mɔgbuya chia a. A sin, a ni sawa an kɔɔ, fɔɛ ɔ.
48004005	Yataa‑a a sɔ, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ni an sawa kɔɔ, an ni bɔ a kɔɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, Yataa ni mmɔ ya a 'a denɛ n na.
48004006	Yataa sin, a‑a a ma wan, a 'a denɛ Nyina, ɛ mmɔ fɛ. A‑a chɛ ma, koe min na mu, a 'a denɛ mu mmɔ a. A 'a denɛ Nyina chɛ sin, ɛ Yataa chee tena wan, a ɔ, “Fa.”
48004007	Chɛ ko a, yɔn ma to wo a, Yataa 'a denɛ mu gbɛ wo a. Wo sin ma‑a ka buɛ min dɔ a 'a denɛ a, a‑a dua miin sa tena ɔ bɛn a 'a mɔɛ n ko a, wo wan ta ɛ ma‑a an na.
48004008	Wo nii ma Yataa sɔn tima min na suun, wo ni yɔncha ɔ wan, nyina yama n boo ɔ, miin nii ma Yataa a.
48004009	Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, wo‑a Yataa sɔn gbɛ. Chɛɛ tea gbu ko a, Yataa an‑na wo sɔn. Tea gbu ko a, a ee che ma‑a wo 'a yiinachii ɔ, wo ni mun to, wo ni bea nyina yama chɛ n fɛ, fanka ee ka miin na, a sin, an mbe ben‑da fen fuinɛ a. Wo e chɛ ma wan? A ee ma to wo 'a yiinachii ɔ ɛnden bɛɛ a, wo ma koe a to, an 'na yɔnɛ n na.
48004010	Wo e tee n ya wan, a ben tee dɔ nu ma. Wo e kau dɔ n bɛɛ ya ka wan, ni tima dɔ nu, a basan sanɛ dɔ n bɛɛ a.
48004011	N mbe faagbaa an dɔ, mbɛ n tɔɔya‑a wo ko a fuu.
48004012	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n mbe wo disa tena, wo ni bea n 'na ko ma buɛ fɛ. Koe min na mu, n bɛɛ, n na‑a koe n ma wan wo ta chia a. Wo nii ma ko yama ma ni n na.
48004013	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ a saa a, gboo ɔ gbandi, an na‑a a ma, n‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ sa wo tena, a si Chisɔsi ma.
48004014	A sin, n gboo ɔ yauaen ni boo ɔ boo, min ni kɔndɔfii a wo tena, wo nii ma n tinɔ ni, chɛ ma, wo ni wo boo bɔ n kɔɔ. Chɛɛ wo na‑a n bia wan, yɔ Yataa 'a maeka, yɔ Chisɔsi Chasi wɛɛ.
48004015	Buɔdia min ni wo ɔ, n ma a ɔ sɔn ɛ gbɛ buɛ min dɔ. Ni wo ni kun fan, wo ni wo ya n bɔ, wo ni an be n ma, wo ni a ma‑a wan. N mbe chɛ siiya bɔ wan.
48004016	N yen ko gbɛ, n‑na tea bai fɔ wo ye. Chɛ ee na n ma gbɛ wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ an na?
48004017	Mɔɛ dɔ nu, an mbe a ɔ yian tena wan wo a, mbɛ an toen mu wo a kaka, chɛɛ ko chɛndɛ ma wo ko a. An toen mu an ni mmɔ tɛ du, mbɛ wo ma‑a gbɛ chia dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ an na.
48004018	A gbu nyin gbɛ, wo faa ni ma koe ɔ, min mu ko chɛndɛ a. A sin, wo ma chɛ ma dechee, n mbe ma wo tɛ ɔ tima min na, chɛɛ wo an ma tima ɔ tima ko a.
48004019	N 'na den toa nu, n mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia tena wo ko a, aan wo sɔnɛ ni bɔ Chasi ta a.
48004020	Sanche chɛ ɔ, ɛ ma wan n ma buɔdia a, n ni ma wo tɛ ɔ, n ni n koɔ buɛ mun. Koe min na mu, n kɔndɔ fiien mu, wo wakoe a.
48004021	Wo wɛn toen mu, wo ni ma sawa chɛ kɔɔ, ka wɛ n mbe wo ɔ tisa. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, sawa chɛ‑a min fɔ?
48004022	Koe min na mu, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Ebeami‑a den kaima fea an fan suun. Dɔndɔɛ de ni yɔnɛ an na, dɔndɔɛ sin de nii ma yɔnɛ a.
48004023	Chɛɛ yɔnɛ chɛ ta den kaima chɛ, a na‑a suun mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia an na. Musu dɔndɔɛ chɛ sin, min nii ma yɔnɛ a, a 'a den kaima suun‑da tooɔdia ta fɛ chia an na, Yataa‑a min chɛ Ebeami a.
48004024	Chɛ mu gbondoma an na, a ɔ gbɛ koe a. Musu fea chɛ nu, an mu dɔbɛn fea chɛ n fan na, Yataa na‑a miin chɛ. Dɔbɛnɛ dɔndɔ chɛ‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an ma, min tɔ mu Saina. A na‑a chɛ wan, mbɛ musu min tɔ mu Aka, ɛ denɛ n suun‑da wan, miin mbe ma‑a yɔnɛ n na.
48004025	Aka chɛ mu gbɛ kɔnkɔɛ chɛ an na, min tɔ mu Saina, Adebia chɛnyɛ ɔ. A sin, a sɔen mu duu wa chɛ an ko a sanche, min mu Chuusaɛn na. Koe min na mu, nɔ ɛ yɔncha an dɔ, a basan a ɔ mɔɛ n na.
48004026	Chɛɛ Chuusaɛn tana, min mbe banda bu ɔ, a ee yɔncha ɔ. A sin, a ɛ wan dechee yɔ mmɔ de.
48004027	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Gbanda musu, i wɛn mbe ee den suun, buɔdia bɔ. Yee tɛ, buɔdia bɔ, a ɔ benden ba a, i wɛn mbe ee bu ɔ tɛ bu dumɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, musu boo kaenɛ, ɛ denɛ suun‑da wan kaka ɛ ben‑da wan musu ma, kai ɛ min boo ɔ.”
48004028	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo e wan yɔ Aisaki, min suun‑da yɔ Yataa‑a Ebeami too ɔ dia buɛ min dɔ.
48004029	Chɛɛ a tima chɛ a, denɛ min suun‑da mɔgbuya ta fɛ chia a, a‑a ko yawaenɛ sa wan den chɛ ma, min suun‑da Yataa Nyina ta fɛ chia a. A sin, sanche wɛɛ, a ɛ ma tena ka wan.
48004030	Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gboo‑a chɛ an fɔ. A ɔ, “Yɔnɛ chɛ gbain, an fea a 'a denɛ a. Koe min na mu, yɔn musu 'a denɛ, a ee a fa boo fenɛ ma chɛɛ chɛ‑a, an fea a 'a fuu musu 'a denɛ a.”
48004031	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ma yɔn musu 'a den na, mmɔ mu fuu musu 'a denɛ n fan na.
48005001	Ni yɔncha tana mu, Chasi‑a mmɔ bɔ a ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ sɔ chidi, a ko a. Wo butuin chɛ, min mbe a ma, wo ma na don to an yɔncha fanka ma chɛ kɔɔ.
48005002	Sanche gbɛ, n fan, Pɔɔ, n mbe chɛ an fɔ tena wo ye. Ni wo dɔn‑da an ni wo a kamincha, Chasi ee na‑a wo deman‑da ɛnden bɛɛ a.
48005003	N mbe chɛ fɔ tena to mɔ ɔ mɔ ye, min ma Chu mɔ a, chɛɛ a dɔn‑da a a ni kamincha. Mbɛ a dindenɛ mu an mɔɛ chɛ ma, don koe a an sawa gbɛɛ kɔɔ.
48005004	Wo tɛ du‑a gbɛ, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. Wo wan, ɛ wo wɛn yii ma, mbɛ ni wo‑a sawa chɛ gbɛɛ a tachɛ, Yataa ɛ wo ya wan mɔ tandenɛ n na, a tena. Wo nɛnɛ nu, wo fo‑a gbae, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ a.
48005005	Koe min na mu, mmɔ tana, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, yiinatɛ ɛ ka mmɔ wɛn dɔ, mbɛ Yataa ɛ mmɔ ya wan mɔ tandenɛ n na, a tena. Mmɔ kai faenɛ ɛ Chasi a, mbɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan.
48005006	Koe min na mu, mmɔ mu ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a, Yataa ee ko dɔ gbɛɛ kan kɔ kan ma fɛn. A ee a ma fɛn, ni mɔɛ a kaminchaen fan mu, chɛ ma, ni a a ma kamincha ni. Ɛ min yen dechee, an nɛ, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa wan a a, min dɔ ɛ yian koadia ɔ.
48005007	Wo na‑a a kuu sɔ wan ta koe a ya ɔ ma chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛɛ n ma a ɔ sɔn, mɔɛ min‑na a fɔ wo ye, wo ni sɛmbɛ bea koe a tea chia chɛ fɛ.
48005008	Wo yiima mun koe chɛ, a ma ka ni Yataa an na, min‑na wo chee, a‑a a boo sɔ wo ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.
48005009	An mbe chɛ an fɔ, an dɔ, yisin denɛ chɛenɛ feawa funku ɔ, an dɔ, an mbe a ma, feawa funku gbu ɛ sɛ wa chɛ.
48005010	N yii faen fan mu Mansa Chisɔsi ma, mbɛ wo ee bea‑a mɔ dɔ mende da a kuiɛ fɛ, chɛɛ wo e bea‑a n ta an fɛ. A sin, mɔɛ min mbe wo tɔɔ‑a, gbɛmbo ɛ wan a ko a. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, a ni ma mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
48005011	Chɛɛ n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n tana, n‑na n boo bɔ kanɛ chɛ koe a, mbɛ ni mɔɛ a ma kamincha ni, a ee ya mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena. Chɛ an fɛ mu, an mbe tun ko yawaenɛ sa‑a n ma. Ni chɛ sin ko a mu, Chu mɔɛ n faa nii tɛ‑a n ma, ni n ni mɔɛ n kan, a si an na kamincha koe an ma. Chɛɛ n mbe mɔɛ n kan, a si Chisɔsi 'a saya an ma, kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
48005012	Ɛ wan n yii ma, mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe ka wo yiima ɔ basan basan tena, an mbe an fandi ma‑a wan kai busi a.
48005013	Koe min na mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, Yataa‑a wo chee wan, a bɔ yɔncha ɔ. Chɛɛ yuu min tɛ‑a ka wo ma, wo ma ben ko yama ma‑a, wo gboo faa ma koe nu, wo ni a dɛn wo bɔ koe ma yɔncha ɔ. Chɛɛ koadianyɔncha ɔ, wo ma bɔi denɛ a wo nyɔn ko a.
48005014	Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a sawa miin gbɛɛ be Mosisi ma, a kun tɛen mu bai dɔndɔ gbe an na. A ɔ, “Wo to wo 'a mɔɛ n na, yɔ wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo wandi a.”
48005015	Chɛɛ ni wo‑a wo nyɔn chin, wo ni wo nyɔn kasaa, chɛ ni ma wo yii ma. Mbɛ ni wo ma tima ya ni, wo e ban‑da wan wo nyɔn kasaa‑a gbae.
48005016	Chɛɛ n ni chɛ fɔ wo ye. Wo tachɛ Yataa Nyina gbee a. Wo faa ma ta wo faa ma koe yama chɛ n tena, bea koe a an fɛ.
48005017	Koe min na mu, mmɔ faa ma koe yama nu, an ko a ma di Yataa Nyina ye. Yataa Nyina wɛɛ, a toen mu koe miin na, mmɔ wɛɛ ma to ni an na. Mɔgbuya chia, a kan kɔ sɔenɛ mu Yataa Nyina a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ee che koe ma‑a wo toen mu min ma koe a.
48005018	Chɛɛ ni Yataa Nyina‑a wo sɔ chia ma, mbɛ wo ee to sawa kɔɔ.
48005019	Mmɔ faa ma koe yama nu, an mbe wan sa ɔ den. Ko tɛ an mbe ma a ɔ, a boo a ee ko ɛnden bɛɛ a, a maenɛ ɛ yɔ ba tana ti.
48005020	A mu to fenɛ n fai koe an na, fenɛ miin ma Yataa a, ni yawa gbasi, a basan chɛɛ ma nyɔncha a. A yɛ to, koɔ wa, toomaya, ni faa gbandiaya. A sin, an mbe to dechee an fandi an na, mbɛ an du‑a ben‑da gbambe ma.
48005021	An ya ɛ ma an bɔɛ n boo fenɛ n fan fɛ, an mbe gbɛ wa min, an mbe daun chɛ bɛnɛ bia wan tima ɔ tima ko a, an mbe ko sɛsɛ dɔ gbɛɛ ma. N sin, n na‑a wo a si buɛ min dɔ a saa a, ka n mbe wo a si to sanche. Mbɛ mɔɛ miin mbe koe chɛ n ma‑a, an mbe ee na‑a don‑da Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
48005022	Chɛɛ ni Yataa Nyina ma‑a mɔɛ fɛ, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ma ka wan. An fan nɛ koadia a, buɔdia, faachima, faabia, ko chɛndɛ ma, mɔ chɛndɛya, ni mɔɛ ma koe danaya tɔɛ a.
48005023	A yɛ to, mɔɛ ni a ma chima, a sin, mɔɛ e kun fan i faa ma. Chɛ nɛnɛ nu, sawa kan kɔ kan mbe ee sɔ an na.
48005024	Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin gbɛɛ, an mbe Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, an‑na chɛ an ma. Koe gbɛɛ, min ma nyin an 'na mɔgbuya ɔ, an faa ɛ miin dɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, an‑na an gbangban kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
48005025	Ni mmɔ ɛ fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, mmɔ tachɛ Yataa Nyina gbee a, mbɛ mmɔ bea‑a chia chɛ fɛ, Yataa Nyina ɛ mmɔ sɔ‑a min ma.
48005026	Mmɔ ma yonka tɛ, mmɔ sin ma sɛ mmɔ nyɔn faa ma, mmɔ sin ma toomaya bɔ mmɔ nyɔn na.
48006001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo e a ɔ yen‑da wan, mbɛ mɔɛ ɛ wo tɛ ɔ, ko yama kun‑da min ma. Yataa Nyina ɛ wo wɛn sɔ tena wɛ chia chɛndɛ ma, wo tima ya, wo ni an mɔɛ chɛ sɔ chia chɛ ma. Wo wandi gbu wɛɛ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, wo yiima ma na mun, a ka an chia ma.
48006002	Wo wo boo si wo nyɔn na ya kɔɔ tawa kɔɔ, min mbe a ma, wo ni Chasi 'a sawa bia a chia ma.
48006003	Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a yiinachii chɛ, mbɛ mɔɛ mu a a, min sin mu ka mɔ a tenden ma a, ɛ a wandi an bun tena ka.
48006004	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a wandi gbu tachɛ buɛ ma mɛn. A tima a mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ a ɔ yen‑da, mbɛ mɔɛ e yonka tɛ i wandi an ko a dechee, chɛɛ i bɔɛ ma.
48006005	Koe min na mu, Yataa ee mɔ ɔ mɔ bia a nyɔn sɔnɛ a.
48006006	Ni an‑na mɔɛ min kan, Yataa bai ma, a ni a boo fenɛ chɛndɛ gbɛɛ ɔ du, a ni a kan mɔɛ kɔ.
48006007	Wo ma wo wandi bun, mbɛ wo e kun fan wo ni Yataa ma yɛn. Koe min na mu, chin fen kan kɔ kan, mɔɛ ɛ min chin, ɛ danka an gbɔɛ ya a.
48006008	A sin, ni mɔɛ ma‑a dechee a faa ma koe yama ma‑a mɔgbuya ɔ, a gbɔɛ ɛ ma‑a kuɔ fɔ saya an na, a danka a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ma‑a Yataa Nyina gbee a, a gbɔɛ ɛ ma‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an na.
48006009	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ gboo ɔ ma fa ko chɛndɛ ma koe a. Koe min na mu, tima ɛ che‑a wan, ni mmɔ ma sɛmbɛ ni, mbɛ mmɔ‑a a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn.
48006010	Chɛ ko a, Yataa ɛ mmɔ kɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ, mmɔ ni ko chɛndɛ ma tima ɔ tima, mɔ ɔ mɔ a. A sin, a bɛɛ bɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, mmɔ kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, mmɔ bɛ miin na.
48006011	Wo gboo chɛ yen bɛ, n fandi gbu, n mbe min nyɛn tena gboso gboso wo tena, n ta boo a.
48006012	Mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ee a din‑da wo ma, wo a kamincha koe a. Mɔɔ dechee mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin toen mu an ni an fandi ɔ yian, mɔ gbu gboo ta chia a. A sin, an mbe chɛ ma‑a dechee chia an na, an mbe ee kun, an ni ko yawaenɛ sa an ma chia min na, Chasi 'a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ko a.
48006013	Koe min na mu, mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ gbu, miin na kaminchaen mu, an bɛɛ gbu ee an sawa bia tena. Chɛɛ an toen mu, wo a ni kamincha, min mbe a ma, an ni tɔmbɔɛ chɛ wo gboo a.
48006014	Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe ee tɔmbɔɛ chɛ ɛnden bɛɛ a, fen dɔ mende ko a, mɔɔ dechee kɔn gbengbanden chɛ, Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa‑a min ma. An kɔn gbengbandenɛ chɛ, a‑a a ma gbɛ, n boo ee to dunya chɛ ma koe ɔ, dunya chɛ wɛɛ boo ee n ma koe ɔ.
48006015	An ni mɔ a kamincha, an ma i a kamincha, chɛ ma ko a, ɛnden bɛɛ a. Min mu dechee koe a, an nɛ, Yataa‑a a mɔɛ chɛ ma mɔ nama a.
48006016	Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe bea‑a chia chɛ fɛ, Yataa ni faachima be an ma, a ni chinchincha yian an na. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an fan mu Yataa ta mɔɛ n na.
48006017	A ka gbɛ sanche ma, aan a ta, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma n ya kɔɔ tawa. Koe min na mu, paa, an mbe n gboo ma, min mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ Chisɔsi 'a yɔnɛ mu n na.
48006018	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo dua. A ni ma ka.
49001001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na, yɔ Yataa toen ni buɛ min dɔ a ni ma. N fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, wo wɛn mu Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, wo wɛn mbe a a tun tena wo kai fa koe a Chisɔsi Chasi a, Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ.
49001002	Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
49001003	Tando ni be Yataa ma. A wan mu Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa. A wan Yataa, a‑a mmɔ dua wan dua chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe banda bu ɔ. A‑a chɛ ma, koe min na mu, mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chasi a.
49001004	A e na to dunya gbu a dan‑da wɛɛ, a na‑a ban fan gbɛ a boo sɔ‑a mmɔ ma, mmɔ ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na, mmɔ wɛn mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a. A na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni ma a ko a tenchen, mɔɛ nu, mabɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee miin ma. Koadia ɔ,
49001005	a ban‑da wan gbɛ a ɔ bɛn‑da suun, mmɔ ma koe a a 'a denɛ n na, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ. Yataa toen ni an ni ma, a‑a a sin dɔ bɛn ka wan.
49001006	Mmɔ Yataa tando kamaya chia chɛ ko a, a‑a a 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ yian mmɔ a min na, a faa gbɛɛ a. A‑a chɛ sin ma, a faa ma denɛ an dɔ.
49001007	Mmɔ mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chasi chɛ an na. A na‑a mmɔ kun ka wan, a wii chɛ a min bɔ‑a, a fa tima a. Yataa‑a a boo bɔ wan mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ. Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ da a ko gba.
49001008	A sin mbe an koadia chɛ, a ɔ yian fan mmɔ a, a ɔ bendenɛ a. Koe min na mu, a 'a yiinachii ɔ yansama ɔ, a 'a ko sɔn ba ɔ,
49001009	a‑a a faa ma koe ɔ yian fan mmɔ a, min dɔ nunden ni tee mmɔ ma. A toen ni chɛ an ni ma, a sin, a‑a Chasi a na, an ma koe a.
49001010	Dɔbɛnɛ an nii nɛ, Yataa ɛ min na ban‑da, ni a tima che‑a. A sin, fen kɔ fen, banda bu ɔ, ni duu gboo ma, na koe mu kaina dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ Chasi ma‑a an kun ma.
49001011	Nn ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, nn bɛ Chasi a, an fɛ mu Yataa‑a a boo sɔ nn ma gbɔɔ, min mbe a ma, nn ni ma tenchen a ko a. Koe min na mu, a toen ni chɛ an ni ma, a sin‑na chɛ an dɔ bɛn. A sin, kan kɔ kan, ɛ a ma wan, yɔ a‑a a ɔ bɛn buɛ min dɔ.
49001012	Nn fan, nn fɛn ma‑a mɔɛ saa n na, nn kai fa koe a Chasi a, Yataa ban‑da gbɛ a boo sɔ‑a nn ma, tando be koe a a ma, basɔmaya wa ɛ a wɛn boo ɔ.
49001013	A sin, a ma‑a ka wan wo wɛɛ a. Wo wan, wo wɛn‑na sakana bai chɛ a min, tea mu min na, min mbe wo baun. Wo sin‑na wo kai fa wan Chisɔsi Chasi a, mbɛ a‑a Yataa Nyina a na, wo too ɔ dia‑a min na, wo kun ma fɛn koe a.
49001014	Yataa Nyina ɛ wan mmɔ fɛ. Chɛ ko a, mmɔ yii na tɛenɛ ni ma gbɛ, mbɛ ɛ fen chɛ n be‑a wan mmɔ ma, a‑a mmɔ too ɔ dia miin na. Mmɔ wɛn sin mu ka a ta mɔɛ n na, mmɔ ɛ fen chɛ n ma sɔn‑da wan, tima min‑na, ɛ mmɔ kun ka‑a gbae. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, Yataa ni tando ma sɔn, basɔmaya wa ɛ a wɛn ma.
49001015	Chɛ ko a, n ma sɛmbɛ ni, Yataa wai bɔ koe a wo ko a. Koe min na mu, n‑na a a min wo kai faen mu buɛ min dɔ Mansa Chisɔsi a. A yɛ to, wo toen mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. N mbe n yii na chii wan wo a, tima ɔ tima, ni n ma‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a.
49001017	N dɔ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a Yataa a, mmɔ fa min kamayaen mu, a ni a Nyina a yii ma koe a wo fɛ. An Nyina chɛ ni a ma, wo ni yiimatɛ wa ma sɔn, koe n dɔ gbɛ koe a chɛndɛ chɛ. A yɛ to, koe miin dɔ nundenɛ ɛ, a si a ma, wo ni an dɔ gbɛ.
49001018	N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena to, Yataa ni a ma, wo ni a 'a manɛ yen, a ɔ sɔn koe a, fen chɛndɛ miin mbe a boo ɔ wo ko a. Wo wan, a‑a wo wɛn chee, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na. N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena to, wo ni a ɔ sɔn to, mbɛ wo too ɔ diaen mu dua miin na, an koo kaka.
49001019	N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena to, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mmɔ wɛn kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya mmɔ ɔ, a danka ee ɛnden bɛɛ a. An gbasaya wa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ,
49001020	a‑a a kun tɛ Chasi an dɔ, kɛn a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a ma, a‑a a si kaina ma bɛndenɛ banda bu ɔ, a boo nyima ɔ.
49001021	Chasi chɛ, a 'a mansaya, a 'a gbasaya, a danka ee. A benden mu fen kɔ fen ma, dunya chɛ ɔ, a basan dunya a, min bɛɛ ɛ na tena. A benden mu nyina yama n 'na mansa n gbɛɛ ma.
49001022	Yataa sin gbu, a‑a Chasi chɛ si fen kɔ fen kun ma, chɔchi ko a. A‑a fen kɔ fen don Chasi kɔɔ.
49001023	Chɔchi gbu sin, an mu Chasi gboo a. An mbe a ma, a da ni fa gban, yɔ a wandi wɛɛ, ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ, fen kɔ fen da ɛ fa.
49002001	A saa a, wo faenɛ ni, Yataa Nyina ta fɛ chia a. Koe min na mu, wo ni koe n ma wan, miin mbe ee a chia ma, ko yama nu.
49002002	An tima chɛ a, wo ni tachɛ tena wan, wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ, wo beaenɛ ɛ dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n ta chia fɛ. Nyina yama n ya ɔ sɔɛ, dunya chɛ ɔ, gbasaya ɛ min boo ɔ ben‑da banda a, wo beaen ni an fɛ. An nyina chɛ, sanche chɛ ɔ, an mbe wai chɛ tena mɔɛ n na, miin mbe ee dɔn an too ma sɔ koe a Yataa ma.
49002003	Mmɔ wɛɛ, tima dɔndɔ a, mmɔ bɛ ni wan ben‑da mmɔ bɛ an mɔ bonda chɛ n na, mmɔ ɛ bea mmɔ faa ma koe n fɛ. Mmɔ ni mmɔ yii ma koe n fan na tachɛ, a basan mɔgbuya yama a. A chia chɛ a, tɛ bɔ nii mmɔ ma, mmɔ bɛ an na. Mmɔ ni mɔɛ n fan na, Yataa ni miin tɔɔ‑a.
49002004	Chɛɛ chinchimaya koo, Yataa boo ɔ. An fɛ mu, mmɔ faen chɛ ni wɛɛ, mmɔ 'a ko yama n boo ɔ, a‑a fɔɛ nama be wan mmɔ ma, mmɔ bɛ Chasi a. A toen mu buɛ min dɔ mmɔ a, a koo. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a 'a koadia demanɛ dechee, an‑na mmɔ baun.
49002006	A sin, Yataa‑a mmɔ kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, mmɔ bɛ Chasi a. Mbɛ a‑a a ma to, mmɔ si‑a banda bu ɔ, mmɔ wɛn mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a.
49002007	Chɛ ni a ma, a ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ ɛ koadia demanɛ min chɛ‑a mmɔ a ya ɔ ma, a danka ee ma a. Chɛ sin mbe bɔ‑a chinchimaya an dɔ, Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ.
49002008	Koe min na mu, koadia demanɛ ɔ mu, wo‑a bauncha ma sɔn. A sin ma‑a koe min na mu, wo‑a wo kai fa wan Chasi a. Chɛ sin, wo wan ma a ma ni. Chɛɛ Yataa wandi, an‑na a ma wo ko a, gbama gbama a.
49002009	Wo chɛ chɛ wai nu, an fan ma a ma ni, chɛ ni ma, ɛnden bɛɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma na yonka tɛ, a si a ma.
49002010	Koe min na mu, Yataa boo gba mu mmɔ a. A‑a mmɔ a dan, koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi a, mmɔ chɛ chɛ wai chɛndɛ ko a. Mmɔ chɛ chɛ wai chɛ nu, Yataa‑a miin to mmɔ ya ɔ, mmɔ ni tachɛ an chia chɛ n na.
49002011	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wan, wo wɛn ma ka Chu mɔɛ n na, wo wo yii na chii chɛ ma. Chu mɔɛ n ni wo chee, an dɔ, Yataa sɔn bai nu, koe min na mu, wo a nii ma kamincha ni, yɔ Chu mɔɛ nu. Chɛɛ da kamincha chɛ sin, a mu dechee manda an na, mɔ gbu ɛ min na tachɛ a boo a.
49002012	Chɛ ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ a tima chɛ a, wo tɛ duen fan ni wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. A yɛ to, wo kaen fan ni mɔɛ tɔɛ n kaa a, a bɔ kuiɛ dɔndɔya dɔbɛn chɛ ɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ. A sin, wo ma‑a sonda n na, dɔbɛn nama chɛ kɔɔ, Yataa‑a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n too ɔ dia min na. Yataa ee wo boo ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ, wo sin yii na ma tɛ ni fen kɔ fen ma.
49002013	Wo tɛ ɔ ni yansan fan tee Yataa a. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, wo ma min chɛ‑a mmɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a, a‑a wo ma sawan Yataa tena. Chɛ bɔ‑a a wii chɛ an dɔ, min bɔ‑a a fa tima a, mmɔ ko a.
49002014	Chasi wandi, an na‑a kuiɛ dɔndɔya a mmɔ tɛ ɔ. A‑a a ma, wo bɛ Chu mɔɛ n na, wo ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. A‑a a ma, kodomaya min ni mmɔ tɛ ɔ, yɔ simɛndi fɛnsi, a ban‑da. A 'a saya‑a a ma,
49002015	a‑a Chu sawa n ka wan an gba n dɔ, ni koe chɛ nu, sawa chɛ ni miin din mɔɛ n ma, an ma koe a. A toen ni, a ni Chu mɔɛ n na gbuu, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a, an ni ma mɔ nama dɔndɔɛ a, a wan Chasi ɔ. Chia chɛ a mu, a na‑a kuiɛ dɔndɔya a an tɛ ɔ.
49002016	A sin, a 'a saya kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, ɛ na‑a wan mmɔ chɛ‑a mmɔ nyɔn dɔ, mmɔ bɛ Yataa a, mmɔ ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, kodomaya chɛ ni ban.
49002017	A sin, a na‑a wan, a‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian wo a, wo wɛn nii Yataa baima, a basan chɛ n na, miin gbɛndenɛ ni Yataa ma.
49002018	Chasi an‑na a ma, Chu mɔɛ nu, ni miin ma Chu mɔ a, mmɔ bɛ, mmɔ ɛ si mmɔ Fa Yataa chen kɔɔ. Mmɔ‑a chia chɛ ma sɔn Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya an dɔ.
49002019	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, wo wan, wo wɛn ma ka Chu mɔ a, sonda ma to wo a, ben‑da dechee chia a, Yataa waa a. Chɛɛ wo e wan gbɛ yɔ mɔɛ nu, nn bɛ suun‑da miin na chɛnyɛ dɔndɔ gbe ɔ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ nu.
49002020	Wo sin, wo kuu sien fan mu gban, yɔ chenɛ. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ nu, an bɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na, an fan‑na a ma, mbɛ wo kuu si‑a. Chen chɛ gbu sin, a sɔ senɛ kuu ba mu Chisɔsi Chasi wandi an na.
49002021	Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe wan yɔ chen dɔndɔ gbe, koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu an na, an bɛ Chasi a. A sin, ɛ koa‑a wan, a ni ma tenchen Mansa Yataa 'a chenɛ a.
49002022	Wo wandi gbu wɛɛ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu wo a, wo bɛ Chasi a. Chɛ ko a, ɛ wo a tun tena wan, wo bɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ tɔɛ n na, wo ni ma yɔ a 'a chenɛ, ɛ ma kaina min a Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ.
49003001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n fan Pɔɔ, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena wo ko a. N fɛn mu ka, n mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a, koe min na mu, n mbe wai chɛ tena Chisɔsi Chasi ye wo ko a, wo wɛn ma ka Chu mɔ a.
49003002	Mmɔ a ya wɛ, mbɛ wo‑a a a min fan, Yataa‑a n ma buɛ min dɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ a, a ko a. Wo wan ko a mu, a‑a koadia deman chɛ chɛ n na.
49003003	N‑na a sima ɔ yian fan wo a gboo ɔ, a si koe chɛ ma, min dɔ nunden ni, Yataa‑a a ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ n na.
49003004	Ni wo‑a gboo nyɛnden chɛ kan, wo yii ɛ ta‑a wan nɔ, mbɛ n‑na koe chɛ n dɔ gbɛ wan, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma.
49003005	Suun, koe n fan nɛ, miin dɔ nii yian mɔ gbama n na. Yataa Nyina‑a a ɔ yian fan mɔɛ n na, miin mbe tenchen Yataa ko a. A‑a a ɔ yian Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na, an bɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na.
49003006	Yataa‑a dɔbɛn chɛ an yian an na. Mbɛ Chisianɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an mbe an ta ma sɔn‑da wan dua gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa ɛ min be. Ɛ ma‑a wan dechee yɔ Chisianɛ nu, miin mu Chu mɔɛ n na, an mbe a ma sɔn‑da buɛ min dɔ. Mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an bɛ Chu mɔɛ n na. Yataa‑a a 'a mɔɛ n too ɔ dia min na, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an bɛɛ an mbe a ma sɔn‑da wan. Koe min na mu, an mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ an na Chisɔsi Chasi a. Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ‑a a fɔ ka wan.
49003007	Sakana bai chɛ, an ko a mu, Yataa‑a n ma a 'a sɔ mɔɛ a. Chɛ bɔ‑a a 'a koadia demanɛ an dɔ, n‑na min ma sɔn, a 'a gbasaya ɔ.
49003008	N fan, n fɛn ma wɛɛ ka mɔ a tenden na, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a‑a koadia deman chɛ chɛ n fan na. A ɔ, Chisɔsi na‑a ko chɛndɛ miin ma, n ni a ɔ yian chɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔ a. An ko chɛndɛ chɛ nu, koe n fan nɛ, miin nyin a danka ee.
49003009	A sin, n ni a ma to, mbɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ni koe ɔ gbɛ, a si koe chɛ ma, Yataa‑a min dɔ nun kɛn a‑a dunya a dan suun tima min na.
49003010	A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma sanche, a ni a ɔ yian nyina yama n na, an bɛ an ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, gbasaya ɛ miin boo ɔ banda a, mbɛ yiimatɛ koo a ɔ kaka. A‑a chɛ ɔ yian an na koe n fan dɔ, a‑a miin chɛ chɔchi ko a.
49003011	Yataa‑a a ɔ bɛn chɛ ma koe a suun pɔɔ, a e na to dunya chɛ a dan‑da. A sin, a‑a chɛ ma, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi an dɔ.
49003012	Mmɔ kai faen fan mu a a, an fɛ mu, mmɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ bɛ a a. Chia a kaen fan mu mmɔ ya ɔ Yataa tena, mmɔ sin mbe sɔ wan a chen kɔɔ, chian mbe ee ma mmɔ ya a.
49003013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo dimu, wo faa ma yɔn, a si tɔɔya chɛ ma, n mbe min chɛ tena wo ko a. A gbu sin ni na basɔmaya a wo tena.
49003014	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe n kumbai gbangban tena mmɔ Fa Yataa chen kɔɔ.
49003015	Mmɔ Fa chɛ sin, dambi kan kɔ kan, banda bu ɔ, ni nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, a wan mbe an sɔnɛ be.
49003016	Dua sɛsɛ ɛ wan a boo ɔ, banda bu ɔ. A sin, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, a ni a ma wo ɔ ni gbɛa, wo 'a danaya ɔ. Chɛ ni ma, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ
49003017	A sin ni a ma to, Chasi wakoe ni ma wo faa ɔ, koe min na mu, wo‑a wo kai fa a a. N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, wo ni sɔ gban koadia ɔ, wo ni yɛ, wo ɔ ni gbɛa chɛndɛ chɛ.
49003018	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, wo 'a koadia da a koo buɛ min dɔ Chasi faa ɔ. A yɛ to, Yataa 'a mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an bɛɛ ni a ɔ gbɛ a buɛ chɛ ɔ.
49003019	A gbu sin nyin, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, wo ni a 'a koadia a tinsɔn. Chɛɛ a gbu sin, a ma koe a, mɔɛ ee min dɔ gbɛ, ɛnden bɛɛ a. Chɛ sin fan fɛ mu, wo sɔnɛ n ni ma yɔ Yataa wandi gbu ta.
49003020	Mmɔ Yataa tando, min 'na gbasaya ɛ wai chɛ tena mmɔ ɔ. A gbasaya ɛ wan Yataa boo ɔ, koe n ma koe a mmɔ yii nii miin dɔ. Ɛ koe n ma wan, miin koo an ni ben chɛ n ma, mmɔ ɛ a ɔ tisa miin ma koe a.
49003021	Mmɔ wɛn mbe chɔchi ɔ, miin mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a, mmɔ Yataa tando tima ɔ tima ko a, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
49004001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n fan, n fɛn mbe ka bia ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi ko a, n mbe wo disa tena wo ni chɛ ma. Yataa‑a wo chee ka buɛ min dɔ a ta mɔɛ n na, wo ma an fɔɛ ɔ, min ma biaen mu an chee chɛ ko a.
49004002	Tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ni wo wandi ma yii, wo faa ma gbandia, wo sin ni wo faa bia. Wo wo faa bia wo nyɔn na. Wo e kun‑da wan koadia yian‑da.
49004003	Yataa Nyina‑a wo ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo ko ɔ ko ma, wo e che min ma koe a, wo ni ma faa chima ɔ, tima ɔ tima ko a.
49004004	Mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a, yɔ Chasi gboo ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina, min mbe mmɔ fɛ, ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. Ɛ ka wan dechee, yɔ yiinatɛ chɛ wɛɛ, Yataa‑a mmɔ chee min ko a, a sin mbe mmɔ ɔ.
49004005	A yɛ to, mmɔ 'a mansa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, mmɔ kai fa tena ɛ dɔndɔ gbe, yii chɛ wɛɛ, Yataa chia a, ɛ dɔndɔ gbe.
49004006	A sin, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ Fa, Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. A sin, a wan 'na gbasaya ɛ mmɔ gbɛɛ kun ma, a yɛ to, a wan mbe wai chɛ mmɔ ɔ, mbɛ a ma‑a mmɔ gbɛɛ fɛ.
49004007	Chɛɛ mmɔ gbɛɛ, Chasi‑a koadia demanɛ chɛ wan mmɔ a, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, yɔ ɛ mɔɛ n kɔ buɛ min dɔ a faa ma a.
49004008	Chɛ an fɛ mu, a nyɛnden mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, “A sɛ‑a kɛn aan, a sɛ‑a, a na‑a mɔ sɛsɛ chɛ wan bia ɔ, a sɛ‑a an na. A sin, a‑a boo fenɛ sɛsɛ be wan mɔɛ n ma.”
49004009	A fɔ koe chɛ, “a sɛ‑a aan, a sɛ‑a” a ma sɔ ni ko dɔ mende ko a. Chɛɛ a fɔenɛ an nɛ, mbɛ Chasi e na to sɛ‑a, a na‑a yii wan faa mɔɛ n tena, duu gboo kɔɔ.
49004010	A wɛn na‑a yii ka duu gboo kɔɔ, a wan sɛ‑a to aan, a sɛ kaina, min dɔ yansan kaina tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma. Chɛ ni a ma, Chasi ni a ma, fen kɔ fen dunya ɔ, a da ni fa.
49004011	A wan‑na koadia demanɛ chɛ mɔɛ n na, ma koe dama dama. A‑a mɔɛ dɔ n ma a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na, mbɛ a‑a dɔ n ma Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na. Dɔ n sin, a‑a an ma Yataa bai sa mɔɛ n na, mbɛ a‑a gbasaya be dɔ n sin ma, an bɔɛ n sɔ koe a chia ma, a basan an kan koe a Yataa bai a.
49004012	A‑a chɛ n ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ wɛn mu ka Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, mmɔ ma ni bɛn an wai chɛ koe a. Chɛ ni a ma, mmɔ ɔ ni gbɛa gbau gbau, mmɔ wɛn mu Chasi gboo a.
49004013	Chɛ an mbe ma‑a, aan mmɔ gbɛɛ ni Yataa 'a denɛ wakoe ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ kai fa a a, mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Mbɛ mmɔ 'a mɔgbuya da fa‑a, a ni che Chasi wandi gbu ta ɔ, a da faenɛ ɛ gban.
49004014	Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, mmɔ ee ma‑a yɔ den mɛsɛ nu, an mbe miin woo, fania fania kanɛ kan kɔ kan na. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin yaaen mu ka, an fan mbe an bun ka, yaa chia a.
49004015	Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ min ma, mmɔ tea fɔ, koadia ta fɛ chia a. Mmɔ ni koa chia ɔ chia a, Chasi ta chia a, a wɛn mu mmɔ kun ti a.
49004016	Chasi an mbe na a 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a kaina dɔndɔɛ. Ɛ wan dechee yɔ mɔ gbu gboo, ni a sɔna nu, an gbɛɛ‑a tun tunden mu buɛ min dɔ. Fasa mɛsɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an dɔ, an tɛ ma tɛ ni, a sin an mbe wai chɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔya an dɔ. Ni an gbɛɛ ma‑a wai chɛ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ mɔ gbu gboo koa‑a, a ɔ gbɛa‑a gbechen. Mɔɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe chɔchi ɔ, ni an to‑a an nyɔn na, an ni wai chɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, chɔchi ɛ koa wan Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ.
49004017	Sanche gbɛ, n mbe chɛ an fɔ tena, n ni a kɔ din, Mansa Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ. Wo ma ma, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma Yataa sɔn, an mbe koe n ma buɛ min dɔ. An mbe an yii na chii buɛ min dɔ, wooya wa an mbe a ɔ.
49004018	An mbe an yii na chii buɛ min dɔ, an mbe pimbi an dɔ, koe ɔ gbɛ koe a ɛnden bɛɛ a. Kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ee an boo ɔ, Yataa ɛ min be. Chɛ sien mu an 'na ko sɔn baiya an ma. Koe min na mu, an faa a kɔɔen mu kaka.
49004019	An ma‑a gbɛ mɔɛ n na, ko ee miin faa gbaa, a sin, an‑na an kunɛ a fuin gbɛ ko yama ma koe a. An ma bɛndenɛ mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, ko yama ma koe a.
49004020	Chɛɛ wo nii ma kan ni ko bonda chɛ n fan na, a si Chasi ma.
49004021	Wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ an‑na bai sa wan wo tena, a si a ma. A sin, an‑na wo kan fan, wo ma koe a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi chɛ a. Tea chɛ sin, sakana chɛndɛ chɛ, ɛ min fɔ, a sien mu a wan Chisɔsi an ma.
49004022	Wo kan‑da wan, mbɛ wo ni wo sɔn kɔma chɛ n boo ka. Wo sɔn chɛ nu, miin beaen mu, wo tachɛ buɛ kɔma chɛ n fɛ, fɔɛ ɔ. A tima chɛ a, wo wakoe ni yɔn tena wan gbata gbata. Koe min na mu, wo toen ni ko yama n fan ma koe a, a sin, an ko yama chɛ ni wo bun tena wan.
49004023	Wo ma yɔ mɔ nama nu, yiinachii n dɔ, wo e miin chɛ.
49004024	Wo sɔnɛ nama n ya, yɔ mɔɛ nu, miin nyanden mu Yataa bɔ nyɔɛ n na. A‑a wo nyan wo ni ma mɔ tandenɛ n na, miin mbe tenchen a ko a. Koe chɛ n mbe bɔ tea an dɔ.
49004025	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo boo bɔ fania fɔɛ ɔ. Wo gbɛɛ, wo tea fɔ wo nyɔn ye. Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ mu gboo dɔndɔɛ an na, Chasi ɔ.
49004026	Wo faa ni tɛ wɛɛ, wo ma ko yama ma. Wo faa gbu sin, a ma tɛ, a ka sauma ma, aan tee ni bea.
49004027	Wo ma na chia yian Sitana a, wai chɛ koe a.
49004028	Mɔɛ min mbe kanka chɛ, a ma a chɛ to. Chɛɛ ɛ min ma, a ni a gboo be wai chɛ koe a. A ni wai chɛ tea chia a, a boo fea a. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, a bɔɛ chɛ nu, fen mbe ee miin boo ɔ, a ni kun basan koe an ma.
49004029	Ni wo ma‑a koɔ‑a, bai yama ma bɔ wo da ɔ. Chɛɛ bai miin nyin dechee a fɔ koe a, a tima chɛ kɔɔ, wo e an fan fɔ. Bai chɛ nu, miin mbe mɔɛ n faa ma nande, a yɛ to, miin mbe basan an ma.
49004030	Wo sin ma a ma, Yataa Nyina faa ni yɔn. An mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa an ta mu wo a, aan tee chɛ ko a, wo e bauncha ma sɔn‑da tee min ma.
49004031	Faa yama gbɛɛ, faagbandia gbɛɛ, faatɛ gbɛɛ, wo wo boo bɔ an gbɛɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, gbonyɛ wa gbɛɛ, nyɔn ma bɔ wa gbɛɛ, ni toomaya wa, wo an boo ka.
49004032	A sin to, wo faa ni nyan wo nyɔn ko a, wo ni ko chɛndɛ ma wo nyɔn na. A yɛ to, wo ni wo boo bɔ ko yama n dɔ, wo bɔɛ n mbe miin ma wo a, yɔ Yataa‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ, ɛ a boo bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ.
49005001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo mu ka buɛ min dɔ Yataa faa ma denɛ n na, a nyin gbu wo ni butuin chɛ, wo ni a sɔnɛ ya.
49005002	Koadia faa ni ma wo ɔ, yɔ Chasi to‑a buɛ min dɔ mmɔ a. A sin, a‑a a wandi fɔɛ be wan mmɔ ko a, a ma‑a yɔ yasi, min mbe Yataa faa chima.
49005003	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma dɛ waa ma basanɛ ɔ, ni wo ee wɛ fuu ɔ. A yɛ to, maumaya ko tɛ, chɛ ma, fenkoya wa kaka. Chɛ ma nyin Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ko a, miin mbe tenchen a ko a.
49005004	Wo ma maumaya ko ma, wo gbu sin ma kun dɔ ban bai sa. A yɛ to, wo ma damba dambaya koe ma. Koe chɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ, a ma ma bɛn ni an ma koe a. Chɛɛ wo e min ma, tima ɔ tima ko a, wo Yataa wai bɔ.
49005005	Wo dan chɛ a, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, ko yama‑a min dɔ chɛ chɛ, a ee don‑da mansaya kɔɔ, Chasi ɛ min dɔ, an fea Yataa a. Wo ma ma mɔɛ n na, miin mbe waa ma basan, an ma dɛ ni fuu ɔ tima min na. Chɛ ma, wo ni ma mɔɛ n na, miin mbe maumaya koe tɛ, an sin fenkoyaen mu, an mbe an boo fenɛ n ya yɔ Yataa.
49005006	Koe chɛ nu, an fan mbe a ma, Yataa ɛ faatɛ a bɔ mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mbe ee a kuiɛ ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, a ma daɔdia bai gbama n fɔ wo ye, wo bun koe a.
49005007	Chɛ an gbu fɛ mu, wo ma bea an mɔ bonda chɛ n fɛ.
49005008	Koe min na mu, wo ni wan tee pimbi ɔ, chɛɛ sanche gbɛ wo e wan manɛ kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi a. A nyin wo tachɛ buɛ ni bɔ mɔɛ n na, miin mbe manɛ kɔɔ.
49005009	Koe min na mu, a ɔ ɛ yen ka wan, mbɛ mɔɛ ɛ wan manɛ kɔɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe manɛ chɛ kɔɔ, ɛ ko chɛndɛ an ma tea tea ɔ, a sin, a tanden mu Yataa tena.
49005010	Wo sin, wo a ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a, wo ni koe n sɔn, miin mbe Mansa Chisɔsi faa chima.
49005011	Wo ma wo boo chɛ ko ɔ pimbienɛ ɔ, miin mbe ee den chɛndɛ suun. Chɛɛ an ko bonda chɛ nu, wo a ma mɔɛ n ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ an ma nyin.
49005012	A gbu sin ma mauen ba mu, mɔɛ ɛ ma bai sa‑a, a si an koe chɛ n ma, an mbe miin ma nun dɔ.
49005013	Ni manɛ sɔ‑a fen kɔ fen na, mbɛ an fen chɛ yen‑da gbadan.
49005014	A sin gbu, fen kɔ fen min mbe yen‑da gbadan, an mu manɛ a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Wo wo kɔɔ sɔ, wo wɛn mbe sa ɔ chinɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a wo kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, a sin, Chasi ɛ a 'a manɛ be‑a wo ma.”
49005015	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo tachɛ buɛ ma mɛn. Wo ma koe ma, yɔ mɔɛ miin kunɛ ee nɔ, chɛɛ wo a ma, yɔ mɔɛ miin 'na yiimatɛ da a koo.
49005016	Ni wo‑a gbasaya ma sɔn tima ɔ tima ko chɛndɛ ma koe a, wo a ma. Koe min na mu, ko yama ma koa‑a gbɛ sanche.
49005017	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma ma woo mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ wo butuin chɛ, wo ni Mansa Chisɔsi faa ma koe ɔ gbɛ.
49005018	A sin, wo wo boo bɔ gbɛ min ba ɔ, a ma na wo wakoe ɔ chɛ chɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina, an ni tachɛ gbɛ wo a.
49005019	Wo ni koe ma ka wo nyɔn tɛ ɔ. Wo si kan kɔ kan sa Yataa ye, a ɛ tando min dɔ. Wo si a diama n na bɔ Yataa tena, wo faa gbɛɛ a.
49005020	Tima ɔ tima ko a, mmɔ Yataa wai bɔ, mmɔ Fa. Mmɔ a wai bɔ fen kɔ fen ko a. Mmɔ chɛ ma, Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ.
49005021	Wo chian‑da ka buɛ min dɔ Chasi ma, wo don wo nyɔn kɔɔ.
49005022	Wo wan fuu musu nu, wo don wo chɛɛ n kɔɔ, yɔ wo donden mu buɛ min dɔ Mansa Chisɔsi kɔɔ.
49005023	Koe min na mu, gbasaya ɛ wan mɔ kaima boo ɔ, a 'a musu kun ma, yɔ gbasaya ɛ buɛ min dɔ Chasi boo ɔ, chɔchi kun ma. Chasi wandi gbu sin, an mbe mɔɛ n gbɛɛ baun chɔchi ɔ, miin maen mu yɔ a gboo wandi.
49005024	Chɛ an fɛ mu, a nyin musu ni don a chɛɛ kɔɔ, chia kan kɔ kan na, yɔ chɔchi mɔɛ n donden mu buɛ min dɔ Chasi kɔɔ.
49005025	Musu si kai nu, wo to wo 'a musu n na, yɔ Chasi to‑a buɛ min dɔ chɔchi a, mbɛ a‑a a fɔɛ be a ko a.
49005026	A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a ni a ma, mɔɛ miin mbe chɔchi ɔ, an ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a. A ni an ko fion, yii a, mbɛ a‑a a da a bai sa an yii kun ma.
49005027	Chɛ ni a ma, a ni chɔchi yian a wandi gbu a, a nyandenɛ ɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. Tɔmbɛ ee ma‑a a ma, a wakoe ɔ sisienɛ ee ma‑a, ko kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a a ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a fɔ, mbɛ ɛ ka wan, chɛɛ ɛ ma‑a tenchen Chasi an ko a.
49005028	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔ kaima n ni to an 'na musu n na chɛndɛ chɛ, yɔ an toen mu buɛ min dɔ an gboo a. Mɔɛ min toen mu a 'a musu a, a toen mu ka a wandi gbu an na.
49005029	Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee nɔ, min mbe toomaya sɔ a wandi gboo ma. Chɛɛ ɛ to wan a a, a ni a bia chɛndɛ chɛ, yɔ Chasi ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ chɔchi ko a.
49005030	Koe min na mu, mmɔ maen fan mu yɔ a sɔna nu, a gboo chɛ ko a.
49005031	A nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ “Chɛ an ko a mu, mɔ kaima ɛ a de to‑a wan, a ni a fa to, an ni chɛ an nyɔn dɔ, an fea a 'a musu a. A sin, an fea chɛ, an mbe ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔɛ a.”
49005032	Ko wa dɛgbɛ, an dɔ nundenɛ ɛ ka. Chɛɛ n mbe a fɔ tena, mbɛ a sien mu Chasi an ma, an fea chɔchi a.
49005033	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, bai chɛ n mbe wan wo wɛɛ ko a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ni to a 'a musu a, yɔ a toen mu buɛ min dɔ a wandi gbu a. Musu n sin, an ni a ɔ yen, mbɛ chianɛ ɛ wan an dɔ, an chɛɛ n ko a.
49006001	Wo wan denɛ nu, wo ma‑a ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a, wo kooya be wo woo mɔɛ n ma. Chɛ an nyin a ma koe a.
49006002	Yataa 'a sawa saa saa, an nɛ, tooɔdia saen mu min kun ma. A ɔ, “Wo kooya be wo fa ma, a basan wo de a,
49006003	min mbe a ma, dunya ni nyan wo ko a, mbɛ wo mɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ.”
49006004	Wo wan, wo wɛn mu denɛ n fa n na, wo ma a ma, an faa ni tɛ. Chɛɛ wo an bɔ a ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, an ni kanɛ sɔn, Mansa Chisɔsi ta chia a.
49006005	Wo wan yɔnɛ nu, wo kooya be wo ti n ma. Wo chian an ma, a sin, masamba ni ma wo ɔ an ko a. Wo kooya be an ma wo faa gbɛɛ a, yɔ wo e a be buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi Chasi ma.
49006006	Wo ma chɛ ma dechee an ya kɔɔɛ ma wan, an faa chima koe a mɔgbuya ɔ. Chɛɛ wo a ma, wo faa gbɛɛ a, yɔ Chasi 'a yɔnɛ nu, miin mbe Yataa faa ma koe ma.
49006007	Wo wai chɛ wo faa gbɛɛ a, yɔ wo e ma ka a chɛ‑a Mansa Chisɔsi an ye. Wo ma a ya, mbɛ wo e ma ka a chɛ‑a wo fian mɔ gbu an ye.
49006008	Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, ko chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan, mɔɛ ɛ min ma, Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ a nyɔn sima tɔnɔnɛ be wan a ma. Chɛ ɛ ma wan, a mɔɛ chɛ ni ma yɔn fan na, chɛ ma, a ni ma mɔ dɔ mende wɛɛ a.
49006009	Wo wan yɔn ti nu, wo wɛɛ, wo wo 'a yɔnɛ n bia a buɛ chɛ ɔ. Wo sɛmbɛ a ma koe a, tima ɔ tima ko a, an ni chian wo ma. Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo bɛ an na, wo e min ko a, ɛ banda bu ɔ wan. A sin, a ee mɔ gbu n tɛ bɔ, ɛnden bɛɛ a.
49006010	N ni a fɔ gbɛ wo ye, mbɛ wo ɔ ni gbɛa, koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu wo a, wo bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a. Gbasaya wa min nyɔn sima ɛ a ɔ, a ni ma wo ɔ.
49006011	Wo ni Yataa 'a chɛɛ chɛ fenɛ n gbɛɛ bia. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, wo ni che sɔ‑a chidi, Sitana ee che‑a wo bɔ‑a a 'a yaa yaa koe n na.
49006012	Koe min na mu, mmɔ ee butuinɛ chɛ tena mmɔ fian mɔ gbu n fan na, chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ a chɛ tena nyina yama n fan na. An fan mu ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, gbasaya ɛ miin boo ɔ kaina nu, banda a. A sin, an pimbi bundenɛ ɛ dunya chɛ kun ma.
49006013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo ma chii gbae, Yataa 'a chɛɛ chɛ koe a. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, wo ni kun sɔ‑a gban, ko yama ma tee chɛ kɔɔ. A ni a ma, wo ni butuinɛ chɛ, aan a danka a, wo e sɔ ɔ chidi.
49006014	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo sɔ gban, wo ni tea ɔ gbɛ a si Yataa ma. A sin ni ma yɔ yuu wo bu tɛ. Wo ma nyina, mbɛ Yataa‑a wo ya mɔ tandenɛ n na a tena. Chɛ ɛ wo konde gbain‑da wan, yɔ soya 'a chɛɛ chɛ doma.
49006015	Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, min mbe faa chima be, ɛ a ma‑a wan wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma. A ni ma yɔ kɔɔwa wo chenɛ a.
49006016	A ka chɛ gbɛɛ ma, wo wo kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a, tima ɔ tima ko a. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ chɛɛ chɛ fenɛ wo boo a, min mbe a ma, soya mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ee che wo sɔɔ‑a. Chɛ ɛ wo konde gbain‑da wan chia gbɛɛ a, an nyina yama, Sitana ɛ bɔ miin na.
49006017	Wo dan chɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ Yataa‑a wo baun. A ni ma yɔ chɛɛ chɛ banfua, wo kunɛ a. Mbɛ Yataa 'a bai sin, a ma‑a wo boo a chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ.
49006018	Wo samunɛ chɛ, tima ɔ tima ko a, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo sɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ chia ma. Wo 'a samunɛ sin gbɛɛ ɔ, wo Yataa ɔ tisa, a ni basan wo ma. Chɛ ko a, ko ɔ ko ma a ma, wo gboo ɔ ni fa. Ni wo sin ma‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a tima ɔ tima ko a, wo a chɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a.
49006019	Wo samunɛ chɛ to, n bɛɛ ko a. Yataa ɛ bai don‑da wan n da ɔ, n mbe min fɔ. A ni a ma, chianɛ ma na ma n dɔ, n da a ka koe a, n ni bai sa mɔɛ n tena, a si sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ma, min dɔ nunden ni mmɔ ma a kɔma a.
49006020	Koe min na mu, bai chɛ an ko a mu ka, n mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a. Wo samunɛ chɛ n ko a, min mbe a ma, n ni koɔ mɔɛ gbɛɛ tena, faagbɛa ɔ, yɔ a nyin n ni koɔ buɛ min dɔ.
49006021	N toen mu wo wɛɛ ni a ɔ sɔn, n mbe buɛ min dɔ sanche nɛ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe Tikikɔsi a na tena wo tena, a ni ko ɔ ko ɔ yian wo a, min mbe si tena n na. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ an nɛ, min ko a di n ye, a sin, ɛ wai chɛ tena wan Mansa Chisɔsi ye, teaya ɔ.
49006022	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe a sɔ tena wo tena, a ni a ɔ yian wo a, nn gbɛɛ, nn mbe buɛ min dɔ sanche nɛ. A yɛ to, a ni wo faa n ma nande.
49006023	Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an ni faa chima be wo ma, wo wan suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ. An ni koadia yian wo a, a sin, wo ni wo kai fa an na.
49006024	Koadia ɛ miin gbɛɛ faa ɔ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, koadia min mbe ee danka kuɔ fɔ, Yataa ni an gbɛɛ dua.
50001001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, nn fea Timoti a. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ mu nn na. Nn fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, wo wɛn mu Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, miin ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, Fiipai duu ɔ. A yɛ to, ni chɔchi ya ɔ sɔɛ n tena, an bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe deman chɔchi ma.
50001002	Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
50001003	Tima ɔ tima, ni n‑na n yii na chii wo a, n mbe n 'na Yataa wai bɔ wan.
50001004	A sin, tima ɔ tima, ni n ma‑a samunɛ chɛ‑a wo gbɛɛ ko a, n mbe a chɛ buɔdia an dɔ.
50001005	Koe min na mu, a ka tee saa saa ma, aan sanche, wo e basan tena wan n ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a che koe a mɔɛ n ma.
50001006	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n danden fan mu a a, mbɛ Yataa boo ɛ ka gbɛ buɛ min dɔ wo baun koe ɔ, a ee sɛmbɛ‑a to. A ɛ wo baun‑da wan, aan a ni che a danka a gbɔdɛ, aan Chisɔsi Chasi na tima a to.
50001007	A nyin yiinachii chɛ sima ni ma n dɔ, a si wo ma. Koe min na mu, wo wakoe ɛ wan n faa ɔ. A mu min na, wo gbɛɛ, wo e basan tena wan n ma, wai chɛndɛ chɛ chɛ koe a, Yataa‑a min be n ma, a chɛ koe a. Wo basan‑da wan n ma, tima min na n ni ben‑da sɔ‑a sawa ti n na, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ko a, a kɔ ni gbɛa. A sin to, n mbe wɛɛ ka sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a sanche, wo e basan tena wan n ma.
50001008	Koe min na mu, n toen mu wo a, yɔ Chisɔsi Chasi 'a koadia ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Yataa wandi an mu n 'na siiya a, ni tea ma chɛ a.
50001009	A sin, chɛ an mu samunɛ a, n mbe min chɛ tena, mbɛ koadia min mbe wo faa ɔ, a ma ni munda tima ɔ tima ko a. A yɛ to, yiima ni ma wo ɔ, wo ni koe n tɛ bɔɛ sɔn,
50001010	min mbe a ma, wo ni a ɔ sɔn koe min nyin chɛndɛ chɛ Yataa chen kɔɔ, mabɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee min ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, Chasi na tee ma, mabɔ ee na‑a ma‑a wo ma, ko yama kan kɔ kan ko a.
50001011	Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, wo sɔnɛ a dondandenɛ ni ma. Chɛ an mbe ma tando a, Yataa tena, a basan basɔmaya a.
50001012	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n toen mu wo ni chɛ ɔ gbɛ. Mbɛ koe gbɛɛ, miin sien mu n na, an gbu an‑na a ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a si Chisɔsi ma, a ta‑a ya ɔ ma.
50001013	Chɛ‑a a ma gbɛ, mɔɛ gbɛɛ, an‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ min na, Chasi an fɛ mu. Soya chɛ n gbɛɛ nɛ, miin mbe Domi kun ti wa 'a kata kun ma fɛn, an‑na chɛ ɔ sɔn fan, a basan mɔ sɛsɛ dɔ gbɛɛ n bɛɛ a nɛ.
50001014	N mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ min sin na, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a ma gbɛ, n suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n sɛsɛ Chasi ɔ, an faa sɔ‑a gbɛ a ko a. An mbe ee chian to ɛnden bɛɛ a, a 'a sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na.
50001015	An dɔ n gbu, an mbe sakana chɛ, a si Chasi ma, a ɔ yian toomaya faa an na, a basan koɔ yanɛ a. Chɛɛ an dɔ n sin, an mbe a ma, yiinachii chɛndɛ an na.
50001016	Mɔɛ dankama chɛ nu, koadia an mbe a ma, an mbe bai chɛ sa ka. Ɛ ma wan an yii ma, n mbe ka nɛ sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ min na, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ an ko a mu, n sɔ‑a min ko a.
50001017	Chɛɛ mɔɛ saa chɛ n sin, an mbe ee a sa tena faa ɔ gbɛ an na, an gbɔsɔen mu dechee an fandi an ko a. An ta yiinachii ɔ, an dɔ, an ni a ma, n 'na mɔnɛ ma ni munda pimbi chen chɛ a nɛ.
50001018	Chɛ ma faagbaa a, n tena. N buɔdia koe mu, an mbe ma ka dechee sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian‑da, a si Chasi ma. A ni ma tea chia an na, a ni ma fania chia wɛɛ a. Tea gbu sin ko a, n mbe buɔdia bɔ‑a wan.
50001019	Koe min na mu, wo e samunɛ min chɛ n ko a, ɛ a ma‑a wan, n kunɛ ni bɔ a ɔ. A sin to, Chisɔsi Chasi Nyina wɛɛ, ɛ deman chɛ chɛ‑a wan n na.
50001020	A mu min na, ɛ wan n 'na yiinatɛ ɔ, ni n 'na yiinachii, mbɛ n mbe ee na‑a mau‑a ɛnden bɛɛ a. Chɛɛ tima ɔ tima ko a, a bɛbɛɛ sanche, n faa ɛ sɔ‑a wan gban. Chɛ ni a ma, n 'na fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, n ni na basɔmaya a Chisɔsi tena, n ni ma wan fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, chɛ ma, n ni fa wɛɛ.
50001021	N mbe fɔɛ min dɔ, basɔmaya be koe a mu Chasi ma, nn fea a, nn ni ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni n fa‑a, a nyin kaka. Koe min na mu, nn fea a Chasi a, nn fan mbe ma‑a gbɛ.
50001022	Chɛɛ n mbe ka gbɛ kɔndɔfii an dɔ, n ma a ɔ sɔn, n mbe fen ma. Ni n ma‑a tun fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, ɛ a ma‑a wan, n ni kun wai chɛndɛ chɛ‑a Chasi ko a.
50001023	Chɛɛ n gbu toen mu gbɛ n ni fa, nn fea ni ma Chasi a, min mu ko nyima wa a. A ɔ gbɛ n ko a, n faa ma ya koe a ko fea chɛ tɛ ɔ.
50001024	Chɛɛ wo ko a, a nyin kaka, n ni ma tun fɔɛ ɔ.
50001025	N danden fan mu chɛ a. A sin, n ko a, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n mbe ma‑a wan fɔɛ chɛ ɔ. N mbe ma‑a wan tun wo gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, n ni basan wo ma, wo‑a wo kai fa min chɛ Chasi a, a ma ni munda. Chɛ ni a ma, wo bu ɔ ni dia, a chenama ɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi a.
50001026	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, ni mmɔ bɛ ma‑a tima min na, wo e yonka tɛ‑a wan, a si Chasi ma. Koe min na mu, an mbe che‑a a ma‑a, n ni na wo tena.
50001027	Koe chenama mu gbɛ min na sanche, an nɛ. Wo koe n ma, wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ, yɔ mɔɛ nu miin dan‑da sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a, a si Chasi ma. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, n ni na wo tena, n ma na wɛɛ wo tena, n mbe wo ma tɔ chɛndɛ a min‑da wan. Mbɛ wo e sɔ ɔ gban, wo yiima a kandenɛ ɛ, wo kuiɛ a kandenɛ ɛ. A sin, wo e wan wo boo si‑a wo nyɔn kɔɔ wo sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, danaya chɛ ko a, min mbe bɔ sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ.
50001028	A sin, chian mbe ee wo ɔ, a si ko ɔ ko ma, wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n mbe min ma. Chɛ ɛ wan yɔ gbau an nɛ, an tena, mbɛ an mbe na tena wan kasaa a. Chɛɛ wo tana, a mu bauncha an na wo ko a. A sin, ɛ ka tena Yataa an na.
50001029	Koe min na mu, ɛ wan gbɛ Yataa boo ɔ wo ko a, mbɛ Chasi chɛ wakoe, wo kai fa koe ma dechee a a. Chɛɛ wo gbu, wo e tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a wan a ko a.
50001030	A sin, wo‑a n yen tɔbu min dɔ bia‑a, wo wɛɛ wo e ka an sima ɔ yen tena. A sin, wo e ka tɔbu min dɔ yen tena, an mbe ka tun n bɛɛ ma.
50002001	Tea ko a, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu wo a Chasi a. Chɛ sin ma‑a wo tena faamanande a. Chasi toen mu wo a, wo sin mbe an buɔdia ɔ. Wo e wan ko dɔndɔɛ ɔ, wo bɛ Yataa Nyina a. A sin, koadia ɛ wan wo faa ɔ, a basan chinchimaya a.
50002002	Koe chɛ n gbɛɛ mu ka buɛ min dɔ tea a, wo a ma, n 'na buɔdia da ni fa gbɛ. Wo ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, wo ko a ni dia wo nyɔn ye. Wo yiima ni ma dɔndɔ, kuiɛ kanɛ da faenɛ ɔ.
50002003	Wo ma ko ɔ ko ma, wo wandi ta tɔnɔnɛ ko a dechee. Wo ma yonka tɛ, wo wandi ɔ koa koe a. Chɛɛ wo wo wandi ma yii, wo ni mɔ dɔ mende n ya, a ben wo wandi gbu ma.
50002004	A sin, wo ma gbɔsɔɛ ni ma wo bɔɛ n ta faa ma koe n na, chɛɛ wo ta faa ma koe nu ma dechee.
50002005	Ni wo ma‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a, wo sɔnɛ ma ka Chisɔsi Chasi ta fɛ.
50002006	A maen nin bɛɛ chia ɔ chia a yɔ Yataa, chɛɛ a nii ma butuin chɛ ni podon, min mbe a ma, an na kandenɛ ni ma tun, an fea Yataa a.
50002007	A‑a a kan kɔ sɔ wan a gbɛɛ a. A‑a a wandi ma yɔnɛ a. A na‑a kɛn mɔgbuya ɔ,
50002008	a‑a a wandi ma yii wan, mbɛ a‑a kooya be Yataa ma, aan a che a fa tima ma, kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
50002009	Chɛ an‑na a ma, Yataa‑a a ya, mbɛ a sɛ‑a basɔmaya dankama ɔ. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a tɔɛ be a ma, min benden mu tɔ kan kɔ kan ma.
50002010	A sin, chɛ an mbe ma‑a, basɔmaya be koe a Chisɔsi tɔɛ chɛ ma. Fɔɛ fenɛ gbɛɛ, banda bu ɔ, ni duu gboo ma, dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, an mbe an kumbai gbangban‑da wan.
50002011	An gbɛɛ, an ni a bɔ an da ɔ, an dɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi an mu mansa a. Chɛ an mbe na basɔmaya a, mmɔ Fa Yataa tena.
50002012	N dia nyɔɛ nu, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na, wo ni wan n da a kuiɛ ma. N mbe ee ka tima min na wo ya kɔɔ, a gbu nyin gbɛ sanche wan, wo ni ma n da a kuiɛ ma chɛndɛ chɛ. Wo ma yɛ kuu kɔ koe n ma koe a, miin ma biaen mu wo ko a, Yataa‑a wo wɛn baun. Wo an ma ma samba ɔ, wo an ma chiandia ɔ.
50002013	Koe min na mu, Yataa an mbe wai chɛ tena wo ɔ. A wan mbe a ma tena, wo ma bɛndenɛ ɛ kooya be koe a a ma. A sin, ɛ gbasaya chɛ wo ɔ, a faa ma koe ma koe a.
50002014	Wo ma tisa chɛ, wo sin ma gbonyɛ, ni wo ma‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a.
50002015	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, tɛɛsi ee ma‑a wo ma, wo wɛn mu ka Yataa 'a denɛ n na. Wo tachɛ buɛ mɔ yama wa chɛ n tɛ ɔ, a ni nyan, a ma bɔ an ta a ɛnden bɛɛ a. Mabɔ ee ma‑a wo ma, mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin dɔ chɛ chɛen mu, ko yama ma mɔ wa chɛ nu. Wo e man‑da wan an tɛ ɔ, yɔ tɔmbuaka n mbe man buɛ min dɔ pimbi ɔ.
50002016	Bai chɛ, min mbe fɔɛ be, wo a bia wo boo fea a. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a Chasi na tee ma, n bu ɔ diama an mbe ma‑a, n kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ ɛ, mbɛ n ma bui chɛ ni gbama a, n ma sɛchɛ chɛ ni gbama a, wo tɛ ɔ.
50002017	Wo e wo wandi be tena wan yɔ yasi, wai chɛ koe a Chasi ko a. Koe min na mu, wo‑a wo kai fa a a. N bu ɔ di, n sin mbe buɔdia bɔ‑a wan wo gbɛɛ a, an ni a ma wɛɛ, n wii ni bɔn, yɔ an mbe gbɛ bɔ buɛ min dɔ yasi a.
50002018	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, wo wɛɛ, a ni ma koe a, min na di wo ye, a sin, wo ni buɔdia bɔ n na.
50002019	Mansa Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ, n yii na tɛenɛ ni ma, mbɛ n fua‑a Timoti a na‑a wo tena. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, n ni sakana a min, a si wo ma, min mbe n bu ɔ dia‑a.
50002020	Mɔ ee n boo ɔ, a ni che a ɔ, min ma bɛndenɛ ɛ che ma‑a, teaya ɔ, basan koe a wo ma.
50002021	Mɔɛ tɔɛ n gbɛɛ, an gbɔsɔen mu an faa ma koe n fan na, an ma an gbɔsɔ ni Chisɔsi Chasi ta ko a.
50002022	Chɛɛ wo wandi gbu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, ɛ buɛ min dɔ n tena. Ɛ wan n tena, yɔ denɛ n fea a fa a. Nn fea chɛ, nn‑na wai chɛ wan, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian koe a.
50002023	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n yii na tɛen mu, a a na koe a wo tena, ni n‑na a ɔ yen dechee, koe min mbe na tena ma‑a n na.
50002024	A sin, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a yiinatɛ be n ma, mbɛ a ɔ ee yansan tena to, mbɛ n fandi gbu na‑a wo tena.
50002025	N‑na n yii na chii wan a a, mbɛ a nyin fan n ni Ɛpafɔditɔsi a yɛ to wo tena. N suun ma nyɔɛ an nɛ, n bɔ soya mɔɛ, n bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ Chasi ko a. A sin, wo‑a an sɔ, basan koe a n ma nɛ.
50002026	Koe min na mu, wo gbɛɛ, wo sɔɛ ɛ gbɛ a a kaka. A sin faa yɔndenɛ mu chɛ gbɛɛ a, a mu min na, wo na‑a a gbandi koe a min fan.
50002027	Tea gbu sin ko a, a gbandi‑a wan kaka, ɛnden fan na‑a to a ni fa. Chɛɛ Yataa chinchin‑da wan a ma. A nii ma chinchin ni a dechee an ma, chɛɛ n fandi gbu wɛɛ, a ma na a ma faa yɔnɛ ni sa faa yɔnɛ kun ma.
50002028	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n fan gbu sin faa bɔen mu kaka, n ni a sɔ wo tena. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni buɔdia bɔ, ni wo‑a a yen to. An mbe a ma‑a, faagbaa ma ni dɔɔya n ma.
50002029	Wo bu ɔ ni dia, wo boo si koe a a kɔɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ. Wo sin ni basɔmaya be an mɔɛ chɛ sima ma.
50002030	Koe min na mu, a‑a a wandi fɔɛ ma tachɛ wan, wo 'a wai a ban koe a n tena. A na‑a to fen den, a ni fa, Chasi 'a wai chɛ ko a.
50003001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo e ka buɛ min dɔ, wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi a, wo buɔdia bɔ. N mbe ee sika tena, yɛ koe a n da a kuiɛ ɔ wo tena. A sin, an mbe nyan‑da wo ko a.
50003002	Wo wo kun ma fɛn, wuu chɛ n boo ɔ, mɔ yama chɛ nu. An fɛn mbe mɔɛ n na kamincha ka, wo wo kun ma fɛn an boo ɔ.
50003003	Mmɔ wan mu Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, tea tea ko a. Koe min na mu, mmɔ wan mbe Yataa fai a Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ. Mbɛ mmɔ yɛ‑a, mmɔ‑a buɔdia bɔ, mmɔ ma koe a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi a. Mmɔ ma mmɔ kai fa ni ko dɔ mende kan kɔ kan na, mɔ gbu ɛ che min ma‑a.
50003004	N ni chɛ fɔ wɛɛ, chɛɛ n fan Pɔɔ, tea ɛ wan n boo ɔ, n ni n kai fa koe n na, mɔ gbu ɛ che miin ma‑a. Ni ɛ wan mɔ ɔ mɔ yii ma, mbɛ tea ɛ wan a boo ɔ, a kai fa koe a an koe chɛ n na, n ta tea koo a ta ma.
50003005	Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ mu n na, n de Ibu mɔɛ, fa wɛɛ Ibu, n sin bɔ‑a Bɛnchamin 'na dambi an dɔ. An‑na n na kamincha wan, tee sɛi n bɔɛ ma kɛn n suun‑da. A sin, Chu n 'na sawa ta fɛ chia a, Fayisii mɔɛ mu n na.
50003006	Ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan, n ta yiima ɔ, Yataa toen ni n ni min ma, n ni a ma wan n sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. N fan ni a ma, ko yawaenɛ ni sa chɔchi mɔɛ n ma. Chu n 'na sawa nan sin, min sien ni tachɛ koe ma a a teaya ɔ, mabɔ nii ma a ɔ.
50003007	Chɛɛ ni tɔnɔnɛ kan kɔ kan ni wan a ɔ, n‑na n kan kɔ sɔ an na, bea koe a Chisɔsi Chasi fɛ.
50003008	Tea ko a, n‑na n kan kɔ sɔ an gbɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, n‑na Chisɔsi Chasi sɔnɛ min chɛ ka mansa a, a benden mu ko ɔ ko ma. A wan ko a mu, n mbe fo tena fen kɔ fen na, n sin mbe an ya tena bubuu an na. N‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, n ni a wan Chasi ma sɔn,
50003009	mbɛ nn fea ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a. N ni nn fan Chu n 'na sawa miin bia, an fan ma a ma ni, n ma‑a mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa chen kɔɔ. Chɛɛ min ma‑a, n‑na n kai fa wan Chasi a. Chɛ an‑na a ma dechee, Yataa‑a n ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a chen kɔɔ.
50003010	N toen mu, n ni Chisɔsi sɔn, n ni gbasaya chɛ a tisɔn, Yataa‑a min ya, a‑a Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. N toen mu to, n ni tɔɔya chɛ sima ɔ bia, a‑a min dɔ bia, n ni ma yɔ a wan, a 'a saya ta fɛ chia a.
50003011	Chɛ ko a, n bɛɛ, n ni ma mɔɛ dɔndɔ a, Yataa ɛ min kɔɔ sɔ‑a, a yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ.
50003012	N mbe ee a fɔ tena, mbɛ n ban‑da an koe chɛ n gbɛɛ chɛ‑a, miin mbe chɛ. Chɛ ma, mbɛ n ban‑da ma‑a gbae mɔɛ gbu a, n ni ma min na. N gboo ɔ ee fa, butuinɛ chɛ koe a, n ni tɔnɔnɛ chɛ ma sɔn, Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a ma, n bea‑a a fɛ min ko a.
50003013	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n mbe ee a ya tena gbɛ, mbɛ an fen chɛ ma‑a n ta a. Chɛɛ ko dɔndɔ ɛ nɔ, n mbe gbɛ min ma‑a. N yii ee to koe kɔma chɛ kɔ, chɛɛ n mbe gbɛ butuin chɛ tena ya ɔ ma an ma sɔn koe a.
50003014	N mbe n fɔsɔ tena, ya ɔ ma an ko a, n ni tɔnɔnɛ chɛ ma sɔn. Mɔɛ min fea Chisɔsi Chasi a, an ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, ɛ tɔnɔnɛ min ma sɔn, ni Yataa‑a an mɔɛ chee banda bu ɔ.
50003015	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ wɛn yii kɔɔen mu gbɛ, Chisiancha chɛ ɔ, mmɔ yiima ni ma a buɛ chɛ ɔ. A sin, ni wo yiima ma‑a dama ko ɔ ko ɔ, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan wo ni a ɔ sɔn.
50003016	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mmɔ‑a kanɛ min ma sɔn, mmɔ tachɛ a chia a.
50003017	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo bea n sɔnɛ fɛ. A sin, wo ya ma ka chɛ n fɛ, miin mbe koe n ma tena, yɔ nn na‑a miin tɔmɔsi a tachɛ.
50003018	Koe min na mu, mɔɛ sɛsɛ nu, n na‑a miin bakoe ɔ yian wo a tima sɛsɛ ko a, n mbe an bakoe fɔ tena to wo ye, di ɛ n ya a. Mbɛ an mu mɔɛ n fan na, miin mu chɛɛ ma nyɔnɛ n na, kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ko a, Chasi fa‑a min ma.
50003019	An 'na Yataa mu an 'na dunya ma buɔdia an na. Koe min ma mauen mu, a ma koe a, an mbe yonka tɛ an ma koe a. A sin, an yiima gbɛɛ ɛ dunya ma koe n fan ma. An danka, ɛ ma‑a kasaa an na.
50003020	Chɛɛ mmɔ tana, mmɔ waa chɛndɛ chɛndɛ mu banda bu ɔ an na. A sin, mmɔ kun ka mɔɛ chɛ, Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi, mmɔ ɛ min ma kɔn tena, ɛ ka tena nɔ wan.
50003021	Mmɔ gboo chɛ, baa a tenden mbe ee ka min ma, a wan mbe a mun‑da. A sin, ɛ a ma‑a wan, yɔ a ta gboo, min kamayaen mu. A 'a gbasaya min mbe a ɔ, min mbe a ma, fen kɔ fen mbe don a kɔɔ, ɛ an na tachɛ a a.
50004001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, n toen mu wo a, wo sin yen sɔɛ ɛ n na. N bu ɔ di wo ko a, a yɛ to, wo wan mu tɔnɔnɛ a, n 'na wai ko a. N dia nyɔɛ nu, wo bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a, wo ma‑a ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo ma yɛ to kuu kɔ chɛ ɔ.
50004002	N mbe Yuodia disa tena, an fea Sintiche a, an ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, yɔ wo suun ma nyɔɛ nu Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ.
50004003	A sin, n mbe i wɛɛ ɔ tisa tena, i wɛn mbe wai chɛ tena danaya ɔ, n toen mu i ni musu fea chɛ n deman. Koe min na mu, an‑na toa si wan n kɔɔ, n 'na wai ɔ, sakana bai chɛ a ta koe a ya ɔ ma. An bɛ ni Kemendi a, a basan n bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ n na. A sin, an tɔɛ ɛ wan gboo chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n tɔɛ ɛ min dɔ, miin mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da.
50004004	Wo e ka buɛ min dɔ, wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Mansa Chisɔsi a, wo buɔdia bɔ tima ɔ tima ko a. Ka n mbe a fɔ to wo ye, wo buɔdia bɔ.
50004005	Mansa Chisɔsi na tima ɔ ma yansan to. Wo a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a ɔ sɔn, wo faa chimaen mu buɛ min dɔ.
50004006	Ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan ma wo faa gbaa. Chɛɛ wo 'a samunɛ ɔ, wo 'a Yataa ma nande ɔ, wo a ma, a ni a ɔ sɔn, wo toen mu a ni koe miin chɛ wo ye, tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, wo a wai bɔ koe n gbɛɛ ko a, a‑a miin chɛ wo ye.
50004007	Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa ɛ faachima min be, min benden mu mmɔ 'a ko sɔnɛ gbɛɛ ma, ɛ wo faa kun ma fɛn‑da wan, a ni wo yiima wɛɛ kun ma fɛn. Koe min na mu, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu wo a, wo bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a.
50004008	N mbe min fɔ tena gbɛ sanche, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo yii na chii koe chɛ n ma, baa ɛ miin ma, Yataa toen mu koe miin na. Koe nu, miin nyin, mabɔ ee miin ma ɛnden bɛɛ a, basɔmaya koe nu. Mɔɛ n mbe che kawa‑a koe miin ma, an mbe koe miin bai, dua ɛ koe miin dɔ.
50004009	Ko ɔ ko, wo‑a n yen miin ma‑a, wo‑a miin kan, an to‑a wo yii ma, wo an ma. An ni ma n da a bai n na, chɛ ma, an ni ma n chɛ chɛ wai n na. A sin, Yataa min mbe faa chima be mmɔ ma, ɛ ma‑a wan wo kɔ.
50004010	N mbe buɔdia bɔ tena wan, a chenama ɔ, a sin to, n mbe Mansa Chisɔsi wai bɔ tena wan. Mbɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, n bakoe ni buɛ min dɔ wo faa ɔ, wo‑a a kun ma sa. Tea gbu ko a, n bakoe ni wan wo faa ɔ, chɛɛ a chia nii wo ye, a ɔ yian koe a.
50004011	An ma a fɔ ni, n mbe ka gbonyɛ an na, mbɛ fen mbe ee n boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, n dii koe mu gbɛ, mbɛ fɔɛ ɛ ma buɛ min dɔ n ko a, tima ɔ tima, a ni ma faachima a n tena.
50004012	N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, n mbe ma buɛ min dɔ, ni fen na tenden mbe ee n boo ɔ, chɛ ma, ni boo fenɛ chenama ɛ n boo ɔ. N‑na chɛ kan gbɛ, mbɛ n ni ma‑a kan kɔ kan, ko ɔ ko ni n tan, n faa chimaenɛ ni ma tun. N bu faenɛ ni ma, kɔnkɔ ni ma n na, fen ni ma n boo ɔ a chenama ɔ, fen den bɛɛ ni ma n boo ɔ.
50004013	Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, ɛ min be n ma, n mbe che wan, n ni ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan ma.
50004014	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔ chɛndɛ mu wo a, n 'na ko yawaenɛ ya koe a.
50004015	Wo sin gbu, wo wan Fiipai mɔɛ nu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, min ma‑a a saa a, n‑na a kuu sɔ tima min na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na. A tima chɛ a, kɛn n ni ka tena nɔ an Masidonia chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, chɔchi kan kɔ kan dɔ gbɛɛ nii ma toa si ni n 'na wai kɔɔ, mɔ dechee wo wan. Wo wan ni wo boo fenɛ be.
50004016	Koe min na mu, Tɛsadonika duu ɔ nan fan bɛɛ, n ni nɔ tima min na, wo ni wo boo fenɛ a ta wan n ye, gba sɛsɛ ko a.
50004017	An ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ n toen mu dechee wo boo fenɛ n fan ma sɔn koe a. Chɛɛ n toen mu n ni a ɔ yen, Yataa ni wo deman, basan koe chɛ a n ma.
50004018	N‑na fen kɔ fen ma sɔn fan, wo‑a miin na na n ye. A sin, n yii nii min dɔ, n‑na an gbu ma sɔn. N mbe wo wai bɔ tena, wo 'a samba fen chɛ n ko a, n‑na miin ma sɔn, a ka Ɛpafɔditɔsi a. A‑a a bɔ n ko a, chɛndɛ chɛ. An samba fen chɛ, ɛ wan dechee yɔ yasi, min kunyɛ a di, a sin, a ko a di Yataa ye, a sin, Yataa toen fan mu a a.
50004019	A sin, nyan fen ba chɛ n gbɛɛ Yataa boo ɔ, miin ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ wo ma, wo e an ma sɔn‑da wan. Chɛ ɛ bɔ‑a koe chɛ an dɔ, Chasi‑a min ma wo ko a. N 'na Yataa, ɛ a ma‑a wan chɛ ni ma.
50004020	Tando ni be mmɔ Fa Yataa tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
50004021	Wo ni Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ kɔndɔn n ye, miin mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ n na, an bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n bɛɛ Chasi ɔ, miin mbe nɛ n tena, an‑na wo kɔndɔn.
50004022	Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ nɛ, a bɛɛ bɛɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe wai chɛ tena Domi kun ti wa 'a kata ɔ, an bɛɛ, an‑na wo kɔndɔn.
50004023	Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo dua. A ni ma ka.
51001001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, nn fea mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ a Chasi ɔ, min mu Timoti a. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na. Yataa wandi an dɔn‑da, n ma koe a sɔ mɔɛ chɛ a.
51001002	N mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ chɛ nu, Kɔdɔsai duu ɔ. Wo gbɛɛ, wo wɛn danayaen mu, wo maenɛ ɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi a. Mmɔ Fa Yataa ni wo dua, a ni faachima be wo ma.
51001003	Nn mbe ma samunɛ chɛ‑a tima ɔ tima, nn mbe Yataa wai bɔ wan wo ko a, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa.
51001004	Koe min na mu, nn‑na a a min, wo kai faen mu buɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi Chasi a. A sin to, koadia min nyɔn sima ɛ wo faa ɔ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a.
51001005	Wo e chɛ ma, a mu min na, wo yii na tɛenɛ mu koe chɛ an ma, Yataa‑a min sa tena ɔ bɛn wo ya ɔ banda bu ɔ. Tea bai chɛ, min mu sakana bai chɛndɛ a, a‑a a fo kɛn wo ma tima saa saa ko a, wo‑a a a min fan, ɛ na yiinatɛ min na.
51001006	Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɛ a ma tena wan, ko chɛndɛ sɛsɛ ɛ mɔɛ n tan tena tima ɔ tima ko a dunya gbɛɛ ɔ. A sin, wo wandi wɛɛ tɛ ɔ, ɛ ma tena ka wan. A bia tee saa saa chɛ ma, wo na‑a a a min kɛn, mbɛ wo dan‑da koadia demanɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa ɛ min chɛ tea tea ɔ.
51001007	Wo‑a a min ka wan Ɛpafasi a, nn bɛ ɛ Yataa 'a wai chɛ min na. A mu mɔɛ an na, min ko a di nn ye, koe min na mu, ɛ Chasi 'a wai chɛ tena nɔ danaya ɔ, nn ko a.
51001008	A sin‑na a ɔ yian nn na, Yataa Nyina‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ, koadia ɛ wo faa ɔ.
51001009	Chɛ ko a, a bia an tee chɛ ma, nn‑na a a min tee min na, nn ma sɛmbɛ ni samunɛ chɛ koe a wo ko a. Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena wan tima ɔ tima ko a, Yataa ni a ma, a toen mu koe miin na, wo ni an dɔ gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ. A sin, n mbe a ɔ tisa tena, a ni yiimatɛ gbɛɛ be wo ma, a wan Yataa Nyina ɛ min be.
51001010	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni kosan tachɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ, min mbe nyan Mansa Chisɔsi tena, a faa ni chima a da faenɛ ɔ. Tima ɔ tima, wo e ko chɛndɛ sɛsɛ ma‑a wan. Wo 'a yiimatɛ ma ni mun‑da a si Yataa wakoe ma.
51001011	Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, Yataa ni gbasaya gbɛɛ be wo ma, a 'a gbasaya kamayaen ba ɔ. Wo ni ko gbɛama kan kɔ kan dɔ bia, faabia ɔ, wo bu ɔ diama ɛ.
51001012	Nn mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena tima ɔ tima, tɔnɔnɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ma sɔn koe a, a‑a miin be koe fɔ a ta mɔɛ n ma, miin mbe a 'a manɛ kɔɔ. A wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe, an mbe a gbasaya be wo ma, an ma sɔn koe a.
51001013	A‑a mmɔ bɔ wan ko yama pimbi 'a gbasaya boo ɔ, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ don a faa ma denɛ 'a mansaya kɔɔ yɛdɛn.
51001014	Mmɔ‑a kunka ma sɔn, mmɔ bɔ‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, koe min na mu, a 'a den chɛ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu gbɛ mmɔ a.
51001015	Mmɔ ee Yataa min yen, a bɔ nyɔɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ, mɔ gbu na‑a min yen, a mu Chisɔsi Chasi an na. Yataa 'a denɛ mu an na, a sin, gbasaya ɛ wan a boo ɔ fen kɔ fen kun ma, min na dan‑da dunya chɛ ɔ.
51001016	Yataa‑a a gbu ma, fenɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ n na dan‑da, banda bu ɔ ni dunya chɛ ɔ, Chasi chɛ an boo ɔ. Mmɔ ɛ fenɛ miin yen, ni mmɔ ee miin yen. A yɛ to, nyina yama n ya ɔ sɔɛ wɛɛ, ni maeka n ya ɔ sɔɛ. Fen kɔ fen, an na dan‑da Chisɔsi boo ɔ wan, a sin fan ko a mu.
51001017	Chasi ni pɛn fɔɛ ɔ, fen kɔ fen ya ɔ, a sin fan‑na a ma, fen kɔ fen mbe kun dɔndɔɛ kɔɔ, a yɛ to, an mbe wai chɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ.
51001018	Chisɔsi Chasi an mu chɔchi kun ti a. Chɔchi mu a gboo an na. A wan mbe fɔɛ be a 'a mɔɛ n ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a pɛn kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, min mbe a ma, a ni ma gbasaya tɔɛ a fen kɔ fen kun ma.
51001019	Yataa sɔnɛ ni wan Chasi ɔ chia ɔ chia a. Yataa wandi sin fan na‑a chɛ ɔ bɛn.
51001020	Yataa‑a a ɔ bɛn fan to, fen kɔ fen dunya chɛ ɔ, ni banda bu ɔ, Chisɔsi‑a a ma, an ma‑a a wan Yataa dia nyɔɛ n na. Yataa‑a chɛ ma wii chɛ an dɔ, Chisɔsi‑a min na bɔn kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma.
51001021	A sin, tima dɔndɔ a, wo dɔ nu, wo nii kuiɛ dɔndɔ ɔ Yataa a, wo yiima nii ma nyin a ko a. Wo ni Yataa chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n fan na, wo 'a yiinachii yama n dɔ, ni ko yama nu, wo ni miin ma.
51001022	Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, wo ma‑a gbɛ Yataa dia nyɔɛ n na, min mbe a ma, wo ni ma gbɛ tenchen a ko a, mabɔɛ sima wɛɛ ma na ma wo ma, a chen kɔɔ. A‑a chɛ ma saya chɛ an dɔ, Chasi‑a min chɛ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, mɔgbuya gboo ɔ.
51001023	Chɛɛ, chɛ ɛ ma dechee, ni wo ma sɛmbɛ ni wo kai fa koe a Chasi a. Wo ma yɛ kuu kɔ, wo sin ni sɔ gban. Wo‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tima min na, wo‑a yiinatɛ min ma sɔn, wo ma dɔn mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ ni wo ka an chia chɛ ma. Yataa‑a n ma a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ a, an sakana bai chɛ an ko a. Sakana bai chɛ, a ɔ yianden fan mu gbɛ dunya gbɛɛ ɔ.
51001024	Sanche chɛ ɔ, n mbe tɔɔya min gbɛɛ chɛ tena, wo ko a, n bu ɔ diama mu. A sin, n gboo chɛ ɔ, n mbe tɔɔya chɛ a ban‑da wan, Chasi‑a min dɔ bia, a gboo ko a, min mu chɔchi a.
51001025	A sin, wo ko a, Yataa‑a n ma wan a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ a, basan koe a chɔchi ma. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ ni yian wo a chɛndɛ chɛ.
51001026	Bai an nii nɛ, min dɔ nunden ni san wu sɛsɛ ko a, a ka mɔ bemba n ta bemba n na tima ma. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, a ɔ yian‑da Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na.
51001027	Yataa toen ni, a ni a ɔ yian mɔɛ chɛ n na, a‑a koe min dɔ nun an ma. An koe ma kawaen ni, a sin dua wa ni, mɔɛ n ko a, miin nii ma Chu mɔ a. An koe ɔ nundenɛ gbu an nɛ, mbɛ Chasi wakoe ɛ wan wo wɛɛ faa ɔ, min mu wo 'a yiinatɛ a, Yataa 'a basɔmaya ma sɔn koe a.
51001028	A wan Chasi chɛ, nn mbe an bakoe ɔ yian mɔ ɔ mɔ a. Nn mbe dasi be tena wan, nn mbe ta‑a mɔɛ gbɛɛ kan‑da nn ta yiimatɛ chia gbɛɛ a. Chɛ ni a ma, nn ni kun a ma‑a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ni na Yataa chen kɔɔ, an yiima da faenɛ ɛ, a si Chasi ma.
51001029	N mbe wai chɛ tena n sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, chɛ an ko a. Chasi wan sin‑na an gbasaya wa chɛ chɛ n dɔ.
51002001	N toen mu wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n mbe mɔnɛ ɔ bia tena wan pien wo ko a. N‑na a chɛ wan mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ ko a, miin mbe Daɔdisia duu ɔ, ni mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ko a, nn ma nyɔn yen nin bɛ, nn bɛ miin na.
51002002	N‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, wo wan, ni an fan, wo gbɛɛ ni wo faa gbɛa, mbɛ wo ko a dia‑a wo nyɔn ye, wo ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, yiinatɛ chenama ni ma wo ɔ, koe ɔ gbɛ koe a chɛndɛ, ɛ na min na. An chia chɛ a mu, wo e Chasi wakoe ɔ gbɛ, min mu Yataa 'a koe ɔ nundenɛ a tee.
51002003	Chasi an mu mɔɛ a, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu ni Yataa 'a yiimatɛ gbɛɛ ɔ gbɛ, min maen mu yɔ nyan fenɛ min nundenɛ ɛ.
51002004	N mbe chɛ fɔ tena, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma na wo bun, an 'na daɔdia bai ma kawaenɛ n na, an mbe miin dɔ yian‑da.
51002005	N mbe wɛɛ nɛ pɔɔ, chɛɛ n faa ɛ wo tena. N bu ɔ diama mu, koe min na mu, wo e chia chɛndɛ ma, wo ma ka ni ɛnden bɛɛ a wo gba ɔ, wo kai fa koe a Chasi a.
51002006	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo‑a Chisɔsi Chasi ma sɔn ka buɛ min dɔ, wo kun ka mansa a, wo ma‑a ka buɛ min dɔ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo tachɛ buɛ ma ka a ta fɛ.
51002007	Wo ban‑da wo kai fa‑a a a gban. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo a a tun wo kai fa koe ma a a, wo ma yɛ kuu kɔ. A sin, wo‑a wo kai fa ka buɛ min dɔ a a, wo ma yɛ to kuu kɔ, yɔ a fɔen mu buɛ min dɔ wo ye. Tima ɔ tima ko a, wo Yataa wai bɔ.
51002008	Wo wo kun ma fɛn, wo ma na ma yɔnɛ a, mɔ dɔ mende n 'na yiinachii ɔ yansama boo ɔ. An ma na wo bun, wo ni bea mɔ gbu ta manda n fɛ, wo ni bea dunya chɛ ma nyina n fɛ. An mbe ee ma‑a Chasi ta chia fɛ.
51002009	Koe min na mu, Chasi ni mɔ gbu gboo an dɔ nɛ dunya ma, chɛɛ Yataa ni a a, chia ɔ chia a.
51002010	A wan mu mansa a, mansa kan kɔ kan ko a, maeka kan kɔ kan ko a, ni nyina kan kɔ kan ko a. A sin, wo wɛɛ, wo fɔɛ da fa‑a gban, koe min na mu, wo ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi a.
51002011	Wo ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi a, wo a ban‑da kamincha‑a. Mɔ gbu ta da kamincha ma, chɛɛ Chisɔsi ta mu. A sin‑na a ma, mbɛ wo kunɛ bɔ‑a wo 'a ko yama n dɔ, miin ma nyin mɔgbuya chɛ ɔ.
51002012	Yii chɛ‑a kɛn wo kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a tima chɛ a, a ma‑a wan yɔ wo tɔn‑da wan ka, wo bɛ Chasi a. A yɛ to, mbɛ Yataa‑a wo kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, wo bɛ Chasi a to. Danaya ni wan wo ɔ Yataa 'a gbasaya ko a, min‑na Chisɔsi kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya chɛ ɔ. An danaya chɛ sin fan‑na a ma, chɛ ma‑a.
51002013	Tima ni wan nɔ, wo faenɛ ni wo 'a ko yama n boo ɔ, Yataa tena. A sin, wo kunɛ nii ma bɔ ni wo 'a ko yama n dɔ, miin nii ma nyin mɔgbuya ɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa‑a wo a yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ, wo bɛ Chasi a. Mmɔ gbɛɛ, Yataa‑a a boo bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ.
51002014	A‑a mmɔ kun ka wan, a bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, Yataa ni mmɔ gbɛmbo‑a miin ko a. A‑a saya min chɛ kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, Yataa‑a a boo bɔ nɔ wan an ko yama chɛ n dɔ.
51002015	An kɔn gbengbanden chɛ ma, Chasi‑a a ma wan, nyina yama n 'na gbasaya ban‑da. A‑a an nyina yama chɛ n ma wan tɔmɔsi a, fanka ɔ den, mbɛ a wan Chasi, a kun‑da an ma.
51002016	Chɛ an fɛ mu, miin sien mu wo daun fenɛ ma, ni fenɛ min mbe min, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma kaa a tɛ, a si a ma. A yɛ to, kaa a ma tɛ, a si bɛn ba chɛ n ma, wo e miin bia, a a ma tɛ kau nama ma, a a ma tɛ suin tee wɛɛ wakoe ma.
51002017	Koe min na mu, koe miin mbe na tena ma‑a, an nininɛ gbama gbama n fan nɛ. Koe kuu ba gbu, a sien mu Chasi an ma.
51002018	Wo ma dɔn mɔɛ chɛ n ni a fɔ wo ye, mbɛ wo ee Yataa chia ma. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin toen mu chii koe a wo ma, kooya be koe a maeka n ma, mbɛ wo‑a an fai. A yɛ to, an mbe a fɔ, an dɔ, an mbe koe n dɔ yen fan, miin dɔ nunden mu. An mbe ma‑a ka fania an dɔ, an mbe yonka tɛ‑a, mɔgbuya chia a, tea sin mbe ee a ɔ.
51002019	An mbe ee Chasi bia‑a an boo fea a, a wɛn mu mmɔ kun ti a. Chasi an mbe na a 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a kaina dɔndɔɛ. Ɛ wan dechee yɔ mɔ gbu gboo, ni a sɔna nu, an gbɛɛ‑a tun tunden mu buɛ min dɔ. Fasa mɛsɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an dɔ, an tɛ ma tɛ ni, a sin an mbe wai chɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔya an dɔ. An mbe koa wan, yɔ Yataa toen mu an ni koa buɛ min dɔ.
51002020	Wo bɛ Chasi a, wo wan fa‑a dɔndɔ a, mbɛ nyina yama n 'na gbasaya ee to wo kun ma dunya ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, ko ɔ ko ma a ma to, wo ni bea dunya chɛ ɔ fɔɛ fɛ, ko ɔ ko ma a ma, wo ni bea a ɔ sawa n fɛ.
51002021	Sawa chɛ nu, miin‑na a fɔ, an dɔ, “Wo ma tu daun fen chɛ a, wo ma chɛ bia, wo gbu ma chɛ n ma fɛn.”
51002022	Mɔ gbu n fan‑na sawa chɛ n sa, mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ n kan an ma. Chɛɛ ni mɔɛ ban‑da dechee daun fen chɛ n daun‑da, ko ɔ ko ee to chɛ gbakɔ, an mbe tui wan.
51002023	Ni mɔɛ‑a sawa chɛ n gbu ma fɛn, a maenɛ mu yɔ tea ɛ koe miin dɔ. Koe min na mu, an mbe a din fan mɔɛ n ma, samunɛ ɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ. A yɛ to, an mbe an fandi ma yii buɛ min dɔ, a basan koe n na, an mbe miin si an gboo a. Chɛɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, tea ee an dɔ. An gbɛɛ ma fen kɔ fen na, ni mɔɛ gbu‑a a yii na chii chia n ma, mɔɛ ɛ kun buɛ min dɔ, a ni a gboo bia, Yataa chia a.
51003001	Tima min na Yataa‑a Chasi a yɛ to fɔɛ ɔ, a‑a a ma wan, wo wɛɛ‑a fɔɛ nama ma sɔn. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo to fen chɛ n na, Yataa‑a miin sa tena ɔ bɛn wo ko a banda bu ɔ. Chasi ɛ nɔ wan si ɔ kaina a ma bɛndenɛ, Yataa boo nyima ɔ.
51003002	Wo wo yii sɔ gban fen chɛ n ma banda bu ɔ, fen chɛ nu ma nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ.
51003003	Koe min na mu, wo fa‑a wan. A sin, wo 'a fɔɛ nama, ɛ sa ɔ nun dɔ, Yataa boo ɔ, Chasi ɛ kaina min.
51003004	Chasi dɔndɔ gbe, an mbe a ma wo ni ma fɔɛ nama ɔ. A sin, ni a yɛ‑a to dunya chɛ ɔ, wo bɛ an mbe ma‑a a a. A sin mbe ma‑a Yataa 'a manɛ min dɔ, wo wɛɛ, wo e ma‑a an dɔ.
51003005	Chɛ an fɛ mu, dunya chɛ ɔ koe nu, miin na di wo ye, wo faa ni fa an ko a. Koe nu, yɔ ko tɛ kan kɔ kan, wo e na to dɛ‑a fuu ɔ, ni ko yama dɔ mende nu. A yɛ to, yiinachii yama, ni dunya ma koe ben koe a mɔɛ ɔ, a basan fenkoya wa a. Chɛ nɛnɛ ɛ wan dechee, yɔ fenɛ fai koe a, min ma Yataa a.
51003006	Mmɔ ɛ na‑a wan Yataa 'a faatɛ ɔ yen‑da, a si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma.
51003007	A saa a, wo ni tachɛ ka wan, koe min na mu, wo ni an koe chɛ n fan ma.
51003008	Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, wo koe chɛ n gbɛɛ boo ka. Koe nu, yɔ faatɛ, ni faagbandia. A yɛ to, toomaya wɛɛ, ni tɔ ɔ tɛ yama chɛ, a basan bai yama sa a.
51003009	Wo ma fania fɔ wo nyɔn ye, koe min na mu, wo‑a wo boo bɔ wan wo sɔn kɔma n dɔ.
51003010	A sin, an sɔn nama chɛ, Yataa wandi an‑na a chɛ wo ɔ. A sin, ɛ a ma tena wan tun tun, wo ni ma yɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ, wo ni a sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ.
51003011	Chɛ an fɛ mu, sɔn nama chɛ ɔ, tɛ bɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee Chu mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma Chu mɔɛ n na. Tɛ bɔ ee chɛ n ma miin na kaminchaen mu, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin na ma kamincha ni. Tɛ bɔ ee chɛ n bɛɛ ma, miin ka‑a chɛnyɛ dɔ mende n dɔ, a ee yɔnɛ n ma, a ee fia ɔ mɔɛ n ma, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin mu mansaenɛ a. Chɛɛ Chasi an mu koe a, a sin mbe wan gbɛ wo gbɛɛ 'a fɔɛ ɔ.
51003012	Wo gbɛɛ, wo e gbɛ Yataa an na boo ma. A to‑a wan wo a, a sin‑na a boo sɔ wan wo ma, a ta mɔɛ n na. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, chinchimaya faa ni ma wo ɔ, ni ko chɛndɛ ma faa. A yɛ to, wo ni wo wandi ma yii, wo ni wo ma chima, a sin, wo ni wo faa bia.
51003013	Wo gboo ɔ ma fa, wo faa bia koe a wo nyɔn na. A sin, ni gbonyɛ ma‑a wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ da a, a bɔɛ ko a, a ni a boo bɔ an bai chɛ ɔ. Wo wo bɔɛ n to nɔ, ni an‑na ko yama ma wo a, yɔ Mansa Chisɔsi wɛɛ‑a wo to buɛ min dɔ nɔ, wo 'a ko yama n ko a.
51003014	Wo ni chɛ gbɛɛ ma wɛɛ, wo koadia sa a kun ma. Koe min na mu, an mbe ko ɔ ko kunɛ a bia, kuiɛ a kanɛ chɛndɛ ɔ.
51003015	Chasi ɛ faachima min be, a ni ma wo faa ɔ wo nyɔn ko a. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a wo chee kaina dɔndɔɛ faachima chɛ an ko a, yɔ mɔ gbu sɔna n mbe buɛ min dɔ an nyɔn boo ɔ. A sin nyin wo ni Yataa wai bɔ tima ɔ tima.
51003016	Sakana bai chɛ, a si Chasi ma, a ni sa wo faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ. Wo wo nyɔn kan, wo ni wo nyɔn na si yiimatɛ chia gbɛɛ a. Wo si kan kɔ kan sa, Yataa ɛ tando min dɔ, wo e ta‑a Yataa wai bɔ‑a, wo faa gbɛɛ a.
51003017	A sin, ni wo ma‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a, wo da ɔ, ni wo chɛ chɛ wai n dɔ, wo an ma Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ. Ni wo ma‑a chɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a, wo Fa Yataa wai bɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ.
51003018	Wo wan fuu musu nu, wo don wo chɛɛ n kɔɔ, yɔ a ma biaen mu buɛ min dɔ musu ko a, miin mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a.
51003019	Wo wan musu si kai n bɛɛ, wo to wo 'a musu n na, wo ma faa ma gbaa koe ma an na.
51003020	Wo wan denɛ nu, wo kooya be wo woo mɔɛ n ma, chia ɔ chia a. Koe min na mu, chɛ an mu Mansa Chisɔsi faa ma koe a.
51003021	Wo wan fa nu, wo ma tɛn wo 'a denɛ n faa n na, an faa ma na yɔn wo ma.
51003022	Wo wan yɔnɛ nu, chia ɔ chia a, wo kooya be chɛ n ma, miin mu wo ti n na dunya chɛ ma. Wo ma a be dechee an ya kɔɔ wan, mɔ gbu n faa chima koe a dechee. Chɛɛ wo a be wo faa gbɛɛ a, Mansa Chisɔsi ma chianɛ ɛ wo ɔ.
51003023	A ni ma wai kan kɔ kan na wo boo ɔ, wo a chɛ wo faa gbɛɛ a. Wo a chɛ yɔ wo e ka a chɛ‑a Mansa Chisɔsi an ko a, chɛɛ mɔ gbu an ma.
51003024	Wo e ma‑a ka wai chɛ‑a kun ti min ko a, a mu Chasi an na. A sin ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ wo e wo 'a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn‑da Mansa Chisɔsi an na.
51003025	Chɛɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ, ɛ a 'a pawa ma sɔn‑da wan an koe chɛ ko a, a‑a min ma. A sin, Yataa ee mɔ ɔ mɔ a yɛ‑a a boo kɔ, ɛ ma‑a chɛ ma‑a.
51004001	Yɔnɛ n mbe wo wɛn boo ɔ, wo kosan wo 'a yɔnɛ n bia‑a, a chia ma. A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ wo wɛɛ, wo kun ti ɛ wan banda bu ɔ.
51004002	Wo ma sɛmbɛ samunɛ chɛ koe a pien. Wo e ma chɛ a, wo wo yii si koe n ma, wo e ta‑a Yataa wai bɔ‑a, tima ɔ tima ko a.
51004003	A sin, wo samunɛ chɛ nn ko a, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni chia yian nn na, a 'a bai chɛ ɔ yian koe a. Sakana bai chɛ, Yataa‑a min dɔ nun tee mɔɛ n ma, n ni a ɔ yian den mɔɛ n na. Sakana bai chɛ, a si Chasi ma, n mbe ka sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a min ko a.
51004004	Wo samunɛ chɛ n ko a, min mbe a ma, n ni bai chɛ ɔ yian gbadan, yɔ a nyin n ni koɔ buɛ min dɔ.
51004005	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin nii ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a, ni wo‑a chia ɔ chia ma sɔn, Chasi wakoe ɔ yian koe a an na, wo wo sɔɛ gbɛɛ chɛ a ɔ.
51004006	Wo da a bai a ni dia mɔɛ n too ɔ, a ma ni kawa an ye. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni kosan mɔɛ gbɛɛ da a bai ma yɛman‑da.
51004007	Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ Tikikɔsi, min ko a di n ye, nn bɛ ɛ wai chɛ tena min na Chasi ko a, ɛ si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma min ma‑a n na, a ni a ɔ yian wo a. Nn toen mu a a kaka, a sin mbe wai chɛ tena danaya ɔ, Chasi ko a.
51004008	N toen mu, a ni a ma wo ni a ɔ sɔn, nn mbe buɛ min dɔ nɛ, a yɛ to, a ni wo faa ma nande. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na a sɔ wo tena.
51004009	An fea, wo bɔɛ dɔndɔ a, min tɔ mu Wɔnesimɔsi, an fan mbe na tena. A wɛɛ, suun ma nyɔɛ an nɛ Chasi ɔ, nn toen mu min na, a sin mbe wai chɛ tena a faa gbɛɛ a, Chasi ko a. An mbe si‑a wan ko ɔ ko ma, min mbe nɛ, an ni a ɔ yian wo a.
51004010	Nn fea ɛ nɛ n bɔɛ min na pimbi chenɛ a, Ayisitakɔsi, a wɛɛ ɛ wo kɔndɔn tena. Maki wɛɛ, Banabasi suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ, ɛ wo kɔndɔn tena. Min sien mu mɔna chɛ ma, n ban‑da a ɔ yian‑da wo a, wo e min ma, ni a che‑a wo ma. Wo wo boo si a kɔɔ chɛndɛ chɛ.
51004011	Chisɔsi chɛ wɛɛ, min tɔɛ mu ka to Chɔsitɔsi, a wɛɛ ɛ wo kɔndɔn tena. Nn bɛ ɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ a, Yataa 'a mansaya ko a, an sawa chɛ dechee, an fan mu Chu mɔɛ n na. A sin, tima ɔ tima ko a, an bakoe mu buɔdia wa an na n tena.
51004012	Wo bɔɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ to, Ɛpafasi, min mu to Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ a, ɛ wo kɔndɔn tena. Tima ɔ tima ko a, ɛ samunɛ chɛ tena wan wo ko a, a faa gbɛɛ a. A ɔ, Yataa ni a ma, wo ni sɔ gban a ko a, wo yii na tɛenɛ ɛ gbae Yataa faa ma koe gbɛɛ ma, min mbe wo ko a.
51004013	Koe min na mu, n fandi gbu, n mbe siiya bɔ wan a ko a. N‑na a ɔ yen fan, a‑a wai chɛ buɛ min dɔ a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, basan koe a wo ma, wo bɛ Daɔdisia a, ni Iyapɔdisi duu ɔ mɔɛ n na.
51004014	Kai Duku wɛɛ, mmɔ faa ma danda chɛ mɔɛ, an fea Demasi a, an mbe wo kɔndɔn tena.
