51004015	Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, Daɔdisia duu ɔ, wo an kɔndɔn n ye. Bɔɔɛ Nimfa wɛɛ, wo ni a kɔndɔn, a basan chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe bɛn a 'a chenɛ a.
51004016	Ni wo ban‑da gboo chɛ kan‑da, wo a ma, an ni a kan chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ tena Daɔdisia chɔchi ɔ. Wo wɛɛ wo gboo chɛ kan, n‑na min na ta chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ tena Daɔdisia. An mbe a a na tena wo tena.
51004017	Wo a fɔ Akipɔsi ye, wo ɔ, a ni a ɔ yen, mbɛ ɛ wai chɛ chɛ tena wan, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a a boo bun a ma, min chɛ koe a.
51004018	N fandi gbu, n fan Pɔɔ, n fɛn mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da, n ni wo kɔndɔn. A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ n mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a. Yataa ni wo dua.
52001001	Nn fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, n fan Pɔɔ, Sidasi, ni Timoti. Nn mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n fan tena pan Tɛsadonika duu ɔ. Wo wɛn mbe kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, wo bɛ mmɔ Fa Yataa a, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a. Yataa ni wo dua, a ni faachima be wo ma.
52001002	Tima ɔ tima ko a, wo e wan nn 'na samunɛ ɔ. Nn mbe Yataa fai wan wo gbɛɛ ko a.
52001003	Nn mbe ma samunɛ chɛ‑a tima ɔ tima mmɔ Fa Yataa tena, wo wakoe ɛ ma wan nn yii ma. Nn mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena wo ko a, wo e wai min chɛ tena. Koe min na mu, wo kai faen mu Mansa Chisɔsi a. Nn mbe a wai bɔ tena, koadia ko a, min mbe a ma tena wo e wai chɛ tena wo sɔɛ a. Nn mbe a wai bɔ tena, yiinatɛ ko a, wo gboo ɔ ma fa ni min chɛ koe a mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a.
52001004	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ, nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa toen mu wo a kaka. A sin, a‑a a boo sɔ wo wan ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na.
52001005	A mu min na, nn‑na sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ yian wo a, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma. Nn ma a ɔ yian ni dechee nn da n fan dɔ. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina an bɛɛ ni ka wai chɛ‑a gbasaya wa ɔ. A sin, nn danden fan ni a a, mbɛ nn mbe tea bai n fan fɔ. Wo sin gbu na‑a nn yen fan, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na, nn ni fɔɛ min nyɔn sima ɔ. Nn‑na chɛ gbɛɛ ma, basan koe an na wo ma.
52001006	Wo bea‑a wan nn chen gba fɛ, a basan Mansa Chisɔsi wɛɛ ta a. Wo‑a wo boo si wan a 'a sakana bai chɛ kɔɔ, a ma‑a wɛɛ ko yawaen dɔ bia a wo ma. Chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina gboo ɔ ma fa ni a ma koe a wo bu ɔ ni dia.
52001007	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, wo ma‑a tɔmɔsi a mɔɛ n tena. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, Masidonia, ni Akaya chɛnyɛ ɔ, miin kai faen ni Chisɔsi Chasi a.
52001008	A sin, Mansa Chisɔsi 'a sakana bai chɛ, ɛ che tena wan kan kɔ kan, a ka wo tena. A ma che ni mɔɛ chɛ n dechee ma, miin mbe Masidonia, a basan Akaya a. Nn fan mbe ee bai dɔ gbɛɛ fɔ to, a si a ma. Koe min na mu, nn ma ta kan kɔ kan, mɔɛ n ban‑da a a min‑da.
52001009	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe wan bai sa‑a, a si nn bia buɛ ma, wo boo ɔ, nn na‑a wo kɔndɔn‑da tima min na. A yɛ to, a si wo‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ buɛ min dɔ fen chɛ n na, miin ma Yataa a. Wo‑a chɛ ma tea Yataa an fai koe a, min mbe ma‑a nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.
52001010	A sin, a 'a denɛ na koe, a ka banda bu ɔ, wo e a ma kɔn tena wan. A 'a denɛ Chisɔsi, a‑a a ma min na a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. A 'a den chɛ sin fan‑na mmɔ kun ka, Yataa ma na faatɛ a bɔ mmɔ ma ya ɔ ma.
52002001	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wandi a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ nn na‑a min chɛ‑a nɛ, mbɛ na yama ma.
52002002	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, nn‑na tɔɔya min dɔ bia Fiipai duu ɔ, nn mbe na to na‑a wo tena Tɛsadonika. An‑na nn bia buɛ min dɔ, a yama yama boo a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa‑a nn sɔɛ don fan a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian koe a. An 'na chɛɛ ma nyɔncha ma a ma ni, nn ni sɛmbɛ ɛnden bɛɛ a.
52002003	Wo e a ɔ yen tena wan gbɛ, nn ni Yataa bai sa tena buɛ min dɔ. Nn ma saman ni, yiima yama nii nn dɔ, a sin to, nn ma wo bun ni.
52002004	Chɛɛ nn mbe koɔ wan, yɔ Yataa toen mu nn ni a 'a sakana bai chɛ fɔ buɛ min dɔ, nn sɔen mu min fɔ koe a. A‑a nn dɔ siman fan, a‑a a yen gbɛ mbɛ ɛ che wan dan‑da nn na. Nn ta wai mu min na, an nɛ, Yataa faa ma koe n ma koe a. Chɛɛ nn mbe ee mɔ gbu n faa ma koe n fan ma. An‑na nn yii ma koe n dɔ sɔn.
52002005	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ nn ma na ni wo tena wo bun bai n fan na. Nn mbe ee koɔ, min mbe a ma, nn ni tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn wo a. Nn sii mu Yataa an na.
52002006	Nn tando koe nɛnɛ, a ee nn yii ma. Nn ma wo ɔ tisa ni a ma koe a, mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n bɛɛ a.
52002007	Sɔ mɔɛ mu buɛ min dɔ wo a Chasi ko a, nn ni kun fan boo fenɛ n ma kain‑da wo ma. Chɛɛ nn ni tima min na wo tɛ ɔ, nn‑na tima ya wan wo bia koe a. Wo maen fan ni nn tena yɔ denɛ n bɛ an de n na, an mbe bia chɛndɛ min chɛ an na.
52002008	Wo ko a dia‑a wan nn ye kaka. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, nn 'na fɔɛ gbu ɔ, nn ma bɛnden ni basan koe a wo ma. Nn ma Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ dechee an sa ni wo tena.
52002009	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ nn‑na wai chɛ wan nn sɔɛ gbɛɛ a. Tima min na nn ni nɔ, su ɔ tee a nn‑na wai chɛ wan, nn fandi deman koe a. Nn nii ma to ni, nn 'na suunɛ ni ma si ɔ wo kun ma, nn mbe ma Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ sa‑a.
52002010	Wo wandi gbu an mu nn 'na sii n na, ni Yataa wɛɛ. Mbɛ tɔmbɛ kan kɔ kan nii nn ma. Nn tanden fan ni, a yɛ to, nn sɔnɛ a koe n ni wo gbɛɛ tena, wo wɛn kai faen mu Chasi a.
52002011	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, nn‑na wo bia buɛ min dɔ dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, yɔ fa n bɛ denɛ n na.
52002012	Nn‑na wo nande wan, nn‑na wo bu ɔ dia. Nn‑na a ma din fan wo tena, mbɛ wo ni ma fɔɛ ɔ, min na di Yataa ye. A wan mbe wo chee tena, ma koe a a 'a mansaya kɔɔ, manɛ ɔ.
52002013	Nn mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena ko dɔndɔ an ko a, tima ɔ tima. Nn na‑a a 'a sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian wo a tima min na, wo‑a wo boo si wan a kɔɔ. Wo ma a ya ni da a bai gbama a. Chɛɛ wo‑a a ya, a wan Yataa 'a sakana bai an na. A gbu sin mu an na. A sin mbe wai tena wo a, wo wɛn kai faen mu Chasi a.
52002014	Chɛ sin fan fɛ mu, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo na‑a ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia wo chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ n boo ɔ. Wo na‑a bɔ ka chɛ n fan gba ɔ, chɔchi nu Chudia chɛnyɛ ɔ, miin kai faen ni Chisɔsi Chasi a. An bɛɛ na‑a ko yawaenɛ n dɔ bia ka wan, Chu mɔɛ n boo ɔ, an chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ nu.
52002015	An dɔ n‑na Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fa wan suun. Mbɛ an dɔ n sin‑na a ma, an‑na Mansa Chisɔsi wandi wɛɛ fa. Mbɛ sanche gbɛ, an dɔ n‑na ko yawaenɛ si mmɔ a, an gbu‑a nn gbain. Mɔ ɔ mɔ mu an chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ an na. Yataa faa tɛen mu an ma gbeden.
52002016	Nn ni sakana bai chɛ sa wan, mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin ma Chu mɔ a. Chɛ an ni a ma, an mbe bauncha ma sɔn Yataa a. An‑na butuin chɛ wan, min mbe a ma, nn ni sɛmbɛ chɛ ma koe a to. Chɛ gbu‑a a ma gbɛ, an 'na ko yama maenɛ da fa‑a gban. A sin, Yataa ɛ a faatɛ a bɔ tena gbɛ an ma, mbɛ a sin ɛ ko ma gbaaenɛ si‑a wan an na.
52002017	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mmɔ tɛ ka‑a tima kundu min kɔɔ, nn faa gbɛɛ nii ma bɔ ni wo tena. Nn nii wɛɛ nɔ, chɛɛ nn yiima ni wan wo kɔ. Wo sɔɛ‑a nn bia wan kaka, a sin, nn‑na butuin chɛ wan, na koe a to wo kɔndɔn‑da.
52002018	Nn toen ni, nn ni yɛ wo tena. N fandi gbu, n‑na a chɛ wan gba sɛsɛ na koe a, chɛɛ Sitana ma dɔn ni.
52002019	Ko dɔ gbɛɛ kan kɔ kan mbe ee to nɔ, min mbe yiinatɛ be nn ma, a ni nn bu ɔ dia, a ben wo ma. Wo wan, nn mbe wo wɛn ya a tɔnɔnɛ a, mbɛ nn‑na nn kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ den, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi chen kɔɔ, a na tima ma.
52002020	Tea ko a, wo wan mbe a ma‑a nn bu ɔ ni dia, nn kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ ni ma den.
52003001	Mbɛ a danka a gbɛ, nn ma che ni to nn faa bia‑a. Nn‑na nn yiima ɔ bɛn fan, min mbe a ma, nn ni to nɛ Atɛnsi duu ɔ.
52003002	Mbɛ Timoti sin, nn‑na a sɔ wo tena. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ, nn bɛ ɛ wai chɛ tena min na Yataa ko a, sakana bai chɛndɛ sa koe a, a si Chasi ma. Nn‑na a ta wo tena, a ni a ma, wo ɔ ni gbɛa, wo ni wo kai fa Chisɔsi a gbau gbau.
52003003	Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, an ni ko yawaenɛ sa wɛɛ wo ma, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ee mun‑da to. Koe min na mu, tɛnɛ ko ma a Yataa wandi tena, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ ko yawaen bonda chɛ n dɔ bia wan.
52003004	Koe min na mu, mmɔ bɛ ni wɛ tima min na, nn‑na a fɔ wan wo ye pɔɔ, mbɛ ko yawaen dɔ bia ɛ mmɔ ya ɔ. A sin, yɔ wo wandi‑a a ɔ sɔn gbɛ buɛ min dɔ, a ma‑a ka wan.
52003005	N nii ma a ɔ sɔn, wo ni gbɛ buɛ min dɔ. Ni wo ni wan tun sɔ ɔ gban, Chasi ko a. Chɛ ma, ni Sitana kun‑da wan wo ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ Chasi a. Mbɛ nn 'na wai nyima gbɛɛ, a ma‑a fufafuu a. N ma che ni to chɛ ɔ bia‑a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n‑na Timoti a na wo tena, a ni a gba bɔ.
52003006	Chɛɛ Timoti yɛ‑a sanche gbɛ nɛ, a ka wo tena. A na‑a bai min na, a si koadia ma, ni wo kai fa buɛ Chisɔsi a, buɔdia mu. A ni a fɔ nn ye, mbɛ tima ɔ tima ko a, wo e yii na chii chɛndɛ an chɛ nn na. A sin, nn toen mu nn ni wo yen buɛ min dɔ, wo wɛɛ wo toen mu ka wan nn yen koe a.
52003007	Chɛ mu nn ma faachima an na, nn 'na ko yawaen dɔ bia chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a basan faamɔnɛ a. Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu, wo kai fa buɛ chɛ Chisɔsi a, a ma‑a faamanande a nn ma.
52003008	A mu fɔɛ nama an na nn tena, wo kai fa buɛ chɛ gban Mansa Chisɔsi a.
52003009	Nn mbe tando be tena gba Yataa ma, wo ko a. Koe min na mu, nn 'na buɔdia koo, a chen kɔɔ, wo ko a.
52003010	Su ɔ tee a, nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena wo ko a, nn faa gbɛɛ a. Nn mbe a ɔ tisa tena, a ni a ma mmɔ bɛ ni mmɔ nyɔn ye, nn ni wo deman chia dɔ n na, miin nyin wo 'a danaya ko a.
52003011	Mmɔ Fa Yataa wandi, an fea mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi a, an ni chia a ka nn ye, nn ni na wo tena.
52003012	Koadia min mbe wo faa ɔ, wo nyɔn ko a, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ gbɛɛ a, Mansa Chisɔsi ni a ma munda ta‑a. A ni koa yɔ nn ta koadia wo ko a.
52003013	Chia chɛ a mu, ɛ wo ɔ gbɛa‑a, min mbe a ma, mmɔ Fa chen kɔɔ, mabɔ ee ma‑a wo ma. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi ɛ na‑a tima min na, an bɛ gbɛɛ chɛ n na, miin mu a ta n na.
52004001	A danka a gbɛ, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo‑a a kan fan nn ma, wo e ma fɔɛ min sima ɔ, min mbe Yataa faa chima. Wo sin, tea ko a, wo e tachɛ tena ka wan fɔɛ ɔ. Sanche gbɛ sin, a dinden fan mu wo ma, mbɛ wo ma yɛ to kuu kɔ. Mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Mansa Chisɔsi a. An fɛ mu, nn mbe wo faa ma nande tena, wo ni a a tun tachɛ koe a chɛndɛ chɛ.
52004002	Wo wandi‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, Mansa Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ, nn‑na koe miin fɔ wo ye a ma koe a.
52004003	Yataa toen mu wo ni ma tenchen a wan ko a, wo ni wo boo bɔ ko tɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ.
52004004	Wo gbɛɛ ni wo gboo bia basɔmaya ɔ, Yataa chia a.
52004005	Wo ma ma koe tɛ mɔɛ n na, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma Chisɔsi sɔn.
52004006	Mbɛ an chia chɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma ko yama ma a bɔ Chisianɛ a, a ma gbasaya din a ma. Nn‑na chɛ fɔ wan wo ye a kɔma a gbau gbau, mbɛ Mansa Yataa ɛ mɔɛ n tɔɔ‑a wan, miin mbe ko bonda chɛ sima ma‑a.
52004007	Yataa ma mmɔ chee ni a ta mɔɛ n na, ma koe a fɔɛ yama an dɔ. Chɛɛ ma koe a mu tenchen a ko a.
52004008	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ban‑da kan chɛ ɔ, a ee ma‑a ka ban‑da mɔ gbu an dɔ. Chɛɛ ɛ ma‑a ka a kan kɔ sɔ‑a Yataa an na, min‑na a Nyina bea wo fɛ.
52004009	Tima yayi mu, gboo nyɛn koe a wo tena, a fɔ koe a wo ye, mbɛ wo ni to wo bɔ Chisianɛ n na. Yataa wandi‑a wo kan, wo e kun buɛ min dɔ to koe a wo nyɔn na.
52004010	Wo sin gbu, tea ko a, wo sɔnɛ ɛ ka wan Chisian chɛ n gbɛɛ tena, miin mbe Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe wo disa tena, min mbe a ma, wo gbu ni to an na, a ben chɛ ma.
52004011	Wo a ɔ yen, mbɛ wo e ma‑a fɔɛ min dɔ, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ fɔɛ ma. Wo ma wo da chɛ mɔɛ n 'na koe n dɔ. Wo ma wo boo chɛ mɔɛ n ta koe n dɔ, wo ni wo ta to. Wo wai bia wo boo fea a. A kɔma wɛɛ a, nn na‑a a fɔ ka wan wo ye, a ma koe a.
52004012	Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, basɔmaya ɛ ma‑a wan wo ma chɛ n tena, miin mu Yataa sɔn bai n na. A sin, wo ee na‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ ya ɔ fɛn‑da fen fen ko a, wo e to‑a min na.
52004013	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn toen mu wo ni tea ɔ sɔn, a si chɛ n ma, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, an mbe e na to fa‑a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo faa ee yɔn‑da, yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, yiinatɛ ee miin dɔ.
52004014	Mmɔ gbɛɛ danden fan mu chɛ a, mbɛ Chisɔsi fa‑a wan, a‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. A sin, mmɔ danden fan mu to chɛ a, Yataa ɛ min ma‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, aan an fa‑a. Ni Chisɔsi na‑a to, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an bɛɛ ni na, an bɛ Chisɔsi a.
52004015	Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ na‑a tee min na, mmɔ wɛn mbe ma‑a fɔɛ a, mmɔ pɛn mbe ee a tan‑da. Mmɔ ee mmɔ kɔɔ sɔ‑a, mɔɛ chɛ n ya ɔ, miin na‑a fa, ta koe a mmɔ ni a tan. Nn mbe ka wo kan‑da min na, Mansa Chisɔsi wandi da a bai an nɛ.
52004016	Kuiɛ ɛ a fɔ‑a wan mɔɛ n ye, an mbe koe min ma. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a Yataa 'a maeka chenama kuiɛ an na, Yataa 'a buu kuiɛ. A sin, Mansa Chisɔsi wandi ɛ yii‑a wan, a ka banda bu ɔ. Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ miin na‑a an kai fa Chisɔsi a, aan an fa‑a, an pɛn mbe an kɔɔ sɔ‑a, an ni yɛ fɔɛ ɔ.
52004017	Mbɛ a tima chɛ a, mmɔ wɛn mbe ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ, mmɔ bɛ an na, mmɔ gbɛɛ ɛ ya a wan, mmɔ a ni sɔn dugbu ɔ banda a. Chɛ an mbe ma‑a, mmɔ ni Mansa Chisɔsi tan. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mmɔ bɛ ni ma kuɔ fɔ ko a.
52004018	Chɛ ko a gbɛ, wo wo nyɔn faa ma nande bai chɛ n na.
52005001	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, gboo nyɛn gbu ee nn ma, a ɔ yian koe a wo a, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ n mbe ma‑a tima min na. Chɛ ma, nn ni a ɔ yian, ni an gbu an mbe ma‑a buɛ min dɔ.
52005002	Koe min na mu, wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ mmɔ 'a mansa na tima ɛ che tena wan. Ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ kanka ɛ mɔɛ tɛnɛ buɛ min dɔ pimbi ɔ.
52005003	Mɔɛ n mbe ma‑a a fɔ‑a dechee, an dɔ, “A yama ee nɛ,” an dɔ, “koe n dɔ chimaen mu,” a tima chɛ a mu, kasaa ɛ an tan‑da. Ɛ an tɛnɛ‑a wan, yɔ bu ɔ tɛ ɛ musu tɛnɛ buɛ min dɔ. A sin, mɔɛ n kun mbe ee bɔ‑a a ɔ.
52005004	Chɛɛ nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo tana, wo ee pimbi ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, an tee chɛ ee che wo tɛnɛ‑a yɔ kanka ɛ na buɛ min dɔ.
52005005	Wo gbɛɛ mu mɔɛ n fan na, miin mbe manɛ kɔɔ, miin mbe an tee chɛ ko a. Mɔɛ nu ma mmɔ a, miin mbe ee manɛ kɔɔ, miin mbe pimbi pimbi ɔ.
52005006	Chɛ ko a, mmɔ ma ma chinɔɛ ɔ, yɔ mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ nu. Chɛɛ mmɔ ni ma mmɔ ya a tima ɔ tima ko a, mmɔ yiima sienɛ ɛ chidi.
52005007	Pimbi ɔ mu, mɔɛ n mbe chinɔ. A yɛ to, pimbi ɔ mu, gbɛ ɛ mɔɛ n bia.
52005008	Chɛɛ mmɔ tana, tee kɔɔ mɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ yiima sien fan mu chidi. Mmɔ kai faenɛ ni ma Yataa a, mmɔ ni to mɔ dɔ mende n na. Chɛ ni mmɔ konde gbain, yɔ a 'a chɛɛ chɛ doma an mbe mmɔ ma. Yiinatɛ ni ma mmɔ ɔ, mbɛ bauncha ɛ wan mmɔ ko a. Chɛ ni ma chɛɛ chɛ banfua a mmɔ kun na.
52005009	Yataa ma mmɔ ya ni a ta mɔɛ n na, a ma koe an na, a ni faa tɛ‑a bɔ mmɔ ma, mmɔ ni tɔɔya ɔ bia. Chɛɛ a ma koe mu, mmɔ ni bauncha ma sɔn, a ka mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a.
52005010	A wan fa‑a mmɔ ko a, min mbe a ma, mmɔ bɛ ni ma fɔɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ. Tima min na ɛ na‑a to, mmɔ ni ma fɔɛ ɔ wan, mmɔ faen fan ni ma, chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan.
52005011	Chɛ ko a, wo e ka a ma‑a buɛ min dɔ sanche, wo ma yɛ to kuu kɔ. Wo wo nyɔn faa ma nande, wo ni basan wo nyɔn ma.
52005012	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe wo disa tena, wo ni basɔmaya da faenɛ be wo ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma, wo bɛ ɛ miin na. An fan mbe wai chɛ tena wo ko a, an mbe koe n dɔ yian wo a, an mbe wo sɔ‑a chia ma, koe n dɔ, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma.
52005013	Wo basɔmaya wa be an ma, wo ni koadia yian an na, an 'na wai ko a, an mbe min chɛ tena. Faachima ni ma wo gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ.
52005014	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe wo ɔ tisa tena, wo ni dasi be baa baa tɔɛ n ma. Chiandia koo miin gboo ɔ, wo ni an faa ma nande, mbɛ wo‑a chɛ n deman, miin dɔ ma gbɛ. Wo wo faa bia mɔ ɔ mɔ a.
52005015	Wo a ɔ yen, mbɛ wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma ko yama a yɛ ko yama ko a. Chɛɛ wo a ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a, tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ni ko chɛndɛ ma wo nyɔn na, wo ni a ma mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n bɛɛ a.
52005016	Wo bu ɔ diama ni ma tima ɔ tima.
52005017	Wo samunɛ chɛ tima ɔ tima.
52005018	Wo ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, Yataa toen mu wo ni chɛ an ma. Ko ɔ ko ni wo tan, wo ni a wai bɔ.
52005019	Wo ma wo boo sɔ Yataa Nyina ya ɔ, a 'a wai chɛ koe a wo ɔ.
52005020	Yataa ɛ a 'a sakana bai min be mɔɛ n ma, a ɔ yian koe a wo a, wo ma ban an bai chɛ n dɔ.
52005021	Chɛɛ wo an gbɛɛ ma fɛn bɛ, min nyin, mbɛ wo‑a wo boo a chii a ma.
52005022	Min kɔ min sin mu ko yama a, wo ma wo boo chɛ a ɔ.
52005023	Yataa wandi, min mbe faachima be mmɔ ma, a ni a ma wo ni ma a ko a tenchen chia ɔ chia a. A ni wo kun ma fɛn chia gbɛɛ a. Mabɔ kan kɔ kan ma ma wo ma, wo 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, tima min na mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ na‑a.
52005024	Yataa min‑na mmɔ chee a ta mɔɛ n na, ɛ chɛ ma‑a wan. A ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn mmɔ tena.
52005025	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo samunɛ chɛ nn ko a.
52005026	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, wo an kɔndɔn koadia faa a.
52005027	Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ mmɔ yen tena. N mbe na tena chɛ an ma din‑da wo tena gbau gbau. Mbɛ wo ni gboo nyɛnden chɛ kan chɛ n gbɛɛ tena, miin kai faen mu a a.
52005028	Mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo dua.
53001001	Nn fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena, n fan Pɔɔ, Sidasi, ni Timoti. Nn mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan chɔchi mɔɛ chɛ n fan tena, pan Tɛsadonika duu ɔ. Wo wɛn mbe kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, wo bɛ mmɔ Fa Yataa a, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a.
53001002	Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma wo ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
53001003	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena tima ɔ tima wo ko a. A sin nyin fan nn ni a ma ka. Koe min na mu, wo 'a kaifa Chisɔsi a, a ma ɛ munda tena wan kaka. A sin to, koadia ma ɛ munda tena wan wo faa ɔ, wo nyɔn ko a.
53001004	Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn bɛɛ, nn mbe koɔ chɔchi tɔɛ chɛ n dɔ, nn kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ a, a si wo ma. A si wo e koe n dɔ bia tena buɛ min dɔ. An mbe a ma tena wɛɛ wo e tɔɔ tena, wo kai faenɛ mu tun Chisɔsi a.
53001005	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ tea kaa an na tɛ. Wo e tɔɔya min dɔ yen tena, Yataa 'a mansaya an ko a mu, banda bu ɔ. Wo e ka tɔɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ, an mbe wo ma‑a mɔɛ n na, miin mbe kun an ni don a 'a mansaya kɔɔ.
53001006	Yataa ɛ ma‑a an tea kaa chɛ sin na tɛ‑a, ɛ a ma‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n ni ko yawaenɛ ɔ yen, miin‑na ko yawaenɛ sa wo ma.
53001007	Mbɛ wo wɛn sin na‑a an ko yawaen chɛ ɔ bia, Yataa ɛ bauncha be‑a wan wo ma. Ɛ a be‑a wan n bɛɛ ma, a basan nn bɔɛ n bɛɛ a. Ɛ chɛ ma‑a wan, tima min na Yataa ɛ Mansa Chisɔsi yian‑da, a ka banda bu ɔ, an bɛ a 'a maeka wa n na.
53001008	Ɛ na‑a wan ta man ba ɔ, an bɛ a 'a maeka n na, mɔɛ chɛ n tɔɔ koe a, miin ban‑da Yataa ɔ. An sin nii ma bea ni sakana bai chɛ fɛ, a si mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi ma.
53001009	Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni tɔɔya ɔ yen, an ni kasaa kuɔ fɔ ko a. An tɛ duenɛ an mbe ma‑a mmɔ 'a mansa a, an mbe ee ma‑a a 'a manɛ kɔɔ.
53001010	Chɛ an mbe ma‑a, ɛ na‑a tima min na an tee wa chɛ ma, tando ma sɔn koe a, a basan basɔmaya a. A ma sɔn koe a, a ka a ta mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin kai faen mu a a. Wo wɛɛ, wo e ma‑a wan an tɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, wo‑a wo kai fa sakana bai chɛ a, nn‑na min fɔ wo ye.
53001011	Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn mbe samunɛ chɛ wo ko a tima ɔ tima ko a. Nn mbe mmɔ 'a Yataa fai tena, min mbe a ma, wo ni kun ma koe a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, a‑a wo chee ma koe a min dɔ. A ni a ma, a 'a gbasaya ɔ, wo ni che wo faa ma koe chɛndɛ gbɛɛ ma‑a. A yɛ to, wo kai faenɛ min chɛenɛ ɛ Chisɔsi a, a ni a ma wo ni koe gbɛɛ ma, wo e min ma.
53001012	Chia chɛ a mu, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɛ basɔmaya ma sɔn‑da, a ka wo a. A sin, wo wɛɛ, wo e basɔmaya ma sɔn‑da wan, a ka a a. Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ, an fea mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an mbe a ma‑a chɛ ni ma.
53002001	N mbe bai sa tena gbɛ, a si mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi yɛ koe ma to dunya chɛ ɔ, a ni mmɔ a sɔn sɔn kaina dɔndɔɛ, a wandi tena. Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe wo disa tena wan.
53002002	Nn ma to ni wo 'a fiienɛ ni ma, a si a ma. Wo ma don faagbaa ɔ, ni mɔɛ dɔ n‑na a fɔ wo ye, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi na tee wa gbu che‑a. Kɔkɔɛ ɛ wan an mɔɛ chɛ n yii ma, mbɛ nn na‑a chɛ fɔ wo ye chia chɛ an na. A ni ma kɔɛ tima chɛ a, nn ni bai chɛ fɔ tena tima min na, Yataa na‑a min fɔ nn ye, a fɔ koe a mɔɛ n ye. Chɛ ma, tima chɛ a, da ɔ sakana gbama mu, nn‑na min na ben gboo nyɛndenɛ ɔ.
53002003	Wo ma dɔn mɔ ɔ mɔ ni wo bun ɛnden bɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, an tee chɛ ee na tena wɛ, aan tima ni che, mɔɛ sɛsɛ n mbe na‑a wan sɔ‑a Yataa a kan. Mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee sawa kɔɔ, a bɔ‑a ya a ma. A tana, ɛ gbɛ nɔ kasaa koe an na.
53002004	Ɛ Yataa ma bɔ‑a wan, a ni fen fen ma bɔ, an mbe miin fai an 'na Yataa a. Ɛ na‑a a wandi a sɛ‑a wan peche peche, a maenɛ ɛ mbɛ a kan nyɔ ee. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni don Yataa 'a chenɛ a, a ni si nɔ. A ni a wandi yian nɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ a, mbɛ a wan gbu mu Yataa a.
53002005	N na‑a chɛ gbɛɛ fɔ wan wo ye, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na. A gbu sin mbe wan wo yii ma gban.
53002006	Chɛɛ wo‑a a sɔn fan, koe min‑na a ma, a ma na nin bɛ. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tima chɛndɛ kɔɔ mu, ɛ a wandi yian‑da.
53002007	Mɔ sɛsɛ n gbu, an mbe gbɛ koe chɛ n ma‑a nun dɔ, Yataa ma dɔn ni mmɔ ni miin ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ, min mbe a a gban tena, ɛ to‑a wan a a gban‑da, aan ɛ ka‑a chia a tima min na.
53002008	A tima chɛ a mu, mɔɛ min mbe ee sawa kɔɔ, ɛ yen‑da wan. Chɛɛ ni Mansa Chisɔsi na‑a to, fia min mbe bɔ‑a dechee a da ɔ, an mbe an mɔɛ chɛ fa‑a. Chisɔsi ɛ ma‑a man ba min dɔ, an mbe an mɔɛ chɛ kasaa‑a.
53002009	Mɔɛ chɛ, min mbe ee sawa kɔɔ, Sitana 'a gbasaya kan kɔ kan mbe ma‑a wan a boo ɔ. Ɛ na‑a kamaya ko wa sɛsɛ ma‑a wan, fania nu.
53002010	Ɛ chia yama sɛsɛ ya‑a wan, a ni mɔɛ n bun. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe na‑a kasaa‑a. An mbe kasaa‑a koe min na, an ma an boo si ni tea bai kɔɔ, a si Chisɔsi ma. A ma to ni a 'a tea a, min mbe a ma, an ni bauncha ma sɔn.
53002011	Chɛ an‑na a ma, Yataa‑a gbasaya be, an bun koe a. Chɛ ni a ma, an ni dan fania chɛ gbɛɛ a.
53002012	Chɛ ɛ denɛ min suun‑da, an nɛ, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan an gbɛɛ ma, an ni tɔɔ. An gbɛɛ, miin ma dan ni tea chɛ a, a si Chisɔsi ma. A yɛ to, an faa ma koe mu ko yama ma an na.
53002013	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, a dindenɛ mu nn ma, Yataa wai bɔ koe a wo ko a tima ɔ tima. Wo ko a di mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi ye kaka. Yataa wɛɛ na‑a wo pɛn ya, bauncha ma sɔn koe a. A saa saa a, ɛ wo baun fan Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, min mbe a ma‑a, wo ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a. A yɛ to, wo dandenɛ min chɛen mu tea chɛ a, a si Chisɔsi ma, ɛ wo baun fan.
53002014	Nn ni sakana bai chɛndɛ min sa ka wo tena, Yataa na‑a wo chee an dɔ, bauncha chɛ ma sɔn koe a. A na‑a wo chee, min mbe a ma, a ni basɔmaya be wo ma, yɔ a na‑a min nyɔn sima be mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ma.
53002015	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu, chɛ an fɛ mu, wo sɔ chidi, wo ni wo boo a chii tea bai chɛ n ma, nn na‑a wo kan miin na, nn ni Yataa bai sa wo tena tima min na, a basan chɛ n na, nn na‑a miin nyɛn gboo ɔ.
53002016	Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi tena, an fea mmɔ Fa Yataa a, min toen mu mmɔ a. A sin, ɛ mmɔ faa ma nande tima ɔ tima ko a. Koe min na mu, a 'a koadia demanɛ, a ma mmɔ a bea ni kuɔ fɔ. A sin, a na‑a yiinatɛ be wan mmɔ ma chɛndɛ chɛ.
53002017	A ni wo faa ma nande, wo ɔ ni gbɛa. Chɛ ni a ma, tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ni bai sa min nyin, a yɛ to, wo ni koe ma min nyin.
53003001	A danka a gbɛ, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo samunɛ chɛ nn ko a. An mbe a ma, sakana bai chɛ, a si Mansa Chisɔsi ma, a tɛ ma tɛ, a ni fasan a ɔ ben‑da bui chɛ bui chɛ a. A sin to, mɔɛ n ni an boo a si a kɔɔ basɔmaya a, yɔ wo‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ.
53003002	Wo samunɛ chɛ to nn ko a, Yataa ni nn kunɛ bɔ faa kɔɔen tɔɛ n boo ɔ, mɔ yama nu. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, min kai faen mu Chisɔsi a.
53003003	Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn. Ɛ a ma‑a wan wo faa ni sɔ, a ni wo kun ma fɛn Sitana boo ɔ.
53003004	Mansa Chisɔsi sin mbe a ma tena wan, nn mbe nn yii fa wo ma. Nn sin danden fan mu a a, mbɛ wo e wan koe chɛ n ma‑a, nn na‑a miin fɔ wo ye an ma koe a. Wo sin, wo e an fan na tun‑da an ma koe a.
53003005	Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena Mansa Chisɔsi tena, wo ni a ɔ sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa toen mu wo a buɛ min dɔ. Wo ni a ɔ sɔn to, Chisɔsi na‑a ko yawaenɛ min nyɔn dɔ bia, a sin mbe a ma tena wo wɛɛ, wo e a ɔ bia.
53003006	Nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, nn mbe chɛ fɔ tena wo ye gbau gbau, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ. Wo ma gbɛn suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, miin mbe gboo ɔ fa bɔ tena an 'na fɔɛ ɔ. A sin, an mbe ee bea tena koe chɛ n fɛ, nn na‑a min fɔ an ye.
53003007	Gboo ɔ fa tɔ nii ma nn na, tima min na mmɔ bɛ ni. Wo sin gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ wo e bea nn chen gba chɛ an fɛ.
53003008	Nn nii ma dɔn ni, nn ni fen kɔ fen bia mɔ ɔ mɔ boo ɔ, gbama gbama a. Nn na‑a wai chɛ wan nn sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, su ɔ tee a, min mbe a ma, nn ma koe ma na si wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ kun ma.
53003009	Nn na‑a chɛ ma koe min na, an nii ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ tea nii nn boo ɔ, wo ɔ tisa koe a nn kɔ koe a. Chɛɛ nn na‑a chɛ ma, ma koe an na tɔmɔsi a, wo e che bea‑a min fɛ.
53003010	Nn ni chɛ an fɔ wo ye, mmɔ bɛ ni tima min na. Mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, min ban‑da wai ma, wo ma a ma a ni daunɛ chɛ.
53003011	Nn‑na a a min fan, mbɛ wo bɔɛ dɔ n mbe wan wo tɛ ɔ, miin gboo ɔ faen mu. An mbe ee wai ɔ wai chɛ, fɔ dechee an da chɛ koe a an bɔ n ta koe n dɔ.
53003012	Nn mbe an mɔɛ chɛ n na si tena, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi tɔɛ ɔ, an ni ma fɔɛ chɛndɛ ɔ. An ni wai chɛ, an da a daun fenɛ ko a. An dimu, an ni chɛ ma.
53003013	Chɛɛ wo wan, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo gboo ɔ ma fa ko chɛndɛ ma koe a.
53003014	Mɔɛ ɛ ma‑a wan kɔɛ nɔ, min ban‑da koe chɛ n ma koe a, nn‑na koe miin nyɛn gboo chɛ ɔ wo tena. Ni ɛ ka wan, wo wo ya gba sa an mɔɛ chɛ ma. Wo sin gbu ma gbɛn a ma, min mbe a ma, a ni mau a wandi ma.
53003015	Chɛɛ wo ma a ya, wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ a. Wo e min ma, wo a a si, yɔ wo suun ma nyɔnɛ.
53003016	Nn mbe samunɛ chɛ tena, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi wandi, mmɔ 'a faachima ɛ ka min tena, a ni faachima be wo ma tima ɔ tima ko a. A ni a be wo ma, chia ɔ chia a. A ni ma wo gbɛɛ kɔ.
53003017	N fandi gbu, n fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da, n ni wo kɔndɔn. N mbe n tɔɛ nyɛn ka wan n 'na gboo nyɛndenɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ. N mbe n 'na gboo n nyɛn ka wan.
53003018	Mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo gbɛɛ dua.
54001001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da i tena, i wan Timoti. N 'na denɛ mu gbɛ i a, i 'a danaya ko a Yataa a. Mɔ yii na tɛen mu Chisɔsi Chasi an ma. A sin, a 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na, mɔ baun mɔɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, an fea a wan Chisɔsi Chasi a. Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma i ma, an 'na chinchimaya ni ma i ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
54001003	N toen mu i ni ma Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ wan. I ma ka nɔ, yɔ n na‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ i ye, tima min na ni n mbe ta‑a Masidonia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ nu Ɛfisɔsi, miin mbe ka fania kan chɛ a, a fɔ an ye an ni sɛmbɛ a a.
54001004	An na si an ni sɛmbɛ tai a bɔɛ a, an mbe ta‑a suunɛ ma dan‑da ta‑a aan. Chɛ ɛ na dechee kɔɔsa an na, an mbe ee deman chɛ, Yataa 'a yiinachii mmɔ ko a, a ni ta ya ɔ ma. Danaya an mbe a ma Yataa 'a yiinachii mmɔ ko a, a ni ta ya ɔ ma.
54001005	Chɛ fɔen mu i ye, min mbe a ma, koadia ni ma nɔ. Koadia min kaen mu faa ɔ gbɛenɛ ɔ, yiima a koenɛ fion, a basan danaya gbau gbau a Yataa a.
54001006	Dɔ n‑na an kan kɔ sɔ dan koe a chɛ n na, mbɛ an‑na an boo chɛ wooya kɔɔsa bia n dɔ.
54001007	An toen mu an ni mɔɛ n kan Mosisi 'a sawa a, an kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a. Chɛɛ an ma sawa gbu ɔ gbɛ ni, a basan koe chɛ n na, sawa ɛ min fɔ tena.
54001008	Mɔ‑a a ɔ yen gbɛ, mbɛ ni sawa chɛ bia‑a chɛndɛ chɛ, sawa chɛndɛ mu a a.
54001009	Mɔɛ miin mbe don sawa kɔɔ, a ee sa an fan ko a. Chɛɛ ɛ sa mɔ yama n fan ko a, miin mbe ee sawa ya, an mbe ee don a kɔɔ, Yataa sɔn bai nu, miin mbe a gbɛnɛ ma bon. Ɛ chɛ n fan ko a, miin mbe an fa n fa, an ni an de n fa, an bɛ mɔ fa mɔɛ n na.
54001010	A yɛ to, ɛ ko tɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fan ko a, mɔɛ miin mbe an bɔ mɔ kaima mun an 'na musu a. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe fania fɔ, ni miin mbe fania siiya chɛ. Mɔ ma tachɛ mɔɛ nu, ni miin mbe koe n ma, min kaen mu kan chɛndɛ chia ma.
54001011	Kan chɛ ɛ kamaya sakana bai chɛndɛ an dɔ, Yataa wandi, mmɔ ɛ min tando, a‑a min be n ma.
54001012	N mbe Chisɔsi Chasi wai bɔ tena, mmɔ 'a mansa. An‑na a yii na chii n na, mbɛ n danayaen fan mu wai chɛ koe a a ko a. A‑a gbasaya wɛɛ be n ma a chɛ koe a.
54001013	N na‑a a main fan, mbɛ n‑na ko ma gbaaenɛ si a 'a mɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ Yataa chinchin‑da wan n ma, koe min na mu, danaya nii n dɔ a tima a Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, a sin, n nii ma a ɔ sɔn n ni koe min ma tena.
54001014	Mmɔ 'a mansa 'a bauncha koadia yii‑a n kun na. Chɛ‑a danaya chɛ wan n dɔ Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, a basan koadia a. Chɛ an mbe ma mmɔ a, ni mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a.
54001015	Tea bai yen ko, Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a dunya ɔ ko yama ma mɔɛ n baun koe an na. Kɔɔsa bia kan kɔ kan mbe ee chɛ ma, a sin mbe nyan fan mɔ ni dan a a. N fan Pɔɔ, ko yama ma mɔɛ n 'na mansa mu n na.
54001016	Chɛɛ Yataa chinchin‑da n ma, min mbe a ma, Chisɔsi Chasi ni kun a ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n na, ɛ a faa bia buɛ min dɔ ko yama ma mɔɛ n na. A 'a tɔmɔsi ma‑a n fan na, n fan mansa chɛ, ko yama ma mɔɛ n ko a. A 'a tɔmɔsi ma‑a n na, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ tena, miin mbe an kai fa‑a Chasi a, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ko a.
54001017	Tando ni ma gbɛ Mansa Wa tɔɛ ma, basɔmaya ni be a ma kuɔ fɔ, mansa min mbe ee fa, mɔ sin mbe ee a yen. Yataa dɔndɔ gbe mu an na. A ni ma ka.
54001018	N 'na den, Timoti, n toen mu n ni chɛ an fɔ i ye a ma koe a. I yii na chii bai chɛ n ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a min fɔ tee, a si i ma. An ya i faa a, min mbe a ma, i ni butuinɛ chɛ Chasi ko a, yɔ soya chɛndɛ.
54001019	Danaya Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, a fea yiima a koenɛ a, a bia i boo fea a. Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe sɛmbɛ wan dan koe a Chasi a, koe min na mu, an mbe koe ma an yiima ma dɔn ni, min ma koe a.
54001020	Mɔ dɔndɔ mu Imenayɔsi a, an fea Adɛsanda a. N‑na an be Sitana ma, a ni an na tɔɔya, min mbe a ma, an ni sɛmbɛ Yataa main‑da.
54002001	N mbe a fɔ tena wo ye, a saa saa a ɔ, mbɛ wo ni samunɛ chɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ko a. A sin, ni wo ma‑a Yataa ɔ tisa‑a, wo a disa chinchin koe a an ma, wo ni yɛ to, wo ni a wai bɔ.
54002002	Samunɛ ni chɛ mansa n ko a, a basan mɔɛ tɔɛ chɛ n na, miin mbe sɔ tena nu. Chɛ ni ma, min mbe a ma, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔɛ ni bɔ mmɔ 'a fɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ faachima ma‑a mmɔ ma, mmɔ ɛ ta‑a ma‑a Yataa fɔɛ ɔ, basɔmaya wɛɛ ɛ mmɔ ɔ chia ɔ chia a.
54002003	Samun bonda chɛ an nyin, a sin mbe mmɔ baun mɔɛ Yataa faa chima wan.
54002004	A mu min na, a toen mu mɔ ɔ mɔ ni tea chia sɔn, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni bauncha ma sɔn.
54002005	Koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. A sin, mɔ dɔndɔ gbe an mbe mmɔ tɛ mmɔ bɛ a a. A mɔɛ chɛ mu Chisɔsi Chasi an na,
54002006	min‑na a wandi fɔɛ be, min mbe a ma, a ni mmɔ gbɛɛ kun ka. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan a tima chɛ a, mbɛ tima gbu an che‑a ka, Yataa toen mu mmɔ gbɛɛ ni bauncha ma sɔn.
54002007	Chɛ ko a mu, a‑a n ya sɔ mɔɛ a, sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian koe a. N ni mɔɛ n kan, Chu mɔ ma miin na, dan koe a Chisɔsi a, a basan tea sakana bai chɛndɛ a. N mbe ka tea an fɔ‑a, fania ma chɛ a.
54002008	Ɛ n ta faa ɔ, mbɛ mɔ kaima nu kan kɔ kan an ni samunɛ chɛ Yataa tena. Ni an sin ma‑a a chɛ‑a, an tandenɛ ni ma, an faa ee tɛ, an mbe ee koɛ wɛɛ chɛ.
54002009	N toen mu to musu n bɛɛ ni basɔmaya ma bɛnɛ chɛ. An ma an fandi a bonchen ba chɛ. An ma an kunɛ ma chɛ, an ni sanu chii, an ni fen baa gbɛ ma chɛ an ma, a basan koa baa gbanden ba a.
54002010	Chɛɛ an ni an fandi a bonchen an chɛ chɛ wai chɛndɛ ɔ, min ma biaen mu Yataa sɔn mɔɛ ko a.
54002011	Ni an ma‑a kanɛ kɔɔ, musu n ni an fandi ma yii chia ɔ chia a, an sin ma an da a kuiɛ ma sɛ.
54002012	Musu n ta mu si koe an na gbɛ. N mbe ee dɔn musu ni sɔ mɔ kaima n ya ɔ, n mbe ee dɔn a ni an kan.
54002013	Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a Adami pɛn pɛn nyan, a e na to Ifi a dan‑da.
54002014	A sin, ka nii ma Adami an woo ni, a na‑a Ifi an woo, min‑na a ma, a ma‑a ko yama ma mɔɛ a.
54002015	Chɛɛ musu n mbe bauncha sɔn‑da wan den suunɛ ɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma wan, ni yiimatɛ ma‑a an tachɛ buɛ ɔ, koadia ɛ an faa ɔ, an sin tandenɛ ɛ Yataa tena, an mbe ta‑a an kai fa‑a a a.
54003001	Tea bai yen ko, ni mɔɛ toen mu ya ɔ sɔ ya a chɔchi ɔ, a‑a wai chɛndɛ an ya ka.
54003002	A mɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma mɔ tandenɛ an na. Musu dɔndɔ gbe an mbe ma a boo ɔ, mɔɛ min kosan a wandi bia‑a, basɔmaya tɔɛ, sonda bia mɔɛ, a sin kosan mɔɛ n kan‑da.
54003003	A ee gbɛ wa min, faagbandia tɔ ma a a, chɛɛ a ni ma mɔɛ a min faa chimaen mu, a ee koɔ yan. A sin, kɔpɔɛ wako ee a faa ɔ kaka.
54003004	Ɛ ma mɔɛ an na min kunden mu a 'a chenɛ ma chɛndɛ chɛ, a 'a denɛ n kooenɛ a ye, an sin kanden mu chia ɔ chia a.
54003005	A mu min na, ni mɔɛ ma kun ni a wandi gbu ta chenɛ ma, a ee kun a ni che koe ɔ bɛn‑da chɔchi ɔ.
54003006	A ni ma mɔɛ an na min kai faen mu Chisɔsi a tima dɔ ko a. Chɛɛ ni tima kundu ko a mu dechee, kɔkɔɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni dɔpandaya bɔ. A sin, Yataa ee a tɔɔya‑a, yɔ Sitana ma‑a buɛ min dɔ.
54003007	A sɔnɛ ma ni kawa mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin mbe baa kɔ, min mbe a ma, an mbe ee tɔ yama si‑a a kun ma, mbɛ a chɛɛ‑a Sitana 'a gbai a.
54003008	Mɔɛ miin bɛɛ ɛ chɔchi ɔ demanɛ chɛ‑a, an ni ma basɔmaya tɔɛ n na. An ma ma nɛnɛn fea ti n na, an ma gbɛ wa min, an sin, kɔpɔɛ koe ma ma an faa ɔ kaka.
54003009	An ni an boo a chii tea chɛ ma, Yataa‑a min kɔɔ yian. An yiima, a ni ko, a si an tea chɛ ma.
54003010	An dɔ ni siman pɛn. Ni an‑na an dɔ siman chɛ ben, mbɛ an‑na a kuu sɔ demanɛ chɛ‑a chɔchi ɔ.
54003011	A musu n bɛɛ sɔnɛ a ni dondan, an ma tɔ ɔ tɛ chɛ, an ni ma basɔmaya tɔɛ n na, an tandenɛ ni ma ko ɔ ko ɔ.
54003012	Mɔɛ miin mbe demanɛ chɛ chɔchi ɔ, musu dɔndɔ an mbe ma an boo ɔ. An ni kun an 'na chenɛ bia‑a chɛndɛ chɛ, a basan an 'na denɛ n na.
54003013	Deman chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an 'na wai chɛ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ, an mbe baa sɔn‑da wan an fandi ko a. An sin mbe kun‑da wan an ni koɔ, an kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a si an 'na danaya ma Chisɔsi Chasi a.
54003014	N toen mu n ni na i tan sanche. Chɛɛ n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena i tena, min mbe a ma,
54003015	ni n ma fua ni na‑a, gboo nyɛnden chɛ, ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan i a, mɔɛ ɛ tachɛ buɛ min dɔ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. An mu chɔchi an na, Yataa, min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, a waa a, Chisian danaya kuu si tena, ni a kɔɔ sɔ kɔnɛ.
54003016	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che chɛ kɔɔsa bia‑a, mbɛ koe nu, Yataa‑a min dɔ yian mmɔ a, tea mu an na. A na‑a mɔgbuya an dɔ. Yataa Nyina‑a tea be a ma. Maeka n‑na a yen. A wakoe ɔ yian‑da wan dunya a. A sin dunya‑a a kai fa a a. Yataa‑a a ya a sɛ‑a manɛ ɔ.
54004001	Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina ɔ, tima ɛ che‑a wan mɔɛ n ni sɛmbɛ dan koe a Chisɔsi Chasi a, mbɛ an bea nyina yama da a kuiɛ fɛ, a basan fania kanɛ a.
54004002	Kan yama bonda chɛ nu, ɛ ka fania yama kan chɛ mɔɛ n fan na. Gbasaya min mbe a ma, an ni ko chɛndɛ ya bɔ ko yama a, a ee to an dɔ. A maen mu yɔ an yiima faen fan mu an dɔ.
54004003	An dɔ, mɔ ee musu si, a ee kai sɔn, a basan daun fenɛ dɔsa daun koe a. Chɛɛ Yataa‑a daun fen chɛ n na bɔ an daun koe an na, mɔɛ n boo ɔ, miin danden mu a a. An sin mbe a wai bɔ pɛn samunɛ ɔ, mbɛ an‑na a daun.
54004004	Yataa‑a fenɛ min gbɛɛ a dan, a nyin fan. A dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma nyin mɔ ni ban a ɔ, ni mɔ‑a min kɔ min ma sɔn wai bɔɛ ɔ.
54004005	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a bai a basan samunɛ a, ɛ fen chɛ n dua wan.
54004006	Ni i gboo ɔ ma fa ni dasi chɛ be koe a suun ma nyɔɛ n ma, ni i‑a Chisian danaya ɔ bai sa i faa ɔ, a basan kan chɛndɛ a, i bea‑a min fɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, e ma‑a wan wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi ko a.
54004007	I ma i boo chɛ tai ɔ, yiimatɛ ee min dɔ, a sin ma gbiti ni Yataa koe ma. Chɛɛ i wandi kan wai chɛ koe a Yataa ko a.
54004008	Ni wai mɛsɛ chɛ ɛ gboo ɔ gbɛa be wan mɔ ma, mbɛ Yataa 'a wai sin nyin fan chia ɔ chia a. A mu min na, mmɔ‑a a 'a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn fan bi tee chɛ a, a basan ya ɔ ma a.
54004009	Tea bai an nɛ. Kɔɔsa bia kan kɔ kan mbe ee chɛ ma, a sin mbe nyan fan mɔ ni dan a a.
54004010	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ɛ tɔɔ, mmɔ ɛ sɛchɛ kaka. Koe min na mu, mmɔ yiima gbɛɛ a tɛen mu Yataa an ma. A ee chinɔ ɛnden bɛɛ a, ɛ mmɔ baun, a bɛbɛɛ mmɔ wɛn danden mu a a.
54004011	N toen mu i ni gboo nyɛnden chɛ a ben an tena, mbɛ i‑a an kan.
54004012	I ma a ma mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a yii dɛn i ta kun ma, i kamin tɔngbɔya koe a. Chɛɛ ma tɔmɔsi a an ko a chia sɛsɛ a, i da a bai basan i sɔnɛ ɔ, koadia ɔ, danaya ɔ Chisɔsi a, a sin ma bɔ ee i sɔnɛ ma.
54004013	Yataa 'a gboo chɛ kan an tena, i ni an faa ma nande, mbɛ i‑a an kan, aan n ni na tima min na.
54004014	Yataa Nyina‑a fenɛ min be i ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n koɔ‑a tima min na, mbɛ chɔchi gbakoo n‑na an boo bun i ma, a bia i boo fea a.
54004015	Koe chɛ n ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, i ni i wandi be an ma koe a, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni a ɔ yen, e ta tena buɛ min dɔ ya ɔ ma.
54004016	Tima ya i ben buɛ a fɔɛ ɔ, a basan i‑a kan chɛ buɛ a. A ma yɔ n‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ i ye, min mbe a ma, i ni bauncha ma sɔn, wo bɛ i kuiɛ a min mɔɛ n na.
54005001	I ma koɔ ma sɛen chɛ chenan kai n tena. Chɛɛ koɔ a tena basɔmaya a, yɔ e koɔ buɛ min dɔ i fa tena. Kamin tɔngbɔɛ n bia yɔ i dɔ kaima nu.
54005002	Sunkun tɔngbɔɛ n bia yɔ i tensa musu nu, musu ko kan kɔ kan ma na i yii ma an ko a, mbɛ i‑a chenan musu n bia yɔ i de.
54005003	Basɔmaya demanɛ be fuinya musu n ma, miin mbe an fandi kun ye.
54005004	Chɛɛ ni denɛ n ma‑a fuinya musu min boo ɔ, ni mama n denɛ ma‑a min boo ɔ, an mbe e na to ko ɔ ko ma‑a, an ni an 'na Yataa wai ɔ yian chenɛ pɛn na. An mbe koe min chɛ‑a ka an woo mɔɛ chɛ n ye, an mbe ma‑a ka an ta kuiɛ an na yɛ‑a. Koe min na mu, Yataa faa ma koe an nɛ.
54005005	Fuinya musu chɛndɛ chɛndɛ, mɔ ee min boo ɔ, a yii faen mu Yataa an ma. Su ni tee a, ɛ samunɛ chɛ wan, ɛ ta‑a Yataa ɔ tisa‑a a deman koe a.
54005006	Chɛɛ fuinya musu min kunɛ a fuinden mu buɔdia bɔ koe a, a nɛnɛ ban‑da, a fɔɛ ɛ wɛɛ boo ɔ boo a sun da a.
54005007	Dasi chɛ n din mɔɛ n ma, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a tɛɛ si‑a an ma, ko ɔ ko ko a.
54005008	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a ya a mun ni a 'a mɔɛ n ma, a bɛbɛɛ a ta chenɛ a mɔɛ nu, a‑a a kan kɔ an sɔ ka a 'a danaya an na Chisɔsi a. A mɔɛ chɛ yau, a ni ben mɔɛ ma min ma a kai fa ni Chisɔsi a tee dɔndɔ wɛ.
54005009	Ni i ma‑a fuinya musu kan kɔ kan tɔɛ sa‑a tɔɛ chɛ n kun ma, a ni ma fuinya an na min benden mu san bi wɔdɔɛ ma. A sin a tanden fan ni a chɛɛ tena.
54005010	Mɔɛ n sin mbe a bai wan a 'a ko chɛndɛ maenɛ wɛɛ ko a, min ni a ɔ. Mbɛ musu mu a a, min‑na a 'a denɛ n bɔ a ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, a‑a a boo si sonda n kɔɔ a 'a chenɛ a, a‑a ko chɛndɛ sɛsɛ ma Chisianɛ n na. Mɔɛ miin bɛ ni yakɔɔtawa ɔ, a‑a an deman, a sin‑na a wandi be ko chɛndɛ ma a a.
54005011	Chɛɛ fuinya musu miin ma che ni san bi wɔdɔɛ ɔ, i ma an tɔɛ chɛ a ɔ. A mu min na, ni kai sɔn sɔɛ‑a an bia, an mbe an kan kɔ sɔ‑a wan Chasi 'a wai a.
54005012	Ni an‑na chɛ ma, Yataa ɛ an bia‑a wan an da a kuiɛ saa a bɔ koe ma a ɔ.
54005013	A ka chɛ ma, an mbe a kuu sɔ wan nyapen nyapencha ma yan‑da, benbenɛ a chenɛ n kun ma. Min yau chɛ ma, an mbe tɔ tɛ chɛ wan a basan ko ɔ fɔɛ ma yanɛ a, bai n fɔɛ a min ma an fɔ bai a.
54005014	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n mbe to‑a wan fuinya musu tɔngbɔɛ ni kai sɔn to, an ni denɛ n suun, an ni an 'na chenɛ n kun ma fɛn. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan mmɔ chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ ee chia sɔn‑da, mmɔ tɔ yama a fasan koe a.
54005015	A mu min na, dɔ n ban‑da an kan kɔ sɔ‑a, bea koe a Sitana fɛ.
54005016	Ni musu kan kɔ kan, min kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, ni fuinya musu ma‑a a 'a suunɛ ɔ, a ni a kun ma fɛn. A ma a ma fuinya chɛ 'a suun fanka ma ni sa to chɔchi kun ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan fuinya musu chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n mbe ee na‑a demanɛ ma sɔn‑da.
54005017	Gbakoo chɛ nu, miin mbe chɔchi wai ma ti bia chɛndɛ chɛ, ɛ nyan fan an ni tɔnɔn fea ma sɔn, an 'na pawa basan basɔmaya a. A bɛbɛɛ chɛ nu, miin‑na an boo a chii kan chɛ ma, an sɔɛ dondenɛ ɛ Yataa 'a bai sa ma.
54005018	A mu min na, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, a ɔ, “I ma ninchi da a chii, ni a ma‑a fenɛ tɛn‑da,” a sin to, a ɔ, “Wai chɛ mɔɛ 'a tea mu a 'a pawa sɔn koe a.”
54005019	I ma koe ya ka dechee a si gbakoo ma, ni mɔ fea, sawa ma siiya bɔ ni a ma.
54005020	Tea fɔ an ye fanka ɔ, an fɛn mbe ko yama ma‑a, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ tɔɛ n ni chian.
54005021	N toen mu i ni dasi chɛ ya i sɔɛ a, i ma a to mɔ ko a, i sin ma a ɔ sii mɔ ko a. Yataa ɛ mɔ yen tena wan, Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ mɔ yen‑da, maeka n bɛɛ, Yataa‑a min ya, an‑na mɔ yen.
54005022	I 'a tima ya i boo bun koe a mɔɛ kun ma, a yian koe a gbakoo ya a. I 'a tima ya, mɔ dɔ mende 'a ko yama maenɛ a ee na sin i ma. To Yataa gbee an na tun.
54005023	A yen ko gboo ɔ bɔ tɔ ma i a. I ma yii dechee min, chɛɛ gbɛ sima wɛɛ, i bu ko a.
54005024	Mɔɛ dɔ n 'na ko yama maenɛ ɛ sa ɔ wan den, mɔ ɔ mɔ e na kaa a tɛ a ma. Chɛɛ dɔ n ta ɔ nunden fan mu, a ee fua bɔ‑a a yen koe a.
54005025	Ko chɛndɛ ma wɛɛ ɛ ka wan to, a ɔ yen fan paden. Chɛɛ ni a sin dɔ ma fua nin bɛ sɔn‑da, a ee to nun dɔ.
54006001	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ mbe yɔncha kɔɔ, an ni baa be an yɔn fa nu ma, min mbe a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee na‑a bai yama sa‑a a si Yataa ma, a basan mmɔ 'a kan chɛ a.
54006002	Yɔn fa nu miin kai faen mu Chisɔsi a, an 'na yɔnɛ n ma tɛ an dɔ, kun dɔ an‑na a yen, mbɛ an gbɛɛ an mbe chia dɔndɔɛ an na. Chɛɛ an yɔn chɛ n ni wai chɛ an ko a an sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, a mu min na, an 'na tɔnɔnɛ ɛ ta tena an kai fa tena dɔndɔ gbe wan. N toen mu i ni koe chɛ n kan, i ni an ma din.
54006003	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ 'a kanɛ ka‑a chia chɛ ma, a ma bea ni mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a kan chɛ fɛ, a basan kan chɛ a a si ma koe ma Yataa fɔɛ ɔ,
54006004	a mɔɛ chɛ mu dɔpanda tɔɛ an na, a ma ko ɔ ko sɔn. Koɔ chɛ gbandi an mbe an ma, an sin mbe kɔɔsa bia chɛ wan kɔnɔ bai kan kɔ kan ma. Chɛ ɛ na toomaya an na, ko a fasanɛ, nyɔn mainɛ, a basan yii sɔ yama a an nyɔn na.
54006005	An sin mbe ma an nyɔn dɔ sawan sawanɛ an na su ɔ tee a, mɔɛ miin yiima a ma ko ni, a sin tea sima wɛɛ ee a ɔ. Ɛ wan an yii ma, mbɛ Yataa koe ee ta nyanɛ gbaa.
54006006	Tea gbu sin na, mɔɛ ɛ faachima min ma sɔn, ni mɔ ma‑a Yataa chia ma, an mu mmɔ 'a tɔnɔnɛ a.
54006007	Koe min na mu, mɔ ma na ni fen fen na dunya chɛ ɔ, mɔ sin mbe ee ta‑a fen fen na mɔ boo ɔ.
54006008	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ni mmɔ‑a daun fenɛ ma sɔn, a basan chii koa a, mmɔ faa ni chima chɛ a.
54006009	Chɛɛ miin toen mu an ni nyan, an mbe dɛ kan gbɛnɛ an dɔ, mbɛ an chɛɛ‑a Sitana 'a gbai a. An mbe ko sɛsɛ ma wan yiimatɛ ee min dɔ, a basan ko yama a. Chɛ ɛ an yɔn fan gbɔkɔɔ.
54006010	A mu min na, kɔpɔɛ koe, ko yama sɛsɛ ɛ a kuu sɔ an ma. Kɔpɔ koe wa dɛgbɛ chɛ, an‑na a ma, mɔɛ dɔ n ka‑a danaya chia ma Chisɔsi a, a sin‑na an na dɛ faa yɔn koe n dɔ.
54006011	Chɛɛ min sien mu i ma, i wɛn‑na i wandi be Yataa ma, i ya ka chɛ gbɛɛ a. I tana, tan Yataa tena, ma Yataa fɔɛ ɔ, danaya ni ma i ɔ Chisɔsi ko a, a basan koadia a, faabia, ni machimaya.
54006012	Butuinɛ chɛ i 'a danaya ko a Chisɔsi a, butuin chɛndɛ an nɛ. I che‑a wan kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da. I sin‑na a fɔ wan den mɔ sɛsɛ ya kɔ, mbɛ i‑a i kai fa Chisɔsi Chasi a. Kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ chɛ bia i boo fea a.
54006013	Yataa ɛ mmɔ yen tena wan, min‑na fɔɛ be fen fen ma, Chisɔsi Chasi wɛɛ ɛ mmɔ yen‑da, min ma a nun ni Kɔfana Pɔnchɔsi Padeti ma, danaya min nyɔn sima ɛ a ɔ. N toen mu i ni
54006014	dasi chɛ ya i sɔɛ a. I ni tachɛ teaya ɔ, mabɔ ee min ma, aan tee chɛ ni che, tee min ma mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ na‑a to.
54006015	An na chɛ, a tima ɛ Yataa an boo ɔ, tando ɛ min ma, mansa n kun ma mansa dɔndɔ gbe, mansa wa mansa n gbɛɛ ko a.
54006016	A dɔndɔ gbe an mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, ɛ tun man ba an dɔ, mɔ ee che gbɛn‑da manɛ min ma, a sin mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a yen nin bɛ fɔɛ ɔ, mɔ sin mbe ee che a yen‑da. Basɔmaya fea kuɔ fɔ gbasaya ni ma a ma. A ni ma ka.
54006017	N toen mu i ni a fɔ chɛ n ye, miin nyanden mu dunya chɛ ɔ, an ma dɔpandaya bɔ, an sin ma an yii sɔ an 'na nyanɛ ma, fenɛ mu a a, min ma namaen mu. Chɛɛ an ni an yii sɔ Yataa an ma, min mbe fen kɔ fen be mmɔ ma, mmɔ 'a buɔdia ko a.
54006018	N toen mu i ni a fɔ an ye, an ni ko chɛndɛ ma, an ni nyan wai chɛndɛ ɔ, an ni ma boo ka tɔ wa a, an ma bɛndenɛ ni ma tima ɔ tima chɛ a.
54006019	Ni an‑na chɛ ma, an mbe ma‑a ka nyanɛ an kuu chɛ‑a an fandi ko a, dunya nama chɛ ɔ min mbe na tena. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni fɔɛ ma sɔn, min mu tea fɔɛ a.
54006020	Timoti, fen chɛ bia i boo fea a, Yataa‑a fenɛ min be i ma. I ma i too ma sɔ wooya chia ɔ bɔɛ ma, chian mbe ee min dɔ Yataa ko a, mɔɛ dɔ n mbe min chee an dɔ yiimatɛ.
54006021	Mɔɛ dɔ n bea‑a an yiimatɛ chɛ an fɛ, min‑na a ma, an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ chɔchi a. Yataa ni wo dua.
55001001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da i tena, i wan Timoti. N faa ma denɛ mu gbɛ i a. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu n na, yɔ Yataa toen ni buɛ min dɔ a ni ma. A‑a n sɔ, n ni a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, mbɛ ni mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a, an mbe a ma, mmɔ ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Yataa na‑a a fɔ ka wan. Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an 'na dua ni ma i ma, an 'na chinchimaya ni ma i ma, a basan an 'na faachima a.
55001003	N mbe Yataa wai bɔ tena i ko a, n mbe wai chɛ tena min ye n yiima a koenɛ a fion, yɔ n bemba n ta bemba n ni a ma tee buɛ min dɔ. N mbe samunɛ chɛ tena i ko a su ɔ tee a.
55001004	A a ma nyina nin bɛ n na, faayɔn ba min ni i ɔ, mɔ‑a mɔ saa mɔ nyɔn na tima min na. A sin, i yen sɔɛ an mbe n na kaka, min mbe a ma, n bu ɔ ni dia.
55001005	Danaya gbau gbau min mbe i ɔ Chisɔsi ko a, a puin‑da n yii ma. Danaya min nyɔn sima ni i mama Doyisi ɔ an fea i de Yunisi a, n danden fan mu a a, mbɛ an mbe i ɔ.
55001006	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe a fɔ tena i ye to, mbɛ i ni tachɛ fen chɛ a chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a boo fenɛ min be i ma, n na‑a n boo bun i ma tima min na i dua koe a.
55001007	Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina min be mmɔ fɛ, a ee a ma mmɔ ni chian. Chɛɛ ɛ gbasaya an chɛ mmɔ ɔ, a basan koadia a, ni mɔɛ e kun buɛ min dɔ i faa ma.
55001008	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, i ma mau mmɔ 'a mansa wakoe ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. N bɛɛ wakoe, i ma mau n ko a, koe min na mu, n mbe pimbi chenɛ a a si Chasi ko a. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, i wɛɛ i ta mɔnɛ ɔ bia a 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ko a. A sin mbe a 'a gbasaya be‑a wan i ma.
55001009	A‑a mmɔ baun fan, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ chee ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na. A ma chɛ ma ni mmɔ sɔn chɛndɛ an ko a. Chɛɛ Yataa e na to dunya a dan‑da, a wandi na‑a a ɔ bɛn ka wan, a 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ, a‑a min dɔ yian Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ.
55001010	Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, mmɔ baun mɔɛ Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a dunya ɔ, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni a 'a koadia deman chɛ ɔ yen. Chasi‑a a ma gbasaya ee to saya boo ɔ mmɔ kun ma. Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, a‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ yian mmɔ a.
55001011	Sakana bai chɛ ko a mu, a‑a n ya sɔ mɔɛ a, n ni kanɛ chɛ, mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yian mɔɛ n na.
55001012	A sin, chɛ an fɛ mu n mbe ka mɔnɛ bonda chɛ ɔ bia tena. Chɛɛ mau ee n dɔ, koe min na mu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, n kai faen mu min na. A sin n danden fan mu a a, mbɛ a‑a fenɛ min be n ma, ɛ che wan a kun ma fɛn‑da aan a tee dankama chɛ ni che.
55001013	Bea tea bai chɛ n fɛ, n‑na i kan miin na. An ni ma tɔmɔsi a i tena. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, a sin i ma sɛmbɛ dan koe ma a a, a basan koadia a.
55001014	Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, min mbe mmɔ fɛ, tea chɛ min been mu i ma, a bia i boo fea a.
55001015	I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan mbɛ an gbɛɛ, an fɛn mbe Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ, an ka‑a n fɛ, an bɛ Fichɛdɔsi a, ni Amɔchɛnesi.
55001016	Mansa Chisɔsi ni chinchin Wɔnesifɔyɔsi 'a chenɛ ma, koe min na mu, a ni buɔdia be wan n ma tima sɛsɛ ko a. A ma mau ni n ma, n 'na pimbi chen na sa ko a.
55001017	Chɛɛ a‑a a fo kɛn Domi duu ɔ, a‑a a ya a kan fan n na a sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, aan a‑a n yen.
55001018	I sin‑na a ɔ sɔn fan chɛndɛ chɛ, a‑a min chɛ n ko a Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ. Mansa Yataa ni chinchin a ma tee dankama ma.
55002001	I tana, n 'na den, Yataa ni i ɔ gbɛa koadia demanɛ chɛ ɔ, mmɔ‑a min ma sɔn kɛn mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a.
55002002	N na‑a i kan fan koe n sɛsɛ ma, a sin, mɔ sɛsɛ ni wan nɔ siiya a. An kan chɛ a ben mɔ dɔ mende n tena, miin danayaen mu, an ni mɔ dɔ mende n bɛɛ kan.
55002003	I ta mɔnɛ ɔ bia, yɔ Chisɔsi Chasi 'a soya chɛndɛ.
55002004	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe soya ɔ, a ma bɛnden mu tima ɔ tima don koe an na ya ɔ sɔɛ da a kuiɛ kɔɔ. A ee a boo chɛ koe n dɔ, mɔ gbama n mbe miin ma.
55002005	A yɛ to, ni i ma‑a Yataa 'a wai chɛ‑a, bea a 'a sawa fɛ. A ɛ wan yɔ bui chɛ tɔmbɔɛ, mɔɛ ee a bɔɛ n gbasi, a ni boo ɔ gbasi woo ma sɔn, ni a ma don ni sawa gbɛɛ kɔɔ.
55002006	A sawan bɔɛ mu sɛnɛ sa mɔɛ an na, min sɔɛ donden mu kaka, an pɛn pɛn ta ɛ che a da ma.
55002007	I yii si koe chɛ n ma, n mbe miin fɔ tena, koe min na mu, mansa Chisɔsi ɛ a ma‑a wan, i ni an gbɛɛ ɔ gbɛ.
55002008	I yii ni to Chisɔsi Chasi kɔ, min bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, a yɛ to, a wɛn kɔɔ sɔ‑a a ka saya ɔ. Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, n mbe min kan, a‑a a fɔ ka wan.
55002009	Sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ an fɛ mu n mbe tɔɔ tena ka, n chenɛ ɔ chiienɛ ɛ yɔ sawa yɔn mɔɛ. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a bai chen dɔ ma chii ni.
55002010	Chɛ an‑na a ma, n mbe ko ɔ ko ɔ bia tena mɔɛ chɛ n ko a, Yataa‑a miin ya a ta mɔɛ n na. Yataa 'a bai, an bɛɛ ni ma mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an bɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a, an ni bauncha ma sɔn. An mbe ma‑a wan, an bɛ Yataa a, kuɔ fɔ ko a.
55002011	Tea bai yen ko. Mmɔ ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a, mmɔ sɔn kɔma n bɛɛ, an na‑a fa‑a wan, an bɛ Chasi a, mmɔ bɛ ɛ ma‑a wan to a a banda bu ɔ.
55002012	Ni mmɔ‑a mɔnɛ ɔ bia, mmɔ wɛɛ ɛ ma‑a wan mansa a a mmɔ bɛ. Ni mmɔ ban‑da a ɔ, a wɛɛ ɛ ban‑da wan mmɔ ɔ.
55002013	Ni danaya ee mmɔ ɔ a ko a, ɛ a 'a danaya a tun fan, koe min na mu, a ee che a kan kɔ sɔ‑a a wandi a.
55002014	Chɛ puin i 'a mɔɛ n yii ma, mbɛ i‑a dasi gbau gbau be an ma Yataa chen kɔɔ, i ɔ an ma koɔ kɔnɔ bai kun ma. Chɛ ee den chɛndɛ suun an ye, chɛɛ ɛ chɛ n fan yɔn gbɔkɔɔ, miin mbe an too ma sɔ‑a a ma.
55002015	Butuin chɛ, min mbe a ma, Yataa faa ni chima i a. I ni ma wai chɛ mɔɛ chɛndɛ a, min mbe ee mau, a wandi gba ma, min mbe Yataa 'a bai kan tena teaya buɛ ɔ.
55002016	I ma i too ma sɔ wooya bai chɛ n ma, baa ee miin dɔ Yataa ko a, koe min na mu, chɛ ɛ a ma wan mɔɛ n ni ka Yataa chia ma.
55002017	A bai chɛ n mbe wan yɔ tɛɛ boo kaenɛ, min mbe fui, mbɛ a‑a gboo daun ta‑a. Imenayɔsi mu mɔ dɔndɔ a, an mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, a basan Fidetɔsi a.
55002018	An ka‑a tea chia ma, mbɛ an bun‑da an bɔɛ n bɛɛ ɔ chɛ‑a, danaya ɛ miin dɔ Chisɔsi ko a. An mbe kanɛ chɛ‑a, an dɔ, mɔɛ n ban‑da an kɔɔ sɔ‑a saya ɔ.
55002019	Chɛɛ Yataa‑a fenɛ min kuu si gban, a ɔ ee ma‑a. A sin, bai chɛ, an nyɛnden mu a si a ma, a ɔ, “Mansa Yataa‑a a ɔ sɔn fan mɔɛ miin mbe a ko a,” a sin to, a ɔ, “Miin mbe a fɔ‑a, mbɛ an mbe Mansa Yataa an ko a, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama a.”
55002020	Chen ba a, feanka sɛsɛ ɛ wan nɔ. Sanu pani n mbe wan nɔ, kain pani n mbe nɔ. Kɔn nɛnɛ n bɛɛ mbe nɔ, a basan boo nɛnɛ n na, baa ɛ wan dɔ n ma, baa ee dɔ n sin ma.
55002021	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe a wandi boo a ko‑a ko yama ma a, baa ɛ ma‑a wan a ma Yataa tena. A mu min na, ɛ tenchen a kun ti an ko a, a sin ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ wan a ma. A mɔɛ tana, a ma bɛnden fan mu wai chɛndɛ chɛ koe a.
55002022	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, i boo bɔ kamin tɔngbɔya fɔɛ ɔ, i ni ma mɔ tandenɛ a, danaya ni ma i ɔ Chisɔsi ko a, koadia wɛɛ ni ma i ɔ, a basan faachima a. Chɛ ma, wo bɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, wo bɛ ɛ Chisɔsi chee, miin na faa ɔ gbɛenɛ ɔ.
55002023	I ma i boo chɛ wooya kɔɔsa bia ɔ, yiimatɛ ee min dɔ. I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ chɛ ɛ na koɛ an na.
55002024	Mansa Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ sin ma koɔ yan mɔ a. Chɛɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu a a mɔɛ gbɛɛ tena, kan chɛndɛ chɛ mɔɛ, a sin mbe koe a bia a ma.
55002025	A mu mɔɛ an na, min mbe tima ya, a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n gba yama yian koe a an na, a faa chimaenɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, kɔkɔɛ Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni an kan kɔ sɔ an 'na ko yama a, mbɛ an‑na an ya a mun tea ma.
55002026	Mbɛ an mbe yiimatɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, an ni bɔ gbai chɛ a, an na‑a chɛɛ ka Sitana 'a gbai min na, an ni min 'na sawa kɔɔ.
55003001	Chɛ ni ma i yii ma, mbɛ tee dankama nɛnɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, Chisɔsi e na to na‑a, ko ɔ gbɛaya ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ.
55003002	Koe min na mu, mɔɛ n mbe to‑a an fandi an na dechee, a basan kɔpɔɛ a. An mbe ma‑a dɔdia tɔɛ n fan na, an dɔ pandaenɛ ɛ, an mbe ee baa be mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, an mbe ee an woo mɔɛ n da a kuiɛ ma, an ma wai nyima sɔn, Yataa sɔn bai nu.
55003003	Mɔgbuya ee an dɔ, an faa a kɔɔen ba ɛ. An mbe koe ɔ fɔ kaka, an mbe ee an fandi boo ɔ, nimisa don mɔ wa nu, miin ma to ni fen chɛndɛ a.
55003004	Mɔ bun mɔɛ mu an na, mɔɛ miin mbe ee an yii na chii an mbe ma koe ma‑a, dɔ diaya faenɛ ɛ an gboo a gban. An ma to ni Yataa a, an toen mu dechee dunya ma buɔdia an na.
55003005	An 'na Yataa koe ɛ an da ɔ wan, chɛɛ a ee an faa ɔ. Ka a mɔ bonda chɛ n bai ma.
55003006	An dɔ n mbe ta mɔ n 'na chenɛ n fan na domɛɛ, an mbe ben‑da musu dɔ n yiima ɔ chɛ chɛ‑a, musu miin yiima ɔ dɔɔ. An musu chɛ n sin to, an 'na ko yama maenɛ tagbaenɛ an da ma, an mbe yɔncha ɔ an faa ma koe n boo ɔ.
55003007	An ma bɛnden fan mu tima ɔ tima ko nama kan koe a. Chɛɛ an mbe ee che an ni tea ɔ sɔn.
55003008	Yɔ Chanesi ni buɛ min dɔ, an fea Chambesi a, an ni Mosisi ma bɔ wan, kamin chɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe ka wan tea ma bɔ‑a. Mɔɛ n fan nɛ miin yiima ɔ chɛ chɛenɛ ɛ, an sin 'na danaya ban‑da an dɔ Chisɔsi ko a.
55003009	Chɛɛ an mbe ee ta‑a ya ɔ ma, koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ an 'na wooya ɔ yen‑da wan, yɔ mɔ fea chɛ n na‑a ma buɛ min dɔ.
55003010	Chɛɛ i tana gbɛ, i ban‑da n 'na kan chɛ buɛ ma mɛn‑da, ni n sɔnɛ, n yii ma koe fɔɛ ɔ, n 'na danaya Chisɔsi a, n 'na faabiaya, koadia n dɔ, a basan n 'na ko ɔ bia a.
55003011	I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, an‑na ko yawaenɛ min si n na, ni tɔɔya gbɛɛ n‑na miin dɔ bia. I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, fen ko si‑a n na kɛn n ni Andiɔki duu ɔ, ni Ikoniɔn duu ɔ, a basan Diisa duu ɔ a, n tɔɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ duu chɛ n dɔ. Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi‑a n kun bɔ wan an gbɛɛ ɔ.
55003012	Tea ko a, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a wandi be Yataa chia ma, ni an ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi a, ɛ ko yawaenɛ ɔ yen fan.
55003013	A sin, mɔ yama nu, ni kankancha tɔɛ nu, an kun ma ɛ chɛ‑a wan tun tun. An mbe mɔɛ n na bea‑a wan, a sin mbe ma‑a an fandi wɛɛ a da bea an na.
55003014	Chɛɛ i tana, a a tun dan koe a tea chɛ n na, nn‑na i kan miin na, an bia i boo fea a. I‑a a ɔ sɔn fan mɔɛ miin nyɔn sima an na i kan.
55003015	A sin, a ni ma i yii ma, mbɛ i‑a bai chɛ kan fan a ka i den mɛsɛ tɔɛ ma, bai chɛ min mbe Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. Chɛ ɛ kun fan a ni yiima be i ma, min mbe che i sɔ‑a chia ma bauncha ma sɔn koe a, min mbe ka danaya ɔ Chisɔsi Chasi a.
55003016	Bai ɔ bai min mbe Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, Yataa da a bai mu. Chɛ an fɛ mu, bai chɛ n kan kɔ kan, an mbe mmɔ kan fan ko sɛsɛ ma. A sin nyin fan mmɔ kan koe a tea ma, mmɔ ni mmɔ sɔn yama yen, mbɛ mmɔ sɔ‑a chia chɛndɛ ma, mmɔ ni a ɔ sɔn mmɔ ɛ tan buɛ min dɔ fɔɛ ɔ.
55003017	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, Yataa 'a mɔɛ ma bɛndenɛ ni ma chɛndɛ chɛ, a kandenɛ ɛ wai chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan chɛ koe a.
55004001	Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ ma‑a tima min na a 'a mansaya ɔ, ɛ mɔɛ gbɛɛ gbɛmbo‑a wan, fuɛ n bɛ chɛndɛ ba n na. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa an fea Chasi a, an mbe mɔ yen tena wan. N mbe na tena chɛ an ma din‑da i tena gbau gbau.
55004002	Sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, tee kɔɔ sona kɔɔ, i ma bɛn a ɔ yian koe a. Mɔɛ n yiima mun, an‑na ko yama fɔ an ye, mbɛ i‑a an faa ma nande, e ta‑a i faa bia‑a an na, ni i ma‑a an kan‑da.
55004003	Koe min na mu, tima ɛ che tena wan, mɔɛ n mbe ee an too ma sɔ‑a kan chɛ buɛ chɛndɛ ma. Chɛɛ an mbe bea‑a an fandi faa ma koe an fɛ, mbɛ an‑na kan chɛ mɔ sɛsɛ a sɔn sɔn an 'na tindanɛ, an too faa ma koe ɔ yian koe an na.
55004004	An mbe ban‑da wan an too ma sɔ koe a tea ma, mbɛ an‑na an too be tai n ma.
55004005	Chɛɛ i tana, sɔ chidi. Ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia, i ni i sɔɛ gbɛɛ chɛ Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. I 'a wai gbɛɛ chɛ, Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ ɛ min chɛ.
55004006	N tana, n mbe ka gbɛ chia an ma. Tima che‑a gbɛ Yataa boo ɔ n ya koe a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ.
55004007	N‑na butuin chɛndɛ chɛ chɛ, n che‑a a danka a. N sin ma ka ni n 'na danaya gbee a.
55004008	A ka gbɛ sanche ma, boo ɔ gbasi woo ɛ n ma kɔn tena banda bu ɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi boo ɔ, a wɛn tanden mu kaa a tɛ ɔ. Ɛ a be‑a wan n ma a tee chɛ ma. A sin mbe ee ma‑a n dɔndɔ gbe an na, chɛɛ chɛ n bɛɛ miin ya ɛ chia a, a na tima ma kɔnɛ a.
55004009	A ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, i ni na n tan sanche.
55004010	Demasi tana, a ka‑a n fɛ dunya chɛ ko a, a ta‑a Tɛsadonika duu ɔ. Kesensi ta‑a Kadesia chɛnyɛ ɔ, mbɛ Taitɔsi sin ta‑a Damatia chɛnyɛ ɔ.
55004011	Duku dɔndɔ gbe an mbe nɛ n tena. Ni i ma‑a na‑a, wo fea ni na Maki a, a mu min na, ɛ n deman‑da wan n 'na wai a.
55004012	Tikikɔsi sin, n mbe ka gbɛ a na‑a na nɔ Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ.
55004013	Ni i ma‑a na‑a, na n 'na doma kai chɛ a, n‑na min to Kapɔsi boo ɔ Towasi duu ɔ. Na n 'na gboo chɛ n bɛɛ a, a bɛbɛɛ miin nyandenɛ ɛ ka soe gboo ma.
55004014	Adɛsanda, tonkan ti chɛ, a‑a ko yama wa an ma n na. A sin, Mansa Yataa ɛ a pawa‑a wan a chɛ chɛ wai chɛ ko a.
55004015	I kun ma fɛn a boo ɔ, a mu min na, a ni chɛɛ ma nyɔn ba an na, mmɔ 'a sakana bai ko a.
55004016	N sɔ saa a kuti ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan ma a ya a bɔ ni nɔ n ko a. Yataa ni a boo bɔ an sɔn chɛ ɔ.
55004017	Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi sɔ‑a wan n kɔ gban, a‑a a ma n che‑a a 'a sakana bai fɔ‑a chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mɔɛ miin ma Chu mɔ a, an gbɛɛ‑a a a min. A sin to, a‑a n kun ka wan.
55004018	Ɛ n kun bɔ‑a wan ko yama kan kɔ kan dɔ, mbɛ a‑a n baun, a ta‑a n na a 'a banda bu ɔ mansaya ɔ. Tando ni ma a tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ. A ni ma ka.
55004019	N mbe Akuida kɔndɔn tena, an fea Pisida a, a basan Wɔnesifɔyɔsi 'a chen na mɔɛ n na.
55004020	Ɛyasitɔsi to‑a Kɔyindi duu ɔ wan, mbɛ n‑na Tɔfimɔsi sin to Midetɔsi duu ɔ, a gbandienɛ ni a tima chɛ a.
55004021	A ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, i ni na chima na tima ya ɔ. Chɛ n gbɛɛ an‑na i kɔndɔn, Yubusi ni ma, ni Pudensi, ni Dinɔsi, ni bɔɔɛ Kaudia, a basan mɔ suun ma nyɔɛ tɔɛ n na.
55004022	Mansa Chisɔsi ni tachɛ i a. A 'a dua ni ma wo ma.
56001001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da i tena, i wan Taitɔsi. N 'na denɛ mu gbɛ i a, danaya dɔndɔɛ ɔ Chisɔsi ko a. Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ mu n na, ni Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ to. A‑a n sɔ, min mbe a ma, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ ka mɔɛ miin ma dan koe a a a, n ni a ma, an ni a 'a tea sakana bai a min. Mbɛ n‑na an sɔ chia chɛndɛ ma, ma koe a Yataa fɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ an yii na tɛenɛ ɛ ma‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma, Yataa min mbe ee fania fɔ, a‑a tooɔdia chɛ min na, a e na to dunya a dan‑da. Mmɔ baun mɔɛ Yataa‑a sakana bai chɛ ɔ yian fan, tima chɛndɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a n sɔ a ɔ yian koe a mɔɛ n na. Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Chisɔsi Chasi a, mmɔ baun mɔɛ, an ni i dua, an ni faachima be i ma.
56001005	Chɛ an‑na a ma, n‑na i to Keti yii tinɛ ɔ duu n dɔ, min mbe a ma, i ni koe n dɔ bɛn. A yɛ to, i ni chɔchi gbakoo n yian duu kan kɔ kan dɔ, yɔ n‑na a fɔ buɛ min dɔ i ye.
56001006	A sin ma bɔ ee ma a ma, musu dɔndɔ gbe an mbe ma a boo ɔ. A 'a denɛ n kai faenɛ ɛ Chisɔsi a. An mbe a kuiɛ ma, an mbe ee wooya koɛ yan.
56001007	Chɔchi ya ɔ sɔɛ sin, min mbe Yataa 'a wai kun ma, mabɔ ee ma a ma, dɔpanda tɔ ma a a, a faa ma gbandi, a sin mbe ee gbɛ wa min. Kɔpɔɛ wakoe ee koa a faa ɔ, a sin mbe ee ma gbun na bea mɔ a.
56001008	Chɛɛ mɔɛ min ya kɔɔɛ di sonda n tena, ko chɛndɛ ko a di min ye. Mɔɛ min mbe yiinatɛ bɔ a tachɛ buɛ a, a tanden mu, baa ɛ a boo ɔ Yataa ko a, a sin kosan a wandi bia‑a.
56001009	Ɛ ma mɔɛ an na, min danden mu tea sakana bai chɛ a, an‑na a kan min na. Chɛ an mbe a ma, a ni che kan chɛndɛ chɛ a, a ni chɛ n na ten, miin mbe kɔɔsa bia chɛ tena.
56001010	Koe min na mu, mɔɛ n mbe nɔ kaka, miin mbe an kaa sa tena kan chɛndɛ chɛ a, fia faenɛ an da ɔ ben‑da an bɔɛ n bun koe a. A bɛbɛɛ gbu chɛ nu, miin ni a fɔ, an dɔ, mɔ ee bauncha ma sɔn, ni i a ma kamincha ni.
56001011	An da a ni tɔn, koe min na mu, an mbe chenɛ n dɔ chɛ chɛ tena wan, an mbe an ka‑a tea chia ma, an 'na kan yama chɛ chɛ a. Chɛ gbɛɛ sin kaen mu mau bandaya kɔpɔ yan chɛ an ma.
56001012	An bɔɛ dɔndɔ gbu, an fandi gbu ta ko sɔn mɔɛ, a‑a a fɔ wan, mbɛ Keti mɔɛ n mu tima ɔ tima fania fɔ mɔ wa an fan na, an gboo ɔ faen mu, an sin bɛnchɛ. A yɛ to, koe a fasan mɔ wa mu an na, kan baiya tɔ wa nu.
56001013	A‑a tea bai an fɔ ka. Chɛ an fɛ mu, an tɛn dɔ tɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, an na ni ten Chisian danaya ɔ.
56001014	Mbɛ an sɛmbɛ‑a an too ma sɔ koe a Chu n 'na tai chɛ n ma, ni bai chɛ n ma, mɔɛ miin‑na an kan kɔ sɔ tea a, an mbe min fɔ‑a a ma koe a.
56001015	Mɔ ɔ mɔ tena min yiima a koen mu, fen kɔ fen nyin fan. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min yiima a ma ko ni, danaya ee mɔɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi ko a, fen kɔ fen ma nyin. Koe min na mu, a yiima ɔ chɛen fan mu, a basan a 'a yiinachii a.
56001016	An‑na Yataa sɔnɛ ɛ an da ɔ wan, chɛɛ a ee an sɔnɛ ɔ. An ma nyin, an mbe ee Yataa 'a sawa ya, an sin ma nyin fen kɔ fen ko a.
56002001	Chɛɛ i tana, i wan Taitɔsi, e kanɛ min chɛ, a ni ma kan chɛndɛ an na.
56002002	A fɔ mɔ kaima ma taenɛ n ye, an ma gbɛ wa min, an ni ma basɔmaya tɔɛ n na, yiimatɛ tɔɛ nu, danaya ɛ miin dɔ Chisɔsi ko a chɛndɛ chɛ, a basan koadia a, ni faabia.
56002003	A fɔ musu ma taenɛ n bɛɛ ye, an ni baa be Yataa ma an sɔnɛ n dɔ. An ma ma yɔnɛ a gbɛ ko a, an ma tɔ ɔ tɛ yama chɛ. An mbe kanɛ min chɛ, a ni ma kan chɛndɛ a.
56002004	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni sunkun tɔngbɔɛ n kan to koe a an chɛɛ n na, a basan an 'na denɛ n na.
56002005	A yɛ to, an yiima ni tɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, an sɔnɛ a koenɛ ni ma, an ni ma musu chɛndɛ a chenɛ a, miin kooenɛ an chɛɛ n ye. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee bai yama sa a si Yataa 'a sakana bai ma.
56002006	A fɔ kamin tɔngbɔɛ n bɛɛ ma, an ni tachɛ yiimatɛ a.
56002007	A ɔ yian chia ɔ chia a, ko chɛndɛ ma ɔ, mbɛ mɔ chɛndɛ mu i a. A sin, ni i ma‑a kanɛ chɛ a, a yian mbɛ mɔ tandenɛ mu i a, basɔmaya ni ma i a kan chɛ ma.
56002008	I da a bai tandenɛ ni ma, mabɔ ee ma min ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ni mau, bai yama ee ma‑a an da ɔ a fɔ koe a a si mmɔ ma.
56002009	A fɔ yɔnɛ n ye, an ni kooya be an ti n ma, an ni wai ma kawaenɛ chɛ an ko a tima ɔ tima, an sin ma an kuiɛ ɔ kai an ma.
56002010	An gbu sin ma kanka chɛ ɛnden bɛɛ a. Chɛɛ an ni an 'na danaya gbɛɛ yian. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan chia ɔ chia a, mbɛ mmɔ baun mɔɛ Yataa 'a kanɛ nyin.
56002011	Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ yian, min mbe a ma, mɔ gbu gbɛɛ ni bauncha ma sɔn.
56002012	A sin mbe mmɔ kan tena, mmɔ ni mmɔ boo bɔ Yataa sɔn baiya ɔ, a basan dunya ma buɔdia a. A yɛ to, mmɔ ni mmɔ wandi bia chɛndɛ, mmɔ tandenɛ ni ma, mmɔ ni ma Yataa sɔn mɔɛ a dunya chɛ ɔ.
56002013	Mmɔ ya ɛ ta‑a ma‑a tee duaen chɛ ya ɔ, mmɔ 'a Yataa wa Chisɔsi Chasi, mmɔ kun ka mɔɛ, ɛ na‑a manɛ ɔ tee min ma.
56002014	A wɛn‑na a wandi be mmɔ ko a, mmɔ bɔ koe a ko yama n dɔ, mmɔ ni ma mɔ ma koenɛ n na. Mmɔ ni ma a ta mɔɛ n na tenchen, mmɔ ma bɛndenɛ ni ma ko chɛndɛ ma koe a.
56002015	Yataa 'a gbasaya ɛ i boo ɔ gbɛ, i ni koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, i ni dasi be, i ni an 'na ko yama fɔ an ye. I ma a ma mɔ ɔ mɔ ni baa bɔ i ma.
56003001	A fɔ to an ye an ni don mansa n kɔɔ, a basan ya ɔ sɔɛ n na, an ni kooya be an ma, an ni an ma bɛn ko chɛndɛ ma koe a chia ɔ chia a.
56003002	An ma bai yama sa mɔ ɔ mɔ ma, an ni an boo bɔ koɛ ɔ, an ni ma mɔ ma chimaenɛ n na, miin mbe basɔmaya be mɔ ɔ mɔ ma.
56003003	Mmɔ wandi wɛɛ, tima dɔ a mmɔ wooen ni, mmɔ nii kooya be, mɔɛ n na‑a mmɔ sɔ wan chia yama ma. Mmɔ ni yɔnɛ n fan na, mmɔ faa ma koe n dɔ, a basan dunya ma koe n na. Mmɔ na‑a tima gbɛɛ ya fɔɛ ɔ toomaya an dɔ, mɔɛ n tooenɛ ɛ mmɔ a, mmɔ wɛɛ tooenɛ ɛ mmɔ nyɔn na.
56003004	Chɛɛ mmɔ baun mɔɛ Yataa, a‑a ko chɛndɛ ma mmɔ a, a‑a koadia yian mmɔ a.
56003005	A‑a mmɔ baun. Chɛ ma bɔ ni mmɔ sɔn chɛndɛ an dɔ, mmɔ 'a teaya ɔ ma. Chɛɛ a 'a chinchimaya ko a, a‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko, a‑a fɔɛ nama be mmɔ ma, a Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ.
56003006	Yataa‑a a ma, mmɔ‑a a Nyina ma sɔn gbama gbama a, Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ, mmɔ baun mɔɛ.
56003007	Yataa‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, a ni mmɔ sɔ chia ma kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn koe a. Koe min na mu, a 'a koadia demanɛ ɔ, a‑a mmɔ ya mmɔ tandenɛ n na a tena.
56003008	Tea bai an nɛ, n mbe ka min fɔ tena. N toen mu i ni koe chɛ n ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, min mbe a ma, mɔɛ miin kai faen mu Yataa a, an ni tachɛ gbee chɛ a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an ni ko chɛndɛ ma bia an boo fea a, min nyin. A sin, tɔnɔnɛ ɛ wan a ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ko a.
56003009	Chɛɛ wooya kɔɔsa bia, ni suun ma danɛ, ni ko a fasanɛ, a basan koɛ a Mosisi 'a sawa kun ma, i ma i boo chɛ a ɔ.
56003010	Mɔɛ chɛ tana, min mbe mɔɛ n na fasan tena, a‑a si gba fea gbe. Ni a ma sɛmbɛ ni, i boo bɔ a ma koe ɔ.
56003011	Koe min na mu, i‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mɔ bonda chɛ ma tan ni, a sin na ko yama maenɛ an mbe a ma konan tena Yataa tena.
56003012	Atɛmisi an fea Tikikɔsi a, ni n‑na an dɔndɔ sɔ i tena, a ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, i ni n tan pan Nikɔpɔdisi duu ɔ. Koe min na mu, n ma bɛndenɛ mu gbɛ chima tima chɛ bia koe a nɔ.
56003013	A ma i ma gbɔsɔɛ a, i ni Senasi deman, dɔya chɛ, an fea Apɔdɔsi a, an 'na tachɛ ɔ. An mbe ta fen kɔ fen na tachɛ chɛ ɔ, a be an ma.
56003014	A yɛ to, mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n ni an mayan ko chɛndɛ ma bia koe a an boo fea a, min mbe a ma, an ni che an fandi deman‑da ko gbɛa tima a, an ma na ma tataya tɔɛ n na.
56003015	N mbe nɛ nn bɛ miin gbɛɛ a, an ni i kɔndɔn. Mmɔ koadia nyɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ kɔndɔn nɔ, mmɔ bɛ ɛ miin na gbee dɔndɔɛ a danaya ɔ Chisɔsi ko a. Yataa ni wo gbɛɛ dua.
57001001	N fan Pɔɔ, n fɛn mbe nɛ pimbi chenɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena i tena, i wan Fidemɔn. Nn mbe a nyɛn tena, nn fea Timoti an na, mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ. Fidemɔn, nn wai chɛ nyɔɛ mu i a, i sin ko a di nn ye.
57001002	Nn mbe a nyɛn tena to, mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ musuma, Afia wɛɛ, a tena, ni Akipɔsi, mmɔ bɔɛ soya mɔɛ Chasi 'a wai ɔ, a basan chɔchi tɔɛ gbɛɛ a, miin mbe bɛn nɔ i 'a chenɛ a.
57001003	Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, an ni wo dua, an ni faachima be wo ma.
57001004	N mbe Yataa wai bɔ wan tima ɔ tima, ni n‑na samunɛ chɛ i ko a, i wan Fidemɔn.
57001005	Koe min na mu, n‑na i 'a koadia ma tɔɛ a min, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a. A yɛ to, i kai faen mu buɛ min dɔ Mansa Chisɔsi a.
57001006	Kuiɛ dɔndɔya chɛ wo e min dɔ, wo bɛ chɛ n na, miin kai faen mu Yataa a, n mbe samunɛ chɛ tena a ni ta ya ɔ ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a fen chɛndɛ min gbɛɛ be mmɔ ma Chasi ɔ, i‑a a ɔ sɔn fan.
57001007	I 'a suun ma nyɔncha koadia, a mu buɔdia a n tena, a‑a n faa chima wan. Koe min na mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ, i‑a buɔdia be wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma.
57001008	Chɛ ko a, Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, n mbe kun fan, n ni i chɛ koe chɛndɛ din i ma, a chɛ koe a.
57001009	Chɛɛ i 'a koadia n faa ɔ, a‑a a ma, n mbe i disa tena wan gbɛ. N fan Pɔɔ, n mbe chɛ ma tena wan, chenan kai mu wɛɛ n na, a sin, n mbe to sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a Chisɔsi Chasi ko a.
57001010	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe disa chɛ tena Wɔnesimɔsi an ko a. N 'na denɛ mu gbɛ a a Chasi ɔ. Koe min na mu, a‑a a kai fa Chasi a, n boo kɔɔ nɛ pimbi chenɛ a.
57001011	A kɔma a, mɔ a tenden nii ma a a i tena. Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, a ma gbɔsɔɛ ɛ wan mɔ fea gbɛɛ ma.
57001012	N mbe a ma tena wɛɛ gbɛ, a ni yɛ i tena, chɛɛ a 'a koadia koa‑a n faa ma kaka.
57001013	A ni wan n yii ma, n ni a bia nɛ ma koe a n baima, min mbe a ma, a ni basan n ma i gba ɔ, tima min na wɛ n mbe pimbi chenɛ a sakana bai chɛndɛ ko a.
57001014	Chɛɛ n ma to ni, n ni n deman koe din i ma. N mbe to‑a wan a a, i ni a chɛ i wandi faa ma a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe ee ko ɔ ko ma tena, ni i ma dɔn ni min ma.
57001015	Dɔndɔ kɔkɔɛ wo tɛ na‑a du Wɔnesimɔsi a, tima kundu ɛnden fan ko a, min mbe a ma, a ni yɛ wo fea ni ma a a, tima ɔ tima ko a.
57001016	Sanche gbɛ, yɔn dechee ma a a, chɛɛ a benden mu yɔnɛ ma kaka. A mu gbɛ mɔ faa ma suun ma nyɔɛ an na. N toen mu a a kaka, chɛɛ i sin mbe to‑a wan a a, a ben n ma. I 'a yɔnɛ mu a a, a yɛ to, i suun ma nyɔɛ mu a a Mansa Chisɔsi ɔ.
57001017	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ni i‑a n ya wan i bɔ wai chɛ mɔɛ a, i boo a si Wɔnesimɔsi kɔɔ, yɔ n fan Pɔɔ an nɛ.
57001018	Ni a na‑a ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan yɔn fan i ma, ni i 'a kuiɛ kan kɔ kan mbe a ma, n mbe a be‑a wan.
57001019	N fan Pɔɔ, n fandi gbu boo gba an nɛ. N fan mbe a be tena, n‑na a ɔ sɔn bɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, mbɛ n fan ta mu i wandi gbu a.
57001020	I dimu, suunɛ, koe chɛ chɛ n ye, Mansa Chisɔsi ko a, buɔdia be n ma Chasi ɔ.
57001021	N danden fan mu a a chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ ni n‑na chɛ nyɛn, e ee n da a kuiɛ a bea duu ma. A sin gbu, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ e ben‑da wan chɛ ma, n‑na min fɔ.
57001022	Ko dɔndɔ to, n yia chenɛ ɔ bɛn. Koe min na mu, ɛ n 'na yiinachii ɔ, mbɛ wo 'a samunɛ a ɛ min‑da wan, n ni bɔ nɛ, n ni na wo tan.
57001023	Nn fea mu nɛ Ɛpafasi a, pimbi chenɛ a, Chisɔsi Chasi ko a. A ni i kɔndɔn.
57001024	Chɛ n bɛɛ, n bɔɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ Maki, ni Ayisitakɔsi, ni Demasi, a basan Duku a, an mbe i kɔndɔn tena.
57001025	Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ni wo dua.
58001001	Suun, tima sɛsɛ ko a, Yataa na‑a koɔ wan mmɔ bemba n ta bemba n tena, chia sɛsɛ a. A sin, a ni chɛ ma, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ sɛsɛ n fan dɔ.
58001002	Chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ ka tee dankama nɛnɛ chɛ miin kɔɔ, dunya e na to ban‑da, a koɔ‑a gbɛ mmɔ tena a 'a denɛ an dɔ. A‑a an yian, ma koe a fen kɔ fen kun ma dunya ɔ. A sin gbu ni dunya gbɛɛ a dan tena tima min na, a na‑a a ma a 'a den chɛ an na gbasaya ɔ.
58001003	An den chɛ sin, Yataa 'a kamaya ɛ yen fan a ɔ. Yataa ɛ buɛ min dɔ dechee, a wɛɛ ɛ ka wan. A da a bai gbasayaen mu, min mbe a ma tena dunya kunɛ a biaenɛ ɛ kaina dɔndɔɛ. A ban‑da kɛn mmɔ ma ko‑a, a bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, a si‑a kaina ma bɛndenɛ Mansa Yataa boo nyima ɔ, pan banda bu ɔ.
58001004	Yataa 'a denɛ benden mu maeka n ma, yɔ a tɔɛ gbu wɛɛ, Yataa‑a min si a kun ma, a benden mu buɛ min dɔ maeka n ta ma kaka.
58001005	Koe min na mu, Yataa na‑a min fɔ a 'a denɛ ye, a nii ma a nyɔn fɔ ni maeka kan kɔ kan ye. A‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ mu i a. N ma‑a i fa a bi.” Chɛɛ a nii ma a fɔ ni a 'a gboo ɔ, maeka kan kɔ kan ma, a ɔ, “N mbe ma‑a wan i fa a, mbɛ i wɛɛ ma‑a n 'na denɛ a.”
58001006	A yɛ to, Yataa e na to a 'a denɛ saa chɛ a na‑a dunya ɔ, a na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N fan Yataa, n 'na maeka n gbɛɛ, an ni basɔmaya be n 'na den chɛ ma.”
58001007	Min sien mu a 'a maeka n ma, Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N mbe n 'na maeka n ma wan yɔ fia, n 'na bɔi den chɛ nu, n ni an ma yɔ ta manɛ nu.”
58001008	Chɛɛ a 'a denɛ wakoe tana, Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Yataa mu i a, i 'a mansaya danka ee ma‑a, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A sin, e gbasaya a tachɛ‑a wan i 'a mɔɛ n kun ma, teaya ɔ.
58001009	I toen mu tea an na, i ma to ni sawa yɔnɛ a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n fan Yataa, i 'a Yataa, n‑na n boo sɔ i ma, ma koe a basɔmaya ɔ, min mu buɔdia a i tena, a ben i bɔɛ n ma.”
58001010	Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan to a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “I wan, Mansa Chisɔsi, i wandi gbu an‑na duu gboo chɛ a dan a saa a. Banda gbu wɛɛ, i wan‑na a wɛɛ a dan.
58001011	Tima sin mbe che‑a wan, an gbɛɛ ni kasaa, chɛɛ i tana e ma‑a wan nɔ, kuɔ fɔ ko a. An gbɛɛ, an mbe chenancha‑a wan, yɔ doma kai wa ɛ taa‑a buɛ min dɔ.
58001012	E an dɔ kandu‑a wan, yɔ doma. A sin, an mbe mun‑da wan, yɔ chii koa ɛ mun buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ i tana ee ka i gba ɔ, a sin, e ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
58001013	Chɛɛ maeka ee nɔ, Yataa‑a chɛ fɔ min ye, yɔ a‑a min fɔ a 'a denɛ ye a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Si nɛ n boo nyima ɔ, aan n ni i chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n don i kɔɔ, n ni an popoya i ya kɔɔ.”
58001014	Chɛɛ maeka chɛ n tana, Yataa‑a an sɔ, an ni na wai chɛ a ko a dunya ɔ. An ni basan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mbe na‑a bauncha ma sɔn‑da.
58002001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ‑a tea bai chɛ min na min, mmɔ a bia mmɔ boo fea a, mmɔ ma na ka an chia chɛ ma.
58002002	Koe min na mu, Yataa na‑a sawa min na ben suun maeka n na, mɔɛ n na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ tea mu. A sin, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a a yɔn, chɛ ma, a ni ko yama ma, a ni tɔɔya an dɔ bia.
58002003	Chɛ mu ka buɛ min dɔ tea a, mmɔ ee kun mmɔ kunɛ ni bɔ tɔɔya ɔ, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ too ka bauncha wa chɛ ma, Yataa na‑a min chɛ mmɔ a. Mansa Chisɔsi wandi gbu, an na‑a a ɔ yian, Yataa na‑a mmɔ baun chia min na. Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin na‑a a da a kuiɛ chɛ a min, an na‑a toa si wan a kɔɔ mmɔ tena.
58002004	Yataa wandi wɛɛ, a na‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ tea mu sakana bai chɛ a. A na‑a chɛ ma kamaya koe sɛsɛ n fan dɔ. A yɛ to, a ni a ma wan to, a Nyina ni mɔɛ n dua chia sɛsɛ n na. Ni Yataa wandi toen ni chɛ ni ma, tima ɔ tima ko a, a ni ma wan.
58002005	Koe min na mu, dunya chɛ min mbe ya ɔ ma, Yataa nii ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ maeka n fan mbe a kun ma. A sin, nn mbe ka koɔ tena, a si an dunya chɛ an ma.
58002006	Yataa 'a gboo kaka dɔndɔ ɔ, a ɛ ka wan, a ɔ, “Mansa Yataa, mɔ gbu ma fen kɔ fen na. Fen mu i‑a i yii na chii a a? Fen mu i gbɔsɔen mu a ko a?
58002007	I na‑a a ma wan, i‑a a don maeka n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ, tima ɛnden ko a dechee. Chɛɛ i yɛ‑a wan, i‑a a ma mansa a, tando ɛ min ma, a basan basɔmaya a.
58002008	A sin, i‑a gbasaya be wan a ma, fen kɔ fen kun ma dunya ɔ.” Yataa‑a gbasaya sin be kɛn a ma, fen kɔ fen kun ma, Yataa wɛɛ‑a fen kɔ fen don fan a 'a gbasaya kɔɔ. Chɛɛ koe n mbe buɛ min dɔ, mmɔ ma a ɔ yen nin bɛ, fen kɔ fen dondenɛ ni ma a kɔɔ.
58002009	Chɛɛ mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan Chisɔsi ɛ gbɛ buɛ min dɔ. Tima ɛnden ko a, Yataa na‑a a don fan maeka n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ. A na‑a a ma wan mansa a, tando ɛ min ma, a basan basɔmaya a. Chɛ ma‑a, a mu min na, a na‑a tɔɔ wan saya ɔ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ ni a ma, a ni saya ɔ yen mɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a.
58002010	Yataa an na‑a fen kɔ fen na dan, a sin fan mbe fɔɛ be fen kɔ fen ma. A na‑a a ma wan, mɔ sɛsɛ ma‑a a 'a denɛ n na, mbɛ an don‑da a waa banda bu ɔ. A ni chɛ ma tena tima min na, a na‑a a yii na chii wan, mbɛ a nyin Chisɔsi ni ma mɔɛ n baun mɔɛ chɛndɛ a. Chɛ ni bɔ tɔɔya chɛ ɔ, a wan Chisɔsi ni na tena min dɔ bia‑a. A wan mbe chia a ka‑a, mɔ gbu n gbɛɛ ni bauncha ma sɔn.
58002011	Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi ni ma, ni mɔɛ chɛ nu, a 'a gbasaya ɛ a ma, miin mbe ma tenchen Yataa ko a, an fa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chisɔsi ee mau an chee koe a, a suun ma nyɔɛ n na.
58002012	A ɛ a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Yataa, n mbe i tɔɛ bai‑a wan n suun ma nyɔɛ n tena. I 'a mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, n mbe i tando‑a wan.”
58002013	A yɛ to, Chisɔsi ɔ, “N mbe n kai fa‑a wan Yataa a.” A sin to, a ɔ, “N yen ko nɛ, nn bɛ a 'a denɛ n na, Yataa‑a miin be n ma.”
58002014	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, den chɛ nu, mɔ gbu gbama gbama mu an na. An fɛ mu, a wandi wɛɛ, a na‑a ma wan to mɔ gbu a, min mbe a ma, a ni fa. A 'a saya chɛ sin mbe a ma‑a wan, a ni Sitana kasaa, gbasaya ɛ ka min boo ɔ saya ko a.
58002015	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin ni yɔncha ɔ, an 'na fɔɛ gbɛɛ ko a, saya ma chianɛ fɛ, a‑a an kun bɔ a ɔ.
58002016	Koe min na mu, tea gbu ko a, a gbɔsɔen mu chɛ n fan ko a, miin mu Ebeami cheeya n na. A ma a gbɔsɔ ni maeka n fan ko a.
58002017	Chɛ an na‑a a ma, a na‑a ma wan mɔ gbu a, chia ɔ chia a, yɔ Yataa‑a a suun ma nyɔɛ n na dan buɛ min dɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, a ni chinchincha yian. A yɛ to, a ni ma tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, min danayaen mu Yataa 'a wai ɔ. A ni a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n dɔ.
58002018	Koe min na mu, a wandi gbu wɛɛ, Sitana na‑a a yiima yan fan, ko yama ma koe a. A sin, a tɔɔya‑a wan. Chɛ ko a, ɛ che wan, a ni mɔɛ n deman, Sitana ɛ miin yiima yan‑da, ko yama ma koe a.
58003001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, nn suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wɛn mbe tenchen Yataa ko a, a sin na‑a wo wɛɛ chee wan, wo wo yii na chii wɛ Chisɔsi chɛ a. Mmɔ ɛ a fɔ wan, mbɛ Yataa 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu a a, a sin, tɛ mɔ wa mu a a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a.
58003002	A danayaen fan ni Yataa tena, min‑na a yian wai chɛ koe a. A ni wan dechee yɔ Mosisi danayaen ni buɛ min dɔ, wai chɛ koe a, Yataa 'a chenɛ a.
58003003	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi ta basɔmaya, a benden mu Mosisi ta ma. Ɛ ka wan dechee yɔ chen sɔ mɔɛ wɛɛ, baa koo a ma, a ni ben chenɛ wandi ma.
58003004	Koe min na mu, chenɛ kan kɔ kan, mɔɛ an mbe a sɔ. Chɛɛ fen kɔ fen dunya ma, a nyan mɔɛ mu Yataa an na.
58003005	Mosisi ni bɔi denɛ an na, min danayaen ni Yataa 'a chenɛ a. A ni koɔ wan mɔɛ n tena, a si koe n ma, Yataa ni na tena miin fɔ‑a.
58003006	Chɛɛ Chasi tana, Yataa 'a denɛ mu a a, a danayaen mu, a sin mbe Yataa 'a chenɛ an kun ma. A sin, mmɔ wan mu Yataa 'a chenɛ a, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ faa sɔ, mmɔ ni dan a a, mmɔ yii a ni tɛ a ma.
58003007	Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa Nyina ɛ a fɔ wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ a min bi,
58003008	wo ma wo faa sɔ, yɔ wo bemba n ta bemba nu, an na‑a sɔ buɛ min dɔ n na, tima min na an na‑a n dɔ siman fuinɛ ma.
58003009	An na‑a sɔ wan n na kan, an‑na n dɔ siman. A sin, san bi naanin ko a, an na‑a n chɛ chɛ wai yen fan.
58003010	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n faa na‑a tɛ wan an mɔɛ chɛ n nɛnɛ ma, mbɛ n‑na a fɔ, n dɔ, ‘An faa ma nyin tima ɔ tima ko a. A sin, an mbe ee dɔn, an ni bea n fɛ.’
58003011	An faa tɛ chɛ sin ko a, n‑na n kai, n dɔ, ‘Kuɔ fɔ ko a, an mbe ee don‑da suin tena chɛ, n‑na min dɔ bɛn.’ ”
58003012	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo kun ma fɛn, wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ, ko yama ma faa ma na dɛ wo ɔ. A ni a ma, wo ee dan Yataa a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ Yataa a, min mbe ee fa.
58003013	Chɛɛ wo wo nyɔn faa ma nande, tee ɔ tee ko a. Wo chɛ ma bi, tima min na wɛ Yataa ma sɛmbɛ ni deman koe a wo ma. Chɛ ni a ma, ko yama ma na chenɛ sɔ wo kɔɔ, a ni wo bun, wo ni too ɔ gbɛa bɔ Yataa a.
58003014	Koe min na mu, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ bɛ Chasi a, mmɔ ɛ ko dɔndɔɛ an dɔ. Ɛ ma‑a ka wan, ni mmɔ‑a danaya saa chɛ bia gban, aan mmɔ 'a fɔɛ danka a.
58003015	Yataa 'a gboo sin mbe a fɔ tena ka wan, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ a min bi, wo ma wo faa sɔ, yɔ wo bemba n ta bemba nu, an sɔ‑a tima min na Yataa a.”
58003016	Nyɔn ni mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin na‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ chɛ a min, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an na‑a an kun si wan Yataa a? An ni mɔɛ chɛ n fan na, Mosisi na‑a sɔ miin ya ɔ, a bɔ Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ.
58003017	A sin, Yataa faa na‑a tɛ nyɔn ma, san bi naanin ko a? Mɔɛ chɛ nu ni, miin na‑a ko yama ma, a sin, an na‑a bea wan an fuinɛ ma, an fa‑a.
58003018	A sin, Yataa nii ma a kai ni mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ tena, mbɛ kuɔ fɔ ko a, an mbe ee don‑da suin tena chɛ, a‑a min dɔ bɛn. Chɛɛ a na‑a a fɔ chɛ n fan ye, miin nii ma an too ma sɔ ni a ma.
58003019	Mbɛ mmɔ ban‑da gbɛ a ɔ yen‑da, mbɛ an nii ma dan ni Yataa a. Chɛ an na‑a a ma, an ma che ni don‑da suin tena chɛ.
58004001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, tooɔdia ɛ wɛ ka nɔ tima min na, mmɔ don koe a suin tena chɛ, Yataa‑a min dɔ bɛn, mmɔ chiandenɛ ni ma, kɔkɔɛ mmɔ dɔ nu, mmɔ ee na‑a kun‑da don koe a suin tena chɛ.
58004002	Koe min na mu, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ, a che‑a buɛ min dɔ mmɔ ma, a che‑a ka wan an bɛɛ ma. Chɛɛ an sakana bai chɛ, an‑na min na min, an ma tɔnɔnɛ sɔn ni a ɔ. Koe min na mu, a nii ma danaya tan ni an dɔ, min sima ni ma an dɔ.
58004003	Mmɔ wɛn sin danden mu Yataa 'a tooɔdia chɛ a, mmɔ wan mbe don an suin tena chɛ. A sin, a na‑a a fɔ ka wan, a ɔ, “An faa tɛ chɛ sin ko a, n‑na n kai, n dɔ, ‘Kuɔ fɔ ko a, an mbe ee don‑da suin tena chɛ, n‑na min dɔ bɛn.’ ” A maen mu wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, mbɛ a na‑a ban fan a 'a wai chɛ‑a, a ka dunya a dan tima ma.
58004004	Koe min na mu, a na‑a chɛ an fɔ, Yataa 'a gboo kaka dɔndɔ ɔ, a si tee wɔnfean bɔɛ ma, a ɔ, “A wan Yataa, a na‑a wai gbɛɛ chɛ kɛn, a‑a a suin fan, tee wɔnfean bɔɛ ma.”
58004005	A sin, a yɛ‑a wan to, a kaka chɛ wɛɛ ɔ, a ɔ, “Kuɔ fɔ ko a, an mbe ee don‑da suin tena chɛ, n‑na min dɔ bɛn.”
58004006	Chɛ an fɛ mu, min toen mu gbɛ, an nɛ mɔɛ n don koe a nɔ. A sin, mɔɛ saa nu, miin na‑a sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min, an nii ma kooya be ni, an na‑a a ma, an nii ma don ni nɔ.
58004007	A sin to, Yataa na‑a tee dɔ mende sa wan, a na‑a min chee, a ɔ, “Bi.” Bai chɛ, mmɔ ban‑da gbɛ min na min‑da, a ɔ mɛenɛ gbakɔ, a na‑a a a ben fan a 'a gboo ɔ, Mansa Defidi a, a ɔ, “Ni wo‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ a min bi, wo ma wo faa sɔ.”
58004008	Koe min na mu, ni Chɔsowa na‑a a ma wan, an ni an suin, Yataa nii koɔ‑a a si tee dɔ mende ma.
58004009	Chɛ an fɛ mu, suin tena ɛ wan nɔ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ko a.
58004010	Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ, min mbe don‑da Yataa tena, a suin koe a, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ a suin‑da wan, wai chɛ koe a. Ɛ ma‑a ka wan dechee, yɔ Yataa wɛɛ na‑a a suin buɛ min dɔ.
58004011	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ butuin chɛ, mmɔ ni don an suin tena chɛ. Mmɔ butuin chɛ, mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma na bea. Mmɔ ma na bɔ chɛ n gba ɔ, danaya nii miin dɔ.
58004012	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a bai, fɔɛ an mbe a ɔ, a sin gbasa. A ɛ wan dechee yɔ mɛ, min na saen mu kaka. A ɛ kun fan don koe a mɔɛ gboo ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, a ni che a faa ma. Mbɛ fenɛ min be a ɔ, a yen‑da. Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ 'a yiinachii, a basan a faa ma koe n na, an dɔ sɔn‑da.
58004013	A sin, Yataa chen kɔɔ, fen kɔ fen mbe ee nɔ, min mbe nun a ma. Chɛɛ ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan, an mbe wan sa ɔ den, a ya kɔɔ. Mmɔ gbɛɛ sin, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ chɛ chɛ wai ɔ yian‑da a wan na.
58004014	A ka gbɛ an tima chɛ ma, tɛ mɔ wa, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, an mbe gbɛ mmɔ boo ɔ, min ta‑a banda bu ɔ. A mu Chisɔsi an na, Yataa 'a denɛ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ni mmɔ boo a chii, mmɔ kai fa koe ma a a.
58004015	Koe min na mu, tɛ mɔ wa an nɛ, mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, min mbe chinchin mmɔ ma, koe n dɔ miin mu mmɔ yama chia an na. Mɔɛ mu an na, chia ɔ chia a, Sitana na‑a a yiima yan fan, ko yama ma koe a, yɔ ɛ mmɔ ta yan buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Chasi ma ko yama ma ni.
58004016	Chɛ ko a gbɛ, mmɔ ma sika, mmɔ ma na koe a Yataa 'a mansaya sea tena, koadia demanɛ ma ɛ sɔn kaina min. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, a ni chinchin mmɔ ma, mbɛ mmɔ‑a a 'a koadia demanɛ ma sɔn, tima min na mmɔ toenɛ ɛ ma‑a demanɛ a.
58005001	Koe min na mu, tɛ mɔ wa kan kɔ kan, Yataa ɛ a boo sɔ a ma wai chɛ koe a, a bɔɛ mɔ gbu n fan ko a. A ni ma nɔ, an tɛ, an bɛ Yataa a, yasi bɔ koe a an 'na ko yama n ko a.
58005002	An tɛ mɔ wa chɛ, ɛ kun fan, a ni a bɔɛ n bia faa chima a. Chɛ nu, miin ma ko sɔn, ni chɛ nu miin bia koe gbɛ, ɛ an bia wan. Koe min na mu, a wandi wɛɛ, a yama chia nu, an mbe wan sɛsɛ.
58005003	Chɛ an fɛ mu, a dindenɛ mu a ma, yasi bɔ koe a Yataa tena. A wandi gbu ta ko yama n ko a, a basan an mɔɛ chɛ n ta n na.
58005004	An wai chɛ sin, mɔ wandi an mbe ee a ya i kun ma gbasaya a. Chɛɛ Yataa an mbe mɔɛ chee, yɔ a na‑a ma buɛ min dɔ Eyɔn na.
58005005	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, Chasi gbu wɛɛ, a nii ma a wandi ya ni tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ, an bɛ Yataa a. Chɛɛ Yataa wandi, an na‑a a boo sɔ a ma. Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ mu i a. N ma‑a i fa a bi.”
58005006	Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan to, a 'a gboo kaka dɔ mende ɔ, a ɔ, “Kuɔ fɔ ko a, e ma‑a wan mɔɛ n tɛ, n fan Yataa a. E ma‑a wan, yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki ni buɛ min dɔ.”
58005007	Tima min na Chisɔsi ni fɔɛ ɔ dunya chɛ ɔ, a ni samunɛ chɛ wan, a yɛ to, a ni Yataa ɔ tisa wan basan koe a a ma. A ni chɛ ma a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ an na, a ya yii ɛ ta‑a bɔ‑a Yataa tena, min mbe che dechee a kun bɔ koe a saya ɔ. A sin ni baa be ka buɛ min dɔ Yataa ma, a wɛɛ, a ni a di kuiɛ a min fan.
58005008	Chɛɛ a ni wɛɛ boo ɔ boo Yataa 'a denɛ a, a na‑a mɔnɛ ɔ bia wan. Chɛ an gbu na‑a a ma, a‑a a yiima ɔ bɛn, kooya be koe a Yataa ma.
58005009	A sin, a na‑a ma wan mɔɛ a, min da faenɛ ɛ gban, Yataa tena. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a ma‑a mɔɛ a, min mbe na kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a mɔɛ n ko a, miin mbe kooya be‑a a ma.
