58005010	A gbu sin, Yataa wandi, an‑na a yian, ma koe a tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a. A ni ma yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki ni buɛ min dɔ.
58005011	Bai kɔkoo nn da a, a fɔ koe a, a si koe chɛ ma. Chɛɛ koe sin fan nɛ, min dɔ gbɛ, a ɔ yian koe a wo a. Koe min na mu, wo ee fua koe ɔ gbɛ‑a.
58005012	Tima chɛ gbu sin na gbɛ, a ni ma‑a ko ma kawaenɛ an na, ni wo ni wan gbɛ mɔ dɔ mende n kan‑da. Chɛɛ sanche wɛɛ, mɔɔ ni mɔ dɔ mende‑a wo kan, a nama a, a si Yataa bai kuu sɔ tena ma. Wo e wan dechee yɔ den toa nu, miin mbe a kuu sɔ susu yii ma, an mbe ee daun fen dɔ gbɛama daun.
58005013	Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe susu minɛ a, den toa mu a a. Koe min na mu, a yiima ɔ dɔɔ, a si chia ma, tea ɛ min dɔ, Yataa tena.
58005014	Chɛɛ daun fen dɔ gbɛama tana, ɛ mɔɛ n fan ko a, miin kunɛ kɔɔen mu. Mɔɛ nu, miin yiima kɔɔen mu, an‑na a kan, mɔ gbu ɛ ko chɛndɛ tɛ bɔ ka ma, a fea ko yama a.
58006001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ koe chɛ n to, Chasi ni mmɔ kan miin na, yɔ den mɛsɛ nu. Mmɔ a kuu sɔ gbɛ mmɔ yii na chii‑a yɔ mɔɛ miin yii kɔɔen mu. Mmɔ sɛmbɛ mmɔ gba ɔ tɛn tɛn koe a, ko mɛsɛ chɛ n kan koe a, a si Chisɔsi ma. Koe chɛ nu, miin mbe a ma, an ni an mun, an ni sɛmbɛ ko yama chɛ n ma‑a, miin mbe a ma, an ni saya ma sɔn. Mmɔ yɛ to, mmɔ ni a ɔ yen, an ni an kai fa Yataa a.
58006002	Mmɔ ma an kan to, a si yii chɛ koe ma mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ Yataa chia a. A yɛ to, boo bunɛ mɔɛ n ma, an ni dua ma sɔn, ni mɔɛ kɔɔ sɔ koe a, a ka saya ɔ, a basan kaa a tɛ a, min mbe ma‑a nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.
58006003	Chɛ sin, ni Yataa dɔn‑da, mmɔ ɛ a ma wan.
58006004	Mɔɛ dɔ nu, an ni wan tima dɔndɔ a pimbi ɔ, mbɛ Yataa‑a manɛ be an ma. An na‑a tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn fan Yataa a, a sin, Yataa Nyina ni wan an bɛɛ fɛ. Mbɛ Yataa 'a bai, ɛ na ko chɛndɛ miin bɛɛ a, an‑na an bɛɛ sima ma fɛn. Fɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, min mbe ya ɔ ma, gbasaya min mbe a ɔ, an‑na a wɛɛ ma fɛn fan. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an ka‑a Chasi fɛ. A yɛ to, an mbe da mau koe n sɛ‑a Yataa 'a denɛ ma, fanka ɔ, an mbe a fa‑a to kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, chia ee che to sa‑a an ko a, gba fean bɔɛ ɔ, yɛ koe a to Yataa tena.
58006007	Tai chɛ yen ko. Sona ɛ chɛ duu gboo ma wan, mbɛ a‑a a chima dɔgbɔ. A sin, chin fenɛ min mbe chin an duu gboo ma, ɛ gbɔɛ be wan a chin mɔɛ n ma, miin nyin an ko a. Yataa sin mbe an duu gboo chɛ dua wan.
58006008	Chɛɛ ni an duu gboo chɛ, wai nyan‑da a ma, a basan binɛ a, duu gboo a tenden ma. A to‑a ɛnden fan na, Yataa ni a danka, a sin, ta an mbe a kasaa‑a.
58006009	Chɛɛ wo wan, nn dia nyɔɛ nu, miin ko a di nn ye kaka, nn‑na chɛ fɔ wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, nn yii na tɛen fan mu wo ko a. Nn‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo e chia chɛndɛ an ma, bauncha ko a.
58006010	Koe min na mu, Yataa ee kaa yama a tɛ, a ni nyina wai chɛndɛ chɛ ma, wo‑a min chɛ. A yɛ to, wo na‑a Yataa 'a mɔɛ n bia wan chɛndɛ chɛ, wo sin mbe tun an bia‑a a buɛ ɔ. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan Yataa a, mbɛ wo toen mu a a.
58006011	Nn toen mu wo gbɛɛ, wo ni butuin dɔndɔ gbe chɛ chɛ wo faa gbɛɛ a, aan wo 'a fɔɛ danka a. Chɛ an mbe a ma, wo yii na tɛen mu koe miin ma, wo ni an ma sɔn.
58006012	Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ee ma‑a gboo ɔ fa tɔɛ n na. Chɛɛ wo e bea wan mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ, miin‑na an kai fa Yataa a, an‑na an faa bia, mbɛ Yataa na‑a an too ɔ dia min gbɛɛ a, an‑na an ma sɔn.
58006013	Chɛ wɛɛ yen ko. Tima min na Yataa na‑a tooɔdia chɛ Ebeami a, a nii ma a kai ni fen dɔ mende ɔ, fɔ a wandi. Koe min na mu, fen dɔ mende kan kɔ kan mbe ee nɔ, a ben a wandi ma.
58006014	Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Ko ɔ ko ee a yɔn, n mbe i dua‑a wan. N mbe a ma‑a wan, i ni ma mɔɛ a, min mbe po.”
58006015	Chɛ sin ko a, Ebeami na‑a a faa bia wan ko sɛsɛ a, mbɛ a too ɔ dia‑a min na, a‑a a ma sɔn.
58006016	Mɔ gbu n mbe an kai fenɛ n fan dɔ, an ta yiima ɔ, fenɛ miin benden mu an ma. A sin fan mbe a ma, koɛ gbɛɛ, an mbe miin chɛ, an mbe danka wan an kai a.
58006017	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ chɛ nu, tooɔdia chɛen ni miin na, Yataa toen ni a ni a ɔ yian an na, mbɛ ɛ bai min fɔ, an mbe ma. A sɔnɛ chɛ ee a ɔ, bai fɔ koe a bi, mbɛ a‑a a ka a gba ɔ sinan. Chɛ an na‑a a ma, a‑a a kai, a da a bai kun ma.
58006018	Chɛ ni a ma, mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen, chia fea a, miin mbe ee mun, Yataa ɛ koe min ma. Yataa‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ ko ee nɔ, min mbe a ma, a ni a da a kuiɛ yɔn. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mmɔ wɛn na‑a bui‑a Chasi tena, mmɔ kun ma fɛn koe a, tooɔdia min mbe mmɔ ko a, mmɔ bu ɔ diama ɛ ma‑a wan, a bia koe a fɔin.
58006019	Mmɔ yii sɔen mu an ma, tima ɔ tima, mbɛ an mbe mmɔ fɔɛ si. A ɛ wan yɔ dɛndɛ chii yuu, ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ ɛ sɔ chidi, a gba ɔ. Yiinatɛ chɛ, an mbe ma mmɔ ɔ, mmɔ ɛ ma don‑da Yataa 'a chenɛ bu ɔ, banda bu ɔ, Yataa chen kɔɔ.
58006020	Chisɔsi pɛn na‑a ta an kaina chɛ, mmɔ ko a. A sin, a ma‑a wan tɛ mɔ wa a, mmɔ ko a Yataa tena, kuɔ fɔ ko a. A na‑a ma wan, yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki ni buɛ min dɔ.
58007001	Mɛchisɛdɛki chɛ, mansa ni an na, Saden duu ɔ. A sin to, tɛ mɔɛ ni a a, Yataa Wa tena. Tima dɔndɔ a, Ebeami ni wan ka tena chɛɛ ɔ. An na‑a mansa naaninɛ n 'na chɛɛ chɛ mɔɛ n kun tɛ an chɛɛ an dɔ. Mɛchisɛdɛki na‑a an tan fan. A sin, a wan Mɛchisɛdɛki na‑a Ebeami dua wan.
58007002	A sin, fenɛ gbɛɛ, Ebeami ka‑a miin na an chɛɛ chɛ ɔ, a na‑a an du wan, si tena tanɛ a, mbɛ a‑a si tena dɔndɔ be Mɛchisɛdɛki chɛ ma. An mu mɔɛ saa a, ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ yii na chii a tɔɛ fasai ma, mbɛ an mu mansa a, min tanden mu. An mu kɛn to mansa a, Saden, min fasaien mu, faa chima mansa.
58007003	A fa ee, a de ee, mɔ sin mbe ee che a fɔ‑a, mbɛ a bɔ kɔnkɔɛ an nɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a fɔɛ kuu sɔ tena sɔn, mɔ ma a fɔɛ a ban tena sɔn. Chɛɛ a bɔen mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na, ɛ ma‑a wan tɛ mɔɛ a, kuɔ fɔ ko a.
58007004	Wo a ɔ yen gbɛ, a mu mɔ chenama min nyɔn sima a. Mmɔ bɔ kɔnkɔɛ, Ebeami, a na‑a miin gbɛɛ ma sɔn chɛɛ ɔ, a na‑a wan si tena tanɛ a, mbɛ a‑a si tena dɔndɔɛ be Mɛchisɛdɛki chɛ ma.
58007005	A sin, Yataa na‑a miin gbɛɛ ma to tɛ mɔɛ a, Difai cheeya n ni. Sawa min be‑a Mosisi ma, a na‑a a fɔ wan an ye, mbɛ an ni boo fenɛ n kain mɔɛ n boo ɔ, Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ ɔ. A dinden fan ni an ma, an boo fenɛ n gbɛɛ, du koe a si tena tanɛ a. Mbɛ an‑na a si tena dɔndɔɛ be. An ni chɛ kain ka an fandi gbu ta mɔɛ n fan ma, Ebeami cheeya ni an bɛɛ a.
58007006	Chɛɛ Mɛchisɛdɛki chɛ nii ma bɔ nin bɛɛ Difai dambi ɔ, chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Ebeami na‑a boo fenɛ si tena dɔndɔɛ be an ma. Mbɛ a dua‑a Ebeami ye, Yataa na‑a too ɔ dia chɛ min na.
58007007	Mɔɛ sin, min mbe mɔɛ dua, a benden mu mɔɛ chɛ ma, ɛ min dua ka. Kɔɔsa bia kan kɔ kan mbe ee chɛ ma.
58007008	Chu mɔɛ n tɛ mɔɛ nu Yataa a, ni an ta ɔ mu, boo fenɛ si tena dɔndɔɛ chɛ ɛ be an fan mɔ gbu n fan ma, miin mbe fa. Chɛɛ Mɛchisɛdɛki chɛ benden mu an ma. Koe min na mu, a fɔen fan mu mmɔ ye, mbɛ ɛ ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ.
58007009	Mmɔ ɛ a fɔ wan, mbɛ Difai wandi gbu, boo fenɛ si tena dɔndɔɛ an ni be a ma. Mbɛ a wɛɛ‑a a be Ebeami ma, a be koe a Mɛchisɛdɛki ma.
58007010	Koe min na mu, Ebeami na‑a Mɛchisɛdɛki tan tima min na, Difai ni wɛ a woo mɔɛ Ebeami gboo kɔɔ wan, a nii ma suun nin bɛ.
58007011	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin na‑a bɔ Difai 'a dambi ɔ, an sin ni mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a, a ta nii ka sawa chɛ wakoe ma, min na‑a be Mosisi ma. Ni mɔɛ n tɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu Yataa a, an 'na wai na‑a Yataa faa chima wan, mbɛ tɛ mɔ ko dɔ mende nii ma‑a to nɔ. Tɛ mɔɛ dɔ mende na‑a na wan, yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki. An sin, a nii ka yɔ Eyɔn.
58007012	Koe min na mu, tɛ mɔɛ kan kɔ kan min mbe na, ɛ sawa wɛɛ ka wan a gba ɔ.
58007013	Chisɔsi chɛ sin, bai chɛ nu, an mbe sa tena a si min ma, a bɔ‑a dambi dɔ mende an dɔ. A sin, an dambi chɛ ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma tɛ mɔya chɛ nin bɛ, gbengbe ma Yataa 'a kata ɔ.
58007014	Koe min na mu, a ɔ sɔnden fan mu chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi bɔ‑a Chuda 'a dambi an dɔ. A sin, min sien mu an dambi chɛ ma, Mosisi nii ma bai ɔ bai sa ni, a si tɛ mɔɛ koe ma.
58007015	Mɔɛ ɛ chɛ gbu yen fan sa ɔ den, kɛn tɛ mɔɛ dɔ mende‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, min ni yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki.
58007016	Mbɛ a ma‑a tɛ mɔɛ a, sawa ta fɛ chia a ma, min sien mu a bɔ dambi ma. Chɛɛ a bɔ‑a gbasaya chɛ an dɔ, fɔɛ min mbe ee che kasaa‑a, an mbe a ɔ.
58007017	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a si a ma, a ɔ, “Kuɔ fɔ ko a, e ma‑a wan mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a. E ma‑a wan, yɔ Mɛchisɛdɛki ni buɛ min dɔ.”
58007018	Chia dɔndɔɛ a, sawa kɔma ee to wai tena. Koe min na mu, an sawa chɛ kɔ ma gbɛ, sawa a tenden gbu nii ma.
58007019	Koe min na mu, chia dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a, sawa gbu nii ma a ma ni, ko kan kɔ kan ni sɔ a chia ma chɛndɛ chɛ. Yiinatɛ chɛndɛ yian‑da wan mmɔ a, min mbe mmɔ ma sawan Yataa tena.
58007020	A sin, chɛ nii ma ma ni gbama a. Yataa na‑a a kai wan. Yataa nii ma a kai ni, tima min na mɔ dɔ mende chɛ n ni ma tɛ mɔɛ a.
58007021	Chɛɛ chɛ nɛnɛ tana, Yataa na‑a a kai wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N fan, Mansa Yataa, n‑na n kai, n sin mbe ee n da a kuiɛ yɔn. N dɔ, ‘Kuɔ fɔ ko a, e ma‑a wan mɔɛ n tɛ n fan Yataa a.’ ”
58007022	Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi an mbe a ma, dɔbɛn nama chɛ mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, a ee yɔn. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ dɔbɛn nama chɛ nyin a ben a kɔma ma.
58007023	A sin, tɛ mɔɛ nu, an kɔ ni koo, an dan koe a. Koe min na mu, saya an ni a ma, an nii che wai chɛ‑a, aan a ta.
58007024	Chɛɛ Chisɔsi tana, a 'a tɛ mɔya, a danka ee. Koe min na mu, ɛ ma‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ, kuɔ fɔ ko a.
58007025	A sin fan fɛ mu, mɔɛ miin mbe na Yataa tena, a 'a gbasaya ɔ, ɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n kun bɔ wan tima ɔ tima an 'na ko yama n dɔ. Koe min na mu, tima ɔ tima ko a, ɛ wan nɔ, Yataa ma nande koe a, an mɔɛ chɛ n ko a.
58007026	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ko ma bɛndenɛ mu, tɛ mɔ wa chɛ, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, a sima ma sɔn koe a. A wɛn ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, ɛ tenchen Yataa ko a. A sin to, mabɔ ee a ma, an tɛ duenɛ ɛ, an bɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ n na. A ya‑a, a sɛ banda bu ɔ.
58007027	A ta nan gbu sin, a ee ka, yɔ tɛ mɔ wa tɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma gbɔsɔɛ ni yasi bɔ koe a, tima sɛsɛ ko a. Koe saa ni min na, an ni yasi chɛ n bɔ tee ɔ tee a, an fandi gbu ta ko yama maenɛ n fan ko a. Mbɛ an yɛ‑a, an‑na a bɔ, mɔɛ tɔɛ n ko a. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi tana, a na‑a chɛ ma gba dɔndɔ gbe an ko a, tima min na a na‑a a wandi fɔɛ be.
58007028	Sawa min be‑a Mosisi ma, an mbe mɔ gbu n yian, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, ma koe a tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a. An ni a fɔ wɛɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ n gbu, wai chɛ gbasaya ee an ye. Chɛɛ Yataa sin mbe a kai wan a wandi ɔ, a ee na koe ma. A sin, a na‑a sawa chɛ be pɛn Mosisi ma, a ee na a boo sɔ a 'a denɛ ma. A den chɛ sin na‑a koe gbɛɛ ma wan tima ɔ tima, Yataa toen ni miin na.
58008001	Nn mbe bai min gbu fɔ tena, an nɛ. Tɛ mɔ wa min mbe mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, a koo sai ma. Ɛ wan si ɔ kaina ma bɛndenɛ, Mansa Yataa 'a mansaya sea boo nyima ɔ, pan banda bu ɔ.
58008002	A saa a, mɔɛ chɛ nu miin ni mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a, an ni wai chɛ tɛndi an kɔɔ. A tɛndi chɛ sin, an ni yasi bɔ kaina min, mɔɛ n 'na ko yama n ko a, mɔ gbu an na‑a a sɔ. Chɛɛ Chisɔsi tana, ɛ wai chɛ Yataa 'a tɛndi an kɔɔ, banda bu ɔ, kaina min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a. An kaina chɛ sin, Mansa Yataa an‑na a sɔ, mɔ gbu ma.
58008003	Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan, min mu tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, a yianden mu yasi bɔ koe an na, a basan boo fen be koe a Yataa ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a nyin an tɛ mɔ wa chɛ wɛɛ ko a, fenɛ ni ma a boo ɔ, a be koe a Yataa ma.
58008004	Sanche gbɛ, ni a ni dunya chɛ ɔ wan, a nii ma‑a mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a, ɛnden bɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ n mbe wan nɔ mɔɛ n tɛ Yataa a, miin mbe boo fenɛ n be Yataa ma, sawa ta fɛ chia a.
58008005	An mbe wai min chɛ Yataa 'a tɛndi kɔɔ, a ɛ wan dechee yɔ koe miin mbe ma banda bu ɔ, an nininɛ gbama, an mbe buɛ min dɔ. Koe min na mu, Mosisi ni tima min na Yataa 'a tɛndi chɛ sɔ‑a, Yataa na‑a koɔ wan a tena, a ɔ, “Fen kɔ fen min sien mu tɛndi chɛ ma, a nyan yɔ i‑a a nyandenɛ yen buɛ min dɔ, Saina kɔnkɔɛ kun ma.”
58008006	Chɛɛ koe gbu, ɛ buɛ min dɔ, Chisɔsi 'a wai chɛ, a benden mu an 'na wai kɔma n ma. Ɛ wan dechee, yɔ a 'a dɔbɛn nama chɛ, a benden mu buɛ min dɔ a kɔma ma. Koe min na mu, a 'a dɔbɛn chɛ, a chɛen mu tooɔdia min na, a kɔ gbɛ.
58008007	Koe min na mu, ni mabɔ nii dɔbɛnɛ saa chɛ ma, mbɛ dɔbɛnɛ fean bɔɛ nii ma nɔ.
58008008	Chɛɛ Yataa na‑a a 'a mɔɛ n ma nyin fan. An fɛ ni, a‑a a fɔ a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Tee ɛ bɔ‑a wan, n fan Yataa, n ni a fɔ, n dɔ, n mbe dɔbɛn nama chɛ‑a wan mɔɛ n na, miin ka‑a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ ɔ, an bɛ chɛ n na, miin ka‑a Chuda chɛnyɛ ɔ.
58008009	A nɛnɛ ee ma‑a, yɔ dɔbɛn chɛ, n na‑a min chɛ an fa n na. N‑na an bia tee min na, an boo ma, sɔ koe a an ya ɔ, a bɔ Ichipi chɛnyɛ chɛ ɔ, chɛɛ an nii ma an boo a chii ni n 'na dɔbɛnɛ ma. Chɛ sin ko a, n fan, Mansa Yataa, n ma n too kan kɔ kan sɔ ni an ma.
58008010	Mbɛ dɔbɛnɛ an nɛ, n mbe min chɛ‑a mɔɛ n na, miin ka‑a Isɔɛɛ chɛnyɛ ɔ. N fan Mansa Yataa, ni tee chɛ n ben‑da, n mbe n 'na sawa n sa‑a wan, an yii ma, n ni a sa an faa ɔ. A sin, n mbe ma‑a wan an 'na Yataa a, mbɛ an bɛɛ, an ma‑a n 'na mɔɛ n na.
58008011	An dɔndɔ wɛɛ, an mbe ee an chɛnyɛ nyɔɛ n kan‑da, chɛ ma, an dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni an suun ma nyɔɛ n kan. An ni a fɔ, an dɔ, ‘Wo Mansa Yataa sɔn.’ Koe min na mu, mɔɛ gbɛɛ, an mbe na‑a wan n sɔn‑da, a ka mɔɛ ma, baa sima wɛɛ ee min ma, a ta mɔɛ tena, min mu mɔ chenama wa a.
58008012	Koe min na mu, n mbe chinchin‑da an ma, ko yama n ko a. A sin, n mbe ee n yii na chii‑a tun, an 'na ko yama n na.”
58008013	Ni a ma‑a bai sa‑a, a si dɔbɛn nama chɛ ma, ɛ a ma wan yɔ a kɔma tana, a kɔkɔya‑a gbɛ. A sin, fenɛ min kɔkɔya‑a, a bun‑da chenancha‑a, a ma bɛndenɛ an nɛ ka gbɛ, tuin koe a.
58009001	Yataa na‑a dɔbɛnɛ saa min chɛ, an bɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na, sawa n ni wan a ma, Yataa fai koe a. A sin, mɔ gbu n na‑a kaina nyan fan, samunɛ chɛ koe a.
58009002	Koe min na mu, an na‑a Yataa 'a tɛndi dɛn fan. An tɛndi chɛ dumu saa, an ni an chee, an dɔ, kaina min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a. A bu ɔ, tebu ni wan nɔ, ni kaina, dambo si koe a. A yɛ to, biidi gbugbu n ni wan sa ɔ an tebu chɛ ma. Mɔɛ miin ni mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an ni an fan be Yataa ma.
58009003	Dumu fean bɔɛ ni wan nɔ, tɛndi chɛ bu ɔ, an ni min chee, an dɔ, kaina min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a, a bɛbɛɛ wandi a. Don koe a an dumu chɛ ɔ, koa an ni dɛn dɔ chia a, min‑na dumu fea chɛ n tɛ du.
58009004	An kaina chɛ bu ɔ, gbengbe ni wan nɔ min nyanden ni sanu ɔ, an ni fen kunyɛ a diama minda kaina. Yataa na‑a dɔbɛnɛ min bɛɛ chɛ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na, a kakaa chɛ wɛɛ ni wan nɔ, min gboo gbɛɛ ma bandenɛ ni sanu a. An kakaa chɛ ɔ, sanu tɔmbua ni wan nɔ, daun fenɛ ɛ a ɔ. An ni an daun fen chɛ chee, an dɔ, mana. Eyɔn 'na tungbɔɛ wɛɛ, yamba kunɛ na‑a fɛn min ma, a ni wan kakaa chɛ ɔ. A yɛ to, sen dɛnfɛ fea chɛ nu, Yataa na‑a sawa chɛ nyɛn miin ma, mbɛ an be‑a Mosisi ma, an bɛɛ ni wan an kakaa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ɔ.
58009005	An kakaa chɛ kun ma chia a, fenɛ n ni wan nɔ yɔ maeka nu, an kambanɛ ɛ an ma. An ni a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wan an kaina chɛ. An kambanɛ chɛ nu, an dɔ fuindenɛ ni kaina chɛ kun ma, Yataa ɛ chinchin kaina min, mɔɛ n ma, ni an‑na ko yama ma. Min sien mu fen chɛ n gbɛɛ wakoe ma, mmɔ ee che bai sɛsɛ sa‑a sanche, a si an ma.
58009006	Fen chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ bɛndenɛ ɛ ma ka wan. A sin, mɔɛ miin ni mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, an fan ni don dechee dumu saa chɛ ɔ, tee ɔ tee a, an 'na tɛ mɔ wai chɛ koe a.
58009007	Chɛɛ tɛ mɔ wa sin, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, a ni don dechee dumu fean bɔɛ chɛ ɔ, gba dɔndɔ gbe sanɛ ma. A tima chɛ a, ɛ don nɔ wii an na a boo ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a be Yataa ma, a wandi ko a, ni a 'a mɔɛ n ta ko yama ko a, an nii ma miin dɔ sɔn.
58009008	Chɛ ko a, Yataa Nyina na‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ chia chɛ, mɔɛ n don koe a Yataa ɛ kaina, a da a nii ma ka ni. A sin mbe ma‑a ka wan, tima min na wɛ tɛndi chɛ ɛ sɔ ɔ.
58009009	Yataa 'a tɛndi chɛ ɔ, ɛ koe tɔmɔsi an yian mmɔ a bi tee chɛ kɔɔ. Mɔɛ n ni na nɔ wan boo fenɛ n na, a basan yasi n na, Yataa fai koe a. Chɛɛ an fen chɛ nu, an nii che a ma‑a an yiima a ni ko fion.
58009010	Koe min na mu, chia kɔma chɛ sien ni daun fenɛ n fan bakoe ma. A yɛ to, mɔɛ ma ɛ ko buɛ min dɔ, Chu n 'na sawa ta fɛ chia a. Chɛ n gbɛɛ, sawa gbama n fan nɛ. An ni nɔ dechee aan tima chɛ an ko a, Yataa na‑a a ta dɔbɛn nama chɛ tima min na.
58009011	Chɛɛ Chasi ban‑da gbɛ na‑a, ma koe a tɛ mɔ wa a, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, ko chɛndɛ chɛ n ko a, miin‑na mmɔ tan. A ben‑da ka tɛndi min kɔɔ, mɔ gbu an ma a nyan ni, a sin gbu ma dunya chɛ ɔ fen na.
58009012	Kaina chɛ, min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a, a bɛbɛɛ gbu, a don‑da nɔ dɔndɔ gbe, a sin, a danka‑a an ma. A nii ma ta ni nɔ ba wii a, a boo ɔ, a ma ta ni ninchi tɔngbɔ wɛɛ wii a, mɔɔ dechee a wandi wii. A na‑a che ka wan kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da mmɔ ko a.
58009013	Sawa kɔma chɛ n tima a, ba wii min ni bɔn, a basan ninchi wii a, a ni mɔɛ n ko wan dechee an gboo ma. An soe chɛ n buwa wɛɛ ni ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma.
58009014	Ni soe wii ɛ chɛ ma wan, a ɔ gbɛ Chasi ta wii? A wɛn nii ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni, chɛɛ a‑a a wandi fɔɛ be, mmɔ ko a, Yataa Nyina 'a gbasaya ɔ, min mbe kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chasi wii ni mmɔ yiima a ko, a ni koe n ka mmɔ yii ma miin mbe na saya a, mmɔ ni Yataa fai, min mbe kuɔ fɔ ko a.
58009015	Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chasi an mbe mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, dɔbɛn nama chɛ ko a. Chɛ ni a ma, Yataa ɛ mɔɛ miin chee‑a, an ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn, min bakoe na‑a don an too ɔ. Koe min na mu, Chasi ban‑da gbɛ saya chɛ‑a, mɔɛ kun ka koe a, a bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ, an na‑a miin ma dɔbɛnɛ kɔma kɔɔ.
58009016	Gboo nyɛndenɛ, a si fuɛ gbaa fenɛ ma sɔn koe ma, a ee che wai‑a, mɔɔ ni siiya ma‑a nɔ, tea ɔ yian koe a. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min‑na a nyɛn, a fa‑a.
58009017	Koe min na mu, ni mɔɛ‑a gboo nyɛn, a si boo fenɛ n ma, ɛ miin to‑a, an gboo chɛ ee wai, ni a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ fɔɛ ɔ, mɔɔ ni a fa‑a.
58009018	Chɛ an fɛ ni, dɔbɛnɛ saa chɛ wɛɛ, a kun nii ma tɛ ni, wii gbaa a.
58009019	Koe min na mu, Mosisi ban‑da kɛn Yataa 'a sawa chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ yian‑da mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, a na‑a chɛ an ma. A na‑a ninchi tɔngbɔɛ wii ya wan, a basan ba wii a, ni yii wɛɛ. A na‑a sa ti mende mende wan kɔnɛ bonɛ ma, mbɛ a‑a a don an wii chɛ ɔ, a‑a a fasi fasi sawa gboo chɛ ma, a basan mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a.
58009020	Mosisi ɛ a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Wii an nɛ, min mbe dɔbɛn chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a min chɛ wo a.”
58009021	A na‑a a ma ka wan to, a‑a wii fasi fasi wan tɛndi chɛ ma, a basan fen kɔ fen na nɔ, an ni Yataa fai miin na.
58009022	Tea gbu a, sawa ta fɛ chia a, fen kɔ fen ma ɛ ko dechee fion wii an na, Yataa chen kɔɔ. A sin gbu, ni wii a nii ma bɔn ni, Yataa nii a boo bɔ‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ.
58009023	Chɛ ko a, koe ni min mbe ma, fen chɛ nu, miin bɔen mu fenɛ n na miin mbe banda bu ɔ, an ni ko fo chia chɛ a. Chɛɛ fen chɛ nu banda bu ɔ, yasi min mbe bɔ an ko koe a fion, a nyin an yasi chɛ ni ben dunya ɔ nɛnɛ ta ma.
58009024	Koe min na mu, Chasi don‑da banda bu ɔ wan. A nii ma don ni kaina chɛ wan, Yataa ɛ fai kaina, mɔɛ n‑na min nyan. A don‑da gbɛ banda bu ɔ, ma koe an na, Yataa chen kɔɔ, mmɔ ko a.
58009025	Tɛ mɔ wa chɛ tana, mɔ gbu n tɛ Yataa a, a ni don fan san kɔ san na, tɛndi chɛ ɔ, min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a. A sin, wii ni ma wan an boo ɔ, min nii ma an ta a. Chɛɛ Chasi tana, a nii ma a wandi be ni gba fea ko a.
58009026	A ni ma‑a chɛ ma‑a, a ni na‑a wan fa‑a, gba sɛsɛ ko a, a ka dunya kuu sɔ tima ma. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ, dunya e na to ban‑da, Chasi bɔ‑a mɔɛ n tɛ, gba dɔndɔ gbe ko a, a sin, a danka an nɛ. A na‑a a wandi be wan, mɔɛ n bɔ koe a ko yama n dɔ.
58009027	A sin yianden mu ka wan, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ kan kɔ kan mbe fa gba dɔndɔ gbe wan, mbɛ a gbakɔ, Yataa‑a gbɛmbo chɛ.
58009028	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, Chasi wɛɛ na‑a a wandi be gba dɔndɔ gbe wan, mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. Chɛɛ Chasi ɛ bɔ‑a wan to a a dunya chɛ ɔ, a gba fean bɔɛ ko a. A sin, a nɛnɛ ee ma‑a ko yama n fan bakoe a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fan kun ka koe mu, miin mbe a ma kɔn tena, an faa gbɛɛ a.
58010001	Sawa chɛ nu, miin be‑a Mosisi ma, an mbe bai sa tena wan, a si fen chɛndɛ n ma, miin mbe banda bu ɔ. Chɛɛ an sawa chɛ n mbe wan dechee, yɔ banda bu ɔ fen chɛ n nininɛ gbama nu. An mbe ee koe chɛ n dɔ yian, tea chia a, ɛnden bɛɛ a. An mbe yasi dɔndɔ gbe an bɔ, san kɔ san na. Chɛ sin mbe ee a ma, mɔɛ miin mbe bea sawa chɛ n fɛ, an ni ma yɔ Yataa toen mu an ni ma buɛ min dɔ.
58010002	Ni a ni kun fan chɛ ma‑a, mɔɛ chɛ n ni sɛmbɛ‑a wan, yasi chɛ n bɔ koe a. A nii ma‑a to an yii ma, ɛnden bɛɛ a, mbɛ an 'na ko yama ma wan.
58010003	Chɛɛ an mbe yasi miin bɔ ka, a puin koe mu an yii ma, san kɔ san na, mbɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ mu an na.
58010004	Koe min na mu, a ee che ma‑a, ɛnden bɛɛ a, ninchi wii basan ba wii a, an ni mɔɛ n ko, a bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ.
58010005	Chɛ an fɛ ni, Chasi na‑a tima min na dunya chɛ ɔ, a na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Yasi n bɛ mɔɛ n boo fenɛ n na, i wan Yataa ma to ni an fan na. Chɛɛ mɔ gbu gboo, i‑a a be n ma.
58010006	Soe miin mbe minda ka i tena, a basan yasi tɔɛ n na, mɔɛ n mbe miin bɔ an 'na ko yama n ko a, an ma fen na, miin mbe i bu ɔ dia.
58010007	Mbɛ n dɔ, ‘N yen ko nɛ, Mansa Yataa, i faa ma koe ma koe a, yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ, i 'a gboo chɛ ɔ, a si n ma.’ ”
58010008	A saa a, Chasi‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Yasi n bɛ mɔɛ n boo fenɛ n na, i wan Yataa ma to ni an fan na. Soe miin mbe minda ka i tena, a basan yasi tɔɛ n na, mɔɛ mbe miin bɔ an 'na ko yama n ko a, an ma fen na, miin mbe i bu ɔ dia.” A‑a chɛ fɔ wɛɛ, chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, an mbe chɛ n bɔ sawa ta fɛ chia an na.
58010009	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N yen ko nɛ, Mansa Yataa, i faa ma koe n ma koe a.” A‑a dɔbɛnɛ saa ɔ yɔn, min mbe a ma, a ni a fean bɔɛ kuu sɔ.
58010010	Chisɔsi ni Yataa faa ma koe an ma. A sin, a chia chɛ a mu, mmɔ ma‑a tenchen Yataa ko a. Chisɔsi na‑a a wandi gboo min be yasi a, gba dɔndɔ gbe, a ma ma ni to fea, an na‑a a ma chɛ ma‑a.
58010011	Mɔɛ miin ni mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an mbe yasi n bɔ wan, tima ɔ tima ko a. Chɛɛ an yasi chɛ nu, an mbe ee an bɔ an 'na ko yama n dɔ.
58010012	Chɛɛ Chasi tana, a na‑a a wandi be dɔndɔɛ min chɛ ka, a ma‑a wan yasi a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a, tima ɔ tima ko a. A na‑a a sin ma kɛn, a si‑a wan kaina ma bɛndenɛ Yataa boo nyima ɔ.
58010013	A ka gbɛ a tima chɛ ma, ɛ nɔ gbɛ ma kɔn chɛ an na, aan Yataa ni a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n don a kɔɔ, a ni an popoya a ya kɔɔ.
58010014	Koe min na mu, a na‑a a wandi an ma yasi dɔndɔ gbe a. An yasi chɛ sin, a‑a a ma wan, a ban‑da wai chɛ‑a, an ma koe a tenchen Yataa ko a, kuɔ fɔ ko a.
58010015	A sin, Yataa Nyina wɛɛ, a koɔ‑a wan mmɔ tena, a si koe chɛ ma. A na‑a a fɔ ka wan Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ,
58010016	“Mansa Yataa ɔ, ‘Ni an tee chɛ n ben‑da, N mbe dɔbɛn chɛ an chɛ‑a, nn bɛ an na.’ A ɔ, ‘N mbe n 'na sawa n sa‑a wan an faa ɔ, mbɛ n yɛ‑a, n‑na a nyɛn, an yiima ɔ.’ ”
58010017	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ to Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Kuɔ fɔ ko a, an 'na ko yama nu, a basan an 'na sawa yɔnɛ a, an mbe ee puin‑da to n yii ma.”
58010018	Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa ban‑da kaina a boo bɔ‑a chɛ n dɔ, yasi bɔ ee to nɔ, mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a.
58010019	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, mmɔ yii sɔen fan mu gbɛ gbae, Chisɔsi wii 'a gbasaya ɔ, don koe a kaina min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a.
58010020	Chisɔsi‑a a gboo be yasi a, min mbe a ma, a ni chia nama a ka mmɔ ko a, a ta Yataa tena. Mmɔ ɛ kun fan gbɛ, mmɔ ni ben tɛndi chɛ ɔ, a ta Yataa tena. Chisɔsi Chasi, an mu an chia chɛ a, min mbe fɔɛ ɔ.
58010021	A sin, a ka a tima ma, tɛ mɔ wa, mmɔ tɛ Yataa a, an mbe mmɔ boo ɔ. A sin fan mbe Yataa 'a chenɛ kun ma.
58010022	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ na Yataa baima, faa chɛndɛ a, a yɛ to, mmɔ kai faenɛ a a gban. Mmɔ faa ɔ gbɛenɛ ni ma, mmɔ yiima a koenɛ ɛ fo, mmɔ gboo wɛɛ ma koenɛ, mmɔ gbɛenɛ fo.
58010023	Mmɔ ma a ɔ yian bi, mbɛ mmɔ yii na tɛen mu Chisɔsi an ma, mbɛ sinan, mmɔ‑a yiima dɔ mende ya. Koe min na mu, a wɛn‑na mmɔ too ɔ dia, a ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn.
58010024	A sin, mmɔ yiinachii chɛ, mmɔ ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ mmɔ ni mmɔ nyɔn deman, mbɛ mmɔ‑a ko chɛndɛ ma mmɔ nyɔn na.
58010025	Mmɔ ma ban bɛn koe a kaina dɔndɔ, yɔ mɔɛ dɔ n mbe a ma buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ mmɔ ni mmɔ nyɔn faa ma nande, a bɛbɛɛ tima ɔ ma yansan to ka buɛ min dɔ, Mansa Chisɔsi na koe a.
58010026	Mmɔ ban‑da ka buɛ min dɔ tea ɔ sɔn‑da, a si Chisɔsi ma, mmɔ ma ko yama ma bia to mmɔ boo fea a. Ni mmɔ‑a chɛ ma, yasi kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a nɔ, min mbe a ma, Yataa ni a boo bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ.
58010027	Chɛɛ ni mmɔ‑a chɛ ma, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a gbɛ ko dɔndɔ an ma kɔn‑da gbɛ dechee, chiandia ɔ. An nɛ gbɛmbo tee a, ni ta wa chɛ min mbe mɔɛ n kasaa‑a, miin mbe ee Yataa ko a.
58010028	Sawa chɛ min be‑a Mosisi ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a yɔn‑da, siiya ɛ bɔ‑a wan a ma. Ni mɔ fea, sawa‑a a fɔ mbɛ tea mu, chinchin mbe ee a ɔ, an mbe an mɔɛ chɛ fa wan.
58010029	Ni tea mu chɛ a, fen koe ɛ na‑a ma‑a gbɛ mɔɛ chɛ a, min mbe ee a gbɔsɔ‑a Yataa 'a denɛ ko a? Yataa 'a dɔbɛn nama chɛ, Chisɔsi wii min bɔn‑da mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a, mɔɛ min mbe ee a ya‑a fen kɔ fen na. Fen mbe ma‑a an mɔɛ chɛ a? Yataa Nyina, min mbe koadia demanɛ chɛ, mɔɛ min mbe a main. Fen mbe ma‑a an mɔɛ a? Wo wo yii na chii wɛ, ko yawaen chɛ a, Yataa ɛ min si‑a an mɔɛ chɛ a.
58010030	Koe min na mu, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N mbe a ma‑a wan, wo ni tɔɔya ko yama chɛ n ko a, wo‑a miin ma.” A yɛ to, a ɔ, “N fan Mansa Yataa, n fan mbe n 'na mɔɛ n gbɛmbo‑a.”
58010031	Yataa min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, a ma chianden mu, a boo ni sa mɔɛ ɔ.
58010032	Chɛɛ wo wo yii na chii koe miin na‑a si wo a, a saa a, tima min na wo na‑a manɛ ma sɔn, a si Chisɔsi ma. A tima chɛ a, wo na‑a tɔɔya ɔ gbɛama ɔ bia wan.
58010033	Tima dɔsa n na, mɔɛ n ni bai yama n sa wan wo ma fanka ɔ, an mbe faa ma gbaa koe n ma wo a. A yɛ to, tima dɔ gbɛɛ n na to, wo dɔn‑da wan sa koe chɛ n kaa a, an ni miin bia tena chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a.
58010034	Wo chinchin‑da chɛ n ma, miin ni sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a. A yɛ to, an‑na wo boo fenɛ n bɔ kɛn wo boo ɔ gbasaya a, wo faa nii ma yɔn ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, wo na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, fenɛ ɛ wan wo ko a, min benden mu an ma, fenɛ min mbe ma‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a.
58010035	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo gboo ɔ ma fa. Koe min na mu, a dankama a, wo e tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn‑da wan min koo.
58010036	Mɔɛ ɛ i faa bia wan, min mbe a ma, i ni che Yataa faa ma koe ma‑a. An mbe a ma, i ni fen chɛ ma sɔn, a na‑a tooɔdia chɛ min be koe a.
58010037	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, “Tima ɛnden fan toen mu gbɛ, mɔɛ min mbe na‑a, mbɛ a na‑a. A ee mɛ tena to, na koe a.”
58010038	A ɔ te to, “N 'na mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a n na, n mbe an ya mɔ tandenɛ a, a sin fan mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Chɛɛ ni min kɔ min‑na a kan kɔ sɔ n na, n bu ɔ ee dia‑a a mɔɛ chɛ a.”
58010039	Chɛɛ mɔɛ ma mmɔ wan na, miin mbe an kan kɔ sɔ, mbɛ an ka‑a Yataa chia ma. Chɛɛ mmɔ kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi a, a sin, mmɔ kun kaen fan mu.
58011001	Mɔɛ min yii na tɛen mu fen chɛ n ma, Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia miin na, a yɛ to, mɔɛ min dandenɛ ɛ koe n na, a ya ma miin dɔ yen ni, a mɔɛ chɛ an kai faen mu Yataa a.
58011002	Suun mɔɛ n na‑a an kai fa min chɛ Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, a faa chimaen ni an na.
58011003	Kaifa Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ a da a bai ɔ mu dechee, dunya gbɛɛ a dan‑da. Chɛ ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ fenɛ miin yen ka sanche, an ma bɔ ni fen kɔ fen dɔ, mɔɛ ɛ miin yen.
58011004	Ebɛɛ na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. An na‑a a ma, a‑a yasi be Yataa ma. An yasi chɛ ni nyin Yataa tena, a ben Ken ta ma. Yataa na‑a Ebɛɛ ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a, kaifa ɔ chia a, mbɛ a‑a a boo si a 'a yasi kɔɔ. Ebɛɛ faen mu wɛɛ boo ɔ boo bi tee chɛ kɔɔ, chɛɛ ɛ wɛ koɔ tena mmɔ tena tun. Koe min na mu, a na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, a sin mu tɔmɔsi an na mmɔ tena.
58011005	Ɛnoku na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, a ma fa ni. Chɛɛ min na‑a ma, a gbafun‑da wan, a sɛ Yataa tena, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma a yen ni. Koe min na mu, Yataa wandi an na‑a a ya, a sɛ‑a a a. Yataa 'a gboo ɔ te, mbɛ Ɛnoku e na gbafun, a sɛ banda bu ɔ, a na‑a Yataa faa chima wan.
58011006	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che a ma‑a Yataa faa ni chima, ni an mɔɛ chɛ ma a kai fa ni Yataa a. Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe na Yataa chen kɔɔ, fɔ ni a dan‑da a a, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wan nɔ. A sin, mbɛ Yataa ɛ tɔnɔnɛ be wan chɛ n ma, miin mbe na a tena.
58011007	Nowa na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, a na‑a a too ma sɔ Yataa 'a dasi ma, a si koe n ma miin ni na tena ma‑a, a nii ma miin sima ɔ yen nin bɛ. A na‑a Yataa da a kuiɛ a min fan, mbɛ a‑a dɛndɛ nyan, min na‑a a baun, an bɛ a 'a mɔɛ n na. Yataa na‑a Nowa ya wan mɔ tandenɛ a, min mbe bɔ dechee a 'a kaifa ɔ Yataa a. An kaifa chɛ sin dɔ, Nowa na‑a koe min ma ka, a na‑a a yian fan, mbɛ dunya ma mɔɛ n yau kaka.
58011008	Ebeami na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, min na‑a a ma, Yataa na‑a min fɔ a ye a ma koe a, a‑a a ma. Yataa na‑a a fɔ wan Ebeami ye, mbɛ a ni bɔ a waa a, a ni ta kaina, a nii ma ta ni kaina min tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ. Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia wan an kaina chɛ be koe a a ma, a ta a. A nii ma a ɔ sɔn, ɛ ta tena kaina min. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, a bɔ‑a wan a 'a chɛnyɛ ɔ.
58011009	A na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, min na‑a a ma, a ni ma chɛnyɛ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ a, chɛnyɛ ɔ, Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia min na. A ni chi tɛndi kɔɔ wan, yɔ sonda. A 'a denɛ Aisaki wɛɛ, an fea a mama denɛ Chekɔpi a, an ni chi ka wan. An bɛɛ, an na‑a too ɔ dia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an ma sɔn.
58011010	Koe min na mu, Ebeami ni wan tima ma kɔn tena, duu wa chɛ ma sɔn koe a, Yataa na‑a a too ɔ dia min na. Duu wa chɛ, Yataa wandi na‑a min siman, a‑a a sɔ gban, a ee yɔn kuɔ fɔ ko a.
58011011	A chenanchaen ni boo ɔ boo, a yɛ to, a 'a musu gbandayaen ni, Ebeami na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. Chɛ an na‑a a ma, a che‑a denɛ ma sɔn‑da. A na‑a dan fan a a, mbɛ Yataa ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn.
58011012	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, saya ni wɛɛ ka gbɛ a boo kana bia‑a, a mɔ dɔndɔ gbe chɛ cheeya nu, an kɔkoo. An kɔkoo yɔ tɔmbuaka nu banda a, ni yɔ tɛɛ kuu yii ɔ, mɔ ee che min dan‑da.
58011013	Mmɔ bɔ kɔnkɔɛ chɛ n sin, an nii ma sɛmbɛ ni an kai fa koe a Yataa a, aan an fa‑a a nyɔn na. An sin nii ma fen chɛ n ma sɔn ni, Yataa na‑a an too ɔ dia miin na. Chɛɛ an na‑a to pɔɔ wan, an‑na an fen chɛ n yen, mbɛ an bu ɔ dia‑a. An gbu sin dɔn‑da wan a ma den, mbɛ sonda mu an na, dunya chɛ ɔ.
58011014	Mɔɛ miin sin mbe bai bonda chɛ n fɔ, an mbe ma ka a fɔ an na gboden, mbɛ an mbe an ya a kan tena an ta chɛnyɛ an na.
58011015	An nii an yii na chii to chɛnyɛ chɛ a, an‑na min to an gbaa. Ni an na‑a chɛ ma wan, an ni kun‑da wan to yɛ koe a nɔ.
58011016	Chɛɛ an ni min ma gbɛ, an ni an yii na chii gbɛ chɛnyɛ an na, min nyin a ben a ma, banda bu ɔ. Chɛ ko a, mauma ko nii ma Yataa tena, ni an‑na a chee an 'na Yataa a. Koe min na mu, a na‑a duu wa ɔ bɛn fan an ko a.
58011017	Ebeami na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. An na‑a a ma, Yataa na‑a a yiima yan kɛn, a dɔn‑da a 'a den dɔndɔ gbe bɔ koe a yasi a. Yataa sin na‑a a too ɔ dia wan, a ɔ, “I 'a denɛ Aisaki cheeya nu dechee, an fan mbe ya‑a i cheeya chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n na.” Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Ebeami ma bɛnden fan ni a 'a den dɔndɔ gbe be koe a yasi a Yataa ma.
58011019	Ebeami yiima a koen fan ni, mbɛ ni a‑a Aisaki fa wɛ, Yataa ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. A sin, mɔ gbu ni a fɔ, mbɛ Ebeami na‑a Aisaki fɔɛ ma sɔn fan, a bɔ saya ɔ.
58011020	Aisaki na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. An na‑a a ma, Aisaki na‑a a 'a fɛnɛ n dua wan, Chekɔpi an fea Isɔ a. A danden fan ni a a, mbɛ dua chɛ ee bea‑a duu ma ya ɔ ma.
58011021	Chekɔpi na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, a e na to fa‑a, a na‑a Chosɛfi 'a den kaima fea an dua wan, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. A duuenɛ a 'a tungbɔɛ kun ma, ɛ ta‑a Yataa fai‑a.
58011022	Chosɛfi na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. An na‑a a ma, a na‑a bai fɔ, a si Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n bɔ koe ma Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A na‑a bai chɛ fɔ tima min na, a ni gbɛ fa tena wan. A sin, a na‑a a ɔ yian fan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n na, an mbe a tɔn buɛ min dɔ, ni a fa‑a.
58011023	Mosisi suun‑da tima min na, a woo mɔɛ n kai faen fan ni Yataa a. An na‑a a ma, a woo mɔɛ n‑na a nun a den toa tɔɛ a, kau sawa ko a. Koe min na mu, an na‑a a yen fan, mbɛ den ma kawaen ba ni a a. Mbɛ an faa gbɛa‑a mansa wa chɛ da a kuiɛ bɔ koe ma a ɔ.
58011024	Mosisi na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, kɛn a koa‑a. Chɛ an na‑a a ma, a nii ma dɔn ni an ni a fɔ, mbɛ Ichipi mansa wa chɛ 'a denɛ musuma chɛ, an‑na a wan Mosisi suun.
58011025	A na‑a a ma bɛn fan, tɔɔya ɔ bia koe a, an bɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n na, a e na ma buɔdia wa ɔ, ko yama ɔ.
58011026	A na‑a a ma bɛn fan, mbɛ nyanɛ gbɛɛ Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ, a ma che ni mainɛ ɔ bia koe a, Chasi ko a. Koe min na mu, tɔnɔnɛ an mbe a ɔ.
58011027	Mosisi na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a, mbɛ a bɔ‑a Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. A sin, chian bɛɛ nii a ɔ, a si mansa wa chɛ faa tɛ koe ma. A na‑a ma wan dechee, yɔ Yataa ni wan a ya kɔɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee min yen. A sin na‑a a ma wan, a na‑a a faa bia.
58011028	A kai faen fan ni Yataa a, min na‑a a ma, a‑a a ma, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ kun bɔ a ɔ bɛnɛ bia‑a. A na‑a a fɔ wan Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ye, a ɔ, an mbe sa tɔngbɔɛ min fa‑a, an ni a wii sin sin an 'na kankanɛ n ma. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, maeka min ni na‑a an 'na den kaima saa saa n fa koe a, a ni tin Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n 'na denɛ n kun ma.
58011029	Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na‑a an kai fa wan Yataa a, an na‑a a ma, an na‑a tachɛ chɛ, an‑na kɔ yii dɔndɔ ɔ tandin, an ni min chee, an dɔ, Yii Yawa, yɔ an ni ka duu gboo gbanda ma wan. Chɛɛ Ichipi mɔɛ n tana, an toen ni kɛn an ni tandin, yii chɛ na‑a ben fan an kun ma, an to‑a a ɔ.
58011030	Tima dɔndɔ a, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n ni Chɛiko duu wa chɛ a bɛn fan, tee wɔnfea ko a. An na‑a an kai fa wan Yataa a, min na‑a a ma, kanda wa min ni an duu chɛ a tindanɛ, a bɔn‑da wuɔn.
58011031	Daabi na‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, a ni wɛɛ duu dia a, kanda chɛ na‑a bɔn tima min na, a kun ma to ni a ɔ. Koe min na mu, a na‑a a boo si wan mɔɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, miin na‑a na da tɛ chɛ tena. Mɔɛ tɔɛ n tana, miin nii Yataa da a kuiɛ ma, an kasaa‑a wan.
58011032	Chɛɛ bai ee to n da a, a fɔ koe a. Koe min na mu, tima ee ma‑a nɔ, an gbɛɛ tɔɛ ɔ tɛ koe a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. Kideɔn ni ma, Baaki, Samisin ni Chɛfata. Mansa Defidi wɛɛ, an fea Samɛɛ a, ni Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ tɔɛ nu,
58011033	an 'na kai fa Yataa a, a na‑a a ma wan, an kun‑da chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ n ma chɛɛ ɔ. An na‑a tea din fan mɔɛ n ma. A sin, too ɔ dia na‑a chɛ wan an na, a yɛ to, an‑na a ma wan, yaa n ma che ni bia chɛ‑a.
58011034	An na‑a ta man ba n na dufɛn fan, mbɛ an bɔ‑a saya yuu a, chɛɛ chɛ boo ɔ. An na faen fan ni, chɛɛ an dɔ gbɛa‑a wan. An fanka ni koo chɛɛ ɔ, an sin na‑a chɛnyɛ dɔ gbɛɛ ɔ soya n bɔ wan chɛɛ ɔ.
58011035	Musu chɛ n bɛɛ, an na‑a an kai fa wan Yataa a, min na‑a a ma, an‑na an boo si to an suun ma nyɔɛ n kɔɔ. An suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ nu, miin na‑a fa, chɛɛ an kɔɔ sɔ‑a to saya ɔ, a yɛ fɔɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ dɔ n sin, an nii ma dɔn ni an kan kɔ sɔ koe a Yataa a. Chɛ ko a, an fa‑a tɔɔya kɔɔ wan, min mbe a ma, an ni an kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ, fɔɛ chɛndɛ ma sɔn koe a.
58011036	Dɔ n sin, an‑na an ma yɛn fan, an‑na an bosa. Mbɛ an‑na dɔ n chii yɔɔɛ a, an ta‑a an na pimbi chenɛ a.
58011037	An‑na an ma bon bon fan, an fa koe a, an‑na dɔ n tɛka fea a, mbɛ dɔ n sin, an‑na an fa chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a. An ni ben ben fan, an ma chiienɛ ɛ sa gboo a, chɛ ma, ba gboo. An yɔnden ni, an mbe ko ma gbaaenɛ sa‑a an ma, an mbe an bia yama yama.
58011038	Mɔ chɛndɛ bonda chɛ nu, an nii ma bɛn ni an dunya chɛ ɔ, ɛnden bɛɛ a. An ni ben ben fan an kun ye, yɔ mɔɛ miin baa ee, an mbe ben fuinɛ n ma, ni kɔnkɔɛ n dɔ. A yɛ to, an ni chi fanɛ n fan na, a basan sonɛ n na, duu gboo ɔ.
58011039	Tando ni koo, an gbɛɛ na‑a min ma sɔn, an 'na kaifa ko a Yataa a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, Yataa na‑a an too ɔ dia min na, an nii ma a ma sɔn ni.
58011040	Yataa na‑a chɛ ma, koe min na mu, ko dɔ mende an ni a yii ma mmɔ gbɛɛ ko a, min benden mu an too ɔ dia chɛ ma. Yataa 'a yiima ni min na, an ni chɛ an na. Mbɛ an mbe ee che ma‑a, yɔ Yataa toen mu an ni ma buɛ min dɔ, mɔɔ ni mmɔ bɛ ma‑a an na.
58012001	Chɛ gbɛɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ wɛɛ, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ mbe wan nɛ mmɔ tɛ ɔ, miin na‑a a ɔ yian an chɛ chɛ wai n dɔ, mbɛ an kai faen fan mu Yataa a. Chɛ ko a, mmɔ ni mmɔ boo bɔ ko ɔ ko ɔ, miin mbe mmɔ ɔ chɛ chɛ. Chɛ n mu ko yama n fan na, miin mbe mmɔ bia gban. A sin, mmɔ ni mmɔ ma bɛn koe n ma koe a a chia ma, fɔɛ ɔ min mbe ya ɔ ma. Mmɔ an ma mmɔ sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ bui chɛ buɛ min dɔ, bui chɛ bɛnɛ ɔ.
58012002	Mmɔ ni mmɔ yii sɔ Chisɔsi ma, tima ɔ tima ko a. A wan mbe a ma, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ kai fa Yataa a, a ka fɔɛ kuu sɔ tena ma, a ta a danka a. An‑na a gbangban tima min bɛɛ a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a nii ma a boo bɔ ni mmɔ wakoe ɔ. Koe min na mu, a na‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ chia dɔndɔɛ a, buɔdia wa an mbe a ya ɔ. A nii ma a ya ni mauma ko kan kɔ kan na, fa koe a kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. A sin mbe sanche gbɛ si ɔ wan, basɔmaya ɔ Yataa 'a mansaya sea boo nyima ɔ.
58012003	Wo wo yii na chii a mɔnɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ. A yɛ to, a‑a toomaya min dɔ bia, ko yama ma mɔɛ n boo ɔ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma a ma wo faa ni yɔn, wo ni sɛmbɛ wo kai fa koe a Yataa a.
58012004	Koe min na mu, wo e butuinɛ min dɔ, ko yama a, wo ma sɔ nin bɛ gban, an ni a fɔ, wo fa koe wɛɛ mu.
58012005	Wo ma nyina Yataa 'a bai ma, a na‑a min fɔ, wo faa ma nande koe a, a 'a denɛ mu buɛ min dɔ wo a. A na‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na denɛ nu, wo wo too ma sɔ, ni n fan Mansa Yataa ma‑a wo sɔ‑a chia ma. A sin, wo faa ma yɔn, ni n ma‑a wo ma tɔɔ‑a.
58012006	Koe min na mu, n toen mu mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ a, n mbe an sɔ wan chia ma. A sin, n mbe mɔ ɔ mɔ tɔɔ wan, n‑na min ya n 'na denɛ a.”
58012007	Wo wo bia tɔɔya a, wo ta yiima ɔ, min mu wo Fa 'a tɔɔya a. Wo 'a tɔɔya chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian tena wan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wo ya tena a 'a denɛ n fan na. Den mbe ee wɛ nɔ, kɛn gba, min mbe a fɔ, a ɔ, a fa ma tɔɔya si ni a a.
58012008	Ni a ma wo tɔɔ ni, yɔ a 'a denɛ n gbɛɛ, mbɛ a 'a denɛ chɛndɛ chɛndɛ ma wo a, ko tɛ denɛ mu wo a.
58012009	Min sien mu mmɔ fa n ma, dunya chɛ ɔ, an‑na tɔɔya si wan mmɔ a, mmɔ sin‑na baa be wan an ma. Fen mbe a ma gbɛ, mmɔ ee don mmɔ Fa kɔɔ, min mbe banda bu ɔ, mmɔ ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.
58012010	Mmɔ fa nu dunya chɛ ɔ, an mbe mmɔ tɔɔ tima kunduenɛ an ko a, yɔ an ta yiima ɛ a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye. Chɛɛ Yataa tana, ɛ a ma basan koe an na mmɔ ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ wɛɛ sɔnɛ ni ma, yɔ a ta ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
58012011	Ni mmɔ ma‑a tɔɔya kɔɔ, a tima chɛ a, mmɔ ɛ a yen koe an na, min mbe mmɔ faa yɔn, a ee mmɔ bu ɔ dia‑a. Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, chɛ gbakɔ, an tɔɔya chɛ ɛ miin koo‑a, an mbe faa chima ma sɔn‑da wan, a bɔ tea koe n dɔ, an mbe miin ma‑a.
58012012	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ɔ ni gbɛa, mbɛ wo faa sɔ‑a. Wo wo chenɛ n dɔ tan, an dɔ ni gbɛa gbau.
58012013	Wo wo tachɛ buɛ ma mɛn, wo gboo ɔ ma na fa wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ wo ɔ ni gbɛa gbau.
58012014	Wo butuin chɛ, ma koe a faachima ɔ mɔ ɔ mɔ a. A sin to, wo ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a. Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee Mansa Yataa yen‑da, ni a ee ka.
58012015	Wo tima ya, wo ma na wo kan kɔ sɔ koadia demanɛ a, Yataa ɛ min be. Wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma ma yɔ kɔn konama. Ni a koa‑a dechee, ɛ ma kɔn yama an na, a bɔɛ n tɛ ɔ.
58012016	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma ko tɛ ma a ma gbɔsɔɛ a, wo tɛ ɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma ma wo tɛ ɔ, Yataa wakoe ee min faa ɔ, yɔ Isɔ. Den saa ni a a, chɛɛ a tana, daun fen dɔndɔ gbe ko a, a‑a an tea ma tachɛ wan.
58012017	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ chɛ gbakɔ, a toen ni a fa ni a dua, chɛɛ chɛ nii bɛn to. Koe min na mu, a na‑a chia yan fan boo ɔ boo, dua chɛ ma sɔn koe a, chɛɛ a nii ma a ma sɔn ni. A na‑a di chɛ wɛɛ, chɛɛ a nii ma che ni, ko ɔ ko ka‑a a gba ɔ.
58012018	Wo ma na ni ka yɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu, miin na‑a an mbe koe a tisɔn kaina min. An na‑a wan Saina kɔnkɔɛ kɔɔ, ta man ba ni kaina min, a yɛ to, pimbi wa bundenɛ ɛ. Fia fichi fichi wa wɛɛ ni bɔ tena wan nɔ,
58012019	buu kuiɛ, a basan kuiɛ wɛɛ a min na min‑da. Mɔɛ chɛ n‑na kuiɛ chɛ a min kɛn, an‑na disa chɛ wan, an ma na bai dɔ mende a min to,
58012020	koe min na mu, an nii che an kun bɔ‑a Yataa da a bai chɛ kɔɔ, a na‑a min fɔ a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Ni soe nan fan bɛɛ tu‑a kɔnkɔɛ chɛ a, a ma ɛ bon bon fan senɛ a, aan a ni fa.”
58012021	An koe ma chianden ni sai ma, min‑na a ma, Mosisi‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “N mbe samba tena wan, chiandia a.”
58012022	Chɛɛ wo‑a min ma gbɛ, wo na‑a Sayɔn kɔnkɔɛ kɔɔ, wo na‑a duu wa chɛ ɔ Yataa tena, min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a. Wo na‑a Chuusaɛn, min mbe banda bu ɔ, maeka wu sɛsɛ n mbe kaina min, buɔdia ɔ.
58012023	Wo na‑a gbɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n 'na chɔchi ɔ, a 'a denɛ saa nu. A sin, an tɔɛ nyɛndenɛ mu banda bu ɔ gboo ɔ. Wo na‑a gbɛ Yataa tena, min mbe mɔ gbu gbɛɛ gbɛmbo‑a. Wo na‑a gbɛ fuɛ n tena, mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa na‑a miin ya mɔ tandenɛ n na, a chen kɔɔ, an fuɛ nu. A yɛ to, a‑a an ma yɔ a toen mu an ni ma buɛ min dɔ, banda bu ɔ.
58012024	Wo na‑a Chisɔsi tena, min ni wo tɛ wo bɛ Yataa a, dɔbɛn nama chɛ chɛ koe a. Wo na‑a a wii tena, min bɔn‑da, wo too ɔ dia koe a fen chɛndɛ a, a ben Ebɛɛ wii ta ma.
58012025	Wo a ma wo ma gbɔsɔɛ a, wo too ma sɔ koe a Yataa ma, ni a ma‑a koɔ‑a. Mɔɛ miin na‑a ban an too ma sɔ koe a, tima min na a ni dasi be tena an ma dunya ɔ, an na‑a tɔɔya ɔ bia wan. Ni a ma‑a koɔ‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ, mbɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ kan kɔ sɔ, mmɔ wɛɛ ɛ tɔɔya ɔ yen‑da wan.
58012026	A kuiɛ na‑a duu gboo ɔ samba wan, a tima chɛ a. Chɛɛ sanche chɛ ɔ, a‑a tooɔdia chɛ mmɔ a, a ɔ, “A to‑a to dɔndɔ, dɔ samba chɛ koe a. Duu gboo dechee ma chɛ nɛnɛ ɔ, chɛɛ banda gbu wɛɛ a.”
58012027	Bai chɛ ɛ a fɔ tena wan, mbɛ fenɛ gbɛɛ miin mbe samba, an mbe ban‑da wan dunya ma. Chɛɛ fen chɛ n sin gbɛɛ, miin mbe ee samba, an fan mbe to‑a an gba n dɔ.
58012028	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ Yataa wai bɔ. Koe min na mu, a‑a gbasaya be mmɔ ma, ma koe a mansaya ɔ a waa a, a sin mbe ee che yɔn‑da. Mmɔ a wai bɔ, mmɔ ni a fai chiandia ɔ, min mbe ma faachima a a tena.
58012029	Koe min na mu, mmɔ 'a Yataa ɛ wan yɔ ta min mbe fenɛ n minda fion.
58013001	Wo to wo nyɔn na tima ɔ tima ko a, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ to buɛ min dɔ a suun ma nyɔɛ n na.
58013002	Wo ma wo boo bɔ ko chɛndɛ ma koe ɔ, sonda n na. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ dɔ n to‑a ko chɛndɛ ma an na, a yiima wɛɛ nii an dɔ, mbɛ an‑na an boo si maeka n kɔɔ.
58013003	Mɔɛ miin mbe sa ɔ pimbi chenɛ a, an bakoe ni ma wo faa ɔ, yɔ wo bɛ an mbe nɔ an na. Ni chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia tena. Wo a ma yɔ wo bɛ an mbe an tɔɔya chɛ ɔ bia tena.
58013004	Basɔmaya wa ni be fuu ma, wo gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ. A sin, wo ma waa ma basan mɔ dɔ mende n na, wo ee miin na fuu ɔ. Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min mbe koe tɛ, ɛ waa ma basan mɔ dɔ mende n na, Yataa ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ gbɛmbo‑a wan.
58013005	Kɔpɔɛ wakoe ma ma wo faa ɔ kaka. Chɛɛ fen kɔ fen min mbe wo boo ɔ, wo bu ɔ ni dia, mbɛ ɛ wo boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a fɔ wan a 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “N mbe ee i dɔndɔ gbe to‑a, n sin, n mbe ee i boo ka‑a.”
58013006	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ yii na tɛenɛ ni ma Yataa ma, mbɛ mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mmɔ ɔ, “Mansa Yataa an mbe basan n ma, n mbe ee chian dɔ, mɔ gbu ee ko ɔ ko ma n na.”
58013007	Wo ma nyina wo ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma, chɛ nu, miin na‑a Yataa bai sa wo tena. Wo wo yii na chii min na‑a an tan fɔɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a wo kai fa Yataa a, yɔ an ni buɛ min dɔ.
58013008	Chisɔsi Chasi ma mun ni a kɔma a, a ee mun bi tee chɛ kɔ, a sin mbe ee mun‑da kuɔ fɔ ko a.
58013009	Wo ma dɔn kan sɛsɛ nu, miin kaen mu sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ ma, an ni wo ka Yataa chia ma. A nyin mmɔ ni faa sɔɛ ma sɔn, koadia demanɛ ɔ, Yataa ɛ min chɛ. Chɛ benden mu bea koe ma sawa n fɛ, miin sien mu daun fenɛ n ma. Mɔɛ miin mbe bea sawa chɛ n fɛ, an nii ma an deman ni.
58013010	Mɔɛ miin mbe an 'na tɛ mɔ wai chɛ tena Yataa 'a tɛndi ɔ, tea ee an boo ɔ, tɔnɔnɛ ma sɔn koe a yasi ɔ, min bɔ‑a Yataa tena mmɔ ko a.
58013011	Chu n 'na sawa kɔɔ, chɛ an ni ma. Chu n tɛ mɔ wa Yataa a, a ɛ na soe wii an na Yataa 'a tɛndi ɔ, san kɔ san na. Ɛ ta wan a a kaina chɛ, tɛndi chɛ ɔ, min mbe tenchen Yataa ko a. Mbɛ a‑a a be Yataa ma, mɔ gbu n 'na ko yama n ko a. Chɛɛ an soe su n tana, an ni an minda chia kunɛ a wan.
58013012	Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chisɔsi wɛɛ nii ma fa ni duu wa chɛ bu ɔ wan. An bɔ‑a wan a a, mbɛ an‑na a fa. Chɛ ma‑a, a 'a mɔɛ n ni ma tenchen Yataa ko a, a wii chɛ 'a gbasaya ɔ.
58013013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ ta a tena kaina chɛ, min mbe chia kunɛ a. Mbɛ mmɔ‑a mmɔ kunɛ don mau ɔ, yɔ a na‑a miin dɔ bia.
58013014	Chɛ ko a, duu ee ma‑a nɛ mmɔ boo ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ, min mbe ma‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a. Mmɔ ya ɛ an duu chɛ an ya ɔ, min mbe na tena.
58013015	Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ tando be Yataa ma, tima ɔ tima ko a. Mmɔ 'a yasi dɔndɔ mu chɛ an na, mmɔ ɛ min be a ma, Chisɔsi 'a gbasaya ɔ. Mɔɛ min mbe a fɔ, a ɔ, ɛ Yataa an ko a, a ɛ chɛ an fɔ.
58013016	Wo ma nyina ko chɛndɛ ma koe a, a basan wo nyɔn deman koe a. Koe min na mu, koe n fan nɛ miin mu yasi a, Yataa faa chima koe a.
58013017	Wo kooya be wo ya ɔ sɔɛ n ma, wo ni bea an da a kuiɛ n fɛ. An fan mbe wo kun ma fɛn tena, tima ɔ tima ko a. Koe min na mu, an mbe na‑a wan a ɔ yian‑da Yataa a, an ni wo kun ma fɛn buɛ min dɔ. Ni wo‑a kooya be an ma, an mbe an 'na wai chɛ‑a buɔdia an na. Ni wo ma kooya be ni an ma, an mbe a chɛ‑a faa yɔnɛ an na. A sin mbe ee ma‑a ko a tenden na wo tena.
58013018	Wo wo boo a chii samunɛ ma, nn ko a. Nn danden fan mu a a, mbɛ nn yiima a koenɛ mu fion. Koe min na mu, nn mbe butuin chɛ tima ɔ tima ko a, tea koe an ma koe a.
58013019	A sin, n mbe wo ɔ tisa tena n faa gbɛɛ a, samunɛ chɛ koe a n ko a, Yataa ni a ma, n ni na to wo tena.
58013020	Yataa‑a a ma wan, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi‑a a kɔɔ sɔ, a ka saya ɔ. Mmɔ ɛ wan gbɛ yɔ sa nu, Chisɔsi ɛ miin kun ma fɛn. A‑a a wandi wii a bɔn fan, mmɔ ko a. Chɛ sin ma‑a wan dɔbɛn nama a, min mbe ma‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a. Chisɔsi wii chɛ 'a gbasaya ɔ, Yataa min mbe faa chima be,
58013021	a ni basan wo ma chia ɔ chia a, wo toen mu min na, a faa ma koe ma koe a. A sin ni a ma, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, mmɔ ni ko ɔ ko ma, min mbe a faa chima. A sin, tando ni ma Chasi tɔɛ ma, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
58013022	Wo dimu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo wo too ma sɔ bai chɛ n ma. Bai chɛ nu, gboo chɛ ɔ, miin mbe wo faa ma nande. Koe min na mu, gboo kundu mu dechee, n‑na min nyɛn ka wo tena.
58013023	N toen mu wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ, Timoti, an‑na a boo ka, a bɔ pimbi chenɛ a. Ni a fua‑a na‑a, nn fea, nn mbe na‑a wan wo tena.
58013024	Wo wo 'a ya ɔ sɔɛ n gbɛɛ kɔndɔn n ye, a basan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. Mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, miin mbe Itadi chɛnyɛ ɔ, an bɛɛ ni wo kɔndɔn.
58013025	Yataa ni wo gbɛɛ dua.
59001001	N fan Chimisi, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena. N mbe wai chɛ tena Yataa an ko a, an fea Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a. N mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ nu, wo wɛn na fasandenɛ ɛ a ɔ gbɛɛ ben‑da dunya ɔ. N mbe wo gbɛɛ kɔndɔn tena kaka.
59001002	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo bu ɔ ni dia, ni ko yawaen kan kɔ kan‑na wo tan.
59001003	Koe min na mu, wo‑a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni an koe chɛ n‑na wo tan, a ɔ sɔn koe mu ni wo kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi Chasi a. A sin, ni wo kai faen fan mu a a, mbɛ wo e kun‑da wan an dɔ bia‑a.
59001004	Wo 'a faabia ma ni munda, a da ni fa gban. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, wo ni ma yɔ Yataa toen mu buɛ min dɔ wo ma koe a. A sin, mabɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a wo ma fɔɛ ɔ.
59001005	Ni yiimatɛ ee wo ɔ, a ɔ sɔn koe a, Yataa toen mu wo ni ma buɛ min dɔ, wo a ɔ tisa. A ee ban‑da a be koe a wo ma. Koe min na mu, ɛ fen sɛsɛ be wan mɔ gbu ma, a bu ɔ diama ɛ.
59001006	Chɛɛ ni wo ma‑a a ɔ tisa‑a, sika ma ma wo ɔ, wo ni wo kai fa a a gban. Ni sika ma‑a mɔɛ min dɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ wan yɔ yii wa, fia ɛ min dɔ ma ma tangban tangban.
59001007	Mɔɛ n fan nɛ, miin mbe ee an yiima ɔ bɛn, a maenɛ ɛ taka taka. Mɔɛ chɛ n sima nu, a ni ma an yii ma, mbɛ Mansa Yataa ee fen kɔ fen be‑a an ma.
59001009	Yataa 'a mɔ kan kɔ kan, min mu yɔn tɔɛ a, a bu ɔ ni dia. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a ya mansaenɛ a.
59001010	Yataa 'a mɔ kan kɔ kan, min mu nyan tɔɛ a, a wɛɛ bu ɔ ni dia. Koe min na mu, a 'a nyanɛ ma Yataa ya a fen fen na. Nyan tɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ kɔn fu. Ɛ bi yen fan, mbɛ sinan a fa‑a.
59001011	Ni tee bɔ‑a, a a kɔɔen ba a, a winɛ ɛ kɔn fu a kɔnya‑a wan, mbɛ a fuu bɔn‑da. A 'a nyanɛ gbɛɛ yayi‑a. Nyan tɔɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe ka wan. An na ɛ kɔnya‑a wan, mbɛ an fa‑a, an 'na nyanɛ gbɛɛ ɔ.
59001012	Yataa ɛ mɔɛ chɛ n dua‑a wan, miin mbe an faa bia, ni ko yawaenɛ‑a an tan. Koe min na mu, ni an‑na an koe chɛ ɔ bia, Yataa ɛ boo ɔ gbasi woo min be‑a an ma, ɛ ma‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an na. Fɔɛ chɛ, a na‑a tooɔdia be koe an na mɔɛ n ma, miin toen mu a a.
59001013	Chɛ ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee Yataa ɔ siman, ko yama ma koe a. A sin mbe ee mɔ ɔ mɔ yiima yan, ko yama ma koe a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ, min toen mu a ni ko yama ma, a ma a fɔ kuɔ fɔ, mbɛ Yataa an mbe ka a yiima yan‑da.
59001014	Chɛɛ mɔ faa ma koe nu, miin ma nyin, an fan mbe mmɔ nande ko yama ma koe a.
59001015	Mɔ faa ma koe yama chɛ nu, an fan mbe na ko yama n na. Mbɛ ko yama chɛ n sin ko a, a na‑a saya a.
59001016	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ko a di n ye. Wo ma dɔn mɔ ɔ mɔ ni wo bun.
59001017	Ko chɛndɛ gbɛɛ, mabɔ ee min ma, ɛ ka Yataa an tena. Manɛ gbɛɛ, miin na dandenɛ ɛ banda bu ɔ, a boo gba mu an na. Ko chɛndɛ kan kɔ kan, mabɔ ee min ma, a wan‑na an be mmɔ ma, a ka banda bu ɔ. A tana, a ee mun kuɔ fɔ. A ee ka yɔ nininɛ, min mbe ka a gba ɔ.
59001018	Yataa wandi gbu ta dɔbɛn chɛndɛ ɔ mu, a‑a mmɔ ya a ta denɛ n na. Yataa‑a a ma wan, a 'a bai, min mu tea a, a‑a fɔɛ nama be mmɔ ma. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, fen fen a na‑a min na dan, mmɔ wan mu a saa a.
59001019	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ko a di n ye. A sin, wo chɛ sa wo yii ma. Ni wo too ma sɔ koe mu, wo ma tima yayi a ma sɔ koe a. Chɛɛ wo tima ya koɔ koe a. Wo ni tima ya, faatɛ bɔ koe a.
59001020	Wo e faatɛ min bɔ ka, Yataa toen mu wo ni ma mɔ tandenɛ min na, a ee wo ma‑a a a, tima dɔndɔ wɛɛ ko a.
59001021	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ni wo boo bɔ ko yama gbɛɛ ɔ wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ. Wo ni wo boo si a 'a sakana bai chɛ kɔɔ, min been mu wo ma. Bai chɛ, a‑a a kun a ma koe a, wo ni bauncha ma sɔn.
59001022	A sin ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ sakana bai chɛ ma bea dechee wo too an dɔ, wo ni wo wandi bun. Chɛɛ Yataa 'a bai chɛ‑a min fɔ, wo an ma.
59001023	Mɔɛ min mbe a too ma sɔ dechee bai chɛ ma, chɛɛ a ee koe ma, a chia ma, ɛ wan yɔ mɛmɛ ɔ fɛn mɔɛ chɛ. Ɛ a wandi ma fɛn tena wan.
59001024	Ɛ a wandi ma fɛn fan, mbɛ a ka‑a nɔ, a ta‑a a ye. A ya kɔɔɛ a, ɛ nyina wan a ni buɛ min dɔ. A gbu gbɔsɔ ma, a ma buɛ ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
59001025	Chɛɛ Yataa 'a sakana bai tana, a nyin kaka. An mbe mɔ gbu kun ka. Mmɔ ma nyina a ma, mmɔ a a tun mmɔ too ma sɔ koe a a ma, mmɔ tachɛ chɛ a gbee a. Yataa ɛ mmɔ dua wan ko ɔ ko ɔ, mmɔ ɛ min ma. Mmɔ ɛ ma‑a mɔɛ n fan na, miin mbe bai chɛ a min, an mbe tachɛ a gbee a.
59001026	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ Yataa sɔn mɔɛ mu a a, a ni a da a kuiɛ kun ma fɛn. Ni a ma chɛ ma ni, ɛ ma‑a ka a wandi an woo a. A ma Yataa sɔn.
59001027	Mmɔ ɛ basan fan chiandenɛ n ma, an bɛ fuinya n na, ni an deman koe bɔ‑a. Mmɔ sin mbe ee a ma, dunya chɛ ɔ ko yama ma ni mmɔ wɛɛ ɔ chɛ. Chɛ an mu fɔɛ chɛndɛ a, mmɔ Fa Yataa toen mu min na, ma bɔ ee min ma.
59002001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ma to mɔɛ dɔ n na, a ni ben dɔ n ma. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, wo ee che a fɔ‑a, mbɛ wo kai faen fan mu mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi a, min mbe si ɔ a 'a basɔmaya ɔ.
59002002	Mmɔ a ya wɛ, mbɛ mɔ fea na‑a bɛnɛ ɔ. Mɔ dɔndɔɛ chɛ, a ma bɛndenɛ ɛ koa baa gbanden ba ɔ, yɔɔɛ basan chia baa gbandenɛ n na, an chɛenɛ ɛ a ma. Mbɛ dɔndɔɛ sin na‑a, min mu yɔn tɔɛ a, a ma bɛndenɛ ɛ koa taa wa ɔ.
59002003	Mbɛ wo sin ma samba‑a gbɛ, si tena chɛndɛ be koe a, mɔ ma bɛnden chɛ ma. Dɔndɔɛ chɛ sin, wo ɔ, ni a di a ye, a ee ka‑a sɔ‑a. Wo ɔ, ni chɛ ma, a ni si duu ma.
59002004	Wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo‑a wo boo don ka mɔɛ n tɛ an dɔ. Wo‑a wo yii na chii buɛ min dɔ, a ma nyin.
59002005	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ko a di n ye. Ka n mbe chɛ fɔ wo ye. Dunya chɛ na‑a miin ya yɔn tɔɛ n na, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ an mɔɛ chɛ n fan ma, an nyan‑da a ta chia a. An‑na an kai fa mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi a. A sin, an mbe ma‑a wan a 'a mansaya kɔɔ banda bu ɔ. Mansaya chɛ, a na‑a mɔɛ chɛ n too ɔ dia min na, mɔɛ miin toen mu a a.
59002006	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo e tɛndɔya koe n ma wan yɔn tɔɛ n na. Min mu ka, nyan tɔɛ chɛ nu, an fan mbe wo konkon, an mbe ta wo a kuti ɔ.
59002007	An fan mbe baa bɔ tena mɔɛ chɛ tɔɛ chɛndɛ ma, Chisɔsi Chasi, min ta mu wo a.
59002008	Ko chɛndɛ mu, tea ko a, ni wo‑a mmɔ 'a sawa chɛ bia, min mbe Yataa 'a gboo ɔ. An gbu mu sawa chenama a. Sawa chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n ni to an 'na mɔɛ n na, yɔ an toen mu buɛ min dɔ an fandi gbu a.
59002009	Chɛɛ ni wo ma samba‑a nyan tɔɛ n dechee an ko a, wo e ma‑a ka ko yama an ma‑a. Koe min na mu, wo e ma‑a ka sawa chɛ an yɔn‑da.
59002010	Mɔ sin mbe ee sawa gbɛɛ bia, i ni dɔndɔ yɔn. Mɔɛ min mbe chɛ ma, e wan dechee yɔ mɔɛ min‑na sawa gbɛɛ yɔn.
59002011	Koe min na mu, Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an‑na a fɔ, a ɔ, mɔ ee waa ma basan mɔɛ a, wo ee fuu ɔ min na. An yɛ‑a to, a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, mɔ ee mɔ fa, sawa ma min fɔ ni. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ min mbe mɔɛ fa, a mɔɛ ban‑da sawa gbɛɛ yɔn‑da, an ni a fɔ a ma waa ma basan bɛɛ mɔɛ a, an mbe ee fuu ɔ min na.
59002012	Chɛ ko a, ni wo ma‑a koɔ‑a tima ɔ tima, ni wo ma‑a koe ma‑a, a ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ Yataa ɛ sawa chɛ an ya‑a, kaa a ni tɛ a si wo ma. Sawa chɛ, min mbe wo kun ka.
59002013	Koe min na mu, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan chɛ n ma, miin nii chinchimaya yian, a ni an tɔɔ. Chinchimaya tɔɛ n sin, an mbe chinchimaya sɔn‑da wan.
59002014	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ mmɔ kai faen mu Yataa a, a ni yen mmɔ tachɛ buɛ ma fɔɛ ɔ. Ni mmɔ ma chɛ ma ni, mbɛ mmɔ kai fa buɛ chɛ Yataa a, a ee mɔ ɔ mɔ baun.
59002015	Wo gbu, wo a ya wɛ, mbɛ wo suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ, a yen ko. Wo‑a a yen, fai ɛ min ma, daun fen bɛɛ ee a boo ɔ.
59002016	Mbɛ wo dɔndɔ ni a fɔ a ma, a ɔ, Yataa ni a dua. A ɔ, a ni koa be a ma, a ɔ, a basan daun fenɛ a. A mɔɛ chɛ ma ko chɛndɛ ma ni ka, ni a ma a bɔɛ chɛ ma chii ni, a ni a da nyin.
59002017	Wo‑a yen gbɛ, mbɛ mɔ kai fa koe Chisɔsi Chasi a, a dechee ma koe a. Kai fa min, mɔɛ n mbe ee a ɔ yen ko chɛndɛ ma ɔ, ko ma a a. An kai fa chɛ ma fen kɔ fen na, a faenɛ mu.
59002018	Chɛɛ mɔɛ dɔ nu, an mbe a fɔ‑a gbɛ, an dɔ, Chisianɛ dɔ n yen ko, an kai faenɛ mu Chisɔsi a. An dɔ, Chisianɛ dɔ n sin, an mbe ko chɛndɛ an ma. Chɛɛ n ni chɛ fɔ gbɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n ye, mbɛ n mbe ee a ɔ yen, ni mɔɛ kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi a, ni n ma a 'a ko chɛndɛ ma gba yen ni. Chɛɛ n tana, n mbe a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ n kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi a, n 'na ko chɛndɛ ma an dɔ.
59002019	Wo dandenɛ mu a a, mbɛ Yataa ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. Chɛ ma a kun wo ko a. Nyina yama n bɛɛ, an danden fan mu chɛ a, an sin mbe samba wan, a ma chianɛ a.
59002020	Wo wooen fan mu. Wo toen mu, wo ni a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ ni wo kai faenɛ ma‑a tenchen Yataa a, wo ee ko chɛndɛ wɛɛ ma, mbɛ yiimatɛ ma.
59002021	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mmɔ bemba n ta bemba, Ebeami, koe min na‑a a ma, Yataa na‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a. A 'a den dɔndɔ gbe, Aisaki, a ni an be tena yasi a, sen gbengbe ma.
59002022	Wo‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a kai faen ni buɛ min dɔ Yataa a, an fea a chɛ chɛ wai a, an na kanden fan ni. Koe min na mu, a chɛ chɛ wai na‑a a ɔ yian fan, a kai faen mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa a.
59002023	Chɛ na‑a a ma wan, Yataa 'a gboo na‑a bai min fɔ, a bɔ‑a a a. A ɔ, “Ebeami‑a a kai fa wan Yataa a. A sin, Yataa wɛɛ‑a a ya mɔ tandenɛ a a chen kɔɔ.” A yɛ to, Ebeami gbu chee‑a wan Yataa dia nyɔɛ a.
59002024	Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian wo a, mbɛ kaifa dechee Yataa a, a ma koe a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ ɛ ko chɛndɛ miin bɛɛ ma, an mbe wan nɔ, mɔ ya koe a mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa boo ɔ.
59002025	Ko tɛ musu dɔndɔ wɛɛ, min tɔ ni Daabi, wo a yen bɛ. Mɔɛ ni a a, min na‑a sonda chɛ n nun, mbɛ a‑a chia dɔ mende yian an na, an ta‑a min na. Chɛ na‑a musu chɛ ma wan mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena.
59002026	Mɔɛ min faen mu, a nyina ee ma to a fɛ. Ɛ ka wan dechee yɔ ni mɔɛ kai faenɛ ma‑a dechee Chisɔsi a, chɛɛ a ee ko chɛndɛ ma.
59003001	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo sɛsɛ ma ma ticha n na, mɔɛ n kan koe a chɔchi n dɔ. Koe min na mu, mmɔ wan kan chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan, a si mmɔ ma, faaakɔɔɛ wandi gbu a, a ben mɔɛ tɔɛ n ma.
59003002	Tima sɛsɛ ko a, mmɔ ɛ nyinamaya sɛsɛ bɔ wan, mmɔ gbɛɛ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe che tachɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ, a ma nyinamaya bai sa ni, mabɔ ee an mɔɛ chɛ ma. A sin, ɛ kun fan tachɛ koe a a wandi gbu a.
59003003	Mmɔ a yen bɛ, mmɔ ɛ koe min ma. Mmɔ ɛ kun fan, mmɔ ni a ma sɔ fen chɛ, min mu soo a, a ni a mun, a ni ta chia kan kɔ kan na, mmɔ toen mu min na. Kundu ɛndenɛ, mmɔ ɛ min don a da a, an mbe a ma, mmɔ ɛ che a mun‑da mmɔ ta chia a.
59003004	Mmɔ dɛndɛ wa chɛ wɛɛ ya wɛ tɔmɔsi dɔndɔ a. Ni a wii mɔɛ toen mu, a ni a kun sɔ kaina min na, fia ni ma bɔ‑a a gbasayaen ba wɛɛ, fen denɛ an mbe a ma, a ni ta an chia chɛ a.
59003005	Mmɔ nɛnɛnɛ wɛɛ ɛ ka wan. A dɔɔ wɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ ɛ bai wa wa n fan fɔ. Mmɔ mmɔ yii na chii wɛ, ta fuin fuinɛ ɛ woa wa minda buɛ min dɔ.
59003006	Nɛnɛnɛ nan gbu sin mu ta an na. Ko yama dechee an faenɛ ɛ a a, min mbe che wo gboo gbɛɛ a yɛ‑a kuu kɔ. Ɛ che wan a ma‑a, mmɔ 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ni mun, a ni chɛ ta ɔ, kasaa koe a. Koe min na mu, a 'a gbasaya kaen mu Sitana an tena.
59003007	Mɔ gbu ɛ kun fan, a ni fɔɛ fen yama kan kɔ kan ma man, yɔ a toen mu a a buɛ min dɔ. A ni konde n bɛɛ ma man, sawan fɛnɛ nu, an bɛ nyɛ n na.
59003008	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ ee kun, a ni nɛnɛnɛ ma man. Mɔ gbu kaka dɔndɔ an nɛ, min kun ma fɛn koe gbɛ. Ɛ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n tɔɔ wan, yɔ ka kona.
59003009	Tima dɔ n na, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ Fa Yataa Mansa tando wan, mmɔ nɛnɛnɛ a. Dɔ n na, mmɔ ɛ bai yama n sa mɔɛ n ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, an nyanden mu Yataa miinɛ an dɔ.
59003010	Mmɔ da dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, an mbe Yataa tando, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, bai yama bɔ‑a a ɔ. N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, chɛ ma nyin ɛnden bɛɛ a.
59003011	Mmɔ ma a ɔ yen nin bɛ, yii ni ma bɔ‑a duu gboo kɔɔ, a konama ɛ, a yɛ to, a nyima ɛ.
59003012	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ee che yii chɛndɛ bɔ‑a sonɛ ɔ, kuiɛ ɛ min dɔ. A sin, kɔnɛ sɔnden mu gbɔɛ min ko a, ɛ an be. Chɛɛ kɔnɛ ee kɔn dɔ mende ta gbɔɛ be.
59003013	Wo tɛ ɔ, ni mɔɛ min yiima tɛen mu, a‑a koe ɔ gbɛ, an mɔɛ chɛ ni chɛ ma. Mɔɛ n ni a ɔ yen, fɔɛ chɛndɛ ma, ɛ min dɔ. An ni a ɔ yen ko chɛndɛ ma, ɛ min ma, yonka ee a fɛ. Chɛ an mbe yiimatɛ ɔ yian.
59003014	Chɛɛ toomaya faenɛ ɛ mɔɛ min faa ɔ, a toenɛ ɛ dechee a faa ma koe n na, yiimatɛ tɔ ma a mɔɛ chɛ a. A yau ko yama tɔɛ gbɛɛ ma, a mɔɛ chɛ yii na chii koe a, mbɛ yiimatɛ tɔɛ mu a a.
59003015	Toomaya, ni mɔ gbu to koe a a wandi faa ma koe n na dechee, Yataa ta yiimatɛ ma an na. Dunya chɛ ma yiimatɛ an nɛ, Yataa Nyina ma to ni min na. Sitana an mbe dechee sɔ ɔ an yiimatɛ chɛ nyɔn sima kɔ.
59003016	Kan kɔ kan, toomaya ɛ kaina, a yɛ to, mɔɛ n toen mu kaina dechee an fan ni ta ya ɔ ma, ko yama kan kɔ kan mbe nɔ wan. An kaina chɛ, koe a fasandenɛ mu nɔ tima ɔ tima.
59003017	Chɛɛ koe saa saa mu min na, Yataa ta yiimatɛ, ko ɔ ko ee a ma. Sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ ee a kɔ chia a, faachima an mbe a ɔ. A yɛ to, basamaya an be a ɔ, chinchimaya, ni ko chɛndɛ ma. Yiimatɛ an nɛ, min mbe ee mɔ ya bɔ, nɛnɛn feaya sin mbe ee a ɔ.
59003018	Mɔɛ miin tanden mu Yataa tena, an mbe a ma mɔ dɔ mende n mbe ma kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, a nyin an ko a. Koe min na mu, ni an‑na koe n ma faachimaya ɔ, ɛ ma ko chɛndɛ n fan na.
59004001	Koe n fan mbe a ma wo ee bɛn, an mbe a ma, koɛ ɛ don wo tɛ. Wo faa ma koe chɛ nu, an fan mbe ma ka wo tɔɔ‑a.
59004002	Wo toen mu fenɛ n na, wo ee che miin ma sɔn‑da. Wo e to wo bɔɛ n boo fenɛ n na yama yama, chɛɛ wo ee an ma sɔn. Wo e koɔ, wo e butuinɛ chɛ. Wo e mɔɛ fa wan, boo fen koe a. Wo ee fen chɛ n gbɛɛ ma sɔn, wo toen mu miin na. Koe min na mu, wo ee Yataa ɔ tisa.
59004003	Chɛɛ wo sin gbu, wo ni Yataa ɔ tisa wɛɛ, wo ee an ma sɔn. Koe min na mu, wo 'a samunɛ ee ma a chia ma. Wo e samunɛ chɛ fen chɛ n fan ko a, wo faa ma koe n dɔ bɛn koe a.
59004004	Wo ma danaya ni gba Yataa tena. Wo gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni dunya chɛ ko a dia‑a wo ye, mbɛ Yataa ɛ ma‑a wan wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ni dunya chɛ ma‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ koadia nyɔɛ a, Yataa ma‑a a mɔɛ chɛ chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ a.
59004005	Bai min nyɛndenɛ ɛ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, wo ma a ya bai fuu a. A ɔ, Yataa‑a a Nyina min be mmɔ ma, a ɔ, toomaya an mbe a ɔ, mmɔ ma koe a Yataa ko a.
59004006	Chɛɛ Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ koo, min been mu mmɔ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa 'a gboo chɛ‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Yataa ma to ni dɔpanda tɔɛ n na, chɛɛ ɛ koadia demanɛ chɛ‑a wan mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin dɔ ma panda ni.”
59004007	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo kooya be Yataa ma. Wo ma dɔn Sitana ni kun wo ma. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ɛ a bui‑a wan, a ni ka wo fɛ.
59004008	Wo gbɛn Yataa ma, mbɛ a wɛɛ, ɛ gbɛn‑da wan wo ma. Wo wo boo a ko, wo wan ko yama ma mɔɛ nu. Wo faa ɔ ni gbɛ, wo wan nɛnɛn fea ti nu.
59004009	Wo chinchin wo wandi ma, wo ni sɛmbɛ yɛn chɛ koe a, mbɛ wo‑a di chɛ gbafi gbafi, wo 'a ko yama ko a. Wo wo 'a yɛn chɛ mun di a. Wo 'a buɔdia ni ma faayɔnɛ a.
59004010	Wo kooya be Mansa Yataa chen kɔɔ, mbɛ a‑a wo a sɛ.
59004011	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ma wo nyɔn ma bɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a bɔɛ ma bɔ‑a, a ni kaa a tɛ a ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a ka sawa chɛ an ma bɔ‑a, Mosisi‑a min be. Ɛ ɛ ma‑a ka kaa a tɛ‑a an sawa chɛ an ma. Ni mɔɛ sin‑na kaa a tɛ sawa chɛ ma, mbɛ a ee ma‑a to a kɔɔ. Koe min na mu, a ban‑da ma‑a kaa a tɛ mɔɛ a sawa gbu ko a.
59004012	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma i a, kaa a tɛ koe a mɔ dɔ mende n ma. Yataa dɔndɔ gbe an‑na sawa be, a sin fan mbe kaa a tɛ. A dɔndɔ gbe an mbe baunɛ chɛ, an mbe kasaa wɛɛ chɛ.
59004013	Wo chɛ a min, wo wɛn mbe a fɔ, wo ɔ, wo e na‑a wan ta‑a duu dɔndɔ ɔ, wo ɔ, wo ni ma nɔ san dɔndɔ ko a. Wo ɔ, wo e ma‑a wan nɔ fee fen ma tachɛ‑a, wo ɔ, wo ni kɔpɔɛ sɛmbɛnden ma sɔn. Wo ɔ, ni wo ma ta ni bi, wo ɔ, wo e ta‑a wan sinan.
59004014	Wo ee kun wo ni chɛ fɔ. Wo gbu ma a ɔ sɔn, fen mbe ma‑a sinan wo a. Wo wo fɔɛ ma fɛn bɛ, ɛ wan dechee yɔ sisi. Ɛ si dechee tima kundu ɛnden fan ko a, mbɛ a gbu ban‑da.
59004015	Wo e a fɔ wan dechee, mbɛ ni Mansa Yataa dɔn‑da, wo fɔɛ ni ma wo sun da a, mbɛ wo e chɛ an ma‑a sinan.
59004016	Chɛɛ wo e min ma, wo e yonka an tɛ ben‑da, wo dandenɛ ɛ wo wandi a. Yonka chɛ gbɛɛ ma nyin.
59004017	A ni ma wo yii ma, ni mɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn, e koe min ma, min nyin, chɛɛ i sin ma an koe chɛ ma ni, ko yama mu a a.
59005001	Wo wan nyan tɔɛ nu, wo chɛ a min. Wo di chɛ, wo ni wo nyinɛ a daun, faayɔnɛ a. Koe min na mu, ko yawaenɛ ɛ wo ya ɔ min koo.
59005002	Wo 'a nyanɛ ɛ ban‑da wan tui‑a. Chisi n mbe wo 'a koa nyima n daun‑da wan.
59005003	Wo‑a sanu miin na sɔn ka, ni kain gbɛ nu, an mbe ee ma‑a fen fen na. Wo 'a nyan chɛ, wo na‑a wo fa min na, an mbe wo gboo kasaa‑a ta ɔ. Wo‑a an sa tena ɔ bɛn ka wo wandi ko a, tee chɛ ma kɔnɛ a, kaa a tɛ tee chɛ.
59005004	A yen ko, wo ni mɔɛ chɛ n pawa wan, miin‑na wai chɛ wo 'a yadi n dɔ. Chɛɛ wo‑a an 'na pawa bia kafaya ɔ. An di kuiɛ che‑a Yataa tena, Mansa Wa.
59005005	Wo 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ɔ nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, wo e nyanɛ an dɔ, wo e wo faa ma koe kan kɔ kan ma‑a. Sanche gbɛ, wo bu ɔ di, wo sin tɔɔen mu. Kasaa chɛ tima an che‑a ka gbɛ.
59005006	Wo‑a kaa a tɛ, wo‑a mɔɛ chɛ n fa, miin ma ko ɔ ko ma ni. An sin nii ma sɔ ni wo a, wo ni an fa tena tima min na.
59005007	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo ma faabia ɔ, wo e ta‑a mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi yɛ tima ma kɔn‑da dunya chɛ ɔ. Wo a ɔ yen bɛ sɛnɛ sa mɔɛ ɛ faabia min chɛ, sama ma kɔnɛ a, sona ni chɛ. Ɛ a faa bia wan aan, tima ma kɔnɛ a, a 'a chin fen nyima ni che a ya tena.
59005008	A nyin wo wɛɛ, wo ni wo faa bia. Wo faa n ma yɔn, a mu min na, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi na tima ɔ ma yansan to.
59005009	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, wo ma gbonyɛ wo nyɔn na. Wo ma chɛ ma, Yataa wɛɛ ma na kaa a tɛ, a si wo ma. A yen ko, kaa a tɛ mɔɛ gbu ɛ sɔ ɔ chenɛ da a.
59005010	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, faabia ko yawaen dɔ bia ɔ, a tɔmɔsi dɔndɔ yen ko. A mu Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fan na, miin ni bai sa, Mansa Yataa tɔɛ ɔ.
59005011	Dua ɛ ma wan mɔɛ chɛ n ma, miin mbe faabia chɛ ko yawaenɛ ɔ. Kai Chobi mu an mɔɛ chɛ n dɔndɔ a. Wo‑a a a min fan, a na‑a a faa bia buɛ min dɔ. A sin, wo‑a a ɔ yen fan to, Mansa Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ na‑a bɔ buɛ min dɔ a gbee a. A mu min na, chinchimaya faa an mbe Yataa ɔ, a sin mbe chinchin.
59005012	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu, bai chɛ an mbe chɛ gbɛɛ kun ma. Ni wo ma‑a ko ɔ ko ma‑a, wo ma wo gboo. Wo ma wo gboo duu gboo ɔ, wo ma wo gboo banda bu ɔ ɔ, wo ma wo gboo fen fen dɔ. Ni wo‑a a fɔ, wo ɔ, wo dɔn‑da koe ma, wo dɔn a ma. Ni wo ma dɔn ni min ma, wo ma dɔn a ma. Wo chɛ ma, Yataa ma na kaa a tɛ, a ni wo tɔɔ.
59005013	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan wo tɛ ɔ, min mbe tɔɔya ɔ, a ni Yataa fai. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ wan wo tɛ ɔ, min mbe buɔdia ɔ, a ni tando be Yataa ma si ɔ.
59005014	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ sin mbe wan nɔ to, wo tɛ ɔ, min gbandien mu, a ni mɔɛ n chee, gbakoo nu chɔchi ɔ. An ni samunɛ chɛ a ko a. An ni yɛ, an ni tu chɛ a ma, Mansa Chisɔsi tɔɛ ɔ.
59005015	An mɔɛ chɛ n 'na samunɛ, danaya ɔ, ɛ a ma‑a wan, Mansa Yataa ni an mɔɛ chɛ baun, a ni a kɔɔ sɔ gbandi chɛ ɔ. Ni a sin na‑a ko yama kan kɔ kan ma, Yataa ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan a ɔ. A mu min na, an‑na a ɔ yian, mbɛ an kai faen fan mu Yataa a.
59005016	Chɛ ko a, wo wo 'a ko yama n kɔɔ yian wo nyɔn na. Mbɛ wo‑a samunɛ chɛ wo nyɔn ko a. Chɛ ɛ na‑a wan bauncha a wo tena, wo 'a gbandi n dɔ. Mɔɛ min tanden mu Yataa tena, ɛ samunɛ min chɛ, a faa gbɛɛ a, gbasaya koo min mbe bɔ a ɔ.
59005017	Kai Idaicha ni mɔ gbu an na, yɔ mmɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ a na‑a samunɛ chɛ wan pien, min mbe a ma, sona ma na na. Sona sin dɔndɔ wɛɛ nii ma na ni, san sawa ni a tɔɛ ko a.
59005018	Mbɛ a yɛ‑a, a‑a samunɛ chɛ sona ko a. Mbɛ sona bun‑da na‑a. A tima chɛ a gbɛ, chin fenɛ n‑na a kuu sɔ nyan‑da.
59005019	N suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ka‑a Yataa 'a tea chia ma, a suun ma nyɔɛ dɔ mende ni a ma, a ni yɛ a ma.
59005020	Mɔɛ miin mbe ko yama ma, a ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ mɔɛ min mbe an dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ a yɛ‑a Yataa 'a chia ma, a‑a an mɔɛ chɛ baun fan ka. A‑a a ma, Yataa‑a a boo bɔ an mɔɛ chɛ a ko yama main sɛsɛ ɔ, a sin kunɛ bɔ‑a saya ɔ.
60001001	N fan Pita, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ, n fan mbe ka gboo chɛ nyɛn‑da. N mbe a nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ chɛ nu, a na‑a a boo sɔ ka wo wɛn ma. Wo a fasandenɛ mu ben‑da, wo e sondaya ɔ chɛnyɛ sɛsɛ ɔ. Wo e pande Pɔndɔsi chɛnyɛ ɔ, wo dɔ n mbe Kadesia, a yɛ to, wo dɔ n mbe Kapadosia, wo dɔ n sin mbe Esia, a basan Bitinia chɛnyɛ ɔ a.
60001002	Mmɔ fa Yataa na‑a wo sɔn pɛn chɛndɛ chɛ, mbɛ a‑a a boo sɔ wo ma suun gbɔɔ. A sin, Yataa Nyina wɛɛ‑a a ma wan, wo ma‑a tenchen Yataa ko a. Chɛ sin mbe a ma tena wan, wo e kooya be tena Chisɔsi Chasi ma. A wii min sin bɔ‑a a fa tima a, a‑a wo ko fo. Yataa ni wo dua, a ni faachima ma munda wo ɔ.
60001003	Tando ni be Yataa ma. A wan mu Mansa Chisɔsi Chasi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa. Koe min na mu, a chinchin‑da wan mmɔ ma a ɔ benden ba a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mmɔ‑a fɔɛ nama ma sɔn. Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a a kɔɔ sɔ wan a ka saya ɔ. Chɛ naen mu gbɛ yiinatɛ ɔ benden ba an na mmɔ tena.
60001004	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, fen kuu ma chɛ ɛ wan nɔ, Yataa‑a min sa tena ɔ bɛn a 'a denɛ n ko a. Ɛ wan nɔ banda bu ɔ, wo ko a. Ko ɔ ko ma ma ni a a, a sin, tɔmbɛ ee a ma. An fen chɛ ee tui, a sin mbe ee ka a gba ɔ.
60001005	Wo danɛ min chɛ‑a Chisɔsi Chasi a, an fɛ mu Yataa ɛ wo kun ma fɛn tena gbasaya ɔ, aan wo ni bauncha ma sɔn. Wo e an bauncha chɛ sin ma sɔn‑da tee dankama tee ma wan.
60001006	Chɛ ni ma buɔdia a wo ma. Buɔdia chenama wa ni ma wɛɛ wo ma ya ɔ ma, chɛɛ tima ɛnden ko a, wo e na‑a wan ma‑a faayɔnɛ ɔ. Koe min na mu, wo e ko gbɛama sɛsɛ n dɔ bia‑a wan.
60001007	Wo e chɛ n dɔ bia koe min na, a ɔ yian koe mu, mbɛ wo kai faen fan mu Chisɔsi Chasi a chɛndɛ chɛ. Ta an mbe a ma, mɔ ni sanu ma kawa koe ɔ sɔn. Sanu min ka, mɔɛ ɛ kun, a ni a yɔn. Kaifa nan gbu sin, wo‑a min chɛ, a sɔnkɔ ee, a benden mu sanu ma. Ko yawaenɛ chɛ nu, an fan mbe a ma, wo ee mun‑da, wo e sɔ‑a wan gban. Wo sin mbe na‑a boo ɔ gbasi ma sɔn‑da wan, wo ni tando ma sɔn, a basan dua a. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan an tee chɛ ma, Yataa ɛ Chisɔsi Chasi yian‑da tee min ma.
60001008	Wo ma a yen nin bɛ, chɛɛ wo toen fan mu a a. A yɛ to, wo kai faen fan mu a a, wo ee a yen tena wɛɛ. A sin, sanche chɛ ɔ wɛɛ, wo bu ɔ diama mu. An buɔdia chɛ danka ee, wo ee che bai fɔ‑a a si a ma.
60001009	Koe min na mu, wo e ka bauncha an ma sɔn‑da kuɔ fɔ ko a. Kaifa chɛ gbu sin wo ɔ, a kaen mu chɛ an ma.
60001010	Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a a ɔ gbɛngbɛn fan chɛndɛ chɛ suun, koe ɔ sɔn koe a, a si bauncha chɛ ma. A sin, an na‑a bai fɔ wan, a si an koadia deman chɛ ma, Yataa ɛ min chɛ‑a wo a.
60001011	Chasi Nyina min ni an fɛ, a ni wan chia yian‑da an na a tima chɛ a. An sin na‑a an sɔɛ don fan, a ɔ gbɛ koe a, Chasi ɛ na‑a tima min kɔɔ, a basan a na buɛ gbu a. An na‑a a kɔɔ fɔ wan to, a ni tɔɔya min nyɔn dɔ bia‑a. An‑na a fɔ wan to, mbɛ basɔmaya wa an mbe an tɔɔya chɛ gbaa.
60001012	Yataa na‑a a ma wan, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ an mbe ee wai chɛ tena an fandi an ko a. Chɛɛ an mbe a chɛ tena wo wan ko a. Koe min na mu, an na‑a bai sa suun a si koe chɛ n fan ma, wo‑a miin na min ka sanche mɔɛ chɛ n da ɔ, an mbe ma sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian‑da. Yataa Nyina min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, an mbe gbasaya chɛ be an ma. An koe chɛ n fan gbu sin mu, maeka n bɛɛ toen mu, an ni miin dɔ gbɛ.
60001013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo yiima ɔ bɛn gbɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, wai n chɛ koe a, wo e min chɛ. Wo kun wo tachɛ buɛ kun ma fɛn‑da tima ɔ tima ko a, wai chɛ koe a. Wo yii na tɛenɛ ni ma gbae dua chɛ ma, min mbe be‑a wo ma. Dua chɛ, wo e min sɔn‑da, Yataa ɛ Chisɔsi Chasi yian‑da tima min na.
60001014	Wo ma yɔ den mɛsɛ nu, miin kooen mu Yataa tena. A sin, fɔɛ chɛ ɔ, wo faa ma koe n ma ben wo ma. Koe chɛ nu, wo toen ni miin na, tima min na wo nii ma sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min nin bɛ, a si Chisɔsi Chasi ma.
60001015	Chɛɛ wo e koe miin ma, an ni ma ko chɛndɛ n dechee an na. Wo ni ma yɔ Yataa, min na‑a wo chee, a ee ko yama kan kɔ kan ma.
60001016	A mu min na, a nyɛnden fan mu Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, mbɛ Yataa ɔ te, a ɔ, “Wo ma ko chɛndɛ ma a, yɔ n bɛɛ, n mbe buɛ min dɔ ko chɛndɛ ma a.”
60001017	Ni wo ma‑a samun‑da a tena, wo e a chee wo Fa an na. A sin mbe ma kaa a tɛ‑a, a ee a boo don mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ. Ɛ kaa a tɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ chɛ chɛ wai n fan ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, sonda mu ka buɛ min dɔ wo 'a fɔɛ chɛ ɔ nɛ dunya ma, wo chian Yataa ma, aan a che tee dankama tee ma.
60001018	Wo wandi gbu‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo ni wan baa baa fɔɛ ɔ, wo bemba n ta bemba n ni min dɔ. Yataa ma kain gbɛ an ya ni, chɛ ma sanu, miin mbe yɔn, a ni an be wo kun ka koe a, a bɔ an fɔɛ chɛ ɔ. Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, a na‑a fenɛ min be.
60001019	Chɛ ni Chisɔsi Chasi wandi ta wii gbu an na, min be‑a wo kun ka koe a. Chasi ma‑a wan yɔ sa tɔngbɔɛ yasi, tɔmbɛ nii min ma, a sin, a wakoe ɔ nii ma chɛ chɛ ni.
60001020	Yataa e na to dunya chɛ a dan‑da, a na‑a a boo sɔ pɛn Chisɔsi ma, ma koe a ka. Chɛɛ tee dankama tee chɛ nɛnɛ n kɔɔ, Yataa‑a Chisɔsi yian wo deman koe an na.
60001021	Chisɔsi Chasi, min‑na a kɔɔ sɔ a ka saya ɔ, a chɛ chɛ wai n fan‑na a ma, wo‑a wo kai fa Yataa a. Mbɛ Yataa‑a baa be a ma. Chɛ an‑na a ma, wo kai faen mu a a. A sin, wo yii na tɛen mu a ma.
60001022	Wo‑a wo boo a si min chɛ sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ kɔɔ, tea mu min na, wo ko‑a gbɛ, a bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ. Chɛ ni a ma, koadia chɛndɛ ni ma gbɛ wo ɔ. Ni a sin ma‑a ka, wo ni to wo nyɔn na pien, wo faa gbɛɛ a.
60001023	A mu min na, Yataa‑a a ma wan, wo suun‑da to a nama a. Wo 'a fɔɛ nama chɛ, wo woo mɔɛ nu dunya ma, an fan ma a be ni wo ma. Koe min na mu, an‑na fɔɛ min be wo ma, ɛ danka‑a saya an dɔ. Chɛɛ fɔɛ nama chɛ tana, ɛ ma‑a wan kuɔ fɔ ko a. Koe min na mu, Yataa da a bai chɛ, fɔɛ ɛ min dɔ, ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.
60001024	Ɛ wan yɔ a nyɛnden mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a gboo ɔ, a ɔ, “Mɔ gbu gbɛɛ maen fan mu yɔ bin gbii, an mbe fa wan. Mɔ gbu 'a dunya ma nyanɛ wɛɛ, ɛ wan yɔ kɔn fu, a ee mɛ a a.
60001025	Chɛɛ Mansa Yataa da a bai, ɛ ma‑a wan kuɔ fɔ ko a.” Bai chɛ mu sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ an na, min dɔ yian‑da wo a.
60002001	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo boo bɔ ko yama ma gbɛɛ ɔ. Wo sɛmbɛ fania fɔ koe a. A yɛ to, wo sɛmbɛ ma koe a nɛnɛn fea ti n na. A sin, wo main chɛ kan kɔ kan boo ka, mbɛ wo sɛmbɛ‑a too koe a mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n na.
60002002	Wo to Yataa 'a bai a min koe a, tima ɔ tima ko a, yɔ den toa toen mu buɛ min dɔ a de susu yii a. Wo a a min, min mbe a ma, wo ni kɔɔ Yataa sɔnɛ ɔ, mbɛ wo‑a bauncha ma sɔn.
60002003	A sin, wo wandi‑a a ɔ yen gbɛ, Mansa Yataa chinchinchaen mu buɛ min dɔ.
60002004	Wo na Chisɔsi tena. An mu senɛ chɛ a, min mbe fɔɛ ɔ. Mɔ gbu n ban‑da wan a ɔ, chɛɛ Yataa tana, a ma kawaen mu a tena, a sin‑na a boo sɔ a ma.
60002005	Wo na Chisɔsi tena yɔ senɛ miin mbe fɔɛ ɔ. Wo a ma Yataa ni a 'a chenɛ sɔ wo a. A yɛ to, wo e ma‑a tenchen tɛ mɔɛ n fan na, mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a. Nɔ mu wo e basɔmaya fenɛ n be‑a Yataa ma, ɛ a boo si‑a miin kɔɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, a mu min na, Chisɔsi na‑a a ma wan.
60002006	A mu min na, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “A yen ko, n 'na senɛ si Sayɔn duu ɔ. Senɛ ma kawaenɛ an nɛ, senɛ kuu ba gbu, n‑na n boo sɔ a ma. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn mbe i kai fa‑a a a, i mɔɛ chɛ ee che‑a mau‑a”
60002007	Wo wɛn kai faen mu a a, senɛ chɛ mu tɔnɔn ba an na wo tena. Chɛɛ wo wɛn ma wo kai fa ni a a, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Chen sɔ mɔɛ n na‑a ban senɛ min dɔ, an dɔ, a ma nyin, an gbu ma‑a gbɛ senɛ kuu ba wandi a, chenɛ gbu ko a.”
60002008	Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan to, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ n mbe an chenɛ n na tu‑a sen chɛ an na, an sen chɛ, mɔɛ n mbe nama‑a min ma, mbɛ an bea‑a.” An mbe an chenɛ n na tu‑a wan, koe min na mu, an ma dan ni Yataa 'a bai a. Yataa sin‑na a ɔ bɛn ka wan an ko a.
60002009	Chɛɛ wo tana, boo sɔ chɛen mu wo wan ma, Mansa Yataa 'a tɛ mɔɛ nu, wo wɛn mu chɛnyɛ a tenchen a ko a. A yɛ to, a ta mɔɛ mu wo a, boo sɔ chɛen mu wo ma, min mbe a ma, wo ni Yataa 'a kamaya ɔ yian. A wan Yataa min‑na wo chee pimbi pimbi ɔ, an na‑a wo a a 'a kamaya manɛ kɔɔ.
60002010	A saa a, Yataa 'a mɔ nii ma wo a. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ a 'a mɔɛ mu wo a. A saa a, wo nii ma Yataa 'a chinchimaya ɔ sɔn. Chɛɛ sanche gbɛ wo ban‑da a 'a chinchimaya sɔn‑da.
60002011	N dia nyɔɛ nu, sonda mu wo a nɛ dunya chɛ ɔ, mɔ gbama gbama nu. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo disa tena, wo ma bea wo gboo faa ma koe n fan fɛ. Tima ɔ tima ko a, an koe chɛ n mbe butuin chɛ an na, wo fo koe a Yataa 'a bauncha a.
60002012	Wo sɔnɛ n ma ni kawa mɔɛ chɛ n tɛ ɔ, miin ma Yataa sɔn. An mbe a ma‑a, ni mɔɛ n‑na wo chee wɛɛ ko yama ma mɔɛ n na, an mbe wo sɔn chɛndɛ chɛ yen‑da wan. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a an ni tando be Yataa ma, a na tee ma.
60002013	Wo kooya be chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, miin mbe gbasaya ɔ wo kun ma dunya chɛ ɔ. Mansa Yataa toen mu wo ni a ma ka wan. Wo kooya be chɛnyɛ ya ɔ sɔɛ ma, min mu kun ti wa a.
60002014	Mbɛ wo yɛ‑a, wo‑a kooya be kɔfana n bɛɛ ma, kun ti wa chɛ‑a gbasaya be miin ma, mɔɛ n kun ma. An fan mbe ko yama ma mɔɛ tɔɔ, mbɛ an‑na ko chɛndɛ ma mɔɛ tando.
60002015	Yataa toen mu, chɛ an ni ma. Wo 'a ko chɛndɛ ni a ma, baa baa mɔɛ chɛ n ni an da a tɔn, wooya bai n fɔ koe a wo ma.
60002016	Wo kooya be, yɔ Yataa 'a mɔɛ nu, miin mbe ee yɔncha ɔ mɔ dɔ gbɛɛ n kɔɔ. Chɛɛ yuu min tɛ‑a ka wo ma, wo ma ben ko yama ma‑a nun dɔ, wo ni a dɛn wo bɔ koe ma yɔncha ɔ. Chɛɛ wo tachɛ buɛ ni wo ma Yataa 'a yɔnɛ n na, tima ɔ tima ko a.
60002017	Wo basɔmaya be mɔ ɔ mɔ ma. Wo to wo bɔɛ Chisianɛ n na. Wo chian Yataa ma, mbɛ wo‑a basɔmaya be kun ti wa ma.
60002018	Wo wan bɔi denɛ nu, wo kooya be wo kun ti n ma, wo ni basɔmaya da faenɛ be an ma. Kun ti chɛ nu ma dechee, miin sɔnɛ n nyin, a yɛ to, an mbe chinchin wo ma. Chɛɛ wo a be chɛ n bɛɛ ma, miin mbe wo bia tena yama yama.
60002019	Yataa faa ɛ chima wan, ni wo‑a ko yawaenɛ n dɔ bia. Koe nu, wo sɔn dɔ ko ma miin na. Chɛ ni ma wo yiima ɔ, mbɛ chɛ ɛ ma wan Yataa chen kɔɔ.
60002020	Koe min na mu, ni wo‑a wo gbasi koe ma, mbɛ an‑na wo gbasi, wo ee tɔnɔn sɔn a ɔ. Chɛɛ ni wo‑a ko chɛndɛ ma, mbɛ wo‑a ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia a ko a, ɛ Yataa faa chima‑a wan.
60002021	An ko bonda chɛ mu, Yataa na‑a wo chee, a ɔ, wo ni a ma. Koe min na mu, Chasi wandi gbu‑a ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia wan wo ko a, min mu tɔmɔsi a wo tena. Chɛ ni a ma, wo wɛɛ ni puin a chen gba ɔ.
60002022	A nii ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni. A sin, fania bai nii ma bɔ ni a da ɔ tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ.
60002023	Bai yama n sa‑a wan a ma, chɛɛ a nii ma a ta ɔ nyɔn ni ɛnden bɛɛ a. A na‑a ko yawaenɛ n bɛɛ ɔ bia wan, chɛɛ a nii ma a wandi ma chian ni. A ni a ta gbɛɛ kai fa dechee Yataa an ma, min mbe tea kaa tɛ.
60002024	Chisɔsi Chasi wandi gbu‑a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ya wan a gboo ɔ, a ta kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a‑a mɔnɛ ɔ bia an ko a nɔ. A na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, ni ko yama ma koe mu to, mbɛ mmɔ su mu gbɛ. Mmɔ ɛ gbɛ fɔɛ chɛndɛ an dɔ. Magba min chɛ‑a a a, an‑na a ma, wo‑a bauncha ma sɔn.
60002025	A saa a, wo ni wan ben‑da wo kun ye, yɔ sa miin toenɛ a ɔ. Chɛɛ wo ya a yɛ‑a gbɛ Yataa ma, min mbe wo kun ma fɛn.
60003001	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, wo wɛɛ, wo wɛn mu kai sɔn musu n na, wo don wo chɛɛ n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ. Yataa da a bai chɛ, kɔkɔɛ an dɔ n mbe ban‑da wan an boo si koe a a kɔɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a wɛɛ, wo e ma‑a ka Yataa fɔɛ min dɔ, ɛ an mun‑da wan Yataa tena, a ben wo da a bai ma.
60003002	Koe min na mu, an mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan wo sɔnɛ nyin buɛ min dɔ Yataa chen kɔɔ, wo sin chianden mu ka wan to a ma.
60003003	Gboo ma nyanɛ an ma ma dechee wo faa ma koe a. Wo ni wo kundi a bonchen, wo ni sanu chɛ wo ma, ni kainɛ a basan koa baa gbandenɛ n na.
60003004	Chɛɛ nyanɛ ɛ wan nɔ, min kun ma ee ka, an mu musu sɔnɛ a. Musu ni tima ya tachɛ koe a mɔ dɔ mende n na, a sin, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ nyina ma ma a fɛ. Nyan chɛ nyɔn sima, an ma kawaen mu Yataa tena.
60003005	Suun musu nu, miin ni tenchen Yataa ko a, an ni an fandi a bonchen ka wan. An yii na tɛen ni Yataa an ma, an mbe an chɛɛ n 'na gbasaya kɔɔ.
60003006	Seda ni musu dɔndɔ an na, min kooen ni a chɛɛ Ebeami ye. A ni a chee, a ɔ, a kun ti. Sanche gbɛ, wo e ma‑a wan Seda bɔ nyɔɛ n na, ni wo‑a koe ma min nyin Yataa chen kɔɔ, wo ee chian kan kɔ kan kɔɔ.
60003007	A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a to, wo wan mɔ kaima n bɛɛ ni baa be wo 'a musu n ma. A ni ma wo yii ma, mbɛ wo ɔ gbɛ a ben an ma. Chɛɛ fɔɛ nama ta fɛ chia a, wo e min ma sɔn‑da, wo a kanden fan mu Yataa tena. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo 'a musu n bia chɛndɛ chɛ, wo bɛ an mbe Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ chɛ ma sɔn‑da. Ni wo‑a chɛ ma, ko ɔ ko ee wo 'a samunɛ ka‑a a chia ma.
60003008	Ka n mbe n da a bai chɛ kunɛ a bia nɛ, mbɛ wo yiima ni ma dɔndɔ. Wo ni to wo nyɔn na wo faa gbɛɛ a. Chinchimaya ni ma wo ɔ wo nyɔn ko a, wo sin ma dɔpandaya bɔ.
60003009	Wo ma ko yama a yɛ ko yama ko a. A yɛ to, wo ma mainɛ a yɛ mainɛ ko a. Chɛɛ dua an ni ma wo da ɔ. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a wo chee tima min na, a na‑a wo too ɔ dia wan, mbɛ dua an ni ma wo ta a.
60003010	Ɛ wan yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a min fɔ. A ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu a ni fɔɛ ɔ daun, tee chɛndɛ yen sɔɛ ɛ min yii ma, a ni a boo bɔ bai yama sa ɔ, mbɛ a sɛmbɛ‑a fania fɔɛ‑a.
60003011	A ni a kan kɔ sɔ ko yama ma a, a ni ko chɛndɛ ma. A ni yɛ, a ni butuinɛ chɛ, a faa gbɛɛ a, faachima ko a.
60003012	Koe min na mu, Mansa Yataa ɛ mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma fɛn‑da wan, miin tanden mu a tena. A sin mbe a too ma sɔ tena wan an 'na samunɛ ma. Chɛɛ ɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ma bɔ tena wan, miin mbe ko yama ma.”
60003013	Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee ko ma‑a wo a, ni wo ma bɛndenɛ ma‑a ko chɛndɛ ma koe a, tima ɔ tima.
60003014	Chɛɛ ni wo‑a tɔɔya ɔ bia wɛɛ, ko chɛndɛ ma gbaa chia a, dua wa mu wo ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a ma chianɛ ni ma wo ɔ, wo sin faa ma gbaa a.
60003015	Chɛɛ Chasi ma chianɛ ni ma wo faa ɔ, wo ni baa be a wan mansa ma. Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma, tima ɔ tima ko a, mɔɛ n 'na tisa yɛman koe a. Ni an‑na wo ɔ tisa, a si yiinatɛ ma min mbe wo ɔ, wo a ɔ yian an na.
60003016	Chɛɛ wo tima ya a ɔ yian koe a an na, basɔmaya chia a. Wo yiima a koenɛ ni ma, min mbe a ma, wo main mɔɛ n ni mau wo ma. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe bai yama sa wo ma, wo e ma ko chɛndɛ n ma‑a. Wo e chɛ ma, koe min na mu, wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ Chasi a.
60003017	A mu koe min na, a ma bɛnden mu mɔ ni tɔɔya ɔ bia ko chɛndɛ fɛ, ni Yataa‑a a fɔ ka wan, a ben tɔɔya ɔ bia koe ma ko yama ko a.
60003018	An na‑a a ma, Chasi wɛn nii ma ko yama kan ko kan ma ni, a na‑a tɔɔya ɔ bia wan mmɔ ko a. A wɛn ni ka mɔ chɛndɛ wa a, a na‑a saya dɔndɔɛ chɛ chɛ wan. A sin mbe ee ma‑a to, mmɔ mɔ yama chɛ n 'na ko yama n ko a. A na‑a chɛ ma, mmɔ ma sawan koe an na Yataa tena. Mɔɛ n na‑a a fa wan kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma, a gboo ɔ, chɛɛ a yɛ‑a wan fɔɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina ta fɛ chia a.
60003019	A tima chɛ a, mbɛ a ta‑a koɔ‑a faa mɔɛ n tena, miin nyina ni pimbi chenɛ a.
60003020	Mɔɛ chɛ n fan nii nɛ, miin nii ma kooya be ni Yataa ma. Yataa ni a faa bia tena wan an na, ɛ an ma kɔn‑da, tima min na Nowa ni a 'a dɛndɛ wa nyanɛ a. Mɔ kuundenɛ miin ni an dɛndɛ chɛ ɔ, an ni mɔ sɛi, yii chɛ na‑a miin baun.
60003021	Chɛ ni tɔmɔsi an na, yii ɛ chɛ buɛ min dɔ mɔɛ n kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, bauncha sɔn koe a sanche. A ma dechee nɔɛ ko koe an na, mɔɛ n gboo ma. Chɛɛ tooɔdia mu, mɔɛ ɛ min chɛ Yataa a, yiima a koenɛ a. An mbe na bauncha a, min ma sɔn‑da, a bɔ Chisɔsi 'a sɔ koe ɔ, a ka saya ɔ.
60003022	A wan Chisɔsi Chasi chɛ sɛ‑a banda bu ɔ, ɛ kaina min si ɔ Yataa boo nyima ɔ. Ɛ nɔ mansaya ɔ maeka n gbɛɛ kun ma, ni fen fen min gbasa, a sin mbe gbasaya ɔ banda bu ɔ.
60004001	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ, Chasi‑a tɔɔya ɔ bia ka buɛ min dɔ a gboo ɔ, wo wɛɛ wo sɔnɛ ni bɔ a ta a a. Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma tɔɔya ɔ bia koe a. Koe min na mu, ni wo‑a tɔɔya ɔ bia wo gboo ɔ Chasi ko a, wo ee ko yama ma.
60004002	A sin, wo ee ma‑a wo faa ma koe n fan ma‑a, aan wo ni fa. Chɛɛ wo ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, tima ɔ tima ko a, Yataa faa ma koe ma koe a.
60004003	A saa a, wo‑a koe chɛ n ma kaka, miin ma koe a ni di gbeden mɔɛ chɛ n ye, miin ma Yataa sɔn. Wo 'a fɔɛ gbɛɛ ni yau kaka. Wo ni gbɛ wa min fan. Wo e dunya ma koe ma to fiti fata. Wo ni mauma koe n sɛsɛ ma wan to. A yɛ to, wo ni fenɛ n fai wan, wo e an ya Yataa a.
60004004	Sanche gbɛ sin, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a, an kɔndɔ fii‑a wo a. An‑na a yen, mbɛ wo ee bea tena to an fɛ, ben‑da mauma koe ma‑a, wo gbɔsɔ wɛɛ ma. Chɛ an mbe a ma tena, an mbe bai yama n sa tena wo ma.
60004005	Chɛɛ an‑na koe miin gbɛɛ ma, an mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan Yataa chen kɔɔ. A ma bɛndenɛ mu gbɛ kaa a tɛ koe a fuɛ n ma, an bɛ chɛndɛ ba an na.
60004006	Chɛ an na‑a a ma, sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ na‑a sa chɛ n bɛɛ tena, miin na‑a fa. Chɛ na‑a ma, min mbe a ma, ni an gboo na‑a tɔɔya wɛɛ saya a, an nyina ni ma nɔ fɔɛ ɔ, yɔ Yataa ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
60004007	A ɔ ma yansan to, mbɛ ko ɔ ko che‑a a danka a. Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma, wo ni kun tachɛ koe a wo wandi a chɛndɛ chɛ, wo ni kun samunɛ chɛ a, a chɛ buɛ a.
60004008	Min mbe ko ɔ ko kun ma, wo to wo nyɔn na wo faa gbɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, koadia ɛ a ma wan mmɔ ni mmɔ ya ka ko yama sɛsɛ a.
