60004009	Ni wo bɔɛ n na‑a wo 'a chenɛ n na, sondaya a, wo ma gbonyɛ wo boo n si koe a an kɔɔ. An bɛɛ ni a ma ka wo ko a.
60004010	Wo gbɛɛ, Yataa‑a wo dua wan chia sɛsɛ a, dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a. An chia chɛ n sin, basan koe a mu wo nyɔn ma. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ Yataa‑a koadia demanɛ min chɛ wo a, wo e tachɛ tena wan a a chɛndɛ chɛ.
60004011	Yataa 'a bai sa wai nyima, an chɛen mu wo dɔ n na. Chɛ ko a, wo Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ yian mɔɛ n na, yɔ Yataa wandi an mbe ka koɔ‑a wo ɔ. Mɔ deman wai nyima an been mu wo dɔ n ma. Chɛ ko a, wo deman chɛ chɛ wo sɔɛ gbɛɛ a, Yataa‑a min be wo ma. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan tando ni be Yataa ma, ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan ko a, Chisɔsi Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ. Basɔmaya ɛ be an ma, a sin fan ta mu to gbasaya a, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
60004012	N dia nyɔɛ nu, wo e ka tɔɔya ɔ gbɛama min dɔ bia‑a, a ma ma dɔsimanɛ a, min mbe wo tɛnɛ‑a. Chɛ ma ma koe a, min mbe ka ma‑a wo a, yɔ a nyɔn sima ma ma ni a kɔma a.
60004013	Chɛɛ a ni ma buɔdia a wo tena, mbɛ wo e ko yawaenɛ min dɔ bia tena, Chasi na‑a an sima ɔ bia. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan wo ni ma buɔdia da faenɛ ɔ, ɛ yen‑da tima min na gbasaya ɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ.
60004014	An mbe wo wɛn main‑da, an dɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi fɛ mɔɛ mu wo a, dua ɛ wo ma. Chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, Nyina gbasayaen chɛ, Yataa Nyina, ɛ gbɛ wo fɛ gban.
60004015	Ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma‑a ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia‑a, a ma ma mɔ fa ko a. A ma ma to kanka chɛ koe wɛɛ a. A yɛ to, ko yama dɔ gbɛɛ ma koe a, chɛ ma, wo da chɛ koe a mɔ dɔ mende n 'na koe ɔ.
60004016	Chɛɛ ni wo‑a ko yawaenɛ ɔ bia, Chisian koe an na, wo ma mau ɛnden bɛɛ a. Chɛɛ wo ni Yataa wai bɔ, a mu min na, wo e wan Chasi tɔɛ ko a.
60004017	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a kaa a tɛ tee ɔ ma yansan to. A sin mbe kaa a tɛ kuu sɔ‑a mmɔ wan ma, a ta mɔɛ nu. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin mbe ee don Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛndɛ kɔɔ, an ta ma ɛ chian‑da wan.
60004018	Ɛ wan yɔ Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a ɔ, “Bauncha sɔn koe ɔ gbɛ, mɔ tandenɛ n boo ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin mu Yataa sɔn bai wa an na, mmɔ ma ɔ sɔn an ta ɛ ma‑a buɛ min dɔ.”
60004019	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo dɔ n mbe tɔɔya ɔ bia‑a wan, yɔ Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, wo ni to wo chɛ chɛ wai chɛndɛ n kɔ, mbɛ wo‑a wo wandi kai fa gbae Yataa a, min‑na wo a dan. A ee a da a kuiɛ yɔn tee dɔndɔ wɛɛ.
60005001	Sanche gbɛ, bai ɛ n da a wo ko a, wo wan gbakoo nu chɔchi n dɔ. N fandi wɛɛ, n mu chɔchi gbakoo dɔndɔ an na. A sin, siiya dɔndɔ mu n na, tɔɔya chɛ ko a, Chasi na‑a min dɔ bia. N sin, n bɛɛ n mbe an basɔmaya chɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, min dɔ ɛ yen‑da. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wan, n bɔ chɔchi gbakoo nu, n mbe koɔ tena wo tena n faa gbɛɛ a.
60005002	Wo ni mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma fɛn chɔchi ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa‑a miin be wo ma. Wo an kun ma fɛn wo faa gbɛɛ a, yɔ Yataa toen mu a buɛ min dɔ. Wo ma an kun ma fɛn faa ɔ nɔɛ a. Wo ma a chɛ pawa dechee an ko a. Chɛɛ wo‑a a chɛ, a chɛ koe a dia ko a.
60005003	Wo ma ma mansa n na mɔɛ chɛ n kun ma, Yataa‑a miin be wo ma an kun ma fɛn koe a. Chɛɛ wo sɔnɛ ni ma tɔmɔsi chɛndɛ a an tena, a nyin an ni bea min fɛ.
60005004	A sin, ni Chasi‑a a kunɛ a bɔ, a wɛn mu mɔɛ n kun ma fɛn mɔɛ n 'na mansa a, wo e banfua chɛ ma sɔn‑da wan, baa koo min ma. Banfua an nɛ, min mandenɛ ɛ ma‑a taun kuɔ fɔ ko a.
60005005	Wo wan mɔ tɔngbɔɛ n nan sin, a chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a, a nyin wo ni kooya be chenanɛ n ma. Wo ma dɔpandaya bɔ, wo e ma wai chɛ‑a wo nyɔn ye. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gboo‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “Yataa ma to ni dɔpanda tɔɛ n na, chɛɛ ɛ koadia demanɛ chɛ‑a wan chɛ n na, miin dɔ ma panda ni.”
60005006	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo ma dɔpandaya bɔ Yataa chen kɔɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, a gbasa ka buɛ min dɔ, a ni wo a sɛ, a faa ma tima a.
60005007	Wo faa gbaaen mu koe miin gbɛɛ a, wo Yataa ma fɛn dechee. A gbɔsɔen mu wo ko a kaka.
60005008	Wo ma bɛndenɛ ni ma tima ɔ tima ko a, wo ya a kaenɛ ɛ. Wo chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ, Sitana, ɛ ben ben tena dau‑a, yɔ yaa ɛ ma mɔɛ yan‑da a nimisa koe a.
60005009	Wo sɔ chidi wo 'a danaya ɔ, Chasi a. Sitana ma kun wo ma. Koe min na mu, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo bɔɛ miin bɛɛ kai faen mu Chasi a dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, an mbe ko yawaen dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an dɔ bia tena.
60005010	Chɛɛ wo ee tɔɔya‑a, a ɔ yansama a. Koadia demanɛ gbɛɛ, a ti mu Yataa an na. A wan‑na wo chee, wo ni ma a 'a basɔmaya kɔɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a, ni wo ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a. A wan mbe wo ma mɔɛ n na, miin dɔ gbɛ an 'na danaya ɔ, an sin mbe sɔ ɔ chidi. A wan mbe an kuu don gban.
60005011	Yataa gbasayaen mu kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
60005012	N mbe ka gboo kunduenɛ min nyɛn‑da wo tena, Sidasi an mbe basan tena n ma. N 'na yiinachii ɔ, suun ma nyɔɛ mu a a, Chasi ɔ, n danden mu min na chɛndɛ chɛ. N toen mu n ni wo faa n ma nande, n ni a ɔ yian to wo a, mbɛ Yataa 'a koadia demanɛ gbu ɛ wan wo ko a. Wo wo boo a chii a ma gban.
60005013	Mɔɛ miin mbe chɔchi ɔ Babidon duu ɔ, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ ka miin bɛɛ ma, an mbe wo kɔndɔn tena. Kamin tɔngbɔɛ chɛ wɛɛ, Maki, min ma‑a gbɛ n 'na denɛ a, a wɛɛ‑a wo kɔndɔn.
60005014	Ni wo bɛn‑da, wo wo nyɔn kɔndɔn koadia faa a. Yataa ɛ faachima min be, a ni ma wo ma, wo ma min chɛ‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Chasi a.
61001001	N fan, Saimɔn Pita, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ mu n na, a 'a sɔ mɔɛ mu to n na. N mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wɛn danden mu Chasi a, yɔ nn mbe buɛ min dɔ. Mmɔ 'a Yataa mu an na, ni mmɔ baun mɔɛ, min‑na mmɔ ya mɔ tandenɛ a Yataa tena.
61001002	Yataa ni wo dua, a ni faachima ma munda wo ɔ. Koe min na mu, wo‑a a sɔn fan. A yɛ to, wo‑a mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi wɛɛ sɔn fan.
61001003	Chasi 'a gbasaya ɔ, fen kɔ fen been fan mu mmɔ ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni ma mɔɛ n na, Yataa wakoe ɛ miin faa ɔ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a koe min na, mmɔ ma‑a gbɛ Yataa sɔn mɔɛ n na. A wan Yataa an‑na mmɔ chee a tena. A‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, mmɔ wɛɛ ni a 'a gbasaya ɔ daun. A yɛ to, a 'a ko chɛndɛ ma ni ma mmɔ 'a fɔɛ ɔ.
61001004	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, a na‑a mmɔ too ɔ dia wai nyima ma kawaen ba min na, a na‑a a be wan mmɔ ma. An wai nyima chɛ ni a ma, wo kunɛ ni bɔ koe n boo ɔ, wo faa a miin ya kaka, miin mbe na kasaa a dunya chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ mmɔ sɔnɛ ta‑a Yataa ta fɛ.
61001005	Chɛ ko a, a nyin wo ni chɛ an ma, chia ɔ chia a. Danaya min mbe wo ɔ, wo a ma munda wo sɔn chɛndɛ a. Mbɛ wo‑a wo sɔn chɛndɛ ma munda yiima a, a si Yataa ma.
61001006	A yɛ to, wo wo 'a Yataa yiima ma munda wo tachɛ buɛ n na fɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ wo‑a faabia sa wo tachɛ buɛ kun ma fɔɛ ɔ. Mbɛ wo yɛ‑a to, wo ma‑a mɔɛ n na, Yataa wakoe ɛ miin faa ɔ kaka.
61001007	Chɛ sin to, wo a wɛɛ ma munda bia chɛndɛ a, wo e min chɛ wo nyɔn na. A dankama nɛnɛ an nɛ, wo an ma munda koadia a, wo nyɔn ko a.
61001008	Ni sɔn chɛ n ma‑a wo ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, a ɔ benden ba a, wo e mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi sɔn‑da wan chɛndɛ chɛ. Chɛ sin mbe na‑a ma‑a ko chɛndɛ an na wo 'a fɔɛ ɔ.
61001009	Chɛɛ ni sɔn chɛ n mbe ee mɔɛ min dɔ, a maen fan mu yɔ fion tɔɛ. A mɔɛ bonda chɛ sin nyina‑a, mbɛ Yataa na‑a a boo bɔ wan a 'a ko yama n dɔ, mbɛ a ma‑a mɔ chɛndɛ a.
61001010	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, wo butuinɛ chɛ wo sɔɛ gbɛ a. Wo ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa‑a wo chee min chɛ, a‑a a boo min sɔ wo ma, ma koe a a ta mɔɛ n na, kuɔ fɔ koe mu. Chɛ sin mbe a ma‑a wan, wo ee sɛmbɛ‑a wo kai fa koe a Yataa a.
61001011	Chia chɛ sin na mu, wo e tea da faenɛ ma sɔn‑da ben koe a, a ta dɔndɔ gbe mmɔ 'a mansa, ni mmɔ baun mɔɛ Chisɔsi Chasi, ɛ kaina min mansaya ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. Yataa ɛ a boo si‑a wan wo kɔɔ.
61001012	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo yiima n na che tena tun koe chɛ n ma. Wo‑a an tea n dɔ sɔn bɛɛ ka boo ɔ boo, min dɔ yian‑da wo a, a si Chisɔsi ma. A yɛ to, wo e a sɔ tena wan an tea chɛ fɛ gbau gbau.
61001013	N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ n fɔɛ ɔ ma yansan to, n gboo gbama chɛ boo ka koe a. A ɛ ma‑a wan, yɔ mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ, a boo kaenɛ ɛ a ma den. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, n ma fa nin bɛ ka tima min na, n‑na n yii na chii, mbɛ a nyin n ni wo yii na che koe chɛ n ma.
61001015	N mbe a ɔ yen‑da wan, n ni chia yan an to koe a wo yii ma, n faenɛ gbakɔ wɛɛ.
61001016	Nn‑na a ɔ yian fan wo a, mbɛ mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ na‑a wan gbasaya wa ɔ. Nn‑na a 'a gbasaya ɔ yen fan nn ya gbu a. Nn nii ma chɛ tɛ ni nn gboo an ma.
61001017	Koe min na mu, nn bɛ ni nɔ kɔnkɔ duaen chɛ ma, tima min na Fa Yataa‑a basɔmaya wa be mansa Chisɔsi ma. A sin, nn‑na kuiɛ chenama wa a min fan, kamaya ɔ, a ka banda bu ɔ Yataa tena. Kuiɛ chɛ ɔ, “N 'na denɛ an nɛ, a ko a di n ye kaka. N faa chimaen mu a ko a.” Nn fandi gbu an‑na kuiɛ chɛ a min, a ka banda bu ɔ.
61001019	Chɛ an fɛ mu gbɛ mmɔ gbu 'a danaya gbu ɔ gbɛa‑a gbɛ, sakana bai chɛ a, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a min dɔ yian suun. Ɛ nyan‑da wan wo ko a, ni wo‑a wo too ma sɔ a ma. Koe min na mu, ɛ wan yɔ dambo manɛ si ɔ pimbi pimbi ɔ. Ɛ ma wan man‑da aan banda ɔ ni ka, mbɛ sayi ma tɔmbuaka man‑da wo faa ɔ, min mu Chisɔsi wandi a.
61001020	Koe saa an nɛ, a nyin wo ni min dɔ gbɛ. Wo ni a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n dɔndɔ wɛɛ nii ma chɛ ma ni. An dɔndɔ wɛɛ, an na‑a Yataa 'a gboo nyɛn tima min na, an nii ma an fandi ta yiimatɛ an nyɛn ni dechee.
61001021	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n fandi an ma si ni an ni yiinachii chɛ, mbɛ an‑na bai chɛ n tɛ an gboo ma. Chɛɛ Yataa Nyina an na‑a bai chɛ n fɔ an ye, Yataa toen ni an ni min fɔ.
61002001	Chɛɛ mɔ sɛsɛ n bɛɛ bɔ‑a wan suun, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, an‑na fania fɔ, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ mu an na. A chia dɔndɔ gbe chɛ a mu, fania kan chɛ mɔɛ n mbe bɔ‑a wo wɛɛ tɛ ɔ. An mbe fania kanɛ chɛ‑a wan, min mbe na kasaa a. An mbe mansa chɛ kɔɔsa bia wan, a wɛn‑na an kun ka. Chɛ sin fan mbe a ma‑a, an ni na kasaa a an fandi kun ma.
61002002	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, mɔ sɛsɛ n mbe bea‑a wan an fɛ, an mbe ma‑a an 'na fɔɛ yama chɛ ɔ. An sɔn chɛ sin fan mbe a ma, mɔɛ n mbe bai yama sa chɛ n ma, miin mbe sɔ ɔ Yataa 'a tea chia ma.
61002003	Fania kan chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n fen ko yaen mu kaka. Chɛ an mbe a ma, an mbe tai n dɔ bɛn bɛn a fɔ koe a wo ye, min mbe na tɔnɔnɛ a an tena. Chɛɛ Yataa wɛn mbe kaa a tɛ tena an bakoe ma, a ni an tɔɔ, a ɔ mɛen mu gbɛ, a ma bɛndenɛ ɛ. A sin mbe an kasaa tena wan, a ee chinɔɛ ɔ ɛnden bɛɛ a.
61002004	Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa nii ma maeka chɛ n boo ka ni, miin na‑a ko yama ma. Chɛɛ a na‑a an na dɛ wan ta ɔ. An chiienɛ ɛ wan nɔ yɔɔɛ a, kaina ɔ pimbienɛ ɔ, an mbe an gbɛmbo tee ma kɔnɛ a.
61002005	Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa nii ma mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ to ni nɔ, miin ni suun. A na‑a an na mɔnɛ wan yii fa a, an fan Yataa sɔn bai chɛ nu. A na‑a mɔ wɔnfea an fan kunɛ bɔ a ɔ, a basan Nowa a, min ni mɔɛ n kan an ni tan Yataa tena.
61002006	Yataa na‑a kaa a tɛ wan mɔɛ chɛ n ba koe ma, a‑a an tɔɔya, mɔɛ miin ni Sɔdɔn an fea Komoa duu wa chɛ n dɔ. A na‑a an kasaa wan ta a. A na‑a an ma wan tɔmɔsi a, a si koe min mbe na‑a ma‑a mɔɛ chɛ n na, Yataa sɔn bai chɛ nu.
61002007	Yataa ni mɔ yama chɛ n kasaa tena tima min na, a na‑a kai Dɔti kun bɔ wan a ɔ suun. Dɔti chɛ ni mɔ chɛndɛ an na, a sin faa na‑a yɔn fan, tima min na an mɔɛ chɛ n ni ko yama yama chɛ n ma tena.
61002008	Kai chɛndɛ chɛ ni suun mɔ yama chɛ n tɛ ɔ wan, a sin nii a dia an sɔn yama an boo ɔ su ɔ tee a. A ni an sɔnɛ miin dɔ yen, a ni miin na min, faamɔnɛ wa ni a ma.
61002009	Chɛɛ Mansa Yataa an kosan kɛn gbɛ mɔɛ n kun bɔ‑a ko gbɛama n dɔ, mɔɛ miin mbe a ko a. A sin fan kosan to mɔɛ n chɛ‑a tɔɔya kɔɔ, aan gbɛmbo tee ma, mɔɛ miin sɔnɛ yau.
61002010	A gbu sin mbe ma‑a ka wan an na, miin boo chɛenɛ ɛ ko tɛ ɔ, an sin gbɔsɔ ma, mbɛ Yataa 'a gbasaya ɛ wan nɔ. Fania kan chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, chianɛ ee ka miin ya a, an toen mu koe min na, an mbe an ma. An mbe ee basɔmaya be an ma, gbasaya ɛ miin boo ɔ banda bu ɔ. Chɛɛ an mbe an main fan.
61002011	Maeka n gbu wɛɛ, gbasaya wa ɛ miin boo ɔ, a ben fania kan chɛ mɔɛ chɛ n ma, an maeka chɛ n mbe ee main chɛ Mansa Yataa chen kɔɔ.
61002012	Chɛɛ fania kan chɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, koe min mbe na an yii ma, an mbe an ma. An maen mu yɔ fia ɔ soe nu, an bia koe a, mbɛ an fa‑a. An mbe mankan fan ko ɔ ko manyin koe a, ni an ma min dɔ gbɛ ni. An mbe kasaa‑a wan, yɔ fia ɔ soe nu.
61002013	An mbe mɔnɛ ɔ yen‑da wan, an na‑a a ma min chɛ mɔ dɔ mende n na mɔnɛ ɔ bia. Koe min na di an ye, an nɛ koe chɛ n ma koe a tee a den, koe miin mu an gboo faa ma koe a. An mu mau an na, a basan popoya a, wo bɛ ɛ ma daunɛ chɛ‑a an na. Koe min na mu, su ɔ tee a an boo ɛ ma an 'na da mau koe chɛ n fan dɔ.
61002014	An mbe ee musu ma fɛn gbama a, ni an ma an yii na chii ni ta koe ma a sofa a. An faa ee chima ko yama ma koe a. An mbe a ma wan mɔɛ chɛ n ni chɛɛ gbai a, mɔɛ miin yiima ɔ dɔɔ. An‑na an fandi kan fan to koe a fen kɔ fen na, an sin mbe ma‑a danka tɔɛ n fan na.
61002015	An ka‑a tea chia ma fion fion, an mbe gbɛ an kun fan ye. An beaen mu gbɛ Badaan na chia an fɛ, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ chɛ, min ni kai Bɛɔ 'a denɛ a. Badaan nii ma a gbɔsɔ ni ko yama ma koe a, ni a‑a kɔpɔɛ an ma sɔn dechee.
61002016	Chɛɛ a 'a sofɛ na‑a a ma wan, a sɛmbɛ a wooya ko bonda chɛ ma koe a. Sofɛ chɛ na‑a koɔ wan a tena, mɔ gbu kuiɛ ɔ, mbɛ a‑a a ma tɔɔ an kun dɔ ban koe chɛ n ko a.
61002017	An mɔɛ chɛ nu, mɔ a tenden ma an na, yɔ yii mɛsɛ mɛsɛ nu, ni an gbaa‑a. An maenɛ ɛ to yɔ banda gbii, fia wa ɛ ben min na. Yataa‑a kaina ɔ bɛn an ko a, pimbi pimbi wa ɔ.
61002018	An mbe bai n fɔ wan, yiimatɛ ee miin dɔ, dɔpandaya bai nu. An mbe koe yama n ma to, miin na di an gboo n ye. An mbe chɛ n ma, mɔɛ chɛ n bia koe an na, mɔɛ chɛ miin‑na a kuu sɔ an kunɛ bɔ‑a an ko yama chɛ n dɔ.
61002019	An mbe mɔɛ n too ɔ dia, mbɛ an mbe yuu tɛ‑a wan an ma. Chɛɛ an fandi gbu mu yɔnɛ an na, sɔn yama n boo ɔ, min mbe an kasaa tena. Koe min na mu, fen kɔ fen min kun‑da gbɛ mɔɛ ma, a ma‑a yɔnɛ a an fen chɛ boo ɔ.
61002020	Mɔɛ n‑na a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mmɔ baun mɔɛ, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi an mbe mmɔ baun. Chɛ‑a a ma, an kun bɔ‑a an 'na ko yama n dɔ, dunya chɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ an ma yɛ to an 'na ko yama kun ma, a ni kun an ma dɔgbɔ. Ni chɛ ma‑a, ɛ yaua‑a wan an mɔ bonda chɛ n ko a tee dankama tee ma, a ni ben a kuu sɔ tena ma.
61002021	A ni nyan‑da wan an ko a, ni an nii ma chia sɔn ni, an mbe tan buɛ min dɔ Yataa tena. Chɛɛ ni an‑na a sɔn, mbɛ an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ Yataa 'a sawa duaenɛ a, a yau an ko a.
61002022	Koe chɛ min sin ma‑a ka an na, a ɔ yiandenɛ an nɛ, mbɛ tai min na‑a tɛ suun, tea mu. Tai gbu ɔ, mbɛ wuu an mbe yɛ a fɔnɔɛ daun‑da. A ɔ, kɔɛnya wɛɛ ɛ yɛ wan to a ma chemen chemen‑da, a koenɛ gbakɔ.
61003001	N dia nyɔɛ nu, gboo fean bɔɛ an nɛ, n‑na min nyɛn gbɛ wo tena. Gboo fea chɛ n dɔ, n mbe wo yiima a che tena wan koe chɛ n ma chɛndɛ chɛ, wo ni ma wo yii na chii‑a an ma.
61003002	N toen mu wo ni wo yii na chii bai chɛ n ma, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na‑a miin fɔ suun. Wo ni wo yii na chii to sawa chɛ ma, Mansa Chisɔsi‑a min be, mmɔ baun mɔɛ. A sin, a 'a sɔ mɔɛ n na‑a an sawa chɛ a ben fan wo tena.
61003003	Koe saa saa gbu, a nyin wo ni min dɔ sɔn an nɛ. Mbɛ tee dankama nɛnɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi e na to na‑a, mɔɛ n mbe na‑a wan wo tɛ ɔ, miin mu yɔnɛ n na. An mu yɔnɛ n na, an 'na fɔɛ ɔ, an faa ma koe yama n boo ɔ. An mbe wo ma yɛn‑da wan.
61003004	An mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, Chasi na koe min mbe a ɔ, an dɔ, an gbu ee a yen. An dɔ, chɛ an to‑a ka ɔ aan, an dɔ, an bemba n ta bemba n ka‑a banda kun ma. An dɔ, chɛɛ ko ɔ ko ma ka ni a gba kun ma, an dɔ, kɛn dunya a dan tima ma.
61003005	An mɔɛ chɛ n ma to ni dan koe a a a, mbɛ duu gboo fea banda chɛ a, Yataa da a bai an‑na a ma an na dan‑da suun. Mbɛ duu gboo bɔ‑a yii an dɔ, an nyanden mu yii an na.
61003006	A sin, mbɛ yii ni to, yii wa min na‑a dunya gbɛɛ ya, min na‑a dunya kɔma kasaa.
61003007	Chɛɛ mmɔ ta duu gboo chɛ wɛɛ, a fea banda chɛ a, Yataa da a bai dɔndɔ gbe chɛ an‑na a ma an mbe nɔ. A wan Yataa dɔndɔ gbe chɛ, ɛ an kun ma fɛn tena, min mbe a ma, ta ni danka an kasaa‑a. An mbe nɔ tee chɛ an ma kɔn koe a, Yataa sɔn bai chɛ nu, kaa a ɛ tɛ‑a an ma tee min na, an ni kasaa.
61003008	Chɛɛ n dia nyɔɛ nu, wo ma nyina ko dɔndɔɛ chɛ ma. Mbɛ tee tɛ bɔ ee Mansa Yataa tena. Tee dɔndɔɛ fea san wu dɔndɔ a, fen dɔndɔ gbe an nɛ a chen kɔɔ.
61003009	Ɛ mɔɛ dɔ n yii ma, mbɛ Mansa Yataa a nɛnchɛnden fan mu, a da a kuiɛ bɔ koe a a. Chɛɛ ɛ a faa bia wan dechee wo a, tima be koe a wo ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na. Koe min na mu, a ma to ni wo dɔndɔ wɛɛ ni kasaa ma sɔn.
61003010	Chɛɛ Mansa Chisɔsi na tima, ɛ ma‑a wan tɛnɛ koe a, yɔ kanka ɛ na buɛ min dɔ. A tee chɛ ma, kuiɛ mau mau ɛ ka‑a wan banda a, mbɛ banda ee ma‑a to dunya ɔ. Ta ɛ tɛ‑a wan fen kɔ fen dɔ min mbe banda a, mbɛ an kasaa‑a. A sin duu gboo wɛɛ, ni fen kɔ fen min mbe a ma, an gbɛɛ ee ma‑a to dunya ɔ.
61003011	Fen kɔ fen sin gbu, ɛ na tena kasaa‑a ka buɛ min dɔ, a nyin wo ni a ɔ sɔn, ni wo e ma‑a mɔɛ miin nyɔn sima n na. Wo ma tenchen Yataa ko a, wo ni wo fɔɛ gbɛɛ be a ma.
61003012	Wo e ma‑a Yataa 'a tee chɛ ma kɔn‑da, wo a faa ma koe n ma, min mbe a ma, an tee ni fua che‑a. An tee chɛ ma, fenɛ miin gbɛɛ ɛ banda a, an mbe kasaa‑a wan, mbɛ an minda‑a. Win ba dɛgbɛ wɛɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, an fen chɛ n ni kunɛ banda a yɔ tu.
61003013	Chɛɛ Yataa na‑a mmɔ too ɔ dia min chɛ, mmɔ ɛ an ma kɔn tena. A‑a tooɔdia chɛ wan dunya nama be koe ma. A sin, an dunya nama chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ n tandenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ Yataa tena.
61003014	N dia nyɔɛ nu, chɛ an fɛ mu, wo e ka an tee chɛ ma kɔnɛ min chɛ a, wo wo wandi bia chɛndɛ chɛ. Tɔmbɛ ma ma wo ma, wo sin ni ma faachima ɔ Yataa a.
61003015	Chɛ an fɛ mu, faabia chɛ, mmɔ 'a mansa‑a min chɛ, wo a ya ka buɛ chɛ ɔ. Mbɛ ɛ ka tima an be‑a mɔɛ n ma, bauncha ma sɔn koe a. Ɛ wan dechee yɔ mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ Pɔɔ, min ko a di mmɔ ye, a na‑a min nyɛn wo tena. Yataa sin na‑a yiimatɛ min chɛ a ɔ, a na‑a an na wai ka.
61003016	A sin mbe bai fɔ tena, a si an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ ma, a 'a gboo n dɔ. Kaina dɔ n mbe wan a 'a gboo nyɛnden chɛ ɔ, miin dɔ gbɛɛ an dɔ gbɛ koe a. Ko sɔn bai nu, mɔɛ miin yiima ɔ basan basandenɛ ɛ, an mbe a ɔ yian fan fania chia a, yɔ an mbe a ma buɛ min dɔ Yataa bai dɔ gbɛɛ n bɛɛ a. Chɛ sin mbe a ma wan, an mbe an fandi kasaa‑a.
61003017	Chɛɛ n dia nyɔɛ nu, wo tana, wo‑a chɛ ɔ sɔn fan gbɛ. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo kun ma fɛn, sawa sɔn bai chɛ n ma na a ma, wo ni saman, mbɛ wo ka‑a chia ma. An ni a ma, wo ni bea, a bɔ wo sɔ tena chɛndɛ chɛ ɔ.
61003018	Chɛɛ koadia demanɛ, a kun ma ni sa wo tena. A yɛ to, yiima min mbe wo ɔ, a si mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ma, mmɔ baun mɔɛ, a kun ma ni sa. Tando ni ma a tɔɛ ma sanche, ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
62001001	Nn mbe gboo chɛ min nyɛn tena ka, a sien mu mɔɛ chɛ an ma, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Bai, min tɔ mu to Fɔɛ. A ni wan nɔ dunya a dan‑da tima min na. Nn‑na a yen fan nn ya a pɛnɛnɛ, nn‑na a kuiɛ a min, nn sin tindi tindi‑a wan nn nyɔn ma.
62001002	A wɛn tɔ mu ka Fɔɛ, a na‑a kɛn dunya chɛ ɔ, a ma na ni nun dɔ. Nn gbɛɛ, nn‑na a yen fan, nn sin mbe koe ɔ yian fan, a si a ma. Mbɛ nn‑na a wakoe ɔ yian wo a, a wɛn mu kuɔ fɔ Fɔɛ a. An fea ni mmɔ Fa Yataa a, a sin fan‑na a yian nn na.
62001003	Nn‑na koe min dɔ yen, nn‑na min na min nn too a, nn mbe ka an dɔ yian‑da wo a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mmɔ ni ma kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, yɔ nn mbe buɛ min dɔ kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, nn bɛ mmɔ Fa Yataa a, an fea a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a.
62001004	Nn mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, min mbe a ma, nn 'na buɔdia da ni fa gban.
62001005	Nn‑na sakana bai chɛ an na min a a, nn mbe ka min dɔ yian‑da wo a, mbɛ Yataa mu manɛ an na. Ko kan kɔ kan mbe ee an tɛ, an fea pimbi a.
62001006	Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ mmɔ bɛ an mbe gbɛ a a kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, chɛɛ mmɔ ɛ a a tun‑da tachɛ koe a pimbi ɔ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a ka fania an fɔ‑a. Mmɔ sin mbe ee ma‑a ka tea koe ɔ.
62001007	Chɛɛ Yataa ɛ manɛ an dɔ. An fɛ mu, ni mmɔ wɛɛ tachɛ‑a a 'a man chɛ kɔɔ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a wan kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, mmɔ nyɔn na. A yɛ to, Yataa 'a denɛ Chisɔsi wii min bɔ‑a, ɛ mmɔ ko‑a wan, a bɔ mmɔ 'a ko yama n gbɛɛ n dɔ.
62001008	Chɛɛ ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ mmɔ ma ko yama ma ni, mmɔ‑a fania fɔ mmɔ wandi ma, a sin, tea ee mmɔ ɔ.
62001009	Chɛɛ ni mmɔ dɔn‑da a ma, mbɛ mmɔ‑a ko yama ma wan, Yataa danayaen mu, ɛ na‑a tea koe an ma‑a. Ɛ a boo bɔ‑a wan mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, mbɛ a‑a mmɔ ko mmɔ 'a ko yama n gbɛɛ n dɔ, mmɔ ni gbɛ fo.
62001010	Ni mmɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ mmɔ ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma nin bɛ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a ka a fɔ an na, mbɛ Yataa ma teaya ni. A sin, a da a bai ee si tena sɔn‑da mmɔ faa ɔ.
62002001	N 'na denɛ nu, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, min mbe a ma, wo ma na dɛ ko yama ɔ. Chɛɛ ni mmɔ dɔndɔ wɛɛ dɛen fan mu gbɛ ko yama ɔ, mɔɛ ɛ wan mmɔ boo ɔ, min mbe koɔ mmɔ Fa Yataa tena mmɔ ko a. A mɔɛ chɛ mu Chisɔsi Chasi an na, a wɛn tanden mu Yataa tena gbeden.
62002002	Chisɔsi chɛ an ma‑a yasi a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A sin, mmɔ 'a ko yama n dechee ko a ma, chɛɛ dunya gbɛɛ 'a ko yama n ko a.
62002003	Ni mmɔ dɔn‑da Yataa 'a sawa n na tachɛ koe a, yɔ ɛ a fɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ mmɔ ye, mbɛ mmɔ‑a a ɔ gbɛ, mbɛ mmɔ‑a a sɔn fan.
62002004	Mɔɛ min mbe a fɔ‑a, a ɔ, a‑a Yataa sɔn fan, chɛɛ a ee Yataa 'a sawa n na tachɛ‑a a gbee a, ɛ ma‑a ka fania an fɔ‑a, tea kan kɔ kan mbe ee a da ɔ.
62002005	Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a da a kuiɛ a min, an mɔɛ chɛ an mu mɔɛ a, min toen mu Yataa a tea tea ko a. Mmɔ ɛ a ɔ sɔn‑da ka wan, mbɛ mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Yataa a.
62002006	Mɔ ɔ mɔ, min mbe a fɔ‑a, mbɛ an ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Yataa a, a ni sɔ Chisɔsi chen gba ɔ.
62002007	N dia nyɔɛ nu, n mbe ee ka sawa nama an nyɛn tena wo tena, chɛɛ sawa kɔma mu. Wo boo ɔ sawa kɔma dɔndɔ gbe chɛ nu mu, a ka sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tima saa saa ma. Sawa kɔma chɛ mu sakana bai chɛ an na, wo na‑a min na min tee.
62002008	Chɛɛ chɛ ni ma wɛɛ, n‑na sawa min nyɛn ka wo tena, sawa nama mu to a a. Tea gbu sin ko a, mɔ ɛ a yen fan Chisɔsi ɔ, a basan wo wɛɛ a. A mu min na, pimbi ɛ ka gbɛ ben fan na, a sin, Yataa 'a manɛ bun‑da a yian‑da.
62002009	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min‑na a wandi ya, mbɛ ɛ Yataa 'a manɛ kɔɔ wan, chɛɛ a tooenɛ a suun ma nyɔɛ a, ɛ ka pimbi an dɔ tun tun.
62002010	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu a suun ma nyɔɛ a, ɛ ka Yataa 'a manɛ an kɔɔ. A sin, ko ɔ ko ee a faa ɔ, min mbe a ma, a ni bea.
62002011	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min tooen mu a suun ma nyɔɛ a, ɛ ka pimbi ɔ wan, ɛ tachɛ chɛ‑a pimbi ɔ, a ta chia toenɛ ɔ a boo ɔ. Koe min na mu, pimbi chɛ‑a a ma, a ee che kaina yen‑da.
62002012	N 'na denɛ nu, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, Yataa‑a a boo bɔ wo 'a ko yama n dɔ Chisɔsi ko a.
62002013	Wo wɛn mu chenanɛ n na, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, wo‑a mɔɛ chɛ sɔn fan, a wɛn mbe nɔ dunya a dan tima a. Wo wɛn mu den tɔngbɔɛ n na, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, wo‑a Sitana a bea.
62002014	N 'na denɛ nu, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, wo‑a Fa Yataa sɔn. Wo wɛn mu chenanɛ n na, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, wo‑a mɔɛ chɛ sɔn fan, a wɛn mbe nɔ dunya a dan tima a. Wo wɛn mu den tɔngbɔɛ n na, n mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, koe min na mu, faa ɛ wo ɔ Yataa ko a. A sin, Yataa 'a bai ee ka wo yii ma. A yɛ to, wo‑a Sitana a bea.
62002015	Wo ma to dunya yama chɛ a, wo ma to fen yama n na a ɔ. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ to‑a dunya chɛ a, a ee che to‑a Fa Yataa a.
62002016	Mɔ gbu 'a yonka wa gbɛɛ, ɛ bɔ dunya chɛ ɔ wan. Mɔ gbu faa ma koe yama n bɛɛ, a basan to koe a fen fen na, mɔ gbu ya ɛ min yen. Chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ ma Fa Yataa faa ma ko a. Chɛ gbɛɛ, an mu dechee dunya ma koe n fan na.
62002017	Ban fenɛ mu dunya chɛ a, a basan dunya ma koe n bɛɛ a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe Yataa faa ma koe ma‑a, ɛ kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
62002018	N 'na denɛ nu, mmɔ ɛ ka gbɛ tee dankama tee an kɔɔ, Chisɔsi Chasi na koe a to. A na‑a a fɔ wan wo ye, mbɛ Chasi chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ ɛ na tena wan, ɛ bɔ‑a mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ wan. Sanche chɛ ɔ, a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n‑na an kun na bɔ. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian mmɔ a, mbɛ tee dankama tee che‑a.
62002019	Mɔɛ chɛ n ni wan dechee mmɔ tɛ ɔ, chɛɛ mmɔ yiima nii dɔndɔ an na. Chɛ an‑na a ma, an ka‑a mmɔ fɛ, an ta‑a. Ni mmɔ yiima ni wan dɔndɔ gbe, an nii ka‑a mmɔ fɛ. Chɛɛ an ka‑a min chɛ‑a mmɔ fɛ, chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan ka, mbɛ mmɔ yiima nii kaina dɔndɔ.
62002020	Chɛɛ wo tana, Chisɔsi‑a a ma, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo fɛ, min‑na a ma, wo gbɛɛ‑a tea sɔn.
62002021	N mbe gboo chɛ nyɛnɛ min chɛ tena wo tena, n mbe ee a fɔ tena wan ka, mbɛ wo ma tea sɔn. Koe min na mu, wo‑a a sɔn fan. A sin to, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan to, mbɛ fania kan kɔ kan mbe ee che a ma‑a, wo ni ka tea chia chɛ ma.
62002022	Fania fɔ mɔɛ, a mu mɔɛ chɛ an na, min mbe kɔɔ sa bia chɛ, mbɛ Chisɔsi an ma Chasi a, kunka mansa. An mɔ bonda chɛ an mu Chasi chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ a, mɔɛ min mbe ban Fa Yataa ɔ, an fea a 'a denɛ a.
62002023	Koe min na mu, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ ban‑da Yataa 'a denɛ ɔ, a mɔɛ chɛ ban‑da ka Fa Yataa wandi an dɔ. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo si Yataa 'a denɛ kɔɔ, a‑a a boo si ka Fa Yataa wandi wɛɛ an kɔɔ.
62002024	Wo‑a min na min, a ka sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tima saa saa ma, wo a sa wo faa ɔ. Ni wo‑a an sa wo faa ɔ, wo e ma‑a wan mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Yataa 'a denɛ a, an fea Fa Yataa a.
62002025	A‑a mmɔ too ɔ dia chɛ an na, kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ.
62002026	N mbe bai chɛ n gbɛɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, a sien mu mɔɛ chɛ n fan ma, miin toen mu an ni wo bun.
62002027	Chɛɛ wo tana, Chisɔsi ban‑da Yataa Nyina a yii‑a, ma koe a wo fɛ. Tima min na mu wɛ, Yataa Nyina ɛ wo fɛ, mɔ dɔ mende ma gbɔsɔ ee wɛ wo ma, wo kan koe a. Koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina chɛ, an mbe wo kan tena ko kan kɔ kan ma. A sin tea mu, fania kan kɔ kan ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo boo a chii, ma koe a mɔ dɔndɔya chɛ ɔ Chisɔsi a, yɔ Yataa Nyina chɛ‑a wo kan min na.
62002028	N 'na denɛ nu, tea ko a, wo wo boo a chii, ma koe a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, wo bɛ a a. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, mmɔ kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ ni ma a tena, mmɔ ee na‑a mmɔ ya kɔɔɛ nun‑da a ma tima chɛ a, ɛ na‑a to tima min na.
62002029	Wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi tanden fan mu Yataa tena. A sin mbe nyan fan gbɛ, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min tanden mu, Yataa 'a denɛ mu a a.
62003001	Wo a yen bɛ, Fa Yataa‑a koadia wa min nyɔn sima yian mmɔ a. Koe min na mu, a‑a a ma, an mbe mmɔ chee Yataa 'a denɛ n na. A sin gbu, Yataa 'a denɛ mu mmɔ a. Koe min‑na a ma, dunya ma mmɔ sɔn Yataa 'a denɛ n na, a nii ma Yataa wandi gbu sɔn.
62003002	N dia nyɔɛ nu, Yataa 'a denɛ mu gbɛ mmɔ a. A sin, mmɔ ma chɛ ɔ gbɛ nin bɛ, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a buɛ min dɔ ya ɔ ma. Chɛɛ mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni Chisɔsi na‑a to, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ a wan. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ɛ a ma gbɛ‑a wan gbadan, yɔ ɛ buɛ min dɔ.
62003003	A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ, danaya chɛ ɛ min dɔ a ko a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee dɔn a ni a boo chɛ ko yama kan kɔ kan dɔ. Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi ee a boo chɛ ko yama ɔ.
62003004	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ko yama ma, Yataa 'a sawa yɔn mɔɛ mu. Koe min na mu, ko yama ma, a mu Yataa 'a sawa yɔnɛ an na.
62003005	Chɛɛ wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi na‑a, min mbe a ma, a ni tɔɔya ka mmɔ kun ma, mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. A sin tana, a ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma ni.
62003006	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Chisɔsi a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee ko yama ma a tun. Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a boo a chii ko yama ma koe ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ma Chisɔsi yen nin bɛ a yiima ɔ, a gbu sin ma a sɔn.
62003007	N 'na denɛ nu, wo tima ya, mɔɛ n ma na wo bun. Mɔɛ min mbe tea koe ma, mɔ tandenɛ mu an na Yataa tena, yɔ Chisɔsi tanden mu buɛ min dɔ.
62003008	Sitana ɛ wan ko yama ma‑a tun, a ka dunya kuu sɔ tima ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mɔɛ chɛ min mbe a boo a chii‑a ko yama ma, Sitana 'a mɔɛ mu. Yataa 'a denɛ sin na‑a, min mbe a ma, a ni an Sitana 'a wai a fasan.
62003009	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu Yataa 'a denɛ a, a ee ko yama ma bia a boo fea a. Koe min na mu, Yataa wandi Nyina ɛ wan a fɛ. A sin, a ee a a tun‑da ko yama ma koe a. Koe min na mu, a ma‑a gbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ a.
62003010	Yataa 'a denɛ nu, ni Sitana 'a denɛ nu, mmɔ ɛ na tena an tɛ bɔɛ sɔn‑da ka wan. Mɔɛ min mbe ee tan‑da, Yataa 'a den ma a mɔɛ chɛ a, n mbe ee baa mɔɛ chɛ ma, min ma to ni a suun ma nyɔɛ a.
62003011	Wo na‑a min na min, tima min na wo na‑a sakana bai chɛ a min a saa saa a, an nɛ, mbɛ mmɔ ni to mmɔ nyɔn na.
62003012	Mmɔ ma ma yɔ mɔna chɛ, Ken, Sitana 'a mɔɛ, min‑na a dɔ kaima fa. A‑a chɛ ma koe min na, a na‑a a ɔ yen fan, mbɛ a ta chɛ chɛ wai nii ma nyin, chɛɛ a dɔɛ tanden fan ni Yataa tena.
62003013	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n suun ma nyɔɛ nu, a ma ma wo ma tɛnɛ ma koe a, ni dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n too‑a wo wɛɛ a.
62003014	Ni mmɔ to‑a mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n na, ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ mmɔ bɔ‑a saya 'a gbasaya kɔɔ, mmɔ‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma to ni a suun ma nyɔɛ a, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ wɛ tun saya 'a gbasaya an kɔɔ.
62003015	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe too‑a a suun ma nyɔɛ a, mɔ fa mɔɛ mu a a. A sin, wo‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ mɔ fa mɔ kan kɔ kan, a ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.
62003016	Chisɔsi Chasi‑a a fɔɛ be wan mmɔ ko a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn koadia mu fenɛ min nyɔn sima a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, mmɔ wɛɛ, a nyin fan mmɔ ni mmɔ wandi be mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n ko a.
62003017	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min boo cheen mu deman chɛ koe a, a ni a suun ma nyɔɛ deman, min ya kɔɔ tawaen mu. Chɛɛ ni a‑a a faa a kɔɔ a suun ma nyɔɛ chɛ ma, a ee che a fɔ‑a, mbɛ a toen fan mu Yataa a a faa ɔ.
62003018	N 'na denɛ nu, mmɔ 'a koadia, a ma ma dechee bai n na, mmɔ ɛ miin fɔ. A ni ma tea koadia a, min dɔ ɛ yian mmɔ chɛ chɛ wai an dɔ.
62003019	Ni mmɔ‑a a ma ka, an mbe a ɔ yian‑da, mbɛ tea ɛ wan mmɔ ɔ. An mbe a ma‑a, mmɔ faa ee gbaa, mmɔ ɛ ma‑a Yataa chen kɔɔ,
62003020	mmɔ faa gbaaenɛ ni ma wɛɛ, mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. Yataa benden mu mmɔ 'a ko yama n ma, a sin‑na ko ɔ ko sɔn fan.
62003021	N dia nyɔɛ nu, ni mmɔ ma ma ni faagbaa ɔ, mmɔ 'a ko yama ko a, mmɔ kunɛ kɔɔ sɔenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan Yataa chen kɔɔ.
62003022	A sin, mmɔ ɛ fen kɔ fen sɔn‑da wan, mmɔ ɛ min dɔ tisa‑a a ma. Koe min na mu, mmɔ ɛ a da a kuiɛ ma, a sin, mmɔ ɛ a faa ma koe ma.
62003023	A sin, a 'a sawa gbu an nɛ, mbɛ mmɔ ni mmɔ kai fa a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi Chasi a. A yɛ to, mmɔ ni to mmɔ nyɔn na, yɔ a 'a sawa‑a min fɔ mmɔ ye.
62003024	Mɔɛ miin mbe Yataa da a kuiɛ ma, an mbe ma wan mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ a a. A sin, Yataa wɛɛ, ɛ ma wan mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ an na. Mmɔ sin mbe a ɔ sɔn ka wan, mbɛ Yataa ɛ wan mmɔ dɔndɔya ɔ mmɔ a. Mmɔ ɛ a ɔ sɔn fan, koe min na mu, a Nyina ɛ mmɔ fɛ.
62004001	N dia nyɔɛ nu, wo ma dan mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe a fɔ‑a, mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɛ wan an fɛ. Wo an mɔɛ chɛ n fɔ bai ma mɛn pɛn, min mbe a ma, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, ni Yataa Nyina an mbe an fɛ tea ko a. Wo chɛ ma, koe min na mu, fania fɔ mɔɛ n sɛsɛ fasanden mu a ɔ, an mbe an fandi ya‑a Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n na.
62004002	Wo e kun‑da ka wan wo ni a ɔ sɔn, ni Yataa Nyina an mbe an fɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a fɔ‑a fanka ɔ den, mbɛ Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a wan dunya chɛ ɔ mɔgbuya ɔ, Yataa Nyina an mbe a fɛ.
62004003	Chɛɛ ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a kɔɔsa bia chɛ chɛ ma, Yataa 'a Nyina ee a fɛ. A ta nyina chɛ nɛnɛ, an mbe ma mɔɛ chɛ n fɛ, miin mu Chasi chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n na. Wo na‑a a mɔɛ chɛ nyɔn sima n na koe a min fan. A sin gbu na‑a. Sanche chɛ wɛɛ ɔ, ɛ nɛ dunya ɔ.
62004004	Chɛɛ wo tana, n 'na denɛ nu, wo e Yataa an ko a. A sin, wo kun‑da an fania mɔɛ chɛ n ma, koe min na mu, Yataa Nyina min mbe wo fɛ, a benden mu chɛ ma, min mbe dunya chɛ ma.
62004005	Dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ mu an na. Chɛ an‑na a ma, an mbe dunya chɛ ma bai n fan sa, a sin, dunya chɛ ɛ a too ma sɔ wan an ma.
62004006	Chɛɛ nn tana, nn mbe Yataa an ko a. Chia chɛ a mu, mmɔ ɛ tɛ bɔɛ sɔn mɔɛ ma, Yataa Nyina min mbe tea ɔ yian, ɛ min fɛ, an tɛ mɔɛ a, fania fɔ nyina gbama ɛ min fɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min‑na Yataa sɔn, ɛ a too ma sɔ wan nn ma. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee Yataa ko a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee a too ma sɔ nn ma.
62004007	N dia nyɔɛ nu, mmɔ a tun to koe a mmɔ nyɔn na, koe min na mu, koadia kaen mu Yataa an na. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min to‑a a bɔɛ a, a mɔɛ chɛ mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na, a sin‑na Yataa sɔn fan.
62004008	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma to ni a bɔɛ a, a ma Yataa sɔn. Koe min na mu, Yataa mu koadia Yataa an na.
62004009	Yataa 'a koadia, a na‑a a ɔ yian ka wan mmɔ a. A na‑a a 'a den dɔndɔ gbe a na wan dunya chɛ ɔ, min mbe a ma, mmɔ ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.
62004010	An ma a fɔ ni, mbɛ mmɔ wan to‑a Yataa a, chɛɛ a wan to‑a dechee mmɔ a. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a wan Yataa, a‑a a 'a den chɛ a na, a ni ma yasi a mmɔ 'a ko yama n ko a. Koadia chɛ mu chɛ an na.
62004011	N dia nyɔɛ nu, ni Yataa toen mu ka wan mmɔ a, mbɛ mmɔ wɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ to wan mmɔ nyɔn na.
62004012	Kɛn gba, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma Yataa yen nin bɛ. Chɛɛ ni mmɔ to‑a mmɔ nyɔn na, mbɛ mmɔ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a Yataa a. A sin, a 'a koadia kuu, a si‑a mmɔ faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ.
62004013	Yataa sin‑na a Nyina be wan mmɔ ma, a ni ma mmɔ fɛ. Chɛ an mbe a ɔ yian, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ wan mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ Yataa a, a sin, a wɛɛ ɛ wan mɔ dɔndɔya ɔ mmɔ a.
62004014	A yɛ to, Fa Yataa‑a a 'a denɛ a na wan, min mbe a ma, a ni dunya kun ka. Nn‑na chɛ ɔ yen fan nn ya a, a sin, nn mbe koe ɔ yian fan, a si a ma.
62004015	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ den, mbɛ Chisɔsi mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na, a ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Yataa a. Yataa wɛɛ, a ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea an mɔɛ chɛ a.
62004016	Mmɔ sin danden fan mu a a, mbɛ mmɔ ko a di wan Yataa ye. Yataa mu koadia Yataa an na. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe to‑a mɔ dɔ mende n na, a ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Yataa a. Yataa wɛɛ, a ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea an mɔɛ chɛ a.
62004017	Ni Yataa 'a koadia kuu si‑a mmɔ faa ɔ, ni mmɔ tachɛ‑a fɔɛ ɔ yɔ Chisɔsi‑a a ma buɛ min dɔ, mmɔ faa ee gbaa, a si gbɛmbo tee ma Yataa boo ɔ.
62004018	Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a koadia mmɔ ko a, ɛ faagbaa bonda chɛ ban fan mmɔ ma. Ni mmɔ‑a mmɔ yii na chii, mbɛ tɔɔya ɛ wan mmɔ ya ɔ, an mbe a ma, mmɔ faa ɛ gbaa ka. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a koadia kuu ma si nin bɛ mmɔ faa ɔ.
62004019	A nyin koadia ni ma mmɔ ɔ, koe min na mu, Yataa pɛn‑na koadia yian mmɔ a.
62004020	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a fɔ, mbɛ a toen fan mu Yataa a, chɛɛ a ma to ni a suun ma nyɔɛ a, ɛ ka fania an fɔ‑a. Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma to ni a suun ma nyɔɛ a, ɛ min yen tee ɔ tee a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee che to‑a Yataa a, a ee min yen.
62004021	Yataa sin‑na chɛ an fɔ mmɔ ye, a ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ, i wɛn mbe to‑a a wan Yataa a, a ɔ, i mɔɛ chɛ ni to i suun ma nyɔɛ wɛɛ a.
62005001	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe dan‑da a a, mbɛ Chisɔsi an mu Chasi a, kunka mansa, a mɔɛ chɛ mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na. A yɛ to, mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu Fa Yataa a, a ni to a 'a denɛ n bɛɛ a.
62005002	Ni Yataa ko a dia‑a mmɔ ye, mmɔ ni ma a da a kuiɛ ma, mmɔ ɛ a ɔ sɔn‑da wan, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ to wan a 'a denɛ n bɛɛ a.
62005003	Mmɔ ɛ koadia yian ka wan Yataa a, ni mmɔ don‑da a da a kuiɛ kɔɔ. Chɛ sin, a ma gbɛ a a min koe a.
62005004	A mu min na, mɔ ɔ mɔ min mu Yataa 'a denɛ a, dunya chɛ ɛ ma a chen kɔɔ wan. A sin, mmɔ 'a danaya Yataa a, an‑na a ma, mmɔ kun‑da dunya chɛ ma.
62005005	Koe min na mu, mɔɛ min mbe kun dunya chɛ ma, an mu dechee mɔɛ chɛ a, min danden mu a a, mbɛ Chisɔsi mu Yataa 'a denɛ an na.
62005006	A wan mu, a wan Chisɔsi Chasi, min na‑a dunya ɔ. Yii chɛ‑a wan a kunɛ ɔ, Yataa chia a, a sin, a fa‑a kɛn, a wii bɔn‑da wan. Yii dechee ma chɛ ni a kunɛ ɔ, a yɛ to, a wii bɔn‑da wan to. A sin, Yataa Nyina wɛɛ‑a siiya bɔ wan, mbɛ koe chɛ n mu tea an na.
62005007	A gbu sin, siiya sawa an mbe tea chɛ ma a si Chisɔsi ma.
62005008	Sii saa saa mu Yataa Nyina an na, a fean bɔɛ mu yii a, a sawan bɔɛ mu wii a. Chɛ n sin gbɛɛ kuiɛ ɛ dɔndɔ gbe.
62005009	Ni mmɔ ɛ dan fan mɔɛ n na, ni an‑na siiya bɔ mmɔ ye, a nyin fan mmɔ ni dan Yataa a, a ben mɔ gbu ma. Yataa wandi sin fan‑na siiya bɔ, a si a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi ma.
62005010	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, mɔɛ min mbe a kai fa‑a Yataa 'a denɛ a, siiya chɛ ɛ wan a faa ɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ min mbe ee a kai fa‑a a a, a mɔɛ chɛ‑a Yataa ma fania fɔ mɔɛ a. Koe min na mu, a ma dan ni siiya a, Yataa‑a min bɔ, a si a 'a denɛ ma.
62005011	Yataa‑a siiya chɛ ɔ te, mbɛ a‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be wan mmɔ ma. A sin, a ma ɛ sɔn a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi an na.
62005012	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma‑a gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Yataa 'a denɛ Chisɔsi a, a‑a fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma ma ni mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea a 'a denɛ chɛ a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn.
62005013	N mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo wan tena, wo wɛn kai faen mu Yataa 'a denɛ a, min mbe a ma, wo ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn.
62005014	Danaya wa chɛ an mbe mmɔ ɔ Yataa chen kɔɔ, mbɛ ni mmɔ‑a samunɛ chɛ fen kɔ fen ko a, min‑na a faa chima, mbɛ ɛ mmɔ 'a samunɛ a min fan.
62005015	A sin, ni mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ Yataa ɛ mmɔ 'a samunɛ a min fan, mmɔ ɛ dan fan gbɛ a, mbɛ mmɔ ɛ samunɛ chɛ tena fenɛ min ko a, mmɔ ɛ a ma sɔn‑da wan.
62005016	Ko kan kɔ kan, min mbe ee Yataa 'a chia ma, ko yama mu. Chɛɛ ko yama ɛ wan nɔ, min mbe ee mmɔ ka‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ chɛ ma sɔn‑da. A ya wɛ, mbɛ i suun ma nyɔɛ dɔndɔ, a‑a ko yama ma. Chɛɛ an ko yama chɛ ee che a ma‑a, a ni fo kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a. Samunɛ chɛ a mɔɛ chɛ ko a, min mbe a ma, a ni kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn. Chɛɛ ni ko yama mu, min mbe che a ma‑a, a ee kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn, n ma i kaa ni samunɛ chɛ‑a, a mɔɛ chɛ ko a.
62005018	Mmɔ danden fan mu chɛ a, mbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ nu, an mbe ee an boo a chii ko yama ma ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a denɛ Chisɔsi ɛ an kun ma fɛn fan. Nyina yama chɛ sin, Sitana, a ee che ko ma‑a an na.
62005019	Mmɔ tana, mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a denɛ mu mmɔ a. Mbɛ a sin, dunya tɔɛ gbɛɛ, an mbe a wan Sitana 'a gbasaya an kɔɔ.
62005020	Mmɔ‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ Chisɔsi, Yataa 'a denɛ na‑a, mbɛ a‑a tea Yataa yian mmɔ a. Mmɔ mu gbɛ mɔ dɔndɔɛ an na tea Yataa chɛ a, koe min na mu, mmɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a Chisɔsi a, a 'a denɛ. An mu tea Yataa a, min mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be.
62005021	N 'na denɛ nu, wo ma a ma, fen kɔ fen bakoe ni ben Yataa ma, wo faa n dɔ.
63001001	N fan chɔchi gbakoo, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena i tena, i wan musu chɛ, Yataa faa ma chɛ, wo bɛ i 'a denɛ n na. Wo e Yataa 'a chia an ma, an fɛ mu, wo ko a di n ye. N dɔndɔ gbe ma to ni wo a, chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin‑na Yataa 'a tea sɔn, an gbɛɛ toen fan mu wo a.
63001002	Nn gbɛɛ, nn toen mu wo a, koe min na mu, tea chɛ ɛ gbɛ mmɔ faa n dɔ, a sin mbe ma‑a nɔ wan kuɔ fɔ ko a.
63001003	Mmɔ Fa Yataa, an fea Chisɔsi Chasi a, a 'a denɛ, an 'na dua ni ma mmɔ ma, an 'na chinchimaya ni ma mmɔ ma, a basan an 'na faachima a. Koe chɛ n mbe ma‑a wan tun tun mmɔ ta n na, koe min na mu, mmɔ danden mu Yataa 'a tea sakana a. A sin to, a toen fan mu mmɔ a.
63001004	A ma‑a wan n ma buɔdia chenama wa a, a ɔ sɔn koe a, mbɛ i 'a denɛ dɔ nu, an mbe wan tea chia ma, yɔ Fa Yataa‑a a fɔ buɛ min dɔ mmɔ ye.
63001005	Sanche gbɛ, bɔɔɛ, n mbe ee ka na tena sawa nama an nyɛn tena wo tena, chɛɛ sawa mu, min mbe mmɔ boo ɔ, a ka sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tima saa saa ma. An sawa chɛ ɔ, mmɔ ni to mmɔ nyɔn na.
63001006	Chɛ sin fan mu koadia a, bea koe a Yataa 'a sawa fɛ. A sin‑na a fɔ wan wo ye, a ka sakana bai chɛndɛ chɛ a min tima saa saa ma, mbɛ wo ni tachɛ chɛ koadia ɔ.
63001007	Fania fɔ mɔɛ sɛsɛ n mbe ben tena dunya ɔ. Mɔɛ nu, miin mbe ee dɔn a ma, mbɛ Chisɔsi Chasi na‑a wan dunya chɛ ɔ, mɔgbuya ɔ. An mɔ bonda chɛ nu, mɔ bun mɔɛ mu an na, Chasi chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ nu.
63001008	Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo kun ma fɛn, min mbe a ma, wo ee fo‑a fen chɛ a, wo‑a wai chɛ min ko a. Chɛɛ wo e wo 'a tɔnɔnɛ gbɛɛ ma sɔn‑da wan.
63001009	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min ma a too ma sɔ ni kan chɛ ma, Chasi‑a min chɛ, chɛɛ a‑a a ta sa a kun ma, a mɔɛ chɛ ma mɔ dɔndɔ a an fea Yataa a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe a too ma sɔ‑a kan chɛ ma, Chasi‑a min chɛ, a mɔɛ chɛ ma‑a mɔ dɔndɔɛ a, an fea Fa Yataa a, a basan a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi a.
63001010	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a wo 'a chenɛ a, kan dɔ mende a min kaen mu Chasi ta ma, wo ma wo ya kɔɔɛ yian a mɔɛ chɛ a, wo gbu ma a kɔndɔn.
63001011	Koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ i wɛn mbe i ya kɔɔɛ yian‑da a a, ɛ wan yɔ e ka i boo chɛ‑a a 'a ko yama ma an dɔ.
63001012	Ko sɛsɛ ɛ wan n yii ma, a fɔ koe a wo ye. Chɛɛ n mbe ee a finɛ puin tena a gbɛ ɔ. N mbe min ma tena, n yiima ɛ a fɔ tena wan n ye, n ni na wo kɔndɔn, mmɔ ni chia ɔ bɔ dɔndɔ chɛ. Chɛ an mbe a ma‑a, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ 'a buɔdia da ni fa gban.
63001013	I suun ma nyɔɛ musu ma, Yataa faa ma chɛ, a 'a denɛ n‑na i kɔndɔn.
64001001	N fan chɔchi gbakoo, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena i tena, i wan Kayɔsi. E Yataa 'a chia an ma, an fɛ mu i ko a di n ye.
64001002	N dia nyɔɛ, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo fea Yataa a, wo e wan kuiɛ dɔndɔya chɛndɛ ɔ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, Yataa ni i gboo ɔ bɔ, Yataa ni i dua.
64001003	Suun ma nyɔɛ dɔ n na‑a wan, an‑na a fɔ n ye, mbɛ e wan sɔ ɔ den Chisɔsi ko a, yɔ e buɛ min dɔ Yataa 'a chia ma teaya ɔ, tee ɔ tee a. Chɛ‑a n bu ɔ dia wan kaka.
64001004	Koe min na mu, buɔdia dɔ gbɛɛ ee to nɔ n ko a, min benden mu chɛ ma, ni n‑na a a min, mbɛ n 'na denɛ n mbe tachɛ tena wan Yataa 'a chia ma teaya ɔ.
64001005	N dia nyɔɛ, i tanden mu i 'a wai ɔ, e min chɛ tena mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n ye, an dɔ n mu wɛɛ sonda n na i tena.
64001006	Koadia min nyɔn sima e a yian tena an na, a a benden fan mu gbɛ chɔchi tena nɛ. An mbe ka tachɛ min dɔ, ɛ nyan‑da wan, i ni an na ben masaa chɛndɛ a, min mbe Yataa faa chima.
64001007	Koe min na mu, an mbe ka tachɛ min dɔ Chisɔsi Chasi ko a, an ma dɔn ni fen kɔ fen bia koe a, mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a min be, mɔɛ miin nii ma an kai fa ni Chisɔsi a.
64001008	Chɛ an fɛ mu, a nyin mmɔ wɛɛ, mmɔ ni toa si an kɔɔ, a nyin mmɔ ni a bun a a, wai chɛndɛ chɛ chɛ‑a, Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ a ta koe a ya ɔ ma.
64001009	N na‑a gboo nyɛn fan nɔ chɔchi tena. Chɛɛ Diotɛfesi, min toen mu a wandi ma koe a an ya ɔ sɔɛ a, a ee dɔn a too ma sɔ koe a, nn da a kuiɛ ma.
64001010	Ni n na‑a nɔ, n mbe a fɔ‑a wan a ye den chɔchi ya kɔɔ, ɛ koe miin ma tena, nn tɔ yama min ɛ ben tena a ɔ tɛ‑a. Chɛ dechee ma, ni mmɔ suun ma nyɔɛ n‑na a tan, a ee ko chɛndɛ ma an na. A ka chɛ ma, mɔɛ miin bɛɛ toenɛ ma, an ni ko chɛndɛ ma an na, ɛ a mɔɛ chɛ n na gban fan. A sin to, ni an mɔɛ chɛ n‑na ko chɛndɛ chɛ ma, ɛ an gbain fan a bɔ chɔchi ɔ.
64001011	N dia nyɔɛ, i ma bea mɔɛ n fɛ, miin mbe ko yama ma. Chɛɛ bea chɛ n fan fɛ, miin mbe ko chɛndɛ ma. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe koe ma min nyin, Yataa 'a mɔɛ mu. Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe koe ma, min ma nyin, a ma Yataa sɔn.
64001012	Demetiɔsi tana, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ a bai tena wan. A sin tea gbu sin ko a, nn bɛɛ, nn mbe wan a bai tena. I sin‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ ni nn na‑a chɛ ma, tea ɛ wan a ɔ.
64001013	Ko sɛsɛ ɛ wan n yii ma, a fɔ koe a i ye, chɛɛ n ma to ni, n ni a finɛ puin a gbɛ ɔ.
64001014	N toen mu n ni na i tan sanche, mɔ ni chia ɔ bɔ dɔndɔ chɛ.
64001015	Yataa ni faachima be i ma. I dia nyɔɛ n gbɛɛ nɛ, an‑na i kɔndɔn. Nn dia nyɔɛ nu nɔ, an kɔndɔn nn ye dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
65001001	N fan Chuda, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, wo wan Chisian mɔɛ nu. Chisɔsi Chasi 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ mu n na, n fan Chimisi dɔ kaima. Fa Yataa toen mu wo a, a‑a wo chee wan a tena, a sin, Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ wo kun ma fɛn tena wan.
65001002	Yataa ni a a tun chinchin koe a wo ma, a ni faachima be wo ma, a ni a ma wo ni to wo nyɔn na.
65001003	N dia nyɔɛ nu, n toen ni kaka n ni gboo chɛ nyɛn a si bauncha ma, Chisɔsi‑a min be mmɔ ma. Chɛɛ n yiima dɔndɔɛ‑a a fɔ wan n ye, mbɛ n ni wo faa nande, wo ni butuinɛ chɛ, wo 'a danaya ko a Yataa a. Danaya chɛ sin, Yataa an‑na a ma, mmɔ‑a a ma sɔn, a sin mbe ee mun to.
65001004	Mɔɛ dɔ n yen ko, miin mbe ee Yataa kuiɛ ma, an mbe kan yama chɛ, an na‑a mmɔ tɛ ɔ yɛdɛn yɛdɛn. Mɔɛ chɛ n bakoe nyɛnden fan mu suun suun, mbɛ Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a wan an bakoe ma, a ni an tɔɔya. An ma Yataa sɔn, Yataa ɛ chinchin fan an ma. Chɛɛ an mbe an chinchincha chɛ an ya, mbɛ an ma‑a fɔɛ yama ɔ. An mbe yɛ wan to, mbɛ an ban‑da Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ, min mu mmɔ 'a mansa dɔndɔɛ a, mmɔ kun ti.
65001005	Wo‑a chɛ ɔ sɔn bɛɛ boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ n mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan to wo a. Mbɛ Yataa na‑a Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n bɔ wan yɔncha ɔ Ichipi chɛnyɛ ɔ. Chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ, an dɔ nu, a‑a an kasaa wan, koe min na mu, an ma dɔn ni dan koe a a wan Yataa a.
65001006	Koe chɛ wɛɛ to‑a wan wo yii ma, a si maeka chɛ n bɛɛ ma, miin faa nii ma chima ni an 'na sɔ tena a banda bu ɔ. An na‑a a boo ka wan, mbɛ an bɔ‑a nɔ. Chɛ ko a, Yataa‑a a ma wan, an chii‑a yɔɔɛ a kuɔ fɔ ko a, pimbi pimbi ɔ. Yataa sin 'na gbasaya ɔ, an mbe ma tena nɔ wan chii chɛ ɔ, aan tee chɛ ni che, gbɛmbo tee wa chɛ. An tee chɛ ma mu, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a an bakoe ma.
65001007	Sɔdɔn fea Komoa an bɛɛ mu to dɔndɔ an na. Duu wa fea chɛ nu, a basan konko mɛsɛ n na an 'na tindanɛ, an‑na ko yama sɛsɛ tɛ wan, an‑na Yataa 'a sawa sɛsɛ ka a chia ma. An 'na tɔɔya tana, a mu tɔmɔsi an na mɔɛ chɛ n tena, miin mbe na‑a ma‑a ta ɔ, kuɔ fɔ ko a.
65001008	Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin na‑a mmɔ tɛ ɔ yɛdɛn, an mbe an ko dɔndɔ gbe chɛ n fan ma tena. An 'na yiinachii ɛ a ma tena wan, an mbe ban‑da don koe a Yataa da a kuiɛ kɔɔ. Ɛ a ma tena wan to, an mbe an fandi gbu gboo bia‑a yama yama, a yɛ to, an mbe maeka n main‑da.
65001009	Chɛɛ maeka n 'na mansa dɔndɔ wɛɛ, min tɔ mu Maikɛɛ, a nii ma Sitana main ni. A na‑a a fɔ wan dechee a ma, a ɔ, Mansa Yataa ni a tɔɔya. Chɛ ma‑a Mosisi su kun ma wan. An fea chɛ dɔndɔ toen ni a ni su chɛ ya, min na ban‑da kɔɔsa ma an tɛ ɔ.
65001010	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tana, ni an ma koe min dɔ gbɛ ni, ma yɛn ma koe mu an tena, an sin mbe bai yama an sa a si a ma. An mbe wan dechee yɔ soe nu, koe min na mu, koe min mbe puin an yii ma, an mbe an ma. Koe n fan nɛ, miin mbe na kasaa a, an kun ma.
65001011	Koe min mbe an tan‑da, a yau gba an ko a. An puin‑da mɔna chɛ chen gba ɔ, mɔna min tɔ ni Ken, min na‑a a dɔɛ fa. Kɔpɔ koe‑a a ma, an bɔ‑a Badaan gba ɔ, an mbe ko ɔ ko ma wan kɔpɔ koe a. A yɛ to, Kɔya 'a gbunɛ nyɔn sima, an‑na a a bea, min‑na an kasaa pɔɛ.
65001012	Mɔ bonda chɛ nu, mɔ yama mu an na, miin mbe an bɔɛ n ka chia chɛndɛ ma. Ni wo ma‑a daun chɛ wɛɛ a, wo bɛ an na, kuiɛ dɔndɔya ɔ, an mbe an yii na chii dechee an fandi an na. An 'na yiima yaua daun chɛ, ɛ kuiɛ dɔndɔya chɛ a ɔ yɔn fan. Mɔ gbu a tenden ma an na. An mbe wan yɔ sona min mbe gbii teema ɔ, chɛɛ a ee na. An mbe wan to yɔ kɔnɛ, min yamba bandenɛ a a, a sin, a ee gbɔ be, kɔn fu tima wɛɛ a. Kɔn bonda chɛ kuu ɛ bɔ wan, a a ni dɛ, mbɛ a fa‑a gba fea.
65001013	A yɛ to, ni yii fa‑a, ɛ fenɛ n na fɔnɔ wan tindi ma, mbɛ a yɛ‑a. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, an mbe ka wan. An mbe an 'na mauma koe n to ka wan an gbaa, mbɛ an ta‑a. An mbe wan to yɔ tɔmbuaka chɛ nu, miin ka‑a chia chɛ ma, Yataa‑a min yian an na, mbɛ an ta‑a an ta gbee a. Yataa‑a kaina ɔ bɛn an ko a, ma koe a pimbi pimbi ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.
65001014	Adami mama denɛ ta mama denɛ ta mama n denɛ dɔndɔ ni wan nɔ, min tɔ ni Ɛnoku. A na‑a bai sa wan suun, a si an mɔ bonda chɛ n ma. A ɔ, a yen ko, mbɛ Mansa Chisɔsi ɛ na‑a wan, a ɔ, an bɛ a 'a maeka wu sɛsɛ sɛsɛ n na.
65001015	A ɔ, ɛ na‑a wan mɔɛ n gbɛɛ gbɛmbo koe a. A ɔ, mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ma Yataa sɔn, a ɔ, mbɛ kaa a tɛ‑a an 'na ko yama n gbɛɛ ma. A ɔ, ko yama chɛ n gbɛɛ, a ɔ, a basan an 'na bai yama n gbɛɛ a, an‑na miin sa a si a ma.
65001016	An mɔ bonda chɛ nu, an faa ee chima, tima ɔ tima an mbe gbonyɛ‑a. An sin, an faa ma koe yama nu, an mbe bea an fan fɛ. A yɛ to, an da ɔ yonka koo, an sin mbe da ma dia bai n sa wan mɔ dɔ mende n tena, min mbe a ma dechee, an faa ma koe ni chɛ an ye.
65001017	Chɛɛ n dia nyɔɛ nu, ɛ wan wo yii ma, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi 'a sɔ mɔɛ nu, an na‑a bai min fɔ suun.
65001018	An na‑a a fɔ wan wo ye, an dɔ, mɔɛ n mbe na‑a wan tee dankama nɛnɛ chɛ n kɔɔ, an dɔ, miin mbe bea‑a an 'na Yataa sɔn baiya koe n fɛ, miin na di an ye. An dɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ nu, an mbe mayɛma bun‑da wo ma, wo bɛ Yataa a.
65001019	Dunya ma mɔ bonda chɛ nu, Yataa Nyina ee miin fɛ, an fan mbe na ko a fasanɛ a.
65001020	Chɛɛ wo tana, n dia nyɔɛ nu, wo ma yɛ kuu kɔ wo 'a danaya ɔ Yataa a. Wo samunɛ chɛ gbasaya chɛ ɔ, Yataa Nyina ɛ min be.
65001021	Wo ma bɔ Yataa 'a koadia kɔɔ. Wo chinchimaya chɛ ma kɔn, mmɔ 'a mansa Chisɔsi Chasi ɛ min chɛ‑a, min mbe na‑a kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ a.
65001022	Mɔɛ dɔ nu, sika ɛ miin dɔ, wo an deman.
65001023	Dɔ n bɛɛ baun, i ni an sogban, a bɔ ta ɔ. Chinchimaya, a basan sika a, a ni ma wo ɔ dɔ n sin ko a. Chɛɛ tima ya, an 'na ko yama maenɛ ma na sin i ma.
65001024	Sanche gbɛ, mmɔ tando be Yataa ma. An mu dechee mmɔ 'a Yataa a, an mbe mmɔ baun, a 'a denɛ Chisɔsi Chasi ɔ, mmɔ 'a mansa. A wan Yataa, an mbe a ma, mmɔ ee bea, mbɛ a‑a a ma, mmɔ sɔ‑a a chen kɔɔ manɛ ɔ, mabɔ kan kɔ kan mbe ee mmɔ ma, mɔɔ buɔdia mmɔ ɔ. Mansaya, ni bemaya, a basan gbasaya a, a ka suun ma, aan sanche, ɛ Yataa an boo ɔ, kuɔ fɔ, ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ni ma ka.
66001001	Yataa‑a koe chɛ n fan dɔ yian Chisɔsi Chasi a, koe miin ni na tena ma‑a sanche. Yataa na‑a chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, Chisɔsi wɛɛ ni an dɔ yian mɔɛ n na, miin mbe a ko a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Chisɔsi‑a a 'a maeka sɔ wan, a ni an sakana chɛ a ben a 'a yɔnɛ Chɔn tena.
66001002	Chɔn chɛ koɔ‑a wan den, a si koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ma, maeka chɛ‑a miin yian a a, a si Yataa da a bai ma, a basan Chisɔsi Chasi 'a siiya a.
66001003	Mɔɛ miin mbe bai chɛ n kan‑da gboo chɛ ɔ, an duaen mu. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe bai chɛ a min‑da, min ka‑a Yataa tena, mbɛ an‑na an boo si a kɔɔ, an duaen mu. Koe min na mu, tima ɔ ma yansan to, mbɛ koe chɛ n gbɛɛ bɔ‑a a a.
66001004	N fan Chɔn, n fan mbe gboo chɛ nyɛn tena wo tena, wo wɛn mbe chɔchi wɔnfea n dɔ, Esia chɛnyɛ ɔ. Yataa ni wo dua, Yataa ni faachima be wo ma. Yataa min mbe nɔ sanche, a ni wan nɔ suun, a sin mbe ma‑a wan nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. Nyina wɔnfea n bɛɛ, miin mbe sɔ ɔ Yataa ya kɔɔ, ɛ si ɔ a 'a mansaya sea a.
66001005	A ka to Chisɔsi Chasi wɛɛ tena, tea bai sa mɔɛ, a wɛn pɛn‑na a kɔɔ sɔ saya ɔ, a sin‑na gbasaya benden mu mansa kan kɔ kan ma dunya ma, an mbe an kɔɔ. Chisɔsi toen mu mmɔ a, a sin‑na mmɔ kun ka wan, mmɔ 'a ko yama n dɔ, a wii a.
66001006	A‑a mmɔ ma mɔɛ n na, miin mbe a 'a mansaya kɔɔ, tɛ mɔɛ n mu miin na Yataa ko a. A wan mu Chisɔsi fa a, ni a 'a Yataa. Basɔmaya ni ma Chisɔsi Chasi ma, gbasaya ni ma a boo ɔ, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ. A ni ma ka.
66001007	A yen ko, Chisɔsi ɛ na tena wan dugbu ɔ. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ a yen‑da wan, a basan chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin na‑a a sɔɔ a kaa fɛ. A sin, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, an mbe di‑a wan gbafi gbafi a ko a. A ɛ ma‑a ka wan. A ni ma ka.
66001008	Yataa Mansa‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, a wan mbe a ma fen fen mbe a kuu sɔ, a wan mbe a ma to fen fen mbe che a danka a. A ɔ, a wan ni suun, a wan mbe sanche, a ɔ, a sin mbe ma‑a wan nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. A ɔ, a 'a gbasaya danka ee ma‑a.
66001009	N fan mu, n fan Chɔn, wo suun ma nyɔɛ Chasi ɔ. Mmɔ gbɛɛ, mɔ dɔndɔɛ mu mmɔ a, mmɔ bɛ Chisɔsi a, an mu mmɔ 'a mansa a. A sin, mmɔ gbɛɛ, mmɔ ɛ tɔɔya dɔndɔɛ an dɔ bia tena, mmɔ ɛ mmɔ faa bia‑a, a ko a. Yataa 'a sakana bai sa koe a, a basan Chisɔsi wakoe a, n na ta‑a Patimɔsi bia ɔ an ko a, yii tinɛ ɔ duu gboo chɛ ma.
66001010	Patimɔsi chɛ ni, Tɛnɛ kan kɔ dɔɛ ma, Yataa Nyina bea‑a n fɛ gban. A tima kɔɔ, n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min fan, n gbaa chia a. Kuiɛ chɛ maen fan ni gbankon, yɔ buu fɛ kuiɛ.
66001011	Mbɛ an kuiɛ chɛ, a ɔ n ma, “E koe miin dɔ yen‑da, an nyɛn, i ni an na ta chɔchi wɔnfea chɛ n tena, duu wa chɛ n dɔ. Chɔchi chɛ ni ma Ɛfisɔsi, ni chɛ Simina, chɛ Pakamɔn, ni chɛ Tiyatiya. Chɔchi chɛ to Sadisi, ni chɛ Fidadɛfia, a basan chɛ a Daɔdisia.”
66001012	Mbɛ n‑na n ya a mun, n ni a ɔ yen, mɔɛ min ni koɔ tena n tena. Mbɛ n‑na dambo si fenɛ yen wɔnfea, an nyandenɛ ɛ sanu a.
66001013	Dambo si fen wɔnfea chɛ n tɛ ɔ, mɔɛ ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ, Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ. Doma min ni a ma, a kaen ni a chen kana a wan. A sin, fenɛ min bunden ni a kaa a, a nyanden ni sanu an na.
66001014	A kundi min ni a kun ma, a gbɛen fan ni fo yɔ fen gbɛ, yɔ fande funku wɛɛ. A ya sin ni man tena wan yɔ sanku manɛ.
66001015	A chenɛ ɛ man‑da taun yɔ kundu bɔenɛ faa ta a. A kuiɛ sin maenɛ ɛ yɔ yii fa ɛ tu buɛ min dɔ.
66001016	A‑a tɔmbuaka wɔnfea bia, a boo nyima a boo a. Mbɛ chɛɛ chɛ mɛ bɔ‑a a da ɔ, min da ɛ a bu ɔ, ɛ to a kɔɛ, an na saen ba ɛ. A ya kɔɔɛ sin ni man tena wan, yɔ ni tee che‑a a kun tɛ.
66001017	N‑na a yen kɛn, mbɛ n bea‑a a chen kɔɔ susu gbuu yɔ su. Chɛɛ a‑a a boo nyima bun n ma, a ɔ, “Sɛmbɛ chian koe a. N fan mbe a ma fen fen mbe a kuu sɔ, n fan mbe a ma to fen fen mbe danka.”
66001018	Mbɛ a ɔ, “A yen ko, chi ɛ n boo ɔ saya ko a, a basan ta koe a faa a. N faen fan ni, chɛɛ a yen ko, n mbe fɔɛ ɔ kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a. N fan, fɔɛ ɛ n fan boo ɔ.
66001019	E koe miin dɔ yen tena sanche, an nyɛn, a basan chɛ n bɛɛ a, miin mbe na tena ma‑a.
66001020	Ka wɛ n mbe a ɔ yian i a, tɔmbuaka wɔnfea chɛ nu n boo nyima a, an sɔen mu fenɛ miin ko a. Mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yian to i a, dambo si fen wɔnfea chɛ nu, an bɛɛ sɔen mu fenɛ miin ko a. Tɔmbuaka wɔnfea chɛ n mu maeka wɔnfea an fan na, chɔchi wɔnfea an ko a. Dambo si fen wɔnfea chɛ n sin, an mu chɔchi wɔnfea an fan na.”
66002001	Mbɛ a ɔ te to n ma, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Ɛfisɔsi duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, tɔmbuaka wɔnfea chɛ n mbe min boo a,” a ɔ, “n fan, mɔɛ chɛ, min mbe tachɛ chɛ sanu dambo si fen wɔnfea chɛ n tɛ ɔ,” a ɔ, “n 'na sakana an nɛ.”
66002002	A ɔ, “N‑na ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan dɔ sɔn fan a si wo ma. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo‑a min chɛ Ɛfisɔsi chɔchi ɔ. A yɛ to, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e fɔɛ min nyɔn sima a tachɛ tena. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan to, wo e wo faa bia tena buɛ min dɔ Chisian wai ɔ. N danden fan mu a a, mbɛ wo ee che wo boo si‑a mɔ yama n kɔɔ. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe an fandi chee n 'na sɔ mɔɛ n na, wo‑a an dɔ siman fan. Mbɛ wo‑a a ɔ yen, mbɛ fania fɔ mɔ gbama mu an na.
66002003	Wo‑a wo faa bia kaka tɔɔya a n ko a, a sin, wo gboo ɔ ma fa ni ma koe a n fɛ.
66002004	Chɛɛ wo ma bɔ chia, ɛ dɔndɔ gbe. Koadia ee to wo faa ɔ chɛndɛ chɛ, yɔ a ni buɛ min dɔ a ɔ a saa a.
66002005	Wo wo yii na chii, wo ni buɛ min dɔ a kɔma a, mbɛ wo‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na, wo ni yɛ wo chɛ chɛ wai kɔma n dɔ. Ni chɛ ma, n mbe na‑a wan, mbɛ n‑na wo 'a dambo si fen chɛ ka a sɔ gba ɔ, n‑na a ya, wo tɔɔ koe a.
66002006	Chɛɛ n mbe wo tando tena ko dɔndɔ an ko a. N ma to ni mɔɛ miin na, Nikodasi fɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, wo wɛɛ ma to ni an chɛ chɛ wai n na.”
66002007	A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.” A ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ miin mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, an mɔɛ chɛ nu, n mbe a ma‑a wan, an ni kɔnɛ chɛ gbɔɛ daun, kɔn chɛ Yataa 'a yadi ɔ banda bu ɔ, min mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ be.”
66002008	Mbɛ a ɔ te to n ma, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Simina duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn mbe a ma fen fen mbe a kuu sɔ,” a ɔ, “n fɛn mbe a ma to fen fen mbe danka, n fan mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn fa‑a, mbɛ n yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ.”
66002009	A ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e mɔnɛ min dɔ bia tena, wo e yakɔɔtawa min dɔ. Chɛɛ tea gbu ko a, yɔn tɔ ma wo a. A yɛ to, n‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin‑na an fandi ya Chu mɔɛ n na, an mbe wo tɔ yama a fasan tena buɛ min dɔ. Chɛɛ Chu mɔ ma an na, Sitana 'a mɔɛ n fan nɛ.
66002010	Wo ma chian tɔɔya kan kɔ kan ma, wo e na tena min chɛ‑a. A yen ko, Sitana ɛ na tena a ma‑a wo dɔ n ni sa pimbi chenɛ a, wo ɔ siman koe a. A sin, wo e tɔɔya ɔ yen‑da wan tee tan ko a. Wo sɔ chidi wo 'a danaya ɔ n na, an ni a fɔ a ni ma saya wɛɛ a wo ko a, wo ma mun. N mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ an be‑a wo ma, wo 'a boo ɔ gbasi woo a.”
66002011	A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.” A ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, a mɔɛ chɛ ee saya fean bɔɛ chɛ‑a.”
66002012	Mbɛ a ɔ te to, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Pakamɔn duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn 'na chɛɛ chɛ mɛ da ɛ a bu ɔ, ɛ a kɔɛ, a a saenɛ ɛ chɛndɛ chɛ,” a ɔ, “n 'na sakana an nɛ.”
66002013	A ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo e kaina min, Sitana an mu mansa a nɔ. Chɛɛ wo‑a n bakoe bia wan wo boo fea a, wo ma wo kan kɔ sɔ ni dan koe a n na. Wo dan‑da wan n na, tima chɛ wɛɛ a, tima min na an‑na Andipasi fa wo tɛ ɔ nɔ, Sitana waa chɛ. A ni mɔɛ an na, min‑na a ɔ yian tima ɔ tima, a da a bai ɔ, a basan a 'a chɛ chɛ wai a, mbɛ n 'na mɔɛ mu a a.
66002014	Chɛɛ n bu ɔ ma di koe dɔ n na, a si wo ma. Mɔɛ dɔ nu wo tɛ ɔ, an mbe bea tena kan chɛ an fɛ, Badaan ɛ min chɛ tena, Badaan min‑na Badaki kan, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n na dɛ koe a ko yama ɔ. A‑a a ma wan, an‑na daun fenɛ n daun, miin ni bɔ yasi a fania yataa n tena. Mbɛ a yɛ‑a to, a‑a a ma, an‑na koe tɛ.
66002015	Wo wɛɛ, wo e ka wan. Mɔɛ dɔ n mbe wan wo tɛ ɔ, miin mbe bea tena kan chɛ n fɛ, Nikodasi fɛ mɔɛ n mbe kanɛ miin chɛ tena.
66002016	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama chɛ n na. Ni chɛ ma, a ɔ ee yansan tena, n na‑a wo tena, mbɛ n‑na butuinɛ chɛ an mɔɛ chɛ n na, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ chɛ a, min mbe n da ɔ.”
66002017	A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.” A ɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, a mɔɛ chɛ, n mbe daun fen chɛ dɔ be‑a wan a ma a daun koe a, daun fen nunden chɛ. A yɛ to, n mbe senɛ be‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ ma, senɛ min gbɛenɛ ɛ, a sin, tɔ nama an nyɛndenɛ ɛ ma‑a a ma. Mɔɛ min mbe senɛ chɛ ma sɔn‑da, an mu dechee mɔɛ a, min mbe tɔɛ chɛ sɔn‑da.”
66002018	Mbɛ a ɔ te to, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Tiyatiya duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn mu Yataa 'a denɛ a,” a ɔ, “n fɛn ya ɛ yɔ sanku manɛ, n chenɛ ɛ man‑da taun, yɔ kundu min bɔ‑a faa ta ɔ,” a ɔ, “n 'na sakana an nɛ.”
66002019	A ɔ, “N‑na ko ɔ ko kan kɔ kan dɔ sɔn fan a si wo ma. N‑na wo 'a koadia ɔ sɔn fan, wo kai faen mu buɛ min dɔ Yataa a, wo 'a wai chɛndɛ, a basan wo 'a faabia a. A sin to, wo e wai min sin chɛ tena sanche, a benden mu a saa ma, tima min na wo ma‑a n fɛ mɔɛ n na.
66002020	Chɛɛ n bu ɔ ma di chɛ a, a si wo ma. Wo ee ko ɔ ko ma tena, a si musu chɛ ma, Chɛsibɛɛ musu chɛ, min‑na a wandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a. Chɛɛ ɛ kanɛ min chɛ tena, ɛ n 'na mɔɛ n sɔ tena chia yama an ma, an mbe ko yama tɛ‑a, a basan daun fen daunɛ a, min mbe bɔ yasi a fenɛ n tena, an mbe miin ya yataa a.
66002021	N‑na tima be a ma, a kan kɔ sɔ koe a, a 'a ko yama n na, chɛɛ a ma to ni a ni a boo bɔ ko tɛ chɛ ɔ.
66002022	A yen ko, n mbe a sa tena gbɛ gbandi waa an ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin‑na koe tɛ a a, n mbe tɔɔya wa an sa tena an bɛɛ ma. Ni an‑na an kan kɔ sɔ ko yama chɛ a, ɛ min ma tena, n mbe ee an tɔɔya‑a.
66002023	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe a fɛ, n mbe an fa‑a wan. A sin chɔchi chɛ n gbɛɛ, an mbe a ɔ sɔn‑da wan, mbɛ n fan‑na mɔ ɔ mɔ yii ma sɔn, a basan mɔ ɔ mɔ faa ɔ koe a. Dɔndɔ, dɔndɔɛ a mu, n mbe an gbɛɛ pawa‑a, yɔ an mbe wai chɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ.”
66002024	A ɔ, “Musu chɛ 'a kan chɛ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, tea ɔ nunden ba a si Sitana ma, kan yama mu. Chɛɛ wo tana, wo wɛn to‑a ka nɔ chɔchi ɔ, Tiyatiya duu chɛ ɔ, wo wɛn ma bea ni a 'a kan chɛ fɛ, bai ɛ wan n da a wo ko a. N mbe a fɔ tena wo ye, mbɛ n mbe ee suun fankama dɔ gbɛɛ si tena wo kun ma.
66002025	Chɛɛ wo gboo ɔ ma fa dan koe a n na.
66002026	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, miin mbe ma‑a n da a kuiɛ ma, aan an 'na fɔɛ danka a, n mbe gbasaya be‑a wan an ma, Yataa sɔn bai n kun ma.
66002027	N mbe gbasaya be‑a wan an ma, yɔ Fa Yataa‑a min be n ma. An sin chinchincha ee ma‑a an faa ɔ, an mbe an bia‑a wan, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ boo da te buɛ min dɔ. N mbe tɔmbuaka be‑a wan an ma, min mbe ma man‑da banda ɔ ka da ma. Chɛ ɛ a ɔ yian‑da wan an na, mbɛ an sɔen fan mu gban Yataa ko a.”
66002029	A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.”
66003001	Mbɛ a ɔ te to, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Sadisi duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn ta mu Yataa 'a nyina wɔnfea chɛ a, tɔmbuaka wɔnfea chɛ n mbe n fɛn boo ɔ,” a ɔ, “n 'na sakana an nɛ.” A ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e tachɛ tena buɛ min dɔ. Wo tɔ a diama taen mu, mbɛ mɔɛ mu wo a, miin kai faen mu n na, chɛɛ n fɛ mɔ ma wo a ɛnden bɛɛ a.
66003002	Koe min na mu, n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ wo tachɛ buɛ ma Yataa faa chima nin bɛ. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ wo 'a danaya ɔ Yataa a, wo ɔ ni gbɛa, a bɔ gboo ɔ fa chɛ ɔ wo 'a Chisiancha ɔ. Gboo ɔ fa chɛ ma a ma wo ni sɛmbɛ dan koe a n na.
66003003	Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo wo yii na chii, wo kan‑da min na, a yɛ to, wo‑a min na min. Wo wo too ma sɔ a ma, wo ni wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na. Ni wo ma wo kunɛ kɔɔ sɔ ni, n mbe na‑a wo tɛnɛ‑a wan, yɔ kanka ɛ a ma buɛ min dɔ. Wo ee na‑a tima gbu wɛɛ sɔn‑da, n mbe na‑a tima min na, wo tɔɔya koe a.
66003004	Chɛɛ chɛ gbɛɛ ɔ, wo dɔ n mbe wan nɔ Sadisi duu chɛ ɔ, wo wɛn tachɛ buɛ nyin Yataa tena. Wo mɔɛ chɛ nu, mmɔ bɛ, mmɔ ɛ doma gbɛ don‑da wan, mmɔ ni tachɛ chɛ. Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan, koe min na mu, chɛ bɛnden fan mu an ma.
66003005	Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, an ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ma‑a ka wan koa gbɛ a. A sin, n mbe ee an tɔɛ bɔ‑a gboo chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ miin mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da, an tɔɛ ɛ ma‑a gboo min dɔ. N mbe a fɔ‑a wan den, Fa Yataa ya kɔɔ, an bɛ a 'a maeka n na, mbɛ n 'na mɔɛ n fan nɛ.”
66003006	A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.”
66003007	Mbɛ a ɔ te to, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Fidadɛfia duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn kan nyɔ ee, n fɛn teaen mu, a sin to, Mansa Defidi 'a chi ɛ n boo ɔ.” A ɔ, “N fan mbe chenɛ da a ka, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a da a tɔn, a yɛ to, n fan mbe a da a tɔn, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee a da a ka.” A ɔ, “N 'na sakana an nɛ.”
66003008	A ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e tachɛ tena buɛ min dɔ. N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ wo 'a gbasaya dɔɔ wɛɛ boo ɔ boo, chɛɛ wo bea‑a wan n da a kuiɛ fɛ, wo ma ka ni n fɛ. A yen ko, chenɛ da a kaenɛ mu gbɛ wo ya ɔ, mɔ ɔ mɔ sin mbe ee nɔ, min mbe a a tɔn.
66003009	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin‑na an fandi ya Chu mɔɛ n na, chɛɛ fania mu, Sitana 'a mɔɛ chɛ nu, a yen ko, n mbe a ma‑a wan an ni na, an ni an bun wo chen kɔɔ. An gbɛɛ, an ni a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ n toen fan mu wo a.
66003010	Koe min na mu, wo‑a n da a kuiɛ a min, wo‑a wo faa bia. N bɛɛ, n mbe wo kun ma fɛn‑da wan tima chɛ a, tima min na dunya gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a dɔsimanɛ kɔɔ, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ɛ ma‑a tɔɔya ɔ.
66003011	A ɔ ee yansan tena to, mbɛ n na‑a. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, wo gboo ɔ ma fa dan koe a n na, min mbe a ma, wo ee na‑a fo‑a wo 'a boo ɔ gbasi woo a.
66003012	Mɔɛ min mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, n mbe a ma‑a wan soo ɔ bia‑a, Fa Yataa 'a chenɛ a. A sin, a ee bɔ‑a nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a. N mbe n 'na Yataa tɔɛ nyɛn‑da wan a ma. A yɛ to, n mbe duu chɛ tɔɛ nyɛn‑da wan a ma, Chuusaɛn nama, Fa Yataa 'a duu wa chɛ, min mbe na‑a, a ka a tena banda bu ɔ. N mbe yɛ‑a wan to, n‑na n fandi gbu tɔ nama nyɛn a ma.”
66003013	A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.”
66003014	Mbɛ a ɔ te to, a ɔ, n ni chɛ nyɛn maeka chɛ tena chɔchi ko a, Daɔdisia duu ɔ. A ɔ, “N fan, mɔɛ chɛ, n fɛn mbe a ma Yataa da a kuiɛ ni to a gba ɔ, n fɛn mbe tea fɔ a si Yataa ma, n fɛn mbe a 'a dunya gbɛɛ kun ma,” a ɔ, “n 'na sakana an nɛ.”
66003015	A ɔ, “N‑na a ɔ sɔn fan, wo e tachɛ tena buɛ min dɔ. Wo e wan dechee yɔ yii, min ma gbandi, a sin ma chima ni to. A ni nyan fan, wo ni ma chia dɔndɔ a, an ni a ma‑a wo ma gbɔsɔɛ ni ma n ma.
66003016	Chɛɛ wo ee ka buɛ chɛ ɔ, mɔ fufafuu mu wo a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo a fu‑a wan, wo ni bɔ n da ɔ.
66003017	Koe min na mu, wo e a fɔ wan, wo ɔ, wo nyanden mu, wo ɔ, fen fen mbe wan wo boo ɔ, wo ɔ, fen fen ma gbɔsɔɛ ee wo ma. Chɛɛ wo ma a ɔ sɔn, mbɛ wo ma chinchinden mu, wo yɔnden mu, a ma boo kan kɔ kan mbe ee wo ye, wo fiondenɛ mu, wo ma senɛ ɛ.
66003018	Chɛ an fɛ mu, n mbe wo a si tena, wo ni sanu chɛndɛ chɛndɛ san n ma, min mbe a ma, wo ni nyan. A yɛ to, wo ni koa gbɛ wɛɛ san n ma, a ma koe a doma a, wo ma senɛ min mbe, a mau chɛ ni nun. Wo ni bui wɛɛ san to n ma, a chɛ koe a wo ya a ma, wo ni kaina yen.
66003019	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, n toen mu miin na, n mbe an fan ma nyin, mbɛ n‑na a ma, an tɔɔ‑a. Chɛ an fɛ mu, wo wo ma bɛn, mbɛ wo‑a wo kan kɔ sɔ wo 'a ko yama n na.
66003020	A yen ko, n sɔ‑a chenɛ da a, n mbe a tu‑a. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a n kuiɛ a min, mbɛ a‑a chenɛ da a ka, n mbe don‑da wan a 'a chenɛ a. A sin, nn fea, nn mbe daunɛ chɛ‑a wan kaina dɔndɔɛ.
66003021	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe sɔ‑a gban Yataa ko a, n mbe a ma‑a wan, a ni si n baima n 'na mansaya ɔ. An mɔɛ chɛ, ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ n fan, n sɔ‑a buɛ min dɔ gban, mbɛ n‑na si tena chɛ ya Fa Yataa tɔnfɛ.”
66003022	A ɔ, “Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min,” a ɔ, “Yataa Nyina ɛ bai min sa tena chɔchi chɛ n tena.”
66004001	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na ko dɔ mende ɔ yen to. A yen ko, n‑na n ya a ta, n‑na chenɛ da a kaenɛ yen sɔ ɔ n ya kɔɔ banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ chɛ min kuiɛ a min a saa a, min na‑a koɔ n tena yɔ buu, n‑na a kuiɛ a min to. A ɔ, “Sɛ nɛ chɛ, min mbe a ma, n ni a ɔ yian i a, koe miin mbe na tena ma‑a.”
66004002	Mbɛ a ya kɔɔɛ a, a yen ko, Yataa Nyina bea‑a n fɛ gban. N‑na a yen, mbɛ nɔ banda bu ɔ, mansaya sea ɛ wan nɔ si ɔ, mɔɛ ɛ si ɔ a a.
66004003	Mɔɛ chɛ sin, min ni nɔ si ɔ, a ni man tena wan taun, yɔ dɛmunɛ, ni sen baa gbɛama a dɔ mende, min tɔ ni kanidian. Ninkinankantuu min ni man tena yɔ senɛ chɛ, puu mɔɛ n mbe min chee, an dɔ, ɛmɛyadi, an tindanden ni an mansa sea chɛ a.
66004004	Mansa sea bi fea kun ma naanin dɔ mende ni wan nɔ, an mansa sea dɔndɔɛ chɛ a tindanɛ. Gbakoo bi fea kun ma naaninɛ n ni wan si ɔ an mansa sea chɛ n na. An ma bɛnden ni koa gbɛ an dɔ, sanu mansa banfua sienɛ an kun na.
66004005	Mbɛ mansa sea dɔndɔɛ chɛ tena banda bu ɔ, banda man mia mia bɔ‑a nɔ, banda wɛɛ, ɛ ta‑a koɔ‑a gbau gbau, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ ɛ ta‑a bɔ‑a. N‑na dambo wɔnfea wɛɛ yen fan, an mbe man‑da nɔ mansa sea chɛ ya kɔɔ. Chɛ n ni Yataa 'a nyina wɔnfea chɛ n fan na.
66004006	A yɛ to, mansa sea chɛ ya kɔɔ to, yii wa wɛɛ ɔ fuinden fan ni, a maenɛ ɛ yɔ mɛmɛ. Mansa sea chɛ a tindanɛ, a tɔnfɛ gbɛɛ, fɔɛ fen naaninɛ n ni wan nɔ. Fɔɛ fen chɛ n ya n ni wan bɔn dɔ an ya ɔ chia a, an mbe bɔn dɔ an gbaa chia a.
66004007	Fɔɛ fenɛ saa ni wan yɔ yaa. A fean bɔɛ ni wan yɔ ninchi kai. A sawan bɔɛ chɛ, mɔ gbu ya kɔɔɛ an ni a ma. A naanin bɔɛ chɛ sin, a ni wan yɔ kochɛ, min mbe ben banda a.
66004008	Fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n gbɛɛ, an kambanɛ ni wɔdɔ wɔdɔ. An sin, an ya ni wan bɔn dɔ an gboo gbɛɛ ma, a basan an kambanɛ n kɔɔ a. A sin to, su ɔ tee a, an mbe ee sɛmbɛ a fɔ koe a, an dɔ, “A kan nyɔ ee, a kan nyɔ ee, Yataa Mansa kan nyɔ ee. A 'a gbasaya danka ee. A ni wan nɔ suun, ɛ wan nɔ sanche, ɛ ma‑a wan nɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
66004009	Fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ nu, an gboo ɔ ma fa ni tando be koe a, a basan basɔmaya a, ni wai bɔɛ. An‑na mansa chɛ an fai ka, min mbe si ɔ a 'a mansaya sea, min mbe ee fa‑a kuɔ fɔ ko a.
66004010	An mbe ma chɛ a, mbɛ gbakoo bi fea kun ma naanin chɛ nu, an‑na an kumbai gbangban a chen kɔɔ, a wɛn mbe si ɔ mansaya ɔ. Mbɛ an‑na a fai, a wɛn mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a. An 'na mansa banfua nu, an‑na an ya, mbɛ an‑na banfua chɛ n sa a chen kɔɔ, kooya ɔ. Mbɛ an dɔ,
66004011	“Nn 'na mansa, nn 'na Yataa, tando bɛnden mu i wan ma, basɔmaya bɛnden mu i ma, a basan gbasaya a. I wan‑na fen fen nyan, i 'a yiinachii, an‑na a ma, an gbɛɛ nyan‑da.”
66005001	Min ma‑a gbɛ, mbɛ a wɛn mbe ka si ɔ mansa sea chɛ a, n‑na fenɛ yen a boo nyima a. An fen chɛ ni gboo yamba an na, fenɛ nyɛndenɛ ɛ a ya fea gbɛɛ ma. A a mendemende n fan ni, a a chiienɛ ɛ gba wɔnfea.
66005002	Mbɛ n‑na maeka gbasaen ba yen, ɛ tisa chɛ‑a, a kuiɛ ma sɛenɛ a, a ɔ, “Gbasaya bɛnden mu nyɔn ma, yuu tɛ koe a gboo chɛ ma, a ni a a fuin?”
66005003	Chɛɛ mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma bɔ ni banda bu ɔ, min ni yuu chɛ tɛ gboo chɛ ma, a ni a ɔ fɛn. Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma bɔ ni dunya wɛɛ ma, a basan faa a, min ni chɛ ma.
66005004	N‑na chinchima di chɛ wan, kɛn mɔ ɔ mɔ ma a gbasaya chɛ ma sɔn ni yuu chɛ tɛ koe a, gboo chɛ ɔ ni fɛn.
66005005	Mbɛ gbakoo chɛ n dɔndɔ‑a a fɔ n ye, a ɔ, “Sɛmbɛ di chɛ‑a. A yen ko, an mbe a wɛn chee, an dɔ, Chuda dambi ɔ mɔɛ n 'na yaa, a wan bɔ‑a Mansa Defidi 'a dambi ɔ, a kun‑da a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ma. Chɛ an‑na a fɔ, ɛ kun fan a ni yuu wɔnfea chɛ n tɛ gboo chɛ ma, a ni a ma fɛn.”
66005006	Mbɛ n‑na sa tɔngbɔɛ yen sɔ ɔ, mansa sea chɛ tɛ ɔ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n na, gbakoo chɛ n tɛtɛ ma. Sa chɛ bena ni wɔnfea, a ya wɛɛ ni wɔnfea, miin ni Yataa 'a nyina wɔnfea chɛ n na, miin na naen mu dunya gbɛɛ ɔ. A maen fan ni yɔ sa min faenɛ yasi a.
66005007	Mbɛ sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ta‑a gboo chɛ bia, a boo nyima chɛ a, a wɛn ni ka si ɔ mansa sea chɛ a.
66005008	Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a a bia kɛn, mbɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ nu, an bɛ gbakoo bi fea kun ma naanin chɛ n na, an‑na an kumbai gbangban a chen kɔɔ. Kɔninka an ni gbakoo chɛ n gbɛɛ boo a, ni sanu pani nu. Fen kunyɛ a diama an ni pani chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ. Fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ n sin ni samunɛ an na, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ni miin chɛ.
66005009	Mbɛ an‑na si nama a bɔ, an dɔ, “Gbasaya bɛnden mu i wan ma, gboo chɛ bia koe a, yuu tɛ koe a a ma. An‑na i wan fa, i 'a saya chɛ sin‑na a ma, i‑a mɔ gbu gbɛɛ kun ka Yataa ko a. Chɛ nu chɛnyɛ kunɛ n dɔ, chɛnyɛ koɛ n dɔ, ni dambi nu, an bɛ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan na.
66005010	I‑a an ma mɔɛ n na, Yataa 'a mansaya kɔɔ, tɛ mɔɛ mu miin na, miin mbe ma‑a mansa a dunya chɛ kun ma.”
66005011	Mbɛ n‑na n ya a ta to, mbɛ n‑na maeka n kuiɛ a min, an wu sɛsɛ, dan mbe ee an ma. An ni sɔ ɔ mansa sea chɛ 'a tindanɛ wan, fɔɛ fen chɛ n na tindanɛ, a basan gbakoo chɛ n na.
66005012	An mbe dau‑a si a, an dɔ, “Basɔmaya bɛnden mu i wan ma, sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ, an‑na min fa. Tando bɛnden mu i ma, gbasaya bɛnden mu i ma, a basan nyanɛ a, yiimatɛ wɛɛ to, a basan dɔgbɛaya a. Chɛ bɛnden mu dechee i wan ma.”
66005013	Mbɛ n‑na fɔɛ fen kan kɔ kan kuiɛ a min. Fɔɛ fenɛ miin ni banda bu ɔ, chɛ nu dunya ma, faa nɛnɛ n bɛɛ, ni fɔɛ fen chɛ n gbɛɛ yii ɔ. An mbe a fɔ‑a, an dɔ, “Mɔɛ chɛ min mbe si ɔ mansa sea a, an fea sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a, an fan ta mu tando a, a basan basɔmaya a, dɔgbɛaya, a basan manɛ a, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
66005014	Mbɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n dɔ, “A ni ma ka.” Mbɛ gbakoo chɛ n gbɛɛ‑a an kumbai gbangban, an‑na Yataa fai, an fea sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a.
66006001	N ya to‑a ka wan sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a, mbɛ a‑a yuu saa tɛ gboo chɛ ma. Mbɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n dɔndɔ, n‑na a kuiɛ a min, min ni yɔ banda koɔ kuiɛ. A ɔ, “Na wɛ, i ni ta.”
66006002	Mbɛ n‑na n ya a sɛ, mbɛ n‑na soo gbɛ yen. Mɔɛ min ni si ɔ a kun ma, tamba a dɛ fenɛ an ni a boo a, mbɛ mansa banfua be‑a a ma. A ni ta tena a 'a soo chɛ a, a ni chɛɛ sɛsɛ kun bia, a ni kun a chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ n ma.
66006003	Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu fean bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, mbɛ n‑na fɔɛ fenɛ fean bɔɛ wɛɛ kuiɛ a min, a ɔ, “Na wɛ, i ni ta.”
66006004	Mbɛ soo dɔ mende bɔ‑a a a to, a yawaenɛ yɔ ta. Mɔɛ min ni si ɔ soo chɛ kun ma, gbasaya been ni an ma, na koe a chɛɛ a dunya ma. A ni a ma, mɔɛ n ni an nyɔn fa. Chɛɛ chɛ mɛ wa, an been ni a ma.
66006005	Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu sawan bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, n‑na fɔɛ fenɛ sawan bɔɛ kuiɛ a min fan, a ɔ, “Na wɛ, i ni ta.” N‑na soo finɛ yen, min sɔen mu tima ko a, daun fen koe gbɛ kaka tima min na. Mɔɛ min ni si ɔ a kun ma, sechee dɔndɔ an ni dɛn dɔ a boo a, daun fenɛ siman koe a.
66006006	Mbɛ n‑na fenɛ kuiɛ a min, yɔ mɔ gbu kuiɛ. An kuiɛ chɛ bɔ‑a fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n fan tɛ ɔ. A ɔ, “Tee dɔndɔ pawa, ɛ biidi dɔndɔ gbe an san‑da. Chɛɛ i ma tu ban, a basan gbɛ a.”
66006007	Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu naanin bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, mbɛ n‑na fɔɛ fenɛ naanin bɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a ɔ, “Na wɛ, i ni ta.”
66006008	Mbɛ a yen ko, n‑na soo yen, a gboo maenɛ ɛ panfuan. Mɔɛ min ni soo chɛ kun ma, a tɔ ni Saya. A bɔɛ min sin ni na tena, a gbaa chia a, a tana, a tɔ ni Faa. Gbasaya been fan ni an ma, dunya chɛ ɔ mɔɛ n kaka dɔndɔ kun ma, ni an mɔɛ chɛ n du‑a kaina naaninɛ a. Gbasaya be‑a wan an ma mɔɛ n fa koe a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a. A yɛ to, an ni an fa daun fen daun sɔɛ a, ni gbandi yama a, a basan bia chɛ soe n na.
66006009	Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu duun bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, mbɛ gbengbe kɔɔ, fen kunyɛ a diama ɛ minda min ma, n‑na fuɛ n yen. An na‑a chɛ n fan fa tee, sɔ koe a den an 'na danaya ɔ Yataa a, a basan Yataa 'a bai sa koe a.
66006010	Mbɛ an‑na yee tɛ dɔndɔ a, an dɔ, “Yataa wa, nn 'na mansa, i kan nyɔ ee, i teaen mu. Mɔɛ n yen ko, miin‑na nn fa dunya ma. I ma tima ɔ yansama ya to, na koe a, i ni kaa a tɛ an ma, mbɛ i‑a tɔɔya si an bɛɛ a.”
66006011	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, an‑na miin fa ka, doma wa dɔndɔ dɔndɔ be‑a an ma, doma gbɛ fo. Mbɛ a fɔ‑a an ye, mbɛ an ni a ma kɔn, aan an bɔɛ wai chɛ mɔɛ n da ni fa, an suun ma nyɔɛ nu Chasi ɔ, miin mbe fa‑a yɔ an fan.
66006012	Sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu wɔdɔn bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, n‑na n ya a ta, mbɛ a yen ko, duu gboo samba‑a. A sin to, tee wɛɛ fin‑da wan yɔ chɛmbu, mbɛ kau yawa‑a yɔ wii.
66006013	Mbɛ tɔmbuaka n bea‑a duu ma, yɔ kɔnɛ dau ɛ bɔn buɛ min dɔ, ni fia wa bɔ‑a.
66006014	Banda tuin‑da, yɔ gboo a konde kondeenɛ. A sin to, kɔnkɔ kan kɔ kan ka‑a wan a gba ɔ, a basan yii tinɛ ɔ duu gboo kan kɔ kan na.
66006015	Mbɛ mansa wa chɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ma, ya ɔ sɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, soya n ya ɔ sɔɛ n gbɛɛ, ni nyan tɔɛ n bɛ mɔ chenama n na, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ma, chɛ nu yɔncha ɔ ni chɛ nu an fandi ko a, an gbɛɛ bun‑da an nun‑da. An bun‑da an nun‑da fanɛ n na, an mbe an nun fa gban kɔnkɔɛ n dɔ.
66006016	An mbe ta‑a kɔnkɔɛ n chee‑a, a basan sen gbu wa an na, an dɔ, “Wo na, wo ni bun nn kun ma, wo ni nn nun. Wo nn nun mɔɛ chɛ ma, min mbe si ɔ mansa sea, a ma na nn yen. Wo nn nun, sa tɔngbɔɛ ma na faa tɛ‑a bɔ nn ma.
66006017	Koe min na mu, tee ma chianden ba che‑a, an mbe mɔ ɔ mɔ a tɔɔ‑a tee min ma. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ kun mbe ee bɔ tena a ɔ.”
66007001	Chɛ gbakɔ, n‑na min nɛnɛ ɔ yen gbɛ, n‑na maeka naaninɛ n yen fan, an mbe sɔ ɔ dunya tɔnkɔn naaninɛ ɔ. Mbɛ fia min ni bɔ tena dunya gbɛɛ ɔ, mbɛ maeka chɛ n‑na a a gban. An‑na chɛ ma, min mbe a ma, fia gbɛɛ duu gboo ma, a gbɛɛ kɔ yii a, ni kɔn kan kɔ kan dɔ, a ni sɛmbɛ bɔ koe a.
66007002	Mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ gbɛɛ yen, ɛ ka‑a tee bɔ. Fenɛ ni wan a boo a, min mbe nyɛnɛ sa mɔɛ ma. Yataa, min mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, an‑na fen chɛ be a ma. Mbɛ a‑a maeka naanin chɛ n chee gbankon, maeka chɛ nu, gbasaya beenɛ ɛ ka miin ma, ko yama ma koe a duu gboo ma, mbɛ an‑na a ma kɔ yii ɔ.
66007003	Maeka chɛ ɔ, “Wo sɛmbɛ, wo ma ko yama ma duu gboo a, wo ma a ma kɔ yii a, wo ma a ma kɔnɛ n na. Wo a ma kɔn, aan nn ni nyɛnɛ sa Yataa 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n ya kɔɔ.”
66007004	Mbɛ an‑na mɔɛ n danɛ fɔ n ye, mɔɛ chɛ nu, maeka‑a nyɛnɛ sa miin ya kɔɔɛ. Mɔ wu chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, wu bi naanin kun ma naaninɛ ni (144,000). An mɔɛ chɛ n na‑a bɔ wan dambi kan kɔ kan dɔ Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ.
66007005	Mɔ wu tan kun ma fea (12,000), an na‑a bɔ Chuda dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Dubɛn dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Kadi dambi ɔ. An gbɛɛ‑a nyɛnɛ ma sɔn an ya kɔɔɛ.
66007006	Mɔ wu tan kun ma fea (12,000), an na‑a bɔ Asaa dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Nafadi dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Manasɛ dambi ɔ. An bɛɛ, an gbɛɛ‑a nyɛnɛ ma sɔn fan to an ya kɔɔɛ.
66007007	Mɔ wu tan kun ma fea (12,000), an na‑a bɔ Simiyɔn dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Difai dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Isaka dambi ɔ. An bɛɛ to, an gbɛɛ‑a nyɛnɛ ma sɔn fan to an ya kɔɔɛ.
66007008	Mɔ wu tan kun ma fea (12,000), an na‑a bɔ Sɛbudɔn dambi ɔ, wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Chosɛfi dambi ɔ, mbɛ wu tan kun ma fea (12,000) bɔ‑a Bɛnchamin dambi ɔ. An gbɛɛ‑a nyɛnɛ ma sɔn fan an ya kɔɔɛ.
66007009	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na n ya a ta to, a yen ko, n‑na mɔ fanka wa yen, mɔ ee che an dan‑da. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɔ‑a wan chɛnyɛ kun kan kɔ kan dɔ, an bɔ‑a chɛnyɛ koɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ, ni dambi kan kɔ kan, a basan mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan na. An gbɛɛ ni wan sɔ ɔ, an ya a mundenɛ ɛ mansa sea chɛ ma, an ya a mundenɛ ɛ sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ ma. An gbɛɛ ni koa gbɛ an dɔ, gbɛ nyanda bianɛ ɛ an boo a, buɔdia bɔɛ a.
66007010	Mbɛ an‑na chee chɛ gbankon, an dɔ, “Yataa an‑na mmɔ baun, a wɛn mbe si ɔ a 'a mansa sea a. Sa tɔngbɔɛ wɛɛ, a‑a mmɔ baun fan.”
66007011	Maeka n gbɛɛ ni wan sɔ ɔ mansa sea chɛ 'a tindanɛ, gbakoo chɛ n 'na tindanɛ, an bɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n na. Mbɛ an‑na an fandi ɔ fuin duu ma susu gbuu, mansa sea chɛ chen kɔɔ, an‑na Yataa fai.
66007012	An dɔ, “A ni ma ka. Basɔmaya ɛ be Yataa an ma. An gbasa, a 'a yiimatɛ koo, a sin dɔ gbɛ kaka. Tando ni be a ma, wai bɔɛ ni chɛ a a, kuɔ fɔ, ni kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
66007013	Mbɛ gbakoo chɛ n dɔndɔ, a‑a n dɔ tisa, a ɔ, “Mɔɛ chɛ nu koa gbɛ ɔ, nyɔn n mbe ee nɛ, an sin ka‑a gbɛ mende?”
66007014	Mbɛ n dɔ, “Kai, n ma ko ɔ sɔn chɛ ma. N mbe i wan dɔ tisa chɛ a.” Mbɛ a ɔ n ma, “Mɔɛ chɛ nu miin kun bɔ‑a ko gbɛama wa chɛ ɔ, an fan nɛ ka. An fan‑na an 'na koa n ko, an‑na an gbɛ fo, sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ wii a.
66007015	Chɛ an fɛ mu, an mbe sɔ ɔ Yataa Mansa chen kɔɔ. Su ɔ tee a, an mbe a 'a chenɛ a, an mbe a fai‑a. A wɛn sin mbe si ɔ a 'a mansa sea, ɛ an konde gbain‑da wan nɔ.
66007016	Kɔnkɔɛ ee an bia‑a to kuɔ fɔ, an kanɛ, a ee gbaa‑a to kuɔ fɔ. Tee wa ee bɔ‑a an ma, a winɛ ni si an dɔ.
66007017	Koe min na mu, sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ sɔ ɔ mansa sea chɛ baima, ɛ ma‑a wan an kun ma fɛn mɔɛ a. A sin mbe chia yian‑da wan an na, an ni yii ma sɔn, min mbe fɔɛ be. A sin to, Yataa ɛ di ka‑a wan an ya a.”
66008001	Mbɛ sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu wɔnfean bɔɛ tɛ kɛn, kaina ɔ maun‑da wan don banda bu ɔ, miniti bi sawa ko a.
66008002	Mbɛ n‑na maeka wɔnfea n yen, miin mbe ma Yataa baima, wai chɛ koe a. An‑na buu wɔnfea an be wan an ma.
66008003	Mbɛ maeka dɔndɔ na‑a, a sɔ‑a gbengbe chɛ baima. Pani min mbe a boo a, a nyanden mu sanu an dɔ. Fen kunyɛ a diama been fan ni a ma, Yataa 'a mɔɛ n 'na samunɛ ma munda koe a. A yɛ to, a minda koe a sanu gbengbe chɛ ma, mansa sea chɛ ya kɔɔɛ.
66008004	Mbɛ fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ, a sisi sɛ‑a, a basan Yataa 'a mɔɛ n 'na samunɛ a. Sisi chɛ sɛ‑a wan, a bɔ maeka chɛ boo ɔ, min mbe Yataa baima.
66008005	Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a sanu pani chɛ ya, mbɛ a‑a a a fa ta a, a‑a min ya gbengbe chɛ ma. Mbɛ a‑a fen kunyɛ a diama ta chɛ ya, a‑a a a bɔn dunya chɛ ɔ. A ya kɔɔɛ a, banda koɔ‑a gbau gbau, banda manɛ ɛ ta‑a ben‑da mia mia, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ ɛ ta‑a bɔ‑a, duu gboo wɛɛ samba‑a to gbididi.
66008006	Mbɛ maeka wɔnfea chɛ nu, buu wɔnfea chɛ ɛ miin boo ɔ, an‑na an ma bɛn an fɛ koe a.
66008007	Maeka saa‑a a ta buu fɛ kɛn, mbɛ ko sɛsɛ ma‑a. Sankɔɛ bɔn‑da wan, ni ta basan wii a dunya chɛ ma. Ni dunya chɛ du‑a si tena sawa a, a si tena dɔndɔɛ minda‑a wan. Kɔnɛ n bɛɛ si tena dɔndɔ minda‑a wan, a basan chin fen kan kɔ kan na.
66008008	Mbɛ maeka fean bɔɛ wɛɛ, a‑a a ta buu fɛ. Mbɛ fenɛ, yɔ kɔnkɔ wa dɛgbɛ, ta sonko sɔenɛ ɛ a ma, a a dɛ‑a kɔ yii ɔ. Kɔ yii chɛ, ni a du‑a si tena sawa a, a si tena dɔndɔɛ wɛɛ fan‑da wan wii a.
66008009	A yɛ to, fɔɛ fenɛ n gbɛɛ kɔ yii chɛ ɔ, ni an du‑a si tena sawa a, an si tena dɔndɔ fa‑a wan. Dɛndɛ wa n bɛɛ, ni an du‑a si tena sawa a, an si tena dɔndɔ yɔn‑da wan.
66008010	Maeka sawan bɔɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ. Mbɛ tɔmbuaka wa bea‑a a ka banda a, ɛ man‑da yɔ sanku. Mbɛ a bea‑a yii si tena dɔndɔ ɔ, ni a du‑a si tena sawa a.
66008011	Tɔmbuaka chɛ tɔ mu koee. A sin, min yii si tena dɔndɔɛ, ni a du‑a sawa a, a kona‑a wan. Mɔ sɛsɛ n fa‑a wan yii chɛ boo ɔ, koe min na mu, a ni kona a min koe a.
66008012	Mbɛ maeka naanin bɔɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ. Tee ni ma, kau, a basan tɔmbuaka n na, an gbɛɛ ma‑a dama. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, an ma manɛ be ni tima ɛnden ko a. Ni tee du‑a si tena sawa a, tee nii ma bɔ ni si tena dɔndɔ ko a. Ni pimbi wɛɛ du‑a si tena sawa a, kau basan tɔmbuaka n na, an ma manɛ be ni si tena dɔndɔ ko a.
66008013	Mbɛ n‑na n ya a ta, n‑na kochɛ yen ben‑da banda a. Mbɛ a koɔ‑a gbankon, a ɔ, “Kasaa na‑a, kasaa na‑a, kasaa na‑a dunya ma mɔɛ n ko a. Kasaa chɛ ma ɛ chian‑da wan, buu tɔɛ chɛ nu, maeka sawa chɛ n boo a, an fɛenɛ ma.”
66009001	Mbɛ maeka duun bɔɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ. Tɔmbuaka na‑a ka wan banda a, a bea‑a duu ma, mbɛ n‑na a yen. Chi been fan ni tɔmbuaka chɛ ma, son chɛ da a ka koe a, son chɛ min danka ee.
66009002	A‑a son chɛ da a ka kɛn, sisi sonko sɔ‑a a ɔ, yɔ sɛnɛ minda sisi. Mbɛ sisi fia‑a banda bia, a pimbi bun‑da tee ma, a ee yen to.
66009003	Mbɛ kondonɛ n bɔ‑a sisi chɛ ɔ banda a, an yii‑a dunya chɛ ɔ. A sin, gbasaya been fan ni an ma, yɔ gbasaya min nyɔn sima ɛ chinchima n boo ɔ dunya ma, mɔɛ n bon koe a.
66009004	A fɔen fan ni an ye, mbɛ an ma ko yama kan kɔ kan ma bin gbii a dunya chɛ ɔ. An ma a ma yamba kuunɛ n bɛɛ a, an ma a ma kɔnɛ n na. Chɛɛ an ni a ma mɔɛ chɛ n fan na dechee, Yataa 'a nyɛn chɛ ma sa ni miin ya kɔɔɛ.
66009005	A fɔen fan ni an ye, mbɛ an ma mɔɛ chɛ n fa. Chɛɛ an ni an tɔɔ kau duu ko a, tɔɔya min mbe ma, yɔ ni chinchima‑a mɔɛ bon.
66009006	An kau duu chɛ tɛ ɔ suun, mɔɛ n toen fan ni an ni fa, an ni bɔ tɔɔya ɔ, chɛɛ an ma fa ni. An‑na an fa chia yan fan, chɛɛ saya‑a an ma sangba wan.
66009007	Ni mɔ na‑a kondon chɛ n yen, an ni wan yɔ ni soo n sɔ‑a an gbee ma, an ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ta koe a chɛɛ ɔ. A maen fan ni yɔ sanu mansa banfua an ni si ɔ an kunɛ n na, an ya kɔɔɛ nan sin ni wan yɔ mɔ gbu ta.
66009008	An kundi maen fan ni yɔ musu n ta, an nyinɛ bɔenɛ a sa ɔ yɔ yaa nu.
66009009	An na‑a doma don fan, miin nyanden ni kundu ɔ. An kamban dɔ kuiɛ ni bɔ tena wan yɔ mɔto gbingbi nu, soo n mbe miin sawan, ta koe a chɛɛ ɔ.
66009010	An fɛ bɔen fan ni yɔ chinchima nu, an sin ni bonɛ chɛ wan. An fɛ bonda chɛ sin fan‑na gbasaya be an ma, mɔɛ n tɔɔya koe a kau duu ko a.
66009011	Mansa ni wan an kun ma, min ni maeka chɛ a, min ni son chɛ kun ma, sonɛ min danka ee ka. An mbe an maeka chɛ chee Ibu koɛ ɔ, an dɔ, Abadon. Kiisi mɔɛ n sin, an dɔ, Apɔdiyon, yɔ mɔɛ ɛ a fɔ, a ɔ, Fen yɔn fenɛ.
66009012	Kasaa saa ben‑da, chɛɛ chɛ gbakɔ, a yen ko, kasaa fea ɛ to gbaa a.
66009013	Mbɛ maeka wɔdɔn bɔɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ. Mbɛ n‑na kuiɛ a min, a bɔ sanu gbengbe chɛ tɔnkɔn naaninɛ ɔ, fen kunyɛ a diama ɛ minda ka min ma, Yataa chen kɔɔ.
66009014	Maeka wɔdɔn bɔɛ chɛ, buu chɛ ɛ ka min boo a, kuiɛ chɛ ɔ te a ma, a ɔ, “Maeka naanin chɛ nu, Yataa‑a a ma miin chiienɛ ɛ Yufatesi yii wa da a, yuu tɛ an ma.”
66009015	Maeka wɔdɔn bɔɛ chɛ‑a yuu tɛ wan maeka naanin chɛ n ma, miin ni bia a ɔ. An ni san chɛ an ma kɔn tena, kau chɛ ɔ, tee chɛ ma, ni tima chɛ kɔɔ, Yataa ni a boo ka an ma. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, ni an du‑a si tena sawa a, maeka chɛ n ni si tena dɔndɔɛ chɛ n fa.
66009016	An‑na a fɔ wan n ye, mbɛ soya mɔɛ miin ni si ɔ soo chɛ n kun ma, an kɔ ni koo aan, dan nii an ma.
66009017	N‑na soo chɛ n yen, ni mɔɛ nu si ɔ an kun ma. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, kundu doma min ni an ma, an yawaenɛ ni yɔ tonkan ta. A yɛ to, a kɔ finden fan ni, a basan a man buɛ dɔ mende a. Soo chɛ n kunɛ sin maen fan ni yɔ yaa kunɛ. An da sin dɔ, ta an ni bɔ tena ɔ, a basan sisi a, ni senɛ min ni gbandi yɔ ta.
66009018	Ta chɛ, a basan sisi chɛ a, ni sen gbandima chɛ, miin ni bɔ tena an da ɔ, an‑na mɔɛ sɛsɛ fa wan. Mɔɛ miin ni dunya ɔ, an duenɛ si tena sawa a, kaka dɔndɔɛ fa‑a wan, kasaa sawa chɛ boo ɔ.
66009019	Soo chɛ nu, an ni mɔɛ fa gbasaya min na, a nii an da dechee ɔ, a ni wan an fɛ wɛɛ ɔ. An fɛ da ni wan a sunɛ a, yɔ ka, an sin ni mɔɛ n nimisa an na.
