66009020	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin kunɛ bɔ‑a koe chɛ n gbɛɛ ɔ, an ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni an 'na ko yama n na. An ma an boo bɔ ni nyina yama n fai koe a, ni fen chɛ n fai koe a, miin ma Yataa a. Fen chɛ nu, an fandi, an mbe miin nyan senɛ ɔ, sanu ɔ, kainɛ ɔ, kɔnɛ ɔ, a basan fen dɔ mende n na. Fenɛ miin mu ka, an ya ee kaina yen, an too wɛɛ ee koe a min, an sin mbe ee tachɛ chɛ.
66009021	Mɔɛ fa koe wɛɛ, an ni miin ma, an ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni a a. An ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni an 'na suaya wa a, a basan an 'na ko tɛ a, ni an 'na kanka chɛ. An ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni chɛ dɔndɔ wɛɛ a.
66010001	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ mende yen yii‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ, min ni gbasa. A ma koa ni dugbu an na, ninkinankantuu tindandenɛ ɛ a kunɛ a. A ya kɔɔɛ ni man tena wan yɔ tee, a chenɛ n sin ni wan yɔ ta sanku manɛ.
66010002	Gboo nyɛndenɛ ni wan a boo a, min nii ma koo, a ɔ fuindenɛ ɛ. Mbɛ a‑a a boo nyima ɔ chenɛ sɔ kɔ yii ɔ, a man dɔ chenɛ sin to‑a sɔ ɔ duu gboo ma.
66010003	Mbɛ a‑a yee wa tɛ, yɔ yaa ɛ ma dau‑a. Mbɛ a‑a yee chɛ tɛ kɛn, banda koɔ‑a gba wɔnfea.
66010004	Banda chɛ sɛmbɛ‑a kɛn koɔ koe a, a‑a min gbɛɛ fɔ, n toen ni n ni a nyɛn. Chɛɛ n‑na kuiɛ a min fan, a ka banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “Koe chɛ n sa i yii ma. I ma an nyɛn gboo ma.”
66010005	Mbɛ n‑na maeka wa chɛ min yen ka sɔ ɔ kɔ yii ɔ, ni duu gboo ma, a‑a a boo nyima a si banda a.
66010006	Mbɛ a‑a a fɔ, a ɔ, “Tima ban‑da, makɔn chɛ tima Yataa boo ɔ.” A ɔ, a ɛ ka tea an fɔ tena, a ɔ, Yataa tɔɛ ɔ. Yataa min mu, a ee fa kuɔ fɔ ko a, min‑na banda bu ɔ a dan, a basan fen fen na, miin mbe nɔ. A yɛ to, a‑a dunya a dan, a basan fen fen na dunya ɔ, a‑a kɔ yii wɛɛ a dan, ni fenɛ miin gbɛɛ ɛ a ɔ.
66010007	A ɔ, “Yataa na‑a a yii ma koe n fɔ wan a 'a yɔnɛ n ye, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ nu. Ni maeka wɔnfean bɔɛ chɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ, an koe chɛ nu, an mbe ban‑da wan ma‑a. An mbe ma‑a wan, yɔ a na‑a fɔ buɛ min dɔ an ye.”
66010008	Mbɛ kuiɛ chɛ, min ka‑a banda bu ɔ, a koɔ‑a to n tena, a ɔ, “Ta, i ni gboo nyɛnden chɛ bia. A bia maeka chɛ boo ɔ, min chenɛ dɔndɔɛ ɛ sɔ ɔ kɔ yii ɔ, dɔndɔɛ ɛ sɔ ɔ duu gboo ma, gboo chɛ da a kaenɛ ɛ a boo a.”
66010009	N ta‑a, n‑na maeka chɛ tan. N‑na a tan kɛn, a ɔ tisa koe a gboo chɛ be koe a n ma, a ɔ te n ma, “Gboo chɛ bia, i ni a daun. I da ɔ, ɛ chinchia‑a wan yɔ kuminɛ, chɛɛ a konama an mbe ma‑a i bu ɔ.”
66010010	Mbɛ gboo nyɛnden chɛ, min nii ma koo, n‑na a bia a boo ɔ, mbɛ n‑na a daun. A ni chinchi n da ɔ yɔ kuminɛ, chɛɛ a kona‑a wan n bu ɔ.
66010011	Mbɛ n‑na kuiɛ dɔ n na min, an dɔ, “Chɛnyɛ kun kan kɔ kan, chɛnyɛ koɛ kan kɔ kan, mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan, a basan an 'na mansa wa n gbɛɛ a dunya ɔ, Yataa 'a sakana bai ɔ yian, a si an gbɛɛ ma.”
66011001	Chɛ gbakɔ, mɔɛ‑a kɔn denɛ be wan n ma, a yansama yɔ fen siman fenɛ. Mbɛ Yataa‑a n sɔ, a ɔ, “Ta n 'na chenɛ a, i ni a siman, a basan a ɔ gbengbe a, mbɛ i yɛ‑a, i‑a mɔɛ chɛ n dan, miin mbe nɔ n fai‑a.”
66011002	A ɔ, “Chɛɛ chen chɛ baa ma, kata chɛ ɔ, i ma a siman, an nɛnɛ to ka.” A ɔ, “Koe min na mu, a been mu mɔɛ chɛ n fan ma, miin ma n sɔn.” A ɔ, “Mɔ yama mu an na, miin mbe gbasaya din‑da n 'na duu wa kun ma, kau bi naanin kun ma fea (42) ko a.”
66011003	A ɔ, “N mbe n 'na siiya fea n na na‑a wan, miin mbe n 'na sakana bai chɛndɛ ɔ yian‑da.” A ɔ, “An ma bɛndenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan yɔ sanka‑a mɔɛ miin tan an 'na chenɛ a.” A ɔ, “A sin, an mbe n 'na sakana bai ɔ yian‑da wan, an kau bi naanin kun ma fea (42) chɛ n dɔ.”
66011004	Mɔ fea chɛ n mu, miin mbe Yataa 'a sakana bai sa, an mbe sɔ ɔ wan a chen kɔɔ, a wɛn mu mansa a dunya chɛ kun ma. An mu kɔn fea chɛ n fan na, an mbe miin chee, an dɔ, wodifi kɔnɛ, an mu to, dambo si fen fea chɛ an na.
66011005	Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ toen mu, a ni ko yama ma an na, ta an mbe bɔ an da ɔ, mbɛ a‑a an chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ fa. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen ni a ni ko yama ma an na, ɛ fa wan.
66011006	Gbasaya ɛ wan an boo ɔ, banda da a tɔn koe a, min mbe a ma, sona ee na‑a tee chɛ n ko a, an mbe ma‑a Yataa 'a sakana bai sa‑a. Gbasaya ɛ wan to an boo ɔ, yii kan kɔ kan mun koe a wii a, ko yama kan kɔ kan ma koe a dunya ma. A sin, ni an toen mu chɛ n ma koe a tima sɛsɛ ko a, an mbe an ma wan.
66011007	An mbe ban‑da kɛn Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ sa‑a, soe ma chianden ba, ɛ bɔ‑a wan son chɛ ɔ, min danka ee ka, mbɛ a‑a chɛɛ bun an ma. Ɛ kun‑da wan an ma, mbɛ a‑a an fa.
66011008	A sin, an su n mbe ma‑a wan sa ɔ, dani wa dɔndɔ ma, duu wa chɛ ɔ. Duu wa chɛ, an 'na mansa, mɔɛ n na‑a a gbangban kaina min kɔn gbengbandenɛ ma. Mɔɛ n mbe duu wa chɛ chee‑a wan, yiima dɔ mende ɔ, an dɔ, Sɔdɔn, an ni a chee, an dɔ, Ichipi.
66011009	Mɔɛ n mbe na‑a wan, a bɔ chɛnyɛ kun kan kɔ kan dɔ, chɛnyɛ koɛ kan kɔ kan, dambi kan kɔ kan, ni mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan. An mbe na‑a wan, an ni an su chɛ n yen. A sin, an mbe ee dɔn‑da mɔ ɔ mɔ ni an su chɛ n ya, a ni an tɔn. An mbe chɛ ma‑a wan, tee sawa ni a tɔɛ ko a.
66011010	Dunya ɔ mɔɛ n bu ɔ dia‑a wan, a si mɔ fea chɛ n fa koe ma. An mbe buɔdia bɔ‑a wan, mbɛ an‑na samba fenɛ a ta an nyɔn tena, a mu min na, mɔ fea chɛ n na‑a wan tɔɔya an ma dunya chɛ ɔ.
66011011	Chɛɛ tee sawa, ni a tɔɛ chɛ ben‑da kɛn, Yataa‑a fɔɛ a yɛ wan an dɔ, mbɛ an‑na an kɔɔ sɔ, an sɔ‑a. A sin, mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ‑a chɛ ɔ yen, an chian‑da wan kaka.
66011012	Mbɛ mɔ fea chɛ n‑na kuiɛ wa a min, a ka banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “Wo sɛ nɛ.” An chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ n ya to‑a ka wan an na, mbɛ an ya‑a, an sɛ‑a banda bu ɔ, dugbu wa ɔ.
66011013	A sin, a tima chɛ kɔɔ, duu gboo samba‑a wan, a ma chianden ba a. An duu wa duenɛ si tena tanɛ a, kaka dɔndɔɛ yɔn‑da gbae. Mɔ wu wɔnfea n (7,000) fa‑a. Mɔɛ tɔɛ n chian‑da wan, a ɔ benden ba a, mbɛ an‑na Yataa tando, banda bu ɔ mansa.
66011014	Kasaa fean bɔɛ chɛ ben‑da wan, chɛɛ a yen ko, kasaa sawan bɔɛ ɛ gbaa.
66011015	Mbɛ maeka wɔnfean bɔɛ‑a a ta buu fɛ. Mbɛ maeka nu banda bu ɔ, n‑na an kuiɛ a min, an mbe koɔ‑a gbankon, an dɔ, “Mmɔ 'a mansa Yataa, an fea kunka mansa a, a‑a a boo sɔ min ma, gbasaya ɛ gbɛ dechee an fan boo ɔ, ma koe a mansa a dunya chɛ gbɛɛ kun ma. A sin, Yataa ɛ ma‑a wan a 'a mansaya chɛ ɔ, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a.”
66011016	Mbɛ gbakoo bi fea kun ma naanin chɛ nu, miin ni ka si ɔ an 'na mansa sea n na, Yataa chen kɔɔ, an‑na an fandi ɔ fuin susu gbuu, mbɛ an‑na a fai.
66011017	An dɔ, “Yataa mansa, i wɛn gbasa, i wɛn ni nɔ suun, e tun nɔ sanche. Nn mbe i wai bɔ tena, i 'a gbasaya wa, i‑a a ya, i bun‑da i 'a mansaya a tachɛ‑a.
66011018	Mɔɛ miin ma i sɔn, an faa tɛen fan ni yama yama, chɛɛ i ta faatɛ che‑a gbɛ a ma, kaa a tɛ tima che‑a gbɛ fuɛ n ma. I 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ nu, gbonka chɛ mɔɛ nu i ko a, an 'na tɔnɔnɛ tima che‑a gbɛ. I 'a mɔɛ nu, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin mbe chian i tɔɛ ma, yɔn tɔɛ n bɛ nyan tɔɛ n na, an 'na tima che‑a. Miin mbe kasaa‑a dunya ɔ, an kasaa tima che‑a.”
66011019	Mbɛ Yataa 'a chenɛ, banda bu ɔ, a da a ka‑a. Mbɛ a 'a chen chɛ bu ɔ, mɔ ni kakaa yen fan nɔ. An kakaa chɛ, an ni a ɔ yian, mbɛ Yataa na‑a dɔbɛnɛ chɛ wan a 'a mɔɛ n na, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ nu. Mbɛ banda manɛ mia mia bun‑da ben‑da, banda ɛ ta‑a koɔ‑a gbau gbau, sɔnkɔ sɔnkɔ chɛ kuiɛ ɛ ta‑a bɔ‑a. Duu gboo samba‑a gbididi, sankɔɛ ɛ ta‑a bɔn‑da.
66012001	Mbɛ n‑na kamaya koe wa ɔ yen, ɛ ma‑a banda bu ɔ. N‑na musu yen, tee chɛndɛ chɛndɛ ni min ma koa a, a sin, a ni a chenɛ ɔ suin tena kau an ma. Mansa banfua ni wan a kun na, tɔmbuaka tan kun ma fean ni min ma.
66012002	A bu cheen ba ni, ɛ yee tɛ‑a, a bu ɔ tɛenɛ ɛ, ɛ a dumɛ‑a pien.
66012003	Mbɛ n‑na kamaya koe wa dɔ mende ɔ yen to ma‑a banda bu ɔ. A yen ko, n‑na fɔɛ fen ba dɛgbɛ wa yen, yii ɔ fenɛ, min gboo bɔen mu fai gboo a. A yawaenɛ ni, a kunɛ ɛ wɔnfea, a bena n sin mbe tan. A kun wɔnfea chɛ n na, mansa banfua ma bɛndenɛ an ni si ɔ an gbɛɛ a.
66012004	Tɔmbuaka chɛ nu, miin ni banda a, ni an du‑a sawa a, a fɛ‑a si tena dɔndɔɛ fian fan, a‑a an bondan duu gboo ma. Fɔɛ fen ma chianden chɛ sɔ‑a wan musu chɛ ya kɔɔ, a ma bɛndenɛ ɛ a 'a den chɛ kanun koe a, ni a‑a a suun dechee.
66012005	Mbɛ a‑a den kaienɛ suun, min mbe na tena ma‑a mansa a, dunya gbɛɛ ko a, a sin mbe ee a 'a mansaya a tachɛ‑a chinchincha ɔ. Maeka‑a den chɛ ya wan, a ya kɔɔɛ a, a sɛ‑a Yataa tena, si ɔ a 'a mansaya sea a.
66012006	Musu chɛ‑a bui sa wan a a, a ta‑a fuinɛ ma, Yataa na‑a kaina ɔ bɛn kaina a ko a. A ɛ ma‑a nɔ wan, a kun ma ni fɛn kau bi naanin kun ma fea (42) ko a.
66012007	Mbɛ chɛɛ bea‑a gbɛ banda bu ɔ. Maeka chɛ n 'na mansa dɔndɔ, min tɔ ni Maikɛɛ, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na, miin ni a kɔɔ, an‑na chɛɛ bun fɔɛ fen ba chɛ ma. Fɔɛ fen chɛ wɛɛ, an bɛ a 'a maeka n na, an‑na an kun si an na.
66012008	Chɛɛ an ma kun ni chɛɛ chɛ ma, a sin, an‑na an bai wan kaina a banda bu ɔ.
66012009	Fɔɛ fen ma chianden ba chɛ, a a bea‑a wan dunya ɔ, a ka banda bu ɔ. Ka kɔkɔ wa chɛ, min tɔ mu Sitana, nyina yama n 'na mansa, min mbe a ma mɔ gbu ɛ ko yama ma, a a bea‑a wan dunya ɔ, an bɛ a bɔɛ n na.
66012010	Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ koɔ kuiɛ a min, a ka banda bu ɔ. A koɔ‑a gbankon, a ɔ, “Mmɔ 'a Yataa‑a chɛɛ fo gbɛ. Ɛ a 'a gbasaya a tachɛ wan gbɛ, a 'a mansaya dunya kun ma. Yataa 'a Chasi wɛɛ, mmɔ kun ka mansa, ɛ a 'a gbasaya yian‑da wan dunya ɔ. Nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ ee to sɔ ɔ Yataa chen kɔɔ, a ee to nɔ, kun yama si koe a mmɔ bɔɛ n kun ma su ɔ tee. Nyina yama chɛ fesan‑da nɔ, a a dɛ‑a dunya ɔ.
66012011	Mmɔ 'a mɔɛ n‑na Sitana bea chɛɛ ɔ, sa tɔngbɔɛ wii 'a gbasaya an dɔ mu, a basan Yataa 'a sakana bai a, an ni min sa. An nii ma chian ni saya ma.
66012012	Wo buɔdia bɔ, wo gbɛɛ, wo wɛn mbe banda bu ɔ. Chɛɛ wo wɛn mbe duu gboo ma, miin mbe kɔ yii ɔ, kasaa naen mu gba wo ko a. Nyina yama n 'na mansa, a fesan‑da nɛ, a a yii‑a nɔ wo kun ma, a faa gbandima wa ɛ, a‑a a ɔ sɔn fan, mbɛ tima ma dɔɔya‑a, a 'a wai chɛ koe a.”
66012013	Fɔɛ fen ma chianden ba chɛ, a‑a a ɔ yen kɛn mbɛ an‑na a a bea dunya ɔ, a faa gbandia‑a. Mbɛ a‑a a ma bɛn, a bun‑da a sɔ‑a musu chɛ fɛ, musu min na‑a den kaien chɛ suun ka.
66012014	Chɛɛ musu chɛ‑a kamban fea ma sɔn fan, a kambanɛ bɔ‑a yɔ kochɛ. Mbɛ a tin‑da, a ta‑a pɔɔ fuinɛ ma, a ka‑a ka chɛ baima. A ta‑a an kaina chɛ, Yataa‑a kaina min dɔ bɛn a ko a, an mbe a kun ma fɛn‑da kaina min san sawa, ni a tɔɛ ko a.
66012015	Mbɛ ka chɛ‑a yii a fu, min ma‑a yii wa a, a ni ta musu chɛ san‑da, a ni ta a a.
66012016	Chɛɛ duu gboo‑a musu chɛ deman fan. Duu gboo‑a a da a ka wan, mbɛ a‑a yii chɛ gbɛɛ kanun, ka chɛ na‑a min na fu ka a da ɔ.
66012017	Chɛ‑a a ma wan, fɔɛ fen ma chianden chɛ faa gbandia‑a kaka, musu chɛ boo ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a a kun sɔ gbɛ musu chɛ cheeya n na, a‑a chɛɛ bun an ma. Cheeya chɛ nu, an mu mɔɛ chɛ n fan na, miin mbe Yataa da a kuiɛ ma, an sin, an kai faen fan mu tea chɛ a, min ka‑a Chisɔsi tena.
66012018	Mbɛ fɔɛ fen ba chɛ sɔ‑a tɛ kuu ma, kɔ yii chɛ tindi ma.
66013001	Mbɛ n‑na n ya a ta, n‑na soe wa yen, soe ma chianden ba, ɛ bɔ‑a yii ɔ. Chɛ nɛnɛ bena ni tan, a kunɛ ɛ wɔnfea. Mansa banfua an ni si ɔ a bena tan chɛ n kan kɔ kan na. A kun chɛ n sin gbɛɛ, tɔɛ nyɛnden fan ni an ma, tɔɛ miin ni mainɛ a Yataa tena.
66013002	N na‑a soe min yen ka, a bɔen ni kui an na. Chɛɛ a chenɛ ni wan yɔ nyima soe dɔ mende, a nyɛnsenɛ n bɔenɛ a sa n dɔ, a da sin yɔ yaa da. Mbɛ fɔɛ fenɛ ma chianden ba saa chɛ, a‑a a 'a sɔ tena dɔ be soe yama nama chɛ ma, a basan a 'a mansaya gbasaya wa dɔ a dunya ma.
66013003	Mbɛ n‑na a yen, an soe yama chɛ kunɛ dɔndɔɛ, tɛɛ paa wa dɛgbɛ ɛ wan a ma, tɛɛ min, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee dan a a, mbɛ a ni baun fan. Dunya gbɛɛ da ɔ gbaa‑a wan chɛ a, mbɛ an bea‑a a fɛ.
66013004	Mbɛ an‑na fɔɛ fen yama chɛ fai yɔ Yataa, min‑na a 'a gbasaya dɔ be ka a bɔɛ chɛ ma. Gbasaya chɛ be‑a ka soe yama min bɛɛ ma, an‑na a wɛɛ fai wan, an dɔ, “Mɔ ɔ mɔ ma gbasa, a ni che i ɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ee che kun‑da i ma butuinɛ ɔ.”
66013005	Mbɛ soe yama chɛ bun‑da yonka bai n sa‑a, ɛ ta‑a Yataa main‑da. Chɛɛ Yataa‑a a too ka wan a ma, ma koe a an gbasaya chɛ ɔ, kau bi naanin kun ma fea (42) ko a.
66013006	A bun‑da a da a ka‑a, ɛ Yataa main, ɛ a tɔɛ ɔ yɔn, ɛ a waa ma nyin, a basan mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe nɔ banda bu ɔ.
66013007	Yataa‑a a to wan nɔ, a‑a chɛɛ bun Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ma, a sin kun‑da wan an ma. A yɛ to, gbasaya be‑a wan a ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ kun ma dunya ɔ. Chɛ nu chɛnyɛ kunɛ n dɔ, chɛnyɛ koɛ n dɔ, ni dambi nu, an bɛ mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan na.
66013008	A sin, mɔɛ gbɛɛ dunya ma, an mbe a fai wan. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe ee a fai‑a, an fan nɛ dechee mɔɛ chɛ n na, miin tɔɛ nyɛndenɛ ɛ gboo chɛ ɔ, a ka dunya a dan tima ma. Gboo chɛ, mɔɛ miin mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da, an mbe min dɔ. An gboo chɛ, ɛ sa tɔngbɔɛ an boo ɔ, an‑na min fa.
66013009	Wo wɛn too ɛ koe a min, wo chɛ a min.
66013010	Mɔ ɔ mɔ, Yataa‑a min ma bia mɔɛ a, a mɔɛ chɛ ɛ ma‑a bia an dɔ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ, Yataa‑a min ma fa mɔɛ a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ an mbe a mɔɛ chɛ fa‑a pɔɛ. Chɛ gbɛɛ‑a a yian fan ka, mbɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n danayaen fan mu, an sin mbe an faa bia wan to.
66013011	Mbɛ n‑na soe yama dɔ gbɛɛ yen to, min nɛnɛ bɔ‑a duu gboo ɔ. A tana, a bena ni fea yɔ sa tɔngbɔɛ, chɛɛ a kuiɛ maen fan ni yɔ fɔɛ fen ma chianden ba koɔ kuiɛ.
66013012	A‑a gbasaya gbɛɛ a tachɛ wan, min ni soe yama chɛ boo ɔ, paa wa chɛ ɛ ka min kunɛ ɔ. A ya kɔɔɛ ma, a‑a a 'a gbasaya din fan dunya ma, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ma miin mbe dunya ma, an ni soe yama saa chɛ fai.
66013013	Soe yama fean bɔɛ chɛ‑a kamaya koe sɛsɛ ma wan. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ya kɔɔɛ ma, a‑a a ma wan, ta gbu wɛɛ, a yii‑a a ka banda a.
66013014	A sin, a 'a kamaya koe chɛ n‑na mɔɛ n gbɛɛ bun fan dunya ma, Yataa‑a a too ka a ma ka koe miin ma koe a, soe yama saa chɛ ya kɔɔ. Soe yama fean bɔɛ chɛ‑a a saa chɛ a gbasaya a tachɛ wan, a fɔ koe a mɔɛ n ye, an ni soe yama saa chɛ bɔ nyɔɛ nyan. Mɔɛ ɛ a yen, yɔ an na‑a an soe yama saa chɛ fa wan chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a, mbɛ a yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ.
66013015	Soe yama fean bɔɛ chɛ, gbasaya be‑a wan a ma, a ni fɔɛ be fen chɛ ma, soe yama saa chɛ, a bɔ nyɔɛ chɛ, mɔɛ chɛ n‑na min nyan ka. Chɛ‑a a ma wan, a ni koɛ chɛ, ɛ a ma wan, mɔ ɔ mɔ min nii soe yama chɛ fai, an ni a fa.
66013016	A yɛ to, soe yama chɛ, a din‑da wan to mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma, mɔ mɛsɛ n bɛ gbakoo n na, yɔn tɔɛ nu, an bɛ nyan tɔɛ n na, yɔnɛ nu, an bɛ mɔɛ n na, miin ma yɔn na, an gbɛɛ ni nyɛnɛ ma sɔn. A ni sa an boo nyima a boo a, chɛ ma, an ya kɔɔɛ.
66013017	A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee fee chɛ, chɛ ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ni fee fenɛ ma tachɛ, ni nyɛn chɛ ee a ma. An nyɛn chɛ, a mu soe yama saa chɛ tɔɛ an na, ni chɛ ma, nɔmba min sɔen mu a tɔɛ ko a.
66013018	Yiimatɛ wa, an mbe chɛ bɔ. Mɔɛ min sin yiima tɛen mu, an mbe a ɔ gbɛ nɔmba chɛ sɔen mu fen ko a. Mɔ gbu 'a nɔmba mu. A mu chɛmɛ wɔdɔ, ni bi wɔdɔ kun ma wɔdɔɛ (666) an na.
66014001	Mbɛ n‑na n ya a ta to, mbɛ a yen ko, kɔnkɔɛ chɛ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Sayɔn kɔnkɔɛ, n‑na sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ yen a kun tɛ. A ni sɔ ɔ, an bɛ mɔ wu chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, mɔ wu bi naanin kun ma naaninɛ (144,000) n fan na. A tɔɛ an nyɛnden ni mɔɛ chɛ n ya kɔɔɛ, a basan a Fa Yataa tɔɛ a.
66014002	Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a ka banda bu ɔ, kuiɛ gbankon ba yɔ yii tu kuiɛ, ni chɛ ma, banda tu kuiɛ. Kuiɛ chɛ bɔ‑a wan, yɔ kɔninka gbasi mɔɛ ɛ ma a boo a tɔmbɔ‑a a yuu a.
66014003	An gbɛɛ, an ni si nama an sa tena. An mbe sɔ ɔ mansa sea chɛ ya kɔɔ, fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n ya kɔɔ, ni gbakoo chɛ n ya kɔɔɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ nii ma an si chɛ sɔn, mɔɔ dechee an fan, Yataa na‑a an fɛn kun ka. An mɔ wu chɛmɛ dɔndɔ, wu bi naanin kun ma naanin (144,000) chɛ.
66014004	Mɔɛ chɛ n fan nii nɛ, miin nii ma koa dɔndɔ bun ni, an bɛ musu kan kɔ kan na, an nii ma musu koe ɔ sɔn, an ma koenɛ ni fion. Mɔɛ chɛ n fan ni bea sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ fɛ kan kɔ kan, a ni ta kaina min. Mɔ gbu n gbɛɛ tɛ ɔ, an tana, an‑na kunka ma sɔn fan. An ma‑a wan Yataa 'a mɔɛ saa n na, sa tɔngbɔɛ 'a mɔɛ saa nu, yɔ chin fenɛ saa, min mbe be Yataa ma.
66014005	An mɔɛ chɛ n da ɔ, fania nii bɔ nɔ, mabɔ chia kan kɔ kan nii an ma.
66014006	Mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ mende yen, ɛ ben‑da banda a yɔ konde. Sakana bai chɛndɛ ɛ a boo ɔ, sakana min mbe ee tui kuɔ fɔ. Ɛ a boo ɔ, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a dunya ma. Chɛ n ko a chɛnyɛ kunɛ kan kɔ kan dɔ, chɛnyɛ koɛ n dɔ, dambi n dɔ, ni mɔ gbu kan kɔ kan ko a.
66014007	A sin‑na a fɔ wan gbankon, a ɔ, “Wo chian Yataa ma, wo ni basɔmaya be a ma. Koe min na mu, tima che‑a, ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a mɔ ɔ mɔ wakoe ma tima min na dunya ɔ. Wo a fai, min‑na banda bu ɔ a dan, a basan dunya gbɛɛ a, kɔ yii gbɛɛ, a basan yii mɛsɛ mɛsɛ n gbɛɛ a.”
66014008	Maeka dɔ mende, a fean bɔɛ gbɛ, a na‑a a saa chɛ gbaa chia a. Mbɛ a ɔ, “A teen fan mu, Babidon duu wa chɛ teen fan mu. Duu chɛ, min‑na a ma mɔɛ gbɛɛ dunya ɔ, an‑na a 'a gbɛ yama chɛ min, min mbe yiinachii yama ma munda, a bɛbɛɛ ko tɛ.”
66014009	Mbɛ maeka dɔndɔ na‑a to, chɛ gbaa, a sawan bɔɛ. A wɛɛ, a koɔ‑a wan gbankon, a ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a soe yama chɛ fai, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a fen chɛ fai, min bɔenɛ a a, ko yama mu.” A ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a nyɛn chɛ sa a ya kɔɔɛ, chɛ ma, a boo a, ko yama mu.”
66014010	A ɔ, “Yataa wɛɛ, ɛ a 'a faagbandia gbɛ be‑a wan an mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ma.” A ɔ, “An mbe a 'a faatɛ tɔmbua a faenɛ ɛ gban, an mbe a min‑da wan.” A ɔ, “An mɔɛ chɛ n mbe tɔɔya‑a wan, ta a, a basan sen gbandi ma yawaenɛ a yɔ ta.” A ɔ, “Chɛ ɛ ma‑a wan an na, sa tɔngbɔɛ ya kɔɔ, a basan a 'a maeka n gbɛɛ a.”
66014011	A ɔ, “A sin, ni ta‑a a kuu sɔ an tɔɔya‑a, a sisi ɛ sɔ‑a wan banda ma, kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a.” A ɔ, “An sin, suin kan kɔ kan mbe ee ma‑a an ko a.” A ɔ, “An fɛn mbe soe yama chɛ fai ka, ni fen chɛ, min bɔenɛ a a, an mbe tɔɔya‑a wan.” A ɔ, “Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ nyɛnɛ saen mu min ma, soe yama chɛ 'a nyɛnɛ, an mbe tɔɔya‑a wan su ɔ tee a.”
66014012	Chɛ gbɛɛ‑a a yian fan ka, mbɛ faabia an nyin Yataa 'a mɔɛ n ko a. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe Yataa 'a sawa bia chɛndɛ, an kai faenɛ ɛ Chisɔsi a gban.
66014013	Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min to, a ka banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “Bai chɛ nyɛn bɛ. I ɔ, a ka sanche ma, mɔɛ miin mbe an kai fa‑a Mansa Chisɔsi a, aan an ni fa, an duaen mu.” Mbɛ Yataa Nyina ɔ, “Tea ko a, an duaen mu. An mbe ee yakɔɔtawa kan kɔ kan dɔ yen‑da to, koe min na mu, an chɛ chɛ wai an mbe an ma konan‑da Yataa tena.”
66014014	Chɛ gbɛɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na n ya a si to, mbɛ a yen ko, n‑na mɔɛ yen si ɔ dugbu ɔ, dugbu gbɛenɛ fion. An mɔɛ chɛ ni Mɔ Gbu 'a Denɛ an na, mansa banfua ɛ si ɔ a kun na, min nyanden ni sanu a, ni mɛ wa ɛ a boo a, chin fen tɛ koe a.
66014015	Mbɛ maeka dɔ mende bɔ‑a nɔ Yataa 'a chenɛ a, banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a mɔɛ chɛ chee gbankon, min ni ka si ɔ dugbu chɛ ɔ. A‑a a chee, a ɔ, “I 'a mɛ wa ya, i ni i 'a chin fenɛ tɛ. Koe min na mu, a tɛ tima gbu che‑a, a mu min na, tima che‑a fen fen na sɔn koe a dunya ɔ, yɔ kɔɔ mɔenɛ a ɛ sɔn buɛ min dɔ.”
66014016	Mbɛ mɔɛ chɛ, min ni ka si ɔ dugbu chɛ ɔ, a‑a a 'a mɛ wa chɛ a ben dunya kun ma, mbɛ a toen mu min na ni sɔn, a gbɛɛ a sɔn‑da.
66014017	Mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ mende yen to, a bɔ‑a Yataa 'a chen chɛ a, banda bu ɔ. A wɛɛ mɛ wa ni wan a boo a, mɛ a saenɛ, min ni chin fen chɛ kai, an ni min chee, an dɔ, keepi.
66014018	Mbɛ maeka dɔ mende bɔ‑a, min ni ta kun ma fɛn, fen kunyɛ a diama chɛ ɛ minda ka gbengbe min ma banda bu ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a yee tɛ gbankon maeka dɔndɔɛ chɛ tena, chin fen kai mɛ wa chɛ ɛ ka min boo a, a ɔ, “I 'a mɛ wa ya, i ni keepi chɛ kai, a ka a nɔmɔɛ ma, dunya chɛ ma. Koe min na mu, an keepi n gbu yawa‑a.”
66014019	Mbɛ maeka chɛ, a‑a mɛ chɛ a ben dunya kun ma, mbɛ keepi chɛ gbɛɛ kai‑a, a ka a nɔmɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma. Mbɛ a gbɛɛ a sɔn‑da bondonɛ da a, a ma ɛ tɛn‑da kaina min, a yii ni bɔ. Chɛ an mbe Yataa 'a faatɛ ɔ yian‑da.
66014020	An‑na a ma tɛn tɛn fan bondonɛ chɛ ɔ, duu wa chɛ tanda ɔ. A sin, wii wasa sa‑a wan, a bɔ bondon chɛ ɔ. Wii chɛ ta‑a wan aan mai chɛmɛ fea (200) nyɔn dɔ, a sin dɔ yiien ni. Soo gbugbu ni tunɛ wan a ɔ.
66015001	Mbɛ n‑na kamaya koe dɔ mende ɔ yen to ma‑a banda bu ɔ. Koe chenama wa ni, min mbe mɔ da ɔ gbaa. Maeka wɔnfea, an ni wan nɔ, kasaa si tena wɔnfea ni miin boo ɔ. Chɛ n mu kasaa dankama n fan na, koe min na mu, Yataa 'a faatɛ ɛ danka‑a an fan ma.
66015002	A yɛ to, mbɛ n‑na yii wa yen, a maenɛ ɛ yɔ mɛmɛ, a basan ta manɛ a. N‑na mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ yen fan, soe yama wa chɛ nii ma kun ni miin ma. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, fenɛ min bɔen ni an soe chɛ a, a ma kun ni mɔɛ miin ma, an sin nii ma nɔmba ya ni an soe chɛ tɔɛ ɔ. An mɔɛ chɛ n ni sɔ ɔ yii mia mia chɛ an kaa a, kɔninka min Yataa‑a a be an ma, ɛ an boo a.
66015003	Mɔɛ chɛ nu, an na‑a si dɔndɔ a bɔ wan, a si Yataa‑a gbasaya ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ a 'a yɔnɛ Mosisi 'a tima a. A yɛ to, a‑a a ɔ yian buɛ min dɔ sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a tima wɛɛ a. An dɔ, “Yataa Mansa Wa, i wɛn gbasa fen fen ma, i chɛ chɛ wai n koo, da ɔ gbaa koe nu mu. Dunya gbɛɛ ɛ i 'a mansaya an kɔɔ. I 'a ko ɔ ko a kanden mu, a sin kafa ee a ɔ.
66015004	Yataa Mansa, mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ samba‑a wan i ma chianɛ a. Mɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ basɔmaya be wan i ma. I wan mu dechee tea Yataa a. Dunya gbɛɛ ɛ na‑a i tando‑a wan, i chɛ chɛ wai chɛndɛ ko a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ ɛ min yen.”
66015005	Mbɛ an gbɛɛ ban‑da si a bɔ‑a kɛn, n‑na n ya a ta. Mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ kaina chɛ, ku tɛndi chɛ kɔɔ, Yataa 'a chen chɛ, n‑na a da a kaenɛ yen.
66015006	Mbɛ maeka wɔnfea chɛ n bɔ‑a Yataa 'a chen chɛ a, kasaa wɔnfea chɛ n mbe ka miin boo ɔ. An ma bɛnden ni doma min dɔ, a gbɛen fan ni fo fo, ɛ man‑da. Fenɛ min ni bun dɔ an kaa a, a nyanden ni sanu an dɔ.
66015007	Mbɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n dɔndɔ, a‑a sanu pani wɔnfea an be maeka wɔnfea chɛ n ma. Pani chɛ n na faen ni Yataa 'a faatɛ an na, a wɛn mbe ee fa kuɔ fɔ ni kuɔ fɔ ko a.
66015008	Yataa 'a gbasaya ɔ, a basan a 'a manɛ a, sisi fa‑a wan a 'a chen chɛ a. A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ nii don to nɔ, aan kasaa wɔnfea chɛ, maeka wɔnfea chɛ n boo ɔ, an ni ban an si‑a mɔɛ n na a danka a gbɔdɛ.
66016001	Mbɛ kuiɛ gbankon ba, n‑na a a min, a ka Yataa 'a chen chɛ a, a ɔ, maeka wɔnfea chɛ n ma, a ɔ, “Pani wɔnfea chɛ nu wo boo n na, miin na faenɛ ɛ ka Yataa 'a faatɛ gbɛ chɛ a, wo ta, wo ni an dɔ wuyan dunya kun ma.”
66016002	Mbɛ maeka saa ta‑a, mbɛ a‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan dunya ma. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, soe yama chɛ, a 'a nyɛnɛ saenɛ ɛ miin ma, miin ni fen chɛ fai, min bɔen ni a a, tɛ yama bɔ‑a an gbɛɛ gboo ma.
66016003	Mbɛ maeka fean bɔɛ tana, a‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan kɔ yii ɔ wan. Mbɛ kɔ yii chɛ mun‑da, a ma‑a yɔ mɔ su wii, a chinɔenɛ ɛ. A sin, mbɛ fɔɛ fen kan kɔ kan a ɔ, an fa‑a wan.
66016004	Maeka sawan bɔɛ sin, a‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan yii tɔɛ n gbɛɛ an dɔ, miin mbe yii. An gbɛɛ ma‑a wii a.
66016005	Mbɛ maeka chɛ, min ni yii gbɛɛ kun ma, n‑na a kuiɛ a min, ɛ koɔ‑a Yataa tena, a ɔ, “Tea ko a, i kan nyɔ ee. I ni wan nɔ suun, e tun nɔ sanche wɛɛ.” A ɔ, “E ka kaa min na tɛ‑a dunya chɛ ma, tea ɛ wan i boo ɔ.”
66016006	A ɔ, “I 'a mɔɛ n wii a bɔnden mu an boo ɔ, a basan i 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n wii a.” A ɔ, “I wɛɛ, i‑a wii dechee be an ma, a min koe a yii a. An‑na wai chɛ chɛ an ko a.”
66016007	Mbɛ n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min, a ka gbengbe chɛ tena, a ɔ, “Yataa Mansa Wa, tea ko a, i danayaen mu, i 'a kaa a tɛ ɔ.”
66016008	Maeka naanin bɔɛ‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan tee an kun na. A sin, gbasaya be‑a wan a ma, mɔɛ n minda koe a, a ta manɛ a.
66016009	Tee chɛ win ba chɛ‑a mɔɛ n ma fufu wan. Chɛɛ an ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni an 'na ko yama n na, an ma Yataa bai ni, a 'a gbasaya ko a. An‑na min ma, an‑na a main fan, gbasaya ɛ ka a wɛn boo ɔ kasaa koe chɛ n kun ma.
66016010	Maeka duun bɔɛ tana, a‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan soe yama chɛ 'a mansa sea an na. Chɛnyɛ chɛ, min ni a 'a mansaya kɔɔ, a ni wan pimbi pimbi ɔ. Mɔɛ n‑na an nɛnɛnɛ n chin fan tɔɔya ɔ.
66016011	Chɛɛ an ma an kan kɔ sɔ ni an 'na ko yama n na. An sin‑na bai yama n sa wan Yataa ma, min mbe banda bu ɔ. Koe min na mu, an 'na tɛɛ chɛ n ni an tɔɔ tena wan kaka.
66016012	Maeka wɔdɔn bɔɛ‑a a ta pani ɔ wuyan yii chɛ an dɔ, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, Yufatesi. An yii chɛ gbaa‑a wan tado, chia be koe a mansa chɛ n ma, miin mbe ka tee bɔ.
66016013	Mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yen, nyina yama sawa, miin ni yɔ tui gbɔfɔɛ nu, an bɔ‑a. Dɔndɔ bɔ‑a fɔɛ fen ma chiandenɛ chɛ an da ɔ. Mbɛ dɔndɔɛ bɔ‑a soe yama wa chɛ da ɔ. A sawan bɔɛ chɛ sin bɔ‑a fania fɔ mɔɛ chɛ an da ɔ, min ni a wandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a.
66016014	Nyina yama ni an na, miin mbe a ma, kamaya koe n mbe ma. An mbe ta wan mansa kan kɔ kan tena dunya ma, an na kan koe a kaina dɔndɔɛ. An ni chɛ ma tena, chɛɛ chɛ koe an na tee wa chɛ ma, Yataa Mansa Wa 'a tee chɛ.
66016015	Chisɔsi na‑a a fɔ wan, a ɔ, “A yen ko, n mbe na‑a wo tɛnɛ‑a wan yɔ kanka. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe ma‑a a ya a, ɛ a 'a koa n kun ma fɛn‑da wan. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ee ben‑da a ma senɛ a, a ni mau fanka ɔ den. A mɔɛ chɛ duaen mu.”
66016016	Mbɛ nyina yama chɛ nu, an‑na mansa chɛ n na kan kaina chɛ, Ibu mɔɛ n mbe min chee, an dɔ, Amakɛdon.
66016017	Mbɛ maeka wɔnfean bɔɛ sin, a‑a a ta pani a fasi wan, mbɛ fia ta‑a a a. Mbɛ kuiɛ wa a min‑da gbankon, a ka Yataa 'a chenɛ a banda bu ɔ, mansa sea chɛ tena, a ɔ, “Ko ɔ ko ban‑da.”
66016018	Mbɛ banda manɛ mia mia ben ben‑da, banda ɛ tu‑a diki diki, ɛ ta‑a koɔ‑a gbau gbau, mbɛ duu gboo wɛɛ samba‑a a ma chianden ba a. A ka mɔ gbu bɔ tima ma dunya chɛ ɔ, duu gboo ma samba nin bɛ, min yau kaka a ni che chɛ ɔ.
66016019	Mbɛ Babidon duu wa chɛ, a tɛka‑a sawa a, duu gboo chɛ sambaenɛ gbakɔ. Duu wa tɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ma, an bɛɛ yɔn‑da wan. Yataa nii ma nyina ni Babidon duu yama wa chɛ ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, a‑a a gbɛ tɔmbua chɛ din nɔ mɔɛ n ma, gbɛ min‑na a 'a faatɛ dankama yian.
66016020	A sin, kaina kan kɔ kan yii tinɛ ɔ, an tuin‑da wan, mɔ sin nii kɔnkɔ kan kɔ kan yen to.
66016021	Mbɛ sankɔɛ gbugbu wa dɛgbɛ nu, miin dɔndɔɛ fanka ni che kɔɔ bɛchi dɔndɔɛ fanka ɔ, an bea‑a mɔɛ n ma, a ka banda a. Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n‑na Yataa main fan, koe min na mu, koe chɛ ma chianden ni kaka.
66017001	Mbɛ maeka wɔnfea chɛ n dɔndɔ, miin‑na pani chɛ n dɔ wuyan ka, a na‑a n tena, a ɔ, “Na wɛ, n ni a ɔ yian i a, duu dia wa chɛ, Yataa ɛ kaa a tɛ‑a buɛ min dɔ a wakoe ma.” A ɔ, “Duu dia chɛ mu duu wa chɛ an na, min sɔen mu ka yii sɛsɛ n kaa a.”
66017002	A ɔ, “Mansa wa chɛ nu dunya chɛ ɔ, an‑na waa ma basan fan an duu dia chɛ a.” A ɔ, “Mɔɛ miin sin gbɛɛ an mbe dunya ɔ, an‑na a 'a gbɛ yama chɛ min fan, min mbe yiinachii yama ma munda, a bɛbɛɛ ko tɛ. An gbɛ chɛ sin‑na an bia wan.”
66017003	Mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a n fɛ gban, mbɛ maeka chɛ ta‑a n na fuinɛ ma. Nɔ ni, mbɛ n‑na musu yen si ɔ soe yawa kun ma, soe yama wa. An soe chɛ gboo gbɛɛ ma, Yataa main bai n dechee an nyɛnden ni a ma. A kunɛ ni wɔnfea, a bena n sin ni tan.
66017004	Musu chɛ ma bɛnden fan ni chɛndɛ chɛ, koa yawaenɛ ɔ, min ni man tena sanu a, ni sen baa gbanden ba nu, a basan fen baa gbanden dɔ mende n na a ma. Kɔpu ni wan a boo a, min nyanden ni sanu a, ko yama faenɛ a a gban, a basan a 'a duu dia wai yama a.
66017005	Musu chɛ ya kɔɔɛ ma, tɔɛ nyɛnden fan ni nɔ, min fasai nunden ni. Chɛ an nyɛnden ni a ma, a ɔ, “Babidon duu wa chɛ, an mu duu dia n gbɛɛ de a, mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin mbe ko yama kan kɔ kan ma.”
66017006	Mbɛ n‑na a ɔ yen, mbɛ musu chɛ gbɛ tɔɛ ni, mɔɛ chɛ n wii a, Yataa 'a mɔɛ chɛ nu, an na‑a miin fa, bea koe a Chisɔsi fɛ. N‑na a yen kɛn, n da ɔ gbaa‑a wan.
66017007	Chɛɛ maeka chɛ ɔ te n ma, a ɔ, “I da ɔ ma gbaa. N mbe koɔ nunden chɛ ɔ yian‑da wan i a, a si musu chɛ ma. N mbe a ɔ yian‑da wan i a, a si soe yama chɛ wɛɛ ma, ɛ ka si ɔ min kun ma, soe min kunɛ ɛ ka wɔnfea, a bena sin mbe tan.
66017008	I na‑a soe yama min yen ka sunɛ, a ni wan fɔɛ ɔ, chɛɛ a fa‑a gbɛ. A ɛ na tena wan bɔ‑a to, a ka son dɔ yiien ba chɛ ɔ, min danka ee ka. A sin, ɛ ta‑a wan kaina chɛ, Yataa ɛ a kasaa kaina min. Dunya chɛ ma mɔɛ nu, Yataa nii ma miin tɔɛ nyɛn ni a 'a gboo ɔ, an gbɛɛ, an da ɔ gbaa‑a wan, an mbe ma‑a soe yama chɛ ma fɛn‑da. A 'a gboo chɛ, mɔɛ miin mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da, a na‑a an tɔɛ nyɛn min dɔ, a e na dunya a dan. Soe chɛ ni wan tee fɔɛ ɔ, a ee sanche fɔɛ ɔ, chɛɛ ɛ yɛ‑a wan to fɔɛ ɔ.”
66017009	A ɔ, “Yiimatɛ wa, an mbe chɛ nɛnɛ bɔ. Kun wɔnfea chɛ nu, an mu kɔnkɔ wɔnfea an fan na, musu chɛ ɛ si ɔ miin ma.
66017010	An mu to mansa wɔnfea an fan na. An mɔ duu nii to fɔɛ ɔ, dɔndɔɛ ɛ tun mansaya ɔ, a dankama sin ma na nin bɛ mansaya ɔ. A sin ni a na‑a, ɛ ma‑a mansaya ɔ tima kundu ɛnden fan ko a dechee.
66017011	Soe yama chɛ tana, min ni fɔɛ ɔ, chɛɛ a ee to fɔɛ ɔ, a sin fan mu to mansa sɛin bɔɛ a. A sin to, ɛ bɔ‑a mansa wɔnfea chɛ n fan tɛ ɔ, chɛɛ a wɛɛ ɛ kasaa‑a wan.”
66017012	A ɔ, “Bena tan chɛ n sin, i na‑a miin yen ka, mansa tanɛ n fan nɛ, miin ma si nin bɛ an 'na mansaya ɔ. Chɛɛ an mbe gbasaya ma sɔn‑da wan, mansaya wai chɛ koe a yɔ mansa nu, awa dɔndɔ gbe ko a, an bɛ soe yama chɛ a.
66017013	An mansa tan chɛ n gbɛɛ yiima ni dɔndɔ gbe, an sin gbɛɛ kuiɛ bɛn‑da wan kaina dɔndɔɛ, mbɛ an 'na mansaya gbasaya gbɛɛ, an‑na a be soe yama chɛ ma.
66017014	Soe yama chɛ, an bɛ mansa tan chɛ n na, an mbe chɛɛ bun‑da wan sa tɔngbɔɛ ma. Chɛɛ sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ, an bɛ a fɛ mɔɛ n na, an mbe tu‑a wan an chɛɛ ma nyɔɛ chɛ n na chɛndɛ chɛ. Koe min na mu, sa tɔngbɔɛ an mu mansa wa a, mansa wa n gbɛɛ kun ma mansa. A fɛ mɔɛ nu, an mu mɔɛ chɛ n fan na, Yataa‑a a boo sɔ miin ma, mbɛ a‑a an chee. An sin, an fan kai faen mu a a.”
66017015	Mbɛ maeka chɛ a ɔ te n ma, a ɔ, “I na‑a yii miin sin yen ka, duu dia chɛ ni ka si ɔ miin kaa a, an mu mɔ gbu n fan na, mɔ fanka nu, chɛnyɛ kunɛ nu, a basan chɛnyɛ koɛ n na.
66017016	I na‑a bena tanɛ miin sin yen, an bɛ soe yama chɛ a, duu dia chɛ wakoe ɛ don‑da wan an ma. An mbe fen kɔ fen bɔ‑a wan a boo ɔ, an ni a ma senɛ to. An mbe a gboo daun‑da wan, mbɛ an‑na ta ya, mbɛ an‑na a minda.
66017017	Koe min na mu, Yataa an‑na a chɛ an faa ɔ, an yiima bɛn‑da kaina dɔndɔ, kuiɛ dɔndɔɛ ɔ, an ni an 'na mansaya be soe yama chɛ ma. Yataa faa ma koe ni a a, an ni ma soe yama chɛ kɔɔ, aan Yataa 'a dɔbɛnɛ gbɛɛ kunɛ a ni bia chɛndɛ chɛ.
66017018	“Musu chɛ sin, duu dia chɛ, i na‑a min yen, a mu duu wa chɛ an na, duu gbasayaen ba chɛ, dunya mansa n gbɛɛ, an mbe min kɔɔ.”
66018001	An musu chɛ yendenɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ mende yen to yii‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ. Gbasaya min ni a boo ɔ, a ni koo kaka. A sin, dunya gbɛɛ ɔ kaen fan ni wandaun, a 'a manɛ a.
66018002	Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a chee chɛ gbankon, a ɔ, “A teen fan mu, Babidon duu wa chɛ teen fan mu. A ma‑a gbɛ nyina yama n baa a, nyina yama kan kɔ kan bɛn tena, konde yama n gbɛɛ waa a.
66018003	Dunya gbɛɛ‑a Babidon 'na gbɛ yama chɛ min, a 'a gbɛ yama min mbe yiima yama ma munda ka, a bɛbɛɛ ko tɛ. Dunya ma mansa gbɛɛ, an‑na waa ma basan a a, yua mɔɛ n nyan‑da a ɔ, a kunɛ a fuindenɛ ɛ duu diaya a.”
66018004	Mbɛ n‑na kuiɛ dɔ mende a min to gbankon, banda bu ɔ, a ɔ, “N 'na mɔɛ nu, wo ka a fɛ, wo bɔ a ɔ, wo ni tanka a 'a ko yama ma koe ma, wo ni tanka a 'a kasaa n ma Yataa boo ɔ.
66018005	A 'a ko yama kɔnkɔɛ che‑a banda bu ɔ, Yataa sin ma nyina ni a gba yama n ma.
66018006	A bia ka wan, yɔ a‑a mɔɛ n bia buɛ min dɔ, a‑a min si mɔɛ n na, a si‑a gba fea ko a. A‑a gbɛ a kɔɔenɛ min be mɔ dɔ mende n ma, gbɛ min gbasa a ma, gba fea ko a, a fa a 'a kɔpu a.
66018007	Tɔɔya be a ma kaka, a basan faayɔnɛ a, a ni ka a 'a dɔpanda nyan tɔ fɔɛ min gbɛɛ ɔ, a nyɔn sima tɔɔya ni si a a. A ni a yonka wan tima ɔ tima, a ɔ, ‘N yen ko si ɔ n 'na mansaya wa ɔ, fuinya musu ma n na, n sin mbe ee fuinya musu di chɛ‑a fion.’
66018008	Chɛ ko a, kasaa sɛsɛ ɛ a tan‑da tee dɔndɔɛ an kɔɔ, saya, faayɔnɛ, a basan kɔnkɔ ma chianden ba a. A sin, ta an mbe a minda‑a, Yataa Mansa faa tɛ buɛ chɛ a ma, Yataa min mbe kaa a tɛ a wakoe ma, a gbasaen mu.”
66018009	Mbɛ dunya ma mansa chɛ nu, miin‑na waa ma basan a a, a 'a duu diaya chɛ ɔ, an mbe di chɛ‑a wan, an 'na duu wa chɛ ko a. Ni an‑na a sisi yen bɔ‑a, an mbe di chɛ‑a wan, aan an ya ni yawa.
66018010	An mbe sɔ‑a wan pɔɔ, an mbe chian‑da, an ma na tɔɔya chɛ ɔ bia, ɛ min dɔ. An mbe a fɔ‑a wan, an dɔ, “Kasaa ma chianden mu gba, kasaa ma chianden mu gba, i duu wa gbasayaen ba chɛ ko a. I wan Babidon duu chɛ, awa dɔndɔ gbe kɔɔ ka, i tɔɔ‑a ka.”
66018011	Yua mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ, an mbe dunya ma, an mbe di chɛ‑a wan a ko a, koe min na mu, mɔ ɔ mɔ ee to nɔ an 'na fee n chɛ koe a.
66018012	An 'na sanu chɛ nu, kain chɛ nu, yɔɔɛ nu an basan fen baa gbanden dɔ mende n na. A yɛ to, koa nyima kani kani kan kɔ kan, ni kɔn kunyɛ a diama kani kan kɔ kan, a basan fenɛ sɛsɛ a, miin nyanden ni kama nyinɛ ɔ. Fenɛ kani kani kan kɔ kan ni wan nɔ, a ka gbɛ kɔn baa gbandenɛ ma, a ta fen chɛ n tena miin nyanden mu kundu ɔ, miin bɛɛ nyanden mu sen baa gbandenɛ ɔ, a basan fen baa gbanden dɔ mende a.
66018013	A yɛ to, fenɛ miin mbe chɛ da ɔ, daun fenɛ dia koe a, an ni wan nɔ. Tu kunyɛ a diama kani kani kan kɔ kan, a basan pɔɔda kani kan kɔ kan na, an baa gbanden ba. Gbɛ wɛɛ, a basan tu a, min ni bɔ wodifi kɔnɛ gbɔɛ ɔ, ni feawa, a basan fen chɛ a, ɛ nyan fenɛ min dɔ. Ninchi n bɛɛ, an basan sa n na, soo nu, an basan mɔto gbingbi chɛ n na, soo n mbe miin sawan ka. Mɔɛ n bɛɛ ni wan nɔ, miin ni yɔnɛ n na, an basan mɔɛ n na, miin bia‑a chɛɛ ɔ.
66018014	Mbɛ yua mɔɛ chɛ n‑na a fɔ a ma, an dɔ, “I faa ma fen chɛ n gbɛɛ, an tuin‑da i ma, i 'a nyanɛ gbɛɛ, fenɛ miin gbɛɛ, miin mbe i 'a gboo ma nyanɛ kun ma chɛ, i fo‑a an na kuɔ fɔ ko a. A sin, an ma ee sɔn‑da to kuɔ fɔ.”
66018015	Yua mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin ta mu fee fen ba chɛ n na, miin‑na duu chɛ 'a nyanɛ ɔ daun ka, an mbe ee gbɛn‑da a ma. An mbe sɔ‑a wan pɔɔ, an mbe chian‑da a 'a tɔɔya ma, chɛɛ an mbe di chɛ‑a wan a ko a, aan an ya yii ni bɔn.
66018016	Mbɛ an dɔ, “Kasaa ma chianden mu gba, kasaa ma chianden mu gba, duu wa gbasayaen ba chɛ ko a. Duu min ma bɛndenɛ ɛ koa kani kani n dɔ, an baa gbanden ba nu, a yawaenɛ nu. A ni man tena sanu an na, sen baa gbanden ba nu, a basan fen baa gbanden dɔ mende n na.
66018017	Awa dɔndɔ gbe kɔɔ, nyan chɛ gbɛɛ kasaa‑a.” Dɛndɛ wa ti nu, dɛndɛ chɛ n wii mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, yii a ta yua n gbɛɛ, mɔɛ gbɛɛ sɔ‑a pɔɔ.
66018018	An‑na sisi yen kɛn bɔ‑a, an‑na yee tɛ wan gbankon, an dɔ, “Duu wa ma ben nin bɛ duu chɛ ma.”
66018019	Mbɛ an‑na sanka boo sin an ma, an kunɛ gbɛɛ a, an mbe ta‑a saya di chɛ‑a gbafi gbafi, an dɔ, “Kasaa ma chianden mu gba, kasaa ma chianden mu gba, duu wa gbasayaen ba chɛ ko a. Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ, dɛndɛ wa ni miin boo ɔ kɔ yii a, duu min 'na nyanɛ pɔpɔɛ‑a an nyan, awa dɔndɔ gbe kɔɔ, a kasaa‑a ka.”
66018020	Wo wɛn mbe banda bu ɔ, wo buɔdia bɔ, Babidon yɔn koe a Yataa boo ɔ. Yataa 'a mɔɛ nu, Chisɔsi 'a sɔ mɔɛ gbau gbau nu, wo buɔdia bɔ, wo bɛ Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. Koe min na mu, Yataa‑a kaa a tɛ Babidon duu wa chɛ ma koe chɛ n ko a, a na‑a miin ma wo a.
66018021	Chɛ gbakɔ, maeka dɔndɔ min ni gbasa, a‑a sen gbugbu wa ya, mbɛ a‑a a a dɛ kɔ yii ɔ, a ɔ, “Babidon duu wa chɛ, ɛ kasaa‑a ka wan gbasaya ɔ. Ɛ ma‑a duu wa tombo an na kuɔ fɔ.
66018022	Kɔninka kuiɛ, a basan mɔ gbu n ta a, koee fɛ mɔɛ nu, an bɛ buu fɛ n na, an na ee min‑da to nɔ. Wai chɛ mɔ ee ma‑a a ɔ, wai ee ma‑a, min mbe to‑a nɔ. Daun fen tu kuiɛ ee bɔ‑a to a ɔ.
66018023	Dambo wɛɛ ee manɛ be‑a to nɔ. Musu fuu mɔɛ nu, an 'na sɛnama nu, an kuiɛ a ee min‑da to nɔ. A 'a yua nu, an kan nyɔn nii dunya ɔ, a 'a suaya wa, a‑a dunya bun fan.”
66018024	Yataa 'a mɔɛ n wii, a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n wii, a bɔn‑da nɔ, a sin‑na duu chɛ kasaa. An‑na mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ fa dunya ma, a boo ni wan an dɔ.
66019001	Maeka chɛ da a kuiɛ chɛ gbakɔ, a ma‑a wan yɔ n‑na mɔ fanka wa kuiɛ a min bɔ‑a gbankon, a ka banda bu ɔ. An dɔ, “Mmɔ Yataa tando, mmɔ 'a mansa, bauncha ɛ an boo ɔ, basɔmaya wɛɛ, a basan gbasaya a.
66019002	A 'a kaa a tɛ, tea ɔ, danaya ɔ. A‑a kaa a tɛ duu dia wa chɛ wakoe ma, dunya ɔ chɛ chɛ duu chɛ, ko tɛ a. A 'a mɔɛ n wii ko a, a‑a tɔɔya sa duu chɛ ma.”
66019003	Mbɛ fanka wa chɛ kuiɛ bɔ‑a to gbankon, an dɔ, “Mmɔ Yataa tando, duu chɛ minda sisi, a tɛ ee tɛ tena kuɔ fɔ.”
66019004	Mbɛ gbakoo bi fea kun ma naanin chɛ nu, an bɛ fɔɛ fen naanin chɛ n na, an‑na an kumbai gbangban, an‑na Yataa tando, min mbe si ɔ a 'a mansaya sea a. An dɔ, “A ni ma ka. Tando ni be Yataa ma.”
66019005	Mbɛ mansa sea chɛ tena, mɔɛ kuiɛ bɔ‑a nɔ, a ɔ, “Wo gbɛɛ, wo mmɔ 'a Yataa tando. Wo wɛn gbɛɛ mu a 'a wai chɛ mɔɛ n na, yɔn tɔɛ nu, nyan tɔɛ nu, wo wɛn mbe chian Yataa ma.”
66019006	Mbɛ a ma‑a, yɔ n‑na mɔ fanka kuiɛ a min. An kuiɛ chɛ maen fan ni gbankon, yɔ yii tu kuiɛ waa a, chɛ ma, banda tu kuiɛ gbau gbau. An dɔ, “Mmɔ Yataa tando, mmɔ 'a mansa, gbasaya mansa wa mu an na.
66019007	Mmɔ bu ɔ ni dia, mmɔ ni buɔdia wa bɔ, mmɔ ni basɔmaya be a ma. Sa tɔngbɔɛ 'a musu fuu tima che‑a, a sin, a 'a sɛnama‑a a ma bɛn, a fuu koe gbu a.
66019008	Sɛnama koa min be‑a a ma, a ni nyin, ɛ man‑da.” Koe min na mu, koa gbɛ chɛ‑a a ɔ yian fan, mbɛ Yataa 'a mɔɛ n chɛ chɛ wai an fan nɛ.
66019009	Mbɛ maeka chɛ ɔ te n ma, a ɔ, “Chɛ nyɛn gboo ɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n duaen mu, miin cheeen mu sa tɔngbɔɛ 'a musu si tena, daun chɛ koe a.” Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ to n ye, a ɔ, “Bai chɛ nu, min fɔ‑a ka, Yataa da a bai chɛndɛ chɛndɛ n fan nɛ.”
66019010	Mbɛ n‑na n kumbai gbangban a chen kɔɔ, a fai koe a. Chɛɛ a ɔ te n ma, a ɔ, “I ma chɛ ma. Yataa an fai. N mbe wai chɛ an ko a, yɔ wo e wai chɛ buɛ min dɔ a ko a. Wo gbɛɛ, wo wɛn kai faen mu tea chɛ a, min ka‑a Chisɔsi tena. An tea chɛ, an mbe a ma, mɔɛ n ni Yataa bai sa.” Koe min na mu, Chisɔsi‑a bai min fɔ, an mu Yataa 'a sakana bai kunɛ a mɔ gbu n tena.
66019011	Chɛ gbakɔ, n‑na banda bu ɔ yen a a kaenɛ ɛ. Mbɛ a yen ko, soo gbɛ ɛ nɔ. Mɔɛ min mbe si ɔ an soo chɛ kun ma, a tɔ mu Danaya ni Tea. A sin, kaa min ɛ a a tɛ, tea an mbe ma a ɔ, a sin mbe ee ta chɛɛ ɔ fania kun ma.
66019012	A ya ni wan yɔ ta sanku manɛ, a kunɛ sin na, mansa banfua sɛsɛ an ni si ɔ a a. A gboo wɛɛ ma, tɔɛ nyɛnden fan ni a ma, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma min sɔn, fɔ a dɔndɔ gbe dechee.
66019013	Mbɛ a yɛ to, doma kai min ni a ma, a chimaenɛ ni wii a dɔgbɔ dɔgbɔ. A mɔɛ chɛ sin tɔ mu, Yataa Da 'a Bai.
66019014	Soya mɔɛ miin sin ni banda bu ɔ, an‑na an gbee gbasi wan a gbaa chia a, an mbe si ɔ soo gbɛ an kun ma. An ma bɛndenɛ ɛ koa nyima ɔ, a gbɛenɛ ɛ fo fo.
66019015	Yataa Da 'a Bai chɛ da ɔ, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a saenɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, a bɔ‑a wan a ɔ. Ɛ an mɛ chɛ an ya tena, a ni kun dunya gbɛɛ ma chɛɛ ɔ. Ɛ ma‑a wan dunya kun ma mansa a, a sin mbe ee a 'a mansaya a tachɛ‑a chinchincha ɔ. A yɛ to, ɛ tɛn tɛn‑da wan fen chɛ ma bondonɛ ɔ, fen chɛ min tɔ mu keepi, a yii bɔ koe a a ɔ. Ɛ ma‑a ka Yataa 'a faatɛ wa an dɔ yian‑da.
66019016	Doma kai chɛ min ni a ma, a woo kun ma, tɔɛ an nyɛnden ni a ma, min ni Mansa Wa 'a Mansa a.
66019017	Mbɛ n‑na maeka yen, ɛ sɔ ɔ tee ɔ, ɛ yee tɛ‑a konde n tena ben‑da banda a. A ɔ, “Wo na, wo a ni kan Yataa 'a daun chɛ bɛn ba chɛ ko a.
66019018	Wo na, wo ni mansa n gboo daun, wo ni soya mansa n bɛɛ gboo daun, an bɛ an 'na soya mɔɛ n na. A yɛ to, soo n gboo wɛɛ, a basan soo ti n bɛɛ a, mɔɛ gbɛɛ gboo, yɔnɛ nu an bɛ chɛ n na, miin ma yɔn na, nyan tɔɛ n bɛ yɔn tɔɛ n na.”
66019019	Mbɛ n‑na soe yama wa chɛ yen, an bɛ dunya ma mansa n na. An 'na soya mɔɛ n na sɔnden fan ni gbɛ, chɛɛ bun koe a mɔɛ chɛ ma, min ni si ɔ soo chɛ kun ma, an bɛ a ta soya n na.
66019020	Mbɛ an‑na soe yama chɛ bia wan, an fea fania fɔ mɔɛ chɛ a, min ni a wandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a. A‑a kamaya koe n ma wan an soe yama chɛ ya kɔɔɛ ma. An koe chɛ n fan na‑a mɔɛ chɛ n bun, miin na‑a soe yama chɛ 'a nyɛnɛ sa an ma, miin bɛɛ na‑a fen chɛ fai, fenɛ min bɔen ni soe yama chɛ a. Soe yama chɛ, an fea soe yama fean bɔɛ chɛ a, an na dɛ‑a wan ta man ba chɛ ɔ, sen gbandima wa faen ni min na.
66019021	An 'na soya mɔɛ n tana, chɛɛ chɛ mɛ a saen chɛ, min bɔ‑a mɔɛ chɛ da ɔ soo gbɛ chɛ kun ma, a‑a an gbɛɛ fa wan. Konde n gbɛɛ, an bu ni te tena wan an su daunɛ a.
66020001	Chɛ gbɛɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na maeka dɔ mende yen yii‑a, a ka banda bu ɔ. Chi ɛ a boo a, son dɔ yansama wa chɛ, min danka ee ka, min mbe a da a ka. Kundu yɔɔɛ fankama wɛɛ, a ni wan a boo a.
66020002	Mbɛ a‑a fɔɛ fen chɛ bia gban, fɔɛ fen ma chianden ba chɛ. An fɔɛ fen chɛ mu ka kɔkɔ wa chɛ an na, nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ, min tɔ mu Sitana. Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a chii fɔin kundu yɔɔɛ chɛ a, san wu dɔndɔ (1,000) ko a.
66020003	Mbɛ a‑a a a dɛ son dɔ yansama wa chɛ ɔ, a‑a a da bun a a, mbɛ a‑a son chɛ da a tɔn gban. Chɛ ɛ a ma‑a wan, a ee dunya bun‑da to kuɔ fɔ, aan san wu dɔndɔɛ (1,000) chɛ ni ban. Chɛ gbakɔ, a ɛ fuin‑da wan tima kundu ɛnden ko a.
66020004	Mbɛ n‑na mansa sea n yen, mɔɛ miin sin ni si ɔ an sea chɛ n na, gbasaya been fan ni an ma, ma koe a mansa n na. A yɛ to, mɔɛ chɛ nu, an‑na miin kunɛ tɛ a a, sɔ koe a gban Chisɔsi ko a, a basan Yataa bai sa a, n‑na an fuɛ n yen fan. An mɔɛ chɛ nu, an nii ma soe yama chɛ fai ni, an nii ma fen chɛ wɛɛ fai ni, fenɛ min bɔen ni a a. A yɛ to, an nii ma soe yama chɛ 'a nyɛn chɛ sa ni an ya kɔɔ, an ma a sa ni a boo wɛɛ ma. An mɔɛ chɛ n yɛ‑a wan to fɔɛ ɔ, an ma‑a mansa a, san wu dɔndɔ (1,000) ko a, an bɛ Chasi a, kunka mansa.
66020005	Tima saa saa an nɛ, Yataa‑a a ma, mɔɛ n yɛ‑a to fɔɛ ɔ. Mɔɛ tɔɛ nu, miin faen ni, an ma yɛ ni to fɔɛ ɔ, aan san wu dɔndɔɛ ban‑da.
66020006	Yataa‑a miin na sɔ a ka saya ɔ tima chɛ a, an duaen mu chɛndɛ chɛ, Yataa 'a mɔɛ mu an na. An mbe ee saya fean bɔɛ chɛ‑a, chɛɛ an mbe ma‑a wan mɔɛ n na mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ Yataa a, an fea Chasi a, kunka mansa. An bɛ Chasi a, an mbe ma‑a wan mansaya ɔ san wu dɔndɔ ko a.
66020007	A sin, ni san wu dɔndɔɛ (1,000) chɛ ban‑da, Sitana ɛ fuin‑da wan, a bɔ bia ɔ.
66020008	A sin, ɛ ta‑a wan ben‑da mɔɛ n bun‑da, mɔɛ miin na fasandenɛ ɛ kan kɔ kan dunya ɔ. An mɔɛ chɛ dɔ n tɔ mu Koki, dɔ n tɔ mu Makoki. Sitana ɛ an gbɛɛ a kan‑da wan kaina chɛ, an mbe butuinɛ chɛ‑a kaina min. An kɔ ɛ koa‑a wan kaka, dan mbe ee ma‑a an ma.
66020009	Mbɛ an fasan‑da a ɔ, duu gboo ɔ fuinden ba ta‑a. Mbɛ an‑na duu wa chɛ a tindan, Yataa toen mu duu min na, a 'a mɔɛ n mbe ka duu min dɔ. Chɛɛ ta yii‑a wan, a ka banda bu ɔ, mbɛ a‑a an gbɛɛ minda, an fɛn gbɛɛ‑a duu chɛ a tindan ka.
66020010	Nyina yama n 'na mansa chɛ sin, min na‑a an bun ka, a a dɛ‑a wan ta man ba chɛ ɔ, sen gbandima wa chɛ ni ka min dɔ. Ta chɛ ɔ ni, an‑na soe yama chɛ a dɛ min dɔ, an fea fania fɔ mɔɛ chɛ a, min ni a wandi ya Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ a. Su ɔ tee a, an gbɛɛ sin mbe ma‑a tɔɔya an dɔ, ta chɛ ɔ, kuɔ fɔ ko a.
66020011	Mbɛ n‑na mansa sea wa dɛgbɛ yen banda bu ɔ, a gbɛenɛ fion, Yataa ɛ si ɔ a ma. A bɔ‑a kɛn dechee a a, duu gboo fea banda a, an tuin‑da, mɔ ɔ mɔ ma an yen ni to.
66020012	Mbɛ mansa sea chɛ ya kɔɔ to, n‑na mɔɛ n yen fan sɔ ɔ, yɔn tɔɛ n bɛ nyan tɔɛ n na, miin na‑a fa tee. Gboo n bɛɛ da a kaen fan ni, mɔ gbu gbɛɛ dunya ma, an chɛ chɛ wai nu, an nyɛn‑da gboo miin dɔ. Mbɛ gboo dɔ mende wɛɛ da a kaen fan ni, mɔɛ n tɔɛ ni gboo min dɔ, mɔɛ nu, miin mbe ma‑a fɔɛ ɔ kuɔ fɔ ko a Yataa chen kɔɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin na‑a fa, kaa a tɛ‑a wan an bakoe ma. Dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ na‑a min ma dunya chɛ ɔ, a nyɛndenɛ ɛ gboo chɛ ɔ, kaa a tɛ‑a an ma.
66020013	A tima chɛ a, mɔɛ miin na‑a to yii ɔ tee, an bɔ‑a wan. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin ni faa a, an bɔ‑a wan. An gbɛɛ ta‑a wan Yataa chen kɔɔ, kaa a tɛ koe a an bakoe ma. Kaa chɛ a ɛ tɛ‑a, a ka an chɛ chɛ wai n fan ma dunya ma.
66020014	Mbɛ saya fea faa a, an na dɛ‑a ta man ba ɔ. Ta wa chɛ ɔ ta, an mu saya fean bɔɛ a, a dankama.
66020015	A sin, mɔ ɔ mɔ min tɔɛ nii ma bɔ ni gboo chɛ ɔ, mɔɛ miin‑na kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn, an tɔɛ ɛ gboo min dɔ, an mɔɛ chɛ a dɛ‑a wan ta man ba ɔ.
66021001	Chɛ gbakɔ, mbɛ n‑na dunya nama yen, a mu min na, dunya saa tuin‑da wan. A sin, dunya nama chɛ ɔ, kɔ yii ee a ɔ.
66021002	Mbɛ Chuusaɛn bɛɛ, Yataa 'a duu wa chɛ, n‑na a wɛɛ nama yen, ɛ yii‑a a ka Yataa tena banda bu ɔ. An duu wa chɛ, a ma bɛnden fan ni, a ma chiienɛ ɛ chɛndɛ chɛ, yɔ ni sɛnama ma bɛn‑da a chɛɛ ko a.
66021003	A sin, n‑na mɔɛ kuiɛ a min fan gbankon, a ka mansa sea chɛ tena, a ɔ, “A yen ko, Yataa waa ɛ ma tena gbɛ mɔ gbu n tɛ ɔ wan. An bɛ an mbe ma tena gbɛ an na, an sin mbe ma‑a a 'a mɔɛ n fan na. A wan Yataa wandi, ɛ ma‑a wan an tɛ ɔ, an mbe ma‑a an 'na Yataa a.
66021004	Ɛ di gbɛɛ ka‑a wan an ya a. Saya ee ma‑a to nɔ, n mbe ee baa sanka di chɛ koe ma, chɛ ma, di gbama gbama, tɔɔya wɛɛ ee ma‑a nɔ. Koe min na mu, koe kɔma n gbɛɛ, miin ni ma tee, an gbɛɛ ban‑da tuin‑da.”
66021005	Yataa wɛn sin ni si ɔ a 'a mansa sea a, a ɔ, “A yen ko, n‑na fen fen ma a nama a gbɛ.” Mbɛ a ɔ te to n bɛɛ ma, a ɔ, “Chɛ nyɛn bɛ, koe min na mu, bai chɛ n mu tea bai n fan na, a nyin mɔ ɔ mɔ ni dan miin na.”
66021006	Mbɛ a ɔ te n ma to, a ɔ, “N ban‑da koe chɛ n gbɛɛ chɛ‑a. N fan mbe a ma fen fen mbe a kuu sɔ, n fan mbe a ma to fen fen mbe danka. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min kanɛ a gbaaen mu, n mbe yii be‑a wan a ma. N mbe yii be‑a wan an ma, min ka‑a yii chɛ ɔ, yii min mbe fɔɛ be mɔɛ ma gbama gbama ko a.
66021007	Mɔ ɔ mɔ min mbe sɔ‑a gban n ko a, koe chɛ n gbɛɛ, n mbe an fan chɛ‑a a ko a. N mbe ma‑a wan a 'a Yataa a, a wɛɛ ɛ ma‑a wan n 'na denɛ a.
66021008	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n tana, an gbɛɛ, an baa ɛ ma‑a ta man ba chɛ an na, sen gbandima chɛ ɛ ka min dɔ. Mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin mbe chian sɔ koe a gban Chisɔsi ko a, miin mbe sɛmbɛ dan koe a Chisɔsi a, a basan chɛ n na, miin mbe ko yama sɛsɛ ma. A yɛ to, mɔ fa mɔɛ chɛ nu, ko yama tɛ mɔɛ nu, sua chɛ nu, miin mbe fenɛ n fai, miin ma Yataa a, an bɛ fania fɔ mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a. An mbe ma min chɛ‑a ta chɛ ɔ, an mu an 'na saya fean bɔɛ a, a dankama.”
66021009	Mbɛ maeka wɔnfea chɛ nu, an dɔndɔ na‑a. Maeka chɛ nu, pani wɔnfea chɛ n ni miin boo ɔ, kasaa wɔnfea dankama chɛ n faen ni pani miin na. Mbɛ an maeka chɛ koɔ‑a n tena, a ɔ, “Na wɛ, n mbe sɛnama chɛ yian i a, min mbe na tena ma‑a sa tɔngbɔɛ 'a musu a.”
66021010	Mbɛ Yataa Nyina bea‑a n fɛ gban, mbɛ maeka chɛ sɛ‑a n na kɔnkɔ a yansama wa ɔ. Mbɛ a‑a Yataa 'a duu wa yian n na, Chuusaɛn duu wa chɛ, ɛ yii‑a a ka banda bu ɔ Yataa tena.
66021011	An duu chɛ ni man tena wan, Yataa 'a manɛ a. A ni man tena taun, yɔ dɛmunɛ. Ɛ ma‑a mia mia yɔ mɛmɛ.
66021012	An duu wa chɛ ma sansaen fan ni fɛnsi a, min nyanden ni senɛ a, a a yansama wa ɛ. A yɛ to, a a ni fanka wan gbɔtu gbɔtu, a da tɛenɛ ɛ kaina tan kun ma fea. A da tan kun ma fea chɛ kan kɔ kan, maeka dɔndɔ ni wan sɔ a a, duu chɛ kun ma fɛn koe a. A yɛ to, a da tan kun ma fea chɛ kan kɔ kan ma, dambi tan kun ma fea chɛ nu, Isɔɛɛ mɔɛ n tɛ ɔ, an nyɛnden fan ni ta‑a dɔndɔ dɔndɔɛ a.
66021013	Fɛnsi da sawa an ni tee bɔ, sawa ɛ tee bea, sawa ɛ boo nyima ɔ, mbɛ sawa ɛ man dɔɛ.
66021014	Fɛnsi chɛ, duu chɛ a tindanɛ, a kuu sien ni sen gbugbu wa tan kun ma fea an ma. An senɛ chɛ n kan kɔ kan ma, sa tɔngbɔɛ 'a sɔ mɔ tan kun ma fea, an tɔɛ nyɛnden fan mu an ma. Sɔ mɔ dɔndɔ, sen dɔndɔ.
66021015	Maeka chɛ sin, min ni koɔ tena n tena, kɔn sɔngbɔɛ an ni a boo a. An kɔn chɛ nyanden ni sanu an na, a sin ni fen siman koe an na. A ni duu wa chɛ gbɛɛ siman koe an na, a fɛnsi gbɛɛ siman koe a, a basan a da tan kun ma fea chɛ n na.
66021016	Duu chɛ sɔngbɔya, a basan a fanaya a, an ni dɔndɔ gbe. Maeka chɛ‑a a 'a kɔn chɛ ya wan, mbɛ a‑a duu chɛ siman a a. A sɔngbɔya ni wan mai wu dɔndɔ, ni chɛmɛ duu (1,500). A fanaya wɛɛ, a basan fɛnsi a yansancha a, an bɛɛ ni ka wan yɔ a sɔngbɔya.
66021017	Maeka chɛ‑a duu chɛ fɛnsi chɛ wɛɛ siman fan. A sin, a yansancha ni fiti chɛmɛ fea, fiti tan kun ma wɔdɔ (216). A tima chɛ a, maeka chɛ na‑a a ya, mɔgbuya ta fen siman buɛ an na.
66021018	An fɛnsi chɛ, a sɔen ni dɛmun senɛ n fan na. Fen kɔ fen min sin ni an duu wa chɛ ɔ, an nyanden ni sanu an na, an mbe man mia mia yɔ mɛmɛ.
66021019	Fɛnsi chɛ min tindandenɛ ni duu wa chɛ a, a kuu sien ni sen gbugbu miin ma, an ma chɛen fan ni sen baa a gbandenɛ a, a ma kawaenɛ kani kani n na. An sen chɛ saa saa ni dɛmunɛ an na, a fean bɔɛ ni senɛ chɛ an na, an mbe min chee, an dɔ, safai. A yɛ to, a sawan bɔɛ tɔ ni, akɛti senɛ, a naanin bɔɛ ni ɛmɛyadi senɛ an na.
66021020	A duun bɔɛ ni wɔnisi senɛ an na, a wɔdɔn bɔɛ kanidian, a wɔnfean bɔɛ, kisodaiti, a sɛin bɔɛ, bɛyi, a kɔnɔntɔn bɔɛ, topasi, a tan bɔɛ, kisopesi, a tan kun ma dɔndɔn bɔɛ, chasinti, a tan kun ma fean bɔɛ chɛ sin tɔ ni, amɛtisi.
66021021	An fɛnsi chɛ da tan kun ma fea n gbɛɛ, an nyandenɛ ni sen baa gbandenɛ nyima nyima, kani dɔndɔ an na. A da dɔndɔ kan kɔ kan, a nyandenɛ ni an senɛ chɛ dɔndɔ an na. Chia miin sin gbɛɛ ni an duu wa chɛ ɔ, an nyanden ni sanu chɛndɛ chɛndɛ an na, an maenɛ ɛ mia mia yɔ mɛmɛ.
66021022	A sin, n ma Yataa 'a chenɛ kan kɔ kan yen ni an duu wa chɛ ɔ, samun chɛ koe a. Koe min na mu, Yataa Mansa wandi, an fea sa tɔngbɔɛ a, an fan mu gbɛ an chen chɛ a, an duu chɛ ɔ.
66021023	A sin, tee ma gbɔsɔ nii an duu chɛ ma, kau ma gbɔsɔɛ wɛɛ nii a ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa 'a manɛ ɛ wan a ɔ, a yɛ to, sa tɔngbɔɛ wɛɛ ɛ manɛ be wan a ma, yɔ dambo ɛ manɛ be buɛ min dɔ.
66021024	Mɔɛ miin gbɛɛ, an mbe dunya ɔ, an mbe an man chɛ an dɔ, duu wa chɛ a man chɛ. A sin, dunya ma mansa n mbe na‑a wan an 'na nyanɛ n na a ɔ.
66021025	An duu wa fɛnsi chɛ da chɛ n na kaenɛ ɛ ma‑a wan tee ɔ tee a, an na ee tɔn‑da kuɔ fɔ ko a, koe min na mu, pimbi ee ma‑a nɔ.
66021026	Mɔɛ n gbɛɛ dunya ma, an mbe na‑a wan an 'na nyan fen ma kawaenɛ gbɛɛ n na duu wa chɛ ɔ.
66021027	Chɛɛ ko yama kan kɔ kan mbe ee don‑da an duu chɛ ɔ, n mbe ee baa mɔɛ ma, min mbe mauma koe n ma, chɛ ma, fania fɔ mɔɛ nu. Chɛɛ mɔɛ miin mbe don‑da dechee, an nɛ yɔ mɔɛ chɛ nu, miin tɔɛ nyɛnden mu sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ 'a gboo ɔ. Gboo chɛ, mɔɛ miin mbe kuɔ fɔ fɔɛ ma sɔn‑da, an tɔɛ ɛ ka min dɔ.
66022001	Chɛ gbakɔ, maeka chɛ‑a yii chɛ yian n na, yii min mbe fɔɛ be. An yii chɛ kunɛ ɛ Yataa 'a mansa sea chɛ tena wan, an fea sa tɔngbɔɛ chɛ a. Yii gbu ɛ yii‑a, a kɔɔ gbɛenɛ ɛ fo, ɛ ma‑a mia mia yɔ mɛmɛ.
66022002	A sin, yii chɛ ni yii tena wan chia chɛ tɛtɛ ma, chia min ni chia wa a, an duu chɛ ɔ. An yii chɛ tɔnfɛ fea gbɛɛ ma, kɔnɛ n ni wan nɔ sɔ ɔ, miin mbe fɔɛ be. An sin ni gbɔɛ be gba tan kun ma fea sanɛ ma, gba dɔndɔ kau ɔ kau ko a. An kɔn chɛ n sin, an yamba ni buii an na, mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ko a dunya ɔ.
66022003	Fen kɔ fen Yataa‑a min danka, a ee yen‑da an duu chɛ ɔ. Yataa an fea sa tɔngbɔɛ a, an mbe ma‑a wan nɔ si ɔ mansa sea a. A sin, Yataa 'a mɔɛ nu, an mbe a fai‑a wan.
66022004	An mbe Yataa ya kɔɔɛ yen‑da wan, a tɔɛ sin mbe nyɛn‑da wan an tee teeya n na.
66022005	A sin to, pimbi ee ma‑a nɔ kuɔ fɔ, dambo manɛ ma gbɔsɔ ee ma‑a an ma, chɛ ma, tee ma gbɔsɔɛ ni ma an ma. Koe min na mu, Yataa Mansa an mbe ma‑a an 'na manɛ a, an sin mbe ma‑a wan mansa n na, kuɔ fɔ ko a.
66022006	Mbɛ maeka chɛ‑a a fɔ n ye, a ɔ, “Bai chɛ n mu tea bai n fan na, a nyin mɔ ɔ mɔ ni dan miin na. Yataa Mansa an mbe a Nyina be a 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ n ma, min mbe a ma, an mbe a 'a sakana bai sa. A sin‑na a 'a maeka a na, a ni a ɔ yian mɔɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin mbe a ko a, koe miin mbe na tena ma‑a sanche.”
66022007	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A yen ko, a ɔ ee yansan tena to, mbɛ n na‑a. Mɔɛ chɛ duaen mu gba, mɔɛ chɛ, min mbe a too ma sɔ‑a bai chɛ ma gboo chɛ ɔ, bai chɛ min ka‑a Yataa tena.”
66022008	N fan, Chɔn, n fan‑na koe chɛ n na min, mbɛ n‑na an dɔ yen to. N sin na‑a an na min kɛn maeka chɛ a, mbɛ n‑na an dɔ yen, mbɛ n‑na chɛ ma. N‑na n kumbai gbangban fan a chen kɔɔ, n ni a fai, a wɛn‑na fen chɛ n yian n na.
66022009	Chɛɛ a ɔ te to n ma, “I ma chɛ ma. N bɛɛ, Yataa 'a yɔnɛ mu n na. N mbe ka wan dechee yɔ i wan, wo bɛ i suun ma nyɔnɛ n na, Yataa 'a gbonka chɛ mɔɛ nu, a basan mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin too ma sɔen mu gboo chɛ ɔ bai n ma. Chɛ an fɛ mu, Yataa an fai.”
66022010	Mbɛ a ɔ te to n ma, “Yataa 'a sakana bai chɛ nu gboo chɛ ɔ, i ma an dɔ nun mɔɛ n ma. Koe min na mu, tima ɔ wua‑a gbɛ, an koe chɛ n bɔ koe a a a.
66022011	Chɛ an fɛ mu, ko yama ma mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ, an ni a a tun ko yama ma a. Mɔɛ chɛ n gbɛɛ ko tɛ‑a, an ni a a tun ko yama yama tɛ a. Mɔɛ chɛ n sin, miin mbe ko chɛndɛ ma, an ni a a tun ko chɛndɛ ma koe a. Mɔɛ chɛ n bɛɛ, miin mbe tenchen Yataa ko a, an ni a a tun ma koe a a ko a.”
66022012	Mbɛ Chisɔsi ɔ, “A yen ko, a ɔ ee yansan tena to, mbɛ n na‑a. N mbe na‑a wan tɔnɔnɛ a, mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a kuiɛ a yɛ koe a, yɔ a na‑a wai min nyɔn sima chɛ.
66022013	N fan mbe a ma fen fen mbe a kuu sɔ, n fan mbe a ma to fen fen mbe danka.”
66022014	Mɔɛ chɛ n duaen mu, miin mbe an 'na koa ko‑a, min mbe a ma, an ni don duu wa chɛ ɔ, fɛnsi chɛ da chɛ n na, mbɛ an‑na kɔn chɛ gbɔɛ daun, kɔn chɛ min mbe fɔɛ be ka.
66022015	Chɛɛ mɔɛ chɛ n nɛnɛ nu, wuu chɛ nu, an mbe ma‑a an duu wa chɛ fɛnsi kɔ wan. Mɔɛ nu, miin mbe suaya a, ni miin mbe ko tɛ a. Chɛ n bɛɛ miin mbe mɔɛ fa, ni miin mbe fenɛ n fai, min ma Yataa a. A basan chɛ n gbɛɛ a, miin toen mu fania koe n na, an sin mbe fania fɔ tima ɔ tima ko a.
66022016	“N fan Chisɔsi, n 'na maeka, n‑na a a na wan wo tena. N‑na a a na, a ni koe chɛ n dɔ yian wo a, wo wɛn mbe chɔchi chɛ n dɔ. N fan, n bɔen mu Mansa Defidi 'a dambi an dɔ. N fan mu tɔmbuaka chɛ a, min mbe man taun banda ɔ ka da ma.”
66022017	Yataa Nyina an fea sa tɔngbɔɛ 'a sɛnama a, an dɔ, “Mansa Chisɔsi, na fo.” Chɛ a min mɔɛ wɛɛ, a ni a fɔ, a ɔ, “Mansa Chisɔsi, na fo.” Mɔ ɔ mɔ min kanɛ a gbaaen mu, a ni na wɛ. Mɔ ɔ mɔ min toen mu na koe a, fɔɛ be yii chɛ min koe a, a ee ka na‑a, a sɔnkɔ be ee a ma.
66022018	N fan Chɔn, n 'na dasi, a yen ko mɔ ɔ mɔ tena, a si bai chɛ n ma gboo chɛ ɔ, bai miin ka‑a ka Yataa tena. Ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a a ta sa bai chɛ n ma, kasaa sɛsɛ miin mbe gboo chɛ ɔ, Yataa ɛ a nyɔn sima, a ma mundaenɛ si‑a wan a mɔɛ chɛ a.
66022019	A sin to, ni mɔ ɔ mɔ‑a fen kɔ fen ka an bai chɛ n na, miin ka‑a Yataa tena, Yataa ɛ a ta kɔ fenɛ kun ma ka‑a wan. A ta kɔ fen chɛ, min mbe ka kɔn chɛ ɔ, fɔɛ be kɔn chɛ, a basan duu wa chɛ ɔ a. An kɔ fen chɛ n gbɛɛ, miin bakoe ɔ yiandenɛ ɛ gboo chɛ ɔ.
66022020	Mɔɛ chɛ, min mbe koe chɛ n gbɛɛ fɔ‑a, a ɔ, “Tea ko a, n na tima ɔ ma yansan to.” A ni ma ka. Mansa Chisɔsi, na fo.
66022021	Mansa Chisɔsi 'a dua ni ma Yataa 'a mɔɛ n gbɛɛ ma. A ni ma ka.
